NSu_0.1–0.2	śriyaḥ patye nitya agaṇita guṇa māṇikya viśada prabhā jāla ullāsa upahata sakalā vadyatamase jagat janma sthema pralaya racanā śīla vapuṣe namaḥ aśeṣa āmnāya smṛti hṛdaya dīptāya haraye yena prādurabhāvi bhūmi valaye vyastāri go santatiḥ prābodhi śruti paṅkajam karuṇayā prākāśi tattvam param dhvāntam dhvaṃsa m anāyi sādhu nikaraḥ ca akāri sat mārga gastena vyāsa divākareṇa satatam mā tyāji me mānasam 
NSu_0.3–0.4	 vyāptiḥ yasya nije nijena mahasā pakṣe sa pakṣe sthitiḥ vyāvṛttiḥ ca vipakṣataḥ atha viṣaye sakti nar vai bādhite na eva asti pratipakṣa yuktiḥ atulam śuddham pramāṇam sa me bhūyāt tattva vinirṇayāya bhagavān ānanda tīrthaḥ muniḥ bhavati yad anubhavāt eḍa mūkaḥ api vāgmī jaḍa matiḥ api jantuḥ jāyate prājña mauliḥ sakala vacana cetaḥ devatā bhāratī sā mama vacasi nidhattām sannidhim mānase ca 
NSu_0.5–0.8	 ramā nivāsa ūci vāsa bhūmiḥ sannyāya ratna āvali janma bhūmiḥ vairāgya bhāgyaḥ mama padmanābha tīrtha amṛta abdhiḥ bhavatādvi bhūtyai pada vākya pramāṇa jñān prativādi mada= chidaḥ śrī mat akṣobhya tīrtha ākhyā an upatiṣṭhe gurūn mama śrīmat ānanda tīrtha ārya sat manaḥ sarasī bhuvi anuvyākhyāna naline cañcarīkati me manaḥ na śabda abdhau gāḍhāḥ na ca nigama carcāsu caturā na ca nyāye prauḍhāḥ na ca vidita vedyāḥ api vayam param śrīmat pūrṇa pramati guru kāruṇya saraṇim prapannāḥ mānyāḥ smaḥ kim api ca vadantaḥ api mahatām 
NSu_0.9	 bhagavatā bādarāyaṇena prāṇinām niḥśreyasāya praṇītam api brahma mī māṃsā śāstram asādhu nibandha andhatamasā avakuṇṭhita tvena apraṇītam iva manyamānaḥ bhagavān ānanda tīrtha muniḥ yathā acārya abhiprāyam asya bhāṣyam vidhāya anubhāṣyam api kariṣyan vilīna prakṛti tayā svayam antarāya vidhuraḥ api anavaratam īśvara pravaṇa kāya karaṇa vṛttiḥ api nārāyaṇa praṇāma ādikam prāripsitasya anantarāya parisamāpteḥ pracayasya ca hetu tayā avigīta śiṣya ācāra parampara ādinā avagatam avaśyam karaṇīyam śiṣyān grāhayitum grantha ādau nibadhnāti nārāyaṇam iti 
NSu_1.1.1.1–1.1.1.2	 nārāyaṇam nikhila pūrṇa guṇa eka deham nirdoṣam āpyatamam api akhilaiḥ su vākyaiḥ asya udbhavāt idam aśeṣa viśeṣataḥ api vandyam sadā priyatamam mama sat namāmi atra nārāyaṇam sannamāmi iti anvayaḥ uttama puruṣa prayogāt eva aham iti labhyate samiti bhaktayā ādi atiśaya sāhitya lakṣaṇām pramāṇasya samyaktām āha tathāvidhaḥ eva hi nārāyaṇa praṇāmaḥ bhavati abhimata siddheḥ aṅgam nikhila ityādīnām tu pramāṇa karmaṇā nārāyaṇena viśeṣaṇa tayā sambandhaḥ prayojanam ca stuti padānām viśeṣya praśaṃsā eva tatra arthika punarukteḥ stuti tvam eva samādhānam avadhātavyam 
NSu_1.1.1.3^1	 athavā kutas nārāyaṇasya namya tvam tathā tve api kṛtaḥ anyāsu devatāsu satīṣu tasya eva namanam iti atra uktam aśeṣa viśeṣataḥ api vandyam iti viśiṣṭate vaḥ tu ebhiḥ iti viśeṣāḥ asādhāraṇa dharmāḥ aśeṣāḥ ca te viśeṣāḥ ca apiḥ abhivyāptau yāvantaḥ vandya tva nimitta bhūtāḥ dharmāḥ tebhyaḥ viśeṣebhyaḥ api hetubhyaḥ vandyam tathā aśeṣāt vandya tvena samāśaṅkitāt padma bhava ādeḥ jagataḥ viśeṣaḥ atiśayaḥ aśeṣaḥ sarva uttama tvam tatas hetoḥ satīṣu anyāsu devatāsu vandyam iti etat ubhayam katham nārāyaṇasya iti atas abhihitam nikhila ityādi trividhā hi devatā vandyā bhavati viśiṣṭa adhikṛteṣyā ca iti na hi devatā vandanam vyasani tayā kriyate kintu vighna vighāta ādi prayojana apekṣayā viśiṣṭā eva devatā tasya iṣye 
NSu_1.1.1.3^2	 adhikṛtā ca sva viṣaya grantha prabodha ādikam sampādayati vandanam khalu bhaktayā ādi upetam eva saphalam tat ca iṣyāyām eva devatāyām upapadyate iti tatra vaiśiṣyayā upapādanāya nikhila pūrṇa guṇa eka deham nirdoṣam asya udbhavāt idam iti viśeṣaṇa trayam nikhilāḥ niḥśeṣāḥ pūrṇāḥ pratyekam api anavadhikāḥ guṇāḥ ānanda ādayaḥ eka śabdaḥ kevala arthaḥ te eva dehaḥ yasya na punar prākṛta ādiḥ iti tathā uktaḥ niṣkrāntaḥ doṣebhyaḥ pāratantrī ādibhyaḥ iti nirdoṣaḥ asya pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddha tayā buddhi sannihitasya sva vyatirikta prapañcasya udbhava utpattiḥ ādiḥ asya iti udbhava ādi janma ādi aṣṭakam tat yathā sambhavam dadāti iti udbhava ādi dastam asya iti sambandha mātre ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣa viśeṣataḥ api iti etat asya udbhavāt idam iti anena api sambaddhayate 
NSu_1.1.1.4	 viyat adhi karaṇa ādi vyutpādya samastauvāntara bheda sahita udbhavāt idam iti adhikṛta tva pradarśanāya api atamam api akhilaiḥ su vākyaiḥ iti api śabdaḥ vandya tve hetu samuccaya arthaḥ abhivyāptau vā apauruṣeya tvena tad mūla tvena vānāśaṅkita doṣa tva ādinā śobhanāni vākyāni veda ādīni brahmasūtra ādīni ca su vākyāni taiḥ akhilaiḥ āpyatamam atiśayena pratipādyam yadi vyāci khya asitena brahmamī māṃsā śāstreṇa tad nirṇetavya arthena veda ādinā ca pratipādya iti nārāyaṇaḥ vandanīyaḥ hanta tarhi tatas eva dharma ādikam prāṇa ādikam vā vandanīyam syāt na syāt tasya nārāyaṇa pratipatti aṅga tayā veda ādi eka deśa pratipādya tvāt asya punar ananya artha tayā akhila veda ādi vedya tvāt tathāvidham eva ca adhikṛtam ucyate iti āśayavatā api atamam iti akhilaiḥ iti ca uktam iṣṭa tva pradaśarnam sadā priyatamam mama iti atra api pūrvavat sat āpadasya tam apaḥ ca prayojanam avadheyam 
NSu_1.1.1.5	 yat vā na anirdhārita svarūpasya praṇāmaḥ yuktaḥ na ca antareṇa lakṣaṇam vastu nirdhāraṇam iti atas vibhavāt anekāni nārāyaṇasya lakṣaṇāni anena ucyante tatra nikhila iti anena nikhila guṇa tvam pūrṇa guṇa tvam svatas guṇa eka deha tvam ca iti vipakṣa abhedena trīṇi lakṣaṇāni uditāni nirdoṣam iti anena ekam āpyatamam iti anena veda ādi mukhya artha tvam akhila veda ādi artha tvam ca iti dvayam asya iti anena āṣyau aśeṣa iti anena mukhya vandya tvam uktam aśeṣāt viśeṣeṇa vandyam iti sadā iti anena parama prema yogya tvam tasya ana anubhāvika tvāt asambhavam āśaṅkaya sadā mama iti uktam anyeṣām api jñāna uttara kālam idam ānubhāvikam mama tu sadā iti api śabdaḥ lakṣaṇa samuccaye athavā nikhila ityādi ukta lakṣaṇa upapanna tayā nārāyaṇaḥ kena pramāṇena pratipattavyaḥ iti atas 
NSu_1.1.1.6	 su vākyairāpyam iti uktam nanu veda ādi eka deśe anyathā api ucyate na tad pratīteḥ aparāmarśa pūrvaka tvāt iti āśayena akhilaiḥ iti uditam tarhi dharma ādi asiddhiḥ syāt tasya pramāṇa antara agocara tvāt mā evam amukhyayā vṛttyā dharma ādeḥ api veda ādi vedya tvāt iti āśayavatā api atamam iti abhihitam api śabdaḥ vakṣyamāṇa pramāṇa samuccaya arthaḥ sakala jagat nimitta kāraṇa tva ādi hetubhiḥ api ukta lakṣaṇaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ pratyetavyaḥ iti abhipretya uktam asya iti 
NSu_1.1.1.7	 yat vā nārāyaṇasya deha sadbhāve duḥkha ādi doṣa anuṣaṅgaḥ tad abhāve jñāna ādi guṇa abhāvaḥ ubhayathā api jagat janma ādi kāraṇatva asambhavaḥ iti āśaṅkayā uktam nikhila pūrṇa guṇa eka deham nirdoṣam iti dehavat tvāt jñānā ādi guṇa pūrṇaḥ tasya api nikhila pūrṇa guṇa mātra tvena duḥkha ādi doṣa rahitaḥ ca iti athavā na ayam nārāyaṇa śabdaḥ ḍittha ādi śabdaḥ iva bhagavati sa aṅgetikaḥ ghaṭa ādi śabdaḥ iva vā rūḍhi mātra pravṛttaḥ kintu viśiṣṭa guṇān api ācaṣṭaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.1.8	 athavā śrotṛ buddha yanu kūlanāya sakala śāstra artham saṅkṣepataḥ anena ācaṣṭe vidita saṅkṣepāḥ hi prapañcam jijñāsavaḥ bhavanti tatra sadā vandyam iti prathama sūtra artha uktiḥ manaḥ vṛtteḥ tad pravaṇa tā hi vandanam jijñāsā api tad viśeṣaḥ eva tasya jīva ādi vyāvṛttaye yat brahma iti uktam tasya arthaḥ nikhila iti tad upapādanāya dvitīya sūtre lakṣaṇam abhihitam tat āha asya iti tṛtīya sūtreṇa tatra śāstram pramāṇam abhidhāya tasya adhyāya śeṣeṇa tad viṣaya tā upapāditā tat kathanam āpyatamam iti prathama adhyāya arthe śaṅkita doṣa nirāsaḥ dvitīye abhihitaḥ tam āha nirdoṣam iti evam brahma svarūpe siddhe adhikāriṇaḥ tad prasāda sādhana upāya bhūta tad sākṣātkāra jananāya vairāgya bhaktibhyām akhila veda artha śravaṇa ādi tṛtīya 
NSu_1.1.2.1–1.1.2.2	 tam eva śāstra prabhavam praṇamya jagadgurūṇām gurum añjasā eva viśeṣataḥ me parama ākhya vidyā vyākhyām karomi anu api ca aham eva nārāyaṇa praṇāmasya iva guru praṇāmasya api abhimata siddhayaṅga tayā kārya ārambhe a vaśyam anuṣṭheya tvāt tad ācaraṇa puraḥsaram brahmamī māṃsā śāstra vyākhyānam samarthayamānaḥ pratijānīte tam eva iti tam pūrva praṇatam nārāyaṇam eva anu api punar api praṇamya bhaktayā ādi upeta tā lakṣaṇena prakarṣeṇa natvā aham parama ākhya vidyāyāḥ brahmamī māṃsā śāstra rūpāyāḥ vyākhyām karomi iti sambandhaḥ vartamāna sāmīpya ardvarta māna vyapadeśaḥ saṅkṣepataḥ vyākhyānasya prakrānta tvāt vā 
NSu_1.1.2.3^1	 nanu praṇatasya punar praṇāmaḥ kimarthaḥ na hi praṇāma āvṛttiḥ vighna vighāta ādi hetuḥ iti atra niyāmakam asti bhāve vā pūrva ślokaḥ eva bahuśas sannamāmi iti vaktavyam mā evam guru tvena atra praṇāma ācaraṇāt katham nārāyaṇasya guru tvam iti atas āha śāstra prabhavam iti śāstra śabdena prakṛta tvāt brahmamīmāṃsā śāstram veda ādikam ca ucyate prabhavati utpadyate prathamam upalabhyate vā yasmāt saḥ prabhavaḥ yathāsambhavam śāstrasya prabhavaḥ śāstra prabhavaḥ tam yaḥ hi yat śāstre pravartate tasya tad prabhāvaḥ guruḥ iti prasiddham eva prakṛta śāstra sampradāya pravartaka tvāt ca nārāyaṇasya guru tvam iti āha jagadgurūṇām iti 
NSu_1.1.2.3^2	 jagataḥ etat śāstra pravaktṛṇām brahma ādīnām añjasā mukhya tayā na tu vayaḥ adhika tva ādi mātreṇa gurum asya śāstrasya pravaktāram iti yāvat prakāra antareṇa guru tvam nārāyaṇasya samarthayate viśeṣate iti gurum iti vartate viśeṣate iti sākṣāt upadeṣyṛ tvena na tu jagataḥ iva paramparayā atra yadi śāstra prabhavam ityādyeva ucyeta tadā pṛthak praṇāmena devatāyāḥ guroḥ ca pārthakyaśaṅkā syāt tad artham tam eva iti uktam na ca evam pṛthak praṇāma anupapattiḥ nimitta dvaya samāveśe naimittika vilopa niyama abhāvāt śiṣya śikṣāyai ca etat granthe niveśanam śiṣyāṇām ca asti guru devatā bhedaḥ tad apekṣayā eva jagadgurūṇām iti uktam anyathā viśeṣataḥ me iti uktam ayuktam syāt 
NSu_1.1.2.4	 syāt etat atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti ādikam grantham vyākhyātu mayam devatā ādi praṇāmaḥ naca ayam vyākhyātavyaḥ artha vivakṣā pūrvakasya eva pauruṣeya vākyasya vyākhyātavya tvāt na hi mātṛkā mātra vyākhyāne prekṣāvān pravartate naca asya artha vivakṣā pūrvaka tve mānam asti praṇayana mātrasya vyabhicāri tvāt prekṣāvat praṇayanasya ca aniścayāt niścaye vā viṣa hara mantrasya iva japa ādinā abhyudaya siddhaye nirmāṇa upapatteḥ gṛhīta saṅgateḥ artha pratibhāsaḥ hi viṣa hara mantre api samānaḥ naca artha vivakṣā pūrvaka tva mātreṇa upādeya tā vyākhyānam yuktam vipralambhaka ādi vākya vyākhyāna prasaṅgāt kim nāma yāthārthye ca sati naca asya yāthārthye mānam asti tad bhāve api tathāvidha vākya antara parityāgena asya eva vyākhyāne kāraṇam vaktavyam iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya parama ākhya vidyā iti uktam 
NSu_1.1.2.5	 ayam abhisandhiḥ asti tāvat asmin granthet ve vidye veditavye parā ca eva aparā ca a ityādau para vidyā ākhyā atra vidyā śabdena artha vivakṣā yāthārthyam ca asya avagamyate yāthārthya jñāna tad sādhanayoḥ vidyā śabdasya yoga rūḍhibhyām pravṛtta tvāt saṃjñāyām samajaniṣadaḥ a iti atra saṃjñāyām iti anuvṛtteḥ para śabdena ca yāthārthyāt vākya antarāt utkarṣaḥ tat evam āgamena asya sarva uttama praṇāmā api apratīteḥ gahana artha tvad ca upapannam anya parityāgena asya eva vyākhyānam iti tathā api anyaiḥ eva vyākhyāta tvāt na punar idam vyākhyātavyam iti atas vyākhyām iti uktam viśiṣṭā akhyā vyākhyā anena para kṛtānām apavyākhyāna tām abhipraiti tathā ca tatra tatra pradarśayiṣyati tathā api sva praṇīta bhāṣyeṇa eva kṛta vyutpādanam idam śāstram iti kim anena vyutpādanena iti atas anu api ca iti āha caśabdena anuvyākhyāne prayojana sadbhāvam samuccinoti tat ca vakṣyate prayojana sadbhāve bhāṣya diśā śiṣyāḥ eva anuvyākariṣyanti iti atas aham eva itya abhihitam eva śabdena anyeṣām asāmarthyam sūcayati 
NSu_1.1.3.1–1.1.3.2^1	 prādurbhūtaḥ hariḥ vyāsaḥ viriñca bhava pūrvakaiḥ arthitaḥ paravidyā ākhyam cakre śāstram anuttamam yat uktam nārāyaṇaḥ asya śāstrasya prabhavaḥ iti tat ayuktam vyāsa upajñatā prasiddhi virodhāt na ca nārāyaṇaḥ eva vyāsaḥ janana virodhāt kṛtakṛtyasya prayojana abhāvena śāstra praṇayanā sambhavāt ca yat ca asya śrautyā para vidyā ākhyayā sarva uttama prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti tat api ayuktam para śabdasya aneka artha tvena vidyā śabdasya ca artha vivakṣā virahiṇī api mantre prayoga darśanena para vidyā ākhyāyāḥ sarva uttama prāmāṇya aniścāyaka tvāt kiñca iyam para vidyā ākhyā etat viṣaya iti atra api na niyāmakam asti iti atas āha prādurbhūtaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.3.2^2	 atra kṛtakṛtyaḥ api hariḥ ātma kṛpa āspadaiḥ viriñca bhava pūrvakaiḥ amaraiḥ arthitaḥ vyāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ na tu jātaḥ grantham imam cakraḥ iti anena nārāyaṇasya śāstra prabhava tve anupapattiḥ parihṛtāḥ dṛśyante hi kevalam kṛpā pāra vaśyena para upakārāya pravartamānāḥ sutarām taiḥ arthitāḥ atas eva para prayojanam api ātma gāmi iva manyamānasya bhagavataḥ śāstra praṇayanam iti jñāpayitum ātma nepada prayogaḥ atra ca nārāyaṇāt viniṣpannam iti ādi a āgamaḥ pramāṇam para vidyā ākhyayā asya sarva uttama prāmāṇya siddhim vyutpādayitum para vidyā ākhyam iti anūdyān uttamam śāstram iti vyākhyātam na asti uttamam śāstram asmāt iti anuttamam śiṣyate yathāsthitam pratipādyate tattvam anena iti śāstram 
NSu_1.1.3.3	 idam uktam bhavati dve vidye veditavye parā ca eva aparā ca a iti vidyādvayam uddiśya tatra apara ityādinā sa aṅgān vedān apara vidyā tvena uktavāatha parā yayā tat akṣaram adhigamyate a iti para vidyā pradarśitā sā tāvat veda ādi śāstra prakaraṇāt parama akṣara adhigati karaṇa tva liṅgāt ca śāstram eva bhavitum arhati anyathā sakṛt ukta vidyā śabdasya aneka artha tva kalpanā prasaṅgāt ca śāstram ca apramāṇam ca iti vipratiṣiddham tasya ca para tvam 
NSu_1.1.3.4	 na amanyat na sambhavati iti anuttama tvam eva tat api sannidhānāt pramāṇa tvena eva śabda antara samabhivyāhāra vaśena sāmānya śabdasya viśeṣa ātharsya kalpanīya tvāt tat yathā parama dhārmikaḥ iti abhihite parama tvam dharmeṇa iti jñāyate tat ca anuttamam śāstram idam eva vivakṣitam nirṇetavya arthānāmṛga ādi pada upalakṣitānām aśeṣa śāstrāṇām apara vidyā tvena ukta tvāt anyasya aprasaṅgāt paratva asambhavāt ca sambhavati tu asya paratvam anugrāhaka tvāt etena upaniṣadaḥ para vidyā iti vyākhyānam iti parāḥ tam ṛc a ādi grahaṇena tāsām api gṛhīta tvāt brāhmaṇa parivrājaka nyāyaḥ ca agatikā gatiḥ tat janyam jñānam para vidyā iti api na yuktam adhigati karaṇa tva anupapatteḥ aneka artha tā kalpana āpatteḥ ca atas anayā para vidyā ākhyayā asya śāstrasya sarva uttama prāmāṇya sādhanam upapannam iti 
NSu_1.1.3.5	 yadi api vidyā śāstra śabdau śiṣya ācārya vyāpāra anubandhinau tathā api ubhaya anugata tattva jñāna karaṇa tva mātram upādāya dvayoḥ aikārthyam uktam iti avagantavyam ṛc a ādyāḥ aparā vidyā yadā viṣṇoḥ na vācakāḥ tāḥ eva paramā vidyā yadā viṣṇoḥ tu vācakāḥ a iti bhagavat pādīyam vyākhyānam api etam eva artham sūcayati brahma mī māṃsā śāstra vyutpādita nyāyān upakṛtāḥ hi veda ādayaḥ viṣṇoḥ avācakāḥ tad u kṛtāḥ ca tasya vācakāḥ bhavanti iti tathā api kevalasya na para vidyā tvam labhyate iti ced mā lābhi veda ādi iti kartavya tārūpasya asya pṛthak prāmāṇya anabhyupagamāt 
NSu_1.1.4.1–1.1.4.2	 guruḥ gurūṇām prabhavaḥ śāstrāṇām bādarāyaṇaḥ yatas tat uditam mānam aja ādibhyaḥ tad arthataḥ evam tāvat āgamena asya śāstrasya anuttamam prāmāṇyam prasādhya adhunā anumānato api tat siṣādhayiṣuḥ ādau tāvat prāmāṇya mātre anumānam vaktum āha guruḥ iti yatas yat kāraṇam bādarāyaṇaḥ gurūṇām jagataḥ tattva upadeśakānām brahma ādīnām guruḥ upadeṣyāḥ yatas ca śāstrāṇām vedānām bhārata ādīnām ca yathāsambhavam prabhavaḥ gurūṇām aśeṣa artha pratipādakānām sa vistarāṇām veda ādi śāstrāṇām guruḥ mukhya prabhavaḥ na tu sampradāya mātra pravartakaḥ iti vā yatas ca aja ādibhyaḥ śrotṛbhyaḥ teṣām arthaḥ mokṣaḥ tad arthaḥ tasmai tad arthataḥ tat uditam tena bādarāyaṇena upadiṣyam idam śāstram atas mānam bhavitum arhati 
NSu_1.1.4.3^1	 atra guruḥ gurūṇām ityādi hetūnām vaktṛ śrotṛ prasaṅgānām ānukūlyāni eva sākṣāt sādhyāni mānasī iti tu parama sādhya nirdeśaḥ iti jñātavyam tathā hi vivakṣita artha tattva jñānam karaṇa pāṭavam vivakṣā ca iti trayam vaktuḥ ānukūlyam nāma tattva jñāna yogyatā vaktṛ prīti viṣaya tā ca iti dvayam śrotuḥ śrotṛ prayojana uddeśaḥ prasaṅgasya tatra gurūṇām guruḥ iti vaktuḥ bādarāyaṇasya vivakṣita artha tattva jñāna sādhane hetuḥ yaḥ hi yasya tattva upadeṣyā sa tatas adhika tattva jñānavān upalabdhaḥ ayam ca sarvajña kalpānām brahma ādīnām tattva upadeṣyāḥ brahma rudra ādi deveṣu iti ādya āgamāt avagataḥ atas savarjñaḥ bhavitum arhati iti gurūṇām śāstrāṇām guruḥ prabhavaḥ iti anena api tattva jñānam karaṇa pāṭavam ca sādhyate yaḥ hi yāvat athar pratipādakasya āgamasya prabhavaḥ sa tāvantam artham tattvataḥ jānan= avagataḥ 
NSu_1.1.4.3^2	 ayam ca aśeṣa artha pratipādakasya āgamasya prabhavaḥ anuktam pañcabhiḥ vedaiḥ utsannān bhagavān vedān ityādi vacanāt avagataḥ tatas bhavitavyam anena sarvajñena yaḥ ca baha uḥ āgamasya prabhavaḥ saḥ asati nimitta antare paṭu karaṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ayam ca aparasya veda ādeḥ prabhavaḥ katham apaṭu karaṇaḥ bhavet iti tat uditam iti vacanena kāryeṇa vaktuḥ vivakṣā kāraṇa bhūta upapāditā gurūṇām iti śrotṛṇām tattva jñāna yogya topa pādane hetuḥ na hi svayam tattva jñāna ayogyaḥ pareṣām tattva upadeṣyāḥ dṛṣṭaḥ aja ādibhyaḥ iti vaktṛ prema āspadatva upapādanam brahma ādayaḥ hi parameśvara prema viṣayāḥ su prasiddhāḥ tad arthataḥ iti prasaṅga ānukūlya upapādanam atra sarvatra akāraṇa kārya utu atti ādi prasaṅgaḥ vipakṣe bādhakaḥ tarkaḥ unneyaḥ 
NSu_1.1.4.4–1.1.4.5	 nanu atra guruḥ gurūṇām ityādīnām śāstra prāmāṇyena yathāśrutaḥ eva sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ vyākhyāyatām kim madhye sādhya antara adhyāhāra kalpanayā yadi api yathāśrutānām eṣām vyadhikaraṇa tā tathā api tat uditam iti vacanāt vibhakti vipariṇāmena eka adhikaraṇa tā bhaviṣyati yadi api ca ete pratyekam bauddha āgama ādau mānatām vyabhicaranti tathā api militānām hetu tāḥ tu bhārata ādi aśeṣa sat śāstra prabhava praṇīta tva aṃśasya sa pakṣa apraveśita tvena asādha araṇyam syāt iti ced na teṣu eva hetu vṛtti sambhavāt tad prāmāṇyasya mahā jana parigraha ādinā niścita tvāt evam tarhi bhārata ādi praṇayana viśiṣṭena 
NSu_1.1.4.6–1.1.4.7	 teṣām apraṇīta tvāt bādarāyaṇena brahma ādīn prati tat mokṣa ārtam upadiṣṭa tva mātram hetuḥ syāt iti ced bāḍham tāvat mātrasya eva vyabhicāra abhāvāt tathā sati guruḥ gurūṇām prabhavaḥ śāstrāṇām iti vyartham āpadyate iti ced na tasya hetu śarīra apraveśinaḥ api dṛṣṭānta upadarśana ādinā sārthakya upapatteḥ iti satyam tathā api na etat evam vijñātum śakyam tathā sati uttara vākye vaktra ādi ānukūlyasya sādhya sambandha vyutpāda nam asaṅgatam syāt tad anumāna antaram bhaviṣyati iti ced na tathā tve prāmāṇyam trividham a 
NSu_1.1.5.1–1.1.6.2	 vaktṛ śrotṛ prasaktīnām yat ā āptiḥ anukūla tā āpta vākya tayā tena śruti mūla tayā tathā yukti mūla tayā ca eva prāmāṇyam trividham mahat dṛśyate brahmasūtrāṇām ekadhā anyatra sarvaśas nanu tarhi anena idam uditam bhavati etat śāstram pramāṇam anukūla vaktra ādimattvāt bhārata ādi vat vaktra ādi ānukūlyam ca ukta hetu siddham iti etad anupapannam āpta vākya tāyāḥ tatra upādhi tvāt na ca pratyakṣa ādau sati api prāmāṇye na asti āpta vākya tvam iti sādhya avyāpaka tvāt na ayam upādhiḥ iti vācyam 
NSu_1.1.6.3	 vākya tva avacchinna sādhya vyāpaka tvena upādhi tva upapatteḥ tathā api apauruṣeye vede tad abhāvāt anupādhi tvam iti ced na veda apauruṣeya tvasya asambhavāt saṃmata tve vā sādhana avacchinne pauruṣeya vākya tva avacchinne vā sādhye asya upādhi tva upapatteḥ iti mā evam abhiprāyān avagamāt na hi vayam vaktra ādi ānukūlyena śāstra prāmāṇyam sākṣāt sādhayitum udyatāḥ yena atra upādhi udbhāvanam saṅgaccheta api tarhi anukūla vaktra ādimattvasya āpta vākya tayā vyāpta tvāt tena tām prasādhya tayā prāmāṇyam śāstrasya sādhyate iti āśayavān āha vaktṛ śrotṛ prasaktīnām iti yadi atra vākye vaktṛ śrotṛ prasaktīnām anukūla tā tatra āptiḥ yat vaktra ādya ānukūlī ayā upetam tad āpta vākyam iti yāvat yatas evam vyāptiḥ yatas ca asya śāstrasya asti anukūla vaktra ādimat tvam tena siddhayā apta vākya tayā mānam idam śāstram iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ 
NSu_1.1.6.4^1	 etat uktam bhavati vimatam āpta vākyam anukūlena vaktra anukūlān śrotṛn prati tadīya hita sādhana bodhāya upadiṣṭa tvāt sampratipanna vat vimatam pramāṇam āpta vākya tvāt sampratipanna tvāt iti vaktuḥ ānukūlyā abhāvāt jainādi ana āpta vākyam śrotra ānukūlya virahāt bauddha ādi prasaṅga anukūla tā vaidhuryāt narma ādi nanu kaḥ ayam āptaḥ nāma yat vākya tvam sādhyate yathā adṛṣṭa artha vādī iti ced na bhrānti dṛṣṭa artha vādinī api prasaṅgāt pramāṇa dṛṣṭā iti viśeṣaṇe api pramāṇa dṛṣṭasya pramāda ādinā an yathā kathake api prasaṅgāt pramāṇena yathā dṛṣṭam tathā vādī iti ced na 
NSu_1.1.6.4^2	 eka deśe tathābhūta vādi tve api aṃśa antare atathābhūta tva ādinī api prasaṅgāt yāvat pramāṇa dṛṣṭam tāvataḥ vaktā iti ced na prāyeṇa atathābhūta tvāt eva lakṣyāṇām tad avyāpteḥ na hi kena api yāvat pramāṇa pramitam tāvat abhidhīyate yāvat pramāṇa dṛṣṭam tāvataḥ eva vaktā iti ced na ajñāta sandigdha anuvāda vākya prayoktuḥ anāpta tva prasaṅgāt bhīma agrajasya api kadācid cāṭuva ādi tva sambhavena anāpta tva āpatteḥ ca nirdoṣaḥ āptaḥ iti ced na āptānām api kvacid rāga ādi doṣa sambhavāt yatra viṣaye nirdoṣaḥ tatra āptaḥ iti ced na yat tat śabdayoḥ viśeṣa viṣaya tvena asādha araṇyāt avyāpteḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.6.5	 mā evam vivakṣitā athaḥ tattva jñānam avipralipsā vivakṣā karaṇa pāṭavam ca iti iyam āptiḥ tat vā an āptaḥ iti aṅgīkārāt āpta tva abhimate api kadācid idam na asti iti ced mā bhūt tadā asau= anāptaḥ iti aṅgīkārāt kāla ādi bhedena avirodhāt evam sati yaḥ yatra evambhūtaḥ sa tatra āptaḥ iti uktam syāt iti ced aḥ tu kaḥ doṣaḥ yat tat śabda arthayoḥ ananugamaḥ iti ced kaḥ ayam ananugamaḥ nāma kim sārvatrika vyavahāra anaupāyika tva muta ekasya aneka vṛtti tva abhāvaḥ na ādyaḥ yaḥ yasya sutaḥ sa tadīyam dhanam arhati ityādau sārvatrika vyavahāra hetu ta upalambhāt na dvitīyaḥ adoṣa tvāt yathā ca ananugatasya api na avyāptiḥ sārvatrika vyavahāra hetu tā ca tathā sāmānya parīkṣāyām vakṣyāmaḥ 
NSu_1.1.6.6–1.1.6.7	 etena nirdoṣaḥ pramitasya eva vaktā iti lakṣaṇa dvayam api samāhitam veditavyam anuvādasya vāda viṣaya tvena tad prayoktuḥ api āpta tva avirodhāt evaṃca vaktuḥ ānukūlī am āpti eka deśaḥ eva vipralipsā ca śrotṛ prasaṅga anukūla tā eka nibandhanā tad abhāve nivartata iti vaktra ādi ānukūlyavat tāyāḥ āpta vākya tayā susthaḥ pratibandhaḥ nanu āpta vākyatā sva kapola kalpiteṣu mālatī mādhava ādiṣu prāmāṇyam vyabhicarati na hi nāṭaka ādi prabandham viracayan= api kadācid ukta lakṣaṇa upapannaḥ na bhavati bhavabhūtiḥ iti ced na yaḥ yatra evambhūtaḥ iti anena eva ukta uttara tvāt āpti mūla vākyasya āpta vākya tayā vivakṣita tvāt ca abodhakam viparīta bodhakam vā vākyam apramāṇam iti ucyate tatra ābodhakam vaktuḥ apaṭu kāraṇa tayā bhavati viparīta bodhakam ca viparīta jñāna ādinā iti āpti pūrvaka vākya tvasya prāmāṇyena pratibandha siddhiḥ anyathā kāraṇena vinā kārya utpatti prasaṅgāt iti 
NSu_1.1.6.8	 nanu ca anukūla vaktra ādi mattayā prāmāṇya sādhanam eva atra vyākhyāyatām kim āpta vākya tā sādhanam madhye vyākhyāyate vyāpti pakṣa dharma tayoḥ atulya tvāt na hi yat yat vayāpakasya vyāpakam tat tasya avyāpakam iti sambhavati anukūla vaktra ādi mattayā āpta vākya tā sādhane vaktra ānukūlī asya apti eka deśa tvena sādhya aviśiṣṭa tā ca syāt vaktṛ śrotṛ prasaktīnām iti vākyam tu śaṅkitasya upādheḥ sādhana vyāpaka tā pradarśana artham bhaviṣyati mā evam āpta vākya tayā tena iti uttara vākya vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt upādheḥ sādhana vyāpaka tāyāḥ vaktṛ śrotṛ prasaktīnām iti anena eva upapādita tvāt nahi upādhim dūṣayatā sādhana vyāpaka tām vyutpādya sādhanena upādheḥ pakṣe sādhanam vidhāya tena sādhyam sādhanīyam iti kula dharmaḥ 
NSu_1.1.6.9	 upādheḥ sādhana abhedam pradarśya tena sādhyam sādhyate iti ced na āpteḥ vaktṛ mātra dharmasya sādhana abheda anupapatteḥ sādhya aviśiṣṭa tā tu na asti eva vaktra ādīnām ānukūlyena vaktuḥ āpti sādhane khalu aṃśataḥ sā syāt anukūla vaktra ādi mattayā āpta vākyatā sādhyate iti ca uktam tathā api sādhya sādhanayoḥ āpti eka deśa anupraveśaḥ asti iti ced satyam tathā api viśiṣṭa bhedena adoṣa tvāt anyathā yaḥ dhūmavān asau= agnimān iti vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ api na syāt viśeṣya aṃśasya ubhayatra anupraveśāt kṛtaka tva anitya tvayoḥ satta anupraveśe api paraiḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt ca yadā tu nirdoṣaḥ pramitasya eva vaktā āptaḥ iti āśritam tadā sādhya viśiṣṭa tāyāḥ śaṅkā eva na asti 
NSu_1.1.6.10	 grantha kṛtā api kasmāt iyam paramparā aśritā iti ced na vaktra ādi ānukūlyena prāmāṇyam sādhayatā api antatas asya arthasya āśrayaṇīya tvāt anyathā astu vaktra ādi ānukūlyam vaktuḥ vipralipsā mūla tvena aprāmāṇyam ca bhavatu iti āśaṅkāyāḥ kaḥ nivārayitā yadi api prāmāṇyam svatas eva iti bādarāyaṇīyam matam yat vakṣyatina vilakṣaṇa tvāt a iti jaiminiḥ apitat prāmāṇyam bādarāyaṇasya anapekṣa tvāt a iti tathā api aprāmāṇya śaṅkā nirāsa arthaḥ ayam prayatnaḥ iti avirodhaḥ 
NSu_1.1.6.11	 evam vijātīya saṃvādena asya śāstrasya prāmāṇyam upapādya tad anuttamatā siddhaye sajātīya dvaya saṃvādam api āha śruti iti tathā ca śabdau samuccaya arthau mānam iti asya anukarṣaṇa arthau vā yathā āpta vākya tayā tathā śruti mūla tayā api iti upamā arthaḥ vā tathāśabdaḥ yadi api śruti yukti mūla śabdau śruti yuktibhyām atharmupalabhya racitasya vācakau tathā api atra sāmānā artha tā sāmyena gaupyā vṛttyā śruti yukti saṃvādita arthau vyākhyeyau bhagavataḥ bādarāyaṇasya svatas sarvajña tvena mukhya artha asambhavāt yadi ca śruti yukti saṃvāditi eva akṣyat tadā yādṛcchika saṃvāditā api vyajñāsyate sā mā vijñāyi iti gauṇa prayogaḥ evam hi prayoge aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ api adhikaḥ vijñāyate saca pakṣa dharma tā upapādakaḥ bhaviṣyati tatas ca ayam arthaḥ yat śruti saṃvādi tad pramāṇam yathā manu ādi vākyam śruti saṃvādi ca idam śāstram tad artha vicāra paratvāt visaṃvāde tad anupapatteḥ tat ca 
NSu_1.1.6.12	 punar tasya artha vittaye a iti ādya āgama siddham yat ca yukti saṃvādi tad pramāṇam yathā dhūmavantam parvatam uddiśya parvataḥ ayam agnimān iti uktam vākyam yukti saṃvādi ca idam mīmāṃsā rūpa tvāt mīmāṃsāyāḥ ca yukta yanu sandhāna ātmaka tvāt tasmāt pramāṇam anyathā śruteḥ yukteḥ ca aprāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ ardha vaiśasāsambhavāt iti 
NSu_1.1.6.13	 kim atas yat devam iti atas āha eva prāmāṇyam iti eva śabdaḥ brahmasūtrāṇām iti anena sambaddhayate trividham iti kriyā viśeṣaṇam brahma vedaḥ tad arthaḥ para brahma vā tasya sūtrāṇi brahmasūtrāṇi sakala veda artha bhūtasya para brahmaṇaḥ viṣṇoḥ sva rūpa nirṇaya arthāni sūtrāṇi iti yāvat sūtra śabda arthaḥ ca alpa akṣaram iti ādi āgamāt avagantavyaḥ etena etat śāstra vācinaḥ śārīraka śabdasya śarīram eva śarīrakam tatra bhavaḥ śārīrakaḥ jīvaḥ tam adhikṛtya kṛtaḥ ayam granthaḥ śārīrakaḥ iti vyākhyānam nirastam bhavati brahmasūtra śabda arthena viruddha tvāt tvaṃpadā abhidheyasya tad pada abhidheya brahma rūpa tā mīmāṃsā iti vyākhyānāt avirodhaḥ iti ced na asambhavāt na hi janma ādi sūtrāṇi abheda parāṇi pratyuta tad nirāsa parāṇi iti vakṣyate atas śārīrakaḥ paramātmā eva yathā uktam śarīrau tau= ubhau 
NSu_1.1.6.14–1.1.6.15^1	 jñeyau jīvaḥ ca īśvara saṃjñitaḥ a iti tasya sakala gura pūrṇa tva ādi mīmāṃsā eva śārīrakamīmāṃsāḥ tathā ca uktam purāṇesarva doṣa vihīna tvam a ityādi yatas evam brahmasūtrāṇām prāmāṇyam trividham dṛśyate āpta vākya tva ādi pramāṇa trayeṇa dṛśyate iti yāvat atas tat mahat anuttamam mantavyam āpta vākya traya ādi liṅga traya avasitam prāmāṇyam anyatra api ced syāt tadā katham eṣām tat anuttamam iti atas brahmasūtrāṇām eva iti uktam tat katham iti atas āha ekadhā iti sarvaśas iti vacanāt ekadhā iti upalakṣaṇam tathā hi kvacid ekadhā yathā apti mūla tayā laukika viṣaye pitṛ vākye śruti saṃvādena dharma ādi viṣaye prativādi udīrita vacane tat uktaḥ eva pavartaḥ agnimān iti vākye yukti saṃvādena kvacid dvedhā yathā apti śrutibhyām manu ādi vākye āpti yuktibhyām parvataḥ agnimān itya ādau pitṛ vākye 
NSu_1.1.6.15^2	 śruti yuktibhyām īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ iti prativādi udīrita vacasi iti jaiminyādi vākye tredhā api asti iti ced satyam yathā brahmasūtreṣu na tathā niravadhikam hi tatra āpti ādikam etad artham api mahat iti etat trividham iti anena api yojanīyam nanu pramāṇa eka tva aneka tvayoḥ prameya tādavasthyāt katham etat ittham na hi pramāṇa mātram niḥśaṅka pravṛttau= upayujyate kim nāma pramāṇa tayā pramitam eva tat ca yāvat yāvat adhikam pramīyate tad tad anusāriṇīm aviśaṅkām kṣipra pravṛttim prasūtaḥ iti anubhava siddham tatas prāmāṇyam eva sva kārya atiśaya vaśena atiśaya vat ucyate evam viṣaya prayojana atiśaya vaśena api atiśayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ 
NSu_1.1.7.1–1.1.7.2	 atas na etādṛśam kiñcid pramāṇatamam iṣyate svayam kṛtā api tadvayā ākhyā kriyate spaṣṭatā arthataḥ tat evam śruti anumānābhyām idam eva śāstram pramāṇatamam na anyat etādṛśam asti iti upasaṃharati atas iti iṣyate prāmāṇikaiḥ iti śeṣaḥ tathā ca anya parihāreṇa asya eva vyākhyānam yuktam iti hṛdayam nanu bhāratam sarva śāstreṣu uttamam ucyate satyam vicāryeṣu śāstreṣu tat iti avirodhaḥ nanu ca asya śāstrasya ārambhaṇīya tvam sūtrakāraḥ eva prathama sūtre samarthayate tadvayā ākhyānena eva sarvam sampadyate kim anena prathama sūtraḥ eva katham pravṛttiḥ iti ced prathama bhāṣye api katham sandehāt pravṛttasya punar ukta pramāṇaiḥ nirṇayaḥ iti ced samam prathama sūtre api mā evam viṣaya ādi sampādanena eva tat na ca tāvatā arambhaṇīya tvam prāmāṇye hi sati kāka danta parīkṣā grantha vailakṣaṇya artham viṣaya ādi vyutpādanam upayujyate atas sūtra ākṣiptam eva idam śiṣyāṇām buddhi śuddhaye bhāṣya kṛta uktam iti 
NSu_1.1.7.3^1	 tathā api na idam vyākhyātavyam vyākhyāta tva āditi atra anvapi ca iti yat prayojana antaram asti iti sūcitam tad vivaraṇa artham āha svayam iti yadi api teṣām brahmasūtrāṇām vyākhyā svayam mayā eva bhāṣye kṛtā tathā api punar atra spaṣṭa tā eva arthaḥ prayojanam yasya spaṣṭatā arthaḥ tasmai spaṣṭatā arthataḥ bhāṣye aspaṣṭīkṛtam artham spaṣṭīkartum kriyate spaṣṭīkaraṇam ca anekavidham kvacid anukta aṃśasya uktiḥ kvāpi ati saṅkṣiptasya vistaraṇam kvacid ati vistṛta tayā buddhayana ārūḍhasya saṅkṣepaḥ kvāpi vikṣiptasya ekīkaraṇam kutra api uktasya upapādanam kvacid apavyākhyāna nirāsena dṛḍhīkaraṇam ityādi tatra tatra draṣṭavyam nanu ekatra eva sarvam vaktavyam kim prasthāna bhedena mā evam yatas saṅkṣepa vistarābhyām uktam śrotṛṇām su graham sa prayojanam ca bhavati yathā uktam saṅkṣepa vistarābhyām tu kathayanti manīṣiṇaḥ bahuvāra smṛteḥ tasya phala bāhulya kāraṇāt a iti 
NSu_1.1.7.3^2	 tatra bhāṣya ādyapadya arthaḥ atra śloka trayeṇa vivṛtaḥ tathā hi sarva guṇa udīrṇa tā uktayā prāptā guṇa guṇi bheda śaṅkā nikhila ityādinā nirākṛtāḥ jñeya tva gamya tvayoḥ itarasādhāraṇyāt katham viśeṣaṇa tvam iti āśaṅkā āpyatamam iti anena parihṛtāḥ api śabdaḥ viśeṣaṇa antara samuccaya arthaḥ tad vivaraṇam asya ityādi śāstra prabhavam ityādibhiḥ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ yat gurutva upapādanam tena gurūn= ca iti bahuvacana antam padam vivṛtam guru devatayoḥ bhede apipadena aruciḥ sūcitā tad vivṛtiḥ tam eva iti sampraśabdābhyām na tvā iti viśeṣitam nirupapada sūtra grahaṇena yat brahmasūtrāṇām sarva uttama prāmāṇyam sūcitam tad upapādanam parama ākhyā iti yat dvāparaḥ iti adibhāṣyam tad asaṅgatam sūtra artha vacanam pratijñāya tad utpatti krama kathanasya upayoga adarśanāt mā evam yasmāt āpti mūla tva ādi yuktayā api brahmasūtrāṇām sarva uttamam prāmāṇyam samarthayitum etat iti darśayati guruḥ gurūṇām ityādinā iti 
NSu_1.1.7.4	 tathā api na idam śāstram vyākartavyam maṅgala ācaraṇa rahita tvāt maṅgala ācaraṇa puraḥsarāṇi khalu karmāṇi nirantarāyam parisamāpyante pracīyante ca naca akṛta maṅgala ācaraṇānām api kārya parisamāpti ādi darśanāt kṛta maṅgala ācaraṇānām api tad abhāva upalambhāt na tad hetu tvam asya iti sāmpratam tathā sati kārīrya ādeḥ api vṛṣṭayā ādi hetutva abhāva āpatteḥ 
NSu_1.1.7.5	 syāt etat evam yadi kārīryādeva vṛṣṭayā ādi hetu tvam niṣpramāṇakam syāt na ca evam śruti niścite tu sādhya sādhana bhāve tad abhāve api bhāvaḥ aneka kāraṇaka tvasya kalpakaḥ bhavati darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iva traivarṇika paricaryā ādinā apiḥ svarga prāpteḥ bhāve api abhāvaḥ tu kartṛ karaṇa ādi vaiguṇya nimittaḥ bhavati na hi sāmagrī vaikalyena sādhyam vyabhicaran hetuḥ ahetuḥ syāt kartṛ ādi sāt guṇye vā prabala pratibandhaka sadbhāvaḥ kalpyate na hi pratibaddham kāryam ajanayat kāraṇam akāraṇam bhavati vahneḥ api sphoṭam pratyakāraṇa tva prasaṅgāt na ca evam sāmagrī vaiguṇya śaṅkayāḥ sarvatra saulabhyena sakala pravṛtti vilaya āpātāt iti samam etat sakalam prakṛte api 
NSu_1.1.7.6^1	 maṅgala ācaraṇasya avighna parisamāpti ādi hetu tvasya api avigīta śiṣya ācāra anumita śruti siddha tvāt na tāvat prekṣā vat pravṛttiḥ viphalā sambhāvinī na api prayojana antara arthāḥ dṛṣṭa parityāga adṛṣṭa kalpanā prasaṅgāt kāryam āripsuḥ khalu tad samāpti ādikam kāmayate iti anubhava siddham na ca phala antara anusandhāne pramāṇam asti na ca eteṣām imam sādhya sādhana bhāva pratīti bhrāntiḥ tathā satya vigāna anupapatteḥ na ca pratyakṣa ādeḥ atra avakāśaḥ iti śrutiḥ eva śiṣya ācāra mūlam kalpyate na ca vighna hetu sadbhāvā niścayāt idam ananuṣṭheyam tad sandehe api anuṣṭhānasya pākṣikaḥ api doṣaḥ parihatarvyaḥ a iti nyāya prāpta tvāt na ca bhagavataḥ sūtrakārasya vighnāḥ eva na santi iti tad parihāra arthān anuṣṭhānam na doṣāya iti yuktam 
NSu_1.1.7.6^2	 śiṣya artham api kartavya tvāt yatas maṅgala ācaraṇa puraḥsarāṇi śāstrāṇi vīryavanti bhavanti āyuṣmat puruṣakāṇi ca anyathā bhārata ādau= api na kuryāt etena sūtra kṛtā kṛtam eva maṅgala ācaraṇam kim nāma grantha ādau na niveśitam iti api nirastam granthe niveśanasya api śiṣya ācāra prāpta tvāt śiṣya artha tvāt ca atas eva anyat kim api vighna vighāta ādi artham anuṣṭhitam sūtra kāreṇa iti nirastam atra ucyate kartavyam eva kārya ārambhe maṅgala ācaraṇam kṛtam ca bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa niveśitam ca grantha ādau yat ayamoṅkārātha śabdau= āditas kṛtavān tayoḥ māṅgalika tvāt yathā uktam oṃkāraḥ ca atha śabdaḥ ca dvau= etau brahmaṇaḥ purā kaṇṭham bhitvā viniryātau tasmāt māṅgalikau= ubhau a iti 
NSu_1.1.8.1–1.1.8.2^1	 tatra tārātha mūla tvam sarva śas astrasya ca iṣyate sarvatra anugata tvena pṛthak oṅkriyate akhilaiḥ nanu etat anupapannam tathā sati etayoḥ vighna vighāta ādi hetu tvena samasta śāstra aṅga tayā prathama sūtra avayava tva abhāva prasaṅgāt tathā tve ca prathama sūtram nyūnam āpadyeta adhikāryādi pratipādakasya anyasya abhāvāt tad pratipādanasya ca āvaśyaka tvāt anyathā adhikāri viṣaya vaidhuryeṇa śāstrasya anārambhaṇīya tva śaṅkā na nirākṛtā syāt iti anarthakam sūtram āpadyeta iti atas āha tatra iti taranti anena aniṣya nicayam iti oṅkāraḥ tāraḥ tāraḥ ca athaḥ ca tayoḥ mūla tvam krameṇa ādi tvam ādau prayuktau anena aniṣya nicayam iti oṅkāraḥ tāraḥ tāraḥ ca athaḥ ca tayoḥ mūla tvam krameṇa udi tvam ādau prayuktau oṅkārātha śabdau= iti yāvat tatra prathama sūtre avayava tayā sarva śāstrasya ca aṅgatayā ca iṣyate aṅgīkriyate sūtrakṛtā iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_1.1.8.2^2	 etat uktam bhavati prathama sūtre adhikārya ādi pratipādanāya upāttāva uṅkā rātha śabdau śaṅkha vīṇā veṇu dhvani vat śrutitaḥ māṅgalika tvāt kṛtsna śāstrasya anantarāya parisamāpti ādikam kurvate anya artha ānīyamāna pūrṇa kalaśa darśana vat iti tārāthau= iti etāvatā pūrṇe yat mūla tvam iti āha tad sūtra kāra aṅgīkāra liṅga sūcanam yat paryāya antaram vihāya anayoḥ eva krama antaram vihāya ādau= eva upādānam tena jānīmaḥ jñāpakatayā a disūtrasya kāraka tayā samasta śāstrasya ca upayogi tvena etau sūtra kṛtā vivakṣitau= iti na ca etat yādṛcchikam sakala sūtra kāraiḥ evam eva prayukta tvāt nacān ekeṣām prekṣāvatām yadṛcchayā ekavidhā pravṛttiḥ upalabdha iti anena atha śabdaḥ maṅgala arthaḥ ityādi bhāṣyam vivṛtam bhavati 
NSu_1.1.8.3	 atra yat pareṣām dūṣaṇaṃmaṅgalasya vākya arthe samanvaya abhāvāt a iti tathā hi padārthaḥ eva hi vākya arthe samanvīyate sa ca vācyaḥ vā lakṣyaḥ vā na ca iha maṅgalam atha śabdasya vācyam lakṣyam vā kintu mṛdaṅga dhvani vat atha śabdasya kāryam na ca kārya jñāpyayoḥ vākya arthe samanvayaḥ śābde vyavahāre dṛṣṭaḥ a  astu vā maṅgalasya padārtha tvam tathā api na vākya arthe samanvayaḥ tathā hi na tāvat maṅgalam brahma jijñāsāyāḥ kartṛ karma karaṇa bhāvena vākya arthe anveti kartṛ ādi anyatama bhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt kāraka antarāṇām vidyamāna tvāt ca na api sāmānādhikaraṇyena anvayaḥ jijñāsā maṅgalam iti praśaṃsā paratayā arthavāda tva prasaṅgāt a iti tat etena apāstam bhavati asmābhiḥ api ānantarya abhidheyaḥ atha śabdaḥ śrutyā maṅgala prayojanaḥ iti aṅgīkārāt nanu atra sūtra ādau= oṅkāraḥ eva na vidyate tat katham ucyate tārātha mūla tvati yadi api śiṣyaiḥ adhyetṛbhiḥ 
NSu_1.1.8.4	 uccāryamāṇaḥ adhyakṣa siddhaḥ tathā api na ayam sūtra avayavaḥ lakṣaṇa antara abhāve satya saṃhita tayā sampāṭhe akhilaiḥ paṭhyamāna tvāt veda adhyayana upakrame adhyetṛbhiḥ uccāryamāṇa uṅkāra vat anyathā atha śabda vat saṃhita tayā nirdiśyeta na ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ adhyayana upakrama virati vaici tṛyeṇa tad tad sthāna parityāgena anyāni a sthāne akhilaiḥ paṭhyamānasya veda vākyān avayava tāyāḥ su prasiddha tvāt anyathā adhyayana upakrama virati vaicitṛye api om iti brahma ityādi vat niyata sthāna tayā pāṭha prasaṅgāt pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ ādau= uccāraṇam tu prāṅmukha tva ādi vat adhyayana niyama antargatam adhyetṛbhiḥ anuṣṭhīyate iti astu evaṃcāyam oṅkāraḥ sūtra kṛtā maṅgala artha tayā sūtra ādau= upanibaddhaḥ iti anupapannam iti atas āha sarvatra iti akhilaiḥ sūtra pāṭhakaiḥ yat pṛthak asaṃhita tayā uṅkriyate tat sarvatra sūtreṣu anugata tvena abhilaṣitena nimittena upapadyate 
NSu_1.1.8.5	 etat uktam bhavati sarvāṇi hi sūtrāṇi pratyekam aneka veda vākya vicāra paratvāt avāntara brahma vidyāḥ sravati anoṅkṛtam brahma parastāt ca viśīryate a iti śrauta artha vāda sāmarthyāt sarvāsu api brahma vidyāsu ādi antayoroṅkārasya ūhaḥ kartavyaḥ iti gamyate na ca uhyamānam vākyāt pṛthak iti śakyate vaktum mantreṣu api ūhyamānasya amantra avayava tva prasaṅgāt tatas ca pati sūtram ādi antayoḥ uccāraṇe gauravam syāt iti ādau= eva uṅkāraḥ adhikṛta tvena uccāryate tasya saṃhita tayā nirdeśe prathama sūtra avayavaḥ eva ayam vijñāyeta tat mā vijñāyi iti śiṣyaiḥ pṛthak oṅkriyate na ca vyākhyānataḥ api adhikāraḥ jñāyate iti vyartham pṛthak karaṇam iti vācyam antaraṅga jñāpaka abhāvaḥ eva bahis aṅgasya anveṣaṇīya tvāt iti tad anena asaṃhita tayā nirdeśe nimitta antaram vadatā hetoḥ anyathā siddhiḥ uktā bhavati 
NSu_1.1.8.6^1	 nanu ca śrauta artha vāda balena ādi antayoroṅkārasya ūhaḥ vā prāc mukha tva ādi vat bahis bhūtasya eva uccāraṇam vā vidheya tvena kalpyam iti sandihyate satyam sandehe api tayā praṇāḍya anumānasya sandigdhān i atha asiddhayā api ābhāsa tvam eva vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena uṅkāra arthasya prathama sūtra vākya arthe samanvayena niścaya upapattau bādhita viṣayam ca anumānam iti athavā dṛṣṭānta dūṣaṇam anena kriyate tathā hi akhilaiḥ veda pāṭhakaiḥ pṛthak rūpa antareṇa sthāna vyatyāsena yadā uṅkriyate tad ukta nyāyena ādau= uccāraṇena eva labdhena sarvatra anugata tvena kāraṇena eva upapadyate iti anena dṛṣṭānte sādhakasya hetoḥ anyathā siddhiḥ uktāḥ 
NSu_1.1.8.6^2	 tathā ca dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikalatā iti evam anumāne niraste nirapavādena ādau= uccāraṇena uṅkārasya prathama sūtra a= ayavatā siddhau= uktam upapannam tat evam siddhe śāstra vyākhyeya tve prekṣā vat pravṛtti viṣayasya eva ārambhaṇīya tvāt prayojana abhidheya sambandhavati eva ca prekṣāvatām pravṛtteḥ ārambhaṇīya tā siddhaye prekṣāvataḥ pravartayitum prayojana ādi abhisambandham pratipādayataḥ prathama sūtrasya vyākhyāmota tva vācī ityādinā ārabhate 
NSu_1.1.8.7	 nanu brahma jñānasya mokṣa hetu tā yadi śāstra pravṛtteḥ prāk eva pramāṇa antara siddhā vyartham tadā tad abhidhānam śāstre pramāṇa antara siddhe kvacid upadeśa anapekṣaṇāt atha iha eva tat niścayaḥ tadā pravṛttau prayojana ādi niścayaḥ niścite ca prayojana ādau pravṛttiḥ iti anyonya āśraya tvam atha prathama sūtrāt tad niścayaḥ tatra eva 
NSu_1.1.8.8	 katham pravṛttiḥ tad artham ca prayojana antara abhidhāne anavasthā evam eva tatra pravṛttau= uttaratra api tathā tva prasaṅgāt anarthakam sūtre prayojana ādi abhidhānam iti ucyate trividhā hi puṃsām citta vṛttiḥ anubhavaḥ icchā prayatnaḥ ca tatra sādhana gocarau= icchā prayatnau pravṛttiḥ iti ucyete na tu anubhavaḥ na api phala gocara icchā yena tayoḥ api prayojana niścaya apekṣā syāt nahi upekṣaṇīyam niṣprayojanam iti na anubhūyate na api sukham prayojana antara rahitam iti na iṣyate na ca mumukṣuṇā anapekṣite svarge yāga ādikam tad sādhana tayā na anubhūyate puruṣātharsādhane tu icchā lakṣaṇā prayatna lakṣaṇā vā pravṛttiḥ tathā na svarasa siddhāḥ na hi kaścid kṣudh prahāṇa ādikam ananusandhāya bhoktum icchati prayatate vā tasmāt yaḥ yatra pravartanīyaḥ sa tad prayojana ādikam darśayitvā eva iti sārthakam sūtre prayojana ādi abhidhānam 
NSu_1.1.8.9	 uktam ca prayojana ādikam śrotā katam śraddadhīta aśraddadhānaḥ ca katham pravarteta iti punar avaśiṣyate tatra eke samādhānam āhuḥ avagata sūtra kāra āpta bhāvaḥ tāvat tad vacanāt eva śraddhāsyati yadi api āpta tva avadhāraṇe prayojana ādi anabhidhāne api tad sāmānya niścayaḥ bhavati eva prayojana adimat idam śāstram āpta ukta tvāt iti tathā api na asau pravṛtti aṅgam na hi prayojana ādimat iti eva pravartate kim nāma asmad abhimata prayojana ādimat iti saca prayojana ādi viśeṣaḥ vacanāt eva avasīyate iti sārthakam tat abhidhānam āpta tva aniścaye api artha sandehāt eva kṛṣṭa ādau= iva pravṛtti upapattiḥ nanu sandehaḥ prayojana ādyavacane api sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāve sati sulabhaḥ eva viśeṣa smṛtiḥ ca 
NSu_1.1.8.10^1	 tad arthi tva viśeṣāt bhaviṣyati mā evam yaḥ hi yat vacanāt pravartate sa tad vacanāt eva viśeṣa smṛtim apekṣate na tu svātantryeṇa na hi roga ārtaḥ mama idam roga nivṛtti sādhanam na vā iti yatra tatra ucchṛṅkhalaḥ svayam utprekṣya pravartate kim nāma anavadhṛta āpta bhāvasya api vaidyasya eva vacanāt anyathā svayam prayojana abhidhānam anadhigacchan= anartham api āśaṅketa kim niṣprayojanam idam kāka danta parīkṣā grantha vat uta aśakya sādhana prayojanam mṛti hara hima mahīdhara uttarasā anusiddha sañjīvanī kathana vat uta mad anabhimata prayojanam āryāvarta vāsinam prati dākṣiṇāti asya mātula kanyā pariṇayana prakāra upadeśa vat athavā abhimatasya api prayojanasya sati api laghīyasi upāya antare garīyān ayam upāyaḥ pipāsum prati gīrvāṇa taraṅgiṇī samīpa kūpa khanana upadeśa vat ityādi etāsu ca anartha sambhāvanāsu na pravarteta na ca prayojana ādi abhidhāne api etāsām avakāśaḥ loka vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt 
NSu_1.1.8.10^2	 na hi kaścid vaidya vacana ādau= evam āśaṅkaya nivartate tasmāt upapannam ubhayathā api prayojana ādi abhidhānam iti tat etat anupapannam tathā hi yadi tāvat āpta vākya tayā sūtram idam prayojana ādeḥ niścāyakam syāt tadā agama tayā nyāya sūtra tva hāniḥ kiñca āpta tvam sūtra kṛtaḥ yena veda ādinā pramāṇena avagantavyam tena eva prayojana ādi abhisambandhaḥ api śāstrasya avagamyate iti vyartham tat abhidhānam āpadyeta āpta tva aniścaye api artha sandehāt pravṛttiḥ iti ca ati sthavīyaḥ na hi kaścid prayojana ādi sandehe ati mahā āyāsa sādhye pravartate prāk ukta anartha paramparāḥ ca katham na śaṅketa tasmāt na idam prayojana ādi upadeśa mātram kintu śrautasya prayojana ādeḥ nyeyena upapādana artham iti eva parihāraḥ āpta tvam tu nyāyasya upodbalaka mātram iti bhāṣya kārīyam tad vyutpādanam api na anarthakam atas eva asya sūtrasya na śāstra bahis bhāvaḥ adhyayana vidhi ādi vadasya api atas eva ārambhaṇīya tva siddheḥ na anavasthā ādi doṣaḥ api iti 
NSu_1.1.8.11	 kaḥ punar asya sūtrasya prasaṅgaḥ ucyate prāripsita tayā hi buddhi sannihitam śāstram sūtrakārasya tatra saṃśayaḥ kim idam ārambhaṇīyam na vā iti upalabhyante khalu ubhayavidhānī api vākyāni vākyam ca idam na ca viśeṣaḥ dṛśyate yena anyatara pakṣa niścayaḥ syāt nanu kasya ayam saṃśayaḥ na tāvat sūtra kārasya avagata viśeṣa tvāt anyathā nirṇāyaka sūtra praṇayana anupapatteḥ na api parasya pareṇa adya api śāstrasya anupalabdha tvāt anupalabdhe ca samāna dharma darśana ādya yogena saṃśaya utpāda anupapatteḥ mā evam yadi idam śāstram pareṇa upalabhyeta tadā ukta sandeha kāraṇa upapattau prayojana arthi tvena viśeṣa smṛtimatā evam sandihyeta iti sūtra kṛtaḥ eva parakīya sambhāvita saṃśaya āharaṇa upapatteḥ 
NSu_1.1.8.12^1	 nanu idam yukta yanu sandhāna ātmaka vicāra mīmāṃsā mananā para nāmaka jijñāsā aṅga bhūta nyāya nibandhanam jijñāsāyāḥ katarvī atāyām ārambhaṇīyam bhaviṣyati na hi vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ tad dvāra bhūta nyāya nibandhanam ca na ārambhaṇīyam iti sambhavati niḥsādhanasya vicārasya eva anutthānāt anyathā tu na iti jijñāsā eva vicāraṇīyāḥ satyam etat śāstra vyutpādanīya nyāya karaṇikāyām jijñāsāyām ubhayavidha vyāpāra darśanāt viśeṣa adarśanāt ca saṃśayaḥ kim kartavyā na vā iti nanu ca tad vijijñāsasva iti jijñāsāyāḥ śruti vihita tvāt katham viśeṣa adarśanam mā evam vinā vicāreṇa śruti arthasya ādya api anirṇīta tvena saṃśaya āspada tvāt tatra tāvat jijñāsā na kartavyā iti prāptam 
NSu_1.1.8.12^2	 kutas viṣaya prayojana sambandha adhikāri lakṣaṇa anubandha vidhura tvāt kartavyatā khalu viṣaya ādi mattayā vyāptā kṛṣṭa ādikam hi sati viṣaya bhūte bhūmi ādau prayojane ca sasya adhigama ādau= adhikāriṇi ca kṛṣīvala ādau kartavyam upalabdham sā ca vyāpikā vyāvartamānā itaḥ vyāpyām api kartavyatām vyāvartayati iti pratibandha siddhiḥ viṣaya śūnya tvāt hi sa manaska indriya sannikṛṣṭasya sphīta āloka madhya vartinaḥ ghaṭasya na jijñāsā kriyate prayojana vikala tvāt khalu sandigdham api vāyasa daśana ādikam na jijñāsyate sambandha vaidhuryāt hi sa prayojanam sa viṣayam api śabda jñānam arthayamānaḥ na vaidyake pravartate adhikāra virahāt ca na mumukṣoḥ vātsyāyane pravṛttiḥ 
NSu_1.1.8.13	 viṣaya ādi vaidhuryam eva atra katham iti ced ittham na tāvat anātma viṣayeyam jijñāsā tasya tṛṇa ādi lakṣaṇasya pratyakṣa ādinā eva niścita tvāt sandigdhaḥ ca arthaḥ nyāya viṣayaḥ bhavati yathā uktam avijñāta tattve arthe kāraṇa upapattitaḥ tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ a iti niṣpādita kriye ca karmaṇi aviśeṣa ādhāyinaḥ sādhanasya sādhana nyāya atipātaḥ na api asau jijñāsitaḥ kasmaicana prayojanāya kalpate evaṃvidhe ca adhikārī dūra utsāritaḥ yatas arthī samarthaḥ vidvān adhikriyate na ca etādṛśe arthe arthitā sambhavati dharma ādi lakṣaṇaḥ tu anātmā śāstra antara ādinā eva nirṇītaḥ ātmā ca 
NSu_1.1.8.14	 śarīra indriya ādi saṅghāta vyatiriktaḥ na asti eva śarīra ādikam ca yathāyatham pratyakṣa ādinā eva niścitam nanu ātmā śarīra ādi vyatiriktaḥ aham iti asandigdha aviparyasta sākṣāt pratītya eva niścīyate iti ced evam tarhi tatas eva na jijñāsyaḥ atas eva anāditaḥ tadīya tattva jñāne vidyamāne api iṣyā niṣya prāpti parihārayoḥ adarśanāt na asau jijñāsitaḥ kasyacid prayojanasya iṣye 
NSu_1.1.8.15	 nanu ayam kartā bhoktā doṣa saṃsargī ca ahaṃpratyaye prakāśate tad viparītaḥ tu śruti pratipāditaḥ pratipattavyaḥ atas jijñāsā iti ced evam tarhi jarat gava ādi vākya vat pāvaka śaitya anumāna vat ca pratīti virodhena śruti jijñāsayoḥ ābhāsa ta āpātaḥ atas eva na para ātmā jijñāsyaḥ tasya prāṇa ādi liṅgaiḥ avagata tvāt sā eva jijñāsā iti ced na tasyāḥ laukika pravedanīya tvena śāstra avyutpādanīya tvāt na khalu bālakaḥ stana pāneṣya sādhanatva anumāne śāstra vyutpādanam apekṣate yat kvacid śāstre api laukika pravedanīya artha vyutpādanam anuvādaḥ asau na punar saḥ eva pradhāna vyāpāraḥ īśvara viṣayā jijñāsā bhaviṣyati iti ced na tasya eva abhāvāt na ca evam īśvara ādi padānām ānarthakyena āpadatva prasaṅgaḥ iti vācyam teṣām kathañcid jīva viṣaya tā upapatteḥ saḥ api hi sva śarīra indriya ādīnām īṣye pratīta artha tva upapattau= apratīta artha tva kalpanāyām gaurava prasaṅgāt jīvasya ca aham iti sva prakāśa tayā sva prakāśa jñāna āśraya tayā mānasa pratyakṣa vedya tayā vā siddha tvena na jijñāsā viṣaya tvam iti uktam 
NSu_1.1.8.16^1	 kiñca īśvaraḥ pramitaḥ na vā na ubhayathā api jijñāsā sambhavati na iti pakṣe anugrāhya pramāṇa abhāvena jijñāsāyāḥ tarka tva vyāghātāt kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti hi uktam pramākaraṇasya pramāṇasya upapattiḥ anugrahaḥ tad karaṇena iti arthaḥ na ca buddhau= anārūḍham śakyam jijñāsitum pramita tve tu niścita tvāt eva na ca evam sakala tarka anupapatti prasaṅgena vyāghātaḥ sāmānyatas pratītau viśeṣe tad avakāśāt na ca atra tathātvam paśyāmaḥ kiñca īśvare pramāṇam bhavat na tāvat pratyakṣam tasya apātataḥ tad abhāva avedaka tvāt na api anumānam 
NSu_1.1.8.16^2	 tad pratibaddha liṅga abhāvāt āgamaḥ tu kārya niṣṭhaḥ na niṣpanna svarūpam īśvaram śaknoti avagamayitum na ca anyat pramāṇam asti yat mīmāṃsayā anugṛhyeta kiñca āgamaḥ api bhavan vedaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ anyasya anāśaṅkanīya tvāt pāratantryāt ca vedasya pauruṣeya tva apauruṣeya tvayoḥ kāraṇa abhāvena prāmāṇyam eva durlabham svatas prāmāṇya aṅgīkāre tu veda viruddhānām api śākya ādi vacasām tathā tva āpātena punar veda apramāṇi atādavasthyam kiñca śabdasya eva prāmāṇyam durghaṭam artha saṃsparśa śūnya tvāt vākya artha pratyāyana prakāra anirūpaṇāt ca kutas tad viśeṣasya vedasya 
NSu_1.1.8.17^1	 prayojanam ca īśvara jijñāsayā abhyudayaḥ vā syāt mokṣaḥ vā na ādyaḥ tasya dharma ādi laghu upāya sādhyasya śāstra antara prayojana tvāt na dvitīyaḥ tasya api apāma somam iti ādi āgamena laghu upāya antara sādhyatā avagamāt naca ekasya eva karmaṇaḥ abhyudaya niḥśreyasa hetu tvam viruddham phala abhisandhyādi bhāva abhāvābhyām viśeṣa upapatteḥ jijñāsā ca mokṣa sādhanam bhavantī kim sākṣāt uta jñāna dvāreṇa na ādyaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa tyāga kalpanā prasaṅgāt na dvitīyaḥ karmaṇā jñānam ātanoti iti āgamena jñānasya laghu upāya antara sādhya tā adhyavasāyāt jñānasya api sākṣāt mokṣa hetu tva abhyupagame adṛṣṭa kalpanā eva na ca īśvara prasāda dvārā jñānasya prasāda hetu tāyāḥ kvāpi adṛṣṭa tvāt tat karma hari toṣam yat a ityādinā tad prasādasya karma ādi alpa upāya sādhyatā pratīteḥ ca kiñca ayam ātma avidyā kalpitaḥ bandhaḥ tad vidyayā eva nivṛttim arhati 
NSu_1.1.8.17^2–1.1.8.19	 śuktikā vidyā kalpitam rajatam iva śukti vidyayā tad kutas bandha nivṛtti lakṣaṇe mokṣe parameśvara prasādasya upayogaḥ kutastarām tat jñānasya kutas tamām ca tad jijñāsāyāḥ atha parāma arthaḥ eva ayam bandhaḥ tarhi na jñānena nivarteta na ca satyasya anādeḥ ātma svarūpa mātra anubandhinaḥ bandhasya ātma svarūpasya iva kena api nivṛttiḥ yuktā api ca muktasya śarīra indriya viṣaya ādi saṃsarge mukta tva vyāghātaḥ duḥkha ādi prasaṅgaḥ ca kāraṇa sāmagrī sadbhāvāt tathā ca abhyudaya tulya tayā ukta doṣaḥ śarīra ādi abhāve ca tad sādhya sukha abhāvena kasya api tatra arthita anupapatteḥ anadhikārikam śāstram āpadyeta kaḥ hi svastha ātmā sahasā sukha tad sādhane hātum utsahate tat evam viṣaya ādi anubandha vidhura tvāt na jijñāsā kartavyā tad vidhayaḥ api na pramāṇam śāstram ca idam anārambhaṇīyam iti prāpte sūtrayāmāsa bhagavān ācāryaḥ om atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti om atha atas brahma jijñāsā atha atas brahma jijñāsā 
NSu_1.1.9ab.1–1.1.9ab.2	 otatva vācī hi oṅkāraḥ vaktayasau tad guṇa utatām yat tāvat uktam viṣaya abhāvāt na jijñāsā kartavyā iti tad anupapannam anātma jīva ātmanoḥ viṣaya tva anupapattau= api īśvarasya tad upapatteḥ atra yat uktam jīva vyatiriktaḥ īśvaraḥ eva na asti iti tad parihārāya sūtra kṛta uṅkāra brahma śabdau prayuktau tena ayam arthaḥ sūcitaḥ om iti etat akṣara mudgītham upāsīta a tad vijijñāsasva tat brahma a ityādi śrutau= oṅkāra brahma śabdau jijñāsye vastuni śrūyete tābhyām ca tat sakala jīva jaḍa ātmakāt prapañcāt vilakṣaṇam avagamyate iti tat ayuktam iva ābhāti om ādipadasya alaukika arthe anavagata saṅgati tvāt na hi padam cakṣuḥ ādi vat apratītaḥ eva arthe pratītim janayati yena apūrvam artham pada prayogāt eva pratīmaḥ svarga apūrva devatā ādi arthaḥ api na pada prayogāt eva siddhaḥ kintu sannihita aneka vākya artha sāmarthyāt labhyate iti atas āha bhāṣya kāraḥ otatu a vācī iti 
NSu_1.1.9ab.3	 hi śabdaḥ hetu arthe oṃkāraḥ tāvadota tvasya gata tvasya praviṣṭa tvasya vā vācakaḥ gati ādi arthasya avateḥ khalu rūpam etat avateṣyi lopaḥ ca a iti sūtrāt om iti punar kasya vaktā a iti praśna pūrvakaṃavatiḥ nāma ayam dhātuḥ gati karmā praveśana karmā ca a iti anyatra api evam eva nirukta tvāt tathā ca yadi asau karmāṇi tadā kartuḥ yadi vā kartari tadā karmaṇaḥ apekṣāyām upapada ādi abhāve api yogyatayā śruti antara ādi balāt vāsau= oṅkāraḥ tasya jijñāsasya guṇaiḥ ānanda ādi ananta kalyāṇa guṇaiḥ guṇa anvotatām vakti pakṣa dvaye api ananta anavadya kalyāṇa guṇa pūrṇa tā eva uṅkārasya arthaḥ brahma śabdasya api saḥ eva arthaḥ bṛhateḥ vṛddhayarthasya khalvedat rūpam tathā ca pūrvavat yogya tayā atha kasmāt ucyate brahma iti bṛhantaḥ hi asmin guṇāḥa ityādi śruti antara balāt vā guṇānām sambandhaḥ 
NSu_1.1.9ab.4–1.1.9ab.5	 etat uktam bhavati yaugikāḥ hi śabdāḥ na avaśyam artha pratyāyane saṅgati grahaṇam apekṣante kim nāma nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa balena avayava artha avagame sati tad saṃsarga sambhāvanāyām prasiddham anyathāpūrvam eva artham avagamayanti vākya rūpa tvāt teṣām yathā aha śrotriyan= chandaḥ adhīte avākya arthe pada prayogaḥ a iti na ca vākyam saṅgati grahaṇa apekṣam artham abodhayati adhigata artha tva prasaṅgāt aśakyatvāt ca tat etau= oṅkāra brahma śabdau= api yaugikaḥ jijñāsyam ananta guṇa paripūrṇam pratipādayantau jīva jaḍayoḥ tad ayogāt tadvayatiriktam eva kiñcid gramayataḥ tat ca avidita tvāt sambhavati jijñāsā viṣayaḥ na ca tatra api guṇa pūrṇa tā viruddhāḥ prāk pratīteḥ nirāśrayasya virodhi pratyayasya anutthānāt pratītyai 
NSu_1.1.9ab.6	 ca evam eva siddha tvāt iti yat punar akāra vācyena tad padārthena ukāra vācyasya tvaṃpadārthasya abhedaḥ makāreṇa ucyate brahma śabdena ca sakalaḥ tu ātmaka tva lakṣaṇa pūrṇatā abhidhīyate iti vyākhyānam tat aprāmāṇikam pramāṇa viruddham ca yat tva āpteḥ ādimattvāt vā ityādya uṅkārasya nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvam sarvajñam sarva śakti samanvitam ityādi brahma śabdasya vyākhyānam tad jīva ādi vyatirikta vastu sādhana avirodhi iti sphuṭam eva iti āśayavatā na vyākhyāna antaram dūṣitam anumatam ca 
NSu_1.1.9ab.7	 nanu guṇa utatām iti katham vṛddhiḥ eci iti bhavitavyam mā evam omāṅgoḥ ca iti caśabdena anyatra api para rūpa tva anuśāsanāt athavā ūyate rūpam etat nanu asau tantu santāne paṭhyate aneka artha tvāt dhātūn ām ityadoṣaḥ katham tar hi etatu a vācī iti guṇaḥ tatra avatirūpa aṅgīkārāt vaicitṛyam tu dhātu dvaya ja tva sūcana artham athavā akāra upasarga pūrvakaḥ asau= itya doṣaḥ 
NSu_1.1.9cd.1–1.1.9cd.2	 saḥ eva brahma śabda arthaḥ nārāyaṇa pada uditaḥ astu vā uṅkāra brahma śabdābhyām jīva jaḍa atiriktasya jijñāsyasya siddhiḥ tathā api īśvarasya kim āyātam iti atas āha nārāyaṇa iti saḥ eva iti anuvartate nahi nāmni vipratipattiḥ iti āśayaḥ athavā sūtra kāra uktau= oṅkāra brahma śabdau= upalakṣaṇa mātram nārāyaṇam mahā jñeyam a ityādi śrutau jijñāsye nārāyaṇa śabdaḥ api śrūyate nārāyaṇa pada uditaḥ ca arthaḥ saḥ eva yaḥ guṇa pūrṇa tva ākhyaḥ atas nārāyaṇa śabdena api jijñāsyam jīva ādi vyatiriktam siddhayati iti anena ucyate etat api upalakṣaṇam ātma ananta īśvara ādi śabdāḥ api jñātavyāḥ teṣām apiātmānam eva lokam upāsīta a ityādau jijñāsye śravaṇāt guṇa pūrṇa tva abhidhāyi tvāt ca na ca alaukika artha kalpane gaurava prasaṅgāt varam kathañcid eṣām śabdānām jīva ādi viṣaya aṅgīkaraṇam iti vācyam yaugika śabda prayogāni atha anupapatteḥ ukta tvena kalpanā bhāvāt anyathā vākyāt api alaukika athar pratyayaḥ na syāt laukikā atha eva kathañcid artha anugamasya vaktum śakya tvāt kiñca kvacid mukhya arthaḥ eva śabdaḥ anupapattyā 
NSu_1.1.9cd.3	 kvacid amukhya arthaḥ anugamyate na punar amukhya arthaḥ eva tathā ca śrautam brahma ādi śabdam jīva ādi viṣayam aṅgīkurvāṇena api niravagraha pūrṇa tā yuktam kiñcid abhidhā iyam mukhyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam eva tatas ca anena kim kṛtam syāt jīvaḥ eva ete mukhya arthāḥ tad anupalabdhiḥ tu avidyā āvaraṇa nimittā iti ced na yatas atra ācāryaḥ svayam eva prativakṣyati iti 
NSu_1.1.10.1–1.1.10.2^1	 saḥ eva bharga śabda arthaḥ vyāhṛtīnām ca bhūmataḥ bhāvanāt ca eva sutvāt ca saḥ ayam puruṣaḥ iti api yat atra uktam īśvaraḥ pramitaḥ na vā iti tatra pramitaḥ iti uttaram tad pakṣa doṣaḥ ca parihariṣyate tathā ca śāstrasya viṣaya sambandhaḥ samāhitā bhavati yat punar atra uktam kena pramāṇena iti tatra vedena iti vadāmaḥ vedasya īśvara viṣaya tā kutas iti atas api oṅkāraḥ sūtra kṛtā brahmaṇi prayuktaḥ tat katham asya arthasya upapādakam iti āśaṅkayā it am atra ākūtam sūtrakārasya iti āha vyāhṛtīnām ca iti saḥ eva arthaḥ iti sambandhaḥ oṃkāraḥ tāvat bhagavataḥ īśvarasya vācakaḥ om iti brahma a ityādi śruteḥ atas saḥ eva vyāhṛtīnām ca bhūḥ ādīnām arthaḥ iti gamyate praṇava arthāḥ vyāhṛtayaḥ a iti ādi a āgamena tisṛṇām vyāhṛtīnām varṇa traya ātma koṅkāra vyākhyāna tayā avagata tvāt vyākhyāna vyākhyeyayoḥ ca eka viṣaya tā su prasiddhā iti 
NSu_1.1.10.2^2	 eva kāraḥ vyāhṛtīnām agni vāyu sūrya devatāka tva prasiddhayā tad pratipādaka tva bhramam nivārayati agni ādīnām adhidevatā tvena api prasiddhayupapatteḥ anyathā ukta vyākhyāna vyākhyeya bhāva anupapatti prasaṅgaḥ kena nimittena vyāhṛtīnām ca saḥ eva arthaḥ iti atas āha bhūmataḥ iti bhūmā pūrṇa tvam tatas bhūḥ bhavateḥ bahutva arthasya kvipi rūpam etat bhāvanāt jagataḥ utpādanāt bhuvaḥ bhavateḥ eva antarṇītapi arthasya kapratyaye rūpam sutvāt sukha tvāt svaḥ sva śabdaḥ hi sukha vācī prasiddhaḥ cakārau nimitta antara samuccaye yathā uktam pūrṇaḥ bhūti varaḥ ananta sukhaḥ yadvaya āhṛtīritaḥ a iti etaiḥ eva nimittaiḥ vyāhṛtīnām arthaḥ na punar lokatraya ātmaka tvena tasya pramāṇa viruddha tvāt bhūḥ iti vai ayam lokaḥ a ityādi śrutiḥ api lokatraya antargata bhagavat viṣaya eva iti eva śabda arthaḥ 
NSu_1.1.10.3^1	 kim atas na hi vyāhṛtayaḥ eva vedaḥ iti ced vyāhṛti artha tayā tāvat parameśvarasya gāyatrī pratipādyatā a= agamyate tripadāyāḥ gāyatṛyā vyāhṛti traya vyākhyāna tvasya āgama siddha tvāt nanu gāyatṛyām yaḥ bhargaḥ naḥ asmākam dhiyaḥ pracodayāt prerayet tasya savituḥ devasya tat vareṇyam rūpam dhīmahi cintayāmaḥ iti bharga nāmakaḥ savitā pratipādyaḥ dṛśyate tat katham bhagavat paratvam iti atas āha saḥ eva bharga śabda arthaḥ iti bharaṇa gamana yogāt iti śeṣaḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etat jagat prasava hetu tvāt savitā iti api draṣṭavyam na tu sūryaḥ tathā tve gāyatṛyā vyāhṛtyartha tva anupapatteḥ dhyeyaḥ sadā savitṛ maṇḍala madhya vartī nārāyaṇaḥ a iti ādi a āgama virodhāt ca iti eva arthaḥ 
NSu_1.1.10.3^2	 astu gāya tṛyarthaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ kim etāvatā api gāya tṛi artha tvāt puruṣa sūkta arthaḥ api saḥ eva iti siddhayati varga traya ātmakasya tasya tri pāda gāyatrī vyākhyāna tvena tad bhedaḥ pauruṣam sūktam a iti ādya āgama siddha tvāt nanu puruṣasūkte puruṣasya paśoḥ hiraṇyagarbhasya vā pratipādanāt katham nārāyaṇaḥ pratipādyate iti atas āha saḥ ayam iti pūrṇa tva ādinā iti śeṣaḥ tathā ca śrutiḥ sa vai ayam puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣṛ puḥ iṣayaḥ na enena kiñcana anāvṛtam na enena kiñcana asaṃvṛtam a iti anyathā ukta yukti virodhaḥ vakṣyate ca etat siddhe ca puruṣasūkta artha tve viṣṇoḥ kim syāt sarva veda artha tvam eva siddham 
NSu_1.1.11ab.1–1.1.11ab.2^1	 saḥ eva sarva veda arthaḥ jijñāsyaḥ ayam vidhīyate vedāḥ puruṣa sūkta gāḥ a iti āgamena sarva vedānām puruṣasūkta artha tayā avagata tvāt iti āha saḥ eva iti eva śabdaḥ kārya adi vyāvṛtti arthaḥ sarve vedāḥ yat padam ām ananti a ityādi śruti siddham api bhagavataḥ sarva veda artha tvam nyāyena upapādayitumayam prayatnaḥ sūtrakārasya syāt etat īśvaraḥ sa varveda arthaḥ tadvaya ākhyeya uṅkāra artha tvāt yaḥ yadvaya ākhyeya arthaḥ sa tad arthaḥ yathā sampratipannaḥ iti vā sarvaḥ veda īśvara paraḥ tad paroṅkāra vyākhyāna tvāt iti vā sākṣāt eva anumānam kim na vyākhyāyate tat yathā sarvāṇi parṇāni śaṅkunā santṛṇṇāni evam oṅkāreṇa eva sarvāḥ vāc santṛṇṇā a ityādi śrutyā hetu artha samarthanam bhaviṣyati kim anena paramparā vyākhyānena satyam tathā api vākya antara balena na sarvā vāc oṅkāra vyākhyānam sākṣāt kim nāma ukta prakāreṇa paramparayā eva iti jñāpayitum ittham vyākhyānam iti adoṣaḥ 
NSu_1.1.11ab.2^2	 nanu ca īśvare pramāṇam pṛṣṭavataḥ oṃkāra brahma śabdau= eva kasmāt na uktau kim veda anumānena na ca padasya apramāṇa tā iti vācyam yaugika pada prāmāṇyasya ukta tvāt mā evam mīmāṃsā anugrāhya pramāṇasya pṛṣṭa tvāt na ca uṅkāra ādi mātram tathā vivakṣitam kim nāma samastaḥ vedaḥ eva iti kim atas yadi evam īśvaraḥ sarva veda arthaḥ iti ced viṣaya sambandha sambhavāt jijñāsāyāḥ kartavyatā śāstrasya ca ārambhaṇīya tvam siddham iti āśayavān sa ākāṅkṣasya vākya ābhāsasya apratipādaka tvāt ākāṅkṣita adhyāhāram sūcayan sūtra vākya artham āha jijñāsyaḥ iti ayam iti ukta vidhayā jīva jaḍa ātmakāt prapañcāt atyanta vivikta tvena niścita tayā viṣaya bhūtaḥ sarva veda artha tayā śakya pratipādanaḥ ca iti arthaḥ 
NSu_1.1.11ab.3^1	 nanu vedānām īśvara pratipatti janaka tvāt bhavatu tad viṣaya tvam śāstram tu teṣām īśvara pratipādana anusaraṇa upāya nyāya viṣayam katham īśvara param ucyate mā evam vedānām īśvaram avabodhayatām itikartavya tā hi mīmāṃsā tena upakāraka tvāt bhavati tad viṣayā tad uddhārā śāstram api na hi bījasya aṅkuram janayataḥ sahakāriṇaḥ jala ādeḥ aṅkuraḥ na kāryam nanu mīmāṃsā api sambhāvana ādi viṣayā katham īśvara viṣayā bhavati mā evam dvividham khalu karma kārakam bhavati kiñcid avyavadhānena vyāpāra janyā atiśaya yogi yathā udya mana nipatana vyāpāra janyā ūrdhvā deśa saṃyoga vibhāga atiśaya viśiṣṭaḥ kuṭhāraḥ kartṛ vyāpārasya avyavadhānena karma bhavati kiñcid uddeśya phala sambandhi tayā karaṇa vyāpāra vyavadhānena yathā dvaidhībhāvavān vṛkṣaḥ 
NSu_1.1.11ab.3^2	 tatra kartṛ vyāpārasya karaṇa vyāpāra vyavadhānena vṛkṣa karmatā iva mīmāṃsā vyāpārasya api pramāṇa ādi sambhāvanāt hāreṇa īśvara avabodhaḥ eva uddeśyaḥ iti bhavati tad karma tā syāt etat evam yadi veda iti kartavyatā vicāraḥ syāt na ca evam vinā api vicāreṇa śabda upalabdhi samaya grahaṇa tad smaraṇa saha kṛtāt śabdāt eva artha avagama darśanāt na ca mantavyam śakti tātparya ajñāna viparyaya doṣāt śabdaḥ saṃśaya vipayaryayau= utpādayati tatra doṣa apanayanena saṃśaya ādi vyudāsāya śakti tātparya vicāraḥ aṅgam bhavati iti yatas tatra api śabdaḥ vinā vicāreṇa tattva jñānasya iṣye kim nāma pratibandha mātram vicāreṇa apanīyate na hi iti kartavyatā evam tat katham veda iti kartavyatā jijñāsā kathantarām ca īśvara viṣayāḥ kathantamām ca śāstrasya tat viṣaya tā iti 
NSu_1.1.11ab.4	 atra ucyate satyam evam tathā api pratibandha nivṛttau satyām eva nirṇayaḥ iti pratibandhaka nirāsa hetoḥ api vicārasya upacāreṇa nirṇaya hetu tvāt upapannam īśvara viṣaya tvam etena etat api nirastam īśvarasya veda pramāṇaka tve tatas eva niścita tvāt kim mīmāṃsayā iti yukti vākya ābhāsa janita vipratipatti pratibandhasya ukta tvāt tathā hi veda prāmāṇyam eva anaṅgīkurvāṇāḥ kecid īśvaraḥ eva na asti iti pratipannāḥ apare tu tad aṅgīkṛtya api tad vācinām padānām jīva ādi viṣaya tām vyākurvantaḥ tad abhāvam asthitāḥ anye tu punar asti īśvaraḥ kintu paramārthataḥ nirguṇaḥ eva iti saṅgirante eke tu sa guṇaḥ api na jagataḥ kāraṇam api tu udāsīnaḥ eva iti ātiṣṭhante kecid kāraṇa tve api upādānam iti abhyupayanti nimitta mātra tve api katipaya guṇam guṇebhyaḥ bhinnam anye manyante itare tu bhinna abhinnam upagatavantaḥ kecid vigrahavantam iti evamādyāsu anekāsu vipratipattiṣu satīṣu tattva jñāna karaṇāt api vedāt tad anutpattau tad apanodana dvāreṇa veda iti kartavya tā rūpā jijñāsā kartavyā iti 
NSu_1.1.11ab.5^1	 tatra tāvat brahmaṇaḥ jijñāsā brahma jijñāsā iti ṣaṣṭhī samāsaḥ na punar dharmāya jijñāsā itivat caturthī samāsaḥ tādarthya samāse prakṛti grahaṇam kartavyam iti vārtika kṛtā prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ eva caturthī samāsasya niyamita tvāt tathā eva udāharaṇam yūpāya dāru yūpadāru iti prakṛti vikāra bhāva rahiteṣu ca aśva ghāsa ādiṣu aśva ghāsa ādayaḥ ṣaṣṭhī samāsāḥ bhavanti iti prativihitam na ca atra prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ asti ṣaṣṭhī samāse api kecid śeṣe ṣaṣṭhī iti pratipannāḥ kecid karmaṇi iti tatra karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī parigrahāya jijñāsyaḥ iti aktam kṛtyānām karmaṇi smaraṇāt anyathā jijñāsā asya iti avakṣyat 
NSu_1.1.11ab.5^2	 jijñāsā khalu karma apekṣā vinā karmaṇā na jñātum śakyā na tu sambandhinam vinā iti karmaṇaḥ prādhānyāt tat eva vaktavyam sambandhi sāmānya ukta varthāt karma api labhyate iti ced na sākṣāt pratīta parityāgena artha labhya svīkārasya vaiyarthyāt evam sati lakṣaṇa ādi jijñāsā api pratijñātā syāt iti ced na tasyāḥ vinā api abhidhānena lābhāt na hi lakṣaṇa ādi jijñāsām antareṇa brahma jijñāsā asti anyathā aneka viṣaya tvena śāstra bheda prasaṅgaḥ nirviṣayatā śaṅkā apanoda artham prayuktam padam idam karma abhidhāni ā iva yuktam tad vijijñāsasva ityādi śruti artha anugatam ca evam sati sūtram syāt 
NSu_1.1.11ab.6–1.1.11ab.7	 nanu ca pratipada vidhānā ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate a iti karmāṇi ṣaṣṭhayāḥ samāsaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti ced na kṛdyoga lakṣaṇā ca ṣaṣṭhī samasyate a iti pratiprasavāt athavā brahmaṇaḥ karma tvena aprādhānya śaṅkām nivartayitum jijñāsyaḥ iti karma prādhānyam sūcitam jñāna vidhau hi brahmaṇaḥ aprādhānyam syāt tad jñāna uddeśena jijñāsā vidhāne kutas aprādhānyam 
NSu_1.1.11ab.8	 vidhīyate iti anena kartavyā iti pada adhyāhāram sūcayati nanu bhavati iti svatas siddham mā evam tathā sati anuvāda tva prasaṅgāt atra eke codayanti siddhā eva nanu brahma jijñāsā atha atas dharma jijñāsā iti sakala veda artha vicārasya udita tvāt brahma jñānasya codanā lakṣaṇa tvena dharma svarūpa tvāt abhyadhika āśaṅka abhāvāt iti 
NSu_1.1.11ab.9–1.1.11cd.1	 tatra kecid abhyadhika āśaṅkām darśayantaḥ brahma jijñāsām pṛthak ārabhante apare tu kārya niṣṭhaḥ eva veda bhāgaḥ vicārya tvena tatra prakrāntaḥ vicāritaḥ ca na vastu tattva niṣṭhaḥ iti atas vastu tattva niṣṭham veda bhāgam vicārayitum idam ārabhyate iti āhuḥ sā iyam gatārtha tā śaṅkā tad samādhānam ca na upapadyate sarva vedānām īśvara eka niṣṭhatvena sarva veda arthasya atra eva jijñāsya tvāt dharma jijñāsā śāstram tu veda eka deśā mukhya artha dharma vicārāya pravṛttam iti āśayena vāsaḥ eva bharga śabda arthaḥ a ityādi uktam tatra sarva veda arthaḥ iti anena gatārtha tā śaṅkā nirāsaḥ saḥ eva na tu kārya śeṣa tayā ityādyam samādhānam sarva iti dvitīyam ca nirastam tad upapādanāya pūrva vākyam jijñāsyaḥ iti sādhya nirdeśaḥ vakṣyati ca etat vistareṇa kārya tā ca ityādinā jñānī priyatamaḥ atas me tam vidvān eva ca amṛtaḥ 
NSu_1.1.12.1–1.1.12.2	 vṛṇute yam tena labhyaḥ ityāt yukti balena hi jijñāsā uttha jñāna jāt tad prasādāt eva mucyate brahma jijñāsāyāḥ niṣprayojana tvam śaṅkitam apākartum atas śabdam vyācaṣṭe jñāni iti tam vidvān iti anenatam evam vidvān amṛtaḥ iha bhavati a iti vākyam eva śabdenana anyaḥ panthāḥ ayanāya a iti uttara vākyam avadhāraṇa artham ca saṅgṛhītam caśabdaḥ vākya samuccaye vṛṇute yam iti anenayam eva eṣa vṛṇute a iti vākyam saṅgṛhītam ādipad enaa ātmā vai are draṣṭavyaḥ a ityādeḥ saṅgrahaḥ hi śabdau hetau eva śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyate yasmāt tasya brahmaṇaḥ nārāyaṇasya prasādāt parama anugrahāt eva mucyate saṃsārāt na tu karma ādi netitam evam ayam eva eṣa vṛṇute a iti śruti balena gamyate yadi api tam evam iti parama puruṣa prasādaḥ na śrūyate tathā api yam eva eṣa vṛṇutaḥ iti śruti balena gamyate yadi api tam evam iti parama puruṣa prasādaḥ na śrūyate tathā api yam eva eṣa vṛṇutaḥ iti vākya anurodhena tatra api anusandheyaḥ nimittena naimittika upalakṣaṇāt mumukṣu sambandhi sādhana avadhāraṇāya tu na sākṣāt uktaḥ 
NSu_1.1.12.3	 varaṇam tu prasādaḥ ucyate apāma somam a ityādyāḥ tu śrutayaḥ sa avakāśa tvāt anyathā yojyāḥ īśvara parama prasādaḥ ca tad jñānāt eva bhavati na punar karma ādinā iti jñānī priyatamaḥ tam evam vidvān iti ukti balena avagamyate vidvān iti asya api prasāda atiśaya dvāreṇa iti artha paryavasānasya ukta tvāt karma ādeḥ anugraha mātra hetu tvena api tat vacanam sārthakam īśvara jñānam ca tad jijñāsayā eva na anyena itiātmā vai are draṣṭavyaḥ a iti paramātma daśarna anuvādena tad sādhana tayā śrotavyaḥ ityādinā śravaṇa ādi vidhāyaka ukti balena pratīyate karmaṇām tu antaḥkaraṇa śuddhi dvāreṇa jñāna aṅga tva upapatteḥ tat vākyam sārthakam bhaviṣyati atas brahma jijñāsā kartavyā iti sambandhaḥ 
NSu_1.1.12.4^1	 idam uktam bhavati yadi api na jijñāsāyāḥ svarga ādi rūpaḥ abhyudayaḥ prayojanam sambhavati tathā api mokṣaḥ bhaviṣyati tasya ānanī a sādhya tvāt mokṣa sādhanam hi sākṣāt bhagavān eva bandhakaḥ bhava pāśena bhava pāśāt ca mocakaḥ a ityādi vacanāt sādhanam ca dvividham siddham asiddham ca tatra asiddham utpādyam phala kāmena yathā yāga ādi siddham tu sa vyāpārīkaraṇīyam yathā kuṭhāra ādi siddham ca sādhanam bhagavān iti mumukṣuṇā savyāpārīkaraṇīyaḥ vyāpāraḥ ca prasanna tā eva nigaḍa ādi mocakeṣu rāja ādiṣu tathā darśanāt yasya prasādāt parama ārti rūpāt asmāt saṃsārāt mucyate na apareṇa a ityādi śruteḥ ca vyāpāra prādhānya uktiḥ ca indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ pratyakṣam iti ādau= iva aupacārikī mocakaḥ ca īśvara prasādaḥ tad bhaktayeka sādhyaḥ bhaktayā eva tuṣyim abhyeti viṣṇunā anyena kenacid a ityādi vacanāt svarga ādi hetu prasāda mātram karma ādi sādhyam karmaṇā tu adhamaḥ proktaḥ prasādaḥ a ityādi smṛteḥ prasādaḥ nāma icchā viśeṣaḥ guṇa antaram vā na naḥ kacid kṣatiḥ 
NSu_1.1.12.4^2	 parameśvara bhaktiḥ nāma niravadhikā nantā anavadya kalyāṇa guṇa tva jñāna pūrvakaḥ sva ātma ātmīya samasta vastubhyaḥ aneka guṇa adhikaḥ antarāya sahasreṇa api apratibaddhaḥ nirantara prema pravāhaḥ yam adhikṛtya yatra na anyat paśyati asā niśā paśyataḥ muneḥ a ityādi śruti smṛtayaḥ nacāsau tad sākṣātkāram antareṇa utpadyate loke tathā darśanāt naca avyakta svabhāvaḥ bhagavāṃ sahasreṇa api prayatnānām śakyaḥ sākṣātkartum vinā tad anugrahāt prasannaḥ tu ananta acintya śakti yogāt ātmānam darśayati iti yujyate 
NSu_1.1.12.4^3	 darśana asādhanam ca anugrahaḥ sva yogya guṇa upetasya nirdoṣasya bhagavat vigraha viśeṣasya ādara nairantaryābhyām viṣaya vairāgya tad bhakti sahitāt bahu kāla upacitāt nididhi āsana apara nāmakāt vicintanāt ṛte na labhyate na ca nididhi āsanam vākya artha grahaṇa lakṣaṇe śravaṇe kṛte api vinā mananā para nāmnā vicāreṇa upapadyate saṃśaya viparyayoḥ tādavasthyāt na hi tayoḥ satora ādara naiḥ antaryādi upapadyate atas jijñāsā nididhi āsana parameśvara anugraha tad darśana parama bhakti parama anugraha dvārā mokṣa asādhana tvāt kartavyā iti ye tu dhyānam eva parama pāṭava āpannam aparokṣa ākāram iti manyante teṣām darśana śrutaye upacarita arthāḥ prasajyeran 
NSu_1.1.12.5	 syāt etat atas śabdaḥ tāvat prakṛtasya hetu bhāve vata ṛte tatra brahma jijñāsāyāḥ prayojana ākāṅkṣāyām adhikāri viśeṣaṇa tayā atha śabdena prakṛtaḥ mokṣaḥ sambaddhayate jñātum icchā jijñāsā na cātra avayava arthena jijñāsā śabdaḥ arthavān icchāyāḥ svātantrya aviṣaya tvena vidhātum aśakyatvāt atas eva iṣyamāṇa jñāna upalakṣaṇa api ayuktāḥ tasmāt jñāna icchā antarṇītaḥ vicāraḥ jijñāsā padena lakṣyate mukhya prayoga atikrameṇa lākṣaṇikā āśrayaṇe ca idam prayojanam yat vicārasya jñāna dvārā eva mokṣa sādhana tva jñāpanam anyathā yogya tā viraheṇa anvaya abhāva va prasaṅgāt yadi ca jijñāsā śabdaḥ mīmāṃsā śabda vat vicāraḥ eva upasaṅkhayāyate tadā api anvaya vyatirekābhyām vicārasya jñāna sādhana tā jñāsyate evaṃca vicāraḥ yatas jñāna sādhanam jñānam ca mokṣa sādhanam atas asau kartavyaḥ iti labhyate 
NSu_1.1.12.6–1.1.12.7^1	 mokṣa āt eḥ anyalabhya tvasya śaṅkita tvāt sa avadhāraṇa tā api īśvara prasādasya tu jñāpakam na kiñcid atra paśyāmaḥ na ca jñānasya mokṣa sādhana tā na yuktāḥ yena īśvara prasādaḥ madhye adhyāhriyate ātma yāthātmya ajñānāt anātmani śarīra ādau= ātma tva ārope sati hi tad anukūla pratikūlayoḥ rāga dveṣau bhavataḥ tābhyām prayuktaḥ puṇya pāpa lakṣaṇām pravṛttim ācinute tatas ca sura nara tiryak ādi nānā yoniṣu navīna śarīra indriya ādi saṃyoga lakṣaṇam janma asya bhavati tasmāt ca duḥkha anubhavaḥ iti anādiḥ ayam kārya kāraṇa pravāhaḥ saṃsāraḥ iti ucyate ātma tattva jñānāt ca ajñāna viparyayau nivartete tattva jñānasya samāna āśraya viṣaya ajñāna mithyā jñāna nivartana svābhāvyāt śuktikā tattva jñānasya tad ajñāna rajatāropanivartaka tva darśanāt mithyājñāna nivṛttau ca rāga dveṣa an udayaḥ 
NSu_1.1.12.7^2–1.1.13.1	 kāraṇa abhāvāt tayoḥ abhāve ca na pravṛtteḥ utpattiḥ prāk upacitāyāḥ ca upabhogena prrakṣayaḥ pravṛtti abhāve ca janma antara abhāvaḥ hetu abhāvāt eva vatarmāna śarīra ādeḥ ca ārambhaka kṣaye sati nivṛttiḥ janma abhāve ca na nirbījasya duḥkhasya utpādaḥ iti evam ātyantikī duḥkha nivṛttiḥ muktiḥ tathā ca jñāna svabhāva labhyāyām muktau kim īśvara prasādena na hi andhakāra nibandhana duḥkha nivṛttaye pradīpam upādadānāḥ kasyacid prabhoḥ prasādam apekṣante svabhāvaḥ hi pradīpasya ayam yad samāna adhikaraṇa andhakāra nivartaka tvam tathā ca nyāya sūtram duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyā jñānānām uttarottara apāye tad anantara apāyāt apavargaḥ a iti dravyam karma ca kālaḥ ca svabhāvaḥ jīvaḥ eva ca yat anugrahataḥ santi na santi yat upekṣayā 
NSu_1.1.14.1–1.1.14.2	 na ṛte tvat kriyate kiñcid iti ādeḥ na harim vinā jñāna svabhāvataḥ api syāt muktiḥ kasya api hi kvacid yat tu mokṣasya īśvara adhīna tva vacanam tad jñāna ādi janmani īśvarasya nimitta tā param iti aviruddham tad artham ca tad upāsti ādeḥ upayogaḥ tat evam jñāna svabhāvena ajñāna ādi nivṛttau kāraṇa abhāve kāryān udayasya īśvara prasāda anapekṣa tvāt ayuktam idam atas śabda vyākhyānam iti atas āha dravyam iti dravya śabdena prakṛti ādi tattvam ucyate karma iti dharma adharmau svabhāvaḥ prakṛti ādīnām pariṇāma ādiḥ jīvaḥ iti abhimānī eva iti yat anugrahataḥ iti atas param draṣṭavyam anena sarva utpattimat upādāna nimittānām sattā api parameśvara adhīnā iti ucyate na ṛte tvad kriyate kiñcana a iti śrutyā sarva artha kriyāyāḥ tad adhīna tvam iti ādeḥ āgamāt avagamyate iti śeṣaḥ jñāna svabhāvataḥ api iti api śabdena aṅgīkāra vādaḥ ayam iti sūcayati hi śabdaḥ hetau yasmāt evam tasmāt upapannam pūrva vyākhyānam iti 
NSu_1.1.14.3^1	 tatas ca ayam arthaḥ syāt etat evam yadi ajñāna mātra nibandhanaḥ ayam bandhaḥ jīvasya syāt na ca evam śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu parameśvara icchā nimitta tva avagamāt advaitinām avidyā adhīna jīva brahma vibhāgavat tārkikā ādīnām ca guṇavat tva adhīna dravya vadana ādeḥ api īśvara adhīna tva upapatteḥ upapādayiṣyate hi jñāna ānanda ādi svarūpaḥ ayam jīvaḥ iti puṃstva ādi vat ityādinā tad bhāva anupalabdhiḥ ca anubhava siddhā tena avagamyate asti kim api āvarakam yena āvṛtaḥ sva prakāśa caitanya rūpaḥ api na ātmanaḥ tattvam veda na ca kāma karma ādikam eva tathā bhavitum arhati 
NSu_1.1.14.3^2	 tasya api sādinaḥ kāraṇa apekṣa tvāt na ca pūrva pūrvasmāt uttarottaram iti yuktam supti pralayayoḥ tad vṛtti abhāvena niṣkalaṅka caitanya balāt sva rūpa avabhāsa prasakteḥ atas kāma karma ādi atiriktam māyā avidyā prakṛtiḥ ityādi śabda abhidheyam anādi eva kim api dravyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam anādi māyayā suptaḥ a ityādi śruti smṛtayaḥ ca bhavanti na ca māyā api katham sva prakāśam āvṛṇoti iti yuktam āvaraka tayā eva tasyāḥ pramita tvāt vakṣyate ca atra upapattiḥ na ca jaḍasya svatas kiñcitkara tvam yuktam dravyam karma ca iti ādi vākya viruddham ca 
NSu_1.1.14.4^1	 atas parameśvaraḥ eva sattva ādi guṇa mayyā vidyā virodhi tvena avidyayā svādhīnayā prakṛtyā acintya adbhutayā sva śaktayā ca jīvasya sva prakāśam api sva rūpa caitanyam ācchādayati iti yuktam saḥ eva ca svādhiṣṭhāna labdha pariṇāma mahat ahaṅkāra ādi prakṛti aṃśaiḥ saṃyojya kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tva sva atantṛyam kāraka phala svāmyam ca asya avidyamānam eva upadarśya rāga ādi utpāda nat varāḥ duḥkham anubhāvayati tat evam bandhasya īśvara adhīna tvāt saḥ eva mocakaḥ aṅgīkāryā aparasya svātantrya abhāvāt prasannaḥ eva asau svakīyām māyām vyāvartayati iti tad prasāda artham sarvaḥ api ayam sādhana sandarbhaḥ iti uktam tatas yadi api na sūtra akṣarebhyaḥ bhagavat prasādaḥ labhyate 
NSu_1.1.14.4^2	 tathā api anupapattyāṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ iti yuktam vyākhyānam vakṣyati ca etat sūtra kāraḥ tatas hi asya bandha viparyayau iti evam uktena nyāyena na jñānasya eva ayam svabhāvaḥ yat sākṣāt mokṣa sādhana tvam astu vā tathā api īśvara prasādaḥ apekṣitaḥ sakala kārakāṇām tad adhīna sattā pravṛtti tvena tad icchām vinā kasya api kāryasya anudayāt iti aṅgīkāra vādasya ca idam prayojanam yat pūrvasya eva arthasya samarthanam tathā hi yena jñānasya mokṣa hetu tvam aṅgīkṛtam na tena api īśvara icchām tyaktum śakyate kāraka preraka tva ādinā avaśya abhyupagamanīya tvāt tathā ca kim anena jñānena apramitena pramitaḥ īśvaraḥ eva aṅgī kāryaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.15.1–1.1.15.2	 ajñānām jñāna daḥ viṣṇuḥ jñāninām mokṣa daḥ ca saḥ ānanda daḥ ca muktānām saḥ eva ekaḥ janārdanaḥ yat uktam na kāryaḥ mokṣaḥ kintu prācīneṣu mithyājñāna ādiṣu nivṛtteṣu kāraṇa abhāvāt eva uttara pravāha an utpāda mātram tatra kā nāma parameśvara apekṣā tad vacanāni tu jñāna utpatti ādi nimitta tā parāṇi iti tad anupapannam jñāna pradāna ādi atiriktasya api īśvara prayojanasya āgameṣu ukteḥ iti āha ajñānām iti mokṣa daḥ prāc ukta prakṛti bandhāt 
NSu_1.1.15.3	 nanu anādeḥ prakṛti bandhasya katham nivṛttiḥ iti ced atra āha kaścid na sādi tvam anādi tvam vā vināśa avināśayoḥ nimittam kintu virodhi sannipāta āsannipātau= eva kiñca loke tāvat anādiḥ prāgabhāvaḥ nivartate sugatānām tattva pati bhāvanā prakarṣeṇa anādi vāsanā santānānām nivṛttiḥ iṣyā naiyyāyikānām api anādi mithyā jñāna pravāhaḥ paramāṇu śyāma tā ca nivartate sa aṅkhayānām api avivekaḥ nivartate vivekena mīmāṃsakānām idānīntana dharma tattva jñāna prāgabhāvaḥ anādiḥ nivartate anādi bhāva rūpasya na nivṛttiḥ iti ced na anirvacanīya tvāt ajñānasya anādinar nivartate iti sāmānya vyāptiḥ jñānena ajñāna nivṛttiḥ iti viśeṣa vyāptiḥ atas sā eva balavatī 
NSu_1.1.15.4^1	 nanu sva upādāna gata uttara avasthāḥ vināśaḥ tat katham anādeḥ nirupādānasya vināśaḥ na sva āśraya gata uttara avasthā iti etāva tvāt anyathā paramāṇu śyāma tva ādīnām anivṛtti prasaṅgāt abhāva vailakṣaṇyāt ātma vat ajñānasya anivṛttiḥ iti ced na sat vailakṣaṇyāt prāgabhāva vat nivṛttiḥ kim na syāt kaḥ tarhi nirṇayaḥ jñāna ajñāna kṛtaḥ viśeṣa anvayaḥ iti uktam iti tat ayuktam tathā hi yat tāvat na sādi tvam anādi tvam vā ityādi tatra kim nivartaka abhāvaḥ upādhiḥ anena ucyate kim vā nivartaka sadbhāvena sat pratipakṣatā na ādyaḥ sādhana vyāpaka tvāt na dvitīyaḥ 
NSu_1.1.15.4^2–1.1.15.5	 asiddheḥ na hi ajñānasya anāditayā nivṛtti anupapattim bruvāṇaḥ tad nivartakam abhyupaiti kintu ana ādi tvena tad abhāvam api anuminoti yat api prāgabhāve vyabhicāra udbhāvanam tat api bhāva tvena hetu viśeṣaṇāt ayuktam yat api sugatānām ityādi tad atyantam asaṅgatam na hi vāsanānām anādi tvam vaināśikāḥ abhyupayanti na ca tadvayatiriktam santānam yena tatra vyabhicāraḥ udbhāvyeta na ca naiyyāyikāḥ abhyupayanti na ca tadvayatiriktam vā pravāham aṅgīkurvate paramāṇu śyāma tā api sādiḥ eva na hi paramāṇu pākasya īdaṃprathama tā tad siddhāntaḥ yat api ajñānasya anirvacanīya tvam uktam tatra anirvacanīya tvam sat asat vilakṣaṇa tvam ced kim anena prakṛta anupayuktena 
NSu_1.1.15.6^1	 pratipakṣaḥ ayam iti ced na parasya asiddheḥ avyāpteḥ ca bhāva abhāva vilakṣaṇa tvam anirvacanīya tvam tena viśeṣaṇā siddhiḥ ucyate iti ced na sva ukti virodhāt svayam eva hi anādi bhāva rūpam yat vijñānena vilīyate iti ajñāna lakṣaṇam abhidhāya bhāva rūpa āmāna sādhanāya pramāṇāni upanyastāni abhāva vailakṣaṇya mātram tatra vivakṣitam iti ced na tasya eva hetu viśeṣaṇa tva upapatteḥ nanu atra uktam sat vailakṣaṇyāt prāgabhāva vat nivṛttiḥ kim na syāt iti satyam uktam duruktam tat prāgabhāvasya api sattva aṅgīkārāt atha sat vilakṣaṇa tvam nāma bhāva vilakṣaṇa tvam vivakṣitam tadā abhāva vailakṣaṇya aṅgīkāra virodhena asiddhi prasaṅgaḥ atyanta abhāve vyabhicāraḥ ca tasya api nivṛtti sādhane tad nivṛttau= eva vyabhicāraḥ kiñca ātmani bhāva tvam na asti iti tatra anaikāntyam duṣpariharam tathā api āropitam bhāva tvam tatra asti iti ced tad avidyāyām api samānam iti asiddhiḥ yat api vyāptyoḥ sāmānya viśeṣa bhāva kathanam tasya upayogaḥ vaktavyaḥ 
NSu_1.1.15.6^2	 tena bala abala niścayaḥ iti ced sa kim sāmānya viśeṣa bhāva mātreṇa uta avi abhicāra ādi sampattau satyām ādye dhūmavān agnimān iti sāmānya vyāpteḥ parvataḥ niragnikaḥ iti viśeṣa vyāptiḥ balavatī prasajyeta dvitīye kim sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena vyabhicāra ādikam eva vyutpādyatām kim vā anena prabala tvena durbala tvena ca viśeṣa vyāptyā sāmānyavyāptiḥ bādhyate iti ced kim saṅkocanam bādhya tvam uta vyabhicāra pradarśanam atha upādhi udbhāvanam na ādyaḥ yat anādi tad ajñāna atiriktam na nivartate iti saṅkocanīyam na punar yat ana ādi tva rahitam tat eva jñāna nivartyam iti saṅkocyam iti atra niyāmaka abhāvāt sāmānya viśeṣa bhāve tu uktam na dvitīyaḥ vyabhicāra sthalasya ādarśita tvāt vyāpti balena ajñānasya jñāna nivartya tve siddhe anādi tvasya tatra eva vyabhicāraḥ iti ced tarhi etat eva ucyatām kim sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena anādi tvena ajñānasya anivatya ṛtve siddhe ajñāna tvasya tatra eva vyabhicāraḥ iti kim na syāt 
NSu_1.1.15.7	 astu tahiḥ pratipakṣaḥ eva iti ced kim vyāpti mātreṇa uta pakṣa dharmatā upetayā vyāptyā na prathamaḥ vyapti mātrasya apratipādaka tvāt anyathā pakṣa dharma tā vaiyarthyāt dvitīye saṃsāra kāraṇam ajñānam jñāna nivartyam bhavitum arhati ajñāna tvāt śuktikā jñāna vat iti uktam syāt atra api kim sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena kiñca tu śuktikā ajñānam nāma kim jñāna abhāvaḥ atha bhāva rūpam ajñānam ādye dṛṣṭāntasya sādhana vaikalyam na hi śabda sāmya mātreṇa dṛṣṭānta dārṣya antika bhāvaḥ asti tathā tve go tvena vāc ādīnām api śṛṅgi tva sādhana prasaṅgāt dvitīye kim tad sādyutana ādi ādye katham ayam viśeṣaḥ syāt dvitīye tat api pakṣa tulyam na tṛtīyaḥ ajñāna itara tvasya samavyāpti āvāt pakṣa itara tvāt ca
