NSu_1.1.15.8	 etena jñāna ajñāna kṛtaḥ viśeṣa anvayaḥ iti nirastam yat api nirupādānasya vināśa anupapattim āśaṅkayā uktam sva āśraya gata uttara avasthāḥ vināśaḥ iti tad anupapannam anupādāna bhūta āśraya uttara avasthā ced āśrita vināśaḥ syāt tadā bhū talāt apa sārite ghaṭe ghaṭa vināśaḥ syāt paramāṇu śyāma tā pratibandī tu tasyāḥ api sa upādāna tvena eva nirastā iti atra ucyate yat tāvat avidyāyāḥ anādi tvena anivṛttiḥ iti saḥ ayam prasaṅgaḥ svatantra anumānam vā na ādyaḥ avidyā anādi tvasya śruti yukti siddha tvena vipayarya aparyavasānāt na dvitīyaḥ viśva māyā nivṛttiḥ amāyām etām taranti te ataranti avidyām a ityādi śruti smṛti viruddha tvāt anādeḥ api nivṛttau bādhaka abhāvena aprayojaka tvāt ca ātmanaḥ api nivṛtti prasaṅgaḥ bādhakaḥ iti ced na vyāpti abhāvāt nivartaka bhāva abhāvābhyām viśeṣa upapatteḥ pramita nivartaka anabhyupagamasya anucita tvāt anādi tvena nivartaka abhāva anumānasya bādhita tvāt etena nivartaka abhāvasya upādhi tvam tad viparyayasya pratipakṣa tvam ca samāhitam 
NSu_1.1.15.9	 nanu avayava tad saṃyoga vināśābhyām dravya nāśaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tat katham atra vināśaḥ iti ced kutas ayam ubhaya abhyupagamaḥ ekaika parihāreṇa api vināśa darśanāt iti ced tarhi sa ādeḥ evam astu anādeḥ tṛtīyaḥ api prakāraḥ anusartavyaḥ pramita tvāt eva vināśasya anādeḥ kīdṛśaḥ vināśaḥ iti ced sva rūpa dhvaṃsaḥ eva sva upādāna gata uttara avasthā sva upādāna mātra tva āpattiḥ ityādi kārya viṣayam nanu avidyā ced nivarteta tarhi eka m uktau sarva muktiḥ syāt na syāt pratijīvam avidyā bhedāṅgīkārāt atra viśeṣaḥ sva guṇa ācchādikā tu ekā a iti āgamāt anusandheyaḥ 
NSu_1.1.15.10	 syāt etat brahma vidām api avidyā anuvartate tena ca śruti smṛtīnām prāmāṇyam brahma sākṣātkāraḥ avidyā nivartakaḥ na viveka mātram iti ced na tadvatām api saṃsāra anuvṛtti darśanāt sākṣātkṛta brahmaṇām sadyas śarīra ādi pāte vāta putrīyāḥ pauruṣeyāḥ brahma upadeśāḥ prasajyeran= iti mā evam na smarati bhava an ukta arthasya prasannaḥ parameśvaraḥ eva bandha vidhvaṃsam karoti iti uktam na ca sākṣātkāraḥ tad prasāda sādhanam yena saḥ api katham teṣām na iti paryanuyujyeta bhakteḥ para avasthāḥ hi tad hetuḥ uktā tad sampattiḥ ca kārya gamyā para citta vṛttīnām apratyakṣa tvāt prārabdha karma pratibaddhaḥ bhagavat prasādaḥ iti tu mandam acetanānām karmaṇām svatantra bhagavat prasāda pratibandhaka tva ayogāt 
NSu_1.1.15.11	 tāni api tad icchā viśeṣa anugṛhītāni iti ced bhagavat icchayoḥ virodha prasaṅgāt mocaka prasādaḥ eva evaṃrūpaḥ iti ced tarhi saḥ eva aparipūrṇaḥ iti eva āgatam anyathā katham prārabdhānām api upamardam vakṣyati prārabdha pratibandha ādi va ādāḥ tu upacarita arthāḥ eva vastutas tu bhagavān eva anādeḥ api bandhasya nivartakaḥ iti sādhu uktaṃjñāninām mokṣa daḥ ca saḥ a iti nanu ca ānandaḥ svarūpam eva sa ca avidyā āvṛtaḥ avidyā nivṛttau svatas siddhaḥ eva anubhavaḥ api evam eva viṣayi tvam api anubhava svabhāvaḥ na tu āgantukaḥ dharmaḥ tatas mokṣa dānāt katham pṛthak ānanda ādi dānam ucyate parameśvara śaktiḥ eva jīva svarūpa āvaraṇam mukhyam avidyā tu nimitta mātram tatas avidyāyām nivṛttāyām api na aśeṣa ānanda abhivyaktiḥ yāvat īśvaraḥ eva svakīyām bandha śaktim na tatas vyāvartayati atas eva ānanda hrāsa vṛddhī vakṣyete iti 
NSu_1.1.16ab.1–1.1.16ab.2^1	 iti ukteḥ bandha mithyātvam na eva muktiḥ apekṣate evam tāvat sva matena sūtram vyākhyāya tad pariśuddhaye pareṣām bhāṣyam dūṣayati bandha mithyātvam ityādinā māyā vādinā hi kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tva doṣa saṃsarga kriyā kāraka phala lakṣaṇasya bandhasyā atmani āropita tvena mithyātvam sva bhāṣyādau varṇitam tad anupapannam bandha mithyā tvasya asūtrita tvāt asūtrita artha varṇane ca bhāṣya lakṣaṇa abhāvena ābhāṣya tva prasaṅgāt sūtra arthaḥ varṇyate yatra vākyaiḥ sūtra anukāribhiḥ sva padāni ca varṇyante bhāṣyam bhāṣya vidaḥ viduḥ iti hi bhāṣya lakṣaṇam ācakṣate atra āha dvividhaḥ hi sūtra arthaḥ śraute ārthaḥ ca tatra atha atas brahma jijñāsā itisūtre anuvāda tva parihārāya śāstre puruṣa pravṛtti siddhaye ca kartavyā iti padam adhyāhāryam 
NSu_1.1.16ab.2^2	 jijñāsā padam ca anuṣṭhāna yogyasya antarṇītasya vicārasya upalakṣaṇam iti sthite sādhana catuṣyaya sampannasya brahma jñānāya vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti sūtra vākyasya śrautaḥ arthaḥ sampadyate arthāt adhikāri viśeṣaṇa mokṣa sādhanam brahma jñānam iti siddhayati sannidhānāt ca vedānta vākya vicāraḥ iti śruti arthābhyām sādhana catuṣyaya sampannasya mokṣa sādhana brahma jñānāya vedānta vākya vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti sūtra vākyasya tātparyeṇa pratipādyaḥ arthaḥ avagataḥ evaṃca śāstre prekṣāvat pravṛtti aṅgatayā arthataḥ sūtritasya prayojana ādeḥ upapādakam bandha mithyātvam iti tat api sūtra arthaḥ eva 
NSu_1.1.16ab.3^1	 brahma jñānam hi sūtritam anartha hetu nibarhaṇam anarthaḥ ca pramātṛ tā pramukham kartṛ tvam bhoktṛ tvam ca tat yadi vastu kṛtam syāt na jñānena nibarhaṇīyam yatas jñānam ajñānasya eva nivartakam tat yadi kartṛ tvam bhoktṛ tvam ajñāna hetukam syāt tatas brahma jñānam anartha hetu nibarhaṇam ucyamānam upapadyeta tena sūtrakāreṇa eva brahma jñānam anartha hetu nibarhaṇam sūtrayatau= idcā hetukam kartṛ tvam bhoktṛ tvam pradarśitam bhavati vicāra viṣaya tayā ca brahma sūtritam ātmā ca brahma tasya ca aham kartā bhoktā iti pratīyamānam rūpam yadi paramārthikam syāt tad ā āsandigdha tayā vicāra viṣaya tā na syāt tat yadi kartṛ tva ādi rūpam avidyā āropitam pāramārthikam niṣkrayam niṣkalam brahma rūpam syāt tatas asya sandidha tayā viṣayatā ucyamāna upapadyate tena ātma svarūpam vicāra viṣayam sūtrayatā sūtra kṛtā eva kartṛ tva ādyatat ākārasya mithyātvam sūtritam bhavati 
NSu_1.1.16ab.3^2	 kartṛ tva ādeḥ bandhasya mithyātvam ca yāvatā vinā na upapadyate tat api sūtritam eva na ca evam aneka artha tā doṣaḥ śrauta arthika tva bhedasya ukta tvāt sūtra tvāt ca alaṃkāraḥ eva hi ayam sūtrasya yat aneka artha tvam yathā āhuḥ alpa akṣaram asaṃdigdham sāravat viśvatomukham astobhamana vadyaṭ ca sūtram sūtra vidaḥ viduḥ iti viśvatomukham iti aneka artha tām āha anyatra api laghūni sūcita arthāni su alpa akṣara padāni ca sarvatas sāra bhūtāni sūtrāṇi āhuḥ maṇīṣiṇaḥ iti yāvān= sūcitaḥ sa sarvaḥ api eṣām arthaḥ iti sūcita arthāni atas yaḥ kaścid arthaḥ śabda sāmarthyena artha vaśāt vā pratīyate sa sarvaḥ tad arthaḥ eva iti bhavati ayam artha kalāpaḥ tat mahima adhigataḥ tat evam vidhi apekṣiteṣu adhikāri viṣaya prayojana anubandheṣu sūtra ākṣipta prayojana viṣayayoḥ upapādakam bandha mithyā tvam pratipādaya di upmat asmad pratyaya gocarayoḥ iti ādi bhāṣyām sūtra atharsaṅgatam eva 
NSu_1.1.16ab.4	 syāt etat prathama pratipannam śrauta artham ullaṅghaya carama pratipannamārthikā artham eva upapādayan katham akuśalaḥ na syāt iti atra ucyate syāt etat evam yadi yuṣmad asmāt ityādi bhāṣyam prathama sūtra ākṣipta arthasya eva upapādakam syāt na ca evam kim nāma sakala tantrā artha upodghātaḥ api prayojanam asya bhāṣyasya tathā hi asya śāstrasya aidaṃparyam sukha eka tānasat ātma kūṭa stha caitanya eka rasa tā saṃsāri tva abhimatasya ātmanaḥ pāramārthikam svarūpam iti vedāntāḥ paryavasyanti iti tat ca aham kartā sukhī duḥkhī iti pratyakṣa abhimatena ābādhita kalpena avabhāsena viruddhayate atas tad virodha parihāra artham brahma svarūpa piparīta rūpam avidyā nimittam ātmana iti yāvat na pratipādyate tāvat jarat gava ādi vākya vat anarthakam pratibhāti atas tad nivṛtti artham avidyā vilasitam abrahma svarūpa tvam ātmanaḥ iti prathamam eva prekṣāvat pravṛttaye pratipādanīyam tat anena bhāṣyeṇa ucyate iti 
NSu_1.1.16ab.5	 tat etat ādi bhāṣyasya saṅgati trayam api asaṅgatam tathā hi yat tāvat uktam sūtrita prayojana ākṣiptam bandha mithyātvam iti tat asat yat khalu pramitam api anupapadyamānam sva upapattaye yat apekṣate tat tadākṣipati na anyat yathā jīvataḥ devadattasya gṛhe abhāvaḥ bahirbhāvam na punar śabda anitya tvam tat kasya hetoḥ yatas gṛhe abhāvaḥ bahirbhāvena eva upapadyamānaḥ tam apekṣate evaṃca prayojana tayā uktāḥ muktiḥ yadi bandha mithyā tvām apekṣeta tadā tadā ākṣipet na ca etat asti iti āha bandha mithyātvam iti eva śabdena anyathā eva upapannatām sūcayati katham uktam etat jñānāt prasannaḥ parameśvaraḥ eva bandha nivṛttim karoti iti upapadyate ca satyasya api prabhu prasādāt nivṛttiḥ iti vakṣyate 
NSu_1.1.16ab.6	 nanu darśanena bandha nivṛttiḥ ubhayī dṛṣṭā yathā satyasya api nigaḍa ādi bandhasya darśana janyena rāja prasādena yathā ca mithyābhūtasya svāpna nigaḍa bandhasya prabodhena eva sākṣāt tatra brahma jñānāt saṃsāra bandha nivṛttiḥ sūtritā kam pakṣam avalambyatām iti sandihyate tathā ca anyathā api upapattiḥ syāt na anyathā eva upapattiḥ iti mā evam viśeṣa uktayā nirṇaya upapatteḥ iti etad artha upapādanāya ajñānām iti uktam atra api anuṣañjanīyam tarati śokam ātma vid iti sāmānya vacanam viśeṣa vacanena bādhyate dṛṣṭvā eva tam mucyate iti śrutiḥ darśana mokṣau= antarā kiñcid na sahate iti ced na avadhāraṇasya ayoga vyavaccheda paratva upapatteḥ darśana janyā deva īśvara prasādāt na punar karma ādi hetukāt iti anya yoga vyavaccheda paratva upapatteḥ ca iti 
NSu_1.1.16ab.7^1	 astu vā jñānāt bandha nivṛttiḥ tathā api bandha mithyā tvam na evamuktiḥ apekṣate katham na hi dṛṣṭa sāmarthyāt jñānāt bandha nivṛttiḥ yena bandha mithyā tvam apekṣeta kintvā āgamaḥ eva jñānāt bandha nivṛttim śrāvayati pramite ca sādhya sādhana bhāve kā nāma anupapattiḥ yat śamanāya upapādakam mṛgyam nanu yathā āgneya ādīnām ṣaṇṇām yāgānām apūrva kāraṇa bhāve śrute api kāla antara bhāvi pradhāna apūrva sādhanatva upapatti artham krama bhā vi yāgajanyāni madhya vartīni avāntarā pūrvāṇi kalpyante yathā vā śrutasya eva yāgasya svarga sādhaśratvasya upapattaye apūrvam kalpyate tathā śruta upapatti artham eva bandha mithyā tva kalpanam iti mā evam vaiṣamyāt yuktam hi tatra apūrva kalpanam yad kāla antara bhāvina tad kāraṇam iti niyamāt na ca iha tathā asti iha api jñānam ajñānasya eva nivartakam iti niyamaḥ asti iti ced na 
NSu_1.1.16ab.7^2	 satyasya api jñānena nivṛttau bādhaka abhāvena tad aniścayāt na ca darśana adarśana mātram vyāpteḥ niyāmakam iti vakṣyāmaḥ niyata pūrvakṣaṇa vṛtti tva śūnyam api kāraṇam astu iti vyāhatā śaṅkā eva na udeti yat nivṛttaye bādhakam upanyasanīyam satyasya api nivṛttau= ātmā api nivarteta iti ced na vyāpti abhāvāt vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvāt ca anādeḥ ca ajñānasya nivṛttau= ātmanaḥ api nivṛttiḥ kim na syāt mithyābhūtam ajñānam anādi api nivartate na satyaḥ ātmā iti ced kva idam upalabdham bhavatā yat satyam na nivartate iti nivṛttau= anādi tvam aprayojakīkṛtya mithyātvam prayojakī kurvata ajñānasya yena kena api nivṛttiḥ kasmāt na iṣyate kim jñāna niyamena jñānam eva ajñāna virodhi iti ced hanta tarhi virodhisadbhāvaḥ eva nivṛttau prayojakaḥ iti kutas ātma nivṛttiḥ 
NSu_1.1.16ab.8	 nanu jñānena satyam nivartamānam kim viṣaya gatam nivartate uta āśraya gatam atha ubhaya gatam na ādyaḥ yatas citra avayavini nīla viśiṣṭa dravya jñānam sva viṣayam vā sva viṣaya samavetam vā rasa ādikam virodhinam vā pītim ādi guṇam na nivartayati na dvitīyaḥ ghaṭa ādi jñānena ātma gata dharma ādi a nivṛtteḥ na tṛtīyaḥ ātmanaḥ śarīra viṣaya jñānena śarīra ātma sambandha anivṛtteḥ iti mā evam ukta uttara tvāt yadi jñānam āśraya gatam nivartayet tadā dharma ādikam api nivartayet iti atra vyāpti ayogāt vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvāt ca ghaṭa ādi jñānam dharma ādi avirodhi ātma yāthātmya jñānam tu bandha virodhī iti vaiṣamyāt ca ātmayāthātmya jñānasya eva āpādana viṣaya tāyām iṣya āpādanam citra avayavini nīla viśiṣṭa dravya jñānam tu mithyājñānam eva na api tatra pītim aguṇaḥ asti ekam eva hi citram nāma rūpam āśraya vyāpya vṛtti iti padārtha vidaḥ 
NSu_1.1.16ab.9–1.1.16ab.10	 astu vā jñānam ajñānasya eva nivartakam iti vyāptiḥ tathā atrapa bandha mithyā tvam na eva muktiḥ apekṣate kintu bandhasya ajñāna tad kārī ayoḥ atvam eva iti tat eva varṇanīyam adhyāsa varṇanasya kā saṅgatiḥ ajñānasya mithyātvam tu kapoṇi guḍāyitam nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt api ca satyasya api viṣasya garuḍa dhyānena nivṛtti darśanāt bandha mithyātvam na eva muktiḥ apekṣate viṣam na satyam iti ced na tathā sati nīla viśiṣṭa dravya ādeḥ api tava asatya tvena tad nivṛtti āpādanasya anupapatti prasaṅgāt satyam tat api mama mithyā para aṅgīkāreṇa tu āpādanam iti ced tarhi tat eva na jñānāt nivṛttam iti na mithyābhūtasya api jñānāt nivṛttiḥ mithyābhūtam virodhi jñāna nivartyam iti ced na viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt avirodhāt eva ātmanaḥ anivṛtti sambhavāt mithyātvam aṅgīkṛtya api virodhaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ tatas varam saḥ eva prayojakaḥ iti aṅgīkāraḥ lāghavāt jñāna virodhi tvam mithyābhūtasya eva iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt darśanāt iti ced 
NSu_1.1.16ab.11^1	 tarhi āgamena satyasya api bhavat kena vāryate na ca darśana mātram vyāpteḥ niyāmakam dhyānam mānasī kriyā na jñānam iti ced na yadi kriyā parispandaḥ sa tarhi ati indriya āśritaḥ atīndriyaḥ iti aparokṣa avabhāsa virodhaḥ rūpa rahita tvena tad avabhāsa virodhaḥ ca yadi ca mānasī sṛṣṭiḥ iti matam anumatam etat śravaṇa darśana ādi janita mānasa vāsanā mayasya vastunaḥ manasā avalokanam dhyānam iti aṅgīkārāt atīndriya upādānakasya api dravyasya aindriyaka tvam tṛyaṇuka ādeḥ iva upapadyate nīrūpādvāyaḥ rūpavataḥ tejasaḥ janma vedāntinām prasiddham eva 
NSu_1.1.16ab.11^2	 tārkikā ādīn ḥ tu ārambha vāda nirākaraṇena toṣayiṣyāmaḥ evaṃca dhyāyateḥ cintā artha tā api smṛti siddha asiddhāḥ atas eva kriyā mānasa vat iti sūtra virodhaḥ api parihṛtaḥ vidhi janya puruṣa icchā prayatna nirapekṣam eva sarvatra jñānasya puṣkala kāraṇam anicchataḥ api aniṣya jñāna darśanāt tat katham idam jñānam iti ced na vidheḥ sādhya sādhana bhāva mātra jñāpanena caritārtha tvāt icchā prayatnayoḥ ca saṃskāra udbodhe kṛtārtha tvāt mānasa vastu avalokane vyāpāra abhāvāt cakṣuḥ calana nirāsa vat manaḥ vikṣepa nirāse vā tad upayogaḥ 
NSu_1.1.16ab.12	 kiñca setu darśana ādinā pāpa ādi nivṛttiḥ suprasiddhāḥ madhye adṛṣṭa kalpanāyām tu na pramāṇam asti anyathā prakṛte api adṛṣṭa kalpanāyām tu na pramāṇam asti anyathā prakṛte api adṛṣṭa kalpanā prasaṅgāt adṛṣṭa sādhya tve mokṣasya anitya tā prasaktiḥ iti ced jñāna janya tve api sāmyāt jñāna janya tve api pradhvaṃsa tvāt na anitya tvam iti ced samānam etat adṛṣṭa sādhya tve api iti 
NSu_1.1.16ab.13	 api ca bandha vidhvaṃsa lakṣaṇa tvāt bandha mithyātvam na eva muktiḥ apekṣate kim nāma satya tvam eva na hi mithyābhūtasya śaśa viṣāṇa adeḥ dhvaṃsaḥ asti nanu yathā mithyā bhūtāt śaśa viṣāṇa ādeḥ vyāvṛttau dhvaṃsaḥ satye paryavasyati iti bhavatā ucyate tathā satyāt cit ātmanaḥ api vyāvṛttau mithyābhūte paryavasyati iti mayā api vaktum śakyataḥ eva satyam āpātataḥ tathā tathā api api sautrī arthāpattiḥ sandeha āskanditā kuṇṭhitā eva anirvācya nirāsena niścayam api bhavataḥ janayiṣyāmaḥ bandha bādhaḥ eva muktiḥ iti ced na evam śruti sūtre vadataḥ tarati śokam ityādau viparīta abhidhānāt vimuktaḥ ca vimucyate iti śruta arthāpattiḥ tu bhāṣya kṛtā eva anyathā upapāditā 
NSu_1.1.16ab.14	 api ca evam uktiḥ brahma jñānam jīva gatam bandham nivartayati iti sautrī prayojana uktiḥ bandha mithyā tvam na apekṣate yadi jīva jñānam jīva gatasya bandhasya nivartakam iti prayojana uktiḥ sūtre syāt tadā kathañcid apekṣeta api bandha mithyātvam na ca evam sūtrakṛt āha na hi śuktikāyām āropitam rajatam ghaṭa jñānāt nivartate brahmajñānam nāma tvaṃpadārthasya jīvasya tad padārthena brahmaṇā aikya anubhavaḥ iti tu sva goṣṭhī niṣṭham pralāpa mātram nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt 
NSu_1.1.16ab.15	 api ca yadi bandha mithyā tvam yadi ca jñāna mātrāt bandha bādhaḥ tadā jñāne sati kim api muktiḥ na eva apekṣate iti sadyas eva sākṣātkṛta brahmaṇām śarīra ādi nivṛttiḥ prasajyeta iti artha āpatteḥ tarka virodhaḥ etat ca tṛtīye prapañcayiṣyāmaḥ evam sūtrita prayojana ākṣiptam bandha mithyātvam iha varṇitam iti etat nirākṛtam 
NSu_1.1.16ab.16	 athavā viṣaya uktayā ākṣiptam iti etat anena nirācaṣṭe evam uktiḥ sautrī brahmaṇaḥ viṣaya tva uktiḥ bandha mithyā tvam na apekṣate yadi hi sūtre jīva ātmanaḥ viṣaya tayā uktiḥ syāt tadā sā tasya sandigdha tā siddhaye katṛtvā ādi bandha mithyātvam kathañcid apekṣeta api brahma eva hi atra viṣayatayā ucyate na hi anyasya sandigdha tayā anyasya vicāra viṣayatā upapadyate atiprasaṅgāt ātmā eva brahma iti etām tu durāśām apākariṣyāmaḥ 
NSu_1.1.16ab.17	 yat vā sakala tantra artha upodghātaḥ prayojanam yuṣmad asmat iti ādi granthasya iti etat anena apākaroti tathā hi evam uktiḥ sakala jagat janma ādi nimitta tva lakṣaṇam samasta jīva jaḍa ātmakāt prapañcadati anta vyāvṛttam brahma eva aśeṣa veda pratipādyam iti evam tat tu samanvayāt ityādi koktiḥ jīva gata bandha mithyā tvam na apekṣate eṣā hi brahmaṇi eva pramāṇa ābhāsa pratipannasya jīva abheda ādeḥ eva mithyātvam apekṣate yadi hi jīvasya brahma tāyām sakala vedānta paryavasānam pratipādayitum idam śāstram pravṛttam syāt tadā virodha śāntyai bandha mithyā tva apekṣā na ca evam yathā ca etat tathā vakṣyāmaḥ nanu apekṣāyāḥ puruṣa dharma tvāt katham etat ittham pramitasya anupapadyamānasya arthasya eva upapādaka ākṣepa śaktiḥ apekṣātra ucyate iti evañca jñānadbandha nivṛtteḥ bandha mithyā tvena vinā anupapadyamāna tva abhāvāt na tat ākṣepaka tvam iti uktam 
NSu_1.1.16cd.1–1.1.16cd.2^1^1	 mithyātvam api bandhasya na pratyakṣa virodhataḥ dūṣaṇa antaram ca artha āpatteḥ āha mithyātvam api iti na kevalam bandha mithyā tvam na eva muktiḥ apekṣate kim nāma bandhasya mithyātvam na asti iti apisambandhaḥ nanu etat anupapannam pramāṇam hi sva mahimnā eva artham vyavasthāpayati na punar prāc artha siddhim apekṣate tathā tve vā pramāṇa vaiyarthyam pūrva pramāṇasya api tathā tvena anavasthā ca syāt atas prāk ākṣepya asiddhiḥ arthāpatteḥ bhūṣaṇam eva pravṛttāyām tu artha āpattau na apekṣya asiddhiḥ pramita tvāt eva 
NSu_1.1.16cd.1–1.1.16cd.2^1^2	 evam tarhi paricita cara puruṣasya divā bhuñjānasya pīna tvam anupapadyamānam rasāyana siddhim yoga ṛddhim vā kasmāt na ākṣipet tat asiddhiḥ api prāc artha āpatti pravṛtteḥ alaṅkāraḥ eva uttara kālam tu na asti eva iti ced na vaiṣamyāt na hi rasāyana siddhayā ādya siddha tayā na artha āpatti prameyam api tarhi paricita care puruṣe pramāṇa bādhita tayā asiddham sādhayati pramāṇam na tu pramāṇa viruddham iti hi prasiddham eṣā khalu arthāpatti sāmagrī yat ākṣepakasya pramita tvam anupapadyamāna tvam ca ākṣepyasya api upapādaka tvam pramāṇa aviruddha tvam ca 
NSu_1.1.16cd.2^2	 atas eva apramita tvam anupapatti abhāvaḥ anyathā api upapattiḥ anyathā eva upapattiḥ pramāṇa viruddha artha tvam ca iti arthāpatti dūṣaṇāni iti satyam vayam api hi bandha mithyā tvam aham kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhī iti ādi pratyakṣa viruddha tvāt eva na artha āpatti prameyam iti brūmaḥ tat idam uktam pratyakṣa virodhate iti pratyakṣa virodhataḥ api iti vā yojanā tena pramāṇa antara virodham samuccinoti ceṣi ādi liṅgaiḥ aham iti eva yaḥ vedyaḥ iti ādi āgamaiḥ ca ātmanaḥ kartṛ tva ādi upetasya eva pramita tvāt athavā arthāpatteḥ ābhāsa tvena anākṣipta bandha mithyā tvam varṇayat pareṣām bhāṣyam anupayuktam iti uktam 
NSu_1.1.16cd.2^3	 ayuktam api pratyakṣa ādi viruddha artha pratipādaka tvāt iti anena ucyate nanu pratyakṣam bandha svarūpa mātram gocarayati na tu tasmin mithyātva abhāvam atas arthāpatteḥ bhāṣya kārīyasya vā tad mithyā tva vyutpādanasya katham pratyakṣa virodhaḥ mā evam pratyakṣam khalu bandham gocarayat asti iti na asti iti vā gocarayet ubhaya udāsīnasya jñānasya ādaśarnāt ādye astitvam mithyātva abhāvaḥ ca iti anarthāntaram iti katham na pratyakṣa virodhaḥ dvitīye anubhava virodhaḥ tad vyutpādana vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt ca 
NSu_1.1.17ab.1–1.1.17ab.2^1	 mithyātvam yadi duḥkha ādeḥ tad vākya agratas bhavet syāt etat evam yadi idam pratyakṣam tattva āvedakam bhavet na ca etat asti samasta upādhi anavacchinna ananta ānanda caitanya ekarasam udāsīnam ekam eva advitīyam khalvātma tattvam na īhanānā asti kiñcana ityādi śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇeṣu gīyate na ca etāni upakrama ādi vaśādī dṛś ātma tattvam abhidadhati tad parāṇi santi śakyāni kena api upacarita arthāni kartum tad viruddham ca prādeśikam anekavidha duḥkha ādi prapañca upaplutam ātmānam ādarśayat pratyakṣam katham upaplavaḥ na bhavet yā iyam caitanyasya svatas eva sthita lakṣaṇa brahma rūpa tā avabhāsam pratibadhya jīvat pāpa ādika vidyā kamarpūrva prajñā saṃskāra citra bhittiḥ anādiḥ anirvācya vidyā 
NSu_1.1.17ab.2^2	 tasyāḥ parameśvara adhiṣṭhita tva labdha pariṇāma viśeṣaḥ vijñāna kriyā śakti dvaya āśrayaḥ kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tva eka ādhāraḥ kūṭastha caitanya saṃvalana sañjāta jyotiḥ aparokṣaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ sa ca cit ātmanaḥ buddhayā niṣkṛṣṭa vedānta va ādibhiḥ antaḥkaraṇam manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṃpratyayī iti ca vijñāna śakti viśeṣam āśritya gīyate parispanda śaktayā ca prāṇaḥ iti tad uparāga nimittam mithyā eva ātmanaḥ kartṛ tva ādikam pratibhāti sphaṭika maṇeḥ iva upadhāna nimittaḥ lohitimā tat evam aham kartā bhoktā sukhī duḥkhī iti ādi pratyakṣe śruti ādi virodhena pūti kūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bandha mithyā tva vyutpādanam upapannataram iti atas āha mithyātvam yadi iti bhevet etat na īhanānā ityādi vākya virodhena pratyakṣam ābhāsīkṛtya bandha mithyā tva varṇanam 
NSu_1.1.17ab.2^3	 bāla jana manoharā ca eṣā prakriyā yadi tad vākyamukta vidha ātma tattva param syāt na ca evam tathā hi kim āpātataḥ pratipannaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ athavā upakrama upasaṃhārau= abhyāsaḥ apūrvatā phalam atharvāda upapattī ca liṅgam tātpari anirṇayaḥ iti ādi ukta liṅga anuguṇaḥ tad aviruddhaḥ ca na ādyaḥ mīmāṃsā vaii arthya āpatteḥ dvitīye tu katham idam vākyukta lakṣaṇa ātma tattva param syāt upakrama ādi liṅgeṣu balavatyā upapattyā viruddha tvāt atas eva hi asataḥ sat ajāyata ityādi vākya pratipannaḥ arthaḥ kutas tu khalu somya eyam syāt katham asataḥ sañjāyeta iti upapatti viruddhaḥ tyajyate 
NSu_1.1.17ab.2^4	 vakṣyati ca bhagavan sūtra kāraḥ abhimāni adhikaraṇe mṛd abravīt ityādi vākyāt pratītam api artham upapatti viruddham parityajya artha antaram katham atra upapatti virodhaḥ iti ced evam yadi duḥkha ādeḥ ātma atiriktasya samastasya mithyātvam śruti ādi balena syāt tarhi tasya śruti ādi vākyasya tāvat mithyā tvam bhavet ātma atirikta tvāt anyathā svasmin= eva asya prāmāṇyam pratihatam iti na kañcid artham pratipādayet yadi ca idam vākyam mithyā syāt tathā api na duḥkha ādeḥ mithyātvam pratipādayet mithyā bhūtasya vandhyā suta vacasaḥ sādhaka tva adarśanāt tat evam asya vākyasya mithyātva āmithyā tvayoḥ bandha mithyā tva pratipādanāsām athryāt pratyakṣa bādhaka tva anupapatteḥ na duḥkha ādi bandha mithyā tva siddhiḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.17ab.3^1	 tattva vidaḥ vadanti sarvaḥ api hi bandhaḥ buddhīndriya śarīra viṣaya tad dharma lakṣaṇaḥ asmābhiḥ api ātmani āropitaḥ eva iti aṅgīkriyate yathā uktam bhāṣya kṛtāḥ pramāda ātmaka tvāt bandhasya iti atas kinnibandhanaḥ bandha mithyā tva nirāse nibarndhaḥ satyam tathā api asti atra darśana bhedaḥ evam khalu adhyātma vidām darśanam kriyā jñāne prati kāraka antara aprayojya tva ādi lakṣaṇam kartṛ tvam bhoktṛ tvam ca parameśvara āyattam ātmani svatas vidyate eva kriyā veśa ādi rūpayā vikriyayā vināśa ādi a hetu tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt tasya apara āyattatva avabhāsaḥ avidyā nimittakaḥ bhramaḥ avidyā ādikam ca sva rūpeṇa ātma sambandhi tvena ca sat eva evam buddhīndriya śarīra viṣayāḥ svarūpa santaḥ eva īśvara vaśāḥ api avidyā ādi vaśāt ātmīya tayā adhyasyante parāyatta ātmīya tā api asti eva 
NSu_1.1.17ab.3^2	 tān= ca ātmanaḥ viviktān api vispaṣṭa tayā anupalabha mānaḥ tad dharmān duḥkha ādīn= satyān eva ātmīya tvena paśyan= tad kṛte nīca uccatva lakṣaṇe vikṛtī satye eva pratipadyate tatas rāga dveṣābhyām prayuktaḥ tad vinivṛttaye yat karoti tat api etādṛś eva atanoti iti aneka yoniṣu bambhrami iti na kvāpi ātyantikam tad upaśamam labhate vinā parama puruṣa ārādhanāt iti māyā vādinaḥ tu duḥkha ādikam sva rūpeṇa api mithyā iti manyante yat avocat satya anṛte mithunīkṛtya iti atas tad nirākaraṇa nirbandhaḥ yuktaḥ eva iti etat paribhāvayitum bandha mithyātvam iti saṃmugdhe prastute api duḥkha ādeḥ iti niṣkṛṣṭa uktam svātantrya ādeḥ na anyaḥ atas astikartā iti ādi śruti bādhita tvāt na hi sarva mithyātva śruteḥ iva asyāḥ kaścid virodhaḥ asti vakṣyati ca etat tatra tatra sūtrakāraḥ 
NSu_1.1.17ab.4^1	 yat api pareṇa ātmānātmanoḥ ita reta rādhyāsa samarthanāya tam etam avidyā ākhyam ātmānātmanoḥ ita reta rādhyāsam puraskṛtya sarve pramāṇa prameya vyavahārāḥ laukikāḥ pravṛttāḥ sarvāṇi ca śāstrāṇi ityādinā pramāṇa antaram ādarśitam tat anena eva nirastam atra hi pramātṛ pramāṇa prameya kartṛ karma kārya bhoktṛ bhogya bhoga lakṣaṇa vyavahāra trayasya śarīra indriya ādeṣu ahaṃmama adhyāsa puraḥsara tva pradarśanena vyavahāra kārya liṅgakam anumānam vyavahārāni atha anupapattiḥ vā adhyāse pramāṇam uktam nacānena antaḥkaraṇa śarīra indriya viṣayāṇām tad dharmāṇām duḥkha ādīnām ca mithyātvam siddhayati svarūpa satām api tādātmya tad sambandhi tvābhyām āropeṇa eva vyavahāra upapatteḥ naca āropita tva mātreṇa mithyātvam ātmanaḥ api antaḥkaraṇa ādiṣu āropita tvena mithyātva prasaṅgāt aṅgīkṛtaḥ ca antaḥkaraṇa ādiṣu pareṇa ātma adhyāsaḥ yathā uktam 
NSu_1.1.17ab.4^2	 tam pratyagātmānam sarva sākṣiṇam tad viparyayeṇa antaḥkaraṇa ādiṣu adhyasyati iti cetanasya acetane svarūpa adhyāsa abhāvāt saṃsṛṣṭa tayā eva adhyāsāt tanmātreṇa eva sakala laukika vaidika vyavahāra upapatteḥ na mithyātvam iti ced samam acetanasya api yat atra kenacid pralapitam itaretara adhyāse api deha indriya ādi prapañcasya bādhanam śruti yuktibhiḥ upapādayiṣyate cit ātmā tu śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa tadaviruddha nyāya nirṇītaḥ abādhitaḥ iti tat asat prapañca bādhaka śruti ādenirrākriyamāṇa tvāt yuktīnām ca nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt śruti ādi siddha tve ca mithyātvasya tam etam avidyā ākhyam ityādi vyatharmā āpadyeta na khalu kaḥ api vādī vadati kena api rūpeṇa śarīra ādikam ātmani na adhyastam iti yena adhyāsa mātram upapādyeta tādātmya adhyāsam ca nirākariṣyati ācāryaḥ vinā ca tena vyavahāram upapādayiṣyati 
NSu_1.1.17ab.5	 yat api ahaṅkāra stham kartṛ tva ādikam tad uparāgāt ātmani cakāsti iti tat ayuktam ahaṃpratyayasya ātma viṣaya tvāt nanu tathā sati suptau= api aham ullekhaḥ syāt tadā atmanaḥ sva prakāśa tayā prakāśamāna tvāt naca avidyā kāryasya api tadānīm pratīti prasaṅgaḥ suptau= avidyāyāḥ samutkhātita nikhila pariṇāma tvena tad abhāvāt iti mā evam suptau= api aham avabhāsasya iṣṭa tvāt tathā sati smaryeta hi astanaḥ iva ahaṅkāraḥ anubhūte smṛti niyama abhāve api smaryamāṇa ātma mātra tvāt iti ced na sukham aham asvāpsam iti supta utthitasya svāpa sukha anubhava parāmarśa darśanāt tadā viśeṣataḥ smarya iti ced kim spaṣṭam smaraṇam āpādyate uta viṣaya viśeṣa uparaktam ādye tu iṣi ā pādanam na dvitīyaḥ aviṣaya janya tvāt sauṣuptika sukhasya na ca ayam asti niyamaḥ yat smaryamāṇam aśeṣa sambandhi viśeṣa sahitam smaryate iti atas eva mukhya sukha tad anubhave bādhaka abhāvāt aduḥkha abhāva viṣayaka tva kalpanam parāmarśasya apāstam 
NSu_1.1.17ab.6–1.1.17ab.7^1	 yat tu athā atas ahaṅkāra ādeśaḥ atha atas ātam ādeśaḥ iti ātma ahaṅkārayoḥ bheda vacanam tat bhāṣya kṛtā eva anyathā vyākhyātam vakṣyati ca sūtrakāraḥ sā eva hi satya ādayaḥ iti katham anyathā ahaṅkārasya sarva gata tvam upapadyeta mahābhūtāni ahaṅkāraḥ ityādi smṛti siddhaḥ tu ahaṅkāraḥ yadi api ātmanaḥ bhinnaḥ tathā api nāsau= aham kartā iti ullekha viṣayaḥ tathā sati ahaṃbrahmā asmi ityādau= api tathā tva prasaṅgāt atra api yaḥ sthāṇuḥ sa puruṣaḥ itiva t vaya khyānam iti ced na tadā atmānam eva avedahaṃbrahma asmi iti niravadyasya brahmaṇaḥ api aham ullekha darśanāt mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etām taranti te a iti sva prapanna māyā nirasana samarthasya īśvarasya api aham sarvasya prabhavaḥ ityādi ullekhā upalambhāt ca spaṣṭaḥ eva śabdataḥ api anayoḥ bhedaḥ yad prakṛti pariṇāma vāci makāra antam avyayam ahaṃpadam na jātu tad ātmani prayujyate 
NSu_1.1.17ab.7^2	 yat ca ātma vāci dakāra anta asmat śabda jam tat na kadācid api māyā pariṇāme prayujyate iti tat evam sarva mithyā tva paratve śruteḥ eva mithyātva prasaṅgena asādhaka tva āpattau duḥkha ādi bandha mithyā tva asiddhayā na pratyakṣam atattva āvedakam iti nanu agratas iti katham na īhanānā iti vākyena ātma atiriktam sakalam api mithyā iti ekā eva buddhiḥ utpadyate na ca buddheḥ viramya vyāpāraḥ asti yāvat sva viṣaya gocarāyāḥ eva tasyāḥ samutpādāt tad atirikta vyāpāra abhāvāt iti satyam vākyena sakṛt eva jātāyāḥ sakala mithyā tva viṣayāyāḥ buddheḥ prāmāṇya avadhāraṇāya parīkṣaka buddhayaḥ eva tad viṣayam buddhayā vibhajya krameṇa avagāhantaḥ iti adoṣaḥ samānam etat yāvat jīvam aham mauni ityādi vākya prāmāṇya cintāyām iti 
NSu_1.1.17cd.1–1.1.17cd.2^1	 mithyāyāḥ sādhaka tvam ca na siddham prativādinaḥ nanu śruti ādeḥ mithyātve api sādhaka tvam sambhavati mayā mithyā bhūtasya eva sādhaka tva abhyupagamāt iti atas āha mithyāyāḥ iti yāḥ śruti ādi vācaḥ mithyā tāsām iti yojanāḥ vibhakti pratirūpakam vā mithyāyāḥ iti avyayam ayam abhisandhiḥ na īhanānā ityādi vākyaiḥ kim pumān niścita advaitaḥ bodhyate uta tad viparītaḥ na ādyaḥ vaiyarthyāt dvitīyaḥ tu satyasya eva sādhaka tvam iti manyamānaḥ yadi idam vākyam sakala mithyā tvam pratipādayet tadā sakala antargata tvāt svayam api mithyā syāt yathāśabdaḥ anityaḥ a iti śabdaḥ anityaḥ 
NSu_1.1.17cd.2^2	 yadi ca etat vākyam mithyā syāt na kasya api arthasya sādhakam syāt iti aniṣya prasaṅgam paśyan katham tvad abhyupagama mātreṇa svatarkasya viruddha tām pratipadyeta iti nanu vākyasya sādhaka tvam nāma padārtha saṃsarga pramiti janaka tvam tad kvacid pada doṣeṇa vihanyate kvacid saṅgatya grahaṇāt kvāpi tad vismaraṇāt kadāci kāṅkṣa ādi virahāt kutracid viparīta pratipādanena tat atra api na īhanānā ityādi vākye sādhaka tva abhāvam āpādayatā pada doṣa ādi anyatamam eva āpādakam upādeyam kim mithyātvena tat kim avidyamānasya api vākyasya nirdoṣa pada avayava tva ādikam vidyate iti vaktum udyataḥ bhavān 
NSu_1.1.17cd.2^3	 evaṃca vadatā bhavatā kasmiṃścana vipratipanne arthe vandhyā suta vacanam pramāṇayantam prativādinam prati nūnam pada doṣa ādikam eva upapādya sādhaka tvam dūṣayiṣyate svarūpasya eva abhāvena asādhaka tve siddhe kim tatra carama bhāvinyā pada doṣa ādi cintayā na hi śabde avidyamāna tvena eva cākṣuṣa tvasya anitya tva sādhaka tva abhāve siddhe kim tatra carama bhāvinyā pada doṣa ādi cintayā na hi śabde avidyamāna tvena eva cākṣuṣa tvasya anitya tva sādhaka tva abhāve siddhe vyāpti cintā kriyate iti ced samam prakṛte api nanu mā bhūt prativādi apekṣayā tarkasya viruddha tā vādi apekṣayā tu bhaviṣyati mā evam vādinā api hi śruti vākyena ātma atiriktasya akhilasya mithyātvam pratipadya mithyā bhūtasya api sādhaka tvam iti pratipattavyam saḥ api hi prāk sakala mithyā tva bodhāt prativādi tulyaḥ eva tathā ca śruteḥ sarva mithyātva pratipādaka tve mithyābhūtasya eva sādhaka tvam pratītya tad virodhena tarkaḥ nirasanīyaḥ tad nirāse ca śruteḥ sarva mithyātva pratipādaka tvam iti anyonya āśrayam anuttīrṇaḥ katham asau= api tarkasya viruddha tām pratipadyeta 
NSu_1.1.18.1–1.1.18.2^1^1	 tat ca mithyā pramāṇena satā vā sādhyate tvayā satā ced dvaita siddhiḥ syāt na siddham ca anya sādhanam atha matam pratyakṣa ādikasya sādhaka tvam tāvat anubhava siddham tat mithyā tvam ca śrutibhiḥ yuktibhiḥ ca avagamyate mithyābhūtasya sādhaka tvam iti eṣaḥ arthaḥ kutas siddhaḥ iti mā vocaḥ eka jñāna janita saṃskāra saha kṛtasya itara pramāṇasya eva surabhi candanam itivat viśiṣṭa pratyaya janakatva upapatteḥ athavā ubhaya pratisandhātura ātmanaḥ vidyamāna tvāt daśarna sparśana abhyam eka artha grahaṇa vat viśiṣṭa pratipattiḥ bhaviṣyati 
NSu_1.1.18.1–1.1.18.2^1^2	 evaṃca pramāṇena eva mithyā bhūtasya eva sādhaka tve siddhe viruddhaḥ tarkaḥ na mad abhyupagama mātreṇa iti etat dūṣayitum vikalpena pṛcchati tat ca iti tat iti mithyā bhūtasya eva sādhaka tvam ātma atiriktasya mithyātvam iva iti caśabdaḥ satā vā pramāṇena iti sambandhaḥ yat idam mithyā bhūtasya eva sādhaka tvam sādhayitum tvayā pramāṇa dvaya samāhāra ātmakam pramāṇam upanyasyate tat mithyā sat vā iti praśna arthaḥ sattva pakṣam dūṣayati satā ced iti yadi api pareṇa aṅgī cikīrṣita tvena prādhānyāt mithyātva vikalpaḥ prathamam praśna avasare nirdiṣyaḥ tathā api mithyā satyayoḥ satyam arthataḥ pradhānam iti tad krameṇa dūṣaṇam 
NSu_1.1.18.2^2	 satā ced iti atas paramātma rūpeṇa tad anyena vā iti vikalpaḥ prathama pakṣe vakṣyāmaḥ iti ādya pakṣa dūṣaṇa pratijñānam ca adhyāhāryam ātma itareṇa satā iti dvitīya pakṣa dūṣaṇam dvaita siddhiḥ syāt iti tathā ca advaita pratipādaka śruteḥ upapatti virodhaḥ iti hṛdayam na punar apasiddhānta mātre tātparyam prakramān anurūpa tvāt śruteḥ upapatti virodhena advaita pratipādaka tva abhāvasya prakrānta tvāt mithyātva pakṣe doṣam āha na siddham ca iti caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe tuśabda arthaḥ vā sataḥ anyat mithyā bhūtam tu sādhanam na siddham eva mithyābhūtasya pramāsā dhana tvam na siddham eva iti yāvat idam uktam bhavati yaḥ hi yat mithyā na tad sādhakam iti vyāptim aṅgīkṛtya śruteḥ mithyātve asādhaka tvam prasañjayati sa mithyā bhūtasya eva sādhaka tvam iti artha sādhanaya upanyasta pramāṇasya api mithyātve asādhaka tvam āpādayiṣyati eva tathā ca asya pramāṇasya sādhaka tve siddhe mithyā bhūtasya eva sādhaka tvam iti artha siddhiḥ tatas ca tarkasya viruddha tā siddhiḥ tatas ca asya pramāṇasya sādhaka tva siddhiḥ iti cakra krama prasaṅgena na ekasya api siddhiḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.18.3^1	 nanu ca śrutiḥ sva vyatiriktasya duḥkha ādeḥ mithyātvam pratipādayantī katham upapatti viruddhā iti ced kṛtaḥ ayam śruti artha saṅkocaḥ sādhaka tva anupapatti pramāṇa balāt iti ced tarhi pramitam vihāya mithyātva vādinī katham duḥkha ādi mithyātvam api pratipādayet tasya api pratyakṣa siddha tvāt nanu ca śruti virodhena pratyakṣam ābhāsīkartum mayā upakrāntam tena eva śruti virodha abhidhāne katham itaretara āśraya tvam na syāt śruteḥ aprāmāṇye bādhaka abhāvāt pratyakṣa prāmāṇyam tatas ca tad viruddha tvena śruteḥ aprāmāṇyam iti hanta tava api katham itaretara āśraya tvam na syāt 
NSu_1.1.18.3^2	 śruti prāmāṇye tad virodhena pratyakṣa aprāmāṇyam tatas ca bādhaka abhāvena śruti prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti śruteḥ prabala tvāt na evam iti ced na tasya dūṣṭa tvāt sādhayiṣyate ca pratyakṣa prābalyam nanu ca atra śruteḥ pratyakṣa virodham eva upanyasya tad prābalya vyutpādanam kutas na kṛtam kim upapatti virodha vyutpādanena ucyate pareṇa hi atra advaita paratve tātparyaliṅga anuguṇa tvam mahatā prabandhena upapāditam atas tad virodhaḥ eva parasya vicārā kauśala prakaṭanāya vyutpāditaḥ upakrama ādi virodhasya ca etat upalakṣaṇam tam ca vyutpādayiṣyāmaḥ 
NSu_1.1.18.4^1	 nanu mā bhūt tarkasya viruddha tā tathā api mithyābhūtaḥ api svāpnaḥ arthaḥ śubha āśubhayaḥ rekhā āropitaḥ varṇaḥ arthasya pratibimbam ca bimbasya sphaṭika lauhityam ca upādhāna sannidhānasya varṇa dairghya ādikam ca artha bhedasya savitṛ suṣira prabhṛti cāriṣyasya sādhakam upalabdham iti praśithila mūla tvena ābhāsa tvam mā evam yatas atra yat sādhakam na tat mithyā yat ca mithyā na tad sādhakam tathā hi svapnasya tāvat jñāna artha rūpasya satya tām vakṣyati rekhā api varṇe padam iva arthe saṅketitā tam smārayati iti na kiñcid atra mithyā asti atas eva rekhām upalabhya varṇam uccārayanti pratibimbasya tu satya tā pareṇa api aṅgīkṛtā 
NSu_1.1.18.4^2	 vicchedasya api satya tām upapādayiṣyāmaḥ sphaṭika lauhityam api etena eva vyākhyātam dairghya ādayaḥ api dhvaniṣu iva varṇeṣu api svābhāvikāḥ eva anyathā svareṣu iva vyañjaneṣu api dhvāna upadhāna vaśena dīrgha ādi pratibhāsa prasaṅgāt na tathāvidha dhvani vyaṅgam vyañjanam iti ced na tathā tve varṇeṣu eva viśeṣaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ syāt saḥ eva dairghya ādi pada abhidheyaḥ bhaviṣyati savitṛ suṣira prabhṛti jñānam eva ariṣya sūcakam vakṣyate ca etat evam anyat api ūhanīyam iti tasmāt pada vākya pramāṇa vidām agresareṇa parama āstikena bhagavatā bhāṣya kāreṇa uktaḥ bhagavati svarūpa bheda abhāvaḥ eva śruti arthaḥ avadheyaḥ 
NSu_1.1.18.5–1.1.19.1	 nanu atra api anupapattiḥ eva yatas nānā iti nānā bhūtaḥ prapañcaḥ abhidhīyate na tu bhedaḥ tathā tve nānātvam iti syāt mā evam mukta upasṛpi avyapadeśāt ityādau= iva bhāva pradhāna nirdeśa upapatteḥ bhavitṛ prādhānye api brahmaṇi nānā bhūta avayava guṇa karma ādi niṣedhe nānātvam eva niṣiddham bhavati sa viśeṣaṇe hi vidhi niṣedhau viśeṣaṇam upasaṅkrāmate a iti nyāyāt ubhaya niṣedhe gauravāt viśeṣaṇasya prathama prāpta tvāt anyathā tad upādāna vaiyarthyāt na jīrṇa malavat vāsāḥ snātakaḥ syāt a ityādau darśanāt ca atas eva uktam viśeṣyam na abhidhā gacchet kṣīṇa śaktiḥ viśeṣaṇe a iti yat kvacid viśiṣṭa vidhi niṣedha aṅgīkaraṇam tad agatikayā eva sa viśeṣa tvam ca brahmaṇaḥ vakṣyāmaḥ nanu evam satya prāpta pratiṣedhaḥ iti ced na ābhāsa prāpta tvāt tathā cana sthānataḥ api a ityādi adhikaraṇa pūrva pakṣe darśayiṣyāmaḥ parasya eva svarga apūrva ādi niṣedhaḥ aprāpta tvāt anupapannaḥ ekam eva advitīyam a ityādau sajātīya vijātīya sva gata nānā tva niṣedham vyākurvatā bhavatā api samādhātavyam etat sādhaka tvam sataḥ tena sākṣiṇā siddhim icchatā svīkṛtam hi aviśeṣasya sādhyā sādhaka tā punar 
NSu_1.1.20ab.1–1.1.20ab.2^1	 tat ca āviśeṣa mānena sādhyam iti anavasthitiḥ nanu yathā bhavataḥ mithyā bhūtasya sādhaka tvam na saṃmatam tathā mama satyasya sādhaka tvam na saṃmatam caitanya atiriktasya satya tā anabhyupagamāt caitanyasya ca kriyā veśa śūnyasya sādhaka tva ayogāt tatra yathā mithyā bhūtasya sādhaka tva anabhyupagamena śruteḥ mithyātve asādhaka tva prasaṅgāt na bandha mithyātva sādhaka tā iti uktam bhavatā evam mayā api satyasya sādhaka tvam anabhyupagacchatā vaktum śakyataḥ eva pratyakṣasya satya tve sādhaka tvam na syāt mithyātvam tu tvayā eva na upeyate tatas ca pratyakṣasya api bandha satya tva sādhaka tva abhāva ātmithyātvam api bandhasya na pratyakṣa virodhataḥ a iti anupapannam iti evaṃca prathamam eva mati kardame kathā ārambhaṇam aśakyam āpadyeta tena avicāryaiya tāvat pramāṇa sadasakṣat tvam vicāraḥ ārabdhavyaḥ iti mā evam duḥkha ādi satya tā grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya satya tve api avirodhāt sataḥ sādhaka tvam mayā na svīkṛtam iti uktam iti ced tatra āha sādhaka tvam iti tena māyā vādinā bhāva rūpa ajñānasya iti śeṣaḥ hi śabdaḥ hetau 
NSu_1.1.20ab.2^2	 prasiddhi dyotakaḥ vā māyā vādinā khalu bhāva rūpa ajñānam siṣā dhayiṣatā pratyakṣam tāvat aham ajñaḥ mām anyam ca na jānāmi iti aparokṣa avabhāsa darśanāt a ityādinā tad sādhanāya sākṣi pratyakṣam pramāṇam aṅgīkṛtam āśraya pratiyogi jñāna bhūtam api sākṣi caitanyam iti ādi uttara vākyena pratyakṣasya sākṣi tva avagamāt evaṃca sākṣiṇā jñāna siddhim icchatā pareṇa sataḥ sādhaka tvam svīkṛtam eva sākṣi caitanyasya sattvāt atas mayā sataḥ sādhaka tvam na aṅgīkṛtam iti na śakyate vaktum asmābhiḥ api duḥkha ādi bandha satyatāyām sākṣi pratyakṣam eva upanyastam iti hṛdayam ajñāna vaśāt eva sākṣiṇaḥ sādhaka tvam mayā aṅgīkriyate na svatas iti ced na itaretara āśraya tva prasaṅgāt na khalu sākṣī avabhāsāt anya ajñāna sattā tava asti tatas ajñāne sati sākṣiṇaḥ sādhaka tva siddhiḥ tasyām ca ajñāna siddhiḥ iti katham na itaretara āśraya tvam dvayoḥ anādi tvāt na evam iti ced tarhi ajñāna vaśāt iti riktam vacaḥ na hi sarvathā yat i anna apekṣate tat tad adhīnam iti yujyate apekṣāyām tu paraspara āśraya anuttāraḥ 
NSu_1.1.20ab.3^1	 evam ubhaya vādi sampratipannam pramāṇam sva mate asti iti darśayitum satyasya sākṣiṇaḥ ajñāna sādhaka tvam para abhyupagatam upanyastam sāmpratam prasaṅgāt tat api na upapadyate iti āha aviśeṣasya iti bhāva rūpam ajñānam anicchantam prati hi tatra sākṣi pratyakṣam pramāṇam upanyastam na ca tat ucitam sākṣiṇaḥ aśeṣa viśeṣa vidhura tva aṅgīkārāt aviśeṣasya sādhaka tā tu param prati tvayā sādhya eva na tu siddhāḥ yat sādhakam karaṇam vā phalam vā nityam vā jñānam tat sarvam jāti ādi viśeṣa vat yat ca nirviśeṣam śaśa viṣāṇa ādi na tad sādhakam iti pareṇa niyamasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt na hi asampratipanna sādhaka bhāvam kasya api arthasya sādhanāya upanyāsam arhati atiprasaṅgāt nanu pramāṇam vastu siddhau= upayujyate tad sa viśeṣa tvam tu kimartham iti ced satyam nirviśeṣasya prāmāṇyam eva na upapadyate iti tad artham eva viśeṣa anusaraṇam na hi sādhakatama tva ādi viśeṣa abhāve prāmāṇyam śakya nirvāham sākṣiṇi āropita tayā eva ajñānam siddhayati 
NSu_1.1.20ab.3^2	 na tatas atiriktam sādhaka tvam tasya iti ced na tarhi sutarām sākṣiṇā jñāna siddhiḥ prakāśa āśrayam tamaḥ prakāśena eva siddhayati iti asya arthasya aviśeṣa vādinā bhavatā param pratyupapādayitum aśakyatvāt kiñca ajñānam āropitam api sākṣiṇaḥ viṣayaḥ na vā ādye viṣayi tvam sākṣiṇyāpatitam dvitīye sākṣi tvam eva anupapannam sākṣāt draṣṭari saṃjñāyām a iti nirvacanā sambhavāt atat viṣayeṇa tad siddhiḥ alaukikī nirviśeṣasya api ajñāna vaśāt sākṣi tvam iti ca nirastam yaḥ tu vaiyyātyāt brayī iti siddha prāmāṇyam iva sādhya prāmāṇyam api pramāram prayoga arham eva anyathā śabda anitya tve kṛtaka tvam upanyasya pareṇa anyatara asiddhau= udbhāvitāyām tad sādhana sphūrtimatā api tūṣṇīm bhavitavyam aham ca aviśeṣasya sākṣiṇaḥ sādhaka tvam vipratipattau sādhayiṣyāmi iti sa praṣṭavyaḥ kim sa viśeṣeṇa pramāṇena etat sādhyate uta aviśeṣeṇa iti na ādyaḥ tasya tava mithyātvāt pareṇa ca ukta nyāyena tasya sādhaka tva anabhyupagamāt atas dvitīyaḥ eva aṅgīkartavyaḥ iti āha 
NSu_1.1.20ab.4–1.1.20cd.1	 tat ca iti kim atas idam tatas tad aviśeṣa pramāṇam kim sākṣi utanyat ādye anyonya āśraya tvam sākṣiṇaḥ sādhaka tva siddhiḥ iti na dvitīyaḥ tad abhāvāt aviśeṣa antara aṅgīkāre dūṣaṇam āha iti anavasthitiḥ iti tasya api aviśeṣasya sādhaka tvam aviśeṣa pramāṇena eva sādhyam iti upapādanam iti śabdena sūcayati nanu ca aviśeṣasya sādhyā sādhaka tā iti prakṛtam atas sā ca iti parāmarśaḥ yuktaḥ satyam tathā api prāc yat mithyā bhūtasya api sādhaka tvam pramāṇa vikalpa nirākaraṇena nirastam tat sa viśeṣa tva ādi vikalpa nirākaraṇena api nirākaraṇīyam iti sūcanāya sāmānyena napuṃsaka nirdeśaḥ etena prāc vikalpitaḥ satā atma bhūtena iti pakṣaḥ api nirastaḥ veditavyaḥ anaṅgīkurvatām viśvasatyatām tat na vāditā 
NSu_1.1.21ab.1–1.1.21ab.2^1	 tasmāt vyavahṛtiḥ sarvā satya iti eva vyavasthitāḥ mithyātvam yadi ityādinā uktam prasaṅgam upasaṃharati anaṅgīkurvatām iti yasmāt evam na mithyābhūtasya sādhaka tvam tat tasmāt viśvasatyatām anaṅgīkurvatām ātma atiriktasya sarvasya api mithyātvam pratipādayatām na īhanānā ityādi vākyānām api mithyātva prasaktayā na vāditā na sādhaka tā syāt tad vākyasya iti prakṛtam ekavacanam samūha viṣayam iti jñāpayitum upasaṃhāre bahuvacanam athavā ati prasaṅga antara abhidhānam etat tathā hi yadi ca etanya atiriktam samastam mithyā syāt tadā samasta antargatam kathā vyavahāra aṅga bhūtam pramāṇa ādikam api mithyā syāt tathā ca viśva satyatām anaṅgīkurvataḥ tad mithyā tvam aṅgī kuvartaḥ māyā vādinaḥ nirupāyasya kathakatā na syāt kutas tat tasmāt ukta rītyā mithyābhūtasya sādhana bādhana aṅgatā yogāt iti viśvamithyā tvam aṅgīkurvatām api cārvākāṇām bauddhānām ca vādi tvā upalambhā dvayabhicāraḥ iti ced na 
NSu_1.1.21ab.2^2	 teṣām api āpādana viṣaya tvāt tat idam uktam anaṅgīkurvatām cārvāka bauddha māyāvādinām iti anyathā tvayā tena iti ekavacanasya prastuta tvāt anaṅgīkuvartaḥ iti avakṣyat tathā api pramāṇa bādhaḥ cārvāka ādīnām vādi tvasya pratyakṣa ādi siddha tvāt mā evam vāditva abhāvasya atra āpādyamāna tvāt sādhanasya hi pramāṇa bādhaḥ dūṣaṇam na tu āpādanasya tasya aniṣya viṣaya tvāt aniṣyasya ca prāmāṇika parityāgā prāmāṇika svīkāra rūpa tvāt anyathā ati prasaṅga mātra uccheda prasaṅgāt itya āśayavān uktasya prasaṅga tvam sphuṭīkartum viparyaya paryavasānam āha pakṣa bala abala cintā na syāt vyavahriyate anayā iti vyavahṛtiḥ kathā aṅga bhūta pramāṇa ādi iti yāvat pramāṇa ādīnām kathā vyavahāra kāraṇa tvāt kāraṇa abhāve ca kārya abhāvasya sulabha tvāt susthaḥ ati prasaṅga mūla bhūtaḥ pratibandhaḥ iti jñāpayitum pramāṇa ādi iti rūḍha pada parityāgena vyavahṛtiḥ iti yaugika pada upādānam 
NSu_1.1.21ab.3^1	 astu kathā aṅga bhūta pramāṇa ādi vyavahārasya satya tā duḥkha ādi bandhasya tu kim āyātam iti atas āha vyāvahārikam iti etasmāt pramāṇa ādi vyavahārasya satya tva advaya avahārikam vyavahāra viṣayaḥ duḥkha ādi caśabdaḥ na kevalam vyavahāraḥ vyāvahārikam ca iti sambaddhayate na hi prameyam na asti asti ca pramāṇam iti sambhavati vyāghātāt iti artha pratipādanāya vyāvahārikam iti uktam yat atra uktam pramāṇa ādīnām sattvam yat abhyupetam kathakena tat kasya hetoḥ kim vāc vyavahārasya pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagama vyāpta tvena tad abhāve pravartayitum aśakyatvāt atha kathaka pravartanīya vāc vyavahāram prati hetu bhāvāt uta loka siddha tvāt athavā tad anabhyupagamasya tattva nirṇaya vijayā ati prasakta tvāt 
NSu_1.1.21ab.3^2	 ādye api kim vyavahāra mātram pramāṇa ādi satta abhyupagama vyāptam uta sādha bādhana kṣamaḥ vyavahāraḥ na prathamaḥ tad anabhyupagacchataḥ api cārvākam ādhyamikā deḥ vāc vistarāṇām pratīyamāna tvena vyabhicārāt tasya eva aniṣpattau bhavataḥ tad nirāsa prayāsa anupapatteḥ tasya api pakṣa tve bādhaḥ dvitīye bādha tādavasthyam mama satta anabhyupagamasya anubhava siddha tvāt hetuḥ ca tava asiddhaḥ siddha tve vā siddham mama samīhitam vyatireke ca sat vacana ābhāsa lakṣaṇa yogi tvam upādhiḥ 
NSu_1.1.21ab.3^3	 yatas abhyupagamya api pramāṇa sattām pravartitā mata antara anusāribhiḥ vyavahārā abhyupagata pramāṇa ādi sattvaiḥ mata antara anusāribhiḥ aparaiḥ sādhana ādi akṣamāḥ iti kathyante tena jñāyate vyavahārasya sādhana ādi akṣa matāyām sat vacana ābhāsa lakṣaṇa yogi tvam eva prayojakam na tu sattā anabhyupagamaḥ iti nanu yadi pramāṇa ādīni na santi tadā vyavahāraḥ eva dharmī katham siddhayet dūṣaṇa ādi vyavasthā vā katham syāt sarva vidhi niṣedhānām pramāṇa adhīna tvāt mā evam na brūmaḥ vayam na santi pramāṇa ādīni iti svīkṛtya kathā ārabhyā iti kim nāma santi na santi pramāṇa ādīni iti asyām cintāyām udāsīnaiḥ yathā svīkṛtya tāni bhavatā vyavahriyante 
NSu_1.1.21ab.3^4	 tathā vyavahāribhiḥ eva kathā pravartyatām iti kiñca kīdṛśīm maryādām avalambya pravṛttāyām kathāyām idam dūṣaṇam uktam bhavatā kim pramāṇa ādīnām sattvam upagamya ubhābhyām vādi prativādibhyām pravartitāya amuta asattvam abhyupetya atha ekena sattvam apareṇa ca asattvam aṅgīkṛtya na ādyaḥ abhyupagata pramāṇa ādi sattvam pratyetādṛś pari anuyoga an avakāśāt na dvitīyaḥ svasya api āpatteḥ na tṛtīyaḥ tathā eva kathā antara prasakteḥ tasmāt pramāṇa ādi sattva asattva abhyupagama audāsīnyena vyavahāra niyame samayam baddhvā pravartitāyām kathāyām bhavatā idam dūṣaṇam uktam iti vācyam 
NSu_1.1.21ab.3^5	 tathā ca vyāghātaḥ na ca vācyam na idam dūṣaṇam prativādinam pratyucyate kim nāma śiṣya ādayaḥ pramāṇa ādi sattān abhyupagantuḥ kathān adhikāram jñāpyante iti yatas śiṣya ādīn pratyapi cārvāka ādeḥ deṣaḥ ayam iti eva abhidhātavyam katham ca tathā syāt tasya kathā praveśa apraveśayoḥ tad bodha akṣama tvāt kathāyām eva hi nigrahaḥ na dvitīyaḥ syāt api evam yadi kathaka pravartanīya vāc vyavahāram prati pramāṇa ādīnām hetu tā tad satta anabhyupagame nivarteta na tu evam sambhavati tathā sati tad satta anabhyupagantṛṇām vāc vyavahāra svarūpam eva na niṣpadyeta hetu anupapatteḥ atha manyase 
NSu_1.1.21ab.3^6	 kathaka vyavahāram prati hetu tvāt pramāṇa ādīnām sattvam sattvāt ca abhyupagamaḥ yat sat tad abhyupagamyate iti sthiteḥ iti mā evam kayā api niyama sthityā pravṛttāyām kathāyām kathaka vāc vyavaharam prati hetu tvāt pramāṇa ādīnām sattvam sattvāt ca abhyupagamaḥ bhavatā prasādhyaḥ kathā ataḥ pūrvam tu tattva avadhāraṇam para parājayam vā abhilaṣat bhayām kathakābhyām yāvatā vinā tad abhilaṣitam na paryavasyati tāvat anuroddhavyam tat ca vyavahāra niyama samaya bandhāt eva dvābhyām api tābhyām sambhāvyate iti vyavahāra niyamam eva badhnītaḥ saca pramāṇena tarkeṇa ca vyavahartavyam iti ādi rūpaḥ 
NSu_1.1.21ab.3^7	 na ca pramāṇa ādīnām sat tāpī ittham eva tābhyām aṅgīkartum ucitā tādṛśa vyavahāra niyama mātreṇa eva kathā pravṛtti upapatteḥ pramāṇa ādi sattām abhyupetya api tathāvidha vyavahāra niyama vyatirekeṇa kathā pravṛttim vinā tattva nirṇayasya jayasya vā abhilaṣitasya kathakayoḥ aparyavasānāt na api tṛtīyaḥ loka vyavahāraḥ api pramāṇa vyavahāraḥ vā syāt pāmara ādi sādhāraṇa vyavahāraḥ vā na ādyaḥ vicāra pravṛttim antareṇa tasya durnirūpa tvāt tad artham eva ca pūrvam niyamasya gaveṣaṇāt na api dvitīyaḥ śarīra ātma tva ādīnām api tathā sati bhavatā svīkartavya tā āpātāt 
NSu_1.1.21ab.3^8	 paścāt tad vicāra bādhya tayā na abhyupeyate iti ced tarhi pramāṇa ādi sattā api yadi vicāra bādhyā bhaviṣyati tadā na abhyupeya eva anyathā tu upagantavyā iti loka vyavahāra siddha tayā sattvam abhyupagamyate iti tāvat na bhavati na caturthaḥ yādṛśaḥ bhavatā pramāṇa ādi sattām abhyupagamya vyavahāra niyamaḥ kathāyām avalambyate tasya eva pramāṇa ādi sattva asattva anusaraṇa audāsīnyena asmābhiḥ api avalambhāt tasya yadi mām prati phala atiprasañjaka tvam tadā tvām pratyapi samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagamasya kathā upayoga abhāvāt anaṅgīkurvatām pramāṇa ādi sattām na vāditā iti anupapannam iti 
NSu_1.1.21ab.4^1	 tat etat sarvam anena apahasita veditavyam tathā hi yattauva dvayavahāra mātrasya pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagama vyāpta tva pakṣe dūṣaṇam uktam tat asat yadi khalu evam asmābhiḥ sādhyeta māyā vādī pramāṇa ādi satta abhyupagamavān vyavahartṛ tvāt tadvayava hāraḥ vā pramāṇa ādi satta abhyupagama puraḥsaraḥ vyavahāra tvāt tattva vādi vat ta dvayavahāra vat ca iti yat vā na ayam vyavahartā pramāṇa ādi sattā anabhyupagantṛ tvāt tadvayavahāraḥ vā na vyavahāraḥ pramāṇa ādi satta abhyupagama puraḥsaratā śūnya tvāt iti tadā syāt eva vyabhicāra doṣaḥ kaḥ nāma svastha ātmā evam anumimīte kim nāma yadi pramāṇa ādīni santi na syuḥ tarhi sādhakāni na syuḥ asataḥ sādaka tva anupapatteḥ teṣām ca asādhaka tve tad kāryaḥ vyavahāraḥ na niṣpadyeta 
NSu_1.1.21ab.4^2	 tathā ca vāditāḥ na syāt asti ca iyam tasmāt tad hetūnām pramāṇa ādīnām sattā abhyupagantavyā iti ācāryeṇa prasaṅga tvena abhimata tvāt vyabhicāra sthalasya ca prasaṅga viṣaya tulya tā aṅgīkṛtāḥ bādhaḥ tu prasaṅgasya alaṅkāraḥ eva iti uktam sādhana bādhana kṣama vyavahārasya pramāṇa ādi satta abhyupam a vyāpta tva pakṣe api ukta dūṣaṇam anena eva nirastam māyā vādinam tat vayavahāram vā pakṣīkṛtya viśiṣṭa vyavahāra kartṛ tvena viśiṣṭa vyavahāra tvena vā hetunā pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagantṛ tve tad pūrvaka tve vā sādhyamāne tat syāt vimataḥ vyavahāraḥ na sādhana ādi kṣamaḥ pramāṇa ādi satta abhyupagama pūrvaka tā ra hita tvāt iti vā sādhane kathañcid anvaye pūrva ukta upādhiḥ syāt na ca evam iti uktam kiñca ayam upādhiḥ na sādhanāt bhidyate 
NSu_1.1.21ab.4^3	 yadā hi pramāṇa ādi sattā na abhyupagatā tadā tat asattvam eva aṅgīkṛtam iti svarūpa siddha tvam tat ca sat vacana ābhāsa lakṣaṇa viśeṣaḥ eva nanu etat āśaṅkayā uktam na brūmaḥ vayam ityādi duruktam tat sattva asattve vihāya pramāṇa svarūpasya buddhau= āropayitum aśakyatvena udāsīnasya tad svīkāra anupapatteḥ evaṃca vadatā yat anirvacanīyam abhipretam tad agre nirākariṣyate yat api atra uktam kīdṛśīm maryādām ityādi tatra yaḥ pramāṇa ādi asattvam abhyupaiti yaḥ ca tad sattām pratītya api sattā adyudāsīnaḥ aham iti manyate tam prati idam dūṣaṇam iti vadāmaḥ na ca ukta doṣaḥ na hi vayam pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagamam kathā pravṛtti kāraṇa tayā avaśyam tatas pūrva bhāvinam brūmaḥ kim nāma yaḥ yathā kathañcid kathāyām pravṛttaḥ tam vipakṣe kathā anutpatti prasaṅgam daṇḍam pradarśya tad kāraṇānām pramāṇa ādīnām sattām aṅgīkārayāmaḥ 
NSu_1.1.21ab.4^4	 na ca evam kathā antara prasaktayā ādi doṣaḥ pramāṇa ādi satta anabhyupagame kathāyāḥ eva aniṣpatteḥ etena śiṣya jñāpanam api samāhitam prativādinaḥ kathāpraveśam abhyupagamya tatra pravṛttam prati pramita kathā kārya balena kāraṇa pramāṇa ādi sattāyāḥ abhyupagantavya tvasya ukta tvāt dvitīya pakṣa ukta doṣaḥ api asaṅgataḥ eva na hi vayam pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagamam api kathaka pravartanīya vāc vyavahāra kāraṇa koṭau niveśayāmaḥ yena tad satta anabhyupagantṛṇām vāc vyavahāra svarūpam na niṣpadyeta iti prasaṅgaḥ syāt api tarhi pramāṇa ādīnām eva kathā kāraṇa tā sā ca sattva abhāve na upapadyate iti tat sattvam aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti vadāmaḥ yat punar kathaka vāc vyavahāram prati iti ādi āśaṅkayā uktam 
NSu_1.1.21ab.4^5	 evam vadatā kathā pravṛtti uttara kālam pramāṇa ādi satta aṅgī kārayitavyā tathā ca kathā phalasya pramāṇa ādi satta abhyupagamasya na kathā kāraṇa tvam kintu pramāṇaiḥ vyavahartavyam iti ādi vyavahāra niyamasya eva iti tat asmābhiḥ abhyupagatam eva yaḥ tu sattā abhyupagamam api kathā kāraṇam brūte saḥ eva evam paryanuyojyaḥ yat punar naca pramāṇa ādīnām ityādinā kalpanā gauravam avādi tatra kim pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagame kalpanā gauravam uta tad satta abhyupagamasya kāraṇa koṭi praveśane na ādyaḥ kāraṇa tvāni athā anupapattyā tad sattāyāḥ pramita tvāt pramitasya parīkṣakaiḥ aṅgīkaraṇīya tvāt dvitīye tu saṃvādaḥ eva tṛtīye api ādyam tāvat aṅgīkurmaḥ tatra uktam dūṣita prāyam dvitīya aṅgīkāre api na doṣaḥ 
NSu_1.1.21ab.4^6	 deha ātma tva ādikam tu paścāt vicāra bādhya tayā na abhyupagamyate iti yat atra uktam pramāṇa ādi sattā api ityādi tena kim uktam bhavati kim vicāra sādhyaḥ pramāṇa ādi satta abhyupagamaḥ na vicāra pravṛtteḥ kāraṇam iti kim vā vicāra bādhyatāyāḥ eva pramāṇa ādi satta abhyupagama prayojaka tvena vyavahārasya aprayojaka tvam iti ādye sampratipattiḥ na dvitīyaḥ autsargikam prāmāṇyam bādhakādapa udyate iti atra darśane tasya eva prayojaka tvāt caturtha pakṣa ukta doṣaḥ api anena eva parihṛtaḥ na hi vayam pramāṇa ādi sattā abhyupagamam kathā phala niṣpatti hetum brūmaḥ kintu pramāṇa ādīni eva teṣām ca tad hetu tā na asatām upapadyate iti tad sattā vaśyam abhyupagamanīyā iti syāt etat niyata avāk vyahāra kriyā samaya bandhena kathām pravartayatā api vyavahāra satta abhyupagantavyā 
NSu_1.1.21ab.4^7	 na hi sattām anabhyupagamya vyavahāra kriyā abhidhātum śakyā kriyā hi niṣpādanāḥ asataḥ sat rūpa tā prāpaṇam iti yāvat pramāṇa evyarva hartavyam iti ca niyama bandhanam pramāṇa karaṇa bhāvasya niyama antar bhāvāt niyata pūrva sattva rūpam kāraṇa tvam pramāṇānām anādāya na paryavasyati dūṣaṇānām ca astitvena bhaṅga avadhāraṇa niyama bandhane sādhana aṅgānām ca vyāpti ādīnām sattvena tad viṣayasya tattva rūpa tau= vavahāra niyamana ādau ca kaṇṭha uktayā eva tasya tasya sattvam aṅgīkṛtam iti ri m idam ucyate pramāṇa ādīnām sattām anabhyupagamya kathā arambhaḥ śakyate iti evam āśaṅkaya yat uktam etaiḥ api bādhakaiḥ kathāyām ārabdhāyām abhimatasya prasādhanīya tvena pūrva ukta bādhāyāḥ na nistāraḥ syāt iti tat api anena eva parihṛtam 
NSu_1.1.21ab.4^8	 kathā svarūpa pala niṣpattaye sva icchā svīkṛtasya eva vyavahāra niyamasya pramāṇa ādi sattā svīkāraḥ eva paryavasānam iti kathāyām pravṛttam sva vyāghātam api acetayantam pratyasmābhirucyamāna tvāt nanu kathā ādeḥ kāryasya sattve kathañcid kāraṇasya pramāṇa ādeḥ sattvam aṅgīkaraṇīyam syāt kāryasya eva sattva abhāve kim kāraṇa sattayā iti ced kutas pramāṇāt kathā ādi sattā bhāvaḥ bhavatā niścitaḥ śruti ādeḥ iti ced na tasya eva aneka atiprasaṅga gahana niviṣṭa tvāt tathā ca siddhe tad prāmāṇye kathā ādi kāryā sattva siddhiḥ tatas anyathā asiddhayā tarkasya ābhāsatā siddhiḥ tasyām ca śruti ādi prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti cakra ka āpattyā na ekasya api siddhiḥ asataḥ kāraṇa tvam tu sūtra kṛtā eva nirākariṣyate iti alam prasaṅgena 
NSu_1.1.21ab.1–1.1.21ab.3^1	 vyavahārasataḥ ca api sādhaka tvam tu pūrvavat syāt etat evam yadi na īhana anoti ādi balena ātma atiriktasya sarvasya asattvam abhyupagacchāmaḥ na ca evam kim nāma vyāvahārikī sattā abhyupagamyate eva tathā ca sarva antaḥpātinaḥ vyavahāra sataḥ pramāṇa ādeḥ sādhaka tva sambhavān na ukta prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha vyavahāra sataḥ ca iti caśabdaḥ hetau api śabdaḥ samuccaye tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe vyavahāra sataḥ api sādhaka tvam pūrvasya asataḥ iva prativādinaḥ na siddham eva yatas atas na ukta prasaṅga nistāraḥ iti ayam arthaḥ yadi vyāvahārikam sat nāma sat eva tadā mithyātva pratipādanam vyāhatam phalitam ca asmad manoratha drumeṇa vyartham ca vyāvahārika padam atha tat asat tadā kim anena adhikam ācaritam sattva abhāve sādhaka tvam na syāt iti aniṣya prasaṅgasya tad avastha tvāt iti nanu ca dvividham sat mukhyam amukhyam ca tatra yasya sarva prakāreṇa bādhita tvam na asti tat mukhyam sat pāramārthikam iti ca gīyate yasya tu sat pratītiḥ eva sattā tat amukhyam sat 
NSu_1.1.21ab.3^2	 na ca tatas sattā siddhayati tathā hi kim sattā avagama mātrāt tad sattā abhyupagamya iti manyase abādhitāt tad avagamāt vā na ādyaḥ maru marīcikā adau jala rūpatā sadbhāva abhyupagama prasaṅgāt dvitīye api vādi prativādi madhya stha māsyi tasya api kathā kāle eva bādhita tva avagama abhāvāt athavā kasyacid api kāla antare api ca bādhita tva bodha virahāt na ādyaḥ atiprasaṅgāt puruṣatraya avagatasya api ekakṣaṇa avagatasya puruṣa antareṇa tena api kṣaṇa antare api bahulam bādha darśanāt na cāsau= arthaḥ asatyaḥ api dvitra ādi puruṣa mātra pūrva jāta tad prati iti anurodhāt bādha darśane san jāte api tathā eva san= iti abhyumabhyupagamyate tasmāt dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ pariśiṣyate na ca asau= amukhye asti iti kutas pāramārthya prāptiḥ na ca vācyam sat pratīteḥ api prati iti antaram eva sattā iti anavasthā iti 
NSu_1.1.21ab.3^3	 pratīteḥ pāramārthika tvāt na hi tasyāḥ bādhaḥ asti asti ced sā eva pratītiḥ abādhitā parama artha satī na ca pratīteḥ svarūpa bhedaḥ asti iti atas vijñānam brahma eva parama artha sat amukhyam punar dvedhāḥ māyā upādhim avidyā upādhikam ca iti tatrā adyam ambara ādikam tat ca abrahma jñānāt bādha vaidhuryeṇa hāna ādi vyavahāra nirvāhaka tva at vayāvahārikam iti gīyate katipaya pratipattṛ katipaya kāla tathā tva avagamāt eva hi laukikaḥ vyavahāraḥ pratīyate dvitīyam śukti rajata ādi na tu pratīti samaya mātra parivarti na punar hāna ādi hetuḥ iti prātitikam ucyate tat evam sattra evidhyāt ambara ādikam viśvam sat api pāramārthika tva abhāvāt mithyā iti yujyate vyāvahārika sattvāt ca tad antargatasya pramāṇā adeḥ kathā aṅgata upapadyate 
NSu_1.1.21ab.3^4	 pāramārthika prātīti ka vyāvṛtti artha tvena vyāvahārika padam ca sambhavati iti atra idam vaktavyam kim pāramārthika sat eva sat asat ca bādhaka bhedena dvividham iti sattra evidhyam uta satyā iva antara bhedena ādye prāc ukta doṣa nistāraḥ na hi sat iti jñāna mātreṇa asat artha kriyā arham yena tathāvidham pramāṇa ādi kathā aṅgatām gacchet tathā tve viṣam api pīyūṣa tayā avagatam tad artha kriyām kuryāt bādha vilambatā artha kriyā kāri tva prasaṅgāt yat api tathā eva laukikaḥ vyavahāraḥ pratīyate iti tad agre nirākariṣyate artha kriyā api asati iti ca itaretara āśraya ādinā nirastam sataḥ artha kriyā sambhavāt asati eva kathañcid sā aṅgīkārya iti ced śruti prāmāṇya niścaya uttara kālam eva etat prāc tat niścayāt parama artha satas eva artha kriyā iti manyamānaḥ prativādī katham bodhanīyaḥ anyonya āśraya ādi prasaṅgāt iti uktam 
NSu_1.1.22cd.1–1.1.23.1–1.1.23.2^1^1	 sattraividhyam ca mānena siddhayet kena iti pṛcchyate tasya api ukta prakāreṇa na eva siddhiḥ kathañcana vailakṣaṇyam sat asatoḥ api etena niṣidhyate dvitīyam dūṣayati sattraividhyam ca iti kena iti asya paramārtha satā vā vyāvahārika satā vā prātibhāsika satā vā ādye api kim ātma itareṇa utā atmanā iti arthaḥ pṛcchyate asmābhiḥ iti śeṣaḥ yathā mithyā bhūtasya sādhaka tvam kena siddhayet iti pṛṣṭam tathā iti ca arthaḥ vyāvahārika sataḥ sādhaka tva siddhaye yat upanyastam tat ca iti vā pṛcchā viṣaya tvam eva na doṣaḥ iti atas āha tasya api iti asataḥ sādhaka tvasya iva tasya sat traividhyasya api kathañcana vikalpita pakṣeṣu kasmiṃścana pakṣe na eva siddhiḥ 
NSu_1.1.23.1–1.1.23.2^1^2	 kutas ukta prakāreṇa eva tathā hi na tāvat parama artha sattā atma itareṇa dvaitā apatteḥ na api ātmanā eva tasya nirviśeṣasya sādhaka tā yogāt vyāvahārika prātītikayoḥ tu svarūpam eva adya api na siddham iti na amukhyam sadasan= api sat yena ukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ kintvanirvacanīyam na ca tat api durvacam sat asat vailakṣaṇyasya eva tattvāt tat ca ukta vidhayā vyāvahārika prātibhāsika bhedāt dvividham tatra vyāvahārikasya prapañcasya sat asat vilakṣasya sat vilakṣaṇa tvāt upapannam śruti ādinā mithyātva samarthanam 
NSu_1.1.23.2^2	 asat vilakṣaṇa tvāt tad antargatasya pramāṇa ādeḥ sādhaka tvam ca iti syāt etat evam kathañcid yadi viśvasya sat asat vilakṣaṇa tvam syāt tat eva na siddhayati iti āha vailakṣaṇyam sat asatoḥ iti viśvasya iti śeṣaḥ sat asatoḥ iti sambandha mātre ṣaṣṭhī tathā ca sat asat bhayām iti arthaḥ etena pramāṇa vikalpa nirāsena tathā hi viśvasya sat asat vailakṣaṇyam kim satā pramāṇena sādhyate uta asatā atha sat asat vilakṣaṇena na ādyaḥ vādinaḥ anupapatteḥ na dvitīya tṛtīyau prativādinaḥ asampratipatteḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.23.2^3	 nanu atra sat asat vailakṣaṇye sādhaka tvam na syāt iti prasaṅgaḥ vācyaḥ na ca tatra vyāptiḥ mā evam sākṣiṇi vyāpti avadhāraṇa upapatteḥ sattva abhāve sādhaka tvam na syāt iti vā prasaṅgam vakṣyāmaḥ tatra asattvam upādhiḥ iti ced na tasya sattva abhāvān atirekāt tad bhaṅgasya ca prāc anirvacanīya siddheḥ aśakya tvāt etena sat vilakṣaṇa tvāt mithyā tva upapādana sat vilakṣaṇa tvāt sādhaka tvam ca upapannam iti parāḥ tam sat vailakṣaṇye asattva āpattyā sādhaka tva abhāva asya asat vailakṣaṇye ca sattva āpātena mithyātva upapādanasya asambhavasya āpatteḥ 
NSu_1.1.23.3	 prāc anirvācya siddheḥ vyāpti dvaya nirāsā yogāt asat vailakṣaṇya mātreṇa hāna ādi vyavahāra upapattau śukti rajata ādau= api tad prasaṅgaḥ māyā avidyā vailakṣaṇyāt na evam iti ced na tasya nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt vailakṣaṇya mātrasya prrakṛta anupayogāt iti āstām vā sattva ādi vikalpa nirāsena dūṣaṇa abhidhānam pramāṇam eva prapañca anirvacanīyatāyām na upapadyate na hi na īhanānā ityādi śrutiḥ sat asat vailakṣaṇya lakṣaṇā nirvacanīyatām viśvasya vakti 
NSu_1.1.24.1–1.1.24.2^1	 vailakṣaṇyam sataḥ ca api svayam sat bheda vādinaḥ asataḥ ca api viśvasya tena aniṣyam katham bhavet atha manyeta vivāda padam sat asat vilakṣaṇam jñāna bādhya tvāt yat evam tat evam yathā śukti rajatam iti anumānam viśvasya sat asat vilakṣaṇa tve mānam tad balāt śrutiḥ api tatra eva paryavasyati iti tat asat anumānasya ābhāsa tvāt iti āśayavān prathama prāpta tvāt pratijñām tāvat nirākaroti vailakṣaṇyam sataḥ ca iti caśabdau= avadhāraṇe api śabdau mithas samuccaye ayam arthaḥ kim atra sat asat śabdau bhāva abhāva vācinau kiṃvā vidyamānā vidyamāna vācinau ādye dūṣaṇam sataḥ bhāva ātmakasya viśvasya asataḥ abhāvāt vailakṣaṇyam api bhāva abhāva bheda vādinaḥ mama mate svayam sat asti eva evam asataḥ abhāva ātmakasya viśvasya sataḥ bhāvāt vailakṣaṇyam api bheda vādinaḥ svayam sat eva 
NSu_1.1.24.2^2	 atas tena sādhitena mama aniṣyam katham bhavet kim nāma evam vibhāgena sat asat vailakṣaṇya siddhayā api pratijñāta artha siddheḥ artha antara tā parasya syāt iti yadi ca pratyekam bhāva abhāva vailakṣaṇyam vivakṣitam tadā sataḥ bhāvasya api viśvasya sataḥ bhāvāt vailakṣaṇyam bhāva bheda vādinaḥ mama svayam sat eva bhāva antara vailakṣaṇya aṅgīkārāt asataḥ abhāvāt api vailakṣaṇyam sutarām bhāva abhāva bheda vādinaḥ svayam sat eva evam asataḥ abhāvasya viśvasya asataḥ abhāvāt vailakṣaṇyam abhāva bheda vādinaḥ svayam sat eva abhāva antara vailakṣaṇya aṅgīkārāt sataḥ bhāvāt vailakṣaṇyam api sutarām svayam sat eva iti tena aniṣyam katham bhavet 
NSu_1.1.24.3^1	 bhāva abhāva vailakṣaṇyam nāma tattva anadhikaraṇa tvam vivakṣitam iti ced tathā api sataḥ bhāvasya api viśvasya asataḥ abhāvāt vailakṣaṇyam abhāva tvān adhikaraṇa tvam api svayam sat eva asataḥ abhāvasya viśvasya sataḥ bhāvāt vailakṣaṇyam api bhāva tva an adhikaraṇa tvam api mama svayam sat eva bhāva abhāva bheda vādi tvāt yadi hi bhāve api abhāva tvam abhāve api bhāva tvam aṅgīkuryām kutas tadā bhāva abhāva bheda vādaḥ tathā ca katham tena sādhyamānena aniṣyam mama bhavet atha pratyekam bhāva abhāva tva an adhikaraṇa tvam vivakṣitam iti manyeta tadā sataḥ bhāvasya api viśvasya bhāva abhāva vailakṣaṇyam bhāva abhāva rūpa tvānadhikaraṇa tvam mama svayam sat eva tathā asataḥ abhāvasya api viśvasya ukta rūpam vailakṣaṇyam svayam sat eva 
NSu_1.1.24.3^2	 bhāva bhāva bheda vādinā eka eka arthasya ubhaya rūpa tā anaṅgīkārāt bhāve hi bhāva tvam eva na abhāva tvam api abhāve ca abhāva tvam eva na bhāva tvam api iti atas tena sādhitena aniṣyam mama katham bhavet atha ekaikasya vastunaḥ bhāva tva an adhikaraṇa tvam abhāva tvān adhikaraṇa tvam ca sādhya tayā vivakṣitam iti manvīta tathā api sataḥ bhāvasya api viśvasya asataḥ abhāvāt vailakṣaṇyam abhāva tvān adhikaraṇa tvam mama sat eva evam asataḥ abhāvasya api viśvasya sataḥ bhāvāt vailakṣaṇyam bhāva tva an adhikaraṇa tvam svayam sat eva bhāva abhāva bheda vādi tvāt atas katham tena aniṣyam bhavet aṃśe siddhārtha tayā parasya nigrahāt ubhaya sādha nāt adoṣaḥ iti ced na asiddha sannidhāne api siddhasya tattva anapāyāt viśiṣṭa sādhanāt na evam iti ced na tathā api vaiyarthya anistārāt 
NSu_1.1.24.4	 atha bhāva abhimate bhāva tva an adhikaraṇa tvam abhāva abhimate ca abhāva tvān adhikaraṇa tvam sādhyate atas na ukta doṣaḥ iti ced na tathā api sataḥ bhāvasya api viśvasya sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam bhāva tva an adhikaraṇa tvam mama svayam sat eva katham bhāva tva bheda vādinaḥ na ekam eva bhāva tvam sarva bhāveṣu anugatam kim nāma pratibhāvam bhāva tvāni bhidyante pratipādayiṣyate ca etat tathā ca bhāvaḥ api bhāva tva antara ādhāraḥ bhaviṣyati evam asataḥ abhāva rūpasya api viśvasya asataḥ vailakṣaṇyam abhāva tvānadhikaraṇa tvam mama svayam sat eva katham abhāva tva bheda vādinā abhāve api abhāva tva antara abhāva svīkārāt tathā ca tena aniṣyam katham bhavet parasya eva siddhārtha tā nistārāt atha bhāva abhāva abhimatayoḥ sarvathā bhāva abhāva tve na staḥ iti arthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tathā api sataḥ eva bhāvasya eva asataḥ vailakṣaṇyam abhāva tvānadhikaraṇa tvam svayam sat eva yatas tasmāt viśvasya tena sādhitena bheda vādinaḥ aniṣyam katham bhavet idam uktam bhavati yadi prāc abhāva ādikam pakṣīkṛtya abhāva tvān adhikaraṇam iti sādhyate tadā tasya bhāva tvam pratijñātam syāt 
NSu_1.1.24.5	 bhāvasya eva abhāva tvān adhikaraṇa tva niyamāt dvau nañau hi prakṛtam artham sa atiśayam gamayataḥ evam viyadādikam pakṣīkṛtya bhāva tva an adhikaraṇa tve sādhyamāne tasya abhāva tvam pratijñātam syāt abhāvasya eva bhāva tvān adhikaraṇa tva niyamāt bhāva niṣedhaḥ eva hi abhāvaḥ tathā ca viśvasya bhāva abhāva vibhāgasya ca pareṇa abhyupagata tvāt na bhāva abhāva bheda vādinaḥ mama aniṣyam kiñcid kintu bhāva abhāva vyatikara mātram tad sādhanam ca prakṛtān upayuktam iti 
NSu_1.1.24.6^1	 bhāva abhāva abhimatayoḥ abhāva bhāva tvān adhikaraṇa tve vādi prativādi saṃmate bhāva abhāva tva an adhikaraṇa tvam api adhikam sādhyate atas na ukta doṣaḥ iti ced na yatas sataḥ bhāvasya eva viśvasya viyat ādeḥ asatas vailakṣaṇyam abhāva tvānadhikaraṇa tvam svayam sat eva pramitam eva yatas ca asataḥ abhāvasya eva viśvasya prāc abhāva ādeḥ sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam bhāva tva an adhikaraṇa tvam svayam sat eva pramitam eva yatas ca asataḥ abhāvasya eva viśvasya prāc abhāva ādeḥ sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam bhāva tva an adhikaraṇa tvam svayam sat eva atas bheda vādinaḥ tena viparītena pratijñātena aniṣyam katham bhavet pratijñāta artha siddhau khalu aniṣyam bhavet na hi pramāṇa bādhitaḥ asau siddhayati vyāvahārika bhāva tva abhāva tva gocaram pramāṇam tattva viṣayeṇa anumānena eva bādhyate iti ced na yatas asmākam tāvat bhāva abhāva tva viṣayam pramāṇam tattva gocaram eva anyathā cakraka ādi prasaṅgāt atiprasaṅgāt ca iti dvitīye api etat eva uttaram viśvasya sataḥ satyāt vailakṣaṇyam api mama svayam sva matam eva 
NSu_1.1.24.6^2	 tathā asataḥ avidyamānāt api vailakṣaṇyam svayam eva atas tena sādhitena mama aniṣyam katham bhavet bhavatu viśvasya ātmanaḥ śaśaviṣāṇa ādeḥ vailakṣaṇyam sva matam sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam tu katham sattva aṅgīkārāt iti ced mā evam sataḥ vidyamānasya api asataḥ bhedam vadataḥ mama yathā viśvasya asataḥ vailakṣaṇyam svayam eva tathā sataḥ api viśvasya sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam satām bheda vādinaḥ svayam eva sat antara vailakṣaṇyāt sattva asattva anadhikaraṇa tvam sat asat vilakṣaṇa tvam iti ced tadā api sataḥ viśvasya asataḥ vailakṣaṇyam sat asat bheda vādinaḥ svayam sat eva atas tena sādhitena mama aniṣyam katham bhavet parasya eva aṃśataḥ siddhārtha tā bhavet tarhi sattva anādhāra tvam eva sādhyate iti ced na asataḥ eva hi sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam sattva an adhikaraṇa tvam bheda vādinaḥ mama svayam sat eva niyamena bhavati tathā ca viśvasya tena sattva an adhikaraṇa tvena sādhitena asattva āpattyā parasya eva aniṣyam bhavet aniṣya prasaṅgena param nigṛhītavataḥ mama aniṣyam katham bhavet 
NSu_1.1.24.7	 atha asattva an adhikaraṇa tve vādi prativādi siddhe sattva an adhikaraṇa tvam api adhikam sādhyate iti ced na aniṣyā nistārāt kiñca na sattvam nāma ekam anugatam kintu prativastu sattvāni bhidyante tatra viyat ādeḥ asat vailakṣaṇye sati sattva an adhikaraṇa tvam sādhyamānam kim eka sattvān adhikaraṇa tva muta aneka sattva an adhikaraṇa tvam atha sarva sattvān adhikaraṇa tvam kim vā aviśeṣita sattva an adhikaraṇa tvam athavā sarvathā sattva an adhikaraṇa tvam vivakṣitam na ādyaḥ viśvasya asataḥ api vailakṣaṇyam tāvat mama svayam eva sataḥ api vailakṣaṇyam sattva an adhikaraṇa tvam api svayam eva katham sattva bheda vādinaḥ mama sataḥ api sattva antara anadhikaraṇa tva aṅgīkārāt tathā ca siddhena tena sādhyamānena mama aniṣyam katham bhavet evam eva caturtha nirākaraṇam api vyākhyeyam na dvitīya tṛtīyau viśvasya asataḥ vailakṣaṇyam asattva anadhikaraṇa tvam tāvat mama svayam eva sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam aneka sattva an adhikaraṇa tvam sarva sattvān adhikaraṇa tvam tāvat mama svayam eva sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam aneka sattva an adhikaraṇa tvam 
NSu_1.1.24.8^1	 sarva sattvān adhikaraṇa tvam api svayam sat eva katham bheda vādinā ekaikasya arthasya aneka sarva sattva asvīkārāt svīkāre ca bheda bhaṅgaḥ syāt tatas ca tena aniṣyam katham bhavet na pañcamaḥ yatas sataḥ eva asataḥ vailakṣaṇyam svayam tat eva niyatam eva asti yatas ca asataḥ eva sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam api niyatam eva atas tena sādhyamānena viśvasya sat asat tva āpattyā bheda vādinaḥ katham aniṣyam bhavet mayā hi ekasya eva sat asat tvam aṅgīkṛtam sva upādhau pratiṣedha apratiyogi tvāt para upādhau ca tad pratiyogi tvāt dvayoḥ api sarvathā pratiṣedhāt katham sat asat tva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced tarhi asataḥ eva sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam svayam sanniyatam eva atas sat vailakṣaṇyam uktavā punar asataḥ api vailakṣaṇyena vyāhatena pratijñātena bheda vādinaḥ katham aniṣyam bhavet evam sataḥ eva asataḥ api vailakṣaṇyam niyatam iti asat vailakṣaṇyam uktavā punar viśvasya sat vailakṣaṇya pratijñā vyāhatā draṣṭavyā 
NSu_1.1.24.8^2	 na hi anirvācya siddheḥ prāgayam vipratiṣedhaḥ nivārayitum śakyaḥ asmāt eva hetoḥ tad siddhiḥ iti ced tarhi mātā vandhyā iti pratijñā kutas vipratiṣiddhā vakṣyamāṇa hetunā eva pratijñāta artha siddheḥ tatra api su vaca tvāt sambhāvitaḥ pratijñāyai arthaḥ sādhyeta hetunā a iti nyāyāt tatra hetu ākāṅkṣā eva na asti iti ced satyam kiñca sataḥ eva viśvasya asataḥ vailakṣaṇyam svayam sat eva sākṣi pramitam asti atas tena bādhitena sarvathā sattva an adhikaraṇa tvena pratijñātena bheda vādinaḥ katham aniṣyam bhavet amukhya sattva āvedakam pramāṇam tat iti ced mama tāvat mukhyam eva tad satvam iti uktam parakīya pramāṇa tarkāṇām adya api gahane niviṣṭa tvāt iti kecid te tava aniṣyam katam na bhavet iti vyācakṣate tatra na pāda ādau= iti pratiṣedhasya nañā nirdiṣyam anityam iti samādhānam avaseyam 
NSu_1.1.25.1–1.1.25.2^1	 yadi ucyate api sarvasmāt iti sadbheda saṃsthitiḥ sat mātra tvam brahmaṇaḥ api tasmāt tat api naḥ bhavet dvitīye dūṣaṇa antaram āha yadi ucyate iti api śabdaḥ dūṣaṇa samuccaye sarvasmāt api iti abhividhau vā yadi iti śravaṇāt tarhi iti grāhyam sarva śabdaḥ aneka arthaḥ yadi anekasmāt sataḥ vailakṣaṇyāt aneka sattva an adhikaraṇa tvam viśvasya sādhyam iti ucyate tarhi satām bheda saṃsthitiḥ tatas ca apasiddhāntaḥ idam uktam bhavati viśvam aneka sattān adhikaraṇam iti pratijānata aneka sattvāni aṅgīkriyante na vā dvitīye aneka viśeṣaṇam vyatharm ādye api ekasmin= eva arthe anekāni sattvānyuta ādhāra bhedena na ādyaḥ vaiyarthyāt dvitīye tu idam upatiṣṭhate sadbheda saṃsthitiḥ iti aneka sattva adhikaraṇa tā pratiṣedha sāmarthyāt ekaika sattva svīkāra āpatteḥ iti vā tṛtīyasya vedam dūṣaṇa antaram 
NSu_1.1.25.2^2	 yadi sarvasmāt sataḥ vailakṣaṇyam sarva sattvān adhikaraṇa tvam viśvasya sādhyatayā ucyate tarhi sadbheda saṃsthitiḥ na hi aneka sat anaṅgīkāre sarva śabdasya prayājenam asti santi eva anekāni santi pāram āthirkam tu ekam eva iti ced na tad siddhayartham eva adya api bhavatā prayatanāt tad anadhikaraṇa tva sādhaneṃ aśe apasiddhāntāt caturthe dūṣaṇa antara māhasat mātra tvam iti avivakṣita viśeṣam sattvam yasmāt brahmaṇaḥ api asti tasmāt kāraṇāt tasmāt satas brahmaṇaḥ tad vailakṣaṇyam tad sattvān adhikaraṇa tvam api viśvasya naḥ asmākam matam bhavet tathā ca siddha tvāt tat api sādhyam naḥ bhavet avivakṣita viśeṣa sattvān adhikaraṇa tve sādhye brahma gata sattvān adhikaraṇa tayā api pratijñāta artha upapatteḥ artha antara tā iti 
NSu_1.1.25.3^1	 athavā kim idam sattvam nāma yat anadhikaraṇa tvam viśvasya sādhyate kim sāmānya sattvam uta svarūpa sattvam ādyam dūṣayati yadi ucyate iti sarvasmāt sarva artha anugatāt sāmānyāt vailakṣaṇyam tad anādhāra tvam iti yāvat sādhya tayā yadi ucyate tadā sadbheda saṃsthitiḥ yadi sattā eva na asti tadā tad anadhikaraṇa tva pratijñā vyārthā syāt na idam śaśa viṣāṇa adhikaraṇam itivat vipratipatteḥ eva anudayāt sattā sāmānya aṅgīkāre ca sat bhedaḥ durvāraḥ eva na hi eka āśrayam sāmānyam asti santi satta adhikaraṇāni santi iti ced tarhi kāni iti vaktavyāni 
NSu_1.1.25.3^2	 dravya ādīni iti ced katham tarhi teṣām eva tad anadhikaraṇa tva sādhanam vyavahārataḥ sarvam asti paramārthataḥ tu na iti ced na ukta uttara tvāt etat ca para matena uttaram uktam veditavyam sva matena tu siddha sādhana tvam draṣṭavyam dravya ādi atirikta anugata sattva sāmānyasya eva anaṅgīkārāt dvitīyam dūṣayati sat mātra tvam iti sattā anapekṣam sattvam sat mātra tvam svarūpa sattvam iti yāvat tat brahmaṇaḥ api asti yatas tasmāt kāraṇāt tasmāt brahmaṇaḥ tad vailakṣaṇyam abrahma tvam api viśvasya naḥ bhavet iti athavā sāmānya sattā pakṣe doṣa antaram anena ucyate 
NSu_1.1.25.3^3	 tathā hi sattā sāmānya vidhurasya api brahmaṇaḥ sat mātra tvam svarūpa sattvam tāvat asti na punar sattva vaidhuḥ yāt asat anirvācyam vā brahma tasmāt sattā vaidhuḥ yasya asattva ādi ahetu tvāt tad sattān adhikaraṇa tvam api viśvasya naḥ bhavet iti etena brahma svarūpam sattvam iti pakṣaḥ api nirastaḥ artha kriyā kāritvam jñāna abādhya tvam vā sattvam iti pakṣa dvayam sphuṭa doṣa tvāt na dūṣitam artha kriyā iti vadatā mithyā bhūtasya eva artha kriyā aṅgīkṛtā iti siddhānta virodhaḥ ca artha kriyā vidhurasya api brahmaṇaḥ sattvāt tat vaidhuryam nāsāttu ādi hetuḥ 
NSu_1.1.25.3^4	 artha kriyā anadhikaraṇa tā mātra sādhanam prakṛtānupayuktam tat viruddham ca jñāna abādhya tva vaidhuryam ca tat bādhya tvam eva tat ca hetu arthān na bhidyate iti sphuṭam eva hetu antara abhidhāne api vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena bādha siddhārtha tā ādi āpattiḥ sphuṭā eva yat atra uktam tvayā api dve tattve sat asidati tattvam vyavasthāpayatā yat eva sattvena vyavasthāpitam tasya eva mayā api aṅgīkārāt na sat śabda arthā niruktiḥ iti tat atīva mandam mayā hi kvacid sat iti bhāvaḥ vyavahriyate kvacid ca pratipanna upādhau niṣedha apratiyogi kvāpi mūrtam ityādi tat sarvam ca nirastam iti 
NSu_1.1.26.1–1.1.26.2^1	 jñāna bādhya tvam api tu na siddham prativādinaḥ vijñātasya anyathā samyak vijñānam hi eva tat matam evam pratijñām nirākṛtya hetum api apākaroti jñāna bādhya tvam iti na kevalam pratijñā duṣyāḥ kim nāma hetu bhūtam jñāna bādhya tvam api iti arthaḥ tuśabdaḥ siddhānti abhimatāt jñāna bādhya tvādvayavat chinatti jñāna bādhya tvam hi jñāna nivartya tvam vā pratipanna upādhau niṣedha pratiyogi tvam vā hetu tvena parasya abhimatam na ca prapañce tad prativādinaḥ mama siddham atas anyatara asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti nanu īśvara jñānena prapañca nivṛttiḥ tvayā apīṣyate eva anyathā tasya saṃhāra kartṛ tva anupapatteḥ jñāna ādimataḥ eva katṛ tvāt satyam na evam jñāna nivartya tvam parasya abhipretam 
NSu_1.1.26.2^2	 api tarhi ajñāna upādānakasya samāne viṣaye virodhitāḥ jñānena upādāne nivṛtte svayam eva vilapanam yathā aha ajñānasya sva kāryeṇa vartamānena pravilīnena vā saha jñānena nivṛtti bādhaḥ a iti na ca ayam prapañce asmākam saṃmataḥ kintu mudgara prahāra ādinā ghaṭasya iva īśvarasya jñāna icchā prayatna vyāpāraiḥ vināśaḥ eva saḥ eva hetuḥ astu iti ced na tathāvidham api jñāna bādhya tvam pakṣa eka deśe prakṛti ādau na siddham prativādinaḥ iti bhāga asiddha tvāt kiñca satyasya api jñāna vināśya tvam astu na ca vipakṣe kiñcid bādhakam asti iti atas aprayojaka tvāt jñāna bādhya tvam na siddham api vyāpya tva asiddham api iti yāvat 
NSu_1.1.26.2^3	 prativādinaḥ matena iti guḍa jihvikā mātram bādhakānupanyāse vādinaḥ api vyāpya tva asiddheḥ āvaśyaka tvāt sataḥ vināśe caitanyasya api vināśa prasaṅgaḥ iti ced tarhi vināśa mātrasya sādhya prayojaka tvena jñāna bādhya tvam asiddham api vyartha viśeṣaṇa asiddham api syāt nāśya tva mātram hetuḥ jñāna iti svarūpa kathana mātram sa ca ukta bādhaka sānāthyena na aprayojakaḥ iti ced na sattva sāmye api vināśa kāraṇa sadasat bhāvena viśeṣasya ukta tvāt nanu ca nehanānā sti iti pratipanna upādhau śrauta niṣedha ātmā bādhaḥ prapañce asti iti ced na śruti artha nirṇaya uttara kālam eva etat saḥ eva tu upapatti virodhāt aśakyaḥ iti ucyamāna tvāt 
NSu_1.1.26.2^4	 athavā jñāna bādhya tvam asiddham vyāpti rahitam api iti yojyam tathā hi kim tvad abhimatam jñāna bādhya tvam atra hetūkriyate kim vā asmat abhimatam iti vācyam ādyam ced ukta nyāyena na siddham prativādinaḥ dvitīye vyāpti vaidhuryam iti tat katham iti atas āha vijñātasya iti hi yasmāt anyathā vijñātasya samyak vijñānam eva bādhaḥ tat viṣaya tvam eva tad bādhya tvam matam asmākam tat ca ātmani vipakṣe gatam iti vyāpti vikalam iti vākya śeṣaḥ satyaḥ api ātmā deha ādi ātmanā vijñātaḥ vedānta janita samyak vijñāna vṛtti viṣayaḥ iti pareṇa api aṅgīkāryam anyathā avidyā nivṛtti anupapatteḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.26.3^1	 athavā dṛṣṭāntam pratyācaṣṭe jñāna bādhya tvam iti apipadena sat asat vilakṣaṇa tva lakṣaṇam sādhyam anirvācya tvam samuccinoti tuśabdaḥ jñāna bādhya tvam abhimatā dvayavat chinatti na siddhim śukti rajata ādau= iti śeṣaḥ śukti rajata ādeḥ anirvacanīya tvam tāvat prativādinaḥ mama asiddham mayā atyanta asattvena aṅgīkṛta tvāt atas eva jñāna bādhya tvam mama tatra asaṃmatam tat hi jñāna nivartya tvam parasya abhimatam na ca asataḥ tad sambhavati tasya nitya nivṛtta tvāt atas sādhya sādhana vikalaḥ ayam dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ nanu pratipanna upādhau niṣedha pratiyogi tvam bādhya tvam asti eva śukti rajata ādau mā evam tathā satya sattva prasaṅgāt vakṣyate ca etat yadi tarhi na bādhya tvam śukti rajata ādeḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.3^2	 sakala loka virodha ādi prasaṅgaḥ mā evam tvad abhimatasya abhāve api anyasya bādhya tvasya tatra vidyamāna tvāt kim tat iti atas āha vijñātasya iti bādhya tvam iti prakṛta prakṛti artham bādhyam tat iti sāmānyena parāmṛśati kecid na idam rajatam iti hi adhyasta vastu abhāva bodham bādham āhuḥ apare tu śuktiḥ iyam iti virodhi bhāva antara jñānam tat ubhayam pratyekam avyāpakam śābda ādau dvayoḥ api bādha tva prasiddheḥ tasmāt ubhaya anugatam etat ucyate rajata tva ādinā vijñātasya puras vartinaḥ śukti tva ādinā vijñānam khalu anyathā vijñātasya samyak vijñānam bhavati evam asataḥ rajatasya sattva ādinā avagatasya asattva ādinā vijñānam api anyathā vijñātasya samyak vijñānam bhavati eva 
NSu_1.1.26.3^3	 samyak vijñānam bādhaḥ iti eva ukte sarvam api samyak jñānam bādhaḥ prasajyeta na ca tathā vyavahāraḥ tad nivṛtti artham anyathā vijñātasya iti uktam anyathā avijñātasya jñānam iti eva ukte dhārāvāhika bhrame rājata tvena avagatasya śuktikā śakalasya punar nāga vaṅga tva ādi jñāne api prasaṅgaḥ tad nirāsāya samyak iti uktam anyathā iti tad svarūpa apekṣayā tena ghaṭasya eva paṭa ādi apekṣayā anyathā ghaṭa tvena jñānasya punar ghaṭa tvena jñāne prasaṅgaḥ nirastaḥ chala prasaṅgāt tathā api rajata tvena avagatasya śuktikā śa kalasya śukla tva ādi jñāne prasaṅgaḥ tad avasthaḥ evam ekena anyathā vijñātasya puruṣa antara sambandhini tasya eva vā puruṣasya kāla antara bhāvinyājāna siddhe samyak vijñāne prasaṅgaḥ api iti ced mā evam 
NSu_1.1.26.3^4	 bādhatiḥ khalu loḍane paṭhyate tat ca jñāna asya arthasya vā astu na tāvat jñānasya tasya kṣaṇika tvena svatas eva loḍita tvāt samyak vijñānasya api uttara jñāna vināśyasya bādhita tva vyavahāra prasaṅgāt na api arthasya śukti śakala ādeḥ tādavasthyāt rajata ādenirtya loḍita tvāt atas pūrva jñāna prasañjitasya anyathā ākārasya loḍanam iva iti vaktavyam tathā ca sati kaḥ ati prasaṅgaḥ tat kim vaktavyam etat na hi katham anucyamānam jñāsyate anyathā avijñātasya iti vacana sāmarthyāt anyathā samyak vijñānam iti eva avakṣyat kim anena iti tad viṣaya tvam bādhya tvam iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.4^1	 athavā anirvacanīyam amukhyam sat iti uktam tatra kim idam anirvacanīya tvam kim nirukti virahaḥ kiṃvā nirukti nimitta virahaḥ nādakyaḥ anirvacanīyam ityādi nirukteḥ sattvena asambhāvi tvāt dvitīye api nirukti nimittam jñānam arthaḥ vā syāt na ādyaḥ jñānasya ubhaya vādi siddhi sadbhāvāt na dvitīyaḥ yatā pratibhāsamarthasya alaukikasya rajata ādeḥ māyā vādinā abhyupagata tvāt iti āśaṅkaya pareṇa anirvacanīyasya lakṣaṇa dvayam abhihitam sat asat vilakṣaṇa tvam anirvacanīya tvam jñāna bādhya tvam ca iti tatra ādyam tāvat nirākaroti vailakṣaṇyam sataḥ ca iti vyākhyānāni tu pūrvavat eva
