NSu_1.1.26.4^2	 tatra yāvatsu pakṣeṣu siddhātha ṛtu aparyavasānam tāvat sva nirvacanīya tvasya sattva avirodhi tvena na san prapañcaḥ kintva nirvacanīyaḥ iti ārambha asaṅgatiḥ deṣaḥ avagantavyaḥ yatra punar bādha ādi paryavasānam tatra avyāptiḥ avagantavyā athavā anirvacanīya tvena viyadādikam śukti rajata ādikam ca parasya abhimatam tatra sataḥ eva sattvena pramitasya eva viyat ādeḥ viśvasya asat vilakṣaṇa tvam eva svayam sat evam asataḥ eva asattvena pramitasya eva śukti rajata ādeḥ viśvasya sarvasya api āropitasya sat vilakṣaṇa tvam eva svayam sat viyat ādau= asat vilakṣaṇa tvam eva asti 
NSu_1.1.26.4^3	 sat vailakṣaṇyam tu pramāṇa bādhitam tathā śukti rajata ādau sat vilakṣaṇa tvam eva asti asat vailakṣaṇyam tu pramāṇa viruddham atas asambhavinā tena lakṣaṇena uktena katham te aniṣyam nigraha sthānam na bhavet ityādi yojanā draṣṭavyā bheda vādinaḥ iti anena māyā vādinaḥ viyat ādau sat vailakṣaṇya aṅgīkāraḥ śukti rajata ādau ca asat vilakṣaṇa tva abhyupagatiḥ āgraha mātra malā eva iti abhipraiti yadi ucyate iti atra api ukta rītyā sambhavi tva ādikam jñātavyam sat mātra tvam iti anena ativyāptiḥ ucyate tathā hi brahmaṇaḥ api sat mātra tvam sattva an adhikaraṇa tvam iti yāvat 
NSu_1.1.26.4^4	 māyā vādinā abhyupagatam iti śeṣaḥ nirdharma ka tva aṅgīkārāt asattva anadhikaraṇa tvam tu niścitam eva tasmāt tat api brahmā api sannaḥ bhavet kintva nirvācyam prasajyeta iti sattvena asattvena ca vicāra asaha tvam anirvacanīya tvam na punar sattva asattva dharmānadhikaraṇa tvam brahma tu sattvena vicāra saham katham anirvacanīyam syāt iti ced na sattvena iti tu apratyaya arthasya anabhyupagamāt kiñca yaḥ viyat ādau vicāraḥ sa brahmaṇi api samānaḥ iti katham na tasya anirvacanīya tvam yathā uktam sarva vailakṣaṇya aṅgīkārāt a ityādi nirākariṣyate ca asau durvicāraḥ tatra tatra iti 
NSu_1.1.26.5	 dvitīyam api lakṣaṇam nirākaroti jñāna bādhya tvam iti yadi jñāna bādhya tvam nāma ukta vidhayā śukti rajata ādeḥ ca asatvena avidyā upādānaka tva abhāvāt tatas ca asambhavi tvam lakṣaṇa doṣaḥ yadi punar jñāna vināśya tva mātram tathā api viyat ādau nitye nitya tvāt eva śukti rajata ādau ca asatvāt na siddham iti avyāptiḥ yadi ca pratipanna upādhau niṣedha pratiyogi tvam tat api viyat ādau na siddham iti avyāptiḥ eva upapattayaḥ tu uktāḥ vakṣyamāṇāḥ ca anusandheyāḥ nanu bhavatā api bādhya tvam kim api aṅgīkaraṇīyam eva padasya nirarthaka tvā yogāt tat eva asmākam anirvacanīya lakṣaṇam bhavatu iti atas āha prativādinaḥ vijñātasya iti prativādinaḥ mama matam iti sambandhaḥ tat ca ātmani anirvacanīye api asti iti ati vyāptam iti śeṣaḥ atra anyathā vijñānam eva bhrāntiḥ tad prasañjitānyathā akāra loḍanam samyak vijñānam eva bādhaḥ iti avadhāraṇa tayā mata antarāṇi nirastāni veditavyāni hi śabdena tatra pramāṇa prasiddhim sūcayati 
NSu_1.1.26.6^1	 atha pañca ākhyātivādaḥ iha khalu kecid yathārtham eva sarva vijñānam iti manyamānāḥ na anyathā ākhyātim sahante tathā hi kā iyam anyathākhyātiḥ nāma yadi tāvat anyathā pariṇate vastuni khyātiḥ anyathā khyātiḥ tadā ghaṭa ādi pratyayāḥ sarve api anyathā ākhyāti tvāt vibhramāḥ prasajyeran kiñca śuktikāyāḥ rajata ākāra pariṇāmaḥ kim sa kāraṇaḥ uta akāraṇaḥ na tāvat akāraṇaḥ kādācid katva anupapatteḥ ādye kāraṇam vācyam karaṇa doṣaḥ iti ced na tasya karaṇa sambandhinaḥ śuktikā pariṇāma hetutva anupapatteḥ anyathā tadā eva sakala arthānām rajata rūpa pariṇāma prasaṅgāt 
NSu_1.1.26.6^2	 duṣya karaṇa saṃsargaḥ hetuḥ iti ced tathā api kim śukti tva apagamena rajata rūpa pariṇāmaḥ kim vā tad anapagamena ādye puruṣa antareṇa api tadā śukti tvam na pratyetavyam dvitīye bhrāntena api tat pratyetavyam kiñca śukti tva apagame bādhe api na tad bhāyāt atha punar śuktayā ākāreṇa rajatam pariṇatam iti ced na karaṇa doṣasya kāraṇasya abhāvāt bādhaḥ api evam tena eva gṛhyate iti ced na ghaṭa ādeḥ api kulāla ādi mātra vedya tā āpātāt sukha ādi vat iti ced na bāhya antara tvena viśeṣāt anyathā ukta ati prasaṅgā nistārāt 
NSu_1.1.26.7^1	 kiñca doṣa vaśāt rajata ākāreṇa pariṇatā ced śuktiḥ tadā doṣa apagame api tathā eva katham na avatiṣṭhate na hi nimitta kāraṇa nāśāt kārya nāśaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kamala kuḍmala vikāsa nimitta sāvitra tejaḥ apagamasya vikāsa nivṛtti hetu tā dṛṣṭā iti ced mā evam dala vibhāgaḥ hi vikāsaḥ nāma sa ca kṣaṇika tvāt sati eva sāvitra tejasi nivṛttaḥ saṃyoga pradhvaṃsaḥ tu na kadāpi nivartate punar saṃyoga lakṣaṇaḥ mukulībhāvaḥ tu śīta ādi nā udana janyaḥ eva sthāyi tve api vibhāgasya anyat eva tad nāśe nimittam iti yat kiñcid etat paratva ādi vatsyāt iti ced na vipratipatteḥ kiñca utpannam ced rajatam vinaṣṭam tadā tathā eva pratītiḥ syāt na punar na idam rajatam iti bādha buddhiḥ etena duṣya karaṇa janyāt vijñānāt rajatam eti api parāḥ tam kā ca evam sati doṣa vācaḥ yuktiḥ na hi mṛdaḥ ghaṭa ākāra pariṇāmasya nimittam daṇḍa cakra ādikam doṣa tvena manyante kiñca yasyāḥ pratīteḥ tad ālambanam tatas eva tad janma kiṃvā prati iti antarāt 
NSu_1.1.26.7^2	 na ādyaḥ paraspara āśraya prasaṅgāt utpanne hi rajate tad ālambanāyāḥ pratīteḥ janma tasyām jātāyām rajata utpattiḥ iti na khalu nirālambanā pratītiḥ utpadyate dvitīye api kim tat pratīti antaram śuktikā alambanam uta śuktikā rajata antara ālambanam athavā artha antara ālambanam na ādyaḥ sarvatra śukti prati iti anantaram rajata utpāda prasaṅgāt śukti rajata pratīteḥ prāk śuktiḥ iti pratīti niyama abhāvāt ca duṣya karaṇa ālocita śukti sādhāraṇa ākāra pratīte rajata janma iti ced na sādhāraṇa ākāra mātra darśana anantaram rajata pratīti niyama abhāvāt kāraṇa vaikalyam tatra kalpyate iti ced syāt etat evam yadi rajata janma pramitam syāt pratītim tu prakāra antareṇa upapādayiṣyāmaḥ na dvitīyaḥ pūrva rajatasya api tat eva kāraṇam iti rajata pratīti pravāha aviccheda prasaṅgāt na tṛtīyaḥ atiprasaṅgāt tat evam bhrānti bādhayoḥ anupapatteḥ na pariṇāma pakṣaḥ yuktaḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.8	 na api vastunaḥ vastu antarātmanā avabhāsaḥ anyathā khyātiḥ iti yuktam tathā hi kim vastunaḥ vastu antarātmanā satī uta asatī ādye na bhrāntiḥ na api bādhaḥ sarveṣām ca sarvam sarva ātmanā pratīyeta na hi doṣaḥ karaṇa saṃskāraḥ tathā satya duṣya kāraṇena na kiñcid upalabhyeta kiñca evam sati rajata saṃvid samī cīnā śuktiḥ eva iyam iti ca asamīcīnā iti āpadyeta na dvitīyaḥ asataḥ prati iti anupapatteḥ upapattau vā kim rajatasya api vastu tva grahaṇena etena asambaddha viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa pratītiḥ anyathā khyātiḥ iti nirastam asataḥ viśeṣaṇa sambandhasya prati iti anupapatteḥ upapattau vā kim asat khyāti vādibhiḥ aparārddham atha brūṣe anya ākāram jñānam anyathā khyātiḥ iti tat asat samīcīna jñānasya api āntara bāhya tva ādinā artha vilakṣaṇa ākāra tvena vibhrama tva āpatteḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.9^1	 anya ākāra ullekhi jñāna manya ālambanam anyathā khyātiḥ iti tu viruddham tathā hi na tāvat sat asat bhāva mātreṇa ālambanam sadbhāva mātrasya sarva vastu pratyaya sādhāraṇyena sarva pratyayānām sarva artha ālambanatva āpatteḥ sarvam sarvajña tā ca evam sati syāt atīta ādi viṣayasya nirālambanatāpātaḥ ca etena puras deśe sadbhāvena ālambana tvam api pratyuktam na ca kāraṇa tvena ālambanam rūpa ādi jñānasya cakṣuḥ ādi api kāraṇam iti tad ālambana tva prasaṅgāt atīta anāgata viṣaya tvam ca jñānasya na syāt atīta anāgatayoḥ asattvena kāraṇatva anupapatteḥ etena viṣaya tayā kāraṇa tvam iti api nirastam 
NSu_1.1.26.9^2	 ātma āśraya tvam ca evam sati syāt viṣaya tvasya eva nirūpyamāṇa tvāt kiñca evam viṣaya tvam iti eva astu kim kāraṇa tayā vyarthayā anartha jananyā kim ca idam viṣaya tvam yena yasya atiśayaḥ utpadyate sa tasya viṣayaḥ iti ced atiśayaḥ hi jñāta tā vā syāt vayavahāraḥ vā na ādyaḥ anabhyupagamāt abhyupagame api atīta ādi jñānasya nirviṣayatva āpātāt na hi asati dharmiṇi dharma utpādaḥ yujyate na dvitīyaḥ atad arthinaḥ vyavahāra anutpattau= aviṣayatva āpatteḥ vyāghra cora ādi jñāna anantaram ādīyamānasya daṇḍa ādeḥ api tad viṣaya tva prasakteḥ ca yat vijñānam yat ākāram tat tad ālambanam iti tu tathāgata matam anudhāvati 
NSu_1.1.26.10^1	 yat sannikṛṣṭa karaṇena yat jñānam janyate tat tad viṣayam iti api na rūpa ādi jñānasya ākāśa ādi viṣaya tā āpātāt na hi rūpa ādi jñānam utpādayat cakṣuḥ ākāśa ādinā na sannikṛṣṭate iti yujyate pratyabhijñā ca tat tāsat nikṛṣṭa karaṇa janyā na tad viṣayā syāt na ca vākyam vākya arthena sannikṛṣṭate yena tad janita jñānasya vākya arthaḥ viṣayaḥ syāt ākāśa ādi viṣaya tā evam ca āpadyeta liṅga jñānāt ca ātma sannikṛṣṭāt jāyamānam liṅgi jñānam ātma viṣayam āpadyeta tasmāt yat jñānam yat pratibhāsam tat eva tasya ālambanam iti mantavyam tatra rajata jñāne śuktiḥ avabhāsate na vā iti vaktavyam avabhāsate iti bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīya prajñaḥ devānām priyaḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.10^2	 yadi saṃvidi bahu mānavān na iti brūyāt tadā katham tad śuktikā ālambanam syāt kiñca rajatam avabhāsate śuktikā ālambanam ced ati prasaṅgaḥ katam pariharaṇīyaḥ nanu rajata avabhāsasya rajata viṣayaka tve tena rajatena bhavitavyam katham na bhavitavyam na hi sampratipanna samīcīna rajata svīkāre api nimittam asti anyat rajata avabhāsāt na hi anyatara rajata pratibhāsa pakṣapāte kāraṇam asti na asti atra rajatam iti api pratibhāsaḥ asti iti ced satyam pratibhāsa sāmarthyāt rajata abhāvaḥ api aṅgīkṛtaḥ eva puratas pratītyoḥ virodhaḥ syāt iti ced na yathā na virodhaḥ tathā vakṣyamāṇa tvāt 
NSu_1.1.26.11	 na ca anyathā ākhyāti janane kāraṇam paśyāmaḥ na ca cakṣuḥ ādikam eva kāraṇam tasya samīcīna jñāna karaṇa tā avadhāraṇāt na khalu jarā maraṇa vidhvaṃsa hetuḥ jātu sudhā tad hetuḥ api bhavati kāraṇa aikye kārya bhedasya akasmika tva prasaṅgāt naca adṛṣṭa bhedāt kārya bhedaḥ tasya kārya bheda niścaya uttara kālam niśceya tvāt kārya bhedasya ca vipratipanna tvāt doṣa saha kṛtāt indriyāt eva anyathājñāna jananam iti api asat doṣāḥ hi kāraṇānām autsargika kārya janana sāmarthyam nighnanti na tu viparīta kārya janana sāmarthyam ādadhāti na khalu duṣyam kuṭaja bījam vaṭam janayati kim nāma na janayati eva kuṭaja aṅkuram na ca vaktavyam dāva dahana dagdha vetra bījānām kadalī kāṇḍa janana sāmarthyam upalabdham iti pākena dravya antara utpatteḥ teṣām abīja tvāt 
NSu_1.1.26.12^1	 kiñca pradarśita ākāra vyabhicāre pratyayasya sarvatra vyabhicāra śaṅkā durvārā syāt tathā ca katham bāhya artha ninhavam nirākurmaḥ tathā hi jñānam eva khalu sarvatra vastu vyavasthāpakam na anyat tat ced kvacid vaya bhicarati tadā tat sarvatra śaṅkita vyabhicāram eva na ca tad śaṅkā paṅka saṅkṣālana kṣamam kiñcid anya dvijñānāt tat ca sakalam api śaṅkā kalaṅka saṅkocita prabhāvam na prabhavati iti uktam tatas ca kutas bāhya artha pratyāśā na ca vācyam yathā ghaṭa ādeḥ pārthivasya vahni vyabhicāre api na dhūmasya api tadvayabhicāraḥ śaṅkayate evam eka jñānasya artha vyabhicāre api na sarvatra vyabhicāra śaṅkā iti vaiṣamyāt asti hi tatra pārthiva tva aviśeṣe api avyabhicāra niścaya upāyaḥ dhūma tva ādiḥ evāva antaraḥ viśeṣaḥ na hi tatra bādhakam kiñcid tena upapadyate tatra āśvāsaḥ prakṛte tu na jñāna tva avāntara viśeṣam anāśvāsa nirasana kṣamam īkṣāmahe 
NSu_1.1.26.12^2	 na ca bādhaka bhāva abhāva rūpāt viśeṣāt vayavasthā iti vācyam bādhakasya api jñāna tvena śaṅkā āspada tvāt na khalu bādhakasya kim api śṛṅgam asti bādhaka abhāvaḥ ca anupasañjāta bādha bhrame samānaḥ saṃvādaka bhāva abhāvābhyām viśeṣaḥ iti ced na ukta uttara tvāt saṃvādakam api jñānam eva iti tat api katham saṃśaya āspadam na syāt tatra api saṃvādaka antara anveṣaṇe anavasthā kutas na bhavet aṅgīkṛtaḥ ca pareṇa dhārāvāhika bhrame anyonya saṃvādaḥ etena jñāna janya vyavahāra visaṃvāda avisaṃvāda lakṣaṇaḥ api viśeṣaḥ parāstaḥ veditavyaḥ tad viśeṣa grāhiṇī api viśvāsa kāraṇa abhāvāt api ca pratīyamānaḥ ayam rajata ākāraḥ kutastyaḥ iti vaktavyam na tāvat puras varti niṣṭhaḥ iti iṣyam anyathā khyāti vādinām bādha virodhaḥ ca tathā sati syāt na api deśa antara vartī iti vakṣyāmaḥ tatas ca jñāna sthaḥ eva ayam iti āpatitam tathā ca jitam sa ākāra vijñāna vādibhiḥ bauddhaiḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.13^1	 nanu tarhi idam rajatam iti ādi pratyayasya kā gatiḥ ucyate rajatam idam iti dve jñāne smṛti anubhava rūpe tatra idam iti puras varti dravya mātra grahaṇam doṣa vaśāt tad gatasya śukti tva sāmānya viśeṣasya agrahaṇāt tatra idam iti puras varti dravya mātra grahaṇam doṣa vaśāt tad gatasya śukti tva sāmānya viśeṣasya agrahaṇāt tanmātram ca gṛhītam sadṛśa tayā saṃskāra udbodha krameṇa rajata smṛtim janayati sā ca gṛhīta grahaṇa svabhāvā api doṣa vaśāt gṛhīta tatta aṃśa pramoṣeṇa gṛhīti sarūpa avatiṣṭhate tathā ca rajata smṛteḥ puras vṛtti grahaṇasya ca mithas svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ ca bheda agrahaṇāt sannihita rajata jñāna sārūpyeṇa idam rajatam iti bhinne api grahaṇa smaraṇe abheda vyavahāram sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśam ca pravataryataḥ kutas etat iti ced na anyathā anupapatteḥ ukta tvāt kiñca idam iti purovarti nayana samprayoga jam jñānam anubhavaḥ iti avivādam rajata jñānam ca na tāvat indriya jam 
NSu_1.1.26.13^2	 indriyasya sannikṛṣṭa athar eva jñāna janana sāmarthyāt anyathā sarva sārvajña prasaṅgāt na ca viprakṛṣṭena rajatena sannikarṣaḥ asti tad kāryasya sākṣātkārasya kadāpi adarśanāt na ca śukti śakala sannikarṣāt eva indriyam rajata jñānam utpādayati iti sāmpratam atiprasaṅgāt na ca doṣa sadasadbhāvābhyām vyavasthā doṣāṇām viparīta kārya kāri tayā nirasta tvāt bhasmaka doṣa dūṣitasya jāṭhara jātavedasaḥ bahutarā ahāra pariṇati hetuta upalabhyate iti ced na vipratipatteḥ doṣasya evā ahāra vikāra hetu ta upapatteḥ na ca dahana kāryam katham doṣaḥ karoti iti vācyam kārye api vaijātya upalambhāt jāṭhara agni pariṇatāḥ hi rasāḥ śarīra upacaya hetavaḥ na bhasmaka pariṇatāḥ tathā tasmāt na idam indriya jam naci liṅga ādi anusandhāna vidhurāṇām api jāyamānam anumānā adi prabhavam iti vaktum śakyate atas pratyutpanna karaṇa abhāve api utpadyamānena anena pariśeṣāt smaraṇena eva bhavitavyam 
NSu_1.1.26.14^1	 kiñca idam smaraṇam anākalita rajatasya anutpadyamāna tvāt sampratipanna smaraṇa vat naca idam asmaraṇam tad ta aṃśa vikala tvāt sampratipanna vat iti yuktam padāt padārtha smṛtau hari hara ādi smṛtau ca vyabhicārāt kiñca anubhūtam tāvat na samastam smaryate tat ta aṃśaḥ ca atīta deśa kāla sambandhaḥ smaryamāṇa dharmaḥ tathā ca smaraṇam ca bhavatu bhavatu doṣa vaśāt pramuṣita tatta aṃśam na ca vipakṣe bādhakam kiñci d ityaprayojakaḥ hetuḥ na ca na iyam smṛtiḥ indriya janya tvāt tat ca indriya vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt iti vācyam smṛti bīja saṃskāra udbodha hetu puras varti sādhāraṇa ākāra grahaṇaḥ eva indriya vyāpāra anvaya vyatirekayoḥ upakṣīṇa tvāt nanu evam sati anāsvādita tiktasya śiśoḥ tikta smaraṇa anupapatteḥ katham tiktaḥ guḍaḥ iti pratyayaḥ iti ced na janma antara anubhūta tvāt adṛṣṭa vaśāt ca kasyacid eva smaraṇam upapadyate 
NSu_1.1.26.14^2	 athavā na ayam niyamaḥ grahaṇa smaraṇe eva agṛhīta viveke vyavahāra ādi pravartake iti kintu kvacid grahaṇe eva mithas agṛhīta bhede yathā pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ iti atra hi viniryat nayana raśmi vartinaḥ pitta dravyasya pīta tvam doṣa vaśāt dravya rahitam gṛhyate śaṅkhaḥ api guṇa hīnaḥ sva rūpa mātreṇa gṛhyate tad anayoḥ guṇa guṇinoḥ ita retarā pekṣiṇoḥ asaṃsarga āgrahāt sārūpyāt pīta cira bilva ādi phala pratyaya aviśeṣeṇa abheda vyavahāraḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyapadeśaḥ ca bhavataḥ yat tu kajjala kālima agrahaṇam tat tiryak avasthānāt asvacchatayā nayana raśmi pratibandhaka tvāt ca pittam tu ājarva avasthitam kācam iva svaccham na pratibandhakam iti viśeṣaḥ evam tiktaḥ guḍaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ api kvacid punar smaraṇe eva agṛhīta viveke yathā sa ghaṭaḥ tatra āsīt iti anayā eva diśālāta cakra ādi vyavahārāḥ sarve api nirvāhyāḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.15^1	 kiñca viparyayam aṅgīkurvāṇena api viveka agrahaḥ grāhyaḥ eva na hi viveka grahe viparyaya avakāśaḥ asti virodhāt anyathā viparyaya nivṛtti anupapatteḥ tathā ca tatas eva sarvasya upapattau kim viparyaya kalpanayā na ca anyathā ākhyātau kim api pramāṇam asti bheda āgraha prasajjita abheda vyavahāra bādhanena eva na idam iti viveka jñānasya bādhaka tvam api upapadyate tad upapattau ca agṛhīta vivekasya jñāna dvayasya bhrānti tvam api loka siddham siddham tathā ca prayogaḥ vigīta pratyayaḥ yathārthaḥ pratyaya tvāt sampratipanna vat nanu atra vigīta pratyayaḥ nāma kim purovarti nirvikalpaka jñānam uta sadṛśa darśana uttham rajara smaraṇam kim vā ubhayam āhosvit rajata puras varti eka tā jñānam āhosvid pramuṣita bhedam vedana dvayam 
NSu_1.1.26.15^2	 tatra ādya pakṣa traye siddha sādhana tā caturthe vādya āśraya asiddha tvam apasiddhāntaḥ vyāghātaḥ ca pañcame prativādya āśraya siddha tā iti ced mā evam asti tāvat purovarti nirvikalpaka jñānam asti ca sadṛśa puras varti darśana janitā rajata smṛtiḥ tathā asti eva ca tat samuttham sa vikalpakam idam iti vedanāt sa vivāda bheda abhedam rajata vedanam tatra vipratipannau bheda abhedau vihāya idam rajatam iti avagama mātram idam rajatam iti ādi sāmāna adhikaraṇya vyavahāra kāraṇam pakṣa tvena vivakṣitam ced kaḥ virodhaḥ na hi vipratipanna ākāreṇa eva pakṣīkāraḥ kvacid mā hi bhūt nitya anitya agni madanagnimat śabda parvata pakṣīkāre prakṛta doṣa anuṣaṅgāt bhaṅgaḥ anumāna mudrāyāḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.16^1	 kiñca siddhasya eva pakṣīkaraṇam vimata ākārasya api siddha tve kim sādhyeta vimatau ca bheda abhedau vibhrama gocara vivāda avasare bhede hi vedanayoḥ idam vedanam purovatiḥ mātra gocaram na rajata vātāḥ vetti rajata vedanam api rajata mātra grāhi na idam iti purovartinam anūdya tasya eva rajata tām idam rajatam iti vidadhāti kintu rajatam iti eva yasya kasyacid rajata tvam anusandhatte tat ca na pramāṇa viruddham iti kva anyathā ākhyātiḥ atas tad vādibhiḥ abhedaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ apākartavyaḥ ca ākhyāti vādibhiḥ iti asti eva vipratipattiḥ tatas vipratipanna ākāram parityajya idam rajatam iti avagama mātra pakṣīkāre na kaścid doṣaḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.16^2	 katham anyathā ākhyātivādī idam rajatam iti jñānasya purovarti viṣaya tva sādhanāya sādhanam upanyasi an= itas doṣāt vimucyeta atha rajatāthiḥ naḥ śuktikāyām pravṛttau hetu bhūtam jñānam mayā pakṣīkriyate iti ced mā uccais vāccaḥ paraḥ api śroṣyati īśvara jñānena siddha sādhana tā syāt iti ced tava api bādhaḥ katham na syāt prakṛta pravṛtti hetuḥ anīśvara jñānam pakṣīkriyate iti ced mama api tathā eva syāt tvayā īśvara anabhyupagamādvayartham viśeṣaṇam iti ced tarhi mām prati tava api katham na vyartham tathā api vyāpti jñāne siddha sādhana tā iti ced tatra eva tava bādha prasaṅgaḥ idam jñānāt agṛhīta vivekam rajata jñānam iti vipratipatti viṣayam uddhāṭayāmi iti ced samam etat mama api 
NSu_1.1.26.17^1	 kiñca vivāda adhyāsitam rajata jñānam rajata viṣayam rajata jñāna tvāt saṃmata vat atra api pūrvavat vimati viṣayaḥ vivecanīyaḥ syāt etat kim idam rajata jñānam nāma rajatasya jñānam rajata jñānam rajatam ca tat jñānam ca iti vā rajata śabda ullekhi jñānam vā rajata arthinaḥ pravṛtti hetu jñānam vā rajatam iti jñānam vā na prathamaḥ ṣaṣṭhayarthasya viṣaṭa viṣayi bhāva vyatirekeṇa asambhavāt sādhya aviśiṣṭa tvāt na dvitīyaḥ ubhaya asiddheḥ jñānasya nirākāra tvāt na tṛtīyaḥ ullekhā arthasya viṣaya tve asiddheḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.17^2	 tad jñāna janita smṛti mātra yoni tve pūrva pada mātra jñānena api rajata padasya smaraṇa sambhavena vyabhicārāt na caturthaḥ viveka graha vādinām idam iti jñānasya api śuktikā alambanasya tad hetu tvena vyabhicārāt na pañcamaḥ pūrva ukta pakṣa ābahirbhāvāt iti mā evam anyathā ākhyāti vādinā kim śuktikā jñānam śukti viṣayam anyathā khyātiḥ ucyate uta rajata jñānam śukti viṣayam ādye na naḥ vivādaḥ yathārtha khyāti tvāt dvitīye rajata jñāna śabdena yaḥ arthaḥ pareṇa vivakṣyate saḥ eva asmākam hetuḥ bhaviṣyati tathā hi na tāvat ādyaḥ kalpaḥ pareṇa aṅgīkartum ucitaḥ vyāghāta prasaṅgāt 
NSu_1.1.26.17^3	 śukti rajatayoḥ abheda prasaṅgāt ca na dvitīyaḥ anabhyupagamāt na tṛtīyaḥ kadācid śaktika ajñānasya api anyathā saṅketitara jata śabda smṛti hetu tva sambhavena anyathā ākhyāti prasaṅgāt na api caturthaḥ yatra śuktikā tad adhaḥ tat rajatam asti iti vākyam śrutavataḥ śukti jñānam api rajatāthiḥ pravṛtti hetuḥ bhavati iti tasya api anyathā ākhyāti ta āpātāt na api pañcamaḥ prāc ukta pakṣā bahirbhāvāt atas rajata jñānam nāma ukta pakṣeṣu kiñcid aṅgīkṛtya tad doṣaḥ vā pariharaṇīyaḥ pakṣa antaram vā utprekṣaṇīyam tattvam eva mayā hetūkariṣyate iti yat kiñcid etat 
NSu_1.1.26.17^4	 kecid punā rajata viṣayam jñānam iti eva hetu artham upagamya rajata itara aviṣaya tvam sādhyam aṅgīkṛtya sādhya aviśiṣṭa tā doṣam pariharanti tat asat rajata ghaṭau= iti jñāne vyabhicārāt anyatara asiddheḥ ca tasmāt uktaḥ eva parihāraḥ api ca jñāna tvam yathā artha mātra vṛtti jñāna mātra vṛtti tvāt pramātva vat śuktikāḥ na rajata tvena avabhāsate tad rūpeṇa asattvāt yat yad rūpeṇa asat tad tad rūpeṇa na avabhāsate yathā meruḥ sarṣapa tvena idam rajata tādātmyam na pratyetum śakyam asattvāt kūrma roma vat tasmāt akhyāti pakṣaḥ eva śreyān iti 
NSu_1.1.26.18^1	 atra ucyate yat tāvat anyathā ākhyāti lakṣaṇam nirākṛta m anya ākāra ullekhiti antena tat iṣyam eva asmākam anyat anya ātmanā viṣayīkurvat jñānam anyathā khyātiḥ iti aṅgīkārāt yathā uktam asataḥ sattva pratītiḥ sataḥ asattva pratītiḥ iti anyathā pratītiḥ eva bhrānti tvāt iti nanu anyasya ani a ātma tā satī uta asatī asatī iti brūmaḥ asataḥ na pratītiḥ iti ced na tasyāḥ upapādayiṣyamāṇa tvāt evam sati rajatasya api kutas sattvam aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti ced na kaḥ hi brūte rajatam sat iti vakṣyāmaḥ hi abhinavān yathā khyāti svarūpam upariṣṭa tvāt atra kenacid pralapitam khaṇḍaḥ gauḥ śuklaḥ paṭaḥ ityādayaḥ sarve eva sa vikalpaka pratyayāḥ vibhramāḥ prasajyeran sāmānādhikaraṇya pratyayasya tādātmya ālambana tvāt tasya ca atra abhāvāt iti tat atīva mandam tathā hi sāmānādhikaraṇya pratyayaḥ hi kayoḥ tādātmyam avalambate 
NSu_1.1.26.18^2	 kim guṇa kriyā jāti ādeḥ dravyeṇa uta guṇa ādīnām eva parasparam atha guṇa āśrayasya kriyā āśrayeṇa ityādi na ādyaḥ asaṃmateḥ na hi śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti asya śauklayam paṭaḥ iti arthaḥ abhimataḥ laukikānām na ca calati paṭaḥ iti asya calanam paṭaḥ iti arthaḥ abhimataḥ na api khaṇḍaḥ gauḥ iti etat khaṇḍa tvam go tvam ca piṇḍe eva iti anena samāna artham tathā tve daṇḍī devadattaḥ iti asya api daṇḍa devadatta tādātmya viṣaya tā āpatteḥ daṇḍī iti śābda vyavahāre bheda artha pratyaya prayogāt jñānam api tādṛśam kalpyate iti ced samam atra api śukta guṇaḥ asya asti iti asmin= arthe arśaa ādibhyaḥ ajitya kāra pratyaya vidhānāt calati ityādau tu sphuṭaḥ eva prakṛti pratyayayoḥ artha bhedaḥ na hi gauḥ iti go tvam ucyate tathā tve tu apratyaya vaiyarthyāt atas eva śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti uktvā śauklayam paṭasya iti vyākartāraḥ bhavanti 
NSu_1.1.26.19^1	 atas eva na dvitīyaḥ na hi śuklaḥ paṭaḥ calati iti asya śauklayam paṭa tvam calanam ca ekam iti arthaḥ cetasi cakāsti pratipattṛṇām tathā sati daṇḍī kuṇḍalī devadattaḥ iti asya api jñānasya daṇḍa kuṇḍala deva datta tva tādātmya viṣaya tā āpātāt tṛtīyaḥ tu syāt eva samānam ekam adhikaraṇam yeṣām te hi samāna adhikaraṇāḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam tathā ca guṇa ādīnām āśrayeṇa parasparam ca bhedaḥ āśrayāṇām ca abhedaḥ sphuṭaḥ eva na hi svayam eva svasya adhikaraṇam na api samānam adhikaraṇam yeṣām iti paraspara abhede yujyate naca āśraya bhede tasya samāna tā asti 
NSu_1.1.26.19^2	 na ca guṇa ādi āśrayasya bhede pramāṇam asti viśiṣṭayoḥ bhede api na tat guṇa ādi āśrayaḥ kintu guṇa ādi āśraya āśritam vastu antaram tat evañca yatra bhedaḥ na tad abhedena pratibhāsate yat ca abhedena pracibhāsate na tatra bhedaḥ iti kva ativyāptiḥ nanu guṇa ādīnām āśrayeṇa parasparam ca abhedaḥ bhagavataḥ muneḥ siddhāntaḥ kvacid bhedā bhedau ca sāmānādhikaraṇya pratītiḥ tu bheda niṣṭhā eva vyākhyātāḥ tathā ca punar śuklaḥ paṭe ityādi pratyayāḥ vibhramāḥ prasaktāḥ mā evam sa viśeṣa tvāṅgī ivakārāt viśadam ca etat viśeṣa nirūpaṇe vyutpādayiṣyāmaḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.20^1	 yat punar anya ākāra ullekhī ityādinā asmad abhimatāni atha ākhyāteḥ anubhava virodham pratijñāya tad upapādanāya yat sannikṛṣṭa karaṇena iti antena ālambana lakṣaṇa nirākaraṇam kṛtam tad anumatam eva asmākam yat vijñānam yat sannikṛṣṭa karaṇena janyate sa tasya viṣayaḥ iti aṅgīkārāt nanu atra api doṣaḥ abhihitaḥ iti ced na sannikarṣasya api kāraṇa tayā vivakṣita tvena tasya asambaddha tvāt na hi cakṣuḥ ādeḥ ākāśa ādi sannikarṣaḥ rūpa ādi jñāna kāraṇam na api vākyasya ākāśa ādi sannikarṣaḥ vākya artha jñāne hetuḥ na ca liṅga jñānasya ātmanā sannikarṣaḥ liṅgi jñāna nimittam kim nāma āvarjanīya sannidhayaḥ te sannikarṣāḥ liṅgasya sādhya dharmi sannikarṣaḥ liṅgi jñāna kāraṇam iti ced na liṅga jñānasya karaṇa tayā abhyupagamāt 
NSu_1.1.26.20^2	 anena eva vākyasya śrotṛ śrotra sannikarṣa āśrayaṇena dūṣaṇam parāḥ tam vākya jñānasya eva karaṇa tva aṅgīkārāt tathā api pratyabhijñāyām tat ta aṃśena cakṣuḥ ādeḥ liṅginā ca liṅga jñānasya vākya arthena vākya jñānasya sannikarṣa abhāvāt aviṣayatā āpattiḥ iti ced na asannikṛṣṭa jñāpane ati prasaṅgāt tad anubhava janita saṃskāra saha kṛta indriyeṇa pratyabhijñā jāyate tad vayā āpta liṅga viṣayeṇa ca liṅga jñānena liṅgi jñānam utpadyate saṃsarga dharmaka padārtha vāci pada samudāya rūpa vākya viṣaya jñānena vākya artha jñānam janyate atas na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti ced tarhi abhyupagataḥ sannikarṣaḥ na hi saṃyoga ādiḥ eva sannikarṣaḥ kim nāma pratyāsatti mātram 
NSu_1.1.26.21	 tathā api rūpa pratīteḥ ātmā viṣayaḥ prasajyeta tatra manasaḥ karaṇa tvāt ātma manaḥ sannikarṣasya api rūpa jñānam prati kāraṇa tvāt iti ced na asādhāraṇa kāraṇasya vivakṣita tvāt manasaḥ ca sādhāraṇa tvāt tarhi manaḥ sannikṛṣṭena cakṣuṣā jāyamānam rūpa jñānam manaḥ viṣayam āpannam iti ced na sannikarṣasya api asādhāraṇa kāraṇa tayā vivakṣita tvāt cakṣu marnaḥ sannikarṣaḥ hi dravya ādi jñāna sādhāraṇaḥ evam anye atrapa kṣudra upadravāḥ pariharaṇīyāḥ tat evam janya jñāne viṣaya tvasya anyathā vyavasthita tvāt yat jñānam yat pratibhāsam iti anyathā paribhāṣaṇam anupapannam na ca evam sati anubhava virodhaḥ rajata avabhāsasya śuktikā sannikṛṣṭa karaṇa janya tvena tad viṣaya tva upapatteḥ naca atiprasaṅgaḥ doṣa janya tva tad abhāva ādinā vyavasthā upapatteḥ anyathā rajata jñānāt arajate pravṛttau= api katham na ati prasaṅgaḥ yat punā rajata avabhāsasya ityādi āśaṅkaya samādhānam abhihitam tad jñāna ekatva samarthanena nirākariṣyāmaḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.22^1	 astu vā yat vijñānam yat pratibhāsam tat tad viṣayam iti eva vyavasthā tathā api na anubhava virodhaḥ tat kim rajata avabhāsasya śukti tva viṣaya tāyām anubhava virodham brūṣe uta īdantu ākārasya ādye sampratipattiḥ na hi vayam asmin pratyaye śukti tvam āvabhāsate iti brūmaḥ yena virodhaḥ syāt śukti tva pratibhāsasya rajata avabhāsa virodhi tva abhyupagamāt dvitīye tu na kaścid virodhaḥ virodhe vā samīcīna rajate idam rajatam iti pratītiḥ na syāt idam ākārasya rajata pratibhāsa viṣaya tām anabhyupagacchate eva pratīti virodham vakṣyāmaḥ evam sati rajatasya api jñāna viṣaya tā prasajyate iti ced satyam iṣyam eva etat na ca evam akhyāti pakṣapātaḥ jñāna aikya abhyupagamāt na apiśukti kārajate a iti jñānam vibhramaḥ prasajyate rajatasya asattva abhyupagamāt tādātmya avabhāsa abhyupagamāt ca 
NSu_1.1.26.22^2	 atas eva uktam asataḥ sattva pratītiḥ sataḥ asattva pratītiḥ iti vakṣyati ca viṣayasya kutas bādhaḥ iti asataḥ rajata tādātmyoḥ jñāna viṣaya tām ācāryaḥ nacānyathā ākhyāti janane kāraṇa abhāvaḥ indriya ādeḥ eva tad kāraṇa tvāt samīcīna jñāna kāraṇasya api tasya doṣa kaluṣitasya vibhrama hetu tva upapatteḥ na ca doṣāṇām svārasika śakti virodhitā mātram iti vācyam tathā sati viparīta śaktayana ādhāyaka tvam aṅgīkartavyam doṣāṇām eva vā ādye paśu hiṃsā kim dharma janane svārasika śaktimatī uta adharma jananaḥ iti vācyam ādye katam kratu bāhyā api dharmam na janayet dvitīye katham kratvā antargatā api dharmam janayet sahakāri vaśāt iti ced aṅgīkṛtam tarhi sahakāriṇām svārasika śakti pratibandhena viparīta śaktayā ādhāyaka tvam na dvitīyaḥ niyāmaka abhāvāt 
NSu_1.1.26.23^1	 kiñca kāca ādayaḥ api viparīta jñāna janane sahakāriṇaḥ eva aṅgīkriyante doṣa tvam tu iṣi a kārya vighātitā mātreṇa ucyate kāmukasya kāminī vibhrameṣu guṇa tva abhimānāt na ca evam bharjita akuṭaja dhānā vaṭa aṅkuram kutas na janayati iti vācyam padārtha śakti vaicitṛyāt kecid vastu antara śaktim eva pratibadhnanti yathā bharjana ādayaḥ kecid sahaja śakti pratibandhena viparītam api śaktim ādadhati yathā viṣasya māraka tva śaktim pratibaddhayā ārogya ādi śaktim ādadhānāḥ padārthāḥ guṇāḥ eva na te doṣāḥ iti ced kāca ādayaḥ api guṇāḥ eva na te doṣāḥ iti uktam eva nanu janakasya eva sākṣātkāri pratyaya viṣaya tvam dṛṣṭam na ca rajatasya īdantāt ātmyasya vāsataḥ janaka tvam asti tat katham viṣaya tvam iti mā evam tathā sati īśvara jñānasya nityasya arthaḥ viṣayaḥ na syāt pratyabhijñānasya ca tat tāṃśaḥ viṣayaḥ na bhavet tad nirūpaka tva ādi mātreṇa viṣaya tva aṅgīkāre rajata ādeḥ api jñāna nirūpaka tvena viṣaya tva upapatteḥ katham asataḥ nirūpaka tvam iti ced gurūṇām ṭīkā kurūṇām kṣetram iti vat upapatteḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.23^2	 atīta ādi viṣaya anumiti ādi vyāvartaka tvam ca prameyasya na syāt tatra vyāvartakam kadācid asti rajata ādikam kadāpi na asti iti vaiṣamyam iti ced tat kim yadā akadācid sataḥ kāraṇa tvam pūrvakṣaṇe sataḥ vā na ādyaḥ atiprasaṅgāt dvitīye tu kim anena atha na atīta ādiḥ arthaḥ sva sāmarthyena anumiti ādikam vyāvartayati yena tad sattāpekṣā syāt kintu sva hetu sāmarthyāt artha vyāvṛttam jñānam utpadyate iti ced samam prakṛte api kiñca satya sthale api na sākṣāt sākṣātkāram prati kāraṇa tvam arthasya kintu indriya sannikarṣasya eva saca yatra asatā na upapadyate tatra artha sattām apekṣate iti pāramparyeṇa eva arthasya kāraṇa tvam nanu tarhi asatā rajata ādinā sannikarṣa ayogāt katham indriyeṇa tat jñāna janma iti ced na śuktikā āsannikṛṣṭam duṣyam indriyam tām eva atyanta asat rajata ātmanā avagāhamānam jñānam janayati iti aṅgīkārāt atas eva na asat khyāti prasaṅgaḥ yāvat khalu vigīte pratyaye bhāsate tasya sarvasya asattve asat khyātiḥ syāt na ca evam iti uktam 
NSu_1.1.26.24^1	 yat ca uktam viṣaya vyabhicāre jñānasya savartrān āśvāsaḥ iti tat autsargikam jñānānām prāmāṇyam apavādāt viparyayaḥ iti vadatā acāryeṇa eva parihariṣyate sākṣī khalu caitanya rūpaḥ niyata yāthārthyaḥ kadācid api saṃśayān āskanditaḥ antaḥkaraṇa vṛttīnām yāthārthyam svayam eva gṛhṇāti parīkṣā sahakṛtaḥ tvayā athārthyam iti bādarāyaṇīyam matam atas eva anāśvāsa nirasana upāyaḥ na jñāneṣu kaścid viśeṣaḥ asti iti nirastam anyathā parasya api katham viṣaya vyabhicāre vyavahṛteḥ vyavahāra antare samāśvāsaḥ syāt 
NSu_1.1.26.24^2	 tad abhāve ca katham vyavahāra darśanena anvitā arthe vyutpattiḥ kvacid viveka agrahe ca katham anyatra viśiṣṭa pratyaye viśvāsaḥ bhavet tad abhāve ca katham niḥśaṅkā pravṛttiḥ bādhaka abhāva ādinā samāśvāsaḥ tu paroktarītyā eva nirastaḥ kiñca pravṛtti uttara kālīnaḥ bādhaka abhāvaḥ katham niḥśaṅka pravṛttau= upayujyate bādhaka abhāva ādinā viśiṣṭa jñāna svarūpa niścayam aṅgīkurvāṇaḥ katham sva prakāśa vijñāna vādam na jahyāt autsargikī pravṛttiḥ apavādāt nivṛttiḥ iti ced samam prakṛte api yat api uktam viparīta khyāti pakṣe jñānam sa ākāram āpatet iti 
NSu_1.1.26.24^3	 tad anupapannam atyantā asataḥ eva ākārasya sphuraṇa aṅgīkārāt anyathā vyavahriyamāṇasya ākārasya bahis abhāvā dvayavahāraḥ api tad ākāraḥ prasajyeta yā ca evam prakriyā rajatam idam ityādinā uktā sā jñāna dvi tve rajata jñānasya ca smṛti tve pramāṇa abhāvāt anupapannāḥ viśiṣṭa jñāna bādhakānām parihṛta tvāt anumānānām ca dūṣṭa tvāt yaḥ tu rajata jñānasya smṛti tve pariśeṣa upanyāsaḥ saḥ api pratyutpanna karaṇa duṣya indriya ādi janya tā upa pādanāt pariśeṣa anupapatteḥ ayuktaḥ anākalita rajatasya anutpadyamāna tvam gagana ādau= anaikāntikam rajata jñānavataḥ eva utpadyamāna tvam vivakṣitam iti ced na tathā api rajata saṃskāra vyavahāra ādau vyabhicārāt jñāna tve satīti viśeṣaṇāt adoṣaḥ iti ced na rajata nirvikalpaka jñānavataḥ eva utpadyamāne rajata sa vikalpaka anubhave vyabhicāra tādavasthyāt rajata sa vikalpaka jñānavataḥ eva utpadyamāna tvam vivakṣitam iti ced na hāna ādi buddhiṣu anaikāntika tā niḥ tārāt saṃskāra mātra saha kṛta manaḥ janya tva upādhi grastam ca anumānam nacānena eva hetunā asya pakṣe sādhanam vyabhicārasya ukta tvāt 
NSu_1.1.26.25^1	 kiñca idam smaraṇa tvam sādhyam na tāvat sāmānyam guṇeṣu prābhākaraiḥ abhyupagatam ananubhava tvam iti ced tat api kim anubhavāt anya tvam anubhava tvānadhikaraṇa tvam vā ādye anubhavasya api tad sambhavena siddha sādhana tā syāt dvitīye anubhava tvam kim iti vācyam smṛti anyatvam iti ced na smṛtau= api prasaṅgāt itaretara āśraya prasakteḥ ca jñāna saṃskāra mātra prabhava tvam smṛti tvam iti ced na mānasa pratyakṣa jā smṛtiḥ iti asmābhiḥ aṅgīkṛta tvena pakṣasya aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvāt dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vaikalyāt ca kiñca indriya vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi idam rajata jñānam tat kāyarmiti avasīyate tathā ca bādhita viṣaya tvam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ anyatra upayogāt na evam iti ced tat kim asya smṛti tve siddhe anyatra upakṣayaḥ kalpyate uta evam eva na ādyaḥ tad abhāvāt asmāt eva anumānāt tad siddhau= anyonya āśraya prasaṅgāt na dvitīyaḥ samīcīna rajata pratyaye api tathā tva prasaṅgāt 
NSu_1.1.26.25^2	 anyatra upakṣayaḥ śaṅkitaḥ iti ced na tathā api sandigdha kāla atīta tā nistārāt samīcīna rajata anubhave api katham anyatra anupakṣayaḥ niścitaḥ bhavatā anubhava tu a niścayāt iti ced naḥ indriya vyāpārasya anyatra upayoga śaṅkayā anubhava tvasya api sandigdha tvāt puras varti vyavahāra saṃvādāt anubhava tva niścayaḥ iti ced na saṃvāda anubhavasya api aniścita tvāt asati bādhake na vṛthā anyatra upakṣayaḥ śaṅkayate iti ced samam prakṛte api iti etena apratyutpanna kāraṇa prabhava tvam smṛti tvam iti api ced na dvitīya ādi bhrame siddha sādhana tvāt sādhya viśiṣṭa tā prasaṅgāt ca tat ta aṃśa ullekhitvam smṛti tvam iti ced na anubhava bādhita tvāt etena jñāna sambhinna artha gocara tvam iti api parāḥ tam anena eva pratipakṣa anumāna dvayam api samāhitam veditavyam na idam smṛtiḥ iti vyavahartavyam tad tollekhā ādi smṛti cinha vikala tvāt iti prathama prayoge vivakṣita tvāt atas eva tikta guḍa ādi pratyaya prakriyā api parāḥ tā 
NSu_1.1.26.26^1	 yat api viparyaya abhyupagame kalpanā gauravam uktam tat viveka agraha mātreṇa pravṛtti ādeḥ upapattau tathā astu na ca evam iti vakṣyāmaḥ kiñca evam antya tantu saṃyoga paryantam kāraṇa kalāpam upādāya paṭaḥ api na aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ tanmātreṇa sarvasya upapatteḥ paṭaḥ api pramitaḥ na hātum śakyate na ca tena vinā eka tva ādi pratyaya upapattiḥ iti ced viparyaye api evam iti kutas gauravam anyathā ākhyātau kim pramāṇam iti ced anubhavaḥ eva iti brūmaḥ yathā hi purovartini rajate rajatam idam iti viśiṣṭa viṣayam ekam eva vijñānam sva prakāśa tayā vā mānasa pratyakṣa tayā vā sākṣiṇāḥ vā avabhāsate tathā idam api iti kutas asya na viśiṣṭa viṣaya eka jñāna tvam 
NSu_1.1.26.26^2	 na hi tatas asya mātrayā api viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ darśane vā asmad pravṛttiḥ na syāt kevalam ekam tādṛś viṣaya sadbhāvāt yathārtham tad abhāva aparama yathārtham aviśiṣṭa viṣayam anekam api tad viśiṣṭa viṣaya eka tvena pratibhāsate iti ced na anyasya api viśiṣṭa viṣaya eka tve samāśvāsa asambhava prasaṅgāt viparyaya aṅgīkāra prasakteḥ ca na asti eva viśiṣṭa viṣaya eka tva grāhi pratyayaḥ iti ced na anubhava siddha jñāna apalāpe smṛti anubhava svarūpa apalāpa prasaṅgāt kiñca rajata arthinaḥ śuktikāyām pravṛttiḥ anyathā anupapannānyathā jñānam ākṣipati 
NSu_1.1.26.26^3	 nanu iyam pravṛttiḥ svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ ca agṛhīta bhedāt vedana dvayāt upapadyate iti ced kaḥ ayam bhedaḥ nāma kim svarūpam uta pṛthaktavam uta anyonya abhāvaḥ athavā vaidharmyam na prathamaḥ sva prakāśa jñāna jñeya pratibhāse tad anavabhāsā anupapatteḥ na dvitīyaḥ guṇe guṇa anabhyupagamāt sarvatra bheda āgraha sambhavena anya arthinaḥ anyatra pravṛtti prasaṅgāt tṛtīye vaktavyam kim idam rajata tvayoḥ anyonya abhāvaḥ na avabhāsate uta idam rajatayoḥ iti na ādyaḥ aparyāya śabda smārakayoḥ jāti vyaktayoḥ tad anavabhāsā sambhavāt 
NSu_1.1.26.26^4	 kiñca anyonya abhāvaḥ nāma anyonya svarūpam eva parasya tat ca upalabdham iti katham tad anupalambhaḥ atas eva na dvitīyaḥ na api caturthaḥ rajata asambhavinaḥ puras vartinī dantu asya puras varti asambhavinaḥ ca rajate rajata tvasya gṛhīta tvāt idam rajata tvayoḥ asaṃsarga āgrahaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti ced na asaṃsargaḥ hi saṃsargasya abhāvaḥ sa ca id aṃrajata tvayoḥ svarūpam eva pareṣām iti katham tad avabhāse na avabhāseta viparyaya abhyupagamava ādibhiḥ api bheda āgrahaḥ abhyupagamanīyaḥ eva tatra api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na bhedasya svarūpa tāvat mātra tva anabhyupagamāt 
NSu_1.1.26.27^1	 atha manyase purovatiḥ naḥ yaḥ śukti tva ādi dharmaḥ rajata vyāvartakaḥ yaḥ ca rajate vyavahita deśa tva ādi dharmaḥ purovarti vyāvartakaḥ tayoḥ agrahaṇam pravartakam iti tat asat puras vartinaḥ hi śuktitva agrahe na śuktikā arthī tatra pravarteta rajatasya ca asat nihita tva ādi dharma agrahe rajata arthī na tatra pravartatām rajata arthinaḥ purovatiḥ ni pravṛttiḥ tu kutas kiñca bheda agra hādanya arthinaḥ anyatra pravṛttim ācakṣāṇaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ kim ayam eva vyavahāraḥ bheda āgrahāt anyaḥ tu abheda grahāt uta sarvaḥ api bheda agrahāt iti na ādyaḥ aniyata kāraṇa tā āpātāt nanu ca sarvatra abheda grahaḥ eva pravartakaḥ tad sārūpyāt bheda āgrahaḥ api tathā iṣyate yathā hi asti tāvat pravartaka tva abhimata pratyaye api apekṣita upāya puras vṛtti avagama aṃśayoḥ svarūpataḥ viṣayataḥ ca bheda virahāt eva bheda āgrahaḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.27^2	 tathā atra api avivecakam sādhāraṇam rūpam avagamyate na avagamyate ca vivecakaḥ asādhāraṇa dharmaḥ vedyayoḥ vedanayoḥ ca tatas ca eka pravartaka pratyaya sadṛśa vapuḥ upajanayati idam vedana dvayam pravṛttim iti mā evam aniyata hetuka tvā nistārāt kiñca pravartaka sādṛśyāt pravṛttiḥ iti atra eva kalpyate uta yat yat sadṛśam tat tad kārya kārī iti sarvatra niyamaḥ na ādyaḥ adṛṣṭa kalpanā prasaṅgāt pravṛtti lobhāt ittham āsthīyate iti ced na tasyāḥ viparyaya aṅgīkārāt eva su vyavasthiteḥ na dvitīyaḥ kṛśa anu sadṛśāt guñjā puñjat śīta nivṛtteḥ adarśanāt nanu idam rajatam iti yathā rajata sādhyā buddhiḥ rajata sadṛśāt śukti śakalāt bhavati bhavatām tathā pravartaka eka jñāna sadṛśāt jñāna dvayāt pravṛttiḥ api kutas na syāt 
NSu_1.1.26.27^3	 mā evam arthasya sākṣāt jñāna kāraṇa tva anabhyupagamāt sādṛśyam tu kāca ādi vat doṣatayā upayujyate api ca idam jñāna dvayam pravartaka sādṛśya mātrāt yadi pravṛttim upajanayet nivṛttim api kutā ena janayet asti hi tatra nivartaka bheda graha sārūpyam abheda agrahaṇam nanu ca yathā bheda āgrahaḥ bhavatām abheda graham janayati tathā pravṛttim api kim na janayet iti mā evam vaiṣamyāt jñāna janane hi kāraṇānām svātantṛyam na puruṣasya tāni ca yādṛśa sāmagrī madhya patitāni tādṛśam jñānam upajanayanti na tu puruṣa ākāṅkṣām apekṣante heya upekṣaṇīya jñāna jananāt pravṛttau tu puruṣaḥ eva svatantraḥ na jñānam sa hi sati api jñāne apekṣitaḥ eva pravartate na tu jñānam jātam iti eva uda āsīna viparītayoḥ api 
NSu_1.1.26.27^4	 tathā ca bheda āgraha doṣa kaluṣitāni nayana ādīni viparyayam janayanti na tu puruṣaḥ pravartaka sādṛśya mātreṇa pravartitum arhati tathā tve vā nivartaka sādṛśyāt prekṣāvān nivarteta api iti uktam kiñca jñānam arthe pravṛttim kim sākṣāt upajanayati uta icchā prayatna dvāreṇa na ādyaḥ heya upekṣaṇīyayoḥ api pravṛtti prasaṅgāt dvitīye katham agṛhīta bhedāt jñāna dvayāt pravṛttiḥ puras varti pravṛtteḥ hi sākṣāt kāraṇam prayatnaḥ tasya ca icchā tasyāḥ ca samīhita sādhana tā anumānam na ca tad sambhavati rajata tvasya pakṣa dharma tayā apratipanna tvāt atha rajate pratipannena rajata tvena tad samīhita sādhana tā jñānam upajātam bheda āgrahasā rūpyāt purovartini icchām upajanayati iti ced na tathā sati bheda graha sārūpyāt abheda agrahāt upekṣayā api āpātāt iti 
NSu_1.1.26.28^1	 nanu astu tarhi dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ tathā hi satya rajate tāvat asti rajata vyakti jñānam rajata tva jāti bodhaḥ ca na ca asti asaṃsarga jñānam etāvatā eva tatra tad arthinām pravṛttiḥ na hi tayoḥ tādātmyam paśyanti jāti vyakta yosda tādātmya abhāvāt na ca tatra saṃsarga grahaḥ pravartakaḥ samavāyaḥ hi tayoḥ saṃsargaḥ na ca asau pratyakṣaḥ indriya sannikarṣa abhāvāt na api anumānaḥ tadā śakyate jñātum liṅga abhāvāt avisaṃvādi vyavahāra janaka tva viśiṣṭa sāka aṃkṣa rūpa rūpi saha upalambhaḥ hi tad liṅgam na ca avisaṃvādi tvam prāk pravṛtteḥ śakya adhigamam asti ca idam sakalam api pravartakam vibhrame api iti kutas viparyaya abhāve pravṛtti anupapattiḥ idam rajata tva ādhārayoḥ bheda grahaḥ vā satya rajate pravṛtti hetuḥ asti ca asau prakṛte api na ca purovartini rajatatva apratītau= icchā anupapattiḥ iti vācyam rajata tvena saha agṛhīta asaṃsarga tayā vā rajatāt agṛhīta bhedatayā vā samīhita sādhana tā anumāna upapatteḥ iti etat api ayuktam 
NSu_1.1.26.28^2	 asaṃsarga āgraha bheda āgrahayoḥ nirasta tvāt kiñca evam sati sa vikalpaka pratyakṣa uccheda prasaṅgaḥ vastu mātra grahasya asaṃsarga āgrahasya ca nirvikalpaka sāmyāt rūpa rūpi bhāvaḥ sa vikalpake cakāsti nirvikalpake tu vastu svarūpa mātram iti bhedaḥ iti ced kaḥ ayam rūpa rūpi bhāvaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ paraspara ākāṅkṣā viṣaya tvam iti ced tat kim tayoḥ svarūpa muta anyat ādye tat api nirvikalpake prakāśataḥ eva dvitīye kim tad ā aindriyaka mutā atīndriyam prathame katham avikalpake na prakāśeta dvitīye katham sa vikalpake prakāśeta atas tad vastu darśana sāpekṣa daśarnam nirvikalpake acakāsat api sa vikalpake bhāti iti ced tarhi na tat sarṃga atiriktam asti iti saṃsarga grahāt eva sa vikalpa kopa pattiḥ na ca nirvikalpakasya pravartaka tvam asti kiñca asaṃsarga agrahāt eva sarvatra pravṛtti aṅgīkāre madhyama vṛddha pravṛtteḥ api tathātvena bālasya tadīya saṃsarga jñāna anumāna upāya abhāvāt padānām anvita artheṣu vyutpatti anupapattau śābda pramāṇa uccheda prasaṅgaḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.29^1	 atha evam manyeta asti eva vyavahartuḥ anvaya jñānam kim nāma sat api na pravṛttau= upayujyate atas na kaścid doṣaḥ iti tatra kim tad anvaya jñānam pravṛttau niyata muta aniyatam iti vācyam ādye astu tad pravṛttau= upayogi mā vā bhūt anyathā ākhyātim vinā na rajata arthinaḥ purovartini pravṛttiḥ iti tāvat siddham dvitīye tu śabda ucchedaḥ tad avasthaḥ kiñca niyata pūrva bhāvi ca akāraṇam ca iti anupapannam pratibhā samānayoḥ asaṃsarga agrahe sati saṃsarga grahaḥ avarjanīya sannidhiḥ iti ced na viparyayasya api vaktum śakya tvāt avaśyam ca etat evam 
NSu_1.1.26.29^2	 vyavahāraḥ hi vyavahartavya upalambha nibandhanaḥ yuktaḥ na tu vyavaharaṇīya viparyaya anupalabdhi nibandhanaḥ na hi ghaṭa vyavahāraḥ vyavahartavya jñāna puraḥsaraḥ vyavahāra tvāt ghaṭa vyavahāra vat vivāda padam jñānam purovarti viṣayam tat viṣaya vyavahāra janaka tvāt saṃmata vat puras varti vā rajata jñāna gocaraḥ rajata jñāna gocaraḥ rajata anupāya tve sati tad arthi pravṛtti viṣaya tvāt samyak rajata vat vivāda padam rajata jñānam idam jñānāt na bhidyate prakāśamānāt tatas a prakāśa māna bheda tve sati prakāśamāna tvāt sampratipanna rajata jñāna vat ityādayaḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.29^3	 kiñca viparyaya abhāve na idam rajatam iti jñānasya bādhaka tvam anupapadyamānam tam gamayati na hi tathā tve bādhaka tvam asti na tāvat agrahaṇa nivartaka tayā bādhaka tvam sarva pratyayānām tathā tva āpātāt na api vyavahāra vicchedaka tvena atad arthinām vyavahāra anutpattau na idam rajata miti jñānasya ābādhaka tva prasaṅgāt vyāghra cora ādi jñānasya api pravṛtti vicchedaka tvena bādhaka tva prasakteḥ ca naca arthasya vyavahāra yogya tā vicchedaka tvena samaya antare api tatra vibhramāt pravṛtti abhāva āpatteḥ na ca vyavahāra pratibandhaka tvena aviveka nivṛttau kāraṇa abhāvāt eva vyavahāra anupapatteḥ pratibandhaka kalpanā yogāt vyāghra cora ādi jñānasya bādhaka tā āpatteḥ ca vimatam ayathārtham bādhya tva advayavahāra vat iti atas eva bhrānti tva prasiddhayā api viparyāsa siddhiḥ evaṃca sati pratyayatva anumānam kāla atyaya apadiṣyam veditavyam aduṣya karaṇa janya tva upādhi grastam ca etena rajata jñāna tva anumānam api nirastam anyathā vimataḥ vyavahāraḥ yathārthaḥ vyavahāra tvāt rajata viṣayaḥ vā rajata vyavahāra tvāt iti api syāt 
NSu_1.1.26.30^1	 yat api jñāna tvam ca yathā artha mātra vṛtti ityādi tatra kim idam jñāna tvam sāmānyam vā pratiniyatam vā na ādyaḥ vādi prativādinoḥ āśraya asiddheḥ dvitīye yathā artha jñāna vṛtti jñāna tve siddha sādhana tā vimata jñāna vṛtti jñāna tva pakṣīkāre api mātrā iti vyartham syāt tad tyāgena ca pratijñāne prathama anumāna doṣaḥ eva kiñca yathā athaḥ mātra vṛtti iti ayathā arthāvṛtti tva mātram vivakṣitam uta ayatha atharjñāna āvṛtti tvam ādye siddha sādhanam ayathārtha vyavahāra āvṛtti tvasya siddha tvāt dvitīye parasya aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā aduṣṭa sāmagrī janya mātra vṛtti tvam apādhiḥ ca 
NSu_1.1.26.30^2	 yat ca śuktikā rajata tvena ābhāsate ityādi tat api asat meruḥ sarṣapaḥ iti ādivāyāt meroḥ api sarṣapa tvena pratibhāsāt dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vaikalyāt anyathā tathāvidha vākya ābhāsam śrutavatā tad pratiṣedhaḥ na kriyeta aprasakta tvāt na hi padārtha pratiṣedhaḥ yuktaḥ api ca evam sati agniḥ anuguṇaḥ iti bādhita viṣayasya vākyasya ghaṭaḥ pacati iti apārthakāt bhedaḥ na syāt yat api idam rajata tādātmyam ityādi tat ca ayuktam tad apratītau= āśraya asiddheḥ pratītau vyāghātāt dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya sama tvāt ca iti āḥ tām vistaraḥ 
NSu_1.1.26.31–1.1.26.33	 kaścid punar evam āha tāsām trivṛtam trivṛtam ekaikām akarot iti ādi śruteḥ sametya anyonya saṃyogam iti ādi purāṇāt tri ātmaka tva ādi sūtrāt ca anyathā śvetaketu uddālaka ākhyāyikayā pratipādita tvāt advaitam api na śruti abhiprāyaḥ syāt tat ha etat paśyan ṛṣiḥ vāmadevaḥ pratipedeham brahmā asmi a iti api para upāsana anuvādaḥ na sva arthe tātparyavān syāt atha yaḥ anyām devatām upāste a itayupāsana aprakaraṇa tvāt tathā ca bahu viplavaḥ syāt tasmāt sūtra kārasya eva ayam abhiprāyaḥ yat jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam brahmaṇaḥ svarūpa antargatam eva lakṣaṇam iti tathā ca vispaṣṭa tadīya vākya antara balāt asya api sūtrasya svarūpa lakṣaṇa paratvam eva iti yatas evam jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam sva lakṣaṇam atra sūtre brahmaṇaḥ abhidhīyate tatas na para mate asya sūtrasya ārambhaḥ eva upapadyate iti āha atas iti 
NSu_1.1.99ab.1–1.1.99ab.3	 atas jīva aikyam api sa nirācakre jagadguruḥ lakṣaṇam hi sajātīya vijātīya vyavaccheda artham bhavati yathā ahasamāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchedaḥ vā lakṣaṇa arthaḥ a iti tathā cānena lakṣaṇena sajātīyāt jīvāt vijātīyāt jaḍāt ca brahma vyāvartitam sūtrakāreṇa jīva aikya nirākaraṇa sūtrasya ārambhaḥ katham jīva aikya vādinām syāt syāt yadi idam kathañcid taṭastha lakṣaṇam syāt svarūpa lakṣaṇam iti ca upapāditam syāt ayam advaitinām anupapannaḥ lakṣaṇa ārambhaḥ yadi idam jīva vyāvṛtti artham lakṣaṇam uktam syāt jaḍa mātra vyāvṛtti artham tu lakṣaṇe vyākhyāyamāne katham jīva aikya vādinām lakṣaṇa sūtra ārambhaḥ anupapannaḥ iti atas āha na hi iti 
NSu_1.1.99cd.1–1.1.99cd.3	 na hi janma ādi hetu tvam jīvasya jagataḥ bhavet yatra hi lakṣaṇam na asti tat sarvam tad vaya āvartyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam anyathā lakṣaṇasya avyāpti prasaṅgāt naca idam lakṣaṇam jīvasya asti tat katham asau= anena na vyāvartyate iti kiñca anena lakṣaṇena yadi jīvaḥ na vyāvartyate kintu saḥ api lakṣya antargataḥ tathā sati lakṣaṇasya jīve ati vyāptim āśaṅkayā itara vyapadeśāt hitākaraṇa ādi doṣa prasaktiḥ iti sūtrakārī iyam tad nirākaraṇam asaṅgatam syāt na hi lakṣyaḥ eva ati vyāptiḥ lakṣaṇasya kena api śaṅkayate kathañcid śaṅkāyām vā tasya api lakṣya tva aṅgīkāram parityajya tatra na lakṣaṇa nirākaraṇam kriyate iti āśavān āha hitā akriyā iti 
NSu_1.1.100ab.1–1.1.100ab.3	 hita akriyā ādi doṣam ca vakṣyati eva svayam prabhuḥ yadi api pareṇa api jīvasya lakṣaṇa vyāvartya tvam aṅgīkṛtam eva yathā ahasarvajñam sarva śaktim vihāya ani atas para parikalpitāt pradhāna ādeḥ acetanāt cetanāt api paricchinna jñāna kriyā śakteḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ hiraṇyagarbhāt utpatti ādi na sambhāvayitum api śakyate a iti tathā api nyāyena upapādayitum idam uktam iti itas api māyā vādinām na brahma lakṣaṇa sūtra ārambhaḥ sambhavati iti āha nirguṇa tvam ca iti 
NSu_1.1.100cd.1–1.1.100cd.3	 nirguṇa tvam ca tena eva niṣiddham prabhuṇā svayam lakṣaṇa vākyam hi sākṣāt lakṣyasi a asādhāraṇa dharma saṃsargam pratipādayat arthāditara vyāvṛttim pratipādayati tatas anena api lakṣaṇa avākyena brahmaṇaḥ jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvena tad avinābhūtaiḥ sarvajña tva ādibhiḥ ca saṃsargaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ tathā ca nirviśeṣa tvam brahmaṇaḥ anena sūtreṇa niṣiddham nirviśeṣa tva vādinām ca nirviśeṣa tvam niṣedhataḥ sūtrasya ārambhaḥ katham upapadyate iti syāt iyam jīva brahmaṇoḥ eka tvam brahmaṇaḥ ca nirguṇa tvam aṅgīkurvatām lakṣaṇa sūtra ārambha anupapattiḥ yadi anena sūtreṇa jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam brahmaṇaḥ sva lakṣaṇam ucyate na ca evam kintu taṭastham eva na hi tathāvidham jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam jīva brahmaṇoḥ ekatvam vā brahmaṇaḥ nirguṇa tvam vā viruṇaddhi 
NSu_1.1.100cd.4^1	 nanu sva lakṣaṇa tve pramāṇam uktam mā evam svasya lakṣaṇāni sva lakṣaṇāni iti vā su samyak svarūpa antargatyā na lakṣaṇāni iti vā tad artha upapatteḥ tarhi yatas asya janma ādi sā māyā tad āśrayaḥ brahma iti nirdeśaḥ syāt na tu janma ādyasya yatas tat brahma iti mā evam yatra ghoṣaḥ sā gaṅgā iti vat lakṣaṇayā prayoga upapatteḥ nanu taṭa sthena api jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvena brahmaṇaḥ jīva aikyam nirguṇa tvam ca viruddhayate kāka nilayana tvam hi pareṇa taṭa stham lakṣaṇam udāhṛtam tasya lakṣya antarbhāve kāka adhikaraṇa tvam api gṛha śabda arthaḥ syāt tatas ca kāka vigame gṛha eka deśa bhaṅga buddhiḥ syāt iti tatra kāka adhikaraṇa tvam tad anadhikaraṇebhyaḥ gṛham vyāvartayati na vā 
NSu_1.1.100cd.4^2	 na iti pakṣe anubhava virodhaḥ tad abhidhāna vaiyarthyam ca ādye brahma lakṣaṇam api katham na jīva vyāvṛttim karoti katham ca tad sambandhena sa guṇam na bhavati iti mā evam yaḥ hi kārya kāraṇa saṅghātāt aviviktam kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tva doṣa saṃsargiṇam ātmānam matvā kliśyati sa jīvaḥ vyāvartyate eva tena lakṣaṇena tatra yaḥ caitanya dhātuḥ sa brahmaṇaḥ na bhidyate iti abhyupagame virodha abhāvāt na ca satyasya prapañcasya kāraṇa bhūtāyāḥ satyāyāḥ māyāyāḥ āśrayaḥ brahma iti sūtra arthaḥ yena brahmaṇaḥ sa viśeṣa tvam syāt kintu yad avaṣṭambhaḥ viśvaḥ vivartaḥ prapañcaḥ tat brahma iti sūtra arthaḥ sati ca evam sūtra arthe katham jīva brahmaṇoḥ eka tvam brahmaṇaḥ nirguṇa tvam ca viruddhayate iti 
NSu_1.1.100cd.5–1.1.100cd.6	 atra ucyate āstām tāvat prapañcasya vivartatā adivārtā pramāṇa abhāvāt prakṛti adhikaraṇe nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt ca taṭa sthena jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvena atra sūtre lakṣaṇayā brahma pratipādyate iti kutas aṅgīkaraṇīyam mukhya artha asambhave hi lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇam dṛṣṭam na tāvat brahmaṇaḥ jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvasya bādhakam pratyakṣam tat agocara tvāt na api anumānam śruti bādhita tvāt na api āgamaḥ tasya akliṣya kāri tva ādi artha tayā sa avakāśa tvāt nanu artha āpattyā idam avasīyate jīva brahmaṇoḥ ekatvam tāvat āvaśyakam na ca jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvasya sva lakṣaṇa tve tad sambhavati atas anyathā anupapattyā māyā gatam eva idam lakṣaṇam janma ādyasya yatas tat brahma iti lakṣaṇayā ucyate iti kalpyate iti tatra āha bhedena eva iti 
NSu_1.1.101ab.1–1.1.101ab.3	 bhedena eva tu mukhya artha sambhave lakṣaṇā kutas yadi jīva brahmaṇoḥ eka tva parirakṣaṇāya yathāśrutam sūtra artham parityajya lakṣaṇa āśrīyate tarhi jīva brahmaṇoḥ bhedena eva aṅgīkṛtena sūtrasya mukhya artha sambhave lakṣaṇā kasmāt āśrayaṇīyāḥ nanu abhedam upādāya sūtre lakṣaṇā vā aśrayaṇīyā bhedam upādāya makhya vṛttiḥ vā iti sandihyate vayam tu brūmaḥ dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ eva śreyān iti aprāmāṇika parirakṣaṇāya vākyānām jaghanya vṛttiḥ āśrīyamāṇā kvacid api dṛṣṭā iti tat idam uktam bhedena eva iti 
NSu_1.1.101ab.4	 nanu katham jīva brahma aikyam aprāmāṇikam tat tvam asi iti ādi śruti siddham iti ced na upapatti parāhata tvāt tathā hi tad śabdenā mukhya arthaḥ yaḥ sat eva somya a ityādinā prakṛtaḥ prekṣā pūrvam tejaḥ abanna ādīnām sraṣṭā sarvāsām prajānām mūlam āyatanam pratiṣṭhā ca sakala avadya gandha vidhuraḥ aparicchinna guṇa ākaraḥ paramātmā yaḥ ca tvaṃpada mukhya arthaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ alpa śaktiḥ para adhīnaḥ doṣa kaluṣitaḥ avacchinna jñāna ādi guṇaḥ tau= upādāya anena vākyena aikyam ucyate uta viruddha bhāga tyāgena lakṣaṇayā vā na ādyaḥ paraspara virodhena yogyatā virahe jarat gava ādi vākya vat ābhāsa tva prasaṅgāt dvitīye doṣam āha bhedana eva iti 
NSu_1.1.101ab.5–1.1.101ab.7	 siṃhaḥ devadattaḥ ityādi vat sāmāna adhikaraṇya mātram gauṇam upādāya jīva brahmaṇoḥ bhedena eva aṅgīkṛtena pada dvayasya mukhya artha sambhave jahat ajahat lakṣaṇā kutas āśrayaṇīyā iti nanu kim sāmānādhikaraṇyam mukhyam upādāya tat tvaṃpadayoḥ lākṣaṇika tvam vyākhyeyam kiṃvā sāmānādhikaraṇyam gauṇam gṛhītvā tattvaṃpadayoḥ mukhyā artha tā vyākhyātavyā iti sandehe na vinigamanāyām hetuḥ asti na na asti tyajet ekam kulasya arthaḥ iti nyāyasya vidyamāna tvāt tātparya liṅgānām tatra tatra bhedaḥ eva anuguṇyasya vyutpādita tvāt tat idam uktam bhedena eva iti kiñca virodhi ākāra parityāgena sva rūpa mātra lakṣaṇayā tat tvam asi a iti vākyam jīva brahmaṇoḥ ekatvam pratipādayati iti atra virodhi ākāra parityāgaḥ nāma na tāvat avivakṣā mātram iti uktam prāk atha saḥ ayam devadattaḥ ityādi vat virodhi ākārasya anitya tvam tatra āha katham iti 
NSu_1.1.101cd.1–1.1.101cd.3	 katham nitya guṇasya asya syāt aikyam guṇa hānataḥ nitya guṇa tvam ca īśvarasya liṅgapāde sādhayiṣyate asya īśvarasya iti upalakṣaṇam jīve api pāratantrī ādi doṣāṇām nitya tvāt yathā uktam purāṇealpa śaktiḥ asārvajñam a iti nanu ca virodhi ākāra parityāgena jīvasya brahma aikyam iti asya arthaḥ na virodhi ākāra avivakṣā mātreṇa iti na api anitya tvena iti kintu nirguṇena brahmaṇā jīvasya aikyam iti eva iti ced na nirguṇasya eva nirūpayitum aśakyatvāt tathā hi tat nirguṇam kim sa guṇāt īśvarāt bhinna muta abhinnam dvitīye tasya api sa guṇa tva prasaṅgena nirguṇa tva vyāghātaḥ ādye doṣam āha sadā eva iti 
NSu_1.1.102ab.1–1.1.102ab.3	 sadā eva guṇavat tve asya bhinnam syāt nirguṇam sadā yadi nirguṇam sa guṇāt atyanta bhinnam tarhi asya sa guṇasya nityam sa guṇa tvāt tasmāt nityam eva nirguṇam bhinnam prasajyeta tathā ca na kadācid api kaivalyam syāt iti nanu svabhāvataḥ nirguṇam eva īropitaiḥ mithyā guṇaiḥ sa guṇam iti bālaiḥ abhilapyate āropita nīlimnā gaganam iva nīlatvena āropapravāhasya ca anādi nitya tayā sadā sa guṇa tvam ca na aniṣyam tathā ca mithyā bhūta virodhya ākāra parityāgena aikya upadeśaḥ api na anupapannaḥ nīrūpam gaganam iti yathā yathā vā yat idam rajatam sā śuktiḥ iti evam pareṇa sva abhisandhau= udghāṭite satyāha na ca iti 
NSu_1.1.102cd.1–1.1.102cd.3	 na ca mithyā guṇa tvam syāt anirvācyasya dūṣaṇāt mithyā iti asat ucyate anirvacanīyam vā na ādyaḥ anaṅgīkārāt na dvitīyaḥ anirvācyasya prathama sūtraḥ eva nirākṛta tvāt atas guṇa rāhityalakṣaṇam nirguṇa tvam na sarvathā śakya nirūpaṇam nanu guṇa ādi pañcakasya nirguṇa tvam padārtha vidaḥ manyante manyantām na hi idānīm nirguṇa vastu nirākaraṇam prastutam kim nāmāt vaidinā nirguṇam brahma nirūpayitum aśakyam iti guṇa śabdena atra dharma mātram prakṛtam tad guṇa ādiṣu api sarva saṃmatam guṇa ādīnām ca sa guṇa tvam paramāṇu ārambha nirāse vakṣyate 
NSu_1.1.102cd.4–1.1.102cd.5	 nanu sākṣī cetā kevalaḥ nirguṇaḥ ca a iti nirguṇam brahma śrūyate mā evam ukta anupapatti parāhata tvena artha antara paratvāt anyathā sākṣi tva ādīnām api dharma tva advayāghātaḥ ca sākṣāt draṣṭā hi sākṣī yathā aha pāṇiniḥ sākṣāt draṣṭari saṃjñāyām iti evam dharmarāhityalakṣaṇam nirguṇa tvam nirākṛtam api āgraha mātreṇa yaḥ aṅgīkaroti tam prati sa ulluṇṭham āha nirguṇa tvam iti 
NSu_1.1.103ab.1–1.1.103ab.3	 nirguṇa tvam tadā ca syāt āsura tvam na ca anyathā tadā ca yuktayā nirguṇa tve nirākṛte api yadi nirguṇa tvam parasmai rucim syāt tarhi guṇa śabda udita sakala śubha rāhitya lakṣaṇam āsura tvam eva syāt anyathā nirūpayitum aśakyatvasya ukta tvāt tena aikyam ca māyā vādinām anumanyāmahe iti etena brahmaṇaḥ nirguṇa tvāt asya lakṣaṇasya yat taṭa stha tvam uktam na hi nānāvidha kārya kriyā veśa ātma tvam tad prasava śakta yatmakam vā jijñāsya viśuddha brahma antargatam bhavitum arhati tat api nirastam veditavyam nirguṇasya eva nirākṛta tvāt yat ca uktamnedam brahmaṇaḥ viśeṣaṇam prapañca upādhi tvena nirupādhika brahma svarūpa antargata tva ayogāt a iti tat uttaratra nirākariṣyate iti yat api guṇa guṇinoḥ anyatva ananya tvābhyām anirūpaṇāt iti lakṣaṇasya taṭastha tva ādi siddhaye pareṇa uktam tat dūṣayitum anuvadati lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.103cd.1–1.1.103cd.2^1	 lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ bhedaḥ abhedaḥ vā yadi vā ubhayam yat atra jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam mukhataḥ lakṣaṇam abhihitam sa varjña tva ādi samasta guṇavat tvam ca abhiprāya vyāptam iti uktam tat ubhayam api lakṣaṇam lakṣyāt brahmaṇaḥ bhinnam abhinnam bhinna abhinnam vā na ādyaḥ meru mandara vat lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāvasya guṇa guṇi bhāvasya ca anupapatteḥ sambandha sadbhāvāt na iti ced tasya api sambandhibhyām anya tva ananya tva ābhyām a nirūpaṇāt na dvitīyaḥ anekaiḥ abhinnasya brahmaṇaḥ api aneka tva āpatteḥ tathā ca ekam eva iti śruti virodhāt lakṣaṇānām vā eka tvam āpadyeta 
NSu_1.1.103cd.2^2–1.1.103cd.3	 tathā cayataḥ vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante a ityādi śruteḥ punarukti doṣa prasaṅgaḥ lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāvaḥ guṇa guṇi bhāvaḥ ca abhede na upapadyate prasiddhena hi aprasiddham lakṣaṇīyam na ca tat eva tadā eva prasiddham aprasiddham ca iti yuktam guṇī ca guṇavān bhavati na ca svena eva tat vān bhavati na tṛtīyaḥ paraspara virodhāt atas aśakya nirūpaṇa tvāt na idam brahma svarūpa antargatam lakṣaṇam kintu taṭastham eva na ca taṭa sthena tena brahmaṇaḥ advitīya tva bhaṅgaḥ yat rajatam iti abhāt sā śuktiḥ iti vat mithyā bhūtena api prapañca kāraṇa tvena upalakṣaṇa yogāt iti evam anūdya nirākartum ārabhate iti pṛṣṭaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.104a.1–1.1.104a.3	 iti pṛṣṭe vaktavyam iti śeṣaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ itayupalakṣaṇam dūṣite ca iti api grāhyam dūṣaṇānām atyanta asambaddha tvāt pṛṣṭaḥ iti eva uktam kim vaktavyam iti tatra jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tva ādīnām dharmāṇām bheda abhāve api viśeṣasya sadbhāvāt tat balena sarvam utpadyate iti vaktum nirbheda vastuni pareṇa viśeṣasya anaṅgīkṛta tvāt ghaṭa ādīnām ca mithyā tvena aṅgīkṛtānām anudāharaṇa tvāt satya eva vastuni asau= udapapādanīyaḥ iti manvānaḥ āha tadā iti 
NSu_1.1.104ab.1–1.1.104ab.3	 tad aikyasya gatiḥ eva na vidyate yadi evam pṛṣṭvā lakṣaṇam dūṣayasi tad aikyasya gatiḥ nirūpaṇa prakāraḥ na vidyate ayam abhiprāyaḥ dvividham hi vākyam māyā vādinā tattva avedakam aṅgīkṛtam ekam jīva brahmaṇoḥ aikya param mahā vākyam yathā tat tvam asi ityādi aparam tat svarūpa param avāntara vākyam yathā satyam jñānam anantam brahma ityādi tat ubhayam api sa viśeṣa abhinna vastu niṣṭham pareṇa aṅgīkaraṇīyam gati antara abhāvāt tatra tāvat ādyasya gati antaram na asti katham iti ced ucyate tat tvam asi ityādi vākya pratipādyam aikyam kim tad pada lakṣitāt caitanyāt abhinnam uta bhinnam atha bhinna abhinnam iti vācyam pareṇa aṅgīkṛta tvena prādhānyāt abheda pakṣam tāvat ādau nirākaroti aikya abhedaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.104cd.1–1.1.104cd.2^1	 aikya abhede na śāstreṇa jñeyam tat sva prakāśataḥ aikyasya caitanya svarūpa abhede aṅgīkriyamāṇe tat ā aikyam tattvam asi ityādinā śāstreṇa pratipādyam na syāt kutas svarūpasya sva prakāśa tvena nitya siddha tvāt tanmātra svarūpa tvāt caikyasya na hi prakāśamānam eva śāstra pratipādyam vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt kiñca āvedya tve satya parokṣa vyavahāra yogya tvam sva prakāśa tvam paroṇa aṅgīkṛtam tathā ca sva prakāśa caitanya ātmakam śāstra pratipādyam ca iti vyāhatam atha śāstram na aikyam pratipādayati kintu bheda bhramam nirākaroti yathā uktam siddham tu nivartaka tvāt iti na aikye prakāśamāne bheda bhramasya eva anavakāśāt tattva apratipatteḥ bhrānti hetu tvāt aikyam na prakāśate iti ced na sva prakāśa caitanya mātra tva virodhāt avidyā vaśāt sva prakāśasya api anavabhāsaḥ iti ced na sarvathā api anavabhāsa prasaṅgāt 
NSu_1.1.104cd.2^2	 tathā ca adhiṣṭhāna anavabhāse avidyā āropasya api anupapatteḥ na hi akhaṇḍe vastuni aṃśataḥ avidyā āvaraṇam sambhavati asambhavanīya avabhāsa caturā avidyā iti ced tarhi sā jaḍeṣu eva kutas na aṅgīkāryā anupapatteḥ tulya tvāt tathā casā na jaḍeṣu vastuṣu a iti ayuktam na śāstreṇa jñeyam tat iti upalakṣaṇam śāstra pratipādya tve api tad padena eva siddha tvāt tvam asi iti vyartham iti api draṣṭavyam tat iti etāvatā na bheda bhrama nivṛttiḥ atas tvam asi iti sārthakam iti ced na tad padena aikyasya pratipādita tvāt aikya pratītau ca bheda bhramasya nirasta tvāt anyathā kadāpi anivṛtti prasaṅgāt tad padena ekyasya apratipādita tve tad upalakṣita caitanya mātra tva anupapattiḥ nanu katham tarhi saḥ ayam devadattaḥ iti vākyam atra api viśeṣa anaṅgīkāre anupapattiḥ eva iti 
NSu_1.1.105ab.1–1.1.105ab.4^1	 bhede mithyātvataḥ bheda satya tvam syāt balāt api dvitīyam nirākaroti bhedaḥ iti aikyasya svarūpāt bhede aṅgīkriyamāṇe apasiddhāntaḥ tāvat tat tvam asya ādi vākyasya akhaṇḍa artha niṣṭhatāyāḥ māyā vādinā aṅgīkṛta tvāt mithyātva prasaṅgaḥ aparaḥ doṣaḥ caitanya atiriktasya sarvasya mithyātva aṅgīkārāt anyathādvaitena eva satyena advaita vyāghātāt aikya mithyā tve kinnaḥ chinnam iti ced na mithyātvataḥ na śāstreṇa jñeyam tat iti anuvartanāt anyathā tattvam asya ādi śāstrasya atattva avedaka tvam syāt kiñca jīva brahmaṇoḥ aikyasya mithyātvataḥ tad bheda satya tvam api syāt 
NSu_1.1.105ab.1–1.1.105ab.4^2–1.1.105c.2	 kutas balā dvaya āpti balāt iti arthaḥ nanu na kutra api satayaḥ bhedaḥ asmābhiḥ abhyupeyate tat katham vyāptiḥ mā evam āstām tāvat parama artha cintā yayoḥ dūra sthayoḥ vanaspatyoḥ aikyam mithyā tayoḥ bhedaḥ satyaḥ iti dṛṣṭam athavā yasya sva rūpeṇa sataḥ yaḥ abhāvaḥ mithyā tasya tad viparītaḥ satyaḥ yathā brahmaṇaḥ anṛta tva ādeḥ mithyā tve satya tva ādikam satyam iti sāmānya vyāpti āśrayaṇena prasaṅga upapattiḥ yathā āhuḥ paraspara virodhe tu na prakāra antara sthitiḥ a iti tṛtīyam nirācaṣṭe bheda abhedau= iti bheda abhedau yadi jīva brahmaṇoḥ aikyasya svarūpāt bheda abhedau yadi aṅgīkriyete tadā vaktavyam tau kim caitanyāt abhinnau= uta bhinnau atha bhinna abhinnau= iti ādye caitanyasya api dvi tvam tayoḥ vā eka tvam iti ādi āpadyeta dvitīyayoḥ deṣam āha tadā iti 
NSu_1.1.105cd.1–1.1.105cd.3	 tadā syāt eva hi anavasthitiḥ hi śabdena anavasthā vyutpādanāya spaṣṭa tām ācaṣṭe tathā hi sa bhedaḥ kim bhedibhyām bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ bhinna abhinnaḥ vā prathame saḥ api bhedaḥ tathā iti anavasthā dvitīye śabda paryāya tva ādayaḥ doṣāḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu tṛtīye antarbhavati tatra api ukta vidhayā anavasthā eva iti nanu bhedasya bheda antaram bheda abhedayoḥ ca bheda abheda antaram iti etāvatā na anavasthā utpatti jñapti pratibandhaka tva abhāvāt iti ced na viśeṣeṇa pratītim antareṇa viśiṣṭa pratyaya anupapattyā jñapti pratibandhaka tvāt tat idam uktam syāt eva iti yadi api bheda abheda aṅgīkāre virodhaḥ vaktum śakyate tathā api sphuṭa tvāt na uktaḥ evam aikyasya svarūpāt bheda pakṣe anavasthā api iti 
NSu_1.1.105cd.4	 nanu aikyam caitanya abhinnam api sva nirvāhaka tvāt svābhāvika prakāśena aprakāśita tvam ātmanaḥ nirvakṣyati yat vā svarūpeṇa aikyasya bheda abhedau stām tayoḥ ca bheda abheda antara abhāve api sva nirvāhaka tva advayavahāra upapattiḥ iti ced na viśeṣa anabhyupagame sva nirvāhaka tvasya api vaktum aśakya tvāt iti abhiprāyeṇa āha svanirvāhaka tā iti 
NSu_1.1.106a.1–1.1.106a.2	 sva nirvāhaka tā ced syāt aikyasya bheda abhedayoḥ vā sva nirvāhaka tā yadi aṅgīkṛtā syāt tadā pṛcchāmaḥ svasya nirvāhakam hi sva nirvāhakam tasya bhāvaḥ sva nirvāhaka tā svasya iti ca karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī kartṛ karmaṇoḥ kṛtī iti vacanāt tathā ca ekasya eva ekasyām eva nirvāha kriyāyām karma kartṛ tva lakṣaṇam nirvāhya tvam nirvāhaka tvam iti uktam bhavati tat nirvāhya tvam nirvāhaka tvam ca parasparam dharmiṇā kriyayā ca atyanta abhinna mutabhinnam iti 
NSu_1.1.106b–1.1.106d.5	 bāhyam bāhakam iti api paryāyaḥ bhedavān vā syāt anavasthobhayatra ca nirvāhyam iti nirvāhakam iti api śabdāt nirvāhakam iti api śabda samūhaḥ paryāyaḥ prasajyeta eka artha tvāt na ca teṣām śabdānām kaścid paryāya tvam manyate dvitīyam anūdya dūṣayati bhedavān iti vā śabdaḥ yadi arthe yadi nirvāhya tva ādiḥ arthaḥ parasparam dharmiṇā na bhedavān syāt tadā tad bheda dvayasya bhedi svarūpa mātra tve paryāya tva ādi doṣa prasaṅgāt bheda antara vat iti aṅgīkaraṇīyam tathā ca parasparam bhedam dharmi bhedam vā aśrityaḥ bhayatra anavasthā syāt iti evam viśeṣa anabhyupagame mahā vākya artha anupapattim abhidhāya avāntara vākye api tām atidiśati satyā iti 
NSu_1.1.107a.1–1.1.107a.2	 satya jñāna ādike api evam satyam jñānam anantam brahma iti ādike avāntara vākye api evam vikalpya dūṣaṇam abhidhānīyam iti arthaḥ tathā hi satya jñāna ādikam parasparam brahmaṇā ca atyanta abhinnam vā bhinnam vā bhinna abhinnam vā na ādyaḥ tathā sati sva prakāśa brahma ātmakasya tasya satya jñāna ādi śāstra pratipādya tva prasaṅgāt satya jñāna ādi padānām paryāyatva āpattyā saha prayoga anupapatti prasaṅgāt ca na dvitīyaḥ apasiddhāntāt mithyātva āpattyā śāstrasya atattva avedaka tva prasaṅgāt ca ajñāna tva ādeḥ satya tva āpatteḥ ca na tṛtīyaḥ anavasthā prasaṅgāt sva nirvāhaka tvasya ca ukta vidhayā nirvaktum aśakya tvāt iti 
NSu_1.1.107a.3–1.1.107a.4	 nanu satya jñāna ādīnām parasparam brahmaṇā ca atyantam abhedaḥ eva na ca tāvatā satya jñāna ādi padānām paryāya tvam vācya artha bheda sadbhāvāt para apara sāmānya vācinām sa guṇa brahma vācinām vā teṣām para brahmaṇi lakṣaṇayā pravṛtti aṅgīkārāt na ca vācyam satya padena lakṣitasya eva jñāna padena lakṣaṇāyām vaiyarthyāt adhika lakṣaṇāyām ca na akhaṇḍa artha tā siddhiḥ iti lakṣya artha bheda abhāve api āropita asatya tva ādivya vṛtti artha tvena pada antarāṇām sa prayojana tvāt atas eva na śāstra vaiyarthyam sva prakāśe api āropita ākāra vyāvṛtti artha tvena śāstrasya sa prayojanat tvāt iti ced na kim brahma viśeṣaṇa tvena asatya tva ādi vyāvṛtti bodhaḥ prayojanam ucyate kiṃvā svatantraḥ eva vyāvṛtti bodhaḥ ādye doṣam āha na vyāvṛttyā iti 
NSu_1.1.107bc.1–1.1.107bc.2	 na vyāvṛttyā prayojanam vyāvṛttasya aviśeṣa tve ittham bhūta lakṣaṇe tṛtīyā brahma viśeṣaṇa tvena asatya tva ādi vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam prayojanam satya ādi padānām tvayā vaktum na śakyate kutas iti atas āha vyāvṛttasya iti vyāvṛtta tayā pratītasya brahmaṇaḥ aviśeṣa tve sati iti arthaḥ abhāva viśeṣa aṅgīkāre ca bhāva viśeṣaiḥ kim aparāddham 
NSu_1.1.107bc.3	 dvitīyam dūṣayati na vyāvṛttasya iti vyāvṛtteḥ vyāvṛttasya brahmaṇaḥ aviśeṣa tve sā svatantrā vyāvṛttiḥ na prayojanam ajijñāsita tvāt mumukṣuṇā brahma vā tad dharmaḥ vā jijñāsitavyaḥ tatra vyāvṛttiḥ na brahma tasya bhāva rūpa tvāt ekatvāt nirupādhika tvāt ca brahma dharmaḥ api na ced katham mumukṣuṇā jijñāsyeta ajijñāsita bodhanam ca katham prayojanam syāt iti 
NSu_1.1.107bc.4–1.1.107bc.8	 kiñca satya ādi padāni brahmaṇi kim satya tva ādi dharma anābhidadhatya sattva ādi vyāvṛtti prayojanāni uta anyathā vā na ādyaḥ anaṅgīkārāt iti āha na vyāvṛttyā iti vyāvṛttasya brahmaṇaḥ aviśeṣa tve aṅgīkṛte sati viśeṣaṇa abhidhāna mukhena vyāvṛttiḥ padānām prayojanam iti vaktum na śakyate iti arthaḥ dvitīyam dūṣayati na vyāvṛttasya iti vyāvṛttasya brahmaṇaḥ aviśeṣa tve satya tva ādi dharma apratipādanaḥ iti yāvat asatya tva ādi vyāvṛttiḥ padānām prayojanam iti vaktum na śakyate na hi tīre nadī tvam anabhidadhataḥ nadī padasya anadītva vyāvṛttiḥ prayojanam sambhavati virodhi ākāra samarpaṇena hi virodhi ākāra antaram vyāvartanīyam yat uktam śāstram ca āropita ākāra vyāvṛttyā sva prakāśe api prayojana vat iti tat api anena eva nirastam nirviśeṣe svayaṃprakāśa māne virodhi ākāra āropaḥ eva anupapannaḥ iti ca uktam evam viśeṣa anaṅgīkāre vākya dvayasya anupapattim abhidhāya upasaṃharati tat iti 
NSu_1.1.107d.1–1.1.107ef.2^1	 tat akhaṇḍam ca khaṇḍitam tat tasmāt akhaṇḍam nirviśeṣam vākya dvaya pratipādyam iti etat matam khaṇḍitam dūṣitam veditavyam iti arthaḥ sva kriyā viruddham ca nirviśeṣa tva vacanam iti āha nirviśeṣa tvam iti nirviśeṣa tvam etena mūkaḥ aham iti vat bhavet yathā mūkaḥ aham iti etat sva kriyā viruddham vaktṛ tva abhāvaḥ hi anena ucyate vacana kriyayā ca vaktṛ tvam iti tathā nirviśeṣam brahma iti sva kriyā viruddham bhavet katham etena nirviśeṣa tvena viśeṣeṇa apatitena hetunā viśeṣa abhāvaḥ hi nirviśeṣam brahma iti vākyena pratipādayitum iṣyaḥ pratipādana kriyayā ca viśeṣa abhāva lakṣaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ prāpnoti iti ayam api viśeṣaḥ nirviśeṣam iti anena nirākriyate iti kutas tatra api sva kriyā virodhaḥ pratīti virodhaḥ iti ced tarhi etat vacana kartṛ tvam api mūkaḥ aham iti anena nirākriyate iti kutas tatra api sva kriyā virodhaḥ 
NSu_1.1.107ef.2^2–1.1.107ef.3	 pratīti virodhaḥ iti ced samaḥ samādhiḥ para bodhana upāya abhāvāt viśeṣa abhāvaḥ upādīyate na tu brahma viśeṣa tayā iti ced atra api para bodhana upāya abhāvāt eva idam vacanam vastutas tu asau mūkaḥ eva ityaḥ tu nirviśeṣam iti asya viśeṣa nirāsaḥ eva tātparyam na nirviśeṣa tva viśeṣa vidhau atas katham virodhaḥ iti ced tarhi mūkaḥ aham iti asya api vaktṛ tva nirāse tātparyam na etat vacana vaktṛtvaḥ iti kutas tatra api virodhaḥ na tatra sva vacana virodhaḥ kintu sva kriyā virodhaḥ iti ced prakṛte api kim anyaḥ abhihitaḥ iti āstām prapañcaḥ tat idam uktam mūkaḥ aham iti vat iti yad artha m ayam prayatnaḥ tat āha abhinne api iti 
NSu_1.1.108ab.1–1.1.108ab.3	 abhinne api viśeṣaḥ ayam balāt āpatati hi atas atas ukta prakāreṇa mahā vākya avāntara vākyayoḥ anyathā anupapatti balāt bheda rahite api brahmaṇi ayam anupapatti śānti hetuḥ viśeṣaḥ nāma śakti viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ prāpnoti idam uktam bhavati mahā vākya pratipādyam aikyam avāntara vākya pratipādyam ca satya tva ādikam brahmaṇā parasparam ca abhinnam eva ekadhā eva anudraṣṭavyam iti ādi eka rasa pratipādaka śruteḥ na ca ukta doṣaḥ yatas bheda hīne api vastuni asti kaścid śakti viśeṣaḥ yena prakāśamānam api na prakāśate ityādi yujyate sa ca viśeṣaḥ anayā eva arthāpattyauvagamyate iti eva tvayā vaktavyam iti nanu aṅgīkṛte api viśeṣe na anupapatti śāntiḥ saḥ api hi viśeṣaḥ yadi vastunaḥ bhinnaḥ tarhi bheda anavasthā ādi doṣaḥ syāt abhinna tve ca viśeṣa tadvat bhāva anupapatteḥ tādavasthyāt iti ataḥ āha viśeṣa iti 
NSu_1.1.108cd.1–1.1.108cd.3	 viśeṣa tadvatoḥ ca eva sva nirvāhaka tā bhavet viśeṣa viśeṣiṇoḥ ca abhedaḥ eva aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ viśeṣa balāt ca viśeṣa tadvat bhāvaḥ api upapādanīyaḥ iti śeṣaḥ tathā api viśeṣa parasparayā anavasthā syāt iti atas āha svanirvāhaka tā iti saḥ eva viśeṣaḥ viśeṣa antaram antareṇa viśeṣa tadvat bhāvam ca ghaṭayati ekasya eva nirvāhya tvam nirvāhaka tvam ca tad balāt eva siddhayati iti aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti nanu abhinne vastuni bheda kārya nirvāhaka tvam viśeṣasya kutas pramāṇāt siddham iti atas āha bheda hīne tu iti tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe 
NSu_1.1.109a–1.1.109c.3	 bheda hīne tu aparyāya śabda antara niyāmakaḥ viśeṣaḥ nāma kathitaḥ aparyāya śabda antara niyāmakaḥ iti aśeṣa bheda kāyar nirvāhaka tva upalakṣaṇam etat uktam bhavati jīva brahma aikya ādīnām ekadhā eva ityādi śrutyā caitanya svarūpa mātra tvam pratīyate caitanye sva prakāśa tayā siddhe api asiddhiḥ aparyāya śabda vedya tvam caitanya prakāśasya na avidyā nivartaka tvam advaita jñānasya tad nivartaka tvam iti artha kriya viśeṣaḥ caitanyam ekam satya tva ādīni anekāni iti saṅkhayā vailakṣaṇyam iti ādi bheda kāryāṇi ca avagamyate etad ubhayāni atha anupapattyā bheda rahite api caitanye bhedra pratinidhiḥ tad kāyarkārī kaścid atiśayaḥ asti iti kalpyate gati antara abhāvāt tathā ca artha āpattyā svarūpa grāhiṇyā bheda kārya nirvāhakaḥ eva asau siddhaḥ iti kim tatra pramāṇa antara anveṣaṇena iti anena eva viśeṣasya lakṣaṇam ca uktam bhavati bheda hāne api anupacarita bheda vyavahāra nimittam viśeṣaḥ iti evam advaita vādinā viśeṣam aṅgīkārayitvā anyān api aṅgīkārayati saḥ asti iti 
NSu_1.1.109d.1–1.1.109d.2^1	 saḥ asti vastuṣu aśeṣatas na kevalam brahmaṇi māyā vādinā viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ kim nāma prapañca satyatāvādibhiḥ api aśeṣa dravyeṣu sa viśeṣaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ tathā hi paṭaḥ tat śauklayam ca tāvat na bhidyete aṅgulī dvaya vat bhedena anupalambhāt ayutasiddha tvāt iti ced kim ayuta siddha tvam nāma avaśyam āśraya āśrayi bhāvena avasthānam iti ced kim etāvatā bhedena na pratyetavyam na api kuṇḍam iva paṭaḥ adhikaraṇa tvena badarāṇi iva śauklayam ādheya tvena parisphurati kim nāma tat eva tat iti na ca eṣā pratītiḥ bhrāntiḥ bādhaka abhāvāt śauklaya paṭayoḥ bheda avagāhinī pratyakṣa pratītiḥ hi bādhikā bhavet anumāna ādīnām abheda pratyaya rodhena utthānasya eva asambhavāt na ca bheda avagāhinī pratyakṣa pratītiḥ asti iti uktam tena pratyakṣatas eva siddhaḥ paṭa śauklayayoḥ abhedaḥ 
NSu_1.1.109d.2^2	 dṛśyante ca bheda kāryāṇi paṭa śauklaya buddhayoḥ anyūnā anatirikta viṣaya tva abhāvaḥ tad śabdayoḥ aparyāya tvam aparyāya śabda smāraka tvam jala āharaṇa ādi artha kriyā bhedaḥ paṭamānayā iti ukte yat kiñcid śuklayā ana ānayanam śuklam ānayā iti ukte niyamena paṭasya ānayanam apaṭaḥ paṭaḥ iti vat aśuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti anayoḥ virodha abhāvaḥ andhasya api paṭaḥ ayam itivat śuklaḥ ayam iti ca prati iti anutpattiḥ śukla apratipatti vat paṭā pratipatti abhāvaḥ mahārajana samparkeṇa śukla tva vat paṭasya avṛtta tva abhāvaḥ paṭavat vā śauklayasya api anāvṛtta tva abhāvaḥ iti evamādīni naca eṣā pratītiḥ bhāntiḥ bādhita tva abhimānasya api abhāvāt vyavahāra ādya visaṃvādāt ca tad etayoḥ abheda bheda kārya pratītyoḥ anyathā anupapattyā nirbhede api paṭe asti kaścid atiśayaḥ bheda pratinidhiḥ yad vaśāt idam sarvam samañjasam syāt iti eva kalpanīyam na ca atiśayaḥ abhinne api viśeṣaka tvāt viśeṣaḥ iti gīyate evam anyatra api dravye viśeṣaḥ pratipattavyaḥ 
NSu_1.1.109d.3–1.1.109d.4	 nanu bheda abheda aṅgīkāreṇa anupapatteḥ śamanāt kim viśeṣeṇa iti ced na paraspara viruddhayoḥ bheda abhedayoḥ ekatra avasthāna ghaṭanāya api viśeṣasya api aṅgīkaraṇīya tvāt pratīta tvāt kaḥ virodhaḥ iti ced satyam pratītiḥ api katham upapanna iti cintāyām vastu svabhāva atiśayasya anusaraṇīya tvāt bheda abheda anavasthā parihāra artham api viśeṣa aṅgīkārasya āvaśyaka tvasya ukta tvāt iti nanu sarva vastuṣu yadi asti viśeṣaḥ sa ca vastunaḥ na bhidyate prāptam tarhi sakala vastūnām aikyam iti atas āha viśeṣāḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.110.1–1.1.110.2	 viśeṣāḥ te api anantāḥ ca paraspara viśeṣiṇaḥ sva nirvāhaka tā yuktāḥ santi vastuṣu aśeṣatas te prakṛta svarūpāḥ viśeṣāḥ aśeṣatas vastuṣu ananteṣu dravyeṣu anantāḥ eva santi na punar ekaḥ eva sarva tra atas na ukta doṣaḥ saḥ asti iti eka vacanam tu samudāya apekṣayā prayuktam iti bhāvaḥ nanu ekaikasmin= ca dravye viśeṣaḥ api ekaikaḥ asti tadā paṭaḥ mahān= chuklaḥ calati iti vicitra aneka vyavahāra anupapattiḥ na hi ekasmāt avicitra svabhāvāt vicitra aneka kārya utpattiḥ dṛṣṭā tathā satyākasmika tva prasaṅgāt tatas ca viśeṣa aṅgīkāraḥ vyarthaḥ syāt iti atas āha viśeṣāḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.110.3–1.1.110.4	 te api ukta lakṣaṇāḥ viśeṣāḥ aśeṣatas api vastuṣu pratyekam anantāḥ santi atas na ukta doṣa avakāśaḥ anantāḥ iti upalakṣaṇam yatra yāvantaḥ vyavahārāḥ tatra tāvantaḥ viśeṣāḥ iti jñātavyam pratidravyam aneka tve viśeṣāṇām parasparam bhedena bhāvyam bheda avinābhūta tvāt aneka tvasya tathā ca bhinnanām dravya abhede dravyasya api bheda prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha paramparā iti paraspara viśeṣavat tvena eva aneka tvam sambhavati viśeṣasya bheda kārya kāritāyāḥ ukta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_1.1.110.5–1.1.110.6	 viśeṣāṇām api viśeṣa antara aṅgīkāre anavasthā iti atas āha svanirvāhaka tā iti pūrvam dravyeṇa viśeṣasya abheda cintā idānīm tu parasparam iti sphuṭaḥ artha bhedaḥ sarvam ca etat viśeṣa svarūpa sādhaka artha āpattyā eva siddham iti na pṛthak pramāṇam uktam na hi svayam anupapannam anupapatti antara śāntyai prabhavati kintu yathāyathā upapadyate tathā tathā eva svarūpa grāhiṇyā artha apatya eva kalpyate yadi api viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣaḥ api bhavati yena pratyakṣa siddhena a iti vakṣyamāṇa tvāt tathā api vipratipannaḥ na tanmātreṇa bodhayitum śakyate iti artha āpattiḥ upanyasta iti yad artham tat aikyasya ityādinā sarva vādibhiḥ viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkāritaḥ tat idānīm āha atas iti 
NSu_1.1.111ab.1–1.1.111ab.2	 atas ananta guṇam brahma nirbhedam api bhaṇyate nirbhedam api brahma atas viśeṣa sāmarthyāt ananta guṇam bhaṇyate iti yat pareṇa pṛṣṭam lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ bhedaḥ ityādi tasya idam uttaram brahma nirbhedam iti yat atra uktam aneka lakṣarā bhinnasya aneka tva prasaṅgaḥ lakṣaṇānām vā aneka tva anupapattiḥ śabda paryaya tvam guṇa guṇi tva ādi anupapattiḥ iti tasya uttaram nirbhedam api atas viśeṣa śad guṇānām ananta tvam brahmaṇaḥ ca eka tvam anantā guṇāḥ asya iti guṇa guṇyādi bhāvaḥ brahma ca guṇāḥ ceti a punarukta bhaṇanam ca yujyate iti atra jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam iti vaktavye ananta guṇam iti vacanam idam sūtram ananta guṇa tvam eva brahmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇam abhipretya tad sādhanāya jagat janma ādi kāraṇatva lakṣaṇam pratipādayitum pravṛttam iti sūcayitum 
NSu_1.1.111ab.3–1.1.111ab.6	 tat evam jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvasya sva lakṣaṇa tve bādhaka abhāvāt na taṭastha tva kalpanam yuktam iti siddham atra āha kimartham lakṣya lakṣaṇayoḥ abhedam aṅgīkṛtya viśeṣa balena sarva vyavahāra samādhānam kriyate bhedaḥ eva kasmāt na aṅgīkriyate guṇa guṇi bhāvaḥ tu samavāya sambandhāt bhaviṣyati yadi ca sūtrakāreṇa samavāyaḥ nirākariṣyate iti na aṅgīkāra arhaḥ tadā guṇa guṇinoḥ eva sa kaścid tādṛśaḥ svabhāva bhedaḥ iti aṅgīkaraṇīyam na hi paṭa ādau bheda abhāve api viśeṣa balā dvaya vahāra viśeṣa darśana mātreṇa brahmaṇi api tathā kalpayitum yuktam niścāyaka pramāṇa abhāvāt niścāyaka pramāṇa upanyāsa artham hi sambhāvanā kalpyate yathā ahuḥ sambhāvitaḥ pratijñāya aarthaḥ sādhyeta hetunā na tasya hetubhiḥ trāṇam utpatan= eva yaḥ mṛtaḥ a  iti na punar sambhāvanā eva artha sādhikā iti atas āha evam dharmān iti 
NSu_1.1.111cd.1–1.1.111cd.2	 evam dharmān iti śrutyā tad abhedaḥ api udīryate api śabdāt viśeṣaḥ api atra hi brahma dharmāṇām pṛthak darśana nindaya abhedaḥ avagamyate dharmān iti ca dharma bahutva uktayā sa viśeṣa tvam na ca dharmān iti anuvāda mātram śrutim vinā tad asiddheḥ mūla śruti aṅgīkāre sā eva viśeṣa abhidhātrī bhaviṣyati iti pramitam etat nirbhedam eva brahma viśeṣa balāt eva nānā vyavahāra ālambanam iti 
NSu_1.1.111cd.3–1.1.112.1	 atra yat pareṇa jagat kāraṇa tvam kim brahmaṇaḥ nimitta tvam eva uta upādāna tvam eva atha ubhayam api iti vimṛśya tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ gṛhītaḥ upādāna tvam ca pariṇāmi tvena iti kaścid prapañca bhrama adhiṣṭhāna mātra tvena iti aparaḥ tat etat sarvam prakṛti adhikaraṇe nipuṇataram nirākariṣyate tasmāt ukta lakṣaṇa dvaya upapannam brahma nārāyaṇa ākhyam mumukṣuṇā jijñāsyam iti sthitam śāstra yoni tvāt jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam para brahmaṇaḥ viṣṇoḥ lakṣaṇam abhihitam tasya hara hiraṇyagarbha ādi cetaneṣu pradhāna ādi a cetaneṣu ca pāśupata ādi āgama anumāna avaṣṭambhena ativyāptim āśaṅkyā atra pariharati bhagavān tsūtra kāraḥ tatra pūrvapakṣam āracayati śaivādya iti śaiva ādi āgama samprāpta dṛṣṭa gena phalena tu tad vākya upamaya anyat ca pramāṇa tve anumīyate 
NSu_1.1.113a.1–1.1.113a.2	 īśa vākya tvataḥ śivena racitaḥ śaivaḥ ādi grahaṇāt hiraṇya garbha ādi racitāḥ gṛhyante taiḥ samprāptam tad ukta sādana anuṣṭhāna samprāptam dṛṣṭam dṛṣṭiḥ pratyakṣam iti yāvat tad siddham dṛṣṭa gam phalena tu tad vākyasya prāmāṇyam anumāya iti śeṣaḥ pramāṇa tvaḥ iti viṣaya saptamī dṛṣṭa phala artham sādhanāni vidadhat vākyam tāvat pramāṇa tayā anumīyate kena liṅgena phalena tasya pakṣa asambandhinaḥ anumāpaka tvam kathaṃm iti atas uktam śaiva ādyāgama samprāptā iti ajñāna asiddhim parihatu muktam dṛṣṭa gena iti tuśabdaḥ anumāna dvaye hetu viśeṣa dyotakaḥ īśa vākya tvataḥ iti atra ādi śabdaḥ yojyaḥ ayam arthaḥ dvividhaḥ hi śiva praṇītaḥ āgamaḥ kaścid pratyakṣa yogya sampad ā ādi phalam uddiśya sādhanāni vidadhat aparaḥ tu saṅkalpa varga ādi apratyakṣa phalāni vidadhānaḥ śivasya jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tva sarvajña tva savarśakti tva satya saṅkalpa tva ādi aśeṣa guṇa pūrṇa tvam niravadya tvam ca pratipādayati tatra ādyaḥ tāvat pramāṇam tad ukta sādhana anuṣṭhāne sati pratyakṣatas eva phala darśanāt 
NSu_1.1.113a.3–1.1.113a.4	 tat ayam prayogaḥ vimataḥ āgamaḥ pramāṇam saphala pravṛtti janaka tvāt caraka suśruta ādi vat yadi apramāṇam abhaviṣyat na samarthām pravṛttim akariṣyat vipralambhaka vākya vat tad uktam pramāṇataḥ artha pratipattau pravṛtti sāmarthyāt arthavat pramāṇam a iti tatas ca tad praṇetuḥ śivasya parama āpta tvam avadhārya tad dṛṣṭāntena tad praṇītasya dvitīyasya api āgamasya prāmāṇyam avasīyate atra ca prayogaḥ vipratipannaḥ āgamaḥ pramāṇam śiva vākya tvāt sampratipanna vat iti vipakṣe śivasya anāpta tva prasaṅgaḥ bādhakaḥ tat evam anumita prāmāṇyena śaiva āgamena śivasya jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tva abhidhānāt na idam lakṣaṇam viṣṇoḥ upapadyate iti śaivāḥ anayā eva diśā tad tad āgama prāmāṇyam tad tad devatā vādinām pratyavasthānāni draṣṭavyāni 
NSu_1.1.113a.5	 upalakṣaṇam ca etat anumānena api śiva ādīnām jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam sarvajña tva ādikam śakya sādhanam tathā hi kṣiti ādikam sa kartṛkam kārya tvāt ghaṭa vat vivāda adhyāsitam karma prayatna ādhāra jam karma tvāt sampratipanna vat vipratipanne pṛthivī udake prayatnavatā dhṛte guru tve satya pāti tvāt sampratipanna vat kṣiti ādikam prayatna vat vināśyam nāśya tvāt sampratipanna vat ityādibhiḥ anumānaiḥ viśva udaya sthiti laya kartari sāmānyatas siddhe asmad ādīnām tad asambhavāt bhagavān= chivaḥ eva pariśeṣāt jagat janma ādi kartā siddhayati yathā ca citra ādi kārya daśarnāt tad anuguṇaḥ eva kartā kalpyate evam vicitra aneka kārya daśarnāt kalpyamānaḥ api kartā tad anuguṇaḥ sārvajña ādimān eva siddhayati athavā kṣiti ādikam kartā ityadantargatam eva sa varjña tva ādikam na yatna antaram apekṣate nimitta upādāna phala ādi abhijñasya tad anuguṇa icchā prayatnavataḥ eva kartṛ tvam evam hiraṇyagarbha ādiṣu api pariśeṣeṇa jagat kāraṇa tvam yojyam iti
