NSu_1.1.113a.6	 evam āgamāt anumānāt ca anyeṣām jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tve prāpte prativihitam sūtra kṛtā āgamāt anumānataḥ vā anye jagat kāraṇa tvena na kalpanīyāḥ kutas śāstra yoni tvāt ṛc yajuḥ sāma atharvāḥ ca ityādinā uktam śāstram yoniḥ kāraṇam abhivyañjakam pramāṇam asya iti śāstra yoni tasya bhāvaḥ śāstra yoni tvam tasmāt etat uktam bhavati jagat janma ādi kāraṇasya vastunaḥ veda ādi śāstra eka samadhi gamya tvena śaiva ādi āgama anumāna agocara tvāt na taiḥ anyeṣām jagat kāraṇa tvam kalpanīyam kintu śāstram yasya jagat kāraṇa tvam ācaṣṭe saḥ eva tathā abhyupagantavyaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.113a.7	 syāt etat yadi śāstra eka samadhigamya tvam sautraḥ hetuḥ siddhaḥ syāt na ca evam pratyakṣa agamya tve api śaiva ādi āgamaiḥ anumānaiḥ ca ukta vidhayā jagat kāraṇa tvasya niścetum śakya tvāt iti āśaṅkaya sautra hetu siddhaye śaiva ādi āgama gamya tvam tāvat nirācikīrṣuḥ tad prāmāṇya sādhakam para upanyastam anumānam apākaroti iti ced iti 
NSu_1.1.113bc.1–1.1.113bc.3^1	 iti ced tad gavya bhicāriṇā aprāmāṇya anumā ca syāt tad gaḥ pratyakṣa avagataḥ ca asau vyabhicāraḥ phala vyabhicāraḥ ca saḥ asi asti iti tad gavya bhicāri vākyam tena dṛṣṭānta bhūtena śiva ādīnām jagat kāraṇa tva āgamasya īśa vākya tva ādinā hetunā prāmāṇya anumitiḥ ca syāt etat uktam bhavati yadi pratyakṣa saṃvādena dṛṣṭa arthānām śiva ādi vākyānām prāmāṇya m anumāya tat dṛṣṭāntena adṛṣṭa arthānām api śiva ādi vākya tvena hetunā prāmāṇyam anumīyate tarhi dṛṣṭa artheṣu eva vākyeṣu yat pratyakṣataḥ eva phala vyabhicāra vat dṛśyate tasya vimatam apramāṇam asamartha pravṛtti janaka tvāt vipralambhaka vākī avaditi aprāmāṇyam anumāya tad dṛṣṭāntena śiva ādi vākya tva ādi hetunā eva adṛṣṭa arthānām api vimatāni apramāṇāni śiva ādi vākya tvāt sampratipannavat iti aprāmāṇyam anumātum śakyataḥ eva na hi dṛṣṭa artham sarvam eva śiva vākyam samartha pravṛtti janakam 
NSu_1.1.113bc.3^2	 viphala pravṛtti janakasya api bahulam upalambhāt nanu tat api vākyam pramāṇam eva phala vyabhicāraḥ tu kartṛ karma ādi vaiguṇya nimittaḥ iti ced tarhi tat api vākyam apramāṇam eva phala saṃvāsa daḥ tu kākatālīyaḥ vā jaga dvayā mohakānām śiva ādīnām guḍa jihvikā vā ityaḥ tu prāmāṇye hi su dṛḍha nirūḍhe vyabhicārasya kartṛ ādi vaiguṇyam kāraṇam kalpanīyam phala avyabhicāreṇa eva prāmāṇyam parikalpayataḥ sphuṭam itaretara āśraya tvam śiva vākya tvam phala saṃvādinī anaikāntikam iti ced na tatra api phala visaṃvādinya naikāntyāt 
NSu_1.1.113bc.4	 kiñca yaḥ śiva āgamasya adṛṣṭa arthasya api evam prāmāṇyam manyate sa hiraṇyagarbha ādi āgamānām api prāmāṇyam aṅgīkaroti na vā na ādyaḥ paraspara viruddhayoḥ ubhayoḥ prāmāṇya ayogāt na dvitīyaḥ anumāna prakārasya samāna tve vaiṣamya anupapatteḥ atha tad anumānam aprayojakam hiraṇyagarbha vākya tve api āgantukena vipralambha ādīnām doṣeṇa ekasya aprāmāṇya sambhavāt iti ced samam samādhānam anena eva nyāyena caitya vandana ādi vākyānām api prāmāṇyam śakya sādhanam na hi tad vaktā kadāpi satyam na avadīt tat evam śaiva ādi āgama prāmāṇyasya aśakya sādhana tvāt na tena jagat kartā siddhayati 
NSu_1.1.113bc.5	 mā bhūt śaiva ādya āgamāt jagat janma ādi kartṛ siddhiḥ ukta anumānaiḥ tu bhaviṣyati tat katham śāstra eka samadhigamya tvam jagat kāraṇasya iti ced kim śāstra anusāri anumānam jagat kāraṇe pramāṇam ucyate uta svatantram ādyaḥ tu aṅgīkriyate eva tena asmad pakṣasya eva siddheḥ śāstrasya bhagavat eka niṣṭhatāyāḥ samanvaya sūtre vakṣyamāṇa tvāt dvitīyam dūṣayati na pṛthak iti 
NSu_1.1.113d.1–1.1.113d.2	 na pṛthak ca anumeśvare īśvare jagat kāraṇe pṛthak svatantrā anumā ca na mānam iti arthaḥ tathā hi yat tāvat sāmānyatas jagat kartṛ tva siddhau= anumānam tatra kim kāraṇa ādi sākṣātkāra vat kartṛ pūrvaka tvam sādhyam sa kartṛka tva mātram vā ādye dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vaikalyam na hi kulāla ādiḥ ghaṭa ādi kāraṇāni dharma adharma ādīni sākṣāt kurute atas eva kadācid pratihata icchaḥ bhavati iti ced kim etāvatā sādhya vaikalya aparihārāt kathañcid asya hetu viśeṣaṇa tve sādhana vaikalyam ca dṛṣṭāntasya syāt kevala vyatirekī tarhi ayam astu iti ced na viśeṣaṇā siddheḥ dvitīye siddha sādhanam adṛṣṭānām jīva ātmānam eva kartṛ tva upapatteḥ teṣām kāraṇa anabhijña tvāt na iti ced na kulāla ādīnām akartṛ tva prasaṅgāt adṛṣṭa adhiṣyātrā api kenacid bhāvyam iti ced na adhiṣṭhātṛ kṛtya abhāvāt na tāvat nodana ādikam adravya tvāt na ca atiśaya janma guṇe guṇa antara anupapatteḥ na ca ati indriya ādheya śaktiḥ anabhyupagamāt 
NSu_1.1.113d.3	 na ca sahakāri samavadhānam adṛṣṭāt eva tad upapatteḥ na api kārya kāri tvam tasya adṛṣṭa svabhāva tvāt tarhi utpatti anantaram eva kim na kuryāt iti ced na prabala adṛṣṭa antara pratibandha ādinā iti vadāmaḥ kiñca kārya tvam pakṣe kutas siddham abhūtvā abhāvi tvāt iti ced na tasya eva kāryatvāt kathañcid bhede api bhāga asiddha tvāt na khalu giri sāgara ādīnām abhūtvā abhāvi tvam asmābhiḥ upalabhyate tarhi dravyeṣu tāvat sāvayava tvāt kāryanvaya siddhiḥ astu iti ced na sa avayava tvam samavāyikāraṇa vat tvam uta pariṇāmikāraṇavat tvam vā ādye prativādya siddhiḥ dvitīye vādya siddhiḥ kiñca yasya kāryatva mātre vipratipattiḥ sa katham kāraṇa vat tām eva abhyupeyāt 
NSu_1.1.113d.4	 nanu kṣiti ādīnām pratyakṣatas eva pradeśa vat tvam anubhūyate anyathā katham bhū tale ghaṭa bhāva abhāvau yugapad sambhavataḥ itrata ced na tarhi evam ākāśa ādīnām api kāryatva prasaṅgāt katham anyathā pakṣiṇaḥ bhāva abhāvau yugapad iti tatra api vaktum śakya tvāt saṃyogasya satva atyanta abhāva samāna āśraya tvāt evam iti ced samam prakṛte api khanana ādinā yeṣām vibhāgaḥ nodana ādinā ca yeṣām saṃyogaḥ te kṣiti ādīnām avayavāḥ pratyakṣa siddhāḥ iti ced tat kim saṃyoga vibhāgi sajatīya dravya antaravat tvam sāvayava tvam iti uktam bhavati uta tadārabdha tvam ādye paramāṇubhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ dvitīye vyartha viśeṣaṇa tvam pūrvavat asiddhiḥ ca iti etena vivāda adhyāsitam karma prayatna ādhāra jam iti etat api nirastam yat api pṛthivī udake prayatnavatā dhṛte iti anumitam tat api pūrvavat siddha sādhanam 
NSu_1.1.113d.5–1.1.113d.6	 kiñca saṃyoga vega prayatna vat adṛṣṭam api kasmāt guru tva pratibandhakam na kalpyate apāti tvam ca sandigdhā siddham mahat tvena patatā anupalambha sambhavāt etena carama anumānam api nirastam kṣiti ādikam vikartṛkam anupalabhyamāna kartṛka tvāt gagana vat ityādinā sat pratipakṣatā ca sarva anumānānām anupalabhya tvam ca asmad upalabdhi ayogya tvam iti na kaścid kṣudra upadravaḥ para sukha ādau vyabhicāraḥ iti ced na tasya anumānāt upalabdheḥ tarhi kṣiti ādi kartā api anumānāt upalabhyate iti ced na anumānāt īśvara upalabdhau= asmat anu mānasya duṣṭa tvam tathā ca anumānāt īśvara upalabdhiḥ iti ita retara āśraya prasaṅgaāt anayā eva diśā sarvāṇi jagat kāraṇa mātra sādhanāni svatantra tā anumānāni nirasanīyāni yat ca śiva ādīnām jagat kāraṇa tve pariśeṣa anumānam tat api kim śāstra anusāri kiṃvā kevalam na ādyaḥ śāstrasya bhagavat eka para tāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇa tvāt dvitīyam dūṣayati na pṛthak ca iti īśvare śive jagatkartari ca pṛthak anumānam na mānam iti arthaḥ tat katham iti atas āha puṃstva iti 
NSu_1.1.114ab.1–1.1.114ab.4^1	 puṃstva hetu balāt eva pūrva uktena eva vartmanā pūrva uktena vartmanā śaiva āgama prāmāṇya anumāna nirākaraṇa mārgeṇa eva sat pratipakṣa tvena eva iti arthaḥ eva kāraḥ na dūṣaṇa antara anveṣaṇena vṛthā manaḥ khedanīyam sphuṭa doṣe sati iti dyotayati īśvara vākya tvam katham atra hetuḥ syāt iti atas āha puṃstva iti pūrva uktena vartmanā iti sat pratipakṣatā mātram ati diṣyam na tu sa hetuḥ iti bhāvaḥ ayam atra prayogaḥ śivaḥ na jagat kāraṇam puṃstvāt devadatta vat iti nanu śivaḥ kena pramāṇena siddhaḥ atha pariśeṣataḥ jagat kartṛ tvam tasmin= anumimānasya tava api kutas siddhaḥ loka pravāda ādinā iti ced mama api tathā iti aḥ tu bhavat abhimate brahmaṇi hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ iti ced na 
NSu_1.1.114ab.1–1.1.114ab.4^2	 kevala anumāna vādinam pratyanīśvara vāda aṅgīkāreṇa pratyavasthānāt nanu jakatkāraṇa tvam śiva niṣṭham anyatra anupapattau satyām kiñcid niṣṭhatayā pramita tvāt iti hi pariśeṣa anumānam tat katham asya ayam pratipakṣaḥ iti ced na viruddha artha sādhana mātreṇa pratipakṣa sambhavāt prayogataḥ api eka dharma niṣṭhatāyāḥ pramāṇa prayojana śūnya tvāt anyathā evaṃvidhārthika pratipakṣāṇām anyatra anantarbhāvena adūṣaṇa tva prasaṅgāt na ca evam astu iti vācyam pratirodhaka tvasya anubhava siddha tvāt nanu evam sati sāmānya siddhiḥ anupapannā apadyate iti ced āpadyatām tad anumānānām dūṣita tvāt kim atas yadi evam iti ced siddhaḥ sautra hetuḥ iti āha śāstra yoni tvam iti 
NSu_1.1.114cd.1–1.1.115.3	 śāstra yoni tvam etena kāraṇasya balāt bhavet etena ukta prakāreṇa kāraṇasya jagataḥ iti śeṣaḥ balāt prakāra antareṇa asiddhi balāt jagat kāraṇasya anumāna āvedya tvam śrutibhiḥ api siddham iti āha na aveda vid iti na aveda vid na tarkeṇa matiḥ ityādi vākyataḥ tarkaḥ jñāpayitum śaktaḥ na īśitāram kathañcana na aveda vinmanutetam bṛhantam a  na eṣā tarkeṇa matiḥ āpaneyā a  na indriyāṇi na anumānam vedāḥ hi eva enam vedayanti a ityādi vākyataḥ iti jñāyate iti śeṣaḥ tarkaḥ iti anumāna mātra upalakṣaṇam īśitāram jagat kāraṇam kathañcana sāmānyatas viśeṣataḥ ca yat api kāryatva ādi hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tā balāt anyasmāt vā anumānat īśvarasya sārvajña ādi siddhiḥ iti tat api pratipakṣa duṣṭa tvāt ayuktam iti āha vana kṛt tvā ādi iti 
NSu_1.1.116.1–1.1.116.2^1	 vana kṛt tvā ādi rūpeṇa pakṣa bhūtasya ca īśituḥ kiñcid jñānam hi puṃstvena śakyam sādhayitum sukham nanu atra evam prayoktavyam īśvaraḥ kiñcijjñaḥ paṃra tvāt devadatta vat iti tatra īśvaraḥ pramitaḥ vā na vā ādye yena pramāṇena siddhaḥ tena eva tasya sārvajña siddheḥ dharmi grāhaka virodhaḥ dvitīye tu āśraya asiddhiḥ tat katham ucyate īśituḥ kiñcijjña tvam ca puṃstvena sādhayitum śakyam hi iti tatra āha sukham iti tat katham iti atas uktam vana kṛt tvā ādi rūpeṇa pakṣa bhūtasya iti prasiddha kartṛ rahitam vanam sa kartṛkam kārya tvāt ityādinā yaḥ vana ādi kartā siddhaḥ tena eva ākāreṇa tam pakṣīkṛtya prayoge na kaḥ api doṣaḥ iti āśayaḥ vana kṛt tvam parvata ādhāraka tvam iti ādi rūpaḥ dharmaḥ tena upetasya 
NSu_1.1.116.2^2–1.1.116.3	 na hi vana kartā iti etāvatā sarvajñaḥ iti labhyate prasiddha vana kartuḥ asarvajña tvāt saḥ eva kṣiti ādikartā iti katham na sārvajñyam iti ced na tad bhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt na hi kāryatva ādi hetuḥ kartāram iva tasya sarvatra eka tvam gamayitum śaknoti lāghavāt eka tvam āśrīyate iti ced loka darśana anusāreṇa kartāram kalpayataḥ gaurava āśrayaṇasya eva ucita tvāt loke hi gaja gavaya gardabha ādīnām ghaṭa ādīnām ca nirmātāraḥ vijātīyāḥ eva upalabhyante na ca vana kartā kiñcijjñaḥ iti sādhane kim īśvarasya iti vācyam tasya ca īśvara tāyāḥ pareṇa anyathā vana kartari siddhe kim īśvarasiddhau= āyātam iti api syāt na kevalam kiñcijjña tva sādhanam sukaram kintu sva kṛta kārya ajña tvam api śakya sādhanam iti āśayena āha vṛkṣa kṛt iti 
NSu_1.1.117ab.1–1.1.117ab.3	 vṛkṣa kṛt na akhilam vṛkṣam vetti puṃstvāt hi caitra vat vṛkṣa kṛt iti pūrvavat dharmi grāhaka virodha āśraya asiddhi parihārāya uktam prasiddha kartṛ rahitā iti api yojyam anyathā siddha sādhana tā prasaṅgāt akhilam iti ārambhaka avayava saṅkhayā pala parimāṇa viśeṣa sahitam asmāt ādīnām vipratipanna vṛkṣa jñāna mātra sadbhāvāt anaikāntya parihārāya akhilam iti uktam hi iti vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvam sūcayati na hi yaḥ yad kartā sa sakalam tat jānāti iti niyamaḥ kulāla ādau= abhāvāt anupayogāt ca tat jñānasya iti anena eva nyāyena sarvatra pratipakṣa sambhavāt satya saṅkalpa tva aśarīri tva nitya jñāna icchā prayatna tva duḥkha ādirāhitya ādikam api na anumānena sādhayitum śakyam iti āśayavān āha ityādi iti 
NSu_1.1.117c–1.1.117f.2	 ityādi anumayā spardhi na anumānam pareśituḥ śaktam vijñāpane ādi śabdaḥ prakāra vacanaḥ pareśituḥ satya saṅkalpa tva ādi upetasya ābhāsa samāna yogakṣemam ca īśvara anumāna jātam iti āha ca atiprasaṅgaḥ iti  ca atiprasaṅgaḥ anumaya īdṛśāḥ īdṛśāḥ āgama ādi sahāya sampadam apahāya atyanta atīndriya arthe prayujyamānayā anumayā atiprasaṅgaḥ cabhavati iti arthaḥ atiprasaṅgam eva darśayati vastu tvāt iti 
NSu_1.1.118a–1.1.118a–1.1.118d.2^1	 vastu tvāt turagaḥ śṛṅgī puṣpa vat kham sutaiḥ yutā citriṇī ca rasaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ rasa tvāt sa uttaraḥ bhavet citriṇī vandhyā ṣaṣṭhaḥ rasaḥ rasa antaravān iti ukte prathama ādi rasena siddha sādhanam syāt saptamarasavān iti ukte aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā syāt atas sa uttaraḥ iti uktam īśvara anumānasya pramāṇa tāyām eteṣām api prāmāṇyam syāt iti śeṣaḥ nanu vastu tvam ghaṭa ādau= anaikāntikam iti ced na tasya api pakṣa tvāt turagṛṅga ādīnām anupalambha bādhaḥ iti ced kṣiti ādi sa kartuḥ api evam eva ayogya tvāt na upalabhyate iti ced turaga viṣāṇam api evam astu na ca viṣāṇam nāma mahat tve sati udbhūta rūpa śarīra avayava viśeṣaḥ sa katham upalabdhi ayogyaḥ syāt iti ced 
NSu_1.1.118a–1.1.118d.2^2–1.1.118d.3	 kartā api tarhi kulāla ādiḥ iva mahat tve sati adbhuta rūpa śarīra vān katham upalabdhi ayogyaḥ bhaviṣyati aśarīra tvāt na upalabhyate iti ced rūpa abhāvāt tura ga viṣāṇam api tathā astu viṣāṇam rūpavat eva iti ced kartā api śarīravān eva śarīram kartṛ tve anupayuktam iti ced na kim upayogena na hi tad utpattyā vyāptiḥ bauddhānām iva bhavatām dharma ādimattvam śarīri tve prayojakam iti ced na tasya api kartṛ tvena sādhanāt iti nanu katham atra prayoktavyam anumāna tvam yadi kāryatva ādau varteta tadā tad aviśiṣṭe vastu tva ādau varteta iti evam iti nanu vicāra śāstram ārabhya jagat kāraṇe anumāna an avakāśa vyutpādanam vyāhatam iti āśaṅkām pariharan= upasaṃharati upakrama ādi iti 
NSu_1.1.118ef.1–1.1.118ef.3	 upakrama ādi liṅgebhyaḥ na anyāsyāt anumā tatas āgama anugṛhīta anumāna upalakṣaṇam etat āgama anugrahe hi sarvāṇi etāni anumānāni eva pakṣa dharma tā ādīnām aṅgānām apauruṣeya tayā svatas pramāṇena śāstreṇa siddheḥ pratipakṣa ādīnām ca tad virodhena bādhāt iti saṅkṣepaḥ tat evam jagat kāraṇa tvasya śāstra eka samadhigamya tvāt na anumāna ādinā lakṣaṇasya ati vyāpti kathanam yuktam iti siddham 
NSu_1.1.118ef.4	 atra kecid śāstrasya yoniḥ iti vyācakṣate tad anupapannam prakṛta anupayogāt na hi śāstra kāraṇa tvam jagat kāraṇa tve hetuḥ vyāpti adarśanāt pūvarsūtre jagat kāraṇa tvena pratītam sārvajñam brahmaṇaḥ veda kāraṇa tvena sphuṭīkriyate iti ced na vedasya api sakala jagat antarbhāvāt katham ca ananta padārtha ātmakasya prapañcasya kartṛ tvena na sphuṭam tad eka deśa veda kāraṇa tvena sphuṭībhaviṣyati sārvajñam atha jagat kāraṇa tvam pradhāna ādi vyudāsena brahmaṇi eva sādhayitum hetu tvena uktam sārvajñam śāstra yoni tvena sādhyate iti ced na asiddhi prasaṅgāt na hi brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tvam anaṅgīkurvāṇaḥ veda kāraṇa tvam aṅgīkaroti āgamena sādhyate iti ced tarhi jagat kāraṇa tvam eva tena kim na sādhyate īkṣati adhikaraṇa ādinā janma ādi sūtrasya punar ukta prasaṅgāt ca jagat kāraṇa tvena sa varjña tvam na siddhayati veda ākartṛ tvāt iti āśaṅkayā it am uktam iti ced na tathā sati pratijñā mātra tva prasaṅgāt viyat ādi viṣayepi evam āśaṅkā prasaṅgāt viyat adhi karaṇa ādau sā api nirākariṣyate iti ced na tarhi tena eva idam gata artham syāt 
NSu_1.1.118ef.5^1	 kiñca veda kartṛ tva abhāve sārvajñyam na sambhavati iti śaṅkā eva nirdalāḥ na hi tad kartrā eva tat jñātavyam iti niyamaḥ asti kiñca veda kartṛ tvam katham sārvajñya sādhakam yaḥ yāvat artha pratipādakasya vākyasya praṇetā sa tatas api adhikam artham jānāti eva yathā pāṇini ādiḥ ayam ca aśeṣa artha pratipādakasya śāstrasya praṇetātaḥ katham na sarvatra iti ced na kim idam veda praṇetṛ tvam nāma kim pramāṇa antareṇa artham upalabhya sva icchayā prabandhaka tṛ tvam kim vā uccāraṇa mātram ādye pauruṣeya tva āpattiḥ dvitīye sārvajñyā siddhiḥ 
NSu_1.1.118ef.5^2–1.1.118ef.7	 upādhyāya vat rajjau bhujaṅga vat brahmaṇi āropitaḥ vedaḥ iti ced katham tarhi pāṇini ādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ na hi pāṇinau= āropitam vyākaraṇam katham ca evam sati sārvajñya siddhiḥ tasya eva vijñāna śakti vivarta tvāt śāstrasya iti ced viyat ādīnām api prakāśa śakti prasaṅgāt avidyā gata āvaraṇa ādi śakteḥ api brahmaṇi tāttvika tva prasaṅgāt kiñca vede jñāna karaṇa tva śaktiḥ brahmaṇi ca tad kartṛ tva śaktiḥ iti kim kena saṅgatam kutra ca idam upalabdham āropya gatā śaktiḥ āra upa adhiṣṭhāne vāstavī iti tasmāt apavyākhyānam eva tat iti uktaḥ eva sūtra arthaḥ tat tu samanvayāt tat tu samanvayāt 
NSu_1.1.118ef.8–1.1.118ef.10	 astu śāstra eka samadhigamyam jagat kāraṇam tathā api śāstrataḥ eva anyeṣām hara hiraṇyagarbha ādīnām pradhāna ādīnām ca jagat kāraṇa tva pratīteḥ ati vyāpakam idam lakṣaṇam na ca tat śāstram viṣṇu param iti vācyam abhiyuktaiḥ śiva ādi paratvena vyākhyāta tvāt yadi api nāmāni sarvāṇi ityādi śrutyā śiva ādi nāmnām viṣṇau śakti mātram avasīyate tathā api na tātparye pramāṇam asti yat paraḥ śabdaḥ sa śabda arthaḥ iti hi nyāyaḥ na ca śakti mātreṇa tātparyam kalpayitum yuktam atiprasaṅgāt anyatra tātparya jñāpakam abhiyukta vyākhyānam asti iti uktam tasmāt alakṣaṇam etat iti āśaṅkaya parihṛtam sūtra kṛtā tat tu samanvayāt iti tattu samanvayāt tatra anvaya padārtham āha te eva iti 
NSu_1.1.119a.1–1.1.119a.3	 te eva anvaya nāmānaḥ upakrama ādayaḥ eva anvīyante śakti tātparya gocareṇa sambaddhayante tathā jñāyante iti yāvat vākyāni etaiḥ iti anvaya nāmānaḥ atra upakrama ādi prasiddha padam parityajya yaugikā anvaya pada parigrahaṇena idam sūcayati na śāstra tātparya avagatau= āpāta pratītiḥ vyākhyātṛ vacanam vā liṅgam kintu upakrama ādayaḥ eva teṣām avyabhicāri tvāt pratīti vyākhyānayoḥ tu vyabhicāri tvāt yatra api pratīvya ākhyāne na vyabhicarataḥ tatra api upakrama ādi anusandhāna pūrvaka tvena eva na tu svatas atas upajīvya tvāt upakrama ādīnām eva tātparyaliṅga tvam iti tat idam āha te eva iti sūtra vākyam yojayati taiḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.119b–1.1.119b–1.1.119d.2^1	 taiḥ samyak pravicārite mukhya arthaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarva śāstrasya na aparaḥ anena anvayāt iti eka vacanam samudāya artham iti uktam bhavati tena ca teṣām avirodham sūcayati saṃśabda arthaḥ samyak iti tasya ca pravicāritaḥ iti adhyāhṛta kriyayā sambandhaḥ darśitaḥ nanu ca pratīti vyākhyāna vat upakrama ādīnām api kvacid tātparya vyabhicāra darśanāt katham liṅga tvam iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya samyak pravicāritaḥ iti uktam upakrama ādīnām śruti ādīnām ca sannikarṣa viprakarṣābhyām sa avakāśa tva ādinā ca bala abala viniścaya puraḥsaram virodhe balavatā durbala bādhayā vākya artha vimarśaḥ samyak pravicāraṇam tena na upakrama ādi mātram liṅgam ucyate 
NSu_1.1.119b–1.1.119d.2^2	 yena vyabhicāra udbhāvanam saṅgaccheta kintu samyak pravicāra lakṣaṇauvāntara vyapāra upetāḥ eva upakrama ādayaḥ na ca te kvacid vayabhicaranti iti uktam bhavati pravicāritaḥ iti bhāve ktaḥ pravicāre kṛte sati iti śāstre pravicārite sati iti vā etat avagamyate iti vākya śeṣaḥ mukhya arthaḥ iti āvṛttyā saṃśabdasya artha antaram sarvā iti api saṃśabda arthaḥ eva śāstrasya arthaḥ iti śāstrayoni iti pūvarsūtrāt anuvṛttasya vyākhyānam bhagavān viṣṇuḥ iti tad śabda arthaḥ tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe tad vaya ākhyānam na aparaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.119b–1.1.119d.3	 tathā ca evam sūtra yojanā anvayāt upakrama ādi liṅga samudāyāt śāstre samyak pravicārite sati sarva śāstrasya bhagavati eva samyak vacana vṛttyā anvayāt śakti tātparya lakṣaṇa sambandhau= agamāt tat viṣṇu ākhyam brahma eva jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvena śāstra yoni na tu hara hiraṇyagarbha ādayaḥ iti ananta guṇa paripūrṇa tvam hi pradhāna lakṣaṇam tatra ca śāstram pramāṇīkriyamāṇam vacana vṛttyā sarvam eva ca yuktam lakṣaṇa ādinā vṛttau vācya artha guṇa alābhāt vācye tad guṇa prasaṅgāt ca evam katipaya vākyaiḥ ananta guṇa apratipādanāt vākya antara viṣayasya ca tad guṇattva prasaṅgāt ca atas saṃśabdasya āvṛttiḥ upapannāḥ 
NSu_1.1.119b–1.1.119d.5	 nanu janma ādyasya yatas iti yat śabda śravaṇāt tat brahma iti prakṛtam tat eva atra maṇḍūka plutya anuvartiṣyate kim punar atra tad grahaṇena mā evam tuśabdaḥ tāvat atra itara vyāvṛtti artham upādeyaḥ na ca tasya tat iti anuktau anvayaḥ pratyetum śakyate yatas avadhāraṇam tatas anyatra niṣedhaḥ iti vacanāt naca anuvṛttena anvaya pratītiḥ bhaviṣyati iti vācyam śrutena anvayāt iti anena eva sambandha pratīti prasaṅgāt tatra upayoga abhāvāt na iti ced na pratīti vyākhyāna nirāsa artha tva upapatteḥ anvaya padāt eva tad siddhiḥ iti ced na tasya upakrama ādīnām liṅga tva pratipādanaḥ eva caritārtha tva sambhavāt atas sārthakam sūtre tad grahaṇam saṃśabdena sakala padānām lakṣaṇayā brahma prātipadikā artha mātra paratvam ucyate iti vyākhyānam akhaṇḍa artha nirāsena nirastam nirākariṣyate ca uttaratra iti na iha nirākṛtam 
NSu_1.1.119b–1.1.119b–1.1.119d.10^1	 tat evam jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvena mukhyayā vṛttyā varṇa pada vākya ātmaka aśeṣa śāstra pratipādyam nārāyaṇa ākhyam brahma eva iti sustham lakṣaṇam iti siddham īkṣateḥ na aśabdam īkṣateḥ na aśabdam vacana vṛttyā eva sakala śāstra pratipādyam brahma iti uktam tat ākṣipya samādhātum idam adhikaraṇam ārabhyate tathā hi yatas vācaḥ nivartante aaśabdam asparśam a ityādi śruteḥ śabdaḥ na yatra purukārakavān a ityādi smṛteḥ ca brahma avācyam avasīyate vacana vṛttiḥ ca dravya guṇa kriyā jāti nimittāḥ na ca brahmaṇaḥ dravya ādi yogaḥ asti kevalaḥ nirguṇaḥ ca aniṣkalam niṣkriyam śāntam a iti ādi a āgamāt tat katham tasya vācya tā sambhavati aupaniṣada tvam ca lakṣaṇayā vṛttyā sambhavat na vācya tām apekṣate atas avācya tvāt brahmaṇaḥ na vacana vṛttyā śāstra gamya tvam iti aparaḥ āha na sarva śāstra pratipādya tvam brahmaṇaḥ sambhavati niścaya upāya abhāvāt upakrama ādayaḥ hi tad niścaya upāyāḥ 
NSu_1.1.119b–1.1.119d.10^2	 taiḥ ca asmad ādi adhigata śāstrasya kathañcid brahma viṣaya tā avadhāraṇe api asmat anadhigata śāstrasya tad paratā avadhāraṇā yogāt anantāḥ vai vedāḥ a iti śruteḥ anantam hi śāstram avagamyate naca ananta śāstra adhigamaḥ asmākam kalpa koṭi śataiḥ api sambhavati viphalaḥ ca śāstra eka deśasya brahma paratva adhyavasāyaḥ eka deśa antare tad viparīta pratipādanasya api śaṅkanāt na ca vastuni vikalpaḥ sambhavati iti atra api sandehaḥ samāskandati iti atas na sarva śāstra prāmāṇyāt jagat janma ādi kāraṇam samasta guṇa paripūrṇam brahma siddhayati iti evam prāpte avācya tva śaṅkām tāvat nirācaṣṭe sūtrakāraḥ īkṣateḥ na aśabdam iti 
NSu_1.1.119b–1.1.119d.13	 īkṣateḥ na aśabdam tadvayā ācaṣṭe īkṣaṇīya tvataḥ iti atra īkṣateḥ iti dhātu nirdeśaḥ na ca avivakṣita artham śabda mātram brahmaṇaḥ vācya tve hetuḥ bhavitum arhati iti tad arthaḥ anena upalakṣyate na ca brahma asambandhi īkṣaṇam api atra hetuḥ bhavati atiprasaṅgāt sambandhaḥ ca na kartṛ tva ādi rūpaḥ śruti ananugamāt vipakṣe bādhaka abhāva prasaṅgāt ca atas īkṣaṇam brahma karmakam eva hetu tvena vācyam naca etat api yuktam vyadhikaraṇa tva prasaṅgāt tasmāt īkṣaṇa karma tvam eva hetu tayā vivakṣitam iti āśayena uktam īkṣaṇīya tvataḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.120ab.1–1.1.120ab.3^1	 īkṣaṇīya tvataḥ viṣṇuḥ vācyaḥ eva tat iti anuvartate tena viṣṇuḥ iti āha na vidyate vācakaḥ śabdaḥ yasya tat aśabdam avācyam iti arthaḥ vācyam iti vaktavye na avācyam iti vacanaṃdvau nañau prakṛtam artham sa atiśayam gamayataḥ a iti vacanāt avadhāraṇa artham iti abhipretya uktam vācyaḥ eva iti nanu avadhāraṇam api kimartham ucyate tattva nirṇaya artham hi nyāya sūtram nirṇayaḥ ca sva para pakṣa sādhana upalambhābhyām eva bhavati na anyatara mātreṇa yathā uktam vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.120ab.1–1.1.120ab.3^2	 tad atra avadhāraṇe kṛte vācya tva vidhiḥ avācya tva niṣedhaḥ ca iti ubhayam api śruti arthābhyām pratijñātam syāt ubhaya sādhana arthaḥ ca īkṣaṇīya tva hetuḥ vijñāyate tathā ca nirṇayaḥ bhavet vācyam iti tu pratijñāte para pakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ na kṛtaḥ syāt na ca tad artham anyat sūtram asti atas yuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ evam anyatra api veditavyam idam uktam bhavati brahma vācyam bhavitum arhati na punar avācyam īkṣaṇa karma tvāt ghaṭa vat īkṣaṇīya tvam ca brahmaṇaḥ saḥ etasmāt jīva dhanāt parātparam puriśayam puruṣam īkṣate aa ātmani eva ātmānam paśyet a ityādi śruti siddham iti 
NSu_1.1.120ab.4–1.1.120ab.5^1	 nanu brahmaṇaḥ vācya tva abhāve kim bādhakam īkṣaṇīya tvam na syāt tathā ca brahma jñāna abhāvena śāstra vaiyarthyam anirmokṣaḥ ca syāt iti ced na vācya tvasya avyāpaka tvāt īkṣaṇīya tvasya avyāpya tvāt ca na hi avyāpaka nivṛttiḥ avyāpya nivṛttim āpādayitum śaknoti īkṣaṇīya tvam hi pratyakṣa anumāna āgama tad ābhāsa nimittam vyāpakam yuktam vācya tvam ca śabda vṛtti viśeṣa upādhikam vyāpyam eva iti mā evam na tāvat idam mokṣa artham upadiṣyam brahma īkṣaṇam pramāṇa ābhāsa janyam bhrānteḥ avidyā nivartaka tva abhāvāt na api pratyakṣa anumāna jam 
NSu_1.1.120ab.4–1.1.120ab.5^2	 śāstra eka samadhigamya tāyāḥ sādhita tvāt tathā ca prakāra antara abhāve sati yadi brahma vācyam api na bhavet tat ā īkṣaṇīyam api na bhavet iti bādhakam sambhavati eva na ca vyāpti asambhavaḥ vyatireka sambhavāt yat yad kārakā viṣayaḥ tat tad kriyā viṣayaḥ yathā kuṭhāra ādya viṣayaḥ gaganam na chidāviṣayaḥ iti sāmānya vyāpti sambhavāt ca nanu mā abhūt pramāṇa ābhāsaiḥ pratyakṣa anumānābhyām ca aikṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ mā ca bhūt vācyam tathā api śabda lakṣyatayā īkṣaṇīyam ca bhaviṣyati tathā ca vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojakaḥ hetuḥ iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_1.1.120bc.1–1.1.120bc.3	 naca anyathā lakṣya tvam kvāpi dṛṣṭam hi hi yasmāt anyathā vācya tva abhāve lakṣya tvam kvāpi na dṛṣṭam tasmāt avācya tve brahmaṇaḥ lakṣya tva abhāvāt lakṣaṇayā api na īkṣaṇīya tvam iti śeṣaḥ kenacid śabdena vācyam eva hi tīra ādikam kenacid lakṣyam dṛṣṭam iti nanu avācyam api lakṣyam kim na syāt tatas ca vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojakaḥ ayam prasaṅga hetuḥ iti atas āha kim tat iti 
NSu_1.1.120d.1–1.1.120d.2	 kim tat iti anavasthitiḥ anyathā iti anuvartate yadi avācyam api brahma lakṣyam iti aṅgīkriyate tadā kim tat iti jijñāsā pravṛttau= anavasthitiḥ idam uktam bhavati lākṣaṇikaḥ hi śabdaḥ na śruta mātraḥ artha antare dhiyam upajanayati tatra agṛhīta śakti tvāt kintu vācya artharbuddhim utpādya tad anupapatti darśane sati na tāvatā api vācya artha anupapatti darśanasya tad tyāga mātra hetu tvāt kim nāma artha antarasya svarūpataḥ vācya artha sambandhi tayā ca avagatau satyām gaṅgā ādi śabdena hi svarūpataḥ gaṅgā ādi sambandhi tayā ca avagatam eva tīra ādikam lakṣyam dṛṣṭam na anavagata svarūpam kūrma roma ādi 
NSu_1.1.120d.3^1	 na api anya sambandhi tayā avagatam tīra ādi tathā ca vaidika śabda lakṣya tve brahmaṇaḥ pratītiḥ aṅgī kāryāḥ na ca tīra ādi vat pratyakṣa ādinā tasya pratītiḥ tatas lākṣaṇika śabde prayukte vācya arthe anupapattim paśyataḥ lakṣaṇīye arthe kim tat yat anena lakṣyam iti jijñāsāyām śabdaḥ eva prayoktavyaḥ tena api ced na vācyam kintu lakṣyam eva tarhi punar kim tat iti jijñāsāyāḥ anivṛtta tvāt śabda antaram eva vācyam tena api ced lakṣyam eva punar jijñāsā eva iti aparyavasānam syāt pūrva pūrva lakṣaṇā siddhau= uttara uttara lakṣaṇā siddheḥ mūla kṣatiḥ yadi ca kenacid śabdena vācyam syāt tadā tad uktau= uparata jijñāsaḥ lākṣaṇika kāryam pratīyāt 
NSu_1.1.120d.3^2	 vācya tve api sambandha grahaṇāya pūrva siddheḥ apekṣita tvena anavasthiteḥ iti ced na abhimāni adhikaraṇe vaktavya tvāt tasmāt vipakṣe anavasthā lakṣaṇa bādhaka sadbhāvāt avācya tve lakṣya tvam na syāt iti yuktaḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ iti lākṣaṇikaḥ hi śabdaḥ na śruta mātraḥ artha antare dhiyam upajanayati tatra agṛhīta śakti tvāt kintu vācya artharbuddhim utpādya tad anupapatti darśane sati na tāvatā api vācya artha anupapatti darśanasya tad tyāga mātra hetu tvāt kim nāma artha antarasya svarūpataḥ vācya artha sambandhi tayā ca avagatau satyām gaṅgā ādi śabdena hi svarūpataḥ gaṅgā ādi sambandhi tayā ca avagatam eva tīra ādikam lakṣyam dṛṣṭam na anavagata svarūpam kūrma roma ādi na api anya sambandhi tayā avagatam tīra ādi 
NSu_1.1.120d.4	 tathā ca vaidika śabda lakṣya tve brahmaṇaḥ pratītiḥ aṅgī kāryāḥ na ca tīra ādi vat pratyakṣa ādinā tasya pratītiḥ tatas lākṣaṇika śabde prayukte vācya arthe anupapattim paśyataḥ lakṣaṇīye arthe kim tat yat anena lakṣyam iti jijñāsāyām śabdaḥ eva prayoktavyaḥ tena api ced na vācyam kintu lakṣyam eva tarhi punar kim tat iti jijñāsāyāḥ anivṛtta tvāt śabda antaram eva vācyam tena api ced lakṣyam eva punar jijñāsā eva iti aparyavasānam syāt pūrva pūrva lakṣaṇā siddhau= uttara uttara lakṣaṇā siddheḥ mūla kṣatiḥ yadi ca kenacid śabdena vācyam syāt tadā tad uktau= uparata jijñāsaḥ lākṣaṇika kāryam pratīyāt vācya tve api sambandha grahaṇāya pūrva siddheḥ apekṣita tvena anavasthiteḥ iti ced na abhimāni adhikaraṇe vaktavya tvāt tasmāt vipakṣe anavasthā lakṣaṇa bādhaka sadbhāvāt avācya tve lakṣya tvam na syāt iti yuktaḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.120d.5	 nanu ikṣu kṣīra guḍa ādīnām viśeṣāḥ tāvat vidyante anubhava siddha tvāt na ca te kena api śabdena vācyāḥ tad vācaka śabda abhāvāt tathā api lakṣyāḥ dṛśyante anyathā tatra vāc vyavahāra abhāva prasaṅgāt atas avācya tve lakṣya tvam na syāt iti prasaṅgaḥ praśithila mūlaḥ yathā uktam ikṣu kṣīra guḍa ādīnām mādhuryasya antaram mahat bhedaḥ tathā api na ākhyātum sarasvatyā api śakyate a iti yathā mādhurya ādi viśeṣāṇām avācyānām api pratīta tā mātreṇa lakṣya tvāt tathā brahmaṇaḥ avācyasya api svayaṃprakāśa tvena prasiddhasya lakṣya tvam sambhavati iti atas āha mādhurya ādi iti 
NSu_1.1.121ab.1–1.1.121ab.2	 mādhurya ādi viśeṣāḥ ca tad śabdaiḥ uditāḥ sadā tad śabdaiḥ mādhurya ādi viśeṣa śabdaiḥ sadā iti avadhāraṇa arthe uditā vācyāḥ eva iti nanu mādhurya viśeṣa śabdaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ kim etāvatā na hi go śabdaḥ aneka arthaḥ iti na kasi api vācakaḥ tathā ca lakṣakaḥ api na syāt vācya artha dvāra tvāt lakṣaṇāyāḥ nanu vācaka tvam pada dharmaḥ mādhurya ādi viśeṣaḥ iti ca na padam kintu vākyam eva anepada ātmaka tvāt tathā ca katham tat śabdaiḥ uditāḥ iti mā evam aikapadyam ā eka svarvam ca samāsa prayojanam iti śabdaiḥ aṅgīkṛta tvāt athavā tad śabdaiḥ sūda śāstra ādi prasiddhaiḥ vācaka śabdaiḥ uditāḥ iti vyākhyeyam tathā ca uktam 
NSu_1.1.121ab.3–1.1.121ab.4	 viśadam kṣīra mādhuryam sthiram ājyasya tīkṣṇakam guḍasya panasa ādīnām nirhari iti abhidhīyate a  iti yathā ca dhvani viśeṣāṇām manda vyutpattibhiḥ aviditāḥ api śruti svara jāti rāga ādi śabdāḥ vācakāḥ saṅgīta śāstra prasiddhāḥ tathā mādhurya ādi viśeṣāṇām api tad tad adhikṛta śāstreṣu prasiddhāḥ vācakāḥ śabdāḥ katham na syuḥ tatas ca aikṣu kṣīra guḍa ādīnām a iti vacanam ātmanaḥ vyutpatti abhāva khyāpana artham śārada anindayā pratyavāya arjana artham ca atas na praśithila mūlaḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ iti yat api sva prakāśa tayā siddha tvāt brahmaṇā ulakṣya tva upapattiḥ iti tad upariṣyāt nirākariṣyate 
NSu_1.1.121ab.5	 nanu avācyaḥ api nadī tīra phala saṃsarga lakṣaṇaḥ vākya arthaḥ lakṣyaḥ nadī ādi padaiḥ upalakṣyate yathā uktam vākya arthaḥ lakṣyamāṇaḥ hi sarvatra eva iti naḥ sthitiḥ a  iti tathā ca vyāpti abhāvāt aprayojakaḥ ayam prasaṅgaḥ vākya arthaḥ ca brahma abhyupeyate na padārthaḥ atas laukika vākya arthavat avācyam api lakṣyam kim na syāt iti atas āha vākya arthaḥ api iti 
NSu_1.1.121cd.1–1.1.121cd.3	 vākya arthaḥ api hi vākya artha śabdena eva uditaḥ bhavet eva śabdasya uditaḥ iti sambandhaḥ vākya artha śabdasya vākya artha avācaka tve anyat tat vācyam vācyam na hi asmābhiḥ lakṣakena eva śabdena vācya tvam āśāsyate kintu kenacid śabdena vācyam eva kenacid śabdena lakṣyam iti bhāvaḥ ayam ca aṅgīkāra vādaḥ jñeyaḥ anvita abhidhānasya samarthita tvāt brahmaṇaḥ vākya artha tvam tu saṃsarga tvasya saṃsṛṣṭa tvasya vā anaṅgīkārāt ayuktam vākyasya akhaṇḍa artha niṣṭhatayā nirasta tvāt evam vyabhicāram nirasya susthā prasaṅga mūla bhūtā vyāptiḥ iti āha na avācyam iti 
NSu_1.1.122a.1–1.1.122a.3	 na avācyam tena kiñcid syāt lakṣyam iti śeṣaḥ athavā brahmaṇaḥ avācya tve tasya vastu tvam eva na syāt yatas avācyam kiñcid api na asti iti prasaṅga antara sūcanam idam nanuyataḥ vācaḥ nivartante a iti ādi a āgama virodhāt kāla atyaya apadiṣyam īkṣaṇīya tvena vācya tva sādhanam prasaṅgānām ca viparyaya aparyavasānam iti syāt etat evam yadi brahma avācya tvam śruti arthaḥ syāt na ca evam tathā vyākhyāne sva kriyā virodha āpatteḥ iti āha yatas iti 
NSu_1.1.122.1–1.1.122.3	 yatas iti ādikaiḥ vadan avācya tvam katham brūyāt mūkaḥ aham iti vat sudhīḥ yatas ityādi śabdaiḥ brahma uktavā tasya avācya tvam vācyam anyathā yasya kasyacid avācya tā apatteḥ tathā ca yatas iti ādikaiḥ padaiḥ brahma eva vadan katham punar tasya avācya tvam śruti artha tayā brūyāt mūkaḥ aham iti vat sva kriyā virodhāt sudhīḥ iti viparīta lakṣaṇayā parasya akovida tvam āha syāt evam sva kriyā virodhaḥ yadi yatas ityādi śabdaiḥ brahma vacana vṛttyā uktavā tasya avācya tvam ucyate na tu evam kim nāma yatas ityādi śabdaiḥ lakṣyam eva iti atas kva asti sva kriyā virodhaḥ iti atas āha yena iti 
NSu_1.1.123ab.1–1.1.123ab.3	 yena lakṣyam iti proktam lakṣya śabdena saḥ avadat brahma lakṣyam iti vadatā api lakṣya śabda vācya tvam tasya aṅgīkartavyam tathā ca kim śabda antareṇa aparāddham atha lakṣya śabdena api lakṣyate na tu ucyate iti brūyāt tadā kim tat iti apekṣāyām śabda antaram brūyāt iti anavasthā syāt atha yāvat pada jātam brahmaṇi prayujyate tat sarvam api lakṣaṇayā eva iti parihāre kutas anavasthā iti ced na anavabodhāt na hi praśna parihāra krama nimittā iyam anavasthā yena sakṛt eva uttareṇa nivarteta kintu lakṣaṇāyāḥ pratīti pūrvaka tvāt śabdena vinā pratyāyaka antara abhāvāt tatra api lakṣaṇā aśrayaṇe mūla kṣayāt atas sva kriyā virodhān na idam śruti vyākhyānam iti na anumāna ādeḥ kaścid doṣaḥ aviruddham tu vyākhyānam uttaratra kariṣyate iti itas ca na brahmaṇi śrutānām vaidikānām sarva śabdānām lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇam yuktam iti āha ekasya api iti 
NSu_1.1.123cd.1–1.1.124.2	 ekasya api hi śabdasya gauṇa artha svīkṛtau satām mahatī jāyate lajjā yatra tatra akhilāḥ ravāḥ amukhya arthāḥ iti vadan yaḥ tad mārga anuvartinām katham na jāyate lajjā vaktum śābda tvam ātmanaḥ yatra vede satām viduṣām ekasya api śabdasya mukhya artha parityāgena amukhya artha svīkṛtau kṛtāyām mahatī lajjā jāyate tatra akhilāḥ api śabdāḥ amukhya arthāḥ iti vadanyaḥ tasya ātmanaḥ śābda tvam śabda śakti tāt paryajña tvam vaktum katham lajjā na jāyate kebhyaḥ tad mārga anuvartinām śabda śakti tāt paryajña tvam vaktum katham lajjā na jāyate kebhyaḥ tad mārga anuvartinām śabda śakti tātparya anusāriṇām viduṣām sakāśāt iti yojanā tasya vyākhyātuḥ mārga anuvartinām śabda śakti tātparya anusāriṇām viduṣām sakāśāt iti yojanā tasya vyākhyātuḥ mārgam anuvartamānānām katham na jāyate lajjā iti vā tathā satya ātmanām iti bahuvacana antam padam adhyāhāryam 
NSu_1.1.124.3	 nanu na tāvat mukhya artha parityāgena amukhya artha svīkāraḥ eva lajjā hetuḥ tathā satigaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ akuṇḍa pāyinām ayane māsam agnihotram juhoti a iti ādau= amukhya artha grahaṇa abhāva prasaṅgāt kim nāma mukhya arthe sambhavati eva amukhya artha svīkāraḥ doṣaḥ mukhya arthaḥ hi śakti grahaṇa vaśāt prathamam buddhayā ārūḍhaḥ bhavati vinā ca prathama atikrame kāraṇam jaghanya pratipatti svīkāre katham anaucityam na bhavet yatra tu mukhya arthe bādhakam asti tatra tad aparityāgaḥ eva lajjā hetuḥ gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ asiṃhaḥ devadattaḥ a iti atra gaṅgā ādi śabdasya mukhya artha aṅgīkāraḥ eva doṣaḥ tat katham etat satyam eva etat prakṛte api na mukhya artha svīkāre bādhakam asti iti ācāryaḥ manyate bādhikāyāḥ śruteḥ nirguṇa tva upapatteḥ ca nirasta tvāt iti 
NSu_1.1.124.4^1	 atra āha dve brahmaṇī nirguṇam sa guṇam ca tatra nirguṇam nitya śuddha buddha mukta svabhāvam paripūrṇam tat eva māyā śabalita tvena eva ārya ādi dharmavat tayā sa guṇam ucyate māyāyāḥ ca anirvācya tayā tad avacchinnasya na tathā abhāvaḥ tāttvikaḥ iti na kūṭastha tva hāniḥ tatra sa guṇam eva parātparam puruṣam īkṣate iti ādau= īkṣaṇīya tvena ucyate tatas ca īkṣaṇīya tvam vācya tvena vinā na upapadyate ced sa guṇam vācyam astu na nirguṇam tasya īkṣaṇīya tve pramāṇa abhāvāt na hi anya gatena vyāpyena anyatra vyāpaka siddhiḥ atiprasaṅgāt na ca parātparam ityādīni eva nirguṇa viṣayāṇi jñāpaka abhāvāt na ca vācyam mā bhūt anu mānena nirguṇasya vācya tva siddhiḥ 
NSu_1.1.124.4^2	 pakṣīkṛte liṅga abhāvāt liṅgavati siddha sādhanaāt tathā apisarve vedāḥ yat padam āmananti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yat vat anti a ityādi śruti balāt vācya tvam nirguṇasya setsyati iti māyā śabale gṛhīta saṅgatayaḥ sarve vedāḥ lakṣaṇayā yat padam āmananti iti artha upapatteḥ naca avācyasya lakṣaṇa anupapattiḥ deṣaḥ prasiddha tā mātreṇa lakṣaṇa upapatteḥ sa guṇa pratītya eva ca nirguṇasya tad svabhāva bhūtasya sarva ātmanaḥ svatas siddha tvāt na ca tat eva īkṣaṇīya tvam yena vācya tva prasaktiḥ kintu prameya tvam na ca svaprakāsya prameya tvam iti tat etat āśaṅkaya pariharati sūtrakāraḥ gauṇaḥ ced na ātma śabdāt iti 
NSu_1.1.124.5–1.1.124.7	 gauṇaḥ ced na ātma śabdāt gauṇaḥ ced na ātma śabdāt parātparam a ityādi śrutiṣu gauṇaḥ eva ātma īkṣaṇīya tvena ucyate atas saḥ eva vācyaḥ astu na nirguṇaḥ tasya īkṣaṇīya tve pramāṇa abhāvāt parātparam iti ādi śrutīnām ca tad paratve jñāpaka abhāvāt kintu lakṣyaḥ eva asau a iti ced na ātma śabdāt upalakṣaṇam etat īkṣaṇīye vastuni ātma brahma puruṣa ādi śabda śravaṇāt teṣām ca pūrṇa abhidhāyi tvena nirguṇa jñāpaka tvāt iti 
NSu_1.1.124.8–1.1.124.12	 bhavet ātam ādi śabdaḥ pūrṇa artha vācī tathā api yatra dṛśye vācye vastuni prayujyate tatra sa guṇa viṣayaḥ eva iti niyama aṅgīkāre kaḥ doṣaḥ iti āśaṅkā parihāra artham sūtram tad niṣṭhasya mokṣa upadeśāt iti tad niṣṭhasya mokṣa upadeśāt tad niṣṭhasya mokṣa upadeśāt na ayam niyamaḥ yujyate yasya anuvittaḥ pratibaddhaḥ ātmā atarati śokam ātma vit a iti dṛśya ātma niṣṭhasya mokṣa upadeśāt na hi gauṇa ātma niṣṭhasya mokṣaḥ upapadyate iti atra prathama sūtre parātparam ityādiṣu vākyeṣu nirguṇa jñāpaka uktayā hetu siddhiḥ samarthitā jñāpakasya ca anyathā siddhiḥ uttara sūtre parihṛtyetāvat sūtra dvayatātparyam sphuṭam avagamyate adhikam vivakṣuḥ āha ātmā iti 
NSu_1.1.125.1–1.1.128a.2	 ātma brahma ādayaḥ śabdāḥ sākṣāt pūrṇa abhidhāyinaḥ janma ādi kāraṇam brahma lakṣitam ca yadā tadā vandhyā putra upamam māyā śabalam vācyam iti api kalpayitvā vinā mānam lakṣyam śuddham vadan padaiḥ ātma śabda uditasya eva jñānam muktauvasādhanam āha śruta parityāgaḥ syāt ca asya aśruta kalpanam syāt sarvatra ca yaḥ vādī tat etat anirvācī a māyā ākhya jñāna śabalam kiñcid brahma kalpayitvā tat eva vaidikaiḥ aśeṣa pada vācyam iti api kalpayitvā māyatītam śuddham sarvajñam sarva śakti paripūrṇam asmad abhimatam param brahma padaiḥ lakṣyam iti vadan vadati asya vādinaḥ śruta parityāgaḥ sarvatra sarva vākyeṣu syāt katham vacana vṛttyā eva prathama pratītasya śuddhasya brahmaṇaḥ vinā kāraṇena parityāgāt katham śuddhasya pratīta tvam ātma brahma ādi śabdānām vede śravaṇāt ātma brahma ādi śabdāḥ ca sākṣāt vacana vṛttyā pūrṇa abhidhāyinaḥ yadā yasmāt tadā tasmāt śruta parityāgaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.128a.3–1.1.128a.4	 na kevalam śruta parityāgaḥ kintu sarvatra api vākyeṣu aśruta kalpanam ca syāt katham māyā śabalasya brahmaṇaḥ vandhyā putra upama tvāt tat katham vinā mānam māna abhāvāt tat api katham śrutiṣu ātma brahma ādi śabda śravaṇāt teṣām ca pūrṇa abhidhāyi tvena māyā śabala viṣaya tvāt nanu yuṣmābhiḥ eva janma ādi sūtre māyā śabalasya lakṣya tvena aṅgīkṛta tvāt katham vandhyā putra upamam iti mā evam prathama sūtre jijñāsyatayā uktasya sarvajñasya sarva śakteḥ para brahmaṇa eva asmābhiḥ jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvena lakṣita tva aṅgīkārāt ityādi asūtra tātparyam ātma śabda uditasya iti dvitīyasya ātma ādi śabdaḥ parṇa arthaḥ api dṛśye śrutaḥ gauṇa viṣayaḥ iti niyamam yaḥ bravīti sa tathāvidhātma śabda uditasya jñānam muktāvasādhanam eva āha gauṇa ātma jñānasya mokṣa sādhanatva anupapatteḥ tathā ca asya śruta parityāgaḥ syāt dṛśya ātma jñānasya mokṣa sādhana tāya ayasya anuvittaḥ a ityādau śruta tvāt iti na ca evam āpādite śruta parityāga aśruta kalpane śakya aṅgīkāre iti āha yatra iti 
NSu_1.1.128ab.1–1.1.129ab.3	 yatra ekam api lokaḥ jugupsate yatra yayoḥ madhye ekam api prasaktam kim ubhayam iti śeṣaḥ atha loka jugupsitam api idam ubhayam na dūṣaṇam mama iti abhyupeyāt tatra āha niyamena iti niyamena ubhayam syāt hi yasya sva parayoḥ mate alaṅkṛtaḥ sadā eva ayam durghaṭaiḥ eva bhūṣaṇaiḥ asmābhiḥ āpādyate pareṇa aṅgīkriyate na hi lokajugupsitam nāma ekam pratijñā ahānya ādikam iva nigraha sthānam asti lokasya avyavasthita tvāt gatānugatikaḥ lokaḥ a iti vacanāt iti manvānena iti sva parayoḥ mate matena yasya niyamena ubhayam idam syāt ayam durghaṭaiḥ aṅgīkāra anarhaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ viparīta lakṣaṇayā dūṣaṇaiḥ ahaṅkṛtaḥ syāt yadi śrutam api viśuddham brahma parityajyate tarhi sakalaḥ api veda arthaḥ tyajyatām aviśeṣāt yadi ca aśnutam api māyā śabalam brahma kalpyate tadā caitya vandana ādeḥ svarga sādhana tva ādeḥ api kalpanīya tvam syāt viśeṣa abhāvāt iti āśayaḥ na kevalam śrautasya paramātmanaḥ tyāge ati prasaṅga mātram mahā pratyavāyaḥ api asti iti āha andham iti 
NSu_1.1.129cd.1–1.1.131.1	 andhantamaḥ nityu duḥkham tasya syāt vasana dvayam andhayati iti andham alaṅkṛtasya vasanābhyām bhāvyam vastra hīnam alaṅkāram ghṛta hīnam tu bhojanam bhāva hīnam tu sallāpam na praśaṃsanti paṇḍitāḥ a  iti vacanāt atas vasana dvayam idam syāt iti parihāsaḥ atra pramāṇam āha anandāḥ iti anandāḥ nāma te lokāḥ andhena tamasā avṛtāḥ tān= te pretya abhigacchanti avidvāṃsaḥ budhaḥ janāḥ asuryāḥ nāma te lokāḥ andhena tamasā avṛtāḥ tān= te pretya abhigacchanti ye keca ātmahanaḥ janāḥ 
NSu_1.1.132ab.1–1.1.132cd.3	 iti ādi śrutayaḥ mānam śataśas atra samantataḥ na vidyante nandaḥ ānandaḥ yeṣu te anandāḥ te iti prasiddhāḥ bodhanāt bhudvedaḥ tasmāt api ye avidvāṃsaḥ vedena mukhyayā vṛttyā pratipāditam api paramātama svarūpam apalapantaḥ iti arthaḥ suṣṭhu ramaṇa viruddha tvāt asura prāpya tvāt ca asuryāḥ ātma hanaḥ veda vācyaparama ātma tyāginaḥ atra ukta arthe samantataḥ sarvāsu api śākhāsu dṛśye vastuni śrutaḥ ātma śabdaḥ gauṇa paraḥ iti niyamam hetu antareṇa apākurvat sūtram paṭhitvā sūtre sādhya nirdeśa abhāvena sākāṅkṣam vākyam pūrayati heya tva iti heya tva avacanāt ca heya tva avacanāt ca heya tva avacanāt ca eva na ātmā gauṇaḥ śrutau śrutaḥ eva śabdaḥ na eva iti sambaddhayate dṛśya tvena iti śeṣaḥ evam sūtra svarūpam nirdhārya vyācaṣṭe tam eva iti 
NSu_1.1.133.1–1.1.133.3	 tam eva ekam jānathā anyāḥ vācaḥ muñcatha ca iti ha uktaḥ ātmā katham gauṇaḥ heya pakṣe hi asau śrutaḥ dṛśyaḥ ātmā gauṇaḥ eva iti niyamam aṅgīkurvāṇenatam eva ekam jānathe ātmānam anyāḥ vācaḥ vimuñcatha amṛtasya eṣa setuḥ aiti śrutaḥ api ātmā gauṇaḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ tasya tam jānathā iti dṛśya tva śravaṇāt katham ca ayam gauṇaḥ aṅgīkartam śakyaḥ yatas asau gauṇaḥ mumukṣuṇā heyeṣuātmā vācaḥ vimuñcatha a iti śrutaḥ asya ca heya tva avacanāt pratyuta tam eva ekam jānathā iti upādeya tva vacanāt ca caśabdaḥ vākya artha dvaya samuccaya arthaḥ hā iti āścarye nanu gauṇānām api brihma ādi devatānām upādeya tvam vakṣyati aṅga avabaddhāḥ tu iti ādau atas anaikāntikaḥ ayam hetuḥ iti atas āha parivāratayā iti 
NSu_1.1.134ab.1–1.1.134cd.1	 parivāra tayā grāhyāḥ api heyāḥ pradhānataḥ satyam viṣṇu parivāra tayā grāhyāḥ brahma ādayaḥ tathā api pradhāna tvena heyāḥ eva prādhānyena ca upādeya tvam atra hetu tvena vivakṣitam amṛtasya eṣa setuḥ iti vākya śeṣāt atas na vyabhicāraḥ iti evam ātma śabdasya nirguṇa viṣaya tvam upapādya nirguṇasya eva vācya tvam samarthitam hetu antareṇa asya eva arthasya upapādakam svāpyayāt a iti sūtram vyācaṣṭe pūrṇasya iti sva api ayāt sva api ayāt pūrṇasya pūrṇam ādāya pūrṇam eva avaśiṣyate 
NSu_1.1.135ab.1–1.1.135ab.3	 iti svasya eva pūrṇasya pūrṇe api ayaḥ udāhṛtaḥ pūrṇasya iti asyām śrutau tāvat kasyacid mahāpralaye svasya svasmin= eva apyayaḥ na anyatra līna bhāvaḥ udāhṛtaḥ svāpyaya śabdaḥ ca sautraḥ upalakṣaṇa mātram pūrṇa tvam api udāhartavyam tābhyām asau nirguṇaḥ iti jñāyate śruti ukta tvāt ca vācyaḥ iti atas nirguṇasya vācya tva siddhiḥ iti nanu svāpyayaḥ pūrṇa tvam ca sa guṇasya kim na syāt mā evam sa guṇasya svāpyaya an upapattiḥ tāvat bhāṣya eva uktāḥ pūrṇa tva anupapattim āha katham iti 
NSu_1.1.135cd.1–1.1.135cd.9	 katham māyā vyavacchinnaḥ pūrṇaḥ mukhya tayā bhavet vyāghātāt iti bhāvaḥ gati sāmānyāt atra gati sāmānyāt iti sūtram na tāvat brahmaṇaḥ vācya tva samarthana artham kintu śāstrasya ananta tvāt na sarva śāstra pratipādya tvam brahmaṇaḥ niścetum śakyam iti āśaṅkita doṣa parihāra artham iti atas prakaraṇa śuddhayā vyabhicara vyāsuḥ tad ullaṅghitavān vyākhyāsyati ca etat uttaratra sūtrakārasya api prakaraṇa sāṅkayarsya etat eva prayojanam yat ākṣepa dvaya samādhānasya pūrva sūtra stha saṃśabda artha samarthanam ekam eva prayojanam iti sūcanāt tena ca āvṛttyā saṃśabdasya aneka artha tā jñāpanam anyathā ekena arthena carita ārtasya artha antaram na jñāyeta tathā ca na lakṣaṇa dvayasya śāstrīyatā syāt iti upapatti antareṇa nirguṇasya brahmaṇaḥ vācya tvam upapādayitum sūtram śruta tvāt ca iti śruta tvāt ca śruta tvāt ca tasya arthaḥ ekaḥ devaḥ a iti asyām śrutau nirguṇasya brahmaṇaḥ śruta tvāt ca asya vācya tvam upapannam iti atra śrutaḥ api sa guṇaḥ kim na syāt iti atas āha padam ca iti 
NSu_1.1.136ab.1–1.1.136ab.3	 padam ca nirguṇaḥ iti katham gauṇam vadiṣyati atra hi vākye kevalaḥ nirguṇaḥ ca iti śrūyate nirguṇaḥ iti ca padam katham gauṇam vadiṣyati vyāhata tvāt atas na sa guṇaḥ atra śrutaḥ iti satyam asyām śrutau nirguṇa ādi pada pratipādyam nirguṇam brahma iti kintu lakṣaṇayā eva tathā ca katham anena nirguṇasya vācya tva siddhiḥ na ca vācyam nirguṇa śabdena nirguṇam ced lakṣyam tarhi tat vācyam vācyam vācya artha dvāra tvāt lakṣaṇāyāḥ na ca sa guṇam nirguṇa pada vācyam vyāghātāt sa guṇasya nirguṇa tvam tathā sati syāt iti guṇa abhāva viśiṣṭasya vācya tva aṅgīkārāt nirvikalpaka svarūpa mātrasya upalakṣya tvāt ekam eva hi nirviśeṣam vastu parama sūkṣmam guṇa abhāva ādi upādhibhiḥ īṣat sthūlam jātam guṇa ādi upādhibhiḥ tu sthūlataram iti atas nirguṇa śabdena guṇa abhāva viśiṣṭa vācya dvārā svarūpam upalakṣyam iti na kaścid virodhaḥ evam pūrṇa ādi padānām api lakṣaṇa aprakāraḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti āśaṅkayā uktam eva parihāram na vismara iti āha guṇa abhāva iti 
NSu_1.1.136cd.1–1.1.136cd.3	 guṇa abhāva upalakṣyam ced padam tat api vācakam nirguṇa padena guṇa abhāva viśiṣṭa vācya dvāra upalakṣyam ced śuddham brahma manyasaḥ iti arthaḥ api tathā api tat padam lakṣya padam brahmaṇaḥ vācakam aṅgīkaraṇīyam tathā ca vācya tvam eva āpatitam iti arthaḥ nanu lakṣya padena api brahma lakṣyam eva na vācyam iti ced na anavasthāyāḥ ukta tvāt kiñca nirguṇa pada lakṣyam iti anena api lakṣya tve kim asya vācyam na tāvat anyat tatra nirguṇa padasya eva aśravaṇena tad lakṣya padasya dūra utsārita tvāt śuddham ced kim lakṣaṇayā kiñca evam yat yat brahma tayā pratipādyate tat tat brahma iti vadatā sādhu samarthitaḥ brahma vādaḥ iti āśa yavān adhikaraṇa artham upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_1.1.137.1–1.1.137.3	 atas anavasthiti mukha sarva doṣa mahā āspadam katham etat matam sadbhiḥ ādriyeta vicakṣaṇaiḥ etat matam brahmaṇaḥ avācya tva matam anādaraṇe ca siddham sarva śāstra mukhya artha tvam brahmaṇaḥ iti śeṣaḥ evam īkṣateḥ na aśabdam iti ārabhya śruta tvāt ca iti antāni sūtrāṇi sva matena vyākhyāya pareṣām vyākhyānam pratyākhyāti na ca iti 
NSu_1.1.138a–1.1.138c.2^1	 na ca sāṅkhayaniḥ ākṛtyai sūtrāṇi etāni acīkpad bhagavān sarvajñam sarva śakti jagat utpatti sthiti nāśa kāraṇam brahma vedānta vedyam iti uktam tatra sa aṅkhayā manyante yāni brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tva pratipādaka tayā abhyugatāni sat eva somya idam agre āsīt a iti evamādīni vākyāni tāni sarvāṇi triguṇam acetanam pradhānam eva jagat kāraṇam pratipādayanti kutas brahmaṇaḥ jñāna kriyā śakti rahita tvāt jñāna kriyā kārya darśana unneya sadbhāve hi te na ca jñāna kriye cit ātmanaḥ staḥ tasya apariṇāmi tvāt eka tvāt ca 
NSu_1.1.138a–1.1.138c.2^2	 triguṇe tu pradhāne pariṇām iti na tayoḥ asambhava kāraṇam asti iti atas tadeva sat eva somya idam agre a ityādau jagat kāraṇa tayā pratipādyate iti evam prāpte pratividhīyate īkṣateḥ na aśabdam iti na sāṅkhaya parikalpitām acetanam pradhānam jagataḥ kāraṇam śakyam vedānta vākyeṣu āśrayitum aśabdam hi tat katham aśabda tvam īkṣateḥ tadā aikṣata bahusyām prajāyeya iti tat tejaḥ asṛjata ai aikṣata loka anusṛjāḥ iti saḥ imān= lokān asṛjata a saḥ īkṣām cakre sa prāṇam asṛjata a iti īkṣitṛ tva śravaṇāt kāraṇasya naca acetanasya pradhānasya īkṣitṛ tvam sambhavati 
NSu_1.1.138a–1.1.138c.3	 nanu ayam īkṣatiḥ gauṇaḥ vyākhyeyaḥ tat tejaḥ aikṣata tāḥ āpaḥ aikṣanta iti gauṇa prāya paṭhita tvāt yathā hi āsanna patanam kūlam ālakṣya kūlam pipatiṣati iti upacāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tathā asanna sarge pradhāne api aikṣatā iti upacāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas parihāram paṭhati gauṇaḥ ced na ātma śabdāt ap tejasoḥ iva acetane api pradhāne gauṇī ayam īkṣatiḥ iti asat kutas ātma śabdāt anena jīvena ātmanā iti na hi jīvaḥ cetanaḥ acetanasya pradhānasya ātmā sambhavati saḥ ātmā tat tvam asi iti ca na hi cetanasya śvetaketora cetanā aikya bodhanam upapannam 
NSu_1.1.138a–1.1.138c.4	 atha ucyeta acetane api pradhāne bhavati ātma śabdaḥ ātmanaḥ sarva artha kāri tvāt yathā rājñaḥ sarva artha kāriṇi bhṛtye mama ātmā bhadrasenaḥ iti ātma śabda darśanāt iti tatra uttaram tad niṣṭhasya mokṣa upadeśāt na evam ātma śabda ālambanam pradhānam kalpyam saḥ ātmā tattvam asi iti śvetaketoḥ tad niṣṭhām upadiśya tasya tāvat eva ciram iti mokṣa upadeśāt na hi acetana niṣṭhasya mokṣaḥ yuktaḥ 
NSu_1.1.138a–1.1.138c.5	 syāt etat brahma eva jñīpsitam tat ca na prathamam sūkṣma tayā śakyam śvetaketum grāhayitum iti tad sambaddham pradhānam eva sthūla tayā atma tvena grāhyate arundhatīm iva ati sūkṣmām darśayitum tad sannihitām sthūla tārakām darśayantīyam arundhati iti asyām śaṅkāyām uttaram heya tva avacanāt ca evam sati sthūla tārāvat na ayam ātmā iti heya tvam brūyāt na ca evam abravīt atas na eṣā kalpanā yuktāḥ caśabdaḥ eka vijñānena sarva vijñāna pratijñā virodham samuccinoti 
NSu_1.1.138a–1.1.138c.7	 sva api ayāt sat śabda vācya prastutya svam hi api itaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na hi acetane cetanasya api ayaḥ suptau laye ca sambhavati atas ca na pradhānam sat śabda vācyam gati sāmānyāt yadi ca kvacid api acetanam pradhānam jagataḥ kāraṇamucyeta vedānteṣu tathā sati kathañcid īkṣaṇa ādikam kalpyeta na ca evam atas vedānta utpādyāyāḥ gateḥ avagateḥ aika rūpyāt ca na pradhānam jagat kāraṇam iti 
NSu_1.1.138a–1.1.138c.9	 śruta tvāt ca sa kāraṇam kāraṇa adhipa adhipaḥ iti sākṣāt sarvajñasya īśvarasya jagat kāraṇa tvam śrūyate atas ca na pradhānam jagat kāraṇam vedānta vedyam jñāna kriyā śaktī tu apariṇāminaḥ api īśvarasya savituḥ iva yujyete iti evam sāṅkhayanirākaraṇāya etāni sūtrāṇi bhagavān sūtra kāraḥ cakāra a  iti yat māyā vādinaḥ vadanti tat na iti arthaḥ kutas na iti ced na sūtra akṣarāṇām anānuguṇyāt tathā hi aśabdam hi tat iti hetūkṛtam aśabda tvam nāma śabda gocara tvam vā śabda avācya tvam vā avaidika tvam vā kāraṇa tayā vaidika tvam vā sarvatra api asiddhiḥ iti āha na hi iti 
NSu_1.1.138cd.1–1.1.138cd.2^1	 na hi aśabda tvam pradhāne aṅgīkaroti asau asau sāṅkhayaḥ sva siddhena hetunā idam nirākaraṇam iti ced na yatas asau sūtra ākāraḥ aśabda tvam pradhānena aṅgīkaroti upapādayiṣyate ca etat kiñca ādi a pakṣe pradhānasya asattvam abhipretam uta pramāṇa antara vedya tvam ādye tad upapādanāya īkṣateḥ upanyāsaḥ anupapannaḥ atas eva na uttaraḥ dvitīyaḥ brahmaṇi anaikāntikaḥ tṛtīya caturthayoḥ sādhya aviśiṣṭa tvam kiṃca īkṣaṇena eva na iti pratijñāta artha siddhau= aśabdam hi tat iti madhye hetu antara kalpanam vyartham īkṣitṛ tvam ca īkṣaṇa guṇa yogi tvam tat brahmaṇi api gauṇam eva nirguṇa tva vādinā aṅgīkaraṇīyam tathā ca gauṇaḥ ced iti vyartham 
NSu_1.1.138cd.2^2	 kiṃca īkṣateḥ gauṇa tva kalpanasya bādhaka abhāvām anuktavā atma śabda āditya saṅgatam pareṇa prāya pāṭha virodhāt tad niṣṭhasya mokṣa upadeśāt iti atra kim pradhāna aikya upadeśa anupapattiḥ vā vivakṣitā tad jñasya mokṣa anupapattiḥ vā ādye brahma pakṣe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ na hi jīvasya api brahma aikya upadeśaḥ yuktaḥ iti uktam adhastāt dvitīyaḥ tu anupapannaḥ eva ātmānātma viveka artham anātma jñānasya āvaśyaka tvāt ātma śabdasya gauṇa tve codite bādhaka abhāvaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ heya tva avacana ādityasya paricodana eva anupapannāḥ na hi sāṅkhayaḥ advaita jñāna artham pradhāna upadeśam manyate 
NSu_1.1.138cd.3–1.1.138cd.6	 heya tva avacanam ca anaikāntikam anna maya prāṇa maya ādīnām abrahma tve api heya tva avacanāt ca uttarottara brahma tva vacanam tatra jñāpakam iti ced atra api tathāvidha jñāpaka saulabhyāt pratijñā virodhaḥ tu brahma vādaḥ eva na pradhāna vāde pradhānasya sarva ātmaka tva abhyupagamāt bhoktṛ vargasya na pradhāna ātmaka tvam asti iti ced satyam brahmaṇaḥ tu na kiñcid etena svāpyayaḥ api nirastaḥ ekībhāvasya brahma pakṣe api abhāvāt pariṣvaṅga mātrasya pradhāne api sambhavāt brahma viṣayam gati sāmānyam parasya asiddham eva īkṣaṇa ādinā tad jñāpane prathama sūtreṇa gata artha tā atas eva śruta tva āditya siddham gata artham ca gati sāmānyena iti eṣā diś astu vā yathā kathañcit sūtra gamanikā tathā api prakṛta saṅgati paryālocanayā atra vācya tva samarthanam eva upapannam na sāṅkhayanirākaraṇam iti āha samanvayaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.139a–1.1.139c.2	 samanvaye pratijñāte śabda gocara tā eva hi prathama pratipādyā syāt tat tu samanvayāt iti samastasya api śāstrasya brahmaṇi samanvaye pratijñāte sati yadi api mukhyayā vṛttyā śabda gocara tā sāṅkhayanirākaraṇam ca iti ubhayam api pratipādyam bhavati ubhaya abhāve api samanvaya anupapatteḥ tathā api śabda gocara tā eva prathama pratipādyā syāt hi yasmāt tasmāt saiva atra pratipādyate na sāṅkhayanirākaraṇam tad punar īkṣati karma vyapadeśāt saḥ iti ādau kariṣyate iti kutas śabda vācya tāyāḥ prathama pratipādya tvam iti atas āha tad abhāvaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.139d.1–1.1.139d.3	 tad abhāve kutas anvayaḥ avācya tve hi brahmaṇi śabda sambandhaḥ eva anupapannaḥ jagat kāraṇa tva ādi vākya vicāraḥ tu dūre sāṅkhayanirākaraṇa abhāve tu sṛṣṭayā ādi vākyānām eva samanvaya anupapattiḥ atas prathamam vācya tva samarthanena samanvaya sambhāvanāyām satyām vākya viśeṣa niṣṭhasya vicārasya paścāt avasaraḥ iti nanu vācya tva abhāve api lakṣaṇayā vṛttyā samanvayaḥ bhaviṣyati iti avācya tva ākṣepam nirdala tayā upekṣya sūtrakāreṇa ādau sāṅkhayamatam nirākṛtam iti aṅgīkāre katham asaṅgatiḥ iti atas āha katham ca iti 
NSu_1.1.140ab.1–1.1.140ab.3	 katham ca lakṣaṇa āvādī brūyāt brahma samanvayam syāt evam yadi sūtrakāraḥ śabdānām brahmaṇi lakṣaṇām abhipreyāt na ca etat asti yadi sūtra kāraḥ brahmaṇi śabdānām lakṣaṇām abhipraiti tadā katham samanvayam brūyāt kintu anvaya mātram brūyāt samanvayam ca abravīt tena jñāyate na lakṣaṇā sūtrakārasya abhipretā kim nāma mukhya vṛttiḥ eva iti samanvayam bruvatā katham mukhya vṛttiḥ abhipreta iti jñāyate iti atas āha yaḥ asau= iti 
NSu_1.1.140cd.1–1.1.140cd.2	 yaḥ asau śabdasya mukhya arthaḥ tatra eva syāt samanvayaḥ samīcīnaḥ anvayaḥ samanvayaḥ saca śabdasya vācya arthaḥ eva ghaṭate tatra eva sākṣāt śaktimat tvāt lakṣya arthe tu vācya athardvāreṇa anvayaḥ na samīcīnaḥ atas samanvaya śabdam prayuñjānena sūtra kṛtā vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ eva pratijñātaḥ iti jñāyate sa ca avācya tva śaṅkā nirāsam antareṇa sarvathā api asambhāvitaḥ syāt iti vācya tva samarthanam eva prāthamikam iti idam ca abhyupagamya uktam lakṣaṇāvāde anvayaḥ eva na upapadyate kutas samanvayaḥ samīcīnatā tu tātparyavattā sā ca lākṣaṇike api arthe śabdānām sambhavati iti na samanvaya siddhayartham vācya tvam samarthanīyam iti ced na saṃśabda sārtha antaram vyākhyāyām api jaghanya vṛttyā lakṣaṇayā samanvaya āśrayaṇa nibandhe kāraṇa abhāvāt 
NSu_1.1.140cd.3	 nanu asti kāraṇam tat tu samanvayāt iti nirguṇe hi brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ sūtra kṛtā pratijñātaḥ na ca tatra śabdānām vacana vṛttiḥ sambhavati tasyāḥ dravya ādi sambandha nibandhana tvāt nirguṇe ca tad abhāvāt atas jñāyate lakṣaṇā aśritā sūtrakṛtā iti evaṃca sati saṃśabdasya api uktaḥ eva arthaḥ niścīyate iti syāt api evam yadi nirguṇe samanvayaḥ pratijñātaḥ syāt na ca evam tathā hi kim atra nirguṇasya prakṛta tvāt tat iti tad parāmarśaḥ aṅgīkriyate uta sa guṇasya prakṛta tve api tad parāmarśa asambhavena jahat ajahat lakṣaṇayā nirguṇa parāmarśaḥ abhyupeyate ādyam dūṣayati janma ādi iti 
NSu_1.1.141.1–1.1.141.2	 janma ādi kāraṇe sākṣāt āha devaḥ samanvayam uktam tat eva jijñāsyam kva avakāśaḥ atra nirguṇe atra tat tu samanvayāt iti sūtre nirguṇe samanvayasya avakāśaḥ prasaṅgaḥ kva asti na asti iti arthaḥ kutas yatas atra tri sūtṛyām atītāyām nirguṇe viṣaya saptamīyam nirguṇasya avakāśaḥ kva asti na kvāpi iti arthaḥ katham lakṣaṇa sūtre janma ādi kāraṇa tvena lakṣite hi brahmaṇi śāstram pramāṇam abhidhāya tasya samanvayam āha sūtrakāraḥ na ca tat nirguṇam janma ādi kāraṇa tva guṇa yogāt nanu janma ādi kāraṇa tvam taṭastham eva sat brahma lakṣayati iti brūmaḥ atas lakṣaṇa sūtre prakṛtam nirguṇam eva iti atas uktam sākṣāt janma ādi kāraṇaḥ iti upapāditam ced tatra eva 
NSu_1.1.141.3–1.1.141.4	 mā bhūt lakṣaṇa sūtre nirguṇasya prakṛta tvam prathama sūtre jijñāsyatayā uktam nirguṇam eva na hi tasya kaścid dharmaḥ śrūyate iti na vācyam yatas tat eva janma ādi sūtre janma ādi kāraṇa tvena lila kṣayiṣitam eva jijñāsyam uktam na hi anyat jijñāsyatayā pratijñāya anyasya lakṣaṇam ucyate anupayogāt iti dvitīyam dūṣayati katham ca iti 
NSu_1.1.142ab.1–1.1.142ab.3	 kathañca asambhavaḥ tasya mukhya arthasya nirākṛtau tasya anukrāntāyām tri sūtṛyām prakṛtasya mukhya arthasya vācyasya samanvaya viṣaya tayā tyāge asambhavaḥ katham na kathañcid iti arthaḥ atas nirguṇa samanvayasya apratijñāta tvāt na lakṣaṇā aśrayaṇam atra yuktam kintu prathama prāptayā mukhya vṛttyā eva iti tad arthaḥ eva saṃśabdaḥ api iti kiñca nirguṇam ced atra tad śabdena parāmṛśyate tadā tatra lakṣaṇā api na sambhavati iti vyartham samanvaya sūtram āpannam iti vaktum nirguṇasya aprameya tvam tāvat sādhayati mānena iti 
NSu_1.1.142cd.1–1.1.142cd.3	 mānena kena vijñeyam avācyā jñeya nirguṇam nirguṇam vastu kena mānena vijñeyam na kena api kutas ajñeya tvāt jñeyam eva hi prameyam dṛṣṭam ghaṭa ādi śabda pramāṇa aviṣaya tve avācya tvam hetuḥ vācyasya eva tad viṣaya tva darśanāt jñeya tva aṅgīkāre ca nirguṇa tva vyāghātāt astu aprameyam eva nirguṇam brahma tatas kim iti atas āha ameyam ced iti 
NSu_1.1.143ab.1–1.1.143cd.1	 ameyam ced na śāstrasya tatra vṛttiḥ kathañcana nirguṇam brahma ameyam ced aṅgīkṛtam tarhi ameya tvāt tatra śāstrasya kathañcana lakṣaṇayā api vṛttiḥ na sambhavati iti samanvaya sūtram vyatharmā iva prāptam lakṣaṇā hi lakṣya artha pramiti pūrvikā dṛṣṭāḥ na hi tīram svarūpataḥ gaṅgā sambandhi tvena ca pramāṇataḥ apratipannam gaṅgā śabdena jñāpyate lākṣaṇikaḥ api hi śabdaḥ lakṣya pramotpādāya prayujyate anyathā prayojana antara abhāvena vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt tathā ca aprameye hetu phalayoḥ asambhavāt katham lakṣaṇā sambhavaḥ nanu prasiddhiḥ eva lakṣaṇa ahetuḥ na pramāṇa prasiddhiḥ viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt tathā ca svatas siddhe katham lakṣaṇā na sambhavati iti evam tarhi sutarām lakṣaṇāḥ na upapadyate iti vakṣyati nanu lākṣaṇikāḥ śabdāḥ lakṣya pramāmanutpādayantaḥ api viparīta ākāra vyāvartanena prayojanavantaḥ bhaviṣyanti iti na nirākṛta tvāt iti nirguṇe samanvayam nirākṛtya vyatireka mukhena upasaṃharati tasmāt iti tasmāt śāstreṇa jijñāsyam asmadīyam guṇa arṇavam 
NSu_1.1.144cd.1–1.1.144cd.3	 vijñeya vācya lakṣya tva pūrva aśeṣa viśeṣataḥ yatas nirguṇe samanvayaḥ na upapannaḥ tasmāt asmadīyam sa guṇam eva param brahma śāstreṇa jijñāsyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam nanu pūrvam viṣṇoḥ jijñāsya tvam uktam idānīm tu sa guṇasya brahmaṇaḥ iti virodhaḥ iti atas uktam vāsudeva ākhyam iti tathā api prāk sa guṇasya heya tva ādikam abhihitam idānīm tu jijñāsya tvam iti kutas na virodhaḥ iti atas uktam guṇa arṇavam iti pūrvam anirvacanīya avidyā avacchinnasya sa guṇasya aprāmāṇika tvam prākṛta sattva ādi guṇa baddhasya heya tva ādikam ca abhihitam idānīm tu jñāna ānanda ādi ananta guṇa arṇava tvena sa guṇam para brahma upādeyam ucyate iti kaḥ virodhaḥ arṇavaḥ iva ācarati iti kvipi kṛte aṇarvateḥ pacāt yaci kṛte arṇava śabdaḥ tri liṅgaḥ sādhuḥ nanu ekam eva advitīyam iti brahmaṇaḥ nirguṇa tvam abhidhīyate atas katham guṇa arṇava tvam iti atas uktam advandvam akhila uttamam iti advandvam asamam samādhi karāhityam śruti arthaḥ iti arthaḥ na kevalam nirguṇe śāstra samanvayaḥ na upapadyate kintu tasya sattvam eva anupapannam iti āha vijñeyetiḥ 
NSu_1.1.144cd.1–1.1.145a.3	 vijñeya vācya lakṣya tva pūrva aśeṣa viśeṣataḥ nirgatam manasaḥ vācaḥ dvandvāt paraḥ tu apratyayaḥ pratyekam abhisambat hayate pūrva padena rūpa ādīnām grahaṇam tat nirguṇam brahma na asti eva iti bahis eva pratijñā draṣṭavyā kutas manasaḥ vācaḥ ca agocaram yatas upalakṣaṇam etat sarva pramāṇa agocara tvāt śaśaviṣāṇa vat iti draṣṭavyam gavām jñānānām caraḥ vṛttiḥ asmin= iti gocaram viṣayaḥ iti yāvat tena napuṃsaka upapattiḥ sarva pramāṇa aviṣaya tvam kutas iti atas uktam vijñeya tva pūrva viśeṣebhyaḥ nirgatam iti vijñeya tva abhāvāt na kasya api pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ vācya tva lakṣya tva sadṛśa guṇa yogitva abhāvāt ca na śābda tvam rūpa ādi abhāvāt ca na pratyakṣa tvam liṅga sambandha abhāvāt ca na anumeya tvam iti nanu pramāṇa gocarasya api nirguṇasya sva prakāśa tayā siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_1.1.145b–1.1.145d.2	 yadi tat syāt agocaram astu tat mā vadet vādī na ca asmad śāstra gam tu tat evam api yadi sva prakāśa tayā tat brahma syāt tarhyaḥ tu kintu samanvaya viṣaya tayā na vaktavyam yatas asmad śāstra gam veda ādi viṣayaḥ na bhavati tad viṣaya tve sva prakāśa tva hāni prasaṅgāt prakāśa antara vyāvṛttiḥ hi sva prakāśa śabdena abhipretāḥ māyā vādinā tat idam ekam sandhitsataḥ anyat cyavataḥ iti āyātam yat brahma astitvam abhilaṣitaḥ śāstra aviṣaya tvam āpatitam vādī iti parihāsaḥ mā śabdaḥ ayam na māṅ atas liṅā sambandhaḥ 
NSu_1.1.145b–1.1.145d.3	 āha sva prakāśasya api brahmaṇaḥ na śāstra viṣaya tvam viruddham vacana janya sphuraṇa āśraya tayā tad karmatayā vā vacana viṣaya tva abhāvena sva prakāśa tvam vacana janya vṛtti vyāpya tayā tad viṣaya tvam ca iti vyavasthā upapatteḥ iti tat asat sphuraṇam hi jñāta tā vā jñānam vā na ādyaḥ svarūpasya eva nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt dvitīye api jñāna āśraya tayā viṣaya tvam na kvacid iti karma tvam eva āśrayaṇīyam jñāna karma tvam ca jñāna viṣayatā atiriktam na asti tatas ca vacana janya jñāna aviṣaya tvam uktam syāt vṛttiḥ iti ca jñānam tat atiriktam bodhyate na tāvat tat atiriktam pramāṇa abhāvāt ādye tu vyāpya tvam na viṣaya tva atiriktam nirūpayitum śakyam iti vacana janya jñāna viṣaya tvam eva uktam syāt tathā ca vyāghāta prasaṅgena na ekam api siddhayati iti āśavān āha avācyam iti 
NSu_1.1.146.1–1.1.146.2	 avācyam vācyam iti uktavā kim iti unmatta vat mṛṣā asmad śāstrasya cauryāya yatate svokti dūṣakaḥ avācyam vacana janya jñāna viṣayaḥ iti uktavā punar ca vācyam vacana janya jñāna viṣayaḥ bhavati iti unmatta vatsva ukti dūṣakaḥ vyāhata bhāṣī kim iti mṛṣā vṛthā eva asmad śāstrasya vedasya cauryāya nirguṇa viṣaya tayā yojayitum yatate na hi vyāhata bhāṣiṇaḥ kiñcid siddhayati unmatta vat cora vat ca iti 
NSu_1.1.146.3	 syāt etat śruti sūtrayoḥ tāvat ekārtha tvam yuktam anyathā karaṇa iti kartavyatā bhāva anupapatteḥ śrutayaḥ ca upakrama ādi vaśāt nitya śuddha buddham advitīyam nirguṇam eva pratipādayantyaḥ niravakāśāḥ pratīyante tatas tat mīmāṃsā api tad viṣayā eva tathā ca anyathā anupapatteyartha akathañcid śruti sūtrayoḥ nirguṇa viṣaya tvam upapādanīyam anyathā viṣaya abhāvena aprāmāṇya āpatteḥ iti atas āha janma ādi iti 
NSu_1.1.147.1–1.1.149ab.2	 janma ādi kāraṇam yat tat sākṣāt nārāyaṇa abhidham vadantu śrutayaḥ brahma śāstram ca etat tad arthataḥ pravṛttamastu avācyam te mā eva brūyāḥ kathañcana na śruti sūtrayoḥ nirviṣaya tva āpatti bhayena avācyasya api tad viṣaya tvam kalpyam sa guṇa viṣaya tvena sa viṣaya tva upapatteḥ naca upakrama ādi vaiguṇyam yatas vai imāni bhūtāni jāyante a ityādau sākṣāt janma ādi kāraṇa tvena nārāyaṇam mahā jñeyam a iti nārāyaṇa ādi śabda udita guṇavat tayā ca sarvatra sa guṇasya eva pratīteḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_1.1.149ab.3–1.1.149ab.4	 sarva pramāṇā viṣayasya śāstra viṣaya tva aṅgīkāre yaḥ vyāghātaḥ uktaḥ na asau su kṣmekṣikām āśritya yena sukṣmekṣikāyām avidyamānam api dūṣaṇam sphurati iti śaṅkayeta yathā ahana ca atra atīva kartavyam doṣa dṛṣṭi param manaḥ doṣaḥ hi avidyamānaḥ api tad parāṇām pradṛśyate a  iti kintu sthūla dṛṣṭibhiḥ api ayam vyāghātaḥ su jñānaḥ iti āśayavān āha sarva śabdaiḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.149cd.1–1.1.149cd.6	 sarva śabdaiḥ avācyam tat uktavā tad viṣayam punar unmattam vyāhata bhāṣiṇam nirguṇe brahmaṇi samanvaya nirākaraṇam upasaṃharati mā vadaḥ iti mā vadaḥ mā vijānīhi tyaja asmad śāstra cora tām yatas vaktum jñātum ca na śakyam tasmāt śāstrasya tad viṣaya tva āgrahaḥ api tyājyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ mā vadaḥ iti sma śabdaḥ atra adhyāhāryaḥ tena ca laṅupapattiḥ mā vijānīhi iti mā śabdaḥ ayam atas nirguṇe samanvayasya apratijñāta tvāt vacana vṛttyā eva samanvayaḥ ayam iti vācya tva samarthanam eva prathama saṅgatam na sāṅkhayanirākaraṇam iti siddham nanu yathā sūtra avivakṣitam sāṅkhayanirākaraṇam kurvataḥ mama doṣaḥ tathā mad nirākaraṇam kuvartaḥ bhavataḥ api katham na doṣaḥ syāt na hi idam kasyacid sūtrasya arthatayā ucyate iti atas āha vayam iti 
NSu_1.1.150.1–1.1.150.3	 vayam tvām śruti yuktibhyām baddhvā asmad śāstram añjasā vicārayāmaḥ śrutibhiḥ yuktibhiḥ ca eva sa ādaram tu ām apavyākhyātāram śruti yuktibhyām baddhvā nirākṛtya asmad śāstram vedam sūtra sūcitābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ yuktibhiḥ ca añjasā nairantaryeṇa sa ādaram ca śiṣyaiḥ vicārayāmaḥ iti anena idam uditam bhavati yāvat āpāta ram aṇīyam pareṣām vyākhyānam śiṣyāḥ paśyeyuḥ na tāvat asmad ukte sūtrāṇām nija arthe api añjasā adaram kuryuḥ kim asau sūtra arthaḥ kim vā ayam iti sandeha avaskandanāt nirākṛte tu apavyākhyāne nairantarī ādarābhyām asmat uktam eva artham upādāya śāstra artha mīmāṃsāyām nirvicikitsāḥ pravarteran atas mābhūt ayam sūtra arthaḥ tathā api sūtra artha grahaṇa upāya tva advaya akaraṇa ādau= udāharaṇa pratyudāharaṇa pradarśana ādi vat na kañcana doṣam āvahati kim nāma guṇa hetuḥ eva bhavati iti nanu yadi vācyam eva brahma kaḥ artha ḥ tarhi avācya tva ādi abhidhātrīṇām śruti smṛtīnām iti atas śruti antareṇa eva tad artham āha adbhuta tvāt iti 
NSu_1.1.151a–1.1.151d.2	 adbhuta tvāt avācyam tat atarkya ājñeyam eva ca ananta guṇa pūrṇa tvāt iti ūde paiṅginām śrutiḥ āścaryatama tvāt katham āścaryatama tvam ananta guṇa pūrṇa tvāt durlabham hi āścaryam bhavati na hi ananta guṇa pūrṇam sulabham bhāsana upasambhāṣā iti ātma nepadam vācya tvasya upapādita tvāt artha kathana mātreṇa eva alam śruti udāharaṇam tu dārḍhya artham iti avagantavyam 
NSu_1.1.151a–1.1.151d.3	 āścaryam hi vastu vācyam api na tena tena ākāreṇa viśeṣataḥ nirdoṣyum śakyate vyutpatti abhāvāt vāc manasayoḥ vyākula tvāt vā iti atas avācyam iti ucyate mukhya atikrameṇa amukhya prayoge kim prayojanam iti ced syāt ayam prayojana anuyogaḥ yadi ayam svatantra prayogaḥ syāt na etat asti rūḍha tvāt yathoktam rūḍha upacāraḥ rūḍha lakṣaṇa upacāraḥ lakṣaṇāa iti anyaḥ api āha mukhya artha bādhe tad yoge rūḍhitaḥ atha prayojanāt a iti tat idam āha avācyam iti 
NSu_1.1.151ef.1–1.1.151ef.3	 avācyam iti loke api vaktayāḥ cāryatamam bhuvi nanu etat śruti vyākhyānam sūtra vyākhyāna anantaram eva kartavyam tatra eva pūrva pakṣa śruteḥ śaṅkita tvāt atra vyākhyānam tu na saṅgatam iti mā evam sūtra pūrva pakṣiṇā iva apavyākhyātrā api lakṣaṇayā brahmaṇi samanvayam samarthayamānena etat śruti smṛti upādānasya kartum ucita tvāt tathā ca ubhau pratisūtra vyākhyā pavyākhyā pratyākhyānayoḥ avasāne śruti ādi vyākhyānam yuktam eva iti tat evam brahmaṇaḥ vācya tvāt gati sāmānyāt ca yuktam samanvaya sūtram iti siddham 
NSu_1.1.151ef.4–1.1.151ef.6	 ānanda mayaḥ abhyāsāt atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti yasya brahmaṇaḥ jijñāsā vihitā tad svarūpam janma ādyasya yatas śāstra yoni tvāt iti lakṣaṇa pramāṇābhyām sva itara samasta vastu vyāvṛtta tayā avadhāritam pramāṇasya anya paratva śaṅkayā lakṣaṇasya ativyāptiḥ samanvaya sūtreṇa parihṛtāḥ brahmaṇaḥ ca sakala śāstra pramāṇaka tva asambhāvanā śaṅkā ikṣati adhikaraṇe nirākṛtāḥ na hi lakṣaṇa pramāṇa nirūpaṇa vyatirekeṇa vastu vicāraṇam nāma asti sambhāvanayā tu na vara tu avadhāraṇa arthāḥ apramāṇa tvāt kintu yatra asambhau= anayā samīcīnayoḥ api lakṣaṇa pramāṇayera tathā bhāva śaṅkayā pravṛtti saṅkocaḥ tatra eva sambhāvana upayogaḥ vastutas tu lakṣaṇa pramāṇābhyām eva vastu vyavasthā iti atas brahma svarūpa nirūpaṇe a vaśeṣa abhāvāt kim ānanda mayaḥ abhyāsāt ityādinā adhyāyena iti āśaṅkayā adhyāya śeṣasya kṛtyam āha evam iti ānanda mayaḥ abhyāsāt ānanda mayaḥ abhyāsāt 
NSu_1.1.152.1–1.1.152.2^1	 evam śāstrau= agamya tve vibhāgena samanvayam ānanda mayaḥ ityādinā dhyāyena vadati ajaḥ satyam na brahma svarūpa nirūpaṇe kim api avaśiṣyam tathā api tat tu samanvayat iti upakrama ādi tātparya liṅga balāt sakalasya api śāstrasya yaḥ brahmaṇi parama mukhyayā vṛttyā pratipādya pratipādaka tva lakṣaṇa samanvayaḥ abhihitaḥ tam eva samanvayam vibhāgena prapañcena ānanda mayaḥ ityādinā dhyāyena vadati sūtrakāraḥ iti na vaiyarthyam tat tu samanvayāt iti hi pratijñā mātreṇa uktam tat yāvat udāharaṇa tvena vākya viśeṣān upādāya vimarśa pūrvakam pūrva uttara pakṣa upālambha sādhanābhyām na prapañcyate tāvat anukta prāyam arka ākāri tvāt anyathā paraḥ api hi anyat eva samanvayāt iti uktavā kṛtī syāt yadi hi pratyayam anutpādya ekaḥ ayam bhū madhya pradeśaḥ iti brūyāt tadā paraḥ api kim na brūyāt parastāt vitasteḥ iti tasmāt āvaśyakam samanvaya prapañcanam 
NSu_1.1.152.2^2	 tat anena samanvaya sūtreṇa adhyāya śeṣasya prapañci aprapañcaka bhāvena saṅgatiḥ darśitā evam tarhi tat ā ānantaryam eva syāt kutas vyavadhānam iti atas uktam evam iti evam īkṣati adhikaraṇa vyutpādita nyāyena brahmaṇaḥ śāstra avagamya tve mukhyayā vṛttyā sakala śāstra pratipādya tve sambhāvite sati iti etat uktam bhavati satyam prapañcanam anantara prāptam tathā api avācya tva ādi āśaṅkā nirāsena śāstra avagamya tva sambhāvanā samarthanena vyavadhīyate sati hi tasmin= asya avasaraḥ śabda leśa sañcāra asambhave vākya tātparya vicārasya anavakāśa tvāt na hi toya abhyavahāra asamarthasya mumūrṣoḥ śaṣkulī bhakṣaṇam sa cetanaḥ sambhāvayati iti svādiṣu asarva nāma sthāne a iti pada saṃjñā anuśāsanāt atra na yati bhaṅgaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ 
NSu_1.1.152.3	 māyā vādī tu uttara sūtra sandarbham ākṣipya samādhānam āha dvi rūpam hi brahma avagamyate vedānta vākyeṣu nāma rūpa vikāra upādhi viśiṣṭam tad viparītam ca sarva upādhi vivarjitam yatra hidvā etam iva bhavati asarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicintya dhīraḥ a iti evam sahasraśas avidyā vidyā viṣaya bhedena brahmaṇaḥ dvi rūpa tām darśayanti vedānta vākyāni tatra avidyā avasthāyām brahmaṇaḥ upāsya upāsaka ādi lakṣaṇaḥ sarvaḥ vyavahāraḥ tatra kānicid brahmaṇaḥ upāsanāni abhyudaya arthāni kāniji krama muktayarthāni kānicid karma samṛddhayarthāni evam apekṣita upādhi bhedam brahma upāsya tvena nirasta samasta upādhi tu jñeya tvena upadiśyate iti asya arthasya pradarśanāya ittara granthaḥ ārabhyate iti 
NSu_1.1.152.4^1	 tat idam anupapannam brahmaṇaḥ dvairūpyasya aprāmāṇika tvāt sarvāṇi api hi veda vākyāni asaṅkhayeya kalyāṇa guṇa ākaram sakala doṣa gandha vidhuram eka rūpam eva brahma nārāyaṇa ākhyam pratipādayanti kintu kānicid sarvajña tva sarva īśvara tva sarva antaryāmi tva saundarya audārya vīrya ādi guṇa viśiṣṭa tayā kānicid apahata pāpma tva nirduḥkha tva prākṛta bhautika vigraha rahita tva ādi doṣa abhāva viśiṣṭa tayā kānicita diś ahana tā ājñāpanāya vāc manasā agocara tva ādi ākāreṇa kānicid sarva parihāreṇa tasya eva upādānāya advitīya tvena kānicid sarva sattā pratīti pravṛtti nimitta tā pratipatti artham sarva ātmaka tvena iti evamādi aneka prakāraiḥ parama puruṣam bodhayanti 
NSu_1.1.152.4^2–1.1.152.5	 tatas vyākula buddhayaḥ guru sampradāya vikalāḥ aśrutaveda vyākhyātāraḥ sarvatra api eka rūpa tām ananu sanda dhānāḥ vedam chindanti na etat dvairūpya prapañcanam uttaratra upalabhyate na api asya avidyā viṣayasya prapañcanam mokṣa śāstre atra upayujyate prasaṅgāt ucyate iti ced na sarvasva prāsaṅgika tve pratipādya abhāva prasaṅgāt tat idam ābhāṇakam laukikānām na ativarta tesārthāt api taskarāḥ bahavaḥ a iti etat ca sa guṇa nirguṇa bhedam nirākurvatā acāryeṇa nirastam iti na iha punar prakrāntam tathā ca bhāṣyam na anyathā tad adṛṣṭeḥ iti nanu evam adhyāyasya samanvaya pratipādana lakṣaṇa eka artha tvena eka vākya tve sati pāda bhedaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ avāntara artha upādhi bhedāt iti bhāvena āha tatra iti 
NSu_1.1.153a–1.1.153c.3^1	 tatra anyatra prasiddhānām viṣṇau= eva samanvayam śabdānām prathame pāde caturvidhāḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ kecid brahmaṇi eva prasiddhāḥ anye anyatra prasiddhāḥ kecid ubhayatra prasiddhāḥ apare tu anyatra eva prasiddhāḥ iti sarve api pratyekam nāma liṅga ātmaka tayā dvividhāḥ sākṣāt dharmi vācinaḥ nāma ātmakāḥ dharma dvārāḥ dharmiṇi vartamānāḥ liṅga ātmakāḥ teṣu brahmaṇi prasiddhānām samanvayaḥ na vaktavyaḥ vivāda abhāvāt tatra eva ca mīmāṃsā avatārāt tatra vaktavya samanvayeṣu trividheṣu śabdeṣu anyatra prasiddhānām nāma ātmakānām śabdānām viṣṇau= eva samanvayam 
NSu_1.1.153a–1.1.153c.3^2	 tatra prathame adhyāye prathame pāde vadati ajaḥ anyeṣām anyeṣu iti tatra tatra vakṣyati krama niyame tu hetuḥ upariṣyāt vakṣyate prathame spaṣṭa brahma liṅgānām dvitīya tṛtīyayoḥ aspaṣṭa brahma liṅgānām samanvayaḥ caturthe pradhānasya śābda tva nirākaraṇam iti uktam dvitīya tṛtīya pāda udāharaṇa vākyānām api bahulam spaṣṭa brahma liṅga tvāt dvitīya tṛtīyayeḥ bheda abhāva prasaṅgāt ca sa guṇa nirguṇa prācuryeṇa tad bhedaḥ iti kaścid tat na nirākṛta tvāt pradhāna śābda tva nirāsasya īkṣati adhikaraṇa ānantaryam vihāya vikṣepe kāraṇa abhāvāt ca 
NSu_1.1.153a–1.1.153c.4	 nanu atra pāde sapta adhikaraṇāni samanvaya vibhāga arthāni tatra saptānām śabdānām brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ siddhayet tat katham anyatra siddhānām nāma ātmakānām sarva śabdānām samanvaya siddhiḥ atra syāt anyathā samanvaya sūtreṇa eva alam kim anena atyalpa prapañcanena iti mā evam ekaikatra adhikaraṇe samānanyāyānam aneka śabda rāśīnām nirṇīyamāna tvāt vākya viśeṣa grahaṇasya pūvarpakṣa viśeṣa upādānasya siddhānta pramāṇa viśeṣa svīkārasya ca udāharaṇa artha tvāt pratyekam nirṇaye śāstrasya aparyavasāna prasaṅgaḥ viśvatomukha tā ca sūtrāṇām na syāt tarhi nirṇetavya śabda avacchedaka upa ādhayaḥ vaktavyāḥ anyathā asya idam udāharaṇam iti jñātum aśakyatvāt sarva udāharaṇa tve ca sarvathā adhikaraṇa antara anārambha prasaṅgāt iti satyam santi pratyadhikaraṇam nirṇetavya artha avacchedaka upādhayaḥ iti āśa yavān ānanda maya adhikaraṇa nirṇeya śabda upādhim āha guṇī iti 
NSu_1.1.153d.1–1.1.154ab.2	 guṇi sāmānya vācinām guṇa vācinām ca prathamam āha devaḥ samanvayam ānanda maya ādi śabdāḥ hi guṇi sāmānyam vadanti na śatakratu a ādi śabdebhyaḥ iva etebhyaḥ guṇi viśeṣa pratītiḥ asti te ca mayaṭ pratyaya ādinā brahmaṇe anyat pratyāyayanti iti bhavanti anyatra prasiddhāḥ guṇa vācinaḥ tu ānanda ādayaḥ te guṇini brahmaṇi vartitum na arhanti iti anyatra prasiddhāḥ guṇa guṇinā uḥ abhedaḥ tu ahi kuṇḍala adhikaraṇaḥ eva sākṣāt sūtra kṛtā vakṣyate abhede api śabda ādi sāṅkarya abhāvaḥ ca iti 
NSu_1.1.154ab.3^1	 taittirīyake sa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ anna rasa mayaḥ iti adina anna maya prāṇa maya manaḥ maya vijñāna maya ānanda mayāḥ paṭhyante tatra saṃśayaḥ kim ete anna maya ādayaḥ paramātmā eva uta tad anyaḥ kaścid iti sarvatra brahma śabda śravaṇāt tasya ca viṣṇau= anyatra ca prayogāt kim tāvat prāptam anyaḥ eva anna maya ādi śabda arthaḥ iti kutas anna maya ādi śabdāḥ hi vikara vācinaḥ mayaṭ pratyayasya vikāra arthe anuśāsanāt vikārasya ca śarīra ādi kośeṣu sambhavāt sarva vikāra ātmaka tvena prakṛtau vā upapatteḥ jīvānām vā vikāra abhimāninām anna maya tva ādikam yuktam gauraḥ śyāmaḥ ityādi vat adhiṣṭhātrīṇām brahma ādi devatānām vā ayam śabdaḥ sambhavati aśaniḥ indraḥ iti vat na ca vikāra tvam parasya brahmaṇaḥ sambhavati nirvikāraḥ akṣaraḥ śuddhaḥ iti ādeḥ yadi api vikāraḥ iva prācurye api mayaṭpratyayaḥ asti tathā api anna maya śabdaḥ tāvat vikāra arthaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ 
NSu_1.1.154ab.3^2–1.1.154ab.4	 oṣadhībhyaḥ annam annāt puruṣaḥ a iti oṣadhi janita anna vikāram puruṣa śabda abhidheyam śarīram prakṛtyasa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ anna mannara samayaḥ a iti ukta tvāt tasya idam eva śiraḥ a iti aparokṣa tayā nirdeśāt tathā ca dvaividhya kalpanā anupapatteḥ sarvatra vikāra arthaḥ eva aṅgī kāryaḥ kiñcāt na maya ādayaḥ pañca brahma tu ekam eva atas katham tat etaiḥ śabdairucyeta api ca ete paraspara m anyatayā śarīra śarīri bhāvena antara tvena ca ucyante na ca evam brahma bhavitum arhati na ca tarhi ānanda mayaḥ astu brahma sarva antara tvāt iti vācyam vikāra pravāha patita tvāt anna maya adya antara tva mātreṇa sarva antara tva aniścayāt kiñca brahma vid āpnoti param iti prakṛtam param brahma ānandam ayasya brahma puccham pratiṣṭhāa iti avayava tayā pratīyate naca avayavaḥ eva avayavī virodhāt atas na anna maya ādayaḥ pañca api brahma kim tu anyaḥ eva iti evam prāpte siddhāntayat sūtram vyākhyāti samudra śāyinam iti 
NSu_1.1.154cd.1–1.1.157ab.2^1	 samudra śāyinam sarva prasūti prasavam śrutiḥ tat eva brahma paramam iti sāvadhṛtiḥ jagau yatas atas brahma śabdasya tatra eva niyata tvataḥ yaḥ annam brahma ityādi rūpāt abhyāsāt taittirīyake anyāsu ca etad rūpāsu śākhāsu api sahasraśas ānanda mayaḥ ityādyaiḥ śabdaiḥ vācyaḥ hariḥ svayam atra taittirīyakeanyāsu cata dūṣāsu śākhāsu api sahasraśas ānanda mayaḥ ityādyaiḥ śabdaiḥ vācyaḥ hariḥ svayam a iti etāvatā ananda mayaḥ brahma iti pratijñā bhāgaḥ vyākhyātaḥ tatra taittirīyakaḥ iti udāharaṇa vākya grahaṇam anyāsu iti nirṇetavya vyapadeśaḥ etat rūpāsu iti guṇi sāmānya guṇa vāci nām avatīṣu iti arthaḥ tatra hetuḥ abhyāsāt iti tad vaya ākhyānam ye annam iti ye annam brahma upāsate ye prāṇam brahma upāsate ānandam brahmaṇaḥ vidvān vijñānam brahma ced vedaḥ asat brahma iti veda ceta iti anna maya ādi viṣaya tayā udāhṛteṣu ślokeṣu brahma śabdasya abhyāsāt iti arthaḥ 
NSu_1.1.157ab.2^2–1.1.157ab.3	 eka viṣaya asakṛt uktiḥ mukhyaḥ abhyāsaḥ na ca evam atra asti kim tu asakṛt akti mātram iti śaṅkāyām eka viṣaya tā api asti iti jñāpayitum iti ādeḥ iti anuktavā ityādi rūpāt iti uktam anna maya ādi viṣaya tvena brahma śabdasya śruta tvāt iti uktam bhavati brahma śabdena katham ayam niścayaḥ iti atas āha brahma śabdasya iti tat api kutas iti atas āha śrutiḥ iti tat eva brahma paramam a iti sāvadhṛtiḥ śrutiḥ viṣṇum eva brahma śabda vācyam jagau yatas atas iti yojanā tatra api tat iti parāmarśa viṣayaḥ viṣṇuḥ iti kutas iti atas uktam samudra śāyinam iti vyākhyātam etat prathama sūtre nanu ānanda mayaḥ iti eva sūtre pratijñā tat katham ānanda mayaḥ iti ādyaiḥ iti vyākhyānam iti atas āha upalakṣaṇa tvam iti 
NSu_1.1.157cd.1–1.1.157cd.3	 upalakṣaṇa tvam śabdānām ānanda maya pūrviṇām ānanda mayaḥ ca asau pūrvaḥ ca saḥ eṣām asti te ānanda maya pūrviṇaḥ teṣām syāt ayam vyākhyāna vyākhyeyayoḥ visaṃvādaḥ yadi atra ānanda maya śabdaḥ sva mātrasya grāhakaḥ syāt na ca evam kim tu atra ānanda maya śabdasya samāna nyāyānām anna maya ādi śabdānām upalakṣaṇaka tvam evam uttaratra api ākāśa ādi śabdānām api sva samāna nyāya śabda antara upalakṣaṇa tvam avagantavyam iti ajahat lakṣaṇā ca eṣā tena ānanda mayasya tyāgaḥ na mantavyaḥ atas eva vikāra śabdāt itya ādi ākṣepāṇām tad parihārāṇām svatantra yuktīnām ca upalakṣaṇa tvam draṣṭavyam syāt etat mukhya artha bādhe tad yoge prayojane ca sati lakṣaṇā dṛṣṭāḥ tat atra vācaka śabda prayoge sambhavati kim lākṣaṇika śabda prayoge prayojanam sūtrakārasya naceyam rūḍha lakṣaṇā yena prayojana anapekṣā iti atas āha sūtrasya iti 
NSu_1.1.158.1–1.1.158.2	 sūtrasya alpa akṣara tvena sarva śākhā vinirṇaye punar ca prāpakāt hetoḥ tatra adhikaraṇa antaram yadi mukhyaḥ eva prayogaḥ kriyate tadā anna maya prāṇa maya manaḥ maya vijñāna maya ānanda mayāḥ iti eva prayoktavyam syāt tathā ca sūtrasya alpa akṣaratva lakṣaṇam hīyeta śrutyā arthāt vā jñāyamānasya arthasya avacanam hi alpa akṣara tvam ayam ca arthaḥ artha ujjñāyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ atas sūtrasya alpa akṣara tvena prayojanena lākṣaṇika prayogaḥ sūtrakārasya iti 
NSu_1.1.158.3	 nanu sūtre yathāśrutam eva ced gṛhyate tadā kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ yena lakṣaṇā vyākhyātavyā iti ataḥ āha sarva iti pravṛtta tvāt iti śeṣaḥ yadi hi sūtre śruta mātram gṛhyeta tadā sūtra śatena vākya śata samanvayaḥ eva siddhayet na tu sarva śākhā nirṇayaḥ sarva śākhā nirṇaya artham pravṛtta śani ca etāni sūtra antara abhāvāt atas sarva śākhā nirṇāyaka tvasya anyathā anupapattyā yathā śruta mātra parityāgena lakṣaṇā vyākhyeya iti gamyate lakṣaṇā aśrayaṇe hi sarva śākhā nirṇayaḥ siddhayati iti 
NSu_1.1.158.4^1	 nanu yathā yathā śruta grahaṇe bādhakam asti sūtrāṇām viśvatomukha tva asambhavaḥ tathā upalakṣaṇā aśrayaṇe api bādhaka sadbhāvaḥ samānaḥ ānanda maya śabdena anna maya ādīnām iva sarva śabdānām upalakṣayitum śakya tvena uttara adhikaraṇa ārambhānupapatteḥ iti ced kim samāna nyāya śabda antara viṣaya adhikaraṇa anārambha prasaṅgaḥ bādhakaḥ kiṃvā nyāya antara viṣaya śabda antara gocara adhikaraṇānarambha prasaṅgaḥ na ādyaḥ iṣṭa tvāt na dvitīyaḥ vaiṣamyāt anna maya ādayaḥ hi samāna nyāya tayā sambandhena upalakṣaṇa tayā gṛhyante tad itareṣām tu upalakṣaṇāyām kaḥ sambandhaḥ na hi sambandhena vinā lakṣaṇā dṛṣṭāḥ śabda tvena sandigdha tvena ca upalakṣaṇam upaplavaḥ tathā sati tat tu samanvayāt iti anena eva pūrṇa tvāt
