NSu_1.1.158.4^2–1.1.158.5	 atha samāna nyāya viṣaya tve api adhikaraṇa antara ārambhaḥ dṛśyate upalakṣaṇa pakṣe sa na syāt iti āpādyate iti atas āha punar ca iti tatra pūrva adhikaraṇa vyutpādi nyāya viṣaye api arthe yat adhikaraṇa antaram ārabhyate tad pūrva adhikaraṇa nyāyācchādaka adhika āśaṅkā lakṣaṇāt punar adhikaraṇa antara ārambha prāpakāt hetoḥ vidyamāna ādyujyate idam uktam bhavati samāne api nyāye punar adhikaraṇa antara ārambhāni atha anupapattyā yathāśrutaḥ eva sūtra arthaḥ iti yat uktam tat na anyathā upapatteḥ adhika āśaṅkayā tad nyāya viṣaya tva abhāve pareṇa āśaṅkite adhika āśaṅkā nirākaraṇena punar tad nyāya viṣaya tva pradarśana artha tvāt adhikaraṇa antara ārambhasya viśvatomukha tva bhaṅgaḥ tu niravakāśaḥ iti lakṣaṇā aśrayaṇam eva nyāyyam iti nanu sarva śākhā nirṇāyaka tvam eva eṣām sūtrāṇām na asti sarva śākhānām kārya niṣṭhatvena abrahma viṣaya tvāt brahma niṣṭhaḥ tu vedānta bhāgaḥ alpīyān vinā api lakṣaṇā aśrayaṇena yathā śruta arthaiḥ sūtraiḥ śakyaḥ nirṇetum iti kim lakṣaṇā aśrayaṇena iti atas āha sarve vedāḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.159ab.1–1.1.159cd.1	 sarve vedāḥ āmananti yat padam tu iti hi śrutiḥ sarveṣām api vedānām brahma niṣṭhatām āha iti śeṣaḥ yadi atra upalakṣaṇam abhipretam syāt tadā prathama prāpta tvāt anna maya śabdam eva upādadyāt ānanda maya śabdam tu upāda dat sūtra kāraḥ tanmātra vivakṣām sūcayati iti atas āha ānanda maya iti ānanda maya rūpe tu brahmaṇaḥ pucchatā uktitaḥ 
NSu_1.1.160ab.1–1.1.160ab.3^1	 samasta abrahma tā prāpteḥ ānanda maya nāma hi anna maya ādīnām abrahmatve vikāra śabdaḥ sādhāraṇa upapattiḥ ānanda maya rūpe tu brahma vid āpnoti param iti uktasyabrahma puccham pratiṣṭhāa iti puccha tva uktayā samastasya avayavinaḥ ānanda mayasya abrahma tva prāptiḥ adhikā api upapattiḥ asti iti atas a trāvahitaiḥ bhavitavyam iti jñāpayitum ānanda maya nāma gṛhītam sūtra kṛtā iti anyathā upapattiḥ uktā bhavati yadi ānanda mayaḥ brahma syāt tadā tad avayavasya samastāyāḥ mukhyāyāḥ ābrahma tāyāḥ samyak brahma tāyāḥ aprāpteḥ iti vā tatas ca tad vedanāt para prāptiḥ śrutā bādhyeta iti 
NSu_1.1.160ab.1–1.1.160ab.3^2	 nanu anna maye api adhika anupapattiḥ asti oṣadhībhyaḥ annam annāt puruṣaḥ sa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ anna rasa mayaḥ a iti tasya idam eva śiraḥ a iti ca mā evam asya api vikāra upapādaka tvena tad antarbhāvāt yat vā atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti jijñāsyatayā uktasya brahmaṇaḥ puccha tva uktayā samasta abrahma tā prāpteḥ ānanda maya vicārasya prakṛtena saṅgata tvāt ānanda maya nāma grahaṇam iti yojyam nanu sūtrāṇām upalakṣaṇa tva abhāve sarva śākhā nirṇaya abhāva prasaṅgena astu upalakṣaṇa tvam ānanda maya śabdasya anna maya ādi upalakṣaṇa tvam iti ayam viśeṣaḥ kutas iti atas āha brahma śabdasya iti 
NSu_1.1.160cd.1–1.1.160cd.3	 brahma śabdasya ca abhyāsāt pañca rūpa ādiṣu sphuṭam ānanda mayasya brahma tve hi hetu tvena brahma śabda abhyāsaḥ abhihitaḥ saḥ anna maya ādiṣu api samānaḥ tathā ca anna maya ādīnām abrahma tve anaikāntikaḥ katham ānanda mayasya api brahma tvam sādhayet atas anna maya ādi sādhāraṇam brahma śabda abhyāsam hetu tvena vadatā sūtrakāreṇa teṣām api pakṣa tvam aṅgīkṛtam iti jñāyate caśabdena asmin= asya ca tad yogam śāsti ityādi hetūnām api sādhāraṇyam sūcayati ādi grahaṇāt ānanda ādīnām grahaṇam tasmāt uktaḥ eva sūtra arthaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.160cd.4–1.1.161.1	 nanu ānanda mayasya katham brahma tvam brahma puccham iti brahmaṇaḥ tad puccha tva abhidhānāt na ca brahma śabdaḥ anya paraḥ tathā satyatra eva anaikānti āpatteḥ na ca nirapavādaḥ brahma śabdaḥ hetuḥ na brahma śabda mātram iti vācyam brahma puccham iti atra api apavāda abhāvāt brahma avayava tvam iti ced na adya api ānanda mayasya brahma tva āsiddheḥ iti atra praṣṭavyam kim avayavasya pūrṇa tve avayavinaḥ pūrṇa tvam na upapadyate iti abhiprāyaḥ kim vā anandam asya avayavinaḥ pūrṇa tve tad avayavasya pūrṇa tva abhāva āpādanam uta avayava avayavinoḥ bhedāt avayavasya rama ātma tvepa na avayavinaḥ tattvam iti atra doṣam āha brahma tā iti brahma tā avayave api syāt tathā avayavini svatas yathā eva kṛṣṇa keśasya kṛṣṇasya brahma tā akhilāḥ 
NSu_1.1.162ab.1–1.1.162ab.4^1	 darśitā ca eva pārthāya niḥsīmāḥ śaktayaḥ asya hi yadā avayave api brahma tā tathā satya vayavini sā svatas anāyasena syāt avayavinaḥ avayava apekṣayā mahattvasya dṛṣṭa tvāt tatas ca avayavasya pūrṇa tve avayavinaḥ pūrṇa tva anupapattiḥ iti viruddham etat dvitīye vyāpti abhāvam darśayati yathā eva iti etat ca audba barha ātmanaḥ keśau a ityādinā purāṇe prasiddham akhilā nirupacaritā tathā ananda maya avayavasya api bhaviṣyati iti śeṣaḥ atra pramāṇam āha darśitā ca iti pārtha darśanam ca dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ ityādi tad vākyāt avagamyate caśabdaḥ purāṇāt yukti samuccaya arthaḥ eva śabdaḥ tu evam pramitā eva na vāc mātreṇa ucyate iti sambaddhayate 
NSu_1.1.162ab.1–1.1.162ab.4^2	 nanu loke yaḥ avayavaḥ sa paricchinnaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tat katham etat iti atas parameśvarasya aghaṭita ghaṭaka tayā sarvatra apratibaddhayā śaktayā anyatra adṛṣṭam api ghaṭate kā atra kathanta iti āha niḥsīmāḥ iti sīmasi ime striyām ubhe iti sīman śabda paryāya sīm ā śabda uttara padaḥ ayam samāsaḥ sīman śabda uttara pada tve api ḍābubhābhyām anyatarasyām iti sādhu tṛtīye api etat eva uttaram niḥsīmāḥ iti hi śabdaḥ hetau śiraḥ nārāyaṇaḥ ityādi prasiddhi dyotakaḥ vā syāt etat brahma śabda balena anna maya ādīnām viṣṇu tvam na niścetum śakyate ṛtam satyam param brahma puruṣam kṛṣṇa piṅgalam ūrdhvaretam virūpākṣam śaṅkaram nīlalohitam a  iti tāpanīya vākye rudre api paraṃbrahma śabda śravaṇāt ityataḥ pūrva uttara ardhe bhinna viṣaya tayā vyākhyāti ṛtam iti 
NSu_1.1.162cd.1–1.1.163.3	 ṛtam satyam param brahma puruṣam kṛṣṇa piṅgalam viṣṇu ākhyam uktam anyatra hi ūrdhvaretam ca tat prati virūpākṣa ākhyam avaram brahma uktam tat vrate sthitam iti pūrva ardhe viṣṇu ākhyam paraṃbrahma uktam iti yojanā anyatra uttara ardhe virūpākṣa ākhyam uktam iti pūrva uttara ardhayoḥ bhinna viṣaya tvam uktam bhinna viṣaya tve anvayaḥ katham iti atas uktam tat pratyūrdhvaretam iti anena ṛtam ityādīni dvitīya antāni ūrdhvaretasam ityādīni prathama antāni iti uktam bhavati tarhi napuṃsa kaliṅga prayogaḥ katham iti atas uktam aparam brahma iti amukhyayā vṛttyā jīve api brahma śabda sadbhāvāt tad apekṣayā napuṃsaka liṅgam iti tad pratyūrdhvaretam iti vivṛṇoti tat vrate sthitam iti eka viṣaya tayā pratīyamānayoḥ pūrva uttara ardhayoḥ kutas bhinna viṣaya tā kalpyate iti atas āha samānā iti 
NSu_1.1.164.1–1.1.164.3	 samāna adhikṛta tvam ced uttaram nīlalohitam kṛṣṇa piṅgala rūpeṇa punaruktam bhaviṣyati samānam ekam adhikṛtam adhikaraṇam viṣayaḥ yayoḥ pūva uttara adharyoḥ te samāna adhikṛte tayoḥ bhāvaḥ yadi pūrva uttara ardhayoḥ eka viṣaya tvam syāt tadā uttaram uttara ardha uktam nīlalohitam kṛṣṇa piṅgala rūpeṇa pūrva ardha uktena nimittena punaruktam bhaviṣyati kṛṣṇa piṅgala nīla lohita śabdayoḥ eka artha tvāt atas pratītam api eka viṣaya tvam parityajya bhinna viṣaya tva grahaṇam nyāyyam iti kiñca brahma adhipatiḥ brahmaṇe adhipatiḥ iti uttara vākye brahma adhipatiḥ yasya rudrasya asau brahma adhipatiḥ iti rudrasya brahma adhipatiḥ pratīyate yasya ca adhipatiḥ asti katham tasya para brahma tā syāt iti atas ca pūrva ardhaḥ na rudra viṣayaḥ iti āśayavān āha brahma adhipatiḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.165ab.1–1.1.165ab.3	 brahma adhipatiḥ iti atra tāpanīya śrutau puras ṛtam satyam iti vākyam yat gatam atra tāpanīya śrutau ṛtam iti asmāt puras puratas upariṣyāt iti yāvat brahma adhipatiḥ iti rudrasya para adhīna tā pratipādakam padam asti iti yojanā syāt evam yadi brahma adhipati śabdasya bahuvrīhi tvam syāt na ca evam ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣe karma dhāraye vā sambhavati bahu vrīhi tva niścāyaka abhāvāt ityataḥ āha svaritā iti 
NSu_1.1.165cd.1–1.1.165cd.3	 svarita brahma śabda antam bahu vrīhi tvam eṣyati yasmāt brahma adhipati prātipadikam svatirabrahma śabda antam tasmāt bahu vrīhi tvam eva prāpnoti na samāsa antara tvam tathā tve anta udātta tvena anudāttam padam eka varjam iti asya prasaṅgena pūrva padasya svarita pūrva pada anta tā na syāt athavā udgrantham eva pūrva uktam artham uktava ukta śaṅkā uttara tvena samastaḥ api ślokaḥ yojyaḥ yadi api bahuvrīhi tvam pūrva siddham eva tathā api tat niścaya apekṣayā eṣyati iti prayogaḥ nanu pūrva pada anta svarasya svarita tve api kutas bahuvrīhi tvam iti ced udāharaṇa darśanāt iti āha svāhā iti 
NSu_1.1.166.1–1.1.166.4	 svāhā indra śatru vardhasva yat bahu vrīhitām agāt mahāvyākaraṇe sūtram iti svara vinirṇaye yadi asmāt svāhā indra śatruḥ vadha sva iti atra indra śatru prātipadikam svarita indra śabda antam bahuvrīhitām prāptam tasmāt idam api tathāvidham bahuvrīhiḥ eva iti indra śatru prātipadikasya api kṛtaḥ bahu vrīhi tvam ṣaṣṭhī samāsa tva sambhavāt iti atas āha tasmāt iti tasmāt asya indraḥ eva abhūt śatruḥ iti uttara śruteḥ 
NSu_1.1.166.5–1.1.166.6	 yasmāt indra śabdaḥ svarita antaḥ upāttaḥ tasmāt mantrasya abhimata svara hīna tā doṣāt asya vṛttasya indraḥ śatruḥ śātayitā abhavat na punar tvaṣṭuḥ abhiprāya anusāreṇa indrasya śatruḥ abhavat iti uttara vākya balāt idam jñāyate yat indra śatru prātipadikam bahuvrīhinar tatpuruṣaḥ iti tathā ca āhuḥmantraḥ hīnaḥ svarataḥ varṇataḥ vā mithyā prayuktaḥ na tam artham āha sa vāc vajraḥ yajamānam hinasti yathā indra śatruḥ svarataḥ aparādhāt a  iti na kevalam pūrva pada anta svarita tve bahu vrīhi tvam udāharaṇa balāt udāharaṇe api uttara śruti balāt kalpyate kim nāma anuśāsanam api evam asti iti āha pūrva anta svaritaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.167.1–1.1.167.2^1	 pūrva anta svarite puṃsoḥ bahu vrīhi tvam eṣyati mahāvyākaraṇe sūtram iti svara vinirṇaye puṃsoḥ puṃliṅgayoḥ samasyamānayoḥ pūrva pada ante svare svarite sati tad samāsa prātipadikam bahuvrīhi tvam eṣyati iti sūtra arthaḥ atra kecid vayabhicāram udbhāvayanti tat asat sāmānya lakṣaṇa prāptam hi punar viśeṣaṇa lakṣaṇaiḥ apodyate iti vyākaraṇa prakriyā yathā uktam sāmānya viśeṣavatā lakṣaṇena iti tatra viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni aparyālocya sāmanyā lakṣaṇe vyabhicāra udbhāvanam katham yujyate kiñca anena sūtreṇa bahuvrīhau pūrva pade prakṛti svara tvam upalakṣyate brahma indra śabdayoḥ svarita anta tvāt tathā ca kutas vyabhicāraḥ yathā aha pāṇiniḥ bahu vrīhauprakṛtyā pūrva padam iti atas eva svara vinirṇayaḥ iti āha anyathā samāsa nirṇayaḥ iti avakṣyat 
NSu_1.1.167.2^2–1.1.167.3	 api ca sandehe sati svareṇa samāsanirṇaya artham idam ucyate yathā uktam asandeham prayojanam vyācakṣāṇena bhāṣya kṛtā sthūla pṛṣatīm anaḍvāhīm ālabheta iti atra sthūla pṛṣatī śabde tatpuruṣa bahuvrīhi sandeham vyutpādya yadi pūrva pada prakṛti tvam bahuvrīhiḥ tadā yadi samāsa anta udātta tvam tadā tatpuruṣaḥ ityādi tathā ācāsan digdhe vyabhicāra udbhāvanam asaṅgatam iti nanu pūrva anta svaritaḥ iti katham sāmarthya abhāvena samāsānupapatteḥ iti mā evam samāsa prātipadike pūrva anta svarite satī iti vyākhyānāt tathā api svarita pūrva antaḥ iti syāt bahuvrīhau viśeṣaṇasya pūrva nipātāt na viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya kāma cāri tvāt āhitāgni ādi tvāt vā iti evam punarukti prasaṅgena uttara vākya balena caṛtam satyam iti pūrva uttara ardhayoḥ bhinna viṣaya tvam upapādya saṅkṣepeṇa vyākhyātam vākyam vistareṇa vyākhyāti ṛtam iti 
NSu_1.1.168.1–1.1.168.2	 ṛtam satyam param brahma ityādi uddeśya dvitīyakāḥ vibhaktiḥ ūrdhvareta ādiḥ prathamā rudra gocarāḥ ityādi iti supām su luj iti prathamāyāḥ luc ityādi pūrva adharstham yat pada jātam tatrastham iti vā dvitīyā iti etau= atī ucyamāne karmaṇi dvitīyā eva pratīyeta prābalyāt kāraka vibhakteḥ na ca tad sambhavati kriyā apekṣa tvāt karma tvasya atra ca kriyā bhāvāt atas uddeśya ādvitīya iti uktam tarhi pratiśabdena bhāvyam satyam adhyāhariṣyate śrauta prayoga darśanāt akāra antaḥ reta śabdaḥ vā samāsāntoḍa pratyayaḥ vā anusartavyaḥ ūrdhvareta ādiḥ iti ūrdhvaretam ityādi pada avayava bhūtāḥ evam rudra gocara iti vat pūrvam viṣṇu gocara iti api draṣṭavyam evam viṣaya vibhaktī tad artham ca uktavāḥ yojanām āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_1.1.169.1–1.1.170.1	 tasmāt viṣṇum param brahma prati rudraḥ vrate sthitaḥ ūrdhvaretāḥ iti hi eva śruti arthaḥ avasitaḥ bhavet ukta yukti samudāyāt ūrdhvaretāḥ iti etat upalakṣaṇam iti āśayena uktam vrate sthitaḥ iti na kevalam upapatti balāt evam śruti arthaḥ vyākhyāyate api tu śruti antara samākhyānāt api iti āha ṛtam iti ṛtam satyam param brahma prati viṣṇum sadāśivaḥ ūrdhvaretāḥ dhyāyati ha śaṅkaraḥ nīlalohitaḥ 
NSu_1.1.171.1–1.1.171.3	 iti artham etam eva āha nīlagrīva śrutiḥ parā ārtharvaṇī param brahma tasmāt ekaḥ hariḥ śrutau dhyāyati tam eva anena dhyāyati iti adhyāhāreṇa karmaṇi vā dvitīyā iti jñāyate ātharvaṇi iti ukte prasaṅgāt tāpanīya śrutiḥ iti eva pratibhāti atas uktam parānyā iti tarhi kim nāmadheyāḥ nīlagrīva śrutiḥ evam pūrva uttara ardhayoḥ bhinna viṣaya tayā vyākhyānena labdham āha param brahma iti ṛtam satyam iti asyām śrutau pratītam iti śeṣaḥ tasmāt pūrva ardhasya viṣṇu viṣaya tvāt bādhaka antaram āha tat eva iti 
NSu_1.1.172.1–1.1.172.2	 tat eva ṛtam iti prāha katham eva anyathā śrutiḥ avadhārayantī tasya eva hi ṛta tva ādikam añjasā ṛtam satyam param brahma iti pūrva ardhaḥ api yadi rudra viṣayaḥ satyāt tadā tat eva ṛtam tat usatyam āhuḥ tat eva brahma paramam kavīnām iti śrutiḥ tasya viṣṇoḥ ṛta tva ādikam katham añjasā kavīnām saṃmatyāḥ āha paraspara virodhena anyatara śruteḥ aprāmāṇyam prasajyeta iti bhāvaḥ ṛtam iti śrutiḥ rudrasya ṛta satya brahmatva ādīni āha tat eva iti śrutiḥ viṣṇoḥ tatra śruti dvaya balāt dvayoḥ api ṛta ādi śabda vācya tve kva asti virodhaḥ iti atas uktam tasya eva iti tat katham iti atas uktam avadhārayanti iti virodhe ca ādya śruteḥ eva bādhaḥ yuktaḥ tat eva iti śruteḥ prabala tvāt tat ca etat śrutyā āpāta pratīti ja bhrānti bādha ātmaka tvāt avasīyate na hi aprāpta pratiṣedhaḥ yujyate na api śruti ābhāsāt vinā tad prāpakam asti iti 
NSu_1.1.172.3–1.1.173.1	 nanu tarhi rudrasya viṣṇu ātmaka tvena avirodhaḥ astu punarukti parihārāya uttara ardha uktaḥ virūpākṣaḥ tu aparaḥ bhaviṣyati evam tarhi viṣṇoḥ eva brahma śabdaḥ iti kva asti sautrasya hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ na hi pakṣe vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkayate iti kiñca rudra ādīnām sarveṣām pralaye asatām sṛṣṭau= īśvarān janmavatām brahma tvam katham upapadyate janma ādimat tvam eva teṣām kutas avagamyate iti atas āha ekaḥ iti ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ āsīt na brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ vāsudevaḥ agre eva āsīt na brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ 
NSu_1.1.174.1–1.1.174.3	 na indra sūryau na ca guhaḥ na somaḥ na vināyakaḥ ityādi vākyataḥ viṣṇoḥ utpattiḥ avatāra gāḥ ityādi vākyataḥ rudra ādīnām pralaye abhāvaḥ viṣṇoḥ utpattiḥ ca avagamyate utpattimat tvena abrahma tve viṣṇoḥ api tathātvam syāt tasya api rāma kṛṣṇa ādi rūpasya utpatti sadbhāvāt iti atas āha viṣṇoḥ iti utpattiḥ utpatti vāc avatāra gā prādurbhāva viṣayāḥ na tu śarīra ādi lābha lakṣaṇā kutas etat iti āśaṅkāyām ekaḥ ityādi pūrva vākyam sambaddhayate ityādi vākyataḥ viṣṇoḥ mahāpralaye api avasthāna avagamāt iti arthaḥ sva rūpa mātreṇa avasthāne api śarīra ādi lābha lakṣaṇa utpattiḥ kim na syāt iti ced na svarūpa sattvasya brahma śaṅkara ādau= api samāna tvena na brahma a ityādi anupapatti prasaṅgāt iti nanu yadi brahma śabdaḥ viṣṇoḥ eva tadā jīva ādau vyavahāraḥ na syāt tathā ca brahmatva apekṣayā napuṃsaka prayogaḥ iti na syāt brahmaṇaḥ adhipatiḥ iti api vyāhatam syāt iti āśaṅkām pariharan= upasaṃharati mukhyam iti 
NSu_1.1.175a.1–1.1.175cd.1	 mukhyam brahma hariḥ tasmāt nanu yadi amukhya tayā brahma śabdasya viṣṇoḥ anyatra vṛttiḥ aṅgīkṛtā tarhi anna maya ādayaḥ api amukhya brahma tayā kutas na vyākhyāsyante na hi atra mukhya brahmatva jñāpakam kiñcid asti iti atas āha prastāvaḥ iti  prastāvaḥ param iti api atra hi brahma vid āpnoti param iti parasya eva brahmaṇaḥ prastāvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ asti tena uttareṣām api brahma śabdānām para brahma viṣaya tva niścayāt na atra amukhya arthā aśaṅkā kāryā api śabdaḥ vakṣyamāṇa samuccaya arthaḥ aṅgīkṛtya ca idam jñāpakam uktam vastutas tu śakti grahaṇa sāmarthyena prathama prāpta tvāt bādhaka abhāvāt ca na amukhya artha kalpanā yuktā iti āha mukhya iti mukhya brahma grahe yukte na amukhyam yujyate kvacid 
NSu_1.1.176ab.1–1.1.176ab.6	 asambhave hi mukhyasya gauṇa artha aṅgīkṛtiḥ bhavet mukhya yoge api amukhya grahaṇam kim na syāt iti ced mukhyā sambhavaḥ eva amukhya aṅgīkāraḥ iti vyāpteḥ iti āha asambhave hi iti yat vā katham tarhi brahma veda brahmā eva bhavati ityādau brahma śabdasya amukhya artha grahaṇam iti atas āha kvacid asambhave hi iti nanu na anna maya ādayaḥ paramātmā vikāra vācinaḥ mayaṭ śabdasya śravaṇāt paramātmanaḥ anna ādi vikāra tva anupapatteḥ na ca brahma śabda anupapattiḥ amukhya artha sambhavāt na ca prastāva virodhaḥ mukhye arthe bādhaka abhāvaḥ ca iti uktam iti vācyam vikāra ātharsya mayaṭ pratyayasya bādhaka tvāt tatas eva prastāvasya api avavādāt iti āśaṅkaya tad parihārāya sūtram vikāra śabdāt na iti ced na prācuryāt iti vikāra śabdāt na iti ced na prācuryāt vikāra śabdāt na iti ced na prācuryāt tatra ānanda maya viṣayau= eva ākṣepari hārau= iti pratīti nirāsāya siddhānta aṃśam vyācaṣṭe prācurya arthāḥ ca iti 
NSu_1.1.176cd.1–1.1.176cd.2	 prācurya arthāḥ ca mayaṭaḥ sarve atra pratipāditāḥ caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe atra śrutau kutas iti atas āha pratipāditāḥ iti ayam arthaḥ mayaṭ śabdaḥ hi vikāraḥ iva prācurye api mukhyaḥ tad prakṛta vacane mayaḍiti anuśāsanāt na ca brahma śabdaḥ anyatra mukhyaḥ na ca sa avakāśena niravakāśasya bādhaḥ asti atas niravakāśa brahma śabda balāt sa avakāśasya mayaṭaḥ prācurya artha tva upapatteḥ na tad balāt anna maya ādīnām aparamātma tvam kalpyam iti etena vikāra pravāha madhya patita tva at na ānanda maya śabdaḥ prācurya arthaḥ iti etat garbhasrāveṇa eva gatam anna maya ādiṣu api mayaṭaḥ prācurya artha tā su īkārāt pareṇa api hi prāṇa maye na vikāra artha tvam vaktum yuktam prāṇānām prāṇa vikāra tva asambhavāt yathā kathañcit vikāra kalpane mukhya artha parityāgāt 
NSu_1.1.176cd.3–1.1.176cd.4	 syāt etat anna vikāra tva vat anna prācuryam api na īśvarasya sambhavati tat hi pāthiḥ vaśarīrāṇām anna upajīvinām syāt iti ced na atra anna śabdasya prasiddhān na artha tva abhāvāt svayam eva hi śrutiḥadyate atti ca bhūtāni tasmāt annam tat ucyate a iti anna śabdam nirvakti adidhātoḥ karmaṇi kartari ca kta pratyaye sati rūpam etat na ca bhūtāt tṛ tvam prasiddha annasya sambhavati tasmāt anna śabdaḥ ayam bhāva pradhānaḥ bhūtādya tvam bhūtāttṛ tvam ca vakti tathā api na tat prācuryam parameśvarasya yujyate bhūtāt tṛ tvasya saṃhartṛ tvena sambhave api bhūtādyatvasya katham api asambhavāt iti atas āha bhogya tvam iti 
NSu_1.1.177ab.1–1.1.177ab.3^1	 bhogya tvam atra ca adya tvam upajīvyatayā hareḥ atra ādya tvam nāma gauṇyā vṛttyā bhogya tvam eva bhogya tvam ca hareḥ sarva bhūta upajīvyatayā yujyate evam prāṇa manaḥ vijñāna śabdānām api vāyu antaḥkaraṇa buddhi lakṣaṇa prasiddha artha tām parityajya prāṇa bodha vijñāna artha tām upādāya tad prācuryama śarīre api paramātmani upapādanīyam tatra udāhṛta śloka arthānām prasiddha arthe anupapatteḥ iti mayaṭaḥ prācurya artha tve api na anna maya ādi tvam paramātmanaḥ yujyate tat pracuraḥ iti ukte tad viruddhasya api alpasya prasakteḥ 
NSu_1.1.177ab.1–1.1.177ab.3^2	 brāhmaṇa pracuraḥ ayam grāmaḥ iti yathā na hi paramātmani ajñāna duḥkha ādi leśaḥ api asti mā evam viruddha athar prāpteḥ aśābda tvāt tad pracura śabdaḥ hi tasya tasmin mahat tva mātram āha viruddha sadbhāvaḥ tu pramāṇa antara gamyaḥ anyathā anna pracuraḥ makhaḥ prakāśa pracuraḥ savitā iti ukte makhe savitari ca durbhikṣa andhakāra leśa prasaṅgāt nanu prācuryam pratiyogi apekṣayā eva bhavati satyam padārtha antara gata alpa tad dharma apekṣayā upapatteḥ iti āśava an yathā viruddha prati iti avakāśaḥ na bhavet tathā anna maya ādi śabda tātparya arthān āha mahā bhoktā iti 
NSu_1.1.177cd.1–1.1.178ab.2	 mahā bhoktā mahā bhogyaḥ iti arthaḥ anna maye bhavet mahā prāṇaḥ mahā bodhaḥ mahāvijñānavān api anna maye parameśvare anna maya śabdena uktaḥ iti śeṣaḥ mahā prāṇaḥ mahāvyāpāraḥ iti prāṇa maya śabdena ukta arthaḥ bhavet iti yojyam manu avabodhanaḥ iti asmāt bhāve asun pratyaye manaḥ bodhaḥ atra api iti arthaḥ manaḥ maya śabdasya vijñāna maya śabdasya bhavet iti yojyam api śabdāt mahā ānandaḥ iti ānanda maya śabda arthaḥ bhavet iti grāhyam 
NSu_1.1.178ab.3–1.1.178cd.1	 nanu anna maya ādi tve paramātmanaḥ aneka tva prasaṅgāt ekam eva iti śruti virodhaḥ syāt tathā vijñānam pracuram asmin= ānandaḥ pracuraḥ asmin= iti vijñāna ādīnām parameśvarasya ca bheda prasaṅgena vijñānam ānandam brahma ityādi śruti virodhaḥ syāt tathā manaḥ śabdasya avabodha artha tve manaḥ vijñāna śabdayoḥ eka artha tvena vijñāna mayaḥ manaḥ mayaḥ iti pṛthak uktiḥ na upapadyate iti atas āha viśeṣa iti viśeṣa sāmānyatayā vijñānam manaḥ iti api 
NSu_1.1.179ab.1–1.1.179ab.3	 ekasya jñāna rūpasya hareḥ uktiḥ vibhāgataḥ atra evam vivakṣā bhedena parihāra trayam draṣṭavyam ekasya nirbhedasya api hareḥ viśeṣa balena aneka tva saṅkhayāvat tvāt vibhāgataḥ anna maya ādi aneka tva uktiḥ yujyate evam jñāna rūpasya jñāna ānanda ādi a ātmakasya api hareḥ viśeṣa śaktayā eva vibhāgataḥ tadvat tvena uktiḥ yujyate evam manaḥ śabdasya avabodha artha tve api vijñāna mayaḥ iti manaḥ mayaḥ iti api vibhāgataḥ pṛthak uktiḥ yujyate katham viśeṣa sāmānyatayā viśeṣa sāmānya viṣaya tayā vijñāna śabdaḥ hi viśeṣa jñānam āha sāmānyaiḥ ye tu avijñeyā viśeṣāḥ mama vācī vijñāna śabda saha pāṭha balāt sāmānya jñāne paryavasyati vidyete hi paramārthataḥ sāmānya viśeṣa ākārau= iti samasta tad viṣaya jñānam upapannam eva īśvarasya iti tathā api na anna maya ādayaḥ paramātmā tasmāt vā etasmāt anna rasa mayāt anyaḥ antare ātmā prāṇa mayaḥ ityādinā anna maya ādīnām anyonyam anyatva avagamāt paramātmani tu bheda abhāvāt iti atas āha abhede api iti 
NSu_1.1.179cd.1–1.1.179cd.4	 abhede api viśeṣeṇa eva anyaḥ iti uditaḥ hariḥ bheda pratinidhi tayā bheda kārya nirvāhakeṇa viśeṣeṇa eva na tu bhedena yena virodhaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ na ca atra yati bhaṅgaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ pūrva antara tsvaraḥ sandhau kvacid eva para ādi vat draṣṭavyaḥ yati cintāyām yaṇa ādeśaḥ para ādivat a  iti vacanāt viśeṣaḥ bheda kāryam vyavahāra ādikam nirvahati iti pūrvam eva uktam atra viśeṣa niṣṭham āgamam ca āha bheda śabdāḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.180a–1.1.181c.3	 bheda śabdāḥ viśeṣam tu harau= anyatra bhinna tvāt brūyuḥ bheda nimittāḥ anya ādi śabdāḥ bheda śabdāḥ harau viśeṣam brūyuḥ iti asya apavādam āha hareḥ iti  hareḥ jīva jaḍaiḥ api bhedam hi mukhyatas brahma tarka vacaḥ api evam evam anyatra bhinna tām iti asya api kvacid apavādaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ na kevalam pūrva ukta upapattiḥ brahma tarka vacaḥ api evam āvedayati iti aperarthaḥ yat uktam prāk ekasya api vibhāgataḥ uktiḥ iti na tatra upapattiḥ abhihitā etām eva upapattim pratijñā mātreṇa ukte tatra api atidiśati atas iti  atas ekaḥ sa pañcadhā uktaḥ anna mayaḥ ityādi viśeṣa balāt eva iti ekaḥ api iti vā api śabda sambandhaḥ ityādi iti kriyā viśeṣaṇam kiñca uttarasmin= anuvāke varuṇaḥ bhṛgoḥ etasmin= anuvāke pratipāditam eva vastu brahma tvena upadiśati atas ca anna maya ādikam param brahma iti āha bhṛgoḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.181d.1–1.1.181d.3	 bhṛgoḥ ca etat vadiṣyati anuvākasya uttara tvena vadiṣyati iti uktam tasya ca brahma tvam upariṣyāt upapādayiṣyate tathā ca brahma śabdāt uttara anuvāka saṃvādāt ca anna maya ādīnām pañcānām api brahma tve siddhe mayaṭ pratyaya ādīnām prācurya artha tva vyākhyānam yuktam iti nanu atra anna maya ādi śabdāḥ śrūyante uttaratra mayaṭ pratyaya hīnāḥ anna ādi śabdāḥ eva śabda bhede ca nimitta bhedena abhidheya bhedena ca avaśyam bhavitavyam na ca anna maya ādi śabdāḥ anna ādi śabda paryāyāḥ iti yuktam pratyaya arthasya adhikasya vidyamāna tvāt na ca bhīmasenaḥ bhīmaḥ balabhadraḥ balaḥ satyabhāmā satyā punarnavā navāḥ kācamācī māci iti ādivatsyāt iti vācyam vaiṣamyāt bhīma ādi śabdāḥ hi pratyekam tad vācakāḥ na ca anna śabda mātram annamayasya vācakam pratyayasya svārthika tva prasaṅgāt prācurya arthaḥ ca mayaḍiti uktam na hi anna mayaḥ yajñaḥ iti vaktavye anna śabda mātram prayujyate tasmāt tatra atra ca pṛthak vastu pratipādanāt katham tad saṃvādena atra api brahma pratipādanam iti ucyate kim tu atra anna maya ādayaḥ kośāḥ tatra tu brahma iti atas āha prāpya tvena iti 
NSu_1.1.182ab.1–1.1.183ab.2^1	 prāpya tvena mayaṭproktenar tatra api anyat ucyate etam annam ayam ātmānam upasaṅkramya ityādi prācya tvena nirdeśe mayaṭaḥ spaṣṭa ukteḥ tatra api na anyat ucyate pracura anna ādiḥ eva atas hi annamat namayā iti api ucyate hi aviśeṣeṇa na anyat kiñcid iha ucyate yathā hi jyotiṣya uma adhikāre vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta iti kāla viśeṣa vidhi pare vākye jyotiḥ śabdaḥ jyotiṣyomasya abhidhāyakaḥ na hi tatra śabdayoḥ paryāya tvam rāja śabdasya api rāja puruṣa śabda paryāya tva prasaṅgāt jyotiṣām stomaḥ hi jyotiṣyomaḥ atas eva na pratyekam vācaka tvam kim tu adhikāra balāt eka deśa utkītarne samagra śabda lakṣaṇām aṅgīkṛtya nimitta abhidheya aikyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam evam atra api anna prāṇa ādi eka deśa utkīrtanena anna maya śabda ādi lakṣaṇayā anna ādi śabdānām anna maya ādi śabdānām ca aikyam aṅgīkṛtya tad nimitta abhidheya aikyam abhyupeyate prāpyatayā ukti sthāne mayaṭ prayoga sāmarthyāt 
NSu_1.1.183ab.2^2	 na hi anya vidyayā anya prāptiḥ yuktā iti bhāvaḥ anna maya iti prātipadika mātra grahaṇam iti śabdaḥ ādi arthe pratyekam ca abhisambaddhayate tathā ca atas prāpya tvena mayaṭ prokti sāmarthyāt annam iti ādīnām ca śabdānām aviśeṣeṇa svarūpakya ena kāraṇena taiḥ śabdaiḥ pracura anna ādi śabdaiḥ pracura anna ādi nimittavān paramātmā eva ucyate na punar anuvāka dvaye pratipādya bhedam aṅgīkṛtya iha anuvāke brahmaṇaḥ anyat kiñcid śarīra ādi kośa rūpam ucyate iti yojanā ādyaḥ hi śabdaḥ na hi anya vidyayā anya prāptiḥ yuktā iti nyāya sūcana arthaḥ dvitīyaḥ tu śabda aikye nimitta abhidheya aikya prasiddheḥ dyetakaḥ 
NSu_1.1.183ab.3–1.1.183cd.1	 evam sūtra dvayena anna maya ādi śabda pañcakasya īśvara vāci tvam mayaṭaḥ ca sarvatra prācurya artha tvam upapāditam idānīm ānanda maya śabdasya viṣṇu vāci tvam tad gatasya mayaṭasya prācurya artha tvam hetu antareṇa upapādayat tad hetu vyapadeśāt ca iti sūtram vyākhyāti mahā ānanda tvaḥ eva iti tad hetu vyapadeśāt ca tad hetu vyapadeśāt ca mahā ānanda tvaḥ eva asya hetuḥ kaḥ anyāt iti sphuṭam 
NSu_1.1.184a.1–1.1.184a.2	 uktaḥ ānanda āmaya prakaraṇe kaḥ hi eva anyāt kaḥ prāṇyāt yat eva ākāśaḥ ānandaḥ na syāt iti asya viṣṇoḥ eva mahā ānanda tvaḥ eva hetuḥ uktaḥ tena jñāyate viṣṇuḥ eva ānanda maya śabda arthaḥ iti mayaṭ ca prācurya arthaḥ iti yadi hi ānanda mayaḥ viṣṇoḥ anyaḥ syāt mayaṭ ca vikāra athaḥ bhavet tadā śrutiḥ anyasya ānanda vikāra tve hetum kam api brūyāt viṣṇoḥ mahā ānanda tve hetu kathanam tu asaṅgatam eva anena tat iti ṣaṣṭhayantam saptamī antam ca tantreṇa upāttam iti uktam bhavati tasya viṣṇoḥ tatra mahānanda tvaḥ iti ukta tvāt 
NSu_1.1.184a.3–1.1.184a.4	 nanu atra ākāśasya ānanda tva abhāve ananam prāṇanam ca kasya api na syāt iti etāvat ucyate na tu viṣṇoḥ mahā ānanda tve kaścid api hetuḥ ucyate iti atas uktam sphuṭam iti tat katham iti ced ākāśa śabdaḥ tāvat viṣṇu paraḥ iti vakṣyate ākāśaḥ tad liṅgāt iti tathā ca viṣṇoḥ anānanda tve jagataḥ niśceṣṭa tva prasaṅgamāṇa dayantyā śrutyā jagat ceṣyaka tvam hetu tvena vivakṣitam iti vivakṣuḥ tasya ānanda tvena vyāptim tāvat upapādayati śruti antaraḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.184a–1.1.184c.2	 śruti antare yasmāt sukham labdhvā karoti ayam karoti na asukhī yasmāt iti asya upari sambandhaḥ śruti antare chandaḥ gaśrutau= iti uktam iti uttareṇa anvayaḥ yadā vai sukham labhate atha karoti na asukham labdhvā karoti sukham eva labdhvā karoti iti śruti antare parameśvara vyāpārasya ānandāvinābhūta tvam uktam iti arthaḥ ānanda śabdaḥ ca pūrṇa ānandaḥ eva mukhya vṛttiḥ iti atra api śrutim āha bhūma iti 
NSu_1.1.184cd.1–1.1.185.1	 bhūmā sukham na alpe sukham bhavet iti uktam yaḥ vai bhūmā tat sukham na alpe sukham asti iti chandaḥ ga śrutau sukha śabdasya pūrṇa ānandaḥ eva mukhya vṛttiḥ iti uktam iti arthaḥ yadi api bhūma śabdaḥ bhāva vācī bahoḥ lopa bhū ca bahoḥ iti vacanāt tathā api bhāva bhavitroḥ aikyāt bhūma iti pūrṇaḥ eva ucyate na alpaḥ iti ukta tvāt sa ca sannidhānāt sukhena iti gamyate  yat pravṛttiḥ ca nṛtta gāna ādikā sukhāt duḥkhāt rodādikā ca eva sarva kartṛ tvataḥ asya ca 
NSu_1.1.186a.1–1.1.186a.4^1	 sarva śaktenar duḥkham syāt atra api yadi asmāt iti asya upati sambandhaḥ pravṛttiḥ caturvidhā bhavati sukha udrekāt duḥkha udrekāt sukha rāgāt veṣāt ca iti śeṣaḥ sukha udrekāt pravṛtteḥ udāharaṇam āha nṛttā iti unmattasya iti śeṣaḥ duḥkha udrekāt pravṛttim udāharati duḥkhāt iti kecid āhuḥ sukha duḥkha tad sādhana rāga dveṣau= eva pravartakau= iti yathā uktam pravartanā lakṣaṇāḥ doṣāḥ iti tad nirāsa artham eva śabdaḥ sukhāt eva duḥkhāt eva iti na hi unmattasya kvacid anusandhānam asti yena sukha rāgāt tad sādhanam etat iti anusandhāya nṛtta ādau pravarteta kim tu udriktam sukham eva tad pravṛttau hetuḥ 
NSu_1.1.186a.1–1.1.186a.4^2	 na api duḥkham dviṣataḥ api nārakiṇaḥ rodana ādikam tad parihāra hetuḥ iti anusandhānam asti kintu duḥkha udrekaḥ eva tatra kāraṇam iti anubhava siddham sukha rāgāt tad prāpti arthāḥ bhojana ādau pravṛttiḥ duḥkha dveṣāt ca tad nivṛtti arthā kaṇṭaka uddharaṇa ādau pravṛttiḥ suprasiddhā iti na udāhṛtāḥ kim atas yadi evam cetana sambandhinī pravṛttiḥ caturvidhā iti atas āha sarva kartṛ tvataḥ iti sukhān avāptiḥ ca iti śeṣaḥ tatas ca duḥkha udreka nimittā tad nivṛtti arthā sukha avāpti arthā ca iti pravṛtti trayam parameśvare na upapadyate iti bhāvaḥ tathā api kim iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_1.1.186bc.1–1.1.186bc.4	 atas kevala līlayā pravartakaḥ atas pariśeṣāt īśvaraḥ pravartakaḥ bhavan kevala līlayā ananda udrekāt eva bhavet iti siddhaḥ parameśvara pravṛtteḥ pūrṇa ānandā vinābhāvaḥ evam upodghāta m uktavā prayogam āha atas iti yatas evam parameśvara pravṛtteḥ siddhaḥ pūrṇa ānandā vinābhāvaḥ atas pravartakaḥ ayam kevala līlayā pūrṇa ānandena yuktaḥ bhavet iti ayam atra prayogaḥ īśvaraḥ sukhī bhavitum arhati pravṛtti kāraṇa traya rahita tve sati pravṛttimat tvāt unmatta vat iti kārya anuguṇat tvāt ca kāraṇasya mahā pravṛttyā mahānandaḥ eva siddhayati iti 
NSu_1.1.186cd.1–1.1.186cd.5	 na ced eṣa prāṇyāt anyāt ca kaḥ pumān evam śruteḥ abhiprāya siddham hetum vyākhyāya vācanikam vipakṣe bādhakam vivṛṇoti na ced iti eṣa paramātmā āsamantāt kāśanāt ākāśaḥ pūrṇa ānandaḥ na ced tadā kāraṇa antara abhāvāt na kiñcid pravartayet na ced eṣa kiñcid pravartayet tadā kaḥ pumān prāṇyāt anyāt ca na kaḥ api laukikīm vaidikīm vā pravṛttim kuryāt svātantrya abhāvāt iti yojyam anna maya ādīnām pañcānām api yuktayantareṇa para brahma tvam pratipādayitum sūtram māntra varṇikam eva ca gīyate iti māntra varṇikam eva ca gīyate māntra varṇikam eva ca gīyate 
NSu_1.1.187.1–1.1.188a.2	 brahma vid param āpnoti iti yat prathama sūcitam tat eva mantra varṇena satyam jñānam ananta vat lakṣitam tasya arthaḥ satyam jñānam anantam brahma iti mantra varṇa pratipāditam eva vastu uttareṇa granthena gīyate atas ca anna maya ādayaḥ param brahma iti syāt etat yadi mantravaṇaḥ api para brahma viṣayaḥ syāt tat eva kutas mantra varṇe brahma iti eva śravaṇāt tasya ca amukhyayā vṛttyā anyatra api sambhavāt katham ca māntra varṇikā atharprapañcanā artham uttaraḥ granthaḥ iti atas sūtra artham vivaritum upodghātam āha brahma vid iti 
NSu_1.1.188a.3^1	 brahma vid āpnoti param iti anuvākasya prathama vākye sūcitam tāvat para brahmā eva para śabda śravaṇāt tat jñānasya mokṣa hetutva ukteḥ ca tat eva ca mantra varṇena satyam jñānam anantavat antavat na bhavati iti lakṣitam asādhāraṇa dharma upeta tayā pratipāditam atas māntra varṇikam param brahma eva brahma vid āpnoti param iti ukte hi śaṅkā trayam udā iti kim lakṣaṇakam tat brahma na hi lakṣaṇena vinā vastu samasta vyāvṛtta tayā śakyate jñātum katham ca tad vedanam kim pratīyamāna ākārasya āropita tvam upetya tat eva asmi iti uta anyathā brahma iti pūrṇam pratītam na ca tādṛśasya sākṣātkāraḥ asmākam sambhavati iti kā nāma tat prāptiḥ ya jñāna sādhyāḥ sarva gata tvena nitya prāpta tvāt iti tad parihārāya mantra varṇam udāharati śrutiḥ 
NSu_1.1.188a.3^2–1.1.188a.4	 tat eṣā abhyuktā iti tat abhyetat āśaṅkā trayam prati tad samādhāna tayā iti yāvat eṣā ṛc ukta ucyate iti arthaḥ tatra satyam jñānam anantam brahma iti lakṣaṇa śaṅkāyāḥ uttaram etat ca pratyekam lakṣaṇam vakṣyamāṇa prakāreṇa satya tva ādīnām avyabhicāri tvāt atas eva samuditam lakṣaṇam abhyupetya viśeṣaṇa kṛtya anveṣaṇe pareṣām kleśaḥ parāstaḥ yaḥ veda iti dvitīya śaṅkottaram paripūrṇa parimāṇam api śakti vaśāt bhakta anukampayā alpa parimāṇam prakaṭayat sarva jīva tad upakāri kārya kāraṇa preraka tvena hṛdaya guhā avasthitam jñeyam iti saḥ aśnutaḥ iti tṛtīya śaṅkā uttaram na saṃyoga mātram tad prāptiḥ na api aikyāpatti ādiḥ kintu tad vayakti sthāne tatas atyanta bhinna tayā satyakāma tva ādi tat sārūpya abhivyaktiḥ eva iti astu evam prathama vākya sūcita arthasya para brahma tvāt tad uttha śaṅkā parihāra arthasya mantra varṇasya api tad paratvam tathā api kim prakṛtaḥ iti atas sūtra artham vivṛṇoti tatra iti 
NSu_1.1.188.1–1.1.189ab.3	 tatra satya tvam sṛṣṭayā anna prāṇayoḥ api uktam jñānam tu manasā vijñānena api udīritam ananta tvam tathā ananda maya vācā api udāhṛtam tatra lakṣaṇeṣu satya tvam sṛṣṭayā tasmāt vā etasmāt ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ a iti sṛṣṭi prakaraṇena sa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ anna rasa mayaḥ a ititasmāt vā etasmāt anna rasa mayāda iti ca anna prāṇayoḥ anna maya prāṇa mayayoḥ prakaraṇābhyām uktam jñānam tu brahma lakṣaṇam manasā tasmāt vā etasmāt prāṇa mayāda ityādinā manaḥ maya prakaraṇena vijñānena api tasmāt vā etasmāt manaḥ mayāda ityādinā vijñāna maya prakaraṇena api udīritam tathā śabdaḥ samuccaye ananta tvam api brahma lakṣaṇam ānanda maya vācāḥ tasmāt vā etasmāt vijñāna mayāda ityādinā ananda maya prakaraṇena apipadena uttara vākyaiḥ api udāhṛtam atas uttareṣām ṣaṇṇām api prakaraṇānām māntra varṇika para brahma lakṣaṇa vivṛti tvāt brahma eva anna maya ādayaḥ iti sūtra arthaḥ satya tvam sṛṣṭi prakaraṇena uktam iti uktam tat katham iti atas āha sadbhāvam iti 
NSu_1.1.189cd.1–1.1.190a.3	 sadbhāvam yāpayet yasmāt satyam tat tena kathyate iti sṛṣṭiḥ iha proktā sat śabdaḥ sadbhāva vācī sadbhāve sādhu bhāve ca sat iti etat prayujyate iti vacanāt sadbhāvaḥ janma sadbhāva śabdena prajananam sūcitam iti tathā ca sat śabde janma vācī iti karmaṇi upapade yāteḥ antarṇītaṇi arthāt atas anupasarge ka iti ka pratyaye kṛte ayasmaya ādīni chandasi iti upapadasya bhasaṃjñāyām satyam iti bhavati tatas sat sadbhāvam janma yāpayet prāpayet sva vyatiriktam sarvam yasmāt tasmāt tat brahma satyam kathyate iti sakala jagat janma kāraṇa tvam satya śabda artham hṛdi kṛtvā ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ iti ādi śrutyā iha anuvāke sṛṣṭiḥ proktā iti arthaḥ astu jagat sraṣṭṛ tvam satya śabda arthaḥ tathā api ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ ityādi sṛṣṭi prakaraṇam tat vaya ākhyānam iti na yuktam avayava artha kathana ādeḥ abhāvāt iti atas āha jagat iti 
NSu_1.1.190bc.1–1.1.190bc.3	 jagat sadbhāvayāpakam brahma iti sthāpanāya eva satya śabdena yat jagat sadbhāvayāpakam brahma iti uktam tasya arthasya sthāpanāya eva sṛṣṭiḥ proktā na avayava artha kathana ādi arthāḥ etat uktam bhavati na avayava artha kathana ādikam eva vyākhyānam kim tu ukta sthāpanam api prakṛte ca satyam brahma iti lakṣaṇe abhihite asambhavi idam pañcānām mahābhūtānām eva jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvāt iti āśaṅkaya mahābhūtānām api brahmā eva kāraṇam tad antargatam tad satta ādi pradam ca atas brahma eva jagat janakam iti tat sthāpanam ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ ityādinā kriyate iti bhavati idam tat vaya ākhyānam iti anna maya prakaraṇam satya śabda arthaḥ iti uktam tat katham iti atas āha sattvam iti 
NSu_1.1.190d.1–1.1.191ab.3	 sattvam jīvanam eva ca viśīrṇa tā ca sattvam syāt sannam iti āhuḥ eva yat na kevalam janma eva sat śabda arthaḥ kintu jīvanam ca prāṇa dhāraṇa lakṣaṇam sattvam eva sat śabda pravṛtti nimittam eva asti devadattaḥ iti ukte jīvati iti pratyayāt viśīrṇa tā ca śaithilya lakṣaṇā sattvam sat śabda pravṛtti nimittam syāt kutas yadi asmāt viśīrṇam vastu sannam iti āhuḥ eva śabdaḥ ṣad viśaraṇa gati avasādaneṣu iti pāṭhān mukhyaḥ eva ayam prayogaḥ iti sūcayati tathā ca asteḥ śatrantasya sadeḥ kvibantasya vā sat iti rūpam bhāva pradhānam ca etat sat sattvam jīvanam viśaraṇam vā bhūtānām yāpayati iti satyam iti uktam bhavati kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_1.1.191cd.1–1.1.192.1	 atas adyatāt tṛta anna tvam satya śabda arthaḥ eva hi yatas evam sakala bhūtānām jīva vināśa hetu tvam satya śabda uktam atas satya śabda arthaḥ eva anna tvam anna śabda pravṛtti nimittam tat katham hi yasmāt upajīvyatva lakṣaṇāt yatā vināśaka tva lakṣaṇāt tṛ tā ca tat iti prāṇa maya prakaraṇam ca satya śabda arthaḥ iti uktam tat katham iti atas āha prāṇam iti prāṇam devāḥ anuprāṇanti manuṣyāḥ paśavaḥ ca ye āyuḥ prāṇaḥ hi bhūtānām iti yat gati jīvane 
NSu_1.1.193a–1.1.193c.2	 ukte saditi dhātu arthaḥ gatiḥ ca atas hi satya tā prāṇa tvam deva ādayaḥ prāṇam paramātmānam anu tad preraṇayā prāṇanti ca iṣyante sa prāṇaḥ paramātmā sarveṣām āyuḥ jīvana hetuḥ ca atas asau prāṇaḥ ucyate iti mantreṇa prāṇanti jīvanti vā sarva bhūtāni anena iti prāṇa śabda artha tayā gati jīvane bhūtānām gati jīvana pradattam iti yāvat ukte yadi asmāt yatas ca sat iti dhātu arthaḥ gatiḥ jīvanam ca asti dhātu arthaḥ tābhyām ca śatari kvipi ca kṛte sat iti bhavati tat ca bhāva pradhānam vivakṣitvā sat sattvam gatim jīvanam vā bhūtānām yāpayati iti satya śabdaḥ api gati jīvana prada tvam āha atas satya tā prāṇa tvam satya prāṇa śabdayoḥ eka artha tvam iti vyākhyeyam anena anna maya prāṇa maya prakaraṇe satya śabda artha prapañcanena tadvaya ākhyāne iti uktam bhavati jñāna śabda arthaḥ manaḥ maya prakaraṇam iti uktam tat katham iti atas āha avabodha arthaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.193c–1.1.193d.3	 avabodha arthaḥ manudhātuḥ prakīrtitaḥ prakīrtitaḥ manu avabodhanaḥ iti vyāghātaḥ tatas ca tasmāt bhāve asun pratyaye vihite manaḥ iti jñānam iti ca eka artha tā bhavati vijñāna maya prakaraṇasya jñāna śabda artha tvam spaṣṭam eva iti na prapañcitam atra jñānam brahma iti lakṣaṇe abhihite sakala cetana sādhāraṇyāt alakṣaṇam etat iti āśaṅkāyām na avabodha mātram jñānam iha vivakṣitam kintu sakala padārtha sāmānya viśeṣa ākāra viṣayam iti atas na ati vyāptiḥ iti ābhyām prakaraṇābhyām lakṣaṇasya ati vyāpti parihārāya prapañcanam kṛtam iti ānanda maya prakaraṇena ananta tvam vyākhyātam iti abhihitam tat katham iti atas āha na alpaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.194.1–1.1.194.2	 na alpe sukham iti proktayā eva ānanda maya tā uktitaḥ ananta tvam sunirṇītam pūrṇa ānandaḥ hi na alpake na ānanda maya prakaraṇam ananta pada nirvacana para tva ādinā rūpeṇa tadvaya ākhyānam kim nāma ananta tva lakṣaṇasya asambhāvanāśaṅkāyām ānanda maya tā uktayā ananta tvam su nirṇītam upapāditam parameśvaraḥ anantaḥ pūrṇa ānanda tvāt iti nanu sādhya sādhanayoḥ kvāpi adarśanena vyāpti abhāvāt katham etat mā evam na alpe sukham asti iti śruti uktayā hi yasmāt alpake antavati pūrṇa ānandaḥ na asti iti niścīyate vyatireka vyāptiḥ asti iti arthaḥ nanu anantatva vat pūrṇa ānandaḥ api asiddhaḥ eva satyam atas eva kaḥ hi eva anyāt ityādinā upapādayati śrutiḥ uktam ca etat ā anantam aya vācāṣī iti sūtra artham upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_1.1.195a–1.1.195c.6	 atas hi mantra varṇa ukta vistṛtiḥ tu samastayā kriyate parayā yasmāt atas iti ukta prakāreṇa hi śabdaḥ prasiddhau tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe parayā mantra varṇāt uttarayā śrutyā tasmāt viṣṇuḥ eva anna maya ādi śabda vācyaḥ iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ evam ānanda mayaḥ abhyāsāt ityādi sūtraiḥ sva pakṣa sādhanam vidhāya para pakṣa pratikṣepa artham sūtram na itaraḥ anupapattiḥ iti na itaraḥ anupapatteḥ na itaraḥ anupapatteḥ tatra pratijña aṃśam vyākhyāti itaraḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.195d.1–1.1.195d.2	 itaraḥ atra na kathyate itaraḥ jīvaḥ vā śarīra ādi kośaḥ vā prakṛtiḥ vātra anna maya ādi prakaraṇe na kathyate kutas anupapatteḥ sarvam vai te annam āpanuvanti ye annam brahma upāsate sarvam eva te āyuryanti ye prāṇam brahma upāsataḥ ityādinā anna maya ādi jñānāt mokṣaḥ pratīyate anna maya ādi śabdānām ca jīva ādi vāci tve tad anupapatteḥ iti arthaḥ kutas anupapattiḥ iti atas āha puruṣam iti 
NSu_1.1.196.1–1.1.196.3	 puruṣam vetti yaḥ mucyet na anyaḥ panthāḥ hi vidyate iti śruteḥ anyavedī katham muktim prayāsyati anena tam evam vidvān amṛtaḥ iha bhavati na anyaḥ panthāḥ ayanāya vidyate a iti śrutim sūcayati nanu atra tam iti ucyate na viṣṇum iti mā evam sahasra śīrṣā puruṣaḥ iti ādau prakṛta puruṣasya tam iti parāmarśāt iti abhipretya uktam puruṣam iti yat śabda śravaṇāt saḥ iti draṣṭavyam mucyet mucyeta vyatyayaḥ bahulam iti vacanāt anyaḥ parama puruṣa jñānāt panthāḥ mokṣasya hi śabdaḥ śruteḥ prasiddha tvadyotakaḥ nanu astu puruṣa jñānāt eva mokṣaḥ puruṣaḥ api anyaḥ ced katham na anya jñānāt mokṣaḥ iti atas āha puruṣaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.124.1–1.1.198ab.3	 amukhya arthāḥ iti vadan yaḥ tad mārga anuvartinām katham na jāyate lajjā vaktum śābda tvam ātmanaḥ svayam nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ na anyasya etāni kasyacid svayam mukhyayā vṛttyā etāni nāmāni kutas eteṣām viṣṇu nāma tvāt eva hi ye viṣṇum uddiśya yajña dāna ādi kurvate te oṃm iti udāhṛtya eva anyathā tat na syāt na hi anya uddeśena kamar kurvāṇaiḥ anya viṣayaḥ mantraḥ japyate iti puruṣa śabdasya viṣṇu vāci tve yuktim āha sūktena iti 
NSu_1.1.199.1–1.1.199.4	 sūktena pauruṣeṇa enam yajanti adhyātma kovidāḥ iti paiṅgiśrutiḥ tena na anya jñānāt vimucyate yaḥ enam nārāyaṇam yajanti te pauruṣeṇa sūktena yajanti tena jñāyate puruṣa śabdaḥ viṣṇuvācī iti iti paiṅgiśrutiḥ puruṣa śabdasya bhagavat eka vācitām āha yatas tena tam evam vidvān iti asya viṣṇupa tvāt iti nanu itara parigrahaḥ iva īśvara parigrahe api anupapattiḥ samānāḥ tathā hi oṣadhībhyaḥ annāt puruṣaḥ iti oṣadhi kārya anna vikāram śarīram puruṣa padena uktavā sa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ iti tam parāmṛśyāt na rasa mayaḥ iti ucyate tasya īśvara tve anupapattiḥ eva tad pravāha patitāḥ ca prāṇa maya ādayaḥ iti āśaṅkām parihartum pīṭham āracayati brahma śabda uditaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.200.1–1.1.200.3	 brahma śabda udite tasmin= ātma śabdam prayujya ca tasmāt ākāśa sṛṣṭim ca provāca atra catuvirdhām brahma vid āpnoti param satyam jñānam anantam brahma iti brahma śabda udite tasmin viṣṇau tasmāt vā etasmāt ātmanaḥ iti ātma śabdam prayujya iti yojyam tasmāt etasmāt iti anusandhānāt ākāśa sṛṣṭim ca provāca ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ iti anena atra anuvāke ātma śabdam prayujya sṛṣṭim ca provāca iti enena ātma tvam api vidheyam iti sūcayati caturvidha ākāśa sambandhi tvāt sṛṣṭeḥ caturvidha tvam na svatas traividhyasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt tathā ca caturvidha ākāśa sṛṣṭim ca provāca iti arthaḥ ākāśa cāturvidhyam katham iti atas āha bhūtam iti 
NSu_1.1.201.1–1.1.202ab.3	 bhūtam bhūta abhimānī ca tad dehaḥ antar niyāmakaḥ hariḥ ca ākāśa śabda uktaḥ mukhyatas hariḥ eva ca ā samantāt kāśate yat ākāśaḥ mukhyatas hariḥ bhūtam āśakāśa śabda uktam iti ādi sambandhaḥ antar niyāmakaḥ eṣām trayāṇām tatra api na samāna kakṣya tayā caturṇām ākāśa śabdātartvam iti āha mukhyatas iti caśabdaḥ tuśabda arthe tat katham iti atas āha āsamantāt iti ā iti anuvādena samantāt kāśanam hi ākāśa śabda arthaḥ tatas ca yadi asmāt hariḥ eva mukhyatas samantāt kāśate tasmāt saḥ eva mukhyatas ākāśaḥ iti yojyam evam mukhyā mukhya bhedena caturvidhāt ākāśāt ākāśāt vāyuḥ iti ukta vidhayā caturvidhasya vāyoḥ sṛṣṭim provāca tatra api vāyu śabdena mukhyatas hariḥ eva ucyate iti yojyam tat katham iti atas āha bala iti 
NSu_1.1.202cd.1–1.1.202d.2	 bala jñāna svarūpa tvāt vāyuḥ vaśabdaḥ bala vācī āyuḥ iti jñānam ucyate ayateḥ gati artha tvāt gati arthānām jñāna artha tvāt tathā vāyoḥ agniḥ iti caturvidhādvayoḥ caturvidhasya agneḥ sṛṣṭim provāca tatra api mukhyatas hariḥ eva agni śabdena ucyate iti sthite tat katham iti atas āha agniḥ iti  agniragam nayan na gacchati svatas na pravartate iti agam viśvam aga śabde kamarṇi upapade nayateḥ kvip tad sanniyogena upapada lopaḥ dhātoḥ ca hrasvatā nirvacana tvāt tatas agneḥ āpaḥ iti caturvidhāt agneḥ caturvidhānām eva apām sṛṣṭim provāca tatra api āpaḥ iti mukhyatas hariḥ eva uktaḥ iti vācyam katham tat iti atas āha āpaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.203a.1–1.1.203a.2	 āpaḥ āpālanāt ca eva āṅpūrvasya pāte rūpam etat upasarga hrasvatā dhātu lopaḥ ca nirvacana tvāt caśabdaḥ anukta samuccaya arthaḥ tena strī rūpa tvāt strī liṅgam bahu rūpa tvāt bahuvacanam ca iti uktam bhavati eva śabdaḥ hariḥ eva iti sambaddhayate evam adbhayaḥ pṛthivī iti caturvidhābhyaḥ adbhayaḥ catuvirdhāyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ sṛṣṭim provāca tatra api hariḥ eva mukhyatas pṛthivī śabda vācyaḥ iti siddhe tat upapādayati pṛthivī iti 
NSu_1.1.203b.1–1.1.203cd.2	 pṛthivī prathitaḥ yatas prathitaḥ yatas tatas pṛthivī iti yojanā pṛthu vistāre tathā ca caturvidhāyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ oṣadhayaḥ iti caturvidha oṣadhi sṛṣṭim provāca bhūtānām samāpta tva ātta sthāne bhautika grahaṇam atas param kāryam tatra api oṣadhi śabdena mukhyatas hariḥ eva ucyate iti sthite kutas iti atas āha uṣyānām iti uṣyānām āśraya tvena saḥ eva uṣadhi nāmakaḥ dagdhānām uṣyāḥ oṣāḥ karmaṇi ghan oṣāḥ dhīyante asmin= iti oṣa dhiḥ iti arthaḥ karmaṇi adhikaraṇe ca iti kipratyayaḥ katham oṣadhi antargatasya uṣya āśraya tvam iti atas āha oṣadhīṣu sthitaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.204ab.1–1.1.204ab.3	 oṣadhīṣu sthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ kṣudhitaiḥ āśritaḥ bhavet kṣudhitaiḥ jāṭhara agni noṣṭhaiḥ oṣadhībhyaḥ annam iti caturvidha uṣadhībhyaḥ caturvidhasya annasya sṛṣṭim provāca tatra api anna śabdaḥ viṣṇau= eva mukhyaḥ adyate atti ca vyākhyānasya tasmin= eva sambhavāt iti prāk eva siddha tvāt na uktam tatas annāt puruṣaḥ iti caturvidha annāt śarīra tad abhimānita dantaryāmi rūpasya trividhasya puruṣasya sṛṣṭim provāca tatra api puruṣa śabdena mukhyatas hariḥ eva uktaḥ iti sthite tat katham iti atas āha purī iti 
NSu_1.1.204cd.1–1.1.205.1	 puri śete yatas saḥ atha puruṣaḥ ca iti gīyate atha tasmāt puri śarīre atra upapadasya saptamyāḥ aluc tasya cekārasya ukāraḥ dhātu śakārasya ṣakāraḥ nirvacana tvāt adhikaraṇe śeterḍaḥ evam ātma ādi śabdān vyākhyāya teṣām sṛṣṭim vivṛṇoti kriyā iti kriyā pravartaka tvena prādurbhāvaḥ hareḥ janiḥ ākāśa ādiṣu na anyā asti hi abhimānaḥ abhimāninaḥ 
NSu_1.1.206ab.1–1.1.206cd.1	 abhimāni śarīrasya sākṣāt bhūtasya ca udbhavaḥ sākṣāt janma eva kim na syāt iti atas āha na anyā iti hi śabdaḥ nityaḥ nityānām iti ādi śruti prasiddhi sūcakaḥ abhimānaḥ mama idam iti buddhiḥ janiḥ iti sambandhaḥ bhūtasya iti upalakṣaṇam oṣadhi ādi bhautikasya ca iti api grāhyam sākṣāt udbhavaḥ eva janiḥ iti anvayaḥ yadi evam ātma ākāśa vāyu agni ap pṛthivī oṣa dhi anna puruṣa padaiḥ mukhyatas hariḥ eva uktaḥ anyat amukhyataḥ tatas kim prakṛtaḥ iti atas āha evam iti evam deha ādi paryantam āgatam harim eva tu 
NSu_1.1.207.1–1.1.207.2^1	 parāmṛśati tasya eva pañca rūpa tva vittaye tyaktavā bhūta ādikam sarvam sa vai eṣaḥ iti śrutiḥ atra deha śabdāt prāc ātma śabdaḥ adhyāhāryaḥ sa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ iti śrutiḥ prakṛtam api bhūta ādikam sarvam tyaktavā a tmā ādi deha paryantam āgatam taiḥ śabdaiḥ prakṛtam harim eva parāmṛśati tasya eva sṛṣṭikartuḥ śarīre anna maya ādi pañca rūpa tva jñāpanāya iti idam uktam bhavati na anna maya ādīnām para brahma tva parigrahe sa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ iti parāmarśa virodhaḥ ātma pada uditasya parāmarśaḥ ayam iti svīkārāt na ca na asau para brahma tasmāt para prāpti kāmena jñātavyatayā uktāt etasmāt punar satya jñāna ananta tvena lakṣitāt ātmanaḥ iti prakṛta anusandhānāt na ca sannihita parāmarśa parityāgena dūra prakṛta parāmarśa aṅgīkāraḥ anucitaḥ iti vācyam ātma ādi puruṣa anta sarva śabdaiḥ api tasya eva prakṛta tva aṅgīkārāt na ca īśvarasya utpattiḥ anutpannā prādurbhāva apekṣayā vyākhyānāt na ca etat aprāmāṇikam vyākhyānam 
NSu_1.1.207.2^2–1.1.207.3	 kāraṇa tvena iti upapādayiṣyamāṇa tvāt na ca evam bhūta ādi sṛṣṭeḥ aprāmāṇika tva āpattiḥ ākāśa ādi śabdānām bhūta ādi paratvasya api svīkārāt anekāthaṛtāyāḥ ca upapādayiṣyamāṇa tvāt na ca evam teṣām api prādurbhāva mātrāpattiḥ sāmānyatas śrutasya sambhava śabdasya yathāyogyam vyākhyāna upapatteḥ na ca evam api anna rasa mayasya prakṛta sarva ātmaka tva āpattiḥ prakṛtānām api bhūta ādīnām parityāgena hareḥ eva parāmarśa aṅgīkārāt na ca etat anyāyyam ākāśa ādi śabdānām harau= eva mukhya tvena tasya eva utkaṭa tayā buddhi sannidhānāt naceśvara parāmarśaḥ vyarthaḥ tasya eva anna maya ādi pañca rūpa tā ājñāpanāya prakaraṇa antara ārambha artha tvāt tasya ca lakṣaṇa vivaraṇa artha tvena upayogasya ukta tvāt tathā ca anna mayasya brahma tve anupapatti abhāvāt na tad pravāha patitānām prāṇa maya ādīnām abrahma tvam kalpanīyam iti nanu kim anena bahudhā saṃvidhānena śarīra mātra parāmarśaḥ ayam kim na syāt mā evam tathā sati eṣa puruṣaḥ iti etāvatā pūrṇa tvena saḥ iti asya vaiyarthya āpatteḥ bhavat pakṣe api tat samānam iti ced na iti abhipretya āha saḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.208ab.1–1.1.208cd.1	 saḥ iti ātma pada uddiṣyaḥ eṣa jīva śarīra gaḥ eṣaḥ iti jīva śarīra gaḥ parāmṛśyate śarīra gaḥ iti eva ukte parameśvarasya śarīri tvam pratīyeta atas jīva iti uktam kiñca śarīra parāmarśe sa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ anna mayaḥ iti eva vaktavyam rasa śabdaḥ tu vyarthaḥ prayojana anupalabdheḥ annāt puruṣaḥ iti eva prakṛta tvāt ca na ca asmat pakṣe api rasa śabdasya vaiyarthyam anna mayaḥ iti eva ukte prākṛta anna maya tvam pratīyeta tad nivṛtti artha tvena sārthakī ādityāśayavān āha sāra iti sāra anna mayaḥ eva ayam na loka anna mayaḥ prabhuḥ 
NSu_1.1.209ab.1–1.1.209cd.1	 iti tam rasa śabdena viśinaṣṭi śarīra gam rasa śabdaḥ hi sāra vācī rasasāraḥ varaḥ ca iti śabdāḥ paryāya vācakāḥ iti vacanāt tatas ca anna rasaḥ annasāraḥ anna śabda artheṣu mukhya arthaḥ attṛtvā ādiḥ tat pracuraḥ iti uktam bhavati tasya tātparya arthaḥ sāra anna mayaḥ iti iti jñāpayitum iti śeṣaḥ viśinaṣṭi śrutiḥ api ca śarīra parāmarśaḥ ayam ced tasya idam eva śiraḥ ayam dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ ayam uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ ayam ātmā idam puccham pratiṣṭhā iti sarvam vyartham eva syāt śarīra śiraḥ prabhṛteḥ pratyakṣa siddha tvena upadeśa anapekṣaṇāt nanu īśvare api anupapattiḥ eva tasya śiraḥ prabhṛti avayava abhāvāt na prakāśa vat ca iti vakṣyamāṇa tvāt tathā api anupapattiḥ īśvara śiraḥ prabhṛtīnām apratyakṣa tvena idam iti nirdeśa ayogāt iti ced na lakṣaṇayā upapatteḥ iti āśa yavān āha idam iti idam iti eva nirdeśaḥ vastra prāvṛta vat vibhoḥ 
NSu_1.1.210ab.1–1.1.210ab.3	 śiraḥ ādeḥ bhavet jīvaśiraḥ ādau vyavasthiteḥ idam iti nirdeśaḥ apratyakṣe api parameśvara śiraḥ prabhṛtau lakṣaṇayā bhavet eva vibhoḥ śiraā ādeḥ jīva śiraā ādau pratyakṣe vyavasthiteḥ iti lakṣaṇā bīja sambandham darśayati nanu mukhya prayogam parityajya lākṣaṇikam prayuñjānasya prayojanam vācyam dṛṣṭam hi gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ iti ādau pāvitṛya ādi jñānam iti ced na prakṛte rūḍha lakṣaṇa tvāt iti bhāvena uktam vastra prāvṛtta vat iti saptamī arthe vatiḥ yathāpratyakṣe api jānuni pratyakṣa vastra prāvṛte pratyakṣa vastra sannidhānāt idam iti nirdeśaḥ tathā prakṛte api iti arthaḥ nanu mukhye bādhaka abhāvāt kutas lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇam iti ced na śarīra parigrahe vaiyarthyasya sphuṭa tvāt kiñca sarvam eva te āyuḥ yanti iti prāṇa maya jñānāt mokṣaḥ śrūyate kadāpi maraṇa abhāvaḥ hi sarvam āyuḥ naca asau vinā mokṣādi ujyate na ca śarīra parigrahe tat yujyate tam evaṃvidvāni śruti virodhāt iti āha tam iti 
NSu_1.1.210cd.1–1.1.210cd.2	 tam viditvā asya muktiḥ syāt na anya jñānāt kathañcana tam paramātmānam viditvā sākṣāt paśyate iti śeṣaḥ tena samāna kartṛ tā brahma śabda ādayaḥ api atra bādhaka tayā vaktavyāḥ nanu ca vikāra śabdāt iti sūtrakāreṇa anna maya ādīnām brahmatva aṅgīkṛtau= ekām anupapattim pariharatā lakṣaṇayā sarva anupapatti parihāraḥ api sūcitaḥ atas eva bhogya tvam atra ca adya tvam ityādinā bhāṣya kṛtā tatra eva anupapatti parihāraḥ kṛtaḥ brahma śabda uditaḥ iti ādikam api tatra eva kartum ucitam vyavadhāne kāraṇa abhāvāt anyathā utsūtrita tva prasaṅgāt iti mā evam tad sūtra sūcitasya api arthasya vyavadhāne prayojana sadbhāvāt anna maya ādīnām pañcānām api abrahmatva upapādaka upapattyā abhāsāḥ tatra nirākṛtāḥ anna maya mātra viṣaya anupapatti parihāraḥ tu atra iti anena jñāpyate kiñca na itaraḥ anupapatteḥ iti sūtram kecid na tāvat anna mayaḥ paramātmā parāmarśa ādi anupapatteḥ iti vyākurvate tat api nirākartum atra idam uditam iti 
NSu_1.1.210cd.3	 atra āha jīvaḥ eva anna maya ādi śabda arthaḥ sa hi anna vikāra śarīra avacchinna tvāt bhavati anna mayaḥ prāṇa manaḥ buddhayā ānanda upādhi avacchinnaḥ ca bhavati prāṇa ādi vikāraḥ ghaṭa ākāśam iva ghaṭa vikāraḥ tena prāṇa maya tva ādi upapattiḥ tathā ca sa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ iti parāmarśaḥ tad upādhi viṣaya tayā hi śliṣyataraḥ bhavati rasa śabdaḥ ca anna stha stha viṣṭha bhāga vyāvṛtti arthaḥ bhaviṣyati idam iti nirdeśaḥ ca mukhya arthaḥ sampadyate prāṇa maya ādiṣu sarvatra śiraḥ prabhṛti avayavānām vaktavya tvena tad prāye siddhasya api kathana upapatteḥ śarīri tvam avayavi tvam priya ādi yogaḥ brahma puccha tvam ca iti etat sarvam samañjasam bhavati na ca vaktavyam śarīra ādi kośāḥ eva kutas tarhi na aṅgīkriyante tathā ca anna maya prāṇa maya manaḥ maya vijñāna maya ānanda mayā me śuddhayantām iti śruti antara anu guṇyam ca syāt iti kośeṣu brahma śabda ādi anupapatteḥ anya tvam antara tvam śarīra tvam ca upādhi apekṣayā jīve api upapadyante 
NSu_1.1.210cd.4^1	 nanu jīva pakṣe api anupapattiḥ asti brahma śabdaḥ hi nirādhāraḥ na paramātmanā vinā upapadyate adyate atti ca iti a sarva ādya tvam sarvāttṛ tvaṃprāṇam devāḥa iti sarva deva ādi ceṣyaka tva yatas vācaḥ a iti vāc manasā agocara tvaṃvijñānam devāḥa iti sarva deva upāsya tvam jyeṣṭha tu aṃsaḥ akāmayata a iti saṅkalpa pūrvakam sarva sraṣṭṛ tvam sarva antara tvam ityādīni na alpatara jñāna śaktayā ādi sampanne jīve sambhavanti tad hetu vyapadeśaḥ ca asaṅgataḥ syāt māntra varṇika vyākhyāna tā ca bādhyeta na ca jīva jñānāt mokṣaḥ yujyate iti mā evam upaniṣad arthān abodhāt atra hi jīva brahmaṇoḥ ekatvam vivakṣitam 
NSu_1.1.210cd.4^2–1.1.210cd.6	 tatra yāni vākyāni śuddha virodhīni tāni upahita saṃsāri svarūpa apekṣāṇi brahma śabda ādīni tu tad svabhāva siddha paramātma svarūpa apekṣāṇi aikya vivakṣā ca atra vākya śābalyāni athā anupapattyā eva gamyate na ca evam vinigamanāyām kāraṇa abhāvāt paramātmā eva anna maya ādi vācyaḥ mahā ākāśa dharmaḥ eva avacchinna kāśe vyavahriyate yāvān vā ayam ākāśaḥ tā= ān eṣaḥ antar hṛdayaḥ ākāśaḥ a iti na tu paricchinna dharmaḥ vitasti mātra tvam mahākāśe na ca brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti anupapannam asya jīvasya brahma puccham āyatanam adhiṣṭhānam nijam sva rūpam iti artha upapatteḥ tasmāt na itaraḥ a iti anupapannam iti āśaṅkām parihartum bheda vyapadeśāt ca iti sūtram bheda vyapadeśāt ca bheda vyapadeśāt ca 
NSu_1.1.211a–1.1.211c.3	 āditye puruṣe ca ayam iti bheda upadeśataḥ na asya abhedaḥ asti jīvena tatra caśabdaḥ pratijñāsamuccaya arthaḥ iti bhāvena sūtram vyācaṣṭe ādityaḥ iti syāt etat evam kathañcid yadi asyām upaniṣadi jīva paramātmanā urabhedaḥ vivakṣitaḥ syāt na ca evam sa yaḥ ca ayam puruṣe yaḥ ca asau= āditye saḥ ekaḥ a iti puruṣa āditya śabda upalakṣita apakṛṣṭa utkṛṣṭa sakala jīvānām niyamya tayā adhikaraṇa tvena paramātmanaḥ ca niyāmaka tayā adhiṣṭhātṛ tvena bhedasya eva atra upadeśāt tathā arasam hi eva ayam labdhvā anandī bhavati a iti labdhṛ labdha vyatayā āyadā hi eva eṣaḥ a iti upāsaka upāsya tayā aupasaṅkrāmati a iti prāptṛ prāpya tayā bhīṣā asmāt a iti niyamya niyāmaka tayā ca bheda upadeśāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ yat uktam vākyaśābalya anupapattiḥ atra pramāṇam iti tat ayuktam kevalam brahma para tayā eva vākyānām samañjasīkṛta tvāt tatas na jīvaḥ anna maya ādi śabda vācyaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.211a–1.1.212.1	 nanu katham ucyate na asya paramātmanaḥ abhedaḥ asti jīvena iti anumānataḥ tad abhedasya pramita tvāt tathā ca ukta vidhayā anna maya tva ādikam jīvasya kim na syāt na ca ukta bheda upadeśa virodhaḥ anumāna virodhena tasya eva anya paratva upapatteḥ iti āśaṅkā parihārāya sūtram kāmāt ca na anumāna apekṣā iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe na anumā iti  na anumā kāma cāriṇī vimatāni śarīrāṇi mad bhoga āyatanāni yat śarīrāṇi iti ādikā tu tattva jñāne hi apekṣyate 
NSu_1.1.213a.1–1.1.213a.5^1	 pratyakṣa ādi viruddha tvāt kāmāt ca na anumāna apekṣā kāmāt ca na anumāna apekṣā sampratipanna sva śarīreṣu siddha sādhana tā parihārāya vimatāni iti uktam yadi asmāt śarīrāṇi śarīra tvāt iti arthaḥ mad śarīra vat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ ādi grahaṇāt vipratipannāni indriyāṇi mama eva karaṇāni indriya tvāt sampratipannavat iti ādīnām upādānam nanu etāni anumānāni pratikṣetram kṣetrajñānām abhedam sādhayanti na tu jīvānām paramātmā bhedam tena vimatāḥ ātmānaḥ paramātmanaḥ na bhidyante ātma tvāt paramātma vat ityādi anumānam atra śaṅkanīyam na tu idam iti mā evam 
NSu_1.1.213a.1–1.1.213a.5^2	 na hi jīvānām upahita svarūpāṇām eva sākṣāt abhedaḥ sambhavati pratyakṣa ādi virodhāt tatas ca nirupādhikena rūpeṇa abhede anumānam paryavasyati tathā ca katham na prakṛta saṅgatiḥ iti tattva jñāne tattva jñāna atharm na apekṣyate tattva jñāna kāraṇam na bhavati iti arthaḥ kutas pratyakṣa ādi viruddha tvāt hi śabdaḥ dṛṣṭānta sūcakaḥ tat ayam prayogaḥ vimatāni śarīrāṇi iti ādika anuma anumāna tvena para abhimatā yathā artha jñāna kāraṇam na bhavati pramāṇa viruddha tvāt dahana anuṣṇa tā sādhana anumāna vat iti pratyakṣa ādi viruddhā api sat anumā kim na syāt iti atas uktam kāmacāriṇī iti tat vivṛṇoti akṣa iti 
NSu_1.1.213bc.1–1.1.213d.3	 akṣa āgama bhaya ujkhitāḥ anumā kāma vṛttāḥ hi akṣam pratyakṣam anumānam api atra upasaṅkhayeyam akṣa āgama bhaya ujkhitā iti tad virodha bhaya ujkhitā iti arthaḥ kāma vṛttā puruṣa icchā anusāri pravṛttimatī nanu anena kim vipakṣe bādhakam uktam iti atas āha kutra iti  kutra na avasaram vrajet kim ākṣepe sarvatra api avasaram vrajet iti arthaḥ tat katham iti atas āha jaḍaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.214.1–1.1.214.3^1	 jaḍaḥ ātmā eva vastu tvāt prameya tvāt jaḍam citiḥ ghanaḥ ākāśaḥ ityādyāḥ vāryante kena hetunā ātmā jaḍaḥ jñānān āśrayaḥ vastu tvāt ghaṭa vat ākāśaḥ ghanaḥ nibiḍa avayavaḥ prameya tvāt pāṣāṇa vat iti sākṣi pratyakṣa viruddham jaḍam ghaṭa ādikam citiḥ cetanam prameya tvāt ātma vat iti anumāna viruddham caitanya kāryasya sarvathā api anupalambhāt ādya padena brāhmaṇena surā peyā drava dravya tvāt kṣīra vat iti āgama viruddhasya grahaṇam kena iti ākṣepe yadi pratyakṣa ādi virodhinaḥ api anumātvam syāt iti śeṣaḥ pratyakṣa ādi viruddham api yadi aikya anumānam pramāṇam syāt tadā udāhṛtam api kim na syāt aviśeṣāt iti uktam bhavati 
NSu_1.1.214.1–1.1.214.3^2	 nanu atra katham prayoktavyam yathā anyāsamaveti evakāreṇa āha tarhi pratijñāpada vyāghātaḥ syāt iti ced astu na hi pratyakṣa ādi virodhāt ayam garīyān samaḥ ca para anumāne tad parihāraḥ api atra tulyaḥ nanu ākāśaḥ ghanaḥ iti sādhane kāla ādau vyabhicāraḥ na pakṣa tulya tvāt yat atra vaktavyam tad upariṣyāt vakṣyate iti nanu atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti atra eva jīva īśa bhedaḥ samarthitaḥ tathā janma ādi sūtreṇa api atas jīva aikyam iti ukta tvāt atra api punar tad sādhane punarukta tā syāt ityaḥ āha na jīva iti 
NSu_1.1.215a–1.1.215d.2	 na jīva bheda sūtrāṇām śaṅkayā atra punar ukta tā vākya antara dyotaka tvāt pṛthak iti atra pūrṇa tā atra śāstre tatra tatra prakaraṇe hi aikya vivakṣāyām coditāyām tad tad gata bheda vākyat yotanena sūtreṣu bheda samarthanam kriyate atas tātparya bhedāt na punarukta tā śaṅkayā tathā hi jijñāsā vākyeṣu abheda śaṅkāyām tad gata brahma śabdena eva bheda samarthanam jijñāsyasya brahmaṇaḥ jīva tve śaṅkite tad pūrva vākya ukta lakṣaṇena bheda sādhanam ityādi svayam ūhyam evam eva bheda vyapadeśāt ca anyaḥa iti ādau= api punar ukta doṣaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ nanu evam satyabhedaḥ sva rūpeṇa kutra api na nirākṛtaḥ syāt iti atas āha pṛthak iti 
NSu_1.1.215a–1.1.215d.3	 pūrṇa tā pradhāna tā bheda sādhanasya svātantryeṇa vicārita tvāt yadi api prakaraṇa viśeṣa viṣaya tayā abhede nirākṛte api svarūpa nirākaraṇam arthāt siddhayati tathā api vastu sthiti kathanam etat iti adoṣaḥ athavā punarukti parihārasya evaṃjāta tva ātata yava ca upamā a ityādi sūtrāṇi āpāta pratīta bhāṣya diśāḥ bheda parāṇi iva pratibhānti tad nirāsa artham idam uktam pṛthak upadeśāt a iti atra eva bheda samarthanasya pūrṇa tā paryavasānam iti yadi api etat kariṣyamāṇa vyākhyānāt eva jñāsyate tathā api spaṣṭa artham uktam iti adoṣaḥ 
NSu_1.1.215a–1.1.215d.7	 śarīra ādi kośāḥ eva anna maya ādi śabda vācyāḥ iti pakṣaḥ api na itaraḥ anupapatteḥ iti sādhāraṇa doṣeṇa dūṣitaḥ eva viśeṣa doṣeṇa dūṣayitum sūtram asmin= asya ca tad yogam śāsti iti asmin= asya ca tad yogam śāsti asmin asya ca tad yogam śāsti yogam annamayādyaiḥ yat phala tvena asya śaṃsati sthāna dvaye api atas kośāḥ ete iti ati sāhasam 
NSu_1.1.215a–1.1.215d.8	 yadi asmāt asya sa yaḥ evaṃvid iti uktasya brahma vidaḥ phala tvena anna maya ādibhiḥ yogam tad prāptim sthāna dvaye api anuvāka dvaye api śaṃsati kathayati śrutiḥ etam annam ayam ātmānam upasaṅkrāmati ityādi etam annam ayam ātmānam upasaṅkramya ityādi ca atas ete anna maya ādayaḥ kośāḥ iti etat vaya ākhyānam ati sāhasam pūrva uttara aparāmarśa mūlam na hi śarīra ādi kośa prāptiḥ brahma vidyā phalam iti sambhavati tarati śokam ātma vid iti ādi virodhāt śarīra ādeḥ ca śoka rūpa tvāt syāt etat yat yatra anna maya ādi prāpti rucyeta na ca etat asti upasaṅkrama śabdasya atikrama artha tvāt iti atas āha upasaṅkramaṇam ca iti 
NSu_1.1.216.1–1.1.217ab.2	 upasaṅkramaṇam ca eva dvitīya uddeśitam prati atikramam vadantam tam upaśabdaḥ nivārayet dvitīya uddeśitam prati dvitīyayā karma tvena uktam anna maya ādikam prati yat upasaṅkramaṇam ucyate tad atikramam vadantam upasaṅkramaṇa pada vāci padam atikrama artham vyākurvantam iti yāvat upaśabdaḥ nivārayet tasya upaśabda virodhaḥ syāt upapūrvasya krameḥ prāpti artha tvāt doṣa antaram āha aśrutasya iti aśrutasya ati śabdasya sthānam dadyāt katham punar punar iti doṣa antara samuccaya arthaḥ 
NSu_1.1.217cd.1–1.1.217cd.4	 śruta aśruta parityāga kalpane vigata hriyām vākya dvaya tātparyam āha śrutā iti evam vyākurvāṇena hi śrutam upaśabdam tyaktavā tad sthāne aśrutaḥ ati śabdaḥ adhyāhāryaḥ tathā ca śruta parityāgaḥ aśruta kalpanam ca syāt tat ubhayam ca lajjā hetuḥ iti na vayam śruta parityāgena aśruta adhyāhāram kurmaḥ yena ayam doṣaḥ syāt kim nāma avyayānām aneka artha tvāt upaśabdaḥ ati śabda arthaḥ vyākhyāyate iti ced na niyāmakena vinā prasiddha artha tyāga aprasiddha artha svīkāra anupapatteḥ na hi avyayāni aneka arthāni iti etāvatā antar śabdasya bahis iti arthaḥ gṛhyate kintu prayoga ādikam anusṛtyā eva iti sthite abhyupagamya api doṣam āha mṛtau= eva iti 
NSu_1.1.218ab.1–1.1.218ab.2	 mṛtau= eva parityāgaḥ kṛtaḥ hi anna mayasya ca hi yasmāt anna mayasya kośasya caśabdāt prāṇa mayasya ca parityāgaḥ mṛtau= eva kṛtaḥ bhavati mṛteḥ śarīra tyāga rūpa tvāt tasmāt asmāt lokāt pretya iti maraṇa uktayā eva anna maya ādi atikramasya ukta tvāta punar etam annam ayam ātmānam upasaṅkrāmati iti tad atikrama uktau punaruktiḥ prasajyeta iti kiñca brahma vid āpnoti param iti upakrama anuguṇyam ca prāpti paratve syāt atas na anna maya ādayaḥ kośāḥ kintu viṣṇuḥ eva śuddhi prārthana liṅgāt vākya antara uktānām kośa tve api na kaścid virodhaḥ api ca te anna maya ādayaḥ ete tvad nara samayaḥ iti upakramāt rasaḥ vai saḥ iti vākya śeṣāt ca anna rasa maya ādaya iti śabda antara nyāyena api anye bhaviṣyanti iti sarvam anavadyam 
NSu_1.1.218ab.3	 evam anna maya ādīnām pañcānām api para brahmatva pratipādana para tayā sūtrāṇi vyākhyāya pareṣāgam a vyākhyām pratyākhyātum uttaraḥ ayam granthasandarbhaḥ ārabhyate tatra māyā vādinaḥ anna maya ādayaḥ pañca api kośāḥ iti manyamānāḥ brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti uktasya brahmaṇaḥ sva prādhānyena jñeya tva pratipādakāni etāni sūtrāṇi iti vyācakṣate tathā hi anna maya ādayaḥ catvāraḥ tāvat anna ādi vikārāḥ kośāḥ eva tathā ca vikāra arthe mayaṭ pravāhe satya ānanda mayaḥ eva akasmāt ardha caratīya nyāyena katham eva mayaṭaḥ prācurya artha tvam brahma viṣaya tvam ca āśrīyate māntra varṇika brahma adhikārāt iti ced anna maya ādīnām api tarhi brahma tva prasaṅgaḥ anna maya ādīnām antarasya anyasya śravaṇāt abrahma tvam ānanda mayasya tu tad abhāvāt brahma tvam iti ced na tatra api satyam jñānam anantam brahma iti prakṛtasya brahmaṇaḥ brahma puccham pratiṣṭhā iti ānanda maya āśraya tayā ukta tvāt tat vijijñāpayiṣayā eva anna maya ādayaḥ pañca api kośāḥ kalpyante 
NSu_1.1.218ab.4	 nanu anna maya ādīna abhiva ānanda mayasya puccha tvena uktam brahma katham sva pradhānam syāt na sva pradhāna tayā prakṛta tvāt naca ānanda maya avaya tvena api brahmaṇi jñāyamāne prakṛta tvam na hīyate ānanda mayasya brahma tvāt iti vācyam tathā sati tat eva avayavi avayavaḥ ca iti asāmañjasya aprasaṅgāt anyatara parigrahe ca pucchasya eva brahma tvam yuktam brahma śabda śravaṇāt na tu ānanda mayasya tatra brahma śabda aśravaṇāt asan= ā iva iti ślokasya brahma puccham iti ukta brahma viṣaya tvāt na hi atra ānanda mayaḥ anvākṛṣṭate kintu pucchatayā uktam brahma sva pradhāna tayā na ca ānandasya anubhava siddhasya bhāva abhāva śaṅkā yujyate katham tarhi puccha tva uktiḥ puccha vat puccham iti āśraya artha tvāt 
NSu_1.1.218ab.5	 kiñca ānanda mayasya priya ādi avayava yoga aśārīra tvābhyām sa viśeṣat tvāt brahmaṇaḥ api sa viśeṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ nirviśeṣam ca brahma vāc manasā agocara tva śruteḥ mayaṭaḥ prācurya artha tve api ānanda pracuraḥ iti ukte duḥkha alpa tvam api gamyate prācuryasya loke pratiyogi alpa tāsāpekṣa tvāt na ca brahmaṇi duḥkham sambhavati kiñca priya ādīnām pratiśarīram bhedena ānanda mayasya api bhede brahmaṇaḥ api pratiśarīram bhedaḥ prasajyeta na ca tat yuktam ananta tva śruteḥ na ca evam bhāgarvī vāruṇī vidyā viruddhayeta tatra mayaṭaḥ aśravaṇena bhinna viṣaya tvāt etam ānanda mayam ātmānam iti ca anna maya ādīnām iva ānanda mayasya atikramaṇīya tayā uktasya abrahma tvāt ante mayaṭaḥ śravaṇena pūrvam api tad adhyāhāre pūrvam api na ānanda mayaḥ brahmāḥ tu brahma jñāna arthinaḥ tu tad upadeśaḥ dvāra tayā upapannaḥ bhaviṣyati iti 
NSu_1.1.218ab.6–1.1.219.1	 nanu evam tarhi katham sūtrāṇi ānanda mayasya brahma tā pratipādana paratayā upalambhāt mā evam veda sūtrayoḥ virodhe guṇe tu anyāyi akalpanā iti nyāyena sūtrāṇām kathañcid yojya tvāt tasmāt ānanda maya ādayaḥ pañca api kośāḥ na brahma iti tat etat sūtra vyākhyānena nirākṛtam api śiṣya hita tayā sphuṭam nirākaroti ye annam iti ye annam brahma ityādi upāsām sāmāna adhikaraṇyataḥ uktavā pañca svarūpāṇām punar tad prāpti vādinī sthāna dvaya gatā veda vāṇī tad apalāpinām 
NSu_1.1.220ab.1–1.1.220ab.3^1	 tamasaḥ anyatra saṃsthānam katham eva saheta sā ityādi iti kriyā viśeṣaṇam pañca svarūpaṇām iti viśeṣaṇa samāsaḥ eva ayam na dviguḥ tad hita artha ādi abhāvāt tad prāpti vādinī jñāna phala tvena iti śeṣaḥ sthāna dvayam anuvāka dvayam tad apalāpinām anna maya ādīnām idam uktam bhavati anna maya ādi pañcakam yadi na brahma tadā anna maya ādīn pratyudāhṛta ślokeṣu ye annam brahma upāsata iti prathama anuvāke annam brahma iti vyajānāt iti uttara anuvāke ca brahmatayā ukti virodhaḥ syāt na hi pucchasya api brahma tve pramāṇam asti anyat atas brahma śabdāt nanu etat brahma jñāna dvāra tayā upadiṣyam na tu brahmatayā upadiṣyam iti ced na 
NSu_1.1.220ab.1–1.1.220ab.3^2–1.1.220cd.1	 sāmānādhikaraṇyena ukta tvāt na ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam api gauṇam tathā sati viduṣaḥ tad prāptiḥ uktāḥ viruddhayeta na ca tatra atikramaḥ athar iti uktam naca ānanda maye brahma śabdaḥ na asti ślokasya puccha viṣaya tvāt iti vācyam tathā sati anna maya ādi ślokānām api tathā tva prāpteḥ kiñca bādhaka vaśāt ittham āśrīyate evam eva vā na ādyaḥ bādhakānām parihṛta tvāt dvitīye tu nirnimittam veda artha bhūta brahmāpalāpinaḥ bauddhasya iva veda abhimāni kopena naraka prāptiḥ syāt iti sthāna dvaya gata iti uktam prāk ca bhṛgoḥ ca etat vadiṣyati iti tatra uttara anuvāka uktasya brahma tvam prapañcayati adhīhi iti adhīhi bhagavaḥ brahma iti uktaḥ anna prāṇa pūrvakam 
NSu_1.1.221a.1–1.1.221a.2^1	 āha brahma katham tat na adhīhi adhyāpaya ṇi arthasya antarṇīta tvāt bhagavaḥ bhagavan matuvasaḥ ruḥ sambuddhau chandasi iti vacanāt uktaḥ bhṛguṇā pṛṣṭaḥ varuṇaḥ bhṛguḥ vai vāruṇiḥ varuṇam pitaram upasasāraḥ adhīhi bhagavaḥ brahma iti tasmai etat provāca annam prāṇam cakṣuḥ śrotraṃmanā uvācam a iti evam brahma praśna uttara tvena ukta tvāt anna ādikam brahmā eva bhavitum arhati iti arthaḥ nanu tatra mayaṭaḥ aśravaṇāt bhinna viṣaya tvam iti ced na ukta uttara tvāt kiñca yathā sati an= amaya ādīn pratyudāhṛta ślokeṣu mayaṭaḥ aśravaṇāt bhinna viṣaya tvam syāt astu iti ced na tathā sati tad udāharaṇasya asaṅgati prasaṅgāt 
NSu_1.1.221a.2^2	 yasya anna ādeḥ vikārāḥ tetad praśaṃsā paratayā saṅgatiḥ tu iti ced na manaḥ maya śloke tad ayogāt tarhi tatas eva anupapatteḥ anna ādi śabdaiḥ annamaya ādayaḥ eva ucyate iti kalpyate iti ced tarhi atra api prakaraṇa vaśāt anna maya ādayaḥ eva ucyante iti aṅgīkāryam ukte arthe hi saṃvādi tvena iyam ākhyāyikā uktā tasmāt anna maya ādayaḥ eva atra ucyante te ca brahma praśna uttara tvena ukta tvānyathā anupapattyā brahma eva iti yadi apisā eṣā bhārgavī vāruṇakṣa vidyā parame vyoman pratiṣṭhitā a iti sākṣāt brahma vidyā tvam ucyate tathā api mīmāṃsā artham yuktayupanyāsaḥ athavā asya api samāna yogakṣema tvāt iti 
NSu_1.1.221a.3	 syāt etat brahma praśna uttara tayā ukti mātreṇa na varuṇa uktānām anna ādīnām brahma tvam siddhayati brahma jñāna upāya tayā api tad upadeśa upapatteḥ tathā hi dvitīyā candra praśne acandra rūpā api śākhā candratayā ucyate candra jñāna upāya tvāt yathā vā arundhatī praśne tad samīpa vartinī pṛthulā tāraka arundhatī tvena upadiśyate arundhatī jñāna dvāra tvāt dvāra tvam ca anna ādi śabda uditānām śarīra ādīnām bahis vṛtti nivāraṇa dvārā brahma jñānam pratyupapadyate eva iti mā evam kim anena vyabhicāraḥ codyate kiṃvā an yathā siddhiḥ sambhāvyate uta sā niścīyate pakṣa trayam asambaddham iti āha dvāram iti 
NSu_1.1.221bc.1–1.1.221d.2	 dvāram tat iti vādinaḥ upasattim katham vidyuḥ tad anna ādikam upapattim brahma jñāna artha upasatti uttara kālīnam guru upadeśa prakāram iti arthaḥ katham iti ākṣepe na vidyuḥ iti arthaḥ guru upadeśa prakāra ajñāna vijṛmbhitā iyam śaṅkā iti bhāvaḥ tat katham na vidyuḥ iti atas āha upasannāya iti  upasannāya hi triśas brahma eva vaktavyam na punar yat kiñcit abodhe api punar punar tat eva śabda antareṇa vaktavyam dvāram ca dvāra tayā eva vaktavyam na tu tad ātmaka tvena na hi dhūmaḥ agni ātmaka tvena pradaśya ṛte candradyudāharaṇam api asiddham eva iti āgamāḥ vedāḥ sampradāya vidaḥ smṛti itihāsa purāṇa kartāraḥ api ca a= itaretara samuccaya arthau tarhi upadeśa prakāra ājña tayā varuṇaḥ anyat upadiśati iti astu mā evam lokapālasya etāvat jñāna abhāva sambhavāt iti āśayena dvāra upadeśa śaṅkā nirākaraṇam upasaṃharati tat iti 
NSu_1.1.223ab.1–1.1.223cd.2	 tat yat kiñcid katham brūyāt upasannāya dikpatiḥ nanu abrahmā eva brahma pṛṣṭavate varuṇena uktam vyāmohanāya iti kim na syāt iti atas āha na vadet iti na vadet brahma ca katham māyāvī na hi vārirāj kim ākṣepe brahma eva vadet iti arthaḥ tatra hetuḥ māyāvī na hi iti āpta tvāt iti arthaḥ vivakṣita artha tattva jñānam hi varuṇasya dikpateḥ prasiddham avipralambhaka tvam ca pitṛ tvāt bhṛgoḥ brahma jñāna yogya tvāt upasannāya iti prasaṅga doṣasya nirasta tvāt vārirāj iti bhūta abhimāni tvena uktasya apaṭukaraṇa tva asambhavāt vivakṣāyāḥ ca upadeśāt eva siddheḥ atas eva śrutiḥ vāruṇiḥ ḥpitaram upasasāda iti āha tat anena āptena brahma praśna uttara tvena ukta tvam anna ādīnām brahma tve hetuḥ iti uktam bhavati 
NSu_1.1.223cd.3	 nanu varuṇena ukteṣu anna ādiṣu anna prāṇa manāṃsi santu brahma svarūpāṇi anna ādi śabdān āmattṛ tva ādi artha tayā anupapatti abhāvāt cakṣuḥ śrotra vāc śabdam tu katham brahma syāt cakṣuḥ ādi śabdānām caṣṭe anena iti cakṣuḥ śṛṇoti anena iti śrotram vadati anayā iti vāc iti karaṇa artha tvāt brahmaṇaḥ ca karaṇa tva anupapatteḥ iti ced na kartarī api tad vyutpatti sambhavāt iti āha caṣṭaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.224.1–1.1.224.3	 caṣṭaḥ iti eva tat cakṣuḥ śravaṇāt śrotram ucyate vacanāt eva vāc brahma sṛṣṭi sthiti ādi kāraṇam eva śabdena karaṇa sādhana tām nirākaroti kiñcayataḥ vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante a iti sakala bhūtānām sṛṣṭi sthiti saṃhāra kāraṇa tvam ca brahma lakṣaṇam anna ādiṣu upadiṣyam tatas ca etat brahma iti āha sṛṣṭī iti yatas sṛṣṭayā ādi kāraṇam uktam atas api brahma iti sambandhaḥ nanu tathā api na anuvāka dvaya uktam ekam vastu bhavitum arhati saṅkhayā bhedāt saṃjñā bhedāt ca pūrvam khalu anna maya ādayaḥ pañca uktāḥ na cakṣuḥ śrotra vācaḥ uttaratra ca anna ādayaḥ ṣaṭ na vijñāna ānandau= iti tatra āha tat ca iti 
NSu_1.1.225.1–1.1.225.2	 tat ca vā āghūla śākhāyām aṣṭa rūpam udāhṛtam vijñāna ānanda sahitam pṛthak sṛṣṭayā ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ caśabdaḥ hetu arthaḥ yasmāt vādhūla śākhāyām vijñāna ānanda sahitam tat anna ādi ṣaṭkam iti aṣṭa rūpam brahmatayā udāhṛtam tasmāt tad anusāreṇa prathama anuvāke cakṣuḥ ādi trayasya uttaratra vijñāna ānandayoḥ adhyāhāreṇa saṅkhayā saṃjña aikyam bhaviṣyati iti bhāvaḥ hetu antasamuccaye vā caśabdaḥ atra api hivijñānam brahma iti vyajānāt a  ānandaḥ brahma iti vyajānāt a iti uttara vākya paryālocanayā api hi atra vijñāna ānandayoḥ adhyāhāraḥ gamyate na hi anyat varuṇena upadiṣyam bhṛguḥ tu anya dvaya jānāt iti yujyate nanu vādhūla śākhā uktam api kutas brahma iti atas āha pṛthak iti aneka śākhā avidām eva atra samyak adhikāra jñāpanāya etat uktam nanu vā adhūla śākhāyām iva atra ubhaya trāṣyakam eva kasmāt na uktam iti atas āha āvāpa iti 
NSu_1.1.226ab.1–1.1.228.1	 āvāpa udvāpa taṣa śākhāḥ yatas āhuḥ param padam kvacid anyatra anukta āvāpena kvacid anyatra ukta udvāpena kvacid ubhaya tayā kvacid sāmagṣeṇa parameśvara svarūpam pratipādayanti iti śākhānām svabhāvaḥ yatas atas na kaścid virodhaḥ iti nanu tathā api varuṇa upadiṣyānām anna ādīnām brahma tvam na upapadyate tat vijñāya punar eva varuṇam pitaram upasasāra a iti labdha upadeśasya api bhṛgoḥ punar upasaraṇa vacanāt pūrva uktasya eva brahma tve adhīhi bhagavaḥ brahma iti punar upasaraṇam vyartham syāt anena tu jñāyate na pūrva upadiṣyam brahma iti yathā hi kaścid suvarṇam yācitavate rajatam dadāti saḥ api gṛhītvā alocya punar suvarṇam dehi iti yācate tena pārśva sthaḥ jānāti prāk dattam anyat eva kiñcid na suvarṇam iti tathā iha api iti āśaṅkām pariharati yatas iti yatas bhūtāni jāyante ityādyaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ svayam lakṣitam guruṇā paścāt tapasā eva aparokṣataḥ dṛṣṭvā ekaikam svarūpam tu samasta ukta anudarśanam icchatā ajñām guroḥ prāpya tapasā evāra ukṣitam abrahma iti eva vadatām śruta hānyaśruta grahau 
NSu_1.1.229ab.1–1.1.229ab.2^1	 sākṣāt lakṣaṇa tām prāptau= iti lajjā tad uktiṣu ayam arthaḥ na punar upasaraṇāni atha anupapattyā pūrva upadiṣyasya abrahma tvam kalpyam punar upasaraṇasya anyathā upapatteḥ tathā hi varuṇaḥ hi uddeśa lakṣaṇābhyām bhṛgave brahma upadiśya uvāca na śravaṇa mātreṇa kṛtī bhavān śravaṇa mātrasya brahma sākṣātkāra asādhana tvāt sākṣātkārasya eva mokṣa sādhana tvāt atas tvayā manana nididhi a āsana rūpam tapaḥ karaṇīyam iti sa ca evam upadiṣya āṣya rūpaḥ yugapad sarvasya sākṣāt kartum aśakyatvāt manana nididhyāsābhyām anna ākhyam bhagavat rūpam sākṣātkṛtya guru prasāda labdham apūrvatamam dhanam tasmai nivedayitum prāṇa ākhya rūpa antara sākṣātkārāya manana nididhi āsane cikīrṣuḥ guroḥ anujñām ādātum ca punar gurum upasasāra evam rūpa antare api tatra anujānīhi iti vaktavye yat adhīhi bhagavaḥ brahma iti vadati tad ahaṅkāra nirāsa artham iti nanu evam astu artha āpattiḥ anyathā upapatti upakṣīṇā tathā api kim pūvarsya abrahmatvāt punar upasaraṇam uta ukta rītyā anujñāna artham iti sandihyate 
NSu_1.1.229ab.2^2–1.1.229ab.3^1	 sandehe ca anna maya ādīnām na brahmatva avadhāraṇam sambhavati iti mā evam yatas vai imāni bhūtāni jāyante ityādi lakṣara yogāt tapasā eva apara ukṣita tva liṅgāt ca uttara pakṣa avadhāraṇa upapatteḥ na hi deha ādau= idam lakṣaṇam sambhavati iti na ca tasya svabhāva siddha jñānasya sākṣātkārāya tapaḥ apekṣitam kiñca pūrvasya abrahma tvena punar upasaraṇe sa tapaḥ taptvā annam brahma iti vyajānāt na annāt dhayā iva khalu ityādi brūyāt evam brahma tva jñāpakeṣu śruteṣu api aśrutam abrahma tvam kalpayatām śruta hāniḥ aśruta grahāpattiḥ ca syāt iti alam nirdala pakṣa pratikṣepe asmākam eva lajjā jāyate iti 
NSu_1.1.229ab.2^2–1.1.229ab.3^2	 akṣara arthaḥ tu sphuṭaḥ eva sūtra akṣarāṇām anānuguṇyam tu bhagavatā na vyutpāditam tasya pareṇa svayam eva aṅgīkṛta tvāt yaḥ hi svayam eva sva vyākhyānasya āsva ārasika tvam manyate tam prati tad vyutpādanam mṛta māraṇam iva nirākartuḥ eva lajjā karam atas eva āha iti prakāreṇa tad uktiṣu viṣaya bhūtāsu dūṣaṇa abhidhāne asmākam eva lajjā iti yat ca bheda vyapadeśāt ca iti sūtram vyākhyāya uktam pareṇa mithyā bhūtam jīvātma parama ātma bhedam āśritya bheda vyapadeśāt ca iti uktam iti tad anupapannam iti bhāvena āha samīpaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.229cd.1–1.1.230ab.2	 samīpe saha bhogasya mukti tvena uktitaḥ asakṛt bhedaḥ jīveśayoḥ mithyā iti eva mithyā svayam bhavet etam ānandamayam ātmānam upasaṅkramya a ityādau parameśvarasya samīpe saḥ aśnute a ityādau tena saha na hi sāmīpyam sāhityam ca bhedena vinā upapadyate na ca mokṣe api śiṣyamāṇam mithyā bhavitum yuktam atma svarūpasya api mithyātva prasaṅgāt athavā bheda vyapadeśāt iti ukte mithyā bhedaḥ ayam kim na syāt iti ākāṅkṣā nirāsa artha tvena asmin= asya ca tad yogam śāsti iti sūtram prakāra antareṇa vyākhyāti 
NSu_1.1.230c–1.1.230f.2	 etena mayaṭaḥ ca eva dvaividhyena artha kalpanāt tad anyeṣām matam api sat saṃsatsu na bhāsate evam pañcakośa vādinām māyā vādinām vyākhyām nirākṛtya ye tu bhāskara ādayaḥ yathā śruta sūtra anusāriṇaḥ anna maya ādayaḥ catvāraḥ kośāḥ ānanda mayaḥ tu ekaḥ eva paramātmā iti vyācakṣate tat matam atideśena nirākaroti etena iti 
NSu_1.1.230c–1.1.230f.4	 etena eva anna maya ādīnām pañcānām api brahmatva upapādanena tad anyeṣām pañcakośa tva vādibhyaḥ anyeṣām catuṣkośa vādinām sat saṃsatsu vidvat sabhāsu adhikam ca atra doṣam āha mayaṭaḥ dvaividhyena artha kalpanāt ca iti anna maya ādiṣu vikāra artha tvam ānanda maye prācurya artha tvam iti yat atra niyāmakam uktam tad prāk eva nirākṛtam iti nanu prāṇa mayaḥ eva vikāra prakramaḥ bhagnaḥ pratyayasya svāthirka tva kalpanāt adhikaḥ doṣaḥ syāt iti nanu sūtra vyākhyānam upakramya parāpavya ākhyā nirākaraṇam asaṅgatam iti ced na sva vyākhyāna darḍhya artha tvāt iti bhāvena adhikaraṇa artham upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_1.1.231.1–1.1.232.1–1.1.232.3^1^1	 atas nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ niḥśeṣa guṇa vācakaiḥ guṇi sāmānya vacanaiḥ api mukhya tayā uditaḥ adhyātma gaiḥ ca prāṇa ādyaiḥ tathā eva hi adhibhūta gaiḥ anna ādi śabdaiḥ bhagavān ekaḥ mukhya tayā uditaḥ guṇi sāmānya vācinām guṇa vācinām ca śabdānām samanvayāya pravṛtte a pyadhikaraṇe adhikaraṇa siddhānta nyāyena siddham api artha antaram upasaṃharati adhyātma gaiḥ ca iti atas eva na adhikaraṇa upakrama virodhaḥ iti samastaiḥ guṇi sāmānya vācakaiḥ guṇavācakaiḥ adhyātma viṣayaiḥ prāṇa vāc a ādibhiḥ adhibhūta viṣayaiḥ ca anna oṣadhi ādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ bhagavān eva mukhya tayā uditaḥ iti upasaṃhāraḥ na upapadyate asya arthasya prāc anukta tvāt nanu uktam upalakṣaṇa paraḥ ayam ānanda maya śabdaḥ iti satyam 
NSu_1.1.232.1–1.1.232.3^1^2	 upalakṣaṇam hi prakṛta upayuktasya upapanyasya ca arthasya bhavati anyathā ati prasaṅgāt na ca eteṣām sarva śabdānām mukhyayā vṛttyā bhagavat eka vāci tva samarthanam prakṛta upayuktam na api upapannam tathā hi janma ādyasya yatas iti sūtre jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tva ādīni aṣṭau lakṣaṇāni brahmaṇaḥ abhihitāni tatra eva śāstram pramāṇam uktam tṛtīya sūtre samanvaya sūtre ca teṣām eva vākyānām brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ pratijñātaḥ atas jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam yatra yatra pratīyate teṣām eva vākyānām parameśvare samanvaya samatharnam prakṛta saṅgatam na sarveṣām sarvatra jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tva pratipādana abhāvāt 
NSu_1.1.232.3^2	 kiñca yat niṣṭha tayā jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam pratīyate tad vācinaḥ śabdasya yayā kayācana vṛttyā bhagavat paratve samarthite api lakṣaṇasya ativyāptiḥ pati hriyate eva na hi gaṅgā pada lakṣyasya tīrasya ghoṣa āvāsa tvam na siddhayati atas mukhya vṛtti samarthanasya kva upayogaḥ na upapadyate ca sarva śabdānām bhagavati eva mukhya vṛtti samarthanam rūḍhi yogau hi mukhya vṛttī tatra api yogāt rūḍhiḥ balavatī na ca śabdānām bhagavati rūḍhiḥ asti kintu tad itaratra eva yogaḥ tu sambhavati tathā api sa tad itara samānaḥ tathā ca artha antaraḥ eva mukhya vṛttayaḥ śabdāḥ rūḍheḥ yogasya ca sattvāt na īśvare yoga mātrasya kathañcid sambhavāt atas sūtrakārasya sakala śabdānām mukhyayā vṛttyā bhagavati eva samanvaya samarthane saṅgati upapattyoḥ abhāvāt apavyākhyānam etat iti āśaṅkaya saṅgatim tāvat darśayati janma ādi iti 
NSu_1.1.233a–1.1.233c.2	 janma ādyasya iti sūtreṇa guṇa sarva sva siddhaye brahmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇam proktam atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti prathama sūtre brahma śabdena jijñāsyasya sakala guṇa pūrṇa tvam jīva ādi vyāvṛtti artham upāttam janma ādyasya yatas iti dvitīya sūtreṇa tad siddhaye jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam brahmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇam proktam atas sūtra dvayena sādhya tayā sādhaka tayā ca ānanda ādi sakala guṇa pūrṇa tvam jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam ca prakṛtam iti vivṛtam ca etat pūrvam asmābhiḥ kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha śāstra mūlam iti 
NSu_1.1.233d.1–1.1.233d.2	 śāstra mūlam yatas tatas tat ubhayam pradhānam apradhānam ca lakṣaṇam anumāna ādinā ati vyāptau śaṅkitāyām tad nivṛtti artham tṛtīya sūtre śāstra mūlam śāstra eka pramāṇam uktam yatas tatas caturthe sūtre śāstrasya anya paratva śaṅkāyām sarva śabdānām bhagavati anvayaḥ pratijñātum ucitaḥ na katipaya śabdānām iti śeṣaḥ sarva guṇa pūrṇa tve śāstrasya pramāṇa tayā abhidhāne api kutas sarva śabda samanvayaḥ pratijñātavyaḥ iti atas āha anvayaḥ iti
