NSu_1.1.234ab.1–1.1.234ab.3	 anvayaḥ sarva śabdānām guṇa sarva sva vedakaḥ yatas sarva śabdānām anvayaḥ eva guṇa sarva sva vedakaḥ na katipaya śabdānām atas sarva śāstrāt guṇa sarva sva siddhaye saḥ eva pratijñātavyaḥ iti sambandhaḥ anyathā yasya eva śabdasya samanvayaḥ na pratijñāyate tad arthaḥ guṇaḥ bhagavati na siddhayet ati vyāptiḥ ca syāt pratijñāte ca samanvaya sūtreṇa sakala śabda samanvaye tad prapañcanam sūtrakārasya katham asaṅgatam bhavati iti etena mukhya vṛttiḥ api saṅga tā draṣṭavyā tasyāḥ api samanvaya sūtre pratijñātavya tvāt amukhya vṛtta autad abhidheya guṇa alābha prasaṅgāt abhidheye ati vyāpti prasaṅgāt ca iti evam asaṅgatim parihṛtya yat uktam pareṇa na parameśvarasya eva sarva śabda mukhya artha tvam yuktam yogasya parameśvaraḥ iva anyatra api sambhavāt īśvare rūḍheḥ abhāvena anyatra tad ādhikyāt iti tatra yogasya ubhayatra sāmyam tāvat nirākaroti śabda iti 
NSu_1.1.234cd.1–1.1.235c.2	 śabda pravṛtti hetūnām tasmin mukhya samanvayāt indra ādi śabda pravṛtti hetūnām parama aiśvarya ādīnām tasmin parameśvare mukhya sambandhāt indra ādi śabdānām tat vācaka tvam eva tasya eva hi parama aiśvaryam anavadhikam svatantram ca anyatra api tathā ced kaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti tatra uktam anya artheṣu iti anya artheṣu alpatā hetoḥ tad nimitta tvataḥ tathā tad vācaka tvam śabdānām yatas anya artheṣu purandara ādiṣu hetoḥ śabda pravṛtti hetoḥ aiśvarya ādeḥ alpa tā deśataḥ kālataḥsvarūpataḥ ca sau= adhika tvāt alpasya api bhagavat nimitta tvāt ca iti etat uktam bhavati avayava artham anusṛtya vṛttiḥ hi yogaḥ avayava arthaḥ ca yathā yathā utkṛṣṭate tathā tathā yoga vṛtteḥ api utkarṣeṇa bhāvyam nimitta vaicitṛye naimittikā vaicitṛyasya anupapatteḥ avayava arthaḥ ca parameśvare anavadhikaḥ svatantraḥ ca artha antare alpaḥ para adhīnaḥ ca atas katham yogasya ubhayatra sāmyam kintvīśvare mahā yogaḥ anyatra yoga mātram iti saḥ eva śabda mukhya arthaḥ iti yat uktam īśvare śabdānām rūḍhiḥ na asti iti tat nirākaroti bahula iti 
NSu_1.1.235d.1–1.1.236a.3	 bahula atiprayogataḥ rūḍham iti eva sādhyam syāt bahula atiprayogataḥ hetoḥ śabda jātam harau rūḍham eva iti sādhyam syāt ayam prayogaḥ vimatāḥ śabdāḥ harau rūḍhāḥ bahula ati prayogavat tvāt nārāyaṇa ādi śabda vat iti prayogavat tvam ca yaugikeṣu amukhyeṣu ca asti iti atas bahula iti uktam ajñāta mukhyeṣu amukhyeṣu api bahula prayogaḥ asti iti atas ati prayogataḥ iti uktam pūjya prayogaḥ hi ati prayogaḥ pūjyatā ca aviveka pūrvaka tva abhāvaḥ na ca rūḍha yoge rūḍha upacāre rūḍha lakṣaṇāyām vyabhicāraḥ tatra api rūḍhi sadbhāvena sa pakṣa tvāt samāhāra vṛttayaḥ hi tāḥ nanu asiddhaḥ ayam hetuḥ indra ādi śabdānām parameśvare prayogasya eva abhāvāt iti atas āha rūḍhiḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.236bc.1–1.1.236d.3	 rūḍhiḥ hi dvividhā matā avidvat vidvat āptyā eva atra rūḍhiḥ iti rūḍhi jñāpakaḥ bahula atiprayogaḥ lakṣyate āptiḥ sambandhaḥ tatra avidvat sambandhinaḥ bahula ati prayogasya abhāve api vidvat sambandhine bhāvāt na asiddhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ astu evam īśvara īrūḍhiḥ śabdānām tathā api loke api tad bhāvāt sāmyam eva tatas ca hariḥ eva mukhya vācyaḥ iti na upapadyate iti atas āha mukhya iti  mukhyāḥ hi viduṣām tu sā viduṣām bahula ati prayoga anumitā sā rūḍhiḥ mukhyāḥ hi yasmāt tasmāt na sāmyam iti śeṣaḥ katham mukhya tvam iti atas āha vidvat iti 
NSu_1.1.237ab.1–1.1.237d.1	 vidvat rūḍhiḥ vaidikā syāt sā yogāt eva labhyate vaidika bahula prayoga anumitā hi vidvat rūḍhiḥ iti ucyate sā ca laukika mātra prayoga anumitāyāḥ mukhya iti sphuṭam eva iti nanu vaidika iti katham ṭiḍhḍhāṇan ityādinā ṅīpāḥ bhavitavyam mā evam parama vaidika tva khyāpana artha tvāt athavā vaidikāḥ prayogāḥ asyām santi jñāpakāḥ itiarśa ādibhyaḥ aca iti aci kṛte vaidika iti bhavati yat vā vaidikānām puruṣāṇām āsyāt iti tad prayogāt siddhā iti hetu antaram āha sā iti lya bla upanimittā pañcamī yatas sā vidvat rūḍhiḥ yogam avihāya eva upalabhyate na tu avidvat rūḍhi vat saṅketa tulyātaḥ api sā mukhyā iti tatas kim iti atas āha tasmāt iti tasmāt mukhyā artha tā viṣṇoḥ yasmāt evam viṣṇau mahā yogaḥ mukhyā ca rūḍhiḥ anyatra yoga mātram amukhya rūḍhiḥ ca tasmāt sarva śabda mukhya artha tā viṣṇoḥ upapanna iti upasaṃharati iti kṛtvā iti  kṛtvā hṛdi prabhuḥ 
NSu_1.1.238a.1–1.1.238a.6	 samanvayam sādhayati etām saṅgatim etām ca upapattim hṛdi kṛtvā sūtra kṛt ānanda mayaḥ a bhyāsa āditya śeṣa guṇi sāmānya vācaka ādi śabdānām mukhyayā vṛttyā harau samanvayam sādhayati atas yuktam eva eta t vaya ākhyānam iti antar tad dharma upadeśāt antar tad dharma upadeśāt syāt etat yadi ānanda mayaḥ abhyāsāt iti vadataḥ sūtrakārasya etāvān arthaḥ abhimataḥ bhavet tarhi tatas eva gata artha tvāt antar tad dharma upadeśāt ityādi adhikaraṇānām anutthānam eva syāt padārtha antara viṣayau hi rūḍhi yogau= āśritya eva tatra pūrva pakṣa pravṛttiḥ yathā uktam bhāṣye tatra anya viṣayāyāḥ rūḍheḥ avidvat rūḍhi tvena bhagavat viṣayāyāḥ vidvat rūḍhitaḥ yogasya ca alpa bhagavat adhīna pravṛtti nimitta sāpekṣasya niravadhikā paratantra pravṛtti nimitta apekṣān mahā yogāt upapāditam eva durbala tvam iti kutas adhikaraṇa antarasya avakāśaḥ satyam t a t h ā p y a b h y a d h i k ā ś a ṅ k ā s a dbhāvena adhikaraṇa antara ārambha upapattiḥ iti āśayavānḥ tāvat adhika āśaṅkā pravartana pūrvakam antar tad dharma upadeśāt ityādi adhikaraṇa tātparyam darśa yati devānām iti antar tad dharma upadeśāt 
NSu_1.1.238b–1.1.238c.2	 devānām tatra śakta tām āśaṅkayaḥ taittirīyāḥ paṭhanti antar praviṣyam kartāram etam antar candramasi manasā carantam saha eva santam na vijānanti devāḥ iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim ayam antar praviṣyaḥ paramātmotā anyaḥ iti anyaḥ iti tāvat prāptam kutas indraḥ rājā jagataḥ yaḥ īśe tvaṣṭāram rūpāṇi vikurvantam vipaścitam brahma indram agnim jagataḥ pratiṣṭhām divaḥ ātmānam savitāram bṛhaspatim iti indra ādi śruteḥ sapta yuñjanti ratham eka cakram iti aditi aliṅgāt ca annam brahma ityādi śrutyā tad hetu vyapadeśa ādi liṅgena ca atīta adhikaraṇena nirṇayaḥ kṛtaḥ na ca indra ādi śrutiḥ anyatra netum śakyate purandara ādiṣu rūḍha tvāt yaugika tvāt ca 
NSu_1.1.238b–1.1.238c.4	 nanu uktam atra anyatra rūḍheḥ avidvat sambandhi tvāt yogasya ca parameśvara āyatta alpa nimitta tvāt amukhya tā iti satyam tad anna oṣadhi ādi padārtheṣu syāt na tu purandara ādiṣu tatra indra ādi śabda pravṛtti nimittasya parama aiśvarya ādeḥ anavadhikasya apara āyattasya vidyamāna tvena mukhya yoga upapatteḥ aśakteṣu khalu sāmanta ādiṣu aiśvarya ādikam alpam parāyattam ca bhavati devāḥ tu apratihata śaktayaḥ katham evam bhaveyuḥ tathā ca śrutiḥ indraḥ vai devān ām ojiṣṭhaḥ iti evaṃjātīyakāḥ 
NSu_1.1.238cd.1–1.1.238cd.2^1	 tatra rūḍhim ca tad śabdānām api svayam rūḍhiḥ api purandara ādiṣu indra ādi śabdānāṃindrasya nu vīryāṇi pravocam a ityādi mantreṣu bahula prayoga darśanena vidvat sambandhinī mukhyā eva teṣām atatparatve tat yajana ādau viniyoga anupapatteḥ na ca svatantra anavadhika aiśvarya ādikam anekeṣām viruddham iti vācyam indra ādīnām parameśvara ātmaka tvāt saḥ eva hi kāyarvaśāt tat tad upādhi bheda bhinnaḥ tāḥ tāḥ saṃjñā labhate kutas etat iti ced etad prakaraṇa gata vākya śābalyā anyathā anupapattyā iti tāvat brūmaḥ tathā hi adṛśye anātmyaḥ iti ānanda maya lakṣaṇa tvena uktam adṛśya tvam iha na vijānanti devāḥ iti ucyate 
NSu_1.1.238cd.2^2–1.1.238cd.3	 samāna adhikaraṇāni ca indra ādi śruti liṅgāni na ca ekam vākyam aneka viṣayam bhavati vyāghātāt yathā uktam artha eka tvāt ekam vākyam sa ākāṅkṣam ced vibhāge syāt iti na ca atra eka upādānena apara parityāge kāraṇam asti tathā ca purāṇa vākyam aham bhavaḥ bhavantaḥ ca sarvam nārāyaṇa ātmakam a ityādi atas eva bheda vyapadeśaḥ tad itara viṣayaḥ vyākhyeyaḥ na ca evam sati vinigamane kāraṇa abhāvaḥ anupahita dharmāṇām upahite sambhavāt vaiparīti asya asambhavāt tasmāt indra ādayaḥ eva antar praviṣṭa tvena pratipādyante iti evam devānām indra ādīnām tatra svatantra anavadhika indra ādi śabda pravṛtti nimitta vat tāyām śakta tām tatas ca indra ādi śabdānām tatra mahā yoga vṛttim iti śeṣaḥ tathā tad śabdānām indra di śabdānām tatra purandara ādi deveṣu svayam api sākṣāt api vidvat sambandhinīm api iti yāvat rūḍhim ca abhyadhikām āśaṅkaya 
NSu_1.1.239a–1.1.239c.3	 samudra anta sthita tva ādyaiḥ tad dharmaiḥ viṣṇu rūḍha tām sādhayitvā svayam sūtra kāraḥ antar tad dharma upadeśāt iti sūtreṇa antar praviṣyaḥ viṣṇuḥ eva samudre antar kavayaḥ yasya aṇḍa kośam śuṣmam āhuḥ brahmā tapasā anvavindat iti samudra antar sthita tva brahmāṇḍa vīrya tva brahma tāpolabhya tva ādi dharma upadeśāt teṣām ca viṣṇudharma tvena śruti smṛti siddha tvāt na ca indra ādi śruti liṅga virodhaḥ niravakāśa liṅga balena tad bādha upapatteḥ na ca teṣām api niravakāśa tvam indram mitram varuṇam agnim āhuḥ ityādinā teṣām bhagavati vidvat rūḍhi sadbhāvasya siddha tvāt mahā yogasya ca su prasiddha tvāt indra ādi gatasya parama aiśvarya ādeḥ alpa tā parameśvara adhīna tā ca śruti purāṇa ādi prasiddhāḥ śakteḥ api asmad ādi apekṣayā adhikya mātram eva na tu nirargala tvam api anyathā aneka īśvara virodhaḥ ca vidvat rūḍhiḥ api īśvara sannidhāna nimittā eva iti evam samudra antar sthita tva ādyaiḥ viṣṇudharmaiḥ antar praviṣṭa tvasya viṣṇu niṣṭhatām tathā tad śabdānām indra ādi śabdānām api viṣṇu rūḍha tām upalakṣaṇam etat tatra yaugika tvam ca sādhayitvā bheda vyapadeśāt ca anyaḥ 
NSu_1.1.239cd.1–1.1.239cd.2	 abhidām taiḥ ca punar eva nyavārayat nanu ukta rītyā devānām parameśvara ātmaka tvena samudra antar sthita tva ādikam sambhavati iti evam taiḥ devaiḥ eva īśvarasya abhidām ca punar āśaṅkaya bheda vyapadeśāt ca anyaḥ iti sūtreṇa anyaḥ ca asau= indra ādi devebhyaḥ antar praviṣyaḥ indrasya ātma ityādi viśeṣa viṣaya bheda vyapadeśāt abhede pramāṇa abhāvāt ca na ca vākya śābalyam sarvasya īśvara para tāyāḥ ukta tvāt purāṇa stha īśvara sannidhāna atiśaya viṣaya tvāt iti evam nyavārayat iti arthaḥ atra punar iti āśaṅkā avṛtti mātram ācaṣṭe taiḥ eva iti avadhārayatā prakāra antareṇa bheda sūtrasya punarukta tā nirastā bhavati yadi api ayam liṅga ātamakaḥ śabdaḥ tathā api indra ādi aneka nāma samanvaya lābhāt atra nirṇītaḥ iti adoṣaḥ 
NSu_1.1.239cd.3	 kecid etat sūtra dvayaṃatha yaḥ eṣaḥ antarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣaḥ dṛśyate yaḥ eṣaḥ anta rakṣiṇi puruṣaḥ dṛśyate a iti chāndogya ukta akṣi āditya antastha puruṣasya īśvara tva samarthana paratvena vyācakṣate tat vā nirakartum eva iti uktam tathā tve hi antare upapatteḥ iti asya anārambha prasaṅgaḥ yaḥ eṣaḥ anta rakṣiṇi puruṣaḥ dṛśyate eṣaḥ ātmā iti ha uvāca iti etat vākyam adhikṛtya tat pravṛttam iti ced na vākya bhedena adhikaraṇa bhede śāstra aparyavasāna prasaṅgāt santi ca tatra api amṛta tva ādayaḥ brahma dharmāḥ 
NSu_1.1.239cd.4–1.1.239cd.7	 nanu adhika āśaṅkayā tad ārambhaḥ bhaviṣyati tathā hi eṣa dṛśyate iti tāvat pratyakṣe arthe prayujyate brahma tu parokṣam na tathā nirdeśa viṣayaḥ bhavitum arhati yujyate ca etat pratibimbe prathama avagatāt pratyakṣa abhidhānāt chāyā puruṣe adhigate tad uparaktāyām buddhau pratīyamānām amṛta tva ādayaḥ stutyā kathañcid vyākhyeyāḥ iti tat idam punarukti bhaya sambhrāntena bhāṣitam yatas atra api yaḥ eṣaḥ anta rakṣiṇi puruṣaḥ dṛśyate iti pratyakṣa abhidhānam asti tat atra yathā paramātmani sā avakāśitam tathā tat api bhaviṣyati iti kā tatra api adhika āśaṅkā tarhi atra para udāhṛtam eva astu viṣaya vākyam tatra antar praviṣyam iti ādi antat bhaviṣyati iti ced na sthāna ādi bheda vyapadeśa ādinā tatra tasya eva udāharaṇa tva pratibhāsanāt tasmāt vākya jñāna daridrāṇām vyākhyānam upekṣaṇīyam iti evam adhidaiva viṣaya śabda samanvayam abhidhāya adhunā adhibhūta viṣaya śabda samanvayam pratipipādayiṣuḥ ākāśasya bhūteṣu prādhānyāt tad śabda samanvayam harau= āha sūtrakāraḥ ākāśaḥ tad liṅgāt iti ākāśaḥ tad liṅgāt 
NSu_1.1.239cd.8	 chandogāḥ paṭhanti asya lokasya kā gatiḥ iti ākāśaḥ iti ha uvāca sarvāṇi ha vai imāni bhūtāni ākāśāt eva samutpadyante ākāśam pratyastam yanti ākāśaḥ hi eva ebhyaḥ jyāyān ākāśaḥ parāyaṇam saḥ eṣa paras varīyān udgīthaḥ saḥ eṣaḥ anantaḥ iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim ayam ākāśaḥ paramātmota bhūtam iti bhūtam iti tāvat prāptam kutas ākāśa śabdasya yoga rūḍhibhyām bhūte prasiddha tvāt ākāśanam avakāśa tvam khalu ākāśa śabda nirvacana labdham tat ca bhūte su prasiddham prayogaḥ ca loka vedayoḥ ākāśa śabdasya bhūta viṣayaḥ bahulaḥ nanu ca sarvāṇi ha vā ityādi ukta liṅga balāt paramātmā kim na syāt liṅgāt śruteḥ balavat tvāt iti brūmaḥ na ca bahu tvena liṅgānām prābalyam tathā api sāmyena anirṇayāt na ca sāmyam api yathā ahuḥ 
NSu_1.1.239cd.9–1.1.239cd.11	 dvividham balavat tvam ca bahu tvāt ca svabhāvataḥ tayoḥ svabhāvaḥ balavān upajīvi ādikaḥ ca saḥ a iti kutrima akṛtrimayoḥ akṛtrimam hi jyāyaḥ atas prathama avagata svabhāva balavat śruti anurodhena liṅgāni kathañcid yojyāni iti nanu antaḥ tad dharma upadeśāt iti anena eva parihṛtam etat indra ādi śabda vat ākāśa śabdasya api bhūte amukhyayā vṛttyā pravṛttasya mahā yoga vidvat rūḍhibhyām īśvara vācinaḥ tat buddhayā ādhāyaka tvam eva hi nyāyyam sutarām ca niravakāśa liṅga balāt iti na ca kācid abhyadhikā śaṅkā asti iti atas anārambhaṇīyam idam sūtram iti tatra abhyadhikām śaṅkām darśayati ceṣyā hi iti 
NSu_1.1.240.1–1.1.241a.1–1.1.241a.3^1	 ceṣṭā hi cetanānām yā sā bhavet tad prasādataḥ acetana svabhāvaḥ tu vivara ādiḥ katham tatas iti śaṅkā nivṛtti artham yuktam indra ādi śabdānām purandara ādiṣu amukhya tvam niravadhikasya pravṛtti nimittasya aiśvarya ādeḥ asambhavāt alpasya api parameśvara āyatta tvāt yuktam ca svatantra anavadhika aiśvarya ādimati parameśvare mukhya tvam na ca evam ākāśa śabda pravṛtti nimittam avakāśa tvam bhūte niravadhikam na sambhavati kvacid kadācid api abhāva abhāvāt na api īśvara āyattam aiśvaryam hi varṣaṇa śāsana pālana ādi rūpā cetana sambandhinī ca iṣyā sā ca āgantuka jñāna icchā ādi kāraṇa vyapekṣa tvāt svayam āgantuka tvāt ca kāraṇa dvārā svarūpataḥ ca parameśvara prasādā ayat ta iti yujyate 
NSu_1.1.241a.1–1.1.241a.3^2	 ākāśa ādi śabda pravṛtti nimittam tu vivara tva ādikam na tāvat āgantuka jñāna ādi kāraṇa dvārā parameśvara āyattam acetana āśrita tvāt na api svarūpataḥ svabhāva tvāt anāgantuka tvāt naca ākāśa śabdasya īśvare yogaḥ sambhavati tasya manāk api avakāśa tva abhāvāt tasmāt ākāśa śabdam bhūtam eva iti abhyadhika āśaṅkā nivṛtti artham sūtritam iti śeṣaḥ vivarādiḥ iti bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ ādi grahaṇena ākāśa grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam iti sūcayati tatas parameśvarāt tat ā āyatte iti yāvat katham iti ākṣepe nanu atra ākāśaḥ paramātmā tad liṅgāt iti etāvat ucyate na punar ukta pūrva pakṣa ācchādakam kiñcid iti atas sūtrasya artha antaram āha ākāśaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.241b–1.1.241d.2	 ākāśaḥ iti nāma ca paratas api varīyaḥ tu apūrvāt liṅgāt hareḥ bhavet ākāśa nāma balāt khalu pareṇa bhūtam āśaṅkitam na ca tat yuktam yatas niravakāśāt paraḥ varīyaḥ tu ādeḥ anekasmāt liṅgāt ākāśaḥ iti nāma ca hareḥ bhavet vācakam iti śeṣaḥ atra upasarjana tayā samāse nirdiṣyena api varīyaḥ tvena buddhayā viviktena paratas api iti asya sambandhaḥ na anupapannaḥ sarva bhūta utpatti kāraṇa tva pūrvāt iti vaktavye paras varīyaḥ tu apūrvāt iti uktam prathama pratītasya api sarva bhūta kāraṇa tva ādeḥ bhūte api kathañci d vaya ākhyātum śakya tvāt paras varīyaḥ tu ādeḥ sarvathā api tatra netum aśakyatvāt 
NSu_1.1.241b–1.1.241d.3	 tathā hi asya lokasya kā gatiḥ iti pṛthivī gati praśnasya ākāśaḥ iti uttaram abhidhāya katham etat apām kāryam hi pṛthivī tatra eva līyate iti tāsām eva pṛthivī gati tva upapatteḥ iti āśaṅkaya mā evam mūla kāraṇa tvāt iti āha sarvāṇi iti na ca tarhi ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ iti śruteḥ ātmā vaktavyaḥ iti vācyam bhūta viṣaya vicāre viyataḥ eva vaktavya tvāt na ca ākāśasya api bhūta tvāt sarvāṇi iti viruddham idam sarvam asṛjata iti vat ta dvayatirikta grahaṇa ipa patteḥ naca avadhāraṇa anupapattiḥ paramparayā bhūta upādana āsya aparasya abhāvāt katham asya bhūta utpatti ādi hetu tvam bhūteṣu jyeṣṭha tvāt iti āha ākāśaḥ hi ebhyaḥ caturbhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ jyāyān iti na kevalam utpatti laya kāraṇa tvāt gatiḥ kim nāma kāraṇeṣu sthitam kāryam iti śruteḥ āśraya tvāt api iti āha ākāśaḥ parāyaṇam iti na ca asya lokasya iti prāṇi nikāya abhidhānam 
NSu_1.1.241b–1.1.241d.6	 yena sarva bhūta śabdaḥ api tad paraḥ syāt na pratiṣṭhām lokam atinayet iti pṛthivyāḥ prakṛta tvāt na ca paras varīyaḥ tu ādikam śakyam evam kathañci d vaya khyātum nirupacaritam sarva uttama tvam hi paras varīyaḥ tvam anyathā jyāyān iti anena eva gatātha ṛtvaprasaṅgāt udgītha tvam com iti etat akṣara mudgītham iti ukta tvāt na kathañcid anyatra netum śakyate āropaḥ ayam iti ced na bāla līlā atha rtu aprasaṅgāt upaniṣadām ananta tvam ca ākāśasya deśa kāla dharmaiḥ antavataḥ na sambhavati eva āpekṣikam tu prakṛta viruddham pṛthivyāḥ sāma gati tvam antavat vai khalu saumya te sāma a iti nirākṛtya svayam api antavantam ākāśam abhidadhatā kim adhikam ācaritam syāt atas ananta tvam api nirupacaritam eva iti nanu ākāśa śrutiḥ api niravakāśa iti uktam satyam duruktam tat na hi deśa kālābhyām paricchinnasya ākāśasya avakāśa dātṛ tvam niravadhikam sambhavati na api svatantram parameśvara āyatta tvāt tad kutas iti atas āha nabhaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.241*a–1.1.241*c.5	 nabhaḥ dadāti śvasatām mārgam yat niyama ādadaḥ ityādi vākyaiḥ ādi grahaṇena sarva bhūta guṇaiḥ yuktam iti ādeḥ saṅgrahaḥ tena yat uktam parameśvare yoga anupapattiḥ iti tat api samāhitam bhavati ākāśe avakāśa dātṛ tvam īśvarasya api pṛthakta dvat tvam ca avagamyate iti śeṣaḥ upapattim tu vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt ākāśa upalakṣita sakala adhibhūta śabda parama mukhya vācyaḥ bhagavān hariḥ iti siddham idānīm ādhyātmika śabda samanvayam siṣādhayiṣuḥ pradhāna tvāt prāṇa śabda samanvaya artham sūtrayāmāsa atas eva prāṇaḥ iti atas eva prāṇaḥ atas eva prāṇaḥ 
NSu_1.1.241*a–1.1.241*c.6	 taittirīyake śrūyate tat vai tvam prāṇaḥ abhavaḥ mahān bhogaḥ prajāpateḥ bhujaḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ yat devān prāṇayaḥ na vā iti tatra saṃśayaḥ kim ayam prāṇaḥ paramātmā uta mukhyaḥ iti vāyu vṛtti ādeḥ prāṇa śabda pravṛttau= api vākya arthasya sarvathā api anupapatteḥ na saṃśaya viṣaya tvam na hi acetanam prati tvam evam abhavaḥ iti buddhimatā ucyate kim tāvat prāptam mukhyaḥ iti kasmāt prāṇa śabdasya loka vedayoḥ mukhya prāṇe prayoga prācuryāt prāṇanti anena iti nirukti sambhavāt ca nanu etat api pūrva nyāyena parihṛtam na sūtra ārambham prayojayati iti atas abhyadhika āśaṅkā darśayati adhyātmam iti 
NSu_1.1.241bc*.1–1.1.241bc*.3	 adhyātmam anvaya vyatirekataḥ prāṇa ādi hetuta adṛṣṭeḥ ātmānam adhikṛtya tasya bhoga āyatana tvena vartate iti adhyātmam śarīram tasmin prāṇaḥ prāṇanam jīvanam ādi grahaṇāt ceṣyā upādīyate mukhyasya iti śeṣaḥ mukhyaḥ eva atra prāṇaḥ bhavitum arhati iti vākya śeṣaḥ atra adhyāhāryaḥ tatas ca ayam arthaḥ upapadyate tatra indra ādi śruteḥ ākāśa ādi śruteḥ vā apahāraḥ pravṛtti nimittasya anyatra mukhyasya asambhavāt paramātmani ca sambhavāt na ca evam prakṛte jīvana ceṣyā hetu tā hi prāṇa śabda pravṛtti nimittam tat ca mukhye sambhavati śarīre sati mukhye jīvana ādikam bhavati na asati iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām mukhyasya jīvana ādi hetuta adṛṣṭeḥ nanu vāyu vikāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvam jīvana ādeḥ pratīyate mukhyasya tu tad hetutā sādhyate iti kim kena saṅgatam mā evam vāyu vikāra śarīra tvāt mukhyasya iti 
NSu_1.1.241bc*.4–1.1.241bc*.5	 athavā prāṇa ādi hetutāyāḥ adṛṣṭeḥ iti vyākhyeyam paramātmanaḥ iti śeṣaḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām hi hetu tā kalpyāḥ na ca paramātmanaḥ prāṇa śabda pravṛtti nimitta jīvana ādi hetuta avagamaka anvaya vyatirekau paśyāmaḥ iti bhāvaḥ yat vā yat atra vākye devān prāṇayaḥ iti indriya prāṇanam uktam yat ca prajāpati upalakṣitānām sakala jīvānām bhoga kāraṇa tvam tat ubhayam api adhyātmam anvaya vyatirekābhyām mukhyasya dṛśyate na paramātmanaḥ atas yukti saṃvādān mukhya viṣayam eva idam vākyam iti na ca atra pūrvavat anan yathā siddham kim api īśvara liṅgam asti yena śruti bādham pratyeṣyāmaḥ iti pūrva pakṣa śeṣaḥ nanu evam ced na sūtram etat ācchādakam iti atas tasya tātparyam āha atideśaḥ hi iti 
NSu_1.1.241*d.1–1.1.241*d.4	 atideśaḥ hi tādṛśaḥ hi śabdaḥ hetau evam adhika āśaṅkayā pūrva pakṣe prāpte sūtra kṛtā tādṛśaḥ pūrva ukta samānasya parihāra nyāyasya atideśaḥ kṛtaḥ yasmāt tasmāt ukta āśaṅkā ācchādakam bhavati eva idam sūtram iti yojyam yat vā kim anena adhika āśaṅkā vyutpādanena yathābhāṣyam eva pūrva pakṣaḥ kim na syāt iti atra idam uktam tādṛśaḥ hi ati deśaḥ yat āśaṅkāyāḥ ādhikye sati parihārasya samāna tvam yadi āśaṅkāyām na viśeṣaḥ tarhi pūrveṇa eva parihṛta tvāt prācīnanyāya atideśanam anarthakam syāt pratyudāharaṇam śaṅkā parihāre śāstra aparyavasāna prasaṅgāt yadi ca parihāraḥ aviśeṣitaḥ na syāt katham tarhi atas eva iti atideśaḥ iti manda vyutpādana artham idam uktam bhāṣye api asya sarvasya api svīkāra artham prasiddheḥ iti āha atideśa atharmā āha liṅgam iti liṅgam balavat eva syāt 
NSu_1.1.241*d.5	 hariḥ iti vakṣyamāṇam siṃha avalokana nyāyena atra api sambaddhyate tena eva śabdasya sambandhaḥ athavā sautrasya eva śabdasya anuvādena balavat iti vyākhyānam śabdāt eva pramitaḥ a iti yathā yatas tasmāt iti adhyāhāryam tatas ca ayam arthaḥ hariḥ eva atra prāṇaḥ syāt kutas yatas atra vaiṣṇavam liṅgam śrūyate tasmāt śrīḥ ca te lakṣmīḥ ca patnnayau a iti sannihita vākye śrūyamāṇasya śrī lakṣmīpati tvasya manasā api anyatra aśakya cintanasya balavat tvāt iti nanu uktam prāṇa śrutiḥ api niravakāśāḥ śabda pravṛtti nimittasya prāṇana ādi hetu tvasya anvaya vyatirekābhyām mukhye dṛṣṭa tvāt parameśvare tad abhāvāt iti atra api etat eva uttaram prāṇana ādi hetu tva liṅgam prāṇa śabda pravṛtti nimittaḥ dharmaḥ iti yāvat harau= eva mukhyam syāt na mukhyaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.241*d.6–1.1.241*d.8	 kutas jīvana ādi hetu tvam harau mukhyam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ abhāvāt ityataḥ āha prerakaḥ iti  prerakaḥ asya api yat hariḥ asya jīvana ādeḥ mukhyā adhīna tayā pratītasya api iti apeḥ arthaḥ yat yasmāt śrutaḥ a iti śeṣaḥ ayam arthaḥ mā bhūtām anvaya vyatirekau= īśvarasya jīvana ādi hetu ta asādhakau tathā api śruti balāt setsyati na hi anvaya vyatirekau= eva kāraṇa tāyām pramāṇam tathā sati svarga ādau= agni hotra ādeḥ kāraṇa tā na syāt iti tarhi pramāṇa dvaya balāt dvayoḥ api jīvana ādi hetu tvena kutas harau= eva tat mukhyam iti ca na vācyam yatas asya mukhyasya api hariḥ prerakaḥ śrūyate iti mukhye katham na mukhyam jīvana ādi hetu tvam iti asya api etat eva uttaram na hi para preraṇayā bhavat tasmin mukhyam iti sambhavati iti 
NSu_1.1.241*d.9	 athavā jīvana ādi hetu ta asādhanāya yat anvaya vi atireka anuvidhāyi tvam liṅgam uktam tat viṣṇu pakṣaḥ eva mukhyam syāt na mukhya pakṣaḥ iti yojyam ubhayatra hetum āha prerakaḥ iti yathā vāyu vikāra niṣṭhā anvaya vyatirekau tasya mukhya śarīra tvāt mukhya viṣayau= aṅgīkriyete tathā asya mukhyasya api hariḥ prerakaḥ iti tad viṣayau= iti mukhye na mukhyam liṅgam iti asya api etat upapādakam ananyathā siddha anvaya vyatirekau hi kāraṇa kptim kurvate na ca iha tathā asti yatas parameśvara avasthānam eva jīvana kāraṇam mukhyaḥ tu tad āyattaḥ tat śarīra rūpaḥ tasmin= avasthite avatiṣṭhate nirgate nirgacchati iti saṃvadati imam sarvam api artham śrutiḥ na prāṇena na apānena martyaḥ jīvati kaścana itareṇa tu jīvanti yasmin= etau= upāśritau a iti evaṃjātīyakāḥ evam eva yukta yānukūlya parihārāya apiliṅgam a iti ādikam eva yojanīyam iti 
NSu_1.1.241*d.10	 atra kecid prāṇasya prāṇam prāṇa bandhanam hi somya manaḥa iti ca udāharanti tat ayuktam iti apare śabda bhedāt prakaraṇa vaśāt ca saṃśaya anupapatteḥ yathā pituḥ pitā iti prayoge anyaḥ pitā ṣaṣṭhī nirdiṣyaḥ anyaḥ prathama anirdiṣyaḥ pitāmahaḥ iti gamyate tadvat prāṇasya prāṇam iti śabda bhedāt prāṇāt anyaḥ prāṇasya prāṇaḥ iti niścīyate na hi saḥ eva tasya iti bheda nirdeśaḥ bhavati yasya ca prakaraṇe yaḥ nirdiśyate nāma antareṇa api saḥ eva tad prakaraṇa nirdiṣyaḥ iti gamyate yathā jyotiṣyoma adhikārevasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta a iti atra jyotiḥ śabdaḥ jyotiṣyoma viṣayaḥ bhavati tathā parasya brahmaṇaḥ prakaraṇeprāṇa bandhanam hi somya manaḥa iti śrutaḥ prāṇa śabdaḥ vāyu vikāra mātram katham avagamayet atas saṃśaya aviṣaya tvāt na etat udāharaṇam yuktam kintu prastotaryā devatā prastāvam anvāyatta iti upakramya śrūyatekatamā sā devatā a iti prāṇaḥ iti ha uvāca sarvāṇi ha vai imāni bhūtāni prāṇam eva abhisaṃviśanti prāṇam abhyujjihate sā eṣā devatā prastāvam anvāyattā a iti etat udāharaṇa vākyam iti 
NSu_1.1.241*d.11	 etat api ayuktam saṃśaya pūrva pakṣayoḥ anutthānāt nanu prāṇa bandhanam hi somya manaḥ aprāṇasya prāṇam a iti ca evamādau brahma viṣayaḥ prāṇa śabdaḥ dṛśyate vāyu vikāre tu prasiddhaḥ loka vedayoḥ atas prāṇa śabdena katarasya upādānam iti bhavati saṃśayaḥ mā evam vāyu vikāre devatā śabdasya prastāva mantra āyatta tvasya ca asambhavāt cetanasya hi devatā śabdaḥ mantra adhiṣṭhānam ca upapannam kiñca atra bhūtānām saṃveśanam udgamanam ca pārameśvaram karma pratīyate tena pūrvavat tad grahaṇam eva yuktam kutas pūrva pakṣasya avakāśaḥ yatas vai imāni bhūtāni iti hi sarva prāṇi nikāyasya brahmaṇi eva saṃveśanam tatas eva udgamanam ca śrāvayati supti jāgarayoḥ api satā somya tadā sampannaḥ bhavati a ityādi 
NSu_1.1.241*d.12–1.1.241*d.13	 nanu mukhye api prāṇe saṃveśana udgamane dṛśyete yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇam tarhi vāc apyeti prāṇam cakṣuḥ prāṇam manaḥ prāṇam śrotram yadā pratibuddhayate prāṇāt eva adhi punar jāyante a iti evam tarhi saṃśayaḥ syāt na pūrva pakṣaḥ sama bala tvāt kiñcaya dā vai puruṣaḥ a iti śrutiḥ api mukhya prāṇa viṣaya iti kutas avagatam svāpa kāle prāṇa vṛttau= aparilupyamānāyām indriya vṛttayaḥ parilupyante prabodha kāle ca prādurbhavanti iti pratyakṣa anuguṇyāt mukhya prāṇa viṣaya tvam prābalyam ca niścīyate iti ced na indriyāṇām atīndriyāṇām mukhya prāṇe saṃveśāt gamanayoḥ apratyakṣa tvāt anumānam astu iti ced na paramātmanaḥ api aparilupyamānasya vidyamāna tvena avadāraṇa anupapatteḥ 
NSu_1.1.241*d.14	 kiñca indriyāṇām mukhya prāṇe saṃveśa udgamanayoḥ śruti anumāna siddha tve api kim āyātam sa varbhūta sambandhinoḥ tayoḥ indriya sāra tvāt bhūtānām na asaṅgatiḥ iti ced kim etat anumānam sambhāvānā vā na ādyaḥ vyāpti abhāvāt dvitīye tu śruti anumā ābhāsa mūla sambhāvanā mātreṇa śruti bādhayā pūrva pakṣaḥ iti subhāṣitam nanu ādityaḥ annam ca udgītha pratihāra devate tāvat brahmaṇaḥ anye tad sāmānyāt prāṇasya api na brahma tvam iti pūrva pakṣaḥ astu iti ced na nirṇāyaka abhāvaḥ eva prāya pāṭhasya anusaraṇīya tvāt spaṣṭam ca atra pārameśvaram karma iti uktam anyathā chatra cāmara ādyasādhāraṇa liṅga sadbhāve api samā anta sannidhi mātreṇa rājā na rājā syāt katham ca avadhāritam ādityaḥ annam ca na brahma iti śrūyate hi tatra api sarvāṇi ha vai imāni bhūtāni ādityam uccais santam gāyanti a ityādi brahma liṅgam annam eva pratiharamāṇāni a iti tu prāya pāṭhāt upajīvana artham grāhyam tasmāt saṃśaya pūrva pakṣayoḥ asambhavān na idam udāharaṇam kintu nyāya vidāmagresareṇa ananta veda vidā bhāṣya kṛta upāttam eva iti siddham 
NSu_1.1.241*d.15–1.1.241*d.17	 jyotiḥ caraṇa abhidhānāt jyotiḥ caraṇa abhidhāna āditi atra adhika āśaṅkā bhāṣyaḥ eva darśitāḥ yat āha agni sūkta tvāt iti tena vaktavya abhāvāt uttaram gāyatṛyadhikaraṇam eva vivriyate adhiveda gata aśeṣa nāmnām upalakṣaṇasya vedamātuḥ traivarṇika dvitīya janmani jananyāḥ gāyatṛyāḥ prādhānyena tad nāmnaḥ samanvayam pratipādayitum sūtram chandobhidhānaḥ ca iti ced na tathā cetorpaṇa nigadāt tathā hi daśarnam iti 
NSu_1.1.241*d.18–1.1.241*d.20	 chandobhidhānāt na iti ced na tathā cetorpaṇa nigadāt tathā hi darśanāt chandaḥ abhidhānāt na iti ced na tathā cetaḥ arpaṇa nigadāt tathā hi darśanam chandogāḥ paṭhanti gāyatrī vā idam bhūtam ityādi tatra saṃśayaḥ kim gāyatrī brahma kim idam bhūtam ityādi tatra saṃśayaḥ kim gāyatrī brahma kim varṇa samāveśa lakṣaṇaḥ mantraḥ iti mantraḥ eva iti tāvat prāptam kutas gāyatrī śabdasya chandaḥ viśeṣe prasiddha tvāt nanu etat api pūrva nyāyena eva parihṛtam iti atas abhyadhikā śaṅkayā pūrvapakṣayati nitya tvāt iti 
NSu_1.1.244ab.1–1.1.244ab.2^1	 nitya tvāt eva śabdasya tad svabhāvaḥ katham hareḥ bhavet ākāśa ādi śabdānām paramātma paratvam anya gatasya śabda pravṛtti nimittasya īśvara paratantra tvena tatra mukhya vṛtti ayogāt yadi api vivara tva ādikam kāraṇataḥ svarūpataḥ api anāgantukam tathā api dharmiṇaḥ eva ākāśa ādeḥ utpatti vināśavataḥ janma sthiti layeṣu īśvara adhīna tve dharmasya api tathā abhāvaḥ avarjanīyaḥ na ca ākāśaḥ anādi nityaḥ iti yuktam ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ ityādi śruti virodhāt yaḥ tu anādiḥ vā ayam ākāśaḥ a iti uktaḥ avyākṛta ākāśaḥ saḥ anādi nityaḥ api na tatra pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ vivakṣitaḥ bhūta prakaraṇa tvāt na ca evam prakṛte sambhavati 
NSu_1.1.244ab.2^2	 gāyatrī śabda pravṛtti nimittam hi gāna trāṇa kartṛ tvam yathā aha śrutiḥ gāyati ca trāyate ca tasmāt gāyatrī iti tatra gāna kartṛ tvam nāma artha pratipādaka tvam trāṇa kartṛ tvam ca adhyetṛṇām pāpāt rakṣaṇa śaktiḥ tat ubhayam api katham kena prakāreṇa hareḥ adhīnam syāt na kena api tathā hi vivara tva ādi vat dharmiṇā saha eva tad adhīnam vā syāt dhvani vat svayam eva vā na ādyaḥ dharmiṇaḥ śabdasya vedasya nitya tvāt anādi tvāt ca dharmiṇaḥ eva nitya tve tena saha para adhīna tvam kutas iti eva arthaḥ na dvitīyaḥ artha pratipādāna ādi śakteḥ tad svabhāva tvāt 
NSu_1.1.244cd.1–1.1.244cd.2	 katham prasiddha bahula śabdānām ayathārtha tā kiñca ākāśa ādi vākye santi pārameśvarāṇi liṅgāni iti yuktam tatra tad āśrayaṇam na ca atra tathāvidham kim api paśyāmaḥ pratyuta gāyatrī vā idam sarvaṃ avāc vai gāyatri a ityādayaḥ śabdaḥ eva prasiddhāḥ bahavaḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante katham ca teṣām vinā balavat bādha kopa nipātena anya artha tā kalpayitum yuktāḥ avyavasthā prasaṅgāt na ca chandasaḥ sarva ātmaka tva anupapattiḥ brahmaṇaḥ api sāmyāt 
NSu_1.1.244cd.3	 nanu iyam eva gāyatrī vākya śeṣe jyotiṣṭvena paṭhyate atha yat atas para udivaḥ jyodiḥ dīpyate a ityādinā jyotiḥ ca pūrva adhikaraṇe brahma iti nirṇītam mā evam pūrva adhikaraṇa udāhṛta vākya uktasya jyotiṣaḥ brahma tve api atra tad anupapatteḥ tatra hi karṇa ādi vidūra tvam uktam atra punar tat etat dṛṣṭam ca śrutam ca iti tad viparītam yujyate ca jyotiḥ iti padam chandasi tad paryāyasya tejaḥ vai brahmavarcasam gāyatri a iti tejaḥ śabdasya tatra darśanāt astu vā aatha yat atas parodivaḥ jyotiḥ a iti uktam jyotiḥ brahma tathā api gāyatrī chandaḥ eva upadeśa bhedena bhinna prakaraṇa tvāt iti atha vā atrā api atha yat atas paraḥ divaḥ iti vākya ukte jyotiṣi sandehaḥ kim brahma utā ani at iti upakrame gāyatrī śabda śravaṇāt anyat iti prāptam nanu gāyatrī śabdasya ākāśa ādi śabda vat īśvara paratva upapatteḥ kim anena iti atas nitya tvāt ityādinā abhyadhika aśaṅkeya muktā iti etat ācchādaka tvena adhikaraṇa tātparyam āha iti ced iti 
NSu_1.1.245ab.1–1.1.245ab.2	 iti ced tad hareḥ eva bāhulyāt śruti liṅgayoḥ tatra brūmaḥ iti adhyāhāryam tat jyotiḥ prakaraṇam gāyatrī prakaraṇam ca hareḥ eva pratipādakam na ca gāyatrī pada virodhaḥ yatas tat hareḥ eva vācakam katham yasmāt tat gāyatrī pada pravṛtti nimittam mukhyatas hareḥ eva anya gatam ca hareḥ eva adhīnam na ca jyotiṣaḥ brahma tve dṛṣṭa tva ādi anupapattiḥ yatas tat adhiṣṭhāna ādi dvārā karṇa ādi vidūrasya eva hareḥ upapadyate naca upadeśa bheda anupapattiḥ yatas tat divaḥ paratvam divi sthita tvam ca vivakṣā bhedāt hereḥ eva yujyate 
NSu_1.1.245ab.3–1.1.245ab.4	 kutas etat śruti liṅgayoḥ bāhulyāt tathā hitataḥ jyāyān= ca pūruṣaḥ a  yat vaitat brahma ayaḥ etām eva brahma upaniṣadam vedaḥ a iti śrutayaḥ liṅgāni ca gāna trāṇa kartṛ tvam bhūta ādi pāda tvam etām eva na atiśīyante a iti sarva uttama tvam ityādīni atas eva śruti liṅga bāhulyāt tat prasiddha bahula śabda jātam api hareḥ eva iti nanu uktam atra nityā gāyatrī pravṛtti nimittam ca tad svabhāvaḥ tat katham hareḥ adhīnam iti atas āha tādṛśa tvāt ca iti 
NSu_1.1.245c.1–1.1.245c.5	 tādṛśa tvāt ca tad śakteḥ pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ hetu samuccaye caśabdaḥ tādṛśī khalu īśvara śaktiḥ yat nitya anitya svabhāva asvabhāva sarva viṣayāḥ anyathā sarva īśvara tva hāneḥ atha tasyāḥ śakteḥ kim śakyam iti ced tad svarūpa sattā eva anādi siddhā sā iti ced satyam anādi īśvara śaktayā eva iti vadāmaḥ uktam ca atra pramāṇam iti apare tu jyotiścaraṇa abhidhānāt ityādi ekam eva adhikaraṇam vyācakṣate tat ayuktam atha yat atas paraḥ divaḥ jyotiḥ iti vākye caraṇa abhidhāna abhāvāt caraṇa abhidhāna ādityasya pāda abhidhānāt iti arthaḥ iti ced bhūta ādi pāda vyapadeśa upapatteḥ ca evam upadeśa bhedāt na iti ced na ubhayasmin api avirodhāt 
NSu_1.1.245c.6	 evam tarhi bhūtādi pāda vyapadeśa upapatteḥ ca evam iti punaruktam syāt na syāt tātparyabhedāt tathā hi pūrvasmin vākye tāvān asya mahimā iti catuṣpād brahma nirdiṣyam tatra yat catuṣpadaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tri pādasya amṛtam divi iti dyusambandhi rūpam nirdiṣyam tat eva iha dyusambandhāt pratyabhijñāyate tat parityajya prākṛtam jyotiḥ kalpayataḥ prakṛta hānā prakṛta prakriye prasajyetām iti atra abhipreyate tatra tu bhūtādi pāda vyapadeśa balena prakṛtasya brahmatva upapādanam iti ucyate evam hi vyākuvartā prakṛta pratyabhijñānam jyotiṣaḥ brahma tve hetuḥ uttarā tu tri sūtrī prakṛtasya brahmatva upapādika iti uktam syāt tathā ca śruta hāna aśruta kalpane syātām anyathā jyotiḥ pratyabhijñānāt iti eva brūyāt laghu ca evam spaṣṭam ca sūtram syāt pāda abhidhānāt iti eva vā vadet śruti anugamaḥ hi evam sati syāt iti uktam eva upapannam iti 
NSu_1.1.245c.7–1.1.245d.1	 prāṇaḥ tathā anugamāt nanu ataḥ eva prāṇaḥ iti anena eva etat gata artham tāḥ etāḥ śīrṣan= chriyaḥ śritā ityādi vākya antara viṣaya tvāt na iti ced na ukta uttara tvāt abhyadhikā śaṅkā sadbhāvāt na iti ced na adarśanāt sadbhāve vā tad anantaram eva ārambhaṇīya tvāt iti atas nirantara adhikaraṇa siddhānta nyāya upajīvi adhikā śaṅkayā pūrva pakṣam āha bāhulyaḥ iti  bāhulye śruti liṅgayoḥ 
NSu_1.1.246ab.1–1.1.246ab.2	 anyasya mukhya vācya tvam iti pūrva adhikaraṇe hi gāyatṛyādi anya vāci śabda bāhulya sadbhāve api śruti liṅga bāhulya āśrayaṇena gāyatrī paramātmā eva iti nirṇītam asti ca atra api parakīya śruti liṅga bāhulyam tathā hi cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ saha pāṭhaḥ tāvat pradhānasya brahmaṇaḥ na upapadyate na ca kiñcid atra brahmaṇaḥ jñāpakam asti yena apradhāna prāya pāṭhasya apavādaḥ syāt yujyate ca indrajīva mukhya prāṇānām indrasya hasta adhiṣṭhātuḥ indriya tvāt jīvasya indriya janya phala āśraya tvāt mukhyasya ca sarva indriya svāmi tvāt prāṇaḥ vai aham asmi aṣaḥ iti indra śrutiḥ tāḥ ahiṃsanta ityādinā uktāni prāṇa vivādaḥ dehāt utkramaṇa praveśau tatas dehapāta utthāne prāṇa saṃvādaḥ ca iti mukhya prāṇa liṅgāni tathā tam śatam varṣāṇi abhyārcat iti śata āyuṣṭvam prāṇaḥ vaṃśaḥ iti cakṣuḥ ādīn prati vaṃśa tvam iti jīva liṅgāni sati ca evam anyadīyayoḥ 
NSu_1.1.246ab.3–1.1.246d.1	 śruti liṅgayoḥ bāhulye anyasya indra ādeḥ prāṇa śabda vācya tvam yuktam anyathā ukta nyāyasya anaikānti āpātāt na ca vākya bhedaḥ doṣaḥ ananya gatika tayā prāpta tvāt iti amukhyayā vṛttyā atra mukhya prāṇasya vācya tvam siddhāntinā api abhyupagamyate iti atas mukhya iti uktam iti śabdaḥ śaṅkā samāpti dyotakaḥ siddhāntayat sūtram vyākhyāti tat na iti prāṇaḥ tathā anugamāt prāṇaḥ tathā anugamāt  tad na atra gasya hi viṣṇoḥ eva tu liṅgāni prāṇa sthāni tu sarvaśas 
NSu_1.1.247.1–1.1.247.2	 prāṇa saṃvāda pūrvāṇi mukhyatas jīvagāni ca abhyārcat śata varṣāṇi prāṇa vaṃśa tvam iti api kintu brahmaṇaḥ eva prāṇa śabda mukhya vācya tvam iti śeṣaḥ kutas brahma śabda anugamāt pārameśvara liṅga anugamāt ca iti bhāvaḥ athavā bāhulyaḥ iti ādikam eva siddhānta vākyam brahma viṣayayoḥ śruti liṅgayoḥ bāhulye vidyamāne yat anyasya indra ādeḥ prāṇa śabda mukhya vācya tvam pūrvavādinā uktam tat na iti 
NSu_1.1.247.3	 nanu ca śruti liṅga bāhulyāt eva anyasya mukhya vācya tvam iti uktam satyam tathā api asti atra vaiṣamyam niravakāśa śruti liṅga bāhulyena hi prāk atra ca nirṇayaḥ kṛtaḥ etāni tu sa avakāśāni iti āha atragasya iti indra ādi gatasya hi śabdaḥ hetu arthaḥ tasmāt na iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ pramāṇa prasiddhi dyotakaḥ vā ādyaḥ tuśabdaḥ nyāya viśeṣa sūcakaḥ prāṇa sthāni prāṇa sambandhi tayā pratītāni punar tu śabdaḥ api arthe indriya viṣayāṇi api iti śrutiḥ api iti vā na ca mañceṣu puruṣa sambandha nibandhanam krośanam iva amukhyānīśvare liṅgāni iti śaṅkanīyam antargatasya tasya eva tad tad kartṛ tvāt iti āśayena mukhyatas iti uktam śatam varṣāṇi iti atas api parastāt iti śabdaḥ yojyaḥ prāṇa vaṃśa tvam prāṇān= cakṣuḥ ādīn prati vaṃśa tvam etena na vaktuḥ iti ādi sūtra tātparyam uktam bhavati 
NSu_1.1.247.4–1.1.247.6	 na vaktuḥ ātma upadeśāt iti ced adhyātma saṃbandha bhūmāḥ hi asmin kecid atra kauṣītaki brāhmaṇa upaniṣadi indra pratardana ākhyāyikāyām śrutaṃprāṇaḥ asmi prajñā ātmā a ityādi vākyam udāharanti teṣām vaktuḥ iti na śruti anugatam vaktṛ tvam hi indrasya ātma upadeśāt iti anena eva labdham na ca vaktuḥ iti indra pratipatti artham tasya tat apratyāyaka tvāt asmākam tu viśiṣṭam śastram śaṃsituḥ viśvāmitrasya na indraḥ anyathā upadeṣī um arhati iti yukti dyotanāya sārthakam iti pāda artham upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
NSu_1.1.248.1–1.1.248.3	 tasmāt anyatragaiḥ śabdaiḥ ukta nyāyaiḥ samantataḥ ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ bhaṇyate na atra saṃśayaḥ anyatragaiḥ nāma ātmakaiḥ iti śeṣaḥ tasmāt iti asya eva vivaraṇa mukta nyāyaiḥ iti uktaḥ nyāyaḥ yeṣu te tathā uktāḥ samantataḥ sarva veda gataiḥ ekaḥ mukhya arthaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ iti lakṣaṇayā ayam samanvayaḥ abhidhīyate iti keṣāñcit matam mukhya vṛttyā iti siddhāntaḥ atas vipratipatteḥ atra saṃśayaḥ na kāryaḥ nirṇāyakasya ukta tvāt iti arthaḥ athavā ukte api nyāye anādi vāsanā nimittaḥ anyasya mukhya vācya tva viṣayaḥ saṃśayaḥ na kāryaḥ iti anena ācaṣṭe sarvajña kalpena tattva upadeśāya pravṛvena bhagavatā acāryeṇa evam sūtreṣu vyākhyāteṣu śiṣyāṇām etāvat mātrā arthāni etāni iti pratītiḥ syāt tām nirākartum āha vāsudeva ādi iti 
NSu_1.1.249.1–1.1.250ab.2	 vāsudeva ādi rūpeṇa catur mūrtiḥ ca sarvaśas athavā pañcamūrtiḥ sa proktaḥ adhikaraṇam prati pratisūtram pratipadam pratyakṣaram atha api vā vāsudeva ādi tvena iti arthaḥ caśabdaḥ vakṣyamāṇa pakṣa antara samuccaya arthaḥ prathama pāda ante kathanāt asmin= eva pādaḥ iti bhāti tad nirāsāya uktam sarvaśas sarveṣu api pādeṣu athavā iti nipāta samudāyaḥ pakṣa antare pañcamūrtiḥ nārāyaṇa ādi tvena pratiśabdaḥ vīpsāyām karma pravacanīyaḥ atha api vā iti trayaḥ nipātāḥ yathākramam pratisūtram ityādibhiḥ tribhiḥ sambaddhayate atra iyam mūrtiḥ pratipādyate iti katham jñāyate iti atas āha taiḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.250cd.1–1.1.250cd.2	 taiḥ taiḥ yukti śruti nyāya viśeṣaiḥ nyāya śabdaḥ prakāra vacanaḥ śruti liṅga vyatirikta nyāya arthaḥ vā tasyām tasyām mūrtau prasiddhaiḥ liṅgaiḥ śruti samākhya ādi vyāvartaka evirvekaḥ jñātavyaḥ iti śeṣaḥ nanu catur mūrtiḥ pañcamūrtiḥ vā iti pratyadhikaraṇam pratisūtram vā pratyakṣaram vā iti ca vastu vikalpaḥ katham iti atas āha yogyatā iti 
NSu_1.1.250d.1–1.1.251a.2	 yogya tā yathā sarve api pakṣāḥ sūtra kṛtaḥ vivakṣitāḥ puruṣāṇām yogya tā anatikrameṇa pratīyante tad apekṣayā vikalpaḥ yujyate iti yojyam evam alaukikā artha tvam kutas sūtrāṇām iti atas āha bṛhat tantrā iti bṛhat tantra pramāṇena evam artha tvam sūtrāṇām jñeyam iti śeṣaḥ bahu arthaḥ iti vakṣyamāṇam cā atra sambaddhayate tarhi kasmāt tathā na vyākhyāyate iti atas āha bahu artham api iti 
NSu_1.1.251b–1.1.251d.3	 bahu artham api saṅgrahāt ucyate nara buddhīnām api kiñcid graha arthataḥ sūtra jātam iti śeṣaḥ ucyate vyākhyāyate buddhi śabdasya jñāna artha tve grahaḥ grāhyam bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ grāhya tvam eva arthaḥ prayojanam tasmai manaḥ artha tve grahaṇam grahaḥ na ca evam sūtra artha leśa vyākhyāna paraḥ ayam granthaḥ iti anādaraṇīyaḥ iti āśayena āha granthaḥ iti 
NSu_1.1.252a.1–1.1.252b.2	 granthaḥ ayam api bahu arthaḥ samagra artha vyākhyānam akurvan= api ayam iti ukta tvāt sati api tasmin punar asya viracanāt bhāṣyam alpa artham iti na aśaṅkanīyam iti āha bhāṣyam ca iti  bhāṣyam ca atyartha vistaram atiśayitena arthena vistaraḥ yasya iti vyadhikaraṇa bahu vrīhi garmaka tvāt bahu artha tvam anayoḥ anupalambha bādhitam iti ced na vyākhyāna sāmagrī vaikalya nimitta tvāt tad anupalambhasya iti āśayena āha bahu jñāḥ eva iti 
NSu_1.1.252cd.1–1.1.252ef.3	 bahu jñāḥ eva jānanti viśeṣaṇa artham etayoḥ evam prāsaṅgika muktavopapāditasya anyatra prasiddha nāma samanvayasya phalam lakṣaṇa siddhim upasaṃharati tasmāt iti tasmāt mahā guṇaḥ viṣṇuḥ nāmnā āya punaruktitaḥ sakala veda gata samastanāma vācya tvāt iti arthaḥ katham tanmātreṇa mahā guṇa tvam nāmnām yaugika tvāt apunaruktitaḥ ca iti dvitīya pādasya pūrvottara pāda bhedasya svasmin= eka vākyatāyāḥ ca siddhaye pratipādyam artham darśayati liṅga ātmakānām iti 
NSu_1.2.1a–1.2.1c.6	 liṅga ātmakānām śabdānām vṛttiḥ nārāyaṇe pare cintyate liṅgam dharmaḥ saḥ ātmā iva ātmā pravṛtti nimittam yeṣām te liṅga ātmakāḥ svarūpa arthaḥ vā atma śabdaḥ nimitta nimittinoḥ abheda upacārāt sakala veda gatānām anyatra prasiddhānām iti śeṣaḥ nanu atīta pāde samanvitāḥ api liṅga ātmakāḥ eva yaugika tvāt anyathā guṇa pūrti alābhena samanvaya samarthana vaiyarthyāt na ca prakaraṇa gata guṇa lābhena sārthakyāt vacana vṛtti aṅgīkāra vaiphalyāt uktam ca yat śabdāḥ yoga vṛttayaḥ iti tat katham ayam vibhāgaḥ satyam tathā api anyatra prasiddha tva ādi vat āpāta pratīti anurodhena iya m uktiḥ iti adoṣaḥ vṛttiḥ lakṣaṇa ādiḥ api bhavati iti atas pare mukhya arthaḥ iti uktam tathā ca mukhya vṛttiḥ iti labhyate cintyate samarthyate asmin pādaḥ iti śeṣaḥ sarvatra prasiddha upadeśāt kecid manaḥ mayaḥ prāṇa śarīraḥ bhā rūpaḥ iti uktam manaḥ maya tva ādinā upāsya tvam paramātmanaḥ pratipādayitum idam adhikaraṇam iti vyācakṣate tad asat iti āśayavān āha sarvaga tvam iti sarvatra prasiddha upadeśāt 
NSu_1.2.1cd.1–1.2.1cd.2	 sarvaga tvam tu prathamam pravicāryate tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe etam asyām etam divi ityādi vākya uktam sa vargata tvam eva atra pāde prathamam parameśvarasya samarthyate na tu manaḥ maya tva ādinā upāsya tvam iti arthaḥ satyakāma tva ādi parameśvara dharmāṇām sphuṭa pratibhāsa tvena sandeha ādi anupapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ nanu manaḥ maya tva ādayaḥ śārīra dharmāḥ api pratīyante iti ced na teṣām ānanda maya adhikaraṇa nyāyena sa avakāśa tvāt carama pratītena api niravakāśena prathama pratītasya sa avakāśasya anyathātva upapatteḥ 
NSu_1.2.1cd.3–1.2.2cd.1	 nanu katham tarhi asmākam api cakṣuḥ maya tva ādīni pūrva pakṣa prāpakāṇi ucyate hetu antareṇa pūrva pakṣe sati abhyuccaya mātra tvena teṣām upanyāsaḥ yathā parasya īkṣati adhikaraṇe prāya pāṭhe niraste api abhyuccaya mātra tvena prāṇa adhikaraṇe tad upanyāsaḥ sarva gata tva pratipādanasya prakṛta upayogam daśaryati tatra iti tatra tatra sthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ tad tad śakti prabodhakaḥ prabodhanam kārya abhimukhīkaraṇam tat kim dūre sthitaḥ śakti prabodhane na śaktaḥ yena tatra tatra tiṣṭhati iti atas uktam dūratas api iti dūratas api atiriktaḥ sa līlayā kevalam prabhuḥ 
NSu_1.2.3a.1–1.2.3a.2^1	 iti jñāpayitum yadi api sa prabhuḥ viṣṇuḥ dūratas api tad tad śakti prabodhane atiśaktaḥ tathā api kevalam līlayā tatra tatra sthitaḥ tad tad tad śaktīnām prabodhakaḥ bhavati iti jñāpayitum sarva gata tvam iha pravicāryate iti sambandhaḥ etat uktam bhavati sva nirgama praveśābhyām deha pātana utthāpanam ityādyāḥ mukhya prāṇa ādi śaktayaḥ tad antargata bhagavat āyattā iti prāk uktam tad anupapannam bhagavataḥ sarva gata tva abhāvāt śāstra eka samadhigamyam khalu tat śāstram ca etam asyām iti ādikamanya param iti āśaṅkayā ukta artha samarthanāya sarva gata tvam atra hareḥ upapadyate iti athavā na sarva gata tvam hareḥ upapādanīyam tasya ānanda ādi vat sraṣṭṛ tva ādi vat vā guṇa tva abhāvāt ityāśaṅkaya na sa vargata tvam nāma sarva saṃyogi tva mātram iha vivakṣitam kim nāma tad tad śakti preraka tvena atas tad upapādanam upapadyate iti anena ucyate 
NSu_1.2.3a.2^2	 athavā na sarva gata tvam atra pratipādanīyam adṛśya tva ādi adhikaraṇe tasya pratipādayiṣyamāṇa tvāt iti āśaṅkaya tatra savargatatva mātram atra tu tad tad śakti prabodhaka tvam iti tātparyabhedaḥ anena ucyate athavā antaryāmi adhikaraṇe pṛthivī ādiṣu sthitevarkṣyamāṇa tvāt na idam ārambhaṇīyam iti āśaṅkayātra śakti preraka tvena tatra tu sattā ādi prada tvena tat tad antargata tvam ucyate iti anena ācaṣṭe athavā antar stha tva adhikaraṇena idam gata artham iti āśaṅkaya tatra candra ādi kati paya padārtha antara sthita tvam atra tu sarva padārtha antargata tvam abhidhīyate iti pratipādya bhedam etena āha athavā sarva gata tvam nāma sarva mūrta parama mahat parimāṇa yogi tvam vā prasiddham tat atra yadi sādhyam syāt tadā arbhakaukaḥ tvāt iti ākṣepa anupapattiḥ adṛśya tva ādi adhikaraṇena gatārtha tā eca iti āśaṅkaya sarva gata tvam anyathā anena vyācaṣṭe 
NSu_1.2.3a.3–1.2.3a.5	 tad tad śakti prabodhakaḥ iti katham kartari ca iti samāsa pratiṣedhāt na yājaka ādibhiḥ ca iti pratiprasavāt yat vā prakṛṣṭaḥ bodhaḥ yasmāt iti vā paca ādi ajanta tvena vā prabodhaḥ śaktīnām prabodhaḥ śakti prabodhaḥ tatas caa jñātaḥ a iti ka pratyayaḥ iti atra sūtram karma kartṛ vyapadeśāt ca iti asya arthaḥ ātmānam parasmai śaṃsati iti śaṃsana kriyāyām ātmanaḥ sarva gatasya karma tvena śarīrasya kartṛ tvena vyapadeśāt ca na śārīraḥ ayam sarva gataḥ ekasyām kriyāyām karma kartroḥ eka tva ayogāt na hi devadattaḥ chidāyām kartā karma api bhavati iti tatra kim karma kartṛ bhāvaḥ bheda vyāptaḥ uta na iti na ādyaḥ niyāmaka abhāvena vyāpteḥ aniścayāt syāt etat kriyā āśrayaḥ kartā iti tāvat prasiddham para sama veta kriyā janya phala śāli kamarā iti ucyate yathā deva datta samaveta gati kriyā phala saṃyoga śālī grāmaḥ kriyā phala śāli tvena eva karma tve saṃyoga śālinaḥ devadattasya api tad prasaṅgaḥ tathā tve ca devadattam grāmam gacchati iti dvitīyā syāt atas lakṣaṇa virodhāt karma kartroḥ bhedaḥ niyataḥ iti 
NSu_1.2.3a.6	 mā evam yatas devadattaḥ grāmam gacchati tasya api deva datta samaveta gati kriyā phala vibhāga śāli tvena karma tva prasaṅgāt tathā ca devadattaḥ kauśāmbīm pāṭalī putram gacchati iti prayogaḥ syāt kim ca anāgata ādi viṣaya icchā ādi kriyā phala śāli tvam anāgata ādeḥ na asti iti tat karma tvam na syāt na hi tad abhāve tatra phala utpādaḥ sambhavati mā bhūt iti ced na icchā ādīnām sa karmaka tva vyāghātāt tad vācinaḥ dvitīya anupapatti prasaṅga gāt ca vartamāne api ghaṭa ādau na jñāna ādi janyam phalam upalabhyate tathā hi na tāvat jñāta tā nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt icchā ādīnām tad ajanaka tvāt ca na api saṃskāra ādikam tasya ātmani eva utpādāt na api vyavahāraḥ 
NSu_1.2.3a.7	 vyavahāra ādi rūpasya tasya kartṛ niṣṭha tvāt upādāna ādi rūpasya upekṣaṇīyā vyāpteḥ tasmāt kriyāsu ātantṛyam kartṛ tvam tad viṣaya tvam ca karma tvam iti vācyam na ca tayoḥ kam api virodham paśyāmaḥ anyathā karma kartā api durlabhaḥ syāt kim ca asti tāvat kāraka antara samāveśaḥ kāṃsya pātṛ yābhuṅkte kāṃsya pātṛyām bhuṅkte iti ādi prayoga darśanāt tathā karma kartroḥ api samāveśe kaḥ virodhaḥ 
NSu_1.2.3a.8^1	 nanu ca dṛśyate tāvat karma kartroḥ bhedaḥ na ca vyabhicāraḥ dṛśyate tena vyāpti niścayaḥ iti mā evam darśana adarśana mātrasya vyāpti aniścāyaka tāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇa tvāt na ca vyabhicāra adarśanam api mām aham jānāmi iti tad darśanāt anyathā sākṣātkāra anupapatti prasaṅgāt na ca nitya anumeyaḥ eva ātmā sākṣātkārasya āpanhotum aśakya tvāt kaścid āha mānasa pratyakṣa avaseyaḥ ayam ātmā tathā api kartṛ tā eva asya na karma tā ātma kartṛke ahaṃpratyaye pratibhāsa mātreṇa tadā aparokṣya siddheḥ iti tat karma tā atirikta anirukteḥ riktam eva vacanam 
NSu_1.2.3a.8^2	 kim ca aham iti pratyayaḥ sa karmakaḥ na vā na iti pakṣaḥ anubhava viruddhaḥ jānāteḥ sadā sa karmaka tva avaca bhāsāt ca ādye kim asya karma iti vaktavyam na tāvat ātmā atiriktam ghaṭa ādau= ahaṃpratyaya adarśanāt ātma sambandhi sukha ādikam iti ced na tat mā atra karma tāyām ātma asiddhi prasaṅgāt aham sukham ityādi vyavahāra prasaṅgāt ca atha jñāna āśrayaḥ kartā sukha ādi viśiṣṭaḥ karma iti ced  āgatam tarhi aṃśataḥ karmaka troḥ aikyam kim ca yuñjānasya nirupādhikam ātmānam paśyataḥ ahaṃpratyayaḥ na anya karmakaḥ iti akarmakaḥ vā atma karmakaḥ vā abhyupagantavyaḥ gati antara abhāvāt 
NSu_1.2.3a.9^1	 aparaḥ tu ghaṭa ādi sannikṛṣṭena cakṣuḥ ādinā upajanitam vijñānam tritaya prakāśa rūpam karma tayā viṣayam sva prakāśa tayā sva rūpam āśraya tayā atmānam vyavasthāpayati iti na ātmanaḥ karma tā na api tad sākṣātkāra asiddhiḥ iti āha sa praṣṭavyaḥ kim idam jñānasya sva prakāśa tvam nāma iti sva karmaka prakāśa tvam iti ced tarhi vṛścika bhiyā palāyamānasya āśīviṣa mukhe nipātaḥ yat sva lakṣara mātra adhīna virodham karma kartṛ bhāvam parihartum sarva lokau= asita virodham kriyākam arbhāvam abhyupaiti kriyā hi karma kāraka janyā iṣyate na ca janya jana kayoḥ ekatā ucitāḥ 
NSu_1.2.3a.9^2–1.2.3a.10	 antar bhāvita pūrva apara bhāvi tvāt tasyāḥ na ca tat eva sva ātmānam prati pūrvam aparam ca iti yujyate prakāśa antara anapekṣa siddha tvam sva prakāśa tvam iti ced na ghaṭa ādeḥ api sva prakāśa tā āpātāt na hi ghaṭa ādayaḥ sva siddhau prakāśa antaram apekṣante kim nāma prakāśam eva sva ati rikta prakāśa anapekṣa siddha tvam iti ced na svāpekṣā bhāvena sva ati rikta viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt prakāśa anapekṣa siddha tvam iti ced na vvyāghātāt śaśa viṣāṇa ādeḥ api siddhi prasaṅgāt ca sva vyavahāra hetu prakāśa tvam iti ced na sva viṣayaḥ eva vyavahāra hetu tva darśanena asva viṣayasya sva vyavahāra hetu ta anupapatteḥ tad guṇa saṃvijñāna bahu vrīhi ādikam tu na udāharaṇam guṇasya api samāsa viṣaya tā aṅgīkārāt 
NSu_1.2.3a.11–1.2.3ab.2	 kiñca ātmā na cākṣuṣa jñāne avabhāsate arūpi dravya tvāt ākāśa vat anyathā rūpi tva prasaṅgaḥ kamartayā prakāśe rūpa upayogaḥ iti ced na prakāśamānam karma tayā eva prakāśate iti vadantam prati viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt etena anumāne api prayojaka antara āśaṅkā nirastāḥ kim ca ātmā yadi tad aviṣayaḥ api tatra prakāśate hanta tarhi rūpa jñāne rasaḥ api kasmāt na prakāśate anāśraya tvāt iti ced tat kim yāvat jñāna sambandhi jñāne prakāśate kiṃvā aśrayaḥ eva ādye cakṣuḥ ādau= ati prasaṅgaḥ dvitīye api niyāmakam vācyam na hi ghaṭaḥ ayam iti ātma avabhāsate ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti pratyayaḥ tu ghaṭa jñāna viśiṣṭa ātma karmakaḥ anyaḥ eva ātma siddhiḥ tu karma tayā api bhaviṣyati iti etena sva prakāśa tayā atma siddhiḥ api parāḥ tā sva kam arka prakāśa vat tva tad rūpa tva atiriktayāḥ tasyāḥ nirūpayitum aśakyatvāt tat evam kartṛ karma bhāvaḥ na bheda vyāptaḥ iti siddham karma kartṛ vyapadeśāt ca tathā ca katham hetu tvena upādānam iti atas āha karma iti  karma kartroḥ utsargataḥ bhidā yau= ekasyām kriyāyām karma kartārau tayoḥ bhedaḥ iti asti eva vyāptiḥ kim tu autsargikī na tu dhūmasya iva agninā saṅkoca anarha iti arthaḥ tatas kim labdham iti ced doṣa dvayam parihṛtam iti krameṇa āha abhedaḥ api iti 
NSu_1.2.3cd.1–1.2.3cd.2^1	 abhedaḥ api viśeṣe syāt balī saḥ api anapoditaḥ yasmāt karma kartroḥ utsargataḥ eva bhidā tasmāt viśinaṣṭi sva viṣayam utsarga viṣaya advaya vat chinatti iti viśeṣaḥ apavādaḥ tasmin satyabhedaḥ api syāt tathā ca mām aham jānāmi iti upapannam bhavati yatas ca utsargaḥ api apavāda abhāve balī sva sādhya sādhane samarthaḥ na ca asti prakṛte apavādaḥ tasmāt atra hetu tvena upadānam api yujyate yathā hi na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti autsargikaḥ bhūta hiṃsā niṣedhaḥ agnīṣomīya paśu hiṃsā vidhinā apodyate bhavati ca anapodite brahma hiṃsā ādya karaṇīya tve pramāṇam nanu evam tarhi prameya tva anitya tvayoḥ api evam vaktum śakyataḥ eva prameya tvasya anitya tvena autsargikī vyāptiḥ apavādena tu ākāśa ādau nitya tvam apavāda abhāvāt śabda ādau= anitya tva sādhaka tā iti tatas ca anaikāntikatocchedaḥ syāt mā evam sāmānya viṣayeṇa hi pramāṇena arthe pratīte sati viśeṣa viṣayeṇa apavādaḥ bhavati tatas ca sarvatas prasaktā buddhiḥ tad viṣayam parityajya anyatra viśrāmyati 
NSu_1.2.3cd.2^2–1.2.3cd.3^1	 na ca sarva bhūta hiṃsā niṣedhasya iva prameya tva anitya tva vyāpteḥ kena api pramāṇena prāptiḥ asti kim nāma prameya tvam nitya tva anitya tvābhyām saha vyavasthitam eva upalabhyata sati na tatra utsarga apavāda nyāyasya avakāśaḥ evam tarhi karmarka tṛ bhāvaḥ api bheda abhedābhyām saha vyavasthitaḥ eva upalabdhaḥ iti katham atra api utsarga apavāda nyāyasya avakāśaḥ mā evam pratyakta vapara aktava rūpaḥ hi kartṛ karma bhāvaḥ sa tāvat āpātataḥ virodhāt bhedena ghaṭanīyaḥ vā viśeṣeṇa vā tatra bhedaḥ mukhyaḥ viśeṣaḥ tu pratinidhiḥ iti uktam na ca mukhya pratinidhyoḥ sama kakṣya tayā pratibhāsaḥ bhavati 
NSu_1.2.3cd.2^2–1.2.3cd.3^2–1.2.4.1	 atas bhedaḥ sāmānyatas prāpnoti viśeṣaḥ tu apavādena iti yuktam uktam yathā ca anugata sāmānya abhāve api utsarga apavāda nyāya sambhavaḥ tathā vakṣyāmaḥ sa upādhika sambandhasya sādhana aṅgatā bhāva vat sa upādhika vyabhicārasya api na dūṣaṇa aṅga tvam iti kim atra alaukikam vakṣyate ca etat iti sarva gata tvam atra adhikaraṇe pratipādyate iti uktam tat kim tanmātra muta anya upalakṣaṇam ādye sūtrāṇām viśvatomukha tva hāniḥ śāstra aparyavasānam ca āpadyeta dvitīye tu upādhiḥ vaktavyaḥ anyathā adhikaraṇa antara abhāva prasaṅgāt iti ataḥ prathama adhikaraṇa upādhim vadan prasaṅgāt sarva adhikaraṇa upādhīn āha etat iti etat bhāva abhidham liṅgam kriyā liṅge tatas param antaryāmī antaraḥ ca iti kriyā bhāva ākhyam ucyate 
NSu_1.2.5ab.1–1.2.5ab.2	 adṛśya tva ādi abhāva ākhyam śrutiḥ liṅga adhikā parā etat sarva gata tvam bhāva abhidham sattā abhidham yāvantaḥ śabdāḥ kvacid pratīke sthiti vācinaḥ te sarve api anena upalakṣyante iti arthaḥ evam uttaratra api jñātavyam kriye ca te liṅge ca tatas prathama adhikaraṇāt param dva abhyāmattā carācara grahaṇāt a guhām praviṣyau= ātmānau hi tad darśanāt a iti etābhyām adhikaraṇābhyām cintyete nanu ekam adhikaraṇam vyartham na vyartham adhika āśaṅkayā pratyavasthānāt antare upapatteḥ a iti antaryāmya dhidaiva ādiṣu tad dharma vyapadeśāt a iti ca adhikaraṇa dvayena kriyā pradhānaka bhāva ākhyam liṅgam ucyate pratipādyate atra api pūrvavat na anyatara adhikaraṇa vaiyarthyam atas eva kriyā kriyayā bhāvaḥ bhāvena vyākhyāyate iti parāḥ tam 
NSu_1.2.5ab.3–1.2.5ab.5	 adṛśya tva ādi guṇakaḥ dharma ukteḥ a iti atra uktam adṛśya tva ādi liṅgam abhāva ākhyam parā parasmin vaiśvānaraḥ sādhāraṇa śabda viśeṣāt a iti adhikaraṇe pratipādyā śrutiḥ nāma na tu liṅgam tarhi pāda antarbhāvaḥ na sambhavati iti atas uktam liṅga adhika iti liṅāni adhikāni samāna adhikaraṇāni yayā sā liṅga adhikā iti yathā prathama pāde antar tad dharma upadeśāt iti liṅga nirṇayaḥ bahu nāma samanvaya lābha arthaḥ tathā bahu liṅga samanvaya lābha arthaḥ nāma vicāraḥ atra na viruddhayate iti sākṣāt prakaraṇi niṣṭha tvāt śruteḥ upādānam ca upapadyate sā ca sūkta ādi vyāvartaka agni ādi śabda upalakṣaṇam iti jñātavyam attā carācara grahaṇāt attā carācara grahaṇāt 
NSu_1.2.5ab.6–1.2.5ab.7^1	 atrayasya brahma ca kṣatram ca ubhe bhavataḥ odanaḥ mṛtyuḥ yasya upasecanam kaḥ itthā veda yatra saḥ a iti vākyam udāhṛtya attāram kecid vṛtti kārāḥ vicāritavantaḥ tad vihāyasa yat yat eva asṛjata tat tat attum adhriyate a iti vākyam udāhṛtya attāram vyacīcarat bhagavān bhāṣya kāraḥ kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ ucyate atraattum adhriyate a atti a iti ca attā sākṣāt pratīyate tatra tu odana upasecana padābhyām upalakṣaṇīyaḥ adadhātu anugatiḥ ca atra na ca upalakṣite niyamaḥ asti kiñca carācara grahaṇāt iti hetuḥ atra sarvam vātti iti kaṇṭha uktaḥ tatra tu brahma kṣatra mṛtyu padaiḥ carācarasya upalakṣaṇam iti asti mahān viśeṣaḥ 
NSu_1.2.5ab.6–1.2.5ab.7^2	 nanu evam tarhi śruti anugamāya sarva grahaṇāt iti kutas na kṛtam asti prayojanam carācara grahaṇasya sarva grahaṇāt iti ukte śaknoti pūrvavādī vaditum aditiḥ api sarvasya sva bhojyasya anna pāna ādeḥ bhoktrī iti tatra na ayam sarva śabdaḥ saṅkucita vṛttiḥ kim nāmasa tayā vācā a ityādi pūrva vākya paryālocanayā carācara vācī iti vaktavyam tat etat anena dyotayati iti yat asmin= adhyāye samanvīyate tat sarvam lakṣaṇa tvena prakṛtam iti ānanda maya adhikaraṇa ante abhihitam lakṣaṇam ca lakṣyeṇa brahmaṇā abhinnam iti lakṣaṇa sūtre pratipāditam atra ca kriyā liṅga samanvayaḥ iti uktam tathā ācādana ādi kriyāṇām parameśvara svarūpa tvam uktam iti tadā ākṣipati anitya tvāt iti 
NSu_1.2.5cd.1–1.2.5cd.3	 anitya tvāt kriyāṇām tu katham eva svarūpa tā tuśabdaḥ sarva gata tva ādi vyavaccheda arthaḥ saḥ api codyasya atra avakāśa sambhāvana arthaḥ katham iti ākṣepe katham eva na kathañcid api iti arthaḥ svarūpa tā parameśvara svarūpa tā parameśvarasya hi nitya tvam janma ādi sūtra labdham svayam anityasya sakala kāraṇa tva anupapatteḥ yat khalu yasya janakam na tasya asau janakaḥ yat ca tasya vināśakam na tasya asau vināśakaḥ iti kriyāṇām tu anitya tvam su prasiddham tathā ca nitya anityayoḥ katham abhedaḥ syāt viruddha dharma adhyāsasya bhāva bheda avi abhicārāt anyathā jagati bheda abhāva prasaṅgāt tatas yadi nāma sarva gata tva ādīnām yāvat dravya bhāvinām abhedaḥ tathā api na kriyāṇām asau yujyate iti pariharati iti ced iti 
NSu_1.2.6ab.1–1.2.6ab.2^1	 iti ced sa viśeṣaḥ api kriyā śaktayā ātmanā sthiraḥ na iti adhyāhāraḥ kutas na kevalam īśvaraḥ sthiraḥ api tu sa tadīyaḥ viśeṣaḥ dharmaḥ api kriyā rūpaḥ sthitaraḥ yatas iti śeṣaḥ atra kriyā asthirā iti etāvat eva vaktavyam viśeṣaḥ iti tu kriyāyāḥ parameśvara aikye api ukta vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena tad dharma tayā api aṅgīkaraṇīyā iti jñāpayitum na kevalam sa viśeṣaḥ sarva gata tva ādiḥ sthiraḥ kintu kriyā api pārameśvarī sthirā yatas iti vā yojyam anena kriyāyāḥ api nitya tva pratijñānena viruddha dharma adhyāsasya asiddhiḥ uktāḥ tathā hi īśvarasya saṃharaṇa ādi kriyāṇām anitya tvam kim pramāṇa balāt aṅgīkriyate uta nitya tve bādhaka sadbhāvāt athavā tad sādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt na ādyaḥ 
NSu_1.2.6ab.2^2	 īśvarasya tad kriyāyāḥ ca apratyakṣa tvena tat anitya tvasya pratyakṣeṇa pratyetum aśakyatvāt liṅga abhāvena anumāna anupapatteḥ kriyā tvam liṅgam iti ced tat kim dhātvartha tvam parispanda tvam vā na ādyaḥ jñāna icchā prayatnaiḥ sat tayā ca vyabhicārāt na dvitīyaḥ sarva kriyāṇām aparispanda tvena bhāga asiddha tvāt īśvara parispanda pakṣīkāretvāśraya asiddheḥ pareṇa tasya anaṅgīkṛta tvāt aṅgīkāre api anaikāntyam kvacid anīśvara parispandānām api nitya tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt kriyā tvasya nitya tvena vinā vṛttau bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojaka tā ca kāryatvena sa upādhika tvam ca tasya api sādhane bādhaḥ pramāṇasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt 
NSu_1.2.6ab.3	 asatya āvaraṇa ādau prāk ūrdhvam ca anupalambhaḥ liṅgam iti ced anupalambhaḥ kim pratyakṣeṇa uta pramāṇa mātreṇa na ādyaḥ yogyatayā viśeṣaṇe asiddheḥ anyathā gagana ādinā vyabhicārāt dvitīye tu asiddhiḥ āgama ādinā upalabdheḥ etena āvaraṇa ādi abhāve sati kadācid eva ulabdhiḥ api pratyuktāḥ varṇa nitya tva vāde anaikāntyāt ca kiñca nityaḥ api īśvara parispandaḥ kadācid abhivyakteḥ kadācid eva upalabhyate iti aṅgīkāre na bādhakam paśyāmaḥ vyaktiḥ api ādi grahaṇena gṛhyate iti ced na sandigdha viśeṣaṇā siddheḥ astu tarhi phala anupalambhaḥ liṅgam iti ced na sarvathā anupambhasya asiddha tvāt na hi īśvara parispanda kriyā kadāpi na saṃyoga vibhāga lakṣaṇam phalam janayati iti yujyate tathā sati parispandatvā anupapatteḥ nitya saṃyoga vibhāga janma anupalabdheḥ iti ced na nitya guṇa ādinā vyabhicārāt kadācid eva saṃyoga ādi janma vivakṣitam iti ced tathā api gagana ādinā vyabhicāraḥ kadācid eva saṃyoga ādya samavāyi kāraṇa tvam astu iti ced na kadācid iti viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt tad parityāge api asamavāyi kāraṇa tvasya durnirūpa tvena asiddheḥ 
NSu_1.2.6ab.4^1	 kiñca dvi tantuka ārambha ketantau karma utpannam tantu antarāt vibhāgam karoti tatas dvi tantuka ārambhaka saṃyoga vināśaḥ tad nāśe dvi tantuka vināśaḥ atha idānīm tantoḥ kārya saṃyukta pradeśa vibhāgaḥ tatas ca uttara deśa saṃyogaḥ tasmāt karmaṇaḥ vināśaḥ iti pareṣām prakriyā evam ca yathā aneka kāla vartini api kriyā kadācid saṃyoga ādi ārabhate na yāvat sattvam tathā nityā api kadācid saṃyoga ādi ārabhatām kaḥ virodhaḥ sāmānyavat tve satyasmad ādi bāhya indriya grāhya tvam hetuḥ astu iti ced na viśeṣya asiddheḥ bāhya indriya grāhya sajātīya tvasya paramāṇu ādau vyabhicārāt kiñca varṇa nitya tve sphuṭaḥ asya vyabhicāraḥ na api āgamāt īśvara kriyā anitya tā avagatiḥ sa hi īśvara kriyā anitya iti evam ātmakaḥ vā saḥ imān lokān asṛjata iti evam ātmakaḥ vā ādyaḥ tu na upalabhyate dvitīyaḥ tu sa aikṣata saḥ akāmayata ityādinā tulyaḥ tatra yadi kriyāyāḥ anitya tvam jñāna ādeḥ api kutas na bhavet iti astu tarhi nitya tve bādhaka sadbhāvāt iti dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ 
NSu_1.2.6ab.4^2	 tathā hi yadi sṛṣṭi samaye api saṃhāra kriyā vidyeta tadā tathā eva śruti ādau= upalabhyeta janana vināśau ca ghaṭasya yugapad prasajyeyātām kiñca yadi īśvara kriyā nityā syāt tarhi kriyāyāḥ saṃyoga vibhāgau prati anapekṣa kāraṇa tvāt tad utpatti sātatya prasaṅgaḥ api ca īśvara kriyā saṃyoga vibhāgau karoti na vā na iti pakṣe kriyā tvam vyāhanyeta ādye api kim sva sattā utta rakṣaṇe uta viramya na ādyaḥ sva sattāyāḥ idam prathama tā bhāvena saṃyoga ādi viśeṣasya vivakṣi ta kṣaṇāt api pūrvam utpatti prasaṅgāt na dvitīyaḥ pūrva uttara avasthayoḥ aviśiṣṭasya viramya vyāpāra ayogāt uttara saṃyogasya karma vināśaka tvena kṛta saṃyogasya karmaṇaḥ avasthāna anupapatteḥ ca iti atas uktam śaktayā ātmanā iti ayam arthaḥ tad tad kārya janana śaktiḥ eva kriyā iti ucyate atas tena rūpeṇa sthirā sā yadā vyajyate tadā vyavahāra ālambanam tad tad kārya jananī ca bhavati iti na kaścid doṣaḥ iti kriyā śaktayā ātmanā vyakti śakti rūpeṇa kāraṇena iti vā 
NSu_1.2.6ab.5^1	 nanu kā iyam śakteḥ vyaktiḥ nāma na tāvat pratītiḥ īśvara apekṣayā nitya siddha tvena ukta doṣa anuśakteḥ para apekṣayā kadāpi abhāvāt bhāve api kārya utpādasya tad anapekṣa tvāt atas eva na āvaraṇa nivṛttiḥ vyaktiḥ iti mā evam vyakti śabdena śakteḥ eva avasthā viśeṣasya vivakṣita tvāt tatra yat tāvat uktam yadi sṛṣṭi samaye api saṃhāra kriyā syāt tadā tathā vyavahriyeta iti tat asat vyakti rūpeṇa eva vyavahāra ālambana tvāt yat api janana vināśau yugapad syātām iti tat api vyakta yava sthāyām eva śakteḥ janaka tvāt anupapannam yat ca kriyāyāḥ nitya tve saṃyoga vibhāga utpatti sātatya prasañjanam tat api evam eva parihṛtam 
NSu_1.2.6ab.5^2	 kiṃca evam paṭasāmagṣāḥ paṭa utpattau= anapekṣa tvāt paṭa utpatti sātatyam syāt nanu kim sāmagrī tam eva paṭam punar janayatu uta paṭa antaram na ādyaḥ paṭa prāgabhāvasya api sāmagrī niviṣṭa tvāt tasya ca paṭa utpattyā vinaṣṭa tvena sāmagṣāḥ vikala tvāt na dvitīyaḥ pūrva paṭena pratibaddha tvāt tat katham paṭa utpatti sātatyam satyam samam etat prakṛte api iti yat api īśvara kriyā saṃyoga vibhāgau karoti na vā iti pṛṣṭham tatra karoti iti brūmaḥ ku varntī ca viramya eva na ca tad anupapattiḥ vyaktayā viśiṣṭa tvāt anyathā avayava kriyā api uttara deśa saṃyogam sva utpatti utta rakṣaṇaḥ eva kuryāt na ca kṛta saṃyogasya karmaṇaḥ avasthāna anupapattiḥ anitya kriyāsu tadvayavastha upapatteḥ 
NSu_1.2.6ab.6^1	 nanu saṃhāra kāle kriyā vyaktā na vā na ced katham tatra vyavahāraḥ artha kriyā vā ādye katham sṛṣṭi vyavahāra ādi a bhāvaḥ mā evam vyakteḥ api avāntara ananta viśeṣa vattā aṅgīkārāt tat idam uktam sa viśeṣaḥ api iti evam anaṅgīkāre pareṣām api samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ pārameśvarasya jñāna icchā prayatna lakṣaṇasya saṃhāra vyāpārasya nitya tvāt nityam api parameśvara icchā ādikam sahakāri sadbhāvaḥ eva kārya kārī iti ced na sahakāriṇam api nitya tvāt parameśvara icchā ādi āyatta tvāt ca na icchā ādi mātram saṃhāra ādi kāraṇam kintu sañjihīrṣā ādikam uta saṃhāra ādi viśeṣa viśiṣṭam tat eva 
NSu_1.2.6ab.6^2	 na ādyaḥ anabhyupagamāt tatas eva saṃhāra ādi siddha avicchā ādi kalpanā vaiyarthyāt ca sañjihīrṣā ādeḥ ca nitya anitya vikalpa anupapatteḥ na dvitīyaḥ sati saṃhāra ādau sañjihīrṣā ādikam tatas saṃhāra ādiḥ iti paraspara āśraya prasaṅgāt na ca sva rūpa satā saṃhāra ādinā icchā ādikam upadhīyate kintu viṣaya bhūtena iti ced saṃhāra ādi viṣaya tā kim āgantukī athavā nitya iti vaktavyam na ādyaḥ guṇeṣu āgantuka dharma utpatteḥ anabhyupagamāt dvitīye tu sarvadā saṃhāra ādi prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt śakti vyakti rūpa tā sarvathā anusaraṇīyā sā ca samā kriyāyām api iti 
NSu_1.2.6ab.7	 nanu pārameśvarī jñāna ādi lakṣaṇā saṃhāra ādi kriyā pareṇa api nitya iti aṅgīkṛtam parispanda lakṣaṇā tu na asti eva tasmāt vayarthaḥ ayam prayatnaḥ mā evam parispanda abhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt parama mahat parimāṇam asti iti ced na aṇu madhyama parimāṇābhyām sat pratipakṣa tvāt na ca te na staḥ parama mahat tve api tathā vaktum śakya tvāt aṇoḥ aṇīyān mahataḥ mahīyān iti dvayoḥ api śrauta tvāt aṇoḥ aṇīyaḥ tvam apratyakṣa tva upalakṣaṇam iti ced mahataḥ mahat tvam api parama pūjya tvam iti kim na syāt virodhāt ubhaya aṅgīkāraḥ na ucitaḥ iti ced tarhi prathama prāpta tvāt aṇu tvam eva grāhyam parihariṣyate ca ayam virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_1.2.6cd.1–1.2.6d.1	 śakti tā vyakti tā ca iti viśeṣaḥ api nanu kriyāyāḥ śakti vyakti rūpe parasparam bhinne abhinne vā ādye śaktiḥ eva nityā kriyā tu a nitya iti āpannam dvitīye tu anivṛttaḥ sadā vyavahāra ādi prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha śakti tā iti abhinne eva śakti vyaktī na ca ukta doṣaḥ yatas tatra śakti tā iti vyakti tā iti ca viśeṣaḥ api asti saca bheda kārya nirvāhakaḥ iti ca prāk eva uktam iti sa ca viśeṣaḥ parasparam viśeṣiṇā ca yadi bhinnaḥ tadā śakti vyaktayoḥ api kim bhedaḥ na syāt atha abhinnaḥ punar vyavahāra ādi sāṅkaryam iti atas āha viśeṣavān iti  viśeṣavān 
NSu_1.2.7a.1–1.2.7a.2	 abhinnaḥ api viśeṣaḥ iti anuvartate abhinnaḥ eva ayam viśeṣaḥ iti brūmaḥ na ca ukta anupapattiḥ yatas abhinnaḥ api viśeṣavān aṅgīkriyate sva nivarhakaḥ iti arthaḥ nanu evam anyatra api kriyāyāḥ nitya tvam aṅgīka tarvyam śakti vyakti svīkāreṇa sakala doṣa parihārāt iti ced aṅgīkriyatām yadi tat nitya tāyām pramāṇam asti sati nirbādhe pramāṇe tad viparīta vyavahāreṣu ca tat anyathā anupapattyā kalpanā eṣā bhavati na ca ghaṭa ādi kriyāyāḥ nitya tve nirbādham pramāṇam asti asti tu parameśvara ādi kriyāyāḥ nitya tve tat iti āha kriyā ādiḥ ca iti 
NSu_1.2.7ab.1–1.2.8d.1	 kriyā ādiḥ ca svabhāvaḥ iti hi śrutiḥ etena tṛtīyaḥ api nirastaḥ parā asya śaktiḥ vividhā eva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñāna bala kriyā ca a iti śrutim anena upalakṣayati svābhāvi kīuyāvat dravya bhāvinī atra spaṣṭām ca śrutim āha jñānam iti jñānam nityam kriyā nityāḥ balam śaktiḥ para ātmanaḥ iti paiṅgiśrutiḥ ca āha athavā pūrvā śrutiḥ śaktiḥ eva kriyā iti atra paṭhitā uttarā tu kriyāyāḥ nitya tve yat vā pūrvā svarūpa tve tasya vivāda āspada tvāt dvitīyā tu tad hetau nitya tvaḥ iti astu evam īśvara kriyā nityāḥ anya kriyā kim anitya eva iti atas vivekam pramāṇa antareṇa darśayati śakti iti  śakti sadbhāvaḥ eva tu kriyā ādi nitya tā jñeyā tad anyatra tu anitya tā 
NSu_1.2.9a.1–1.2.9a.3^1	 iti sat tattva vacanam sadbhāve nitya tve ādi padena jñāna ādi grahaṇam athavā nitya tā iti sthāyi tvam ucyate tatas ca jñāna kriyā ādi śaktiḥ yāvat kāla bhāvinī tāvat kāla bhāvi jñāna ādikam api iti uktam bhavati svarūpa sahakāri samavadhāna atiriktā śaktiḥ eva na asti iti kecid teṣām udāhṛta śruti ādi virodhaḥ na ca tad svarūpa mātram sambandhi tayā pratīteḥ na api sahakāri param svābhāvika tva ādi śravaṇāt kim ca asti tāvat ittham vyavahāraḥ sphoṭa ādi kāryam prati śaktimān api dahanaḥ deha saṃyoga ādi sahakāri virahāt na tat ajījanat iti tatra na tāvat śakti śabdena vahni svarūpa mātram ucyate matupaḥ vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt na api sahakāri samavadhānam tad abhāvasya ukta tvāt dahana tva sāmānyam eva śaktiḥ iti ced katham tarhi svarūpa sahakāri samavadhāna atiriktā na asti sāmānyam api saha kāri varga antargatam iti ced tat kim pratyakṣam apratyakṣam vā 
NSu_1.2.9a.3^2	 ādye dahana darśane sphoṭa janana śakti jijñāsā na syāt na dvitīyaḥ apasiddhānta āpātāt tathā abhyupagame vā sā eva śaktiḥ asmākam kiñca mṛd tantu ādi svarūpam pratyakṣa ādi siddham tasya ghaṭa ādi kāraṇa tvam tu anvavavyatireka samadhigamyam anvaya vyatireka grahaṇa upāyaḥ ca sāmānyam tat ca pratyakṣa ādi siddham iti pareṇa api svīkṛtam na ca kāraṇa tvam svarūpam sahakāri samavadhānam vā svarūpasya anvaya vyatireka anapekṣa adhigata tvāt kāraṇasya eva sahakāri samavadhāna anveṣaṇāt tatas atīndriyam eva kiñcid mṛdā ādīnām ghaṭa ādi kāraṇa tvam abhyupagamanīyam tat eva śaktiḥ iti śaktivādibhiḥ abhyupeyate iti āstām prapañcaḥ 
NSu_1.2.9a.4^1	 nanu ca kriyāyām kim pramāṇam pratyakṣa dravya vartinyām pratyakṣam eva iti brūmaḥ calati iti aparokṣa avabhāsa darśanāt indriya vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anusāri tvāt calati pratyayasya anyathā rūpa ādeḥ api apratyakṣatva āpātāt atha matam na karma pratyakṣam pratyakṣeṇa gacchati dravye vibhāga saṃyoga atirikta viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ yaḥ tu ayam gacchati iti pratyayaḥ sa saṃyoga vibhāga anumita kriyā ālambanaḥ anumāpaka saṃyoga vibhāga avagarma athar= ca indriya vyāpāraḥ iti tat ayuktam kriyā pratīteḥ anumiti tvam indriya vyāpārasya ca anyatra upakṣīṇa tvam apratyakṣatāyām pramāṇataḥ siddhāyām kalpyate anyathā vā na ādyaḥ pramāṇa abhāvāt 
NSu_1.2.9a.4^2	 yat uktam anupalabdheḥ iti tat asiddham vādya siddheḥ na hi aparokṣa avabhāsam aṅgīkurvāṇaḥ anupalabdheḥ iti etāvatā śakyaḥ bodhayitum ghaṭa ādau= api tathā prasaṅgāt vivāda padam karma apratyakṣam karma tvāt paramāṇu karma vat iti ced na paramāṇu karmaṇaḥ api asmābhiḥ yogi pratyakṣa ta aṅgīkārāt tad artham asmad ādi iti viśeṣaṇa upādāne parasya vaiyarthyam kiñca vivāda padam rūpam apratyakṣam rūpa tvāt paramāṇu rūpavat iti kim na syāt pratīti virodhāt na iti ced samam prakṛte api anumāna viruddhā kamarprati akṣatā pratītiḥ apramā iti ced rūpa pratyakṣa tā pratītiḥ api tathā astu pratīti viruddhe arthe anumānam eva na udeteti iti ced etat api tulyam 
NSu_1.2.9a.5	 atha brūṣe paramāṇu rūpasya apratyakṣatāyām āśrayā mahat tvam prayojakam iti tat na paramāṇoḥ api mahattvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt kim ca paramāṇu karma apratyakṣa tāyām api tat eva prayojakam kim na kalpyam yadi tarhi karma pratyakṣam ekasyām api karma vyaktau= utpannāyām calati iti pratyayaḥ syāt iti ced na saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ api tulya tvāt tathā ca na karma anumānam api syāt atha manyase senā vana ādi vat saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ pratyakṣa ta upapattiḥ iti tarhi karmaṇaḥ api tathā kim na syāt na dvitīyaḥ tantavaḥ na pratyakṣāḥ kintu paṭa kārya anumeyāḥ paṭa grahaṇaḥ eva ca indriya vyāpāra upayogaḥ iti api kalpanā prasaṅgāt 
NSu_1.2.9a.6^1	 api ca saṃyoga vibhāgau dvaya āśrayau= iti parasya matam asmākam api saṃyoga vibhāga dvayam dvaya āśrayam iti tābhyām ca anumīyamānam karma ubhayatra anumātavyam tathā ca śyenaḥ iva sthāṇau= api calati iti pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ atha ucyeta na kriyā sthāṇau= anumīyate kim nāma śyenaḥ eva nipatataḥ śyenasya pūrva deśa vibhāga utpattau utpatataḥ ca uttara deśa saṃyoga janane sthāṇu karmaṇaḥ kāraṇa tā yogāt śyene tu karmaṇi anumite tasya upapadyete deśa antara saṃyoga vibhāgau= iti tad anupapannam sthāṇu karmaṇā hi śyenasya deśa antara saṃyoga vibhāga utpatti anupapattau karma antaram eva tad anuguṇam śyene kalpanīyam syāt 
NSu_1.2.9a.6^2	 sthāṇu karma anumānasya tu kutas nivṛttiḥ yat gatam hi kāryam upalabhyate tad gatam kāraṇam api iti autsargikaḥ nyāyaḥ śyena karmaṇā eva kalpitena sarvasya upapattau na sthāṇu karma upayogaḥ iti ced na vikalpa anupapatteḥ tathā hi kim vyāpti pakṣa dharma tāvat api upayoge sati eva liṅgam anumāpakam iti etā= atī anumāna sāmagrī uta vyāpti pakṣa dharma tāvat tva mātram na ādyaḥ akārya kāraṇa anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt kiñca yaḥ yena nāvinā bhūtaḥ sa kvacid upalabhyamānaḥ anupayogāt tam na gamayati iti alaukikam dvitīye tu katham na sthāṇau karma anumānam anumitam api kalpanā gaurava bhayāt apanīyate iti ced pramāṇa siddhe arthe tad bhaya abhāvāt 
NSu_1.2.9a.7	 nanu īśvara anumāne api aneka īśvara kalpanā evam sati syāt na syāt vaiṣamyāt kāryatvam hi kṣiti ādīnām kartṛ tva mātram avagamayat tat ekatva aneka tvayoḥ udāsīnam eva tatas tad aneka tva śaṅkāyām kalpanā gaurava parāhatāyām eka tve paryavasyati iha tu saṃyoga vibhāga lakṣaṇena kāryeṇa sthāṇau= eva karmaṇi anumite katham kalpanā gauraveṇa tad apanayanam atha ucyeta 
NSu_1.2.9a.8^1	 anyathā api upapatteḥ na sthāṇau karma anumānam na ca ayam arthāpatti doṣaḥ na anumānasya iti vācyam anyathā api upapatti śaṅkāyām anumāne api vyāpti sandeha āpatteḥ iti tad anupapannam atra hi sthāṇau pratītau saṃyoga vibhāgau= akāraṇakau= eva syātām iti vā śaṅkanīyam śyena gatena eva karmaṇā bhavetām iti vā na ādyaḥ vyāhatāyāḥ śaṅkāyāḥ anutthānāt na dvitīyaḥ tad tad avayava gata parityāgena anya gatasya kāraṇa tāyāḥ kvāpi anupalabdha tvena nirmūlāyāḥ śaṅkāyāḥ anudayāt karma eva tathā vidham upalabdham iti ced na tasya idānīm kalpayamāna tvāt pratyakṣa karma vāde tu na ayam doṣaḥ pratipanna tatsvabhāva anusaraṇa sambhavāt kiñca saṃyoga ādinā kriyā anumāne yāvat sattvam calati pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ saṃyogena kriyā vināśāt na iti ced na 
NSu_1.2.9a.8^2	 kriyā nāśasya api apratyakṣa tāvāde duravabodha tvāt nahi kārya janma kāraṇa vināśena vyāptam yena saṃyoga utpattyā karma vināśaḥ anumīyeta paṭa utpattau= api tantu saṃyoga ādeḥ avināśāt na api saṃyoga jananam kvāpi karma vināśa avinābhūtam anubhūtam karma avasthāne sadā saṃyoga ādi udaya samāsattiḥ iti ced tat kim yāvat kāraṇam tāvat kārya antara jananam mā hi bhūt yāvat tantu saṃyoga sadbhāvam paṭa parampara utpādaḥ yāvat karma sadbhāvam saṃyoga utpādaḥ tu na niścitaḥ api ca apratyakṣe vyomni saṃyoga vibhāgau= api apratyakṣau= iti patati patatrī gaganaḥ iti pratyayaḥ na syāt viyati vitata āloka avayavini bahu vihaga vibhāga saṃyoga nibandhanaḥ asau pratyayaḥ iti ced tathā api dīpikā aloka gati pratīteḥ aśakya tva aparihārāt 
NSu_1.2.9a.9^1	 kim ca andhakāre nayana ādi spanda pratibhāsaḥ durghaṭaḥ syāt yadi ca mārtaṇḍa maṇḍalasya iva devadattasya api gatiḥ anumeyā syāt tadā ubhayatra api calati pratyayaḥ syāt na vā kutracid viśeṣa kāraṇa abhāvāt api ca kārma kāraṇāt eva saṃyoga vibhāga utpatti upapattau kim madhye karma kalpa nayā iti anavakptiḥ eva karmaṇaḥ na saṃyoga ādi utpattiḥ karma kāraṇāt sambhavati tasya saṃyoga viśeṣa ādeḥ sva āśraye tad samavete vā kārya ārambhaka tvasya anyatra niścita tvāt śarīra ātma saṃyogaḥ hi śarīra karma kāraṇam katham tasmāt śarīra ākāśa deśa saṃyoga vibhāgau bhavataḥ evam anyatra api draṣṭavyam iti 
NSu_1.2.9a.9^2	 mā evam tathā sati saṃyoga viśeṣa ādeḥ karma kāraṇa tvasya api abhāva prasaṅgāt na hi parasparam tantu saṃyogasya kriyā hetu tvam asti saṃyoga mātrasya tad abhāve api tad viśeṣasya syāt iti ced tarhi tathā eva paratra ārambhaka tvam api kutas na syāt kim ca evam sati karmaṇaḥ api katham āśraya āśrayi samaveta parityāgena anyatra saṃyoga ādi janaka tvam tasya tathāvidha kārya gamyasya tathā eva pramita tvāt iti ced karma kāraṇasya eva ayam avāntara bhedam āśritya svabhāvaḥ kalpyatām dharma kalpanāt khalu dharmi kalpanā garīyasī tasmāt pratyakṣa āśritam karma pratyakṣam eva iti sthitam 
NSu_1.2.9a.10–1.2.9a.12	 guhām praviṣyau= ātmānau hi tad darśanāt guhām praviṣṭau ātmānau hi tad darśanāt ṛtam pibantau= iti vākyam kim jīva īśvarau pratipādayati kiṃvā parameśvaram eva iti saṃśaye jīva īśvarau= iti tāvat prāptam kutas dvi vacanāt na ca ānanda maya adhikaraṇa nyāyeṇa parihāraḥ bādhaka abhāvāt karma phala bhoga anupapatteḥ ca jīveśvara pakṣe tu chatri nyāyena upacāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti evam prāpte paramātmānam ekam eva pratipādayati idam vākyam guhā nihita āliṅga tvāt brahma śabdena viśeṣaṇāt ca iti siddhāntitam tatra karma phala bhogaḥ bhagavatā bhāṣye pratipāditaḥ dvivacanasya tu na spaṣṭam parihāraḥ abhihitaḥ atas tad parihāra artham āha dvi tvam ca iti 
NSu_1.2.9b.1–1.2.9b.4	 dvi tvam ca ekasya yujyate etat uktam bhavati parameśvara mātra grahaṇe dvivacana anupapattim vadan pṛṣṭavyaḥ katham anupapattiḥ iti dvivacanam bheda abhidhāyi na ca paramātmani sva gata bhedaḥ yujyate iti ced na dvivacanasya bheda abhidhāyi tve anuśāsana abhāvāt atha dvi tva saṅkhayā dvivacana abhidheyāḥ sā ca paramātmani abhedena ekatva saṅkhayayā ca viruddhayate iti ced na abhedena ekatvavati eva ghaṭe dravya antara sahite dvi tva darśanāt atha dvi tvam dravya antara vidhurasya na yujyate virodhāt iti matam tatra idam upatiṣṭhate na kevalam saṃsāra dharma hīnasyar kama phala bhogaḥ yujyate kintu dvi tvam ca ekasya nirbhedasya eka tva ādhāra mātrasya ca yujyate katham iti apekṣāyām tad pradaśarnāya viśeṣaṇāt ca iti sūtram prakāra antareṇa vyācaṣṭe yaḥ setuḥ iti viśeṣaṇāt ca 
NSu_1.2.9cd.1–1.2.9cd.2	 yaḥ setuḥ iti ca eka tva vacanena viśeṣaṇāt dvi tvasya abheda eka tvābhyām na tāvat bhāva abhāva lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ tad bhāva abhāvāt na api vadhya dhātuka bhāvaḥ saha avasthāna prasaṅgāt tādātmya abhāvaḥ tu prakṛte na upayujyate atas saha anavasthānam eva vaktavyam tasya ca niyamena paraspara parihāreṇa apalambhaḥ bījam na ca asau= asti ṛtam pibantau a iti dvi vacana viṣaya tayā prakṛtayoḥ dvi tva ādhārayoḥyaḥ setuḥ a iti eka vacanena ca viśeṣaṇāt abheda eka tva ādhāra tā a= agamāt iti yāvat na ca atrekasya eva grahaṇam vyāvartaka abhāvāt iti etena edapi pratyuktam yat pareṇa buddhi jīvau= iti pūrva pakṣayitvā jīveśvarau= iti siddhāntitam a  tathā hi tat tu samanvayāt a iti paramātmani eva samanvayam pratijñātavatā sūtrakāreṇa saḥ eva vivaraṇa vākyaiḥ prapañcanīyaḥ jīveśvarayoḥ asya vākyasya samanvayam pratipādayan prakramam jahyāt 
NSu_1.2.9cd.3–1.2.9cd.6	 bādhake sati na ayam doṣaḥ iti ced na tad anirūpaṇāt dvi vacanam iti ced tarhi jīva īśvara aṅgīkāraḥ api na syāt tayoḥ aikya aṅgīkārāt kālpanikaḥ asti tayoḥ bhedaḥ iti ced tarhi īśvarasya eva adbhuta acintya aiśvarya vaśāt dvi rūpa tvena dvi tvam upapadyatām tathā ca prakrama anuguṇam sūtram syāt tattva avedakam ca śāstram iti nanu eka vacanena iti vaktavyam eka tva vacanena iti katham eka tva ādi saṅkhayāhi pratyaya arthaḥ yathā uktam dvayekayoḥ dvivacana eka vacane a iti dvi tva eka tvayoḥ iti arthaḥ anyathā dvayekeṣu iti syāt tasmāt ekatvasya vacanam eka tva vacanam iti eva yuktam anyatra api bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ pratipattavyaḥ iti antare upapatteḥ antare upapatteḥ atra kriyā bhāva rūpa liṅga samanvayaḥ cintyate iti uktam tat ayuktam sūtre bhāvasya eva pratijñānāt kriyayā anukteḥ iti atas antara śabdam ubhaya artha tayā vyākhyāti antar iti 
NSu_1.2.10.1–1.2.10.2	 antar sthitvā ramaṇa kṛt antaraḥ samudāhṛtaḥ ramaṇam ca ātma śabdena ādeyam mātī iti ca ucyate antar śabda upapadāt ramaterñam antāḍḍaḥ iti ḍaḥ uṇa ādayaḥ bahulam iti upapada lopaḥ vivakṣitam ca etat sūtra kārasya anyathāantaḥ tad dharma upadeśāt a iti vat antar upapatteḥ iti avakṣyat laghu ca evam sati sūtram syāt antaraḥ iti kurvat = imam eva artham pratijānītaḥ iti nanu cayaḥ eṣaḥ antarikṣaṇi puruṣaḥ dṛśyate eṣaḥ ātmā iti ha uvāca a iti etat atra udāharaṇa vākyam atra ca akṣi sthaḥ eva pratīyate na tasya ramaṇa kartṛ tvam śruti uktam eva sūtraiḥ pratijñātavyam tat katham śrutau= anuktam ramaṇa kartṛ tvam sūtra kṛtā pratijñāyate iti atas āha ramaṇam ca iti na kevalam akṣi stha tvam kintu ramaṇam ramaṇa kartṛ tvam ca iti ādyaḥ ca śabdaḥ na kevalam sūtre api tu śrutau ca iti dvitīyaḥ ātma śabdena eṣaḥ ātmā iti anena ādeyam upādeyam sukham sukha sādhanam ca mā ati anubhavati iti nirvacanena iti arthaḥ āṅpūrvakāt dadāteḥ manyateḥ ca kvip 
NSu_1.2.10.3–1.2.10.4	 sukha viśiṣṭa abhidhānāt eva ca cakṣuḥ antarasya parameśvara tva upapādakam aparam sūtram sukha viśiṣṭa abhidhānāt eva ca iti atra viśiṣṭa padam vyartham sukha abhidhānāt eva cā iti etāvatā pūrṇa tvāt sukha sambandha abhidhāna artham viśiṣṭa padam iti ced na sukhitva abhidhānāt eva ca iti kartum śakya tvāt laghu ca evam sati sūtram syāt ayuktam ca sukha sambandha abhidhānam prāṇaḥ brahma kam brahma a iti śrutau sukha mātra abhidhānāt iti ataḥ anyathā vyācaṣṭe viśiṣṭa iti 
NSu_1.2.11a.1–1.2.11a.3	 viśiṣṭa sukha vat tvāt ca na atra sukha viśiṣṭa śabdaḥ tadvat tām ācaṣṭe yena anupādeyaḥ syāt kintu sukhasya vaiśiṣyayam pūrṇa tā lakṣaṇam yadi hi sukha abhidhānāt iti eva brūyāt tadā sukhasya anyatra api sadbhāvena vyabhicāraḥ syāt tatas sārthakam viśeṣaṇa upādānam nanu katham atra vigrahaḥ sukhena viśiṣṭaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ iti katham tarhi viśiṣṭa sukha iti uktam artha kathana mātram etat iti adoṣaḥ sukhena śreṣṭhaḥ hi tadā syāt yadi tat sukham śreṣṭham bhavet iti arthāt vaiśiṣyayam sukha dharmaḥ bhavati athavā akaḍārāḥ karma dhāraye a iti viśeṣaṇasya para nipātam manyamānena viśiṣṭa sukha iti uktam katham tarhi matup prayogaḥ śrutau= anukta tvāt sva rūpeṇa api sukhena viśeṣa śaktayā tadvān bhavati iti jñāpayitum iti nanu evam vyākhyāne hetu sasiddhaḥ syāt sukha viśeṣaṇasya viśiṣṭa tvasya śrutau= anukta tvāt iti ced na mukhyā mukhyayoḥ mukhyasya eva grāhya tvāt uktā ca sukhasya viśiṣṭa tā śrutau= iti āha brahma tvam ca iti 
NSu_1.2.11b.1–1.2.11b.4	 brahma tvam ca viśiṣṭa tā sukha viśeṣaṇam viśiṣṭa tā ca brahma tvam brahma śabda arthaḥ kam brahma iti a brahma śabdena uktā iti yāvat brahma śabdaḥ hi pūrṇa tām āha tad viśeṣya ākāṅkṣāyām sannihita parityāge kāraṇa abhāvāt sukham eva sambaddhayate iti anavasthiteḥ asaṃbhavāt ca na itaraḥ cakṣuḥ antarasya īśvara tvam pratipādya akṣi ādityayoḥ agniḥ eva niyāmaka tayā atra ucyate iti yat pūrva pakṣiṇa uktam tat nirākartum sūtram anavasthiteḥ asambhavāt ca na itaraḥ iti 
NSu_1.2.11b.5	 tasya arthaḥ jīvasya agneḥ jīva antara niyāmaka tve tasya api niyāmaka antareṇa bhāvyam iti anavasthiteḥ ubhayoḥ jīva tu a sāmyena niyamya niyāmaka bhāvā sambhavāt ca na agni rakṣya āditya stha tayā atra ucyate iti etat ayuktam sva vyāghātāt asmābhiḥ api hi brahma ādi jīvānām mānuṣa ādi jīva niyāmaka tvam aṅgīkriyate tatra yadi para sya āna visthiti a sambhavau asmākam api kutas na bhavataḥ yathā ca na asmākam tathā na parasya api iti atas sūtram samyak vyākhyātum pīṭham āracayati anyonya iti
