NSu_1.2.11cd.1–1.2.11cd.3	 anyonya niyatiḥ ca īśa ni yame na anyathā bhavet caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe cetanānām iti vakṣyamāṇam atra api sambaddhayate cetanānām yaḥ anyonya niyatiḥ brahma ādīnām niyāmaka tā mānuṣa ādīnām tu niyamyatā sā īśa ni yame preraṇe sati eva upapannā bhavet anavasthiti asambhava abhāvāt preraka paramparā hi para nirapekṣe parameśvare viśrāmyati tat niyatyā ca itareṣām niyamya niyāmaka bhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati niyantuḥ īśvarasya abhāve anyonya niyatiḥ upapannā na bhavet anavasthiti asambhava parihāra upāya abhāvāt nanu brahma ādīnām niyāmaka tvam mānuṣa ādīnām niyamya tvam iti eṣa viśeṣaḥ teṣām svabhāvaḥ eva yat vakṣyati na cā adhikārikam iti mokṣe api anuvṛtteḥ ca ādhikāri maṇḍala stha ukteḥ iti vacanāt sva mate ca kā nāma parameśvara apekṣā iti atas āha cetanānām iti 
NSu_1.2.12ab.1–1.2.12ab.3	 cetanānām viśeṣaḥ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ api īśvara apirtaḥ cetanānām brahma ādīnām mānuṣa ādīnām ca yaḥ viśeṣaḥ niyamya niyāmaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ saḥ teṣām svabhāvaḥ eva na tat asti vinā yat syāt mayā bhūtam carācaram a iti vacanāt anyathā īśvarasya sarva aiśvaryam na syāt syāt ca pareṣām svātantṛyam aṅgīkṛtam ca paraiḥ ākāśe anādinaḥ api dravya tvasya guṇavat tva adhīna tvam advaitibhiḥ ca avidyā adhīna tvam jīva brahma vibhāgasya yaḥ hi īśvareṇa yasya sarvadā niyamyate sa tasya svabhāvaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ tu kadācid saḥ asvabhāvaḥ iti kim atas yadi evam sva vyāghātena vinā sūtra arthaḥ niṣpannaḥ iti āha anyonya iti 
NSu_1.2.12cd.1–1.2.12cd.2	 anyonya niyame tasmāt anavasthiti asambhavau yasmāt īśvara aṅgīkāre anyonya niyamaḥ yujyate na anyathā tasmāt īśvaram anaṅgīkṛtya pareṇa anyonya niyame aṅgīkriyamāṇe anavasthiti a sambhavau sūtra kṛta uktau yuktau= iti arthaḥ nanu anavasthiti asambhavayoḥ kaḥ bhedaḥ ubhayatra api pravṛtti anupapatti sāmyāt ucyate anavasthāyām hi prāk siddhamūla abhāvena pravṛtti nirodhaḥ asambhave tu samāna tayā vinigamya tvena iti bhedaḥ yathā pṛthivī sambandhāt gandha upalabdhiḥ payasi iti vadantam pratyucyate payaḥ sambandhāt pṛthivyām tad upalabdhiḥ iti kim na syāt vinigamaka abhāvāt iti tad anena anīśvara vādinam pratīdam doṣa abhidhānām iti uktam īśvaram aṅgīkṛtya akṣi āditya sthata yā atrā agniḥ ucyate iti vadataḥ kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha īśvaraḥ ced iti 
NSu_1.2.13a–1.2.13d.2	 īśvaraḥ ced niyantā ca saḥ eva prathama āgataḥ kim iti apodyate kasmāt vṛthā avasthiti kalpanā yadi īśvaraḥ sarva niyantā abhyupagataḥ syāt tadā saḥ eva prathama āgataḥ sākṣāt akṣi āditya stha tvena amṛta tva ādi pramāṇaiḥ pratītaḥ kasmāt parityajante kasyāt ca īśvarasya āditya ādīnām ca madhye vṛthā agneniḥ yāmaka tvena avasthiti kalpanā kriyate pūrva pakṣa prāpakāṇām bhāṣye nirasta tvāt iti īśvara parityāge madhye agni kalpane ca pramāṇam na asti iti uktam tatas kim iti atas āha doṣavatī iti 
NSu_1.2.13ef.1–1.2.13ef.3	 doṣavatī eva tasmāt sā na eva kāryā kathañcana doṣaḥ śruta hāniḥ aśruta kalpanā ca ādyena eva śabdena doṣa dvayasya aparihārya tvam āha tasmāt ubhayatra pramāṇa abhāvāt sā parameśvara parityāgena avasthiti kalpanā anena sūtrasya artha antaram uktam veditavyam madhye agneḥ avasthiti kalpaka abhāvāt prathama avagata īśvara parityāga asambhavāt ca na itaraḥ iti idam uktam bhavati akṣi āditya stha tayā atra pratipādyam agnim pratipādyamānam prati kim svatantram īśvaram anabhyupagamya etat ucyate uta abhyupagamya iti vikalpya pakṣa dvaye sūtrakāreṇa dūṣaṇam uktam iti 
NSu_1.2.13ef.4	 athavā prativādinam nirīśvaram niścitya sūtra kṛta anavasthiti asambhavau= uktau= iti pūrva grantha arthaḥ tat katham niścitam iti atas āha īśvaraḥ ced iti yadi sarva niyanteśvaraḥ prativādinā abhyupagataḥ syāt tadā saḥ eva prathama āgataḥ kim iti apodyeta kasmāt ca vṛthā avasthiti kalpanā kriyate kim tu nirnimitta tvāt sā na eva kāryā syāt na hi pūrva pakṣī sarvathā api aprekṣāvān tathā sati unmatta vat upekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt na hi pūrva pakṣī sarvathā api aprekṣāvān tathā sati unmatta vat upekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt kṛtā ca tena iyam sarvā kalpanā tena jānīmaḥ ayam nirīśvaraḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ sūtrakārasya iti 
NSu_1.2.13ef.5–1.2.13ef.7	 antaryāmya dhidaiva ādiṣu tad dharma vyapadeśāt antaryāmī adhidaiva adhiloka ādiṣu tad dharma vyapadeśāt nanu etat anantara atītena eva gata artham antar yāmi tvam hi antar sthitvā niyāmaka tvam etat eva antaraḥ upapatteḥ iti uktam na ca tatra niyāmaka tvam na vivakṣitam tathā satya nava sthiteḥ asambhavāt ca iti dūṣaṇasya ālagnaka tva prasaṅgāt iti ataḥ prameya bhedam darśayitum etad adhikaraṇa nivartanīyām āśaṅkām āha ramaṇam iti 
NSu_1.2.14ab.1–1.2.14ab.2	 ramaṇam na ati yatnasya vikṣepāt eva yujyate pūrva adhikaraṇe akṣi ādiṣu sthitvā ramamāṇaḥ tad prerakaḥ hariḥ iti uktam tat asat vyāhata tvāt āditya ādi niyamana artham ati yatnena hi bhāvyam prayatnasya vyāpāra anuguṇa tva darśanāt atiyatnavataḥ ca citta vikṣepaḥ niyataḥ na ca citta vikṣepavataḥ ramaṇam upapadyate atas niyāmakaḥ ca ratimān= ca iti vyāhatam na ca vyāhatam śatena api hetūnām siddhayati tat uktam bahu vyāpāra tāyāḥ ca kleśaḥ adhikataraḥ bhavet a iti ukta vyāpti pakṣa dharmatā avadhāraṇāya eva śabdaḥ etat parihāra tvena gūḍha abhisandhiḥ adhikaraṇa artham āha iti ced iti 
NSu_1.2.14cd.1–1.2.14cd.2	 iti ced sarva niyamaḥ yasya kasmāt na śakyate tatra idam uttaram iti śeṣaḥ yasya parameśvarasya sarva niyamaḥ sarva antaryāmi tvam asti tasya kasmāt na śakyate ramaṇam iti prakṛtam etām āśaṅkām parihartum sarva antaryāmi tvam iha hetutayā ucyate iti bhāvaḥ nanu etat piṇyāka yācana artham gatasya khārī taila dānam iva yat ādityādi niyāmakasya citta vikṣepa sambhavena ramaṇam na yujyate iti ukte sarva niyāmaka tvam uktam tatas hi atiśayena citta vikṣepāt ramaṇa anupapattiḥ iti atas abhiprāyam udghāṭayati sva ātmanā iti 
NSu_1.2.15.1–1.2.15.5	 sva ātmanā aniyatam vastu pratīpam hi ātmanaḥ bhavet svādhīna sattā śaktayā ādi katham ātma pratīpakam yat vastu sva ātmanā devadattena aniyatam devadatta anadhīna sattā pratīti pravṛttikam tat eva ātmanaḥ devadattasya pratīpam citta vikṣepakam bhavet iti hi dṛṣṭam idam tu jagat īśvara adhīna satta ādikam tat katham tasya citta vikṣepakam bhavet athavā yadi idam yaḥ tu viśvam sva ātmanā īśvareṇa aniyatam syāt tad adhīna satta ādikam na syāt tadā eva hi ātmanaḥ parameśvarasya pratīpam bhavet na ca evam iti yojyam na rāja ādi vat niyāmaka tva mātram antar yāmi tvam api tarhi sattā ādi pradatvam iti uktam bhavati adṛśya tva ādi guṇakaḥ dharma ukteḥ adṛśya tva ādi guṇakaḥ dharma ukteḥ atra yat tat adreśyam ityādi vākya uktānām adṛśya tva ādīnām dharmāṇām brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ pratipādyate teṣām ca ukta rītyā brahma svarūpa tvam abhyupagatam tad abhyadhikā śaṅkāyā akṣipati guṇa iti 
NSu_1.2.16.1–1.2.16.2	 guṇa kriyā ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ yat ivā syuḥ abhedinaḥ abhedaḥ abhāva dharmāṇām brahmaṇā yujyate katham ānanda ādayaḥ guṇāḥ saṃharaṇa ādi kriyāḥ sarva gata tva ādi bhāvāḥ anna maya ādi rūpāṇi puccha ādi avayavāḥ ca yadi abhedinaḥ aṅgīkṛtāḥ tadā tathā syuḥ vā teṣām bhāva tvana vakṣyamāṇa anupapatteḥ abhāvāt anupapatti antarāṇām ca parihṛta tvāt adṛśya tva ādīnām tu dharmāṇām brahmaṇā bhedaḥ na yujyate teṣām abhāva tvāt brahmaṇaḥ bhāva tvāt bhāva abhāvayoḥ aikyasya viruddha tvāt iti pariharati na abhāvaḥ iti 
NSu_1.2.17ab.1–1.2.17ab.2	 na abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ iti ca viśeṣaḥ prāyaśas bhavet iha hi dṛśyāt anyaḥ adṛśyaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ adṛśya tvam iti adṛśyaa ādi śabdaiḥ dṛśya ādi anyonya abhāvaḥ abhidhīyate aśvāt anyaḥ anaśvaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ anaśva tvam iti yathā na punar tad prāgabhāva ādiḥ asāmathyarena samāsāsambhavāt dṛśya ādi virodhi tvam arthaḥ astu iti ced na saha anavasthāna vadhya ghātaka bhāva bhāva abhāva alakṣaṇa virodhānām asambhavāt tādātmya virodhasya ca anyonya abhāva an atirekāt tathā ca abhāvaḥ anyonya abhāvaḥ iti bhāvaḥ iti ca etayoḥ loke api viśeṣaḥ bhedaḥ na bhavet evam sati brahmaṇi eva kā anupapattiḥ iti tad abhāvaḥ hi iti vakṣyamāṇa abhiprāyeṇa prāyaśas iti uktam athavā abhāvaḥ iti caturvidhe api abhāve prāpte anyonya abhāva parigrahaṇa artham prāyaśas iti uktam anyonya abhāvaḥ hi prāc abhāva ādibhyaḥ bahutaraḥ prativastu niyata tvāt nitya anādi sambandhinaḥ prāc abhāva ādeḥ abhāvāt 
NSu_1.2.17ab.3^1	 nanu prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāva atyanta abhāva bhinnaḥ saṃsarga abhāvaḥ kim dharmiṇaḥ bhinnaḥ uta abhinnaḥ na ādyaḥ brahma gatasya api bheda prasaṅgāt tathā caevam dharmān a ityādi śruti virodhāt na ca brahmaṇi na asau śrutaḥ iti vācyam agotram avarṇam ityādinā pratīta tvāt na vidyate gotra ādikam yasya tat hi tathā ucyate dvitīye kim anyonya abhāva nirdhāraṇena abhāvaḥ iti eva vaktavyam tathā ca aśeṣa śruti vyākhyānam bhavati iti atra brūmaḥ bhinnaḥ eva dharmiṇaḥ prāgabhāva ādiḥ dharmi vināśe api avināśāt yatra hi bhū tale ghaṭa abhāvaḥ tasya khanana ādinā vināśe api ghaṭa abhāvaḥ anuvartate eva dharmi tvam ca bhū tala ādeḥ prātītikam na vastu kṛtam 
NSu_1.2.17ab.3^2	 atas eva bhāva vat abhāvasya api tattva antara tvam abhidhāya bhāva abhāva svarūpa tvāt iti anyonya abhāvasya dharmi svarūpa tām āha nanu tarhi brahmaṇi api tathā tva prasaṅgaḥ satyam gotra ādi saṃsarga abhāvasya brahma atirikta abhyupagamāt yathā hi daṇḍaḥ devadattasya viśeṣaṇam tathā gotra ādi abhāvaḥ api brahmaṇaḥ viśeṣaṇam na ca śruti virodhaḥ daṇḍitva vat abhāvavat tvasya dharma tvena vivakṣita tvāt na ca ānanda ādau= api evam kalpanā ānandaḥ brahma a ityādi vacanāt bādhaka abhāvāt ca tasmāt anyonya abhāvaḥ eva anyatra dharmi svarūpam iti brahmaṇi api tathā abhyupagantavyaḥ gotra ādi abhāvavat tā tu bhāva rūpā eva iti na tasyāḥ brahma svarūpa tve kācid anupapattiḥ iti na iha vicāryate 
NSu_1.2.17ab.4–1.2.17cd.2	 yaḥ tu anyonya abhāvasya dharmi svarūpa tām kvāpi na manyate sa praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃnimittaḥ ayam anabhyupagamaḥ kim virodhāt uta pramāṇa abhāvāt atha bādhaka sadbhāvāt ādye katham anyonya abhāvasya dharmiṇā virodhaḥ iti vaktavyam vidhi niṣedha rūpa tvena iti ced tat eva katham nañaḥ prayoga aprayogābhyām iti ced tatra āha atadbhāvaḥ iti atadbhāvaḥ anya tā ca iti na viśeṣaḥ asti kaścana paṭasya hi aghaṭa tvam ghaṭāt anya tvam ca ekam eva aghaṭaḥ ghaṭāt anyaḥ iti anayoḥ viśeṣa apratīteḥ vidyete ca nañaḥ prayoga aprayogau iti atas vyabhicāraḥ iti arthaḥ sthala antare vyabhicāram darśayati doṣa abhāvaḥ iti 
NSu_1.2.18ab.1–1.2.18ab.2	 doṣa abhāvaḥ guṇaḥ iti prasiddhaḥ laukikeṣu api ārogyam guṇaḥ akrauryam guṇaḥ iti nañprayoga viṣayasya niṣedhasya roga ādi abhāvasya nañprayoga aviṣayaḥ vidhi rūpa tvam guṇa tvam laukika vaidikeṣu vyavahāreṣu prasiddham upalakṣaṇam ca etat anaudāryam doṣaḥ iti guṇa abhāvasya doṣa tvam api prasiddham atas vyabhicāraḥ iti arthaḥ anyonya abhāvasya dharmi svarūpa tva samarthanam na autprekṣikam kintu sūtra kṛtaḥ api abhimatam iti darśayitum sūtra kṛtā api ayam vyabhicāraḥ sūcitaḥ iti āha adṛśya tva ādikān iti 
NSu_1.2.18cd.1–1.2.18cd.3	 adṛśya tva ādikān= tasmāt guṇān āha svayam prabhuḥ yasmāt nañaḥ prayoga aprayogau nābheda virodhinau tasmāt tat eva sūcayitum adṛśya tva ādi guṇakaḥ iti adṛśya tva ādīnām nañvācyānām a tathābhūtānām guṇānām ca aikyam āha sūtrakāraḥ anyathā dṛśya tva ādi iti avakṣyat iti anena sa pratiyogi tva niṣpratiyogika tvābhyām virodhaḥ api parāstaḥ veditavyaḥ nanu evam bhāva abhāvayoḥ aikye bhāva abhāva lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ kvāpi na syāt asati ca tasmin virodha vārtā eva lupyeta bhāva abhāvayoḥ hi sākṣāt virodhaḥ tad dvārānyayoḥ iti ced kim aviśiṣṭayoḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ virodham aṅgīkṛtya tad abhāvaḥ āpādyate uta avacchinnayoḥ ādye tviṣi āpādanam iti āha bhāva iti 
NSu_1.2.19ab.1–1.2.19cd.2	 bhāva abhāva virodhaḥ api na tu sarvatra vidyate sarvatra iti anena aviśiṣṭa tvam dyotayati ghaṭavati paṭa abhāva t aśarnāt iti bhāvaḥ dvitīye tu āpādaka asiddhiḥ iti bhāvena tad svarūpam āha tad abhāvaḥ hi iti tad abhāvaḥ hi tad bhāva virodhī na tatas aparaḥ ubhayatra api anubhava prasiddhim hi śabdena dyotayati nanu etat sarvam tṛtīye antarbhavati satyam tathā api ulbaṇa tayā pṛthak dūṣitam iti adoṣaḥ astu tarhi anyonya abhāvasya dharmi svarūpa tve pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ mā evam bhedaḥ hi vastu svarūpam iti sarvaiḥ abhyupagantavyam anyathā anavasthā ādi doṣa prasaṅgāt abhāve svarūpa atiriktasya asambhavena bheda abhāva prasakteḥ ca anyonya abhāvaḥ ca bhedaḥ eva iti katham dharmi svarūpa tvam na syāt 
NSu_1.2.19cd.3	 atha matam bhedaḥ trividhaḥ asmābhiḥ abhyupagamyate pṛthaktavam anyonya abhāvaḥ svarūpam ca iti tatra dravye trividhaḥ api sambhavati guṇa ādi pañcake tu dvividhaḥ eva pṛthaktavasya guṇa tvena tatra asambhavāt abhāve tu svarūpa bhedaḥ eva tatra anyonya abhāva abhyupagame anavasthā prasaṅgāt atas anyonya abhāvasya bheda tve api bhedasya svarūpa tve api na anyonya abhāvasya dharmi svarūpa tvam sva rūpa bheda atirikta bheda tvāt anyonya abhāvasya iti atas āha pṛthaktava iti 
NSu_1.2.20.1–1.2.20.3	 pṛthaktava abhāva tad rūpān bhedān= trīn kalpayanti ced kalpanā gaurava ādyāḥ tu doṣāḥ tatra virodhinaḥ abhāvaḥ anyonya abhāvaḥ sa dharmī rūpam ātmā yasya asau tad rūpaḥ ādya grahaṇena dṛṣṭa hāniḥ adṛṣṭa kalpanā ca gṛhyate tatra tu tathā akalpane tu iti arthaḥ katham pṛthaktava anyonya abhāva svarūpa bhedānām bheda aṅgīkāre kalpanā gaurava ādikam iti atas āha pṛthaktava iti 
NSu_1.2.21.1–1.2.21.2	 pṛthak tava anyatva bhedāḥ tu paryāyeṇa eva laukikaiḥ vyavahriyante satatam vaidikaiḥ api sarvaśas anya tvam anyonya abhāvaḥ bhedaḥ svarūpa bhedaḥ ghaṭāt pṛthak ghaṭaḥ na bhavati paṭe eva iti pṛthaktavānyonya abhāva svarūpa bhedāḥ sarvaiḥ laukikaiḥ vaidikaiḥ ca paryāyeṇa eva krameṇa eva pṛthak vākyatayā vyavahriyante na jātu eka vākya niveśena 
NSu_1.2.21.3^1	 etat uktam bhavati yathā ghaṭa kalaśa kumbha vyavahārāṇām paryāya tvāt ekena eva nimittena upapattau ghaṭa tva ādi aneka nimitta kalpane kalpanā gauravam yathā ca ghaṭa ādi vyavahārān paryāyeṇa eva kurvāṇaiḥ tad nimittam ekatayā eva dṛṣṭam iti tad tritva aṅgīkāre dṛṣṭa hāniḥ adṛṣṭa kalpanā ca bhavati tathā pṛthak aa ādi vyavahārāṇām api paryāya tvāt ekena eva svarūpa bhedena upapattau nimitta traya kalpane kalpanā gauravam niyamena asahaprayoktṛbhiḥ pṛthaktava ādīnām aikyam dṛṣṭam iti tad parityāgena tri tva kalpanāyām dṛṣṭa hāniḥ adṛṣṭa kalpanā ca syāt iti avinā abhāvi tvāt na saha prayogaḥ iti ced mā bhūt ghaṭāt pṛthak iti uktavā ghaṭaḥ na bhavati iti prayogaḥ ghaṭaḥ na bhavati iti uktavā ghaṭāt pṛthak iti kasmāt na bhavet 
NSu_1.2.21.3^2	 pṛthaktave sati anyonya abhāva ādikam niyatam na tu anyonya abhāve pṛthaktavam iti pareṇa eva vyutpādita tvāt naca ayam asti niyamaḥ avinābhūtam saha na ucyate iti pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu manasām kriyāvat tva mūrta tva paratva aparatva vegavat tva ādīni iti tadīya granthaḥ eva vyavahāra darśanāt laukikāḥ prayojana mātra parāḥ anyatama vyavahāreṇa eva tad prayojana siddheḥ na saha vyavahāranti iti ced na vaidikaiḥ api evam eva vyavahārāt tat idam uktam vaidikaiḥ api iti kiñca paryāya prayogasya anyathātva kalpanam kvacid aparyāya prayoge sati syāt anyathā ghaṭa ādi vyavahāre api tathā aprasaṅgāt na ca etat asti tat katham anyathā kalpanam nirmūlam upapadyeta iti etat api uktam sarvaśas iti satatam iti ca 
NSu_1.2.21.4	 atha matam pṛthaktavānyonya abhāvayoḥ tāvat sphuṭaḥ vivekaḥ yat pṛthaktavam avadhi nirūpyam anyonya abhāvaḥ tu pratiyogi nirūpyaḥ kiṃca anya ārāditara rta a iti pṛthaktava vāci pada yoge pañcamī anuśiṣyate anyaḥ iti artha grahaṇam iti vacanāt anyathā bhinnaḥ ghaṭāt paṭaḥ artha antaram ghaṭāt paṭaḥ ityādau pañcamī na syāt anuśāsana antara abhāvāt tathā ca pṛthaktavam eva ced anyonya abhāvaḥ tadā ghaṭaḥ na bhavati paṭaḥ iti atra api pañcamī syāt naca evam tena jānīmaḥ anyat pṛthaktavam anyaḥ ca anyonya abhāvaḥ iti svarūpa bhedasya ca ābhyām ubhayābhyām vivekaḥ para nirūpya tva virahāt vidhi rūpa tvāt ca evaṃca vyavahāra paryāyatāni athā upapādanīyā iti 
NSu_1.2.21.5	 atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam nirūpaka bhedāt bhedaḥ iti tat asat avadhi pratiyoginoḥ eva bhedasya nirūpayitum aśakyatvāt pṛthaktava nirūpaka tvam avadhi tvam abhāva nirūpaka tvam pratiyogi tvam iti ced na pṛthaktavānyonya abhāva bhedasya adya api asiddha tvena itaretara āśraya tvāt pañcamī prayoga aprayogābhyām bhedaḥ ca anupapannaḥ anya śabda upapade pañcamī vidhānāt katham tarhi bhinna ādi yoge pañcamī iti ced vilakṣaṇaḥ yajñadattaḥ devadattāt iti atra katham na hi vailakṣaṇyam pṛthaktavam guṇa ādiṣu api sadbhāvāt atha kathañcid apādāna tvam tatra vyutpādayiṣyate iti ced bhinnaḥ iti ādau= api kim na vyutpādyate tathā sati anyaḥ iti atra api sāmyāt sūtra vaiyarthyam āpadyate iti ced na prapañca atha ṛtvena upapatteḥ 
NSu_1.2.21.6–1.2.21.7	 vilakṣaṇa yoge pañcamī vaktavyā iti ced viśiṣṭa vyāvṛtta ādi yoge api katham na viśiṣṭa ādikam pṛthaktavam iti ca svayam eva vyutpāditam sarvatra upasaṅkha yāne bhinna ādiṣu api tathā bhaviṣyati kim anyā iti atra artha grahaṇa vyākhyānena pṛthak vinānā nābhiḥ tṛtīyā anyatarasyām a iti vikalpa vidhāna sāmarthyāt idamāśrīyate iti ced na aprāpte api vikalpa vidhānasya bahulam upalambhāt 
NSu_1.2.21.8	 astu vā anyā iti artha grahaṇam tathā api pṛthaktava vāci pada yoge pañcamī vidhānasya vyākhyānāt ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ na bhavati iti atra tu vākya pratipādyam pṛthaktavam iti pañcamī na bhaviṣyati pratiyogi nirūpya tva anirūpya tvābhyām tu vivekaḥ sva rūpa bheda vādinā vaktum aśakyaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ vidhi rūpa tvam ca ukta nyāya parāhatam atas eva pṛthaktavānyonya abhāva vivecaka tvam api nirastam 
NSu_1.2.21.9–1.2.21.10	 kim ca anaśvaḥ iti kim anyonya abhāvaḥ nañarthaḥ kiṃvā pṛthaktavam ādye katham aśvāt anyaḥ iti vigraha vākye pañcamī na ca tatra pṛthaktavam anya śabda arthaḥ iti yuktam samāsa vigraha vākyayoḥ samāna artha tvāt dvitīye pṛthaktavasya api niṣedhatā iti alam pallavena santu kalpanā gaurava dṛṣṭa hānyadṛṣṭa kalpanāḥ tatas kim iti ced tat kim kalpanā gaurava ādikam dūṣaṇam eva na bhavati kiṃvā bhavati dūṣaṇam kintu doṣa unnāyaka tvena eva iti ādyam nirākaroti dṛṣṭā iti 
NSu_1.2.22.1–1.2.22.3	 dṛṣṭa hāniḥ adṛṣṭasya kalpanā iti eva dūṣaṇam yadā tad adhikaḥ doṣaḥ vidyate kaḥ nu vādinām iti śabdaḥ ādi arthe tena kalpanā gauravam saṅgṛhyate dūṣaṇam eva iti yojanāḥ kutas iti atas āha yadā iti yadā śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe tad adhikaḥ tad atiriktaḥ kim ākṣepe nu vitarke vādinām iti vaiparītya lakṣaṇayā parihāsaḥ aniṣya prasañjana artham vā etat uktam bhavati yadi dṛṣṭa hāni ādikam na dūṣaṇam tadā asiddhayā ādikam api kutas dūṣaṇam iti vaktavyam aṅga vaikalya hetu tvāt iti ced atha vikala aṅgam api kutas na sādhanam tathā satya ākāśa ādīnām anitya tā ādikam āpadyeta tat ca pramāṇa viruddham iti ced svīkṛtam tarhi dṛṣṭa hāna ādeḥ doṣa tvam 
NSu_1.2.22.4	 aṅga vikalasya api anumāna tve aprāmāṇikāni anekāni prasajyante iti ced tat idam adṛṣṭa kalpanam kalpanā gauravam ca vikala aṅgam ca sādhanam ca iti vyāhatam iti ced katham vyāhatam sakala aṅgasya eva sādhaka tva darśanāt vikala aṅgasya adarśanāt iti ced dṛṣṭa hāni ādikam eva etat atha mā bhūt asiddhayā ādikam dūṣaṇam iti brūyāt tadā vādi tvam eva na syāt dūṣya pakṣa abhāvāt tad abhāve sādhyasya api abhāvāt iti dvitīyasya api etat eva uttaram dṛṣṭa hāniḥ iti 
NSu_1.2.22.5–1.2.22.7	 atra etat eva dūṣaṇam na tu doṣa antara unnāyaka tvena iti yathā sthitaḥ eva sambandhaḥ tatra hetum āha yadā iti yadā dṛṣṭa hāni ādikam udbhāvyeta tadā tatas kim iti āśaṅkāyām tad adhikaḥ tat unneyaḥ doṣaḥ kaḥ nu vaktavyaḥ vidyate na kaḥ api yaḥ api ucyeta tasya api dṛṣṭa hāni ādi anatirekāt iti bhāvaḥ anyonya abhāvasya bhāva svabhāva tve dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ tad śabdānām saha prayogaḥ kadācid dṛṣṭe api vastuni tad adarśanam iti ādikam na syāt iti tṛtīyasya prāk uktam eva parihāram smārayati bhāva iti 
NSu_1.2.23.1–1.2.23.2	 bhāva abhāva svarūpāḥ tu viśeṣāḥ eva vastunaḥ abhinnāḥ eva saṅgrāhyā vyavahāra prasiddhaye bhāva grahaṇena attṛ tva ādiṣu api ayam parihāraḥ anusandheyaḥ iti daśaryati bhāva bhāva svarūpāḥ attṛ tva ādayaḥ adṛśya tva ādayaḥ ca yadi api para brahmaṇā abhinnāḥ eva tathā api dharma dharmyādi vyavahāra prasiddhaye vastunaḥ dharmiṇaḥ viśeṣāḥ eva saṅgrāhyāḥ na vastu tanmātram iti idam uktam bhavati attṛ tvā ādīnām adṛśya tva ādīnām ca brahma svarūpa tvam tāvat śruti ādi siddham asti ca dharma dharmyādi vyavahāraḥ api pramitaḥ na ca anyatarasya api bādha upapannāḥ tatas tat anyathā anupapattyā sa viśeṣa abhedaḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ viśeṣasya ca abhinne api bheda nimitta vyavahāra nirvāhaka tvam svarūpa grāhaka pramāṇena eva siddham iti 
NSu_1.2.23.3	 atra eke guṇa kriyā ādīnām dravyeṇa atyanta bhedam samavāyam ca aṅgīkṛtya vyavahārān upapādayantaḥ śrutīnām upāsana artha tvam anāgantuka artha tvam vā vadantaḥ viśeṣam na abhyupagacchanti apare tu bheda abhedābhyām vyavahāra nirvāham paśyantaḥ kevara bheda pratiṣedham ca śrutīnām artham bruvāṇāḥ na viśeṣam icchanti anye tu akhaṇḍam eva brahma abhyupagamya dharma dharmyādi vyavahārāḥ sarve api avidyā aropanimittāḥ iti manyamānā viśeṣam avajānate tatra bheda vādinā bheda abheda vādinā ca viśeṣam aṅgīkārayati yathā iti 
NSu_1.2.24.1–1.2.24.3	 yathā ekaḥ samavāyaḥ api bheda abhedau ca vastuni aṅgīkāryāḥ viśeṣeṇa sthāneṣu vyavahartṛbhiḥ sthāneṣu sva śāstra pradeśeṣu ekaḥ samavāyaḥ iti vastuni bheda abhedau= iti ca vyavahartṛbhiḥ yathā te samavāya bheda abhedāḥ viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantā uṅgī kāryāḥ tathā bhāva abhāva svarūpāḥ ca iti yojanāḥ etat uktam bhavati dharma dharmi bheda vādinā tāvat ekaḥ samavāyaḥ iti vyavahriyate tattvam bhāvena iti sūtrita tvāt tatra samavāyasya eka tvam kim tatas bhinnam uta tad svarūpam na ādyaḥ samavāye dravya guṇa ādeḥ a sambhavāt dvitīye tu katham saha prayogaḥ 
NSu_1.2.24.4	 ṣaṣṭhī vyavahāraḥ vā aupacārikaḥ iti ced na samavāya ekatva sādhana prayāsa vaiyarthya āpatteḥ tatas gati antara abhāvāt sa viśeṣa abhedaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ tathā ca kim brahmaṇi śrutīnām anya paratvam prakalpya bheda samavāya kalpanayā antatas api aṅgīkāryeṇa viśeṣeṇa eva sarvasya upapatteḥ samavāya pratiyogika bheda abhāvaḥ samavāyasya eka tvam iti ced tathā api samavāyasya iti ṣaṣṭhayarthasya pṛthak abhāvena tatra viśeṣasya aṅgī kārya tvāt yaḥ tu bheda vādī samavāye api ekatva saṅkhayām aṅgīkaroti tena api samavāyasya sambandhaḥ aṅgīkriyate na vā ādye kim saḥ eva samavāya antaram vā na prathamaḥ sambandhi atirikta sambandha abhāvena ekaḥ samavāyaḥ iti vyavahāra anupapatteḥ atas eva na tṛtīyaḥ sva nirvāhaka tve punar sa viśeṣa tvam eva aṅgīkaraṇīyam na dvitīyaḥ ekaḥ samavāyaḥ iti asya anupapatteḥ 
NSu_1.2.24.5–1.2.24.6	 kiñca vastuni samavāyaḥ iti katham na hi avayava avayavi ādīnām sambandhaḥ asti yatas ekaḥ samavāyaḥ sva nirvāhaka tve tu uktam api ca eka svabhāvaḥ eva samavāyaḥ sa katham avayava ādīn ādhāra tvena avayavi ādīn ādheya tvena niyacchet avayava ādīnām svabhāva bhedāt iti ced alam tarhi samavāyena atha samavāyasya eva vicitra svabhāva tvam tadā sa viśeṣa tvam eva iti bheda abheda vādinā tu avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ viśeṣaḥ paraspara viruddhayoḥ bheda abhedayoḥ ekatra tam antareṇa anupapatteḥ kiñca bheda abhedayoḥ api vastunā parasparam ca bheda abheda antara abhyupagame anavasthā sva nirvāhaka tve tu viśeṣa aṅgīkāraḥ bhede vastuni bheda abhedau= iti vyavahāra anupapattiḥ vastunā tayāḥ sambandha abhāvāt atyanta abhede api vastuni bheda abhedau= iti ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ dvivacanam ca anupapannam syāt vastu tanmātra tvāt tatas ca tat nirvāha artham avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīye viśeṣe tatas eva brahmaṇi sarvasya upapattau kim bheda abheda abhyupagamena iti yathā ca tantu paṭa ādau bheda abheda abhyupagamaḥ tat vakṣyāmaḥ akhaṇḍa vādinā api viśeṣam aṅgīkārayati akhaṇḍa iti 
NSu_1.2.25ab.1–1.2.25b–1.2.25d.2^1	 akhaṇḍa vādinaḥ a pi syāt viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkāryaḥ iti vacana vipariṇāmena sambaddhayate nanu akhaṇḍa vādinaḥ api viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkāryaḥ iti vyāhatam akhaṇḍa tvam nirviśeṣa tvam iti anartha antara tvāt iti atas uktam anicchataḥ api iti  anicchataḥ api asau vyāvṛtte nirviśeṣe tu kim vyāvartyabahutvataḥ sva abhyupagama mātreṇa akhaṇḍa vādi tve api nyāya prāpta tvāt viśeṣa aṅgīkaraṇam iti asau pūrva upapāditaḥ anena pūrva ukta artha smaraṇa artha tvāt asya na punarukti doṣaḥ iti sūcitam yat vā yasmin= anaṅgīkṛte satya jñāna ādi padānām paryāya vyarthate syātām satya tva ādīnām brahma tanmātra tva aṅgīkārāt aṅgīkṛte ca tad nivṛttiḥ tasya aparyāya śabda pravṛtta avabhinne api nimitta tvāt asau iti aṅgī kāryatva hetu sūcanam nanu brahma atirikte satya jñāna ānanda ādau vācaka tva śaktimatām satya ādi padānām lakṣyam eva brahma abhyupagamyate tat katham paryāyatā vācya artha bheda sadbhāvāt mā evam satya jñāna ananta ānanda ādīnām brahma atiriktānām pareṇa anaṅgīkṛta tvāt 
NSu_1.2.25b–1.2.25d.2^2	 asti kathañcid sati ādikam anyat iti ced na kathañcid satyādikam vācyam sākṣāt satya ādikam tu lakṣyam iti vaiparītyasya anucita tvāt astu vā kathañcid paryāyatā parihāraḥ tathā api ekena padena lakṣitasya eva anyena api lakṣaṇāyām vyathartā na parihartum śakyāḥ nanu ca lakṣya artha bheda abhāve api brahmaṇi āropita asatya tva ādi dharmāṇām vyāvartyānām bahula tvāt tad vayāvartaka tvena sārthakyam padānām iti atas āha vyāvṛttaḥ iti vyākhyāta caram idam tat evam viśeṣasya sarva vādibhiḥ aṅgīkāya ṛtvāt tad balena dharma dharmyādi vyavahāra upapatteḥ yuktam adṛśya tva ādi guṇānām brahmaṇā aikyam iti siddham 
NSu_1.2.25b–1.2.25d.5	 vaiśvānaraḥ sādhāraṇa śabda viśeṣāt vaiśvānaraḥ sādhāraṇa śabda viśeṣāt asya adhikaraṇasya na atra antarbhāvaḥ sambhavati nāma ātmaka śabda samanvaya artha tvāt na api pūrvatra liṅga samanvayasya api atra siddha tvāt na ca ubhaya bahis bhāvaḥ anyatra prasiddha śabda viṣaya tvāt na ca avaktavya tā samanvaya asiddhi prasaṅgāt tat katham iti atas liṅga adhika iti atra antarbhāvaḥ samarthitaḥ yat vā pāda dvaya artha tvena ekatra praveśa anupapatteḥ pāda dvaya śeṣaḥ ayam atas eva pada dvaya ante nibandhanam iti jñāpayitum pāda dvaya artham tāvat upasaṃharati bahu liṅga iti 
NSu_1.2.26.1–1.2.27ab.3	 bahu liṅga samāyuktaiḥ bahubhiḥ rūḍha nāmabhiḥ prasiddhaiḥ anya ga tvena vācyaḥ sākṣāt janārdanaḥ vaiśvānara ādayaḥ śabdāḥ api tad vācinaḥ tatas rūḍha iti asya eva vivaraṇam prasiddhaiḥ anyaga tvena iti anyathā yaugika nāma parityāgaḥ syāt etat ca liṅgānām api viśeṣaṇam sākṣāt mukhyayā vṛttyā idānīm vaiśvānara adhikaraṇa tātparyam āha vaiśvānara ādayaḥ iti ādi śabda prayogāt vaiśvānara śabdasya upalakṣaṇa tvam iti darśayati tatas iti sautra ātma śabda ādikam parāmṛśati tad vācinaḥ parameśvara vācinaḥ nanu katham vaiśvānarasya viṣṇu tva nirdhāraḥ pakṣa antare api agni ādi śabdānām homa adhikaraṇa tva ādi liṅgānām ca śravaṇāt ityataḥ āha tāni iti 
NSu_1.2.27cd.1–1.2.27ef.3	 tāni liṅgāni te śabdāḥ api tad gāḥ hi sarvaśas tad gāḥ parameśvara viṣayāḥ hi iti tathā dṛṣṭayupadeśam hetum ācaṣṭe yasmāt evam tasmāt iti pūrveṇa vā sambandhaḥ anena śabda ādibhyaḥ iti sūtrasya tātparyam uktam veditavyam nanu katham agni ādi śabdānām viṣṇu paratvam anyatra rūḍha tvāt na ca viṣṇau= api rūḍhiḥ asti iti vācyam bahu tvena anyatra rūḍheḥ prabala tvena alpa parameśvara rūḍhi bādhaka tva upapatteḥ iti atas āha bahulā api iti bahulāpyajña rūḍhiḥ tad prajñā ārūḍhim na bādhate tat tasmāt ajña prājña rūḍhi tvāt eva ānanda maya adhikaraṇa ante vyutpādita nyāyāt iti vā iti bhinna vākya tva ādi siddhaye tṛtīya pāda pratipādyam artham darśayati tatra iti 
NSu_1.3.1.1–1.3.1.2^1	 tatra anyatra ca siddhānām liṅganāmnām punar hariḥ viśeṣāt mukhyatas vṛttim svasmin= eva atra vaktaya jaḥ hariḥ sūtrakāraḥ atra pāde liṅgānām nāmnām ca svasmin vṛttim vakti nanu pūrveṇa pāda dvayena uktā sā iti atas uktam punar iti nanu tarhi vaiyarthyam iti atas uktam tatra harau anyatra ca tasmāt prasiddhānām iti pūrvatra tu anyatra prasiddhānām iti uktam eva parameśvare prasiddhāni ced liṅga nāmāni kim samanvaya pratipādanena siddha tvāt iti atas uktam svasmin= eva iti anya yoga vyavacchedaḥ prayojanam iti bhāvaḥ tat kim anyatra śabda vṛttiḥ eva na asti na na asti kintu mukhyatas parameśvare anyatra tu amukhyā iti uktam mukhyatas iti 
NSu_1.3.1.2^2	 evam sati anyatra lakṣaṇa ādikam eva prāptam iti atas uktam viśeṣāt iti parama mukhyā vṛttiḥ īśvare anyatra mukhya ādi iti etat uktam bhavati ye śabdāḥ loka dṛṣṭayā anyatra śaktimantaḥ teṣām veda vākyeṣu anya paratve prāpte śakti tātparyābhyām bhagavat eka niṣṭha tvam pāda dvayena pratipāditam atra tu ubhayatra śaktimat tayā loka prasiddhānām anyatra tātparye prāpte bhagavati eva śakti tātparye pratipādyete iti yadi api prādhānya krama anurodhena nāma liṅgānām iti vaktavyam tathā api uttara pratipādana anusāreṇa liṅga nāmnām iti abhihitam 
NSu_1.3.1.3–1.3.1.7	 dyubhva ādi āyatanam sva śabdāt dyubhva ādi āyatanam sva śabdāt atrayasmin dyauḥ a iti adi vākya pratipādyam dyubhva ādi āyatanam viṣṇuḥ eva iti pratipādya pūrva pakṣiṇā śaṅkitānām rudra ādīnām nirākaraṇa artham sūtritam na anumāna m atad śabdāt prāṇabhṛt ca iti tatra atad śabdāt iti tad śabda abhāvāt iti vyākhyātam bhāṣye tat ayuktam iva ābhāti asāmarthyena samāsa anupapatteḥ tatra chandaḥ vat sūtrāṇi bhavanti a iti vā akartari ca kārake a iti jñāpakāt asāmarthye api kvacid samāsaḥ bhavati iti vā aartha abhāve yat avyayam a iti avyayībhāvaḥ vā iti samādhānam avadhātavyam athavā tebhyaḥ śiva ādibhyaḥ anyat atat brahma tasya śabdaḥ atad śabdaḥ tasmāt iti vyākhyānam iti āśayavān āha viṣṇau= eva iti na anumānam atad śabdāt 
NSu_1.3.2a–1.3.2c.2	 viṣṇau= eva ātma śabdasya rūḍha tvāt na śiva ādikān śrutiḥ vakti rūḍha tvāt prasiddha tvāt iti arthaḥ na tu rūḍhi vṛttyā upeta tvāt iti mahā rūḍhi yogābhyām tasya tatra pravṛtteḥ tasya ca atra śravaṇāt iti śeṣaḥ śrutiḥyasmin dyauḥ a iti ādikāḥ athavā anyatra api siddhānta sādhakasya eva pūrva pakṣa nirāse api hetu tvam draṣṭavyam tena na nyūna tā doṣaḥ iti etat pradarśayitum siddhānta sādhakasya eva pūrva pakṣa nirāse api vyāpāram darśayitum idam sūtra dvayam iti anena ucyate nanu tarhi tad śabdāt iti eva astu tat iti ca brahma parāmarśaḥ vyākhyāsyate mā evam aneka artha tve tad śabdaḥ anya arthaḥ api sambhavati atas tasya eva śabdāt iti vaktavyam tad artham atad śabdāt iti prayuktam atas eva āha viṣṇau= eva iti 
NSu_1.3.2a–1.3.2c.5	 bhūmā samprasādāt abhyupadeśāt idam kaścid vaya ākhyāti bhūmā paramātmā kutas samprasīdati atra iti samprasādaḥ suptiḥ tatra jāgrat prāṇaḥ samprasāda śabdena lakṣyate tasmāt ūrdhvam upadeśāt iti aparaḥ āhasamprasādaḥ jīvātmā tasmāt ūrdhvam upadeśāt iti tat ubhayam api asat prasiddha prāṇa ādi pada parityāgena aprasiddha samprasāda pada upādāne kāraṇa abhāvāt atas adhyupadeśāt iti eva hetuḥ nanu katham tasya paramātma tva sādhaka tā anyatra api sambhavāt iti ataḥ vyākhyāti akhila īśa tvāt iti bhūmā saṃprasādāt adhyupadeśāt 
NSu_1.3.2cd.1–1.3.2cd.2	 akhila īśa tvāt bhūmāḥ viṣṇuḥ sukha adhikaḥ adhiśabdaḥ hi īśvara vācī tathā ca viśeṣa anukteḥ akhila īśa tvam eva uktam bhavati na ca etat asiddham nāma vāga ādīnām pūrva pūrva ādhipatyasya ukta tvāt iti nanu tarhi samprasādāt iti etat anākāṅkṣita tvāt vyartham āpannam iti ced na hetu antara abhidhāyaka tvāt iti āśayena vyācaṣṭe sukha adhikaḥ iti prasīdati anena iti prasādaḥ sukham samyak prasādaḥ samprasādaḥ guṇa guṇi bhāva abhyupagamena sukha adhikaḥ iti tātparyārthaḥ abhihitaḥ yatas tasmāt iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_1.3.2cd.3–1.3.2cd.6	 akṣaram ambara anta dhṛteḥ akṣaram ambara anta dhṛteḥ etat vai tat akṣaram gārgī a iti atra uktam akṣaram brahma eva iti uktam atra sūtram  anya bhāva vyāvṛtteḥ ca iti tat idam akṣarasya brahmatva upapādanāya hetu antara abhidhāyaka tayā vyākhyātam bhāṣye ākṣepa nivartaka tayā api atas viruddha vat ityādinā vyākhyāyate tathā hi na idam akṣaram brahma asthūlam anaṇva hrasvam adīrgham alohitam acchāyam atamaḥ avāyu anākāśam asaṅgamara samavāgamanaḥ acakṣuṣkamaprāṇam asukham amātram anantaram abāhyam na tat aśnāti kiñcana a iti akṣarasya asthūla tva ādi śravaṇāt naca etat brahmaṇaḥ sambhavati asthūla tva ādi padaiḥ hi sthūla tva ādi viparītam aṇu tva ādi abhidhānam vā syāt sthūla tva ādi nivṛtti mātra paryavasānam vā 
NSu_1.3.2cd.7–1.3.2cd.9	 ādye paraspara virodhaḥ asthūlam iti anena hi aṇu parimāṇam vaktavyam anaṇu iti anena ca mahat tvam na ca ubhayam ekatra yujyate paraspara parihāreṇa eva vṛtti darśanāt evam ahra svam adīrgham iti atra api virodhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ naca eka parimāṇa upetam eva utkṛṣṭa apekṣayā aṇu mahat dīrgham hrasvam ca iti ucyate iti āśrayaṇena virodha parihāraḥ ghaṭa ādi tulya tvena avaktavya tvāt utkṛṣṭa apakṛṣṭa parimāṇa dravya antara abhāvāt ca dvitīye tu niḥsvabhāvam brahma iti āpannam tathā casarvatra prasiddha upadeśāt attā carācara grahaṇāt rūpa upanyāsāt ca a iti ukta virodhaḥ syāt iti tatra tāvat prathama pakṣam abhyupetya caśabda sūcitam parihāram āha atas iti anya bhāva vyāvṛtteḥ ca 
NSu_1.3.3.1–1.3.4a.2	 atas viruddha vat bhātam api vyākhyāya tattvataḥ yojanīyam harau vākyam viruddhaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ yutam brahma eva yatas brahma viruddhaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ yutam eva atas viruddhavatuukta ubhayavidha viruddha artha pratipādakam iva bhātaṃ upratītam api vākyam tattvataḥ vyākhyāya harau yojanīyam yojayitum śakyam iti yojanā yatas ambara anta dhṛtyādinā akṣarasya viṣṇu tvam niścitam atas viruddha vat bhātam api vākyam tattvataḥ vyākhyāya harau yojayitavyam iti vā katham tattvataḥ vyākhyānam iti apekṣāyām viruddhaiḥ iti sambaddhayate athavā atas iti asya pūrvatra sambandhaḥ yatas sukha adhikaḥ atas bhūmāḥ viṣṇuḥ atas bhūma iti viruddha vat iti pratijñāyām viruddhaiḥ iti hetu tayā sambaddhayate 
NSu_1.3.4a.3–1.3.4a.4	 etat uktam bhavati na akṣarasya brahma tve asthūlam iti adivākyasya anavakāśaḥ asthūla ādi padaiḥ tad viparīta aṇu tva ādi abhidhānam iti vyākhyānasya aṅgīkārāt na ca evam sati paraspara virodhaḥ iti vācyam viruddha dharmāṇām brahmaṇi avasthānasya śruti ādi siddha tvāt iti viruddhaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ yutam brahma iti uktam me mātā vandhyā itiva dvaya āhata tvāt yadi hi mahattva aṇu tva ādīni viruddhāni katham tarhi taiḥ yutam ekam syāt virodhasya saha anavasthāna ātmaka tvāt yadi ca ekam taiḥ yutam katham tarhi tāni viruddhāni syuḥ saha avasthānasya avirodha rūpa tvāt iti āśaṅkayā uktam vivṛṇoti tāni iti 
NSu_1.3.4.1–1.3.4.2	 tāni liṅgāni tat anyatra tvasanti api avirodhena govinde santi asthūla ādikāni ca viruddhaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ yuktam brahma iti anena etat asmābhiḥ abhipretam tāni asthūla ādikāni aṇu tva mahat tva ādikāni liṅgāni tasmāt brahmaṇaḥ a nyatra sahāsanti api govinde avirodhena eva saha eva iti yāvat santi iti na punar virodham abhyupetya ekatra avasthānam ucyate yena vyāghātaḥ syāt iti avadhāraṇa arthasya caśabdasya atharḥ govindaḥ iti anena yaśodādi pratyakṣam api atra arthe pramāṇam iti sūcayati ayam abhisandhiḥ aṇu tva mahat tva ādikam brahmaṇi kim pramāṇa abhāvāt na abhyupeyam kiṃvā viruddha tvāt na ādyaḥ aṇoḥ aṇīyān a iti ādya āgamasya ubhaya kārya darśana anumānasya udāhṛta pratyakṣasya ca tatra pramāṇa tvāt dvitīye api kim virodhaḥ pramāṇena atha parasparam na prathamaḥ viparīta pramāṇa adarśanāt dravya tva ādeḥ tu ukta pramāṇa viruddha tvena kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvāt 
NSu_1.3.4.3	 kiñca ākāśasya paramāṇu saṃyogaḥ kim ākāśa eka deśe vartate uta ākāśaḥ eva ādye kim eka deśaḥ nāma avayavaḥ pradeśa bhedaḥ vā na ādyaḥ anabhyupagamāt dvitīye kim asau= ākāśa svarūpam eva atha artha antaram ādyaḥ antye antarbhavati dvitīyaḥ api abhyupagama viruddhaḥ aupādhika aṅgīkāre tu ātma āśraya ādikam na dvitīyaḥ bherī saṃyogasya api tathā tva āpatteḥ tathā ca sarvatra śabda upalabdhi prasaṅgāt atas paramāṇu saṃyoga artham ākāśaḥ aṇuḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ iti vyabhicāraḥ ca na dvitīyaḥ paraspara virodhāt anyatra sarvatra sa hi sarvatra saha anavasthāna darśanāt vā kalpanīyaḥ uta kvacid kim vā vimati padāt anyatra sarvatra na ādyaḥ brahmaṇi śruti ādinā saha avasthānasya darśanāt na dvitīyaḥ ākāśa manasoḥ paraspara parihāreṇa vartamānayoḥ api bhūta tva mūrta tvayoḥ virodha abhāvāt anyathā pṛthivī ādau tat ubhayam na syāt na tṛtīyaḥ nitya tva jñāna tvayoḥ aśarīra tva kartṛ tvayoḥ ca anyatra sarvatra saha anavasthitayoḥ īśvara buddhau= īśvare ca samāveśa abhāva prasaṅgāt 
NSu_1.3.4.4–1.3.4.5	 kiñca saṃyoga ādīnām pradeśa vṛtti tvam aṅgīkurvatā na tāvat pradeśa vṛtti tvam avayava vṛtti tvam aṅgīkartum ucitam ākāśa ādīnām tad abhāvāt anya dharmasya anya vṛtti tva abhyupagame ati prasaṅgāt ca kintu svātyanta abhāva samāna adhikaraṇa tvam eva vaktavyam tathā ca bhāva abhāvayoḥ anyatra sarvatra saha anavasthitam katham virodhaḥ na bhavet darśanāt iti ced samam prakṛte api tasmāt anyatra sarvatra saha anavasthitam katham nāma saha avatiṣṭhate iti evam praśna mātram avaśiṣyate tatra vastu svabhāvaḥ eva tādṛśaḥ iti parihāraḥ na ca evam atiprasaṅgaḥ pramāṇa bhāva abhāvābhyām tat vyudāsāt evam sati vākya vyavasthā na kvāpi āśrayaṇīyā iti ced na pramāṇa svarūpa avadhāraṇe tu evam etat iti aṅgīkārāt atas eva na mīmāṃsā vaiyarthyam iti evam tāvat asthūla ādi padānām aṇu tva ādi abhidhāyaka tva pakṣam upādāya śruteḥ brahma viṣaya tvam upapāditam idānīm sthūla tva ādi nivṛtti paratve api na dāṣaḥ iti evaṃpara tayā sūtram vyācaṣṭe anyā iti 
NSu_1.3.5.1–1.3.5.2	 anya vastu svabhāvānām sthaulya ādīnām apākṛtim nārāyaṇe śrutiḥ vakti na tu tasya asvabhāva tām brahmaṇaḥ anyāni vastūni ghaṭa ādīni tad svabhāva bhūtāni yāni sthaulya ādīni jaḍāni paratantrāṇi kāryāṇi vināśavanti aṇu tva ādibhiḥ saha anavasthitāni ca tathāvidhānām sthaulya ādīnām abhāvam nārāyaṇea sthūlam anaṇuḥa iti ādi śrutiḥ vakti na tu tasya niḥsvabhāva tvam yena ukta virodhaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ kutas evam śruteḥ artha saṅkocaḥ kriyate niḥsvabhāva tvam eva arthaḥ kim na syāt iti atas āha sarva dharmā iti 
NSu_1.3.6.1–1.3.6.3	 sarva dharmā sarva nāmā sarva karmā guṇāḥ śrutāḥ doṣāḥ śrutāḥ ca na ityādyā pramāṇam śrutiḥ atra ca atra parameśvarasya sa svabhāva tve na kevalam atra kim nāma pūrva ukta aṇu tva mahāt tu ādau ca iti arthaḥ iha ācchāyamatamaḥ iti ādeḥ a saṅkucita vṛtti tvam eva jñeyam bahu pada viṣaṭa tvāt idam vyākhyānam sva śabdena vidhāya sūtrakāraḥ katipaya pada viṣayam pūrva vyākhyānam caśabdena samuccitavān iti atas parāṇi sūtrāṇi bhāṣyaḥ eva spaṣṭa arthāni iti na tatra vaktavyam asti parama ākhya vidyā vyākhyām karomi iti ca pratijñātam tad ubhaya siddhayartham etat pāda adhikaraṇa viṣaya pūrva pakṣa siddhānta nyāyān saṅgraheṇa darśayati liṅgam iti 
NSu_1.3.7.1–1.3.9.1	 liṅgam sādhāraṇam śabdau sthānam liṅgam anugrahaḥ punar śabdāḥ liṅga śabdau vicāryāḥ dvi sthitāḥ iha bāhulyam liṅga śabdānām anuktiḥ ca viruddha tā adṛṣṭiḥ anvaya abhāvaḥ viparīta śruti bhramaḥ liṅga avakāśarāhiti a bhramaḥ tādṛś dvayam tathā bahu tādṛś tavam uktasya virodhaḥ arthāt tathā gatiḥ samastam etat iti atra pūrva pakṣeṣu yuktayaḥ 
NSu_1.3.10.1–1.3.12.1	 te eva balavantaḥ tu gati antara vivarjitāḥ siddhānta yuktayaḥ jñeyāḥ dṛśyante tāḥ ca sarvaśas etat ca nyāya vivaraṇe svayam eva ācāryeṇa vyākhyātam iti tatra eva avagantavyam sūtra sūcitān siddhānta nyāyān abhidhāya sākṣāt uktān api āha muktā iti mukta upasṛpyatā prāṇāt ādhikyam sarvatas tathā vailakṣaṇyam svabhāvasya prekṣā pūrva kriyā tathā arasya ṇyasya ca īśa tvam sūrya ādi anukṛtiḥ tathā vāmana ākhyā sarva kampaḥ tad śabda an anya siddha tā 
NSu_1.3.13.1–1.3.13.2	 anāma rūpa tā bhedasya upajīvya pramāṇa tā sarva aiśvarya ādika ādyāḥ tāḥ veda īśena pradarśitāḥ atas eva pūrvam dṛśyante iti uktvā atra pradarśitāḥ iti uktam sarvatas tathā iti etat pūrveṇa uttareṇa ca sambaddhayate prāṇāt ādhikyam tathā sarvatas ādhikyam iti svabhāvasya sarvatas vailakṣaṇyam tathā ambara anta dhṛtyādi iti prekṣā pūrva kriyā tathā iti tathāśabdaḥ uttaratra sambadhyate tena apahata pāpma tva ādīnām grahaṇam sūrya ādi anukṛtiḥ tathā sarva prakāśaka tvam tad śabda an anya siddha tā iti jyotiḥ śabdasya anyatra asambhavaḥ iti arthaḥ upajīvyam pramāṇam yasya asau tathā uktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ upajīvya pramāṇa tā tāḥ iti siddhānta yuktayaḥ 
NSu_1.3.13.3	 nanu atra pāde caturdaśa adhikaraṇāni bhāṣyāt avagamyante viṣayāḥ pūrva pakṣa nyāyāḥ siddhānta nyāyāḥ ca atra dvādaśa eva uktāḥ na ca viṣaya ādinā vinā adhikaraṇam sambhavati tat katham etat iti ced ittham tad upari api bādarāyaṇaḥ sambhavāt aśugasya tad anādara śravaṇāt tadā dravaṇāt su ucyate hi a iti etat adhikaraṇa dvayam na samanvaya samarthana artham kim nāma deva ādīnām veda vidyā adhikāra samarthanā artham ādyam dvitīyam tu traivarṇika vyatiriktānām tad abhāva samartha nātharmiti etat jñāpayitum etat adhikaraṇa dvaya viṣaya viṣaya ādi anuktiḥ anyathā tatra api samanvaya sambandha anveṣaṇena śiṣyāṇām vṛthā prayāsaḥ prasajyeta 
NSu_1.3.13.4	 nanu etat dvayam atra na vicāraṇīyam asaṅgata tvāt tathā hi saṅgatiḥ tāvat dvividhā bhavati antar bhāva lakṣaṇā anantarya lakṣaṇā ca tatra ādyā tāvat anayoḥ adhikaraṇayoḥ na sambhavati samanvaya lakṣaṇe prathama adhyāye anantarbhāvasya bhavadbhiḥ eva ukta tvāt adhyāya anantarbhūtayoḥ ca pāda antarbhāva asambhavāt uttarā api ṣoḍhā bhavati prasaṅga upodghāta avasara prāpti kāraṇa kārya tva eka kārya tva bhedāt tatra na tāvat pratha mātra asti smāraka abhāvāt na dvitīyā vinā eva tena prakṛta siddheḥ na tṛtīyā samanvaya śeṣeṇa avaruddha tvāt na caturthī uttaram prabandham prati kāraṇa tva anupalambhāt na pañcamī pūrva prabandha kārya tva adarśanāt na api ṣaṣṭhī pūrveṇa anena uttareṇa ca ekasya ājananāt tasmāt idam na iha avakāśam arhati iti atas āha adhikāraḥ ca iti 
NSu_1.3.14ab.1–1.3.14ab.3	 adhikāraḥ ca tad hāniḥ prasaṅgāt eva cintitau antar bhāva lakṣaṇa saṅgatyabhāve api devānām veda vidyā adhikāraḥ tad abhāvaḥ śūdra ādīnām atra prasaṅgāt eva cintitau prasaṅgaḥ ca manuṣya adhikāra tvāt iti pūrva sūtra uktyā upodbalitaḥ iti bhāvaḥ na ca prasakta anuprasakta vicantane ati prasaṅgaḥ prayojana bhāva abhāvābhyām vyavasthānāt prakṛte ca viśvedevāḥ upāsate a iti ukta upapanna tva ādikam prayojanam asti nanu cintitau= iti katham vipratiṣedhe param kāryam iti strī liṅgena bhāvyam mā evam itāmau viṣayau= iti adhyāhāram 
NSu_1.3.14ab.4–1.3.14ab.5	 atra devānām veda vidyā adhikārākṣepa artham sūtra dvayam madhu ādiṣu asambhavāt anadhikāram jaiminiḥ ajyotiṣi bhāvāt ca a iti tasya arthaḥ na devāḥ vaidika upāsana ādau= adhikriyante tān prati vaidika vidheḥ abhāvāt ātmānam upāsīta a ityādi vidhiḥ eva tān viṣayīkaroti iti ced na vikalpa anupapatteḥ tathā hi kim teṣām sarva veda ukta upāsana ādau= adhikāraḥ kim vā kvacid na ādyaḥ sarvatra teṣām niyojya tva abhāvāt tad sādhya phala kāmaḥ hi tatra niyujyate phalam ca tat ucyate yat aprāptam ananuṣṭhita sādhanam ca na ca sarva upāsana ādi phale devānām kāmaḥ sambhavati madhu ādi upāsanānām devatā pada prāpti phala tvāt tasya ca taiḥ prāpta tvāt sarvajña tvena upāsana asādhya jñānasya api nitya siddha tvāt atas eva na dvitīyaḥ kiñca jaiminiḥ api evam manyate iti evam avāntara phalasya parama prayojanasya ca pada ādeḥ prāpta tvena vidhera sambhavāt jaimini vacanāt ca devānām anadhikāraḥ iti prāpte tad pratividhāna artham sūtram bhāvam tu bādarāyaṇaḥ asti hi iti 
NSu_1.3.14cd.1–1.3.15.4	 tad phalāya vidhiḥ siddhe ca upāsāyāḥ nirākṛtaḥ yatas jaimininā anya artham asiddhe arthe vidhiḥ tathā vidyā adhirājasya matam avirodhaḥ tayoḥ tatas tatra yat pūrva pakṣiṇa udāhṛtam jaimini vacanam tasya parihāraḥ na asti tat kim bhagavat mata viruddha tvena apramāṇam eva pratipattavyam iti mā evam bhinna viṣaya tvena virodha abhāvāt iti āha tad phalāya iti tat iti vasūnām eva ekaḥ bhūtvā a iti ādi śruti prasiddham parāmṛśati siddhe jñāte brahma svarūpe viṣaya saptamīyam upāsāyāḥ vidhiḥ iti sambandhaḥ anya artham phala antara artham tathā asiddhe arthe vidhiḥ upāsāyāḥ iti atra api anuvartate atra iti śabda adhyāhāreṇa matam iti yojyam tayaḥ martayoḥ nanu kim tad anya phalam katham ca sarva jñānām asiddhaḥ atharḥ yena devānām api upāsanā vidhāna upapattiḥ iti atas āha mokṣaḥ iti 
NSu_1.3.16.1–1.3.17.1	 mokṣe phala viśeṣaḥ asti na ca sarvam prakāśate sarvadā tena devānām api yuktā hi upāsanāḥ yat ca prakāśate na tat sarvadā tena tad ubhaya artham hi śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe nanu sarvajñānām sarvam na prakāśate iti vipratiṣiddham mā evam parameśvara vyatiriktānām sarvajña tva asiddheḥ iti āha nityam iti nityam vṛddhi kṣaya apetam viṣṇoḥ pūrṇam tu vedanam spaṣṭa ati spaṣṭa viśadam brahmaṇaḥ aśeṣa vastu gam 
NSu_1.3.18ab.1–1.3.18ab.2	 anyeṣām kramaśas jñānam mita vastu gatam sadā pūrṇam aśeṣa artha viṣayam tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe viṣṇoḥ eva iti sambadhyate spaṣṭa ati spaṣṭa viṣayam iti niratiśaya spaṣṭam iti arthaḥ nanu spaṣṭa tā nāma jñānasya viśeṣa viṣaya tā sā ca pūrṇam iti anena eva gatāḥ mā evam aparokṣa tva ādi vat spaṣṭa tāyāḥ viṣaya anapekṣa jñāna dharma tva aṅgīkārāt tasya ca anubhava siddha tvāt brahmaṇaḥ hiraṇyagarbhasya aśeṣa vastu gam para brahma atirikta aśeṣa vastu viṣayam atra api eva iti sambaddhayate na tu sarva artha viṣaya tvādi ukta viśeṣaṇa upetam iti arthaḥ atra brahma saṃvedanasya pṛthak uktiḥ kaimutya artham viṣṇu saṃvedana uktiḥ tu sarva viṣaya tvasya viṣṇu jñāna lakṣaṇa tvena itareṣām tad asambhāvitam iti sūcayitum mita vastu gatam parameśvara atirikta katipaya artha viṣayam etena bhāvam iti sūtram vyākhyātam bhavati atra cayāvat sevā a ityādi bhāṣya udāhṛtam vacanam pramāṇam iti 
NSu_1.3.18ab.3–1.3.18cd.1	 nanu jaimini bhagavat matayoḥ avirodhaḥ iti na yuktam jaiminiḥ hi śruta phala ādi atiriktam phala ādikam vidyānām asti iti vā manyate na asti iti vā ādye katham anadhikāram brūyāt dvitīye tu katham na virodhaḥ iti ced na bhagavataḥ sūtrakārasya aśeṣa viśeṣa jña tvena viśadam vacanam jaiminiḥ tu sāmānya vedī phala antara ādikam ajānan na nirākuvarnyatha aśrutam aṅgīkṛtyān adhikāra muktavān iti avirodha upapatteḥ iti āha ityādayaḥ iti ityādayaḥ viśeṣāḥ tu sadā vidyā pateḥ hṛdi 
NSu_1.3.19.1–1.3.19.2	 jaimini ādyāḥ tu sāmānya vettṛ tvāt tat tathā avadan vidyeśa m atam etasmāt na eva sadbhiḥ viruddhayate mokṣaḥ iti ukta parāmarśa arthaḥ iti śabdaḥ tuśabdaḥ vidyā pateḥ tu iti yojyaḥ hṛdi vartante tasmāt asau viśadam avādīt iti śeṣaḥ tata devatā an adhikāra ādikam tathā iti saṃmugdham iti arthaḥ asya api upapādanāya nityam iti ādi pūvar vākyam anusandheyam vidyeśa iti upasaṃhāraḥ ayam nyāyaḥ anyatra api anusandheyaḥ iti jñāpayitum iti ādayaḥ itrata jaimini ādyāḥ iti sadbhiḥ iti ca uktam iti 
NSu_1.3.19.3–1.3.19.5	 anyatra eva prasiddha śabda samanvaya pratipādanam pāda arthaḥ iti bhāṣyāt pariśeṣāt vā siddham anyatra prasiddhebhyaḥ anyatra eva prasiddhānām vivekaḥ ca bhāṣyaḥ eva upapāditaḥ iti na iha ucyate ānumānikam api ekeṣām iti ced na śarīra rūpaka vinyasta gṛhīteḥ darśayati ca ānumānikam api ekeṣām iti ced na śarīra rūpaka vi nyasta gṛhīteḥ darśayati ca 
NSu_1.3.19.6–1.3.19.9	 atramahataḥ param avyaktam avyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥ a iti vākyam udāhṛtya avyakta śabdam param brahma eva iti upapāditam tatra yat uktam pūrva pakṣiṇāa vyaktam ced param brahma tadā tasya puruṣāt avara tvam prāpnoti na ca tat yuktam sakala śruti ādi virodhāt a iti tad parihāra artham sūtram tad adhīna tvāt arthavat iti tad adhīna tvāt arthavat tasya artham vivṛṇoti duḥkhī iti 
NSu_1.4.1a–1.4.1c.2	 duḥkhi baddha avara ādyāḥ tu tad adhīna tva hetutaḥ śabdāḥ brahmaṇi vartante avyakta grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam yatra vākye sarva īśvara tva virodhi duḥkhi tvā ādikam pratīyatejīvāḥ eva tu duḥkhinaḥ a yonim anye prapadyante a ityādau tasya sarvasya api samanvayaḥ atra pratipādyate iti atas duḥkhyāt agrahaṇam na avyakta ādi śabdānām brahma paratve api avara tva ādi prāptyā sarva māna virodhaḥ asti yatas svasmin= avara tva ādi abhāve api tadvatām pradhāna ādīnām brahma adhīna tvena hetunā duḥkhī baddhaḥ avaraḥ ityādyāḥ api śabdāḥ brahmaṇi vartante iti aṅgīkṛtam etat uktam bhavati duḥkhya ādi śabda balāt eva hi duḥkhi tvā ādi prāptiḥ tatas ca pramāṇa virodhaḥ vācyaḥ na ca duḥkhī a ādi śabdaḥ niyamena duḥkha ādi samavāyasya vācakaḥ kintu tat asya asti iti tad sambandha mātrasya sambandhaḥ ca samavāyaḥ iva svāmyam api bhavati tatra niraniṣyaḥ niravadyaḥ anāmāni sarvāṇi yamāviśanti a iti niravakāśa śruti dvayāni atha anupapattyā duḥkha ādi niyantṛ tvena duḥkhi a ādi śabda pravṛttiḥ iti aṅgīkāre kā anupapattiḥ iti 
NSu_1.4.1a–1.4.1c.3^1	 bhavatu evam tat hita anteṣu gatiḥ kṛdanteṣu baddha ādi śabdeṣu rūḍheṣu ca avara ādi śabdeṣu katham ittham baddha śabdasya bandham prati karma tvam pravṛtti nimittam tat yasya asti tatra sa śabdaḥ vartate yasya asti iti ca sambandha mātram ucyate sambandha viśeṣe pramāṇa abhāvāt evam kāraka antara vāciṣu api draṣṭavyam avara ādi śabdāḥ api avara tva ādi nimitta adhīna pravṛttayaḥ evam eva yojyāḥ kiñca prātipadikāt dhātu arthaḥ a iti ṇi antebhyaḥ pacāt yaci vihite sulabhā eva avara ādi śabda pravṛttiḥ syāt eṣā vyākhyā yatra śabdataḥ avara tu ādi pratītiḥ 
NSu_1.4.1a–1.4.1c.3^2	 yatra punar avyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥ iti ādau= arthāt avatu a ādi prāptiḥ tatra katham na hi śabda vat upapattiḥ vyākhyānam arhati ucyate avyaktāt iti pañcamyā hi puruṣa gatam paratvam prati avyaktasya avadhi tvam asti iti etāvat eva labhyate nacatadasya aḥ ti a iti anena samavāyaḥ eva prāpnoti iti niyamaḥ asti tad svāmi tvena api upapatteḥ tatas ca yat gatam paratvam prati avadhi tvam tasya avara tvam arthāt āpadyatām para gatam tu yat svāmikam tasya avara tva ādikam prati svāmyam eva arthāt āpadyate iti na kaścid virodhaḥ 
NSu_1.4.1a–1.4.1d.4	 syāt etat yadi api tat asya asti iti sambandha sāmānyam duḥkhī a ādi śabda pravṛtti nimittam ucyate tathā api samavāya ādiḥ eva na svāmi tvam prayoga anusāri tvāt kṛt tad hita samāsānām prayogaḥ ca samavāya ādi nimittaḥ eva dṛśyate na svāmi tva nimittaḥ atas evatadasya asti asmin= iti matu ba iti iti karaṇaḥ vivikṣita arthaḥ nibaddhaḥ tasmāt na tad adhīna tva hetutaḥ duḥkhya ādi śabdānām brahmaṇi pravṛttiḥ iti atas asti tad adhīna tva nimittaḥ api prayogaḥ iti āha rājñi iti  rājñi yadvat parājayaḥ bhṛtya samavetasya parājayasya rāja adhīna tvena yathā rājñi parājayaḥ parājaya nimittakaḥ parājayīti śabdaḥ vartate parājayī bhadrasenaḥ iti tathā iti arthaḥ kiñca svāmi asambandhena matu bartha apravṛttau gomān devadattaḥ iti ādikam api na syāt etat eva vivṛṇoti svātantryam iti 
NSu_1.4.2ab.1–1.4.2ab.3	 svātantryam tad gata tvam ca śabda vṛtteḥ hi kāraṇam yasmāt pravṛtti nimittānām duḥkha ādīnām tad gata tvam iva para gateṣu svātantryam api duḥkhya ādi śabda pravṛtteḥ kāraṇam anuśāsana prayogayoḥ ubhayatra sāmyāt tasmāt duḥkhya ādi śabdāḥ api ukta artha āpatti balāt tad adhīna tva hetutaḥ brahmaṇi vartante iti sambandhaḥ astu svātantryam api śabda pravṛtti nimittam kim tu amukhyam eva tatra prayogasya apracura tvāt prayoga prācuryāt tad gata tvam eva mukhyam tathā ca duḥkhya ādi śabdānām jīva ādiṣu eva mukhya tvāt brahmaṇya mukhya tvāt tat tu samanvayāt a iti anupapannam iti atas āha svātantryam iti 
NSu_1.4.2c.1–1.4.2c.3	 svātantryam tatra mukhyam syāt tatra svātantrya tad gata tvayoḥ madhye svātantryam eva mukhyam śabda pravṛtti nimittam syāt na tu tad gata tvam iti arthaḥ svātantryam api śabda pravṛtti kāraṇam iti mukhyam iti ca krameṇa pratijñātam tad krameṇa eva upapipādayiṣuḥ svātantryasya kāraṇa tva anabhyupagame bādakam āha kutas iti 
NSu_1.4.2d.1–1.4.2d.3	 kutas rājñi jayaḥ anyathā anyathā svātantryasya śabda pravṛtti kāraṇa tva abhāve rājñi jayaḥ jaya nimittakaḥ jayi śabdaḥ kutas katham sva dhāma upaviṣye rājñi jayaḥ kutas na kutas api yatas iti arthaḥ jayasya rāja gata tva abhāvāt svātantryam api yadi śabda pravṛtti nimittam na syāt tadā nimitta abhāvāt rājñi jayi śabda pravṛttiḥ na syāt na ca evam tasmāt svātantryam api kāraṇam aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti lakṣaṇayā prayogaḥ astu iti ced na tat asya asti iti nimitta sāmyāt anyathā vaiparītyasya api āpātāt parājayasya prakṛta tve api jaya grahaṇam vyāpti artham svātantryasya mukhya kāraṇa tvam upapādayati na hi iti 
NSu_1.4.3.1–1.4.3.2^1	 na hi bhṛtyasya vijayi śabdaḥ tāvat prayujyate yāvat rājñi anya ga tve api svātantrya ābhāsa mātrataḥ hi śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe tāvat yāvat iti kriyā viśeṣaṇe jayasya anya gatve api bhṛtya gata tve api tam jayam prati svātantrya ābhāsa mātreṇa rājñi vijayi śabdaḥ yāvat prayujyate tāvat jaya adhikaraṇasya api bhṛtyasya sambandhi tayā na prayujyate yasmāt tasmāt svātantryam tatra mukhyam syāt iti sambandhaḥ svātantryāt iti vaktavye svātantrya ābhāsa mātrataḥ iti vacanam kim uta anupacarita svātantrye paramātmani iti kaim utyadyotana artham bhṛtya ajñāna nimittam rājñi prayoga prācuryam iti ced na bhṛtya jñāne api tad upalambhāt 
NSu_1.4.3.2^2	 nanu prayoga prācuryam na mukhya tā hetuḥ ajñāta mukhya lākṣaṇika ādi prayogeṣu api darśanāt iti ced satyam prayoga prācuryāt tad gata tvam eva mukhyam svātantryam tu tad aprācuryādamukhyam iti pareṇa paryanuyukte asiddhiḥ anena abhidhīyate na tu prayoga prācuryeṇa mukhya tā sādhyate yena vyabhicāra codanā saṅgatā syāt yadi api atra prayoga prācuryasya mukhya ajñāna nimitta tva ādinā anyathā siddhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ vā śakyate vaktum tathā api jagat vāci tvāt a iti sūtra diśā śiṣyaiḥ eva jñātum śakyate iti asiddhiḥ eva uktāḥ kutas tarhi mukhya tā siddhiḥ iti ced 
NSu_1.4.3.3	 nanu yadi su āsyam pravṛtti nimittam syāt tadā bhṛtye baddhe mṛte vā rājā baddhaḥ rājā mṛtaḥ iti prayogaḥ syāt na ca evam asti tena jānīmaḥ na svāmyam pravṛtti nimittam iti na ca vācyam prayoge sati nimitta anusaraṇam na tu nimittam asti iti prayogaḥ iti amukhya prayoga viṣaya tvāt asya nyāyasya tatra hi nimittam na sāmagrī kintu tat eka deśaḥ mukhya prayoge tu nimittam eva sāmagrī na hi siṃha śabdasya śārdūle prayoga abhāva vat upagoḥ apatye api aupagava śabda prayoga abhāvaḥ bhavati iti atra vaktavyam kaḥ ayam prayogaḥ nāma kim śabda śaktiḥ prayoga mūlam vyākaraṇam iti yathā kim vā uccāraṇam na ādyaḥ prasaṅgasya iṣṭa tvāt viparyaya paryavasāne ca asiddheḥ dvitīye tu anyathā siddham āha bhṛtya iti 
NSu_1.4.4.1–1.4.4.4^1	 bhṛtya bandha ādikam rājñi rājñaḥ bandha ādi yogyataḥ kāraṇam saṃśayasya syāt iti na eva prayujyate rāja adhīna bhṛtya bandha ādikam vivakṣitvā rājñi rājā baddhaḥ mṛtaḥ ityādi vākyam na prayujyate kim kāraṇam sa prayoga saṃśayasya kāraṇam syāt iti eva na tu svātantryasya akāraṇa tvāt kutas saṃśayasya kāraṇam rājñaḥ api bandha ādi yogya tvāt idam uktam bhavati bhavati eva svātantryam śabda pravṛtti nimittam prayoga bhāvaḥ tu pratibandhaka nimittaḥ rājā baddhaḥ mṛtaḥ iti prayoge hi saṃśayaḥ vyutpannasya syāt kim rāja adhīnasya bhṛtyasya baddha tva ādinā evam ucyate 
NSu_1.4.4.1–1.4.4.4^2	 kim vā rājñaḥ eva baddha tva ādinā iti ākāṅkṣā sannidhi yogyatānām ubhayatra sadbhāvena artha dvaya pratīteḥ a varjanīya tvāt na ca saṃśayaḥ mā bhūt iti evam nivṛttaḥ prayoga akāraṇa tvam svātantryasya gamayati na hi maṇi mantra ādi pratibaddhaḥ agniḥ na adhākṣīt iti na tad kāraṇam iti na saṃśaya kāraṇa tva mātram prayoga pratibandhakam vyākhyānataḥ saṃśaya nivṛtti sambhavāt yathā uktam vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣa pratipatti nar hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam a iti anyathā rājā jayīti api prayogaḥ na syāt tatra api ukta vidhayā saṃśaya avatārāt iti atas āha amaṅgalatavāt iti 
NSu_1.4.5.1–1.4.5.2	 amaṅgala tvāt śabdānām rājñaḥ yogāt amaṅgale apriya tvāt tu śabdasya syāt prayoga nivartanam tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe śabdasya iti jāti eka vacanam rājñaḥ bandhana ādau= amaṅgale yogāt yogya ta asadbhāvāt ākāṅkṣā ādeḥ ca sphuṭa tvāt rājā baddhaḥ ityādi padānām pākṣika rāja bandha ādi a maṅgala pratīti janaka tva sambhavāt rājñaḥ amaṅgala abhidhānasya ca rāja tatpuruṣa aprīti hetu tvāt eva śabdasya prayoga nivartanam syāt ayam abhisandhiḥ na kevalam saṃśaya prāpteḥ prayoga abhāvaḥ kintu saṃśaya nimittā prīti hetuka an artha śaṅkayā eva na punar svātantryasya akāraṇa tvāt iti tarhi rājā parājayī iti api na prayoktavyam iti ced bhṛtya dvārā eva rājā vijayate parājayate ca iti prasiddha tayā saṃśaya an utpādāt 
NSu_1.4.5.3	 nanu asti tāvat rājā baddhaḥ ityādi prayoga abhāvaḥ sa tu svāmi asya akāraṇa tvāt na bhavati kim tu ukta saṃśaya pratibandhāt iti kutas niśceyam na ca vācyam mā bhūt ayam niścayaḥ prayoga abhāvasya anyathā siddhi śaṅkā api tarka anumāne śaknoti dūṣayitum iti vādinaḥ api niścayasya āvaśyaka tvāt anyathā svātantrya nimittaka samanvaya anavadhāraṇa apātāt iti atas āha guṇāḥ tu iti 
NSu_1.4.6ab.1–1.4.6ab.2	 guṇāḥ tu tādṛśāḥ yatra prayujyante akhilāḥ api tādṛśāḥ svāmya nimittakāḥ śabdāḥ yatra yadi guṇāḥ śubha abhidhāyinaḥ na tu pakṣikam api amaṅgalam pratyayāyayanti tatra tarhi te akhilāḥ api prayujyante yathā jitam rājñā ityādayaḥ prāpta aprāpta vivekena ana artha śaṅkā eva prayoga abhāva kāraṇam na tu svātantryasya animitta tvam iti niścīyate iti bhāvaḥ atas eva uktam akhilā api iti naca ayam niyamaḥ asti nimitta sadbhāve prayogaḥ bhavati iti anantānām hi śabdānām lakṣaṇāni vyākaraṇa kāraiḥ uktāni na ca teṣām prayogaḥ dṛśyate iti sphuṭa tvāt na uktam tat evam svātantryasya śabda pravṛtti hetu tvam mukhya tvam ca siddham iti āha pūjyeṣu iti 
NSu_1.4.6cd.1–1.4.7.1	 pūjyeṣu eva viśeṣeṇa svātantryam mukhya kāraṇam yatas pūjyeṣu svāmiṣu jayi prabhṛtayaḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante tena jñāyate svātantryam śabda pravṛtti kāraṇam iti yatas ca pūjyeṣu eva viśeṣeṇa prācuryeṇa prayujyante na bhṛtyeṣu tena niścīyate svātantryam śabda pravṛttau tad gata tvāt api mukhyam kāraṇam iti kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha atas iti tatas doṣa atidūra tvāt saṃśayasya api asambhavāt doṣāṇām viṣṇu ga tvasya prājña buddhi vyapekṣayā 
NSu_1.4.8ab.1–1.4.8ab.3	 svātantrya artham abhipretya doṣa śabdāḥ ca viṣṇavi yatas svātantryam kāraṇam mukhyam ca atas svātantrya artham abhipretya duḥkhi baddha avara ādyāḥ doṣa śabdāḥ api viṣṇavi viṣṇaujīvāḥ eva tu duḥkhinaḥ a ityādau prayujyante iti sambandhaḥ sati api nimitte yathā rājā baddhaḥ ityādi prayoga abhāvaḥ tathā viṣṇuḥ duḥkhī iti ādi prayoga abhāvaḥ api kutas na bhavet atra api pākṣikasya viṣṇu vaiṣṇava bhayasya pratibandhaka tva sambhavāt iti atas uktam doṣā iti niraniṣyaḥ niravadya ityādi śruteḥ viṣṇau doṣa atidūra tva niścayāt prājña buddhi vyapekṣayā doṣāṇām viṣṇu ga tvasya tad viṣayasya saṃśayasya asambhavāt nimitta sadbhāvāt pratibandhaka abhāvāt api iti apeḥ arthaḥ 
NSu_1.4.8ab.4–1.4.8ab.5	 etat uktam bhavati sati api nimitte vaidika prayoga nivṛttiḥ hi viṣṇu vaiṣṇavebhyaḥ bhayāt syāt tad kāraṇam ca tad aprītiḥ tatra api hetuḥ viṣṇoḥ anena doṣi tvam ucyate iti saṃśayaḥ tasya ca nimittam vākyasya ubhaya artha pratīti janaka tvam tasya api ubhayatra yogyatā ādi sadbhāvaḥ na cāsau= asti prakṛte viṣṇuḥ vaiṣṇavānām parameśvara nirdoṣa tā niścayavat tvena yogyatā adhyavasāya anupapatteḥ anyathā jarat gava ādi vākye api tad prasaṅgāt yadi api vākyatāt paryājñe aprīti sambhavaḥ tathā api sat abhiprāya vākya prayoga nivṛttau kim āyātam iti etat api uktam prājña buddhi vyapekṣayā iti svasya parama vaidikatā khyāpanāya viṣṇavī iti vaidika prayogaḥ atra śruti saṃmatim api āha vāsudeva iti 
NSu_1.4.8cd.1–1.4.9.2	 vāsudeva śrutiḥ ca āha na eva viṣṇau= amaṅgalam maṅgala amaṅgale anyatra tatas na amaṅgalam vadet svātantrya apekṣayā viṣṇau doṣaḥ na amaṅgala uktitaḥ āha etam arham iti śeṣaḥ yatas na eva viṣṇau amaṅgalam duḥkha ādikam asti tatas yogya tā viraheṇa artha antara pratīti abhāvāt svātantrya apekṣayā viṣṇau= amaṅgala uktitaḥ doṣaḥ anarthaḥ na asti tāsmāt duḥkhya ādi śabdāḥ api viṣṇau vede prayujyante iti śeṣaḥ anyatra tu rāja ādau yatas maṅgala amaṅgale saṃbhavataḥ atas yogyatā saṃbhavena artha antara pratibhāsanāt pākṣikā anartha śaṅkayā tatra amaṅgalam rājā baddhaḥ iti ādikam na vada iti arthaḥ ekasya eva śabdasya kvacid doṣa pratyāyaka tvena anartha hetu tvam kvacid tad abhāvaḥ iti etat dṛṣṭāntena bodhayati bahu bhuj tvam iti 
NSu_1.4.10ab.1–1.4.11a.2	 bahu bhuktavam yathā doṣaḥ nṛṣu na eva harau kvacid yathā bahu bhuj devadattaḥ iti ukte bahu bhogavān iti nindyaḥ ca iti pratīyate asvargyam ca ati bhojanam iti smṛteḥ ubhayasya api devadatte saṃbhavena yogya tvāt atas eva devadattāt bhīruṇā na evam prayujyate parameśvare tu saṃsāra dharmāṇām atyanta asaṃbhāvāt na kintu sarva saṃhartṛ tva ādikam eva pratīyate iti tatra tad prayogaḥ dārṣṭa antikam āha evam iti evam duḥkhī a ādi śabdāḥ ca svātantrya apekṣayā uditāḥ na eva doṣāḥ harau doṣāḥ doṣa hetavaḥ prathama dṛṣṭāntasya api dārṣṭa antikam adhyāhāryam katham tarhi parameśvare duḥkha tva ādi vedanam anartha hetutvena ucyate asan= ā iva sa bhavati iti ādau= iti atas āha tad gabudhyā iti 
NSu_1.4.11.1–1.4.11.5^1	 tad gabuddhayā uktāḥ doṣa kāriṇaḥ tasmāt te doṣa śabdāḥ ca tatra eva guṇa vācakāḥ duḥkha ādīnām tad gata tva vikṣayā iti arthaḥ tasmāt iti śrutiḥ sva ukta artham upasaṃharati atas avyakta ādi śabda vācyaḥ paramātmā iti siddham jyotiḥ upakramāt tu tathā hi adhīyate eke jyotiḥ upakramā tu tathā hi adhīyate eke jyotiṣyomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta vasanta vasante jyotiṣā yajeta ityādi karma kāṇḍa gate vākye sandehaḥ kim etat brahmaṇi samanveti uta na iti na iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ tathā hi kim atra vākya arthaḥ brahma kiṃvā padārthaḥ na ādyaḥ jyotiṣyomaka tarvyata ādeḥ vākya arthatayā pratīteḥ na dvitīyaḥ padāni hi amūni kim rūḍhyā brahma vācīni kiṃvā yogena ādye api kim prasiddha vasanta ādi ātmaka tvena tad padānām brahmaṇi rūḍhiḥ āśrīyate uta pṛthak eva na ādyaḥ teṣām jaḍa tva aniyatva ādinā brahmaṇaḥ api dūṣaṇa prasaṅgāt na dvitīyaḥ aneka artha tāsvīkārasya anyāyya tvāt na hi īśvare vasanta ādi śabdānām rūḍhiḥ pramāṇavatī 
NSu_1.4.11.5^2–1.4.11.6	 na ca rūḍhyā samanvaya samāśrayaṇaṣa prayojanam asti guṇa pūrtya siddheḥ na api yogena yogasya rūḍheḥ jaghanya vṛtti tvena mukhya artha tā siddheḥ na ca evaṃvidham yogam api paśyāmaḥ yoge ca prakṛti ādi vibhāgaḥ pūrva uttara pada vibhāgaḥ ca aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ tatra prakṛti ādeḥ īśvara vāci tvam asti na vā ādye yoga anupapattiḥ sāmarthya abhāvāt dvitīye brahmaṇi sarva śabda samanvaya anupapattiḥ prakṛti ādeḥ anya paratvāt kiñca sarveṣām padānām brahma paratve vibhakti vaiyarthyam karma anuṣṭhāna vilopaḥ ca prāpnoti kriyā upahita rūpa tvāt kārakāṇām kriyā abhidhāyakasya ca abhāvāt anuṣṭhāpaka pramāṇa antara darśanāt tasmāt ayuktam samanvaya sūtram iti atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam kim brahmaṇi vākyasya anvayaḥ kiṃvā padānām iti tatra tāvat padānām iti brūmaḥ na ca vṛtti asambhavaḥ yoga sadbhāvāt iti abhipretya nirvakti jātam iti 
NSu_1.4.12ab.1–1.4.12c.2	 jāta motam harau yasmāt jyotiḥ ṣaḥ prāṇa rūpataḥ jirjātam janerauṇādikaḥ ḍi pratyayaḥ oti rotam avateḥ ktin jātam jagat otam praviṣyam yasmin= asau jyotiḥ prāṇa rūpataḥ ca iṣyaka rūpa tvāt ṣakāraḥ prāṇaḥ ātmā a iti śruteḥ jyotiḥ ca asau ṣaḥ ca iti jyotiṣaḥ tasya sambuddhiḥ jyotiṣa āyajñetas ca ayajetaḥ yajateḥ bhāve ghañartheka vidhānam a iti ka pratyayaḥ samprasāraṇa abhāvaḥ chāndasaḥ yajaḥ yajñaḥ athavā kartari eva pacāt yat tathā ca āusamyak samantāt vā yajena yajñena karmaṇā yājakena puruṣeṇa vā itas prāptaḥ āyajetaḥ sakala yajña bhoktā yajvabhiḥ jñāna dvārā prāpyaḥ ca iti arthaḥ tasya sambuddhiḥ āyajeta 
NSu_1.4.12d.1–1.4.13ab.2	 vasantiḥ ca vasantataḥ vasateḥ pacāt yat vasati iti vasaḥ tanoteḥ auṇa ādikaḥ ḍi pratyayaḥ tanoti iti tiḥ varṇa āgamaḥ varṇa viparyayaḥ ca a iti pūrva padasya nakāra āgamaḥ vasan= ca asau tiḥ ca iti vasantiḥ vyāptaḥ vartate iti arthaḥ tad sambuddhiḥ vasante dvis uktiḥ ādara arthāḥ vigata= chādana tvāt tu gaccha ameḥ chadeḥ ca ḍaḥ anyatra api dṛśyate iti ḍapratyayaḥ gam vigatam cham chādanam avidyā ādikam yasmāt asau gacchaḥ tasya sambuddhiḥ gaccha aindrāgacche atyādi vyākhyānam etat 
NSu_1.4.13bc.1–1.4.13cd.2	 bhūta kṣayaṅkaraḥ bhuṅkṣā iti uktaḥ hariḥ su śabdaḥ bhūta śabdasya ādeśaḥ kṣaya śabdasya ca kṣvaḥ pūrva padasya makāra āgamaḥ pṛṣṭa udara ādiḥ ayam yat vā kṣi kṣayaḥ iti asmāt ḍva pratyayaḥ ayam api sambuddhi atas  hum ca hutam asmin jagat yatas juhoteḥ adhikaraṇe makāra pratyayaḥ kṛt mejante iti avyaya tvam hutam svena eva asmin viṣṇau jagat pralaya ādau yatas atas hum ca asau= iti arthaḥ karma viśeṣa anukteḥ jagat iti uktam 
NSu_1.4.14a.1–1.4.14bc.2	 sphuṭa tvāt phaṭ iti proktaḥ sphauṭa vikasanaḥ iti asmāt kartari kvip sakāra lopaḥ ukārasya ākāraḥ sphuṭa tvāt svātmānam prati vyakta tvāt asaṅkucita vṛtti tvāt vā  kava rakṣaṇaḥ iti atas kavacam kava rakṣaṇaḥ iti atas iti asya dhātoḥ rūpam kavacam iti etat iti arthaḥ kavateracaḥ iti etāvān eva pratyayaḥ kavati rakṣati iti kavacam 
NSu_1.4.14c–1.4.14ef.2	 vata ṛte yasmāt ṣaḍguṇa tvena sarvadā vaṣat vṛtu vartane ḍa pratyayaḥ vartate iti vaḥ ṣaḍguṇa ātmaka tvāt ṣaṭ vaḥ ca asau ṣaṭ ca iti vaṣaṭ tasya tātparyam vartate ityādi aiśvarya vīrya yaśaḥ śrī jñāna vairāgyāṇi ṣaḍguṇāḥ  tad gatvataḥ teṣām vauṣaṭ viḥ viṣṇuḥ akaya pravisambhūma sakhāhāḥ viṣṇu vācakāḥ a iti vacanāt tasmin vau vartamānāḥ ṣaṭ guṇāḥ vauṣaṭ saptamyāḥ aluc asya tātparya arthaḥ teṣām ṣaṇṇām guṇānām tat gatvataḥ vauṣaṭ iti 
NSu_1.4.14f.1–1.4.15ab.2	 iti eva kathyate na ca evam bhagavat nāma tva anupapattiḥ tad gata guṇānām api tad ātmaka tvāt tat idam uktam iti eva iti tarhi kathyate iti katham bhāve prayogaḥ na karmaṇi iti atas na doṣaḥ svīyam svīkurute yasmāt svāhā iti uktaḥ janārdanaḥ harateḥ jahāteḥ vā ḍaḥ dvau= api āṅpūrvauḥ svīkāre vartete svam svabhāvataḥ svīyam eva haviḥ ādi bhrāntyā asva vat pratītam svīkurutaḥ iti svāhaḥ sa ca asau aḥ ca iti svāhā iti sambuddhiḥ 
NSu_1.4.15cd.1–1.4.16.1	 namanti asmin guṇāḥ yasyāt namaḥ iti eva kathyate namateḥ adhikaraṇe asun pratyayaḥ napuṃsa kaliṅga tā tu śabda anusāriṇī guṇāḥ iti yogyatayā sambandhaḥ namanena ātyantika sambandham upalakṣayati athavā asmin parameśvare viṣaye guṇāḥ upasarjana bhūtāḥ brahma ādayaḥ namanti prahvībhavanti iti vyākhyeyam evam yoga vṛtyā pada samanvaye aṅgīkṛte labdham prayojanam āha iti aśeṣa iti iti aśeṣa kriyā nāma śabdaiḥ ekaḥ janārdanaḥ ucyate mukhyatas yasmāt pada varṇa svara ādibhiḥ 
NSu_1.4.17a.1–1.4.17a.2	 tasmāt ananta guṇa tā iti ukta diśā tena ca vibhakti artha anupapattiḥ kriyā śabdāḥ ākhyāta padāni nāma śabdāḥ subantāni ekaḥ a iti śabda antara nyāyena prāptam bhedam apākaroti abhidheya bhede hi na ananta guṇa tā siddhayati mukhyatas yoga vṛttyā kriyā nām a śabdaiḥ iti asya anuvādaḥ pada varṇa svara ātmabhiḥ iti na kevalam pada varṇa ātmabhiḥ kim tu udātta ādi svara ātmabhiḥ ca nanu varṇānām api vācaka tve vibhakti anta tve ca padatvam eva tat kim artham pṛthak grahaṇam eka aneka varṇa ātmaka tva vivakṣayā iti brūmaḥ ananta guṇa tā siddhayati iti śeṣaḥ hi śabdaḥ aparyāya tvāt iti sūcayati anena rūḍhi mātreṇa pada samanvaya aṅgīkāraḥ niṣprayojanaḥ ananta guṇa tva āsiddheḥ iti pūrva pakṣiṇa uktam parihṛtam iti uktam bhavati 
NSu_1.4.17a.3–1.4.17b.2	 nanu ca na nirvacanasya śakya kāraṇa tva mātreṇa ananta guṇa tvam parameśvarasya vedatas siddhayati nirvacanasya vyākhyātṛ mati parikalpitasya artha antare anyathā ca sambhavāt anyathā śvitrī śodhanam karoti iti abhiprāyeṇa prayuktasya śvetaḥ dhāvati iti vākyasya itas sārameyaḥ drutam gacchati iti api prameyam prasajyeta iti atas uktam śruti iti  śruti tāt paryataḥ asya hi bhavet evam yadi vasantaḥ iti ādi śrutīnām ukta vidhi nirvacanena parameśvara guṇeṣu tātparyam na syāt tat ca asti iti upapādayiṣyāmaḥ iti ca hi śabdaḥ yoga vṛtti aṅgīkārasya prayojana antaram āha vijñāna iti 
NSu_1.4.17cd.1–1.4.17cd.2	 vijñāna artha tvataḥ sarva śabdānām na asti dūṣaṇam vaidikānām sarva śabdānām evam yoga vṛttyā vijñāna artha tvataḥ ananta guṇa upeta tayā parameśvara jñāna artha tvena aṅgīkṛta tvāt vasanta ādi ātmaka tayā rūḍhi aṅgīkāra prayuktam yat anitya tva ādi dūṣaṇam uktam tat na asti iti arthaḥ tat anena jyotiḥ a iti sūtrasya leśataḥ tātparyam uktam bhavati evam karma kāṇḍasya brahmaṇi pratipada samanvaya pratipādanena samanvaya sūtrasya anupapattiḥ parihṛtāḥ idānīm vākya anvaya pakṣa aṅgīkāreṇa api tām pariharati aṅgīkṛte api iti 
NSu_1.4.18ab.1–1.4.18ab.3	 aṅgīkṛte api na eva asti doṣaḥ vākya samanvaye vākya samanvaye aṅgīkṛte api brahmaṇi vasantaḥ ityādi vākyānām samanvaya aṅgīkārāt api doṣaḥ samanvaya sūtra anupapattiḥ na eva asti iti arthaḥ anena vākya anvayasyāt iti sūtrasya tātparyam uktam bhavati nanu uktam atra na vākyānām brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ ghaṭate sa aṅgakam arpa ratvā avagamāt āgamanām iti tatra āha tad artha tvena iti 
NSu_1.4.18cd.1–1.4.18cd.3	 tad artha tvena karma ādeḥ sambhavāt alpabuddhaye tat iti vijñānam parāmṛśati alpabuddhayaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhayarthe caturthī ahalyāyai jāraḥ a iti yathā na vākya anvaya anupapattiḥ iti śeṣaḥ yathā khalu yūpa āhavanīya ādi vākyāni na niṣphale tāvat mātre paryavasyanti kintu jyotiṣyoma ādi iti kartavya tā parāṇi tathā sarvam api karma kāṇḍam na alpa asthira phale paryavasyati kintu brahma jñāna artham eva tad pratipāditasya karma ādeḥ brahma jñāna atha rtvāt vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasā anāśakena a iti ādi śruteḥ iti bhāvaḥ nanu ca yaḥ karma kāṇḍasya brahmaṇi pratipada samanvayaḥ abhihitaḥ sa yuktaḥ na vā na iti pakṣe na vyutpādanīyaḥ ādye kim anena vākya anvaya aṅgīkāreṇa iti atas uktam alpabuddhayaḥ iti prapañcayiṣyate ca etat anenaanya artham a ityādi sūtrāṇām tātparyam uktam bhavati nanu alpabuddhīnām api pratipadā anvayaḥ eva brahma jñāna hetuḥ bhavati iti kim vākya anvaya iti atas āha kaḥ iti 
NSu_1.4.19a.1–1.4.19bc.2	 kaḥ chandasām yogam iti śruteḥ kacchandasām yogam āveda dhīraḥ a iti śruteḥ vaidika pada yoga vṛtteḥ alpabuddhibhiḥ aśakyajñāna tva ādi uktam vākya anvaya vyutpādanam iti śeṣaḥ nanu evam tarhi yoga vṛttyā pratipada samanvaya vyutpādanam na kartavyam kaḥ dhīraḥ chandasām yogam brahmaṇi yoga vṛttim āveda na kaḥ api iti niradhi kārika tva śravaṇāt na hi gāyamānaḥ badhireṣu gāyati iti atas āha yoga artha iti  yoga artha tattva vid brahmā ekaḥ na eva ca anyaḥ asti yogasya arthaḥ yoga arthaḥ tasya tattvam yāthārthyam caśabdaḥ artha dvaya samuccaya arthaḥ ayam asyāḥ śruteḥ arthaḥ iti śeṣaḥ etat upapādayati kaḥ iti 
NSu_1.4.19d.1–1.4.19d.3	 kaḥ iti asya ra ubhaya arthataḥ prajāpatiḥ vai kaḥ a iti śruteḥ ka śabdaḥ brahma arthaḥ kiṃvṛttasya ca ākṣepe vṛttiḥ suprasiddhāḥ tathā ca kaḥ iti asya ubhaya artha tvāt brahma artha tve tasya yoga vṛtti jñāne sāmarthya kathana at na anadhikārika tvam ākṣepa artha tve tad anyeṣām anadhikāra kathanādyuktaḥ vākya anvaya abhyupagamaḥ nanu katham etat āvṛtteḥ tantra dharmāt vetyadoṣaḥ pramāṇam ca atra anyathā anupapattiḥ iti yadi brahmā ekaḥ eva padānām yoga vṛttyā artha sambandham veda tadā aekasya pratibhātam tu kṛtakān na viśiṣṭate a iti nyāyāt kṛtaka tvam śabda artha sambandhasya ityādi āpadyate tathā āca autpattikaḥ tu śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ a iti jaimini uktaḥ śabdānām arthaiḥ nitya yogaḥ parityaktaḥ syāt iti atas āha tasya api iti 
NSu_1.4.20a–1.4.20d.5^1	 tasya api pūrva siddhasya jñānam eva iti niścayāt nitya yogaḥ api śabdānām arthaiḥ na eva niṣiddhayate yadi api ekaḥ eva pratipattā tathā api tasya pūrva siddhasya iva pūrva sthitasya eva jñātasya eva ca śabda artha sambandhasya pramitiḥ eva bhavati na tu utprekṣā mātram iti asya arthasya śruti ādibhyaḥ niścayāt jaimini uktaḥ arthaiḥ śabdānām nitya yogaḥ na eva asmābhiḥ tyajyate iti yojanā etat uktam bhavati syāt ayam doṣaḥ yadi brahmaṇaḥ śabda artha sambandha jñānam utprekṣā rūpam syāt na ca evam 
NSu_1.4.20a–1.4.20d.5^2	 kintu pūrva janmani pratītam svatas siddham eva sambandham iha janmani supta prabuddha nyāyena īśvara prasādāt avabuddhayate iti tathā ca śrutiḥyaḥ brahmāṇam a iti evaṃjātīyakāḥ eka deśe puruṣa antara pratipatti saṃvādāt ca etat evam tathā ca smṛtiḥ janma antare śrutāḥ tāḥ tu a iti ādikāḥ atas eva śrutiḥ āvedaḥ a iti āha etena na eka ādhikārikam śāstram iti api parāḥ tam idānīṃ prakṛtiḥ ca pratijñā dṛṣṭāntān uparodhāt aetena sarve vyākhyātāḥ vyākhyātāḥ a iti adhikaraṇa dvayasya saṅkṣepataḥ tāt paryam āha strī śabdāḥ ca iti prakṛtiḥ ca pratijñā dṛṣṭānta anuparodhāt etena sarve vyākhyātāḥ vyākhyātāḥ 
NSu_1.4.20ef.1–1.4.20ef.3	 strī śabdāḥ ca niṣedha arthāḥ sarve api brahma vācakāḥ strī liṅgāḥ prakṛthati ādi śabdāḥ strī śabdāḥ niṣedhanam niṣedhaḥ abhāvaḥ niṣiddhayate iti niṣedhaḥ asat tad ubhaya arthāḥ śabdāḥ iti vartate atra na sarvāṇi sūtrāṇi vyākhyātāni tatas pratijñā vyāhanyeta iti atas viṣaya ādi kathanena vyākhyāta tām manvānaḥ sarva adhikaraṇa viṣaya pūrva pakṣa siddhānta yuktīḥ āha virodhi iti 
NSu_1.4.21.1–1.4.21.2	 virodhi sarva bāhulya kāraṇa strī niṣedhinām pṛthak samanvaya arthāni sthānāni etāni sarvaśas yat vā atra ādyena ślokena adhikaraṇa upādhayaḥ kathyante virodhi iti parama aiśvarya virodhi arthāḥ sarva iti ukta vakṣyamāṇa vyatiriktāḥ bāhulyā iti bāhulya viśiṣṭa artha vācinaḥ kāraṇa iti avāntara kāraṇa vācinaḥ strī iti strī liṅgāḥ niṣedhaḥ vācyaḥ yeṣām asti te niṣedhinaḥ athavā dvandvāt paraḥ in pratyayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tathā tve virodhi ādayaḥ arthāḥ grāhyāḥ śabdānām iti śeṣaḥ etāni etad pāda gatāni sarvaśas sthānāni adhikaraṇāni eṣām śabdānām samanvaya prayojanāni iti ukte pratyekam sarva śabda samanvaya siddhiḥ iti api pratīyeta atas pṛthak iti uktam 
NSu_1.4.22.1–1.4.24.3	 sarva mānaiḥ virodhaḥ ca vyutpatteḥ api aśakyatā paraspara virodhaḥ ca virodhaḥ kārya tadvatoḥ strī liṅga tvam niṣedhaḥ ca pūrva pakṣeṣu hetavaḥ doṣāti aspṛṣṭi niyamaḥ śabda artha aneka tā tathā bahu rūpa tvam īśasya vyaktaya vyakti viśeṣitā utpādanam sva dehāt ca durjana avyakta tā tathā itayā ādyāḥ yuktayaḥ sākṣāt siddhānta sthāpakāḥ iha sarva iti anena eva samākarṣa adhikaraṇa arthaḥ api saṅgṛhītaḥ tasya jyotiḥ adhikaraṇa artha ākṣepa parihāra artha tvāt sarva mānaiḥ virodhaḥ ca a iti ādi arthaḥ nyāya vivaraṇa ādau= avagantavyaḥ evam ānumānikam ityādīni sūtrāṇi saṅkṣepataḥ vyākhyāya siṃha avalokana nyāyena samākarṣa adhikaraṇam jyotiḥ adhikaraṇaṃca anvayaḥ a ityādinā kiñcid vivṛṇoti 
NSu_1.4.24.4	 tathā hi samākarṣa adhikaraṇe pratipādyamānaḥ vākya anvayaḥ sūtrakārasya abhimānaḥ na vā ādye vaktavyam prāc ukta pratipadā anvayaḥ yuktaḥ na vā iti na iti pakṣe na vaktavyaḥ yukta tve tu mukhye tasmin vidyamāne asya vaiyarthyam kiñca vākya anvayasya sva mata tve anya artham tu jaiminiḥ iti ādi sūtreṣu jaiminī ādi grahaṇam vyartham syāt api ca pratijñā siddheḥ liṅgam āśmarathyaḥ utkramiṣyate evam bhāva āt iti auḍulomiḥ avasthiteḥ iti kāśa kṛtsnaḥ iti vākya anvayaḥ tri prakāraḥ abhihitaḥ tasya parasparam avirodhe mata bhedaḥ na syāt virodhe tu katham sūtra kāra abhimata tvam atha sūtrakārasya anabhimataḥ vākya anvayaḥ tadā nirākaraṇa sūtreṇa abhāvyam na ca etat asti tat katham etat iti atas āha anvayaḥ iti 
NSu_1.4.25.1–1.4.26ab.1–1.4.26ab.3^1	 anvayaḥ sarva śabdānām aśakyaḥ jñātum añjasā iti yat loka vaimukhyam jaiminī ādi matam vadan vidyā adhināthaḥ bhagavān apācakre svayam prabhuḥ pratipadā anvaye abhihite hi manda adhikāriṇām mokṣam āgarvaimukhyam syāt sarva śabdānām brahmaṇi añjasā mukhyayā vṛttyā anvayaḥ tāvat jñātum aśakyaḥ kaḥ chanda sāmiti a śruteḥ na ca tad jñānena vinā mokṣaḥ naca aśakye pravṛttiḥ yuktā ākāśa romanthana ādau pravṛtti adarśanāt tathā ca āhuḥ vyasanāni durantāni samavyaya phalāni ca aśakyāni ca vastūni na ārabheta vicakṣaṇaḥa iti tasmāt āstām ayam mokṣaḥ śakya anuṣṭhāna sādhana dharma ādi artham eva pravartemahi iti 
NSu_1.4.26ab.1–1.4.26ab.3^2–1.4.26cd.1	 evam manda lokasya mokṣa mārga vaimukhyam bhagavan sūtra kāraḥ svayam eva jaiminī ādi matam etat iti vadan vākya anvaya pradarśanena nirākṛtavān anena sva abhimataḥ eva vākya anvayaḥ atas na nirākaraṇa sūtra abhāvaḥ doṣāya pratipadā anvayaḥ ca yuktaḥ eva iti tad vyutpādanam upapannam eva tathā api pratipadam anvaye sāmarthya vaikalyena mokṣa mārgāt vimukhānām manda adhikāriṇām upāya antara pradarśanena samāśvāsa artham vākya anvaya kathanam ca upapannam iti uktam bhavati tarhi jaimini ādi grahaṇam vyartham iti uktam iti atas āha sva śiṣyāṇām iti sva śiṣyāṇām prasiddhayartham matam ātmīyam aṃśataḥ 
NSu_1.4.27ab.1–1.4.27ab.3	 vijñātam taiḥ jagāda atra tāratamyam nṛṇām vadan jaiminī ādīnām iti śeṣaḥ na atra jaiminī ādi grahaṇena tadīyam eva etat matam iti ucyate kintu madīyam eva matam eka deśataḥ jaiminī ādibhiḥ vijñātam iti etat ca teṣām khyāti artham guruṇā ślāghitāḥ hi śiṣyāḥ loke khyātim labhante nanu vākya anvayasya prakāra trayam paraspara viruddham katham sūtra kāra abhimatam syāt iti atas āha tāratamyam iti nṛṇām alpa adhikāriṇām avasthā tāratamyam vadan= iti anena avasthā tāratamya vyavasthayā mata bhedaḥ na virodhena iti uktam bhavati etena aṅgīkṛte api ityādi uktam vivṛtam veditavyam 
NSu_1.4.27ab.4–1.4.27cd.1	 jyotiḥ adhikaraṇe yoga vṛttyā parameśvare akhila śabda samanvayaḥ abhihitaḥ na asau yujyate prakṛti ādeḥ anya paratva abhāve nirvacana anupapatteḥ na hi jāta ādi padānām anya paratva anaṅgīkāre jāta motam yasmin= iti vyutpattiḥ sambhavati prakṛti ādeḥ anya paratve tu sarva śabdānām bhagavat vāci tvam iti gataḥ pakṣaḥ kiñca vasantaḥ ityādīnām bhagavat paratve karma anuṣṭhāna lopaḥ loka vyavahāra vilopaḥ ca prasajyeta iti uktam iti atas āha teṣu iti kalpanā upadeśāt ca madhu ādi vat avirodhaḥ teṣu teṣu padārtheṣu rūḍhiḥ aṅgīkṛtā yatas 
NSu_1.4.28.1–1.4.28.2^1	 prayojana bahu tvena tasya tasya avirodhataḥ upadeśa ādi sāmarthyāt viṣṇau śaktiḥ ca gṛhyate vyutpatti upapattiḥ karma anuṣṭhāna sambhavaḥ loka vyavahāra anucchedaḥ ca iti evam prayojanānām bahu tvena kāraṇena teṣu teṣu tad tad śabda vācya tayā prasiddheṣu artheṣu tad tad śabdānām rūḍhiḥ iti upalakṣaṇam vṛttiḥ aṅgīkṛtāḥ yatas tasmāt tasya tasya avirodhataḥ tam tam artham aparityajya upadeśa liṅga prakaraṇa ādi balena sarva śabdānām viṣṇau ca śaktiḥ gṛhyate yadi api atra etāvat eva vaktavyam na eṣa doṣaḥ sarva śabdānām bhagavat vācinām api prasiddhārtha antara vācaka tvasya api svīkārāt jyotiḥ ādi śabdānām hi jyotiṣyomā dvayartha tvasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt na anuṣṭhāna loka vyavahāra vilopaḥ 
NSu_1.4.28.2^2	 jāta motam iti avayava vṛttyā parameśvare vṛttau jāta atipadānām anyatara tvam aṅgīkriyate iti vyutpatti upapattiḥ punar tad avayavasya api anya para tvam upādāya parameśvare jāta pada vyutapatti sambhavaḥ itrataḥ tathā api syāt etat evam yadi śabdānām aneka artha tvam syāt tat eva kutas iti śaṅkā nirāsa artham idam uktam iti jñātavyam tathā hi padārtha antara vāci tvam tāvat ukta prayojana siddhaye aṅgīkaraṇīyam parameśvara vāci tvam ca sarva śabdānāṃ nāmāni sarvāṇi yamāviśanti a  tāḥ vai etāḥ sarvāḥ ṛcaḥ a ityādi upadeśa balāt śati liṅga ādi sāmarthyāt ca tad tad śabdānām avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti anena kalpanā upadeśāt ca madhu ādi vat avirodhaḥ a iti sūtrasya tātparyam uktam bhavati 
NSu_1.4.28.3	 yadi sarva śabdānām ubhaya artha tvam tarhi viśvasmāt indraḥ uttaraḥ aasat eva idam agre āsīt a ityādau katham ubhayoḥ sarva uttama tva ādeḥ viruddha tvena atra ubhaya artha tva anupapatteḥ padānām ubhaya artha vācitave api tatra virodhaḥ tatra anyatara mātre tātparyam aṅgī kāryam iti ced tatra api kim upādeyam kim parityājyam iti na jñāyate iti atas āha tathā api iti 
NSu_1.4.29ab.1–1.4.29ab.3	 tathā api etat virodhe tu tat vāci tvam apodyate yadi api ubhaya arthāḥ śabdāḥ iti sāmānyena uktam tathā api parameśvara paratva virodhe anya paratvam apodyate tuśabdaḥ viśeṣadyotana arthaḥ ubhaya para tvam tāvat viruddham iti pareṇa eva uktam anyatara parityāge ca parameśvara parityāgaḥ na yuktaḥ niścita tātparya vākya antara virodhāt atas pariśeṣāditara parityāgaḥ eva ucitaḥ iti tarhi kalpanā upadeśāt ityādi virodhaḥ tatra sarva śabdānām ubhaya paratvasya ukta tvāt iti ced na nirapavāda sthale paryavasāyi tvāt tasya iti āha avirodhaḥ iti 
NSu_1.4.29cd.1–1.4.29cd.3	 avirodhe tu bahu arthāḥ etad mūla tayā matāḥ bahu śabdaḥ aneka arthaḥ matāḥ tatra tatra sūtre abhimatāḥ nanu avirodhe api ubhaya artha tva aṅgīkāraḥ na yuktaḥ tat tu samanvayāt iti avadhāraṇa śaditi atas uktam etat mūla tayā iti eṣa parameśvaraḥ mūlam mukhyaḥ yeṣām te tathā uktāḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ tat tā tayā iti itthaṃmbhūta lakṣaṇe tṛtīyā mukhyam artha antaram vārayitum avadhāraṇam na tu artha antara mātram ukta prayojana vyāghātāt iti bhāvaḥ etenana anyāyaḥ ca aneka artha tvam iti api samāhitam mukhya arthasya eka tvāt nanu purandara ādiṣu api indra ādi śabdāḥ rūḍhi yogābhyām pravṛttāḥ rūḍhi yogau ca mukhya vṛttī kathyete atas akṣa ādi śabdānām iva indra ādi śabdānām ubhayam mukhya abhidheyam yuktam na īśvaraḥ eva iti atas āha itas hi iti 
NSu_1.4.30ab.1–1.4.30ab.3	 itas hi rūḍha tā anyeṣām upajīvya tvam atra hi satyam asti purandara ādīnām api indra ādi śabda rūḍhi viṣaya tā tathā api sā itas parameśvarāt eva hi yasmāt yasmāt ca atra yoga viṣaya tve parameśvarasya eva upajīvya tvam tasmāt saḥ eva mukhya arthaḥ na purandara ādayaḥ svatas eva anavadhika aiśvarya ādi matī īśvaraḥ eva indra ādi śabdānām yoga rūḍhī tad sannidhānāt tad āyatta pravṛtti nimitta tvāt eva ca purandara ādiṣu prasiddham ca etat yat yat sannidhānāt yat śabda pratipādyam tat amukhyam anyat mukhyam iti yathā dagdhṛ śabdasya ayaḥ agniḥ ca na ca akṣa ādi śabda arthānām itara apekṣā asti iti vaiṣamyam iti nanu evam ced īśvarasya api amukhya tvam prasaktam artha antara apekṣayā eva tatra śabda pravṛtteḥ na khalu jāta ādi śabdānām anya artha tām anapekṣya jyotiṣā ityādi śabdānām bhagavati pravṛttiḥ sambhavati iti atas āha tad siddhiḥ iti 
NSu_1.4.30c.1–1.4.30c.3	 tad siddhiḥ tad apekṣā ca caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe na ayam asti doṣaḥ yatas parama puruṣe tad tad śabda pravṛtti pratītiḥ eva artha antara apekṣā na tu pravṛttiḥ na hi ghaṭasya rūpam pradīpa apekṣayā pratīyate iti etāvatā tadāyattam bhavati yathā anyatra śabda pravṛttiḥ eva parameśvara apekṣā na evam paramātmani vṛttau= itara apekṣām kāma pi īkṣāmahe iti itas ca na ayam doṣaḥ iti āha sa apekṣā ca iti 
NSu_1.4.30d.1–1.4.30d.3	 sa apekṣā ca hari icchayā yā parameśvare śabdānām vṛttau= artha antara apekṣā sā ca bhagavat icchā nibandhanā eva na tu ananya gatikatayā iti atas na tasya amukhya artha tā prāptiḥ na hi icchayā prakṛti ādikam upādadānasya sṛṣṭiḥ para āyattā na api paṭu karaṇāḥ līlā nimittam icchayā daṇḍam avaṣṭabhya gacchan daṇḍa āyatta gatiḥ bhavati iti yadi evam hari sannidhāna ādinā śabdānām anyatra vṛttiḥ tat kim ayasi iva dagdhṛ śabdasya loke sarva śabdānām lakṣaṇā eva tathā sati gaṅgā tīrayoḥ aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ īkṣati adhikaraṇa ukta arthasya mūle nihitaḥ kuṭhāraḥ iti āśaṅkām pariharan= etat mūla tayā ityādinā uktam artham upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
