NSu_1.4.114ab.1–1.4.114ab.2	 vācā ārabdham tu sāṅketyam nāma syāt nanu ārambhaṇa śabdaḥ lyuḍantaḥ lyuh ca bhāve karaṇa adhikaraṇayoḥ ca vihitaḥ na karmaṇi naca kṛtyat luṭaḥ bahulam a iti karmaṇi lyuh prabala niyāmakam antareṇa bahula grahaṇasya karmaṇi vyākhyātum aśakya tvāt na ca ārabhyasya ārambhaṇam iti yujyate śabdaḥ a iti sva vacana virodhāt ca tat katham ārabdhaḥ iti vyākhyānam iti mā evam bhāvaḥ eva ārambhaṇa śabdasya aṅgīkārāt vācā vāc indriyeṇa ārambhaṇam utpādanam yasya iti tṛtīyāyāḥ aluk ṭāpam ca api halantānām yathā vācā niśā diśāa iti vacanāt vācayā arambhaṇam yasya iti vā bahuvrīhiḥ ayam tasya artha kathanam vācā ākhyam iti 
NSu_1.4.114ab.3–1.4.114b.3	 tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇa arthaḥ uttaratra sambaddhayate vācā ārambhaṇa śabdāt eva vikāra tva lābhāt vikāraḥ iti punaruktam syāt atas tāt paryam āha sa aṅka itya iti vācā ārambhaṇa śabdena sa aṅketikam nāma eva vācyam syāt avayava artha kathanam tu vaiśadya artham eva yathā caṣṭe anena iti cakṣuḥ iti nirvacana labhyā iti darśana kāraṇa tve cakṣuṣā paśyati iti na ukta artha tā tasyām daśāyām avayava arthasya avivakṣita tvāt tathā ca vācā ārambhaṇa śabdaḥ api sa aṅketika paryāyaḥ iti  vikṛtam bahu vikāra śabda artham āha vikṛtam iti anena vikriyate iti vikāraḥ iti karmaṇi ghañiti uktam bhavati vikṛta tva upapādakam artha antaram ca āha vahniti vividhaḥ mṛttikā iti eva satyam iti asya artham āha tu iti 
NSu_1.4.114cd.1–1.4.114cd.3	 nityam tu nāmadheyam yat mṛttikā ityādi vaidikam satya śabda arthaḥ nityam iti tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe ādi śabdena loha maṇya ādeḥ graḍaṇam yat mṛttikā ityādi saṃskṛtam nāmadheyam tat eva nityam iti sambandhaḥ vaidikam iti tad upapādanam tatas ca evam yojanā vācā ārambhaṇam sa aṅketikam nāmadheyam vikāraḥ utpattimat tatas eva anityam kutas bahuvidha tvāt puruṣa icchā anusāreṇa aneka prakāra tvāt mṛttikā ityādi nāmadheyam vaidika tvāt nityam anādi ca iti na ca vācā ārambhaṇam vikāraḥ iti liṅga vaiṣamya doṣaḥ nāmadheya vikāra śabdayoḥ niyata liṅga tvāt vācā ārambhaṇa śabdasya ca nāmadheya viśeṣaṇa tvāt viśeṣaṇānām ca viśeṣya nighna tvāt atas eva sa aṅketyam iti eva vaktavye sa aṅketi anāma iti avocat yadā tu vācā yasya ārambhaṇam tat nāmadheyam vikāraḥ janimat iti vācā nāmnām ārambhaṇam vividha ākāraḥ ākāra akāriṇoḥ abhedāt vikāri tvāt utpatti vināśa vat iti yāvat iti vā grantha antara uktā yojanā tadā liṅga vyatyāsa śaṅkā eva na asti iti 
NSu_1.4.114cd.4	 nanu ca sa aṅka itikā nāmanām utpatti vināśavat tvam saṃskṛta nāmnām anādi nitya tvam kimartham atra ucyate parama prakṛte brahma vijñānena sarva vijñāne avāntara prakṛte asmākam iva dṛṣṭānte ca upayoga abhāvāt atas asaṅgata tvāt na ayam śruti arthaḥ iti mā evam yadi api parasya iva na idam dṛṣṭānta upapādakam tathā api brahma jñānena sarva vijñāne dṛṣṭānta antara tayā upayokṣyate yathā tena tat vijñātam syāt iti prakṛta anuvṛtteḥ iti āśayavān āha prādhānyāt iti 
NSu_1.4.115.1–1.4.115.3^1	 prādhānyāt tad parijñānāt prākṛta ajñaḥ api pūruṣaḥ vidvān iti ucyate sadbhiḥ evam nitya para ātma vid idam uktam bhavati kṛtaka tvāt anitya tvāt ca para apekṣa tvena sa aṅketikam nāma apradhānam anādi nitya tvāt para anapekṣa tvena saṃskṛtam pradhānam tatra yathā prādhānyāt saṃskṛta jñāna mātreṇa sa aṅketikam jñānam bhavati tad jñānena yat phalam vidva dvaya vahāra gocara tva ādikam tat bhavati iti yāvat evam anitya tva ādinā pradhānasya devatā karma ādi miśrasya sakalasya api jagataḥ jñānena yat phalam tat samastam api nitya tva ādinā pradhānasya paramātmanaḥ jñānāt labhyate 
NSu_1.4.115.1–1.4.115.3^2	 tad phale antarbhavati iti atra prākṛta ajñaḥ api iti anena phala apekṣayā idam iti sūcitam evam tarhi eka vijñānena sarva vijñānam amukhyam syāt iti ced satyam na hi pareṇa api tat mukhyam vyākhyātum śakyam tathā sati dṛṣṭa mṛdaḥ puruṣasya ghaṭa śarāva ādi saṃsthāna viśeṣa ādi jijñāsā bhāva prasaṅgāt pāmarāḥ na hi vidvān iti vadanti atas sadbhiḥ iti uktam evam nitya para ātma vid iti vākyasya ukta anusāreṇa śeṣaḥ jñātavyaḥ nanu satya śabdaḥ katham nitya arthaḥ rūḍheḥ yogasya ca abhāvāt iti atas yogam tāvat darśayati sa dātanam iti 
NSu_1.4.116ab.1–1.4.116ab.3	 sadātanam satyam iti nityam eva ucyate budhaiḥ satyam iti iti āvartanīyam sadātanam satyam iti nirvacanena satyam iti padena nityam ucyate eva na tu upacaryate iti budhaiḥ vaiyākaraṇaiḥ iti nirvacana mūlam sūcayati sadā śabdāt tatra bhavaḥ iti artheavyayāt ti ap a iti tyappratyaye kṛte sarvasya saḥ anyatarasyām diḥ a iti atra yoga vibhāgāt sadā śabdasya saḥ anyatarasyām bhavati sadā śabdāt bhava arthe tad hitāḥ iti ḍya pratyayaḥ vā utpādyaḥ dakārasya ca takāraḥ idānīm rūḍhim api darśayati prayogaḥ ca iti 
NSu_1.4.116c.1–1.4.117.1	 prayogaḥ ca uttaratra asti uttaratra āṣyame prapāṭhake satya śabdasya nitya tvaḥ eva prayogaḥ ca asti iti sambandhaḥ tam eva prayogam darśayituṃyada enam jarauvāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vā kim tatas avaśiṣyata iti sa brūyāt na asya jarayā etat jīya ṛte na vadhena asya hanyate etat satyam brahma puram a iti vākyam arthataḥ paṭhati jarā iti  jarā yadi enam āpnuyāt dehaḥ pradhvaṃsate vā ayam kim tatas asya atiśiṣyate hanyate na vadhena ayam jarayā ca na jīryati 
NSu_1.4.118ab.1–1.4.118ab.2	 etat satyam brahma puram iti nitya tvaḥ eva hi yadā enam deham jarā avāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vā ayam dehaḥ tatas tat asya dehasya antargataḥ paramātmā dahyamāna geha antargata gagana vat kim atiśiṣyate kiṃvā paṭa ādi vat naśyati iti pṛṣṭe na asya dehasya jarayā ayam paramātmā jīryate asya vadhena na hanyate kintu etat brahma pūrṇa tvāt puram satyam nityam iti parihāraḥ abhidhīyate iti śabdasya pūrveṇa anvayaḥ atra api satya śabdaḥ kutas nitya arthaḥ iti atas āha nitya tvaḥ eva hi iti 
NSu_1.4.118ab.3^1	 atra satya śabdaḥ nitya arthaḥ ced saṅgacchate vināśasya prakṛta tvāt tathyā artha tāyām asaṅgatiḥ anṛta tāyāḥ aprastuta tvāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ etat eva spaṣṭīkartum etat satyam brahmapuram iti etāvati paṭhitavye pūrva vākyam api paṭhitam pūrveṇa eva sambandhaḥ brahmaṇaḥ jarā vadhayoḥ abhāve satya tvam hetu tvena ucyate iti ced na tvayā brahma vyatirikta satyasya anabhyupagata tvena anvaya abhāvāt jarā ādi upetānām dehānām asatya tva asya asiddheḥ asatyānām ca śukti rajata ādīnām jarā ādi abhāvena vyatirekasya api abhāvāt nanu tathā api vācā ārambhaṇa vākyam tri vāram kasmāt paṭhyate 
NSu_1.4.118ab.3^2–1.4.118ab.4	 śabda antaram dṛṣṭāntīkartum iti brūmaḥ tarhi ṣaṭ ete dṛṣṭāntāḥ syuḥ evam aiva etat tathā sati saṃskṛta śabda dṛṣṭānta trayam ekatra eva vaktavyam mā evam tat tad abhidheya prasaṅga āyattasya tad abhidhānasya tadā eva vaktavya tvāt tathā api pratiśabdam dṛṣṭāntīkaraṇe aparyavasāna prasakteḥ upalakṣaṇa tve ca ekena api kṛta tvāt śabda traya upādānam anupapannam iti ced na mṛd piṇḍa ādi dṛṣṭānta traya upādāne api asya samāna tvāt gahane prameye traya upādānam na doṣāya kintu buddhi vaiśadya hetu tayā guṇayā eva iti ced samam prakṛte api iti evam sva matena vācā ārambhaṇam ityādi vākyam vyākhyāya vivartavāt a vyākhyāne doṣam āha vācā ārambhaṇam iti 
NSu_1.4.118cd.1–1.4.118cd.3	 vācā ārambhaṇam iti ukte mithyā iti aśruta kalpanam uktam uktiḥ śabdaḥ iti yāvat vācā ārambhaṇam iti śabde mithyā iti vyākhyāyamāne sati iti śeṣaḥ tathā hi kim rūḍhim āśritya vācā ārambhaṇam iti asya mithyā iti vyākhyānam kriyate kiṃvā yogam ādye rūḍhi jñāpaka pramāṇa abhāvāt aśruta kalpanam atha ārabhyate iti ārambhaṇam iti dvitīyaḥ tathā api kṛt yoge ṣaṣṭhayām prāptāyām tṛtīya aṅgīkāre aśruta kalpanam lyuṭaḥ karmaṇi vidhāna abhāvāt ca aśruta kalpanam eva asmin= api pakṣe mithyātvasya alābhāt aśruta kalpanam vācā ārabhyatva mātreṇa tathā tve brahmaṇaḥ api tad prasaṅgāt vācā kevalam ārabhyate vikāraḥ na tu vastu vṛttena asti iti vyākhyāne mithyātvam labhyate iti ced na yatas śrutyā vācā ārambhaṇam iti eva ukte kevala śabda prakṣepeṇa mithyā iti vyākhyāne aśruta kalpanam eva iti dūṣaṇa antaram āha punaruktiḥ iti 
NSu_1.4.119a.1–1.4.119a.3	 punaruktiḥ nāmadheyam iti śabdaḥ atra adhyahāryaḥ āgāminaḥ vā kāka akṣi nyāyena ubhayatra sambandhaḥ nāmadheyam iti etat nāmadheya mātram hi etat anṛtam iti pareṇa vyākhyātam tasya vācā ārambhaṇam iti anena eva gata artha tvāt nāmadheyam iti punaruktiḥ syāt atha vikāraḥ nāmadheyam ca dvayam api vācā ārambhaṇam iti vyākhyānam tathā api vikāra śabdena eva abhidheya abhidhānayoḥ grahaṇa sambhavān nāmadhayem iti punaruktiḥ eva iti tad nāma rūpābhyām vyākriyate iti ādi śruteḥ doṣa antaram āha iti iti asya iti 
NSu_1.4.119b.1–1.4.119b.2	 iti iti asya nirarthatā mṛttikāyāḥ satya tvam hi parasya vivakṣitam tatra mṛttikā eva satyā iti vaktavye iti śabdaḥ tu nirarthakaḥ eva sa hi kvacid padārtha viparyāsa kṛt kvacid hetau kvāpi evam iti arthe kutracid ādi śabda arthe kvacid prakāra arthe kvacid parisamāptau na ca atra evam ādiṣu anyatamena arthena arthavān asmākam tuśabdāt arthe sampratyayaḥ a iti mṛttikā arthe prāpte tad parihāreṇa śabda svarūpa grahaṇa artham tad upapattiḥ pariṇāma vādinaḥ api kṛt yoge tṛtīyāyāḥ aṅgīkṛta tvāt lyuṭaḥ karmaṇi vyākhyāta tvāt vācā ārambhaṇam vikāraḥ nāmadheyam iti eteṣām padānām anvaya abhāvena pada antara adhyāhārasya iṣṭa tvāt aśruta kalpanam nāmadheyasya api vikāra grahaṇena grahaṇa sambhavāt punaruktiḥ iti śabdasya nirarthaka tā ca iti sphuṭa tvāt na uktam 
NSu_1.4.119b.3–1.4.119b.4	 nanu tena iti śabdaḥ prakāra vacanaḥ iti uktam tat katham nirarthaka tā ucyate kārya kāraṇayoḥ bheda śaṅkā nirāsa artham hi idam ucyate tatra yat sattayā mṛttikā satī tayā eva mṛṇmayam satyam iti vyācakṣāṇena vaktavyam kā iyam sattā vivakṣitā iti svarūpa sattā ced sādhya aviśiṣṭa tā yaḥ hi kārya kāraṇayoḥ bhedam manyate sa katham kāraṇa svarūpeṇa eva kāryam svarūpa vat iti aṅgīkuryāt atha sāmānya sattā sā anaikāntikī na hi mahiṣa sattayā san= aśvaḥ mahiṣāt na bhidyate atha mṛttikā satta adhīna sattākam mṛṇmayam iti vivakṣitam iti tathā api kulāla ādi satta adhīna sattākam api bhavati iti anaikāntyam eva viruddham catat yat yat adhīnam tat eva tat iti atas vivakṣita sādhana anupayogi tvāt iti śabdasya tad mate api nirarthaka tā eva iti idānīm yathā somya ityādīni dṛṣṭānta vākyāni sva matena vyākariṣyan parakīya vyākhyāyām tāvat doṣam āha ekaḥ iti 
NSu_1.4.119cd.1–1.4.120a.1–1.4.120a.2^1	 ekaḥ piṇḍaḥ maṇiḥ ca iti pada vaiyathya rmā iva ca vikāra tva vivakṣāyām pada samuccaye prathamaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti śabdasya pratyekam sambandhaḥ vaiyarthyam vigata artha tvam viruddha artha tvam ca eva śabdena vaiyarthyasya aparihāryatām āha caśabdasya vivarta vivakṣāyām ca iti arthaḥ jagataḥ brahma vikāra tvena tad āropita tvena ca eka vijñānena sarva vijñāne vivakṣite mṛdā vijñātayā mṛṇmayam vijñātam syāt lohena vijñātena loha mayam vijñātam syāt kṛṣṇāyasā vijñātena kārṣṇāyasam vijñātam syāt iti etāvatā pūrṇa tvāt trayāṇām eka śabdānām piṇḍa maṇi nakha nikṛntana śabdānām sarva śabdānām ca vigata atha ṛtvam syāt 
NSu_1.4.120a.1–1.4.120a.2^2	 sarva mṛṇmayā ādīnām eka mṛd piṇḍa ādi vikāra tva abhāvāt viruddha artha tā ca syāt āropita tvam tu ekasya api mṛṇmayasya ekasmin mṛd piṇḍe na asti kutas sarvasya yuktyā samathya rtaḥ iti ced tarhi vivāda pada tvena dṛṣṭānta tā anupapattiḥ laukika parīkṣakāṇām yasmin= arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ a iti hi nyāya vidaḥ kintu ghaṭa ādīnām abādhita pratyakṣa ādi siddha tvena yuktiḥ eva ābhāsa bhūtā iti paramāṇu puñja vāda nirāse vakṣyate āropita tve api na ekasmin sarvam iti eka ādi padānām vaiyarthyam eva 
NSu_1.4.120a.3–1.4.120d.1	 nanvakena iti parama akāraṇasya ekatvam piṇḍena iti kārya abhimukhyam sarvam iti kārya nānā tvam vivakṣitam atas katham vaiyarthyam iti mā evam dārṣya antika vākye tad vivakṣāyām atra vaiyarthya aparihārāt api ca ādyayoḥ dṛṣṭāntayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva mātram asti kintu eka ādi pada vaiyarthyam eva idantu sarvathā na upapadyate yathā somya ekena nakha nikṛntanena iti nakha nikṛntanasya antya avayavi tvena kārṣṇāyasa antaram prati kāraṇa tvasya eva asambhavāt kim vekasya sarvam pratīti āha na ca iti  naca eka nakha kṛntanam sarva kārṣṇāyasam ca syāt sarvam ca iti dvitīya ca śabda sambandhaḥ yadi atra dṛṣṭānta traye na vikāra vivarta vivakṣā kim tarhi vivakṣitam iti atas āha atas iti  atas sādṛśyaḥ eva ca 
NSu_1.4.121ab.1–1.4.121ab.3	 vivakṣā atra tu nitya tve prādhānye ca ukta vartmanā artha antarasya dūṣita tvāt iti arthaḥ caśabda avitarotara samuccaye tuśabdena nitya tvam viśinaṣṭi nitya tvam prādhānya upapādakam eva na tu svatantram eka vijñānena sarva vijñānasya iti mṛd piṇḍa ādi dṛṣṭānta trayam sādṛśya viṣayam vācā ārambhaṇam ityādi tu prādhānya viṣayam iti vivektavyam vācā ārambhaṇa dṛṣṭāntasya pūrvam eva vyākhyāta tvāt kim punarvacanena iti ced na buddhayā āroha artham uktasya api anuktena saha ekena vākyena ukti sambhavāt iti āśayena uktam uktā iti sādṛśyāt eka vijñānena sarva vijñānam ācāryeṇa anyatra vyutpāditam atra anusandheyam tathā mṛd piṇḍa ādi dṛṣṭāntānām avāntara bhedaḥ api iti nanu asmin= api pakṣesat eva somya idam agre āsīt a ityādeḥ uttara granthasya saṅgatyabhāvaḥ doṣaḥ asmākam tu kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādi prapañca artha tvena asti upayogaḥ iti atas āha prādhānya iti 
NSu_1.4.121cd.1–1.4.121cd.3	 prādhānya pratipatti artham sṛṣṭayā ādeḥ ca eva vistaraḥ ādipadena pralaye avasthānam trivṛt karaṇam jīva rūpeṇa praveśanam iti ādikam gṛhyate prādhānyāt brahma jñānena sarva jñānasya phalam bhavati iti ukte kutas tasya prādhānyam iti āśaṅkāyām tad pratipatti artham sṛṣṭayā ādeḥ pratipādakaḥ eva grantha vistaraḥ pravṛttaḥ atas katham asaṅgatiḥ iti caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe na tu upādāna tva ādi pratipatti artham iti na hi upādanām prekṣā pūrvam kāryam karoti na api adhiṣṭhānam adhyastam eṣa ca iti vā sambandhaḥ tenaa pāgāt agneḥ agni tvam a ityādi api parasya brahmaṇaḥ prādhānya pratipatti artham eva iti uktam bhavati tathā ca uktam bhāṣye vivartam ata nirākaraṇam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
NSu_1.4.122ab.1–1.4.122ab.2	 tasmāt kena api mārgeṇa na vivarta matam bhavet kena api mārgeṇa iti brahma avidyā apekṣayā vā jīva avidyā pakṣeṇa vā eka jīva matena vā aneka jīva matena vā sva pakṣa sādhanena vā para pakṣa nirāsena vā yukti paryālocanayā vā śruti paryālocanayā vā vicāritam iti śeṣaḥ na bhavet upapannam iti adhyāhāraḥ tatas kim iti atas āha tat iti 
NSu_1.4.122cd.1–1.4.122cd.3	 tad asaṅkha yāta doṣetam heyam eva śubha arthibhiḥ tat vivarta matam tasmāt ita vā tasya eva vivaraṇam asaṅkhayā tadoṣetam yasmāt iti heyam eva tat na tu tad ukta rītyā sūtra arthaḥ grāhyaḥ etena paramatanirākaraṇasya asaṅgatiḥ api nirastāḥ veditavyā yadi ukta atirikta doṣāḥ santi tarhi dūṣaṇa abhidhānāya pravṛttaiḥ vaktavyāḥ kim uparameṇa iti atas āha asaṅkhayatvena iti 
NSu_1.4.123a–1.4.123c.3	 asaṅkhayatvena doṣāṇām grantha ādhikya bhayāt api uparamyate doṣāṇām ati bahu tvena kāṃścid uktvā keṣāñcid upalakṣaṇena eva uparantavyam upalakṣaṇam ca etāvatā api bhavati iti uparamyate iti sarve api vaktavyāḥ kim upalakṣaṇa tvena iti atas uktam grantha iti grantha ādhikye hi śrotṝṇām pravṛttiḥ na syāt tathā ca kṛtam api akṛtam syāt iti bhayāt api iti arthaḥ yadi na upādāna tayā vibhrama adhiṣṭhāna tayā vā brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tvam kīdṛśam tarhi janma ādi sūtre abhitiham iti atas āha tatas iti 
NSu_1.4.123de.1–1.4.123de.3	 tatas viṣṇuḥ icchā pūrva kam aśramaḥ karoti pitṛ vat viśvam pariṇāma ādi vādasya nirasta tvāt iti arthaḥ pitṛ vat icchā pūrvakam iti katṛ tvena nimitta tvam abhipraiti vicitra aneka kārya kartṛ tve śrama ādi doṣāḥ prasajyante iti atas uktam aśramaḥ iti tat uktam antaryāmī adhikaraṇe yat vā āśramaḥ iti enena idam abhipraiti adhikam tu bheda nirdeśāt a ityādinā brahmaṇaḥ śrama ādiḥ nirasiṣyate na ca apādāna ādeḥ śrama ādi prasaktiḥ asti atas api kartṛ tvam eva abhipretam sūtrakārasya iti evam asmin= adhyāye para brahmaṇi nārāyaṇe pratipāditasya sakala śruti samanvayasya phalam janma ādi sūtra udita lakṣaṇa siddhim upasaṃharati pūrṇā iti 
NSu_1.4.123f.1–1.4.123f.4	 pūrṇa śeṣa guṇa ātmakaḥ pūrṇāḥ pratyekam niravadhikāḥ yat padam veda saṃvedyam kaṭākṣeṇa api vīkṣitum na kṣamante vimatayaḥ tam upāse śriyaḥ patim eka vākyatā siddhaye prathama adhyāya artha saṅgata tvena dvitīya adhyāya artham vivakṣuḥ abuddhi sthena saṅgateḥ darśayitum aśakyatvāt prathama adhyāya artham tāvat anuvadati uktaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.1a.1–2.1.1a.2	 uktaḥ samanvayaḥ sākṣāt jagat janma ādi nimitta kāraṇe sārvajjñasarva aiśvarya ādi ananta guṇa paripūrṇe avidyā āt yavadyagandha vidhure pare brahmaṇi nārāyaṇe svara varṇa pada vākya mahā vākya rūpasya samastasya śāstrasya sākṣāt parama mukhyayā vṛttyā na tu lakṣaṇayā tathā mahātātparyeṇa na tu pārārthyena samanvayaḥ prathame adhyāye samarthitaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.1.1a.3–2.1.1a.4	 yadi api samanvaya śabdena eva sākṣāt iti arthaḥ labhyate tathā api parakīya saṃśabda vyākhyāna nirasane avahitaiḥ bhavitavyam iti sūcanāya tat vaya ākhyānam idam kṛtam iti adoṣaḥ athavā samanvaya śabdena mukhyayā vṛttyā anvayaḥ pratīyate parama mukhyayā tu vṛttyā anvayam darśayitum sākṣāt iti uktam yat vā na pradhāna paramāṇu ādi nirāsanena upādāna tva ādi pratipādanena ca paramparayā kintu sākṣāt eva iti anena ācaṣṭe evam prathama adhyāya artham abhidhāya tad saṅgata tvena dvitīya adhyāya artham āha avirodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.1b.1–2.1.1b.2	 avirodhaḥ atra sādhyate atra ukte arthe avirodhaḥ virodha abhāvaḥ atra vyāci khyāsita tayā buddhi sannihite dvitīye sādhyate anena asya adhyāsya atīta adhyāyena kārya kāraṇa bhāva lakṣaṇa saṅgatiḥ sūcitā bhavati sakala śāstrasya samanvayena jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tve samasta gura pūrṇa tve a śeṣa doṣa vidhura tve ca parasya brahmaṇaḥ abhihitaḥ eva tatra virodhaḥ sphurati na anyathā nirāśraya tvāt virodha sphūrtau= eva tad abhāva sādhanasya avasaraḥ na itarathā aprāpta pratiṣedha ayogāt atas atīta adhyāya arthasya kāraṇa tvam etat adhyāya arthasya kārya tvam niścīyate athavā śruti samanvayena upapāditaḥ api arthaḥ na tāvat śrotṝṇām dṛḍha nirūḍhaḥ bhavati yāvat atra pratīte virodha abhāvaḥ na sādhyate virodhena śrutīnām eva aprāmāṇya śaṅkanāt tathā ca anupapādita kalpaḥ eva āpadyate virodha abhāva sādhane tu bhavati eva dṛḍha nirūḍhaḥ yathā uktam vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥa iti atas viparīta kārya kāraṇa bhāva lakṣaṇāḥ anayossaṅgatiḥ 
NSu_2.1.1b.3–2.1.1b.4	 nanu ukta arthe virodhaḥ tatra tatra eva parihṛtaḥ kim atra pariśiṣyate yad artha madhyāya antara ārambhaḥ satyam prativakṣyati atra ācāryaḥ nanu evam adhyāyasya avirodha lakṣaṇa eka artha tvena eka vākya tve sati pāda bhedaḥ kinnibandhanaḥ tatra api asya pādasya prāthamyam kinnibandhanam iti apekṣāyām āha caturvidhasya iti 
NSu_2.1.1c.1–2.1.1c.3	 caturvidhasya tasya ādau yauktaḥ tasya avirodhasya nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī ādau prathama pāde avirodhaḥ sādhyate iti anuvartate caturvidhasya tasya iti anuvādāt sa caturvidhaḥ iti labhyate tat ayam arthaḥ yadi api ukte arthe virodha abhāvaḥ iti ekaḥ arthaḥ tathā api yukti samaya śruti nyāya upeta śruti virodha abhāva rūpa avāntara bhedena sa caturvidhaḥ bhavati tad pratipādanena caturṇām pādānām bhedaḥ yujyate tasya caturvidhasya api virodha abhāvasya madhye yukti virodha abhāvaḥ prathama pāde sādhyate sarveṣām api virodhānām yukti upajīvitavena tad virodhasya prabala tayā tad abhāva sādhanasya prāthamya upapatteḥ yukti puraskāreṇa yukti upajīvi tvena tad virodhasya prabala tayā tad abhāva sādhanasya prāthamya upapatteḥ yukti puraskāreṇa pravartanāt ca vicāra śāstrasya iti 
NSu_2.1.1c.4–2.1.1c.5	 nanu katham abhāvasya cāturvidhyam ucyate caturvidhāḥ hi virodhinaḥ yukti ādayaḥ tad upadhānāt virodhaḥ api caturvidhaḥ abhidhīyate tatas tad pratiyogikaḥ abhāvaḥ api tathā ucyate atas eva yauktaḥ iti upapannam abhāvasya api paramparayā yukti sambandhi tvāt athavā avirodha pada sannidhāpitaḥ virodhaḥ tasya iti parāmṛśate tathā ca virodhasya yukti ādi upadhānena caturvidha tvāt tad abhāva sādhanena pāda bhedaḥ yujyate caturvidhasya tasya virodhasya madhye yauktaḥ virodhaḥ ādau= ukta prakāreṇa prabalaḥ yatas tasmāt tad abhāvaḥ atra ādau sādhyate iti yojanīyam yat vā tasya iti virodhi parāmarśaḥ ayam tasya api avirodha padena buddhi sannihita tvāt avirodhaḥ hi virodha dhīna nirūpaṇaḥ virodhaḥ ca virodhinā vinā na upapadyate tatas ca virodhinaḥ yukti ādi bhedena caturvidha tvāt virodha abhāva sādhanena pāda bheda upapattiḥ caturvidhasya api tasya virodhinaḥ madhye yukteḥ prabala tvāt ādau yauktaḥ yukti sambandhī virodha abhāvaḥ sādhyate iti yojyam prathama adhikaraṇe viśeṣam āha tatra api iti 
NSu_2.1.1d.1–2.1.1d.3	 tatra api ca smṛteḥ apipadam ādau= iti asya anukaṣarṇa artham tatra yukti virodha abhāva pratipādake api pādaḥ iti anaucitya śaṅkā sūcana artham vā caśabdena avirodhaḥ sādhyate iti etat anukṛṣṭate smṛteḥ pāśupata ādikāyāḥ yadi api smṛteḥ iti asya na nañarthena sambandhaḥ ghaṭate virodhaḥ ca samāse guṇa bhūtaḥ tathā api buddhayā viviktena tena sambandhaḥ sambhavati yukti virodha parihāra lakṣaṇe atra pāde smṛti virodha parihāraḥ na kartavyaḥ asaṅgata tvāt kartavyatāyām vā prāthamyam kutas iti atas āha tasyāḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.2a.1–2.1.2a.4	 tasyāḥ catur svarūpa tvāt tasyāḥ pāśupata ādi smṛteḥ yukti samaya ādi virodhi catussva rūpa tvāt etat uktam bhavati pāśupata ādi smṛtayaḥ hi svayam āpta abhimata vākya tayā samaya rūpāḥ api sva abhimata arthe yuktīḥ śrutīḥ ca saṃvādayantyaḥ yukti samaya ādi virodhi catuṣyaya rūpāḥ tatas ca ukte arthe tad virodha parihāraḥ adhyāye antarbhavati eva kintu pāda catuṣyaya artha saṅgataḥ ayam na niṣkṛṣṭa ekatra eva pāde antarbhavati tatas adhyāya ādau tad ante vā vaktavyaḥ prathama atikrame ca kāraṇam na kiñcid asti ityādya adhikaraṇe nirūpyate iti evañca tatra api ca smṛteḥ iti ayam uktasya apavādaḥ bhavan= api na sarvathā iti uktam bhavati samaya ādi virodhasya api parihāreṇa niṣkṛṣṭa pāda artha abhāvāt yukti virodha parihārasya api bhāvena antar bhāva sambhavāt ca ekasya eva adhikaraṇasya pāda catuṣyaya artha sambandhena catussva rūpa tva kathana prasaṅgat śiṣyāṇām śāstre bahu māna utpādanāya anyat api cāturvidhyam vakti pratyekam iti 
NSu_2.1.2bc.1–2.1.2bc.3	 pratyekam catur ātmakāḥ pādāḥ sarve tad aṃśāḥ ca catvāraḥ api pādāḥ pratyekam catur ātmakāḥ pāda catuṣyayā arthavantaḥ draṣṭavyāḥ tat yathā yukti virodha parihāra lakṣaṇaḥ api ayam pādaḥ samaya ādi traya virodha parihāra ātmakaḥ api bhavati tathā samaya virodha parihāra lakṣaṇaḥ api dvitīyaḥ yukti ādi traya virodha parihāra ātmakaḥ api bhavati ityādi pādāḥ iti eva ukte sannihita tvāt etat adhyāya gatāḥ eva iti jñāyate tad artham sarve iti uktam sarva adhyāya sambandhinaḥ api iti arthaḥ yaḥ yat adhyāya gataḥ pādaḥ sa tad adhyāya pāda catuṣyaya arthavān avadheyaḥ na kevalam evam pādāḥ kintu tad aṃśāḥ ca te pādāḥ aṃśāḥ yeṣām te tad aṃśāḥ adhyāyāḥ iti arthaḥ prathama adhyāyaḥ samanvayasya iva avirodha ādi trayasya api pratipādakaḥ bhavati ityādi pādānām catur ātmaka tve adhikaraṇānām tathātvam siddham eva na ca evam adhyāya ādi bheda anupapattiḥ paunaruktyadoṣaḥ ca iti vācyam vivakṣā bhedena sāmañjasyāt yadā prathamaḥ samanvayasya arthaḥ vivakṣyate na tadā tad artha tā itareṣām ityādi anyat ādi cāturvidhyam śāstrasya darśayati mūrtīnām iti 
NSu_2.1.2d.1–2.1.3.1	 mūrtīnām varṇam ā agamāt catasṛṇām vāsudeva ādi mūrtīnām pratipādaka tvena api catur ātmaka tvam jñātavyam iti yojanā nanu etat uktam eva punar kasmāt ucyate iti atas āha varṇam iti atra āgama āditya aṅga dvayasya upaśleṣaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tatra ādyasya ārabhyā iti arthaḥ dvitīyaḥ abhividhau āgamaḥ iti caturadhyāyi śāstram ucyate tatas ca ayam arthaḥ na kevalam pratyakṣaram pratipadam pratisūtram pratyadhikaraṇam kintu etat śāstra gatam ekam varṇam ārabhyaḥ ā sarva śāstrāt pratyadhikaraṇam pratipādam pratyādhyāyam samastena śāstreṇa ca catasraḥ mūrtayaḥ pratipādyante iti arthaḥ kutas etat avagantavyam iti atas āha āgamāt iti bṛhat tantra ādeḥ iti arthaḥ etad pāda adhikaraṇa pūrva pakṣa siddhānta yuktīḥ saṅkṣepeṇa āha āpta tā ityādinā āpta tā samatā dṛṣṭi śruti sāmya balāt bhavāḥ sarva anusāraḥ laghu tā viśeṣa adarśana aphale 
NSu_2.1.4.1–2.1.4.2	 iṣya siddhiḥ ca niyamaḥ pūrva pakṣeṣu yuktayaḥ etāḥ eva tu atibalā siddhāntasya niyāmakāḥ ukta artham smṛti virodhena ākṣipya samādadhat sūtram smṛti anavakāśa doṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na anya smṛti anavakāśa doṣa prasaṅgāt iti asya arthaḥ yat uktam parasya brahmaṇaḥ viṣṇoḥ sakala jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam sārvajñi ādi sakala guṇa pūrṇa tvam samasta doṣa dūra tvam ca tat ayuktam pāśupatasāṅkhaya bauddha arhata ādi smṛti viruddha tvāt tāḥ hi śiva prabhṛtīnām eva jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tva ādikam pratipādayanti na ca tāsām anyaḥ avakāśaḥ asti yena pratīte api arthe tātparya abhāvam pratīmaḥ anyathā tāsām smṛtīnām anavakāśena aprāmāṇya lakṣaṇa doṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti tat na puruṣottamasya eva pañca rātra ādi smṛtibhiḥ akhila jagat kāraṇa tva ādeḥ ukta tvāt aparathā tāsām pāśupata ādibhyaḥ anyāsām pañca rātra ādi smṛtīnām avakāśa antara abhāvena aprāmāṇya doṣa prasaṅgāt iti 
NSu_2.1.4.3–2.1.4.4	 tatra ākṣepaḥ tāvat ayam ayuktaḥ śruti samanvayena asya arthasya sādhita tvāt śruti viruddhānām smṛtīnām aprāmāṇyasya iṣṭa tvāt śruti samanvaya nyāyena pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām api para brahmaṇi samanvayena śiva arcana ādi paratvena vā sa avakāśa tvāt ca samādhānam api idam ayuktam sakala śāstra pramāṇaka tva mukta arthasya abhidhāya idānīm smṛti mātra upādāne kāraṇa abhāvāt para abhidhitsitam doṣam avabuddhaya śruti parityāgaḥ tu ayuktaḥ kintu sa parihartavyaḥ anyathā prāk api śrutiḥ anādeyā syāt kiñca pañca rātra ādi smṛtīnām aprāmāṇyam parasya iṣyam eva vāsudeva arcana ādi paratayā sa avakāśa tā api tena sambhāvyeta sāmya āpādana mātre api parasya eva jayaḥ niścaya pratibandhaka tvāt iti atas nirdalam pūrva pakṣa tāvat ujjīvayati āptaiḥ iti smṛti anavakāśa doṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na anya smṛti anavakāśa doṣa prasaṅgāt 
NSu_2.1.5.1–2.1.5.2	 āptaiḥ pratyakṣatas dṛṣṭvā proktam artham katham śratiḥ pipīlikā lipi nibhāḥ vārayeta sarvagāḥ hi te ayam iha abhisandhiḥ pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ śruti virodhena smṛtīnām aprāmāṇyam abhilaṣatā prabala durbala tve sarvathā samarthanīye anyathā ati prasaṅgāt na tāvat prāmāṇya kāraṇa bhāva abhāvābhyām prābalya daurbalye prāmāṇyasya svatastvena aṅgīkṛta tvāt vaiparītyāt ca vākya prāmāṇye hi kāraṇam vaktuḥ āpta tvam vaktāraḥ ca smṛtīnām āptāḥ na śruteḥ apauruṣeya tvena aṅgīkṛta tvāt atas eva sa mūla tva nirmūla tvābhyām smṛtī nām āpti mūla tvāt śruteḥ tad abhāvāt na api kṛttimatvā akṛtrima tvābhyām svarūpataḥ aprayojaka tvāt ukta rītyā vaiparītyāt ca tat idam uktam āptaiḥ rudra kapila kam ala āsana ādibhiḥ uktam artham śiva ādīnām jagat kāraṇa tva ādikam pipīlikā lipi nibhā buddhi pūrva praṇaya hīnāḥ śrutiḥ katham vārayet na katham api iti 
NSu_2.1.5.3	 nanu audumbarīm spṛṣṭvā udgāyet iti ādi śruti viruddhānām audumbarī sarvā veṣyayitavyā ityādi smṛtīnām aprāmāṇyam upalabdham tathā atra syāt na syāt vaiṣamyāt śruti mūla tayā abhimatāḥ hi tāḥ smṛtayaḥ atas tāsām mūla śruti anumāpaka tvena prāmāṇyam iṣyam na ca śruti viruddhāyāḥ smṛteḥ mūla śruti anumāpaka tvam sambhavati iti aprāmāṇyam eva yuktam yathā aha jaiminiḥ virodhe tu anapekṣam syāt asati hi anumānam a iti na ca evam prakṛte pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām śiva ādi pratyakṣa mūla tvena śruti mūla tva abhāvāt tat idam āha pratyakṣataḥ dṛṣṭvā iti nanu tarhi smṛtīnām ukta rītyā sa avakāśa tvāt niravakāśa śruti virodhena aprāmāṇyam astu mā evam vaiparītyāt smṛtayaḥ hi vispaṣṭa vādinyaḥ na vivakṣita arthāt pracyāvanam arhanti śrutayaḥ tu asphuṭa vikṣipta vādinyaḥ avyavasthita ālaukika śābda lakṣaṇa viṣayā aśakya adhyayana anantā paripūrṇa vākya rūpāḥ na artha viśeṣa niṣṭhāḥ lakṣyante atas eva bhavatām mīmāṃsā āyāsaḥ etat api uktam prakarṣeṇa uktam iti vispaṣṭam uktam iti arthaḥ pipīlikā ālipinibhā iti ca asphuṭa iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.1.5.4–2.1.5.7	 kiñca śrutayaḥ tāvat avispaṣṭa arthāḥ praṇetṛ vyākhyāna sampradāya vikalāḥ na svatantrāḥ kam api artham pratipādayitum īśate kintu sahaja siddhena yogardhi labdhena vā pratyakṣeṇa aśeṣa artha darśinām āptānām vacanam anusṛtya netavyāḥ yathā uktam itihāsa purāṇābhyām vedam samupabṛṃhayet iti itihāsa purāṇa grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam tathā ca katham pāśupata ādi smṛti ukta artha nivāraṇāya samarthāssyuḥ tat idam uktam pipīlikā lipi nibhā saṃvādena vinā kam api artham pratipādayitum asamarthā śrutiḥ yat vacana saṃvāda apekṣiṇī taiḥ eva āptaiḥ pratyakṣatas dṛṣṭvā proktam artham katham vārayet svatantra daśa āyāma pratipādaka tvāt pāratantrye tu virodha abhāvāt eva kintu tad anusāreṇa eva netavya iti bhavet etat yadi pāśupata ādi smṛti praṇetṝṇām āpta tvam syāt tat eva kutas iti atas āha sarvagā hi iti sarvam gacchanti avagacchanti iti sarvagāḥ āptatva upalakṣaṇam etat te rudra ādayaḥ hi iti tatra pramāṇa prasiddhim dyotayati athavā sarvajña tvam eva atra pramāṇa prasiddhayā sādhyate tatas eva anyasya siddheḥ 
NSu_2.1.5.8^1	 tathā hi hari hara hiraṇyagarbhāḥ tāvat sarvajña tayā śruti itihāsa purāṇeṣu prasiddhāḥ tatra hareḥ eva avatārāḥ buddha ṛṣabha kapilāḥ saugata ādi smṛti praṇetāraḥ tathā ca teṣām moha abhāvena rāga dveṣayoḥ api abhāvāt vipralipsā ca nivartate kiñca jñāna icchā prayatna sthāna karaṇa pāṭavāni tāvat upadeśa mātreṇa teṣām niścīyante kiñca jñāna icchā prayatna sthāna karaṇa pāṭavāni tāvat upadeśa mātreṇa teṣām niścīyante jñānam tu yathārtham ayathārtham vā syāt icchā api pratipipādayiṣā vā vipralipsā vā iti sandehaḥ avaśiṣyate tatra abhyāsa daśā āpannaḥ ayam arthaḥ asya iti sāmānyatas niścaye bhavati eva tasya jñānasya yathārtha tva niścayaḥ yathā abhyāsa daśa āpannam idam araṇyam amīṣām mleñchānām atas asmin= ete mārga abhijñāḥ iti pānthānām eva niścayaḥ 
NSu_2.1.5.8^2–2.1.5.9	 vipralipsā ca hetu darśanena vyāptā hetau sati syāt sa ca dvi rūpaḥ sva upakāraḥ para apakāraḥ vā na tāvat pāntheṣu vimārgeṇa pratiṣṭhamāneṣu mleñchānām kaścid sva upakāraḥ svasya gṛhīta tvāt śarīrasya ca karaṇīya antara bhāvāt bhāve vā parityāga ayogāt na api dvitīyaḥ na hi anunmattāḥ anapakāriṇam apakurvate na api para apakāra mātram puruṣa arthaḥ tathā sati sarvaḥ sarvam apakuryāt iti evam vipralipsā api nivāryate anabhyāsa daśā āpanne tu viṣaye pramāṇa antara saṃvādāt pravṛtti sāmarthyāt vā moha vipralipsayoḥ nivṛttiḥ iti atas mleñchāḥ api āptāḥ bhavanti kim uta mahā anubhāvāḥ rudra ādayaḥ iti evam pūrva pakṣa sūtra abhiprāyam abhidhāya siddhānta sūtra tātparyam āha iti ced iti 
NSu_2.1.6a–2.1.6c.2	 iti ced yadi aśeṣa jñāḥ rudra ādyāḥ hari pūrvakāḥ kim na aśeṣa vidaḥ tat na iti śeṣaḥ kutas niścite hi pāśupata ādi smṛti prāmāṇye tad viruddham viṣṇossarva jagat kāraṇa tva ādikam asat syāt na ca evam sat pratipakṣa tvāt āstām tāvat chatiḥ pañcarātra ādi smṛtayaḥ hi viṣṇoḥ eva sakala jagat kāraṇa tva ādikam abhidadhānāḥ dṛśyante 
NSu_2.1.6a–2.1.6c.4	 nanu viruddhayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ sāmye sati sat pratipakṣatā syāt na ca evam prakṛte pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām āpta praṇīta tvāt vispaṣṭa vādi tvena niravakāśa tvāt ca pañcarātra ādi smṛtīnām tad abhāvāt iti atas āha yadi iti aśeṣa jñāḥ aśeṣa vidaḥ iti āpta tva upalakṣaṇam hari pūrvakāḥ harim anuprabhṛtayaḥ pañca rātra ādīnām api tad upeyam na ca viśeṣa hetuḥ asti iti bhāvaḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etat vispaṣṭa vādi tvena niravakāśa tvam ca draṣṭavyam kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha mānam iti 
NSu_2.1.6cd.1–2.1.6cd.4^1	 mānam hi ubhayatra samam bhavet hi śabdaḥ hetau yasmāt evam tasmāt ubhayatra pūrva pakṣa siddhāntayoḥ mānam smṛti dvayam samam bhavet tathā ca pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām sat pratipakṣa tvam sthitam iti śeṣaḥ nanu ye viruddhe pramāṇe na tayoḥ sāmyam śukti rajata jñānayoḥ tad abhāva darśanāt ye ca same na tayoḥ virodhaḥ paṭa śuklaḥ dīrghaḥ ca iti atra tad abhāvāt tat katham pāśupata ādi smṛteḥ sat pratipakṣa tva sambhavaḥ sambhave api jitam pareṇa siddhānta nirṇayasya ayogāt ityataḥ āha mānam iti ubhayatra dvayossmaraṇayoḥ madhye yat samam saha mayā mūla pramāṇena vartate tat eva mānam anyat apramāṇam 
NSu_2.1.6cd.1–2.1.6cd.4^2	 etat uktam bhavati viśeṣa anirdhāraṇāyām eva sat pratipakṣa tvam vastutas tu sa mūlam mānam anyadamānam iti nanu sa mūla tvena prāmāṇya avadhāraṇe prāmāṇyasya paratas tu āpattiḥ mā evam paraspara virodhena aprāmāṇya śaṅkā prāptau sa mūla tvena tad apanayanāt tathā ubhayatra smaraṇe yat pañcarātra ādi smaraṇam samam sa mūla pramāṇam saṃvādi pamāṇa antara upetam ca tat eva mānam bhavet na tu pāśupata ādikam mūla ādi abhāvāt atas na ukta doṣaḥ iti yojyam vakṣyete hi śruti mūla tva tad saṃvādi tve ca pañca rātra ādīnām nanu katham pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām nirmūla tvāt yāvatā paśupati prabhṛtīnām āptiḥ tatra mūlamuditā iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.1.7ab.1–2.1.7ab.3	 na ca āpti niścayaḥ tatra śakyate vyabhicārataḥ tatra śiva ādiṣu niścaya upāya abhāvāt iti śeṣaḥ nanu uktam atra sarvagāḥ hi te a iti mā evam nityam vṛddhi kṣaya upetam a ityādinā parama puruṣa āditareṣām sārvajñya abhāvasya ukta tvāt śruti ādīnām ca upacarita tvāt nanu asti tāvat viṣṇoḥ anupacarita sārvajñyam śiva ādīnām api upāya upeya viṣayam kim gaṅgā vālukā kīṭa saṅkhayā parijñānena satyam na tāvat tattva jñānam eva āptiḥ vipralambhake ati vyāptiḥ iti āha vyabhicarate iti 
NSu_2.1.7ab.4	 atha ucyeta sarvajñānām moha abhāvāt tad mūlayoḥ rāga dveṣayoḥ abhāve vipralipsā api nivartate iti āpti niścayaḥ iti kim tatra sarve api tīrthakarāḥ āptā iti aṅgīkṛtya evam anumīyate uta sva sva abhimatam ekam eva ādyam dūṣayati vyabhicārate iti pañcarātra ādi smṛti praṇetari nārāyaṇe asya aṅgīkārasya bhagna tvāt iti arthaḥ abhaṅge vā siddham 
NSu_2.1.7ab.5	 naḥ samīhitam yat vā vyabhicāraḥ anyonya virodhaḥ na hi paraspara viruddha vādinaḥ sarve api āptāḥ iti aṅgīkartum ucitam vastu vikalpa prasaṅgāt dvitīyam parācaṣṭe vyabhicārate iti yasya tīrthakarasya āpta tvam na aṅgīkriyate tatra eva sārvajñyasya vyabhicārāt iti arthaḥ na ca tatra sāvarjñyam na aṅgīkriyate iti yuktam samāna nyāya tvāt atha hetum viśiṃṣyāt tadā sandigdha asiddhayā ādikam 
NSu_2.1.7ab.6^1	 yat api uktam jñāna icchā prayatna sthāna karaṇa pāṭavāni tāvat upadeśa mātreṇa niścīyante iti tat na apaṭu karaṇānām api upadeśa darśanena vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicarate iti upadeśa viśeṣaṇe ca uktaḥ doṣaḥ niścīyatām jñānam tasya yāthārthyam tu kutas abhyāsa daśā āpannaḥ ayam arthaḥ asya iti sāmānya niścaye sati tad siddhiḥ iti na iti āha vyabhicārate iti vyabhicāraḥ viprakarṣaḥ teṣām eva sannidhānam durlabham asmad ādīnām dūre tadīya abhyāsa avadhāraṇam iti bhāvaḥ vineya vacana paramparayā tad avadhāraṇam iti ced tīrthakara antare vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicārate iti tāsu tāsu smṛtiṣu abhiniviṣyāḥ sarve api hi tam tam ācāryam tatra tatra arthe abhyāsavantam eva ācakṣate na ca tadīyam jñānam yathārtham eva aṅgīkartum śakyam tvad siddhānta virodhi tvāt anyathā tvadīya siddhāntasya āvāstavatva āpātāt iti āha vyabhicārate iti vyabhicāraḥ virodhaḥ icchā api vipralipsā kutas na iti vācyam 
NSu_2.1.7ab.6^2	 sva upakāra para apakāra rūpa hetu darśana abhāvāt iti ced tat kim smṛti praṇetāra ssarve api na vipralambhakāḥ addhā iti ced asya niyamasya buddha ādiṣu bhagna tvāt iti āha vyabhicarate iti niyame ca sva vyāghātaḥ yasya kasya api vipralambhaka tve hetu darśana abhāvasya tatra eva vyabhicāraḥ na hi tad tad puruṣa viśeṣa anusaṃhitāḥ te te prayojana viśeṣāḥ piśita nayanaiḥ asmad ādibhiḥ avadhārayitum śakyante iti āśayena āha vyabhicārate iti kena api pramāṇena hetu upalambha abhāvaḥ avipralambha hetuḥ iti ced na sandigdha tvāt prayojana abhāvaḥ avipralambha hetuḥ prayojana abhāvaḥ ca para vañcanasya apuruṣa artha tvāt atad sādhana tvāt ca niścīyate iti ced na sampratipanna vipralambhakeṣu vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicārate iti apuruṣa artham api puruṣa artha tayā vibhramya vañcayati asau= iti ced kim tāvatā prakṛtaḥ tu viveki tayā na evam iti ced na tīrthakara antare avidyamānasya vivekasya asmin= avadhāraṇa anupapatteḥ 
NSu_2.1.7ab.7–2.1.7ab.9	 atha viśva hita upadeśa artham pravṛttyā vipralambha abhāvaḥ anumīyate iti ced na buddha ādiṣu tad sāmyena vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicārate iti atha te na tathā kintva yogya jana vyāmohana artham iti ced prakṛtaḥ api na tathā iti kutas niścitam niścaya upāyasya itaratra api tulya tvāt yat api uktam pramāṇa antara saṃvādāt moha vipralipsayoḥ nivṛttiḥ iti tat asat pramāṇa antaram hi na tāvat pratyakṣam atīndriya tvāt vipratipanna arthasya anumānam cedvayabhicāraḥ buddha ādiṣu ābhāsam eva tat madīyam tu anumānam eva iti ced na yatas nivārayiṣyāmaḥ tava camatkāram mā tvariṣṭhāḥ iti āśayena āha vyabhicārate iti 
NSu_2.1.7ab.10	 atha āgamaḥ sa kim veda ādiḥ uta tat viruddham smṛti antaram athavā sva yūthya racitam grantha antaram na prathama dvitīyau virodhi tvena saṃvādāsambhavāt iti āha vyabhicārate iti na api tṛtīyaḥ buddha ādi praṇīta smṛtīnām api sva yūthya puruṣa antara vacana saṃvādi tvena vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicārate iti te api sandigdha āpta bhāvāḥ iti ced na prakṛteṣu api tad niścaya upāya abhāvāt 
NSu_2.1.7ab.11	 yat ca uktam pravṛtti sāmarthyā dvaya amoha vipralipsayoḥ nirāsaḥ iti tat ayuktam pravṛtti sāmarthyam hi tatas artham avabuddhaya pravṛttasya phala upalambhaḥ na ca vipratipannasmṛti phalam svarga apavarga lakṣaṇam pratyakṣeṇa īkṣyate indriyāṇām tādṛś a artha aviṣaya tvāt iti āha vyabhicārate iti ābhimukhyena cāraḥ abhicāraḥ tad abhāvaḥ vyabhicāraḥ na api anumānena smṛti tva ādeḥ vyabhicāri tvāt anyasya ca abhāvāt iti āha vyabhicārate iti atha āgamena saḥ api na tāvat sampratipannaḥ asti na ca vipratipannena tasya bauddha ādi viṣaye api vidyamāna tvena vyabhicārāt iti āha vyabhicārate iti 
NSu_2.1.7ab.12	 syāt etat dvividhā khalu śiva ādi praṇītā smṛtiḥ ekā tāvat adṛṣṭam phalam uddiśya pravṛttā parā tu sampadā ādikam dṛṣṭam tatra dṛṣṭa arthāyāḥ pravṛtti sāmarthyam pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyate tatas tad praṇetuḥ āpta tvam iti tat na tathā api vipratipanna smṛteḥ āpti mūla tve pramāṇa abhāvāt tatas eva asyāḥ api tad siddhiḥ iti ced na vyabhicārāt na hi ekatra āptena sarvatra api tathā bhāvyam iti niyamaḥ asti tathā ca sati sarvāsām api smṛtīnām āpti mūla tā āpātāt tatra api dṛṣṭa arthānām pravṛtti sāmarthya upalambhāt iti āha vyabhicārate iti aṅgīkṛtya ca idam uditam dṛṣṭa arthānām api tāsām bahulam vyabhicāraḥ dṛśyate tathā ca katham tat dṛṣṭāntena itara asām āpti mūla tā anumānam iti āha vyabhicārate iti 
NSu_2.1.7ab.13–2.1.7ab.15	 kiñca phala vyabhicārataḥ tad aṃśasya anāpti mūla tva sthitau paśupati praṇīta tva ādeḥ tatra vyabhicārataḥ katham anumānam syāt iti āha vyabhicārate iti tat evam pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām āpti mūla tva aniścayena nirmūlānām pañca rātra ādi smṛti virodhena aprāmāṇyam eva yuktam tat anena etareṣām ca anupalabdheḥ etena yogaḥ pratyuktaḥ a iti sūtra dvayam vyākhyātam bhavati 
NSu_2.1.7ab.16–2.1.7ab.17	 yat ca itareṣām mahat ahaṅkāra ādi tattvānām anupalabdheḥ ca sāṅkhayasmṛteḥ aprāmāṇyam iti vyākhyānam tad pratyakṣa anupalabdheḥ veda anteṣu api vyabhicārataḥ sarvathā anupalabdheḥ asiddheḥ ukta tvāt ayuktam iti nanu pañca rātra ādi smṛtayaḥ api phalam vyabhicaranti kvacid tad ukta anuṣṭhāne api dṛṣṭa phala anupalambhāt atas tāsām aprāmāṇyāt na tad virodhena pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām aprāmāṇyam anyathā phala vyabhicārasya anaikāntika tvam iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.1.7cd.1–2.1.7cd.2	 naca asyāḥ vyabhicāre api hīyate mānatā kvacid asyāḥ pañcarātra ādi smṛteḥ kvacid vayabhicāre api iti sambandhaḥ kutas na hīyate iti ced kim adṛṣṭa arthāyāḥ prāmāṇya abhāvaḥ abhidhīyate uta dṛṣṭa arthāyāḥ eva na ādyaḥ yatas phala vyabhicāre hetau kvacid dṛṣṭa arthāyām vartamāne asyāḥ adṛṣṭa arthāyām phala vyabhicāre tatas eva aprāmāṇye sati api asyāḥ adṛṣṭa arthāyāḥ tā= avat māna tā na hīyate kāraṇa abhāvāt tad virodhāt eva ca pāśupata ādīnām aprāmāṇyam uktam dṛṣṭa arthāyāḥ aprāmāṇya vacanam tu prakṛta anupayuktam iti abhisandhiḥ 
NSu_2.1.7cd.3	 atha dṛṣṭa arthāyāḥ phala vyabhicāreṇa aprāmāṇye sati tatas eva adṛṣṭa arthāḥ api apramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti ced na tatas iti kim tena hetunā uta tena dṛṣṭāntena na ādyaḥ kvacid vayabhicāre aprāmāṇye api asyāḥ mānatā hīyate iti na yuktam vyāpti abhāvāt na dvitīyaḥ kvacid vaya bhicāre aprāmāṇye asyāḥ mānatā hīyate iti etat na yuktam hetu abhāvāt nārāyaṇa vākya tva ādeḥ vyabhicārāt mā hi bhūt sakalam api nārāyaṇa vākyam apramāṇam dṛṣṭa arthāyām phala vyabhicāre aprāmāṇye ca satyasyāḥ api mānatā śaṅkā āspada tvena hīyate iti ca na vācyam atra hetum āha nirdoṣā iti 
NSu_2.1.7*.1–2.1.7*.2	 nirdoṣa vākya mūla tvāt na ca tat yukti mūla tā nirdoṣa vākyam vedaḥ tad yuktiḥ samartha pravṛtti janaka tvam prāmāṇya avadhāraṇasya yatas iti śeṣaḥ ayam abhisandhiḥ kim idam dṛṣṭa arthāyāḥ pañca rātra ādi smṛteḥ phala vyabhicāreṇa aprāmāṇya anumānam tatas eva itarasyāḥ api aprāmāṇya śaṅkanam ca svātantryeṇa kriyate kiṃvā pratibandī grahaṇam ādyam tu uttara adhikaraṇe nirākariṣyāmaḥ na dvitīyaḥ pratibandī grahaṇam hi prameya sādhye bhavati na ca evam prakṛte pareṇa khalu phala saṃvāda ādinā pāśupata ādi smṛteḥ āpti mūla tva prāmāṇyayoḥ anumitayoḥ asmābhiḥ tad nyāyena phala visaṃvādam pradarśya doṣaḥ abhihitaḥ yadi nāma pañca rātra ādi smṛti prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam phala saṃvāda yuktyā aśāsyeta syāt idam tadā pratibandī grahaṇam na ca asmābhiḥ pañca rātra ādi prāmāṇya avadhāraṇasya tat yukti mūlatā upeyate na ca evam tad prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam nirmūlam syāt iti vācyam bodhaka tvena svatas siddha tvāt aprāmāṇya śaṅkā nivṛttiḥ kutas iti ced āpti mūla tvena iti uktam tad avadhāraṇam nirmūlam iti ced na śruti saṃvāda nibandhana tvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.7*.3	 nanu śruteḥ eva vaktṛ guṇa hīnāyāḥ na prāmāṇyam iti atas nirdoṣa vākya iti uktam bodhaka tvena eva hi prāmāṇyam vyavasthāpitam tat ca vākya tvāt śateḥ u bhaya sammatam doṣaḥ tu tad apavādakaḥ na ca apauruṣeye sa sambhavati iti niṣkampam eva śruti prāmāṇyam iti vakṣyāmaḥ iti arthaḥ asyām daśāyām śruti virodhena api pāśupata ādi smṛtīnām aprāmāṇyam śakya sādhanam yat api uktam itihāsa purāṇābhyām vedam samupabṛṃhayet a iti tat tathā kintu a viruddhānām eva upāya tvam na tu viruddhānām naca evam itaretara āśraya tvam śruti artha niścayasya smṛti saṃvāda eka nibandhanatva abhāvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.7*.4	 nanu ca pañca rātra ādi smṛtīnām prāmāṇyam aṅgīkurvāṇaiḥ sarvathā pravṛtti sāmarthyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam vyabhicārasya ca kartṛ karaṇa ādi vaiguṇya nibandhana tvam abhyupeyam anyathā phala vyabhicāri ca pramāṇam ca iti vyāghāta āpātāt tathā ca phala saṃvādena api prāmāṇya ādi sādhanam suśakam eva iti kim ucyate na ca tat yukti mūla tā iti suhṛd bhāvena pṛcchantam pratyāha veda uktasya iti 
NSu_2.1.8.1–2.1.8.3	 veda uktasya adhikārasya durnirūpa tvataḥ sadā niyamaḥ vyabhicāraḥ vā na eva jñātum hi śakyate vaidika grantha upadiṣya anuṣṭhāne veda uktāḥ niṣeka ādi saṃskārāḥ eva adhikāra tām āpadyante iti veda uktasya iti uktam yat vā veda śabdena pañcarātra ādayaḥ api gṛhyante adhikārasya iti upalakṣaṇam sādhana anuṣṭhānasya iti api draṣṭavyam durnirūpa tvam asmad ādya pratyakṣa tvam sadā iti svabhāvataḥ eva na tu deśa ādi vyavadhānena iti arthaḥ niyamaḥ vyabhicāraḥ vā phalasya iti śeṣaḥ hi śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe tasmāt phala saṃvādena prāmāṇya ādi na anumīyate iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_2.1.8.4^1	 etat uktam bhavati pramitam khalu liṅgam anumiteḥ karaṇam na sattā mātreṇa atiprasaṅgāt atra evam prayoktavyam pañca rātra ādikam pramāṇam samartha pravṛtti janaka tvāt sampratipanna vat iti tasya ca ayam arthaḥ etad vihita sādhana anuṣṭhānavadbhiḥ tad phalasya niyamena prāpteḥ iti na ca etat liṅgam śakya avadhāraṇam vyabhicārasya bahulam upalambhena niyamasya pratyetum aśakyatvāt tad avadhāraṇe ca kākatālīyatāyāḥ śaṅkanāt tatra etāvat vaktavyam kāryam kāraṇa sāmagrī sampādyam na tu tad eka deśena tathā tve ati prasakteḥ prakṛte ca ubhaya kula śuddhi vaidika niṣeka ādi saṃskāra ādi adhikāra pūrvakam viśuddha abhisandhyādimatā samyak anuṣṭhita karma asati pratibandhake sati ca īśvara icchā ādau hi sahakāriṇi sampad ā ādi phala jananāya alam tathā ca yatra phalam na upalabdham tatra adhikāra ādi vaiguṇyam itaratra tu tad sādguṇyam iti atas niyama niścayaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.8.4^2–2.1.8.5^1	 na ca etat yuktam para gatayoḥ adhikāra ādi bhāva abhāvayoḥ asmad ādibhiḥ avagantum aśakya tvāt na hi khalu parakīya pitṛ pitāmaha ādīnām mānasa ādi viśuddhirdhā niṣeka ādi samīcī natā vā mantrāṇām ayātayāma tva ādikam vā dravya ādīnām śuci tva ādikam vā arvācīnaiḥ avagantum śakyate tathā ca asya phala niyamaḥ eva vyabhicāraḥ tu vaiguṇya nimittaḥ iti vā astu vyabhicāraḥ eva asya kvacid phala upalambhaḥ tu kākatālīyaḥ anya nimittaḥ eva iti vā bhavatu iti sandehaḥ na nivartate na ca sandigdhena prāmāṇya anumānam yujyate 
NSu_2.1.8.4^2–2.1.8.5^2	 prāmāṇya siddhayuttara kālam tu vyabhicārasya vaiguṇya nimitta tā kalpanāyām itaretara āśraya tvam syāt veda saṃvādena tu prāmāṇye avadhārite śakyate phala vyabhicārasya anyā gatiḥ kalpayitum atas veda saṃvādena eva prāmāṇyam pañca rātra ādīnām avadhāryate na pravṛtti sāmarthyena iti evam nyāya sāmya abhāvena pratibandī mocitā yat api pratibandīm ādadānasya vivakṣitam yathā ca pañca rātra ādi prāmāṇyam abhilaṣatā phala vyabhicārasya adhikāra ādi vaikalya nibandhana tā kalpyā tathā aham api pāśupata ādi smṛtiṣu kalpayiṣyāmi iti tat ayuktam vaiṣamyāt iti āha adhikāraḥ hi iti 
NSu_2.1.9.1–2.1.9.3	 adhikāraḥ hi sulabhaḥ kathitaḥ anya āgameṣu alam veda uktaḥ hi adhikāraḥ tu durlabhaḥ sarva mānuṣaiḥ adhikāra grahaṇam sādhanasya api upalakṣaṇam anya āgameṣu pāśupata ādiṣu kathitaḥ adhikāraḥ alam sulabhaḥ anāyāsa sādhyaḥ kutas yasmāt anya āgameṣu tathā kathitaḥ tathā ca tad vaikalya kalpa nama sambhāvanā pratihatam veda uktaḥ tu adhikāraḥ viśuddha santāna ja tu ādiḥ sarva mānuṣaiḥ durlabhaḥ iti prasiddham eva atas tad vaikalya kalpanam sambhāvitam eva iti nanu katham anya āgameṣu adhikāraḥ sādhanam ca sulabha m uktam iti atas leśena daśaryati anya āgameṣu iti 
NSu_2.1.10.1–2.1.10.2^1	 anya āgameṣu vipra tvam api caṇḍāla janmanām maṇḍala antar praveśena kramaśas pratipādyate yad bhāvāḥ tareṇa mahatā tapasā vinā vā alabhyam tat api iti arthaḥ yati tva ādikam api iti vā caṇḍāla janmanām api kimu kṣatriya ādīnām iti vā viprāḥ eva ye kamarṇā caṇḍālāḥ teṣām kathañcid pratyāpattiḥ vaidikaiḥ api aṅgīkriyate iti atas caṇḍāla janmanām iti uktam caṇḍāleṣu janma yeṣām iti vā caṇḍāla sambandhi tvāt caṇḍālam janma yeṣām iti vā tathā uktāḥ kramaśas maṇḍala antar praveśena iti anena idam ucyate yaḥ yāvat jāti vyavahitaḥ tasya tāvanti maṇḍalāni pūjyāni tatra yat yat maṇḍalam praviśati tad tad jātīyaḥ bhavati carama maṇḍala praveśe tu vipraḥ sampadyate iti anya āgameṣu pratipādyate iti sambandhaḥ 
NSu_2.1.10.2^2–2.1.11.1	 tathā ca uktam dīkṣā praveśa mātreṇa brāhmaṇaḥ bhavati kṣaṇāt kāpālam vratam āsthāya yatiḥ bhavati mānavaḥ a  iti etad adhikāra saulabhyam udāharaṇam evam sādhana saulabhyam api draṣṭavyam yathā ahuḥ kāpālikāḥ mudrikā ṣaṭka tattva jñaḥ para mudrā viśāradaḥ bhagāsana stham ātmānam dhyātvā nirvāṇam ṛcchati karṇikā rucakam ca eva kuṇḍalam ca śikhāmaṇiḥ bhasma yajñopavītam ca mudrā ṣaṭkam pracakṣate ābhiḥ mudrita dehaḥ tu na bhūyas iha jāyate a ityādi tathā kālāmukhāḥ api rudrākṣa kaṅkaṇam haste jaṭā ca ekā ca mastake kapālam bhasmanā snānam lakuṭam kalaśa arcanam a ityādi nanu yathā adhikāra sādhanayoḥ saulabhyam uktam evam tat daurlabhyam api tatra eva uktam iti ced tarhi na kevalam phala saṃvādena pāśupata ādīnām aprāmāṇyam kinnāma paraspara visaṃvādena api iti āha adhikāram iti adhikāram durāpādya m ukta vāti sulabham punar aśakyam sādhanam ca uktavā suśakam tad phala āptaye ucyate atas tat uktam hi vyabhicāri phale api tu 
NSu_2.1.12a.1–2.1.12a.2	 katham pramāṇa tām gacchet yasmāt kvacid adhikāram durāpādyam uktvā punar api sulabham bravīti yasmāt ca tad phala āptaye sampad ā ādi phala āptaye sādhanam aśakyam uktvā suśakam ca ucyate yasmāt ca tat uktam sādhanam phale api viṣaye vyabhicāri atas tat uktam sā pāśupatāt yuktiḥ katham pramāṇa tām gacchet na katham api iti arthaḥ durlabha tva ukti anurodhena saulabhya vacanam prarocana artham vyākhyāyatām tathā ca phala visaṃvādaḥ api adhikāra ādi vaiguṇya nimittaḥ bhaviṣyati yathā pañca rātra ādau= iti ced na vaiṣamyāt yuktam hi pañca rātra ādiṣu tathā kalpanam śruti mūla tvena prāmāṇyasya niścita tayā kalpakasya vidyamāna tvāt pāśupata ādau tu tad abhāvena visaṃvādasya aprāmāṇya nibandhana tā upapattau kalpaka abhāvāt kvacid saṃvādaḥ tu kākatālīyaḥ vā guḍa jihvikā nimittaḥ vā bhaviṣyati tat idam uktam tuśabdena tat uktam tu iti sambandhaḥ tat evam pāśupata ādīnām apasmṛti tvāt na tad virodhena ukta artha asambhavaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ iti sthitam 
NSu_2.1.12a.3^1	 na vilakṣaṇa tvāt asya tathātvam ca śabdāt parihṛtaḥ smṛti virodhaḥ samprati yukti virodhaḥ parihriyate tathā hi śruti ādi samanvayena khalu jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam brahmaṇaḥ nirūpitam tatra śruteḥ eva prāmāṇyam tāvat durlabham yat hi phala vyabhicāri tad apramāṇam dṛṣṭam yathā vipralambhaka vākyam phala vyabhicāriṇī ca śrutiḥ putrakāma iṣyaya ādi anuṣṭhāne api kadācid putra janma ādi anupalabdheḥ anyathā phala anupalabdhyā uktam pāśupata ādya prāmāṇyam api na syāt eka deśe ca aprāmāṇye tad nyāyena eka deśa antarasya api aprāmāṇya anumānam sulabham eva 
NSu_2.1.12a.3^2–2.1.12a.4	 kiñca yat abuddhi pūrvakam tat apramāṇam yathā pipīlikā ālipiḥ abuddhi pūrvakaḥ ca vedaḥ apauruṣeya tva aṅgīkārāt pauruṣeya tve ca mūla pramāṇa śūnya tvāt apramāṇam eva vipralambhaka vākya vat api ca āpta apraṇīta vākya tvāt unmatta vākya vat aprāmāṇyam vedasya anumeyam yadā vedasya īdṛśī daśā tadā kā vāta smṛti itihāsa purāṇānām phala vyabhicāra ādi kharkharāṇām prāmāṇyasya tathā ca veda ādi samanvayena na jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam brahmaṇaḥ siddhayati iti evam prāpte tad pratividhānātharsya na vilakṣaṇa tvāt iti sūtrasya tātparyam āha nitya tvāt iti na vilakṣaṇa tvāt asya tathātvam ca śabdāt 
NSu_2.1.12c–2.1.12d.2	 nitya tvāt puruṣa udbhavaiḥ ujkhitam sarva doṣaiḥ ca katham naḥ māna tām vrajet veda vākyam iti śeṣaḥ ayam arthaḥ bodhaka tvena khalu karaṇānām prāmāṇyam doṣāt tu kadācid apanīyate veda vākyam ca bodhaka tvena vādi prativādi sammatam anyathā phala vyabhicāraḥ api tatra na syāt vākye ca prāmāṇyasya apavādakāḥ doṣāḥ abodhaka tva viparīta bodhaka tvāt ayaḥ sarve api vaktṛ doṣa nibandhanāḥ eva anvaya vyatirekābhyām tad avagamāt veda vākyam ca nitya tvāt apauruṣeya tvāt puruṣa doṣa nibandhanaiḥ sarva doṣaiḥ varjitam svatas eva prāmāṇyam āpnoti prāmāṇye ca niścite sati phala vyabhicārasya sāmagrī vaikalyam vā pratibandhaka sadbhāvaḥ vā kāraṇam kalpayiṣyate anyathā siddhān anyathā siddhayoḥ ananyathā siddhasya balavat tvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.12c–2.1.12d.5	 atra ete prayogāḥ bhavanti vedaḥ pramāṇam bodhaka tve sati viparīta bodhaka tvāt sampratipanna vat vimataḥ viparīta bodhakaḥ na bhavati anāpta apraṇīta vākya tvāt sampratipanna vākya vat vimataḥ anāpta praṇītaḥ na bhavati apauruṣeya tvāt vayoma vat vimataḥ phala vyabhicāraḥ vaikalya ādi nibandhanaḥ bhavati pramāṇa siddha phala vyabhicāra tvāt caraka ādi ukta phala vyabhicāra vat iti syāt etat nitya tvam eva vedasya kutas prāc ukta sāmānya siddhi pariśeṣābhyām iti brūmaḥ ye tu sva yūthyāḥ veda prāmāṇyam aṅgīkṛtya api tat nitya tām na anumanyante tān prati sūtra sūcitābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ tām upapādayati virūpa iti 
NSu_2.1.13a.1–2.1.13a.3	 virūpa nityayā vācā anenatasmai nūnam abhidyave vācā virūpa nityayā vṛṣṇe codasva suṣyutim a iti śrutim upādatte atra vācaḥ nitya tvam ucyate na vedasya tat api bahu kālīna tvam bhaviṣyati iti atas nityayā anityayā staumi brahma tat paramam padam a iti śrutiḥ vāva nitya anityāḥ vāva smṛtayaḥ yāḥ canyāḥ vācaḥ a iti śrutim upādatte nityayā iti 
NSu_2.1.13b–2.1.13d.3	 nityayā anityayā sadā ityādi śrutibhiḥ vedaḥ nityaḥ iti avagamyate vyākhyāna antara nirāsāya nityayā iti etat sadā vidyamānayā iti vyākhyātam vākya śeṣe hi bahu kālīnāḥ api smṛtīra nitya pakṣe nikṣipya śrutim eva nityām āha pauruṣeya tām api śrutayaḥ abhidadhati iti ced na āpta ukta tvasya duravadhāraṇa tāyāḥ prāc ukta tvena pauruṣeya tve prāmāṇya avadhāraṇa anupapatti prasaṅgena durbala tvāt prāmāṇyasya svataḥ tvena apauruṣeya tve api kāraṇa abhāvāt prāmāṇyam na syāt iti prasaṅgasya ābhāsa tvāt prabala śruti anusāreṇa tad tad puruṣa pravartita tvam eva tāsām arthaḥ avagantavyaḥ tathā caṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire aṛgvedaḥ eva agneḥ ajayata a ityādi upapannam bhavati na hi ekam vākyam aneka kartṛkam api sambhavati sambhavati tu aneka pravartitam iti yat api pipīlikā lipivat a buddhi pūrvaka tvāt aprāmāṇyam śruteḥ iti tat nirākaroti pipīlikā iti 
NSu_2.1.14ab.1–2.1.14ab.4	 pipīlikā lipiḥ ca api pramāṇam avirodhataḥ caḥ yasmāt iti arthe bodhaka tva samuccaye vā tasmāt dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvāt asat anumānam iti śeṣaḥ na kevalam śrutiḥ kintu pipīlikā lipiḥ api iti apeḥ arthaḥ aprāmāṇyam khalu pipīlikā lipera bodhaka tvena vā syāt viparīta bodhaka tvena vā na ādyaḥ anubhava viruddha tvāt anyathā puruṣa lipeḥ api abodhaka tvam syāt tathā ca tat vaiyarthyam āpadyeta api ca evam satya ākāśa ādikam eva udāhriyeta tat kim pipīlikā lipi gaveṣaṇayā na dvitīyaḥ tat hi balavat pramāṇa virodhataḥ kalpanīyam anyathā ati prasaṅgāt na ca pipīlikā lipibodhite arthe pramāṇa virodhaḥ asti atas katham asau= apramāṇam syāt syāt etat lipiḥ tāvat na pramāṇam pṛthak anupramāṇa tritva abhyupagamāt na ca pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ antar bhavati atad lakṣaṇa tvāt 
NSu_2.1.14ab.5	 atas anumānam eva iti vācyam tat ca lekhaka buddhi stha śabda viṣayam vā tad avabuddha artha viṣayam vā syāt na ca etat pipīlikā lipau sambhavati pramāṇa bādhita tvāt tat katham asau pramāṇam iti mā evam tathā satya iḍa mūkalipeḥ api aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt bhavatu sāpramāṇam itarā tu anumānam iti ced na eḍamūka lipeḥ api sāṃvyāvahārika tva darśanāt kiñca itaratra api anumāne kim eḍa mūka vyāvṛtti artham kim api viśeṣaṇam upādeyam uta na iti vācyam na ādyaḥ sandigdhā siddhi prasaṅgāt nirṇīta lekhakā eva lipiḥ anumānam iti ced na anirṇīta lekhakāyāḥ api sāṃvyāvahārika tvāt na dvitīyaḥ eḍa mūkali pa avanaikāntyāt atha mūla lekhaka buddhi stha śabda artha anumāne na kaḥ api doṣaḥ iti matam tat api na pipīlika ali pāvanaikāntyāt tad vayā āvartane ca sandigdha asiddheḥ na hi pipīlikā lipeḥ puruṣa lipeḥ asti kaścid viśeṣaḥ yena na iyam pipīlikālipiḥ iti niścinuyāt tasmāt puruṣa lipiḥ api padam iva padārthasya varṇānām smaraṇa hetuḥ eṣyavyā tad samam pipīlikā lipau= api smṛteḥ ca pramita tvam vakṣyāmaḥ 
NSu_2.1.14ab.6	 nanu pramātve api smṛteḥ na tad hetu mātrasya prāmāṇyam pramātṛ ādīnām api tad prasaṅgāt kintu sādhakatamasya eva tat ca manaḥ eva iti siddhāntaḥ lipi darśana ādikam tu saṃskāraḥ dvedhā abhidha sahakāri sampādanena eva carita artham iti katham tasya prāmāṇyam mā evam artha sannikarṣa lakṣaṇa avāntara vyāpāra sahitam hi indriyam pratyakṣam na indriya mātram manasaḥ ca smaraṇa udaye saṃskāra udbodhaḥ eva artha sannikarṣaḥ tathā ca cakṣuṣaḥ iva artha upasarpaṇa tad saṃyoga sahitasya prāmāṇyam evam lipi darśana tad udbuddha saṃskāra sahitasya eva manasaḥ iti katham na lipeḥ prāmāṇyam kevalāyāḥ tu na asti iti ced śruteḥ api tat na aṅgīkriyate eva iti 
NSu_2.1.14ab.7–2.1.14cd.1	 nanu atra pramāṇa śabdaḥ bhāva sādhanaḥ vā syāt kāraṇa sādhanaḥ vā ādye pipīlikā ālipiḥ pramāṇam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam na syāt dvitīye tu pramāṇi iti bhavitavyam katham vedāḥ pramāṇam smṛtiḥ pramāṇam iti pramāṇam iti sāmānyena uddiśya veda ādi tva vidhānāt anyathā tatra api daurghaṭyam eva iti mā evam bhāva sādhana tva abhyupagamāt sāmānādhikaraṇyam tu bhāktam iti nanu ca śruteḥ samyak anubhava sādhana tvena prāmāṇyam iṣyam na tu smāraka tvena tathā ca na śrutiḥ samyak anubhava sādhana buddhi pūrvaka tvāt pipīlikā lipivat iti anumāsyate iti atas āha yathā iti yathā drauṇeḥ ulūkena kṛtam api āsa bodhakam 
NSu_2.1.15a.1–2.1.15a.3^1	 aviruddham yathā buddhi pūrvakam api ekena ulūkena kṛtam aneka kāka nāśanam aśvatthāmnaḥ aham eka eva anekān vadhiṣyāmi iti asya arthasya bodhakam samyak anubhavam prati sādhanam jātam tathā śrutiḥ abuddhi pūrvā api samyak anubhava sādhanam etat uktam bhavati abuddhi pūrvaka tvam kim anādi tvam vivakṣitam sādi tve api buddhi janya tva abhāvaḥ vā pratipādya atharbuddhi pūrvaka tva abhāvaḥ vā anena etat evam pratipādayiṣyāmi iti abhisandhi pūrva ka tā vaidhuryam vā na ādyaḥ pipīlikā li pau= abhāvāt gaganam eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced tathā api śruteḥ anādi tvasya pareṇa anaṅgīkṛta tvena asiddheḥ na dvitīyaḥ 
NSu_2.1.15a.1–2.1.15a.3^2	 utpadyamānam buddhi janyam eva iti mayā aṅgīkṛta tvāt na tṛtīya caturthau ulūka kṛta vyāpāre vyabhicārāt iti yadi api pratyakṣe vyabhicāraḥ atra vaktum śakyate tathā api jñāta kāraṇa sajatīya tvena śakya parihāraḥ asau= iti na uditaḥ anumāna mātre su vacaḥ api cetana vyāpāra viṣayasya tathābhūtaḥ eva śākune pradarśayitum ucitaḥ iti na pradarśitaḥ nanu śākunam artha visaṃvādī api dṛśyate satyam yat tu pramāṇa aviruddham tadvayabhicāra sthalam bhaviṣyati iti bhāvena uktam aviruddham iti śākuna mātre vyabhicārasya darśayitum śakya tve api āgamika tvena visaṃvādān arha tayā idam udāhṛtam 
NSu_2.1.15a.4–2.1.15a.5	 nanu āsa iti katham asteḥ bhūriti asya nitya tvāt vibhakti pratirūpakam ca avyayam bhavati iti vacanāt avyayam etat iti na doṣaḥ vibhaktipratirūpakam iti ucyate na ca evam vibhaktiḥ asti na na asti āmanta anuprayogasya vidyamāna tvāt nanu evam tarhi prayujyate śrutiḥ na samyak anubhava sādhanam śabda tve satya buddhi pūrvaka tvāt iti yat vā śrutiḥ na āgamaḥ abuddhi pūrvaka tvāt iti abuddhi pūrvaka tvam ca vivakṣita artha tattva jñāna pūrvaka tva abhāvaḥ ādyasya pipīlikā li pau= apraveśe api unmatta vākyam dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhaviṣyati na ca unmatta vākyam api pramāṇam pramāṇa viruddha tvāt iti atas āha viruddham tu iti 
NSu_2.1.15ab.1–2.1.15ab.3	 viruddham tu virodhāt eva bādhitam pramāṇa viruddham yat unmatta vākyam tat pramāṇa virodhāt eva bādhitam ayathārtham iti yāvat na tu ukta hetubhyām iti sa upādhika tām anena ācaṣṭe atas eva āptā praṇīta vākya tva hetuḥ api apāstaḥ ayam abhisandhiḥ na tāvat samyak anubhava sādhana tva abhāvaḥ jñāna sādhana tva abhāvena jñāna sādhana tvasya ubhaya siddha tvāt na api smṛti sādhana tvena ananubhūta viṣaya tva sammateḥ tatas viparīta bodhaka tvena eva iti vācyam evam dvitīya prayoge api na tāvat anāgama tvam aśabda tvena śabda tvasya ubhaya sammata tvāt tasmāt ayathā atha ṛtvena iti vaktavyam evam tṛtīya prayoge api sādhya niṣkaṣarḥ kartavyaḥ tathā ca tatra pramāṇa bādhita tvam upādhiḥ yat vā anubhava sādhana tva avacchinne prathama sādhye vākya tva avacchinne dvitīya sādhye bodhaka tva avacchinne tṛtīye ca ayam upādhiḥ iti nanu asya upādheḥ yat ayathārtham tad pramāṇa viruddham iti sādhya vyāpaka tve api sādhana avyāpaka tvam katham iti atas āha virodha iti 
NSu_2.1.15c.1–2.1.15c.3	 virodha adarśanāt pakṣīkṛtāyām śrutau= ukta sādhana sadbhāve api pramāṇa virodhasya ādaśarnāt sādhana avyāpaka tvam iti śeṣaḥ atra virodha abhāvāt iti vaktavye adarśanāt iti uktam virodha abhāva sādhana artham iti draṣṭavyam kim atas yadi evam pramāṇa viruddha tvam upādhiḥ iti ced upādheḥ pratipakṣa unnāyaka tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvena anumānānām sat pratipakṣa tvam iti āśayena āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_2.1.15cd.1–2.1.15cd.3	 tasmāt veda prāmāṇyam iṣyate yasmāt pramāṇa viruddha tvam ayathārtha tvasya vyāpakam vyāvṛtam ca pakṣīkṛtāt vedāt vyāpaka nivṛttau vyāpya nivṛttiḥ avaśyam bhāvinī tasmāt veda prāmāṇyam eṣi avyam ayam atra prayogaḥ vedaḥ na ayathārthaḥ pramāṇa aviruddha tvāt pratyakṣa vat yat vā vedaḥ yathārthaḥ bodhaka tve sati pramāṇa aviruddha tvāt pratyakṣa vat evam vedaḥ samyak anubhava sādhanam anubhava sādhana tve sati pramāṇa viruddha tvāt pratyakṣa vat vedaḥ āgamaḥ vākya tve sati pramāṇa aviruddha tvāt sampratipanna vat iti evam vākya tva avacchinne sādhye anāpta praṇīta tvam upādhiḥ tad viparyayeṇa ca pratipakṣaḥ abhidheyaḥ iti astu evam veda prāmāṇyam pañcarātra ādi smṛtīnām tu katham na hi tāḥ api apauruṣeyāḥ yena prāmāṇyam avadhārya phala vyabhicāram anyathā neṣyāmaḥ iti atas āha tad mūla tvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.16a.1–2.1.16a.3	 tad mūla tvāt smṛtīnām ca prāmāṇyam iṣyate iti sambandhaḥ yadi api bhagavat racitānām veda atham upalabhya racita tvam veda mūla tvam na asti tasya svatas sarvajña tvam tathā api tam anusṛtya racita tvam tad mūla tvam iha vivakṣitam iti na ukta doṣaḥ ayam atra prayogaḥ pañcarātra ādi smṛtiḥ pramāṇam pramāṇa mūla tvāt pramāṇa saṃvādi tvāt sampratipanna vat iti yat vā vimatam pramāṇam veda saṃvādi tvāt para abhyupagata arhiṃsā ādi vākya vat āpta vākya tvam upādhiḥ iti ced pratyakṣa ādau sādhya avyāpanāt vākya tva avacchinna sādhya vyāpaka tvāt adoṣaḥ iti ced na tathā api veda itara vākya tva avacchinna sādhanena upādheḥ pakṣe sādhana saulabhyāt sati ca evam smṛtīnām prāmāṇye tad balena phala vyabhicāraḥ api anyathayitavyaḥ iti nanu ca ukta artha viruddha vādīni api smṛti itihāsa purāṇāni upalabhyante teṣām prāmāṇya sādhane ca bahu viplavaḥ syāt iti atas āha virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.16b.1–2.1.16b.3	 virodhaḥ yatra na kvacid pūrveṇa eva anvayaḥ yāsām smṛtīnām sarvathā pramāṇa virodhaḥ na asti tāsām eva pakṣīkaraṇāt na kaścid doṣaḥ iti āśayaḥ nanu evam sati veda mūla tva upanyāsaḥ vyarthaḥ jñāna janakānām avaśya aṅgīkaraṇīyena virodha abhāvena eva prāmāṇya siddheḥ iti ced na phala vyabhicāra lakṣaṇa virodha darśanena asiddhi prasaṅgāt prāmāṇyena tad apanayane ca itaretara āśraya tva āpātāt veda mūla tvena tu prāmāṇye siddhe na kaḥ api doṣaḥ iti aprāmāṇya prayojakasya pramāṇa virodhasya abhāvāt na śruti smṛtyoḥ a prāmāṇyam iti uktam tat ayuktam śruti ādi uktaḥ īśvara sārvajña āderīśvaraḥ na sarvajñaḥ puruṣa tvāt yajñadatta vat ityādi anumāna viruddha tvāt iti atas āha virodhaḥ api iti 
NSu_2.1.16cd.1–2.1.16cd.2	 virodhaḥ api saḥ eva uktaḥ pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā prakṛta sambandha arthaḥ api śabdaḥ yat śabdaḥ adhyāhāryaḥ virodhāt eva bādhitam iti aprāmāṇya prayojaka tayā uktaḥ virodhaḥ api saḥ eva yaḥ pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā syāt na punar anumānena ayam abhisandhiḥ aprāmāṇya prayojaka tayā yat asmābhiḥ abhihitam tat pakṣe api upapādayitum khalu parasya ayam prayatnaḥ asmābhiḥ ca pratyakṣa āgama virodhaḥ eva tathā abhipretaḥ na anumāna virodhaḥ tathā ca pakṣe tad vyutpādanam prakṛta asaṅgatam eva svatantra anumāna virodham tu uttaratra nirākariṣyati sūtra kṛt iti 
NSu_2.1.16cd.3–2.1.16cd.4	 nanu pramāṇa virodhaḥ eva aprāmāṇye prayojakaḥ astu kim pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā iti viśeṣaṇena tathā ca ukta numāna virīdhāt veda ādeḥ aprāmāṇyam iti mā evam vakṣyāmaḥ hi atra brahma ādi vastuṣu pramāṇam vedaḥ eva ekaḥ iti vaidike arthe anumānasya anavakāśam yatra ca yasya apraveśaḥ na tasya tat bādhakam na hi nayanam sparśa apabādhanasya iṣye tathā ca katham anumānam veda atha bādhakena tad aprāmāṇye prayojakam syāt prakṛtam ca veda ādikam eva iti nanu evam tarhi veda arthamīmāṃsā na ārambhaṇīyā syāt mīmāṃsāyāḥ yukti anusandhāna ātmaka tavāt ityataḥ āha āgamena iti 
NSu_2.1.17ab.1–2.1.17ab.2	 āgamena āgamasya eva virodhe yuktiḥ iṣyate eva śabdaḥ virodhaḥ iti atas paraḥ draṣṭavyaḥ nirṇaya artham iti śeṣaḥ etat uktam bhavati anumānam hi dharmya ādi pramitim apekṣate na ca dharmya ādi rūpam brahma ādikam vedāt ṛte siddhayati iti tad anapekṣāyām āśraya asiddhayā ādikam apekṣāyām tu virodhinaḥ dharmyādi grāhaka virodhaḥ iti evam vaidike arthe anumānasya anavakāśaḥ abhidhistitaḥ mīmāṃsāyām tu kvacid āgamasya āgama antareṇa virodhaḥ eva artha nirṇaya artham yuktiḥ upādīyate sā khalu anyatara āgamam upodbalayanti anyatara āgama bādhayā artha nirṇayāya prabhavati anyatara āgama siddha dharmya ādi āśrayaṇena āśraya asiddhayā ādi anavakāśāt anyatara āgamasya dharmya ādi grāhaka tva abhāvena aprabalasya āgama sūcitayā upapatteḥ tatas durbalasya akiñcitkara tvāt tat evam evaṃvidha upapatteḥ āgamike api arthe sa avakāśa tvāt upapannā mīmāṃsā iti 
NSu_2.1.17ab.3	 api ca pratyakṣa āgama virodhaḥ api na sva rūpeṇa aprāmāṇyam prayojayati kintu tayoḥ upajīvyatva ādinā prābalye sati eva durbalayoḥ svayam bādhita tvena sama balayoḥ pratibandha mātra hetu tvena aprāmāṇya niścaya anupapatteḥ upajīvya ādi virodhena ca aprāmāṇyam bhavat vedasya na sarvathā ayathārtha tva lakṣaṇam kinnāma pratīta artha pracyāvana mātram apauruṣeya tayā nirdoṣasya sarvathā prāmāṇya anupapatteḥ tathā ca anya artha kalpanā avaśyam kāryā iti āśayavān āha upajīvya iti 
NSu_2.1.17cd.1–2.1.17cd.2	 upajīvya virodhe tu vedasya anya artha kalpanā upalakṣaṇam etat niravakāśa tva ādikam api grāhyam bhavatu evam tatas kim veda upajīvya tva ādikam ca pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ eva prāyeṇa sambhavati yukteḥ tu kvacid eva puruṣa tva ādi yukteḥ tu na asti eva atas ca na tad virodhena vedasya aprāmāṇyam mantavyam iti āśayena āha pratyakṣam iti 
NSu_2.1.18.1–2.1.18.3	 pratyakṣam upajīvyam syāt prāyas yuktiḥ api kvacid āgama eka pramāṇeṣu tasya eva hi upajīvyatā vedasya iti anuvartate syāt iti atas param iti śabdaḥ adhyāhāryaḥ tat tvam asi ityādi vedasya pratyakṣam upajīvyam yuktiḥ api kvacid vedasya upajīvyā iti sambandhaḥ yathā prāṇāḥ vā aṇavaḥ a ityādeḥ āgama eka pramāṇakeṣu viṣṇu ādi viṣayeṣu pravartamānaṃjanitaḥ atas viṣṇoḥ a ityādi vedam prati niraniṣyaḥ niravadya iti ādeḥ tasya veda upajīvyata iti arthaḥ evam niravakāśa tva ādikam api pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ eva prāyeṇa sambhavati yukteḥ tu kvacid eva tat ca na prakṛta yukteḥ iti api draṣṭavyam āgamayoḥ paraspara virodhe sati a nyatarāgama āśrayeṇa yukteḥ anupraveśa upapatteḥ yuktā mīmāṃsā iti uktam tad anupapannam asārvatrika tvāt na hi sarvatra āgamayoḥ paraspara virodhaḥ eva mīmāṃsā avatāryate iti atas āha yuktaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.19a–2.1.19c.3	 yuktaḥ ayuktaḥ ca yadi arthaḥ āgamasya pratīyate syāt tatra yuktaḥ eva arthaḥ tatra tarhi ayam abhisandhiḥ satyam etat kvacid eva ayam nyāyaḥ iti tathā api yatra na evam tatra ekasya eva āgamasya aneka artha pratītau yukti anusāriṇam artham upādāya tad anuguṇa tad viruddha artha parityāgaḥ kriyate iti na ukta niyama bhaṅgaḥ kevala yukteḥ vaidike arthe anupraveśasya anaṅgīkṛta tvāt na api mīmāṃsā anupapattiḥ anyatara vaidika artha anusāriṇyā yukteḥ aṅgīkṛta tvāt iti prāk puruṣa tva ādi yukti virodhena āgamasya aprāmāṇyam na vācyam iti uktam idānīm tu yuktiḥ eva asau pratyakṣa āgama virodhena apramāṇam tasyāḥ tat u jīvi tvena tatas durbala tvāt ityāśayavān āha yuktiḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.1.19d.1–2.1.20ab.4	 yuktiḥ ca trividhā matā yat vā yat siddhavat kṛtya tatra mīmāṃsā ārambha anupapattiḥ parihṛtā tat idānīm darśayitum āha yuktiḥ ca iti caśabdaḥ prakṛta anusandhāna arthaḥ katham traividhyam iti atas āha vyāptiḥ iti vyāptiḥ pratyakṣatā yasyāḥ yukti gā agama gā tathā yasyāḥ yukteḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pratyakṣa gā pratyakṣa avagatā sā ekā yukti gā yukti avagatā yasyāḥ vyāptiḥ sā dvitīyā tathā agama gā āgama avagatā yasyāḥ vyāptiḥ sā tṛtīyā iti evam trividhā iti yojyam upalakṣaṇam ca etat dharmya ādi grāhaka bhedena api traividhyam draṣṭavyam etat ca spaṣṭayiṣyāmaḥ evam tarhi yā yukti mūlā yuktiḥ sā nāgam ādi upajīvinī iti tasya bādhikā tad abādhyā ca bhavatu iti atas āha pratyakṣā iti 
NSu_2.1.20cd.1–2.1.20cd.2	 pratyakṣa āgama mūlā tu yuktiḥ tatra balīyasī tatra tāsu trividhāsu yuktiṣu pratyakṣāgamūlā iti pratyakṣa mūlā agama mūlā ca iti arthaḥ yukti mūlā api hi yuktiḥ antatas pratyakṣa āgama mūlā evaeṣyavyā anyathā tad mūla yuktenirrmūla tvam anavasthā vā apadyeta tathā ca pratyakṣa ādi apekṣa tvena sāmye api bahu saṃvidhāna anapekṣayoḥ pratyakṣa āgama mūlayoḥ yuktyoḥ prabala tvam tad apekṣāyāḥ tu yukti mūlāyāḥ durbala tvam yuktam eva tathā ca prabalayoḥ yadā īdṛśī daśā tadā kā durbalāyāḥ yukteḥ āgama bādhana ādau= iti 
NSu_2.1.20cd.3–2.1.20cd.4	 tat evam aprāmāṇye pramāṇa virodhasya eva prayojaka tva acchati ādeḥ ca pratyakṣa āgama virodha abhāvāt anumāna virodhasya aprayojaka tvāt na aprāmāṇyam kinnāma bodhaka tvena svatas eva prāmāṇyam iti upapāditam tat etad pramāṇa apramāṇa vivekam aviduṣām duravadhāraṇam iti uddeśa lakṣaṇa vibhāga parīkṣābhiḥ tad nirūpaṇa artham uttaraḥ grantha sandarbhaḥ na ca sāṃvyāvahārika tvāt pramāṇa ādeḥ kim tad nirūpaṇena iti vācyam tathā api svarūpa saṅkhayā viṣaya phala gocarāṇām vādi vivādānām vidyamāna tvena nirūpaṇa arha tvāt yadi api eṣaḥ arthaḥ tarka śāstrasya viṣayaḥ na mīmāṃsā śāstrasya tathā api śiṣya hita eṣiṇā bhāṣya kṛtā prasaṅga āgataḥ nirūpyate yathā pūvarmī māṃsa ābhāṣya kāreṇa iti adoṣaḥ atas eva pramāṇa lakṣaṇa ādau nirūpitasya arthasya punar atra nirūpaṇam na doṣāya ekīkṛtya nirūpaṇasya api śiṣya hita artha tvāt tatra nirdhārita svarūpasya eva saṅkhayā ādi jijñāsā lakṣaṇam ca tad nirdhāraṇa upāyaḥ na ca sāmānya lakṣaṇena vinā viśeṣa lakṣaṇa avasaraḥ iti atas pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam prathamam tāvat āha yāthārthyam eva iti 
NSu_2.1.21a.1–2.1.21a.4^1	 yāthārthyam eva māna tvam atra kaścid āha kimartham lakṣaṇam ucyate kim sajātīya vijātīya vyavacchinna lakṣya pratīti artham uta pramāṇa tva ādi pratītaye tad cihna upadarśanam idam uta pramāṇa ādi śabda pravṛtti nimitta avadhāraṇa artham anyasmai kasmaicid prayojanāya vā na ādyaḥ tasyāḥ eva duravadhāraṇa tvāt tathā hi kim sajātīya iti pramāṇa tvena vivakṣitam rūpa antareṇa vā na ādyaḥ sva vyavaccheda avadheḥ sajātīyāt avyāvṛtta tvena vyavacchedakatva anupapattyā vyāvṛtti svīkāreṇa avyāpaka tvāt na api dvitīyaḥ vijātīya pada upadāna vaiyarthyāt asti hi prameya sarvasājātyam 
NSu_2.1.21a.1–2.1.21a.4^2	 atha jñāna tvena viśeṣeṇa sājātyam vivakṣitvā idam ucyate tarhi lakṣyasya api jñāna tva ādinā sājātya advayavat chedya koṭi praviṣyatayā saṅgrāhya abhāva prasaṅgaḥ lakṣyasya yat jñāna tva ādibhiḥ sajātīyam tadvayava= chedyam na ca lakṣyasya lakṣyam sajātīyam ṣaṣṭhayarthasya sambandhasya bhede vyavasthita tvāt iti ced evam tarhi lakṣya apekṣayā bhinnā dvaya vat chedaḥ iti eva ucyatām kṛtam jñāna tva ādinā sājātyena prakṛta anupayoginā varṇitena yadā ca lakṣyāt anyatva pareṣām avagatam tadā parebhyaḥ anya tvam api lakṣyasya arthāt avagamyata iti siddham agratas lakṣaṇa prayojanam iti vaiyarthyam eva syāt lakṣaṇa ākhyānasya 
NSu_2.1.21a.5	 api ca na tāvat anena lakṣaṇena anavagatena eva vyavacchinna pratīti sambhavaḥ atiprasaṅgāt na api jñātena duravadhāraṇa tvāt na tāvat lakṣaṇam pratyakṣam nirdoṣa akṣa udbhava tva ādeḥ apratyakṣa viśeṣaṇa tvam na api kāryeṇa liṅgena tad anupapattyā vā tad avagamaḥ tābhyām sāmānyatas kāraṇa mātra ākṣepeṇa kāraṇa gata anugata rūpā siddhau= eka rūpa lakṣaṇa asiddheḥ kāryasya eka jātyāt eka jātīya kāraṇa siddhiḥ iti ced tarhi kārya gata eka jāti asya pūrvam avaśyam pratyetavya tva aṅgīkāre tatas eva sajātīya vijātīya vyavaccheda pratipattiḥ astu kṛtam anayā pāramparya kusṛṣṭayā 
NSu_2.1.21a.6	 nanu etāvatā api na prakṛta lakṣaṇa khaṇḍanam bhavati avyāpteḥ ati vyāpteḥ vā anudbhāvanāt iti ced mā evam prathama bhāvitayā avaśya abhyupeya tayā laghoḥ upāyāt sādhya siddhau sambhavatyām carama bhāvitayā avaśya anuṣṭheya tva abhāvena gurau= upāye pravartamānasya tava eva idam doṣa udbhāvanam pradīpe pradīpam prajvālya tamaḥ nirāsāya yatamānasya eva puṃsaḥ na hi tatra kaścid dīpa doṣaḥ kintu tathā ākārī puruṣaḥ eva paryanuyojyaḥ sarva sādhana sādhāraṇaḥ vā ayam doṣaḥ yad sambhavat evaṃvidha laghu upāya tvam nāma svarūpa asiddhiḥ iva sarva pramāṇānām tasmāt mā nāma bhūt ati vyāpti ādi doṣaḥ sāmānya doṣāt eva duṣyam lakṣaṇam iti 
NSu_2.1.21a.7	 etena dvitīyaḥ api nirastaḥ pramāṇa tva ādi avagamam antareṇa tad avagama anupapatteḥ tad avagamāya asya pratītau= anyonya āśraya prasaṅgaḥ astu vā anyat api lakṣaṇe kiñcid liṅgam tathā api tat eva lakṣyāvinā bhūta tayā lakṣaṇam upanyasyatām sannihita pratipattika tvāt na tat avaśyam vyāpakam vaktavyam liṅga tvasya vyāpya tvena eva upapatteḥ iti ced na yatra liṅgam avyāpaka tvāt na asti tatra lakṣaṇasya pramāṇa abhāvāt pratyetum aśakya tvena katham tatas prāmāṇya ādi avagamaḥ yadā ca kvacid lakṣya jātīyaḥ eva pramāṇa abhāvāt lakṣaṇa manavadhāraṇīya tayā lakṣya vyāpaka tā anavagame api lakṣaṇam tadā kim aparāddham liṅga antareṇa avyāpakena atha yatra tad lakṣaṇe liṅgam na asti tatra liṅga antarāt pratyetavyam tathā api te eva āstām lakṣye liṅgam kim lakṣaṇa anumāna pūrvakam tad anumāna kalpanayā atha tathā āliṅga dvayam yat tat pratyekam avyāpaka tayā na lakṣaṇam tad anumitam tu tathā tvāt lakṣaṇam iti ced na lakṣya anumānasya lakṣaṇa prayojanasya ubhābhyām eva siddheḥ kṛtam vyāpakena tena 
NSu_2.1.21a.8–2.1.21a.10	 na api tṛtīyaḥ sa hi evaṃrūpaḥ yat yathārtham tad pramāṇam iti vyavahartavyam iti ayam anupapannaḥ sarvatra lakṣaṇasya jñātum aśakyatvāt pramāṇa tva ādinā tad avagame tat eva astu vyavahāra niyama nidānam avyavahita pratipattika tvāt iti a āveditam atas eva na caturthaḥ kalpanā gaurava doṣaḥ ca adhikaḥ na pañcamaḥ tādṛśasya darśayitum aśakya tvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.21a.11–2.1.21a.12	 atra ucyate astu tāvat sajātīya vijātīya vyavacchinna lakṣya pratīti artham lakṣaṇam iti pakṣaḥ sāsnādimān gauḥ iti vidita lakṣaṇa sambandhaḥ hi yam piṇḍam sāsnādi mantam paśyati tam na ayam aśvādiḥ na api ghaṭādiḥ iti pratipādyate nanu vyavacchedaḥ anyonya abhāvaḥ bhedaḥ iti anarthāntaram bhedaḥ ca vastu svarūpam eva tathā ca lakṣya svarūpa pratipattiḥ eva tat pratipattiḥ iti kṛtam lakṣaṇena atha lakṣya pratīti nirapekṣam eva lakṣaṇena vyavacchedaḥ bodhyate iti matam tat na nirāśrayasya tasya bodhayitum aśakyatvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.21a.13	 satyam svarūpa pratītiḥ eva bheda pratītiḥ iti tathā api pratiyogi viśeṣa ghaṭita tad avagamāya lakṣaṇasya upayogaḥ asaṅkīrṇa tayā gopiṇḍam paśyan= api hi na tāvat ayam na aśvaḥ na ghaṭaḥ iti pratyeti yāvat lakṣaṇam na avagacchati sāsnādima tvam tadā pratītam iti ced na sāsna ādimān gauḥ iti evam avagamasya vivakṣita tvāt atas eva sajātīya ityādi viśeṣaṇa upādānam 
NSu_2.1.21a.14–2.1.21a.15	 yat atra uktam kim sajātīya ityādi tat asat pauruṣeya vacasām puruṣa vivakṣā adhīna tvena niyantum aśakyatvāt lakṣya atiriktam hi sajātīya vijātīya tayā dvairāśyena vivakṣyate yathā yathā artha jñāna tad sādhanasya pramāṇasya jñānam tad sādhanam ca sajātīyam yat na jñānam na api tad sādhanam tat vijātīyam yathā ca pratyakṣasya anumāna ādikam sajātīyam vijātīyam tu ghaṭa ādikam evam anyatra api vivektavyam iti 
NSu_2.1.21a.16–2.1.21a.17	 evam tarhi lakṣya apekṣayā bhinnā dvaya vat chedaḥ iti uktam syāt iti ced kaḥ na iti āha na hi kaḥ api svastha ātmā svasmāt eva vyavacchedam lakṣaṇa prayojanam ācakṣati yat atra uktam yadā ca ityādi tasat aṅgatam vastutas yat lakṣyāt bhinnam tatas vyavaccheda avagama artha tvāt lakṣaṇasya pratipādakasya yadi api lakṣya anya tva jñānam alakṣya īpekṣitam tathā api pratipādyasya atad apekṣitam tathā api pratipādyaḥ tad apekṣa tvāt na doṣaḥ 
NSu_2.1.21a.18	 tasya api padārtha jñāna pūrvaka tvāt vākya artha jñānasya sajātīya vijātīya pada upātta lakṣyāni ajñānam vinā lakṣyasya alakṣya anya tva jñānam lakṣaṇa prayojanam na siddhayati iti kaścid tad anupapannam na hi lakṣyāni avyāvṛttiḥ lakṣaṇa vākya pratipādyāḥ kinnāma tat jñānam lakṣaṇa prayojana tvena ucyate lakṣaṇa vākya arthaḥ eva pratipādyena boddhavyaḥ 
NSu_2.1.21a.19^1	 yat api api ca ityādinā pṛṣṭam tatra avagatam eva lakṣaṇam vyāvṛtta lakṣya jñānam upajanayati iti vadāmaḥ na ca tasya duravadhāraṇa tā yathāyatham pratyakṣa ādinā tad avadhāraṇāt yatra liṅgāt tad avagamaḥ tatra tatas eva lakṣaṇa prayojana siddheḥ vyarthā paraspara aku sṛṣṭiḥ iti ced na prayojana sadbhāve gauravasya api anādaraṇa sambhavāt yathā indriya vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvena akṣa udbhava tvam anumāya tena pratyakṣam lakṣyate tatra anvartha saṃjñā jñāpanam prayojanam evam anyatra api draṣṭavyam gauravam anuruddhaya prayojanam avadhīryatām iti ced na puruṣa abhiprāyāṇām niyantum aśakyatvāt garīyān= ca pratipattau gauravāt prameya ādhikya lābhaḥ 
NSu_2.1.21a.19^2	 prayojana abhāve tu paramparā ku sṛṣṭiḥ iti ced na prayojana sadbhāve gauravasya api anādaraṇa sambhavāt yathā indriya vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvena akṣa udbhava tvam anumāyatena pratyakṣam lakṣyate tatra anvartha saṃjñā jñāpanam prayojanam evam anyatra api draṣṭavyam gauravam anuruddhaya prayojanam avadhīryatām iti ced na puruṣa abhiprāyāṇām niyantum aśakyatvāt garīyān= ca pratipattau gauravāt prameya ādhikya lābhaḥ prayojana abhāve tu paramparā ku sṛṣṭiḥ anādaraṇīyā eva iti tadīya doṣa tā vyutpādanam na asmākam aniṣyam etena dvitīya tṛtīya caturthāḥ api samāhitāḥ veditavyāḥ lakṣaṇa avadhāraṇa upāyasya ukta tvāt gauravasya ca samāhita tvāt 
NSu_2.1.21a.20	 nanu tathā api kim tattvam yathāyatham catuṣi ayam api tathā hi kvacid lakṣya atiriktam lakṣaṇam bhavati yathā gandhavatī pṛthivī iti kvacid lakṣyā an atiriktam yathā pṛthivī tvavatī pṛthivī yathārtham pramāṇam ityādi tatra ādyam lakṣya svarūpa pratipatti kāraṇam bhavat tasya anvayaḥ vyavaccheda tat śabda vyavahartavyate ca pratipādayati dvitīyantu pravṛtti nimittam bhava dvaya vahāra mātra kāraṇam bhavati tatra siddha aṃśena pakṣīkaraṇam asiddha aṃśena sādhya tvam svayam ūhanīyam 
NSu_2.1.21a.21	 nanu lakṣaṇam vyāvṛttam vyāvartayat i uta avyāvṛttam ādye sva vyāvṛttiḥ lakṣaṇa antara adhīnā na vā na prathamaḥ tatra api lakṣaṇa apekṣāyām anavasthāpātāt na dvitīyaḥ lakṣye api tad prasaṅgāt ninirmitta kārya abhyupagame kādācid ka tā anupapatteḥ ca na antyaḥ atiprasaṅgāt eva iti ucyate lakṣaṇam api vyāvṛttam eva vyāvartayati tat api lakṣaṇena eva na ca evam anavasthā prāk nirjñāteṣu arthrṣu vyavasthānāt yaḥ tu kāṣṭha loṣṭhayitaḥ kañcid padārtham vā kasyacid kiñci= śabda vācya tvam vā na vetti na asau lakṣaṇa śāstre adhikriyate kinnāma upadeśa ādinā vidita padatad artha saṅgati ādiḥ svatantra vyavahāra ādi artham lakṣaṇam apekṣate iti 
NSu_2.1.21a.22	 atha api syāt kim avagatam lakṣaṇam phala hetuḥ kiṃvānavagatam na tāvat caramaḥ tad abhidhāna vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt abhidhānasya jñāna utpādana upāya tvāt tasya ca anavagatasya eva phala sādhana tva abhyupagamāt ādye kim anyasmāt tad avagamaḥ uta tvadīyāt lakṣaṇa vākyāt yadi anyasmāt kṛtam amunā lakṣaṇa abhidhāna prayāsena abhidhānasya jñāna utpāda atirikta prayojana abhāvāt tasya anyatas eva siddheḥ antye kim idam tvad abhidhānam āpta upadeśa tayā lakṣaṇam bodhayati uta liṅga ādi bhāvena na tāvat caramaḥ tvad vacana lakṣaṇa avinābhāva ādeḥ darśayitum aśakyatvāt na api prathamaḥ param prati bhavati āpta tva siddheḥ siddhau hi pratijñā mātrāt eva sādhya siddheḥ hetu abhidhānam anarthakam syāt 
NSu_2.1.21a.23	 nanu prativādinam prati lakṣaṇa abhidhānam na artha vat tena vā adya āpta bhāva anaṅgīkārāt kintu śiṣya artham lakṣaṇam ucyate śāstre sa hi sarvasya śāstrasya kartāram āptam eva manyate tasmāt śiṣyam pratyāpta vacana tayā eva lakṣaṇa vākya martam pratipādayiṣyati iti mā evam yadi na prativādinam prati śāstram kintu śiṣyam prati tadā pratijñā mātrāt eva āpta vacanāt śiṣyasya artha niścaya upapatteḥ hetu ādi abhidhānam anarthaka tām āpannam śāstre atha bhavatu prativādinam api prati śāstra vākyam yatra hetu ādi upāttam lakṣaṇa vākyam tu śiṣyam eva prati prayojakam pratipanna śāstra kāra āpta bhāvam iti manyase tat api anupapannam śāstra antara sādhya tvāt asya arthasya asti hi samaya grāhakam śāstram munibhiḥ praṇītam nāma liṅga anuśāsana vyākaraṇa ādi iti 
NSu_2.1.21a.24	 atra brūmaḥ uktam hi etat avagatam eva lakṣaṇam phala hetuḥ iti tad avagamaḥ ca yathāyatham pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇāt iti api na ca yathārtham pramāṇam iti sāsnādimān gauḥ iti vākyasya lakṣaṇam pratipādyam abhyupagacchāmaḥ yena anyatas siddha tvāt tasya idam anarthakam syāt kintu yaḥ lakṣaṇam anyatas jānāti na jānāti ca vyavahāra nidāna tva ādinā tam prati tad avabodhāya idam vākyam tathā hi ayam gauḥ iti ādi upadeśa ādinā ekasyām vyaktau go śabda artha tayā avagatāyām kim iyam eva vyaktiḥ uta anyāpi iti jijñāsamānam pratyanyatra api go śabda artha tām vijijñāpayi puruṣa deśa ādeḥ ānanti ādinā kartum aśakyatavāt idam vyāpti viṣayam vākyam āhayaḥ sāsnādimān sa go śabda arthaḥ a iti idam ca na āpta upadeśa tayā eva vyāpti bodhakam api tu prayoga antara vat pratītāyāḥ vyāpteḥ smāraka tvena apratītāya astu tat eva jijñāsā janana dvāreṇa pramā utpādaka tvena upayujyate smṛta vyāptiḥ ca yām yām vyaktim sāsnādimatīm avalokayati tām tām go śabda artha tayā anuminoti iti kaḥ doṣaḥ 
NSu_2.1.21a.25	 yat vā yaḥ pṛthivī iti padam vā vyakti viśeṣasya tad atha ṛtām vā avagacchan= tad pravṛtti nimittam jijñāsate tam prati pṛthivī tvavatī prathivī iti pṛthivī tvam pṛthivī śabda pravṛtti nimittam ucyate tatra yasya vaktari āpta tā buddhiḥ sa tāvatā santuṣyati aparam prati tu avyāpti ādi śūnya tvāt iti vākya śeṣaḥ pravartate 
NSu_2.1.21a.26	 athavā asti gauḥ nāma arthaḥ iti viditavataḥ yatra tatra gavi ghaṭa ādau= aśva ādau ca go buddhau prasaktāyām goḥ svarūpa avadhāraṇa mukhena itara vyavacchedam kurvat sāsna ādi mān eva gauḥ na tu tad virahī ghaṭa ādiḥ aśvādiḥ vā iti vākyam prayujyate idam api pūvarvat āpta tva avadhāraṇa anavadhāraṇābhyām dvayām gatim avalambate iti kim atra anupapannam 
NSu_2.1.21a.27^1	 nanu atra tāvat evam prayoktavyam ayam go tvena vyavahartavyaḥ sāsnādimattvāt iti tatra kim gauḥ vī avahārasya viśeṣaṇam go śabdaḥ vā ādye yadi asau go viśiṣṭam vyavahāram na ajñāsīt tadā katham purovarti vyaktau tasya kartavya tām anumānāt api jānīyāt na hi avidita agniḥ anumānāt agni sambandham bodhayitum śakyaḥ atha ājñāsīt tadā jñāta jñāpaka tvena vyartham anumānam na dvitīyaḥ tadā hi ayam go śabda abhidheyaḥ sāsnādimat tvat iti anumānam syāt tatra ca atiprasaṅgaḥ tatra eva jabagaḍa daśa ādi śabda abhidheya tvam api sādhyam syāt te sāmānyatas api arthavat tayā na prasiddhāḥ 
NSu_2.1.21a.27^2	 na evam go śabdaḥ iti asti viśeṣaḥ iti ced tathā api śaśa viṣāṇa ādi śabda abhidheya tvam sādhyatām te api asat viṣaya tayā eva prasiddhāḥ gauḥ asti iti ādi prayogāt go śabdaḥ na evam iti ced evam api svastimatī ityādi śabda vācya tā anumānam go mātre syāt atha sati api go tve tat anyatra tad aprayogāt na iti ced evam tarhi yatra sa asnādimattvam na asti tatra go śabda prayogaḥ api na asti yatra sa asnādimattvam asti tatra sarvatra asti iti yaḥ jānīte tam prati lakṣaṇa abhidhānam iti syāt sa ca vyavahāra antara vat anvaya vyatirekābhyām eva vācya vācaka bhāvam avadhāritavān iti vyartham anumānam iti
