NSu_2.1.21a.28	 mā evam ubhayatra api doṣa abhāvāt kevala vyatireki tve hi kathañcid etat abhidhātum yuktam upadeśa ādinā viśeṣaṇena gavā viśeṣitam vyavahāram avagatavaḥ hi tat anyatra tad kartavya tā anumāna sādhya iti aṅgīkāre kaḥ virodhaḥ syāt śabda viśeṣita vyavahāra kartavyatā sādhane ati prasaṅgaḥ kim bodhyasya bodhakasya vā iti vācyam na ādyaḥ tena tad vaya āpteḥ anavagata tvāt avagata tvāt ca go śabda vācya tā vyāpteḥ na dvitīyaḥ tena api pūrvam vṛddha vacana ādinā tathā eva vyāpteḥ avagata tvāt prayoga bhāva abhāvābhyām bādhasya nirṇīta tvāt ca na hi bodhyaḥ bādha paricaya śūnyaḥ iti etāvatā paricita bādhena api bodhakena viparītam bodhanīyam vipralambhaka tva āpātāt tattva nirṇaya artha tvāt ca vāda kathā anusāriṇaḥ śāstrasya iti evam pakṣa antare api anumāna prayoga prakāraḥ boddhavyaḥ 
NSu_2.1.21a.29^1	 yat api uktam śāstra antara sādhya tvāt ayam arthaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti tat ayuktam na hi evam asmābhiḥ pratijñātam yat sarvathā śāstra antara sādhyam tat na ucyate iti na ca evam śāstra sāṅkaryam āśaṅkanīyam viṣaya prayojana bhedāt yadi ca śāstra antara sādhyaḥ api arthaḥ bhavadīyaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ tarhi vyākaraṇa ādi sādhyam anyat api kasmāt na ucyate iti ced na sandigdha tva saprayojana tva sat asat bhāvābhyām vaiṣamyāt sandigdha tā ādi sadbhāve api yat avacanam tad ukta diśā śiṣyaiḥ eva śakya jñāna tvāt iti yat kiñcid etat 
NSu_2.1.21a.29^2–2.1.21a.30	 anyathā parasya api kulīrasya iva svāpatya yukti hata tvam syāt tena api hi smṛti rūpaḥ paratra pūrva dṛṣṭa avabhāsaḥ adhyāsaḥ ityādīni lakṣaṇāni sva śāstre nibaddhāni sūtra kṛtā ca janma ādyasya yatas iti tatra ete doṣāḥ tāni lakṣaṇāni kim samāskandanti uta na iti vaktavyam na tāvat dvitīyaḥ sāmānya samāna nyāya tvāt na ādyaḥ duṣya upādānasya parājaya hetu tvāt doṣāskanditāni api tāni vyavahāram nirvahanti iti ced na āpātatas api duṣyānām tathā tve katham unmatta bhāṣitānām api tad bhāvaḥ na syāt na hi teṣām anirvāhaka tve anupapatteḥ anyat kāraṇam asti kiñca evam vadatā prāk brahma sākṣātkārāt bādhyam avyāvahārikam brahma sākṣātkāra bādhyam vyāvahārikam iti matam api parityaktam syāt na hi ayam brahma sākṣātkāraḥ na api bādhaḥ 
NSu_2.1.21a.31	 kiñca evam asmadīyam api lakṣaṇam kutas na vyavahāram nirvahet na ca vyavahāra nirvāha atiriktam kim api tat sādhyam abhilaṣāmaḥ bhavat abhilaṣitā pāramārthika tā bādhyate iti ced kim lakṣaṇasya uta lakṣyasya na ādyaḥ tathā hi vimatam apārama arthi kam aprayojana abhidhāna tvāt ityādi uktam syāt na ca asya asmān prati vyāptiḥ śakya abhidhānāḥ kiñca asmin pakṣe adhyāsa lakṣaṇa anupapattiḥ ca bhavatā na pariharaṇīyāḥ tasyāḥ vyavahāra nirvāhā virodhāt pārama arthika tā niṣedha aupayika tvena iṣya sādhana tvāt ca etena ati vyāpti ādi doṣaḥ api na aparamārtha tā sādhakaḥ alakṣaṇa tā sādhakaḥ tu syāt na dvitīyaḥ anupapadyamāna lakṣaṇa tvena lakṣya mithyā tva sādhane brahmaṇi vyabhicārāt uktāyāḥ lakṣaṇa anupapatteḥ tad lakṣaṇe api sāmyāt 
NSu_2.1.21a.32–2.1.21a.34	 kiñca adhyāsa lakṣaṇam upapannam na vā ādye sa pakṣa apraveśaḥ sādhanasya dvitīye tad anupapatti nirāsa āyāsaḥ vyarthaḥ syāt iti āstām vistaraḥ artham na ativartate iti yathārtham tasya bhāvaḥ yāthārthyam tat eva māna tvam māna śabda pravṛtti nimittam mā alakṣaṇam iti yāvat yadi api sāsnādimān gauḥ itivat yathārtham pramāṇam iti ukte api bhavati eva lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāva pratītiḥ tathā api tadvat eva lakṣyam lakṣaṇa atiriktam śaṅkayeta tatas ca pṛthak nirūpyam api syāt tat mā śaṅkī iti yāthārthyam eva māna tvam na tu sāsnādimattvāt go tvam iva tatas atiriktam iti uktam nanu kim idam lakṣaṇam nāma lakṣyasi a asādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ yāvaḥ tu ekaḥ śabdaḥ niveśayitum iṣyaḥ yāvanti ca itarasmāt vaya āvartanīyāni tāni ucyante lakṣyāṇi iti 
NSu_2.1.21a.35	 nanu asādhāraṇa dharmaḥ ced lakṣaṇam avyāpakasya api tadā lakṣaṇa tā āpattiḥ ati vyāpti asambhavau= iva avyāptiḥ api hi lakṣaṇa doṣaḥ ucyate liṅga tayā hi lakṣaṇam upayujyate na ca vyāpaka tā liṅga tva upayoginī vyāpya tvena eva tad upapatteḥ itarathā dhūma ādīnām aliṅga tā pātāt kinnāma pakṣīkṛta dṛṣṭāntī kṛta vyāpaka tā tu apekṣitā eva upāya tvena upanyastasya abhāve tad upeya prāpteḥ asambhavāt ubhaya dharma bhūtāyāḥ vyāpteḥ anyatara abhāve darśayitum aśakyatvāt tathā ca tadānīm lila kṣayiṣita mātra vyāpti tvam lakṣaṇasya apekṣitam tat ca lakṣyasya dharmaḥ iti uktam eva avyāpaka tvasya lakṣaṇa doṣa tā vādaḥ tu sarvasya api lila kṣayiṣita tve draṣṭavyaḥ 
NSu_2.1.21a.36	 yat vā anyatra lakṣaṇa antara abhāva niścaya nimittā tat uktiḥ vastutas tu ekam iva anekam api svasva āśraye vyāvṛtti ādikam kurvat bhavati eva lakṣaṇam atas eva kaṇādaḥ kriyāvat guṇavat samavāyi kāraṇam iti kriyāvat tvam api dravya lakṣaṇa tvena āha kriyāvat grahaṇam anya artham iti ced tat kim avyāpakasya lakṣaṇa tā anupapatteḥ anyathāvyākhyānam uta nimitta antarāt na antyaḥ tad adarśanāt na prathamaḥ anupapatteḥ apākṛta tvāt 
NSu_2.1.21a.37	 nanu atra pṛthivī ādīni nava api pakṣīkṛtya etāni dravyāṇi kriyāvat tvāt iti prayoktavyam kriyāvanti ā iva vā mūrtāni na ādyaḥ bhāga asiddheḥ na dvitīyaḥ anadhyavasita tvāt tat katham na anupapattiḥ mā evam kaiścid anadhyavasitasya doṣa tā anaṅgīkārāt yeṣām ca sa doṣaḥ teṣām api upadeśa ādinā ghaṭa ādeḥ dravya tva niścaye sati tad itara mūrta pakṣīkāreṇa dravya tva sādhane kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ syāt iti alam 
NSu_2.1.21a.38	 kecid vādinaḥ vijñānasya prāmāṇyam āsthiṣata apare tu tad kāraṇasya tat kim atra tattvam dvayam api iti brūmaḥ pramitiḥ pramāṇam pramīyate anena iti pramāṇam iti bhāva karaṇayoḥ pramāṇa śabdasya sāmarthyāt yadi api lyuh bhāva kāraṇayoḥ iva adhikaraṇe api smaryate tathā api pramāṇa śabdasya abhidhāna abhāvāt na tatra vṛttiḥ kṛt taddhita samāsānām abhidhāna adhīna tvāt 
NSu_2.1.21a.39	 nanu asti viprāḥ pramāṇam iti adhikaraṇe api prayogaḥ mā evam viprāṇām pramāyām svātantryeṇa kartṝṇām adhikaraṇa tva abhāvāt na hi kriyādhāraḥ adhikaraṇam kinnāma kartṛ karmaṇoḥ kriyā āśrayayoḥ dhāraṇa kriyām prati yaḥ ādhāraḥ tad kārakam tasmāt tadīya vijñānasya vākyasya vā prāmāṇyāt viprāḥ pramāṇam iti upacaryate yadi tarhi vijñānam tad kāraṇam ca pramāṇam dvayam api tatra ubhayatra yāthārthya apara paryāyam prāmāṇyam kim eka prakāram vartate uta aneka prakāram ādye vijñānam kevala pramāṇam pratyakṣa anumāna āgama lakṣaṇam tad kāraṇam anupramāṇam iti siddhānta virodha āpātaḥ dvitīye lakṣaṇasya anupapattiḥ prakāra dvayasya anyonya smin= avartanena avyāpta tvāt iti atas āha tat iti 
NSu_2.1.21b.1–2.1.21b.4^1	 tad mukhyam jñāna śabdayoḥ karaṇa bhūtayoḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ tvamukhyam iti śeṣaḥ etat ca sphuṭīkariṣyate syāt etat yadi yāthārthyam pramāṇa lakṣaṇam syāt na ca tad sambhavati ati vyāpteḥ tathā hi yogya tā vīpsā padārtha anativṛttiḥ sādṛśyam ca iti yata aśabda arthāḥ artha śabdaḥ ca abhidheya dhana vastu prayojana nivṛttiṣu vartate tatra sādṛśya arthasya yathāśabdasya tāvat atra na parigrahaḥ yathā sādṛśye a iti avyayībhāva vidhāne viśeṣaṇāt samāsa antarasya ca asāmarthyādi pratihata tvāt atas eva yathārtha anubhavaḥ pramā iti atra kim yāthārthyam artha sādṛśyam iti ādiḥ kasyacid praścaḥ anupapannaḥ 
NSu_2.1.21b.1–2.1.21b.4^2	 na api yogya tā vīpsā arthasya vākya śeṣa abhāvena artha yogya tāyāḥ artha vīpsāyāḥ vā prāmāṇya āpatteḥ tasmāt padārthān anivṛtti arthasya idam grahaṇam artha śabdasya abhidheya vācinaḥ grahaṇe avyāpti prasaṅgāt viṣaya apara paryāyavasvacanasya eva grahaṇam tathā ca artham viṣayam na ativartate na vyabhicarati yat tat pramāṇam iti uktam syāt etat ca sa karmaka kriyā mātre asti na hi gamanam gamyam ativartate na api chidā chedyam yat eva gati ādinā prāpyam tat eva gamya ādi tatas na idam lakṣaṇam iti atas āha artha tvam iti 
NSu_2.1.21c.1–2.1.21c.3	 artha tva marya tā eva syāt artha tā eva jñeyatā eva artha tvam artha śabda pravṛtti nimittam asmākam vivakṣitam syāt na tu viṣaya tvam iti arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati yathā śabdasya padārtha an ativṛtti vāci tvam aṅgīkṛtam eva artha śabdaḥ tu na viṣaya paryāyaḥ gṛhyate kintu jñeya vācī yadi api na tatra tasya rūḍhiḥ tathā api aryataiti vyutpatyā tad vācitā asti eva arteḥ auṇa ādikasya than pratyayasya prasiddha tvāt gati arthānām ca jñāna artha tvāt iti nanu arthatā iti katham aryaḥ svāmi vaiśyayoḥ a iti viśeṣaṇāt mā evam svāmi tva upacārāt arthaḥ hi jñāna ādi apekṣayā pradhānam vivakṣyate kim atas yadi evam jñeyatā eva artha tvam iti atas āha na iti 
NSu_2.1.21d.1–2.1.21d.3^1	 na kriyā artheṣu sā matā kriyā artheṣu kriyā viṣayeṣu sā aryatā tad abhāvāt ca na yathārtha tā kriyāsu iti na ati vyāpakam pramāra lakṣaṇam iti śeṣaḥ nanu etāvatā api na ati vyāpti parihāraḥ gamana ādīnām api jñeya anati vṛtti tvāt na hi tad viṣayaḥ grāma ādiḥ sarvathā na jñeyaḥ iti śakyate vaktum tad atyantā bhāva prasaṅgāt iti mā evam yathā hi pitari sādhuḥ mātari sādhuḥ iti vākyam yat kiñcit pitṛ ādau sādhu tvena na paryavasyati kintu svīye pitṛ ādau tat kasya hetoḥ pitṛ ādi śabdānām sambandhi śabda tvāt sambandhi śabdānām hi eṣa mahimā 
NSu_2.1.21d.1–2.1.21d.3^2	 anyathā pituḥ dhanam upādadyāt ityādau bahu viplavaḥ syāt sati ca evam śabda mahimānam anādṛtya pratyavatiṣṭhamānaḥ chala vādi tayā jīyeta tathā prakṛte api jñeya śabdasya sambandhi śabda tvāt su a jñeyam na ativartate yat tad pramāṇam iti uktam syāt na ca gamana upādhinā gamanena vā nimittena grāmaḥ jñeyaḥ yena tam anatikramya vartamānam gamanam yathārtham syāt kintu gamyaḥ eva tat katham ativyāptiḥ bhavati ca ghaṭa ādiḥ jñāna tad kāraṇābhyām upādhi nimittābhyām jñeyaḥ iti tat idam uktam kriyā artheṣu sā na matā śabda artha tattva viduṣām iti 
NSu_2.1.21d.4–2.1.21d.5	 nanu tathā api anyonya āśraya tvam ātma āśraya tvam vā sva śabdena pramāṇasya abhidhānāt iti ced na jñāna tad kāraṇa mātra upādanena lakṣaṇasya vyākhyāta tvāt sva guṇa grahaṇam indriyam śrotram iti atra yathā iti nanu kim idam pramāṇasya jñeyā avyabhicāri tvam nāma kim prameya vyāpya tvam kim vā yāvat prameya gocara tvam ādye api vyāptiḥ kim deśataḥ kiṃvā kālataḥ na prathamaḥ pramāṇa asamāna deśa artha viṣaya pramāṇeṣu avyāpteḥ na dvitīyaḥ atīta ādi viṣaya pramāṇa avyāpteḥ na antyaḥ asarvajña jñānānām tad kāraṇānām vā prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt iti 
NSu_2.1.21d.6–2.1.21d.7	 mā evam advaita āgama ādeḥ tattva āvedaka tva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam abhyupagacchatā pareṇa api asya arthasya nirvaktavya tvāt pareṇa aṅgīkṛtam upādāya asmābhiḥ vyavahriyate na tu kim api lakṣaṇam vyavasthāpyate iti ced na sva pratipattau= avaśya āśrayaṇīya tvāt vayavasthāyāḥ na hi sva prakāśam tattvam iti etāvatā vinā vedānta adhigamam tad adhigamaḥ śakyaḥ aṅgīkartum atha āveditasya sattvam tattva āvedaka tvam iti nirbrūyāt tadā vibhrame ativyāptiḥ syāt tatra api āveditasya idam ākārasya sattvāt atha yāvat āveditasya sattvam tattva āvedaka tvam sat eka gocara tvam iti yāvat iti vadet tat eva asmākam api yāthārthyam iti vadāmaḥ 
NSu_2.1.21d.8	 nanu evam api bhrame ativyāptiḥ na hi idam aṃśaḥ vā rajata tva ādi jātiḥ vā tad sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ vā tad tādātmyam vā na sat anyatra sattve api atrāsat iti ced na hi devadattaḥ gṛhe asannityasan= ā iva naca ayam asti asmākam prasaṅgaḥ adhiṣṭhāna itarasya sarvasya anirvacanīya tayā aṅgīkārāt iti mā evam asmābhiḥ api tasya atyantā sattva svīkārāt 
NSu_2.1.21d.9–2.1.21d.10	 atha matam kim viṣaya sattvam tadānīm abhimatam uta pūrvam atha paścāt yat vā sarvadā athavā yadākadācid yadi vā yat yad deśa kālayoḥ yathā pratītam tasya tad deśa kālayoḥ tathā tvena na ādyaḥ atīta anāgata viṣaya pramāṇā vyāpanāt na dvitīyaḥ vartamāna anāgata viṣaya avyāpteḥ pāka rakte api ghaṭe nīla pratītau vibhāga uttara kālam saṃyukta pratyaye vā ati vyāpteḥ ca na tṛtīyaḥ atīta ādi viṣaya avyāpteḥ bhāvi pāka ja rāge kumbhe śyāme api raktapittinā rakta tā pratibhāse ati vyāpteḥ ca na caturthaḥ anitya viṣaya avyāpteḥ na pañcamaḥ pūrva ukta vibhrame ati vyāpteḥ na api ṣaṣṭhaḥ deśa kāla pramāṇa avyāpteḥ na hi deśa kālayoḥ deśa kāla antaram asti iti mā evam deśa kālayoḥ api sva sambandhena nirūpaṇasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt yat vā yat yathābhūtam pratītam tasya tathābhūtasya sattvam iti uktaḥ eva na ati prasaṅgaḥ deśa kālayoḥ api viśeṣaṇa antara vat yathābhūtam iti anena eva gṛhīta tvāt viśeṣa anukteḥ ukta doṣa aprasakteḥ ca 
NSu_2.1.21d.11	 tathā atrapa niścāyaka abhāvena asambhavi idam lakṣaṇam tathā hi jñāna yāthārthyam kim aduṣya karaṇa janya tvena avadhāraṇīyam uta duṣya karaṇa ajanya tvena atha pravṛtti sāmarthyena yat vā jñāna antara saṃvādena kiṃvā visaṃvāda abhāvena na ādyaḥ tasya api duravadhāraṇa tvāt jñāna yāthārthyena tad anumāne ca itaretara āśraya tva āpatteḥ nitya jñāneṣu tad abhāvāt ca na dvitīyaḥ aśakya avadhāraṇa tvāt na tṛtīyaḥ sarvatra tad abhāvāt na caturthaḥ sukha ādi jñāne tad abhāvāt jñāna mātra saṃvāda aṅgīkāre ca dhārāvāhika vibhrame tad graha āpattiḥ yathā artha jñāna saṃvāda abhyupagame tu tad tad yātha arthya avadhāraṇena anavasthā na pañcamaḥ asañjāta bādha bhrameṣu api tad āpātāt puruṣa deśa kāla vikalpa anupapatteḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.1.21d.12	 mā evam tathā sati vedānta janita vijñānasya api yāthārthya anavadhāraṇa prasaṅgāt viṣaya satya tvāt tad avadhāraṇam iti ced tat eva katham jñāna sāmarthyāt iti ced kim jñāna mātrasya sāmarthyam uta yathārtha tayā niścitasya ādye śukti rajata ādeḥ api satya tā āpattiḥ dvitīye kim etasya eva jñānasya uta jñāna antarasya na prathamaḥ paraspara āśraya prasaṅgāt na dvitīyaḥ anavasthā ādi āpātāt 
NSu_2.1.21d.13	 atha manyeta svatas eva vijñānānām prāmāṇya grahaḥ bādhena kvacid apā udyate na ca brahma jñānasya bādhaḥ sambhavati yathāśakti parīkṣāyām api tad adarśanāt nirmūla śaṅkāyāḥ ca anudayāt niravadhikasya nissākṣikasya bādhasya adarśanāt avadhya ādi svīkāre ca tasya eva brahma tvena bādhitum aśakya tvāt iti tat etat samānam asmad mate api vivṛtaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ tatra tatra iti upapannam yāthārthyasya pramāṇa lakṣaṇa tvam iti tad mukhyam jñāna śabdayoḥ iti na yuktam tathā sati jñāna vat śabdasya api kevala tva āpatteḥ iti āśaṅkām sa upapattikam pariharati jñāna arthaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.22ab.1–2.1.22ab.2	 jñāna arthe jñeyatā mukhyā śabda arthe tad anantaram yasmāt jñāna arthe jñāna viṣaye jñeyatā mukhyā śabda arthe śabda viṣaye tad anantaram jñeyatā mukhya iti yāvat tasmāt jñānaḥ eva yāthārthya lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam mukhyam śabde tu amukhyam tathā ca na tasya kevala tva āpattiḥ iti arthaḥ jñāna artheṣu aryatā mukhyā iti prakṛta tvāt vaktavye aryatā api gati karmasu vidyata iti gatau= ativyāptiḥ tad avasthā iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya jñeyatā iti arya tā vyākhyānam kṛtam idam uktam bhavati na jñāna sama kakṣatayā śabde yāthārthyam mukhyam kintu karaṇa traya apekṣayā jñānaḥ eva mukhyam yāthārthyam karaṇeṣu api nirdhāraṇāyām śabde mukhyam tat ete parama mukhya mukhye ekīkṛtya tat mukhyam jñāna śabdayoḥ iti uktam iti 
NSu_2.1.22ab.3–2.1.22ab.4	 yat vā tat mukhyam jñāna śabdayoḥ iti atra eva ayam arthaḥ vyākhyātavyaḥ tathā hi tad yāthārthye jñāne mukhyam karaṇeṣu tu amukhyam karaṇeṣu api kim eka prakāram aneka prakāram vā iti jijñāsāyām śabde mukhyam pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ amukhyam iti uktam atra ca śabda śabdane vedam eva adhikurute bhagavān muniḥ tad mukhya tā kathanasya eva mīmāṃsā upayogi tvāt anyathā vyarthāyāḥ jijñāsāyāḥ tad parihārasya ca asaṅgati prasaṅgāt yadi api jñāna śabdau dvandva nirdiṣyau tathā api karaṇeṣu amukhyam iti atas āha jñāna arthaḥ iti śabdaḥ iti upalakṣaṇam pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ api iti draṣṭavyam vyākhyānam tu pūrvavat śabdasya sva śabdena upādānam pūrvatra jñāna sama kakṣatayā pratītim vārayitum iti jñāne mukhyam yāthārthyam karaṇeṣu amukhyam tatra api śabde mukhyam iti uktam tatra jñāna karaṇayoḥ yātha arthyasya mukhya tva amukhya tva upapādanāya tad viṣayayoḥ jñeyatāyāḥ mukhyā mukhya tve hetu tayā ukte tad upapādana artham āha yathārtha iti 
NSu_2.1.22cd.1–2.1.22cd.3	 yathā artha jñāna janakāḥ yathārthāḥ yuktayaḥ smṛtāḥ sa upaskarāṇi vākyāni bhavanti tena jñānam sākṣāt yathārtham ityādau paṭhitavyam bahuvacanam ādi arthe yukti ādayaḥ iti arthaḥ tena janakāḥ iti upapannam avyayībhāvasya klība avyaya tvam chandaḥ tulya tvena anāśritya yathārthāḥ iti uktam kathañcid bahuvrīhitām āśritya vā yat vā bhāva pradhānāt yathā athar śabdāt matu arthe arśaḥ ādi tvāt aca yāthārthya upetāḥ iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.1.22cd.4	 tat ayam arthaḥ jñānam eva hi viṣayasya jñeyasya jñeyatāyām sākṣāt upādhiḥ bhavati jñāta tāyāḥ nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt atas tad viṣayasya jñeya tvam mukhyam iti jñānasya eva mukhyatas yāthārthyam yukti ādi karaṇāni tu viṣayasya jñeyatāyām upādhi bhūtam jñānam janayanti iti tad viṣayasya jñeya tvam amukhyam tatas eva teṣām yāthārthyam api amukhyam iti 
NSu_2.1.22cd.5–2.1.22cd.6	 atra yatha artha jñāna janakāḥ yathārthāḥ a iti uktiḥ tu parama sādhyam api sūcayitum yukteramukhya tāyām ādi tvena grahaṇam triṣu api apakarṣa sūcana artham āgama yuktyoḥ utkarṣa apakarṣau tatra tatra samarthitau= iti na iha uktam kim atas yadi evam jñānasya yāthārthyam mukhyam pratyakṣa ādi karaṇānām ca amukhyam iti atas āha anupramāṇam iti 
NSu_2.1.23ab.1–2.1.23ab.2	 anupramāṇam etāni hi akṣa yukti vacāṃsi atas atra api jñānam kevala pramāṇam iti prathamam paṭhitavyam hi yasmāt evam atas iti sambandhaḥ anupramāṇam iti eka vacanam bahuvacana arthe supām su luj iti smaraṇāt athavā akṣa yukta vacāṃsi iti dvandva nirdiṣyānām api buddhayā vivekena pratyekam anupramāṇam iti sambandhaḥ yat vā anupramāṇa anuvādena akṣa ādi tva kathanam atra iti na doṣaḥ avāntara vyāpāram avivakṣitvā karaṇa dharmiṇaḥ eva vivakṣayā akṣam iti uktam anyathā pratyakṣam iti vaktavyam vacaḥ iti āgama upalakṣaṇam 
NSu_2.1.23ab.3	 na ca evam api avyāptiḥ lakṣaṇasya iti vācyam jñānam eva yathārtham karaṇāni tu tad janakatayā tathā upacaryante iti aṅgīkāre hi sā syāt na ca evam yathā avasthita artha viṣayi tvasya ubhayatra api sāmyāt jñāna viṣayaḥ eva hi karaṇānām viṣayaḥ na hi kam api aviṣayīkurvanti eva tāni jñānam janayanti na api anya viṣayāṇi atiprasaṅgāt kevalam viṣayasya jñeyatām jñānam upādhi tayā karaṇāni tu tad janakatayā sampādayanti iti etāvantam viśeṣam āśritya kevala anupramāṇa bhedaḥ samathirtaḥ yadi ca etāvatā api avyāpti doṣaḥ tadā sarvatra api yat kiñcid vailakṣaṇyasya vaktum śakya tvāt ati prasaṅgaḥ syāt iti 
NSu_2.1.23ab.4	 ayam atra samudāya arthaḥ yathārtham pramāṇam tat dvividham kevalam anupramāṇam ca tatra yathārtha jñānam kevalam tad sādhanam anupramāṇam kevalam api dvividham caitanyam vṛtti rūpam ca iti caitanyam api trividham uttama madhyama adhama bhedāt tatra uttamam yathārtham eva madhyamam miśram adhamam ayathārtham eve dvitīyam api kevalam pratyakṣa anumānāgam a ja bhedāt trividham eva iti anupramāṇam api pratyakṣa anumāna āgama bhedāt trividham eva iti 
NSu_2.1.23ab.5	 nanu tathā api kākatālīye ati vyāptiḥ aparihāryā tathā hi pāṇau pañca varāṭakān pidhāya kaścid kañcid pṛcchati mama kare kati varāṭakāḥ iti sa ca pṛṣṭaḥ ajākṛpāṇīyanyāyena āha pañca iti tat etat praṣṭuḥ vaktuḥ ca jñānam yathārtham iti pramāṇam prasajyate na ca nissādhanam tat utpannam iti tad sādhanasya api pramāṇa tva āpātaḥ yādṛcchika saṃvādi liṅga vibhrama ādiṣu api evam prasaṅgaḥ durvāraḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.23ab.6	 mā evam vaktuḥ jñānasya saṃśaya tvena aprasaṅgāt tatra pākṣika vyavahāraḥ tu vaiyātya nibandhanaḥ na sva jñāna nibandhanaḥ anyathā vipralambhakasya api tādṛśa niścaya āpattau viparyasta aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt etena āhārya niścaya kalpanam api apāstam praṣṭuḥ tu prāk ūrdhvam ca jñānam pramāṇam eva tad mūlam ca pratyakṣam vākya janitam api pārśva stha ādeḥ vijñānam evam eva vākyam tu yādṛcchika saṃvādi yādṛcchika saṃvādi liṅga vibhrama vākya ābhāsa janyasya kevala pramāṇa tve api na tayoḥ prāmāṇyam tathā hi na tāvat tatra bāṣpasya bāṣpa tayā jñātasya vā yathā artha jñāna sādhana tvam vaktum śakyam na api dhūmasya asataḥ sādhana tva ayogāt sattve api aparāmṛṣṭa tvāt tatas dhūma tvena jñātasya bāṣpasya bāṣpa viṣayasya dhūma vibhramasya vā iti vaktavyam na ca tad sambhavati tad jātīyasya sarvatra kārya utpattiḥ āpanna iti ced na liṅga vibhramasya laukika kāraṇa tve api pāribhāṣika sādhana tva abhāvasya ukta tvāt 
NSu_2.1.23ab.7–2.1.23ab.9	 vākya ābhāsasya api prāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ anena nirastaḥ tasya prāmāṇya prasaṅge api na kācid asmākam kṣatiḥ na hi tārkikāṇām iva asmākam āpta ukta tayā prāmāṇya anumāna ādikam asti yat vā nirdoṣa tayā sādhanam viśiṣṭate nirdoṣa tā ca liṅga jñāna ādeḥ yathārtha tva ādi lakṣaṇā vyākhyeyāḥ tathā tve nirdoṣam jñāna sādhanam anupramāṇam iti eva astu kṛtam yathārtha iti jñāna viśeṣaṇena iti ced tad phalita arthasya eva nirdoṣa grahaṇena varṇita tvāt nirdoṣa karaṇa jam jñānam yāthārthyam na vyabhicarati iti svarūpa kathanam vā tat iti nanu darśana antara ukte lakṣaṇe sati kim apūrva nirmāṇena iti atas āha prāmāṇyam iti 
NSu_2.1.23cd.1–2.1.24ab.2	 prāmāṇyam na anuvādasya smṛteḥ api vihīyate yāthārthyam eva prāmāṇya śabda arthaḥ yat vivakṣitaḥ yat yadāḥ yāthārthyam eva prāmāṇya śabda arthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ bhavati tadā eva yathārthayoḥ smṛti anuvādayoḥ prāmāṇyam na hīyate darśana antara ukta lakṣaṇa kakṣīkāre tu taiḥ sva lakṣaṇasya vyāpaka tayā aṅgīkṛta tvāt smṛti ādau tad abhāvāt prāmāṇya abhāvaḥ eva prasajyate iti yuktam tad anādareṇa lakṣaṇa antara nirmāṇam iti 
NSu_2.1.24ab.3^1	 tathā hi anadhigata artha gantṛ pramāṇam iti mīmāṃsaka uktasya lakṣaṇasya smṛti ādau= abhāvaḥ sphuṭaḥ tasya adhigata gocara tvāt anubhūtiḥ pramāṇam iti prābhākara uktam lakṣaṇam api na tatra asti smṛti vyatiriktam jñānam anubhūtiḥ iti nirvacanāt tathā pramā vya āptam pramāṇam pramākaraṇam pramāṇam iti naiyāyika uktam api taiḥ api yathārtha anubhavaḥ pramā iti vyākhyāta tvāt atas eva pramāsām agrī pramāram iti nirastam avisaṃvādi vijñānam pramāṇam iti saugata uktam api tad abhipretasya artha ja tvā deḥ avisaṃvādasya abhāvāt smṛti ādeḥ avyāpakam 
NSu_2.1.24ab.3^2	 svāpūrva artha vyavasāya ātmakam jñānam pramāṇam iti jaina uktam api na smṛti ādau vartate tasya apūrva artha viṣaya tva abhāvāt nanu smṛtiḥ apūrva artha viṣayāḥ tat iti ullekhāt tasya ca anubhavena aviṣayīkaraṇāt iti ced na tathā satya pūrva grahaṇasya vyavacchedya abhāva prasaṅgāt dhārāvāhikam tat vayava= chedyam iti ced na anekānta vāde padārthānām kṣaṇika tvasya aṅgīkṛta tvena dhārāvāhike api evam apūrva artha tā abhyupagama saulabhyāt mā bhūt vā atra smṛti prāmāṇya hāniḥ doṣaḥ dhārāvāhike tu tad ha aniravarjanīyāḥ tat api smṛti anuvāda padābhyām upalakṣyate iti 
NSu_2.1.24ab.4	 nanu bhavat pakṣe api smṛteḥ prāmāṇyam hīyate eva tasyāḥ yāthārthya abhāvāt na hi yādṛśaḥ arthaḥ smaryate yadā tādṛśaḥ eva asau tadā pūrva avasthāyāḥ vartamāne nivṛtta tvāt anivṛttau hi pūrva tā eva na syāt na ca nivṛtta pūrva avastha tayā eva tam artham smṛtiḥ ālambate pūrva avasthā nivṛttau= anubhava apravṛtteḥ nanu samāna viṣaya tve api smṛti anubhavayeḥ anubhavaḥ yathārthaḥ na tu smṛtiḥ iti kutas etat nu bhava kāle tasya arthasya tādavasthyāt smṛti kāle tu atādavasthyāt nanu pūrvam tāvat tad avasthaḥ eva asau= asīt etāvatā eva jñānam astu yathārtham na pāka rakte api śyāma tā pratyayasya yathārtha tva prasaṅgāt nanu atīta śyāma tā pratyayaḥ tatra yathārthaḥ eva satyam tad viṣayasya tadānīm eva tad avasthā tvam na tu smaryamāṇa avasthaḥ tadānīm tad avasthaḥ tasmāt smṛtiḥ ayathārtha eva 
NSu_2.1.24ab.5	 mā evam apasiddhānta āpātāt tathā hi upalabdhi hetuḥ pramāṇam iti atra saṃśayāt au= ati vyāptim āśaṅkaya prakṛta yātha arthyena upalabdhiḥ viśeṣitāḥ tasya api smṛti hetau= ati vyāptim āśaṅkayā upalabdhi śabdaḥ anubhava vacanaḥ na jñāna sāmānya vacanaḥ iti uktam vācaspatinā tena jñāyate tena abhyupagatam smṛteḥ yāthārthyam iti anyathā yāthārthyena smṛtau vyāvṛttāyām punar na śaṅketa śaṅkamānaḥ vā tam eva parihāram anatidiśan= upalabdhi padam anubhūti para tayā na vyākuryāt yathārtha anubhavaḥ pramā samyak anubhava sādhanam pramāṇam ityādīni nyāya vidān vacanāni apīmam eva artham avagamayanti anyathā dvayaṅga vikala tvāt smṛteḥ anubhava pada vyāvartyatā na syāt 
NSu_2.1.24ab.6–2.1.24ab.7	 kāṇādaiḥ api pratyakṣa laiṅgika smṛti ārṣabhedena vidyā cāturvidhi am aṅgīkurvāṇaiḥ yathārtha tvam smṛteḥ aṅgīkṛtam yat apinahi yaḥ yādṛśaḥ a ityādi tat anena kim uktam bhavati smaraṇa kāle arthasya tad avasthā tva abhāvāt ayāthārthyam smṛteḥ iti vā pūrva avasthā nivṛtteḥ a viṣayīkaraṇāt iti vā anivṛtta pūrva avastha tvena viṣayīkaraṇāt iti vā ādye atīta anāgata viṣaya anumāna āgama prāmāṇya pracyutiḥ atīta ādi viṣayasya tadānīm asattvāt dvitīye sarva pramāṇā prāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ kasya api sarva ātmanā viṣayīkaraṇa abhāvāt tṛtīye tu asiddhiḥ na hi anivṛtta tad avasthaḥ asau= iti smṛtiḥ ālambate kintu tadā asau tādṛśaḥ iti tad avasthā nivṛtti a nivṛttyoḥ tu udāsīna eva 
NSu_2.1.24ab.8	 nanu anubhavena tadā tādṛśaḥ a iti aviṣayīkṛtam tathā viṣayīkurvāṇāḥ katham yāthārthyam labhante iti ced na syāt idam yadi anubhava anusāri tvam yāthārthyam iti vadāmaḥ artha anusāri tvam tu tathā iti uktam anubhave anya ākāre kutastyaḥ ayam smṛteranyākāraḥ iti ced kim ayam na asti iti abhimānaḥ uta nirhetukaḥ iti vā yat vā praśna mātram na ādyaḥ sākṣi siddha tvāt na dvitīyaḥ vyāghātāt tṛtīye anubhavasya api kutastyaḥ sva hetu samāsāditaḥ iti ced tulyam yadi ca saṃskāra mātra janya tā smṛteḥ syāt tadā kathañcid vaisādṛśya anupapattiḥ mānasam tat hi vijñānam iti vakṣyate tasmāt vaiyātya mātra nimittam smṛti yātha athi arnirākaraṇam tathā ca smṛti anuvāda prāmāṇya saṅgrahāya lakṣaṇa antara racanam iti sūktam 
NSu_2.1.24ab.9–2.1.24ab.10	 nanu ca saṅgrāhyasya saṅgrahaḥ guṇaḥ na tu asaṅgrahyasya api kinnāmā ati vyāptyā doṣaḥ eva na ca smṛti ādi lakṣaṇa saṅgrāhyam prāmāṇya abhāvāt iti ced tat kim smṛti ādi prāmāṇyam sādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt na aṅgīkāryam uta bādhaka sadbhāvāt na ādyaḥ loka vyavahārasya sattvāt yathā artha jñāna tad sādhane hi pramāṇa tayā lokaḥ vyavaharati na hi asti pratyakṣa ādi prāmāṇya sādhakam anyat loka vyavahārāt 
NSu_2.1.24ab.11	 nanu pramāṇa abhiyuktānām kaṇa bhuj akṣapāt ādīnām tatra pramāṇa vyavahāraḥ na asti iti ced na smṛtiḥ pratyakṣam aitihyam a ityādi śruti siddhārtham anaṅgīkurvatām āpta tvasya asiddheḥ smṛtiḥ pauruṣeyaḥ granthaḥ iti ced kim atra ayam akhaṇḍa vṛttiḥ śabdaḥ kiṃvā yaugikaḥ na ādyaḥ kṛdanta tāyāḥ spaṣṭa avabhāsa tvāt na dvitīyaḥ avyāpti ati vyāptibhyām yoga anupapatteḥ tasmāt manu ādi smaraṇa mūla tvāt smṛtiḥ iti upacāraḥ grāhyaḥ te hi śruti ādinā anubhūtam artham smṛtvā tad pratipādakam grantham āracayanti vyāsa ādi praṇīteṣu tad sādṛśyāt prayogaḥ na ca mukhye bādhakam antareṇa upacāraḥ labhyate 
NSu_2.1.24ab.12–2.1.24ab.14	 santu vā akṣa caraṇāt ayohi a āptāḥ tathā api tad tad vayava hāra abhāva mātreṇa smṛti ādi prāmāṇya anabhyupagamaḥ ayuktaḥ na hi taiḥ prativyakti padārthāḥ nirūpitāḥ tathā api ukta lakṣaṇaiḥ saṅgṛhītāḥ iti ced tulyam smṛti ādeḥ api pratyakṣa ādi antarbhāvasya su vaca tvāt api ca smṛti ādikam pramāṇa pada vācyam yathārtha tvāt pratyakṣa vat na ca anubhava tvam upādhiḥ sama vyāpti pakṣe saṃśaya ādau vyāpti bhaṅgāt viṣama vyāpti tve api karaṇa rūpe pratyakṣe sādhya avyāpaka tvāt kiñca idam anubhava tvam smṛti vyatirikta jñāna tvam iti ced kimartham idam viśeṣaṇam pakṣa vyāvṛtti artham iti ced tarhi pakṣa itara tvena anupādhi tvam anyathā īśvara anumāne api upādhiḥ aśakya nirāsaḥ syāt etena anubhava tatkaraṇayoḥ anyatara tvam api pratyuktam astu tarhi bādhaka sadbhāvāt iti dvitīyaḥ iti atas āha aṅgīkṛtam ced iti 
NSu_2.1.24cd.1–2.1.25ab.2	 aṅgīkṛtam ced prāmāṇyam smṛti ādeḥ kā virodhatā smṛti ādeḥ prāmāṇyam iti sambandhaḥ kim ākṣepe tarhi iti śeṣaḥ sa mṛtiḥ anuvādaḥ ca apramāṇam niṣphala tvāt yat yat pramāṇam tad tat saphalam dṛṣṭam yathā pratyakṣa ādi iti bādhaka sadbhāvāt katham etat iti ced kim atra sarvā smṛtiḥ sarvaḥ api anuvādaḥ ca pakṣīkriyate kiṃvā tat eka deśaḥ ādye bhāga asiddhiḥ iti āha na ca iti nacā phala tvam vaktavyam sarva smṛti anuvādayoḥ kāsāñcid smṛtīnām keṣāñcid anuvādānām ca saphala tva upalambhāt iti ca arthaḥ upapādayiṣyate ca etat aprayojakaḥ ca ayam hetuḥ iti āha phalavat tvam iti 
NSu_2.1.25cd.1–2.1.25cd.3	 phalavat tvam naca asmābhiḥ prāmāṇyam hi vivakṣitam yadi hi phalavat tvam prāmāṇyam prāmāṇyasya vyāpakam asmābhiḥ parīkṣakaiḥ vivakṣitam syāt syāt nāma tadā vyāpakasya tasya nivṛttyā smṛti ādeḥ prāmāṇya nivṛttiḥ na ca evam iti arthaḥ ayam abhisandhiḥ apramāṇa vyavahāre yāthārthya abhāvaḥ eva prayojakaḥ aprāmāṇye tu karaṇa doṣa bādhaka pratyayau na niṣphala tvam iti etena aphala aṃśasya eva pakṣīkaraṇam iti dvitīyaḥ api nirastaḥ karaṇa doṣa bādhaka pratyayau= iva viphala tvam api aprāmāṇya prayojakam kinna syāt iti atas āha tṛṇa ādi iti 
NSu_2.1.26ab.1–2.1.26ab.4	 tṛṇa ādi darśane kim ca phalavat tvam nigadyate dharmasya dharmī adhikaraṇam iti saptamī grāmam gacchataḥ pathi paritatṛṇā ādi darśanasya upalakṣaṇam ca etat sva kāraṇa sāmarthya āyāta anumiteḥ ca iti api draṣṭavyam kim ākṣepe viphala tvasya aprāmāṇya prayojaka tve tṛṇa ādi darśana ādeḥ tathā tvena aprāmāṇyam syāt na ca evam loka vyavahāra virādhāt itya āśayaḥ yat vā anaikāntikaḥ ca ayam hetuḥ iti anena ācaṣṭe pramāṇa tayā sammate vipakṣa bhūte tṛṇa ādi daśarne kim phalavat tvam nigadyate na kiñcid api iti aphala tvam tatra gatam iti 
NSu_2.1.26ab.5	 nanu kārya jātam prāṇinām dharma adharmābhyām upajāyate iti tāvat avivādam tatas ca dharma adharma abhyām u janita tṛṇa ādi darśanam svayam asukha duḥkha ātmakam yadi sukham duḥkham vā tad sādhanam vā na janayet tadā dharma adharmayoḥ vaiyarthyam śruti ādeḥ aprāmāṇyam vā āpadyeta tatas ca tṛṇa ādi darśanena api sukha duḥkha ādikam kiñcid upajanayitavyam eva atas katham tasya viphala tvam iti atas āha sukha iti 
NSu_2.1.26cd.1–2.1.26cd.3^1	 sukha duḥkha ādikam kiñcid smṛtau= api hi dṛśyate anena nyāyena sarvasyā smṛteḥ sarvasya ca anuvādasya saphala tvāt svarūpa asiddhaḥ eva hetuḥ syāt bhāga asiddha tā tu spaṣṭa phala upalambha abhiprāyeṇa uktā iti bhāvaḥ iyān= tu viśeṣaḥ tṛṇa ādi darśanasya phalam sarvathā avyaktam na evam smṛti ādeḥ iti uktam dṛśyate api hi iti atra anuvādaḥ api grāhyaḥ tathā hi iṣya artha smṛtau sukham tad jātīye rāgaḥ saṃskāra pāṭavam ca aniṣya artha smṛtau duḥkham tad jātīye dveṣaḥ saṃskāra pāṭavam ca praśasta artha smaraṇe dharmaḥ apraśasta artha smaraṇe tu adharmaḥ 
NSu_2.1.26cd.1–2.1.26cd.3^2	 evam anuvāde api draṣṭavyam anyathā praṇidhāna ādi vaiyathyarprasaṅgāt śabda arthayoḥ punarvacanam punar uktam anyatra anuvādāt a iti vadata akṣa pādena api anuvādasya sāphalyam aṅgīkṛtam nigamanasya ca prayojanāni nyāya vidbhiḥ upapāditāni iti atha api syāt prākaṭya apara paryāyām artha gatām jñāta tām upajanayat eva pramāṇam yathā pratyakṣa ādi na ca smṛti ādinā arthe jñāta topa janiḥ sambhavati anubhavena eva tasyāḥ jāta tvāt na hi chinne chidā punar utpadyate tat katham tasya prāmāṇyam syāt iti tatra āha na iti 
NSu_2.1.27ab.1–2.1.27ab.2	 na pariccheda kāryā iva pramāṇam iti ca pramā paricchedaḥ jñāta tā eva iti prativādi ukta anuvādaḥ pariccheda kāryā iva pramāṇam tad abhāvāt smṛti ādikamapramāṇam iti na iti arthaḥ kutas na iti atas āha iti ca iti iti śabdena artha gatām jñāta tām parāmṛśati na iti asya anukarṣaṇa arthaḥ cakāraḥ jñāta tāyām pramā pramāṇam na asti iti arthaḥ tathā ca jñāta tā janaka tvam sa pakṣe vibhrama ādau= iva vipakṣe pratyakṣa ādau= api vartate iti sādhāraṇa anaikāntikam iti bhāvaḥ kiñca dhārāvāhika vijñānāni smṛti ādikam iva na jñāta tām upajanayanti iti kutas nānaikāntyam api ca saṃśaya viparyayau= api jñāta tām upajanayate iti tvayā aṅgīkaraṇīyam samāna nyāya tvāt tatas ca vipakṣāt iva sa pakṣāt api vyāvṛtteḥ ta va asādhāraṇaḥ hetuḥ syāt yat vā jñāta tā lakṣaṇasya paricchedasya eva aprāmāṇika tvāt pariccheda kāri eva pramāṇam iti asyām vyāptau na pramāṇam asti iti eka grantha tayā yojyam tathā ca vyāpaka anupalabdhi liṅgakam anumānam dūra apāstam iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.1.27ab.3	 nanu ca ajñāta jñāpakam eva pramāṇam ajñāta jñānam eva vā na ca etat smṛti ādau= asti iti tat apramāṇam iti atas vā aha na iti paricchedaḥ ajñāta jñānam tat kartum śīlam asya asti iti pariccheda kāri yat vā paricchedaḥ eva kāra akāraḥ pariccheda kāraḥ saḥ asya asti iti pariccheda kāri kim pariccheda kāri tvam prāmāṇyasya vyāpya vyāpaka bhūtam lakṣaṇam iti tad abhāvāt smṛti ādeḥ aprāmāṇyam ucyate kiṃvā vyāpakam eva iti 
NSu_2.1.27ab.4	 ādye pariccheda kāryā iva pramāṇam iti lakṣaṇam na pramā na upapannam iti yojanāḥ avyāpteḥ ati vyāpteḥ ca iti tathā hi dharmiṇam ādāya anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam ucyate prakāram vā ādye nitya viṣayāṇām aprāmāṇyāpātaḥ vyāpyavat tayā avagatam dharmiṇam vyāpaka vat tayā viṣayīkurvataḥ anumānasya pṛthak avagatānarthāntsaṃsṛṣṭa tayā gocarayataḥ śabdasya ca aprāmāṇya prasaṅgaḥ dvitīye tu dhārāvāhika vijñānānām aprāmāṇyam syāt na hi vaināśikānām iva mīmāṃsakānām anyaḥ eva ghaṭaḥ na api sa aṅkhayānām iva pariṇāmī na api prakāram api upajana apāyavantam īkṣāmahe 
NSu_2.1.27ab.5^1	 nanu yadi api svarūpasya prakārasya vā tādavasthyam tathā api ghaṭaḥ ayam ghaṭaḥ ayam iti pratyakṣa jñāna dhārāyām vartamānaḥ eva arthaḥ sphurati na ca krama bhāvinām jñānānām ekaḥ eva vartamāna kāle viṣayaḥ nānā pratipattṛ vat jñāna yaugapadya prasaṅgāt pratyabhijñāna anupapatteḥ ca jñāna aneka tve api eka kāla avasthānā kalanāt tasmāt pūvarvūrva vijñānaiḥ anākalitaḥ eva vartamānaḥ arthaḥ uttarottaraiḥ avasīyate iti anadhigata artha tvam eva iti evam tarhi smṛti ādeḥ api anadhigata artha tvam eva smṛtiḥ api vartamāna tatkāla tayā anubhūtam atharmatīta tad kāla tayā avagāhate 
NSu_2.1.27ab.5^2	 anyathā saḥ iti na syāt anuvādaḥ api yadi vāda viṣayaḥ tadā sphuṭa m anadhigata artha tvam yadi ca pūrva vijñāna viśiṣṭa artha gocaraḥ tathā api dhārāvāhika samānaḥ nyāyaḥ adhika vidhānena eka vākya tāyām api tathā iti saṃśaya viparyāsayoḥ api anadhigata viṣaya tvāt prāmāṇyam syāt anadhigata tathā bhūta artha tvam vivakṣitam iti ced na anadhigata viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt smṛtyādi vyāvṛtti artham tat iti ced smṛti ādikam eva kutas vyāvartanīyam lakṣaṇa abhāvāt iti ced tat idam itaretara āśraya tvam iti 
NSu_2.1.27ab.6	 astu tarhi vyāpaka nivṛttyā vyāpya nivṛttiḥ iti dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ syāt api evam yadi pariccheda kāryā iva pramāṇam iti pramā pramāṇam syāt na ca tat asti tathā hi prāmāṇyasya anadhigata artha tvena vyāptiḥ kim sāhacarya darśana mātrāt siddhayati uta vyabhicāra darśana saha kṛtāt uta vipakṣe bādhaka upetāt na ādyaḥ atiprasaṅgāt na dvitīyaḥ dhārāvāhini vyabhicāra darśanāt ati prasaṅga aparihārāt ca na tṛtīyaḥ tad abhāvāt 
NSu_2.1.27ab.7	 adhigatam eva artham adhigamayatā pramāṇena piṣyam piṣyam syāt iti ced kim idam piṣyapeṣaṇam nāma kim adhigate arthe adhigati antasya anudayaḥ kiṃvā viphala tvam uta aviśiṣṭa phala tvam atha anapekṣita phala tvam na ādyaḥ syāt api evam yadi jñāna abhavaḥ api jñāna sāmagṣeka deśaḥ syāt jñānam vā tad pratibandhakam bhavet naca evam tathā tve smṛteḥ eva anudaya prasaṅgāt na dvitīyaḥ ukta uttara tvāt na tṛtīyaḥ ādye api āpatteḥ na caturthaḥ tṛṇa ādi darśane heya daśarne ca prasaṅgāt 
NSu_2.1.27ab.8	 nanu ca karaṇa viśeṣaḥ pramāṇam kāraṇam ca sādhakatamam na ca sādhya siddhau tad jātīyasya api sādhakatama tvam asti chinne paraśoḥ iva iti ced mā evam na hi karaṇasya sādhakatama tvam sādhakatama antara apekṣayā kintu pradhāna kriyā kāraka antara apekṣayā anyathā yatra karaṇānām samuccayaḥ tatra paraspara apekṣayā anatiśayita tvāt akaraṇa tvam syāt chinne kuṭhārasya akaraṇa tvam tu phalānudayāt na ca prakṛte tathā asti iti uktam iti 
NSu_2.1.27ab.9–2.1.27ab.11	 nanu anapekṣa tvam prāmāṇyasya vyāpakam anyonya nirapekṣā dhārāvāhikāḥ buddhayaḥ atas prāmāṇyam aśnuvate na ca evam smṛtyādi itya pramāṇam eva iti ced na asyai api vyāpteḥ aprāmāṇika tvāt iti āha na iti paricchedaḥ anapekṣam jñānam kiñca anapekṣa tvam sarvathā ced anitya pramāṇeṣu na asti jñāna antara anapekṣa tvam ced anum iti ādau tad abhāvaḥ utpattau= eva anum iti ādikam liṅga ādi apekṣam na artha paricchedaḥ iti ced jñāna vyatiriktasya artha paricchedasya eva abhāvāt smṛti ādau= api evam eva su vaca tvāt ca samāna viṣaya jñāna anapekṣa tvam ced dharmiṇam ādāyānum iti ādau= api tad abhāvaḥ prakārataḥ api smṛtyādau= asti iti asiddhiḥ iti ananubhava tvāt smṛtiḥ apramāṇam anubhava tat sādhanayoḥ eva prāmāṇyāt iti etat api asat pūrvavat vaya āpteḥ asiddheḥ iti āha na iti paricchedaḥ anubhavaḥ evam pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇam abhidhāya tad viśeṣān lila kṣayiṣuḥ ādau pratyakṣasya uddiṣṭa tvāt tat lakṣaṇam āha nirdoṣā iti 
NSu_2.1.27cd.1–2.1.27cd.2	 nirdoṣa akṣa udbhavam hi atra pratyakṣam iti gīyate atra pramāṇeṣu loka vedayoḥ iti vā nanu katham idam vijñāyate kim nirdoṣaiḥ akṣaiḥ udbhavaḥ yasya iti kiṃvā nirdoṣam ca tat akṣa udbhavam ca iti na ādyaḥ avyāpteḥ ati vyāpteḥ ca tathā hi īśvara ādi pratyakṣam na akṣa udbhavam nitya tvāt akṣa kāryam kriyā ādikam api pratyakṣam syāt na dvitīyaḥ dvayoḥ api viśeṣaṇa tvena samāsa anupapatteḥ uktā vyāpti a nistārāt ca iti ucyate astu tāvat ādyaḥ ajñāna viparīta jñāna hetubhiḥ kāca kāmalā ādi doṣaiḥ rahitāni yāni akṣāṇi indriyāṇi taiḥ udbhavaḥ yasya iti 
NSu_2.1.27cd.3–2.1.27cd.4	 na ca avyāptiḥ udbhava śabdasya utpatti abhivyakti anyatarā atha rtvāt yathoktam sarvam akṣa ātmakam matam a iti na api ativyāptiḥ jñānasya prakaraṇa prāpta tvāt tathā api akṣa liṅgake anumāne ati vyāptiḥ iti ced na tasya akṣa jñāna udbhava tvena akṣa mātra udbhava tva abhāvāt nirdoṣa akṣa udbhavam api artha doṣāt ayathārtham utpadyate jñānam yathā uktam ati dūrāt atisāmīpyāt indriya doṣāt manaḥ anavasthānāt saukṣmyāt i avadhānāt abhibhavāt samāna abhighātāt ca a iti tathā api nirdoṣa artha sannikṛṣṭā iti viśeṣaṇāt adoṣaḥ atra jñāna grahaṇam sukha ādi vyāvṛtti artham iti kecid tat asat viṣaya sākṣātkārasya eva sukha ādi hetu tvāt indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ tad artham abhyarthyate 
NSu_2.1.27cd.5	 nanu evam sati sarva artha sākṣāt kāravataḥ parameśvarasya sukha ādi utpāda prasaṅgaḥ iti ced līlā vigraha grahaṇe tasya indriya artha sannikarṣavataḥ kutas na tad prasaṅgaḥ atha na tāvat mātram sukha ādi kāraṇam kinnāma dharma ādikam api atas tad abhāvāt na tasya sukha ādi utpādaḥ iti ced tulyam atas eva na yogiṣu api prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca āhuḥ dehe śīta uṣṇa ādi sambandhāt hi śītoṣya ādi anubhavaḥ ātmanaḥ tatas ca sukha duḥkhe a iti atra deha śabdena tad āśritāni indriyāṇi upalakṣyante tat ayam lakṣaṇa atharḥ nirdoṣa artha sannikṛṣṭa nirdoṣa indriya udbhavam jñānam pratyakṣam iti 
NSu_2.1.27cd.6	 yat vā nirdoṣa artha indriya sannikarṣa jam jñānam pratyakṣam iti eva arthaḥ janya pratyakṣa viṣayam eva etat vaya ākhyātam iti na ukta doṣaḥ anugata lakṣaṇa siddhayartham tu dvitīyam pakṣam parigṛhṇīmaḥ nirdoṣam yathārtham akṣa udbhavam iti akṣa udbhava śabdena sākṣātkāraḥ lakṣyate iti na kaścid doṣaḥ sākṣātkāra tvam ca jñāna gataḥ eva viśeṣaḥ na karaṇa upādhikaḥ tat anena kevalam pratyakṣam lakṣitam 
NSu_2.1.27cd.7–2.1.27cd.8	 atra eva yatas tat iti pada dvaya adhyāhāreṇa yathārtha aparokṣa jñāna sādhanam iti anupramāṇa pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam api vyākhyeyam tat ca vivakṣā bhedena nirdoṣa artha indriya sannikarṣaḥ vā nirdoṣa artha sannikṛṣṭa maduṣyam indriyam vā iti nanua duṣyam indriyam tu akṣam a iti vacanāt akṣa śabdaḥ eva aduṣya tām ācaṣṭe tat kim artham nirdoṣa iti akṣa viśeṣaṇam mā evam indriyam tu akṣam tat ca aduṣyam iha vivakṣitam iti tad vaya khyānāt nanu etat lakṣaṇam pratigatam akṣam pratyakṣam iti evam śabda nirvacanāt eva pratīyamānam lakṣyāt pratyakṣāt na bhidyate naca ekasya eva lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāvaḥ sambhavati jñāta ajñāta tva asambhavāt iti ced na atra pratyakṣa padavācya tāyāḥ sādhya tvena vivakṣita tvāt iti āśayena uktam iti gīyate iti 
NSu_2.1.27cd.9–2.1.27cd.10	 nanu nirdoṣa ta indriyāṇām kutas avagantavyā jñāna yāthārthyāt iti ced tat api kim karaṇa nirdoṣa tayā jñātavyam kiṃvā viruddha pramāṇa abhāvāt na ādyaḥ paraspara āśrayatā āpatteḥ na dvitīyaḥ asañjāta virodhi vibhrame api āpatteḥ mā evam jñāna yāthārthyasya sākṣi siddha tva aṅgīkārāt parīkṣā apekṣāyām tu prabala virodha bhāvaḥ sācivyam ācarati yathā uktambalavat pramāṇataḥ ca eva jñeyāḥ doṣāḥ na ca anyathā a iti asañjāta virodhī tu vibhramaḥ eva iti kutas deśa kāla puruṣa antara sambandhi viparīta pramā vaśāt iti ced katham tarhi asan jāta virodhi tvam evam tarhi sarvathā viparīta pramābhāvaḥ aṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt addhā saḥ api taiḥ taiḥ parīkṣā viśeṣaiḥ niścīyate nirmūlam tu na śaṅkayate anyathā sarva tra anāśvāsena abhimatam api na siddhayet iti nanu indriya artha sannikarṣasya pratyakṣa tve gagana nayana sannikarṣāt api jñānam utpadyatām mā evam artha śabdena tad tad indriya grahaṇa yogyasya eva vivakṣita tvāt gagana ādau ca tad yogya tā bhāvasya kārya abhāvāt eva siddheḥ etena cakṣuḥ ādinā gandha ādi grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ api apāstaḥ 
NSu_2.1.27cd.11	 atha matam yadi āśritā yogyatā kim antar gaḍunā sannikarṣeṇa tad tad indriya viṣayaḥ tena tena indriyeṇa gṛhyate katham anyathā kāca abhra paṭala ādi antarita upalabdhiḥ syāt sa antara grahaṇam ca prāpti pakṣe na sambhavati prāpya kāriṣu tavac ādiṣu tad abhāvāt kiñca nayanam ced prāpya kāri tadā sva saṃyukta mātram gṛhṇīyāt kuṭhāra ādiṣu tathā darśanāt pṛthutaram ca gṛhṇāti digviśeṣa sandehaḥ ca eva sati na syāt prāptyā tad niścaya prāpteḥ sannikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭayoḥ śākhā candramasoḥ yugapad grahaṇāt ca na hi prāpya kāriṇī evam bhavitum arhati api ca cakṣuḥ aprāpya artha prakāśakam ati āsanna aprakāśaka tvāt vyatirekeṇa śrotra ādi vat cakṣuḥ gatvā na arthena sambadhyate indriya tvāt sparśana ādi vat naca arthasya āgamanam pratyakṣa virodhāt tathā ca aprāpya prakāśaka tva siddhiḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.27cd.12	 atra ucyate viṣaya karaṇayoḥ yogyatā mātram upādāya sannikarṣa apākaraṇam kim sarvatra uta nayane eva iti vaktavyam na prathamaḥ aprāptaiḥ eva kuṭhāra ādibhiḥ kāṣṭha ādau chidādi udaya prasaṅgāt ghrāṇa rasana sparśanaiḥ aprāptaiḥ eva gandha ādi avabodha udaya āpatteḥ ca tathā ca yogya tāvat anvaya vyatireka siddhā prāptiḥ api kriyā utpāda upayoginī na dvitīyaḥ viśeṣa kāraṇa abhāvāt yogyatāyāḥ anvaya vyatireka daśarnāt prāpteḥ ca anupalambhāt iti ced na cakṣuṣaḥ api karaṇa tva indriya tvābhyām prāpti upalambhāt 
NSu_2.1.27cd.13	 nanu atra kim golakam pakṣīkriyate uta tat atiriktam cakṣuḥ ādye pramāṇa bādhaḥ dvitīye tu āśraya asiddhiḥ iti ced na tava api golaka pakṣīkāre siddha sādhanam anyatra āśraya asiddhiḥ iti vaktum śakya tvāt atha viśeṣam vihāya rūpa darśana anumitam karaṇa mātram pakṣīkriyate iti brūṣe samam mama api atas eva golaka atiriktam api tad setsyati sannikarṣaḥ ca pratyāsatti mātram vivakṣitam na saṃyoga ādiḥ iti na śabda ādibhiḥ vyabhicāraḥ 
NSu_2.1.27cd.14^1	 kā ca iyam yogya tā yat mātrāt asat nikṛṣṭam api cakṣuḥ prakāśayet yadi rūpa viśeṣa ādi rūpā tadā atīta anāgatayoḥ api tad bhāvāt cākṣuṣa tā āpattiḥ sannikarṣa artham khalu vartam āna tā abhyarthanam sannikarṣasya anyathā siddhau pratyabhijñāyām tat ta aṃśasya cakṣuṣā avabhāsanāt sa ced anapekṣitaḥ kim tadā vatarma ānatayā atha vartamāna tā api rūpa divat yogya tā antargatāḥ tadā pratyabhijñā na siddhayet kuḍya ādi vyavahita pratīti prasaṅgaḥ ca prāpti pratibandhakam hi kuḍya ādi vyavadhānam iti prāpti artham tad abhāvaḥ anveṣaṇīyaḥ syāt sā yadi na iṣyate tadā kuḍya ādikam kasya apakuryāt 
NSu_2.1.27cd.14^2	 āvaraṇa abhāvaḥ api yogyatā iti ced na kuḍya para bhāga avasthitena api agrahaṇa prasaṅgāt atha nayana viṣayayoḥ madhye nibiḍa dravya abhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti ced sphaṭika ādi antarita anupalabdhri prasaṅgāt asvaccha dravya abhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti ced tathā api avyavahita dūra darśana āpattiḥ eva atha kṣaṇa bhaṅga pariṇāmau= āśritya tathābhūtasya utpāda anutpādau eva yogyatā aya ugyate manyase tadā saḥ arthaḥ kadācid sarvaiḥ upalabhyeta kadācid na kena api draṣṭṛ nibandhanaḥ api tad bhedaḥ asti iti ced na pramita sannikarṣa parityāgena apramita aneka kalpanasya anucita tvāt 
NSu_2.1.27cd.15	 kiñca āsat nikṛṣṭa pratītau ca āsanna sannikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭayoḥ vaiśadyā vaiśadye na syātām asmākam tu nayana raśmayaḥ samyak āsannena sannikṛṣṭante viprakṛṣṭena tu asamyak pradīpa raśmayaḥ iva iti yukte pratīteḥ vaiśadyā vaiśadye kāca ādi antarita upalabdhyā kim aprāpya prakāśaka tvam kalpayāmaḥ kiṃvā kāca ādīnām prapti pratibandhaka tva abhāvāt ādyaḥ pramāṇa viruddhaḥ aneka atiprasaṅga parāhataḥ iti dvitīyaḥ eva āśrayaṇīyaḥ tathā tve kāca ādeḥ vyūha antara tā āpattiḥ iti ced jala anala vyatibhede api ghaṭa ādeḥ tad abhāvāt tatra api sūkṣmatara tad abhyupagame atra api sā astu sa antara grahaṇam api asat nikṛṣṭasya grahaṇam ced asiddham sa antaraḥ iti grahaṇam ced pradīpe anaikāntikam 
NSu_2.1.27cd.16	 yathā khalu dīpaḥ raśmibhiḥ artha sannikṛṣṭaḥ api svarūpa apekṣayā sa antara iti pratīyate tathā cakṣuḥ api adhiṣṭhāna apekṣayā iti kim anupapannam pṛthutara grahaṇam api nayana raśmīnām unmattaka kusuma vat pṛthu agra tayā upapatsyate aprāptau tu alpasya api grahaṇam na syāt prāptau digviśeṣa sandehaḥ na syāt iti ced aprāptau sarvatra kalpayiṣyati yugapad grahaṇa abhimānaḥ tu tejasaḥ śīghra gāmitā nibandhanaḥ bhramaḥ eva prāpteḥ pramāṇa siddha tvāt 
NSu_2.1.27cd.17	 aparaḥ āha nayana raśmayaḥ śākhā candra saṃyuktaiḥ saura raśmibhiḥ ekībhūtāḥ yugapad śākhā candramasau grāhayanti iti tat asat sarva artha grahaṇa prasaṅgāt adṛṣṭāt tadvayava sthā iti ced bāhya sādhana sākalye adṛṣṭa vaikalyena kāryān udayasya kvāpi adarśanāt adṛṣṭa vaikalye hi bāhyasāmagrī vikalā syāt anyathā sa manaska indriya sannikṛṣṭaḥ sphīta āloka madhyam adhyāsīnaḥ api ghaṭaḥ kadācid na upalabhyeta aprāpya artha prakāśakam iti ca aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā ati āsanna aprakāśaka tvam prāpya prakāśakeṣu ghrāṇa ādiṣu api vidyate sva gata gandha ādeḥ agrahaṇāt parasya eva ati āsanna kāca ādya grahaṇam ayuktam yogyatāyāḥ anapāyāt 
NSu_2.1.27cd.18–2.1.27cd.20	 gatvā na arthena sannikṛṣṭataḥ iti atra kim gati pratiṣedhaḥ sādhyaḥ kiṃvā sannikaṣarpratiṣedhaḥ uta ubhaya pratiṣedhaḥ na ādyaḥ kāla atīta tvāt anaikāntyāt ca na dvitīyaḥ anaikāntika tvāt eva atas eva na tṛtīyaḥ api viśiṣṭa niṣedhaḥ ayam iti ced na saḥ api viśeṣaṇa abhāvena vā ityādi vikalpa dūṣaṇā nistārāt sannikarṣa artham gatimat na bhavati iti sādhyam iti ced na sparśana āda avanaikāntyāt śīla jala sannikarṣa artham tvac indriya gataye hi śarīra parispandaḥ bhavati 
NSu_2.1.27cd.21	 atha ayam abhiprāyaḥ adhiṣṭhānāt bahis na gacchati iti tadā indriya tve samāne api ghrāṇa ādīn ām ataijasānām anevambhāvaḥ cakṣuṣaḥ tu taijasasya ittham bhūta tā iti aṅgīkāre bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojaka tvam cākṣuṣa raśmīnām upalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na atīndriya tva upapatteḥ mahat tejaḥ jātīyam aindriyakam upalabdham iti ced cākṣuṣam api upalabdham iti vāri stham tathā syāt adṛṣṭa vaśāt anudbhūta rūpam tat iti ced idam api anudbhūta rūpa sparśam kutas na kalpyate kalpikāyām prāpya kāritāyām pramāṇasya ukta tvāt 
NSu_2.1.27cd.22–2.1.27cd.24	 yadi ca nayanam nirgatya artham gṛhīyāt tadā unmīlya nimīlane api artha pratipattiḥ syāt yadi vā akṣam adhiṣṭhāna atiriktam syāt adhiṣṭhāna upaghāta cikitse vyarthe syātām iti tu pradīpena samāna yogakṣemam api ca chāyāyām upaviṣyasya ātapa avalokanena nayanasya aśiśira tvam ātapa upaviṣyasya api śiśira dravya avalokanena śiśira tvam ca etam eva artham gamayataḥ na hi aprāptau= etat upapadyate tat etat akhilam api pramāṇa prasiddham iti kim atra vaktavyam iti hi śabdena ācaṣṭe yat akṣa viśeṣaṇam nirdoṣa tvam uktam tadvayava= chedyam darśayitum akṣa bhedam tāvat āha prākṛm iti 
NSu_2.1.28ab.1–2.1.28ab.2	 prākṛtam śuddha caitanyam akṣam tu dvividham matam prakṛti śabdena ahaṅkāraḥ pañcabhūtāni ca ucyante sūkṣma rūpeṇa nityam api ahaṅkāra bhūtāṃśaiḥ upacita tvāt prākṛtam śuddham iti asya eva vivaraṇam caitanyam iti ca iti śabdau= adhyāhāryau tuśabdena ācaitanyam eva indriyam tat ca ahaṅkārikam eva iti vadatām sāṅkhayādīnām bhautikam eva iti bhāṣamāṇānām vaiśeṣika ādīnām dravya indriya bhāva indriya bhedāt dvividham iti jalpatām jainānām ca matam vyavacchinatti matam iti sva ukta arthasya pramita tvam āha 
NSu_2.1.28ab.3	 tatra jaḍa caitanya bhedam anupadam eva upapādayiṣyati jaḍasya ca nitya ahaṅkārika bhautika tvam sūkṣma indriyāṇi santi eva syuḥ sthūlāni api ahaṅkṛteḥ teṣām bhūtaiḥ upacayaḥ sṛṣṭi kāle vidhīyate a ityādi smṛti siddham na ca kevala ahaṅkārika tve bhautika tve vā pramāṇam asti kapila ādīnām āpta tva asiddheḥ ghrāṇam pārthivam rasa avyañjaka tve sati gandha vyañjaka tvāt kuṅkuma gandha abhivyañjaka ghṛta vat rasanam āpyam rūpa avyañjaka tve sati rasa vyañjaka tvāt lālā vat cakṣuḥ taijasam sparśa avyañjaka tve sati rūpa vyañjaka tvāt pradīpa vat sparśanam vāyavīyam śabda avyañjaka tve sati spaśarvī añjaka tvāt vyajana vāta vat iti 
NSu_2.1.28ab.4–2.1.28ab.5	 atra pārthiva tva ādi mātra sādhane siddha sādhana tvam tanmātra tva sādhane dṛṣṭāntānām sādhya vaikalyam sarvatra pāñcabhautika tva abhyupagamāt sarvatra ca adṛṣṭena vyabhicārāt tat sarva vyañjakam iti ced kim vyakti puraskāreṇa ucyate uta upādhi avaccheda puraskāreṇa na ādyaḥ yat adṛṣṭam ekaika vyañjakam tatra vyabhicāra anistārāt tat na niścitam iti ced tathā api sandigdha vyabhicāritā na dvitīyaḥ indriya tva avacchedena asiddheḥ 
NSu_2.1.28ab.6–2.1.28ab.8	 kiñca pārthiva ādi padaiḥ pṛthivī tva ādi abhidhāne tad tad sannikarṣaiḥ anaikāntyam indriya tvena hetu viśeṣaṇe dṛṣṭāntānām sādhana vaikalyam pṛthivī ādi kārya tā sādhane prāc ukta siddha sādhana tā parihārāya mātra pada prayoge pṛthivī ādi rūpa ādi vyañjaka sannikarṣeṣu vyabhicāra tādavasthyam api ca carma ādi gandha vyañjaka tvam jala ādeḥ rasa vyañjaka tvam lavaṇa ādeḥ rūpa vyañjaka tvam añjana ādeḥ sparśa vyañjaka tvam karpūra ādeḥ api asti iti vyabhicāraḥ eva indriya dvaividhyasya pramita tvam uktam tat katham iti atas āha śuddham iti 
NSu_2.1.28cd.1–2.1.28cd.3	 śuddham īśaramāmukteṣu anyatra prākṛtaiḥ yutam prāk prasiddhi tāratamyam apekṣya uddeśe api prādhānya tāratamya apekṣayā upapādanam iti draṣṭavyam anyatra saṃsāriṣu prākṛtaiḥ akṣaiḥ yutam śuddham asti iti arthaḥ ayam abhisandhiḥ upapādayiṣyate hi īśaramāmuktānām akṣavattā na ca tat akṣam prākṛtam iti yuktam nirguṇa tva ādi śruti smṛti virodhāt tatas tad śuddha caitanyam eva bhavitum arhati saṃsāriṣu ca akṣavattā suprasiddhāḥ na ca tad muktau= akṣa pratipādaka pramāṇa bala āyātam śuddham eva astu iti yuktam saṃsāre api samyak jñāna niyama ādi āpatteḥ atas tatra prākṛtam śuddham ca iti dvividham api asti iti svīkāryam tatas siddha mukta rūpākṣa dvaividhyam iti paraiḥ īśa lakṣmyoḥ līlā vigraha grahaṇam aṅgī kāribhiḥ tad akṣasya prākṛta tvam aṅgīkriyate tān prati kim vāda antareṇa iti mukta grahaṇam sva mate muktānām līlā vigraha svīkārāt kim anyadā api indriya upapādana āyāsena iti īśaram a iti kim atas yadi evam akṣa t vaividhyam iti atas āha nirdoṣam eva iti 
NSu_2.1.29ab.1–2.1.29ab.2	 nirdoṣam eva caitanyam anyatra ubhayam iṣyate tatra uttama jīva sambandhi caitanyam akṣam nirdoṣam eva iti arthaḥ anyatra api nirdoṣa tā sadbhāvāt eva iti uktam anyatra madhyama jīva sambandhi caitanye sarvatra prākṛte ca akṣe nirdoṣa tvam sa doṣa tvam ca ubhayam kāla ādi bhedena iṣyate adhama sambandhi caitanye tu sa doṣa tvam eva iti śeṣaḥ iṣyate prāmāṇikaiḥ iti anena āgamam kārya liṅgakam anumānam ca atra arthe darśayati yāvat atra sa doṣa m uktam tat nirdoṣa grahaṇa vyavacchedyam iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.1.29ab.3	 nanu ca saṃsāriṣu pravṛtti siddhayartham indriyam avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam na ca tat śuddham ukta anupapatteḥ tatas prākṛtena eva savarsya upapatteḥ saṃsāriṣu śuddha indriya abhyupagamaḥ nirbījaḥ eva na ca muktau śuddha sadbhāvāt prāk api tad aṅgīkaraṇīyam mukti vat śuddha indriyasya api paścāt prāpti upapatteḥ iti atas āha sukha iti 
NSu_2.1.29cd.1–2.1.29cd.3	 sukha duḥkha ādi viṣayam śuddham saṃsāra geṣu api na kevalam īśa ramāmukteṣu saṃsāra geṣu api śuddham indriyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam kutas sukha duḥkha ādi viṣayam ayam arthaḥ asti tāvat saṃsāriṇām sukha duḥkha icchā ādi viṣaye aparokṣa avabhāsaḥ liṅga ādi ananusandhānena eva aham sukhī ityādi spaṣṭa avabhāsa darśanāt naca indriya viṣaya tām antareṇa aparokṣa avabhāsi tvam sukha ādīnām yuktam dharma ādeḥ api tad prasaṅgāt tasmāt sukha duḥkha ādi viṣayam indriyam aṅgīkartavyam tat eva śuddham iti astu sukha duḥkha ādi viṣayam indriyam saṃsāriṣu tat śuddham iti kutas prākṛtena api tad aparokṣa avabhāsa upapatteḥ iti atas āha nirdoṣa tva iti 
NSu_2.1.30ab.1–2.1.30ab.3^1	 nirdoṣa tva ati niyamāt tat baliṣṭhatamam matam tad sukha ādi viṣayam indriyam tāvat baliṣṭhatamam sarvathā abādhyam matam sarveṣām sammatam na hi kadācid api asati sukhe aham sukhī iti pratyayaḥ asti na api sati na asti sukhī iti tathā hi sati indriyasya bādhyatā syāt baliṣṭhatamatā ca indriyasya nirdoṣa tva ādi niyamāt eva upapadyate na anyathā sa doṣāṇām bādha darśanāt nirdoṣa tva ati niyamaḥ ca śuddhasya eva dharmaḥ na prākṛtasya iti sukha ādi viṣayasya indriyasya śuddha tā siddhiḥ iti etat uktam bhavati sukha ādikam indriya viṣayaḥ aparokṣa avabhāsi tvāt ghaṭa vat sukha ādi viṣayam indriyam śuddham nirdoṣa tā niyamavat tvāt īśvara ādi indriya vat 
NSu_2.1.30ab.1–2.1.30ab.3^2	 vimatam nirdoṣa tā niyama vat sarvathā api abādhya tvāt tadvat eva iti yadi api muktānām śuddha indriyavat tvena saṃsāriṇām tadvat tā śakya sādhanā tasya tad svarūpa tā avagamāt svarūpasya ca anāgantuka tvāt tathā api sākṣiṇaḥ yat pratyakṣa tvam uktam tad vibhāvayitum ayam pramāṇa antara upanyāsaḥ sukha ādi viṣayam svarūpa bhūtam caitanya indriyam hi sākṣī iti ucyate tad abhivyaktam jñānam ca iti nanu prākṛta śuddha bhedāt dvividham indriyam iti asat śrotram cakṣuḥ sparśanam ca rasanam ghrāṇam eva ca adhiṣṭhāya manaḥ ca ayam a iti pañca indriya manaḥ bhedena indriya ṣāḍvidhi a smaraṇa virodhāt iti ataḥ āha pañca iti 
NSu_2.1.30cd.1–2.1.30cd.4^1	 pañca indriya manaḥ bhedāt prākṛtam ṣaḍvidham smṛtam yat pañca indriya manaḥ bhedāt indriyam ṣaḍvidham iti smṛtam tad prākṛtam na tu sarvam iti atas na virodhaḥ jñāna indriyāṇām eva atra aukta tvāt na ekādaśa tva ukti virodhaḥ buddheḥ api manasi antar bhāvāt na sapta tva virodhaḥ nanu ākāśa ātmakasya śrotrasya katham prākṛta tvāt mā evam bhūta ākāśa pariṇāma tva abhyupagamāt avyākṛta ākāśa ātmaka tve sārvatrika śabda upalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ karṇa śaṣkulya vacchedāṅgīkāre api badhira abhāva prasaktiḥ adṛṣṭa upagrahāt na iti ced na tathā satya ākāśasya eva tad tad avacchinnasya adṛṣṭa upagṛhītasya ghrāṇa ādi bhāva upapattau pārthiva tva ādi abhyupagama vaiyarthyāt 
NSu_2.1.30cd.1–2.1.30cd.4^2	 gandha ādimattvāt tad siddhiḥ iti ced na asiddheḥ yat indriyam yam viśeṣa guṇam gṛhṇāti tat tadvat iti vyāpteḥ sukha ādi grāhiṇi manasi sāṃsiddhi ka drava tva sneha grāhiṇi cakṣuṣi śīta uṣṇa sparśa grāhiṇi sparśane ca bhagna tvāt āgamāt pṛthivī ādi prākṛtikatā a= agamyate iti ced tarhi ahaṅkārikā ākāśa kārya tā śrotrasya api tatas eva aṅgīkaraṇīyā nanu manonādi nityam katham prākṛtam mā evam pramāṇa abhāvāt sparśa rahita dravya tva ādeḥ sattvāt na iti ced tam asmasmākam anaikāntyāt nitya tva ādi mātra sādhane siddha sādhana tvāt kūṭastha tā sādhane tu āgama virodhāt iti krama prāptam kevalam anupramāṇam ca anumānam lakṣayati anumā iti 
NSu_2.1.31a.1–2.1.31a.3	 anumā yuktiḥ eva uktāḥ atra anumā iti lakṣyam yuktiḥ iti lakṣaṇam yadi ca yukteḥ eva bahuśas prakṛta tvāt tad svarūpa jijñāsāyām idam pravṛttam tadā viparītaḥ lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāvaḥ nanu anumā yuktiḥ iti paryāyau= etau tathā hi phala prāmāṇya pakṣe anumitiḥ anumā iti bhāva sādhanaḥ anumā śabdaḥ liṅga darśana samuttham laiṅgika viṣayam anumiti nāmakam yathārtha jñānam āha tat eva yojanam yuktiḥ ita yukti śabdaḥ api sādhana prāmāṇya pakṣe api apakṣe aapi anumīyate anayā iti karaṇa sādhanaḥ anumā śabdaḥ yam artham ācaṣṭe tam eva yujyate anayā iti yukti śabdaḥ api tat katham lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāvaḥ iti atas uktam uktā eva iti atra api vyavahāraḥ eva sādhyaḥ na tu anumā tvam yukti tvam vā yena ukta doṣaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.1.31a.4	 nanu yukti upapatti śabdau= eka arthau tathā ca anyatra nirdoṣa upapattiḥ anumā ityādau yadi nirdoṣa grahaṇasya vyāvartyam asti tadā atra api tat kartavyam syāt anyathā ati vyāpti prasaṅgāt na ced na kartavyam iti ucyate asti khalu śabdānām mukhyā mukhya bhedena dvayī vṛttiḥ evañca upapatti śabdāt upapattau= iva tad ābhāse api pratipattau= utpannāyām tadvayava= chedena mukhya artha upadarśana artham tatra nirdoṣa grahaṇam kṛtam atra punar antargata nirdoṣa tvam mukhyam eva artham upādāya yuktiḥ iti eva uktam samīcīnaḥ hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ iti yathā iti tat idam api uktam yuktiḥ eva iti na tu nirdoṣa tva viśeṣitā yukti śabda mukhya artha vivakṣāyām tad anapekṣaṇāt iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_2.1.31a.5	 athavā na idam paryāya lakṣaṇam kinnāma yujyate sambaddhayate iti yuktiḥ anumoktā iti yojyam nanu evam sati viruddha anadhya vasita vyavacchede api anaikāntikasya anumāna tvam syāt iti atas yuktiḥ eva iti uktam yujyate eva na tu yujyate api iti arthaḥ prameya tva ādikam hi anitya tva ādinā yujyate na yujyate ca na tu yujyate eva tat anena sāhitya niyama vat vyāpyam liṅgam anumānam iti ca ucyate iti uktam bhavati 
NSu_2.1.31a.6–2.1.31a.7	 saugatāḥ tu manyante tādātmya tad utpattī eva anumāna aṅga bhūtau sambandhau= iti vaiśeṣikāḥ tu asya idam kāryam kāraṇam sambandhī eka artha samavāyi virodhi ca iti laiṅgika nimitta sambandhān parisañca kṣate evaṃmātra animitta saṃyogi virodhi sahacāribhiḥ sva svāmi vadhya ghāta ādyaiḥ sa aṅkhayānām saptadhā anumāa  iti sa aṅkhayāḥ parisaṅkhayātavantaḥ tat sarvam apākartum vā yuktiḥ eva iti avadhāraṇam niyata sambandha vat eva anumānam na sambandha viśeṣa vat iti arthaḥ etat ca upapādayiṣyāmaḥ kecid āhuḥ pakṣa dharma tāpi anumāna aṅgam iti tat api apākurvan= uktam eva vivṛṇoti vyāptiḥ eva iti 
NSu_2.1.31b.1–2.1.31b.2	 vyāptiḥ eva tu sā smṛtā viśeṣeṇa api atas iti vyāptiḥ yat avyabhicarita sāhitya upetam eva liṅgam sānumā na pakṣa dharma tā vaśyambhāvinī iti arthaḥ yat vā vyāptiḥ iti bhāva sādhanaḥ tathā tve vyāptiḥ eva sānuma iti gauṇaḥ nirdeśaḥ vyāptiḥ eva anumāna aṅgam na pakṣa dharmatā iti arthaḥ upapādayiṣyate ca etat vayadhi karaṇasya api sādhaka tām upapādayata ācāryeṇa eva etena jñāta sambandha niyamasya eka deśasya darśanāt eka deśa antare jñānam anumānam abādhitam a iti api nirastam eka deśa tā aniyamasya aprayojaka tvāt 
NSu_2.1.31b.3–2.1.31b.4	 yat uktam pakṣa dharma tvam sa pakṣe sattvam vipakṣā dvayā vṛttiḥ abādhita viṣaya tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam iti pañca rūpa upapannam anumānam iti yathā anumeyena sambaddham prasiddham ca caśabda saṅgṛhītam iti tat asat kevala anvayinaḥ vipakṣā dvaya āvṛtti a bhāvena kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ ca sa pakṣe sattā bhāvena avyāpaka tvāt kvacid catū rūpa upapanna tvam kvacid pañca rūpa upapanna tvam iti ced eka prayojaka alābhāt vyāpti pakṣa dhamarta aupayika tvena eṣām grahaṇam vastutas tu te eva anumāna aṅgam iti ced na pakṣa dharma tāyāḥ api aprayojaka tvāt tathā ca vyāptiḥ eva prayojikā iti vaktavyam kim anena jalpitena iti āha vyāptiḥ eva iti avinā abhāvaḥ vyāptiḥ sā dvividhāḥ anvaya vyatireka bhedāt sādhyena sādhanasya vyāptiḥ anvayaḥ sādhana abhāvena sādhya abhāvasya vyāptiḥ vyatirekaḥ iti kecid ācakṣate tat dvaividhyam tuśabdena vyavacchinatti 
NSu_2.1.31b.5	 tathā hi yaḥ agnimān na bhavati sa dhūmavān na bhavati iti vyatireka vyāptiḥ kim dhūmena agni sādhane upayujyate kiṃvā agni abhāvena dhūma abhāva sādhane na ādyaḥ yaḥ dhūmavān asau= agnimān iti anvaya vyāptyā eva tad siddheḥ anyathā kevala anvayavataḥ asādhaka tva prasaṅgāt kiñca atra abhāvayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ bhāvena bhāva sādhanam iti su bhāṣitam anya gatayā vyāptyā anyasya sādhaka tve ati prasaṅgāt yat abhāvayoḥ vyāpi avyāpaka bhāvaḥ tayoḥ eva sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ iti abhyupagame na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na tathā api vyāpyam liṅgam iti asya avyāpti prasakteḥ yat abhāvayoḥ vyāpi avyāpaka bhāvaḥ tayoḥ eva sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ iti abhyupagame na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na tathā api vyāpyam liṅgam iti asya avyapti prasakteḥ yad abhāvaḥ yad abhāvasya vyāpakaḥ sa tasya vyāpyaḥ iti niyamāt adoṣaḥ iti ced tarhi na vyatireka vyāptiḥ prakṛta sādhya siddhayupayoginī kinnāma prakṛta sādhana vyāpti sādhana upayoginī tatra ca anvayi rūpa tā eva tasyāḥ dvitīyaḥ tu iṣyate eva kinnāma sā api anvaya rūpā eva iti na sarvathā vyāpti dvaividhyam sambhavati iti 
NSu_2.1.31b.6	 etena anumānasya kevala anvayi kevala vyatireki anvaya vyatireki bhedena traividhyam api parāḥ tam vyatireka vyāpteḥ anumāna anaṅga tvāt sadbhāva mātreṇa vyutpādanasya atiprasaṅgi tvāt katham tarhi kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ gamaka tvam iti ced kaḥ ayam kevalavyatirekī nāma kevalaḥ vyatirekaḥ eva yasya asau= iti ced tarhi katham atyantā satoḥ sādhya sādhana tā syāt dṛśyate tāvat iti ced na yatas tasya anyā eva gatiḥ prāṇa ādimattvasya sa ātmaka tvena vyāptiḥ jīvat śarīraḥ eva gṛhītā atas tatra eva vipratipattau na sa upadarśayitum śakyā abhūt vyāpti mātram eva anumāna aṅgam na punar sa pakṣe tad upadarśanam api iti atas vyatirekayoḥ vyāptyā tad upapādanam kriyate 
NSu_2.1.31b.7–2.1.31b.8	 ayam atra prayoga kramaḥ jīvat śarīram sa ātmakam prāṇa ādimattvāt yad prāṇādimat tat sātmakam prāṇa ādimat ca idam tasmāt sa ātmakam iti prayukte dhūmasya agninā iva asya na vyāptiḥ dṛśyate tat katham iti ākāṅkṣāyām prayoga antaram pravartate prāṇa ādimat tvam sa ātmaka tvena vyāptam tad abhāva vyāpaka abhāva tvāt yaḥ yat abhāva vyāpaka abhāvaḥ sa tad vayā āptaḥ yathā dhūmaḥ agninā iti tat etāvati vaktavye yat anyathā prayujyate tad vivekinām sphuṭa pratītika tayā saṅgraha rucitayā vā iti syāt etat vyāpyam ced anumānam tadā dhūmaḥ śabda anitya tve api anumānam syāt vyāptaḥ hi saḥ api agninā iti mā evam vyāpyam iti asya sambandhi śabda tvāt tathā ca yaḥ yena vyāpyaḥ sa tasmin= anumānam iti uktam syāt na ca evam atiprasaṅgaḥ asti 
NSu_2.1.31b.9	 dvividhāḥ hi dharmāḥ bhavanti kecid paraspara parihāreṇa eva vatarmānāḥ yathā kṛtaka tva nitya tve svātantrya pāratantrye ca iti evamādayaḥ kecid samāviṣyāḥ te api trividhāḥ kecid saṅkīrṇāḥ paraspara parihāreṇa eva vartamānayoḥ ekatra samāveśaḥ saṅkaraḥ yathā bhūta tva mūrta tve puruṣa tvapācaka tve ca iti evamādayaḥ kecid para apara bhāva avasthitāḥ yathā sattva dravya tve dhūmavat tva agnimattve ca iti evamādayaḥ kecid tulya vṛttayaḥ yathā kṛtaka tva anitya tve guru tva rasavat tve ca ityādayaḥ tatra ādyānām paraspara sambandhaḥ eva na asti iti na anumāna anumeya bhāvaḥ viruddha samākhyayā te abhidhīyante dvitīyānām api sati api sambandhe paraspara vyabhicāreṇa vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva abhāva at na anumāna anumeya tā kintu parasparam anaikāntika tayā abhidhīyate tṛtīyeṣu apareṣām vyāpya tayā apareṣām vyāpaka tayā asti anumāna anumeya tvam pare tu avyāpya tayā na apareṣu anumāna tām aśnute kinnāma anaikāntikāḥ eva caturthāḥ tu parasparam vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvāt anyonyam anumāna tām arhantaḥ prasiddhaya prasiddhibhyām viśiṣṭantaḥ iti saṅkṣepaḥ 
NSu_2.1.31b.10	 nanu evam api dhūmena agni jñānam sarveṣām syāt iti atas uktam smṛtā iti pramita tvasya upalakṣaṇam etat smṛtā vyāptiḥ eva pramitam eva vyāpyam anumā na tu indriya vat sattā mātreṇa pramākaraṇam iti arthaḥ nanu tathā api nārikela dvīpa vāsinaḥ dhūma darśanāt agni anumiti prasaktiḥ mā evam vyāpya svarūpa pramiti va t vaya āpti pramiteḥ api apekṣita tvāt tathā api gṛhīta asmṛta vyāpteḥ tad avasthaḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti atas uktam smṛtā iti smṛtā vyāptiḥ eva sa anuma upayoginī iti arthaḥ tathā ca vyāpti smaraṇa savyapekṣam vyāpya jñānam anumānam iti uktam bhavati 
NSu_2.1.31b.11	 liṅga parāmarśaḥ anumānam parāmarśaḥ ca anusandhāna ātmakam tṛtīyam jñānam iti kaścid tathā hi mahānasa ādau dhūmasya agninā vyāpti grahaṇa samaye yat jñānam tat prathamam gṛhīta vyāptikasya parvata ādau yat dhūma jñānam tat dvitīyam tatas sambandhidaśarna samudbuddha saṃskāra kāraṇasya yaḥ dhūmavān asau= agni mān iti vyāpti smaraṇasya anantara mayam ca agni vyāpta dhūmavān iti pratisandhāna ātmakam yat dhūma jñānam tat tṛtīyam anumānam iti tatetat anyaḥ na manyate vyāpti smaraṇam pakṣa dharma tā jñānam iti etāvat eva hi anumāna sāmarthyam tatra ananubhūtāyāḥ vyāpteḥ smartum aśakyatvāt prathamam jñānam iṣyate dvitīyam api pakṣa dharma tā viṣaya tvāt aṅgīkriyate tatas vyāpti smṛtau satyām kim aparam avaśiṣyate yad artham tṛtīyam jñānam eṣyavyam iti sa sthūla dṛśva ityādyaḥ na khalu sahakārita anupapatteḥ kintu saṅkalite 
NSu_2.1.31b.12–2.1.31b.13	 na ca tad saṅkalita tvam vinā tṛtīya jñānāt iti katham tat na eṣyavyam ātmā saṅkalayati iti ced satyam vṛttyā hi asau saṅkalayet na tu sva rūpeṇa eva na ca evam tat eva astu iti vācyam pūrveṇa vinā tad anupapatteḥ iti vayam tu brūmaḥ yatra liṅga darśanāt eva vyāpti smṛtiḥ astu tatra ukta prakāraḥ yadā tu gṛhīta vyāpteḥ vinā api liṅga darśanāt vacana ādinā eva vyāpti smṛtiḥ āviḥ asti yadā dvitīyam eva liṅga darśanam pratisandhāna ātmakam udeṣyati iti na avaśyam bhāvinī iyam prakriyā yathā khalu saṃskāra sāhitye sati indriya sannikarṣāt eva saḥ ayam iti pratyabhijñā jāyate tathā iti aṅgīkāre na kaścid virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.31b.14–2.1.31b.15	 nanu vyāptiḥ eva kena pramāṇena grāhyā yathāyatham pratyakṣa anumāna āgamaiḥ iti uktam yathā ca etat tathā vakṣyāmaḥ dvividham anumānam sva artham para artham ca iti tatra yat para upadeśān upekṣam vyāpti smṛtim advayā api adarśanam tat sva artham para upadeśa apekṣam tu para artham sa sāmarthya liṅga pratīti janakam vākyam para upadeśaḥ tat ca pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamanaiḥ pañcabhiḥ avayavaiḥ upetam iti eke tam imam niyamam arocayamānaḥ āha uktā iti uktā vyāptiḥ eva sānumā vyāpti uktiḥ eva para upadeśaḥ iti yāvat eva śabdaḥ niyama nirākaraṇa paraḥ na punar pakṣa antara nivṛtti arthaḥ pakṣa antarasya svayam eva vakṣyamāṇa tvāt 
NSu_2.1.31b.16–2.1.31cd.1	 nanu yaḥ dhūmavān saḥ agnimān iti vyāpti uktiḥ katham pratyāyana aṅgam vādi prativādinoḥ anyonyasmin= anāśvāsāt iti atas uktam smṛtā iti tuśabdaḥ ca śabda arthaḥ jijñāsitā iti samuccinoti gṛhīta vyāpteḥ tat uktiḥ smaraṇa hetuḥ agṛhīta vyāpteḥ tu jijñāsā janikā iti ucyate na tu āgamatayā upayujyate iti āśayaḥ nanu ca vyāpti uktiḥ eva para upadeśaḥ iti ayuktam prathamatas eva vyāpti ukteḥ a saṅgata tvāt iti āśaṅkām parihara nuktā vyāptiḥ eva sā a iti pratijñātam upapādayati pratijñāta iti pratijñāta artha siddhayartham vyāptiḥ eva yadā uditā 
NSu_2.1.32a.1–2.1.32a.2	 avaśiṣyam kim atra asti pratijñāta artha siddhayartham iti asaṅgateḥ parihāraḥ tadā iti adhyahāyarm kim ākṣepe atra vaktavye etat uktam bhavati yaḥ hi parvatam agnimantam pratipadyamānaḥ pareṇa niragnikam manyamānena kim parvatasya agnima tve mānam iti anuyujyate sa yadi yaḥ dhūmavān asau= agni mān iti vyāpti mātram sva pratipanna artha siddhayartham brūyāt tadā kā nāma asaṅgatiḥ para pṛṣṭa pramāṇasya upanyasyamāna tvāt kiṃvā param vaktavyam avaśiṣyam yad artham śabda antaram vaktavyam syāt atas vyāpti vacanam eva para upadeśaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.32a.3^1	 syāt etat vyāpti pakṣa dharmatā upeta tayā liṅga anusandhānam khalu anumānam pakṣa dharma tām anaṅgam manyamānaiḥ api liṅgasya sattā tāvat aṅgīkaraṇīyā anyathā vyāpti aṅgīkāra vyāghātāt sā ca na avivakṣita sthānāḥ tathā sati yasyakasyacid dhūmavat tva ādinā sarvasya api agni mat tva ādi prasaṅgāt atas vyāpti anusāreṇa niyata deśa dharma tāpi aṅgīkaraṇīyā eva vyadhikaraṇaḥ api hi kṛttikā gataḥ eva udayaḥ rohiṇī udaya asattim gamayati na tu yatra tatratyaḥ tatas tāvadanena vaktavyam yāvatā vyāpti vivakṣita sthala dharmatā upeta tayā liṅgasya anusandhānam syāt tat api ākāṅkṣā krameṇa abhidhātavyam iti sthite nirāśrayasya pramāṇasya abhidhātum aśakyatvāt pramāṇa jijñāsā utthāpanāya viṣaya upakṣepa rūpam parvataḥ agnimāniti pratijñā vākyam vaktavyam 
NSu_2.1.32a.3^2	 tatas kasmāt idam pramāṇāt pratipattavyam iti ākāṅkṣāyām para aṅgatā panna liṅga svarūpa mātra pratipādakam dhūmavat tvāt iti hetu vacanam tatas asya sāmarthya jijñāsāyām vyāpti pratipādanāyāḥ yaḥ dhūmavān asau= agnimān iti udāharaṇa vākyam pakṣa ādi vivakṣita sthala dharma tā pratipādana artham dhūmavān= ca ayam iti upanayaḥ tatas sarvasya buddhayā ārohāya eka vākya tām āpādayitum tasmāt agnimān eva iti nigamanam atas eva pratijñā hetubhyām upanaya nigamanayoḥ gata artha tām manyamānāḥ nirastāḥ bhavanti tat evam etāvati vaktavye katham vyāpti mātram uktvā kṛtī syāt iti 
NSu_2.1.32a.4–2.1.32b.3	 ucyate yat tāvat pratijñā vaśyambhāve kāraṇam uktam tat asat vivādena eva viṣaya upakṣepasya siddha tayā kāṅkṣa udayasya samarthita tvāt tathā api ākāṅkṣita tvāt liṅga svarūpasya tad pakṣa dharma tāyāḥ ca pratipādanāya hetu upanayau vaktavyau= iti ced na vikalpa anupapatteḥ tathā hi kim yena dhūmavat tvam parvata vṛtti tayā avagatam tam prati hetu upanayau vaktavyau uta viparītam prati ādyam dūṣayati liṅgam iti  liṅgam tatra vijānataḥ tatra vivakṣite sthale avaśiṣyam kim asti iti pūrveṇa anvayaḥ liṅga svarūpa tadīya pakṣa dharjña tā vijñāpanāya hi hetu upayana upayogaḥ tat ced vijñānam parasya svatassiddham tadā kim hetu upanayābhyām iti bhāvaḥ dvitīyam anūdya dūṣayati yadi iti 
NSu_2.1.32cd.1–2.1.32cd.3^1	 yadi liṅgam asiddham syāt kutas eva asya mānatā tatra iti anuvartate asiddham pareṇa aprasiddham tadā asya liṅgasya svarūpa asiddhasya mānatā eva kutas na asti iti yāvat dūre vaktavyatā iti eva śabda arthaḥ nanu evam sati vyāptiḥ api na vaktavyā sā api yadi vidita vyāptikam pratyucyate tadā abhidhāna vaiyarthyam viparatītasya tu vyāpya tva asiddhayā tad pramāṇam eva na bhavati kutas vyāpti abhidhānam iti tatra api vaktum śakya tvāt tathā ca vādi prativādinoḥ maunam eva āpatitam iti mā evam ubhayathā api adoṣāt vyāptiḥ hi na sva rūpeṇa upayoginī na api jñāta tā mātreṇa 
NSu_2.1.32cd.1–2.1.32cd.3^2	 api tarhi smaryamāṇāḥ tathā ca gṛhīta vyāptikam prati tasmāraka tvena agṛhīta vyāptikam prati tu tad jijñāsā janaka tayā vyāpti vacanam upayujyate iti uktam eva evam tarhi hetu upanayau= api na anupayuktau na hi pakṣa dharma upetam liṅgam sva rūpeṇa upayuktam na api vidita tva mātreṇa kintu jñāta caram smaryamāṇa tayā jñāyamānam api na vṛkṣa ādi sādha araṇyena kintarhi liṅga tayā tathā ca vidita liṅga svarūpa pakṣa dharma tvam prati tad smāraka tvena liṅga tayā anusandhāyaka tvena itaram prati tad jijñāsā janaka tvena hetu upanayayoḥ sārthakyam eva iti āśaṅkayā āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.1.33ab.1–2.1.33ab.2	 yadi smāraka mātram syāt smartuḥ na atra prayojanam smāraka tva m uktasya sarvasya upalakṣaṇam mātra grahaṇena pratyāyaka tvam vyāvartayati hetu ādikam iti śeṣaḥ pakṣa dharma torpetasya liṅgasya iti ca syāt iti atas param tat na yatas iti adhyāhāryam smartuḥ iti upalakṣaṇam atra vyāpti vacane nimitta saptamīyam hetu ādau= iti ca 
NSu_2.1.33ab.3	 tatas ca vyāpti vacana vat hetu ādikam api pakṣa dharma torpetasya liṅgasya smaraṇa anusandhāna jijñāsā janakam syāt iti yadi ucyate tat na yatas vyāpti vacanena eva tad smaraṇā ādimataḥ tasya hetu ādinā prayojanam na asti iti yojanāḥ etat uktam bhavati yadi hi hetu ādikam vākya tayā pratyāyakam syāt tadā samārthya cintā upayujyate yadā tu tad smāraka tva ādinā eva upayuktam tadā saṃskāra udbodha upayuktam sādṛśya sambandha ādikam kim api anveṣyavyam tad vayā āpti vacane api samānam yaḥ dhūmavān asau= agnimān iti abhihite khalu anumāna mudrā vid atra dhūmavat tvam vyāpyam iti avabudhyate eva tatas tadīya pakṣa dharma tā ādi smṛti ādimān api katham na bhavet iti 
NSu_2.1.33ab.4–2.1.33ab.5	 yat vā para upadeśasya pañca avayavatā niyatim vadan praṣṭavyaḥ kim etat pañca avayavam vākyam āgama tayā vyāpti pakṣa dharma torpetasya liṅgasya pratyāyakam uta smāraka ādi mātram ādye tu syāt evam para vyutpādita rītyā vākyam pramāṇam kathañcid naca asau yujyate vādi pratava ādinoḥ ita retar asmin= anāśvāsāt āśvāse vā pratijñā mātreṇa artha siddhau hetu ādi abhidhāna vaiyarthyāt dvitīye tu āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.1.33ab.6	 parepa deśam vākyam yadi smaraṇa ādi mātra kāraṇam aṅgīkriyate tadā atra vyāpti vacane sati eva smartuḥ vyāpti vacanāt eva smaraṇa ādi utpatteḥ iti yāvat atra vyāpti vacana atirikte śabde prayojanam na asti iti na asau= avaśyam vaktavyaḥ dṛśyate khalu loke pada eka deśa āditas api padārtha smaraṇa ādikam śāstre api ca vākya eka deśa prayogaḥ tatra vaktuḥ āpta tva avadhāraṇāt anusaraṇam prativādini tu tat na asti iti ced mā bhūt na hi etat āgama tayā pratyāyakam iti aktam anyathā sāṃvyāvahārikaḥ kevala vyatireki prayogaḥ api na anusaraṇīyaḥ vāstava prayoga parimāṇāni athātvasya upapādita tvāt prativādinī api anusaraṇe nigraha sthāna udbhāvanam na syāt iti ced laukika śāstrīya saṃvyavahāra atikrame tad avakāśāt anyathā prakaraṇa ādi āpannasya asaṅkīrtanam api nigraha hetuḥ syāt kim prakaraṇa ādi āpannatayā ayam na vadati uta apratipanna tva ādinā iti sandehasya prakṛte api tulya tvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.33ab.7–2.1.33cd.3	 aparaḥ āha prameya avadhāraṇa artham hi pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ prameya avadhāraṇam ca nirvivādā tad pratītiḥ na ca sā pramāṇa svarūpa mātra upadarśane bhavati kinnāma tad ābhāsa uddhāreṇa api anyathā tad prāmāṇyasya eva anavasthānāt tathā ca pratijñā vākyena viṣayam upakṣipya tatra hetunā pramāṇa svarūpam upadarśya tasya udāharaṇa vākyena viruddha anadhyavasita anaikāntika tva nirāsaḥ kriyate upanayena asiddhiḥ apāsyate nigamanena api hetu anuvādena tasmāt eva na anyasmāt iti siddha sādhana tāpakṣipyate sādhya anuvādena agnimān ā iva na tu niragnikaḥ iti bādha pratipakṣa pratikṣepaḥ kriyate tat evam vidhūta vivāda sādhya pratipattaye pañca avayava vākyam āvaśyakam iti tat ayuktam evam vadatā hi yāvatā vivāda avasānam tāvān para upadeśaḥ iti uktam syāt tathā ca pañca avayavam vākyam para upadeśaḥ iti ayuktam pañca avayava uktau= api vivādau= asiteḥ abhāvāt kintvā kathā parisamāpteḥ para upadeśaḥ iti vaktavyam iti āśayavān āha na iti na pañca avayā uktau ca vivādau= asitiḥ bhavet vivāda adhyavasitiḥ vivāda avasāna upetā sādhya pratītiḥ nanu etat ayuktam udāharaṇa ādi avayava trayeṇa ābhāsa uddhārasya kṛta tvāt nirasta samasta ābhāsa pramāṇa upanyāse api vivāda an avasāne sarvathā api tad prasaṅgāt iti atas āha dṛṣṭānta iti 
NSu_2.1.34ab.1–2.1.34ab.3	 dṛṣṭānta ādiṣu ca evam syāt sādhanam punar eva hi dṛṣṭānta padena udāharaṇa artham upalakṣayati ādipadena upanaya nigamana artha grahaṇam viṣaya saptamīyam evam yathā pratīta arthe sādhanam vaktavyam iti śeṣaḥ syāt eva iti sambandhaḥ tuśabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe ayam arthaḥ satyam uddhṛta ābhāsāt pramāṇāt prameya avadhāraṇam bhavati iti kintu pañcabhiḥ api avayavaiḥ tādṛśa pramāṇa pratītiḥ eva na bhavati iti brūmaḥ ābhāsa uddhāra para udāharaṇa ādi artha vipratipattau tad sādhanasya api vaktavya tvāt na ca tatra vipratipattiḥ na kartavyā na api vāc mātreṇa tad nivṛttiḥ pratijñā artha samāna yogakṣema tvāt naca udāharaṇa ādiṣu eva sarva śaṅkā uddhāra kāraṇam asti anupalambhāt pañca avayava prayogaḥ eva kathā pudraṇa āpātāt atas prameya niṇarya avadhi tve anumāna prayogasya na pañca avayava tva niyamaḥ yujyate api tu katha pari samāpti avadhika tvam eva aṅgīkāryam iti satyam niḥśeṣataḥ vivāda nivṛttiḥ na pañca avayava prayoge api bhavati iti tathā api avāntarā kāṅkṣā nivartaka tvena pañca avayavam eva avāntara vākyam parisamāpyate iti atas āha liṅga iti 
NSu_2.1.34cd.1–2.1.34cd.3	 liṅga uktau= api ca evam syāt anumāva sitiḥ dhruvā caḥ hetu arthe anumā iti tad sambandhi vākyam upalakṣyate evam sati kim atra pramāṇam iti avāntara ākāṅkṣā nivṛtti hetau dhūma tvam iti liṅga uktau kṛtāyām api avāntara vākya paryavasānam avaśyam bhavati iti tanmātram eva vākyam aṅgīkaraṇīyam na tu pañca avayava tva niyatiḥ iti yat uktam smaraṇa ādi mātra hetu tvena vākyasya upayogaḥ tat ca vyāpti vacana mātreṇa bhavati iti vyāptiḥ eva vaktavyā iti tat ayuktam tathā sati liṅga mātra vacanasya api prayoktavya tva āpātāt sambhavati hi tasya api vyāpti pakṣa dharmatā smaraṇa ādi hetu tvam iti ukta abhiprāyam ajānānasya ca udyam vā pariharati liṅga iti yathā vyāpti uktau= evam liṅga uktau= api anumāva sitiḥ dhruvā syāt iṣya āpādanam etat iti arthaḥ caśabdaḥ pratijñā hetu garbha eva ityādi ukta pakṣa antara samuccaye na ca evam sati vyāptiḥ eva iti avadhāraṇa anupapattiḥ yena yena prakāreṇa vyāpti ādi smaraṇa ādikam bhavati yaḥ ca sāṃvyāvahārikaḥ tam tam upādāya niyama nirākaraṇasya tatra iṣṭa tvāt iti abhisandhiḥ 
NSu_2.1.34cd.4–2.1.34cd.5	 etena pratijñā hetubhyām upanaya nigamanayoḥ gata artha tā api samarthitā veditavyā iti nirdoṣa tām antar bhāvya yuktiḥ anumeti aktam doṣa parijñānaḥ eva tad viyuktā yuktiḥ su jñāna iti atas yukti doṣaḥ nirūpaṇīyaḥ dhūma ādeḥ agni ādi pramiti janaka tve api yad nimittam kaścid arthaḥ artha antara jñānam na janayati saṃśaya viparyayau vā karoti sa yukti doṣaḥ sa dvividhaḥ sākṣāt vācanikaḥ ca tatra ādyam vibhāgena uddiśati virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.35ab.1–2.1.35ab.3	 virodhaḥ asaṅgatiḥ ca eva sākṣāt yukteḥ tu dūṣaṇam prāyeṇa anumāna doṣaḥ virodhaḥ eva antarbhavati iti prādhānyāt prathamam tad uddeśaḥ eva iti para parisaṅkha yātam ādhikyam nirākaroti doṣāṇām satām atra eva antarbhāvāt anantarbhūtānām ca doṣa tva nirāsāt sākṣāt iti vacana upadhānena vinā artha niṣṭham ukta yukteḥ sāmarthyam dūṣaṇam tu iti tuśabda sambandhaḥ sākṣātu iti vā yukteḥ yukti tva abhimatasya arthasya sādhana abhimatasya arthasya sādhya abhimatena arthena sambhāvita pratītikasya api sādhya sādhana bhāvasya bādha lakṣaṇam ayogya tvam virodhaḥ iti śiṣyaiḥ eva uhyatām iti āśayavān asaṅgatim nirūpayati pratijñāyām iti 
NSu_2.1.35cd.1–2.1.35cd.3	 pratijñāyām asambandhaḥ yukteḥ uktā hi asaṅgatiḥ pratijñāpadena tad arthaḥ lakṣyate viṣaya saptamīyam asambandhaḥ atra ākāṅkṣā lakṣaṇa sambandha virahaḥ atra api yukteḥ iti gauṇaḥ nirdeśaḥ asambandhaḥ asaṅgatiḥ iti paryāyau= iti atas vyavahāra sādhyatā sūcanāya uktā iti uktam virodha asaṅgati svarūpasya sphuṭa tvāt anyaiḥ upadarśita tvāt ca kim atra udāharaṇa upadarśanena iti hi śabdena āha nanu katham dve eva anumāna dūṣaṇe para parigaṇitānām asiddha tva ādīnām bahūnām sattvāt iti ataḥ teṣām atra antarbhāvam vibhāvayitu virodha vibhāgam āha virodhaḥ api iti 
NSu_2.1.36a.1–2.1.36a.3	 virodhaḥ api tridhā eva syāt sāmānya vibhāgena saha viśeṣa vibhāgasya samuccaye api śabdaḥ asaṅgatiḥ api anekavidhā iti vā tridhā eva na tu ekavidhā eva yena asiddhayā ādīnām antarbhāvaḥ durghaṭaḥ syāt yat vā yāvantaḥ anumāna ābhāsāḥ para parigaṇitāḥ tāvat bhedatām nivataryitum eva śabdaḥ sarveṣām atra eva antarbhāvāt traividhyam darśayati pratijñā artha iti 
NSu_2.1.36bc.1–2.1.36bc.3	 pratijñā artha viruddha tā liṅga rāhityam avyāptiḥ sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī pratijñā arthaḥ tasya pratispardhi sadbhāvaḥ viruddha tā yatra arthe liṅga pramitiḥ sādhya siddhayupayoginī tatra tad abhāvaḥ liṅgarāhityam vyāpteḥ abhāvaḥ avyāptiḥ iti śabdaḥ adhyāhāryaḥ sādhya sādhana bhāva sambandha yogya tā virahaḥ hi sādhya sādhana abhimatayoḥ tad bhāvā sambhave bhavati na ca sādhanasya tad bhāve api viruddhasya sādhya tā sambhavati niśita tve api paraśoḥ ākāśasya chedya tā bhāvāt na api sādhyasya tathātva sambhave api asamarthasya 
NSu_2.1.36bc.4–2.1.36bc.5	 sādhana tā upapadyate chedya tve api kāṣṭhasya kuṇṭha kuṭhārasya chedana tva abhāvāt atas pratijñā artha viruddha tā ādīnām yuktam virodhi tvam astu liṅgarāhitya avyāptyoḥ yukti doṣa tvam pratijñā artha viruddha tā tu katham tad doṣaḥ sādhya sambandhi tvāt iti ced na sādhya abhimatasya tad bhāvā sambhave sādhana abhimatasya aviṣaya vṛtti tvāt nanu evam sati siddha sādhana tā api virodhaḥ eva syāt na hi siddhasya sādhya tā sambhavati naca astu iti vācyam ukta prakāra traya anantarbhāvāt siddha sādhakaḥ asaṅgataḥ iti sva vacana virodhāt ca iti mā evam sati sākāṅkṣa tve anvayā yogya tvam virodhaḥ na ca siddha sādhanasya sa ākāṅkṣatā asti iti na asau virodhe antarbhavati 
NSu_2.1.36bc.6	 nanu ca anyatra trividhaḥ virodhaḥ ityādinā liṅgarāhitya avyāptyoḥ ekatām upādāya sādhyasya sādhanasya vā anugamaḥ dṛṣṭānta virodhaḥ tṛtīya tayā parigṛhītaḥ atra api sādhya sādhana vaikalyam dṛṣṭāntasya iti vakṣyati tat katham etat na ca atra api tat adhyāhāreṇa tathā eva vyākhyānam yuktam dṛṣṭānta doṣasya anumāna doṣa tā anupapatteḥ na hi dṛṣṭāntaḥ anumānam tathā api anumāna aṅga vyāpti dūṣaka tayā anumāna doṣa tvam astu dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vaikalye sādhanasya sādhya parityāgāt sādhana vaikalye tu vyāpteḥ anupadarśanāt iti ced na tathā satyavyāptyā eva saṅgṛhīta tvena tṛtīyatva anupapatteḥ iti ucyate sva artha anumāne hi dṛṣṭa vyāptikasya liṅgasya vivakṣita sthale siddhi mātreṇa sādhya pramitiḥ utpadyata iti tad paripanthinām doṣa tvam abhipretya pratijñā artha viruddha tā liṅgarāhitya avyāptīnām atra grahaṇam para artha anumānetu avyāpti aupayikasya api dṛṣṭānta doṣasya tad āśraya tayā pratīta tvena tathā eva udbhava nīya tā ājñāpanāya tena saha trividha tvam anyatra uktam iti na virodhaḥ 
NSu_2.1.36bc.7	 yat vā sādhya sādhana ubhaya āśraya hīna sādhya sādhana ubhaya vyāvṛtta āśraya hīnān aṣṭau dṛṣṭānta doṣān eke bhāṣante tad nirāsāya dṛṣṭānta doṣasya pṛthak upādānam tathā hi ubhaya vikalaḥ tāvat na parisaṅkhayeyaḥ anyatara vaikalyena eva duṣyata asiddhau= ādhikya prasaṅgāt anyathā ekaika vikala parisaṅkhayāna anupapatteḥ katham tarhi anvayavyatirekī iti ced na kathañcid iti uktam eva sādhya ādi avyāptiḥ tu dṛṣṭāntasya guṇaḥ eva na doṣaḥ sataḥ hi satā vyāptim pradarśayitum dṛṣṭāntaḥ anveṣyavyaḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntasya ayam doṣaḥ iti ced saḥ eva kimarthaḥ vyatireka vyāpti bodhayā iti ced na tasyāḥ sākṣāt anupayogāt pāramparyeṇa upayogaḥ tu sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva asau= iti kim pṛthak upādānena ubhaya avi āvṛttaḥ ca ādhikyāt nirastaḥ āśraya hīnaḥ tu āśraya asiddhi samāna yogakṣemaḥ iti dvau= eva dṛṣṭānta doṣau asārvatrikaḥ ca dṛṣṭānta doṣaḥ na hi sarvatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva vyāptiḥ upadarśanīya iti asti niyamaḥ ānumānika āgamika vyāpteḥ tad anapekṣaṇāt
