NSu_2.1.36bc.8	 syāt etat pratijñā artha viruddha tayā hi kāla atīta prakaraṇa samau saṅgṛhītau liṅgarāhiti am iti asiddhiḥ avyāptiḥ ca trividhā bhavati sādhanasya sādhyena sambandha abhāvaḥ sati api sambandhe tad abhāvena api sambandhaḥ sādhya abhāva vyāpya tā ca iti tat etat trayam krameṇa anadhyavasitāḥ na aikāntika viruddha saṃjñām labhate tathā ca para nirūpita prastārasya samasanam eva anena kṛtam syāt naca anena kim api prayojanam anyathā puruṣam ati vaiśvarūpyeṇa prakriyā antarasya api sa avakāśa tvāt na ca brahma tarka ādi tarka śāstram anusṛtya ittham vyutpādanam iti vācyam prayojana abhāve andha paramparā āpatteḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.36bc.9	 ucyate asti prakriyā antara karaṇasya prayojanam tathā hi pratijñā artha viruddha tayā hi sva vākya virodhasya api saṅgraham vakṣyati na ca kāla atīta tva ādinā sa labhyate api ca vyavahāraḥ api pratijñā artha viruddhatayā upapadyate na kāla atīta tva ādinā vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt asādhakam idam kāla atīta tvāt sat pratipakṣa tva ādityasya prabala sama bala pramāṇa viruddha tvāt iti arthaḥ na ca atra viśeṣaṇasya kim api prayojanam asti hīna balasya pramāṇa padena eva nirasta tvāt pramāṇa tad ābhāsā vivekaḥ eva hi pramāṇa śabda prayogaḥ na tu aprāmāṇya niścaye ahīna bala tayā vā viśeṣaṇe sambhavati tat avāntara bheda upādānam niratharkam eva tathā ca ekam eva idam dūṣaṇam syāt liṅgarāhiti agrahaṇena ca adūṣaṇānām api dūṣaṇa tayā para parigaṇitānām āśraya vyadhikaraṇa sādhyāni atha asiddhīnām nirāsaḥ labhyate anyathā siddheḥ dūṣaṇa tve api prakāra antasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt 
NSu_2.1.36bc.10–2.1.36bc.11	 anadhyavasita tva ādi bhedaḥ api kim vyāpti abhāve sambhavati iti etāvatā parisaṅkhayeyaḥ vyavahāra upayogi tvāt vā na ādyaḥ vyartha vyutpādanasya atiprasaṅgi tvāt na dvitīyaḥ vaiyarthya prasakteḥ na idam sādhakam anaikāntika tva āditi asya hi sa pakṣa vṛtti tve sati vipakṣa vṛtti tvāt iti arthaḥ na ca atra viśeṣaṇa vyavacchedyam kiñcid asti evam viruddha tva āditi asya sa pakṣa āvṛtti tve sati vipakṣa vṛtti tvāt iti arthaḥ tathā ca vaiyarthyam eva sādhya viparyaya vyāpya tvāt iti atra api sambandha mātreṇa kṛtārtha tve vyāpti grahaṇam vyartham eva evam avāntara bheda vyutpādanam api nirastam śiṣyam ati vaiśadyāya vyutpādanam tu anumatam eva iti na svīya vyavahāra virodhaḥ iti virodha vat asaṅgateḥ api prabhedāḥ svayam eva ūhanīyāḥ evam sākṣāt yukti doṣam abhidhāya vācanika doṣam āha nyūna iti 
NSu_2.1.36d.1–2.1.36d.3	 nyūna ādhikye tu vācike nyūna śabdaḥ bhāva pradhānaḥ yukteḥ dūṣaṇam iti prakṛtam anuvartate avaśya vaktavya aparipūrtiḥ nyūna tvam kṛta kārya tvam ādhikyam vacana doṣāt tad pratipāditā yuktiḥ api duṣyā syāt iti etayoḥ vācanika tvam nanu ayuktaḥ ayam vibhāgaḥ virodha asaṅgatyoḥ api vācika tvāt na hi kṛtaka tvam svayam eva duṣyam anitya tva sādhane api tathā tva āpatteḥ kṛśa anuśaitya ādau tathā iti ced tat kim kṛtaka tvam kṛśa anu śaityam vā śabda nitya tvam vā sādhayitum svayam eva pravṛttam yena tatra duṣyam syāt kinnāma tad sādhana tayā śabdena pratipāditam evam asaṅga tau= api siddha sādhana tā ādi lakṣaṇāyām vācyam iti āśaṅkā nirāsa artham tuśabdaḥ nyūna ādhikye eva vācanike na virodha asaṅgatī sva artha anumāne api darśanāt iti bhāvaḥ santu tarhi pratipattṛ pratipādakayoḥ eva ete doṣāḥ yathā niśātam kṛśa anuśaitya ādau vyāpārayan puruṣaḥ eva aparādhī syāt na tu kṛtaka tva ādikam iti 
NSu_2.1.36d.4–2.1.36d.5	 mā evam kṛtaka tva ādeḥ aduṣṭa tve tadvayā pārayataḥ api aparādha anupapatteḥ anyathā śabda nitya tva sādhane prayuñjānaḥ api aparādhyeta tatas kṛśa anuśaitya ādeḥ sādhya tān arha tvam nitya tva ādi sādhane kṛtaka tva ādeḥ a samartha tvam iti ādiḥ artha śabda gataḥ eva doṣaḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ na hi upādhim antarbhāvya bhavan doṣaḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati tathā sati bahu viplava āpatteḥ iti nanu katham ete eva anumāna doṣāḥ sa upādhika tvasya api atiriktasya sattvāt iti ataḥ tad svarūpa anuvādena ukta antarbhāvam āha sādhyeti 
NSu_2.1.37ab.1–2.1.37ab.2	 sādhya vyāpaka vailomyam avyāptiḥ sādhanasya ca sādhanasya yat sādhya vyāpaka vailomyam sa avyāptiḥ caśabdāt sat pratipakṣatā ca sādhyasya adharma sādhana tva ādeḥ vyāpakaḥ yaḥ niṣiddha tva ādi dharmaḥ yatra adharma sādhana tvam tatra niṣiddha tvam iti niyamāt tena sādhanasya hiṃsā tva ādeḥ vailomyam sādhya apekṣayā vaiparītyam avyāpta tvam iti yāvat yatra hiṃsā tvam tatra niṣiddha tvam iti niyama abhāvāt vaidhahiṃsāyām sati api hiṃsā tve niṣiddha tva abhāvāt tat anena sa upādhika tvasya svarūpam uktam sādhya vyāpaka tve sati sādhana avyāpakaḥ hi dharmaḥ upādhiḥ tadvat tvam ca sādhanasya sādhya vyāpaka avyāpya tvam eva 
NSu_2.1.37ab.3–2.1.37ab.4	 etad prāc anumāna advaya āpti grahaṇa velāyām avyāptiḥ eva sādhya vyāpakam parityajataḥ sādhya parityāga avaśyambhāvāt na hi sādhyam aparityajan tad vayāpakam parityajati iti yujyate sādhya parityāgaḥ ca avyāptiḥ eva apare tu nirupādhikaḥ sambandhaḥ vyāptiḥ sa upādhika tve tu lakṣaṇa abhāva advaya āpti abhāvaḥ iti ācakṣate tat asat vyāpti jñāna adhīnam upādhi jñānam tat adhīnam ca nirupādhika tva jñānam tadā āyattam vyāpti jñānam iti cakraka prasaṅgena tasya vyāpti lakṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ tat kim sā apa adhikasya api asti vyāptiḥ mā evam vyāpta tva anupādhika tvayoḥ sama niyame api vyāpti bodha anaṅga tayā upādhi abhāvasya lakṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ ukta tvāt 
NSu_2.1.37ab.5	 nanu evam ced katham sādhya sādhana vyavahāraḥ āgāmi sambhāvana apekṣayā iti brūmaḥ vastutas tu yaḥ dharmaḥ yat vayāpaka avyāptaḥ tasya tena avyāptiḥ iti eva vaktavyam anumāna pravṛtti uttara kālam tu sat pratipakṣa tā eva sādhanasya sādhya vyāpaka parityāgaḥ hi pakṣāt anyatra vā syāt pakṣe vā na tāvat ādyaḥ tathā sati sphuṭa vyabhicāra parityāgena upādhi udbhāvanasya anavasara tvāt dvitīye tu sādhya vyāpakasya pakṣā dvaya āvṛttiḥ sādhyam api vyāvartayati iti sat pratipakṣa tā eva 
NSu_2.1.37ab.6	 etena upādhi abhāvasya pratipakṣa tve na upādheḥ dūṣaṇa tvam na hi yad abhāvaḥ yatra dūṣaṇam saḥ api tatra dūṣaṇam iti yukta virodhāt iti parāḥ tam pakṣa vyāvṛtti prādhānyena eva upādhi tvāt etad artham ca sādhya vyāpakasya vailomyam pakṣā dvaya āvṛttiḥ sādhanasya sat pratipakṣata iti yojanīyam bhāva pradhānasya adoṣa tvam tu iṣyam eva 
NSu_2.1.37ab.7	 nanu ca prāk anumānāt api sat pratipakṣatā anumāna uttaram avyāptiḥ vā kin na syāt mā evam pakṣe hi sādhyasya upasaṃhāre pratipakṣa avasaraḥ na ca vyāpti grahaṇa samaye pakṣa ādi pravibhāgaḥ asti iti katham tadā pratipakṣa tvam syāt anumāna uttaram avyāptiḥ katham iti vaktavyam sādhya vyāpakaḥ upādhiḥ pakṣa advaya āvartamānaḥ sādhyam api vyāvartayati tathā ca sādhya rahite tatra vartamānam sādhanam sādhyam vyabhicarati iti ced na tathā sati bādhita sat pratipakṣayoḥ api vyabhicārita āpātāt om iti ced na nirasiṣyamāṇa tvāt bādha pratipakṣābhyām eva anumāna dūṣaṇa sambhave kim tad upajīvinā vyabhicāreṇa iti ced tarhi vyāpaka vyāvṛttyā pratipakṣeṇa eva anumāne dūṣite kim tad upajīvinā vyabhicāreṇa iti tulyam 
NSu_2.1.37ab.8	 kiñca pakṣe vyabhicāraḥ kim niścitaḥ uta sandigdhaḥ na ādyaḥ vikalpa anupapatteḥ tathā hi pakṣe sādhya abhāvaḥ niścitaḥ na vā ādye kim pramāṇa antareṇa uta sādhya vyāpaka upa adhi vyāvṛttyā prathame tatas eva anumānam duṣyam iti kim upādhinā na dvitīyaḥ paraspara āśraya tva prasaṅgāt upādheḥ sādhya vyāpaka tva niścaye tad vaya āvṛttyā sādhya vyāvṛtti niścayaḥ sati ca tasmin= asau= iti 
NSu_2.1.37ab.9	 na iti pakṣe sādhya vyāpaka tva aniścayāt upādheḥ katham tad vaya āvṛttyā pakṣe sādhanasya niścitaḥ vyabhicāraḥ syāt pakṣe sandigdhaḥ vyabhicāraḥ tu svatas eva siddhaḥ sa upādhi mukha nirīkṣaṇa apekṣaḥ sarva anumāna uccheda hetuḥ ca tasmāt anumāna uttara kālam sat pratipakṣatā eva iti ucitam etat eva abhipretyasaḥ eva upādhi doṣaḥ api a ityādi vacanāt 
NSu_2.1.37ab.10	 anukūla tarka ādinā sādhya vyāpaka tva niścaye sati pakṣe niścita vyabhicārita asiddhiḥ iti ced na niścisādhya vyāpaka vyāvṛtteḥ bādhaka tvena tatas eva anumāne dūṣite vyabhicāra vaiyarthyāt tathā api sa upādhika tvam sat pratipakṣa tvam iti gataḥ pakṣaḥ iti ced na pratipakṣasya yāvajjīvam tad bhāva anaṅgīkārāt sāmarthya anirdhāraṇāyām eva sat pratipakṣaḥ nirdhārite tu sāmarthye bādhakaḥ vā syāt bādhyaḥ vā iti kaḥ nāma na abhyupaiti 
NSu_2.1.37ab.11–2.1.37ab.12^1	 atra sa upādhika tvam iti vaktavye sādhya vyāpaka vailomyam iti vacanam upādhi lakṣaṇasya api pradarśana artham tat api sādhya samavyāpaka tva pakṣa nirāsāya nanu eṣa pakṣaṣṭīkā akṛta aṅgīkṛtaḥ mā evam para mata anuvāda tvāt anyathā eka sādhya avinābhāvaḥ iti udayana vacana udāharaṇa vaiyarthyāt dūṣaṇam tu sphuṭa tvāt na uktam tathā hi sama padam kim viṣama vyāptikavyavaccheda artham uta prayojana antara artham na ādyaḥ pārthiva paramāṇu rūpa ādayaḥ nityāḥ paramāṇu viśeṣa guṇa tvāt āpya paramāṇu rūpa ādi vat iti ādau pṛthivī viśeṣa guṇa tva abhāva ādeḥ viṣama vyāptikasya api upādhi tvena tadvayava= chedasya ayukta tvāt 
NSu_2.1.37ab.11–2.1.37ab.12^2	 pratipakṣa unnāyaka tva sambhavena dūṣaṇa tvāt ca viṣama vyāptikasya upādhi tve pakṣa itara tvasya api tad prasaṅgaḥ iti ced tat kim ukta viśeṣaṇa dvaya upetam na vā na iti pakṣe tatas eva anupādhi tvam ādye tu tasya api upādhi tve kaḥ doṣaḥ parvata itara tva ādeḥ sarvatra sambhavena na evam iti ced na anumāna vyāpti ādi grāhaka pramāṇa prābalye sati sādhya vyāpaka tva bhaṅgāt tad abhāve ca anumāna bhaṅgasya iṣṭa tvāt anyathā śabdaḥ abhidheyaḥ prameya tvāt ghaṭavat iti ādau= a śabda tva ādeḥ samavyāptika pakṣa itarasya anirāsa prasaṅgāt tat idam iṣyam api tyajati aniṣyam api gṛhṇāti iti na viśeṣaṇam 
NSu_2.1.37ab.13	 yat api ayuktam sva sambandhena yaḥ svīyam dharmam anyatra yojayet saḥ upādhiḥ yathā loke japa ādiḥ sphaṭika ādiṣu iha api avyāpya hetu artha vyāpya tva bhrama hetu tā upādheḥ syāt tadā tasya samavyāptiḥ yadā bhavet a iti tatra vaktavyam kim anena uktam bhavati kim viṣama vyāptikasya vyāpya tva abhāvāt tad sambandhena sādhana abhimate vyāpya tā bhrama anupapatteḥ adoṣa tvena tadvayava= chedāya sama padam iti kiṃvā anvartha upādhi śabda sampādana artham iti na ādyaḥ pratipakṣa unnāyaka tvena dūṣaṇa tva sambhave sva gata vyāpti avabhāsaka tā bhāvasya adoṣa tvāt sādhya sāhacarya darśanena eva vyāpya tā bhrama sambhavāt ca na dvitīyaḥ upādhi śabda sambandhasya sva kapola kalpita tvāt atas eva bhagavān ācāyarvaryaḥ sa upādhika tvam iti anabhidhāya sādhya vyāpaka vailomyam iti āha vyavahārāḥ tu para kṛta saṅketena api nirvahaṇīyaḥ yat vā kvacid sādhya vyāpya ta asadbhāvena upādhi tve anyatra api gauṇyā vṛttyā upādhi vyavahāra upapattiḥ atas eva na dvitīyaḥ api 
NSu_2.1.37ab.14–2.1.37ab.15	 nanu ca viṣama vyāptikasya pratipakṣa unnāyaka tvam na sambhavati kvacid pakṣa itara viparyayasya asādhāraṇa tvāt iti mā evam asādhāraṇa tvasya dūṣaṇa tva asammateḥ sammatau vā tatra upādhi tva abhāvasya vyutpādanāt yatra upādhiḥ pakṣa eka deśa advaya āvartate tatra katham pratipakṣaḥ bhāga asiddhi prasaṅgāt nacāsau na upādhiḥ pakṣa eka deśa advaya āvṛttyā api sādhana avyāpaka tva sambhavāt naca ayam samavyāpti pakṣe asti doṣaḥ upādhimati eka deśe sādhya sadbhāva niyamena tam vihāya eka deśa antarasya eva pakṣīkaraṇa aucityāt iti ucyate asmābhiḥ api upādhi vyāvṛttimān eka deśaḥ pakṣīkriyate eka deśa antare api yadi sādhya sammatiḥ tadā tasya apakṣīkaraṇam eva asammatau tu tatra doṣa antaram eva bhaviṣyati iti kim anupapannam nanu śaṅkita upādhau katham pratipakṣaḥ sandigdhā siddhi prasaṅgena asama bala tvāt iti ced na pākṣika siddha yādinā sat pratipakṣatā phalasya saṃśayasya anivāraṇāt saṃśaya anaṅga tvam eva asama bala tvam abhipretam 
NSu_2.1.37ab.16	 syāt etat sādhya vyāpaka tve sati sādhana avyāpaka tvam kim upādhi sāmānya lakṣaṇam kiṃvā viśeṣa lakṣaṇam na ādyaḥ samavāyaḥ samavetaḥ sambandha tvāt saṃyoga vat iti atra sādhana avacchinna sādhya vyāpaka kṛtaka tva upādhya vyāpanāt vāyuḥ spārśanaḥ anudbhūta rūpa anadhikaraṇa tve sati upalabhyamāna sparśa adhikaraṇa tvāt ghaṭa vat iti atra dravya tva avacchinna sādhya vyāpaka cākṣuṣa tva upādhi avyāpteḥ ca na ca sādhana avacchinna sādhya vyāpakasya yat kiñcit avacchinna sādhya vyāpakasya ca na upādhi tvam iti vācyam tatra tatra ācāryaiḥ aṅgīkṛta tvāt vyatireka upādhi avyāpaka tvāt ca na dvitīyaḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇa antarasya vaktavya tā āpātāt na ca anvaya vyatireki dharma tvam tat iti vācyam tasya atra ayam upādhiḥ iti vyavahāra kāraṇa tva abhāvāt tathā tve ca lakṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt iti 
NSu_2.1.37ab.17	 atra brūmaḥ idam eva sāmānya lakṣaṇam sādhya padena avacchinna an avacchinna sādhyasya abhidhānāt na ca tatra pratipakṣā sambhavaḥ yad avacchinna sādhye yaḥ upādhiḥ ta d vayā vṛtteḥ tad viśiṣṭa abhāve hetu tva upapatteḥ yathā samavāyaḥ sambandha tve sati samaveta tvena hīnaḥ akārya tvāt ākāśa vat vāyuḥ dravya tve sati spārśana tvena hīnaḥ acākṣuṣa tvāt ākāśa vat iti 
NSu_2.1.37ab.18	 na ca atra sādhya viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthyam śabdaḥ na sparśavat viśeṣa guṇaḥ pratyakṣa tve satya kāraṇa guṇa pūrvaka tvāt ityādau= iva vyabhicāra parihāra artha tvāt kvacid sādhyāvacchedaka avacchinnasya upādhi abhāvasya hetu tvāt yathā vāyuḥ spārśanaḥ na bhavati dravya tve satya cākṣuṣa tvāt iti vyatireka vyāptau tu uktam eva uttaram sādhya sādhana padābhyām ca prakṛtayoḥ eva vivakṣita tvāt na kaścid kṣudra upadravaḥ yaḥ yat sādhya vyāpakaḥ yat sādhana avyāpakaḥ iti vā asya arthaḥ iti sarvam sustham 
NSu_2.1.37ab.19	 nanu ca sa upādhika tvasya sat pratipakṣa tve api tena eva anumāna doṣa ādhikyam iti mā evam pratijñā artha viruddha tā iti anena eva prabala pramāṇa viruddha tā lakṣaṇa kāla atīta vat sama bala pramāṇa viruddha tāyāḥ sat pratipakṣatāyāḥ api saṅgṛhīta tvāt pratispardhi sadbhāva mātram hi pratijñā artha viruddha tā iti uktam evam tarhi durbalena virodhaḥ api pratijñā artha viruddha tā syāt ukta lakṣaṇa upeta tvāt iti atas āha durbalena iti 
NSu_2.1.37cd.1–2.1.37cd.2	 durbalena virodhe api na pramāṇam asādhakam ayam arthaḥ prakaraṇa ādi vaśāt hi sāmānya śabdāḥ api viśeṣe vatarntaḥ iti prasiddham yathā viśiṣṭa samaye puruṣam ānayā iti ukte puruṣa viśeṣaḥ eva ānīyate na tu yaḥ kaḥ api puruṣaḥ prakṛte ca anumānasya asādhaka tva nimitta parisaṅkhayānam na ca durbalena virodhe api anumānam asādhakam bhavati prabala virodha ādinā tasya eva ābhāsa tvāt yathā vimataḥ cakṣuṣmān rūpa aparokṣa jñāni tvāt iti atra vimataḥ andhaḥ puruṣa tvāt iti atas sāmānya śabda prasaktaḥ api durbalena virodhaḥ na prathijñā artha viruddha tā kintu prabala sama bala pramāṇa viruddha tā eva 
NSu_2.1.37cd.3	 nanu evam ādhikya nirāse api na anumāna virodha traividhyam sambhavati pratijñā virodhasya avyāptyā eva gata tvāt virodhena eva sādhya virahiṇi pakṣe vartamānasya hetoḥ arvyāpti bharvati na hi viredhasya avyāpti asaṅkīrṇam udāharaṇam asti yatra tu virodha sambhavaḥ tatra avyāpteḥ eva anyatra avadhṛta sāmarthyāyāḥ dūṣaṇa tvāt virodhasya avyāpti utthāpanena caritārtha tvāt iti āśaṅkām bhikṣu pāda prasāraṇena pariharati sva vākyena iti 
NSu_2.1.38ab.1–2.1.38ab.2	 sva vākyena virodhe api na eva sādhaka tām vrajet pramāṇam iti anuvartate na kevalam pramāṇa virodhe kintu sva vākyena virodhe api pramāṇam na eva sādhaka tām vrajet eva śabdena pareṣām api siddhaḥ ayam arthaḥ iti darśayati yathā uktam avirodhi grahaṇāt pratyakṣa anumāna gama sva śāstra sva vacana virodhinaḥ nirastāḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.38ab.3–2.1.38ab.4	 etat uktam bhavati pratijñā artha virodhaḥ dvedhā bhavati pramāṇa virodhaḥ sva vākya virodhaḥ ca iti tatra ādyaḥ prabala sama bala pramāṇa virodha ātmā dvividhaḥ bhavati dvitīyaḥ api apasiddhānta jāti bhedena dvedhā jātiḥ ca sva vacana virodha sva nyāya virodha sva kriyā virodha bhedena tredhā tatra āstām tāvat pramāṇa virodhaḥ sva vākya virodha grahaṇam tāvat pṛthakkaraṇīyam tasya api avyāpti utthāpane vyāpāra ayogāt sva vākya virodhe hi kim sādhanasya ubhaya abhimatyā vyabhicāraḥ bhavet kiṃvānyara abhimatyāḥ na ādyaḥ sva vākya prāmāṇyasya ubhaya asammateḥ na dvitīyaḥ tasya svatas siddha tvena sva vākya virodha anapekṣa tvāt adoṣa tvāt ca tasmāt aviṣaya vṛvi tvena pratijñā artha viruddha tā pṛthak eva pati saṅkha yātavyā iti kiñca ayam na kevalam vyāpti apekṣa pravṛtteḥ anumānasya eva doṣaḥ kinnāma tad anapekṣasya pratyakṣa ādeḥ api tathā ca anyatra upalabdha sāmarthyasya anumāne api svātantrya siddhiḥ iti āśayavatā prastāvāt anumānam iti vaktavye pramāṇam iti eva adhikṛtam 
NSu_2.1.38ab.5	 etena etat api nirastam astu sva vākya virodhasya pṛthak doṣa tvam avyāpti utthāpaka tva ayogāt bādha pratirodha rūpaḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ tu na svatantra doṣaḥ pramāṇa virodhe hi hetuḥ apakṣa dharmaḥ vā syāt anaikāntikaḥ vā jijñāsita dharmaṇaḥ dharmiṇaḥ pakṣa tvāt pramāṇa avagata sādhya viruddha dharmavataḥ ca apakṣa tvena tad dharmasya apakṣa dharma tva niyamāt sādhya dharrmiṇī eva pramāṇa upasthāpita sādhya dharma viruddha dharmavati darśanena vyabhicārāt na ca sa pakṣa vipakṣau= eva anvaya vyatireka gamyā vinābhāva darśana viṣayau na pakṣaḥ iti sāmpratam yadi hi pakṣam vihāya bahis eva avinābhāvaḥ avagamyate tadā bahis vyāpti balena pakṣa dharmaḥ api hetuḥ na pakṣe sādhyam sādhayet asiddhāḥ hi tatra tasya sādhyena vyāptiḥ tasmāt antar bahis vā sarva upasaṃhāreṇa avinābhāvaḥ avagantavyaḥ evañca siddhaḥ pakṣe vyabhicāraḥ sādhana dharmasya 
NSu_2.1.38ab.6–2.1.38ab.8	 nanu pratirodhe katham tatra api vyāpti grāhakasya pramāṇasya prābalyam ubhayatra api pramāṇa sadbhāve vyāpya tva asiddhau= antarbhāvāt iti pramāṇa virodhasya pramāṇa antare api aviṣaya vṛtti tā hetu tvena avagata svatantra dūṣaṇa bhāvasya anumāne api tathā eva aṅgī kartum ucita tvāt api ca kim vyāpti grahaṇa samaye avyāpteḥ upasthāpakaḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ syāt uta anumāna pravṛtti uttaram api ādyaḥ tu iṣyate eva māna bādhe na tat bhavet a iti vakṣyamāṇa tvāt na dvitīyaḥ upajīvya parityāgena upajīvaka svīkārasya ayukta tvāt pramāṇa viruddhasya apakṣa dharma tve siddha sādhanasya api tathātvam syāt samāna nyāya tvāt om iti ced na sva artha anumāne api siddha sādhanasya doṣa tva āpatteḥ na hi pakṣa dharmatā siddhiḥ para arthaḥ eva anumāne doṣaḥ tasmāt parānākāṅkṣita tvāt asaṅgataḥ eva siddha sādhanaḥ iti evam anumāna doṣāt nirūpya prasaṅgāt para nirūpita aśeṣa nigraha sthānānām api virodha ādiṣu eva antarbhāvaḥ iti āha saṃvāda iti 
NSu_2.1.38cd.1–2.1.38cd.4	 saṃvāda anukti saṃyuktāḥ ete eva ca nigrahāḥ nigṛhyate parājīyate ebhiḥ iti nigrahāḥ nigraha sthānāni nanu ca pratijñāhāni a ādīnām vaktṛ doṣāṇām katham artha vacana doṣeṣu virodha asaṅgati nyūna ādhikyeṣu anupraveśaḥ iti atas uktam saṃvāda anukti saṃyuktām iti tathā api anupapattiḥ eva virodha ādi catuṣyayasya anumāna doṣa tvena ukta tvāt nigraha sthānānām ca niyamena anumāna āśraya tva abhāvāt na hi punaruktiḥ anumānaḥ eva sambhāvinī praśna ādau= api upapatteḥ iti atas asti atra viśeṣaḥ iti tuśabdena āha dvividham hi virodha ādi catuṣyayam samaya bandha ādi kathā sarva rūpa sādhāraṇam asādhāraṇam ca tatra anumānasya eva yat asādhāraṇam virodha ādi tatra anumāna doṣāṇām sarveṣām praveśaḥ abhihitaḥ sādhāraṇe tu sarva nigraha sthānānām iti na kaścid virodhaḥ yat vā kathā bāhya ādīnām eṣām nigraha sthāna tā vyavaccheda arthaḥ tuśabdaḥ nanu kā iyam kathā nāma iti apekṣāyām tad svarūpam nirūpayan sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāgam uddeśam ca āha vādaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.39ab.1–2.1.39cd.1	 vādaḥ jalpaḥ vitaṇḍa iti kathāḥ tisraḥ vijānatām atra kathā iti lakṣya padam āvartanīyam vicāra gocara iti upaskartavyam vijānatām iti jātau bahuvacanam tathā ca aneka vidvat vaktṛka vicāra gocarā kathā vākya sandṛddhiḥ kathā iti sāmānya lakṣaṇa siddhiḥ tāḥ ca kathā vāda ādi bhedena tisraḥ trividhāḥ iti arthaḥ vijānatām matena tisraḥ iti vā tena nyūna adhika saṅkhayā uktiḥ tad virodhāt ayuktā iti uktam bhavati vāda lakṣaṇam āha sva artham iti sva artham para artham api vā tattva nirṇaya sādhanī 
NSu_2.1.40a.1–2.1.40a.3	 kevalam tu kathā vādaḥ tattva nirṇaya sādhani iti artha ādi artha jalpa vitaṇḍa avyavacchedaḥ tathā api vitaṇḍā viśeṣe ativyāptiḥ tad artham kevalam iti uktam sākṣāt iti arthaḥ tuśabdena tattva nirṇaya sādhanāt api jalpa viśeṣāt tad uddeśena pravṛtta tva vailakṣaṇyam darśayita yadā tu vidita tattvau vīta rāgau= avidita tattvaiḥ paraiḥ abhyarthitau kathām kurutaḥ tadā tatra avyāptem etad lakṣaṇam nacāsau na vādaḥ anyatra anantarbhāvena tisraḥ iti asya vyāghātāt iti atas uktam sva artham para artham api vā iti api śabdaḥ ubhaya artha tāsamuccaya arthaḥ jalpa lakṣaṇam āha jalpaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.40bc.1–2.1.40d.1	 jalpaḥ artha ādi vyapekṣayā satām eva kathā jñeyā ādipadena khyāti ādeḥ grahaṇam artha ādi vyapekṣayā iti vāda vyāvṛtti artham ānuṣaṅgika artha ādi sādhana tvam vādasya api sambhavati iti vyapekṣā grahaṇam vitaṇḍā vyāvṛtti artham satām eva iti satām iti eva ukte na vitaṇḍā vyāvṛtti siddhiḥ vitaṇḍāyām api ekasya sattvāt bahuvacanasya jāti artha tvāt tena eva iti uktam vitaṇḍām lakṣayati vitaṇḍa iti  vitaṇḍā tu asatām satām 
NSu_2.1.41ab.1–2.1.41ab.3	 aprakāśya sva siddhāntam asatām pakṣa dūṣaṇam tuśabdaḥ vāda jalpa vyavaccheda arthaḥ kathā iti anuvartate kartṛ bhedena kathā bhede atiprasaṅgaḥ iti atas lakṣaṇa antaram āha aprakāśya iti sadbhiḥ sva siddhāntam aprakāśya asādhayitvā asatām pakṣasya dūṣaṇam eva kriyate yat sā vitaṇḍa iti arthaḥ prativādinaḥ sva pakṣa sādhanena vinā para pakṣa pratikṣepa mātreṇa paryavasyantī kathā vitaṇḍa iti uktam bhavati nanu etat eva kinnimittam prāśnika ādi adhīnam iti brūmaḥ te api kutas etādṛśa niyamam kuryuḥ iti ced tattva jñāna ayogyān asataḥ prati sadbhiḥ sva siddhānta sādhane teṣām tattva jñāna utpāda prasaṅgāt tasya ca niṣiddha tvāt iti āśayena asatām iti uktam etena prathama lakṣaṇasya api samarthanam veditavyam nanu asambhavi idam lakṣaṇam para pakṣa dūṣaṇam hi tad pratipādaka pramāṇa dūṣaṇena eva bhavet na ca sva pakṣa sādhana hīnāyām vitaṇḍāyām tad sambhavati iti atas āha uktaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.41cd.1–2.1.41cd.3	 ukte taiḥ prathamam māne vaktavyam tasya dūṣaṇam taiḥ asadbhiḥ prathamam sva pakṣa sādhanāya māne ukte sati sadbhiḥ tasya mānasya dūṣaṇam vaktavyam asataḥ vādi bhūtasya sva pakṣa sādhanam para pakṣa nirākaraṇam ca karaṇīyam sataḥ tu prativādinaḥ tad pramāṇa dūṣaṇena eva caritārtha tvam iti uktam bhavati kvacid satām eva ityādisārdha ślokaḥ vāda jalpayoḥ iti atas param paṭhitaḥ tatas etām eva saṅgatim āśritya ṭīkā kṛtā tatra eva vyākhyātaḥ 
NSu_2.1.41cd.4	 kiñca guru śiṣya ādayaḥ asamāna vidyāḥ api vāde adhikriyante tattva nirṇaya arthi tvāt jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu sambhāvita samāna vidyayoḥ eva adhikāraḥ yayoḥ eva samam vittam yayoḥ eva samam śrutam tayoḥ vivāhaḥ vādaḥ ca na uttama adhamayoḥ kvacit a iti smaraṇāt vādaḥ jalpa vitaṇḍā lakṣaṇaḥ vivādaḥ anyathā atyanta apakṛṣṭaḥ api utkṛṣṭatamena vaiyātyāt ghaṭamānaḥ yadi vā daiva āyattam abhibhāvayet tadā vṛthā ākhyātim labheta tathā ca prāśnika ādīnām asujñātvam pratyavāyaḥ ca syāt apūjyaḥ pūjyate yatra iti vacanāt evam ca vādāt jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ bhedaḥ nanu etat ayuktam para buddheḥ apratyakṣa tvena vidyā sāmya vaiṣamyayoḥ jñātum aśakya tvāt iti ced na jalpa vitaṇḍa arthinoḥ vidyā sāmya ādeḥ parīkṣayā niścaya upapatteḥ tat etat āha vidyā iti 
NSu_2.1.42ab.1–2.1.42ab.2	 vidyā parīkṣā pūrvā eva vitaṇḍā jalpaḥ eva ca vidyā parīkṣā pūrvā kāraṇa bhūtāḥ yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā vidyā parīkṣayā niścita sāmyayoḥ eva vitaṇḍā dātavyā na viṣama vidyayoḥ jalpaḥ ca evam vidyā parīkṣā pūrvam eva iti vyākhyeyam dvitīyā eva śabdaḥ vāda vyāvṛtti arthaḥ samāna vidyayoḥ eva iti ayam niyamaḥ na vāde asti iti 
NSu_2.1.42ab.3–2.1.42cd.3	 nanu jalpa vitaṇḍa arthinaḥ virdyāsāmi ādi niścayāya kartavyā parīkṣā kim kathayā uta anyathā na anyathā anyonya saṅgharṣaṇena vinā tad asiddheḥ ādye api kim vādena jalpa vitaṇḍābhyām vā na prathamaḥ khyāti ādi kāmayoḥ spardhau= atorvāda anupapatteḥ na dvitīyaḥ anavasthā pātāt iti ced na vādena tāvat vidyā parīkṣaṇasya iṣṭa tvāt iti āśayavān vādasya vidyā parīkṣāyām kāraṇa tvam anvaya vyatirekābhyām sādhayitum upodghātam tāvat āha ucca iti ucca nīca tva nirṇītiḥ yatas jaya parājayau yatas vidyayā uccatvena nirṇīta tvam eva jayaḥ nīca tvena nirṇīta tvam ca parājaya iti arthaḥ iti vidyā parīkṣaṇam vādena iti vakṣyamāṇena anvayaḥ evam upayuktam abhidhāya vyatirekam āha vinā eva iti 
NSu_2.1.43.1–2.1.44ab.2	 vinā eva tattva nirṇītim nahi jalpa ādinā kvacid ucca nīca tva vijñānam iti vidyā parīkṣaṇam nirṇīyate anayā iti nirṇītiḥ tattvasya nirṇītiḥ tattva nirṇītiḥ vādaḥ iti yāvat tattva nirṇītim vinā ucca nīca tva vijñānam na hi iti eva ukte vinā vādena iti vakṣyamāṇa virodhaḥ syāt atas jalpa ādinā iti uktam iti śabdaḥ tasmāt iti arthe vidyā parīkṣaṇam vādena iti vakṣyamāṇam atra api sambaddhayate yadi api sat sādhana upalambhe jalpe api bhavati vādinoḥ ucca nīca tva vijñānam tathā api tad uddeśena apravṛtteḥ tādarthvasya prathamam aniścayāt na tad artham jalpaḥ dātum śakyate vyatirekasya anyadīya akāraṇa tva mātra niścaya hetu tvāt vādasya kāraṇa tām avadhārayitum anvayam ca āha vādena iti vādena ca ucca nīca tva vijñānam bhavati sphuṭam caśabdaḥ anvayasya vyatirekeṇa samuccaya arthaḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām samarthitam artham upasaṃharati iti iti 
NSu_2.1.44c.1–2.1.44c.4	 iti vādasya pūrva tvam iti tasmāt vādasya pūrva tvam jalpa vitaṇḍa arthinoḥ vidyā sāmya ādi niścaya hetu parīkṣā artham prathama anuṣṭheya tvam siddham iti arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati samāna vidyayoḥ eva jalpa vitaṇḍe samāna vidyatā ca parīkṣā niśceyā parīkṣā ca vāda kathayā vidheyāḥ na jalpa vitaṇḍābhyām jayena hi vidyā ādhikyam nirṇetavyam parājayena ca tat nyūna tā jaya parājayau ca pramāṇa tarkābhyām prakṛta prameya sādhana sāmarthyā sāmarthya lakṣaṇau ucca nīca tva nirṇaya viṣaya tā śabda vācyau= eva prakṛta upayoginau tau ca vādaḥ eva sambhavataḥ na jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tatra yat kiñcit nigraha udbhavana mātreṇa jaya parājaya vyavasthāpanāt atas jalpa vitaṇḍa artham jalpa vitaṇḍa abhyarthanābhāvān na anavasthā iti jalpa vitaṇḍa arthinoḥ vidyā parīkṣāyām vādena kṛtāyām kim kāryam samavidya tva sambhāvanāyām jalpa vitaṇḍe kartavye iti uktam eva viṣama vidyata avadhāraṇāyām kim vidheyam iti apekṣāyām āha tad siddhau= iti 
NSu_2.1.44d.1–2.1.45ab.4	 tad siddhau vyarthatā anyayoḥ tena vādena eva tasya nīca ucca bhāvasya siddhau satyām anyayoḥ jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ vyarthatā tatas ca akartavyatā iti arthaḥ parīkṣā arthena vādena eva uparamaḥ iti bahu vidya tva siddhau tu na eva vādaḥ api jalpa vitaṇḍa arthinoḥ vidyā parīkṣā artham vāda kathā prathamam dātavyā iti uktasya apavādam āha bahu vidyatvā iti prāk parīkṣātaḥ loka saṃvāda ādinā anyatarasya pratiyogi apekṣayā bahu vidyatva siddhau tu vādaḥ api na eva dātavyaḥ kimu jalpa vitaṇḍe iti kutas iti atas āha kāraṇam iti 
NSu_2.1.45b.1–2.1.45cd.1	 kāraṇam vidyā parīkṣāyāḥ iti śeṣaḥ vādaḥ iti anuvartate vādaḥ hi vidyā parīkṣā kāraṇam iti eṣyavyaḥ na tu vyasani tayā tad phalam tu anyatas eva jātam iti kim parīkṣayā kim tad aṅgena vādena iti yat uktam spardhāvatoḥ khyāti ādi kāmayoḥ vādaḥ na sambhavati tatra asat sādhana uttara prayogasya avaśyam avarjanīya tvāt tatas ca vidyā sāmya vaiṣamya niṇarya anupapatteḥ iti tatra āha sabhā iti sa bhāsa bhāpa prāśnīka pūrvaḥ tu spardhinām api 
NSu_2.1.46a.1–2.1.46a.4	 vādaḥ eva praśna śabdāt karoti iti arthe īkak pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ spardhinām iti jātau bahuvacanam eva iti asya yujyate iti adhyāhṛtena anvayaḥ yatas sabhā ādi pūrvaḥ tatas spardhinām api vādaḥ yujyate eva iti tuśabdaḥ hetu arthaḥ sabhāsabhā pati prāśnikaiḥ niyatayoḥ asat sādhana ādi prayoga varjana sambhavāt iti bhāvaḥ yat uktaṃtad siddhau vyarthatā anyayoḥ a iti tat ayuktam vādena tattva nirṇaya siddhau= api artha ādi asiddheḥ tathā ca abhilaṣitam na siddham siddham ca anabhilaṣitam iti tatra āha ubhaya iti 
NSu_2.1.46ab.1–2.1.46ab.3	 ubhaya arthaḥ syāt nirṇīti jaya kārakaḥ vādaḥ iti anuvartate asya eva vivaraṇam nirṇīti iti na kevalam nirṇīti kārakaḥ kintu jaya kārakaḥ ca jaya śabdena tat sādhyam arthya ādikam upalakṣyate vidyā parīkṣā arthe vāde jayinaḥ artha ādikam api sabhā patinā sampādanīyam iti bhāvaḥ evam tarhi na kadāpi jalpa vitaṇḍā pravṛttiḥ vyartha ratānyayoḥ a iti yukteḥ sama tvāt yathā hi vidyā vaiṣamya nirṇaye jitavataḥ artha ādi lābhaḥ tathā tad sāmye dvayoḥ api artha ādi lābhaḥ sambhavati eva na ca phala antaram asti yena punar jalpa vitaṇḍa ārambhaḥ syāt iti atas āha tattva aprakāśaḥ eva iti 
NSu_2.1.46cd.1–2.1.46cd.2	 tattva aprakāśaḥ eva ekaḥ vitaṇḍā jalpayoḥ phalam tattva aprakāśaḥ iti para vañcana sāmarthyam ucyate tena tat sādhyaḥ artha ādi lābhaḥ lakṣyate idam uktam bhavati yadi api vidyā sāmya vaiṣamyayoḥ nirṇīti jayau syātām tathā api tāttvika kathā phala rūpau= eva para ācchādana cāturya prayukta artha ādi lābha artham samāna vidyayoḥ punar jalpa vitaṇḍā pravṛttiḥ iti na ca evam viṣama vidyayoḥ api tad pravṛttiḥ upaplava prasaṅgasya ukta tvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.46cd.3–2.1.47c.2	 yat vā tattva nirṇaya phalaḥ vādaḥ artha ādi phale jalpa vitaṇḍe iti phala bhedena kathā bhedaḥ uktaḥ saḥ anupapannaḥ tathā satyartha ādīnām bhedena kathā anantyaprasaṅgāt iti atas āha tat tva iti yadi api artha ādayaḥ avāntara bheda bhinnāḥ tathā api tattva aprakāśaḥ ekaḥ eva vitaṇḍā jalpayoḥ phalam tattva nirṇaya itara tva rūpeṇa artha ādīnām eka tvāt na ukta doṣaḥ tat avāntara bheda vivakṣā tu vyarthā eva iti bhāvaḥ evam kathayā vidyā parīkṣaṇam iti pakṣaḥ samarthitaḥ idānīm anyathā iti pakṣam api samarthayamānaḥ āha vinā iti vinā vādena vidyāyāḥ yadi śakyam parīkṣaṇam syāt jalpa ādiḥ api kvāpi avigīta vidvat prasiddhayā ādinā iti śeṣaḥ kvāpi iti asya pūrva ardhena anvayaḥ tadā samavidyayoḥ prathamam api jalpa ādiḥ kathā viśeṣaḥ kāryaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ tarhi vidyā parīkṣaṇam vādena eva iti ukti virodhaḥ iti atas āha vai eva iti 
NSu_2.1.47d.1–2.1.47d.4	 vādaḥ eva anyathā bhavet vādaḥ eva prathamam kartavyaḥ bhavet iti yat uktam tat anyathā vādena vinā vidyā parīkṣaṇasya kartum aśakyatvaḥ eva atas na virodhaḥ iti astu evam upāya antara virahe kathaya eva vidyā parīkṣaṇam sā tu vādaḥ iti kutas tattva nirṇaya arthinoḥ adhikāri tvāt tad phala tvāt ca iti ced tarhi vijigīṣāvatoḥ adhikāri tvāt artha ādi phala tvāt sabha ādi aṅga upeta tvāt jalpaḥ api syāt iti kim atra jalpa śabda vācya tā mātram āpadyate kiṃvā vāda śabda vācya tā bhāvaḥ athavā samāhāra rūpam kathā antaram yat vā nimitta dvaya samāveśe vāda śabdasya eva vyavahāra anupapattiḥ sarvatra api uttaram āha jalpaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.48ab.1–2.1.48ab.2	 jalpaḥ iti api nāma syāt vādasya etādṛśasya tu etādṛśasya nimitta dvaya upetasya atra jalpaḥ iti nāma syāt iti abhyupagamena ādyaḥ nirastaḥ api śabdena vāda śabda vācya tām pratijñāyai tādṛśasya iti anena hetuḥ uktaḥ tena dvitīyaḥ api nirākṛtaḥ nahi nimitta sadbhāve vācaka apravṛttiḥ iti yuktam jalpa śabde api sāmyāt atas tulāyām pramāṇa āditas vidha antaravatī syāt vādasya jalpaḥ iti api nāma syāt iti vāda saṃjñā tu mukhyā jalpa saṃjñā tu amukhyā iti sūcitam tena caturthaḥ api nirastaḥ tatra hetu viśeṣa sadbhāvam tuśabdena dyotayati 
NSu_2.1.48ab.3	 tathā hi yadi api kathakā vāditaḥ vijigīṣū tathā api sabhyādibhivirjigīṣām paribhāvya utpāditā tattva nirṇaya arthi tā eva kathā upayoginī artha ādi lābhaḥ ca antarā prāptaḥ na tvāditas eva uddiṣyaḥ iti amukhyaḥ eva atas eva pūrvaḥ ubhaya arthaḥ syāt iti ukte sāmya pratīti prasaktau nirṇīti jaya kāraka iti tattva nirṇīteḥ prādhānya pradarśana artham vivaraṇam kṛtam 
NSu_2.1.48ab.4–2.1.48ab.5	 anyathā kathā phala dvayasya eva ubhaya śabdena pratīteḥ vivaraṇam vyartham syāt alpa āctaram iti lakṣaṇasya vyabhicāram kurvāṇena api etat eva sūcitam anyathā jaya nirṇīti kārakaḥ iti avakṣyat sabhyādi saṃvaraṇam ca vijigīṣu tā paribhava artham iti vādatā prādhānyam eva upodbalayati iti api ca adhikāri bheda ādikam bahis aṅga tayā eva kathā bhedakam antaraṅgam tu pravṛtti prakāraḥ eva sa ca vāda sambandhyā iva asyām kathāyām asti iti atas vāda tvam eva mukhyam iti āśayavān āha pratijñā iti 
NSu_2.1.48cd.1–2.1.48cd.2	 pratijñā mātra sādhya tvam api syāt yājñavalkya vat vidyā parīkṣā arthāyām kathāyām kvāpi prameye pratijñā mātreṇa pramāṇa upanyāsa rahitena vacanena sādhya tvam prajñāpanīyam syāt kutas etat kati eva devāḥ yājñavalkya iti śākalyena pṛṣṭe trayastriṃśat iti vacana mātreṇa prajñāpanasya kṛta tvāt sā ca vidyā parīkṣā arthā kathā iti upakrama paryālocanayā siddham yājñavalkya śabdena tat kathā upalakṣyate saptamī arthe vatiḥ tatas kim iti atas āha saṃvādaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.48*a.1–2.1.48*a.3	 saṃvāde vādinoḥ kvāpi evambhāvaḥ hi vādi prativādinoḥ saṃvāde anyonya āptatā aśvāse sati eva syāt tad āśvāsaḥ hi vādaḥ eva sambhavati na jalpe vijigīṣuṇā apa siddhānta ādi parihāreṇa sarvathā pramāṇa praśnasya kartavya tvāt tena ayam vādaḥ eva iti jñāyate iti nanu evam tarhi na vidyā parīkṣā sambhavati pramāṇa upanyāse hi tad samarthana upālambhābhyām sā syāt na tu praśna pratijñā abhyupagama mātreṇa iti atas āha vivādaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.48*b.1–2.1.49c.3	 vivāde hetuḥ iṣyate hetuḥ iti pramāṇa mātra upalakṣaṇam pramā hetuḥ iti vā na hi ekatra āptaḥ sarvatra āptaḥ eva iti niyamaḥ asti iti bhāvaḥ yājñavalkyena api tatra tatra pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ eva iti sakalam anākulam prakṛtānām sabhyasa bhāpati prāśnikānām svarūpa jijñāsāyām āha sabhā iti sabhā sabhā patiḥ ca eva prāśnikāḥ ca eva vaiṣṇavāḥ rāga dveṣa vihīnāḥ ca caśabdau sabhā ādīnām anyonya samuccaye tṛtīyaḥ viśeṣaṇa samuccaye eva śabdau tu vaiṣṇavāḥ eva rāga dveṣa vihīnāḥ eva iti sambaddhayete anyathā kathā anupapatti sūcanam tad prayojanam syuḥ iti vakṣyamāṇam iha api sambaddhayate sabhyānām prāśnikānām ca viśeṣaṇa antaram āha syuḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.49d.1–2.1.50a.3	 syuḥ sabhyāḥ sarva vedinaḥ prāśnikāḥ sarva śabdena vādi prativādi darśanasya kathā upayuktasya vyākaraṇa ādeḥ ca saṅgrahaḥ punar sabhya prāśnika grahaṇam sabhā pati vyavaccheda artham tat sārvajñasya kathā upayoga abhāvāt sabhyāḥ prāśnikāḥ ca sarva vedinaḥ syuḥ iti anvayaḥ nanu prāśnikānām kva upayogaḥ vivadamānayoḥ guṇa doṣa avadhāraṇa ādau= iti brūmaḥ evam tarhi taiḥ eva alam kim sabhyaiḥ iti atas āha etat iti 
NSu_2.1.50ab.1–2.1.50ab.3	 ca etat ajñāne sabhyāḥ ca anantara uktān prāśnikān etat śabdena parāmṛśati kvacid sūkṣme prameye eteṣām prāśnikānām kāraṇa antara dvājñāne sati vādinoḥ guṇa doṣa nirṇayāya sabhyāḥ ca pramāṇam syuḥ iti vakṣyamāṇena anvayaḥ pramāṇa āśrayeṣu pramāṇa tva upacāraḥ yadi evam prāśnikeṣu ajñāna śaṅkayā sabhyānām varaṇam tadā teṣu api ajñāna śaṅkayā anye api varaṇīyāḥ anyathā nirṇaya abhāvena kathā vaii arthyā patteḥ teṣu api evam iti atas āha eṣām ca iti 
NSu_2.1.50bc.1–2.1.50d.3	 eṣām ca dūra gāḥ pramāṇam nirṇayāya syuḥ eṣām sabhyānām ca ajñāne sati dūra gāḥ deśa antara sthāḥ na ca evam sabhya saṃvaraṇam api anarthakam tatas param prāyeṇa ajñāna śaṅkā anudayāt laukikaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ iti dūra gāt nirṇāyaka tva sambhavāya viśinaṣṭi pakṣa iti  pakṣapāta vivarjitāḥ eka deśa utkīrtanena yathoktam sabhyādi lakṣaṇam atidiśati aprakāśya sva siddhāntam iti vitaṇḍā lakṣaṇam uktam tat katham vāda jalpābhyām vyāvartakam iti atas āha ubhābhyām iti 
NSu_2.1.51ab.1–2.1.51ab.4	 ubhābhyām sādhanam ca eva dūṣaṇam vāda jalpayoḥ vāda jalpayoḥ ubhābhyām eva sva pakṣa sādhanam para pakṣa dūṣaṇam kartavyam na tu prativādinaḥ para pakṣa dūṣaṇa mātreṇa kṛtārtha tā iti satām eva iti sārdha ślokasya atra sanniveśe tu lakṣitau vāda jalpau idānīm tu vitaṇḍāyāḥ lakṣaṇa dvayam vivakṣuḥ tāvat upayuktam āha ubhābhyām iti kathā vāda jalpa lakṣaṇā etena jalpaḥ artha ādi vyapekṣayā iti uktasya vitaṇḍāyām ativyāptiḥ api parihṛtāḥ ubhaya sādhanavat tvena sat eka ādhikārika tvena vā artha ādi vyapekṣa kathāyāḥ viśeṣita tvāt yad artham satām eva iti uktam tad vitaṇḍā lakṣaṇam āha vitaṇḍā tu iti kathā iti anuvartate ubhābhyām iti yad artham uktam tad lakṣaṇa antaram āha aprakāśya iti ukte taiḥ iti pūrvavat iti ubhābhyām sādhanam ityādi uktam tatra sādhanāya kim pramāṇam prayoktavyam yatra yat asti tatra tat eva vaktavyam satyam pramāṇa samplave tu katham kim sarvam eva ūta ekam eva tatra api kim iti apekṣāyām āha sadbhiḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.51cd.1–2.1.51cd.2	 sadbhiḥ āgamaḥ eva ekaḥ prayojyaḥ abhīṣya sādhakaḥ ekaḥ eva na tu sambhavat sarvam ādhikya prasaṅgāt sa ca āgamaḥ eva iti yojyam yat vā eka śabdaḥ mukhya arthaḥ īśvara ādi prameye mukhyaḥ veda ādiḥ āgamaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ na anumānam iti nanu avaidikasya veda ādi āgama upādāne apasiddhāntaḥ syāt iti atas uktam sadbhiḥ iti kutas veda ādi prayoga niyamaḥ iti atas āha abhīṣya iti yatas iti śeṣaḥ anumānam khalu na svātantryeṇa īśvara ādi sādhanasya iṣye sarvatra upādhi pratipakṣayoḥ sambhavāt tad artham antatas api āgamaḥ anusaraṇīyaḥ tatas varam prathamam eva vaktavyaḥ tasya svātantryeṇa sādhya siddhayaṅga tvāt nanu avaidikam prati katham āgamam prayujya tad prāmāṇyam sādhanīyam iti 
NSu_2.1.51cd.3	 nanu asadbhiḥ kim vaktavyam na tāvat pratyakṣam atīndriye tad ayogāt na ca āgamaḥ sva para āgamayoḥ anyonyam prāmāṇya asammateḥ na api anumānam prayoga parimāṇa asammateḥ tathā hi saugataḥ yadi dvayava yava prayogam kuryāt tadā naiyāyikena nyūnena nigṛhyeta anigrahe vā prativādī paryanuyojyam upekṣeta pañca avayava prayoge tu adhikena nigṛhyeta tathā svīkāre cāpa siddhāntena tathā ca niyata avayava ādi vyatirekeṇa vitaṇḍā eva na syāt iti atas āha sva siddhānta iti 
NSu_2.1.52ab.1–2.1.52ab.4	 sva siddhānta anusāreṇa hi asadbhiḥ anumā ucyate yathā asiddhāntam vaktavyam iti prāk niyamāt sva siddhānta nirṇīta prayoga avayava parimāṇa apekṣayā eva nyūnāt yavatārāt anyathā anupapatteḥ iti hi śabda atharḥ sadbhiḥ āgamaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti na yuktam vaidikasya prativādinaḥ tad dūṣaṇe apasiddhāntāt adūṣaṇe tu para pakṣā t ūṣaṇena kathā bhāva prasaṅgāt iti atas āha pratyakṣā iti 
NSu_2.1.52cd.1–2.1.53ab.2	 pratyakṣa āgama vairūpyam āśritya anyārtha tā eva tu āgame daśarnīyā atra doṣaḥ liṅga viloma tā āgame tu vādinā prayukte prativādinā vaidikena tasya anyārtha tā eva daśarnīyāḥ na anumānasya iva aprāmāṇyam yena apasiddhāntaḥ syāt tatas eva kṛta para pakṣa dūṣaṇaḥ api bhavet anya artha tām darśitavatā agamasya para abhimata arthāt pracyāvita tvāt na hi apekṣita artha asādhaka tavāt anyat pramāṇa dūṣaṇam asti iti 
NSu_2.1.53ab.3–2.1.53ab.4	 nanu evam sati katham kathā paryavasānam sva sva abhimata artha āgraha parityājana upāya abhāvāt iti atas uktam pratyakṣa ityādi atra para abhimate arthe pratyakṣa āgama virodham āśritya na kevalam etāvat atra upakrama ādi liṅga vilomatā doṣaḥ api darśanīyaḥ atra anyatama mātre tātparyam anyathā adhikya prasaṅgāt nanu etāvatā api na kathā samāptiḥ para abhimata artha anupapatti mātreṇa sva abhimata artha asiddheḥ iti atas satyam iti āha liṅga iti 
NSu_2.1.53cd.1–2.1.53cd.2	 liṅga ānukūlyam sva arthasya śruti ādīnām anugrahaḥ darśanīya padam anuvartate śruti ādīnām veda ādīnām śrutiḥ liṅgam samākhyā ca iti uktānām liṅga grahaṇena eva gṛhīta tvāt upalakṣaṇam ca etat para arthe pramāṇa ānukūlyasya sva arthe tad prātikūlyasya ca nirāsaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti api draṣṭavyam sva siddhānta prayoga parimāṇa anatikrameṇa para artha anumāna vākya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ tathā tve ca na nyūnāt i avatāraḥ tat atikramaḥ eva tad avakāśaḥ iti uktam 
NSu_2.1.53cd.3–2.1.53cd.4	 aparaḥ āha yathāvastu prayoktavyam na ca vastu tattvaḥ eva vādinām vipratipatteḥ avaśyam nyūna ādi avatāra sambhavena aprayoga prāptiḥ iti vācyam yasya yatra tāttvika tva abhimānaḥ tena tad prayoga anantaram pareṇa nyūna ādau= udbhāvite tathārūpa tāyāḥ sādhanāt na ca evam artha antara āpātaḥ hetoḥ anyatara asiddha yudbhāvane tad siddhi vyutpādana vat prakṛta upayoga sadbhāvāt iti tat ayuktam dvi tri pañca avayava ādi pakṣāṇām sarveṣām api tāttvika tāyāḥ samarthita tvāt sva sva niyamasya eva tātvika tvam upetya tad anatikrameṇa eva prayoga aṅgīkāre tu sarvathā kathā uccheda āpatteḥ tat tāttvika tāyām prativādinā vipratipadyamānena avaśyam nyūna ādeḥ udbhāvanāt nanu uktam atra sva sva avayava kalpanā param prati samarthanīya iti duruktam tat tad samarthanasya aśakya tvāt iti āha tripañca iti 
NSu_2.1.54.1–2.1.54.2	 tri pañca avayavām eva yugma avayavinīm api niyamāt yaḥ anumām brūyāt tam brūyāt yadi tādṛśī na anumā iti tadā kena sādhya avayava kalpanā trayaḥ pratijñā hetu udāharaṇāni udāharaṇa upanaya nigamanāni vā pañca pratijñā hetu udāhaṇa upanaya nigamanāni vā avayavāḥ yasyāḥ sā tri pañca avayavāḥ eva śabdena pakṣa dvaya niyamam āha yugmau dvau= udāharaṇa upanaya avayavau yasyāḥ sā yugmauvayavinī niyamāt iti sannihitena eva sambaddhayate anumā iti tādarthyāt prayogaḥ ucyate vaiśeṣika ādīnām tatra eva vyavahārāt tam brūyāt yadi paraḥ aniyata vādī iti śeṣaḥ yat vā yaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ tārkikā ādiḥ ca tri pañca avayavām eva anumām brūyāt tam prati yaḥ saugataḥ niyamāt yugma avayavinīm brūyāt sa yadi tādṛśī tri avayavā pañca avayavā ca na anumā iti brūyāt iti yojyam evam parivartena api tādṛśī na anumeti asya pramāṇa abhāvāt iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_2.1.54.3	 etat uktam bhavati naiyāyikena saugatam prati pañca avayava prayoge vihite saugataḥ adhikam iti nigṛhṇīyāt tatas naiyāyikena pañca avayava prayogasya eva tāttvika tvāt na evam iti vaktavyam tatas saugataḥ na idam tattvam apramāṇika tvāt iti vadet eva atha naiyāyikena aprāmāṇika tvam asiddham iti vadatā katham iti saugate pṛṣṭavati kena pramāṇena svīyā pañca avayava kalpanā sādhyāḥ tad agocara tvāt na hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ kvāpi pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ na ca āgamena tad abhāvāt pañca avayava yuktasya vākyasya guṇa doṣa vit a iti bhārata ādi vākyam asti iti ced na saukṣmyam saṅkhayā kramaḥ ca eva nirṇayaḥ ca prayojanam a ityādinā tatra eva anyathā vyākhyāta tvāt na api upamāna abhāvābhyām niyata viṣaya tvāt naca artha āpattyā tad abhāvāt anupānān atiḥ ekāt ca iti 
NSu_2.1.54.4	 mā bhūt pratyakṣa ādinā avayava kalpanā siddhiḥ anumānena tu bhaviṣyati vyāpti pakṣa dharmatā upeta liṅga pratīteḥ pañca avayava vākya śravaṇa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt iti ced na tāvat idam anumānam tvad cetasi parivartamānam param pratyāyana aṅgam kinnāma prayujyamānam tatra kim pañca avayava prayogaḥ asya vidhāsyate atha dvaya vayavaḥ na ubhāvapi iti āha niyata iti 
NSu_2.1.57a.1–2.1.57a.3	 niyata avayava asiddhau niyata avayavasya pañca avayavasya dvayava yavasya ca yathāsaṅkhayam saugata naiyāyikayoḥ bodha aupayika tva asiddhau na anumānena api avayava kalpanā siddhiḥ iti śeṣaḥ yadvā uttara vākye niyata avayava asiddhau= iti anuvādaḥ ayam tatas niyata avayava āsiddheḥ iti siddhayati pañca avayava prayoge pareṇa ādhikya udbhāvanāt dvayava yava prayoge anyatara nyūna tva apasiddhāntayoḥ udbhāvanāt iti arthaḥ tatas kim iti atas āha vyāpti iti 
NSu_2.1.57bc.1–2.1.57bc.3	 vyāpti mātreṇa sādhanam kartavyam eva tena syāt yatas evam na upāya antaram tena kāraṇena tena naiyāyikena vyāpti mātreṇa yat i asya anyavavyatireka anuvidhatte tad tad kāryam ityādi vyāpti vacana mātreṇa eva upalakṣaṇam etat liṅga uktau a ityādi prāc vyutpādita prakāreṣu anyatamena iti api draṣṭavyam sādhanam pañca avayava niyamasya kartavyam syāt saugatena api tad anusaraṇīyam itarathā tasya api prayoga anupapatti prasaṅgāt iti tatas api kim iti atas āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_2.1.57d.1–2.1.57d.3	 tasmāt sā eva anumā matā yasmāt prayogeyattā sādhanam vādi prativādibhyām anyatareṇa vā sva mata parityāgena anya mata abhyupagame kṛtaḥ eva upapadyate na anyathā tasmāt sā eva anumāḥ matā vyāpti vacana ādikam eva para artha prayoga tvena sarvatra mantavyam idam uktam bhavati yadā naiyāyikaḥ dvayava yavena pañca avayava niyamam sādhayati tadā dvayava yavasya tāttvika tvam svayam manyate na vā na iti pakṣe pratārakaḥ syāt ādye anyatra api katham tat tatvam na syāt evam kathā bhāva prasaṅga bhīruḥ saugataḥ api pañca avayavena dvayava yavasya āvaśyaka tām pratipadyamānaḥ tattvam manyate na vā dvitīye katham tatas pratipadyeta ādye anyatra api kutas tat na tattvam atas atra sarva siddhānta prakārāṇām tāttvika tva ādi uktam sva siddhānta anusāreṇa iti asmāt eva saṅkaṭāt bibhyat udayanaḥ yathāvastu vaktavyam iti uktvā yathā siddhāntam vā vaktavyam iti samayam baddhvā pravṛttāyām kathāyām na nyūna ādi avatāraḥ iti pakṣa antaram avādīt iti avasitam anumānam 
NSu_2.1.57d.4–2.1.57d.5	 nirdoṣam vākyam āgamaḥ sa dvividhaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ apauruṣeyaḥ ca tatra apauruṣeyaḥ vedaḥ anyaḥ tu pauruṣeyaḥ iti su prasiddha tvāt na uktam kecid vākyam vākya arthe anumānam iti bruvate tad anupapannam vākya vākya arthayoḥ deśataḥ kālataḥ vā anvaya vyatireka abhāvāt atha idam vākyam vākya atharvat vākya tvāt iti sādhyate tatra kim vākya artha mātram sādhyate tad viśeṣaḥ vā na ādyaḥ viśeṣa pramiteḥ nirnibandhanatva āpatteḥ dvitīye sa viśeṣaḥ pratītaḥ na vā ādye vākya vaiyarthyam dvitīye aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā viśeṣasya anyatra abhāvāt anaikāntyam ca matu bārthaḥ ca kim pratipādya pratipādaka bhāvaḥ sambandha antaram vā ādye sākṣāt liṅga tayā vā na prathamaḥ anumāna vaiyarthyāt apasiddhāntāt ca dvitīye tu na idam vākya artha anumānam kintu siddhe arthe vākyasya liṅgatā anumānam eva tatra ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ anyatara sādhya vikalaḥ na dvitīyaḥ tad abhāvena bādhāt 
NSu_2.1.57d.6	 atha evam prayujyate vivāda adhyasitāni padāni svasmārita artha anvaya pramiti pūrvakāṇi ākāṅkṣa ādimat pada tvāt iti tat ayuktam vinā api anvaya pramitim daivāt prayukteṣu ākāṅkṣa ādimatsu padeṣu anaikāntyāt āpta prayukta tvena hetu viśeṣaṇe sādhya arthasya hetu arthe praveśa āpatteḥ puruṣa viśeṣa prayukta tvasya adhyāpaka prayukteṣu vyabhicārāt mūla pramānu māne api vedeṣu anupapatteḥ tad apauruṣeya tvasya sādhita tvāt 
NSu_2.1.57d.7–2.1.57d.8	 apare tu apauruṣeyasya āgama tvam upagamya pauruṣeyasya anumāna tvam abhyupagacchanti teṣām tu sphuṭaḥ vede vyabhicāraḥ kiñca padānām anvita abhidhāne śaktiḥ padāni eva ca vākyam na ca vaidika padebhyaḥ anyāni eva laukikāni padāni vaktā tu pada jñānaḥ eva upayujyate tat katham loka vedayoḥ prakāra bhedaḥ syāt api ca veda anusāreṇa paṭhyamāneṣu laukika vākyeṣu katham anvaya pratītiḥ utpadyate eva kinnāma punar pauruṣeya tva jñānāt apanīyate iti evam tarhi vākyāt eva vākya atharjñānam tad prāmāṇya niścayāya tu vaktra ādi anusaraṇam iti āyātam iti āstām tat evam sāmānyatas viśeṣataḥ ca pramāṇāni lakṣitāni tatra svīya sāmānya lakṣaṇa samarthanena arthāt vādi antara ukta sāmānya lakṣaṇāni nirastāni eva tathā api smṛti viṣaye vaktavya śeṣasya vidyamāna tvāt prābhākara lakṣaṇam viśeṣataḥ nirākaroti anubhūtiḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.58ab.1–2.1.58ab.2	 anubhūtiḥ pramāṇam ced kena smṛtiḥ apa udyate tadā vaktavyam smṛtiḥ pramā na vā ādye apasiddhāntaḥ a iti śeṣaḥ dvitīye tu āha kena iti yadi smṛtiḥ na pramā tadā smṛtiḥ lakṣaṇena vyāvartanīyāḥ anyathā ativyāpteḥ tat kutas smṛtiḥ apa udyate vyāvartyate smṛtiḥ vyāvartakam na kim api lakṣaṇe asti iti yāvat 
NSu_2.1.58ab.3	 nanu anubhūtiḥ iti uktaḥ eva smṛtau= aprasaṅgaḥ smṛti vyatiriktam jñānam anubhūtiḥ iti abhidhānāt nahi smṛtiḥ smṛti vyatiriktā bhavati iti mā evam smṛteḥ api smṛti antara vyatirikta tva sambhavena avyavacchedaka tvāt smṛti tva anadhikaraṇam jñānam anubhūtiḥ iti ced kim idam smṛti tvam na tāvat jātiḥ guṇeṣu jāteḥ anaṅgīkṛta tvāt saṃskāra mātra janya jñāna tvam tu na sambhavati adṛṣṭa ādi janya tvāt asādhāraṇa kāraṇa vivakṣāyām api tathā smṛteḥ mānasa tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt etena niyamena pratyutpanna asā dhāraṇa kāraṇaka pratyagra tvam anubhūti tvam iti api avacchedakam draṣṭavyam smṛteḥ api mānasa pratyakṣa janyāyāḥ tathā tvāt saṃskārasya kāraṇa tve api na asau sattā mātreṇa smṛtim janayati kinnāma udbuddhaḥ eva tathā ca katham na pratyutpanna asā dhāraṇa kāraṇa janya tvam anyathā indriya ādi mātram upādāya anubhūteḥ api tad nirākuryāt kiñca smṛtiḥ api kācid pratyutpanna saṃskāra janyā sambhavati eva naca avacchedakena vinā niyamaḥ jñātum śakyate iti 
NSu_2.1.58ab.4	 yat vā anubhūtiḥ pramāṇam ced tadā smṛtau= avyāptiḥ iti śeṣaḥ nanu smṛtiḥ pramāṇam eva na bhavati tat katham tatra avyāpti doṣaḥ iti atas āha kena iti smṛtiḥ kena nimittena apodyate pramāṇāt bahis kriyate na kena api iti arthaḥ tathā hi kim ayathārtha tvāt yāthārthye api ananubhūti tvāt vā aprāmāṇye bādhaka abhāvāt vā prāmāṇye sādhaka abhāvāt bādhaka sadbhāvāt vā ādyam dūṣayati kena iti smṛtiḥ kena prabalena pramāṇena apodyate bādhyate yena yathārthāḥ na syāt bādhaka abhāvāt na ayathārtha tvam vācyam iti dvitīyam nirākaroti kena iti kim anubhūti tvam pramāṇa lakṣaṇam iti kṛtvā ananubhūti tvāt smṛtiḥ apramāṇam iti ucyate kim vā ghaṭa ādi dṛṣṭānta avaṣṭambhena ādye anyonya āśraya tvam tathā ca kena smṛtiḥ apa udyate dvitīye api smṛtiḥ eva kena apodyate asmṛti tvena anubhūtiḥ kutas na apodyate viśeṣa abhāvāt iti tṛtīyam apākaroti pūrva iti 
NSu_2.1.58cd.1–2.1.58cd.4	 pūrva anubhūte kim mānam iti ukte syāt kim uttaram yadi smṛtiḥ apramāṇam syāt tadā pūrva anubhūte kim mānam iti praśnaḥ niruttaraḥ syāt smṛti vyatiriktasya tad pramāṇasya abhāvāt tathā ca sākṣī ādi loka vyavahāraḥ lupyeta smṛtiḥ eva pramāṇam kintu liṅgatayā iti ced na tathā anubhava abhāvāt anyathā sākṣātkāreṇa kāryeṇa karma kāraka tayā ghaṭa anumānam iti api syāt caturtham pratyāha pūrva iti smṛtiḥ iti eva hi vaktavyam vacanāt ca anubhavaḥ anumīyate iti loka vyavahāraḥ eva atra pramāṇam iti arthaḥ nanu yadi smṛtiḥ pramā syāt tadā tad kāraṇasya saṃskārasya anupramāṇa tvam prasajyeta tathā ca anupramāṇa tri tvam bhajyeta na hi saṃskāraḥ pratyakṣa ādiṣu antarbhavati anindriya sannikarṣa tvāt ajñāta karaṇa tvāt ca iti pañcamam apākaroti mānasam iti 
NSu_2.1.59a.1–2.1.59b.3	 mānasam tat hi vijñānam hi yasmāt tad smaraṇam mānasam manaḥ pratyakṣa jam na saṃskāra karaṇakam tatas na ukta doṣaḥ iti śeṣaḥ asākṣātkāra rūpa tvāt na pratyakṣa phala tvam iti atas uktam vijñānam iti sākṣātkāraḥ iti arthaḥ smaraṇasya mānasatvam sākṣātkāra tvam ca kutas iti atas āha tat ca iti  tat ca sākṣi pramāṇakam tat iti mānasatvam caśabdāt sākṣātkāra tvam ca yat vā dvayam api tad śabdena parāmṛśyate prakṛta anusandhāna arthaḥ ca śabdaḥ nanu indriyāṇām prāpya kāri tva niyamāt atītena ca manasaḥ prāpteḥ ayogāt katham smṛteḥ mānasa pratyakṣa ja tvam iti atas āha atīta iti 
NSu_2.1.59c–2.1.59f.2	 atīta anāgatam yadvat yogibhiḥ dṛśyate añjasā evam pūrva anubhūtam ca manasā eva avagamyate santi tāvat yoginaḥ aṇima ādi siddhi sampannāḥ atīta anāgata darśinaḥ śruti smṛti itihāsa purāṇa prasiddhāḥ śruti ādeḥ siddhārthe prāmāṇyasya sādhita tvāt karma vidhi samāna yogakṣema tvāt ca yoga vidhīnām na ca tad jñānam asākṣātkāraḥ śruti ādinā sākṣātkāra tva pratīteḥ tathā hi śrutiḥ apaśyam apyaye māyayā viśvakarmaṇi adaḥ jagat nihitam śubhra cakṣuḥ a iti purāṇam canārāyaṇa prasādena a ityādi itihāsaḥ api divyam dadāmi te cakṣuḥ a ityādi tat idam uktam añjasā iti sākṣāt iti arthaḥ evañca yathā yoginām indriyeṇa eva atīta anāgata atharsa akṣātkāraḥ tathā atītam api manasā smaryate iti kaḥ doṣaḥ 
NSu_2.1.59c–2.1.59f.3	 nanu indriyasya artha prāptiḥ nāma na saṃyogaḥ samavāyaḥ vā iti niyamaḥ kintu pratyāsatti mātram asti ca tad yogi indriyāṇām tad tad upadarśaka yoga ja dharma saha kṛta tva lakṣaṇam iti ced evam tarhi manasaḥ api pūrva anubhava janita saṃskāra sācivya lakṣaṇa astyatīta arthena pratyāsattiḥ iti āśayavatā uktam pūrva anubhūtam ca iti 
NSu_2.1.59c–2.1.59f.5	 etat uktam bhavati yadi prāptiḥ saṃyoga ādi lakṣaṇā vivakṣitā tadā tad abhāvaḥ anaikāntikaḥ pratyāsatti mātra vivakṣāyām tu asiddhiḥ iti dṛṣṭānta kathanam tu pratyāsatti mātrasya sākṣātkāra hetutām sambhāvayitum kārya darśana vaśāt ceyam kalpanā asau na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti darśayitum ca etena mānasam ced smaraṇam syāt na saṃskāra jam tadā ananubhūte api utpadyeta iti parāḥ tam saṃskārasya sannikarṣa sthānīya tayā aṅgīkṛta tvāt yat smṛteḥ mānasa tvam sākṣi siddham iti uktam tad abhinayena darśayati vijñātam iti 
NSu_2.1.60a–2.1.60c.3	 vijñātam manasā pūrvam mayā etat kṛtam iti api sākṣāt anubhavāt siddham etat mayā pūrvam kṛtam iti etat mayā manasā vijñātam smṛtam api iti smaraṇasya mānasatvam sākṣāt anubhavāt sākṣī anubhavena siddham iti yat uktam paraiḥ pūrva anubhava avacchinna artha gocarā smṛtiḥ tad ya athārthya ādikam anuvidadhānāḥ na svayam yathārtha iti tat asat anubhavavat śuddha artha viṣaya tvasya api sākṣi siddha tvāt iti darśayitum mayā etat kṛtam iti api iti uktam 
NSu_2.1.60a–2.1.60cd.2	 nanu manasaḥ apratyakṣa tvāt katham smaraṇasya mānasa tā sākṣi pratyakṣa gamya iti ced na tasya sākṣi vedya tāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇa tvāt tathā api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na pratyakṣaḥ iti ced anvaya vyatireka sacivasya sākṣiṇaḥ tatra prāmāṇya abhyupagamāt jñānam nitya anumeyam iti ced na jñāta tāyāḥ nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt sva prakāśam iti ced na anātva tvāt ghaṭa vat mānasa vedya tā tu nirasiṣyate iti āśayavān āha katham eva iti  katham eva hi apodyate yāthārthyam eva ityādinā uktasya prakṛta upayogam āha evam iti 
NSu_2.1.61.1–2.1.61.3	 evam lakṣaṇake māna traye brahma ādi vastuṣu pramāṇam vedaḥ eva ekaḥ yasmāt māna trayam evaṃlakṣaṇakam tasmāt brahma ādi vastuṣu vedaḥ eva pramāṇam na yukti ādeḥ tatra avakāśaḥ indriyam hi rūpa ādimati eva dravye pravata ṛte na ca brahma ādikam tathā anumānam ca vyāpti sāpekṣam na ca veda nirapekṣasya tasya brahma ādau sañcāraḥ asti upādhi pratipakṣayoḥ tu sarvatra sambhavena vyāpti a niścayāt veda anusaraṇe tu sādhya avyāpaka tva bādhita viṣaya tvayoḥ āvaśyaka tvāt pauruṣeya āgamaḥ tu paratantraḥ eva iti tatas kim iti atas āha tad prāmāṇyam ca iti 
NSu_2.1.61d.1–2.1.61d.5	 tat prāmāṇyam ca sādhitam yasmāt veda viṣaye na yukteḥ avakāśaḥ tatas virodhaḥ api saḥ eva uktaḥ iti upapannam tathā ca vedasya pramāṇa virodha abhāvāt tat prāmāṇyam ca sādhitam yat uktam prāk tasmāt veda prāmāṇyam iṣyate a iti tat siddham iti arthaḥ abhimāni vyapadeśaḥ tu viśeṣa anugatibhyām yukti antara virodham vedasya parihartum idam ārabhyate syāt etat yukti virodhāḥ kim pratyekam pariharaṇīyāḥ a uta upalakṣaṇayā na ādyaḥ nirasanīya yukti ābhāsā ānantyena śāstra aparyavasāna prasaṅgāt sūtra tva vyāghātāt ca dvitīye tu anārambhaḥ eva asya adhikaraṇasya nirantara atīta adhikaraṇena eva upalakṣaṇayā sakala yukti virodhānām parihṛta tvāt iti mā evam abhyadhika śaṅkā asadbhāvena tad upapatteḥ iti āśayavān pūrva pakṣam tāvat āha tathā api iti abhimāni vyapadeśaḥ tu viśeṣa anugatibhyām 
NSu_2.1.62.1–2.1.62.2	 tathā api mṛd jala ādīnām buddhi vāc ādi vācakaḥ dṛṣṭa vyāpti viruddha tvāt tatra mānam katham bhavet yadi api phala vyabhicāra ādi virodhaḥ vedasya parihṛtaḥ tathā api iti arthaḥ mṛd jala ādīnām ityādi padena tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām grahaṇam buddhiḥ jñānam vāc vaktṛ tva jn ādi grahaṇena śrotṛ tva ādikam vedaḥ iti anuvartate dṛṣṭā pramitā vyāptiḥ yasyāḥ yukteḥ sā tathā uktā vyāpti grahaṇam pakṣa dharma tāyāḥ api upalakṣaṇam kvacid tad niyama anabhyupagamāt sva śabdena asaṅkīrtanam tayā viruddha tvāt tatra mṛd jala ādīnām buddhi vāc ādau katham iti ākṣepe pratipādya antaram tu na asti apratīteḥ iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_2.1.62.3	 etat uktam bhavati mṛd abravīt āpaḥ abruvan tat tejaḥ aikṣata tāḥ āpaḥ aikṣanta ṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ viduṣaḥ anuprāṇāḥ aham śreyasi vyūdire āpaḥ vai akāmayanta a iti ādi vedaḥ tāvat na pramāṇam yukti viruddha artha abhidhāyi tvāt nīlam nabhaḥ iti vat mṛd jala ādīnām buddhi vāc ādimat tvam khalu asya arthaḥ sa ca vimatā mṛd na vaktrī mṛd tvāt sampratipanna mṛdvat ityādi yukti viruddhaḥ tathā ca veda vākya antare api aprāmāṇyam anumāsyate 
NSu_2.1.62.4^1	 nanuna vilakṣaṇa tvāt a iti anena eva nyāyena ayam api virodhaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ mā evam nyāya sañcāra aviṣaya tvāt tatra hi yathā ukta anuṣṭhāne api phala vyabhicāraḥ ced hetuḥ tadā apātataḥ tāvat sandigdha viśeṣaṇā siddhiḥ kartṛ ādi vaiguṇyasya api sambhavāt nitya tvena veda prāmāṇyasya sthitau tu viśeṣaṇā siddhi niścayaḥ eva phala vyabhicāra mātrasya hetu tve tu anaikāntika tvam iti evam vyāpti pakṣa dharma tā viraha vyutpādanena yukti virodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ na ca asyāḥ yukteḥ vyāpti ādi aṅga vaikalyam sambaddham prasiddha mṛd ā ādau tathā upalambhāt 
NSu_2.1.62.4^2	 na ca tatra api buddhayā ādi sadbhāvaḥ kadāpi tad kāryasya ādaśarnāt na api sambaddham api vyabhicīrṇam vyabhicāra anupalambhāt naca anupalambha māna vyabhicāram api sa upādhikam upādheḥ anirūpaṇāt buddhayā ādimattve ca mṛd ādīnām śarīra indriya vat tā api syāt akaraṇaka kriyā darśanāt na ca tat yuktam indriya ādīnām api vaktṛ tva ādi vat adarśanāt tatas anukūla tarka sanāthena upādhi vyabhicāra anupalambha saha kṛtena saha bhāga grāhakeṇa pramāṇena siddhā mṛd tva ādīnām avaktṛ tva ādinā vyāptiḥ na ca mṛd ādiṣu mṛdādi tvam na asti iti yuktam vyāghātāt mṛd abravīt iti ādi prayogāt ca tatas pakṣa dharma tā api siddhā eva iti 
NSu_2.1.62.5–2.1.62.9	 nanu ca nitya tayā vedasya prāmāṇye vyavasthite tad viruddhāyāḥ yukteḥ eva aprāmāṇyam ucitam iti mā evam vyāpti pakṣa dharmatā upetāyāḥ yukteḥ api niravakāśa tvāt tatas ca sat pratipakṣa tayā niścāyaka tva abhāvena aprāmāṇyam vedasya nanu prasiddha mṛd ā ādi pakṣīkāre siddha sādhana tā pakṣa sa pakṣa bheda abhāvaḥ ca sa pakṣa antara svīkāre tatra mṛd tva ādi abhāvaḥ jaḍa tvasya hetūkaraṇe tu asiddhiḥ syāt tasmāt ādi ka ālīnam mṛdā ādikam pakṣayitavyam na ca tat pratyakṣa ādi siddham iti vedaḥ eva upajīvyaḥ tathā ca dharmi grāhaka pramāṇa virodhāt aprāmāṇyam yukteḥ iti ced na vyāpti ādimatyāḥ tad asambhavāt ādi kālīna mṛd ā ādi svarūpa para vākya antareṇa paridṛśyamāna kārya liṅgena dharmi graha upapatteḥ etena vaidike arthe yukteḥ avakāśa abhāvāt na tad virodhaka tvam iti apāstam tat evam mṛd abravīt iti ādi veda vākyānām yukti viruddha tvena aprāmāṇye veda tva atyatas vā imāni a ityādi vākyānām api aprāmāṇyāt na veda samanvayena brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tva siddhiḥ iti siddhāntam āha tatas iti 
NSu_2.1.63.1–2.1.63.3	 tatas tad nāmakaḥ kaścid pumān anyaḥ bhavet iti yuktayā āgama avirodhena prāptam atra abhidhīyate vedasya yukteḥ ca niravakāśa tvam tatas iti parāmṛśati tad nāmakaḥ mṛd ādi nāmakaḥ kaścid iti asmad ādi atīndriya tvam abhipraiti pumān= cetanaḥ anyaḥ asmad ādi vilakṣaṇaḥ antardhāna ādi śaktimān bhavet asyām śrutau vaktṛ tva ādinā pratipādyate iti śeṣaḥ iti śabdasya prāptam iti anena anvayaḥ prāptam pramitam yukti āgama virodhena iti arthāpattim sūcayati tatas ca ayam arthaḥ na mṛd abravīt ityādi vākyānām yukti virodhena aprāmāṇyam vaktavyam atra mṛdādi śabdasya cetana viṣaya tvāt tathā ca tad pakṣīkāre hetoḥ asiddheḥ śabda mātreṇa hetu tve atiprasaṅgāt acetana mṛd ādi pakṣīkāre ca prakṛta avirodhāt 
NSu_2.1.63.4	 nanu katham cetaneṣu mṛd ādi śabda vṛttiḥ abhidhāna śaktyā iti brūmaḥ mṛd ādi abhimāni tvāt pṛthivī ādiṣu tad abhimata tvena mṛdādi śabda pravṛttiḥ nanu ete abhimāninaḥ kim abhimata artha vyāpinaḥ tad eka deśa vṛttayaḥ vā ādye sa dehāḥ videhāḥ vā ādye tad upalambha prasaṅgaḥ dvitīye teṣām indriya abhāvena vaktṛ tva ādi anupapattau punar yukti virodha tādavasthyam tṛtīye tad vaiyarthyam tad anadhiṣṭhita pradeśa vat pradeśa antara pravṛtti sambhavāt iti mā evam vyāpakānām sa dehānām api piśāca ādi vat antardhāna śakti yogāt adṛśya tva upapatteḥ 
NSu_2.1.63.5	 nanu evam sati kalpanā gauravam āpadyeta keṣāñcid cetanānām mṛd ādi abhimāni tvam tatas tad śabdānām teṣu vṛviḥ vyāpaka tvam sa deha tvam antardhāna śaktiḥ tatpara tā ca śruteḥ iti anekasya kalpyamāna tvāt mā evam arthāpattitaḥ sarvasya asya siddha tvāt śrutiḥ hi mṛd ādīnām vaktṛ tva ādikam pratipādayati yuktiḥ ca tad abhāvam navāstavaḥ virodhaḥ sambhavati vastu vikalpa āpatteḥ naca ayam virodhaḥ vinā etat kalpanayā śāmyati jaḍa svīkāre yukti virodhāt anabhimāni svīkāre ca pṛthak śabda śaktau pramāṇa abhāvāt avyāpaka tva ādi aṅgīkāre ca ukta anupapatteḥ na ca śruti yuktyoḥ anyatarā prāmāṇyena api upapadyate etat iti vācyam ukta rītyā dvayoḥ api niravakāśa tvāt na hi pareṇa api vidveṣeṇa eva āgama aprāmāṇyam abhidhātum yuktam kinnāma upapattim āśritya eva tathā ca katham veda prāmāṇye api na dīyate dṛṣṭiḥ tat evam yukti āgama virodhena asya arthasya prāpta tvāt na kiñcid kalpanā gauravam iti 
NSu_2.1.63.6–2.1.63.8	 nanu etat utsūtritam katham ucyate iti atas āha atra iti iti uktam etat sarvam atraabhimāni vyapadeśaḥ tu viśeṣa anugatibhyām iti a sūtre abhidhīyate iti arthaḥ yat vā atra abhidhīyate iti siddhānta upakrama vākyam tasya evam prāpte sūtra kṛtā samādhānam abhidhīyate iti arthaḥ evam sūtram avatārya tatas ityādinā vyākhyātam iti yat uktam tat nāmakaḥ iti mṛdādi śabda vācya tvam devatāyāḥ tad anupapannam ayogāt anuyogāt ca mṛd ādi śabdāḥ khalu acetaneṣu eva rūḍhāḥ na devatāyām lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇena api śruti yukti virodha śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati na api vacana vṛttim sūtra kṛt āha iti atas āha bāla rūḍhim iti 
NSu_2.1.68.1–2.1.65a.2	 yatra tatra katham vastu nirṇayaḥ syāt i ti īrite virodhi yukti bāhulyāt iti nyāyaḥ viniścitaḥ santi ete pṛthivī varuṇa ādayaḥ tad tad nāmānaḥ eva santi tāni tāni mṛd ādīni nāmāni vācakāni yeṣām te tathā uktāḥ na tu tāni lakṣakāṇi iti eva śabda arthaḥ santi bhavanti ayoga parihārāya uktam bālā iti avidvat rūḍhyabhāve api vidvat rūḍhi sadbhāvāt mṛdādi śabdāḥ tāvat devatā viṣayāḥ iti arthāpatti siddham mukhyā sambhavaḥ eva ca jaghanya vṛttiḥ āśrayaṇīyāḥ na ca atra bādhakam asti iti vaidika prayogāt eva bādhaka abhāva sahitāt vidvat rūḍhiḥ avagamyate yat ca uktam vacana vṛtti aṅgīkāraḥ prakṛta anupayogī iti tat parihārāya uktam tat tad mṛda ādi vastu abhimāninaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.65a.3	 ayam arthaḥ mṛdādi śabdānām cetana viṣaya tā mātreṇa prakṛta virodha śāntau= api vastu sthitim vijijñāpayiṣatā sūtrakāreṇa vyapadeśaḥ tu iti tuśabdena mukhya vṛttiḥ sūcitā tatra upapatti jñāpanāya abhimāni iti ca uktam anyathā cenana vyapadeśaḥ iti avakṣyat abhimānī khalu abhimatasya sattā ādeḥ prayojakaḥ tatas ca tad adhīna tvāt iti nyāyena saḥ eva mukhya arthaḥ iti tat etat asmābhiḥ sūtram vyākurvadbhiḥ abhihitam iti 
NSu_2.1.65a.4–2.1.65a.5	 nanu atra tad nāmakaḥ iti eka vacanam prakramya tat tad nāmānaḥ iti bahuvacana prayoge kinnimittam tathā bhāṣye api abhimāni devatā tatra vyapadiśyate tāsām ca a ityādi ucyate abhimāni vyapadeśaḥ iti abhimāni śabdaḥ hi ekavacana antar samastaḥ vyapadeśa śabdasya eka vacana anta tvāt na hi bahūnām ekaḥ vyapadeśaḥ iti sambhavati uttara sūtre ca eka vacanam eva atas yathāsūtram prathamam vyākhyātam atha idānīm prāṇa saṃvādi ghaṭanāya jātau= idam eka vacanam iti āśayavatā bahuvacanam prayuktam iti abhimāninām prādeśika tva videha tvayoḥ vaiyarthya vaktṛ tva ādi anupapattī vyāptānām sa deha tve anupalambha bādhaḥ iti etat parihārāya viśeṣa anugatibhyām iti sūtra khaṇḍam kaścid anyaḥ iti tātparyataḥ vyākhyātam tat prapañcayati teṣām iti 
NSu_2.1.65ab.1–2.1.65ab.3	 teṣām viśeṣeṇa śaktiḥ anyebhyaḥ ucyate viśeṣeṇa atiśayena anyebhyaḥ asmad ādibhyaḥ vyāptiḥ ca ucyate iti sambandhaḥ dehavat tvasya api upalakṣaṇam etat yadi api etat sarvam artha āpattyā eva labdham anyathā virodha śānteḥ eva apayarva sānāt tathā api ucyate iti pṛthivī ādi abhimāninyaḥ iti āgamam api atra saṃvādinam darśayati yadi api atra ākāṅkṣa anusāreṇa vyāptim ādau= uktvā śakti viśeṣaḥ anantaram abhidhātavyaḥ tathā api alpa āctarasya pūrva nipātam anusṛtya pravṛttam sūtram anugacchatā kramaḥ bhagnaḥ nanu ca pṛthivī ādi abhimāninyaḥ iti vākyam katham upādeyam aātmani ca evam vicitrāḥ ca hi a utkrānti gatyā gatīnām iti ādi a āgāmi sūtreṇa acintya śakteḥ sarva gata tvasya ca viruddha tvāt iti atas āha ukta anusāreṇa iti 
NSu_2.1.65c.1–2.1.65c.3	 vyāptiḥ ca ukta anusāreṇa ātmani ca evam iti ādi ukta anusāreṇa śaktiḥ vyāptiḥ ca ucyate iti anvayaḥ syāt ayam virodhaḥ yadi śaktiḥ vyāptiḥ ca niravadhikātra ucyate na ca evam pramāṇa antara anusāreṇa antardhāna ādi śakteḥ abhimata artha vyāpteḥ ca pratipādyata aṅgīkārāt iti evam asmad ādi apekṣayā abhimāninām anupalambham aṅgīkṛtya tad bādhaḥ parihṛtaḥ idānīm asiddhaḥ ca asau= iti āha dṛśyante ca iti 
NSu_2.1.65d.1–2.1.65d.4	 dṛśyante ca ādhikāribhiḥ adhikāribhiḥ antarhita artha darśana samarthaiḥ yogibhiḥ etat ca udāhṛta smṛti siddham etena adṛśyate ca a iti sūtram vyākhyātam bhavati ye tu mīmāṃsakaṃmanyā vigrahavatī devatām na sahante te api anena eva nirastāḥ bhavanti arthāpattyā pratyakṣeṇa ca tad siddheḥ samarthitam ca āgamānām siddhārthe prāmāṇyam anupalambhaḥ anekatra yugapad sannidhānam ca śakti viśeṣāt upapadyate piśāca ādi vat na ca piśāca ādayaḥ api na santi mantra auṣadha ādinā asmad ādibhiḥ api upalabhyamāna tvāt artha kriyayā saṃvādena ca prāmāṇya upapatteḥ vakṣyati ca sūtra kāra udeva ādivat a iti uktvā tatra api vipratipannam pratiapi lokaḥ a iti kiñca indra agni varuṇa ādi padam kasyacid vācakam padatvāt go pada vat naca acetana mātre tad prayogaḥ asti na ca cetanaḥ muktaḥ pralīnaḥ vā tad vācyaḥ jagat vaya apāra sambandhini api prayogāt naca asau vigraha vidhuraḥ sambhavati iti alam 
NSu_2.1.65d.5	 nanu tathā api mṛd abravīt iti ādi vedasya ābodhaka tva lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam durnivāram tathā hi yadi api vākyatā āpannāni padāni vākya artham padārthānām anyonya saṃsarga viśeṣa rūpam apūrvam eva avagamayanti tathā api padārthaiḥ vācya vācaka bhāva rūpa sambandha pratipatti lakṣaṇām vyutpattim apekṣante anvaya vyatirekābhyām tathā avadhāraṇāt na ca mṛdā ādi śabdānām pṛthivī ādiṣu devatāsu vyutpatti ssambhavati sambandhasya sambandhi jñāna sāpekṣa tvāt pratisambandhi rūpāyāḥ ca devatāyāḥ pratyakṣeṇa duradhigama tvāt liṅga abhāvena anumāna ayogāt na ca śabdataḥ tad avagamaḥ satyām vyutpattau śabdataḥ devatā gamaḥ sati ca tasmin vyutpattiḥ iti paraspara āśraya tvāt na ca śabda viśeṣasya agṛhīta saṅgatikasya eva bodhaka tvam adṛṣṭa kalpanā prasaṅgāt yadi api dṛśyate ca iti uktam tathā api asmad ādīnām vyutpati anupapattiḥ eva devatā darśanam tu yoginām veda artha jñāna uttara bhāvanā janyam aṅgīkriyate iti na vyutpatti hetuḥ lakṣaṇā api vācya artha darśanam vinā anupapannā eva iti atas āha śāstra uktā iti 
NSu_2.1.66ab.1–2.1.66ab.2	 śāstra ukta vastunaḥ ca eva vyutpattiḥ śāstra liṅgataḥ caśabdaḥ api arthaḥ eva śabdaḥ sāmarthyāt śāstra śabdena sambandhanīyaḥ śāstra eka samadhigamya vastunaḥ iti pratyakṣa ādi agamyāyāḥ api devatāyāḥ iti yāvat vastunaḥ vyutpattiḥ ati mṛdādi śabdasya tad sambandhi vācaka tva pratipattiḥ iti arthaḥ yujyate iti śeṣaḥ anena ca eva śabdasya sambandhaḥ śāstra liṅgataḥ tad jñāna sambhavāt iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_2.1.66ab.3–2.1.66ab.4	 yat vā śāstra ukta vastunaḥ api śāstra liṅgataḥ adhigati sambhavāt tatra śabdasya vyutpattiḥ yujyate iti yojanā devatāyāḥ iti vaktavye śāstra ukta vastunaḥ ca iti vacanam śaṅkā anuvāda rūpam śāstram eva liṅgam śāstra liṅgam mṛd abravīt iti ādi śāstrāt eva upapatti virodha sahitān mṛdā ādi śabda vācya tayā eva devatā svarūpam avagamyate iti 
NSu_2.1.66ab.5–2.1.66ab.6	 yat vā śāstram taiḥ taiḥ praṇītam tad sadbhāve liṅgam na hi vedāt anyat vākyam vaktāram antareṇa upapadyate tatas ca vacana liṅga anumite vaktari vṛddhaiḥ anyān prati mṛd ādi śabdāḥ śakya vyutpādanāḥ yat vā śāstram śāsanam varṣaṇa ādi upalakṣaṇam etat na hi varṣaṇa ādi kriyā vikartṛkā sambhavati tathā ca tayā anumite katarri śakyante eva vṛddhaiḥ śabdāḥ vyutpādayitum 
NSu_2.1.66ab.7	 athavā śāstra uktam liṅgam avyabhicaritaḥ dharmaḥ śāstra liṅgam pāśa hasta tva sahasra akṣa tva ādi śāstra ukta tad tad devatā lakṣaṇāni upādāya vyutpādanam śakyam eva yathā khalu loke yathā mudgaḥ tathā mudgaparṇī yathā māṣaḥ tathā māṣaparṇī dīrghagrīvā ādimān paśuḥ uṣṣaḥ iti lakṣaṇāni upādāya mudgaparṇī ityārdi śabdāḥ vyutpādyante tathā yaḥ pāśa hasta tva ādimān saḥ abādi śabda arthaḥ iti vyutpādanam su vacanam eva pāśa ādi śabdāḥ tu lokataḥ eva gṛhīta saṅgatayaḥ samāsasya vākya tvena vyutpatti anapekṣa tvam iti na kaścid virodhaḥ 
NSu_2.1.66ab.8–2.1.66ab.9	 na kevalam mṛd ādi śabda anām ayam vyutpatti prakāraḥ kinnāmā atīndriye dharma ādau= api tatas ca evam veda prāmāṇyam ākṣipataḥ atīndriya atharvī avahāra mātra vilaya prasaṅgaḥ iti sūcayitum śāstra ukta vastunaḥ ca iti sāmānyena uktam evam tarhi kuṭilikā iyam vyutpattiḥ dubarlā sākṣātkṛte tu mṛd ādau= eva prabalā tatas ca devatānām mukhya pratipādya tvam iti ayuktam kintu mṛd ādīnām eva vyutpatti anusāri tvāt pratipādanasya iti atas āha vyutpattiḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.66cd.1–2.1.66cd.3	 vyutpattiḥ sā balavatī mūrkha vyutpattitāḥ hi yat sā iti yā vidita śabda śaktibhiḥ vṛddhaiḥ śāstra liṅgataḥ sampāditā mūrkhaiḥ avidita śaktibhiḥ vyutpāditā vyutpattiḥ mūrkha vyutpattiḥ hi śabdaḥ hetu sūcakaḥ na hi vyutpatti viṣayasya parokṣa tvam aparokṣa tvam ca vyutpatteḥ daiḥ balye prābalye ca kāraṇam api tarhi vyutpādakasya śakti tattva jñattvam tad anusāreṇa vyutpādanam prābalye anyat tu daurbalye anyathā ekhaṇḍe sākṣātkṛte candana śabdasya vyutpattiḥ prabalāḥ liṅgataḥ api jñāpite candane dubarla iti syāt asti ca idam kāraṇam prakṛte iti iyam eva prabalā na itarā iti yat yasmāt eva etat tasmāt tat tad nāmānaḥ eva ete iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ nanu etat ayuktam yat yukti virodhena vedasya sva arthāt pracyāvanam tasya sakala pramāṇa apekṣayā ca prābalyam yat kvacid svārthāt pracyāvanam tad upajīvya virodhaḥ eva na ca atra tathā iti atas āha dṛḍha iti 
NSu_2.1.67ab.1–2.1.67ab.2	 dṛḍha yukti virodhe tu sarvatra nyāya īdṛśaḥ virodhe vedasya iti śeṣaḥ ayam bhāvaḥ śruteḥ artha pracyāvanasya ayukta tām vadataḥ kaḥ abhisandhiḥ kim viruddhayoḥ eva aprāmāṇya muta āgama viruddhāyāḥ yukteḥ aprāmāṇyam na ādyaḥ vastu vikalpa prasaṅgāt na dvitīyaḥ vyāpti pakṣa dharmatā upetāyāḥ tad ayogāt katham tarhi upajīvya virodhe tu iti ādi uktam iti ced upalakṣaṇa tvena iti brūmaḥ upajīvyam khalu na upajīvyam iti eva bādhakam kintu prabala tvena tat yadi yukti antarasya api syāt tadā kutas na bādhaka tā iti yat vā adhikaraṇa upādhimanena āha na kevalam atra udāharaṇe kintu sarvatra api veda vākye pramita vyāpti pakṣa dharma tāvat yakti virodhe satī dṛśa eva anyathā artha svīkāreṇa virodha parihāraḥ nyāyaḥ prakāraḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.67ab.3–2.1.67ab.4	 asat iti ced na pratiṣedha mātra tvāt nanu cana ārambhaṇīyam eva idam adhikaraṇam na vilakṣaṇa tvāt a iti anena eva vedasya sakala yukti virodhānām parihṛta tatvāt dṛḍha yukti virodha parihārasya ca abhimāni adhikaraṇa nyāya siddha tvāt iti atas gata artha tām pariharan= adhikaraṇasya upādhim āha alpa vākya iti asat iti ced na pratiṣedha mātra tvāt 
NSu_2.1.67cd.1–2.1.68.2	 alpa vākya yutā yuktiḥ bahulā eva virodhinī yatra tatra katham vastu nirṇayaḥ syāt i ti īrite virodhi yukti bāhulyāt iti nyāyaḥ viniścitaḥ yatra yadā vedasya vākya yutā yuktiḥ virodhinī syāt tatra tadā vastu nirṇayaḥ katham syāt iti pūrva pakṣiṇa īrite sati tad virodhi yuktīnām bāhulyāt prābalyāt vastu nirṇayaḥ bhavet iti siddhāntaḥ iti eṣaḥ atra adhikaraṇe nyāyaḥ viniścitaḥ 
NSu_2.1.68.3–2.1.68.4	 etat uktam bhavati pūrva adhikaraṇe pratyakṣa ādi gṛhīta vyāpti ādimattvena dṛḍhayā yuktyā viruddha tvāt veda eka deśasya aprāmāṇye sati tad dṛṣṭāntena brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇatva abhidhāyakasya api vedasya veda tvāt aprāmāṇye tat asiddhiḥ iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhāntaḥ tu yukti vat vedasya api apauruṣeya tvena dṛḍha tvāt vāstava virodhasya anupapatteḥ aviruddha atharkalpanā upapatteḥ na aprāmāṇyam iti 
NSu_2.1.68.5	 iha punar veda vākya antara saṃvādena su dṛḍhayā yuktyā viruddha tvāt brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tva abhidhātrīṇām śrutīnām eva tatra prāmāṇya anupapattau prathama adhyāya ukta vastu nirṇayaḥ na bhavet iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ siddhāntaḥ tu pūrva pakṣiṇa utprekṣitābhyaḥ śruti sahita yuktibhyaḥ api prabalānām tad virodhi yuktīnām sadbhāvāt tad viruddhānām pūrva pakṣa śruti yuktī nāma prāmāṇyāt upapannataraḥ prāk uktaḥ arthaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.68.6–2.1.68.8	 atas pūrva uttara pakṣa nyāyayoḥ agata tvena yuktaḥ adhikaraṇa ārambhaḥ iti etat ca anupadam eva udāharaṇena prapañcayiṣyāmaḥ nanu evam sati śrutīnām śruti yukti virodha parihāraḥ asya adhikaraṇasya arthaḥ iti uktam bhavati saḥ ayam caturtha pāda arthaḥ eva iti tatra eva asya adhikaraṇasya upanibandhanam ucitam na atra iti atas asya tatas api vailakṣaṇyam darśayitum uktam alpa iti bahula iti ca atra alpa tvam upasa jarna tvam bahula tvam pradhāna tvam iti jñātavyam eva śabdaḥ tuna guṇa pradhāna bhāva vyatyāsaḥ caturtha pādaḥ iva a iti arthe nanu śruti yuktibhyām pūrva pakṣite katham prabala yukti mātra āśrayeṇa siddhāntaḥ kathañcid pratipakṣatā mātra sambhavāt iti atas uktam vivṛṇvan= āha yukteḥ tu iti 
NSu_2.1.69a–2.1.69c.2	 yukteḥ tu yukti bāhulyam āgamāt āgamasya ca katham na nirṇayam kuryāt pūrva pakṣa yukti apekṣayā virodhi yukteḥ bāhulyam tathā pūrva pakṣa āgama apekṣayā virodhi āgamasya ca bāhulyam katham nirṇayam na kuryāt pūrva pakṣyutprekṣita yukti āgamābhyām prabalau virodhi yukti ā āgamau tad bādhayā vastu vyavasthām kurute iti arthaḥ kuryāt iti pratyekam sambandhaḥ na kevalam siddhānte prabala yukti mātram kinnāma prabala āgamaḥ api asti iti bhāvaḥ iti atas adhikaraṇa ārambhaḥ sambhavati iti śeṣaḥ adhikaraṇa upādhi vyutpādana samāpti dyotakaḥ vā iti śabdaḥ 
NSu_2.1.69a–2.1.69c.4	 tat idam udāharaṇa niṣṭham vyutpādayitum pūrva pakṣam anuvadati sūtrakāraḥ asat iti ced iti ayam asya arthaḥ na brahmaṇaḥ jagat kartṛ tvam yuktam pramāṇa abhāvāt sat eva somya idam agre āsīt tat tejaḥ asṛjata a ityādi śrutiḥ asti iti ced na tasyāḥ yukti viruddha tvena bhavat abhimata arthe prāmāṇya abhāvāt tathā hi mahāpralaye tāvat utpatsyamāna kārya prāgabhāvaḥ avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ anyathā sarga ādau kārya utpāda ayogāt naca asya ani atra caritārthatā upalabhyate tatas ca saḥ eva sakala kārya kāraṇam bhaviṣyati 
NSu_2.1.69a–2.1.69c.5	 ayam atra prayogaḥ mahāpralaya vartī kārya prāgabhāvaḥ mahat ādikāyarkāraṇam bhavitum arhati anyatra anupakṣīṇa tve sati niyamena tad pūrva bhāvi tvāt yaḥ anyatra anupakṣīṇa tve sati niyamena yat pūrva bhāvī sa tasya kāraṇam yathā kuvindaḥ paṭasya iti mahat ādikam vā prāc abhāva kāryam ananyathā siddha niyata paścāt bhāvi tvāt yat yat ananyathā siddha niyata paścāt bhāvi tat tad kāyarm yathā paṭaḥ kuvindasya iti 
NSu_2.1.69a–2.1.69c.6^1	 nanu atra jagatprāgabhāvasya jagat kāraṇa tva mātram vā sādhyam anya yoga vyavacchedena vā ādye artha antara tā prāgabhāvasya kāraṇa tve api brahma kāraṇa tā sambhavāt dvitīye vyāpti abhāvaḥ na hiyaḥ yad apekṣayā pūrva bhāvī saḥ eva tad kāraṇam na anyaḥ a iti niyamaḥ asti tatas prāgabhāvasya jagat kāraṇa tve api tad samāna nyāyānām īśvara ādīnām api tad kāraṇa tvam aṅgī kāryam iti mā evam syāt etat evam yadi īśvara ādīnām pralaye sattvam eva syāt na ca etat asti siddhāntinā kāraṇa tvena āśāsyamānam īśvara ādikam pralaye asat bhavitum arhati bhāva tvāt mahat ādi kārya vat iti yukti virodhaḥ 
NSu_2.1.69a–2.1.69c.6^2	 evañcaḥ īśvara ādīnām pralaye asattva siddhau prāgabhāvasya kāraṇa tva mātra sādhane api tasya eva kāraṇa tvam iti siddhayati nanu ca yat kāryam tat sa kartṛkam iti niyamān mahat ādi kartṛ tvena īśvaraḥ avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ na pralaye tad sattā abhāvasya pramita tvena prāgabhāvasya eva jagat kartṛ tva upapatteḥ na ca etat anumāna jātam udāhṛta śruti viruddha tvena aprāmāṇyam iti sāmpratam asat eva idam agre āsīt tat asat eva sat manaḥ akuruta asataḥ sat ajāyata a ityādi śruti saṃvādi tvena śruti mātratas prābalyāt prabala yukti viruddhāyāḥ ca śruteḥ sva artha parityāgasya atīta adhikaraṇe sthita tvāt prāgabhāvasya api sva rūpa sattva ādinā sadā iva ityādi prayoga viṣaya tadvā upapatteḥ 
NSu_2.1.69a–2.1.69c.8	 nanuetena sarve a iti asat ādi śabdānām brahma artha tvam uktam tat kim śabdānām anyatra śaktiḥ eva na asti kim vā śruteḥ tatra tātparya abhāvaḥ na ādyaḥ samākarṣa aṅgīkārāt na dvitīyaḥ yukti upatāyāḥ tatra tātparya upapatteḥ tathā api prāgabhāvasya eva kāraṇa tvam kartṛ tvam ca na kvāpi upalabdham iti ced na alaukika arthasya yathāgamam grāhya tvāt santata utpatti prasaṅgaḥ tu brahma vādinaḥ api samānaḥ icchā ādi kāraṇānām kādācid ka tvena tad samādhānam mama api samānam atas eva śrutirāha tat manaḥ akuruta a iti tat tasmāt tad tad prāgabhāvasya eva tat tat kartṛ tvāt uktam ayuktam iti tat idam uktam asat iti abhāvaḥ śrutyā jagatkartṛ tvena ucyate anumīyate ca tathā tasmāt saḥ eva jagat kartā iti atra asat śabdaḥ bhāva sādhanaḥ śruti anugama artham abhāve prayuktaḥ aparā api vṛttiḥ bhāva tva hetunā kārya vat īśvara ādikam api pralaye asat anumīyate iti atra asat śabdaḥ kartṛ sādhanaḥ iha prathamām vṛttim abhipretya na iti siddhānta aṃśam vyācaṣṭe asat iti 
NSu_2.1.69d.1–2.1.70a.3	 iti asat kāraṇam na hi śruti arthaḥ bhavati abhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ kāraṇam iti tad viśeṣaḥ kartā ucyate hi iti anena idam āha upapatti viruddhaḥ tāvat na veda atharḥ sambhavati tad aviruddhe arthe sambhavati iti uktam prakṛtaḥ ca upapatti viruddhaḥ tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ iti śruti arthaḥ na bhavati iti upalakṣaṇam anumāna prameyam api idam na bhavati upapatti viruddha tvāt iti api draṣṭavyam kiñca sambhāvitaḥ eva śruti arthaḥ vaktavyaḥ anumātavyaḥ ca na ca evam prakṛtaḥ kvāpi abhāvasya kartṛ tva anupalambhāt iti āha kvāpi iti  kvāpi asat kāraṇam na hi anupalabdham iti anuvartate caturtha pādasya adhikaraṇasya vailakṣaṇyam darśayitum alpā ityādi uktam tad aviśadam vailakṣaṇya jñānasya ubhaya svarūpa jñāna adhīna tvāt atas caturtha pāda artham darśayati śruti iti 
NSu_2.1.70b.1–2.1.70b.4	 śruti prāya upapattibhiḥ śrutīnām prāyas bāhulyam tad sahitābhiḥ upapattibhiḥ śruti pradhāna kopa pattibhiḥ iti yāvat avirodhaḥ virodha abhāvaḥ śrutīnām iti śeṣaḥ yat vā śruti prāya śabdena śruti kalpa tvam ucyate śruti gṛhītābhiḥ upapattibhiḥ iti arthaḥ atra tu svatantrābhiḥ iti sphuṭam eva atha vā atra ukta arthasya eva tatra prapañcanāt na doṣaḥ yathā prathama pāda artha prapañcanāt dvitīya pādasya iti āśayena uktam samyak iti yat vā kvāpi iti atra sambaddhayate tena kvāpi adhyātma lakṣaṇe viṣaye atra tu anyatra iti bhedaḥ sūcitaḥ bhavati yadi api etat prāk eva vaktavyam tathā api asatkāryam iti ādeḥ vakṣyamāṇasya sūtrasya vyākhyāna antara tvadyotanāya vyavadhānena uktam anyathā pūrvam eva vyākhyānam idam tu tad upapādanāya upayogī iti vijñāyeta atha dvitīyām vṛttim abhipretya a sat iti ca inna a iti etāvat sūtram vyācaṣṭe asat iti 
NSu_2.1.71.1–2.1.71.3	 asat kāryam yathā dṛṣṭam vastu tvāt kāraṇam tathā iti ced na kāryam mahat ādikam yathā pralaye asat pramitam tathā vastu tvāt bhāva tvāt kāraṇam kāraṇa tvena siddhāntinā aṅgīkṛtam īśvara ādikam api pralaye asat bhavitum arhati iti arthaḥ kutas na iti ced na tāvat asmāt eva anumānāt abhāvasya viśvakartṛ tva siddhiḥ kintu anena pralaya avasthāyām īśvara ādya bhāva siddhau kāryasya sa kartṛka tva niyame sthite prāgabhāvasya niyata pūrva bhāvi tvena viśvakāraṇa tvam siddhayan kartṛ tayā eva setsyati iti vaktavyam tat idam pratyanumāna parāhatam iti āśayavān pratiṣedha mātra tvat iti sautram hetum vyākuvarn sādhyam adhyāharati niṣedha iti 
NSu_2.1.71cd.1–2.1.71cd.3	 niṣedha eka svarūpasya na kartṛ tā niṣedha eka svarūpasya iti hetu garbha viśeṣaṇam ayam atra prayogaḥ vipratipannaḥ abhāvaḥ na kartā pratiṣedha mātra tvāt niṣedha eka svarūpa tvāt sampratipanna ghaṭa abhāva vat iti kartṛ tva mātrasya abhāve viśvakartṛ tvam dūra utsāritam na ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām kulāla ādeḥ kartṛ tva niścaye tu abhāvasya tad kalpaka abhāvāt nanu astu niṣedha eka svarūpa tvam kartṛ tvam ca kaḥ virodhaḥ tathā ca ghaṭa ādi abhāvasya akartṛ tve api pralaya kālīnaḥ abhāvaḥ kartā bhaviṣyati iti atas kartṛ tva niṣedha eka svarūpa tvayovirredham sphorayitum kartṛ tva svarūpam āha buddhi iti 
NSu_2.1.72ab.1–2.1.72ab.3	 buddhi pūrva pravṛttiḥ hi kartṛ tvam iha niścitam pravṛttiḥ icchā prayatna ādikāḥ niścitam sarvaiḥ api parīkṣakaiḥ vṛkṣeṇa sthīyate iti ādau kartṛ tvam pāribhāṣikam na tu svābhāvikam iti hi sarve api pratipannāḥ atra buddhi pūrva pravṛttiḥ iti etat buddhayā vivicya vyākhyeyam tathā hi syāt kartṛ niṣedha eka svarūpa tvayoḥ avirodhaḥ yadi tṛtīya ādi viṣaya tvam eva kartṛ tvam syāt na ca etat asti api tarhi icchā prayatna ādi rūpā pravṛttiḥ eva sarvaiḥ api parīkṣakaiḥ tasyāḥ eva kartṛ tvena niścita tvāt prakaraṇāt ca etat eva niścitam atra eva hi vipratipattiḥ na anyatra sā ca iyam pravṛttiḥ buddhi pūrvā buddhi vyāptā kāryāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ buddhi kāraṇaka tvāt akāryāyāḥ ca buddhi vyabhicārāt yat aśarnāt na ca kartṛ tva apara paryāyāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ vyāpikā buddhiḥ abhāve sambhavati tatas vyāpyam kartṛ tvam api na sambhavati eva iti katham kartṛ tva niṣedha eka svarūpa tvayoḥ na virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.72ab.4–2.1.72ab.5	 atra kartṛ tva anuvādena buddhi pūrva pravṛttiḥ iti vyākhyānāt niścitam iti napuṃsaka upapattiḥ bhāve vā kta pratyayaḥ iti nanu mā bhūt aprayojaka tvam hetoḥ tathā api vaiyarthyam aparihāyarm abhāva paryāyaḥ hi pratiṣedha śabdaḥ kartṛ tvam ca kārya utpatti anukūla icchā ādi yogaḥ iti uktam na ca pratiṣedha tvam kartari vartate yena akartṛkam vyabhicaret tad nirāsa artham ca viśeṣaṇam sārthakam syāt atas pratiṣedha tvāt iti etāvatā kartṛ tva vyabhicāra abhāvāt sūtre mātra grahaṇam vyākhyāne api eka grahaṇam vyartham iti atas āha pratiṣedha iti 
NSu_2.1.72cd.1–2.1.72cd.3	 pratiṣedha ātmaka tvam tu bhāvasya  bhāvasya api kulāla ādeḥ kartuḥ pratiṣedha ātmaka tvam vidyate atas pratiṣedha tvāt iti ukte kulāla ādau akartṛ tvena hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ syāt tad parihāra artham mātra grahaṇam tadvaya ākhyāne eka grahaṇam ca sārthakam iti nanu kulāla ādeḥ bhāvasya katham pratiṣedha ātmaka tvam iti atas āha abhāva iti 
NSu_2.1.72d.1–2.1.72d.3	 abhāva dharmataḥ abhāvaḥ atra anyonya abhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ sa dharmaḥ asya iti abhāva dharmā tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam tatas iti bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ asti khalu kulāla ādeḥ bhāvasya bheda apara paryāya pratiṣedha ātmakaḥ anyonya abhāvaḥ dharmaḥ iti nanu idam asaṅgatam yaḥ kartā dharmī kulāla ādiḥ na tasya pratiṣedha ātmaka tvam yaḥ ca pratiṣedha ātmakaḥ anyonya abhāvaḥ na tasya kartṛ tvam ittayaḥ āha dharma iti 
NSu_2.1.72e.1–2.1.72e.3	 dharma dharma aikyataḥ ca eva dharma dharmiṇoḥ kulāla anyonya abhāvoḥ ekatvataḥ caśabdaḥ hetu samuccaye abhāva dharmataḥ dharma dharmī a aikyataḥ ca pratiṣedha ātmaka tvam bhāvasya asti iti anvayaḥ eva śabdaḥ bheda vyudāsa arthaḥ anyonya abhāvaḥ hi dharmiṇā atyanta abhinnaḥ abhyupeyate na tu ayāvat dravya bhāvī dharmaḥ iva bhinna abhinnaḥ astu evam pratiṣedha tvasya kulāla ādau vyabhicāraḥ tathā api katham mātra grahaṇasya sārthakyam na hi aviśiṣṭa vyabhicāraḥ eva viśeṣaṇam prayojayati tathā tve viśeṣaṇa niyama anupapatteḥ kinnāma viśeṣaṇasya vyabhicāra nirāsaupayika tve sati tat atra katham iti atas āha na tu iti
