NSu_2.1.72f.1–2.1.72f.3	 na tu tanmātra tā bhavet kulāla ādeḥ kartuḥ bhāvasya pratiṣedha tve api tanmātra tā pratiṣedha mātra tā na bhavet atas asti mātra grahaṇasya vyabhicāra parihāra aupayika tvam tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe sandigdha vyabhicāra parihāra arthaḥ nanu evam ekam sandhitsataḥ aparam pracyavate yatas vyartha viśeṣaṇa tā parihāre svarūpa asiddhiḥ āpannā tathā hi pakṣīkṛte abhāve prameya tva ādi dharmāḥ santi na vā na iti pakṣe apramita āśraya tva ādikam hetoḥ ādye na tāvat te api abhāvāḥ vidhi pratyaya viṣaya tvāt pratiyogi a nirūpya tvāt ca ṣaṣ padārtha atirikta tvam abhāva tvam iti ced na sva icchā parikalpanāyāḥ anupādeya tvāt anyathā pañca eva bhāvāḥ tat atiriktaḥ abhāvaḥ iti kalpanāyām samavāya ādeḥ api bhāva tvam na syāt te ca na abhāvāt dharmiṇaḥ bhinnāḥ 
NSu_2.1.72f.4	 anyonya abhāva samāna nyāya tvāt tathā ca yathā kulāla ādeḥ vipakṣasya vidhi niṣedha ātmaka tvena pratiṣedha mātra tva abhāvaḥ tathā pakṣī kṛtha abhāvasya api pratiṣedha mātra tva abhāvāt sva rūpa asiddhaḥ hetuḥ syāt dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca sādhana vikalaḥ ghaṭa abhāvasya api dharma dvārā vidhi rūpasya pratiṣedha mātra tva abhāvāt ityatas āha abhāvasya ca iti 
NSu_2.1.73ab.1–2.1.73ab.3	 abhāvasya ca bhāvaḥ api dharmaḥ atha api prathama api śabdāt pūrvam yadi iti adhyāhāryam yadi api abhāvasya pakṣīkṛtasya dṛṣṭāntīkṛtasya ca bhāvaḥ prameya tva ādi dharmaḥ asti caśabdāt dharmiṇā abhinnaḥ ca bhāvasya abhāva dharmaḥ iva iti vā atha api na svarūpa asiddhayā ādi doṣaḥ iti śeṣaḥ katham iti atas āha hi dharmiṇaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.73b–2.1.73c.2	 hi dharmiṇaḥ tādṛktavam mātratā iha uktāḥ hi śabdaḥ hetau tādṛś tvam pratiṣedha ātmaka tvam mātra tā pratiṣedha mātra tā iha sūtre etat uktam bhavati syāt ayam svarūpa asiddhayā ādi doṣaḥ yadi atra pratiṣedha mātra śabdena kevala pratiṣedha tvam vivakṣitam syāt naca evam kintu dharma dvāram antareṇa dhamirṇaḥ eva pratiṣedha tvam tat ca pakṣa dṛṣṭāntayeḥ asti eva tayoḥ dharrma dvāreṇa vidhi tve api dharmiṇoḥ pratiṣedha tvasya ubhaya siddha tvāt vyāvṛttam ca vipakṣāt kulāla ādeḥ tasya dharmataḥ niṣedha tve api dharmiṇaḥ aniṣedha tvāt iti nanu katham etat labhyate ucyate mātra śabdaḥ hi sākalye vartate na ca tat kvāpi sambhavati pratiṣedhe api vidhi sadbhāvasya pareṇa eva ukta tvāt tatas pratiṣedha mātra śabdaḥ vidhera prādhānyam lakṣayati 
NSu_2.1.73b–2.1.73c.4	 anna mātram bhuktam iti yathā dharma dharmiṇoḥ ca aprādhānyam dharmasya prādhānyam dharmiṇaḥ tena dharmiṇaḥ pratiṣedha tvam pratiṣedha mātra tvam iti siddhayati icchā prayatna ādi rūpāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ kartṛ tā apara nāmikāyāḥ vyāpikā buddhiḥ abhāvā dvaya āvṛttā tām api vyāvartayati iti uktam tatra abhāvāt buddhi vyāvṛttiḥ eva kutas iti atas āha buddhi iti 
NSu_2.1.73d.1–2.1.73d.2	 buddhiḥ āhityam eva tat tat tasmāt pratiṣedha mātra tvāt eva buddhiḥ āhityam abhāvasya ghaṭa abhāva vat siddhayati iti arthaḥ dvividham hi prameyam svatantram paratantram ca paratantram api dvividham bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ ca bhāvaḥ api dvedhā cetanaḥ acetanaḥ ca evañca yadā bhāvasya api kasyacid na caitanyam kā vārtā tadā abhāve caitanyasya kaścid abhāvaḥ buddhimān kinna syāt iti ced na nirupādhika sambandham anādṛtya nirnimittāyāḥ śaṅkāyāḥ atiprasaṅgi tvāt tad manaḥ akuruta a iti śruteḥ iti ced na anyathā asiddha tvāt atha pratiṣedha mātra tvam api pakṣe na abhyupeyāt tadā asat iti brahma iti ca saṃjñā bheda mātram aneka tva ādeḥ pareṇa api tyājya tvāt aneka svātantrye kārya udaya ayogāt 
NSu_2.1.73d.3–2.1.73d.4	 nanu idam tatra eva vaktavyam satyam pratiṣedha mātra tve vidite tatas buddhirāhitya pratīteḥ saulabhyāt iha uktam ṭīkākāraḥ tu prameya tva ādi bhāva dharma aṅgīkāre buddhiḥ api tathā kin na syāt iti śaṅkā avakāśāt iha uktam iti āhuḥ bhāvasya abhāvaḥ dharmaḥ abhāvasya ca bhāvaḥ api dharmaḥ iti anupapannam bhāva abhāvayoḥ abhāva bhāva dharmi tve pramāṇa abhāvāt sambandha abhāvāt ca sambaddhayoḥ eva hi śauklaya paṭayoḥ dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na asambaddhayoḥ maru mandarayoḥ na ca bhāva abhāvayoḥ sambandhaḥ asti saṃyoga samavāyayoḥ bhāva niyata tvāt viruddha svabhāva tvāt ca yāvaviruddha svabhāvau guṇa guṇinau tau= eva hi dharma dharmiṇau= upalabdhau na viruddha svabhāvau= aśva mahiṣau viruddha svabhāvau ca bhāva abhāvau vidhi niṣedha rūpa tvāt abhedāt ca na hi ghaṭaḥ svayam svasya eva dharmaḥ bhavati uktam ca dharma dharmya aikyam iti atas āha viśeṣyatā eva iti 
NSu_2.1.74a.1–2.1.74a.2	 viśeṣya tā eva dharmi tvam viśeṣaṇa tā eva ca dharma tvam iti api draṣṭavyam yaḥ hi viśiṣṭate vyavacchidyate sa tasya dharmī dharmaḥ ca aparaḥ prakāra antarasya nirvaktum aśakya tvāt pratīyate ca viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhāvaḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ anyathā ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ na bhavati iti abhāvaḥ prameyaḥ iti ca vyavahāra anupapatteḥ tat katham bhāva abhāvayoḥ na dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ paṭa śoklayayoḥ ca na sambandha prayuktaḥ dharmi dharma bhāvaḥ na api meru mandarayoḥ tad abhāvaḥ sambandha abhāva prayuktaḥ kintu svabhāvāt eva viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa tva atad abhāva rūpaḥ sambaddhayoḥ api ghaṭa paṭayoḥ tad abhāva vat bhū tala ghaṭa abhāvayoḥ tad bhāvāt ca 
NSu_2.1.74a.3	 evam eva virodhi svabhāva abhedau= api parāḥ tau sa guṇa nirguṇa tvena nitya anitya tvena vā viruddha svabhāvayoḥ api guṇa guṇinordharmyādi tvasya darśanāt adarśanāt ca paṭa tva śauklayayoḥ dṛśyate ca abhede api tad bhāvaḥ astitva abhidheya tva ādīnām dharmāṇām paraiḥ dharmya bhedasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt bhinnānām api tad bhāvaḥ na upalabhyate tat evam asambaddhayoḥ api vilakṣaṇa svabhāvayoḥ api bhāva abhāvayoḥ abhede api viśeṣa śaktyā viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa tā lakṣaṇaḥ dharmi dharma bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ eva iti 
NSu_2.1.74a.4–2.1.74a.5	 yadi evam bhāva abhāvayoḥ abhāva bhāva dharmi tvam dharma dharmiṇoḥ ca abhedaḥ syāt tadā bhāvasya api abhāva tvena abhāvasya ca bhāva tvena ghaṭa ādīnām bhāva tvam eva prāk pradhvaṃsa atyanta abhāvānām abhāva tvam eva iti niyamaḥ nirnibandhanaḥ syāt naca evam astu iti vācyam sakala loka siddhasya tathā abhāvānarha tvāt iti atas āha prathamā iti 
NSu_2.1.74b–2.1.74d.2	 prathama pratipattiṣu niṣedha vidhi rūpa tvam bhāva abhāva tvam atra hi rūpa śabdaḥ dharmi vacanaḥ bhāva abhāva tvam iti yathāyogam sambandhaḥ atra evam sati api hi śabdaḥ prasiddhau ayam arthaḥ kim bhāva abhāva nibandhanam prameya rūpam anviṣyate pramāṇam vā ādyasya uttara ardham uttaram yadi api bhāva abhāva ātmakāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ prāc abhāva ādayaḥ ca tathā api atra padārtha sārthe yaḥ piṇḍaḥ vidhi dharmikaḥ ghaṭa ādiḥ sa bhāvaḥ yaḥ tu niṣedha dharmikaḥ prāgabhāva ādiḥ saḥ abhāvaḥ iti vyavasthā upapadyate abhede api dhamardharmi bhāvaḥ viśeṣa śaktyā saṅgacchate iti uktam eva dvitīyasya uttaram prathama pratipattiṣu iti 
NSu_2.1.74b–2.1.74d.5	 yaḥ prathamam vidhi tayā para pratikṣepa rūpa tām vinā pratīyate sa ghaṭādiḥ bhāvaḥ yaḥ tu niṣedha tayā para pratikṣepeṇa pratīyate prāgabhāva ādiḥ saḥ abhāvaḥ iti uttara ardhena eka vākya tayā yojyam ghaṭaḥ hi prathamam vidhi tvena dharmi rūpeṇa pratītaḥ anantaram paṭaḥ na bhavati iti paṭa niṣedha ātma tayā pratīyate prāgabhāva ādiḥ api prathamam niṣedha tvena dharmi svarūpeṇa avagataḥ anantaram prameyaḥ iti vidhi tayā pratīyate iti sakala pratipattṛ siddham iti bahuvacana hi śabdābhyām dyotayati viṣayi viṣayayoḥ ādhāra ādheya bhāvam abhipretya saptamī prayogaḥ kārakeṣu gauṇa mukhya tva vivakṣā bhāvasya sthita tvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.74b–2.1.74d.8^1	 evam pūrva pakṣyutprekṣita pramāṇa samudāya labdhasya arthasya pramāṇa virodhaḥ darśitaḥ idānīm asat kāryam yathā dṛṣṭam iti anumānam viśeṣataḥ nirācikīrṣuḥ tad prastāvanāya asūtrayat sūtra kāraḥ api itau tadvat prasaṅgāt asamañjasam iti asamañjasam etat viśvasya abhāva kartṛka tva matam kutas abhāvasya jagat kartṛ tva aṅgīkāre api itau pralaye tadvat prasaṅgāt abhāvavat tva prasaṅgāt īśvara ādeḥ sarvasya abhāva abhyupagama prasaṅgāt iti yāvat na hi īśvara ādau sati tad parityāgena abhāvasya jagat kartṛ tvam avadhārayitum śakyam iti 
NSu_2.1.74b–2.1.74d.8^2	 nanu na idam aniṣyam īśvara ādikam pralaye asat bhavitum arhati bhāva tvāt ghaṭa vat iti anumānena īśvara ādeḥ sarvasya pralaye abhāva abhyupagamāt iti atra uktam sūtra kṛtāna tu dṛṣṭānta bhāvāt a iti na eva pralaye sarvasya asattvam aṅgīkartum ucitam kasmāt dṛṣṭānta bhāvāt dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti tatra avadhārita vyāpti mūlam anumānam ucyate dṛṣṭānta mātrasya sādhana bādhana anaṅga tvāt tathā ca pralaye parameśvara ādi sadbhāva sādhaka anumāna sambhavāt iti arthaḥ kim tad anumānam iti atas āha bhāṣya kāraḥ sarva nāśeṣu api iti api itau tadvat prasaṅgāt asamañjasam 
NSu_2.1.75.1–2.1.75.2	 sarva nāśeṣu api sadā śiṣṭa tvāt yasya kasya nuḥ nāśaḥ ayam vimataḥ api syāt nāśa tvāt kartṛ śeṣavān apiḥ abhivyāptau sarva śabdaḥ vartamāna mātra vivakṣayā api syāt iti atas sadā iti uktam tat idam vyabhicāra parihārāya abhihitam naḥ puruṣasya ayam iti asya eva vivaraṇam vimataḥ iti atra pūrva ardhena vyāptiḥ uktāḥ uttara ardhena pratijñā hetū 
NSu_2.1.75.3–2.1.75.4	 etat uktam bhavati mahāpralaya lakṣaṇaḥ nāśaḥ puruṣa śeṣavān bhavitum arhati nāśa tvāt sampratipanna nāśa vat iti atra puruṣa avaśeṣa mātram sādhyam na tu nāśa kartuḥ puruṣasya avaśiṣyatā atas eva uktam yasya kasya iti nāśasya kartuḥ akartuḥ vā iti arthaḥ tathā api kartṛ śeṣavān iti vadata idam abhipretam pralaye puruṣa sadbhāva mātra sādhane sati bhagnam tāvat parasya anumānam yat api parasya abhāva kartṛka tvam jagataḥ abhimatam tat api atas eva apāstam avaśiṣyasya puruṣasya eva viśvakartṛ tva sambhave abhāvasya tad kalpanāna vakāśāt dṛṣṭa anusāriṇī hi kalpanā na hi loke prāk utpatteḥ kulāla abhāvayoḥ sa tora bhāvaḥ ghaṭasya kartā dṛṣṭaḥ kinnāma kulāle eva iti abhiprāyam ajānānaḥ kartṛ śeṣavān iti uktvā vibhrāntaḥ ca udayati yatra sunda upasunda nyāyena aśeṣāḥ api puruṣāḥ naṣṭāḥ tatra nāśatva hetoḥ anaikāntika tā a iti tatra āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.1.76ab.1–2.1.76ab.2	 naca aśeṣa nṛnāśaḥ tu dṛṣṭaḥ dṛśyaḥ asti vā kvacid caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe aśeṣa nṛnāśaḥ tu na eva kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ iti atīta niṣedhaḥ dṛśyaḥ vā na eva iti anāgatasya na eva asti vā dṛśyamānaḥ iti vartamānasya idam uktam bhavati anaikāntika tvam hi pramite vipakṣe hetu vṛttau satyām vaktavyam na apramite tathā satya namina mātra uccheda prasaṅgāt naca aśeṣa puruṣa nāśaḥ kāla traye api pramitaḥ yena nāśa tvasya tatra vyabhicāraḥ syāt pramita tva aṅgīkāre ca pramātuḥ evoḥ varita tvena vyāghātaḥ ca syāt na ca nāśakartuḥ puruṣasya avaśiṣyatā sādhya tvena iṣyā yena sunda upasunda ādi nāśaḥ pratyudāhriyeta kintu puruṣa śeṣavat tva mātram iti 
NSu_2.1.76ab.3–2.1.76ab.5	 anena pralaya kālaḥ puruṣavān kāla tvāt idānīntana kāla vat iti api anumānam sūcitam na ca tadā kāla abhāvāt āśraya asiddhiḥ tathā sati tadā iti eva vaktum aśakyatvāt parakīya anumāne ca pralaya viśeṣaṇa anupapatteḥ yadi api atra kālaḥ aṅgīkriyate na vā ādye tatra eva bhāva tva hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ dvitīye pralaya viśeṣaṇa anupapattiḥ sakala kārya vināśa viśiṣṭa kālasya pralaya tvāt atha kārya vināśaḥ eva pralayaḥ tathā api īśvara abhāvasya tena sambandha abhāvāt īśvara ādikam pralaye asat iti pratijñā artha anupapattiḥ deśa ādi dvārā sambandha abhyupagame tatra eva bhāva tvasya vyabhicāraḥ pralaya viśeṣaṇa parityāge tad śiṣyaiḥ eva uhyatām iti na sūtra bhāṣya kārābhyām abhihitam sūcitam ca api ītau= iti sūtra kṛtā laye mānam ca kim bhavet a iti bhāṣya kṛtā api tat idam jīva īśvara sādhāraṇam anumānam uktam idānīm pralaye jīva sadbhāva sādhakam anumānam āha dharma iti 
NSu_2.1.76cd.1–2.1.76cd.3	 dharma adharma āśraya tvena svīkāryaḥ api naraḥ laye na kevala muktā anumānena kinnāma dharma adharma śraya tvena api iti sambandhaḥ naraḥ jīvātmā ayam atra prayogaḥ pralaya kāla vartī dharmaḥ sa āśrayaḥ dharma tvāt idānīnta dharma vat evam adharmam api pakṣīkṛtya prayoktavyam na ca dharma adharma āśrayaḥ jīva ātmanaḥ anyaḥ sambhavati evañca pralaye jīva ātma sadbhāvāt bhāva mātrā sattva sādhanam anupapannam iti yatra īśvara sadbhāva sādhanam idam āśraya śabdasya adhiṣṭhātṛ para tvāt tatra evam prayogaḥ pralaya kāla vartinau dharma adharmau kenacid adhiṣṭhitau kāraṇa tve satya cetana tvāt vāśya ādi vat iti na ca atīndriyayoḥ dharma adharmayoḥ adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam īśvarāt anyasya upapadyate atas dharma adharma adhiṣṭhātṛ tvena api naraḥ parama puruṣaḥ laye svīkāryaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.76cd.4	 nanu pralaye bhāva mātrasya asattvam abhyupagacchataḥ mama tadā dharma adharmau= api na staḥ eva iti āśraya asiddhiḥ iti idam iha vaktavyam kim dharma adharma saṃjñitam adṛṣṭam asti kārya mātrasya kāraṇam ca bhavati iti abhyupagamya pralaye tad abhāvaḥ abhīdhīyate uta sat api tat akāraṇam iti abhyupetya atha tat eva na asti iti aṅgīkṛtya ādyam dūṣayati anādi tvam iti 
NSu_2.1.77ab.1–2.1.77ab.3	 anādi tvam vinā adṛṣṭam katham syāt kāraṇam kvacid anādi tvam iva anādi tvam pralaye sattvam iti arthaḥ kvacid iti sṛṣṭi kāle yadi adṛṣṭam pralaye na syāt tadā adikālīnasya kāryasya kāraṇam na syāt asataḥ kāraṇa tva ayogāt tathā ca sarva utpattimatām nimittam iti abhyupagamaḥ bhagnaḥ iti atharḥ syāt etat adhunātana kāryam adṛṣṭa kāraṇakam na tu ādi ka ālīnam iti mama abhyupagamaḥ tat kim adṛṣṭasya pralaye sadbhāvena iti atas āha anādi tvam iti anādi tvam vinā tatas eva ādi kālīnakāyarkāraṇa tvam ca vinā adṛṣṭam kvacid adhunātane api kārye kāraṇam katham syāt na kathañcid adhunātanam kāryam adṛṣṭa kāraṇakam na kārya tvāt ādi kālīna kārya vat iti anumāna sambhavāt na ced idam iva tat api adṛṣṭa kāryam eva aṅgī kāryam iti 
NSu_2.1.77ab.4–2.1.77ab.5	 yat vā mā bhūt ādi kālīnasya kāryasya adṛṣṭam kāraṇam tathā api pralaye tad bhāvaḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ kutas anādi tvam pralaye sattvam vinā adṛṣṭam kvacid idāni intane api kārye kāraṇam katham syāt antarālaḥ eva adṛṣṭa utpatti ayogāt iti yojyam nanu adṛṣṭasya sarva utpattimat nimitta tve api na pralaye sadbhāvaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ ādi kāle eva utpannasya api mahat ādi kāraṇa tva upapatteḥ iti idam atra vaktavyam tad ādi kāle janimada dṛṣṭam tatas pūrva adṛṣṭāt utpadyate na vā iti ādyam upādatte pūrva iti 
NSu_2.1.77cd.1–2.1.77cd.3	 pūrva adṛṣṭāt parādṛṣṭam yadi na eva uttaram kutas jāyate iti śeṣaḥ pariharati na eva iti evam tarhi tad uttaram ādi kāle janimada dṛṣṭam na eva asmābhiḥ pakṣīkriyate kintu tad kāraṇam pralaya kālīnam pūrva adṛṣṭam eva iti kutas āśraya asiddhiḥ iti dvitīyam upādatte pūrva iti na eva utpadyate iti śeṣaḥ dūṣayati uttaram iti tarhi tad uttaram ādika ālīnam adṛṣṭam kutas jāyate na kutaścid sarva utpattimat nimittasya adṛṣṭasya abhāvāt ādikālīna adṛṣṭa utpattiḥ eva na syāt iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.1.77cd.4–2.1.77cd.5	 na brūmaḥ vayam sarvam kāryam adṛṣṭa janyam iti kim tarhi ādi kāle janimataḥ mahat ādi kāraṇāt adṛṣṭāt anyat evātaḥ na ukta doṣaḥ iti āśaṅkām utthāpya dūṣayati pūrva iti yadi parādṛṣṭam sṛṣṭayupakrame janimat pūrva adṛṣṭāt na eva utpadyate api tu adṛṣṭa nirapekṣam eva tarhi uttaram ahat ādikāyarmapi kutas adṛṣṭāt utpadyate iti aṅgīkaraṇīyam adṛṣṭa vat tasya api adṛṣṭi nirapekṣa tva sambhavāt anyathā kārya tvāt adṛṣṭasya api adṛṣṭa apekṣā aṅgīkārya iti astu tarhi adṛṣṭam kāraṇam eva na bhavati iti dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ adṛṣṭam eva na asti iti tṛtīyaḥ vā ubhayasya api anupalambhāt tathā aca āśraya asiddhiḥ aparihārya iti āśaṅkayā āha adṛṣṭam iti 
NSu_2.1.78ab.1–2.1.78ab.2	 adṛṣṭam kāraṇam no ced laye mānam ca kim bhavet yadi pratyakṣeṇa anupalambhāt adṛṣṭam na syāt sat api vā kāraṇam na syāt tadā laye ca kim mānam bhavet pralayaḥ api aprāmāṇika tvāt na syāt na hi asau= api pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyate tathā ca īśvara ādikam pralaye asat bhavitum arhati iti aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ parasya api syāt 
NSu_2.1.78ab.3	 atha matam kāla viprakarṣāt anupalabhamānaḥ api pralayaḥ anumāna siddha tvāt aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ tathā hi viśva santānaḥ ayam dṛśya santāna śūnyaiḥ samavāyibhiḥ ārabdhaḥ santāna tvāt āraṇeya santāna vat vartamāna brahmāṇḍa paramāṇavaḥ pūrvam utpādita sajātīya santāna antarāḥ nitya tve sati tad ārambhaka tvāt pradīpa paramāṇu vat sarve santānāḥ kadācid saha ucchidyante santāna tvāt pradīpa santāna vat sarve eva paramāṇavaḥ kadācid samagra upādeya prabandha śūnyāḥ ārambhaka tvāt naṣṭa pavana ārambhaka paramāṇu vat bhū golaka santānaḥ kadācid sākalyena ucchidyate santāna tvāt dīpa santāna vat iyam kriyā sva anya avayayikā ālīna tva anadhikaraṇa kiñcid kālīna kriyā anyā kriyā tvāt anyakriyā vat iti 
NSu_2.1.78ab.4	 evam tarhi dharma adharmau= api svarūpataḥ viprakṛṣṭa tvāt anupalabhyamānau= api devadatta śarīra ādikam devadatta viśeṣa guṇa janyam kāryatve sati devadatta bhoga hetu tvāt devadatta prayatna janya sraj ādi vat iti ādi anumānena vicitra kāryāni atha anupapattyā jyotiṣyomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta a yaḥ brāhmaṇāya avaguret tam śatena yātayāt a ityādi śruta sādhya sādhana bhāvāni atha anupapattyā vā siddha tvāt abhyupagantavyau= iti samam samādhānam 
NSu_2.1.78ab.5	 atha manyase na anumāna ādinā dharma ādi siddhiḥ tasya ābhāsa tvāt tathā hi deva datta śarīra ādeḥ devadatta viśeṣa guṇa janya tvam kim sākṣāt sādhyam uta paramparayā na ādyaḥ dharma adharmayoḥ api ārambhaka preraṇa ādi rūpeṇa eva upayoga aṅgīkārāt devadatta śarīram na sākṣāt devadatta viśeṣa guṇa janyam śarīra tvāt yajña datta śarīra vat iti sat pratipakṣa tvāt ca dvitīye tu janma antarīya prayatna ārādhita devatā dvāreṇa upapatteḥ artha antara tā devadatta viśeṣa guṇa janya tayā vinā api ākāśa ādeḥ iva īśvara icchayā devadattasya bhoga hetu tā sambhavati iti aprayojaka tā ca kārya vaicitryam ca dṛṣṭa kāraṇa vaicitryāt eva upapadyate ādikālīnam ca tad tad prāc abhāvaḥ eva vaicitrya aṅgīkāreṇa sva garyāga ādeḥ sādhya sādhana bhāva śravaṇam tu asiddham eva yogya tā virahāt anyathā ākhyātim āśritya abhyupagame apanyathā siddham yāga ādi ārādhita a= ajñāta devatā dvāreṇa svarga ādi upapatteḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.78ab.6	 evam tarhi pralaya sādhaka anumānānāmabhāsa tvāt na taiḥ tad siddhiḥ iti tulyam uttaram tathā hi vimataḥ kālaḥ avaya vi yuktaḥ kāla tvāt idānīntana kāla vat vimataḥ brāhmaṇaḥ brāhmaṇa pūrvakaḥ brāhmaṇa tvāt sammata vat ityādinā sat pratipakṣam tāvat ukta anumāna jātam nanu pralaya kāla pakṣīkṛtau= āśraya asiddhiḥ anyathā siddha sādhanam evamādya brāhmaṇa pakṣīkāre anyathā ca doṣaḥ iti ced na parvataḥ agnimān itya ādau= api agni madanagnimat pakṣa dūṣaṇa sambhavena sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt nanu agni mat tva divya rirekeṇa api asti parvata ādeḥ svarūpam śakyam ca viśeṣa antareṇa avadhārayitum tat katham doṣa avakāśaḥ iti ced tad kimavayavi sambandhā sambandhau vihāya kāla viśeṣasya svarūpam eva na asti brāhmaṇa vyakteḥ vā adya tva anādya tve vihāya avadhāraṇam ca kāla ādeḥ hiraṇyagarbha apavarga uttararbhāvi tva ādinā bhaviṣyati 
NSu_2.1.78ab.7	 kiñca prathama prayoge viśva śabdena kim brahmāṇḍam abhipreyate sakala kāryāṇi vā na ādyaḥ aśraya asiddheḥ pralayam anabhyupagacchatā brahmāṇḍasya anaṅgīkṛta tvāt brahmāṇḍa abhāve api kārya antara avasthiti sambhavena pralaya asiddheḥ ca kapi kapola antargata audumbara udara varti maśaka śarīra ādi vat kārya antara avasthānam asambhāvitam iti ced na kuṇḍa badara vat upapatteḥ kālāgni rudra ādi prakriyāyāḥ asiddha tvāt dvitīye api na pralaya siddhiḥ yathā hi idānīntanānām dahana pavana santānānām krameṇa astamaye api na pralayaḥ tathā taru giri śarīra ādi santānānām api krama ārambha siddhau= api avayavi śūnya samayā siddheḥ atha ekadā eva iti viśeṣaṇam upādīyeta tadā krama ārabdha dahana pavana ādi santānaiḥ vyabhicāraḥ syāt eka darambhaka hetu sākalye sati iti hetu viśeṣaṇe viśeṣaṇā siddhiḥ dvayaṇuka ādi krameṇa ārambha svīkāreṇa bādha ādi prasaṅgaḥ ca 
NSu_2.1.78ab.8	 etena dvitīya anumānam api nirastam brahmāṇḍa anabhyupagamāt abhyupagame api avayavānām āvāpa uddhārābhyām eva utpāda vināśayoḥ upapatteḥ kārya antara avasthāna upapatteḥ ca tṛtīye api apasiddhāntaḥ krameṇa ucchedasya abhyupagamāt caturthe api paṭa ādibhyaḥ pūrva vinaṣṭaiḥ tantu ādi bhivyarbhicāraḥ parama aṇu tvena hetu viśeṣaṇe api dvayaṇuka ādi avasthāna sambhavena dṛṣṭāntasya sandigdha sādhyatā pañcame api kim bhū golakāḥ eva santāna śabdena ucyante tad atiriktaḥ vā kaścid ādye siddha sādhanam avayavānām āvāpa uddhārābhyām santata utpatti vināśa siddheḥ dvitīye tu āśraya asiddhiḥ ṣaṣṭham tu ābhāsa samāna yogakṣema tvāt upekṣaṇīyam iti 
NSu_2.1.78ab.9–2.1.78ab.10	 atha mā bhūt anumānaiḥ pralaya siddhiḥ tathā api āgamaiḥ bhaviṣyati teṣām siddhārthe api prāmāṇyasya sādhita tvāt tatas na aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā iti brūṣe tarhi asmākam api dharma ādi siddhiḥ āgamāt bhaviṣyati iti katham āśrayā siddhiḥ iti evam pralaye jīveśvara sadbhāvam sādhayatā dharma ādi sattvam api sādhitam iti na pralaye bhāva mātrā sattva sādhanam yuktam evam ādi kāryam pakṣīkṛtya sa upādāna tva sādhane prakṛti ādi siddhiḥ api draṣṭavyā iti prathama sūtre abhāvasya kartṛ tva nirāsāya anumānam uktam idānīm itas api na abhāva kartṛkam jagat cetana kartṛka tva īdṛṣṭānta bhāvāt a iti sūtrasya vṛtti antaram abhipretya cetana kartṛka tve anumānam āha utpatti iti 
NSu_2.1.78cd.1–2.1.79ab.3	 utpatti nāśa kārī hi buddhimān dṛśyate kvacid tad dṛṣṭāntena sarvatra kartā kim na anumīyate buddhimān utpatti nāśa kārī iti buddhi pūrvam tat kartā iti arthaḥ kvacid paṭa ādau sarvatra vipratipanne kārye mahat ādi kāryaḥ iti eva ukte aṅkura ādau vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkayeta tad artham tasya api pakṣa nikṣepa artham sarvatra iti uktam kartā buddhimān iti śeṣaḥ anyathā bhāva kartṛ tva vādinam prati siddha sādhana tā prasaṅgāt kim ākṣepe ananumāne na kim api kāraṇam dṛṣṭānta abhāvena pratipakṣā sambhavāt iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.1.79ab.4–2.1.79ab.5	 etena sva pakṣa doṣāt ca a iti sūtram api vyākhyātam bhavati ayam atra prayoga kramaḥ vimatam kāryam cetanā utpādyam kārya tvāt ghaṭa vat cetana vināśyam ca tatas eva tadvat eva vimata utpattiḥ cetana kartṛkā utpatti tvāt paṭa utpatti vat vimataḥ vināśaḥ cetana kartṛkaḥ vināśa tvāt sammata vat iti atra vināśasya cetana kartṛka tva sādhanam prāsaṅgikam yat vā kecid kāraṇasya bīja ādeḥ pradhvaṃsena aṅkura ādeḥ janma darśanāt tantu ādi nāśena paṭa ādi nāśadaśarnāt ca pradhvaṃsa abhāvasya eva jagat janma vināśa kartṛ tvam āsthitāḥ yathā uktam na anupamṛdya prādurbhāvāt iti tat matam vātrāsat iti ādi sūtraiḥ nirākṛtam iti jñāpana artham dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ tu svayam ūhanīyaḥ nanu idam anumānena īśvarasya jagat kartṛ tva sādhanam sūtrakārasya ukta viruddham śāstra yoni tvāt iti īśvare anumāna prāmāṇyasya svayam eva nirākṛta tvāt iti atas āha āgama iti 
NSu_2.1.79cd.1–2.1.79cd.3	 āgama anugṛhītā tu mānam anumā iti vakṣyamāṇam atra api sambaddhayate na sarvathā api īśvare anumānasya prāmāṇyam sūtra kṛtā nirākṛtam kinnām a āgamān anugṛhītasya āgama anugṛhītā tu anumā īśvare mānam eva abhimatā anyathā veda vākya arthe yukti anusandhāna rūpa jijñāsā na ārabheta iti kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha eṣā iti 
NSu_2.1.79d.1–2.1.79d.3	 eṣā anumāpitu āgama anugṛhīta iti anuvartate mānam iti ca eṣā samprati upanyastā api anumāyataḥ vā imāni bhūtāni a iti āgama anugṛhītā tatas bhavati īśvare mānam iti na kaścid virodhaḥ iti evam anumānena abhāva kartṛka tvam viśvasya āśaṅkayā anumānena eva īśvara kartṛka tvam samarthitam tat etat mata antareṇa ākṣipya samādadhat sūtram tarka apratiṣṭhānāt api anyathā anumeyam iti ced evam api anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti tatra ākṣepasya ayam arthaḥ na ayam anumāna a= aṣṭambhena pūvarpakṣaḥ pramāṇena ca siddhāntaḥ bhavati na ca anumānam nāma pramāṇam asti anyathā api anumeyam asat pratipakṣa tvam hi anumāna prāmāṇya vādibhiḥ anumāna aṅgam aṅgīkaraṇīyam pratiruddhasya karaṇasya kvāpi kriyā niṣpādaka tva adarśanāt anumāna pratipannam ca anyathā api anumeyam anumātum śakyam kasmāt tarka apratiṣṭhānām evam eva anumātavyam na punar anyathā a iti tarkasya vyavasthā bhāvāt tathā ca uktam upādhi pratipakṣau tu kva nāma atīva durvacau a iti 
NSu_2.1.79d.4–2.1.79d.6	 nanu idam vyadhikaraṇam tarkasya apratiṣṭhita tvāt anyathā anumeyam iti mā evam etat anena jñāpayati sūtrakāraḥ na tarkaḥ anumānāt bhidyate a iti athavā tarkasya anumānasya apratiṣṭhānāt apramāṇa tvāt na anumānena pūrva uttara pakṣau yuktau katham apramāṇa tvāt yatas anyathā anumeyam iti yojanā tatra samādhāna sūtram saṅgamayitum utsūtram eva bhāṣya kāraḥ tāvat uttaram āha āgama iti tarka apratiṣṭhānāt api anyathā anumeyam iti ced evam api anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ 
NSu_2.1.80ab.1–2.1.80ab.3	 āgama anugraha abhāve na tarkaḥ syāt pratiṣṭhitaḥ āgama grahaṇam pramāṇa mātra upalakṣaṇam atas eva uttara ardhe akṣajam api saṅgṛhītam pramāṇa anugraha pramāṇa mūla tva śabdābhyām pratiṣṭhita prāmāṇya pramāṇa antara avadhṛta pakṣa liṅga vyāptimat tvam tad saṃvādi tvam ca ucyate tatra ādya yojana āyām asya ayam arthaḥ yat uktam anumānasya avyavasthita tvena sarvatra pratyanumāna sambhavaḥ iti tad anupapannam yatas pramāṇa anugraha abhāve tarkaḥ na pratiṣṭhitaḥ syāt kintu pramāṇa mūlasya eva asya pratiṣṭhitiḥ syāt etat uktam bhavati pratyanumānam bhavat kim pramāṇa anugraha rahitam syāt uta tad mūlam ādyam tu katham svayam adṛḍha bhūmikam param pratirundhyāt na hi bhavati tarakṣoḥ pratipakṣaḥ hariṇa śāvaḥ kintvā ādyena eva pramāṇa mūlena bādhyate dvitīyam tu syāt eva pramāṇam 
NSu_2.1.80ab.4–2.1.80ab.5	 ādyam ca apabādheta ubhayathā api na sarva anumāna aprāmāṇyam yada tu ubhayoḥ api pramāṇa mūla tva sandehaḥ tadā astu pratirodhaḥ kintu na evam sarvatra avadhāraṇāyām tu pūrvā eva gatiḥ iti dvitīya yojanāyām tu praṣṭavyam kim pramāṇa anugraha rahitam anumānam pratyanumāna parāhata tvāt apramāṇam uta tad mūlam ādye sampratipattim uttaram āha āgama iti na evam sarvatra iti bhāvaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ pramāṇa bhūtaḥ dvitīye tu āha akṣa ja iti 
NSu_2.1.80cd.1–2.1.80cd.3	 akṣaja āgama mūlasya syāt eva asya pratiṣṭhitiḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ prāmāṇyam tena eva pratiprayogasya bādhita tvāt ubhayoḥ vāstava pramāṇa mūla tva asambhavāt iti bhāvaḥ yaḥ tu etām vyavasthām anabhyupagamya sarvatra api pratipakṣasya asti avakāśa iti sarvam anumānam apramāṇam iti ca manyate tasya sūtra ārūḍham uttaram āha anyathā iti 
NSu_2.1.80ef.1–2.1.80ef.2	 anyathā asya apratiṣṭhā ca sva vācā vyāhatā eva hi etena evam upapādite api yaḥ na evam manyate tasya sva vacana vyāghātāt anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti sūtra yojanā sūcitā tathā hi sarvam anumāna pramāṇam pratipakṣa pratihata tvāt iti tvadīyam anumānam pratipakṣa parāhatam ca apramāṇam ca bhavati na vā ādye na anena sarvasya aprāmāṇya siddhiḥ dvitīye tu atra eva bādhāt iti anyathā ukta vyavasthām vihāya asya sarvasya api anumānasya apratiṣṭhā apramāṇa tā sva vācā eva vyāhatā hi iti 
NSu_2.1.80ef.3–2.1.80ef.5	 apare tuna vilakṣaṇa tvāt a ityādīni sūtrāṇi brahmaṇaḥ jagat upādāna tva ākṣepa samādhāna artha tayā vyācakṣate tad prakṛti adhikaraṇaḥ eva nirākṛtam yat ca atra sūtre tarka apratiṣṭhānāt iti vākyam bhittvā siddhānta tayā eva varṇayanti tat vā anena sārdhena ślokena nirācaṣṭe tathā hi tarkasya apratiṣṭhām vadan vaktavyaḥ kim pramāṇa anugraha rahitasya uta tad mūlasya ādye gūḍha abhisandhiḥ uttaram āha āgama iti ayam āśayaḥ satyam etat tathā api na sāṅkhayaḥ sva tarkasya āgama ādi anugraha abhāvam manyate sva matena idam ucyate ced paunaruktyam śāstra yoni tvāt īkṣateḥ na aśabdam ānu mānikam iti adina asya arthasya ukta tvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.80ef.6	 dvitīyam dūṣayati akṣa ja iti na hi jñāna karaṇasya pramāṇa gṛhīta vyāpti ādimattvena aprāmāṇya kāraṇa vyabhicāra ādi śaṅkā kalaṅka vikalasya prāmāṇyam na asti iti yuktam iti bhāvaḥ vipakṣe bādhakam ca āha anyathā iti anyathā ukta anabhyupagamena asya pramāṇa mūlasya api anumānasya apratiṣṭhā sva vācā vyāhatā eva sūtra kṛtaḥ syāt svayam eva hi yukti anusandhāna rūpām brahmamīmāṃsām ārabhya pramāṇa mūlasya api tarkasya aprāmāṇyam abhidadhānaḥ sūtra kāraḥ na vyāhata bhāṣī katham syāt yat api vṛtti kāraiḥ uktam ekena tārkikeṇa utprekṣitam tarkam aparaḥ dūṣayati tena utprekṣitam api aparaḥ iti atas puruṣam ati vaiśvarūpya janmā tarkaḥ syāt apratiṣṭhitaḥ a iti tat ca ayuktam yatas asya api tarkasya prāmāṇye aprāmāṇye vai asya apratiṣṭhā ca sva vyāhatā eva iti na ayam vākya bhedaḥ yuktaḥ iti uktaḥ eva sūtra arthaḥ 
NSu_2.1.80ef.7–2.1.80ef.8	 atra sūtram etena śiṣyāḥ aparigrahāḥ api vyākhyātāḥ iti tat kecid vayā ācakṣate etenana vilakṣaṇa tvāt a ityādinā prakṛtena śiṣyaiḥ kenacid aṃśena parigṛhītasya pradhāna kāraṇa vādasya nirākaraṇena śiṣyaiḥ manuvyāsa prabhṛtibhiḥ kenacid api aṃśena aparigṛhītāḥ ye aṇu ādi kāraṇa vādāḥ te api vyākhyātāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ iti tat idam dūṣayati na ca iti etena śiṣṭa aparigrahāḥ api vyākhyātāḥ 
NSu_2.1.81ab.1–2.1.81ab.3	 na ca śiṣyā gṛhīta tvam nirīśāt īśa vādinaḥ āstām tāvat abhyadhikā śaṅkā prakāraḥ parihāra atideśa prakāraḥ ca yat tāvat uktamsa aṅkhayāt api vaiśeṣika ādeḥ atiśayena śiṣyā gṛhīta tvam a tat ati viruddham sāṅkhayasya nirīśvara tvāt vaiśeṣika ādeḥ tu sa īśvara tvāt vaiparītyasya eva ucita tvāt iha hi brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tve vipratipattayaḥ nirasyante tatra sāṅkhayaḥ brahma eva na abhyupaiti kutas tadīyam jagat kāraṇa tvam iti atiśayena vedānta vāda virodhi tvāt śiṣya aparigṛhītaḥ vaiśeṣika ādiḥ tu brahma tasya jagat nimitta tvam ca aṅgīkṛtya upādāna tā mātram na aṅgīkurutaḥ iti īṣa dvi rodhi tvāt īṣat śiṣyā parigṛhītaḥ iti yuktam satkārya vādi tva ādikam tu prakṛta asaṅgatam eva anyathā yāgīyahiṃsā niṣedha ādinā viparivartaḥ syāt atha veda saṃvāda bāhulya ābāhulya prayuktam idam mā evam pratipādyānām a parisaṅkha yāta tvāt iti kim tarhi asya sūtrasya abhidheyam iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_2.1.81cd.1–2.1.81cd.3	 artha avaśiṣṭa jīva ādi kartṛ tā atra niṣidhyate artha antarasya nirākṛta tvāt iti arthaḥ apavyākhyāna nirākaraṇasya sva vyākhyāna dārḍhyā atha ṛtvā at na asaṅgatam iti sūcayitum ataḥ iti uktam avaśiṣyāḥ nirākṛtāyāḥ abhāva kartṛ tāyāḥ jīva ādi kartṛ tā jagataḥ iti śeṣaḥ anena nirākṛtāt avaśiṣyāḥ veda aparigṛhītāḥ jīva pradhāna asat kāla svabhāva ādi vādāḥ nirākṛtāḥ iti vyākhyātam bhavati tatra śiṣyāḥ iti eva ukte brahma kāraṇa vādaḥ api prāpnoti tad artham aparigrahāḥ iti uktam tanmātre tu ukte abhāva kartṛ tva vādaḥ api gṛhyeta tathā ca punaruktiḥ atideśa anupapattiḥ ca syāt atas śiṣyāḥ iti uktam abhyadhikā śaṅkā sadbhāva sūcanena sūtra ārambha upapādana artham ca śiṣyāḥ śiṣya tayā pratītāḥ na tu tatas eva nirākṛta tayā iti nanu jīva ādi iti āsida grahaṇena asatkartṛka tvam gṛhītam tasyaa sat iti cet a ityādinā nirasta tvena paunarukti ādi prasaṅgāt iti atas āha tad manaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.82.1–2.1.83ab.2	 tad manaḥ akuruta iti ādeḥ asataḥ manasaḥ janiḥ nivāritā tu pūrvatra hi akasmāt iti tat vinā asataḥ viśva jananam āśaṅkayā atra niṣiddhayate ityādeḥ pramāṇāt āśaṅkitā iti śeṣaḥ ādipadena ukta yuktiḥ gṛhyate asataḥ abhāvasya manasaḥ iti jñāna icchā prayatnebhyaḥ janiḥ jagataḥ iti śeṣaḥ pūrvatra tu iti sambandhaḥ tat ca pratiṣedha mātra tvāt ityādinā sphuṭam avagamyate iti hi śabdaḥ akasmāt hi idam āvirāsīt iti ādi śrutyā tat manaḥ vinā asataḥ śūnyāt 
NSu_2.1.83ab.3	 etat uktam bhavati pūvarma bhāvasya jagat kāraṇa tvam nirākṛtam idānīm tu śūnyasya kiñca pūrvam kartṛ tvena adhunā kartṛ tām vinā eveti na paunarukti ādi iti yat vā bhāṣya diśā niṣkāraṇa eva atra jagat janiḥ āśaṅkitā iti na paunarukti ādikam atra śaṅkā prāpaka pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ tu asya eva prameya bhedasya upapādana artham 
NSu_2.1.83ab.4–2.1.83ab.5	 etena abhyadhikā śaṅkā api sūcitā tathā hi mā bhūt abhāva kartṛkam jagat tathā api jīva ādibhyaḥ janimat bhaviṣyati jīvāt bhavanti bhūtāni a pradhānāt idam utpannam a akasmāt hīdam āvirāsīda ityādi śruti anugṛhītebhyaḥ ghaṭa dadhi kaṇṭa taikṣṇa ādi dṛṣṭāntebhyaḥ na hi jīva ādīnām pratiṣedha mātra tvam asti yena ukta yukti virodhaḥ syāt asattva acetana tva ādeḥ upalakṣaṇam etat iti ced kim atra āsat ādeḥ kāraṇa tva mātram na iti ucyate kiṃvā kartṛ tvam na ādyaḥ ukta dṛṣṭānteṣu vyabhicārāt na dvitīyaḥ kartṛ tvasya asmābhiḥ anaṅgīkṛta tvāt iti atas eva atra sarvatra kartṛ śabdaḥ kāraṇa tva mātra paraḥ draṣṭavyaḥ nanu atra jīva ādeḥ viśvakāraṇa tva mātram śaṅkayate tasya eva vā ādye na siddhānta virodhaḥ jīvasya hi adṛṣṭa ādhāra tayā nimitta tvam pradhānasya ca upādāna tvam aṅgīkṛtam eva na dvitīyaḥ prāpaka abhāvāt kāryasya sa kartṛka tva niyama darśanāt ca iti atas āha prāpakam iti 
NSu_2.1.83c.1–2.1.83c.4	 prāpakam vākya mātram tu dvitīyaḥ eva aśaṅkayate tasya ca prāpakaṃ na jīvāt kāraṇam param a na hi anyat kāraṇam matam a ityādi vākyam na ca loka virodhaḥ vākya mātra siddhe arthe tad pratipannam eva gṛhyate na tu lokaḥ anugamyate iti pūrva pakṣī manyate iti nanu ca pradhāna kāraṇa tva ādi matāni dvitīya pāde nirākariṣyate teṣām atra api nirākaraṇe punarukti doṣaḥ syāt iti atas vā aha prāpakam iti atra śaṅkā prāpakam vākya mātram na tu samayaḥ iti arthaḥ idam uktam bhavati atra śruti anugṛhītābhiḥ yuktibhiḥ prāptam pradhāna ādi kāraṇa tvam nirākriyate uttaram tu tu sāṅkhayādi samaya prāptam atas api na ukta doṣaḥ iti nanu evam tarhi etena iti atideśaḥ katham ukta parihārasya pūrva pakṣiṇā parihṛta tvāt iti atas āha parihāraḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.83d.1–2.1.83d.3	 parihāraḥ viśeṣitaḥ yadi api pratiṣedha mātra tvam pradhāna ādiṣu asiddham acetana tva ādikam ca kāraṇa tva mātra vāde anaikāntikam tathā api pūrva pakṣāṇām yukti viruddha tvam yat pratiṣedha mātra tvāt dṛṣṭānta bhāvāt iti sāmānyatas sūcitam yat ca sva pakṣa doṣāt cetya prāmāṇika tvam sa parihāraḥ atra api aviśeṣitaḥ samānaḥ iti atideśaḥ yujyate iti arthaḥ nanu katham jagataḥ jīva kartṛ tva ādivādasya yukti viruddha tvam iti atas āha kvacid iti 
NSu_2.1.84.1–2.1.84.3	 kvacid jīva akṛtam dṛṣṭvā cetanāt eva ca akṛtam tadvat eva anumāni atra vastu tvāt kriyate śruteḥ kvacid deśa ādau yat vā kvacid jīva ādau akṛtam iti ca bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ kāraṇa tva mātram atra pūrva pakṣaḥ na kartṛ tvam iti atas acetanāt iti pañcamī prayogaḥ acetanāt akṛtam ca dṛṣṭvā eva śabdena dṛṣṭāntānām asat digdha sādhyatām āha anumā anumitiḥ anyathā vastu tvasya eva anumāna tvāt pañcamī na syāt jīvākṛta tva ādeḥ iti śeṣaḥ anyatra mahat ādau atra ete prayogāḥ mahat ādi kāryam na jīva kṛtam vastu tvāt jīva vat vimatam na pradhāna kāryam vastu tvāt pradhāna vat vimatam na asat kāryam vastu tvāt ghaṭa vat iti yadi api jīvasya nimitta tvena pradhānasya upādāna tvena jagat kāraṇa tvam aṅgīkṛtam eva tathā api svātantrya abhāva abhiprāyeṇa idam vacanam iti na virodhaḥ 
NSu_2.1.84.4	 nanu evam sati ati prasaṅgaḥ syāt vimatam aśvara kṛtam na bhavati vastu tvāt īśvara vat iti api prayoktum śakya tvāt iti atas āha śruteḥ iti saḥ idam sarvam asṛjata a iti ādi śruteḥ mahat ādeḥ īśvara kṛta tva avadhāraṇāt ati prasaṅga anumānasya bādhita tvena aprāmāṇyam iti samam tarhi idam bhavat anumāneṣu jīvāt bhavanti bhūtāni ityādi śruteḥ iti atas āha śruteḥ iti bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ jīva ādi śabdānām brahma śruti tvāt brahma nāma tvāt na śruti virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ tad kutas iti atas āha śruteḥ iti nāmāni sarvāṇi yamāviśanti a ityādi śruteḥ śeṣam bhāṣye 
NSu_2.1.84.5–2.1.84.6	 nanu jīva ādi kāraṇa tve api ghaṭa ādi dṛṣṭānta avaṣṭambhena anumāna sambhavāt katham aprāmāṇika tvam iti atas āha śruteḥ iti na anyaḥ atas asti kartā a ityādi śruteḥ bādhita viṣaya tvāt dṛṣṭāntānām sādhya vaikalyāt ca na anumānānām prāmāṇyam etena asmad anumāne akārya tvam upādhiḥ iti api nirastaḥ jīva ādya kṛte api ghaṭādau= akārya tva abhāvāt pratipakṣe bādha ādi doṣa anuṣaṅgāt ca iti sarvam sustham 
NSu_2.1.84.7–2.1.84.8	 bhoktrā patteḥ avibhāgaḥ ced syāt loka vat atīta adhikaraṇe brahmaṇaḥ jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tve śruti saṃvādi tvena prabalayā yuktyā virodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ idānīm tu śruti siddha tvena prabalayā yuktyā virodhaḥ parihriyate tathā hi na brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tvam vāstavam sambhavati asarva kāraṇena muktena atyanta abhinna tvāt na hi yaḥ yena atyanta abhinnaḥ sa tad viruddha svabhāvaḥ vastutas iti kvacid upalabdham na ca muktasya asarva kāraṇa tvam asiddham saṃsāre anupalambhāt saṃsāre pratīyamānasya kasyacid ākārasya eva apagamaḥ hi mokṣaḥ na tu apūrva ākāra utpādaḥ anitya tva prasaṅgāt 
NSu_2.1.84.9	 naca ānanda ādeḥ iva vidyamānasya eva avidyayā tirohita tvāt sarva kāraṇa tvasya anupalambhaḥ iti vācyam pramāṇa abhāvāt ānanda ādeḥ parama prema āspada tva ādinā īṣat upalabdheḥ ca na ca brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tva śravaṇāt sa vartha anupalabhyamānam api jagat kāraṇa tvam saṃsāre kalpyam iti yuktam śruteḥ kālpanika jagat kāraṇa tva anuvādi tvena api sa avakāśa tvāt na ca tathābhūtam eva lakṣaṇam astu iti vācyam anaṅgīkārāt kālpanikasya jagat kāraṇa tvasya pradhāna ādiṣu api sambhavena atiprasaṅgāt ca syāt etat muktasya brahmaṇā aikyam eva asiddham iti mā evam karmāṇi vijñāna mayaḥ ca ātmā pare avyaye sarve ekībhavanti a ityādi śruti siddha tvāt iti tat idam uktam sūtra kṛtā bhoktuḥ jīvasya mokṣe brahmatva āpatti śravaṇāt tayoḥ avibhāgaḥ bheda abhāvaḥ tatas ca na brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tvam vāstavam yuktam iti 
NSu_2.1.84.10–2.1.84.12	 evam prāpte siddhāntitam bhavet etat akhilam yadi muktasya brahmaṇā bhedaḥ eva prāmāṇikaḥ syāt na ca etat asti śrautaḥ tu ekībhāva prayogaḥ syāt loka vat yathā loke udake udakasya ekībhāva vyavahāraḥ sthāna aikya nibandhanaḥ yathā vā prāk vibhinnāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ sāmpratam ekībhūtāḥ iti mati ā aikya nibandhanaḥ tathā prāk vibhinna sthānāḥ bhinna matayaḥ ca jīvāḥ muktau brahmaṇā ekībhavanti eka sthānāḥ eka matayaḥ ca bhavanti iti upapadyate tasmāt asiddhena asiddha sādhanam etat iti tat etat ayuktam mukhya arthe bādhaka abhāvāt vinā bādhakena jaghanya vṛtti āśrayaṇe ca atiprasaṅgāt iti atas mukhya arthe bādhaka yukti vyutpādana paratvena api syāt loka vat iti sūtra khaṇḍam vyācaṣṭe na anyat iti bhoktrā āpatteḥ avibhāgaḥ ced syāt loka vat 
NSu_2.1.85.1–2.1.85.2	 na anyat anya tvam āpannam kvacid dṛṣṭam kathañcana atas jīvasya na brahma bhāvaḥ syāt hi kadācana atra mukhyam eva artham aṅgīkurvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ kim prāc abhinnasya eva jīvasya muktau brahmaṇā aikyam anena ucyate uta bhinnasya atha bhinna abhinnasya na ādyaḥ abhūta tad bhāva arthasya ekībhavanti iti cvipratyayasya eva anupapatteḥ atas eva na tṛtīyaḥ aikyasya prāk siddha tvāt bheda nivṛtti artha tve tu gauṇa artha tva āpatteḥ dvitīya nirākaraṇena nirasta tvāt dvitīye tu idam upatiṣṭhate na anyat iti hi śabdaḥ hetau yatas loke anyat vastu anya tvam vastu antareṇa abhedam āpannam kvacid kāle kathañcana upāyena na dṛṣṭam atas tat dṛṣṭāntena jīvasya api kadācana muktau= api brahma bhāvaḥ brahma tvam na syāt 
NSu_2.1.85.3	 ayam atra prayogaḥ jīvaḥ na kāla antare api brahmaṇā aikyam āpatsyate prāk tatas atyanta bhinna tvāt yaḥ kadācid yatas atyantam bhidyate na asau kadācid tat aikyam āpadyate yathā ghaṭaḥ paṭena iti athavā jīva brahmaṇoḥ bhedaḥ satoḥ bhedinoḥ na nivṛttimān bheda tvāt stambha kumbha ādi bheda vat iti āgama bādhitam etat iti ced na āgamānām mukhya artha tā sambhave anumāna bādhaka tvam bādhite ca anumāne teṣām mukhya artha tā iti paraspara āśraya tva prasaṅgāt sat pratipakṣa tvāt ca tathā hi śrutiḥ yathā udakam iti ādikāḥ pralhādaḥ api paramātma ātmanoḥ yogaḥ parama arthaḥ iti iṣyate mithyā etat anyat dravyam hi na eti tat dravya tām yataḥ a iti 
NSu_2.1.85.4	 atha matam na ayam asti yukti virodhaḥ prāk api abhinnaḥ eva brahmaṇā jīvaḥ iti aṅgīkārāt na ca cvipratyaya anupapattiḥ prati iti apekṣayā tad upapatteḥ prāk vibhinna tayā dṛṣṭaḥ ayam jīvaḥ brahmaṇaḥ atha idānīm muktau= abhinna tayā dṛśyate iti atas ekībhavanti iti ucyate iti atra idam vaktavyam kim prāktanī jīva brahmaṇoḥ bheda dṛṣṭiḥ bhrāntiḥ uta pramā iti na ādyaḥ bādhaka abhāvāt śrutayaḥ tvad yāpya vyavasthita arthāḥ na bādhaka tām aśnuvate dvitīye tu āha kvacid iti 
NSu_2.1.86.1–2.1.86.2	 kvacid bhinna tayā dṛṣṭam tad abhinnatayā katham dṛśyet naḥ dṛṣṭa pūrvam hi tādṛśam na ca dṛśyate kvacid kāle yat vastu yatas bhinna tayā pramitam tat kāla antare api katham tad abhinnatayā pratīyeta na kathañcid iti arthaḥ kutas iti atas āha naḥ dṛṣṭa pūrvam hi iti tādṛśam prāk bhinna tayā pramitam kāla antare abhinnatayā pramīyamāṇam 
NSu_2.1.86.3	 ayam iha prayogaḥ jīvaḥ na kadācid brahma abhinna tayā pramā viṣayaḥ tatas atyanta bhinna tayā pramita tvāt yat evam tat evam yathā ghaṭaḥ paṭāt bhinna tayā iti yaḥ tu kvacid api bheda pramām na manyate tam pratyāropita bhedam ekam vastu vyatireka udāharaṇam vācyam evañca pratītim upādāya api na cvipratyaya upapattiḥ etad artha tvena api syāt loka vat iti yojyam tat evam grāva plavana ādi śruti vat upapatti viruddha tvena śruteḥ mukhyā artha asambhavāda mukhya artha eva svīkaraṇīye parakīya hetoḥ asiddha tvāt na brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tve yukti virodhaḥ iti siddham 
NSu_2.1.86.4	 kecid idam sūtram anyathā vyācakṣate pūrvam kila cetana acetana ātmakasya prapañcasya brahma upādana tvena brahma ananya tvam uktam tat ākṣipya samādhātum idam sūtram tathā hi yadi cetana acetana ātmakasya jagataḥ brahma ananya tvam syāt tadā cetanaḥ bhoktā bhogyaḥ ca acetanāḥ viṣayāḥ iti ayam vibhāgaḥ na syāt kutas bhogyasya api bhoktṛ tvā āpatteḥ bhoktuḥ api bhogyatva āpatteḥ bhavitavyam ca anena vibhāgena pratyakṣa ādi siddha tvāt iti ced syāt loka vat yathā loke samudra ātmanām api phena taraṅga ādīnām na itara itara bhāva āpattyā vibhāga bhaṅgaḥ yathā vā mahākāśa ātmanām api ghaṭa maṭha ādi ākāśānām tathā prakṛte api syāt iti tat idam dūṣayati bhoktṛ tvā iti 
NSu_2.1.87a–2.1.87c.4	 bhoktṛ tvā āpattitaḥ iti yat matam tat kutas hariḥ bhoktrā āpatteḥ iti prāha yat yadi bhoktrā patteḥ iti atra bhoktra tva āpatteḥ iti vyākhyānam sūtra kārasya api matam syāt tat tarhi kutas hariḥ sūtra kṛt bhoktrā āpatteḥ iti āha bhoktṛ tvā āpatteḥ iti eva brūyāt na ca evam abravīt tatas na ayam abhiprāyaḥ sūtrakārasya iti yadi api atra pareṣām asmākam ca adhyāhāra sāmyam tathā api bhāva pratyaya abhāvaḥ parasya adhikaḥ ye tu vyācakṣatecit acit vastu śarīra tve brahmaṇaḥ jīva vat sukha duḥkha ādi bhoktṛ tva āpatteḥ jīva brahma svabhāva vibhāgaḥ na syāt iti ced na yathā kāntāre nipatitasya nṛpasya na daṃśa maśaka ādi upadravaḥ tathā atra api syāt a iti teṣām api ayam śabda doṣaḥ samānaḥ 
NSu_2.1.87a–2.1.87c.7	 nanu bhāva pradhānāḥ nirdeśāḥ tatra tatra bahulam upalabhyante tat katham ayam doṣaḥ abhidhīyate ayam abhisandhiḥ bhāṣya kārasya pratipādye vyavasthite tad bala acchābdī gauṇa tā kathañcid anusartavyā naca asya sūtrasya idam pratipādyam vyavasthitam jagat upādāna tvasya prāc anukta tvena anukta upālambha prasaṅgāt jagat śarīra tvasya antaryāmī adhikaraṇe prasakte api sambhoga prāptiḥ iti anena eva parihṛta tvāt tatra jīva śarīra gata tvena kata bhoktṛ tvam apāstam atra tu jagat śarīra tvena iti ced na pūrva uttara pakṣayoḥ nyāya aviśeṣe sūtra ārambha anupapatteḥ atas nirnimittaḥ śābda doṣaḥ api na anusaraṇa arhaḥ iti yat vaitad artha pratipādanāya katham ca iti ādi uttara vākyam atra api saṃyojya vyākhyeyam iti uktaḥ eva sūtra arthaḥ iti tad ananya tvam ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ prāk pramāṇa mūla tva tad saṃvādi tvābhyām prabalayā yuktyā uktethe virodhaḥ nirākṛtaḥ bāhulya lakṣaṇa balavat yukti virodha parihārāya idam adhikaraṇam ārabhyate 
NSu_2.1.87a–2.1.87c.8	 tat idam brahma pariṇāma vādī vyācaṣṭeanantara adhikaraṇe bhogya vargasya pariṇāmataḥ siddha prātisvika rūpa bhedān apahnavena loka siddha kāraṇa abhedam aṅgīkṛtya sāṅkhayasiddhāntena śāstrataḥ bhoktṛ vargasya svābhāvika rūpa brahma avibhāge bhogyasya api brahma aikya vat bhoktṛ tva āpattim āśaṅkaya anaikāntika tvena nirāsaḥ abhihitaḥ samprati vaiśeṣika ādi matena svarūpa kārya vyapadeśa ādi bhedena kāryasya kāraṇa ātma tva asiddhayā prapañcasya brahma advaitam ākṣipya samādhīyate tathā hi tat ananya tvam tena brahmaṇā ananya tvam kāryasya kutas ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ yathā somya ekena mṛd piṇḍena vijñātena sarvam mṛṇmayam vijñātam syāt vācā ārambhaṇam vikāraḥ nāmadheyam mṛttikā iti eva satyam a iti adi śabdāt ādi agrahaṇa āta etat ātmyam idam sarvam a yat ayam ātmā a sarvam khalu idam brahma a iti ādi tādātmya āvedaka śruti parigrahaḥ a iti 
NSu_2.1.87a–2.1.87c.11	 vivartavādī tu vyākhyāti abhyupagamya ca imam vyāvahārikam bhoktṛ bhogya lakṣaṇam vibhāgam syāt lokavat a iti parihāraḥ abhihitaḥ na tu ayam vibhāgaḥ pāramārthikaḥ asti yasmāt tat ananya tvam kāraṇāt brahmaṇaḥ kāryasya ākāśa ādeḥ paramārthataḥ ananya tvam vyatirekeṇa abhāvaḥ avagamyate kutas ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ a iti tatra ādyam vyākhyānam tāvat nirākaroti katham ca iti tad ananya tvam ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ 
NSu_2.1.87.1–2.1.87.3	 katham ca tad ananyatā katham iti ākṣepe caśabdaḥ pūrva sūtra apavyākhyāna ākṣepeṇa asya samuccaya arthaḥ jagataḥ iti vakṣyamāṇam atra api sambaddhayate atra pratipādyā syāt a iti śeṣaḥ ayam āśayaḥ yaḥ hi brahma upādāna tām jagataḥ abhyupagamya api tad anyatām manyate saḥ atra pūrva pakṣīkaraṇīyaḥ na ca vaiśeṣika ādiḥ tathā iti prāpti abhāvāt na tad ananyatva ukteḥ avasaraḥ asti brahma upādāna tām anaṅgīkurvāṇam prati tu sā eva samarthanīyāḥ na tu tad ananyatā tad adhīna siddhi tvāt asyāḥ atha brahma upāda āna tā api atra samarthyate iti ced na tathā sati prakṛti adhikaraṇa vaiyarthya āpatteḥ prakṛti adhikaraṇa nyāyena upapāditam abhyupetya api tad anyatām manyamānaḥ atra pūrvapakṣī iti ced na kim idam brahma upādāna tvam brahma samavāyi tvam vā brahma pariṇāma tvam vā yad pareṇa aṅgīkāritam na ādyaḥ tasya ananyatva virodhāt samavāyasya nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt ca dvitīye prayatna vaiyarthyam eva na hi kaḥ api pariṇāma vādam aṅgīkṛtya kāyarkāraṇayoḥ atyanta bhedam aṅgīkurute yam pratīdam ārabhyeta iti 
NSu_2.1.87.4	 yat vā katham ca tad ananyatā jagataḥ vaktum śakyate ananya tvam hi bheda abhāvaḥ atyanta abhedaḥ iti yāvat bheda abhedau ca pareṇa aṅgīkṛtau atas tādātmyam iti vaktavyam syāt na eṣa doṣaḥ yāvatā kāryasya kāraṇena abhedaḥ eva kāraṇasya tu kāryāt bhedaḥ eva iti evam bheda abhedau= aṅgīkṛtau= iti ced na yadi brahma jagataḥ anyat eva tadā katham ca tat ananya tvam jagataḥ syāt na hi yadi atas atyanta bhinnam tat tena atyanta abhinnam iti sambhavati atiprasaṅgāt iti 
NSu_2.1.87.5–2.1.87.6	 athavā katham ca tad ananyatā pratijñātum yuktāḥ pramāṇa abhāvāt iti śeṣaḥ nanu ca ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ iti ukta tvāt katham pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti ced atra vaktavyam ārambhaṇa śabdaḥ tāvat kim sākṣāt jagataḥ brahma ananya tvam ācakṣīta uta vikārasya vikāri ananya tvam ādye katham ca tad ananyatā jagatosya arthaḥ syāt yathā somya iti mṛd piṇḍa ādeḥ prakṛta tvāt iti uttaram dvitīye bhavatu nāma vikārasya vikāri ananya tvam jagataḥ tu katham tat ananyatā iti vikārasya vikāri ananya tve tena ukte api jagataḥ brahma ananya tvam siddhayati eva tasya api tad vikāra tvāt iti atas āha jagataḥ tu iti 
NSu_2.1.88ab.1–2.1.88ab.2	 jagataḥ tu avikāra tvaḥ ukta nyāyena sādhite avikāra tve brahma vikāra tva abhāve ukta nyāyena na ca prakṛtiḥ a ityādinā iti śeṣaḥ sādhite sati katham ca tad ananyatā iti anvayaḥ yat vā jagataḥ iti pūrveṇa eva sambaddhayate avikāra tve brahmaṇaḥ iti śeṣaḥ na vidyate vikāraḥ yasya iti avikāram tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam tasmin 
NSu_2.1.88ab.3	 nanu atra ārambhaṇa śabdena auta tam ādeśam aprākṣya a ityādyā śrutiḥ upalakṣyate tat tātparya paryālocanāyām ca jagataḥ brahma vikāra tvam tat anantyavam ca avagamyate iti ced na mahā vākya avāntara vākya upakrama tva pradhāna vāci tva ādi a bhāvena asya śruti upalakṣaṇayā upādāne nimitta abhāvāt abhyupetya api upalakṣaṇa tvam āha avikāra tvaḥ iti vikarātvāt anyasmin sādṛśya ādau śruti artha tayā ukta nyāyena sādhite sati śruti tātparya paryālocanayā ca katham tad ananyatā siddhayet iti 
NSu_2.1.88ab.4–2.1.88ab.5	 yat api uktam ādipada gṛhītāda etat ātmyam idam sarvam ityādi vākyāt tat ananyatva siddhiḥ iti tat api asat ādi padena vākya antara grahaṇasya anupapatteḥ tathā satyeteṣām api śabda tvena ārambhaṇa ādi śabdebhyaḥ iti prayoga prasaṅgāt astu vā kathañcid ādi pada upātta tāteṣām vākyānām tathā api na etebhyaḥ tad ananyatā siddhayati upapatti viruddha tvāt iti āśayena pṛcchati katham ca iti yā sūtra kṛtā pratijñātā śrutibhiḥ ca pratipāditā sā jagataḥ tad ananyatā katham kiṃprakārāḥ kim pikaḥ kokilaḥ a itivat eka tva lakṣaṇā kiṃvā mṛd ghaṭaḥ itivat vikāra vikāri tva lakṣaṇa iti praśna arthaḥ 
NSu_2.1.88ab.6	 ādyam ākṣipati katham ca iti ekatva lakṣaṇā jagataḥ tad ananyatā tu katham sūtra kṛtā pratijñāyeta katham ca śrutibhiḥ pratipādyeta na kathañcid iti arthaḥ atra hetum āha avikāra tvaḥ iti brahmaṇaḥ avikāra tvaḥ ukta nyāyena sādhite sati jagataḥ tu vikāra ātmaka tve pratyakṣa ādi pramite sati viruddha dharma adhikaraṇa tvāt iti bhāvaḥ dvitīyam ākṣipati katham ca iti vikāri vikāra tva rūpaḥ iti śeṣaḥ ākṣepe yuktim āha jagataḥ tu iti vyākhyānam pūrvavat 
NSu_2.1.88ab.7	 nanu evam upapatti viruddhā api jagataḥ brahma ananyata aṅgīkaraṇīyā anyathā etat ātmyam idam sarvam ityādi śrutīnām aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt iti atas āha katham ca iti avikāri tve api vikāra tvāt anyasmin= tad adhīna tva ādau śruti arthesvātantrye ca viśiṣṭa tve a iti ukta nyāyena sādhite sati katham tad ananyata aṅgīkartum ucitā sa avakāśa śruti pratītaḥ api arthaḥ niravakāśa upapatti virodhāt tyājyaḥ eva yathā uktam abhimāni adhikaraṇaḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.1.88ab.8–2.1.88ab.9	 aparam api vyākhyānam dūṣayati katham ca iti prāha iti anuvartate yadi atra kārya mātra prapañcasya anṛta tvam sūtra kṛtaḥ abhimatam syāt tadā anṛta tvam iti eva brūyāt tat ananyatvam iti katham prāha na hi brahma ananya tva śabdaḥ anṛta tva avācī tathā sati brahmaṇaḥ api anṛta tva prasaṅgāt nanu ca tat ananya tvam tadvayatirekeṇa abhāvaḥ iti vyākhyātam satyam na tathā api anṛta tva lābhaḥ tat vayatirekeṇa na asti iti ukte tad ātmanā asti iti labhyate na punar sarvathā api anṛta tvam anyathā brahma atirekeṇa asataḥ jīva caitanyasya api sarvathā anṛta tvam syāt prasiddham ca etat yad viśiṣṭa pratiṣedhaḥ viśeṣaṇam upasaṅkrāmati iti 
NSu_2.1.88ab.10–2.1.88ab.12	 satyam tathā api brahma vivartata ājñāpanāya evam uktam iti ced tathā sati tatra āropitam iti vaktavya tvāt nahi śuktikā śakale kaladhautam āropitam iti vaktavye tatas nanyat iti prayuñjate atha brahma sattayā eva idam sat na aparā sattā asya asti iti jñāpanam etasya prayojanam iti ced tarhi parama artha sadevedam iti āyātam iti katham anṛta tvam atha yā iyam prapañce sattā avagamyate sa adhiṣṭhāna brahma gatā eva āropitā iti anena jñāpyate iti ced tatmin i atha ākhyāti vādi vat anirvacanīya khyāti vādinaḥ api āropita ākārasya anyatra pāramārthyam āvaśyakam tathā tve ca ākāśa tva ādikam api brahmaṇi pāramārthikam aṅgīkāryam syāt rajata tva ādikam ca śuktikāyām iti 
NSu_2.1.88ab.13	 yat vā syāt loka vat iti bhoktṛ bhogya prapañcasya satya tām abhidhāya idānīm katham ca tat ananyatā iti tat viruddham anṛta tvam prāha iti yojanā nanu sūtrakāraḥ parama artha abhiprāyeṇa tat ananyatvam iti āha vyavahāra abhiprāyeṇa tu syāt loka vat iti tad kutas virodha sati ced na pratāraka tva prasaṅgāt anyathā pratyācakṣīta apratyākhyāya eva kārya prapañcam pariṇāma prakriyām āśrayati sa guṇeṣu upāsaneṣu upayokṣyate iti ced kim sa guṇa upāsana viṣaya prayojane prakṛta viṣaya prayojana anukūle uta tad viruddhe atha udāsīne na ādyaḥ bheda viṣaya tvāt sāṃsārika phala tvāt ca bheda vāsanā hi su dṛḍhā tām eva upodbalayet atas eva na tṛtīyaḥ api na dvitīyaḥ 
NSu_2.1.88ab.14–2.1.88ab.16	 anāpta tva aparihārāt iti athavā astām tāvat iyam grantha ārjava cintā katham ca tad ananyatā anṛta tva lakṣaṇā jagataḥ yuktā syāt na kathañcid iti yojyam atra hetum āha jagataḥ iti avikāritva brahma vivartatva abhāve yat ca avikṛtam ityādi ukta nyāyena evam pramāṇa abhāva paratvena api pūrvavat vaya ākhyeyam iti evam tarhi kaḥ asya arthaḥ iti atas āha svatantrā iti 
NSu_2.1.88cd.1–2.1.88cd.2^1	 svatantra kāraṇa anya tvam tena hi atra niṣiddhayate yatas evam jagataḥ brahma ananya tvam anekavidham api na atra pratipādyam tena iti arthaḥ anena apavyākhyāna nirākaraṇam sva vyākhyāna dṛḍhīkaraṇa artha tvāt na asaṅgatam iti smārayati kartṛ anadhīna sattā śakti ādimat kāraṇa antara ta vi apekṣā khalu ghaṭa ādi sṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭā tatas mahat ādi sṛṣṭiḥ api kartṛ vyatirikta svatantra kāraṇa savyapekṣā sṛṣṭi tvāt ghaṭa sṛṣṭi vat mahat ādikam vā kartṛ vyatirikta svatantra kāraṇa āyattaḥ sa apekṣā utpattikam kāya ṛtvāt ghaṭa vat prakṛti ādikam vā svatantram kāraṇa tvāt mṛdā ādi vat īśvaraḥ vā svatantra kāraṇa savyapekṣaḥ kartṛ tvāt kulāla vat iti yukti viruddha tvāt janma ādi sūtre abhipretam yat parasya eva brahmaṇaḥ svātantryam tat na upapadyate 
NSu_2.1.88cd.2^2	 na ca śruti virodhaḥ śrutīnām brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tva mātra paratvāt svatantra kāraṇa antara nirāse śruteḥ abhāvāt bhāve api apauruṣeya tayā śruti prābalya vat bāhulyena yukti prābalyasya api sambhavāt sat pratipakṣa tayā śrutyā abhipreta avadhāraṇa anupapatteḥ iti evam prāptam svatantra kāraṇa anya tvam brahmaṇaḥ anyasya svatantra kāraṇa tvam iti yāvat atra adhikaraṇe tat ananyatvam iti anena niṣiddhayate mahat ādi sṛṣṭau yat svatantra kāraṇam tasya tat ananyatvam iti 
NSu_2.1.88cd.3	 yadi atra svatantra kāraṇā bhāvaḥ iti eva brūyāt tadā brahmaṇaḥ api svātantryam pratiṣiddham syāt tat ananya tvam svatantra kāraṇasya iti ukte hi svatantra kāraṇam tat eva na anyat iti labhyate tad upapādanāya yata ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ a iti sva pakṣe pramāṇam uktam yaḥ ca bhāve ca upalabdheḥ a iti vipakṣe pramāṇa abhāvaḥ tat ubhayam hi śabdena sūcayati 
NSu_2.1.88cd.4	 nanu ārambhaṇa ādi ākṣepa śabda ādibhyaḥ iti vaktavyam satyam lakṣita lakṣaṇayā eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ pratipādyate iti adoṣaḥ tathā api kiṃsvidāsīt adhiṣṭhānam a iti śrauta nirdeśa anusāreṇa adhiṣṭhānasya upādānam ucitam iti ced na śābdāt api artha prādhānyasya balavat tvāt sādhakatamam karaṇam iti vacanāt nanu ca svatantra kāraṇasya brahma ananya tvam pratijñāya kāraṇa antara abhāve pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ asaṅgataḥ mā evam asti atra abhiprāyaḥ vakṣyate ca brahma atirikta prakṛti ādi kāraṇa sadbhāvaḥ ārambhaṇa śabda ādibhyaḥ tad abhāvaḥ avagamyate tata ūrthāt svatantra kāraṇa antara bhāve ca pramāṇaiḥ upalabdheḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti vadan pramāṇa abhāvam āha evam manyate śuṣkābhyaḥ bahu yuktibhyaḥ api śruti anugṛhītānām bahvīnām yuktīnām prābalyāt tat viruddhānām pūrva pakṣa yuktīnāma prāmāṇyam iti 
NSu_2.1.88cd.5–2.1.88cd.7	 syāt etat adbhayaḥ sambhūtaḥ iti ādi vacanāt katham brahma atiriktasya svatantra kāraṇasya anupalabdhiḥ na ca atra na svātantryam śrūyate iti vācyam pāratantrya anuktau svātantryasya loka anurodhāt eva siddheḥ iti etat parihārāya sūtram sattvāt ca avarasya iti tasya athaḥ syāt ayam doṣaḥ yadi vayam brahma atiriktam kāraṇam eva na asti iti vadāmaḥ na ca evam avarasya tad adhīnasya prakṛti ādeḥ kāraṇasya sattvāt iti tat idam parihārāya na paryāptam yāvatā pūrva pakṣiṇā pāratantrya anuktau svātantryam eva sa ityasyati iti uktam anyathā pūrva pakṣasya nirdala tva āpatteḥ iti atas prakṛti ādeḥ kāraṇa jātasya īśvara adhīna sattāka tva pramāṇam darśayan sūtram vyācaṣṭe dravyam iti sattvāt ca aparasya asat vyapadeśāt na iti ced na dharma antareṇa vākya śeṣāt 
NSu_2.1.89a–2.1.89f.2	 dravyam karma ca kālaḥ ca svabhāvaḥ cetanā dhṛtiḥ yad prasādāt ime santi na santi yat upekṣayā iti śruteḥ tad vaśasya bhāvaḥ cetanāḥ jīvāḥ dhṛtiḥ cit prakṛtiḥ dhāraka tvāt a iti śruteḥ prakṛti ādeḥ tad vaśasya bhāvaḥ aṅgīkriyate atas adbhayaḥ sambhūtaḥ iti atra api svātantrya asiddheḥ na anupalabdhiḥ yuktā iti arthaḥ yadi api ārambhaṇa śabda ādeḥ adbhayaḥ sambhūtaḥ iti śruteḥ ca paraspara viredhāt artha āpattyā eva eṣaḥ arthaḥ labhyate tathā api manda apekṣayā spaṣṭa śruti udāharaṇam 
NSu_2.1.89a–2.1.89f.4	 yat vā svatantra kāraṇa anya tvam niṣiddhayate iti anena paratantra kāṇa antara sadbhāvaḥ sūcitaḥ anyathā kāraṇa anyatvam iti eva syāt paratantra kāraṇa sadbhāvaḥ kṛtaḥ iti atas āha dravyam iti bhāvaḥ gamyate iti śeṣaḥ atra tad vaśa tvam vidheyam kāra rasadbhāvasya pareṇa api aṅgīkṛta tvāt asa dvaya padeśāt na iti ced na dharma antareṇa vākya śeṣāt iti sūtram tatra ākṣepasya ayam arthaḥ na asat āsīt nosadāsīt tadānīma iti mahāpralaye mūrtā mūrta ādeḥ aśeṣasya asattva vyapadeśāt kāraṇa upalabdhi paricodanā tasya īśvara vaśasya aṅgīkāreṇa samādhānam ca na upapadyate naca ayam pakṣaḥ asat iti cet a ityādinā eva nirākṛtaḥ tatra īśvarasya api anaṅgīkārāt iha punar īśvaram aṅgīkṛtya kāraṇa antara nirākaraṇāt nacaat bhayaḥ sambhūtaḥ a ityādi virodhaḥ 
NSu_2.1.89a–2.1.89f.6	 atra mahāpralaye kāraṇa antara sadbhāvasya aśravaṇāt īśvara atirikta kartṛkāsu sṛṣṭiṣvabādi kāraṇa sadbhāva paratvāt ca evañca ārambhaṇa śabda ādayaḥ api samañjasā bhavanti iti na iti siddhānta aṃśam vyācaṣṭe dravyam iti na mahāpralaye kāraṇa antarasya abhāvaḥ vācyaḥ kintu tad vaśasya bhāvaḥ eva tasya tad vaśa tvam kutas iti ced dravyam iti śruteḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.89a–2.1.89f.7	 nanunāsadāsīt a iti sarvasya asattva vyapadeśāt katham na iti atas uktaṃdharma antareṇa a iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe tad vaśasya iti sa avadhāraṇam ca idam tad vaśasya eva bhāvaḥ pralaye na svatantrasya tatas svātantrya lakṣaṇa dharma viśeṣa abhiprāyeṇa asattva vyapadeśaḥ yujyate upalakṣaṇam etat yathā uktam bhāṣye yat khalu paratantram avyaktam kārya anabhimukham tat asat iti vyapadiśyate 
NSu_2.1.89a–2.1.89f.9	 kutas śruteḥ mukhya artha parityāgena amukhya arthaḥ aṅgīkriyate tamaḥ āsīt a ityādi vākya śeṣāt na ca tamaḥ brahma ānīdavātam a iti tasya pṛthak avasthāna ukteḥ naca ananta prakāśasya tamaḥ tvam upapadyate kintu prakṛteḥ eva ācchādaka tva ādeḥ iti nanu ca pralaye avasthitam ced prakṛti ādi tasya svātantrya ādi dharma abhāvaḥ kutas yena evam vyākhyāyate iti ced vākya upakrama tad śeṣayoḥ virodhāt arthāpattyā eva iti brūmaḥ śrūyate ca spaṣṭam iti āśayavān vākya śeṣāt iti etad prakāra antareṇa vyācaṣṭe na paraḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.89f.1–2.1.89f.2	 na paraḥ iti atas tasmāt dha anyatra paraḥ kiñca nāsa a iti atas vākya śeṣāt prakṛti ādīnām pralaye svātantrya ādi abhāvaḥ avagamyate iti arthaḥ iha hi tasmāt brahmaṇaḥ anyat prakṛti ādikam paraḥ param svātantrya ādi dharma upetam nāsā iti tad sadbhāva abhyupagamena paratvam niṣiddhayate anyathā para śabda vaiyarthyāt iti 
NSu_2.1.89f.3	 syāt etat kāraṇa antara sadbhāvam abhyupagamya tasya īśvara adhīna tām vadatā siddhāntinā idam vaktavyam kim īśvaraḥ prakṛti ādibhiḥ vinā api kadācid sṛṣṭayā ādikam karoti uta taiḥ eva iti niyamaḥ ādye teṣām katham kāraṇa tvam aniyata tvāt anyathā rāsabhasya api ghaṭa kāraṇa tā āpatteḥ dvitīye tu katham tad parityāgena kadāpi akurvāṇasya īśvarasya svātantryam katham ca niyamena apekṣaṇīyānām teṣām pāratantryam evam pṛkṛtya eva mahāntam mahatā eva ahaṅkāram ityādi niyamam kadācid apahāya sṛjati uta anena niyamena eva ādye tu aniyata tvena akāraṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ dvitīye punar īśvara ādeḥ svātantrya ādi anupapattiḥ tathā prakṛti ādikam upādānīkṛtya kāla ādikam nimittīkṛtya sṛjati iti niyame vyatyāse ca ukta doṣa anuṣaṅgaḥ 
NSu_2.1.89f.4–2.1.89f.6^1	 atas yukti bādhita tvāt asya arthasya kāraṇa antara nirapekṣaḥ eva bhagavantsṛṣṭayā ādikam karāti iti eva jyāyaḥ evañca nirargalam aiśvaryam asya samarthitam syāt na ca pramāṇa bādhaḥ adbhayaḥ sambhūtaḥ pṛthivyai rasāt ca ityādeḥ anīśvara kartṛ kā avāntara sṛṣṭi viṣaya tvasya ukta tvāt tamaḥ āsīt iti ādau tamaḥ prabhṛtīnām pralaye sattva śravaṇe a pīśvara kartṛkāyām sṛṣṭau kāraṇa tva aśravaṇa āt itya āśaṅkā apanodana artham sūtram  yukteḥ śabda antarāt ca iti asya ayam arthaḥ na ukta yukti virodhena bhagavataḥ kāraṇa antara vidhura tvam urarīkartavyam 
NSu_2.1.89f.4–2.1.89f.6^2	 kāraṇa antara sadbhāva abhyupagame api prakṛti ādeḥ kāraṇa tvasya īśvara ādi svātantrya ādikasya ca yukteḥ na ca evam tarhi vinigamane kāraṇa abhāvaḥ iti vācyam adbhayaḥ sambhūtaḥ hiraṇyagarbhaḥ ityādi śabda antarāt pūrva udāhṛta śabda vilakṣaṇa śabdaḥ śabda antaram tena idam uktam bhavati yadi api prāc udāhṛtāḥ śabdāḥ kathañcid anyathā netu śakyante tathā api ayam na tathā atra īśvara kartṛ kāyām eva sṛṣṭau kāraṇa antara sadbhāva śravaṇāt na hi hiraṇyagarbha sṛṣṭiḥ anīśvara kartṛkā tasya eva prathama ja tvāt iti atra yukteḥ iti yā sva pakṣe kāraṇa tva ādeḥ ghaṭana uktā sā katham iti apekṣāyām āha śaktaḥ api iti yukteḥ śabda antarāt ca 
NSu_2.1.90.1–2.1.90.2	 śaktaḥ api hi anyathākartum sva icchā niyamataḥ hariḥ kāraṇaiḥ niyataiḥ eva karoti idam jagat sadā anyathā kāraṇaiḥ vinā kartum śaktaḥ api hariḥ kāraṇa antarāṇi upādāya eva kariṣyāmi iti sva icchā niyamataḥ kāraṇaiḥ eva idam jagat sadā sṛjati evam anyathā prakṛtyā ahaṅkāram ahaṅkāreṇa mahāntam iti evam tathā prakṛtim nimittīkṛtya kāla ādikam ca upādānīkṛtya kartum śaktaḥ api etena eva idam etat upādānīkṛtyā eva idam srakṣyāmi iti sva icchā niyamataḥ niyataiḥ kptaiḥ eva tathā niyataiḥ sva niyata sattā śakti ādimadbhiḥ eva kāraṇaiḥ idam jagat sadā karoti iti yojanā 
NSu_2.1.90.3	 idam uktam bhavati yat uktam īśvarasya kāraṇa upādāna ādi niyamaḥ asti na vā iti tatra asti iti brūmaḥ tathā ca prakṛti ādīnām kāraṇa tvam yuktam sa ca niyamaḥ na kulāla ādeḥ iva tāni apahāya vyatyasya vai akaraṇe śakti abhāva nibandhanaḥ yena tasya svātantryam teṣām ca pāratantryam na syāt kinnāma sva icchā āyatte eva tatas svātantrya ādikam api yuktam na ca tāni svādhīna sattā śakti ādimanti yena aiśvaryam nirargalam na syāt kintu bhagavati eva tadīyam sattā ādikam āyatate tatas tat sācivyam atiśayena aiśvaryasya dyotakam eva yathā uktamsādhanānām sādhana tvam yadā atma adhīnam iṣyate tadā sādhana sampattiḥ aiśvaryadyotikā bhavet a iti 
NSu_2.1.90.4–2.1.90.5	 nanu śaktasya api īśvarasya tad niyama anusaraṇa icchā kutas iti ced kim kāraṇam pṛcchasi uta jñāpakam ādye svabhāvaḥ ayam iti brūmaḥ dvitīye tu śruti prasiddheḥ iti tat idam uktam hi śabdena śrutim ca udāhariṣyati anena śabda antarāt ca iti sūtram prakāra antareṇa vyākhyātam jñātavyam śabda antaram ca śabda viśeṣaḥ vivakṣita artha pratipādakaḥ śabdaḥ iti yāvat paṭavat ca a yathā prāṇa ādiḥ a iti sūtre bhāṣyaḥ eva vyakte 
NSu_2.1.90.6–2.1.90.8	 anye punar anyathā etāni sūtrāṇi varṇayanti tathā hi bhāve ca upalabdheḥ mṛd ādeḥ kāraṇasya bhāvaḥ eva ghaṭa ādeḥ kāryasya upalabdheḥ ca ananya tvam kāraṇāt kāyarsya na hi yadi atas bhinnam tad tad bhāvaḥ eva upalabhyate na hi aśvaḥ gotaḥ anyaḥ gorbhāvaḥ eva upalabhyate kiñca bhāve tila ādau kāraṇe taila ādi upalabhyate kārye ca bhāve kuṇḍala ādau suvarṇa ādikam atas ca tad abheda siddhiḥ satvāt ca avarasya avarakālīnasya kāyarsya prāk utpatteḥ sat eva somya idam agre āsīt a iti sattva avadhārarāt ca ananya tvam kāraṇāt kāryasya 
NSu_2.1.90.9	 asa dvaya padeśāt na iti ced na dharma antareṇa vākya śeṣāt asat eva idam agre āsīt a asat vā idam agre āsīt a iti prāk utpatteḥ kāryasya asattva vyapadeśāt na iti ced na bhavet etat yadi kārya svarūpa abhiprāyeṇa ayam vyapadeśaḥ syāt kintu vyakta tva lakṣaṇa dharma antara abhiprāyeṇa kutas vākya śeṣāt asat eva idam agre āsīt iti asat śabdena upakrame nirdiṣyam punar tad sadā āsīt iti vākya śeṣe nirdiśati asat veti atrāpi tad ātmānam svayam akuruta a iti tena jñāyate na asat kāryam dharma antareṇa eva asattva vyapadeśaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.90.10–2.1.90.12	 yukteḥ śabda antarāt ca yukteḥ ca kāyarsya prāk utpatteḥ sattvam kāraṇāt ananya tvam ca gamyate śabda antarāt ca yuktiḥ tāvat asat akāraṇāt itya ādikā sa aṅkhayā uktāḥ vṛtti vikalpa anupapatti ādikā ca saugata uktāḥ śabda antaram ca asa dvaya padeśāt anyaḥ sat eva somya idam agre āsīt a ityādi sa dvaya padeśaḥ paṭavat ca saṃveṣyita prasārita paṭanyāyena idam kāraṇāt kāryasya ananya tvam prāk utpatteḥ sattvam ca pratipattavyam atra sūtra akṣarāṇām ārjavān ārjava ādi cintā śiṣyaiḥ eva kriyatām iti āśayavān yat uktam kāraṇāt kāryasya ananya tvam tat tāvat nirākariṣyan kim anena prabandhena nimitta kāraṇa ananya tvam kāryasya upapāditam uta upādāna kāraṇa ananyatvam iti vikalpam cetasi nidhāya ādyam nirākaroti nitya bhedaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.91a.1–2.1.91b.3	 nitya bhedaḥ nimittena hi nitya śabdaḥ niyama arthaḥ bhedaḥ eva iti kāryasya iti śeṣaḥ hi iti sarva pramāṇa prasiddhim sūcayati tathā ca sarvam idam bādhita viṣayam iti na dvitīyaḥ prakṛta anupayogāt viyat ādi prapañcasya brahma ananya tvam upapādayitum khalu asya upanyāsaḥ tat yadi nāma upādāna an anya tvam kāryasya tadā kim āyātam prakṛte na hi brahma prapañca upādānam iti etat ukta prāyam iti manvānaḥ dūṣaṇa antaram āha upādānena iti  upādānena tu dvayam hi iti anuvartyate upādānena kāryasya dvayam bheda abhedau pramitau tatas asmin= api pakṣe bādhita viṣaya tvam iti katham kāryam kāraṇena bhinna abhinnam pramitam iti atas āha asat iti 
NSu_2.1.91cd.1–2.1.91cd.3	 asat yat kārya rūpeṇa kāraṇa ātma tayā asti hi yat ghaṭa ādikam mṛdādi kāraṇa ātma tayā prāk utpatteḥ asti iti pramitam pareṇa aṅgīkṛtam ca tat eva pṛthu budhnā udara ākāra ādinā kārya rūpera prāk utpatteḥ asat hi yasmāt tasmāt upādānena bhinna abhinnam iti niścīyate etat uktam bhavati paraḥ hi ghaṭa ādeḥ kāryasya prāk utpatteḥ sattvam abhyupagacchati tat kim pṛthak eva uta mṛdādi kāraṇa ātmatayā iti vaktavyam na ādyaḥ anabhyupagamāt anupalabdheḥ ca dvitīye tu kāryasya upādāna abhedaḥ tāvat aṅgīkṛtaḥ na ca atyanta abhedaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ kārya akāreṇa prāk utpatteḥ asattvāt yadā hi ghaṭa ādikam mṛdādinā atyanta abhinnam syāt tadā prāk utpatteḥ ghaṭa ādi rūpeṇa satsyāt mṛd ādeḥ tadā sattvāt na ca evam tena jānīmaḥ ghaṭa ādikam mṛd ādinā bhinna abhinnam iti atyanta asat kārya vādinam prati bheda abheda samarthanam virodha parihāraḥ ca uttaratra vidhāsyate iti 
NSu_2.1.91cd.4–2.1.91cd.6	 yat ca kāryasya prāk utpatteḥ sattvam uktam tat api na upapannam iti āha asat iti yat ghaṭa ādikam prāk utpatteḥ asti iti āvayoḥ sammatam tat eva tadā asat ca yasmāt tasmāt sat eva iti satkārya vādaḥ anupapannaḥ eva tasya eva tadā eva tatra eva sattvam asattvam ca viruddham iti ced na rūpa bhedena avirodhāt iti āśayena uktam kāraṇa ātma tayā kārya rūpeṇa iti nanu evam sati kiñcid sat eva kiñcid asat eva sat asat tu na kim api syāt na syāt tayoḥ api rūpayoḥ atyanta bheda abhāvāt iti syāt etat uktam yadi asattvam prāk utpatteḥ kāryasya syāt tat eva kutas tathā ca atyanta abhinnam kāryam upādānena iti atas vipakṣe bādhaka pradarśanena kāryasya prāk utpatteḥ asattvam upādānāt bhedam ca upapādayati anavasthā iti 
NSu_2.1.92ab.1–2.1.92ab.2	 anavasthā anyathā hi syāt sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ anyathā kāryasya prāk utpatteḥ ātyantike sattve kāraṇena atyanta abhede ca aṅgīkṛte sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthā avyavasthā syāt yathā hi paṭaḥ tantu ātmakaḥ prāk api san= ā iva tathā tantavaḥ api sva kāraṇa ātmakāḥ santaḥ eva iti anena krameṇa sarvasya mūla kāraṇa ātmaka tvena ātyantikam sattvam syāt na ca mūla kāraṇam utpadyate vinaśyati ca iti paṭa ādīnām api utpatti vināśau na syātām tathā ca paṭa ādayaḥ utpatti vināśavantaḥ ātma ādayaḥ tat rahitāḥ iti loka veda prasiddha utpavināśa vyavasthā na syāt iti upalakṣaṇam ca etat paṭa ādīnām utpatti vināśa abhāve tad kāraka vyāpāra vaikalyam syāt iti api draṣṭavyam 
NSu_2.1.92ab.3	 yat vā utpatti nāśa śabdābhyām sattvam asat tvam ca upalakṣyate tatas ca ayam arthaḥ yadi paṭaḥ tantu ātmakaḥ prāk utpatteḥ api san= ā iva tadā api upalabhyeta tantu vat yadi ca anupalabhyamānaḥ api san= abhyupeyate tadā sarvatra utpatti nāśa yoḥ sat asattvayoḥ anavasthā syāt upalabhyamānam ghaṭa ādikam asti anupalabhyamānam khara viṣāṇa ādikam na asti iti sarva jana sammatāḥ vyavasthā na syāt 
NSu_2.1.92ab.4	 athavā utpatti vināśa śabdābhyām tad upapādanasya upalakṣaṇam tathā ca evam yojanāḥ āstām tāvat anyat satkārya vāde sarvatra śiṣyam prativādinam vā prati utpatti nāśayoḥ na asat utpadyate na sat vinaśyati iti evaṃrūpa upapādanasya api anavasthā avasthāna abhāvaḥ syāt tathā hi idam upapādanam kim artham iti vācyam śiṣya ādeḥ vidyā utpattaye avidyā nāśāya vāda jalpa ādau tu khyāti ādi utpādāya iti ced tad vidyā ādikam sat ced na utpādyam sattvāt ātma vat asat ced na utpādayitum śakyam anyathā satkārya vāda bhaṅga prasaṅgāt evam avidyā satī ced na vināśyā anyathā apasiddhānta āpatteḥ asatī ced na tāram nitya nivṛtta tvāt tatas sarvathā pratipādanā sambhavaḥ eva iti 
NSu_2.1.92ab.5	 yadi vā utpatti vināśayoḥ iti viruddha dharma upalakṣaṇam tathā hi yadi kāryam upādāna ātmakam eva sat eva ca prāk utpatteḥ syāt tadā utpatti vināśa ādi dharmāṇām anavasthā syāt tantavaḥ prāk eva santaḥ na idānīm utpadyante paṭaḥ tu utpadyate tantuṣu avinaṣṭeṣu eva paṭaḥ vinaśyati tantavaḥ bahavaḥ paṭaḥ tu ekaḥ evam ākāra abhidhāna buddhi kārya bhedaḥ api draṣṭavyaḥ sā eṣā vyavasthā na syāt iti 
NSu_2.1.92ab.6	 nanu etat sakalam api paṭa vat ca yathā prāṇa ādiḥ iti vyakti avyakti avaṣṭambhena parihṛtam tathā hi vyakti apekṣayā utpattiḥ paṭa ādīnām avyakti apekṣayā ca vināśaḥ yujyate vyakti avyakti artham eva ca kārakāṇi upayujyante vyakti avyaktibhyām eva upalabdhi anupalabdhī bhavataḥ atas eva pratipādanam saṅgacchate vyakta avyakta rūpeṇa eva viruddha dharmāḥ vyavatiṣṭhante yathā hi saṃveṣyitaḥ paṭaḥ na sphuṭam paṭaḥ iti pratīyate na prāvriyate na śītam apanudati na bahu deśa vyāpī bhavati prasāritaḥ tu sphuṭa pratīti ādimān na ca etāvatā bhedaḥ na api prasāritaḥ prāk asat yathā ca prāṇāyāmena niruddhaḥ śārīraḥ vāyuḥ jīvana mātram karoti na utkṣepaṇa ādi nirodha apagame tu āsādita vyaktiḥ tat api karoti na tāvat mātreṇa bhidyate prāc asanvā tathā eva etat api vyakti avyaktibhyām samañjasam iti 
NSu_2.1.92ab.7–2.1.92ab.8	 atra brūmaḥ kā iyam paṭasya prāk utpatteḥ ūrdhvam ca vināśāt avyaktiḥ madhye ca vyaktiḥ anupalabdhiḥ avyaktiḥ upalabdhiḥ vyaktiḥ iti ced tatra āha anavasthā iti yadi upalabdhi anupalabdhī eva utpatti vināśau tadā sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthā syāt yat yada upalabdham tat tadā eva utpannam anupalabdham ca vinaṣṭam iti syāt iti yāvat kiñca prāk utpatteḥ sattve paṭasya kasmāt na upalabdhiḥ katham ca ūrdhvam upalabdhiḥ iti praśnasya upalabdhi anupalabdhibhyām eva iti parihāram vadan devānāṃpriyaḥ ślāghanīya prajñaḥ syāt api ca prāk ūrdhvam ca tantu upalabdhau katham tanmātrasya sataḥ paṭasya anupalabdhiḥ anyathā tantūnām api sā syāt 
NSu_2.1.92ab.9	 atha paṭa dharmau= eva vyakti avyaktī tadā tau= api tantūnām vidyete na vā na ced na kārya kāraṇayeḥ atyantā bhedaḥ vidyete ced tatra āha anavasthā iti utpatti nāśa vyavahāra hetū vyakti avyaktī yadi tantuṣu api vidyete tadā sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthā syāt tantavaḥ na utpannāḥ na naṣṭāḥ kintu paṭe eva iti utpatti vināśa vyavasthā na syāt iti 
NSu_2.1.92ab.10	 kiñca iyam abhivyaktiḥ utpatti ādi vyavahāra kāraṇa tayā upādīyate sā kim cakra cīvara ādibhiḥ prāk asatya iva utpadyate mudgara abhighāta ādinā ca naśyati uta prāk api sati eva avināśinī ca evam avyaktiḥ api kim prāc asatī mudgara abhighāta ādinā utpadyate kiṃvā prāk api satī ubhayatra ādyau dūṣayati anavasthā iti vyakti avyaktyoḥ utpatti nāśavat tve sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthā vyavasthā bhāvaḥ syāt na kiñcid asat utpadyate na kiñcid sat vinaśyati iti siddhānta virodhaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ dvitīyau dūṣayati anavasthā iti vyakti avyaktyoḥ sadā sattve sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthā vyavasthitiḥ syāt tathā hi etāvantam kālam anutpannaḥ ghaṭaḥ idānīm utpannaḥ iti tāvat na syāt utpatti vyavahāra hetoḥ abhivyakteḥ prāk api sattvāt tathā mudgara abhighāta ādi uttara kālam api ghaṭa sattva vyavahāraḥ syāt tad hetoḥ abhivyakteḥ avinaṣṭa tvāt tathā idānīm eva naṣṭaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti api na syāt 
NSu_2.1.92ab.11–2.1.92ab.12	 vināśa vyavahāra kāraṇa anabhivyakteḥ prāk api sattvāt iti kāraka vyāpāra vaiphalya tādavasthyam sphuṭam eva atha etad doṣa parihārāya vyakti avyaktyoḥ api vyakti avyaktī svīkriyete tadā tayoḥ api ukta vikalpa doṣa anuṣaṅgaḥ syāt atha tatra api vyakti avyakti antara aṅgīkāraḥ tadā anavasthā syāt iti āha anavasthā iti utpatti nāśayoḥ iti viṣaya saptamī santu anantāḥ vyaktayaḥ avyaktayaḥ ca mūla kṣaya abhāvāt na anavasthā doṣaḥ iti atas āha anavasthā iti anyathā anavacchinna vyakti avyakti parampara aṅgīkāre savartra ghaṭa ādau= utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthānavakptiḥ syāt uttarottara vyakti avyakti siddhau hi pūrva pūrva vyakti avyaktīnām utpatti nāśa vyavahāra nidāna tvam tatas prayojana parikṣaya hetu tvāt anavasthā dūṣaṇam eva 
NSu_2.1.92ab.13	 nanu idam bhavatām api samānam prāc asataḥ sattā samavāyaḥ hi janiḥ iṣyate sattā samavāya āha ca sadā santau= iti prāc vināśa uttaram api janiḥ syāt vināśaḥ ca na syāt iti atas āha anavasthā iti iyam sarvatra utpatti vināśayoḥ anavasthā vyavasthitiḥ anyathā samavāyasya janitvā aṅgīkṛtau= eva hi syāt na asmad mate prakāra antareṇa janeḥ vakṣyamāṇa tvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.92ab.14	 nanu janiḥ kim prāk satī uta kāraka vyāpāra janyā ādye prāk uktaḥ eva doṣaḥ dvitīye janeḥ janiḥ api tathā iti anavasthā evam vināśa upītyate āha anavasthā iti sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ iya mukta anavasthā anyathā ghaṭa janeḥ anyā janeḥ janiḥ iti aṅgīkāraḥ eva syāt na tu evam aṅgīkriyate api tarhi ghaṭa janma eva janmanaḥ janma iti yathā ahuḥ yathā janeḥ janiḥ na anyā tasyāḥ vastu janiḥ janiḥa iti ghaṭaḥ jāyate ghaṭa janma jāyate iti anayoḥ ekārtha tā eva hi laukika parīkṣaka sammatā na ca vyakti avyaktyoḥ api evam aṅgīkartum ucitam janma vināśau= upalabdhi anupalabdhī vā vihāya vyakti avyaktyoḥ evā prāmāṇika tvāt iti 
NSu_2.1.92ab.15–2.1.92ab.16	 nanu yadi asat utpadyeta sat ca vinaśyeta tadā sarvatra utpatti nāśayoḥ anavasthā eva syāt evam sati hi śaśa viṣāṇam api utpadyeta ātmā ca naśyet iti atas āha anavasthā iti anyathā kāraṇa śakti anādaraṇe hīm utpatti vināśayoḥ anavasthā syāt na ca evam kintu yasya utpatti kāraṇam asti tat asat api utpadyate yasya ca vināśa kāraṇam vidyate tat sat api niruddhayate na ca khara viṣāṇa janmani ātma vināśe vā kāraṇam asti iti tayoḥ janana vināśa abhāvaḥ kāraṇa svabhāvān anugame tu satkārya vādinaḥ api atiprasaṅgaḥ eva iti athavā syāt iyam anavasthā yadi atyantāsadeva utpadyate sat mātram vinaśyati iti brūmaḥ sat asat eva utpadyate iti ca uktam vināśa kāraṇa vat eva ca vinaśyati iti 
NSu_2.1.92ab.17–2.1.92ab.18	 yat ca uktam bhāve ca upalabdheḥ iti sūtra artha tvena tad vayā api avyāpaka bhāvena eva upapannam na atyanta abheda sādhakam atha kāraṇa uparakta buddhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya buddhiḥ vātra abhimata iti matam sā api abheda mātreṇa caritārthāḥ na atyanta abheda sādhanāya alam kiñca etat yukteḥ ca iti anena eva śakya saṅgraham na punar abhidhātavyam atha anena pratyakṣam upanyasyate tat api na atyanta abheda sādhakam atas eva bhāvāt ca upalabdheḥ iti sūtra vipariṇāmaḥ api nirastaḥ sattvāt ca avasya iti yuktiḥ ced yukteḥ ca iti etena eva gatārtha tā śrutiḥ ced śabda antarāt ca iti anena asa dvaya padeśāt iti tu paricodana eva asaṅga tā paramārthataḥ brahma kāraṇa tā para tvena apātataḥ tu śūnyasya abhāvasya vā kāraṇa bhāva pratipādaka tā pratibhāsena kārya asattvasya śrutau= apratīteḥ yukteḥ iti ukta yuktim tu uttaratra apākariṣyāmaḥ śabda antaram tu ācāryeṇa eva anyatra anyathā eva vyākhyātam paṭe prāṇa ādau ca na atyantān upasañjāta viśeṣa tvam iti anudāharaṇam eva iti alam prapañcena yat uktam śaktaḥ api hi iti yat ca nitya bhedaḥ itrata tat ubhayam śrutyā api sādhayati śaktaḥ api iti 
NSu_2.1.92cd.1–2.1.93.2	 śaktaḥ api bhagavān viṣṇuḥ akartum kartum anyathā sva bhinnam kāraṇa abhinna bhinnam viśvam karoti ajaḥ iti śruteḥ avasitaḥ ukta arthaḥ ayam aśeṣatas akartum śaktaḥ api karoti anyathā vinā kāraṇaiḥ tat vayatyāsena ca kartum śaktaḥ api niyataiḥ kāraṇaiḥ karoti icchayā iti yojyam svasmāt nimitta kāraṇāt bhinnam upādānakāraṇena abhinnam bhinnam ca saṃsāriṇaḥ hi viṣyi gṛhītāḥ iva īśvara preritāḥ aniṣyam api dhāraka prayatnena akṛtvā na sthātum īśate na ca bhagavān= tathā iti akartum śaktaḥ api iti uktam aśeṣatas prāk idānīm ca uktaḥ na tu sannihitaḥ eva iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.1.93.3–2.1.93.4	 itara vyapadeśāt hitākaraṇa ādi doṣa prasaktiḥ asmin= adhikaraṇe jīva kartṛ tva pakṣaḥ śruti prāptaḥ vistarāt nirākriyate iti bhāṣyam atra vaktavyam kim atra jīvasya sarvathā kartṛ tvam nirākriyate uta īśvara adhīnam tad aṅgīkṛtya svātantrya mātram na ādyaḥ tathā sati kartā śāstra atharvat tvāt itya ādi vakṣyamāṇa virodha āpatteḥ svatas kartṛ tva anupapattiḥ ityādi viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt ca na dvitīyaḥ hita karaṇa ādi doṣa prasaktiḥ iti ādi sūtrāṇām svātantrya nirākaraṇa paratvena śakya yojana tve api kṛtsna prasaktiḥ niravayava tva śabda koṣaḥ veti asya sūtrasya aśakya vyākhyāna tvāt idam hi sūtram sarvathā kartṛ tvam nirākurvat upalabhyate 
NSu_2.1.93.5	 tathā hi kartṛ tvam kṛtsna eka deśābhyām vyāptam tatra kṛtsna prasaktau= anubhava virodhaḥ eka deśa aṅgīkāre caatha yaḥ sa jīvaḥ sa nityaḥ niravayavaḥ a iti anaṃśa tva śruti vyākopaḥ syāt na hi sāmarthya apara paryāyam prayatna ādi rūpam kartṛ tvam asmākam jīvāt bhinnam yena tasya vicitra tve api jīvasya niraṃśa tvam na vyāhanyeta tatas vyāpaka nivṛttyā vyāpyam kartṛ tvam api vicitra tve api jīvasya niraṃśa tvam na vyāhanyeta tatas vyāpaka nivṛttyā vyāpyam kartṛ tvam api nivartate iti khalu asya tātparyam pratīyate prasaṅgasya viparyaye paryavasāna avaśyambhāvāt atha jīva kartṛ tvasya īśvara adhīna tā anaṅgīkāraḥ eva etaḥ prasaṅgau= uktau na kartṛ tva mātre tathā ca īśvara adhīna tvam eva viparyaya varya vasā analabhyam bhaviṣyati iti ced na syāt api evam yadi jīva kartṛ tvasya īśvara adhīna tva aṅgīkāreṇa imau prasaṅgau śakya samādhānau syātām na ca evam para adhīnena api khalu anena kṛtsnena vā kartavyam eka deśena vā tṛtīya prakāra abhāvāt bhāve vā tena eva apara adhīna tve api kartṛ tva upapatteḥ 
NSu_2.1.93.6–2.1.93.8	 atas viparyaya aparyavasānāt na evam vyākhyānam yuktam iti kartṛ tva abhāvaḥ eva tātparyam tathā ca vakṣyamāṇa virodhaḥ atha vastutas na asti eva jīvasya kartṛ tvam ābhimānikam tu tat iti avirodhaḥ mā evam vihāra upadeśāt ityādinā vāstavasya eva tasya sādhayiṣyamāṇa tvāt atas durghaṭam etat adhikaraṇam iti atas dvitīya pakṣam aṅgīkṛtya prasaṅgau jīva kartṛ tvasya īśvara adhīna tā anaṅgīkāra viṣayau vyākariṣyan= ādau tāvat īśvara adhīna tā aṅgīkāre prasaṅga nivṛtti prakāram āgama vākya udāharaṇena darśayati anaṃśasya api iti itara vyapadeśāt dhitā karaṇa ādi doṣa prasaktiḥ 
NSu_2.1.94.1–2.1.94.3	 anaṃśasya api jīvasya kiñcid sāmarthya yojanām kāryeṣu yaḥ kara uti addhā namaḥ tasmai svayambhuve kiñcid sāmarthya yojanām kārya anurūpa sāmarthya prayogāt svayambhuve svatantrāya iti vacanāt avasitaḥ ayam abhipretaḥ arthaḥ iti anuvartate tatas ca etat uktam bhavati yadi jīvaḥ parameśvara adhīna tayā kartā aṅgīkriyate tadā upapadyate eva tasya kartṛ tvam prasaṅgayoḥ samādhātum śakya tvāt anaṃśa tvasya abhyupagamena hi na niravayava tva śabda koṣaḥ anaṃśasya api parameśvara acintya śakti vaśena kārya anurūpa sāmarthya prayoga sambhavāt na kṛtsna prasaktiḥ iti etacaca anupadam sphuṭībhaviṣyati evam upodghāta prakriyayā viparyaya paryavasāna upapattim uktvā idānīm vivakṣita arthe sūtram yojayati yadi iti 
NSu_2.1.95.1–2.1.95.2	 yadi bhāgena kāryeṣu jīva śaktim na yojayet hariḥ tadā hi sarvatra kṛtsnayatnoṃ aśitā api vā bhāgena kārya anuguṇa aṃśena atra yadi īśvara adhīna tayā kartā na syāt iti vaktavye yadi bhāgena ityādi vacanam prasaṅga sphuṭīkaraṇa artham īśvara adhīna tva prakāra prapañcana artham ca sarvatra tṛṇa ādāna ādau= api kṛtsnayatnoṃ aśitā api vā prasajyeta tathā ca anubhava śruti virodhaḥ tasmāt parameśvara adhīnaḥ eva jīvaḥ kartā iti śeṣaḥ na ca upādhi kṛta aṃśa kalpanayā kartṛ tvasya avidyaka tvena ca upapattiḥ anaṃśasya api iti ādi pramāṇa siddha upapanna upapādaka parityāgena aprāmāṇika anupapanna svīkārasya ayukta tvāt 
NSu_2.1.95.3	 nanu jīva śaktyā eva idam ghaṭatām mā evam tasya āghaṭita ghaṭaka acintya śakti abhāvāt bhāve vā hita akaraṇa ādi doṣa prasaktiḥ na hi atra adhikaraṇe pūrva pakṣiṇā mahat ādi sakala kārya kartṛ tvam jīvasya āśaṅkitam kintu ghaṭa ādi kartṛ tvam tad tāvat anubhava siddha tvāt kulāla ādīnām na tyaktum śakyam tatra īśvarasya api kartṛ tva aṅgīkāre kalpā gauravam syāt iti atas na īśvarasya sarva kartṛ tvam iti tathā ca katham acintya śakti prasaktiḥ 
NSu_2.1.95.4	 nanu ca vyatirekaḥ gandha vat iti jīvānām aneka rūpa tām sūtrakāraḥ eva vakṣyati utkrānti gatyā gatīnām iti aṇu tvam ca na ca aṇoḥ yugapad aneka rūpa tvam vinā sa aṃśatayā upapadyate iti sa aṃśatā api tatas eva siddhāḥ tat katham atra niravayava tva śabda kopaḥ vā iti avādīt iti gūḍha abhisandheḥ āśaṅkām avidita abhiprāya eva pariharati aṃśinaḥ hi ityādinā sārdhena śloka dvayena 
NSu_2.1.96.1–2.1.98ab.2	 aṃśinaḥ hi paṭa ādyāḥ ye bhinnaiḥ eva parasparam aṃśaiḥ aṃśinaḥ ucyante na evam eva hi cetanāḥ atas anaṃśinaḥ iti eva śrutiḥ eteṣu vartate api aneka svarūpeṣu viśeṣāt eva kevalam bahu svarūpa tā ākhyā tu teṣu asti eva hi sa aṃśatā tatra bahu svarūpa tā ākhya iti anena vakṣyamāṇam abhyupaiti bahu iti aneka tva upalakṣaṇam bahu svarūpa tayā khyāyate iti bahu svarūpa tā ākhyā tuśabdaḥ śruti niṣedhyāyāḥ vaiśiṣyayat yotakaḥ teṣu cetaneṣu hi śabdaḥ pramāṇa prasiddhim dyotayati atas eva asti eva iti avadhāraṇam 
NSu_2.1.98ab.3	 tatas ca ayam arthaḥ asti eva vakṣyamāṇa aneka svarūpa tāṇu tvam ca tad anyathā anupapatti siddhā sa aṃśatā ca prāmāṇikasya tyaktum aśakya tvāt iti tarhi katham atra tat viruddham uktam iti atas uktam aṃśinaḥ ityādi ādyaḥ hi śabdaḥ pramāṇa prasiddhau dvitīyaḥ yasmāt iti arthe ye paṭa ādyāḥ aṃśinaḥ prasiddhāḥ te parasparam bhinnaiḥ eva aṃśaiḥ aṃśinā ca vakṣyamāṇa prakāreṇa bhinna abhinnaiḥ eva na tu atyanta abhinnaiḥ tantu ādibhiḥ aṃśaiḥ aṃśinaḥ ucyante cetanāḥ tu evam eva paṭa ādi vat ukta rūpaiḥ aṃśaiḥ aṃśinaḥ na bhavanti kintu parasparam aṃśinā ca atyanta abhinnaiḥ yasmāt evam atas prasiddha aṃśi vaidharmyā deva aneka svarūpeṣu tatas eva sa aṃśeṣu api eteṣu cetaneṣu anaṃśinaḥ iti śrutiḥ vartate na tu sarvathā aṃśara ahitya abhiprāyeṇa atas na virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.98ab.4	 nanu yadi bhedaḥ na asti katham tarhi aneka tvam tasya abheda vyāpta tvāt katham ca aṃśi tvam matvarthasya bhedena vinā anupapatteḥ iti atas uktam viśeṣāt eva iti bheda abhāve api kevalam tad pratinidheḥ viśeṣāt eva aneka svarūpeṣu iti yojanāḥ yat vā aapi aneka sva rūpā iṣu a iti anena eva vakṣyamāṇam aṅgīkṛtya aṃśinaḥ ityādinā virodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ tatra bheda abhāve katham aneka tvam aṃśitvam ca iti āśaṅkām
