NSu_2.1.98ab.5	 viśeṣāt eva ityādi pāda trayeṇa pariharati kevalam eva bhedena vinā eva teṣu bahu svarūpa tā tayā khyāyamānā sa aṃśatā ca asti katham viśeṣāt eva iti kutas etat kalpyate śruti dvaya virodhāt eva iti hi śabdena āha atra jīvasya iti prakṛte api yat cetanā iti sāmānyena uktam tena cetana mātre api ayam nyāyaḥ iti sūcayati athavā yadi aṃśinaḥ jīvāḥ tarhi paṭa ādi vat eva syuḥ iti asya acetana tvam upādhimanena dyotayati 
NSu_2.1.98ab.6	 nanu evam tarhi kim jīva kartṛ tvasya īśvara adhīna tva kalpanayā tad abhāve api svatas bahu rūpa tva sadbhāvena eka deśataḥ kriyā upapattau kṛtsna prasakteḥ abhāvāt vibhinna aṃśa abhāvena niravayava tva śabda kopasya api parihārāt etat atiriktasya ca īśvara kṛti asya adarśanāt iti pūrva pakṣiṇā sva abhisandhau= udghāṭite satyāha bahu tvena iti 
NSu_2.1.98cd.1–2.1.99ab.2	 bahu tvena āvinābhāvāt bhinna tā niyamāt bhavet yadi na evam niyama kṛt bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ yadi bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ evam na niyama kṛt bahu tve api bhedaḥ jīveṣu mā bhūt iti vyavasthāyāḥ kartā na syāt tadā bahu tvena hetunā jīveṣu api bhinna tā bhavet bahu tva saṅkhayāyāḥ bhinna tu ena avinābhāva lakṣaṇāt niyamāt yathā uktam tad anuvidhānāt pṛthaktvam a iti 
NSu_2.1.99ab.3^1	 etat uktam bhavati parameśvara anapekṣasya jīvasya kartṛ tva aṅgīkāre na sarvathā ukta prasaṅga dvaya parihāraḥ tathā hi kṛtsna prasaktiḥ tāvat katham pariharaṇīyāḥ bahutva sadbhāvena iti ced tarhi bahu tvasya loke bheda avinābhūta tvena jīvasya bahu tve bhinna tvam api āpadyeta tathā ca durātmā niravayava tva śabda kopaḥ duṣparihāraḥ atha tad parihāra artham bhedaḥ na iṣyate tadā vyāpaka nivṛttyā vyāpya nivṛtteḥ āvaśyaka tvāt bahutva saṅkhayā api tyājyā syāt tathā ca punar sā eva kṛtyā kṛtsna prasaktiḥ āskandeta atha jaḍeṣu eva yatra bahu tvam tatra bhedaḥ iti niyamaḥ na cetaneṣu iti ced kutas etat tatha darśanāt iti ced na yatas kāraka praśnaḥ ayam na pramāṇa praśnaḥ svabhāvaḥ ayam padārthānām iti ced na 
NSu_2.1.99ab.3^2–2.1.99ab.4	 anīśvara vāda pāda prasārikā pātāt kiñca viruddhaḥ ca svabhāvaḥ ca iti katham na hi svayam eva svena sa dvitīyaḥ iti yuktam pramita tvāt na virodhaḥ iti tu pratyuktam caitanya sāmarthyāt idam ghaṭataḥ iti ced dhūmavān api kaścid niragnikaḥ ghaṭatām atha viśeṣa śaktyā idam upapadyate iti ced ghaṭe api upapadyatām na hi tatra viśeṣaḥ na asti viśeṣa vaicitryāt na iti ced tat eva kutas tasmāt bhagavān eva svarūpa svabhāva viśeṣāṇām niyāmakaḥ caitanyam avacchedakam vidhāya viśeṣam nimittīkṛtya viruddhe api abheda bahu tve samāveśyā bhedena niravayavatva śabda kopam apāsya bahu tvena kṛtsna prasaktim nyakkṛtya kārya anurūpam sāmarthya aviśeṣam yojayañjīvena kārayati iti aṅgīkartavyam iti nanu etat sarvam jīva sāmarthyādinā aśakya sampādanam katham bhagavān api sampādayet iti atas āha tasya tu iti 
NSu_2.1.99cd.1–2.1.99cd.4	 tasya tu aśeṣa śakti tvāt yujyate sa varmā iva ca tat evam asya sūtrasya evam tātparyavyākhyāne na kaścid virodhaḥ iti sthitam śruteḥ tu śabda mūla tvāt nanu īśvarasya api kartṛ tvam na yujyate jīva vat kṛtsna prasakteḥ na hi brahmāṇḍa pipīlikā nirmāṇe samam sāmarthyam prayuñjānaḥ prekṣāvān bhavati gati antara abhāvāt na doṣaḥ iti ced na īśvara tva vyāghātāt atha etad parihāra atharmeka deśena pravṛttiḥ aṅgīkriyate tadānā iha nānā a ityādi niravayava tva śabda kāṣaḥ syāt śarīra indriya ādi vikala tvāt ca na kartṛ tvam na hi kaścid śarīra ādi vikalaḥ kartā upalabdhaḥ bhūmi ādi ādhāra vidhura tvāt ca evam daurghaṭye api yadi kartṛ tvam īśvarasya syāt tadā jīvasya api kinna syāt viśeṣa adarśanāt evañca sarva kartṛ tvam dūra nirastam iti ayam pūrva pakṣaḥ atra adhikaraṇe nirasyate tasya tātparyam āha tasya tu iti śruteḥ tu śabda mūla tvāt 
NSu_2.1.99cd.1–2.1.99cd.2	 tasya tu aśeṣa śakti tvāt yujyate sa varmā iva ca tuśabdaḥ jīvāt viśeṣam dyotayati caśabdaḥ hetu samuccaye īśvarasya laukika tva śruteḥ āgama ekāgamya tvena yukti virodhān avakāśāt vicitra śaktiḥ puruṣaḥ a sarvaiḥ yuktā śaktibhiḥ devatā sā a iti ādi śrutibhiḥ vicitra aśeṣa śakti tva avagamāt ca sarvam bhinna aṃśa rahitasya api kāryeṣu kṛtsna prasakti abhāvaḥ svarūpa aṃśa bāhulye api bheda abhāvaḥ aṃśataḥ kārya karaṇe api niravayava tva śabda kopa abhāvaḥ deha ādi rahitasya api kartṛ tva nirvāhaḥ ityādi yujyate iti 
NSu_2.1.99cd.3	 nanu durghaṭam api jīva kartṛ tvam īśvara śaktyā ghaṭataḥ iti atīta adhikaraṇe abhihitam tathā ca katham atra pūrva pakṣa avakāśaḥ yaḥ hi paratra pramitam ghaṭayitum īṣye saḥ svasmin naḥ īṣye iti asambhāvitam ucyate na eṣorthaḥ sūtra kṛta atīta adhikaraṇe abhihitaḥ kintvā āgāminam artham manasi nidhāya jīva kartṛ tva vāda nirāsaḥ eva vihitaḥ bhāṣya kāreṇa tu śiṣya hita eṣiṇā vakṣyamāṇam api artham ākṛṣṭa pūrva uttara virodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.99cd.4	 pariṇāma vādinaḥ vivarta vādinaḥ ca brahmaṇaḥ jagat upādāna tvam kṛtsna prasaktiḥ iti anena ākṣipya śruteḥ tu ityādinā samādhīyate iti vyācakṣate tathā hi na brahma jagat upādānam yatas tathā tve kṛtsnasya api brahmaṇaḥ kārya akāra tā prasaktiḥ syāt sthitau ca brahma abhāve tad darśana upadeśa anarthakī ādi syāt atha etad doṣa parijihīrṣayā brahma eka deśena pariṇamate eka deśena ca avatiṣṭhate iti ucyate tadā aniṣkalam śāntam a ityādi niravayava tva śabda kopaḥ syāt iti atra ucyate na ayam doṣaḥ tadā ātmānam svayam akuruta a ityādi śruteḥ brahmaṇaḥ jagat upādāna tvasya kṛtsna pariṇāma abhāvasya ca avagamāt śabda mūla tvena yukti virodhān avakāśāt ca api ca sarva śakti upetā ca para devatā śrūyate sarva karmā sarva kāmaḥ a ityādi tatas niravayavasya api brahmaṇaḥ kṛtsna prasakti abhāvena eva jagat upādāna tvam upapannam ityādi tat etat vaya ākhyānam anupapannam evam sati eṣām sūtrāṇām etat adhyāya antar bhāva lakṣaṇa saṅgatya bhāva prasaṅgāt tat katham iti atas āha virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.100a–2.1.100c.3	 virodhaḥ sarva vaiśiṣṭaye yaḥ dvitīye nirasyate nārāyaṇasya tu adhyāye tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe para brahmaṇā nārāyaṇasya sarvasmāt cetanāt acetanāt ca vaiśiṣyaye vailakṣaṇye parama utkṛṣṭa tve atyanta vyāvṛtta tve ca yaḥ yukti ādi virodhaḥ saḥ eva atra dvitīye adhyāye nirasyate sakala jagat upādana tvena sarva ātmaka tvam tu na sarva vaiśiṣyayam na api tad upayuktam pratyuta viruddham eva tat katham tatra virodha parihāraḥ atra antarbhāvam āsādayet nanu jagat upādāna tvāt eva sarva vaiśiṣyayam brahmaṇaḥ na hi jagat jagat upādānam iti ced tat kim upādāna upādeyayoḥ bhedam manyase tathā ca tat ananya tvam iti ukta virodhaḥ jagat brahmaṇaḥ na bhidyate brahma tu jagataḥ bhidyate iti ced na ukta uttara tvāt 
NSu_2.1.100a–2.1.100c.4	 prāc brahma upādāna tvasya anukta tvāt kṛtsna prasakti ādi paricodana eva anavakāśāḥ pariṇāma pratipādaka śruteḥ abhāvena gagana ādi prapañca ātmakasya tad asambhavi śabda mūla tva sarva śakti tva ādi a sambhavena ca samādhānam api ayuktam vivartavāde tu sarvathā api na eṣā śaṅkā avakāśam aśnute śukti ādikam iva rajata ādi āropasya brahma avidyaka prapañca āropasya adhiṣṭhānam iti spaṣṭam ārambhaṇa adhikaraṇe abhihitam tatra katham kṛtsna eka deśa vicāraḥ ukta anavachānāt śaṅgā iti ced tarhi uktam smara iti vaktavyam spaṣṭam ca āropita tvam prapañcasya brahmaṇi upapādanīyam śruteḥ tu iti ādeḥ tu kā saṅgatiḥ 
NSu_2.1.100a–2.1.100c.6	 kaścid parihāra adarśana sambhrānta cittaḥ āha avidyā saṃvalitam khalu brahma jagat upādānam tatra avidyā upādāna tvasya ayam ākṣepaḥ parihāraḥ ca iti tat atīva mandam na hi avidyāyāḥ upādāna tvam api vāstavam tasya avicārita ramaṇīya tayā eva śaṅkā viṣaya tvāt kiñca kṛtsna prasaktiḥ sāvayava tvam ca avidyāyām kim kariṣyati samādhānam tu sarvathā api asaṅgatam eva etena vikaraṇa tvāt iti ākṣepa parihārau= api asaṅgatau veditavyau na hi bhrama adhiṣṭhāna tā śarīra ādikam apekṣate īśvara viṣayam tat iti ced na tasya kiraṇa tva abhāvena ākṣepān udayāt iti ādikam svayam eva śiṣyaiḥ avagantavyam iti asaṅgatiḥ eva ācāryeṇa uktā syāt evam asaṅga tiryadi brahmaṇaḥ sarva vaiśiṣyaye virodha parihāraḥ adhyāhāyarḥ syāt tat eva kutas iti atas āha tad anyaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.100c.1–2.1.100c.2^1	 tad anye tatra tatra gāḥ tasmāt sarva vaiśiṣyaya viṣayāt anye virodhāḥ tatra tatra eva adhikaraṇeṣu gatāḥ parihṛtāḥ etat uktam bhavati avirodha lakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ adhyāyaḥ iti tāvat sammatam na ca anukte arthe virodha parihāraḥ saṅgataḥ iti prathama adhyāya arthe avirodhaḥ dvitīyasya arthaḥ prathame ca ādi sūtreṇa śāstrīya viṣaya prayojana pradarśana mukhena brahma jijñāsāyāḥ katarvya tvam uktam tat catur adhyāyī parisamāpyam na ekatra paryavasyati tatas kim tat brahma kim jīvaḥ atha jaḍam iti svarūpa jijñāsāyām śṛṅga grāhikayā pradarśayitum aśakyatvāt 
NSu_2.1.100c.2^2–2.1.100c.3	 dvitīya sūtre sarvatas vailakṣaṇya pradarśanena sarva utkṛṣṭam sarvasmādvaya avṛttam ca iti pratipāditam sajātīya vijātīya asambhāvita dharmasya lakṣaṇa tvāt sakala itara vyāvṛtteḥ ca tad prayojana tvāt tṛtīya sūtre śāstram tatra pramāṇam abhidhāya tasya uttara prabandhena sāmānyatas viśeṣataḥ ca sakala jīva jaḍa vyāvṛtta vastu viṣaya tā samarthitā evaṃca dvaye virodhaḥ pariharaṇīyāḥ bhavanti dvitīya sūtra siddha sarva vaiśiṣyaya viṣayāḥ śāstra samanvaya viṣayāḥ ca tatra dvitīyā vikāra śabdāt ityādinā tatra tatra eva adhikaraṇe parihṛtāḥ iti pariśeṣāt sarva vaiśiṣyaya viṣaya virodha parihāraḥ eva dvitīya arthaḥ iti jñāyate iti nanu ca śrutīnām paraspara virodhaḥ api dvitīye adhyāye na viyat aśruteḥ iti ādinā parihṛtaḥ tat katham ucyate brahmaṇaḥ sarva vaiśiṣyaye virodhaḥ dvitīye nirasyate iti tatra āha sṛṣṭī iti 
NSu_2.1.101.1–2.1.101.2	 sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vākyānām jīva rūpa abhidhāyinām api anyonya avirodhaḥ tu dvitīya adhyāya gocaraḥ jīva rūpa abhidhāyinām vākyānām upalakṣaṇam etat prāṇa ādi viṣayāṇām ca iti api draṣṭavyam sṛṣṭayā ādi viśeṣaṇam upapatti sūcana artham tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa arthaḥ yaḥ dvitīya adhyāya gocaraḥ vākyānām anyonya virodhaḥ saḥ api pārameśvara sarva vaiśiṣyayavi rodha parihāraḥ eva kintu prathama dvitīya pādayoḥ sākṣattṛtīya caturthayoḥ tu vyavadhānena iti viśeṣaḥ tathā hi śrutīnām paraspara virodha parihāraḥ kim tad prāmāṇya nirṇaya mātra phalaḥ kim vā prameya nirṇaya phalaḥ na ādyaḥ mīmāṃsāyāḥ nyāya śāstra tva āpatteḥ kiñca evam sati viyat ādi sṛṣṭayā ādi viṣaya vākya virodha parihāraḥ eva kasmāt kriyate udita homa ādi vākyānām api nyāya darśanaḥ iva upādāna upapatteḥ 
NSu_2.1.101.3–2.1.101.4	 ākāśa vāyu ādi kramaḥ ca atra na atyantam upayujyate dvitīye api kim sṛṣṭayā ādikam eva prameyam uta tad aṅgi bhūtam anyat na ādyaḥ tasya svarūpataḥ aprayojana tvāt prathama apratipādya tvam anyathā punar udita homa ādi vākya virodha parihāraḥ api kāryaḥ syāt sṛṣṭayā ādi viṣaya niṣkarṣaḥ api nirhetukaḥ atas dvitīyaḥ eva pariśiṣyate na ca anyat asti sṛṣṭayā ādi prameyasya aṅgi prathama uktam dvitīya sūtra abhihitāt brahmaṇaḥ sarva vaiśiṣyayāt atas yuktam uktam tat evam parokta sūtra arthasya dvitīya adhyāya antarbhāva lakṣaṇa saṅgatyabhāvāt virodhāt ca uktaḥ eva sūtra arthaḥ iti siddham 
NSu_2.1.101.5–2.1.101.6	 atra īśvarasya śarīra indriya ādi karaṇa rahita tvāt kartṛ tvam na upapadyate iti ākṣepa samādhāna artham sūtram vikaraṇa tvāt na iti ced tat uktam iti etat anārambhaṇīyam punarukta tvāt śruteḥ tu śabda mūla tvāt tātmani ca evam vicitrāḥ ca hi sarva upetā ca tad darśanāt iti sūtraiḥ eva alaukika tva śabda eka samadhigamya tva vicitra ananta śakti tva ādi yuktibhiḥ sarvasya api daurghaṭyasya parihṛta tvāt yaḥ hi sākṣātkāraka adhiṣṭhānasya neṣye sa śarīra vyavadhānam apekṣate yasya ca āgantukam jñānam sa tad artham indriyāṇi yaḥ ca guru śarīraḥ na avasthātum śaknoti sa kṣiti ādikam ādhāram bhagavān= tu sarva śaktiḥ sarvajñaḥ kim artha papekṣa tā iti na ca kācid abhyadhikā śaṅkā asti yena punar ārambhaḥ syāt iti atas āha māna iti vikaraṇa tvāt na iti ced tat uktam 
NSu_2.1.102ab.1–2.1.102ab.2	 māna meya viśeṣeṇa punar uktiḥ na jāyate yathā atas eva prāṇaḥ ityādau māna aikye api meya viśeṣaṇa na punarukti doṣaḥ tathā atra meyā aikye api māna viśeṣaṇa na punarukti doṣaḥ etat uktam bhavati kim ukta artha ukti mātram doṣaḥ kim vā ukta anatirikta uktiḥ na ādyaḥ ukta parihāra atideśa ukteḥ api doṣa tva anuṣaṅgāt dvitīyaḥ tu prakṛte na siddhaḥ prameya aikye api pramāṇa bhedasya sattvāt iha hi cit ānanda ādya ātmaka divya maṅgala vigrahavataḥ mahāpuruṣasya prākṛta śarīra ādi abhāve api sakala kārya kartṛ tvam apāṇi pādaḥ ityādi śrutim āśritya uktam iti yat vā māna meyayoḥ viśeṣeṇa iti yojyam tathā ca ayam atharḥ pūrva sūtraiḥ sāmānya viṣaya pramāṇāni āśritya sāmānyatas eva sarva anupapatti parihāraḥ vihitaḥ iha tu viśeṣa viṣayeṇa eva pramāṇena viśeṣa anupapatti parihāraḥ kriyate iti katham punarukti doṣa avakāśaḥ iti tathā api ākṣepaḥ na upapadyate iti ced na viśeṣa jijñāsayā upapatteḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.102ab.3^1	 na prayojanavat tvāt loka vat tu līlā kaivalyam yad prayojana artham sṛṣṭayā ādiḥ tad ūna tvāt apūrṇa tā iti ākṣepa parihārāya idam adhikaraṇam ārabhyate tat etat anupapannam iti ābhāti tathā hi yadi atra kartṛ tvena prayojanavat tvam prasādhya āpūrṇa tva sādhanam pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ vivakṣitam syāt tadā prathama sūtram ayuktam syāt apūrṇa tā sādhakam prati prayojanavat tva hetoḥ asiddha tvāt atha kartā ced prayojanavān syāt tathā ca āpūrṇaḥ syāt iti āpādanam vivakṣitam tadā vyartham eva idam sūtram na ca āpūrṇaḥ tatas na prayojanavān iti pareṇa eva aṅgīkṛta tvāt anyathā viparyaya aparyavasānāt loka vat tu līlā kaivalyam iti dvitīya sūtram tu pakṣa dvaye api ayuktam sādhana āpādana dūṣaṇasya anudbhāvanāt iti mā evam īśvarasya sṛṣṭayā ādinā prayojanam asti na vā 
NSu_2.1.102ab.3^2–2.1.102ab.6	 ādye apūrṇa tvam prasajyeta dvitīye tu kartṛ tva anupapattiḥ tasya prayojana vyāpta tvāt iti ubhayathā api īśvarasya jagat sṛṣṭayā ādi kartṛ tva anupapattiḥ iti atra pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ vivakṣitam tatra prathama sūtreṇa prayojana abhāva pakṣam sa yuktikam upādatte tatra ukta doṣa parihāra artham dvitīyam sūtram yat vā kartṛ tvena prayojanasya tena ca āpūrṇa tvasya idam sa dhanam vivakṣita muta āpādanam iti siddhāntī vikalpya ādyam ādyena nirācaṣṭe na kartṛ tvena prayojanavat tvam sādhyam kṛtakṛtya tvena prayojana abhāvasya eva niścita tvāt naca asiddhaḥ hetuḥ atha eṣaḥ eva paramaḥ ānandaḥ niraniṣyaḥ niravadyaḥ iti śruteḥ prayojanavat tvena āpūrṇa tā anumānam tu garbhasrāveṇa eva gatam iti ādyasya dūṣaṇa antaram vadan dvitīyam dvitīyena nirākaroti iti nanu uktam atra loka vat iti sūtreṇa sādhanasya āpādanasya vā na kiñcid dūṣaṇam udbhāvyate iti mā evam bādha ādeḥ udbhāvanā ādityāśayavān dvitīya sūtrasya tātparyam āha sadā iti na prayojanavat tvāt loka vat tu līlā kaivalyam 
NSu_2.1.102cd.1–2.1.102cd.3	 sadā pravṛttiḥ īśasya svabhāvāt eva kevalam yathā loke jvalana pavana ādīnām tathā īśasya api sadā sṛṣṭayā ādau kevalam prayojanena vinā svabhāvāt eva pravṛttiḥ pramitā iti śeṣaḥ tat anena īśvarasya pravṛttyā prayojana sādhanam anaikāntikam bādhita viṣayam ca prasaṅgaḥ tu vyapti vikalaḥ viparyaya aparyavasāyī ca iti uktam bhavati atha manyeta cetana pravṛttiḥ na prayojanena vinā dṛṣṭāḥ atas nānā ekānti ādi iti tat api na asti mattasya sukha udrekāt eva nṛtta gāna ādi pravṛtti darśanāt nanu ca prekṣāvat pravṛttiḥ na prayojana uddeśena vinā upalabdhāḥ iyam ca prekṣāvat pravṛttiḥ atas prayojana uddeśavatī syāt iti sādhyam āpādyam ca iti atas āha aṅga iti 
NSu_2.1.103ab.1–2.1.103ab.3	 aṅga ceṣyāḥ yathā puṃsaḥ kāścid uddeśa varjitāḥ kāścid vaya ākhyān a ādau= aṅguli cālana ādikāḥ uddeśa varjitāḥ prayojana uddeśa varjitāḥ tathā īśasya api pravṛttiḥ iti pūrveṇa anvayaḥ tathā api anaikānti ādya nistāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ yat uktam īśvarasya pravṛttiḥ prayojanena vinā svabhāvāt eva pramitā iti tad pramāṇam idānīm āha devasya iti 
NSu_2.1.103cd.1–2.1.103cd.3	 devasya eṣa svabhāvaḥ ayam iti āha śrutirañjasā devasya eṣa svabhāvaḥ ayam āpta kāmasya kā spṛhā a iti śrutirañjasā sphuṭa m uktam artham āha devasya ayam sṛṣṭayā ādi viṣayaḥ eṣaḥ icchā tad pūrvikā pravṛttiḥ iti yāvat svabhāvaḥ eva na prayojanāya kutas āpta kāmasya prayojana spṛhā sambhavāt iti arthaḥ kecid idam sūtram anyathā vyācakṣate yathā loke sapta dvīpām medinīm adhitiṣṭhataḥ sampūṇarśaurya vīrya parākramasya api mahā rājasya kevala līlā eka prayojanāḥ kanduka ādi ārambhāḥ dṛśyante tathā eva parasya api brahmaṇaḥ sva saṅkalpa mātra avakpta jagat janma sthiti dhvaṃsa ādeḥ līlā eva prayojanam iti tat etat nirākaroti krīḍām iti 
NSu_2.1.104ab.1–2.1.104ab.3	 krīḍām prayojanam kṛtvā sṛṣṭiḥ śruti virodhinī bhoga artham sṛṣṭiḥ iti anye krīḍā atharm iti ca apare a iti krīḍā prayojanām bhagavataḥ sṛṣṭayā ādi pravṛttim vadataḥ pūrva pakṣīkṛtya devasya eva svabhāvaḥ ayam iti sa yuktikam prayojana leśa abhāvaḥ śrutyā siddhāntitaḥ atas śruti viruddha tvāt apavyākhyānam eva etat sūtra akṣarā an anuguṇam ca eta t vaya ākhyānam iti āha iti iti 
NSu_2.1.104cd.1–2.1.104cd.2	 iti kevala līlā eva nirṇītā prabhuṇā svayam yatas evaṃkrīḍām prayojanam kṛtvā sṛṣṭiḥ śruti virodhinī a iti tasmāt śruti anusāriṇā prabhuṇā svayam sākṣāt sṛṣṭam kevala līlā eva sṛṣṭayā ādi pravṛttiḥ nirṇītā līlā kaivalyam iti na tu līlā artha iti tatas api ayuktam idam vyākhyānam iti yat vā pūrva vākya uktaḥ hetuḥ ayam sādhya nirdeśaḥ yasmāt līlām prayojanam kṛtvā sṛṣṭiḥ śruti virodhinī tasmāt etat sūtre kevala līlā eva sūtra kṛtā nirṇītā vyākhyātā na punar līlā artha iti 
NSu_2.1.104cd.3–2.1.104cd.4	 kiñca kartṛ tvena prayojanavat tām sādhayan= āpāt ayan vā praṣṭavyaḥ kim prayojanam sva sambandhi vivakṣitam uta para sambandhi atha sādhāraṇam ādye sādhane anaikāntyam āpādane vyāpti abhāvaḥ viparyaya paryavasāne vyabhicāraḥ eva dṛśyante hi kṛpālavaḥ sva prayojanam anuddiśya para prayojana artham eva pravartamānāḥ naca adṛṣṭa artham iti vācyam paśūnām paśu prāyāṇām ca apatya pālana ādau pravṛtti darśanāt na ca prayojana uddeśitā kṛpālu tā ca iti sambhavati dvitīye api anaikāntya ādikam eva sva prayojana artham pravṛtteḥ bahulam upalambhāt bhagavataḥ api sva prayojana abhāve api para prayojana uddeśita aṅgīkāreṇa krameṇa siddha sādhaneṣya āpādana asiddha tva prasaṅgaḥ ca atas eva na tṛtīyaḥ api atas eva kenacid kartṛ tva viśeṣaṇam pravṛtti svabhāva tve sadā pravarteta iti ati prasañjanam ca pratyuktam syāt etat evam yadi īśvara pravṛttau para prayojana uddeśaḥ syāt na ca asau= aṅgīkartum ucitaḥ kā spṛhā na kā api iti śrutyā na iti sūtrakāreṇa ca sarvathā prayojana uddeśasya nivārita tvāt iti atas āha ātmā iti 
NSu_2.1.105ab.1–2.1.105cd.3	 ātma prayojana arthāya spṛhām śrutiḥ avārayat śrutiḥ iti sūtra kṛtaḥ api upalakṣaṇam para prayojana artha tām tu aṅgīkurutaḥ eva iti śeṣaḥ kutas etat avagamyate iti atas āha na iti na prayojanavat tvena iti atas āha jagadguruḥ yatas para prayojanam aṅgīkṛtya ātma prayojana artha tām eva na iti nyavārayat atas eva hi prayojanavat tvāt iti tatra hetum āha anyathā na etam brūyāt etat uktam bhavati yadi na iti sautrī pratijñā sva para prayojana viṣayā syāt tadā prayojanavat tvāt iti hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ syāt svayam vyāpāra sādhya prayojanavataḥ api para prayojana uddeśena vyāpāra darśanāt sva prayojana mātra viṣaya tve tu na ayam doṣaḥ yaḥ avāptayat prayojanaḥ sa sva artham na tat uddiśati iti vyāpteḥ anavadya tvāt atas prayojanavat tvāt iti hetum brahmaṇaḥ sūtrakṛt ātma prayojana uddeśam eva na iti nivāritavān na para prayojana uddeśam api tathā tve tad vayā āptam eva kam api hetum brūyāt sva prayojana niṣedham kurvāṇaḥ viśeṣa niṣedhasya śeṣa abhyanujñā jñāpaka tvāt para prayojana spṛhām abhyupaiti iti jñāyate iti upalakṣaṇam etat śrutiḥ api āpta kāmasya iti hetu garbha viśeṣaṇam prayuñjānā atma prayojana spṛhām eva ākṣipati para prayojana spṛhām abhyupaiti iti jñāyate iti api draṣṭavyam 
NSu_2.1.105cd.4	 iha hi buddhiḥ eva īśvarasya avyāhatā kriyāśaktiḥ tathā eva sarvasya upapattau kim icchā prayatna kalpanayā yat vā prayatnaḥ kartatvam tasya eva ākhyāta artha tayā nirṇīta tvāt sa ca dvedhā buddhim apekṣate utpatti artham viṣaya niyama artham ca tatra īśvara prayatnaḥ yadi api nitya tvāt na utpattau= apekṣate buddhim tathā api viṣaya niyama artham tām apekṣate eva na hi nirviṣayaḥ eva asau vyartha tva prasaṅgāt na ca svabhāvataḥ eva artha pravaṇaḥ buddhi tva prasaṅgāt buddhiḥ eva hi svabhāvataḥ artha pravaṇāḥ atas jñāna prayatnābhyām eva sarva nirvāha at na īśvarasya icchā asti na ca icchayā prayatnasya viṣaya niyamaḥ tasyāḥ api svatas viṣaya pravaṇa tā bhāvāt tad artham buddhayaṅgīkāre tayā eva prayatnasya viṣaya niyama upapatteḥ kim antar gaḍunā icchayā iti manvānāḥ kecid kā spṛhā a itrata śrutiḥ na īśvarasya prayojana icchā mātra niṣedha parā kintu icchā lakṣaṇam guṇam eva niṣedhati iti vyācakṣate tat nirākaroti icchā mātram iti 
NSu_2.1.106a–2.1.106c.2^1	 icchā mātram prabhoḥ sṛṣṭiḥ iti sṛṣṭau viniścitāḥ iti praśaṃsayā kā spṛhā iti śrutyā na īśvarasya icchā mātram niṣidhyate kutas icchāvat tvasya pramāṇataḥ siddha tvāt tathā hi vibhūtim prasavam tu anye manyante sṛṣṭi cintakāḥ svapnam āyāsa rūpā iti sṛṣṭiḥ anyaiḥ vikalpitā kālāt prasūtim bhūtānām manyante kāla cintakāḥ a iti pariṇāma vādam vivartavādam kāla ādi nimitta vādam ca anya mata tvena uktvā icchā mātram iti śrutyā sva matam ucyate ye sṛṣṭi viṣaye viśiṣṭa niścayavantaḥ te prabhoḥ icchā mātra adhīnā sṛṣṭiḥ na brahma pariṇāmaḥ na ca tad vivartaḥ na api kāla ādi nimitta iti manyante iti 
NSu_2.1.106a–2.1.106c.2^2	 anayā prabhoḥ icchā mātra āyattatām sṛṣṭeḥ manyamānānām viniścitāḥ iti praśaṃsayā tasya icchāvat tvam avagamyate yadi īśvarasya icchā na syāt tadā tadāyatta tām sṛṣṭeḥ manyamānāḥ vipayarstāḥ syuḥ viśiṣṭa niścayavantaḥ iti eṣā praśaṃsā anupapannā syāt na ca praśaṃsā tvāt eva artha asiddhiḥ pūrva uttara pakṣa avadhāraṇa prasaṅge praśaṃsā anupapannā syāt na ca praśaṃsā tvāt eva artha asiddhiḥ pūrva uttara pakṣa avadhāraṇa prasaṅge praśaṃsāyāḥ api yāthārthya avaśyambhāvāt anyathā pariṇāma ādi vādāḥ api praśaṃsyeran 
NSu_2.1.106cd.1–2.1.106cd.2	 kāmaśrutibhyaḥ ca eva na kevalam śruta artha anupapattyā api tarhi kāmaḥ tad agre samarvata ādhi a saḥ akāmayata a ityādibhyaḥ bhagavataḥ kāma pratipādaka śrutibhyaḥ ca icchā avagamyate eva śabdaḥ śrutīnām arthāpattitaḥ prābalya sūcakaḥ icchā kāma śabdayoḥ jñāna prayatna upalakṣaṇa tvasya sambhavāt na artha āpatti śrutibhyām icchā siddhiḥ iti ced na mukhye bādhaka abhāvāt 
NSu_2.1.106d.1–2.1.106d.2	 yuktitaḥ mā vā saitsīdicchā arthāpatti śrutibhyām yuktitaḥ tāvat setsyati tathā hi īśvaraḥ icchāvān ātma tvāt yajñadatta vat na ca muktā ādau vyabhicāraḥ tatra api tasyāḥ sādhayiṣyamāṇa tvāt jñānavat tvāt prayatnavat tvāt kartṛ tvāt vā īśvara jñānam vecchā samāna āśrayam jñāna tvāt asmad ādi jñāna vat evam tat prayatnam api pakṣīkṛtya prayoktavyam yat vā kṣiti ādikam icchā vat janyam kārya tvāt ghaṭa vat nanu evam duḥkha ādikam api sādhayitum śakyam iti ced tat kim ati prasaṅga bhīruṇā kṣiti ādeḥ buddhimat kāraṇaka tva anumānam api tyakṣyate duḥkha ādi sādhane bādhaḥ asti na buddhi sādhanaḥ iti ced samam prakṛte api 
NSu_2.1.106c.1–2.1.106c.2	 mahātātparya yukteḥ ca nanu īśvarasya icchā bhāve bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojaka tvam anumānānām iti mā evam mahātātparya yukteḥ ca yadi īśvarasya icchā na syāt tadā tasmin sarva vedānām mahātātparyam na syāt iti bādhaka sadbhāvāt icchā niṣprayojanā iti ced syāt evam yadi prayojanam anurudhya kalpyate anyatas siddhe arthe kim prayojana gaveṣaṇayā 
NSu_2.1.106d.1–2.1.106d.3^1	 na icchā mātram niṣiddhayate kiñca evam sati buddhiḥ api na aṅgīkaraṇīyā svarūpa sāmarthyena eva īśvarasya kartṛ tva upapatteḥ loka vairūpyam iti ced tat kim udāsīnasya boddhuḥ kartṛ tvam upalabdham loke yena anicchataḥ api tad īśvarasya aṅgīkriyate prayatnavataḥ eva vā kartṛ tvam bhaviṣyati tasya viṣaya niyama artham buddhiḥ eṣyavyā iti ced na buddhi vatsvataḥ viṣaya pravaṇa tā upapatteḥ tathā tve buddhitaḥ bhedaḥ na syāt iti ced na buddhi tva ādinā eva tad upapatteḥ anyathā para upādhika viṣaya pravaṇa tvayoḥ icchā prayatnayoḥ api bhedāḥ na syāt viṣaya niyama artham iti ca kaḥ arthaḥ 
NSu_2.1.106d.1–2.1.106d.3^2	 kim viṣaya viśeṣa sambaddha tayā utpādātham uta utpannasya sthitasya eva vā tad sambandha artham atha tad jñāna artham na ādyaḥ anādi tvāt sādi tve api karaṇa sāpekṣayā buddheḥ api paratas viṣaya pravaṇa tā āpatteḥ na dvitīyaḥ paurvāparyaḥ bhāvāt na hi prayatnaḥ utpādya sthitvā vā paścāt viṣayeṇa sambaddhayate na tṛtīyaḥ svarūpa grāhaka pramāṇena eka tad grahaṇāt buddheḥ api para apekṣā prasaṅgāt ca iti mahātātparya yukteḥ ca iti yat uktam tat asat yadi īśvaraḥ na icchāvān syāt tadā śruti mahātātparya viṣayaḥ na syāt iti atra vyāpti abhāvāt icchā rahitasya api dharma ādeḥ tad tad śāstra mahātātparya viṣaya tva darśanāt āpāt yasya aniṣṭa tva abhāvāt ca iti atas uktam vivṛṇoti mokṣa arthāḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.107.1–2.1.108.2^1	 mokṣa arthāḥ śrutayaḥ yasmāt sa ca tasya prasādataḥ unninīṣati vākyāt ca loka dṛṣṭa anusārataḥ icchāṃnimittakaḥ yasmāt tad abhāve kutas śrutiḥ mahātātparya rahitā pramāṇa tvam gamiṣyati yasmāt kāraṇāt sarvāḥ api śrutayaḥ mokṣa arthāḥ mokṣa prayojanāḥ tasmāt tad abhāve parameśvarasya icchā abhāve tatas eva mokṣa artha tā bhāve śrutiḥ tatra mahātātparya rahitā syāt tathā ca katham pramāṇa tvam gamiṣyati iti yojanā mokṣa artha tve kim īśvarasya icchayā iti atas uktam sa ca iti sa ca mokṣaḥ tasya īśvarasya prasādataḥ yasmāt tasmāt tad abhāvaḥ iti sambandhaḥ tathā api īśvarasya prasādena bhāvyam kim icchayā iti ata prasādate iti etat vaya ākhyātam icchā nimittakaḥ iti īśvara jñānāt eva mokṣa siddheḥ kim tad prasādena iti atas uktam loka iti 
NSu_2.1.108.2^2	 vimataḥ bandha mokṣaḥ prabhu prasāda sādhyaḥ mokṣa tvāt śṛṅkhalā mokṣa vat ityādi loka dṛṣṭa vyāpti upeta anumāna anusārataḥ iti atharḥ na kevalam anumānāt kintvā āgamāt api iti uktam unninīṣati iti eṣa hi eṣa sādhu karma kārayati tam yamebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ unninīṣate a iti vākyāt ca atra karma iti upalakṣaṇam unninīṣate ūrdhvam netum icchati yat vā prasāda śabdena icchā ucyate iti atas idam vākyam jñāpakam loka dṛṣṭa anusārataḥ iti etat api asya eva arthasya jñāpakam uktam śrutayaḥ iti upakramya śrutiḥ iti eka vacanam kaim utya artham ekam api vākyam na tatra mahātātparyavat syāt kim uta sarvāḥ śrutayaḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.108.3^1	 etat uktam bhavati śāstram hi sādhya sādhana bhāvavat viṣaya prayojanavat tayā vyāptam tatra śrutīnām mokṣaḥ eva prayojanam teṣām duḥkha prahāṇāya śrutiḥ eṣā pravartate a iti vacanāt mokṣāt anyatra atyantika duḥkha prahāṇa ayogāt svarga ādi prayojanam bhavat api avāntaram eva na pradhānam viṣayaḥ tu parameśvaraḥ eva sarve vedāḥ yat padam ām ananti a ityādi vacanāt dharma ādikam tu avāntara pratipādyam abhipreta prayojana sādhanam ca viṣaya tām aśnute na ca dharma ādikam mokṣa sādhanam puṇya citaḥ lokaḥ kṣīyate a iti śruteḥ atas bhagavati eva mokṣa sādhana tvāt sa varśrutīnām mahātātparyam naca avyāpṛtāt sādhanāt phala siddhiḥ vyāpāraḥ ca prasādaḥ eva na tu śruti janitam tad jñāna sākṣātkāraḥ vā yasya prasādāt a ityādi vākyāt ukta anumānāt ca jñānam tu prasāda sādhanam iti na sambandha anupapattiḥ 
NSu_2.1.108.3^2–2.1.108.4	 prasādaḥ nāma icchā viśeṣaḥ tathā sati unninīṣate atad icchayā yatas hi asya bandha mokṣau pratiṣṭhitau a iti ādi śrutibhiḥ yasya prasādāt a iti śruteḥ aika arthya lābhāt prasannaḥ asmi iti pratītau para upacikīrṣāyāḥ eva sphuraṇāt tathā ca yadi īśvaraḥ na icchāvān= tadā na prasidet ghaṭa vat sāmānya abhāve viśeṣa abhāva niyamāt prasāda rahitaḥ ca na mokṣa sādhanam syāt yadi atra vivakṣita avāntara vyāpāra rahitam na tat tatra sādhanam iti vyāpteḥ mokṣam pratyasādhanam ca na mokṣa śāstra mahātātparya viṣayaḥ syāt tathā ca mokṣa prayojana tā śrutīnām hīyeta na ca viṣaya antaram prayojana antaram ca asti iti viṣaya prayojana śūnya tvāt aprāmāṇyam eva āpadyeta na ca tad apauruṣeya tā yānāśaṅkita doṣasya vākyasya upapadyate atas avaśya muktena krameṇa icchāvat tvam bhagavataḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti nanu viṣaya abhāve syāt aprāmāṇyam phala abhāve tu katham aprāmāṇi a āpādanam na hi phalavat tvam prāmāṇyam kintu yāthārthyam eva iti uktam na api prāmāṇyasya vyāpakam tṛṇa ādi darśanasya prayojana abhāve api prāmāṇya abhyupagamāt iti ataḥ āha yāthārthyam eva iti 
NSu_2.1.109a–2.1.109c.3	 yāthārthyam eva māna tvam api vākyam prayojakam māna tvam eti yadi api yāthārthyam eva māna tvam na phalavat tvam na api tena vyāptam tathā api vākyam prayojakam eva māna tvam eti iti yuktam āpādanam etat uktam bhavati prāmāṇya mātrasya prayojanavat tvena vyāpti abhāve api tad viśeṣasya vākya prāmāṇyasya asti eva padānām iṣya sādhanaḥ eva gṛhīta saṅgatika tvāt pada saṅga tigrahaṇa savyapekṣasya eva vākyasya bodhaka tvāt phalasya viṣaya viśeṣe vākya prāmāṇya nirṇaya hetu tvāt ca atas vyāpaka abhāve vyāpya vākya prāmāṇya abhāva āpādanam upapannam eva iti nanu ca mahātātparya gocarasya viṣayasya parama prayojanasya ca abhāve api avāntara viṣayeṇa dharma ādinā apradhāna prayojanena ca svarga ādinā viṣaya prayojanavatī śrutiḥ pramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti atas āha tatra api iti 
NSu_2.1.109cd.1–2.1.109cd.3	 tatra api yat sampūrṇa prayojanam vākye api nirdhāraṇe saptamī prayojanavat tve api iti vā yat vākyam sampūrṇa prayojanam mahā prayojanam upalakṣaṇam ca etat pradhāna viṣayam ca iti api draṣṭavyam yat iti śravaṇāt tat iti labhyate sampūrṇa prayojanam iti ca āvartanīyam māna tvam eti iti anuvartanīyam tathā ca ayam arthaḥ nāva antara viṣaya prayojanābhyām vākyasya prāmāṇyam sambhavati kinnāma yat vākyam yat mahat prayojanam uddiśya yam pradhānam viṣayam pratipādayitum pravṛttam tat tābhyām prayojana viṣaṭābhyām upetam prāmāṇyam aśnute tad abhāve avāntara prayojana ādeḥ api asiddheḥ siddhau vā vā tasya eva prādhānya prāpteḥ veda vākyam ca mokṣa uddeśena mahātatparya upetam iti uktam tat tayoḥ eva viṣaya prayojanayoḥ upapattau pramāṇam syāt na anyathā iti 
NSu_2.1.109cd.4^1	 vaiṣamyanaiḥ ghṛṇye na sa apekṣa tvāt tathā hi darśayati prāṇinām vividhān deha indriya viṣayān= tad phalam ca sukha duḥkha lakṣaṇam utpādayan= īśvaraḥ kim tadīyam dharma adharma rūpam karma apekṣate na vā ādye tasya svātantrya pracyutiḥ dvitīye nirnimittam kāṃścid sukhayan viṣamaḥ syāt kāṃścid duḥkhayat nirghṛṇaḥ syāt iti ubhayathā na tasya sarva kartṛ tvam iti eṣa pūrva pakṣaḥ atra adhikaraṇe nirākriyate tatra tāvat ādyena sūtreṇa karma ādi sāpekṣasya kartṛ tvam abhyupetya vaiṣamyanairghaṇye parihṛte apekṣaṇīyam karma ādi īśvara āyattam na vā na iti pakṣe sarva kāraṇa tva hāniḥ 
NSu_2.1.109cd.4^2	 ādye nirnimittam viṣamāṇām karmaṇām kārayituḥ vaiṣamyanaiḥ ghṛṇye syātām iti ākṣipya karma ādīnām anādita abhyupagamena samādhānam uktaṃ na karma avibhāgāt iti ced nānādi tvāt a iti sūtreṇa evam tarhi karma ādi sāpekṣasya svātantryam na syāt iti āśaṅkayā uktam upapadyate ca iti karma ādi apekṣasya api tasya svātantryam upapadyate karma ādi sattā ādeḥ api tad adhīna tvasya ārambhaṇa adhikaraṇe samarthita tvāt na hi svādhīna satta ādikam apekṣamāṇasya svātantrya pracyutiḥ yuktā iti evam tarhi tad apekṣāḥ nāma anapekṣā eva tathā ca punar vaiṣamya ādi āpattiḥ iti āśaṅkayā uktam upalabhyate ca iti upalabhyate hi īśvarasya īdṛśam vaiṣamyam nirghṛṇa tvam ca pramāṇaiḥ atas na idam aniṣyam iti 
NSu_2.1.109cd.5–2.1.109cd.6	 tat idam ayuktam vaiṣamyanaiḥ ghṛṇye hi vastutas dūṣaṇe na vā ādye katham antatas api aṅgīkriyete dvitīye prathamam eva aṅgī kārye kim sa apekṣatā pakṣam kakṣīkṛtya tatra dūṣaṇa parihāra kleśena tathā ca baka bandharītiḥ iti atas abhiprāyam āha vaiṣamyam iti vaiṣamyanaiḥ ghṛṇye na sa apekṣa tvāt tathā hi darśayati 
NSu_2.1.110.1–2.1.110.2^1	 vaiṣamyam ca eva nairghṛṇyam veda aprāmāṇya kāraṇam na aṅgīkāryam atas anyat tu na vaiṣamya ādi nāmakam dvividham khalu idam vaiṣamyam nirghṛṇa tvam ca ekam karma ādi anapekṣatā prayuktam aparam tu sa apekṣa tve api karma ādi sattā ādeḥ api īśvara adhīna tva prayuktam tatra ādyam veda aprāmāṇya kāraṇa tvena dūṣaṇa tvāt na īśvarasya aṅgīkartum ucitam vedaḥ hi dharmam sukha sādhanam adharmam ca duḥkha sādhanam āha tatra yadi īśvaraḥ dharma adharmān apekṣya viṣamaḥ nirghṛṇaḥ ca syāt tadā veda uditam dharma adharmayoḥ sukha duḥkha sādhana tvam asatsyāt 
NSu_2.1.110.1–2.1.110.2^2	 tathā ca tasya katham prāmāṇyam syāt atas sūtrakāreṇa karma ādi sāpekṣa tā pakṣam urarīkṛtya tat parihṛtam atas anyat tu dvitīyam vaiṣamyam nairghṛṇyam ca na vaiṣamya ādi nāmakam dūṣaṇa rūpam na bhavati iti yāvat tathā hi vaiṣamya ādikam tāvat na svarūpeṇa doṣaḥ kintu doṣa hetu tayā na ca idam veda aprāmāṇya kāraṇam karma ādi sāpekṣa tva aṅgīkārāt na api jīvānām iva īśvarasya pratyavāya hetuḥ tad abhāvāt atas adūṣaṇa tvāt aṅgīkṛtam sūtrakṛtā iti na kaścid doṣaḥ tathā ca bhāgyam na ca punar vaiṣamya ādi āpātena doṣaḥ a iti 
NSu_2.1.110.3–2.1.110.4	 sarva dharma upapatteḥ ca sarve cetanāḥ apūrṇa guṇāḥ doṣiṇaḥ ca dṛṣṭāḥ tad dṛṣṭāntena cetana tvāt īśvarasya api samāsa vyāsābhyām aparipūṇarguṇa tvam doṣi tvam ca syāt iti pūrva pakṣaḥ atra adhikaraṇe nirasyate tat idam aspaṣṭam bhāṣye caśabda samuccitāyāḥ śruteḥ eva udāhṛta tvāt yukteḥ avyutpādanāt tatas spaṣṭam yat adhīnāḥ iti sarva dharma upapatteḥ ca 
NSu_2.1.111.1–2.1.111.2	 yad adhīnāḥ guṇāḥ ca eva doṣāḥ api hi sarvaśas guṇāḥ tasya katham na syuḥ syuḥ deṣāḥ ca katham punar ca api śabdau= anyonya samuccaye eva śabdasya yat adhīnāḥ eva iti anvayaḥ hi śabdaḥ sarvasya bhagavat adhīna tāyām śruti ādi prasiddhim dyotayati katham iti ākṣepe dvedhā hi vastu na prāpyate tatra svātantrya abhāvāt vā prepsā abhāvāt vā dvedhā ca na hīyate svātantrya abhāvāt vā jihāsā abhāvāt vā asti tāvat īśvarasya sarvatra svātantryam asti ca mayā sarvadā ananda ādi guṇavatā duḥkha ādi doṣa varjitena bhāvyam iti icchā prekṣāvat tvāt atas katham tasya ānanda ādi guṇa pūrṇa tvam duḥkha ādi sarva doṣa dūra tvam na bhavati 
NSu_2.1.111.3	 atra ete prayogāḥ īśvaraḥ sakala guṇa pūrṇaḥ sarva doṣa dūraḥ ca svatantra tvāt vyatirekeṇa yajñadatta vat īśvaraḥ vipratipanna guṇavān tatra prepsāvat tve sati svatantra tvāt yaḥ yatra prepsāvatve sati svatantraḥ sa tadvān yathā sampratipannaḥ īśvaraḥ na vimata doṣavān tat jihāsu tve sati svatantra tvāt yaḥ yatra jihāsā vat tve sati svatantraḥ sa tad abhāvavān yathā sammataḥ iti 
NSu_2.1.112.1–2.1.112.4	 sarva dharma āpapatteḥ tat vākyaiḥ api hi tādṛśaiḥ nirdoṣa aśeṣa guṇakaḥ nirṇītaḥ bhagavān hariḥ tat evam ukta prakāreṇa sarveṣām dharmāṇām guṇānām doṣa abhāvānām ca sambandhinyāḥ tad pratipādikayā upapatteḥ tādṛśaiḥ sarva guṇa pūrti ādeḥ upapādakaiḥ hi śabdaḥ teṣāṃguṇāḥ śrutāḥ a ityādīnām prasiddhānām sūcayati tat anena sva pakṣe pramāṇam abhidadha tā eva parakīya yuktīnām kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvam svātantrya abhāva upādhi duṣṭa tvam ca uktam bhavati iti sakala jagat janma ādi kāraṇe sakala guṇa paripūrṇe samasta avadya gandha vidhure pare brahmaṇi viṣṇau samasta śruti samanvayaḥ yaḥ prathama adhyāye abhihitaḥ tasya sāṅkhayādi samaya virodhena anyathā tva śaṅkām nivārayitum dvitīya pādaḥ ārabhyate 
NSu_2.1.112.5	 nanu anārambhaṇīyaḥ eva ayam pādaḥ tathā hi sāṅkhayādi matāni kim smṛti tvena ukta artham anyathamanti iti śaṅkayate kiṃvā yukti upeta tayā athavā śruti upeta tayā yat vā pratyakṣa upeta tayā na ādyaḥ pratismṛti parāhata tvena āpti niścāyaka abhāvena ca teṣām apasmṛti tvasya prathama pāde samarthita tvāt atas eva na caturthaḥ na dvitīyaḥ ukta artha viruddhānām sakala yuktī nāmā bhāsa tvasya tatra eva vyutpādita tvāt prabala yukti virodhaḥ atra nirasyate iti ced na prābalyam hi yuktīnām śruti ādi pramāṇa mūla tvena tad saṃvādi tvena bahu tvena vā syāt sarvathā api na adhika āśaṅka avakāśaḥ śruti ādi saṃvādinīnām tad mūlānām bahvīnām ca yuktīnām tatra eva nirākṛta tvāt kāścid eva tatra nirastāḥ na samastāḥ iti ced na sūtrāṇām upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt anyathā yuktyābhāsānām ananta tvena aparyavasānam syāt pāda bhedaḥ ca evam sati na syāt na tṛtīyaḥ samasta śrutīnām brahmaṇi samanvayasya ukta tvāt 
NSu_2.1.112.6	 atra kaścid āha sva pakṣa sādana para pakṣa pratikṣepābhyām eva nirṇayaḥ bhavati tatra prathama adhyāye sva pakṣe pramāṇam uktam tasya yukti virodhaḥ dvitīyasya ādya pādena nirastaḥ evam sva pakṣa sthāpane jāte para pakṣa pratikṣepa atharmayam vādaḥ ārabhyate iti tat ayuktam para pakṣa pratikṣepaḥ hi tadīya sādhana nirāsāt anyaḥ na asti sādhanāni ca smṛti ādīni eva nirastāni ca samastāni tāni prathama pādaḥ iti kim asya kṛtyam kiñca evam sati virodha parihāraḥ adhyāya arthaḥ na syāt iti 
NSu_2.1.112.7^1	 aparaḥ āha ukta arthe smṛti nyāya virodhaḥ na asti iti sthāpite api asti brahmaṇi samanvaya abhāva śaṅkā katham yadi api anumānam brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tvam apabādhitum na alam tathā api kāraṇa antaram jagataḥ avagamayitum alam tatas ca vastu vikalpa anupapatteḥ anyatara parigrahe hetu abhāvāt brahma eva jagat kāraṇam iti na niścetum śakyate pratyuta sarvajña praṇetṛka tvena anumānasya upabṛṃhita tvāt pradhāna ādi eva jagat kāraṇam na brahma iti buddhiḥ syāt atas na kevalam brahmaṇaḥ jagat kāraṇa tvam apabādhitum anumānam na utsahate 
NSu_2.1.112.7^2–2.2.1.1	 kintu kāraṇa antaram api avagamayitum nālam iti pradarśana artham dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ ārabhyate iti etat api uktam tathā hi kim anena uktam syāt yadi prāk sva abhimata arthe yukti virodha parihāreṇa sva pakṣa stha pānā vihitā idānīm para pakṣa pratikṣepaḥ vidhīyate iti tadā uktam eva uttaram atha yukti virodha parihāraḥ eva pāda dvaya arthaḥ kintu sva pakṣa virodhi yukti nirākaraṇam prathame dvitīye tu para pakṣa sādhaka yukti nirākaraṇam iti tat na nyāya sāmyena tāsām api śakya nirākaraṇa tvāt sarvajña tvam ca praṇetṝṇām prāk eva nirastam atas na ayam pādaḥ ārambhaṇīyaḥ iti atas āha smṛti iti smṛti yukti śruti guṇa yuktayaḥ bahu yuktayaḥ evam caturvidhāḥ na eva viruddhayante anvayam prati 
NSu_2.2.2.1–2.2.2.2	 iti prathama pādena nirṇīte api abhiyogataḥ darśanānām pravṛtta tvāt mandaḥ āśaṅkate punar śrutayaḥ gurāḥ upasarjanāḥ yāsām tāḥ tathā uktāḥ caturvidhāḥ virodhi pratītayaḥ anvayam prati na viruddhayante iti śruti samanvaya siddham artham na anyathayitum śaknuvanti iti arthaḥ abhiyogaḥ āgrahaḥ dṛśyate prameyam ebhiḥ iti darśanāni sāṅkhayā ādi śāstrāṇi etat uktam bhavati yadi api para matasādhakānām asmad mata bādhakānām ca smṛti ādīnām ābhāsa tva vyutpādanena spapara pakṣa sādhana upālambhau kṛtau= eva iti parama arthaḥ tathā api ukte arthe punar puruṣasya āśaṅkā bhavati eva kim etat evam anyathā vā iti kasmāt abhiyogataḥ matānām pravṛtta tvāt tad upalambhāt iti 
NSu_2.2.2.3	 nanu ca śrutayaḥ tāvat apauruṣeyatayāna āśaṅkita doṣāḥ bahula yuktibhiḥ ca anusaṃhita arthāḥ nirasta samasta pratipakṣāḥ ca tat katham tad samanvaya siddhe arthe abhiyoga pravṛtta darśana upalambha mātreṇa anyathā tva śaṅkā syāt atiprasaṅgāt nanu atas eva uktam mandaḥ iti mā evam prāptim ana ālocya śaṅkamānasya avicikitsita śaṅkasya śāstre anadhikāra ādityataḥ abhiyogataḥ darśanānām pravṛtta tvāt iti ukta śaṅkā kāraṇam vivṛṇoti anādi iti 
NSu_2.2.3.1–2.2.3.3	 anādi kālataḥ vṛttāḥ samayā hi pravāhataḥ naca ucchedaḥ asti kasya api samayasyet kapila kaṇāda ādīnām praṇetṝṇām smaraṇāt katham anādi tvam iti atas uktam pravāhate iti kapila ādayaḥ hi pūrvaiḥ praṇītāni eva śāstrāṇi kāla balāt utsannāni sva prabhāva ādinā avagamya prabandha antara racanayā pravartayanti evam pūrve api pūrvataraiḥ iti evam pravāhataḥ anādi tvāt adoṣaḥ tathā eva ca smaraṇāni iti iti hetoḥ āśaṅkitaḥ iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ idam uktam bhavati karaṇa doṣa bādhaka pratyaya vaśāt eva hi aprāmāṇyam kalpanīyam anyathā atiprasaṅgāt tatra yatā śrutī nām anādi tvāt karaṇa doṣa abhāvaḥ tathā samayānām api sva rūpa anādi tvam pravāha an ādi tvam iti tu vaiṣamya mātram 
NSu_2.2.3.4	 puruṣa doṣa sañcāra abhāvasya ubhayatra api sāmyāt yathā ca anucchedena anuvṛtteḥ śrutīnām bādhaka abhāvaḥ evam samayānām api yadi karaṇa doṣa bādaka pratyaya upetāḥ syuḥ tadā unmatta vākya vat idaṃprathamāḥ samucchedavantaḥ ca syuḥ naca evam atas katham aprāmāṇyam aśnuvate yathā ca śrutayaḥ balavat yukti anusaṃhita arthāḥ evam samayā api na ca tāsām ābhāsa tvam uktam iti vācyam sarveṣām tad anuvartinām asmābhiḥ anava gata tvena tad parihāra sambhāvanāt evam eva apratipakṣa tvam śrutīnām iva samayānām sambhāvitam katham anyathā sūtra kṛt eka dhurīṇāḥ śauddha udani prabhṛtayaḥ abhiyogataḥ tān pravartayeyuḥ katham ca prekṣāvantaḥ aneke abhiyogena eva upādadīran tat evam śruti tulya yogakṣema tām samayānām manyamānasya syāt eva ukta arthe sandehaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.3.5	 nanu evam sati paraspara viruddhānām anekeṣām prāmāṇyam tāvat na sambhavati vastu vikalpa āpatteḥ tathā ca avaśya āśrayaṇīye kasyacid eva prāmāṇye anādi kālataḥ anuvṛtta tva ādeḥ anyeṣu anyathā siddhau sarvathā kalpanīyāyām itareṣām ca anupalabdheḥ a iti ukta diśā sāṅkhayādi samayānām aprāmāṇyam kalpayitum śakyataḥ eva tat katham śruti samanvaya siddhe arthe punar śaṅkā iti ucyate yaḥ hi itareṣām ca anupalabdheḥ a iti saṅkṣepeṇa uditam nyāyam para kalpiteṣu prameya viśeṣeṣu utprekṣitum kṣamate tam prati evam etat yaḥ tu evam na kṣamaḥ sa yāvat ayam saṅkṣepaḥ na prapañcyate tāvat anya parityāgena eka grahaṇasya anīśānaḥ śaṅketa eva na ca evam śāstre na adhikriyeta saṅgraha prapañca uccheda prasaṅgāt tat idam uktam mandaḥ āśaṅkate iti kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_2.2.3d.1–2.2.4ab.3	 atas vibhuḥ bhrānti mūla tvam eteṣām pṛthak darśayati sphuṭam bhrānti padam vipralambhasya api upalakṣaṇam pṛthak vistareṇa sphuṭam su bodham tad tad samaya ukta arthānām aprāmāṇika tvam pramāṇa viruddha tvam prāk saṅkṣepeṇa asphuṭam ca uktam atra vistareṇa sphuṭam darśayan= teṣām bhrānti ādi mūla tvam jñāpayati iti arthaḥ etena pūrva pādena asya pādasya prapañci aprapañcaka bhāva lakṣaṇā saṅgatiḥ prapañcane prayojanam ca uktam bhavati tat idam uktam itareṣām ityādi bhāṣyeṇa nanu etat aśakyam taiḥ svaprameyāṇām dṛḍha tarka āgama sādhita tvāt parakīyatarka ādenirasta tvāt iti ataḥ āha tarkaiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.4cd.1–2.2.4cd.2	 tarkaiḥ dṛḍhatamaiḥ eva vākyaiḥ ca āgama vādinām tarka śabdaḥ sa upaskara anumāna arthaḥ dṛḍhatamaiḥ parakīya tarka bādhakaiḥ tad abādhyaiḥ vākyaiḥ ca dṛḍhataraiḥ iti sambaddhayate pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ veda ādi vākyānām prāmāṇyam anabhyupagacchantam prati katham tad upanyāsaḥ iti atas uktam āgama vādinām iti āgamasya veda ādeḥ prāmāṇyam abhyupagacchatām puṃsām samayānām iti sambandhaḥ yat vā sva āgama prāmāṇya vādinām iti arthaḥ tatas ca sva āgama prāmāṇya abhyupagama nyāyena veda ādeḥ api prāmāṇyam tairaṅgīkāryam iti bhāvaḥ athavā agamasya veda ādeḥ prāmāṇya vādinām śiṣyāṇām vyapekṣaya iti śeṣaḥ tathā ca bauddha adhikaraṇa antena na virodhaḥ yadi api etat anupadam eva pradarśayiṣyate tathā api śrotṛ manaḥ samādhāna artham uktam iti 
NSu_2.2.4cd.3–2.2.4cd.4	 nanu ca anādi ananta kāle anucchedena pravartamānānām samayānām na bhrānti ādi mūla tvam ucitam na hi tathāvidhasya unmatta vākya ādeḥ anādi anta kāle anuvṛttiḥ asti tat ayam prayogaḥ sāṅkhayādi samayāḥ pramāṇa bhūtāḥ na bhrānti ādi mūlā vā sarvadā anuvarta māna tvāt mahā jana parigṛhīta tvāt veda vat iti tathā ca vakṣyamāṇasya tarka ādeḥ bādhita viṣaya tvam iti mā evam kim atra sarveṣām api samayānām prāmāṇya ādikam sādhya muta ekasya na ādyaḥ paraspara viruddhānām prāmāṇya ādi sādhane vastu vikalpa āpattyā bādhita viṣaya tvāt paraspara pratikṣepa rūpa tvena sat pratipakṣa tvāt ca na dvitīyaḥ pakṣīkṛtāt anyasya prāmāṇya ādi abhyupagame pragukta doṣa anuṣaṅgāt anabhyupagame tatra eva vyabhicārāt veda prāmāṇya ādi abhyupagame pratijñāta artha anupapattiḥ anabhyupagame ca dṛṣṭānta doṣaḥ bhavet evam bhrānti ādi mūla tve samāne sati unmatta vākye avidyamānām anādi ananta kāla anuvṛttiḥ eteṣām eva tarhi kinnimittā iti suhṛd bhāvena pṛcchantam pratyāha daurlabhyāt iti 
NSu_2.2.5a–2.2.5ef.2	 daurlabhyāt śuddha buddhīnām bāhulyāt alpa vedinām tāmasa tvāt ca lokasya mithyājñāna prasaktitaḥ samaya pravartakānām puṃsām durāgraha gṛhīta tvāt vartante samayāḥ sadā na aikyam unmatta vākye vidyate nanu āgrahe api kim kāraṇam iti atas uktam vidveṣāt iti vidveṣāt parame tattve tattva vediṣu ca aniśam tarhi dveṣa utpatti anantaram pravartatām katham sadā iti atas uktam aniśam iti nanu puruṣa artha kāmāḥ katham dveṣa nimittāt āgrahāt anyāyam pravartayanti iti atas uktam anādi iti 
NSu_2.2.6.1–2.2.6.5	 anādi vāsanā yogāt asurāṇām bahu tvataḥ durāgraha gṛhīta tvāt vartante samayāḥ sadā vāsanā vaśāttebhyaḥ tat eva rocayate iti bhāvaḥ nanu anādi vāsanā api balavat prayatnena kutas na nivartate iti atas uktam asurāṇām iti viparīta prayatna ādi prerakāṇām buddhayā ādi abhimāninām iti śeṣaḥ nanu sādhūnām viduṣām nivāraṇāt kutas na nivartante iti atas uktam daurlabhyāt iti alpa vedinām bhrama adhiṣṭhāna svarūpa mātra vidām samaya pravartakānām tarhi rāja ādiḥ lokaḥ nivārayiṣyati iti atas uktam tām asa tvāt iti tatas eva kupaṇḍita nimitta mithyā jñāna prasaktiḥ ca na ca etāni kāraṇāni svarūpataḥ api anādau vede sambhavanti iti yadi api etat pāda ante vaktavyam tathā api atra prasaṅga āgatam buddhi samādhānāya uktam iti yadi evam tarhi eteṣām su dṛḍha nirūḍhānām samayānām sarvathā utsādanasya aśakya tvāt vayarthā iyam nirākṛtiḥ iti atas āha tathā api iti 
NSu_2.2.7.1–2.2.8c.2	 tathā api śuddha buddhīnām īśa anugraha yoginām yuyuktayaḥ tamaḥ hanyuḥ āgama anugatāḥ sadā iti vidyā patiḥ samyak samayānām nirākṛtim cakāra yadi api kusumayā na sarvathā samucchedyāḥ tathā api tamaḥ ajñānam su yukti tvasya vivaraṇam sadā agama anugatāḥ iti pramāṇa gṛhīta vyāpti ādi yuktāḥ tad saṃvāda yuktāḥ ca iti iti evam artham etat uktam bhavati na sāṅkhayādi samaya samuccheda arthaḥ ayam prayatnaḥ yena ukta doṣaḥ syāt kinnāma keṣāñcid puṃsām taiḥ taiḥ samayaiḥ āhita ajñāna saṃśaya viparyayān āgama sahitābhiḥ yuktibhiḥ tattva jñānam utpādya apanetum iti 
NSu_2.2.8a–2.2.8c.4	 nanu etat api ayuktam ati nirūḍha nibiḍa vāsanā anubaddham anādya jñānam idānīm eva utpannena tattva jñānena apanīyate iti kintu tattva jñānam paribhūya sva vāsanā vaśāt punar udbhavati pravartayati ca sva ucitam kāryam iti atas uktam śuddha buddhīnām iti yathā artha jñāna svabhāvānām mokṣa yogyānām ayam bhāvaḥ vakṣyate hi kecana cetanā mokṣa yogyāḥ kecana na iti tatra na ayogyānām ajñānam apanetumaya rambhaḥ kintu yogyānām eva teca viśuddha vijñāna svabhāvāḥ tathā ca pramāṇaiḥ idānīm eva utpannam api idam manaḥ vṛtti tvam tattva jñānam antaraṅga bhūtena viśuddha svarūpa jñānena upodbalitam sat bahis aṅgam anādi api sa vāsanam ajñānam sa mūla ghātam hanti svabhāvasya sarvatas api balavat tvāt na ca evam pramāṇa vaiyarthyam svabhāvasya bāhya prayatna sacivasya eva kārya kāri tvāt yathā uktamvinā yatnam na haṭhaḥ na api karma a iti 
NSu_2.2.8a–2.2.8c.6	 kiñca sarvatas api balīyānīśvara anugrahaḥ iti tāvat su prasiddham asti ca asau mokṣa yogyeṣu anāditaḥ iti vakṣyate tathā ca tat sacivam idam vṛtti jñānam ajñānam ati nirūḍha nibiḍa vāsanā anubaddham anādi api sa mūla kāṣam kaṣati eva atas na vyartheyam samayānām nirākriyā iti bhāvena uktam īśa anugraha yoginām iti na ca evam tatas eva avidyā nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati kim tattva jñānena iti vācyam īśvara anugrahasya puruṣa prayatna anusāreṇa eva phala janana svābhāvyāt tathā ca uktam phala pradaḥ vāsudevaḥ akhilasya a iti akhilasya yogyatā kamarpra yatna sākalyasya na punar ekaikasya iti arthaḥ yadi evam sādhūnām kusumayā ahitam ajñānam apanetum bhagavān samayānām nirākṛtim cakāra tadā iyam brahma ādibhiḥ anādartavyā syāt teṣu kusumayaiḥ ajñānasya anāhita tvena prayojana abhāvāt tathā caevaṃvidhāni sūtrāṇi kṛtvā a iti āgama virodhaḥ iti atas āha nija iti 
NSu_2.2.8cd.1–2.2.8cd.4	 nija bhaktānām buddhi śāṇa tva siddhaye kusumayaiḥ anāhita ajñānānām brahma ādīnām buddhim yuktīnām śāṇa tva siddhaye yukti śāṇena jñānāseḥ ati naiśitya siddhayartham iti yāvat pūrveṇa eva sambandhaḥ kusumayā jñāna nirasana prayojana abhāve api jñāna vaiśadya prayojanasya vidyamāna tvāt taiḥ idam ādaraṇīyam iti bhāvaḥ racanā anupapatteḥ ca na anumānam tat evam samarthitaḥ pāda ārambhaḥ tatra ādya adhikaraṇe nirīśvara sāṅkhayānām nirākriyate na ca tad svarūpa ajñāne dūṣaṇam su bodham bhavati iti atas tad mata sthitim tāvat darśayati cetanā iti racanā anupapatteḥ ca na anumānam 
NSu_2.2.9a–2.2.9c.2	 cetana acetanam tattva dvayam eva nirīśvarāḥ āhuḥ cetanam acetanam ca iti dvandva eka vat bhāvaḥ āhuḥ saṅkhayā iti śeṣaḥ nanu ca vidha antarā sambhavāt prāmāṇikaiḥ tattva dvayam eva vaktavyam tat kim teṣām vaiṣamyam ucyate iti atas uktam nirīśvaraḥ iti īśvaram anabhyupagamya jīva jaḍa ātmakam tattva dvayam eva āhuḥ iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.9a–2.2.9c.3^1	 nanu sa aṅkhayā manyante saṅkṣepataḥ tattvasya catasraḥ vidhāḥ kaścid arthaḥ prakṛtiḥ eva kaścid arthaḥ vikṛtiḥ eva kaścid prakṛti vikṛtiḥ kaścitanubhayaḥ tatra sattva rajaḥ tamasām sāmya avasthā pradhānam prakṛtiḥ eva sā hi viśvasya kāryasya mūlam na tu asyāḥ mūla antaram asti mahat ahaṅkāra tanmātrāḥ sapta prakṛti vikṛtayaḥ prakṛtayaḥ vikṛtayaḥ ca iti tathā hi mahat tattvam ahaṅkārasya prakṛtiḥ vikṛtiḥ ca mūlaprakṛteḥ evam ahaṅkāra tattvam tanmātrāṇām indriyāṇām ca prakṛtiḥ vikṛtiḥ ca mahataḥ evam pañca tanmātrāṇi bhūtānām ākāśa ādīnām prakṛtayaḥ vikṛtayaḥ ca ahaṅkārasya iti 
NSu_2.2.9a–2.2.9c.3^2	 pañca bhūtāni ekādaśa indriyāṇi iti ṣoḍaśakaḥ gaṇaḥ vikṛtiḥ eva yadi api pṛthivī ādīnām api go ghaṭa vṛkṣa ādayaḥ vikārāḥ evam tad vikāra bhedāḥ payaḥ bīja ādayaḥ teṣām dadhi aṅkura ādayaḥ tathā api gavā ādayaḥ bīja ādayaḥ vā na pṛthivī ādibhyaḥ tattva antaram sthūla tā indriya grāhya tā sāmyāt tattva upādāna tvam ca prakṛti tvam iha vivakṣitam iti puruṣaḥ tu anubhayaḥ na prakṛtiḥ na api vikṛtiḥ tat evam vistarataḥ pañcaviṃśati tattvāni yathā uktam mūlaprakṛti vikṛtiḥ mahat ādyāḥ prakṛti vikṛtayaḥ sapta ṣoḍaśakaḥ tu vikāraḥ na pṛkṛtiḥ na vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ a iti tat katham ucyate tattva dvayam eva āhuḥ iti āha tat iti 
NSu_2.2.9c–2.2.9e.3	 tat pañca pañcatva vibhāga stham acetanam cetanam pañca ca te pañcataḥ ca teṣām bhāvaḥ pañca pañcatvam sa ca asau vibhāgaḥ ca tena upalakṣitam tiṣṭhati iti pañca pañcatva vibhāga stham tat cetanam acetanam ca tattva dvayam eva saṅkṣepataḥ caturvidham vistarataḥ pañcaviṃśati prabhedam āhuḥ iti atas na virodhaḥ nanu cetanam acetanam ca asaṅkha yātam pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇaiḥ upalabhamānāḥ katham evam āhuḥ iti atas āha tat iti  tad asaṅkha yātam tat iti ubhaya parāmarśaḥ upādhi kroḍīkāreṇa pañcaviṃśati prabhedam vadantaḥ api avāntara bhedena tattva dvayam asaṅkha yātam āhuḥ iti arthaḥ cetanānām acetanānām ca pratyekam asaṅkha yāta tva sāmye api na ubhayoḥ bhinna tvena sāmyam kim tarhi iti atas āha bhinnam iti 
NSu_2.2.9f.1–2.2.9f.3	 bhinnam anyat layam bhavet cetanam iti śeṣaḥ cetanam para sparataḥ bhinnam āhuḥ yathā uktam janana maraṇa kāraṇānām pratiniyamāt ayugapad pravṛtteḥ ca puruṣa bahu tvam siddham traiguṇya viparyayāt ca a iti anyat cetanāt acetanam bhidā ujkhitam āhuḥ nanu īśvara anabhyupagame kasya api pravṛtti anupapatteḥ sarga ādi asambhavāt īśvara ākhyam tṛtīyam tattvam aṅgīkaraṇīyam tat katham na aṅgīkurvanti iti atas āha acetanasya iti 
NSu_2.2.10ab.1–2.2.10ab.2	 acetanasya kartṛ tvam svātantryeṇa nigadyate nigadyate sa aṅkhayaiḥ iti śeṣaḥ tathā hi cetanaḥ saṅghāta para artha tva ādihesiddhaḥ acetanam ca vyaktam pratyakṣa ādi siddham avyaktam ca kāraṇa kārya vibhāga ādi hetu siddham na ca evam ananyathā siddham īśvare pramāṇam asti acetanasya eva pradhānasya kartṛ tvena sarga ādi upapatteḥ adṛṣṭa īśvara kalpanā anupapatteḥ iti manyante iti 
NSu_2.2.10ab.3–2.2.10ab.4	 nanu acetanam cetanā anadhiṣṭhitam ku api na pravṛttimat upalabdham tatas pradhānasya adhiṣṭhātreśvareṇa bhāvyam iti atas uktam svātantryeṇa iti cetana adhiṣṭhānena vinā iti arthaḥ tathā uktam vatsa vivṛddhi nimittam kṣīrasya yathā pravṛttiḥ ajñasya puruṣasya vimokṣa nimittam yathā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasya a iti anyat bhidā ujkhitam iti uktam tat asat acetanānām api cetana vat parasparataḥ bhedasya pratyakṣa ādi siddha tvāt iti atas āha paraspara iti 
NSu_2.2.10cd.1–2.2.10cd.3^1	 paraspara vibhedaḥ ca kāryāṇām ālayam bhavet ālayam pralaya paryantam kāryāṇām paraspara vibhedaḥ ca bhavet iti nigadyate taiḥ etat uktam bhavati kāryam tāvat kāraṇa vyāpārāt prāk api sat asat akaraṇāt asat ced kāraṇa vyāpārāt pūrvam na asya sattvam kartum śakyam na hi nīlam śilpi sahasreṇa api pītam śakyam kartum kiñca kāryeṇa sambaddham kāraṇam kāryasya janakam asambaddham vā ādye tu asatā sambandha anupapatteḥ sattvam aṅgī kāryam na dvitīyaḥ asambaddha tva aviśeṣeṇa sarvasmāt sarva sambhava āpatteḥ asambaddha tve api kāraṇam tat evam karoti yatra śaktam atas na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti ced sā śaktiḥ śakya viṣayā vā syāt savartra vā sarvatra ced sā eva avyavasthā 
NSu_2.2.10cd.3^2	 ādye tu asati śakye katham tat viṣayā syāt iti sat eva kāryam na ca kāraṇāt anyat kāryam sat upalabhyate iti kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhedaḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ kiñca na paṭaḥ tantubhyaḥ bhidyate tantu dharma tvāt yadi atas bhidyate tat tasya dharmaḥ na bhavati yathā gauraśvasya upādāna upādeya bhāvāt ca yayoḥ artha antara tvam na tayoḥ upādāna upādeya bhāvaḥ yathā ghaṭa paṭayoḥ saṃyoga aprāpti abhāvāt ca artha antara tve hi saṃyogaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā kuṇḍa badarayoḥ aprāptiḥ vā yathā himavat vindhyayoḥ naca iha saṃyoga aprāptī tasmāt na arthānta tvam guru tva antara kāryasya avanati bhedasya agrahaṇāt ca 
NSu_2.2.10cd.4–2.2.10cd.5	 evañca kāryāṇām parasparam bhede api sva sva kāraṇaiḥ abhedāt krameṇa mahāpralaye mūla kāraṇa bhāvam gatānām abhedaḥ eva iti enena abhiprāyeṇa anyat bhidā ujkhitam iti uktam iti tat ca uktam asat akaraṇāt upādāna grahaṇāt sarva sambhava abhāvāt śaktasya śakya karaṇāt kāraṇa abhāvāt ca satkāryam a iti teṣu api mata bhedam āha bhoktṛtām iti 
NSu_2.2.11ab.1–2.2.11ab.3	 bhoktṛṇām cetanasya āhuḥ kecid tām api na apare sarve api sa aṅkhayāḥ puruṣasya kartṛ tvam na anumanyante kriyā āveśaḥ hi kartṛ tvam na ca ātmanaḥ parispanda lakṣaṇā kriyā upapadyate sarva gata tvāt na api prayatna lakṣaṇāḥ tasyāḥ antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti tvāt na ca vikriyā lakṣaṇā nirvikāra tvāt yathā uktam tasmāt ca viparyāsāt siddham sākṣi tvam asya puruṣasya kaivalyam mādhyasthyam draṣṭṛ tvam akartṛ bhāvaḥ ca a iti tatra kecid cetanasya bhoktṛtām āhuḥ yathā bhoktṛ bhāvāt iti apare tām api na āhuḥ yathātasmāt na badhyate na mucyate na api saṃsarati kaścid badhyate saṃsarati mucyate ca nānā āśrayā prakṛtiḥ a iti nanu kartṛ ta abhāve bhoktṛ tvam api katham tasya api kriyā veśa ātmaka tvāt iti atas āha svarūpa iti 
NSu_2.2.11cd.1–2.2.11cd.3	 sva rūpa caitanya balāt sva prakāśāt ca bhogitām sukha duḥkha ādi anubhavitṛ tvam hi bhoktṛ tvam āhuḥ iti atas uktam sva prakāśāt iti sukha ādi anubhavitṛ tvasya sva pratīti siddha tvāt iti arthaḥ yathā aha bhoktṛ tva yogya tā ca puruṣasya caitanyam iti na ca evam kartṛ tvam api aṅgīkartum ucitam upapatti bādhita tvena kartṛ tva pratīteḥ adhyāsa rūpa tvāt nanu evam tarhi pratīti siddham bhoktṛ tvam apare katham na abhyupayanti iti atas āha prakṛteḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.2.12a–2.2.12c.3	 prakṛteḥ ca svarūpasya viveka agraham eva tu abhoga vādinaḥ bhogam āhuḥ bhogam bhoga vyavahāra kāraṇam ayam teṣām āśayaḥ bhoktṛ tvam hi na puruṣasya svabhāvaḥ apavarga abhāva prasaṅgāt āgantukam tu na upapadyate apariṇāmi tvāt atas kartṛ tvam iva bhoktṛ tvam api ātmanaḥ na śakyam aṅgīkartum na ca pratīti virodhaḥ pratīteḥ abhāvāt vyavahāraḥ eva hi kevalam bhoktā atmā iti sa ca kartṛ tva vyavahāra vat prakṛti puruṣa viveka agraha mātra nibandhanaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.12a–2.2.12d.1	 syāt etat yeṣām puruṣaḥ bhoktā teṣām mokṣa abhāvaḥ syāt prakṛti saṃyoga nimittaḥ hi puruṣasya bhogaḥ taiḥ aṅgīkriyate puruṣasya darśana artham kaivalya artham tathā pradhānasya paṅgu andhavat ubhayoḥ api saṃyogaḥ tad kṛtaḥ sargaḥ a iti vacanāt na ca prakṛti puruṣa saṃyogaḥ kadāpi apaiti yena puruṣasya mokṣaḥ syāt iti atas āha bheda grahāt iti  bheda grahāt tayoḥ 
NSu_2.2.13a.1–2.2.13a.4^1	 bhoginām muktiḥ uddiṣṭāḥ tayoḥ prakṛti puruṣayoḥ bhoginām puruṣasya bhogam abhyupagacchatām mate ayam abhisandhiḥ teṣām prakṛti saṃyogaḥ hi puruṣasya na kevalam bhoga arthaḥ kinnāma apavarga arthaḥ ca tatra viveka āgrahasacivaḥ bhogāya bhavati viveka grahe ca apavargāya karotu nāma paunaḥpunyena śabda ādi upabhogam prakṛtiḥ anayā viveka khyātiḥ akṛtā iti kṛta viveka khyātiḥ tu na śabda ādi upabhojayati aviveka khyāti nibandhanaḥ hi tad upabhogaḥ nibandhana abhāve na bhavitum arhati tat ca uktam dṛṣṭā mayā iti upekṣakaḥ ekaḥ dṛṣṭā aham iti uparam atyantā 
NSu_2.2.13a.1–2.2.13a.4^2	 sati saṃyogaḥ api tayoḥ prayojanam na asti sargasya iti tathā āraṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛttāt puruṣasya tathā atmānam prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ a iti na ca nivṛttā api punar pravatsyarti iti śaṅkanīyam prayojana abhāvāt uktam ca prakṛteḥ sukumārataram na kiñcid asti iti me matiḥ bhavati tasya api svena eva nivṛtteḥ nanu ca yeṣām mate puruṣasya bhogaḥ eva na asti teṣām katham mokṣaḥ bandha abhāvāt tathā ca yoga anuśāsana vaiyarthyam iti atas āha saḥ eva iti 
NSu_2.2.13b.1–2.2.13b.3	 saḥ eva ābhoga vādinām sa bheda grahaḥ eva mukti ruddhiṣyā bheda āgraha nibandhanaḥ bhramaḥ eva hi bandhaḥ sa ca bheda grahe sati nivartate sā eva muktiḥ na tu aparā asti iti atas saḥ eva iti uktam na punar bheda grahaḥ eva muktiḥ tasya api nivartanīya tvāt na api viveka khyātim iti ukta tvāt iti evam upanyastam matam adhunā nirasanīyam tatra sūtra kṛtā krama vivakṣitvā racanā anupapatteḥ ca na anumānam a iti prathamam para pakṣa upālambham vidhāya anantaraṃpravṛtteḥ ca a iti sva pakṣa sādhanam vihitam bhāṣya kāraḥ tu sādhaka pramāṇasya tattva pratipatti antaraṅga tvena tad upanyāsasya prāthamyam para pakṣa nirāsāya tasthaiyarhetoḥ bahiraṅga tvena tad upanyāsya ānantaryam iti kramam api grāhayiṣyan vyatyayena vyācakṣāṇaḥ pravṛtteḥ ca iti sūtrasya pātanika artham āha īśasya iti 
NSu_2.2.13cd.1–2.2.14.3	 īśasya asaṅgrahāt eva na yuktau tau= ubhau= api asaṅgrahāt anabhyupagamāt eva iti asya doṣasya ulbaṇa tvam sūcayati tau= ubha api puruṣasya bhoktṛ tvā abhoktṛ tva pakṣau nanu aprāmāṇikasya īśvarasya anabhyupagame katham ayukta tvam iti atas pravṛtteḥ ca iti sūtra arthatayā īśvare pramāṇam āha cetanā iti cetana icchā anusāreṇa yadā dṛṣṭaḥ paṭa udbhavaḥ etādṛśa tvam anyasya vastu tvāt kena vāryate yadā yasmāt tasmāt iti labhyate etādṛśa tvam paṭa vat cetanā icchā anusāreṇa udbhūta tvam anyasya mahat ādeḥ vastu tvāt kāryatvāt anumīyamānam iti śeṣaḥ kena iti ākṣepe ayam atra prayogaḥ mahat ādikam cetanā icchā adhīna utpattikam kārya tvāt paṭa vat iti yat vā mahat ādi udbhavaḥ cetanā icchā adhīnaḥ udbhava tvāt paṭa udbhava vat iti prayoktavyam prayoga dvaya sūcanāya paṭa udbhava dṛṣṭāntam uktvā vastu tvāt iti hetum āha evam uktau= upalakṣaṇa tvam hi ubhayatra jñāyeta upalakṣaṇam ca etat mahat ādi upādānam cetanam adhiṣṭhitam upādāna tvāt tantu vat ityādi api draṣṭavyam naca anyaḥ cetanaḥ tathā bhavitum arhati iti sarva atiśayī puruṣaḥ īśvaraḥ eva siddhayati iti 
NSu_2.2.14.4–2.2.14.5	 syāt etat mahat ādikam na tāvat pratyakṣa siddham avyakta tvāt atas sāṅkhayā ācārya vacanāt tad prayukta anumānāt vā tad avagamaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ taiḥ ca anevaṃvidham eva tat uktam anumitam ca iti bādhaḥ anyathā aśraya asiddhiḥ iti mā evam vedataḥ tad avagamāt uktam hi idam ajām ekāma ityādi śrutiḥ pradhānam api pratipādayati iti nanu puruṣaḥ cetanaḥ na antaḥkaraṇam icchā ca antaḥkaraṇa dharmaḥ na cetanasya avikārasya atas aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā bādhaḥ vā paṭa ādeḥ api evambhāva abhāvāt dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vaikalyam ca iti ced na ātmanaḥ eva icchāvat tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt 
NSu_2.2.14.6	 tathā api udbhavaḥ nāma utpattiḥ abhivyaktiḥ vā na ādyaḥ prathama prayoge aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvāt dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvāt ca dvitīye ca āśraya asiddheḥ mayā satkārya vādasya abhyupagata tvāt dvitīye api ete eva doṣāḥ tvayā vyakti anabhyupagamāt iti ced na asat kārya vādasya sādhita tvāt satkārya vāde pramāṇa abhāvāt ca asat akaraṇāt ityādibhiḥ ca kim kāryasya prāk karaṇa vyāpārāt sattva mātram sādhyam uta atyanta sattvam ādye siddha sādhanam sat asat tva abhyupagamāt dvitīye tu asat akaraṇāt iti vat sat akaraṇāt iti api samānam na hi sanna ātmā kenacid kriyate 
NSu_2.2.14.7	 nanu asataḥ katham karma tvam sataḥ katham kāryatvam iti api samānam anena ghaṭaḥ jāyate iti api pratyuktam tarhi ghaṭam karoti iti ādeḥ kaḥ arthaḥ mṛttikām ghaṭīkaroti iti mṛttikā ghaṭībhavati iti asat utpattau khara viṣāṇam api kutas na utpadyate iti ced tad ātmakasya upādānasya abhāvāt iti brūmaḥ anyathā sataḥ utpattau= ātmā api kutas na utpadyate iti samānam 
NSu_2.2.14.8	 yadi api kāryeṇa kāraṇam sambaddham tat upajanayati uta asambaddham eva iti pṛṣṭam tatra kāraṇa śabdena upādānam vā vivakṣitam nimittam vā ādye janayati iti eva na iṣyate kintu nimitta kāraṇāni tat kārya tām nayanti dvitīye tu kārya akāreṇa asambaddham kāraṇa ākāreṇa sambaddham iti uttaram atas eva na ati prasaṅgaḥ śaktiḥ ca kāraṇānām sat asat viṣayā anyathā nirviṣayatva āpātāt na hi sat kartum śakyam bhavati 
NSu_2.2.14.9–2.2.14.10	 yat ca tantu paṭaya uḥ abheda anumānam tatra abheda mātra sādhane siddha sādhana tvam bheda abheda aṅgīkārāt atyanta abheda sādhane tantu dharma tvam tāvat asiddham na hi svayam eva svasya dharmaḥ bhavati nahi upacāraḥ anumāna pravṛtteḥ aṅgam atiprasaṅgāt katham ca tantu dharma tvam paṭasya tantu viśeṣaṇa tvam iti ced na puruṣa ādi viśeṣaṇe daṇḍa ādau vyabhicārāt tad āśrita tvam iti ced na 
NSu_2.2.14.11	 abhedena asiddhi prasaṅgāt kuṇḍa badara ādau vyabhicārāt ca tad ātmaka tvam iti ced na sādhya viśiṣṭa tva āpatteḥ abhedena bheda abhāvaḥ sādhyate iti ced na bheda abhāva atiriktasya abhedasya anabhyupagamāt abhyupagamaḥ api bādhāt evam upādāna upādeya bhāvaḥ api asiddhaḥ eva na hi svayam eva upādanam upādeyam ca iti yuktam karaṇa tva karma tvayoḥ bheda niyata tvāt saṃyoga aprāpti abhāvaḥ ca atyanta bheda abhāvāt upapatsyate guru tva antara kārya adarśanam ca abhedāṅgīkāreṇa bhaviṣyati 
NSu_2.2.14.12–2.2.14.13	 etena kāryatvam abhūtvā abhāvi tvam ced asiddham asmākam abhivyakti dharmaka tvam ced yuṣmākam iti ca nirastam tat idam uktam kena vāryatas iti tat evam paṭa ādi utpattau cetanasya kuvinda ādeḥ pravṛtteḥ upalambhāt tat dṛṣṭāntena mahat ādi utpatteḥ api cetanā icchā adhīna tvam iti evam sva pakṣam prasādhya para pakṣa nirāsa artham racanā anupapatteḥ ca na anumānam iti sūtram vyākhyātum pīṭham āracayati na ca iti 
NSu_2.2.15a.1–2.2.15a.3	 na ca kācid pramokta arthe na kevalam asmad mate pramāṇa sadbhāvaḥ kintu sa aṅkhayā ukta arthe pradhānasya svātantryeṇa jagat kāraṇa tve kim api pramāṇam na asti tathā hi kim atra pratyakṣam pramāṇam syāt uta āgamaḥ athavā anumānam vā na ādyaḥ tat hayasmad ādīnām vā yoginām vā na prathamaḥ asya arthasya atīndriya tvāt na dvitīyaḥ asiddheḥ na hi evam yoginaḥ paśyanti iti asmākam pramāṇam asti na api āgamaḥ sa hi apauruṣeyaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ vā syāt na adyaḥ iti āha śrutiḥ eva iti 
NSu_2.2.15b.1–2.2.15b.2	 śrutiḥ eva pramā hi naḥ śrutiḥ naḥ asmākam eva mate pramā hi sarvā api hi śrutiḥ īśvaram eva svātantryeṇa sakala jagat kāraṇam sarvajñam sarva śaktim pratipādayati pradhānam ca tad āyatta sattā pratīti pravṛttimat tat adhiṣṭhitam jagat upādāna mātram iti tathā hi yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva vit a  yaḥ yonim adhitiṣṭhati ekaḥ a ityādi tathā ca śrutiḥ parasya pratipakṣa bhūtā eva 
NSu_2.2.15b.3	 pauruṣeyaḥ api kim smṛti itihāsa purāṇa lakṣaṇaḥ uta sāṅkhayā ācārya praṇītaḥ na ādyaḥ tasya api asmad mata anusāri tvāt prakṛtim puruṣam ca eva praviśya puruṣottamaḥ kṣobhayāmāsa bhagavān sṛṣṭayartham jagataḥ vibhuḥ a ityādi vacanāt na dvitīyaḥ tad prāṇi asya asammateḥ āpta ukta tvena tad prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti ced tatra āha āpta tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.15cd.1–2.2.15cd.3	 āpta tvam ukta mārgeṇa vaktuḥ na eva upapadyate ukta mārgeṇa śrutiḥ eva pramā hi naḥ iti ukta rītyā śruti viruddha bhāṣi tvāt iti arthaḥ vaktuḥ sāṅkhaya praṇetuḥ yat vā itareṣām ca anupalabdheḥ iti ukta mārgeṇa sāṅkhayaśāstre api hi ākhyāyikāsu yogyā anupalabdhi bādhitāḥ bahavaḥ arthāḥ pratipādyante athavā aa vipralambhaḥ tad jñānam a iti ādi ukta mārgeṇa āptatva niścāyaka pramāṇa abhāvāt iti arthaḥ kapilaḥ vāsudeva ākhyaḥ tantram sāṅkhayam jagāda ha brahma ādibhyaḥ ca devebhyaḥ bhṛgu ādibhyaḥ tathā eva ca tathā eva asuraye sarva veda artha paribṛṃhitam sarva veda viruddham ca kapilaḥ anyaḥ jagāda ha sāṅkhayam āsuraye anyasmai kutarka paribṛṃhitam a iti purāṇa ukta mārgeṇa iti vā ṛṣim prasūtam kapilam a iti ādi śruti udāharaṇam api anena eva nirastam etena evaa āgamāt yogi pratyakṣau= agame a iti apākṛtam na kevala mukta mārgeṇa āptatvā anupapattiḥ kinnāma anupapanna bhāṣi tvāt api iti āha aprāmāṇya iti 
NSu_2.2.16ab.1–2.2.16bc.2	 aprāmāṇi asvataḥ tu asya svīkārāt api api śabdena prāmāṇyasvataḥ tvam api samuccinoti jñānānām prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam jñāna kāraṇa mātra adhīna utpattikam iti svīkaroti sāṅkhayaḥ tat ca anupapannam iti atas api asau na āptaḥ katham prāmāṇya aprāmāṇyayoḥ svatas tvam anupapannam iti atas āha māyi vat iti  māyi vat sva ukta akhila niṣedhī syāt prāmāṇya aprāmāṇyayoḥ jñāna kāraṇa mātra janya tve sāṅkhayasya vacanena utpannam jñānam pramāṇam apramāṇam ca iti ubhaya ātmakam vā syāt paraspara virādhena ubhaya vikalam vā jñāna mātram utpadyate niḥsvabhāvasya jñānasya anupapattyā na utpadyeta vā ādye sat asat vilakṣaṇam viśvam manyamānaḥ māyā vādī yathā sva ukta niṣedhī sat vilakṣaṇam iti uktyā prāptasya asattvasya svayam eva asat vilakṣaṇam iti niṣedhāt asat vilakṣaṇam iti uktyā ca prāptasya sattvasya svayam eva sat vilakṣaṇam iti niṣedhāt 
NSu_2.2.16bc.3–2.2.16bc.4	 tathā sāṅkhayaḥ api sva ukta akhila niṣedhī syāt tad vākya janita jñānasya yāthārthye hi prakṛtiḥ jagatkāraṇam iti ādikaḥ arthaḥ yaḥ labdhaḥ saḥ eva arthaḥ tasya ayāthārthye niṣiddhaḥ syāt ayātha athi arsya viṣaya viparyāsān atirekāt ubhayasvataḥ tve vastunaḥ viruddha ākāra dvaya āliṅgita tvam prasajyeta iti bhāvaḥ māyā śabdasya vrīhi ādi tvāt māyi iti sādhu nanu evam api yāthārthyena prakṛtiḥ jagatkāraṇam iti ādikaḥ arthaḥ tāvat siddhayati iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.2.16d.1–2.2.16d.2	 na ca kiñcid prasiddhayati na hi paraspara virodhe kim api siddhayati iti bhāvaḥ tarhi prāmāṇyasya kā gatiḥ iti ced aprāmāṇye api dīyatām dṛṣṭiḥ dvitīye doṣam āha na ca iti jñānam hi yathāvasthitam ayathā avasthitam vār atham viṣayīkuryāt tṛtīya prakāra anirūpaṇāt tathā ca prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya vikalam jñānam ayaḥ śalākā vada viṣayam eva syāt evaṃca na sāṅkhaya vacanāt kiñcid prasiddhayati iti tṛtīye tu jagat āndhyam eva syāt iti āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.2.16d.3	 syāt etat yadā jñāna kāraṇam guṇa upetam tadā tadīya āyāma prāmāṇya janana śaktau guṇena pratibaddhāyām pramāṇa jñānam eva utpadyate yadā tu doṣa upetam tadā doṣeṇa prāmāṇya janana śaktau pratibaddhāyām apramāṇa jñānam eva utpadyate nahi kim api karaṇam yugapad u bhaya upetam ubhaya vikalam vā sambhavati yena ukta doṣaḥ syāt iti ucyate kimartham ittham kalpyate jñānasya ubhaya ākāra tva prasakteḥ iti ced tad prasaktiḥ api kutas na abhyupagantavyā virodha bhayāt iti ced karaṇe api ubhaya śakti virodhāt kutas na bibheṣi 
NSu_2.2.16d.4–2.2.16d.5	 yat api viruddha kārya dvaya janakam karaṇam tad sahakāri sāhityāhita śaktikam eva prakṛte ca tathā abhyupagame dvayoḥ api paratas tu āpattiḥ kiñca vacane kau guṇa doṣau āpta an āpta tva praṇīta tve iti ced tarhi ubhaya abhāvāt veda vākyena ubhaya ātmakam anubhaya ātmakam vā jñānam utpadyeta na utpadyeta vā anāpta praṇīta tvam guṇaḥ iti ced tarhi āpta apraṇīta tvam doṣaḥ api kinna syāt iti saḥ eva prasaṅgaḥ 
NSu_2.2.16d.6–2.2.16d.7	 etena sāṅkhayā ācārya vacanam svatas eva pramāṇam kim āpti niścayena iti api nirastam aprāmāṇyasya api svatas tvena ukta sakala doṣa āpatteḥ atha mahājana parigrahāt tad prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti ced na pūjya artha tve asiddheḥ bahu artha tve savyabhicāra tvāt sandigdha asiddheḥ ca iti mā bhūt prakṛti kāraṇa tve prapañcasya pratyakṣam pramāṇam mā ca bhūt āgamaḥ anumānam tu bhaviṣyati yathā uktam bhedānām parimāṇāt samanvayāt śaktitas pravṛtteḥ ca kāraṇa kārya avibhāgāt avibhāgāt vaiśvarūpasya a iti 
NSu_2.2.16d.8^1	 ayam arthaḥ kāraṇa kārya vibhāgāt avibhāgāt vaiśvarūpyasya mūla kāraṇam asti avyaktam yathā kūrma śarīre santi eva aṅgāni tatas vibhajyante tasmin= eva avyaktībhavanti evam kāraṇāt mṛd piṇḍāt hema piṇḍāt vā kāryāṇi ghaṭa mukuṭa ādīni vibhajyante santi eva ca pṛthivī ādīni kāraṇāt tanmātrāt santi eva ca tanmātrāṇi ahaṅkārāt san= ā iva ca ahaṅkāraḥ mahataḥ sat eva ca mahat parama avyaktāt iti saḥ ayam kāraṇāt parama avyaktāt pāramparyeṇa viśvasya kāryasya vibhāgaḥ pratisarge 
NSu_2.2.16d.8^2	 mṛd piṇḍam hema piṇḍam vā ghaṭa mukuṭa ādayaḥ viśantaḥ avyaktībhavanti iti tad kāraṇa rūpam eva anabhivyakta ghaṭa mukuṭa ādi kāryam apekṣya avyaktam bhavati evam pṛthivī ādayaḥ tanmātrāṇi viśantaḥ sva apekṣayā tanmātram avyaktayanti evam tanmātrāṇi ahaṅkāram viśanti ahaṅkāram avyaktayanti evam ahaṅkāraḥ mahāntam āviśat mahāntam avyaktayati mahān prakṛtim sva kāraṇam viśati prakṛteḥ tu na kvacid niveśaḥ iti sā sarva kāryāṇām avyaktam eva saḥ ayam avibhāgaḥ prakṛtau vaiśvarūpyasya nānā rūpasya kāryasya tasmāt kāraṇe kāryasya sataḥ eva vibhāga avibhāgābhyām avyaktam kāraṇam asti iti 
NSu_2.2.16d.9	 itas ca śaktitaḥ pravṛtteḥ kāraṇa śaktitaḥ hi kāryam pravartate aśaktāt kāraṇāt kāryasya anutpatteḥ śaktiḥ ca kāraṇa gatāḥ na kāryasya avyakta tvāt anyā astu tarhi mahataḥ eva parama avyakta tvam iti atas uktam bhedānām parimāṇāt iti mahat ādīnām avyāpaka tvāt avyakta kāraṇaka tvam ghaṭa ādi vat iti arthaḥ itas ca samanvayāt sukha duḥkha bhoga samanvitāni hi kāryāṇi yāni ca yadūpam anugatāni tāni tad svabhāva avyaktakāni yathā mṛd hema rūpam anugatāḥ ghaṭa mukuṭa ādayaḥ mṛd hema piṇḍa avyaktakāḥ tasmāt asti sukha duḥkham ahā ūha ātmakānām sattva rajaḥ tamasām sāmya avasthā vyaktam bhedānām iti 
NSu_2.2.16d.10	 yadi api etāni anumānāni avyakta svarūpam sādhayanti tathā api mahat ādi kāraṇa tayā eva tat etaiḥ siddhayati iti atra vaktavyam kim etaiḥ anumānaiḥ jagat upādāna tā mātreṇa avyaktam siddhayati uta svātantryeṇa api ādye siddha sādhanam asmābhiḥ api viśva upādānasya pradhānasya abhyupagata tvāt śarīra rūpakaḥ a iti hi uktam dvitīyam nirākartum sūtram racanā anupapatteḥ ca na anumānam iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe idam iti 
NSu_2.2.17.1–2.2.17.3	 idam na acetana vaśam vastu tvāt pratipanna vat iti eva pratiṣiddhasya kena mūla anumā bhavet mahādādi kāryam iti arthaḥ acetana vaśam svatantra acetana adhīna utpattikam pratipanna vat pradhāna vat āstām tāvat dūṣaṇa antaram iti pratyanumānena eva pratiṣiddhasya pradhāna svātantryasya mūla anumā sādhika anumā kena sāmarthyena bhavet pramāṇam iti śeṣaḥ mūlānumā iti vā avartanīyam kim ākṣepe akārya tvam atra upādhiḥ iti ced na paṭa ādau sādhya avyāpteḥ paṭa ādeḥ kuvinda ādi adhiṣṭhita tantu ādikāya ṛtu asya anvaya vyatirekābhyām upalambhāt evam pradhānasya racanāyāḥ svatantra pravṛtteḥ anumāna virodhena anupapatteḥ na anumānam tatra pramāṇam iti sūtra akṣara yojanām manasi nidhāya sūtra tātparyam uktam idānīm tām eva vivṛṇvan pratipakṣa antaram āha svatantrā iti 
NSu_2.2.18ab.1–2.2.18ab.3	 svatantra vṛttiḥ racanā sā ca eva acetane kutas caśabdaḥ anumāna antara samuccaye kutas eva iti anvayaḥ ayam atra prayogaḥ pradhānam svatantra pravṛtti rahitam acetana tvāt tantu ādi vat iti nanu acetana tve api pradhānasya svātantryeṇa pravṛttiḥ astu kaḥ virodhaḥ tathā ca vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojakaḥ ayam hetuḥ iti atas āha acetana tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.18cd.1–2.2.18cd.3	 acetana tvam svātantryam iti ca ātma pramāhatam tāvat eva hi anena aśaṅkanīyam yasmin= āśaṅkayamāne sva vacana sva kriyāsu anyāya pramāṇa antara virodhaḥ na prāduṣyāt na hi kaścid evam śaṅkate mūkaḥ api vaktā kinna syāt śabdaḥ apratipādakaḥ kinna bhavet anumāna tvāt anumāna mātram apramāṇam kutas na syāt agniḥ anuṣṇaḥ kutas na bhavet iti na hi eṣā śaṅkā apiśācī kadācid śāntim upāgacchati tasmāt eva āmā śaṅkamānaḥ na laukikaḥ na api parīkṣakaḥ iti unmatta vat upekṣaṇīyaḥ prakṛte ca acetana tvam svātantryam ca ātma pramāhatam sva vyāhatam pramāṇa viruddham ca tasmāt acetana tve api svatantra pravṛttiḥ astu pradhānasya iti śaṅkā eva na utpattum arhati iti kim atra bādhaka upanyāsena iti nanu acetanasya svātantrya śaṅkāyām katham sva vyāhatiḥ na hi svātantryam nāma caitanyam na api acetana tvam nāma asvātantryam kathaṃca pramāṇa virodhaḥ iti ata sva vyāghātam tāvat upapādayitum svātantryam vyākhyāti sva icchā iti 
NSu_2.2.19ab.1–2.2.19c.2	 sva icchā anusāritām eva svātantryam hi vidaḥ viduḥ pravṛttau= iti śeṣaḥ vidaḥ viduḥ iti anena sakala vidvat sammatam etat iti āha atas eva hi svātantrya abhāvāt vṛkṣaḥ tiṣṭhati ityādi kartṛ tva vyavahāraḥ gauṇaḥ iti sarve pratipannāḥ tathā api katham sva vyāhatiḥ na hi acetana tvam nāma icchā virahaḥ kinnāma caitanya virahaḥ iti atas āha kutas iti kutas icchā acetanasya acetanasya icchā kutas kāraṇāt jāyate na kutaścid jñānam eva hi icchāyāḥ janakam iti arthaḥ tathā api kim iti atas āha seccham ced iti 
NSu_2.2.19cd.1–2.2.19cd.3	 seccham ced kim acetanam seccham ced aṅgīkṛtam tadā tat acetanam kim cetanam eva iti arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati acetanam api pradhānam svātantryeṇa pravṛttim adaḥ tu iti vadata acetanam icchā vadaḥ tu iti uktam syāt sva icchā anusāri tvasya svātantrya śabda artha tayā sarva sammata tvāt acetanasya icchāvat tvam aṅgīkurvāṇena cetana tvam api aṅgīkartavyam syāt anvaya vyatirekābhyām icchāyāḥ sva samāna āśraya caitanya kāryatva avadhāraṇāt kārya aṅgīkāre kāraṇa anaṅgīkārasya anucita tvāt acetanam cetanam iti ca sphuṭāḥ vyāhatiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.19cd.4–2.2.19cd.5	 etena etat api nirastam acetana tvam svātantryam ca yadi paraspara vyāhatam tarhi acetana tvena svatantra pravṛttiḥ āhitya sādhane sādhya aviśiṣṭa tā doṣaḥ syāt iti na hi asmābhiḥ acetana tva svātantryayoḥ vandhyāḥ apatyavatī iti vat sākṣāt virodhaḥ abhihitaḥ kintu svātantrya balena caitanyam pareṇa aṅgīkārayitvā anena eva svātantrya aṅgīkāre acetana tva anupapattiḥ iti bādhakam ca uktam bhavati evam acetanasya svātantrya aṅgīkāre sva vyāhatim upapādya pramāṇa virodham api upapādayati icchāmi iti 
NSu_2.2.20.1–2.2.20.2	 icchāmi aham iti hi eva nija anubhava rodhataḥ acetanecśāpa gatāḥ hi śabdena asya anumānasya viśva jana prasiddha tvam sūcayati eva śabdasya apagata eva etya nvayaḥ nija anubhavaḥ sākṣi anubhavaḥ aham icchāmi iti tāvat icchā ātma sambandhinī sākṣiṇā anubhūyate na ca sā dvi kartṛkā sambhavati kvāpi ekasya vyāpārasya dvi kartṛka tva anupalambhāt tatas ca acetanasya icchā aṅgīkṛtāced anubhava virodhāt acetanasya icchā apagatā na asti iti yāvat icchā bhāve ca sva icchā anusāri tva lakṣaṇam svātantryam dūra utsāritam iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.2.20.3	 nanu navam asti anubhavaḥ kintu aham icchāmi iti vyavahāra mātram tasya api nimittam bheda āgrahaḥ ātmā hi nityaḥ nirvikāraḥ caitanya mātra vapuḥ na tasya icchā ādi kartṛ tvam āgantukam sambhavati kintu antaḥkaraṇasya eva prasava dharma tvāt tayoḥ ca ātma antaḥkaraṇayoḥ bheda agra hāditara itara dharma vyavahāraḥ pravartate bheda agrahe ca nimittam sannidhānam yathā uktam tasmāt tad saṃyogāt acetanam cetanāvat iva liṅgam guṇa kartṛ tve ca tathā kartā iva bhavati udāsīnaḥ a iti atas anubhava balāt cetanasya eva icchāvat tvam na acetanasya iti ayuktam iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.20d.1–2.2.21a.2	 yadi bheda āgrahaḥ atra ca katham na sa ghaṭasya syāt yadi evam anubhavaḥ eva na asti kintu vyavahāra mātram atra ca vyavahāre bheda āgrahaḥ eva nimittam ucyate tadā sa bheda āgrahaḥ ghaṭasya kim na syāt vyavahāra hetuḥ iti śeṣaḥ idam uktam bhavati sva prakāśa anubhava apalāpa doṣaḥ tāvat vyavahāre ca nimittam na asti na ca bheda āgrahaḥ viśiṣṭa vyavahārasya tādṛśa jñāna kārya tā niyamāt anyathā ghaṭa paṭau= apīta retara bhedam na gṛhṇītaḥ iti itara itara dharma saṃsarga vyavahāraḥ syāt iti 
NSu_2.2.21a.3	 nanu gṛhyamāṇayoḥ bheda grahaḥ vyavahāra hetuḥ na tu bheda agraha mātram na ca ghaṭa paṭau svarūpam gṛhṇītaḥ tat katham atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ced kim ayam viśiṣṭaḥ bheda āgrahaḥ antaḥkaraṇasya uta ātmanaḥ na ādyaḥ tasya acetana tvena svarūpa graha anupapatteḥ upapattau vā sa katham viśiṣṭaḥ bheda āgrahaḥ ghaṭasya na syāt tathā ca vyavahāraḥ api syāt nanu antaḥkaraṇe asti caitanya āropaḥ na ghaṭe atas na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti ced kim tasya nimittam sannidhānam iti ced tarhi sarva gata ātma sannidhānam ghaṭe api asti iti katham sa na ghaṭasya syāt nanu na saṃyoga mātram nimittam kintu upa kārya upakāraka bhāve sati sa ca asti ātma antaḥkaraṇayoḥ puruṣasya darśana artham iti ukta tvāt iti ced tarhi ghaṭaḥ api puruṣasya upakārakaḥ iti katham sa na ghaṭasya syāt 
NSu_2.2.21a.4–2.2.21a.5	 dvitīye vyavahāraḥ api kim ātmanaḥ uta antaḥkaraṇasya na ādyaḥ tasya nirvikārasya vyavahāra kriyā anupapatteḥ upapattau vā kim icchayā aparāddham dvitīye anya gatena bheda agraheṇa anyasya vyavahāraḥ ced katham sa na ghaṭasya syāt kiñca yadi bheda agrahāt antaḥ karaṇa dharmaḥ eva icchā atmani vyavahriyate iti aṅgīkriyate tadā ghaṭasya api ātmanā bheda agrahāt pṛthu budhna udara ākāraḥ aham iti vyavahāraḥ katham na syāt iti gūḍha abhisandheḥ uttaram 
NSu_2.2.21a.6–2.2.21a.8	 yat vā atra ca ātmā antaḥkaraṇayoḥ ca sphuṭam pratibhāsamāna bhedayoḥ api iti hṛdayam yadi bheda āgrahaḥ syāt tadā katham sa bheda āgrahaḥ ghaṭasya ātmanaḥ ca na syāt iti yojanāḥ athavā evam vadan praṣṭavyaḥ bheda āgrahaḥ kim bheda grahasya virodhī na vā iti na iti pakṣe katham sa ghaṭasya ātmanā paṭa ādinā vā na syāt iti uttaram nanu bheda grahaḥ bheda agraha vi rodhī sa ca asti ghaṭaḥ iti kutas tatra bheda āgrahaḥ tad prayuktaḥ vyavahāraḥ vā iti gūḍha abhisandhim ajānataḥ dvitīya pakṣam āśaṅkayā āha manaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.21bc.1–2.2.21bc.2	 manaḥ me iti bhedataḥ manasaḥ api gṛhīta tvāt bhedataḥ iti tṛtīya arthaḥ tasiḥ yadi bheda grahaḥ bheda agrahavirodhī iti bhedena gṛhyamāṇe ghaṭe na bheda agrahaḥ iti ucyate tadā me manaḥ iti manasaḥ api bhedena gṛhīta tvāt na ātmanā bheda āgrahaḥ syāt tathā ca bheda āgraha nimittaḥ aham icchāmi iti vyavahāraḥ iti asat kintu anubhava nimittaḥ eva atas eva na antaḥkaraṇa dharmasya ātmani āropaḥ iti api yuktam bheda graha sadbhāvena āropa hetoḥ bheda agrahasya ayogāt na hi avidita bhedam sambandhi tayā gṛhyate ātmani api prasaṅgāt kena punar pramāṇena manaḥ gṛhyate sākṣiṇā iti vadāmaḥ tathā hi natā vat cakṣuḥ ādinā tad avagamaḥ arūpi dravya tvāt cakṣuḥ ādi avyāpāre api upalabdheḥ naca anumānena liṅga abhāvāt nanu asti yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ manasaḥ liṅgam tathā hi bāhya indriyeṣu svaiḥ svaiḥ viṣayaiḥ yugapad sannikṛṣṭeṣu ātmanā adhiṣṭhiteṣu api na yugapad jñānāni jāyante tena jñāyate asti etebhyaḥ anyat sahakāri yad saṃyoga krama vaśāt jñāna kramaḥ prakramataḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.21bc.3	 atra kaścid āha ātmanaḥ eva evaṃvidha sāmarthya kalpanā upapattau= anyathā siddham anumānam manasaḥ pratīndriya saṃyoga vyavahāre kramavati kāraṇa antara śūnye anaikāntikam ca phalasya ca vṛkṣa śat patataḥ krama vartinī ākāśa saṃyoge kuṭhāra ādi vyāpāre ca indriyāṇām prativiṣaya saṃyoga vyāpāre ca iti tat ayuktam dṛṣṭa anusāriṇī hi kalpanā kartā hi aneka karaṇa adhiṣṭhānena yugapad nānā kāryāṇi kurvāṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tathā hi yugapad māṇavakaḥ gacchati paṭhati panthānam īkṣate vahati ca kamaṇḍalum tasmāt na eva kartṛ dharmaḥ yuktaḥ kalpayitum kintu dṛṣṭa tvāt dravya antaram eva avyāpakam anaikāntyam tu na asti eva tatra api kriyā krama ādeḥ nimittasya vidyamāna tvāt iti 
NSu_2.2.21bc.4^1	 atra ucyate asti tāvat avivekinām api manaḥ pratītiḥ mama manaḥ anyatra gatam ityādi vyavahārāt na ca te yugapad jñāna anutpattim jānanti pratyuta yugapad eva jñāna utpattim manyante anyathā vyāsaṅge krama darśanena anyatra api krama anumānam parasya vyartham syāt tasmāt liṅga darśanāt prāk eva bhavat idam manaḥ jñānam na tad nimittakam iti astu tarhi buddhayā ādīnām asamavāyi kāraṇasya saṃyogasya āśraya tayā manaḥ siddhiḥ mā evam pratyakṣa jñāne tāvat indriya ātma saṃyogasya eva asamavāyikāraṇa tvasya upapatteḥ anumiti ādau liṅga jñāna ādeḥ 
NSu_2.2.21bc.4^2–2.2.21bc.5	 smṛtau bhāvanāyāḥ sukhāt āviṣya artha upalabdha ādeḥ iti nitya viśeṣa guṇānām saṃyoga asamavāyikāraṇa tva niyamāt na evam iti ced na vibhāga śabda ja śabde vyabhicārāt aśrāvaṇat tvena hetu viśeṣaṇāt na iti ced yathā tarhi vibhāga ādi śabde kāraṇa antara darśanāt tad nirāsa artham vyāpti grahaṇa velāyām prayatyate tathā sukha ādi nirāsāya prayatanīyam asamavāyi kāraṇa antara darśanasya tulya tvāt nimittam tat iti ced na asamavāyi kāraṇa lakṣaṇasya ati vyāpti prāpteḥ iti na ca sukha ādi upalabdhi karaṇa tvena manassiddhiḥ sākṣi siddha tayā anyathā siddheḥ evam anumāna antaram api nirasanīyam naca āgamaḥ manasi pramāṇam jāti badhirāṇām api tad pratyayāt tasmāt siddham sākṣi grāhya tvam manasaḥ tasya ca tena eva ātmanaḥ bhinna tayā grahaṇāt bheda āgrahā sambhavena icchāmi ahamī iti na bheda āgraha nibandhanaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.21bc.6	 nanu ca kāmaḥsaṅkalpaḥ vicikitsā śraddhā aśraddhā dhṛtiḥ adhṛtiḥ bhīrhīḥ iti etat sarvam manaḥ eva a iti śrutau kāmasya antaḥkaraṇa rūpa tvam tāvat pratīyate na ca śrautena arthena anyathā bhavitum yuktam atas balavat bādhaka upanipātāt icchāmi aham iti bheda āgraha nimittam vyavahāra mātram etaṅgīkaraṇīyam na tu ātmanaḥ icchā sambandha anubhavaḥ na ca me manaḥ iti bheda grahāt tad agrahā sambhavaḥ me caitanyam itiva dvaya vahāra mātra tvāt na ca ukta anupapattiḥ sattva rajaḥ tama sā āmādi kāryam hi buddhiḥ iti ucyate sā ca aṃśa trayavatī puruṣa uparāgaḥ viṣaya uparāgaḥ vyāpāra āveśaḥ ca iti aṃśāḥ bhavati hi aham idam karomi iti tatra aham iti cetanā uparāgaḥ darpaṇasya eva mukha uparāgaḥ bheda agra hāda tāttvikaḥ idam iti viṣaya uparāgaḥ indriya pranāḍikayā pariṇati bhedaḥ darparasya iva mala sambandhaḥ pāramārthikaḥ tathā ubhaya āyattaḥ vyāpāra āveśaḥ eṣā eva diś aham icchāmi iti atra api iti atas āha ubhaya iti
