NSu_2.2.21d.1–2.2.22a.3	 ubhaya ātmaka tā yatas kāmasya tu manaḥ kāmaḥ tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe tatas iti upaskartavyam yatas kāraṇāt kāmasya ubhaya ātmaka tā asti ātma dharmatā manaḥ dharma tā ca tatas eva manaḥ kāmaḥ iti śrutiḥ upapadyate idam uktam bhavati bhavet idam bheda agraha kalpanam yadi ātmanaḥ kāmavat tvam pāramārthikam na syāt na ca etat asti bādhaka abhāvāt dvividhaḥ hi kāmaḥ asti ekaḥ ātma dharmaḥ aparaḥ antaḥkaraṇa dharmaḥ tatra antaḥkaraṇa dharmam kāmam abhipretya śrutiḥ pravṛttā na ātmanaḥ kāmavat tvam bādhate na hi devadattaḥ gomān iti vākyam yajñadattasya go sambandham bādhitum śaknoti iti syāt etat evam yadi kāma dvaividhyam pramitam syāt etat eva kutas iti ced śruti anubhava balāt tāvat prakāra sahasra anusaraṇe api aghaṭanāyām khalu anubhava apalāpa sāhasam abhyupeyam pramāṇa antaram ca āha priyā iti 
NSu_2.2.22bc.1–2.2.22bc.3	 priya apriya vibhedataḥ dvaividhyam dṛśyate ca asya priyam iti ātyantikeṣyam ucyate apriyam iti ca tātkālikeṣyam viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇaḥ upalakṣaṇam asya kāmasya ayam arthaḥ asti tāvat āstika kāmukasya puruṣasya sraj canda vanitā ādau idam me syāt iti ekatas kāmaḥ anyatas tyajeyam iti naca ekaḥ eva ayam viruddha rūpa tvāt na ca dvau= api manaḥ dharmau yaugapadyāt yugapad sajātīya dharma janana ayogāt na ca yaugapadyam na asti anubhava siddha tvāt bādhaka abhāvāt ca tatra yaḥ apriya viṣayaḥ saḥ antaḥkaraṇa dharmaḥ yaḥ tu priya viṣayaḥ saḥ ātma dharmaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.22bc.4–2.2.22bc.5	 yat vā priya apriya śabdābhyām mukti saṃsārau= ucyete tad sambandhi vibhedena kāma dvaividhyam dṛśyate iti asti tāvat saṃsāre pracuraḥ ayam antaḥkaraṇa vṛtti rūpaḥ kāmaḥ asti ca asau muktau sa yadi pitṛ loka kāmaḥ bhavati a ityādi śruteḥ naca ekaḥ eva ayam muktau= antaḥkaraṇa vilayāt tathā ca asau= ātma dharmaḥ abhyupeyaḥ naca āgantuka dharma sambandhaḥ muktau= iti prāk api kāma dvaividhyam siddhayati iti śruti bādha parihārasya prayojanam āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_2.2.22d.1–2.2.22d.3	 tasmāt bheda āgrahaḥ kutas śruti virodhasya parihṛta tvāt bheda āgrahaḥ kutas pramāṇāt kalpanīyaḥ kutas ca anubhava apalāpena vyavahārasya tad nimitta tvam na kutas api iti arthaḥ anena acetanasya pradhānasya svātantryeṇa jagat kāraṇa tvam sādhayatām anumānam api sva vacana virodhaḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ ca uktau bhavataḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca sādhya vikalaḥ acetana svātantryasya kvāpi asammateḥ iti sūtra artham upasaṃharat na anumānam iti etat prakāra antareṇa vyācaṣṭe racanā iti 
NSu_2.2.23a–2.2.23c.3	 racanā anupapatteḥ tat na sarvajñānum āgatam acetanam jagatkartṛ tat tasmāt sarvajñānum āgatam anumānam prakṛti ādikam kasyacid pratyakṣam prameya tvāt iti sarvam asādhaka anumaya avagatam etad anumāna siddha sarvajña vākya avagatam iti yāvat yat vā anumāna siddha prāmāṇyaka tvena anumāna pradhāna tvena ca sarvajña abhimatasya vākyam eva sarvajñā anumā ucyate vyākhyāna antarasya ca idam prayojanam yat prāk uktam na yogi pratyakṣeṇa sāṅkhayā ācārya vacanena vā ayam arthaḥ siddhayati iti tat api sūtra sūcitam eva iti jñāpanam yadā tu sarvajña abhimata utprekṣitayā bhedānām parimāṇāt ityādikayā anumaya avagatam ānu mānam iti yojanāḥ tadā vaicitrī pradarśanam vyākhyāna antara prayojanam jagatkartṛ svātantryeṇa jagat kāraṇam 
NSu_2.2.23a–2.2.23c.5	 syāt etat parimāṇa ādi hetubhiḥ tāvat mahat ādi kāryāṇām kim api mūla kāraṇam asti iti avagamyate tasya api kāraṇa antara kalpane pramāṇa abhāvāt anavasthānāt ca tasya ca svātantryam kāraka antara aprayojya tvam eva na tu sva icchā anusāri tvam yena ukta doṣaḥ syāt tat ca tat prayoktuḥ kāraka antarasya aprāmāṇika tvāt eva siddham naca acetanasya tad asambhāvitam acetaneṣu api payaḥ ambu prabhṛtiṣu darśanāt acetanam eva hi payaḥ anyān adhiṣṭhitam api vatsa vivṛddhayartham pravartate dadhi bhāvam ca āpadyate ghana vinirmuktam ca ambu jambīra nārikela ādiṣu anekavidham vikāram prāpnoti nādeyam ca apasarpati tṛṇam ca gavā jagdham kṣīrībhavati ayaḥ ca ayaska antam abhisarpati na ca edam na acetana vaśam a ityādi pramāṇa virodhaḥ tasya ukta sthāneṣu eva anaikāntyam naca idam brahma vādinām sammatam yena siddha sādhanam syāt iti āśaṅkā parihāra artham sūtram  payaḥ ambu vat ced tatra api iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe payaḥ ambu ādi ca iti payaḥ ambu vat ced tatra api 
NSu_2.2.23d.1–2.2.24ab.4	 payaḥ ambu ādi ca na upamā etad praśāsti vacanāt cetanā acetanasya ca upamā sva artha sambhā vanāyām asmadīya hetu vyabhicāre ca iti śeṣaḥ yathā atra sādhyam vyabhicarati tathā pakṣe api vyabhicaratu hetuḥ iti evam artham hi vyabhicāra udbhāvanam tat atra na yujyate cetana acetanasya etat praśāsti vacanāt pārameśvara preraṇa apratipādaka śruteḥ ādyaḥ caśabdaḥ laukikānām svatantra tayā pratīyamānam api iti arthe dvitīyaḥ tu na kevalam acetanasya kintu ubhayasya api iti etat uktam bhavati kāraka antara aprayojya tva lakṣaṇam api svātantryam na pradhānasya upapadyate asambhāvita tvāt ukta anumāna viruddha tvāt ca 
NSu_2.2.24ab.5	 yat uktam atra payombu ādi vat iti tat asat tatra api īśvara preraṇayā āetasya vai akṣarasya a iti adiśruti siddha tvāt atas eva pradhānasya para prayojya tve pramāṇa abhāvaḥ api parāstaḥ iti sūtre payaḥ ambu vat iti ukte api na udāharaṇam ādaraṇīyam sthala antare sambhāvanā vyabhicāraḥ ca bhaviṣyate iti āśaṅkā parihāra arthasya vyatireka anavasthiteḥ ca anapekṣa tvāt a iti uttara sūtrasya api vyākhyānāya ādi pada prayogaḥ yat vā payaḥ ambu grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam iti abhipretya ādi padam pratyuktam uttara sūtram tu kaimutya artham cetana pravṛtteḥ api īśvara vyatirekeṇa anavasthiteḥ acetana pravṛtteḥ tad adhīna tvam kimu vācyam iti 
NSu_2.2.24ab.6–2.2.24ab.7	 tadvayā ākhyānāya cetana acetanasya ca iti uktam kiñca parimāṇāt iti hetuḥ tāvat anaikāntikaḥ sattva rajaḥ tamasām sāmya avasthā hi prakṛtiḥ ucyate sattva ādayaḥ ca parimitāḥ eva yathā uktam abagnīra nabhaḥ ahaṅkṛt mahat tattva guṇa trayaiḥ kramāt daśa uttaraiḥ a iti na ca prakṛtiḥ avyakta antaravatī iti katham na anaikāntyam na ca parimitasya api mūlaprakṛti tve bādhakam asti sārvatrika kārya anutpatti parimitānām eva kāraṇa tvam tantu ādiṣu darśanāt aparimitasya kṛtsna eka deśa vikalpa anupapatteḥ ca asmākam tu īśvara śaktyā eva upapadyate 
NSu_2.2.24ab.8	 samanvayāt iti api asat yat kāryam yat anugatimat tat tādṛkkāraṇa upetam iti asyāḥ vyāpteḥ avyaktāt vayakta janma aṅgīkāreṇa eva bhagna tvāt śaktitaḥ pravṛtteḥ ca iti etat api na vivakṣita artha sādhakam antar bhāvita kārya tvam eva kāraṇasya śaktiḥ iti asya siddhau hi tathā syāt tat ca satkārya vāda nirvāhyam iti atas eva vibhāga avibhāgau= api nirastau vibhāga avibhāgayoḥ eva satkārya vāda siddhayadhīnayoḥ asattvāt sva prakriyā mātreṇa artha siddhausthūla kāyarsya loṣṭha ādeḥ a ityādinā tārkika parikalpitābhyām vibhāga avibhāgābhyām paramāṇu kāraṇa tvam api syāt iti āstām prapañcaḥ 
NSu_2.2.24ab.9–2.2.24cd.1	 nanu idam ghaṭṭa kuṭṭī prabhāta nyāyam anusarati icchāvat tvam ātmanaḥ eva na tu jaḍasya iti atra hi prathamam anubhavaḥ pramāṇīkṛtaḥ tatra ca śruti virodhe codite antaḥkaraṇa dharmaḥ ātma dharmaḥ ca iti kāmasya dvaividhyāt na virodhaḥ iti uktam evañca ātmanaḥ eva icchāvat tvam na tu acetanasya iti tyaktam eva iti āśaṅkām siṃha avalokana nyāyena pariharati dvaividhye api iti dvaividhye api tu kāma ādeḥ kutas svāmi tvam ātmanaḥ 
NSu_2.2.25ab.1–2.2.25ab.3^1	 sākṣāt anubhava ārūḍham śakyate apoditum kvacid kāma ādeḥ dvaividhye api sākṣāt anubhava ārūḍham ātmanaḥ kāma ādeḥ svāmi tvam tu kutas pramāṇāt apoditum śakyate na kutas api iti yojanā śruti apekṣayā adipada grahaṇam apoditum iti samprasāraṇam chāndasam ayam atra uttara kramaḥ satyam kāmaḥ dvividhaḥ ātma dharmaḥ manaḥ vṛttiḥ ca iti tatra manaḥ vṛttim api kāmam pratyātmanaḥ eva svāmi tvam na manasaḥ aham kāmayaḥ iti sākṣi anubhava siddha tvāt manasaḥ tu kāmam pratyupādāna tvam eva yathā hi kṣetra upādānakānām api sasyānām kṛṣīvalaḥ eva svāmī na kṣetram tathā eva 
NSu_2.2.25ab.1–2.2.25ab.3^2	 na ca vācyam manasaḥ eva kāma svāmi tvam aham kāmayaḥ iti anubhavaḥ tu bhrāntiḥ vyavahāra mātram vā iti bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt na ca kauṭasthyam bādhakam antaḥkaraṇasya eva kāma upādāna tvena aṅgīkṛta tvāt svāmi tva mātreṇa ca kauṭasthya avighātāt anyathā kṛpaṇa dhanasya iva ātmanaḥ vaiyarthya āpatteḥ iti tat idam uktam kvacid iti nanu astu kāma svāmi tvam ātmanaḥ eva mā bhūt ca manasaḥ tathā api pūrva uttara virodhaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva icchā svāmi tva abhāve api yādṛśa tādṛśasya icchāvat tvasya manasi aṅgīkṛtattvāt iti atas āha icchā iti 
NSu_2.2.25cd.1–2.2.25cd.2	 icchā svāmi tvam eva uktam icchāvat tvam na ca aparam acetana icśāpa gata iti ādau= icchā svāmi tvam eva icchāvat tvam uktam naca aparam icchā upādāna tva lakṣaṇam etat uktam bhavati syāt atra pūrva apara virodhaḥ yadi yat eva icchāvat tvam prāk manasaḥ niṣiddham tat eva atra punar aṅgīkriyeta na ca etat asti pūrvam hi icchā svāmi tva lakṣaṇam icchāvat tvam ātmanaḥ eva na tu acetanasya iti uktam tasya eva kartṛ tva upayogāt śruti artha tayā tu icchā upādāna tva lakṣaṇam icchāva tvam idānīm manasaḥ abhyupagamyate iti kutas virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.25cd.3	 yat vā kāmasya dvaividhyena manasaḥ api kāmavat tvāt kartṛ tvam upapatsyate iti atas āha dvaividhye api iti dvayoḥ kāmavat tve api kāma svāmi tvam ātmanaḥ eva na tu manasaḥ nirapavāt a sākṣi anubhava siddha tvāt manasaḥ tu kāma upādāna tvam eva iti tatas kim iti atas āha icchā iti icchā svāmi tva lakṣaṇam eva icchāvat tvam prāk kartṛ tva upayuktam uktam na punar icchā upādāna tva lakṣaṇam yaḥ hi icchati sa prayatate na tu yat icchā bhavati tat iti tasmāt icchāsvāmi tvāt cetanasya eva kartṛ tvam na acetanasya tasya icchā upādāna tve api icchā svāmi tva abhāvāt iti 
NSu_2.2.25cd.4	 syāt etat svam nāma tat bhavati yat yatheṣya viniyoga yogyam yathā gavā ādi svāmī ca saḥ ucyate yaḥ yathā iṣya viniyoktā na cecchā ātmanoḥ etat asti yasmāt āstika kāmukasya niṣiddha icchām niyacchataḥ api sā avirbhavati prayatamānasya api vihita icchā na udeti tat katham icchā svāmi tvam ātmanaḥ syāt iti ced kim icchā atmanaḥ sarvathā api vaśā na bhavati iti ucyate uta kiñcid vaśa tvam aṅgīkriyate na ādyaḥ anubhava virodhāt icchati devadattaḥ ityādi vyavahāra viraha prasaṅgāt ca dvitīye tu siddham svāmi tvam iti āha kiñcid iti 
NSu_2.2.26ab.1–2.2.26ab.3	 kiñcid tad vaśa ga tve api svāmi tvam loka vat bhavet prabala virodhi vaśāt atyantavaśa tva abhāve api icchāyāḥ kiñcid ātma vaśa tva mātreṇa api tām pratyātmanaḥ svāmi tvam bhavet eva katham yathā atyantam avaśāyām api gavi kiñcid vaśa tva mātreṇa devadatta svāmi tvam loke dṛṣṭam tathā eva anyathā tat api na syāt iti nanu evam sati ekam sandhitsataḥ nyat cyavataḥ iti āpannam acetanasya kartṛ tvam nirākartum ātmanaḥ eva icchāsvāmi tvam na tu manasaḥ iti samarthitam tarhi īśvarasya api kulāla ādi manaḥ vṛtti icchām prati svāmi tvam na asti iti ghaṭa ādi kartṛ tvam na syāt tathā acetara vyapadeśāt iti adhikaraṇa virodha eti atas āha sarva ātmā iti 
NSu_2.2.26cd.1–2.2.26cd.3	 sarva ātma tantra kāma ādeḥ kim uta eva pareśituḥ yadā jīvasya api kāma ādi svāmyam tadā sarva ātmanā tantram adhīnam kāma ādi yasya asau tathā uktaḥ sarveṣām ātmanām tantram sādhanam yaḥ kāmaḥ tasya ādiḥ kāraṇam tasya pareśituḥ kāmasvāmi tvam kim uta eva vaktavyam etat uktam bhavati jīveśvarau dvau= api śarīram adhitiṣṭhataḥ tatra īśvaraḥ antaḥkaraṇam spaṣṭam dṛṣṭvā tatra jñāna icchā prayatna rūpāḥ vṛttīḥ sva icchā jñāna prayatnaiḥ utpādya bāhya karaṇāni ca adhiṣṭhāya ghaṭa ādi utpādayati jīvaḥ tu tat datta svāmyaḥ avatiṣṭhate yathā uktaṃbaddhiḥ jñānam a ityādi tasmāt īśvarasya eva mukhyam svāmyam kartṛ tvam ca jīvasya tvamukhyam eva iti tathā ca uktam sva svāmibhāvaḥ dhruvaḥ eṣa yatra tarhi acyute asau= iti kṛtya yoge a iti yat uktam nirapavāda anubhava balāt ātmanaḥ eva icchāsvāmi tvam iti tat ayuktam kāmaḥ saṅkalpaḥ iti manasaḥ kāma svāmi tva abhidhātri āpauruṣeya tvena balavatyā veda vācā eva āpodita tvāt iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.2.27a–2.2.27c.3	 na ca anubhava gam kāma svāmi tvam veda vāc api śakta apavaditum kāma svāmi tvam ātmanaḥ iti śeṣaḥ kāma ādi anuvādena khalu iyam veda vāc ātma upādāna tvam vaiśeṣika ādi mata prāptam vārayitum teṣām manaḥ rūpa tvam ācaṣṭe kāma ādi svarūpam ca sākṣi anubhavena eva siddham iti tasya upajīvya tvam sa ca tān ātma svāmikān eva viṣayīkaroti naca upajīvyakam upajīvyam apavaditum śaknoti vedasya utsargataḥ balavat tve api upajīvya apekṣayā daurbalyam eva yathā āhuḥ prābalyam āgamasya eva jātyā teṣu triṣu smṛtam upajīvya virodhe tu na prāmāṇyam amuṣya ca a iti atas na śruteḥ anubhava apavādaka tvam yuktam iti tarhi śruteḥ kā gatiḥ iti atas āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_2.2.27cd.1–2.2.28ab.3	 tasmāt sā tad anya abhidhāyinī upajīvya tvena balavatā anubhavena bādhita tvāt iti arthaḥ tad anya abhidhāyinī svāmi tvāt anyasya upādāna tvasya abhidhāyinī na kevalam upajīvya bādhāt kintu upa patti virodhāt ca iti āha mokṣa kāmaḥ iti mokṣa kāmaḥ bhavet anyaḥ yadi muktāt bhaviṣyataḥ yadi kāmaḥ antaḥkaraṇa kartṛkaḥ syāt tadā mokṣa kāmaḥ api antaḥkaraṇasya eva syāt mokṣaḥ tu ātmanaḥ iti ca prasiddham tathā ca yaḥ muktaḥ bhaviṣyati tasmāt anyaḥ eva mokṣa kāmaḥ ita yuktam syāt kāmasya anya gata tve sādhana anuṣṭhātā api anyaḥ eva iti aṅgīkartavyam phala kāmanā sā dhana anuṣṭhānayoḥ eka niṣṭhatva dṛṣṭeḥ tathā ca akṛta abhyāgama kṛta vipraṇaśa prasaṅgaḥ nanu na ayam doṣaḥ puruṣa vimokṣa artham prakṛti pravṛtti abhyupagamāt dṛśyate hi para prayojana artham janānām pravṛttiḥ iti atra idam upatiṣṭhate mokṣa kāmasya iti 
NSu_2.2.28c.1–2.2.28c.3	 mokṣa kāmasya kim tena upalakṣaṇam etat sādhana anuṣṭhātā iti api draṣṭavyam para prayojana ārtam pravatarmānāḥ khalu loke dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam vā kim api prayojanam anusandadhānāḥ prāyeṇa upalabdhāḥ tathā atra api prakṛteḥ prayojanena bhāvyam na ca tat asti iti arthaḥ syāt etat sva prayojanam ananusandhāya eva jīva mokṣa artham prakṛteḥ pravṛttiḥ yatā kṛpālu tvena bhavatām īśvarasya iti atas āha sva nāśa artham ca iti 
NSu_2.2.28d.1–2.2.28d.2	 sva nāśa artham ca kaḥ yatet na kevalam para prayojana arthā prakṛteḥ pravṛttiḥ yujyate prakṛti layaḥ hi mokṣaḥ nāma na hi kaḥ api kṛpālurātma nāśa artham yatamānaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti yadi api atra anādheya atiśayasya niṣkriyasya upakārya tvam api kvacid na dṛṣṭam iti eva vaktavyam tathā api tad śiṣyaiḥ eva uhyatām iti tad abhyupagamena dūṣaṇa antaram idam uktam 
NSu_2.2.28d.3	 nanu idam ayuktam cetanaḥ hi sva prayojanam anusandadhyāt sva nāśāt ca bibhyat parāvarteta prakṛtiḥ tu acetanā katham evam paryanuyogam arhati iti evam tarhi katham ātma mokṣam api anusandhāya pravarteta svabhāvaḥ ayam pradhānasya iti ced tarhi kadāpi saṃsāraḥ asya na syāt bhoga arthā pravṛttiḥ prakṛteḥ svabhāvaḥ iti ced tarhi mokṣa abhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.2.28d.4–2.2.28d.6	 ubhaya svabhāva tve tu ubhayam na syāt virodhāt avirodhe vā yugapad ubhayam syāt vyavasthāpaka abhāvāt bhogeṣu upabhukteṣu mokṣa artha iti ced na bhogānām ānantyena aparisamāpteḥ iti ayam prasaṅga atharḥ yadi ātmā na kāma kartā syāt tadā mumukṣuḥ api na syāt tatas ca na tad artham prayateta tathā ca na mucyeta 
NSu_2.2.28d.7–2.2.28d.8	 para pravṛtteḥ sva prayojana bhāva abhāvayoḥ ayukta tvāt iti bahulam etat nidarśanam iti smaraṇādyatet iti para smaipadam tathā ācāha candra ādayaḥ tu manyante sarvasmāt ubhayam padam a iti evam anīśvara sāṅkhaya matam sādhāraṇa dūṣaṇaiḥ apākṛtya ye kartṛ tvam prakṛteḥ eva bhoktṛ tvam tu ātmanaḥ iti manyante tat matam dūṣayati kartṛ tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.29ab.1–2.2.29ab.3	 kartṛ tvam yasya tasya eva bhoktṛ tvam upalabhyate yat vā evam ātmanaḥ kartṛ tvam upapādya bhoktṛ tvam api anena eva upapādayati yena mayā idam kṛtam saḥ eva aham tad phalam bhuñjaḥ iti kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya anubhavāt tayat vaiyadhi karaṇya aṅgīkāre anubhava virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ bhrāntaḥ ayam anubhavaḥ iti ced na bādhaka abhāvāt iti āha vibhāge ca iti 
NSu_2.2.29cd.1–2.2.29cd.3	 vibhāge ca tayoḥ mānam na eva kiñcid kvacid bhavet tayoḥ kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tvayoḥ vibhāge vyadhikaraṇa tve akṛta abhyāgama kṛta vināśau ca evam sati syātām iti yat uktam ātmanaḥ mokṣaḥ na syāt iti tat iṣi āpādanam prakṛteḥ eva mokṣa abhyupagamāt na ca bandha mokṣayoḥ vaiyadhi karaṇyā anupapattiḥ bandhasya api prakṛti gata tvāt iti ced na sakala śruti smṛtī hāsa purāṇa anubhavaiḥ bandha mokṣayeḥ ātma gata tva avagamena tad virodhāt itya āśayavān upasaṃharati sarva iti 
NSu_2.2.30.1–2.2.30.2	 sarva māna virodha eka durdīkṣā dīkṣitaḥ tu ayam māyā vādi upamām yāyāt sarva māna virodhaḥ eva yā pradhāna durdīkṣāḥ duṣyaḥ anuṣṭhāna saṅkalpaḥ tayā dīkṣitaḥ ayam tu sāṅkhayaḥ māyā vādinām upamā tvam prāpnuyāt te api hi kartṛ tva bhoktṛ tva ādi sakala dharma vikalam asat kalpam caitanya mātram aṅgīkṛtya avidyāyā eva acetanāyāḥ sarva kāraṇa tvam bandha mokṣa adhikaraṇa tvam ca abhyupagacchanti tat eteṣām sarva pramāṇa viruddha artha aṅgīkāri tve sāṅkhayaḥ ayam dṛṣṭānta bhāvam āpadyate iti 
NSu_2.2.30.3–2.2.30.5	 yat puruṣa bahu tvam sāṅkhayena aṅgīkṛtam tat api māyā vādibhiḥ abhyupagatam eva janana ādi prakṛti dharmaiḥ eva hi tad bahu tvam na tu svarūpe kaścid asti parasparataḥ viśeṣaḥ māyā vādinaḥ api upādhi nibandhanam bhedam aṅgīkurvanti eva na ca prapañca satya tvam viśeṣaḥ kāraṇa mātra tva abhyupagamena kāyar prapañcasya sāṅkhayena nirasta tvāt iti yā api sa aṅkhaya parikalpitā sṛṣṭi pralaya bandha mokṣa tad sādhana prakriyā sā api sarva pramāṇa viruddha iti uktam bhavati na kevalam sāṅkhayasya māyā vādi sadṛśa tvam asmābhiḥ eva ucyate kintu sūtra kṛtā api sūcitam iti āha tat iti 
NSu_2.2.30d.1–2.2.30d.3	 tat caśabdāt nirākṛtaḥ tasmāt māyā vādi sadṛśa tvāt eva hi sāṅkhayaḥ bhoktrā patteḥ avibhāgaḥ ced syāt loka vat iti prāk parākṛtena māyā vādinā racanā anupapatteḥ ca na anumānam iti caśabdena samuccitya nirākṛtaḥ yat vā pramāṇa virodhaḥ api na utsūtritaḥ iti anena āha tasmāt sarva māna virodhi tvāt eva caśabdāt sarva māna virodha samuccaya artham caśabdam prakṣipya iti arthaḥ anyatra abhāvāt ca na tṛṇa ādi vat 
NSu_2.2.30d.4	 anyatra abhāvāt ca na tṛṇa ādi vat idam sūtram kecid ittham vyācakṣate yathā tṛṇa pallava ādikam gavādinā upabhuktam svayam eva kṣīrībhavati evam pradhānam svayam eva mahat ādi rūpeṇa pariṇamate iti āśaṅkā kila atra nirasyate na tṛṇa ādi vat svayam eva pradhānasya pariṇāmaḥ vaktavyaḥ yatas tṛṇa ādīnām api svayam eva pariṇāmaḥ na asti kutas anyatra anaḍuha upabhukte tad abhāvāt iti atra āśaṅkā eva tāvat anupapannāḥ payaḥ ambu vat ced tatra api iti anena eva parihṛta tvāt pratyudāharaṇam ca sūtra praṇayana ayogāt parihāraḥ api ayam anupapannaḥ gavā ādi upabhuktasya eva kṣīra tvam na anyatra iti hi vadatā prakṛteḥ sahakāri sadbhāva mātram upapāditam syāt na punar īśvara apekṣa tvam atas na ayam sūtra arthaḥ kintu pātañjala matam atra adhikaraṇe nirākriyate iti āśayavān= tat upanyasyati sa aṅkhayānām iti 
NSu_2.2.31.1–2.2.31.2	 sāṅkhayaḥ tu sa īśvaraḥ brūte kṣetra anugraha śaktimān asti īśvaraḥ svayambhātaḥ kleśa karma ādi varjitaḥ sāṅkhayamatasya nirasta tvāt kim punar upanyāsena iti atas asya matasya tatas viśeṣam tuśabdena sūcayati tam eva viśeṣam vyanakti sa īśvaraḥ iti sa īśvaraḥ ced na nirākāryaḥ virodha abhāvāt iti atas uktam kṣetra iti tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇa arthaḥ atra api anvīyate yadi api sa īśvaraḥ iti anena eva īśvaraḥ asti iti brūtaḥ iti siddham tathā api tad anuvādena viśeṣaṇa vidhānam eva etat yaḥ īśvaraḥ asti sa kṣetra anugraha śaktimān eva iti brūtaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.31.3	 kṣiyanti asmin kāryāṇi avyakta tayā iti kṣetram upādānam prakṛtiḥ tad anugraha śaktiḥ eva īśvarasya tena abhyupagamyate atas nirākaraṇīyaḥ eva asau= iti sarva śakti tva abhāve kim tasya īśvara tvam iti atas uktam svayambhātaḥ iti svayam indriya ādi anapekṣam eva bhātaḥ kartari ktaḥ tatas ca sarvajñaḥ iti labhyate īśvara tva upapādakam viśeṣaṇa antaram āha kleśa iti kleśa karma vipāka āśaya varjitaḥ iti arthaḥ tathā ca āha patañjaliḥ kleśa karma vipāka śayaiḥ aparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa viśeṣaḥ īśvaraḥ a iti tathā anirmāṇa kāyam adhiṣṭhāya sampradāya pravartakaḥ anugrāhakaḥ ca a iti tatra avidyā smitā rāga dveṣa abhiniveśāḥ pañca kleśāḥ 
NSu_2.2.31.4–2.2.32ab.2	 anātmani ātma buddhiḥ avidyā idam madīyam iti abhimānaḥ asmitā viṣayeṣu āsaktiḥ rāgaḥ kopaḥ dveṣaḥ bhayam abhiniveśaḥ ete eva pañca kleśāḥ tantra antare tamaḥ mohaḥ mahā mohāḥ tāmisraḥ andhatāmisraḥ iti vyavahriyante vārṣagaṇyaḥ tu ena anavidyā iti eva āha karma iti vidhi niṣedhau= ucyete āśaya śabdena dharma adharmau vipākaḥ iti tad phalam sukha duḥkhe tad upāyaḥ ca iti iti śabdasya āgāminaḥ prativākyam sambandhaḥ veda vāda virodham sphuṭīka rtum avadhāraṇa vyāvartyam āha kṣetra iti kṣetra śaktimatī sā eva prakṛtiḥ yā jagat upādānam sā prakṛtiḥ eva upādāna tva śaktimatī brūte na punar veda vādinaḥ iva tām api śaktim īśvara āyattām vyāvartya antaram āha bīja iti 
NSu_2.2.32bc.1–2.2.32bc.3	 bīja śaktimān jīvaḥ parjanya vat atra api eva iti sambaddhayate śarīra indriya ādi sambandhena utpattau yā śaktiḥ sā bīja śaktiḥ jīvaḥ eva tat vān iti brūte na tu tadīyām bīja śaktim tattva vidaḥ iva bhagavat adhīnām yadi upādāna tva utpatti śaktimat tvam prakṛti puruṣayoḥ eva tadā kim īśvareṇa anugrāhakeṇa iti atas āha parjanya vat iti yathā hi pṛthivyāḥ kalama ādi bījānām ca upādāna tva bīja tva śaktī yadi api svāyatte tathā api aṅkura utpattau parjanyasya asti pṛthivī anugrāhaka tvam tathā prakṛti puruṣayoḥ sva āyatta śakti tve api īśvaraḥ prakṛti anugraha śaktimān aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ tat kim parjanya vat anvaya vyatirekābhyām īśvarasya prakṛti anugrāhaka tvam avaseyam na iti āha daiva iti 
NSu_2.2.32cd.1–2.2.32cd.3	 daiva śaktimān īśvaraḥ smṛtaḥ daiva śabdaḥ adṛṣṭa svarūpa tvam āha tena anvaya vyatireka aviṣaya tvam lakṣayati tat kim niṣpramāṇakaḥ eva īśvaraḥ prakṛti anugrāhakaḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ iti atas uktam smṛtaḥ iti māyā adhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram a iti ādau= iti śeṣaḥ smṛtaḥ iti upalakṣaṇam śrutaḥ iti api grāhyam prakṛti puruṣayoḥ sva āyatta śakti tvam kutas iti atas āha pṛthivī vat iti 
NSu_2.2.33a.1–2.2.33a.3	 pṛthivī vat pradhānam tat yathā pṛthivyāḥ su a āyatta upādana tva śaktiḥ tathā tat tasmāt upādāna tvāt pradhānam api sva āyatta upādāna tva śaktimat anumeyam iti arthaḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etat kalama ādi bīja vat bīja tvāt jīvaḥ api sva āyatta bīja śaktimān anumātavyaḥ iti api draṣṭavyam nanu yathā loke kalama ādi bījānām kaścid āvapana kartā asti tathā atra api tat sthānīyena kena api bhāvyam nacāsau= anyaḥ asti parameśvarāt tat katham kṣetra anugraha śaktimān eva īśvaraḥ iti atas āha jīvaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.33bc.1–2.2.33bc.3	 jīvaḥ sannidhi mātrataḥ bīja a= apana kartā iva iti dṛśyate khalu apatyajīvaḥ bīja bhūtaḥ pitṛ jīvaḥ ca avapana kartṛ sthānīyaḥ tasmāt kim īśvarasya tad śakti kalpanayā viṣaya utpattau tu tad apekṣā eva na asti iti bhāvaḥ nanu evam pitṛ jīvasya apatya utpādaka tva aṅgīkāre apasiddhāntaḥ syāt sa aṅkhayaiḥ jīvasya kartṛ tva anabhyupagamāt iti atas uktam sannidhi mātrataḥ iti śarīra ādi rūpā prakṛtiḥ eva apatya utpāda katrī tad sannidhi nimittāt viveka agrahāt jīve tad kartṛ tva vyavahāraḥ eva iti brūtaḥ iti evam upi asta mata nirāsa artham sūtram avatārayati atra iti 
NSu_2.2.33d.1–2.2.33d.4	 atra prāha prabhuḥ svayam atra etat mata viṣaye dūṣaṇam prāha iti atharḥ svayam sākṣāt na upacāreṇa prabhuḥ iti sūtra kṛtaḥ dūṣaṇa sāmarthyam ācaṣṭe sūtram vyācaṣṭe anyatra iti anyatra kā api śaktiḥ na svātantryeṇa anyatra prakṛtau puruṣe tathā pṛthivyām kalama ādi bīje ca kā api iti kṣetra śaktiḥ bīja śaktiḥ bīja avapana śaktiḥ ca iti arthaḥ katham tarhi upādāna tva ādikam iti atas uktam svātantryeṇa iti kutas na asti iti atas āha īśa iti 
NSu_2.2.34bc.1–2.2.34d.1	 īśaḥ eva hi śaktīḥ tāḥ prerayati añjaḥ yasmāt īśaḥ eva tāḥ pradhāna ādi śaktīḥ prerayati iti śruti ādi prasiddham tasmāt anyatra kā api śaktiḥ svātantryeṇa na asti iti na ca pradhāna ādi vat īśvarasya api preraṇā śaktiḥ parāyatta iti uktam añjaḥ iti kriyā viśeṣaṇam etat tat anena parakīya anumānasya bādhita viṣaya tvam dṛṣṭāntasya ca sādhya vikala tvam uktam bhavati na kevalam prakṛti puruṣayoḥ svātantryeṇa śakti abhāvaḥ parameśvara āyatta śakti tvam ca kim tarhi iti atas ca śabda samuccitam artham āha tad adhīnāḥ ca iti  tad adhīnāḥ ca sarvadā 
NSu_2.2.35a–2.2.35c.3	 sattā pradhāna puruṣa śaktīnām ca pratītayaḥ pravṛttayaḥ ca tāḥ sarvāḥ ādyaḥ ca śabdaḥ śakti preraka tvasya sattā ādi prada tvena saha samuccaya arthaḥ uttarau= anyonya samuccaye pradhāna puruṣayoḥ tadīyānām śaktīnām ca sattā svarūpam pratītayaḥ ca pramāviṣaya tvam ca iti yāvat tāḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ pravṛttayaḥ ca sarvadā tad adhīnāḥ iti yojanā kecid manyante svarūpam eva vastunaḥ sattvam iti apare tu pramāṇa yogya tvam anye punar artha kriyāvat tvam tat idam trayam api prakṛti ādīnām bhagavat adhīnam eva iti nanu etat ayuktam pradhāna ādi sattā ādenirtya tvāt nityasya para adhīna tā sambhavāt iti ataḥ āha nityam iti 
NSu_2.2.35d.1–2.2.36a–2.2.36c.3^1	 nityam nitya ātmanā yatas yathā nitya tayā nityam nitya śaktayā svayā īśvaraḥ niyāmayati nityam ca yathā anityam ghaṭa ādikam anitya tayā niyamyate tathā nityam api nitya ātmanā nityam ca sarva daiva īśvaraḥ niyāmayati yatas evam tasmāt uktam upapannam iti yojanā etat uktam bhavati yathā hi ghaṭa ādayaḥ anitya svabhāvāḥ api na akasmāt anityāḥ bhavanti kaḥ doṣaḥ na ca anitya tā para adhīnā iti kadācid ghaṭa ādeniḥ tyatā prāptā vināśa kāraṇa upanipāta ghrauvyāt tathā nityasya nityatāyāḥ para adhīna tve atrapa na jātu anitya tā prasaktiḥ tad niyamana niyamāt iti 
NSu_2.2.36a–2.2.36c.3^2	 tat idam uktam nityam ca iti na ca etat alaukikam nitya karmabhiḥ duritaprāgabhāva anuvṛtteḥ sādhya tvena vādibhiḥ abhyupagata tvāt anuvṛtteḥ nityatā āpādanān atirekāt bhavet etat esvarasa nityasya na svarasa nityasya iti ced na īśvara atiriktasya tad bhāva asammateḥ iyān= tu viśeṣaḥ kiñcid asmad āyatta nitya tvam kiñcid ca īśvara āyatta nitya tvam iti tat api asmāsu kasmāt na āyatate tathābhūtam ca katham īśvara adhīnam iti atas uktam nitya śaktyā iti pradhāna ādi śakteḥ prakṛta tvāt tad grahaṇam idam iti manda āśaṅkām vārayitum svayā iti uktam 
NSu_2.2.36a–2.2.37.1	 yat uktam pradhāna ādeḥ upādāna tva ādi śaktiḥ na svādhīnā kintvīśvara preritā eva iti tad kutas iti atas āha na iti na ṛte tvad kriyate kiñcanāre a iti śruteḥ prāk uktam pratipattavyam iti śeṣaḥ śaktiḥ eva hi kriyā ucyate yad pradhāna ādi sattā deḥ bhagavat adhīna tvam uktam tasya sambhāvanā eva uktā pramāṇam tu tatra kim iti atas āha svabhāva iti svabhāva jīva karmāṇi dravyam kālaḥ śrutiḥ kriyāḥ yad prasādāt ime santi na santi yat upekṣayā 
NSu_2.2.38ab.1–2.2.38ab.3	 iti śruteḥ na sattā ādyāḥ api nārāyaṇam vinā karma śabdena dharma adhamarvyaktayaḥ gṛhyante kriyāḥ parispandāḥ śrutiḥ vedaḥ santi iti trividham api sattvam vivakṣitam sattā ādyāḥ pradhāna ādeḥ nārāyaṇam vinā tad preraṇām vinā tasmāt anyatra upādāna tva ādi śakteḥ abhāvāt tad satta ādeḥ api īśvara āyatta tvāt ca na tṛṇa ādīnām utpattau parjanyasya iva pṛthivī anugrāhaka tvam īśvarasya mahat ādi utpattau kṣetra anugrāhaka tva mātram kintu sarva svātantryam eva iti yat anyat abhyupagatam pātañjalaiḥ vaidika mata viruddham tat sarvam prathama adhikaraṇaḥ eva nirastam kim punar prayatnena iti āśayavān pūvarmatena saha etasya hetām upasaṃharati tat iti 
NSu_2.2.38cd.1–2.2.38cd.3	 tad patañjali vindhya ādi matam na puruṣa artha dam vindhyaḥ anīśvaraḥ sāṅkhayaḥ ādi padena tad eka deśinām pañcaśikheśvara kṛṣṇa ādīnām grahaṇam tat avāntaramatayoḥ api nirasta tvāt yat vā patañjali vindhyāvādī yasya tat tathā uktam patañjalinā aṅgīkṛtaḥ api īśvaraḥ anīśvara kalpaḥ eva atas pūrvasya asya ca sāmya abhiprāyeṇa vā saha upasaṃhāraḥ iti abhyupagame api artha abhāvāt 
NSu_2.2.38cd.4–2.2.38cd.5	 abhyupagame api artha abhāvāt kecid idam satram evam vyācakṣate prāk pradhānasya pravṛttiḥ na upapadyate iti uktam atha idānīm pravṛtteḥ abhyupagame api tasyāḥ prayejana abhāvāt iti tat ayuktam abhyupagame api iti etāvataḥ vaiyarthyāt artha abhāvāt ca iti etāvatā eva pūrṇa tvāt kiñca artha abhāvena kim sādhyam sāṅkhayamatasya āsām añjasyam vā prakṛteḥ pravṛtti anupapattiḥ vā na ādyaḥ vyadhikaraṇa tvāt kathañcid eka adhikaraṇa tā āpādane api sva matena anaikāntyāt na dvitīyaḥ abhyupagama virodhāt na hi abhyupagama vāde api yat eva abhyupagamyate tat eva nirākriyate anāsthām khalu tātkālikīm abhyupagamena dyotayanti yathā astu śabdaḥ nityaḥ anityaḥ vā anuśāsanam tāvat kartavyam iti tasmāt na ayam sūtra arthaḥ kinnāma mā bhūt acetanasya kartṛ tvam śarīrasya eva cetanāvat tvena kartṛ tva upapatteḥ kim īśvara ādinā iti adhika āśaṅkayā pratyavatiṣṭhamānasya cārvākasya matam atra adhikaraṇe nirasyate iti bhāvena tat matam upanyasyati cārvākaiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.39ab.1–2.2.39ab.4	 cārvākaiḥ ucyate mānam akṣa jam na aparam kvacid cārvī buddhiḥ tad sambandhāt ācāryaḥ api ca ārvī tasya ime chātrāḥ cārvākāḥ taiḥ akṣa jam mānam ucyate nanu etat asmākam api sammatam iti atas sa avadhāraṇam idam uktam iti āśayena uktam vivṛṇoti na aparam iti anumānam āgamaḥ ca mānam na ucyate iti arthaḥ etat api asmākam anumatam eva prameya viśeṣe pratyakṣasya eva mānatā abhyupagamāt iti atas āha kvacid iti etat uktam bhavati pramāṇa adhīnā hi prameya siddhiḥ pramāṇam ca pratyakṣam eva na atas anyat asti na ca pratyakṣeṇa īśvaram pratīmaḥ tasmāt pramāṇa abhāvāt na asti īśvaraḥ iti nanu yadi pratyakṣa atiriktam na pramāṇam tadā dharma mokṣayoḥ tad sādhanānām ca pratyakṣa aviṣayāṇām asiddhiḥ syāt iti atas āha dehaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.39cd.1–2.2.40a.3	 dehaḥ ātmā pum arthaḥ ca kāma arthābhyām vinā na hi jñānavān khalva ātmanā jñānam ca deha dharmaḥ yathā uktam pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ iti tattvāni tad samudāye śarīra indriya viṣaya saṃjñā tebhyaḥ caitanyam mada śakti vat vijñānam a iti tasmāt dehaḥ eva ātmā sa ca vināśī iti atas kāla antara bhāvinaḥ puṃsaḥ eva abhāvāt dharma mokṣa ākhya puruṣa artha abhāvaḥ na aniṣyaḥ puruṣa arthau tu kāma arthau= eva puruṣa anvaya sambhavāt iti tatra api kāmaḥ eva mukhyaḥ arthaḥ tu tad sādhana tayā eva pum arthaḥ iti jñāpayitum kāmasya ādau saṅkīrtanam iti ca ucyate iti sambandhaḥ etat mata nirāsa artham sūtram vyākhyātum upodghātam tāvat āha yat evam iti yat evam yadi evam atīndriyam vastu na syāt tadā tadīyam śāstram viṣaya prayojana śūnyam āpadyeta iti śeṣaḥ tat katham iti ced kim anena śāstreṇa tad praṇetā viṣayam pratipadyate prayojanam ca labhate uta vineyāḥ narāḥ ādyam dūṣayati darśanena iti 
NSu_2.2.40a–2.2.40c.2	 darśanena asya kaḥ arthaḥ pratyakṣa gocaraḥ labdhaḥ tena eva hi kim ākṣepe arthaḥ viṣayaḥ prayojanam ca labdhaḥ upalabdhaḥ prāptaḥ ca pratyakṣa gocaraḥ hi iti tatra hetuḥ tatas ca ayam arthaḥ na tāvat anena śāstreṇa śāstra praṇetrāḥ tīndriyaḥ arthaḥ upalabhyate tad abhāvāt na api aindriyakaḥ tasya pratyakṣa gocara tvena viṣaya tva anupapatteḥ aprāpte hi śāstram arthavat a  kiñca pratyakṣeṇa tam artham upalabhya khalu asau śāstre pravīṇavān anyathā praṇayana anupapatteḥ tathā ca tam prati tam eva artham upadarśayat katham sa viṣayam syāt evam prayojanam api na tāvat atīndriyam tad abhāvāt na api aindriyakam tasya yogyā anupalambha bādhita tvāt nanu hita upadeṣī ari janaḥ anurajyate jana anurāga prabhavāḥ ca sampadaḥ a iti ced kṛtaghna tā nimitta pratyavāya anusandhāne sati evam etat tat tu pareṇa tyājitam iti dvitīyam dūṣayati naraiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.40cd.1–2.2.40cd.2^1	 naraiḥ śāstrāt kim mohanam vinā labdham iti anuvartate atra api pūrvavat uttaram syāt etat dharma ādi ati indriya abhimata artha abhāvaḥ śāstrasya viṣayaḥ tasya pratyakṣa tve api vaidika vāsanā nimitta śaṅkā kalaṅkita tvena viṣaya tvam upapadyate prayojanam ca dharma adharma śaṅkā uparuddha artha kāma upabhogaḥ tat katham naraiḥ śāstrāt kim labdham iti ucyate mā evam viṣaya pratipattau hi prayojana avāptiḥ viṣayam ca kim śāstram āpta vākya tayā pratipādayet uta upapatti vyutpādanena na ādyaḥ āgama prāmāṇya abhyupagama prasaṅgāt na asti atīndriyam kim api iti etāvatā eva pūrṇa tvena vākya vistara vaiyarthyāt ca na dvitīyaḥ upapatti prāmāṇya abhyupagama prasaṅgāt 
NSu_2.2.40cd.2^2–2.2.40cd.3	 śāstram śaṅkām eva nivārayati viṣaya pratipattiḥ tu pratyakṣeṇa eva iti ced na svayam vā upapatti vyutpādanena vā kam api artham anupadarśayataḥ śaṅkā nivāraṇā sāmarthyāt śaṅkā hi saṃśayaḥ vā syāt viparyayaḥ vā dvau= api viparīta artha gocara balavat pratyaya nirasanīyau na ājñā mātreṇa tarka vyutpādanam śāstreṇa kriyate iti ced tasya api pramāṇa tvāt tat idaṃdarśanena a iti prakṛta anuvṛttau satya aṃśa astrāt kim a itrata vadatā sūcitam anyathā naraiḥ ca iti avakṣyat mohanam vinā iti ubhaya vākya śeṣaḥ parihāsaḥ śāstra praṇetrā sura guruṇā yogya jana vyāmohanam prayojanam labdham anyaiḥ ca mithyājñānam na atas adhikam iti kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha sva iti 
NSu_2.2.41a.1–2.2.41a.3	 sva para artha vihīna tvāt niṣphalam śāstram iti vakṣyamāṇam siṃha avalokitena anuvartate tat ca upalakṣaṇam nirviṣayam ca iti api draṣṭavyam viṣaya prayojanavat tvam hi sva para viṣaya prayojanavat tayā vyāptam tṛtīya prakāra abhāvāt sarva prakāra parityāgena sāmānya anavasthānāt tatas ca vyāpikāyāḥ sva para viṣaya prayojana vattāyāḥ abhāvāt tad vaya āptam viṣaya prayojana vat tvam api na asti iti arthaḥ astu evam viṣaya prayojana śūnyam asmadīyam śāstram tatas kim iti atas sūtram vyākhyāti sva matena eva iti 
NSu_2.2.41b–2.2.41d.2	 sva matena eva niṣphalam kim iti unmatta vat śāstram vṛthā pralapati svayam yatas evam sva matena eva niṣphalam nirviṣayam ca na kevalam para upapādanam eva tasmāt vṛthā viṣaya prayojana śūnyam yasmāt vādinā cārvākeṇa prativādibhiḥ ca tad itaraiḥ sarvaiḥ viṣaya prayojana śūnya tayā abhyupagatam tasmāt viṣaya prayojana śūnyatyarthaḥ yasmāt vṛthā tasmāt tat śāstram kim iti svayam prekṣāvān pralapati prekṣāvatā na ārambhaṇīyam iti yāvat viṣaya prayojana śūnyam ca ārabhamāṇaḥ na laukikaḥ na api parīkṣakaḥ iti unmatta vat upekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt iti yat vā niṣphalam iti prayojana abhāva abhidhānam vṛthā iti viṣaya abhāva vacanam tathā ca evam sūtra yojanā na kevalam para upapādanena kintu sva abhyupagame api artha abhāvāt anārambhaṇīyam śāstram iti śeṣaḥ iti artha abhāva hetoḥ asiddhi parihārāya abhyupagame api iti uktam 
NSu_2.2.41b–2.2.41d.3	 nanu ca pramāṇa anurodhi prayojanam na punar prayojanam anurudhya aprāmāṇikaḥ ayarthaḥ aṅgīkartum ucitaḥ atiprasaṅgāt pramāṇam ca pratyakṣam eva na anyat na ca evam loka vyavahāra ucchedaḥ sambhāvanayā eva tad upapatteḥ saṃvādena ca prāmāṇya abhimānāt pratyakṣeṇa ca dehaḥ eva ātma upalabhyate gauraḥ aham jānāmi iti tathā ca kāla antara bhāvi prayojana anvayinaḥ puruṣasya abhāvāt katham dharma mokṣa ākhyam prayojanam atīndriyaḥ ca viṣayaḥ aṅgīkartum śakyate iti atas āha dehāt iti 
NSu_2.2.42.1–2.2.42.2	 dehāt anyaḥ anubhavataḥ ātmā bhāti śarīriṇām mama dehaḥ iti vyaktam mama arthaḥ iti vat sadā anubhavataḥ para abhyupagata prāmāṇyena pratyakṣeṇa eva mama dehaḥ iti hi ahaṅkārāspadā ātma sambandhī dehaḥ pratīyate naca anya tā pratītau sambandha pratītiḥ upapadyate yathā mama arthaḥ iti pratītau bheda pratīti pūrvakaḥ eva sambandha ābhāsaḥ iti nanu evam pratibhāsaḥ eva na asti api tarhi ghaṭasya sva rūpam itiva dvayavahāra mātram iti ced na kalpaka abhāvāt viparīta pratītau khalu evam kalpyate na ca evam prakṛte kasyacid kadācid api dehaḥ aham iti pramā bhāvāt tat idam uktam śarīriṇām sadā iti atas eva pratibhāsaḥ api bhramaḥ astu iti nirastam asti gauraḥ aham iti pramā iti ced na pratipakṣatayā bādhaka tva anupapatteḥ 
NSu_2.2.42.3	 kiñca na ayam deha ātma tā avabhāsaḥ kintu deha dharmasya ātma dharma tāvabhāsaḥ na ca vyadhikaraṇayoḥ virodhaḥ asti tad abhāve katham asau= iti ced kim etat anumānam arthāpattiḥ vā praśna mātram vā na prathama dvitīyau apasiddhāntāt sphaṭika japā ku sumayā uḥ abheda apratibhāse api tad dharmasya tatra pratīti darśanāt ca tṛtīye tu vakṣyate astu pratītiḥ pratyakṣam iti tu kutas abādha pratibhāsasya pratyakṣāt anyasya pareṇa anabhyupagamāt abhyupagame vā prāmāṇya aparihārāt aparokṣatayā anubhavāt ca tat idam uktam vyaktam iti na ca tat eva asiddham liṅga ādi anusandhāna abhāve api bhāvāt anyathā deha pratibhāsasya api tat na syāt etat api uktam sadā iti 
NSu_2.2.42.4–2.2.42.5	 kecid āhuḥ deha ātma bheda jñānam samādhi paripākavatām eva iti tat asat āvipāla gopālam mama dehaḥ itrata pratibhāsa syāna palapanīya tvāt atas eva āha śarīriṇām abhimāninām iti nanu astu ātmā deha atiriktaḥ tathā api artha kāma atirikte puruṣa arthe tad sādhana ādau ca kim mānam veda ādiḥ āgamaḥ anumānam ca iti vadāmaḥ tasya prāmāṇyam eva kutas iti ced tatra āha pratyakṣasya eva iti 
NSu_2.2.43ab.1–2.2.43ab.2	 pratyakṣasya eva māna tvam iti kena avasīyate yad pareṇa abhyupagatam artha ādi tat kutas siddham iti vaktavyam pratyakṣeṇa iti ced pratyakṣasya māna tvam iti eva kena avasīyate tathā ca puruṣa artha tad sādhana mātrā siddhau jagat anīham āpadyeta iti pratyakṣa jñānam tāvat pratīyate prāmāṇyam ca jñāna grāhaka mātra grāhyam atas katham uktaḥ doṣaḥ prāmāṇya paratas tu āvāde api bādhaka abhāva ādinā pratyakṣa prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.43cd.1–2.2.43cd.3	 yadi tad sādhakam veda prāmāṇye na katham bhavet yadi pratyakṣa jñāna prāmāṇyasya jñāna grāhakam vā bādhaka abhāva ādikam vā sādhakam ucyate tarhi tat eva veda prāmāṇya viṣaye katham sādhakam na bhavet na hi veda vākyāt jñānam na utpadyate na ca na pratīyate atra veda grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam atas eva anyā iti sāmānyena vakṣyati nanu jñāna grāhakasya prāmāṇya grāhaka tvam iti utsargaḥ apavādesatyaprāmāṇyam api gṛhyate tat katham veda ādi prāmāṇya siddhiḥ paratas tve api bādhaka abhāvaḥ kutas iti ced samam etat pratyakṣe api anupalambhāt apavāda ādi abhāvaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ iti ced tulyam etat veda ādau= iti āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.2.44ab.1–2.2.44ab.3	 naca anyāmāna tā kvāpi pramāṇena avasīyate pratyakṣāt anyayoḥ anumāna āgamaya uramāna tā kvāpi viṣaye yat vā pratyakṣa prāmāṇyam abhyupagacchan praṣṭavyaḥ kim tvayā anubhūyamānasya ekasya eva pratyakṣasya māna tvam uta sarvasya api pratyakṣasya ādye doṣam āha pratyakṣasya eva iti itareṣām api pratyakṣāṇām tad tulya sāmagrī janya tve sati ekasya eva pratyakṣasya māna tvam iti kena avasīyate dvitīye doṣam āha pratyakṣasya eva iti pratyakṣasya māna tvam eva sarvam api pratyakṣam pramāṇam iti kena avasīyate anubhūyamāna pratyakṣāt anyasya pratyakṣasya tad prāmāṇyasya vā ca avasāyakam na kim api iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.44ab.4–2.2.44ab.5	 parakīya vacanena ca iṣyayā vā pratyakṣam avagamya pratyakṣa tvena tasya prāmāṇyam avagamyate iti atas āha yadi iti pratyakṣasya tad prāmāṇyasya ca sādhakam vacanam anumānam ca yadi pramāṇam iṣyate tarhi veda ādi prāmāṇye katham na bhavet abhyupagamaḥ iti śeṣaḥ evam anumāna āgama prāmāṇyam pratyapi vikalpaḥ ādyaḥ tu pūrvavat nirastaḥ apasiddhāntaḥ ca adhikaḥ dvitīyam dūṣayati na ca iti anyayoḥ para puruṣa ādi vartinoḥ anumāna āgamaya uramāna tā pūrvavat āśraya ādi asiddheḥ tad sādhaka aṅgīkāre ca vyāghātāt iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.2.44ab.6–2.2.44ab.7	 nanu artha sannikṛṣṭa karaṇa janya tvāt pratyakṣam pramāṇam anumāna āgamayoḥ atīta ādikam api viṣayīkurvatoḥ tad abhāvāt katham prāmāṇyam iti kim yāthārthyam eva prāmāṇyam tat niyāmakaḥ ca sannikarṣaḥ anyathā ati prasaṅgāt iti abhiprāyaḥ uta viṣaya sannikṛṣṭa karaṇa janya tvam prāmāṇyam iti ādye api kim yathā kathañcid sannikarṣaḥ niyāmakaḥ uta saṃyogaḥ eva ādyam dūṣayati na ca iti evam tarhi anyayoḥ anumāna āgamaya uramāna tā na asti avinā abhau= a ādi sannikarṣasya tatra api sattvāt iti bhāvaḥ dvitīye doṣam āha kvāpi iti 
NSu_2.2.44ab.8–2.2.44ab.9	 kvāpi pramāṇe cākṣuṣe śrāvaṇe ca na avasīyate na abhyupagamyate artha saṃyukta karaṇa janya tā pareṇa golaka atiriktasya cakṣuḥ ādeḥ anabhyupagamāt tad ātmakasya ca artha saṃyoga abhāvāt tatas pratyakṣasya api kasyacid prāmāṇyam na syāt iti dvitīyam dūṣayati na ca iti yāthārthyāt anyā artha sannikṛṣṭa karaṇa janya tā lakṣaṇāḥ mānatā na vaktavyā kutas iti atas āha kvāpi iti pūrvavat cākṣuṣa ādau= avyāpteḥ iti bhāvaḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etat viparyayāt au= ati vyāptiḥ ca iti api draṣṭavyam 
NSu_2.2.44ab.10–2.2.44ab.12	 yāthārthye sati idam lakṣaṇam iti ced tarhi tat eva astu kim viśeṣyeṇa anumāna ādi vyāvṛtti artham iti ced na tad aprāmāṇyasya adya api asiddheḥ iti āha na ca iti nanu veda ādi arthasya anupambha bādhita tvāt katham tat prāmāṇyam iti ced na veda ādinā eva upalabdheḥ tad anyena na upalabhyate iti ced tat kim pramāṇa antara saṃvādi tvam prāmāṇyam addhā iti ced tatra āha na ca iti pramāṇa antara saṃvāda lakṣaṇā mānatā na iti arthaḥ kutas na iti atas āha kvāpi iti anavasthā prasaṅgāt kvāpi pramāṇe na avasīyate yatas yat vā kvāpi sva sukha ādi jñāne pramāṇe saṃvādaḥ eva na avasīyate iti yojyam iti alam sūtra artham upasaṃharati sva matena iti 
NSu_2.2.44cd.1–2.2.44cd.5^1	 sva matena artha rahitaḥ upekṣyaḥ pakṣaḥ īdṛśaḥ sva sammatyā eva artha rahitaḥ viṣaya prayojana rahitaḥ īdṛśaḥ īśvara ādi atīndriya anabhyupagama lakṣṇaḥ puruṣa aśma vat iti ced tathā api puruṣa aśma vat iti ced tathā api atra nirīśvara sāṅkhayā eka deśinām puruṣa upasarjana prakṛti kartṛkatva vādinām matam apākriyate nanu evam tarhi tad anantaram eva idam ārambhaṇīyam satyam tathā api abhyadhikā śaṅkā anusāreṇa iya muktiḥ tathā hi parama cetanasya bhagavataḥ eva sarva kartṛ tvam prāk uktam tasya kevala prakṛti kartṛka tva vādaḥ sākṣāt virodhi iti prathamam apākṛtaḥ 
NSu_2.2.44cd.1–2.2.44cd.5^2	 tatra mā bhūt kevalasya acetanasya pradhānasya jagat kartṛ tvam īśvara anugṛhītasya tu bhaviṣyati iti āśaṅkā dvitīya adhikaraṇe nirākṛtāḥ mā bhūt acetanasya kartṛ tvam kintu śarīrasya eva caitanya āśrayasya kartṛ tvam astu iti āśaṅkaya śarīrasya caitanya āśraya tā yogāt punar tad avasthaḥ kartṛ tva ayogaḥ iti tṛtīye abhihitam idānīm tu kevalasya acetanasya kartṛ tva ayoge api cetana sat nidhānena tad upapatteḥ kim īśvareṇa iti eṣā śaṅkā nirākriyate tat mata rītiḥ sūtre eva uktā iti tat eva vyācaṣṭe sannidhānāt iti 
NSu_2.2.45.1–2.2.45.4^1	 sannidhānāt cetanasya vartate yadi acetanam tathā api abuddhi pūrva tvāt ukta doṣaḥ samaḥ bhavet yathā khalu acetanam eva śarīram cetanasya ātmanaḥ sannidhāna mātreṇa aśma ānayana ādikam karoti evam acetanā api prakṛtiḥ puruṣa sannidhānāt mahat ādi kāryam kariṣyati tathā ca prayogaḥ mahat ādikam puruṣa upasarjana prakṛti kartṛkam kārya tvāt aśma ānayana ādi vat iti evaṃca kim īśvareṇa iti śaṅkā arthaḥ yadi api evam abhyadhikam āśaṅkitam tathā api racanā anupapatteḥ iti ukta doṣaḥ samaḥ bhavet na parihṛtaḥ bhavet kutas abuddhi pūrva tvāt prakṛteḥ iti śeṣaḥ buddhiḥ pūrvā yasya tat buddhi pūrvam jñāna icchā prayatnāḥ iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.45.1–2.2.45.4^2	 na vidyate buddhi pūrvam yasya tat tathā uktam tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam tasmāt etat uktam bhavati jñāna icchā prayatna vat tvam hi kartṛ tvam na ca puruṣa sannidhāne na prakṛteḥ buddhimat tvam sambhavati acetana tva aṅgīkāra virodhāt na ca buddha ya bhāve tad kāryayoḥ icchā prayatnayoḥ api sambhavaḥ tathā ca acetanasya kartṛ tva pratijñā vyāhatā eva iti nanu ātma upasa jarnasya śarīrasya aśma ānayana ādi kartṛ tvam nidarśitam tat katham iti ced na śarīrasya api ukta rītyā kartṛ tva asammateḥ dūṣaṇa antaram ca dṛṣṭānte darśayitum sūtram  aṅgitvā anupapatteḥ iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe aṅgi tvāt iti aṅgitvā anupapatteḥ ca 
NSu_2.2.46a–2.2.46d.3	 aṅgi tvam puruṣasya eva sarvaiḥ api anubhūyate tad aṅga tva uktitaḥ ca eva syāt sarvasya apalāpakaḥ caśabdaḥ dūṣaṇa antara samuccaya arthaḥ eva śabdaḥ vakṣyamāṇa kaimutyasphuṭīkaraṇa arthaḥ aṅgi tvam pradhāna tvam śarīram prati iti śeṣaḥ tad aṅga tva uktitaḥ tasya upasarjana tva aṅgīkārāt syāt sāṅkhayaḥ iti śeṣaḥ nanu etat prakṛta viruddham parameśvarasya hi sarva kartṛ tvam upapādayitum ayam ārambhaḥ tathā ca aśma ānayana ādi kārye jīvasya prādhānya upapādanam katham na prakaraṇa viruddham iti ced na jīva gatasya amukhyasya kartṛ tvasya nirāsaḥ eva yadā pramāṇa virodhaḥ tadā kimu vaktavyam sarva kartuḥ īśvarasya apalāpaḥ iti etad pradarśanāya eva sūtra kṛtā jīvasya aṅgitva upapādana ādityāśayavān āha kim u iti 
NSu_2.2.46ef.1–2.2.46ef.5	 kimu sarva īśvarasya asya hi apalāṣāt yatas akhilam asya sarva kartṛ tvena pratipipādayiṣitasya uttara sūtre ca asya aṅgīkāra vāda tvam sphuṭībhaviṣyati iti hi śabdena sūcayati katham jīvasya prādhānya nirāsāt api atiśayena īśvara nirāsaḥ pramāṇa viruddhaḥ iti atas āha yatas iti yatas kāraṇāt akhilam pramāṇam yogi pratyakṣa anumāna āgama ātmakam sarva kartāram īśvaram pratipādayati tasmāt iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ anyathā anumitau ca jña śakti viyogāt 
NSu_2.2.46ef.6–2.2.46ef.7	 anyathā anumitau ca jña śakti viyogāt prakṛti upasarjana puruṣa kartṛ tva vādinām nirīśvara sāṅkhayā eka deśinām matam atra nirākriyate tathā hi aśma ānayana ādi pravṛttau tāvat puruṣasya prādhānyam śarīrasya ca upasarjana tvam anubhava siddham iti uktam tathā ca tad dṛṣṭāntena mahat ādi kāryam api prakṛti upasarjana puruṣa kartṛkam anumīyate puruṣasya ca cetana tvena na kartṛ tva anupapattiḥ suṣupti ādau ca kartṛ tva anupalambhāt prakṛtiḥ upasarjana bhūta aṅgīkaraṇīyā evaṃca kim īśvareṇa iti atra vaktavyam kim puruṣasya ekākinaḥ kutra api svātantryam na asti uta asti iti ādyam dūṣayitum sūtram vyācaṣṭe aṅgitvam iti 
NSu_2.2.47.1–2.2.47.2	 aṅgi tvam yadi tasya eva svātantryam ced naca akhilam tad preraṇe api aśakta tvāt svatantraḥ anyaḥ hi apekṣitaḥ yadi puruṣasya aṅgitvam prādhānyam kartṛ tvam iti yāvat prakṛteḥ tu upasarjana tvam eva iti pūrva matāt anyathā anumīyate tatra api ca puruṣasya akhilam svātantryam na asti iti pakṣaḥ yadi aṅgīkriyate tadā svatantraḥ anyaḥ parameśvaraḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ eva syāt kutas prakṛti preraṇe puruṣasya aśakta tvāt mā bhūt tāvat kārya antara artham īśvara apekṣā tathā api prakṛti preraṇa artham apekṣaṇīyaḥ eva asau= iti apeḥ arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.47.3–2.2.47.4	 etat uktam bhavati na tāvat sattā mātreṇa saṃyoga mātreṇa vā pradhānasya kartāram puruṣam pratyupasarjana tvam supti pralaya ādau= api prasaṅgāt kintu karaṇa tva ādinā na ca kartrā prayujyamānasya karaṇa tva ādikam dṛṣṭam na ca tat eva tad preraṇe karaṇa ādi sva vṛtti virodhāt tathā ca prakṛti nirapekṣasya puruṣasya kvāpi vyāpāra asāmarthye avaśyam anyena sahakāriṇā bhāvyam naca asau= api evaṃvidhaḥ eva tasya api sahakāri antara apekṣāyām anavasthā prasaṅgāt atas svatantraḥ eva asau= aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ saḥ eva ca īśvaraḥ iti katham asau na abhyupagamyate iti dvitīyam niṣedhati na ca iti 
NSu_2.2.48a.1–2.2.48b.2	 na ca svātantryam asya eva tathā sati prakṛti anapekṣa tva prasaṅgena sva siddhānta virodha āpatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ anena vipratiṣedhāt ca iti sūtram vyākhyātam bhavati vipratiṣedhāt ca asamañjasam sūtrasya artha antaram āha pratyakṣa ādi iti  pratyakṣa ādi virodhataḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇaiḥ hi puruṣasya asvātantryam sarvadā upalabhyate prakāra antareṇa vyācaṣṭe hita iti 
NSu_2.2.48c.1–2.2.48d.3	 hita ākṛtya ādi doṣāt ca ādipadena ahita kriyā upādīyate evam pañcamatāni nirākṛtya upasaṃharati bhadram iti  bhadram na anīśvaram matam pātañjala abhimatasya īśvarasya īśvara lakṣaṇa abhāvāt tat api anīśvaram eva matam iti nanu anyāni api bhinnaka saṃsāra mocaka ādīni anīśvarāṇi matāni santi tāni kutas na nirākriyante ukta doṣaiḥ eva nirasta tvāt abhyadhika āśaṅkā abhāvāt ca iti āha saṃsāriṇaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.49.1–2.2.49.3	 saṃsāriṇaḥ anyam sarva īśam sarva śaktim anaupamam cetana acetanasya asya sattva ādeḥ tad adhīna tām na aṅgīkurvanti ye teṣām sarveṣām ca samāḥ ime saṃsāri padam īśvara atirikta upalakṣaṇam sarva īśam iti viśeṣya padam tena na paunaruktayam upamā eva upamam svārthikaḥ aṇ na asti aupamam yasya asau= anaupamaḥ yat vā upamāyāḥ ayam aupamaḥ sa upamaḥ iti yāvat tatas nañsamāsaḥ asya prapañcasya ime kathitāḥ doṣāḥ iti śeṣaḥ na kevalam sarva īśam sva rūpeṇa anaṅgīḥ kurvatām ime doṣāḥ kintu tam aṅgīkṛtya api jīva anyatva ādi viśeṣaṇāni tasya anaṅgīkurvatām api tathā tve phalatas tasya anīśvara tvāt iti kim atas yadi evam anīśvaram atama samañjasam iti atas āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_2.2.50.1–2.2.50.4	 tasmāt śruti pramāṇena yuktibhiḥ ca paraḥ hariḥ aṅgīkāyartamaḥ nityaḥ sarvaiḥ api su niścitam na para pakṣa nirāsa mātreṇa sva pakṣa siddhiḥ iti atas śruti pramāṇena ityādi uktam paraḥ utkṛṣṭaḥ ukta viśeṣaṇa upapannaḥ nityaḥ iti sāmarthyāt aṅgīkārasya viśeṣaṇam sarvadā iti yāvat niścayasya sva para pakṣa sādhana upālambha atirikta anapekṣa tvāt prāmāṇika niścayasya ca asamī cīna tva ayogāt su niścitam iti uktam prathama adhyāya vyutpāditena para pakṣa upālambhena ca yathālakṣitam brahma siddham iti āśayaḥ nanu evam tarhi uttara adhikaraṇānāmāna rambhaḥ eva nirākariṣyamāṇaiḥ api ukta viśeṣaṇasya īśvarasya anabhyupagata tvāt iti ced satyam tathā api tat matānām atyanta heya tā pradarśanāya dūṣaṇa antarāṇi vyutpādanayitum uttaraḥ granthaḥ mahat dīrgha vat vā hrasva parimaṇḍalābhyām mahat dīrgha vat vā hrasva parimaṇḍalābhyām 
NSu_2.2.51a–2.2.51c.2	 nitya jñāna prayatna iccham saṅkhayat yaiḥ api pañcabhiḥ yuktam īśam vadanti anye atra paramāṇu ārambha vādinām vaiśeṣika ādīnām matam apākriyate nanu vaiśeṣika ādayaḥ parameśvaram aṅgīkurvanti eva tat katham tad nirāsāya adhikaraṇa ārambhaḥ iti āśaṅkaya yadi api īśvaram sva rūpeṇa aṅgīkuvarnti tathā api tad dharmeṣu sukha ādiṣu vipratipadyante eva tathā sṛṣṭi pralaya ādi vidhim ca anyathā manyante iti atas yuktaḥ tad nirāsāya adhikaraṇa ārambhaḥ iti āśayavān= tad matam upanyasyati nitya iti 
NSu_2.2.51a–2.2.51c.4	 īśam vadantaḥ anye iti āhuḥ iti vakṣyamāṇena anvayaḥ nityāḥ jñāna prayatna icchā yasya asau tathā uktaḥ saṅkhayā ādyaiḥ saṅkhayā parimāṇa pṛthaktava saṃyoga vibhāgaiḥ sa avadhāraṇam ca etat evam aṣṭaguṇakam eva vadantaḥ iti nitya dravya āśritāni ekatva eka pṛthaktava parimāṇāni nityāni eva dvi tvat vipṛthakta va ādīni saṃyoga vibhāgau ca savartra anityai eva iti siddha tvāt saṅkhayā ādau vidyamānaḥ api nitya anitya vibhāgaḥ na abhihitaḥ jñāna ādīnām tu jīva āśritānām anitya tvāt atra nitya tva saṅkīrtanam yadi api kecid īśvaram ṣaḍguṇam ācakṣate tathā api na tat paramam matam iti aṣṭaguṇa tvam eva upanyastam evam ātreyasya jñāna anitya tvam api na upanyastam 
NSu_2.2.51a–2.2.51c.7	 yat vā nitya tva saṅkīrtanam guṇa antara abhāve yukti tvena kṛtam tathā hi jīva ātmānaḥ buddhi sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma adharma bhāvanābhiḥ navabhiḥ viśeṣa guṇaiḥ yuktāḥ tatra nitya yathārtha jñānasya moha abhāvāt tad prabhavasya dveṣasya abhāvaḥ tad abhāve tad mūlayoḥ dharma ādyayoḥ abhāvaḥ icchāyāḥ api moha abhāvena ārāga rūpa tvāt na dharma ādi kāraṇa tvam dharma ādi abhāve ca tad kāryayoḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ abhāvaḥ eva nitya jñāna tvāt eva smṛtya sambhavena kalpaka abhāvāt bhāvanāyāḥ api abhāvaḥ iti athavā nitya tvena jñāna ādīnām akhaṇḍa tvam sūcayati evam api īśvara viṣayām vipratipattim upanyasya sṛṣṭi viṣayām upanyasyati tat icchā iti 
NSu_2.2.51d–2.2.51f.2	 tad icchā dṛṣṭa coditāḥ paramāṇavaḥ caturvargāḥ saṃyujyante dviśas akhilāḥ mahāpralaye hi vakṣyamāṇaḥ nitya vargaḥ anityāḥ ca dharma adharma saṃskāra ādayaḥ avatiṣṭhante tatas brahmavarṣa śata ante prāṇinām bhoga bhūtaye maheśvarasya sisṛkṣā san jāyate tayā ca sarva ātma gatāḥ dharma adharma lakṣaṇa adṛṣṭa ādayaḥ labdha vṛttayaḥ bhavanti tatas tad icchayā sisṛkṣā lakṣaṇa īśvara icchayā adṛṣṭaiḥ adṛṣṭa vat ātma saṃyogaiḥ ca iti yāvat coditāḥ preritāḥ kriyāvantaḥ iti yāvat 
NSu_2.2.51d–2.2.52.1	 prāk pravibhakta tayā avasthitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ caturguṇāḥ pāthirvāḥ pāthasīyāḥ taijasāḥ vāyavīyāḥ ca dviśas saṃyujyante atra paramāṇavaḥ iti eva ukte manasām api grahaṇam syāt teṣām saṃyoga sadbhāve api vakṣyamāṇam dravya ārambhaka tvam gagana vat asparśavat tvāt ayuktam atas ta dvaya āvṛttaye caturvargāḥ iti uktam yat vā sajātīya saṃyogaḥ eva dravya ārambhakaḥ na tu anyaḥ iti anena sūcayati akhilāḥ iti dviśas saṃyoge niyama vacanāt ye paramāṇavaḥ dravya ārambhāya saṃyujyante te akhilāḥ dviśas dvau dvau= eva iti tatas kim iti atas āha paramāṇu iti paramāṇu dvayena eva dvayaṇukam nāma jāyate dvayaṇukatrayeṇa tri aṇukam taiḥ caturbhiḥ tad ātmakam 
NSu_2.2.53.1–2.2.53.2^1	 tatas tu aniyamena eva khaṇḍa avayavinām bhavaḥ tatas ca aniyamena eva sarva avayavi sambhavaḥ paramāṇu puñja vādam pariṇāma vādam aniyama vādam ca eva śabdena vyāvartayati paramāṇu dvayena eva na tu nirantaratayā utpanna paramāṇu dvayam na api paramāṇu dvayam eva saṃyuktam āsādita pariṇāma viśeṣam na ca traya ādinā iti jāyate iti asat kārya vādam sūcayati jāti apekṣayā eka vacanam tatas ca saṃyukta sajātīya paramāṇu dvayaiḥ tatas atyanta bhinnāni tad samavetāni prāk asanti eva dvayaṇuka nāmakāni dravyāṇi utpadyante iti arthaḥ dvayaṇukatrayeṇa tri aṇukam jāyate iti anurvate eva iti ca atra api pūrvavat vaya ākhyānam aṇu tva parimāṇasya paramāṇau dvayaṇuke ca sāmyāt dvayaṇuka saṃjñāvat tri aṇuka saṃjñā api upapadyate eva taiḥ sajātīyaiḥ saṃyuktaiḥ caturbhiḥ tri aṇukaiḥ tad ātmakam dravyam jāyate tri aṇukeṣu aṇu saṃjñā upacārāt 
NSu_2.2.53.2^2–2.2.53.3	 kecid dvayaṇukaiḥ eva catur aṇukā ārambham abhyupayanti tad mata anusāreṇa taidvaryaṇukaiḥ iti vyākhyeyam dvayaṇukāni trīṇi yat kāyarma ārabhante tat tri aṇukam caturbhiḥ ārabdham catur aṇukam iti atra ca saṃjñā mukhyā eva tatas tri aṇukebhyaḥ catur aṇekebhyaḥ vā tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa arthaḥ tam eva āha aniyamena eva etāvadbhiḥ eva iti saṅkhayā niyamam vinā iti arthaḥ dravya samavāyi kāraṇāni kāyardravyāṇi khaṇḍāvayavinaḥ tri aṇuka ādeḥ antyāvayavinaḥ ca madhye na ekam eva khaṇḍa avayavi kintu aniyamena anekāni api bhavanti iti sūcayitum bahuvacanam tatas taiḥ khaṇḍa avayavibhiḥ ca aniyamena eva saṅkhayā niyamam vinā eva sarva avayavinā āmantyauvayavinām śarīra indriya viṣayāṇām sambhavaḥ tat anena dravya utpattiḥ abhihitā guṇānām karmaṇām ca sva āśraya dravyeṣu utpādaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ sarvam api kāryam bhāva rūpam kāraṇa tritaya janyam kāraṇāni ca samavāyi asamavāyi nimittā nāmāni tatra yatra samavetam kāyarmutpadyate tad samavāyi kāraṇam tad svarūpeṇa darśayati kāraṇam iti 
NSu_2.2.54ab.1–2.2.54cd.3	 kāraṇam samavāyi ākhyam paramāṇu ādi tatra hi atra dvayaṇuka ādi kārya utpattau paramāṇu ādi dravya padārthaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam kutas atra paramāṇu ādau dravye hi yasmāt sarva kāryam samavetam utpadyate tasmāt iti śeṣaḥ samavāyi asamavāyi vyatiriktam kāraṇam nimittam tat udāharati īśa iti īśa icchā dṛṣṭa kālāḥ tu nimittam kāraṇam matam nimittam tu iti anvayaḥ idam ca sarva kārya sādhāraṇam nimittam darśitam evam anyat api draṣṭavyam yathā turī vema ādikam paṭasya ityādi samavāyi kāraṇa pratyāsannam avadhṛta sāmarthyam asamavāyi kāraṇam samavāyi kāraṇa tad samavāyi kāraṇayoḥ anyatara samaveta tvam samavāyi kāraṇa pratyāsanna tvam sāmarthya avadhāraṇam ca ananyathā siddha niyata pūrva bhāvi tvena bhavati tat ca asamavāyi kāraṇam dravyam samavāyi kāraṇam iti vat na eka uktayā vaktum śakyam pratikāryam pṛthaktavāt atas tat vivekena darśayitum tat jñānasya kāyaṛjñāna sāpekṣa tvāt kārya akārya vibhāgam tāvat āha sāmānyā iti 
NSu_2.2.55.1–2.2.55.4	 sāmānya antya viśeṣau ca samavāyaḥ ca tat trayam nityam kriyāḥ anityāḥ tu guṇa dravye dvirūpake kāryatva anitya tvayoḥ sama niyamāt nitya anitya vibhāga uktayā kārya akārya vibhāgaḥ eva siddhayati ṣaṭ ime dravya guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyāḥ bhāva rūpāḥ padārthāḥ abhāvaḥ saptamaḥ vidhi rūpaḥ bhāvaḥ niṣedha rūpaḥ abhāvaḥ guṇa āśrayaḥ dravyam samavāyi kāraṇam vā sāmānya vāna samavāyi kāraṇam aspanda ātmā guṇaḥ calana ātmakam karma nityam ekam aneka samavetam sāmānyam nityeṣu eva dravyeṣu eva vartante eva ye te viśeṣāḥ atyanta vyāvṛtti hetavaḥ vā ayutasiddhayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ avaśyam āśraya āśrayi bhāvena avasthitau= ayuta siddhau nityaḥ sambandhaḥ vā 
NSu_2.2.55.5–2.2.55.6	 tatra sāmānyam antya viśeṣaḥ ca samavāyaḥ ca iti etat trayam nityam akāryam ca viśeṣaḥ iti eva ukte dravya guṇa karma sāmānyānām api grahaṇam syāt viśiṣṭate anena iti hi viśeṣaḥ dravyam ca daṇḍa ādi kamadaṇḍī a ādibhyaḥ devadatta ādikam vyāvartayati guṇaḥ ca nirguṇāt dravyam karma api niṣkriyāt mūrtam sāmānyam dvividham parama param ca param sattā pracura āśraya tvāt aparam dravya tva ādi alpa āśraya tvāt tatra para sāmānyasya anuvṛtti mātra hetu tvena sāmānya mātra tve api apara sāmānyam vyāvṛtteḥ api hetu tvāt viśeṣaḥ api ye vyāvartakāḥ bhavanti te antyāḥ atyanta vyāvṛtti hetavaḥ iti yāvat na hi daṇḍa ādikam tathā daṇḍī antara ādibhyaḥ avyāvartaka tvāt kriyāḥ utkṣepaṇa apakṣepaṇa ākuñcana prasaraṇa gamana rūpāḥ anityāḥ ca caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe na dravya ādi vat ubhaya rūpāḥ iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.55.7^1	 guṇāḥ dravyāṇi ca nitya anitya bhedena dvividhāni iti tathā hi dravyāṇi pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa kāla ādigātma manāṃsi tatra paramāṇu rūpāṇi pṛthivī ādīni catvāri gagana ādīni pañca nityāni dvayaṇuka ādi rūpāṇi pṛthivī ādīni catvāri anityāni iti guṇāḥ ca anitya dravya gatāḥ anityāḥ eva pārthiva paramāṇauvaika tva eka pṛthaktava parimāṇa guru tvāni nityāni rūpa rasa gandha sparśa anekatva aneka pṛthaktava saṃyoga vibhāga paratva aparatva saṃskārāḥ anityāḥ pāthasīye ca rūpa rasa sparśa eka tva eka pṛthaktava parimāṇa guru tva dravya tva snehāḥ nityāḥ anekatva aneka pṛthaktava saṃyoga vibhāga paratva aparatva saṃskārāḥ anityāḥ taijase ca rūpa sparśa eka tva eka pṛthaktava parimāṇāni nityāni 
NSu_2.2.55.7^2–2.2.55.8	 anekatva aneka pṛthaktva saṃyoga vibhāga paratva dravya tva saṃskārāḥ anityāḥ vāyavīye ca sparśa eka tva eka pṛthaktava parimāṇāni nityāni anekatva aneka pṛthaktava saṃyoga vibhāga paratva aparatva saṃskārāḥ anityāḥ ākāśe ca eka tva eka pṛthaktava parimāṇāni nityāni aketvā aneka pṛthaktava saṃyoga vibhāga śabdāḥ anityāḥ kāle diśi ca eka tva eka pṛthaktava parimāṇāni nityāni anekatva aneka pṛthaktava saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ anityāḥ ātmani ca eka tva eka pṛthaktava parimāṇāni nityāni anekatva aneka pṛthaktava saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ buddhayā ādayaḥ ca nava anityāḥ īśvarasya api viśeṣaḥ abhihitaḥ manasi ca eka tva eka pṛthaktava parimāṇāni nityāni anekatva aneka pṛthaktava saṃyoga vibhāga paratva aparatva saṃskārāḥ anityāḥ iti vivekaḥ evam kārya akārya vibhāgamuktavā yasya yat asamavāyi kāraṇam tat āha kāryaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.56.1–2.2.56.2	 kārye guṇa kriyāṇām tu samavāyi anya kāraṇam kāraṇa sthāḥ guṇa ādyāḥ tu saṃyogaḥ dravya kāraṇam kārya kāraṇa grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam tatas ca kārye akārye ca dravye jāyamānānām guṇānām samavāyi kāraṇa samavāyi kāraṇa sthāḥ samavāyi kāraṇa sthāḥ ca guṇāḥ samavāyi kāraṇa stham karma ca samavāyi anya kāraṇam asamavāyi kāraṇam karmaṇaḥ ca asamavāyi kāraṇa sthāḥ guṇāḥ eva asamavāyi kāraṇam iti yojyam 
NSu_2.2.56.3–2.2.56.4	 ādyaḥ tuśabdaḥ dravyāt viśeṣam dyotayati dvitīyasya dravya kāraṇam tu iti anvayaḥ yat vā dvau= api anukta samuccaya arthau tat ca uktam tathā hi kārya gatānām rūpa rasa gandha sparśa parimāṇa eka tva eka pṛthaktava uttara saṃyoga vibhāga guru tva drava tva sneha vegānām kāraṇa gatāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ asamavāyi kāraṇam pārthiva paramāṇu gatānām rūpa rasa gandha sparśānām pārthiva taijasa paramāṇu gata dravyasya tat gataḥ eva tejaḥ saṃyogaḥ sarvatra aneka tva aneka pṛthaktavayoḥ āśraya gata eka tva eka pṛthaktavāni saṃyoga vibhāga vegānām āśraya gatam karma paratva aparatvayoḥ āśraya gatau diś kāla saṃyogau ātma viśeṣa guṇānām ātma gataḥ manaḥ saṃyogaḥ śabdasya ākāśa gatāḥ saṃyoga vibhāga śabdāḥ karmaṇaḥ ca āśraya gatāḥ guru tva drava tva vega saṃyogāḥ iti dravyasya tu samavāyi kāraṇānām avayavānām saṃyogaḥ asamavāyi kāraṇam iti uktasya kvacid apavādam āha evam iti 
NSu_2.2.57ab.1–2.2.57cd.1	 evam sthite api siddhānte viśeṣaḥ tatra kalpitaḥ kāraṇa gatam parimāṇam kārya gatasya parimāṇasya asamavāyi kāraṇam iti evam sāmānyatas siddhānte sthite api tatra parimāṇa viśeṣe viśeṣaḥ anyathā bhāvaḥ kalpitaḥ vaiśeṣikaiḥ katham iti atas āha dvayaṇukaḥ iti dvayaṇuke paramāṇau ca hrasva tvam parimaṇḍalam 
NSu_2.2.58a.1–2.2.58a.3	 na kāraṇam kārya guṇe caturvidham parimāṇam aṇu tvam mahat tvam hrasva tvam dīrgha tvam ca tatra aṇu tvam dvividham nityam anityam ca nityam caturvidha paramāṇau manasi ca pārimāṇḍalyam iti ca ucyate anityam dvayaṇukaḥ eva mahat tvam api dvividham nitya anitya bhedāt nityam ākāśa kāla diś ātmasu parama mahat tvam anityam tri aṇuka ādau kāyardravye hrasva tvam dvayaṇukaḥ eva dīrgha tvam tri aṇuka ādi kārya dravyaḥ eva kecid paramāṇau= api hrasva tvam gagana ādau= api dīrgha tvam abhyupayanti tatra dvayaṇuke vartamānam hrasva tvam upalakṣaṇam etat aṇu tvam ca kārya guṇe dvayaṇuka kārya tri aṇuka parimāṇe viṣaya saptamīyam tri aṇuka mahat dīrgha tvayoḥ asamavāyi kāraṇam na bhavati tathā paramāṇau vartamānam parimaṇḍalam pārimāṇḍalyam paramāṇu kārya dvayaṇuka guṇasya hrasva tvasya aṇu tvasya ca asamavāyi kāraṇam na bhavati tri aṇuka ādi gatam tu mahat tvam dīrgha tvam ca catur aṇuka ādi parimāṇam pratyasamavāyi kāraṇam bhavati eva iti kasmāt evam kalpitam iti atas āha vairūpyam iti 
NSu_2.2.58bc.1–2.2.58bc.3	 vairūpyam tatra kāraṇam iti āhuḥ tatra dvayaṇuka paramāṇu parimāṇānām tri aṇuka dvaya ṇuka parimāṇāni prati kāraṇa tva abhāve vairūpyam vijātīya tvam kāraṇam sajātīyayoḥ eva hi tantu paṭa parimāṇayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tathā ca prayogaḥ dvayaṇuka tri aṇuka parimāṇe na kārya kāraṇa bhāvavatī vijātīya parimāṇa tvāt vyatirekeṇa tantu paṭa parimāṇa vat evam paramāṇu dvayaṇuka parimāṇayoḥ api draṣṭavyam paramāṇoḥ aṇu tvam dvayaṇuka aṇu tvasya kāraṇam astu iti ced na tatra api nitya parimāṇa tvasya parama aṇu tvasya ca vairūpyasya sattvāt evañcet vayaṇuka tri aṇuka parimāṇānām kim asamavāyi kāraṇam iti atas āha vairūpyam iti aneka tvam iti arthaḥ īśvara buddhim apekṣya utpannā paramāṇvoḥ dvi tva saṅkhayā dvayaṇuke aṇu tvam hrasva tvam ca karoti dvayaṇukeṣu ca utpannā tri tva saṅkhayā tri aṇuke mahat tvam dīrgha tvam ca karoti iti evam upanyastam matam apākartum adhikaraṇam avatārayati tān iti 
NSu_2.2.58cd.1–2.2.59.1	 tān atha uvāca vidyādhīśaḥ svayam prabhuḥ uvāca mahat dīrgha vat vā ityādi iti śeṣaḥ prabala tarka upabṛṃhita mata nirāse sāmarthyam sūtra kṛtaḥ katham iti atas uktam svayam sākṣāt sarva vidyānām adhīśaḥ tasmāt prabhuḥ iti na vaiśeṣika ādi mata virodhena ukta arthasya anyathātvam śaṅkanīyam tasya upapatti viruddha tvāt tathā hi yat tāvat uktam dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇam na tri aṇuka ādi parimāṇasya asamavāyi kāraṇam iti tad upapatti viruddham iti darśayan mahat dīrgha vat vā hrasva parimaṇḍalābhyām a iti sūtram vyācaṣṭe mahat tvam ca iti mahat tvam ca eva dīrgha tvam tri aṇuka ādyeṣu kalpitam tasmāt ca sadṛśam kāryam tad kāryeṣu upajāyate 
NSu_2.2.60.1–2.2.60.3	 yathā tathā eva hrasva tvāt pārimāṇḍalī ataḥ api hi jāyeta sadṛśam kārye parimāṇam samatvataḥ eva śabdasya tri aṇuka ādyeṣu eva iti kalpitam eva iti vā sambandhaḥ tri aṇuka ādyeṣu dravyeṣu tasmāt tri aṇuka ādau kārye antya avayavi vyatirikte vartamānān mahat tvāt dīrgha tvāt caśabdaḥ vākya artha samuccaye kāryam parimāṇam tad kāryeṣu tri aṇuka ādi kāryeṣu catur aṇuka ādiṣu tathā eva iti eva śabdena dṛṣṭānta dārṣya antika vaiṣamya śaṅkām apākaroti kārye tri aṇuke dvayaṇuke ca samatvataḥ kārya parimāṇa tva ādi sāmyāt iti hetu vacanam hi śabdaḥ vyāpti dyotakaḥ 
NSu_2.2.60.4	 yadi api mahat ādi śabdāḥ dravya vacanāḥ tathā api bhāva pradhāna tvāt parimāṇa vācinaḥ bhavanti ityāyena mahat tvam iti ādi uktam sūtra kṛtasya bhāva prādhānyena uktiḥ kaṇāda sūtra anusāreṇa kāraṇa bahu tvāt kāraṇa mahat tvāt pracaya viśeṣāt ca mahat a ityādi hi tat mahat dīrgha vat iti ṣaṣṭhayarthe vatiḥ vibhakti vipariṇāmena vā sakāśāt iti adhyāhāreṇa vā tasmāt iti uktam atra etāvat ādau vaktavyam yathā tasmāt kāryeṣu kāyarmupajāyate tathā eva hrasva tvāt pārimāṇḍalī atas api kārye parimāṇam jāyeta samatvataḥ hi iti 
NSu_2.2.60.5^1	 etat uktam bhavati tri aṇukā dvayaṇuka parimāṇam sva āśraya āśraya samavāyi kāraṇa parimāṇa jam kārya parimāṇat tvāt caturaṇuka ādi parimāṇa vat dvayaṇuka paramāṇu parimāṇam parimāṇa ārambhakam dravya samavāyi kāraṇa parimāṇa tvāt tri aṇuka parimāṇa vat tri aṇuka dvaya ṇuke vā parimāṇa ārabhya parimāṇavatī kārya dravya tvāt caturaṇuka ādi vat dvayaṇuka paramāṇū parimāṇa asamavāyi kāraṇa parimāṇavantau dravya samavāyi kāraṇa tvāt tri aṇuka vat iti na ca vivakṣita artha asiddhiḥ anyathā anupapattyā tad siddheḥ na ca yatra kevalena pracayena parimāṇam ārabhyate tatra vyabhicāraḥ iti vācyam tasya api pakṣa tulya tvāt na ca evam sati bādhaḥ pracaya kāraṇa tāyāḥ anivāraṇāt 
NSu_2.2.60.5^2	 naca ubhaya kāraṇa tva kalpane gaurava doṣaḥ dvayoḥ api kpta śakti tvāt dvayaṇuka parimāṇam tri aṇuka parimāṇa ajanakam paramāṇu parimāṇam ca dvayaṇuka parimāṇa ajanakam parimāṇa tvāt paṭa parimāṇa vat ityādinā sat pratipakṣata iti ced na tad samavāyi kāṇa parimāṇa tva abhāvasya upādhi tvāt tri aṇuka parimāṇam caturaṇuka parimāṇa ajanakam parimāṇa tvāt paṭa parimāṇa vat iti ādi a ābhāsa samāna yogakṣema tvāt ca paramāṇu parimāṇam parimāṇa anārambhakam nitya parimāṇa tvāt gagana parimāṇa vat iti api na dravya samavāyi kāraṇa parimāṇa tva abhāvasya upādhi tvāt api aparamāṇu rūpam rūpa anārambhakam nitya tvāt gagana parimāṇa vat paramāṇavaḥ dravya anārambhakāḥ nitya tvāt gagana vat iti ādya ābhāsa tulya tvāt ca 
NSu_2.2.60.6–2.2.60.7	 etena paramāṇu dvayaṇuka parimāṇe parimāṇa anārambhake aṇu tvāt manaḥ parimāṇa vat iti api parāḥ tam na ca anaṇu tvam upādhiḥ vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena parimāṇau= āntara jāteḥ apākaraṇāt pakṣīkṛtāt ghra sva tvāt avyāvṛtteḥ ca nanu ca tri aṇuka ādi parimāṇam catur aṇuka ādi parimāṇam ca sajātīyam iti yuktaḥ tatra kārya karaṇa bhāvaḥ dvayaṇuka tri aṇuka parimāṇayoḥ tu vijātīya tvāt katham tathātvam iti atas dṛṣṭānta dārṣya antikayoḥ sadṛśam iti uktam yathā tri aṇuka ādi parimāṇāt catur aṇuka ādau sajātīyam parimāṇam utpadyate tathā dvayaṇuka paramāṇu parimāṇāt api tri aṇuka ādau sajātīya parimāṇa utpādasya eva sisā dhayiṣita tvāt na doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.60.8–2.2.60.9	 nanu ca tri aṇuka ādau mahat tva dīrgha tve dvayaṇuka ādau tu aṇu tva hrasva tve pramāṇa siddhe tat katham sājātya sādhane bādhaḥ na bhavet iti atas uktam mahat tvam ca iti kalpanā eva eṣā vaiśeṣikāṇām na tu parimāṇauvāntara jāti bhede pramāṇam asti kinnāma parimāṇam eka jātīyam eva utkarṣa apakaṣarvat iti bhāvaḥ anena vairūpyasya asiddhiḥ uktāḥ veditavyā nanu ca dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇasya paramāṇu ādi parimāṇa ajanya tve bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojaka tvam anumānānām dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇasya saṅkhayā eva janma sambhavāt iti āśaṅkām pariharan vā śabdam vyākhyāti naced iti 
NSu_2.2.61ab.1–2.2.61ab.3	 na ced mahat tvataḥ ca eva dīghaṛtvāt api naḥ bhavet ca api śabdau= itaretara yoge eva śabdaḥ naḥ bhavet eva iti sambaddhayate idam iha vaktavyam dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇe asamavāyi kāraṇa lakṣaṇam asti na vā iti ādye asamavāyi kāraṇa lakṣaṇa sadbhāve api tri aṇuka ādi parimāṇam dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇa jam ca ced bhavet tadā tri aṇuka ādi gatān mahat tvataḥ dīrgha tvāt ca naḥ bhavet eva catur aṇuka ādi parimāṇam iti śeṣaḥ idam uktam bhavati yadi samavāyi kāraṇa pratyāsanna tva ādi sadbhāve api na asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam tadā idam ati vyāpaka tvāt alakṣaṇam syāt tathā ca na tathābhūtasya api mahat tva ādeḥ asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam syāt iti 
NSu_2.2.61ab.4	 dvitīye kim samavāyi kāraṇa pratyāsattiḥ na asti uta sāmarthya avadhāraṇam na ādyaḥ dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇasya tri aṇuka ādi parimāṇa samavāyi kāraṇa samavāyi kāraṇe dvayaṇuka ādau samaveta tvasya pramita tvāt samavāyi kāraṇa samaveta tva abhāvāt na ced dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇāt tri aṇuka ādi parimāṇasya utpādaḥ tadā tri aṇuka ādi gatābhyām mahat tva dīrgha tvābhyām catur aṇuka ādi parimāṇam api naḥ bhavet tasya api samavāyi kāraṇa samaveta tva abhāvāt na dvitīyaḥ ananyathā siddhi niyata pūrva bhāvi tvena hi sāmarthyam avadhāraṇīyam tat ca asti dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇe evam api na ced tatas tri aṇuka ādi parimāṇa ādi janma tadā ukta prasaṅgaḥ eva 
NSu_2.2.61ab.5	 sadṛśa parimāṇasya eva kāraṇatva avadhāraṇāt vi sadṛśam etat akāraṇam avarjanīya sannidhi iti ced kim idam visadṛśa tvam kim jāti bhedaḥ uta vailakṣaṇya mātram na ādyaḥ paramāṇu dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇānām anumānena eka jātīya tvasya api sādhita tvāt dvitīye vailakṣaṇya mātreṇa na ced kāraṇa tvam tadā mahat tva ādeḥ api na syāt na hi tri aṇuka caturaṇuka mahat tve na vilakṣaṇe sa utkarṣa tu asya anubhava siddha tvāt 
NSu_2.2.61ab.6	 atha saṅkhayātaḥ eva janma sambhave parimāṇasya api kāraṇa tvam na kalpanīyam iti ced tathā api uktaḥ eva atiprasaṅgaḥ catur aṇuka ādi parimāṇasya api saṅkhayātaḥ eva janana upapatteḥ yatra tu niyāmaka viśeṣaḥ tatra parimāṇam api ādriyatām iti yadi api pariṇāma vādinām na ayam panthāḥ kintu upādānāni sva guṇa yuktāni tathāvidha kārya tām āpadyante iti tathā api paramatam āśritya parasya idam dūṣaṇa abhidhānam iti na kācid kṣatiḥ 
NSu_2.2.61ab.7–2.2.61cd.3	 evam paramāṇu parimāṇāt dvayaṇuka parimāṇasya utpādaḥ tatas tri aṇuka parimāṇasya janma teṣām ca eka jātīya tvam iti anumānena sādhitam tat asat pratitarka parāhata tvāt tathā hi kim paramāṇu parimāṇāt vayaṇuke dvayaṇuka parimāṇāt ca tri aṇuke sajātīya parimāṇasya aṇu tvasya utpattiḥ sādhyate uta mahattvasya atha hrasva tvasya yat vā dīrgha tvasya sarveṣām api pakṣāṇām duṣṭa tvam pratijānīte sadṛśasya hi iti sadṛśasya hi kāryasya na eva yogaḥ kathañcana yogaḥ ghaṭanā kathañcanaḥ ukta prakāreṣu kena api prakāreṇa kutas iti atas prathama pakṣe aniṣyam āha apratyakṣa tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.62a–2.2.62c.2	 apratyakṣa tvam evam syāt yatas kāryeṣu aṇutvataḥ iti ced yadi paramāṇu parimāṇāt aṇu tvena sajātīyam dvayaṇuke dvayaṇuka parimāṇāt ca tri aṇuke parimāṇam utpadyate tadā sarva kāryeṣu aṇu tva prasaṅgena asmad ādya pratyakṣa tvam eva syāt yatas tasmāt na iti dvi aṇukasya apratyakṣa tvam iṣyam eva iti atas avadhāraṇam sarveṣām api kāryāṇām apratyakṣa tvam eva syāt na tu kasyacid pratyakṣa tvam iti dravyasya hi asmad ādi pratyakṣa tvam mahat tve sati udbhūta rūpa sparśavat tvena vyāptam tathā ca tri aṇuka ādīnām aṇu tve mahat tva abhāvāt apratyakṣa tvam syāt etena tṛtīyaḥ api parāstaḥ tri aṇuka ādeḥ api hrasva tve mahatva abhāvena apratyakṣa tva prasaṅgasya durnivāra tvāt 
NSu_2.2.62a–2.2.62c.4	 dvitīye tu paramāṇu dvayaṇukayoḥ api mahat tve pratyakṣa tva āpattiḥ na ca udbhūta rūpa sparśayoḥ anyatara abhāvena tad abhāvaḥ tri aṇuka ādau= api tad āpatteḥ atas eva caturthaḥ api parāstaḥ dīrgha tve mahatvasya āvarjanīya tvāt iti pakṣa dvaya dūṣaṇam spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam yadi api idam parimāṇauvāntara jātīnām aṇu tva ādīnām aprāmāṇika tva uktayā parihṛtam eva tathā api tasya eva arthasya sphuṭīkaraṇa artham punar āśaṅkitam iti adoṣaḥ atra tāvat vikalpiteṣu mahat tva pakṣam gṛhṇāti na mahat tvam ca iti 
NSu_2.2.62cd.1–2.2.62cd.4	 na mahat tvam ca paramāṇauvaṇau= api caśabdaḥ dīrgha tva samuccaya arthaḥ aṇau dvayaṇuke katham na kathyate iti vakṣyamāṇam atra apa sambadhyate yat uktam kim aṇu tvasya utpattiḥ sādhyate ityādi tatra paramāṇu mahat tvāt dvayaṇuke mahat tvam dvayaṇuka mahat tvāt tri aṇuka mahat tvam utpadyate iti eṣa pakṣaḥ tāvat parigṛhyate iti arthaḥ yadi api atra parimāṇau= āntara jāti abhāvāt na evam vikalpaḥ eva yujyate iti vaktavyam tathā api tad abhāvam eva upapādayitum gūḍha abhisandhinā pakṣa parigrahaḥ kṛtaḥ iti jñātavyam atas eva pakṣa antaram api gṛhṇāti katham eva iti 
NSu_2.2.62ef.1–2.2.62ef.3	 katham tṛyaṇuka pūrveṣu na aṇu tvam api kathyate paramāṇoḥ aṇu tvāt dvayaṇuke aṇu tvam dvayaṇuka aṇu tvāt tri aṇuke aṇu tvam tatas ca caturaṇuke aṇu tvam iti vā pakṣaḥ parigṛhyate iti bhāvaḥ nanu evam sati pakṣa dvaya ukta doṣa āpattiḥ vyāghātaḥ ca adhikaḥ tathā hi paramāṇum ārabhya antya avayavi paryantasya udbhūta sparśavataḥ mahat tve sarvasya api pratyakṣa tvam syāt aṇu tve ca apratyakṣa tvam syāt na ca paramāṇu ādeḥ pratyakṣa tvam tri aṇuka ādeḥ apratyakṣa tvam yuktam pratyakṣatvā pratyakṣa tve ca paraspara vyāhate yat pratyakṣam ghaṭa ādi na tad apratyakṣam yat ca apratyakṣam gagana ādi na tat pratyakṣam iti tayoḥ paraspara parihāreṇa eva vṛtteḥ kiñca mahattva aṇu tve paraspara viruddhe katham ekaikatra aṅgīkartum ucite yathā āha sūtra kāraḥ dṛṣṭāntāt ca a iti na ca kāla bhedena virodha parihāraḥ parimāṇasya yāvat dravya bhāvi tvāt iti āśaṅkaya pratyakṣatva apratyakṣa tva prasaṅgayoḥ tāvat iṣya āpādana tvam vadan vyāhatim pariharati pratyakṣa tvā iti 
NSu_2.2.63ab.1–2.2.63cd.3	 pratyakṣa tva tad anya tve puruṣa apekṣayā akhile paramāṇu ādau= akhile api dravye pratyakṣatvā pratyakṣa tve staḥ eva iti na etau prasaṅgau yuktau na ca vyāhatiḥ puruṣa bheda apekṣayā vyavasthā upapatteḥ iti etat ca uttaratra sphuṭībhaviṣyati idānīm aṇu tva mahat tva vyāghātam pariharati aṇu tvam ca iti aṇu tvam ca mahat tvam ca yatas vastu vyapekṣayā akhila iti anuvartate aṇu tvam ca mahat tvam ca akhile vastuni vidyete na tu viruddhe katham yatas vastu vyapekṣayā aṇu tvam ca mahat tvam ca tat eva ucyate iti yojanā etat uktam bhavati syāt ayam paramāṇu ādiṣu akhila dravyeṣu aṇu tva mahat tva aṅgīkāre virodhaḥ yadi rūpe nīlatva pīta tva vat parimāṇe aṇu tva mahat tva ādi jāti yogaḥ syāt naca evam pramāṇa abhāvāt kintu yathā tri aṇuka ādiṣu mahat tvam eka jātīyam eva utkarṣa apakarṣa vatpareṇa aṅgīkṛtam yathā ca aṇu tvam paramāṇu dvayaṇukayoḥ evam parimāṇam avāntara jāti rahitam eva sarva dravyeṣu utkarṣa apakarṣa vat vartate tathā ca ekatra dravye vartamānam parimāṇam dravya antara varti utkṛṣṭa parimāṇa apekṣayā aṇu tvam iti ucyate tat eva dravya anta vartinaḥ apakṛṣṭa parimāṇasya apekṣayā mahat tvam iti ucyate evañca kutas virodhaḥ yathā khalu ekam eva dravyam dravya bheda apekṣayā sannikṛṣṭam viprakṛṣṭam ca ucyamānam 
NSu_2.2.63cd.4	 na virodha āspadam atas eva pratyakṣatva apratyakṣa tva virodhaḥ api apāstaḥ tayoḥ mahat tva ādi mātra nimitta tve hi sa syāt na ca evam kintu puruṣāṇām indriya pāṭava nimitta tvam eva anyathā manda vilocanena api tri aṇukam upalabhyeta tarhi gagana ādeḥ api kadācid pratyakṣa tvam syāt iti ced na udbhūta rūpa abhāvāt dvayaṇuka anupalambhaḥ guṇa viśeṣa viparyaya adhīnaḥ āloka indriya sannikṛṣṭa cākṣuṣa dravya anupalambha tvāt pavana anupalambha vat iti ādikam tu apakṛṣṭa mahat tva ādinā eva anyathā siddham tarhi parvata ādeḥ apratyakṣatā syāt iti ced na apakarṣa viśeṣasya vivakṣita tvāt na asau vyavasthitaḥ asti iti ced satyam atas eva puruṣa apekṣayā iti uktam iti 
NSu_2.2.63cd.5	 astu evam parimāṇe avāntara jāti abhāvaḥ tathā api na sarvatra mahattva aṇu tu abhyupagamaḥ yujyate utkṛṣṭa apakṛṣṭa parimāṇa apekṣayā hi madhya varti parimāṇam aṇu tvam mahat tvam ca ucyate iti uktam tat ca dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇe sambhavati na ca paramāṇu parimāṇe na hi paramāṇu parimāṇāt apakṛṣṭam parimāṇam asti yad apekṣayā tat mahat tvam syāt atas paramāṇoḥ aṇu tvam eva tathā ca na mahat tvam ca iti asat iti atas āha tāratamya iti 
NSu_2.2.64ab.1–2.2.64ab.2	 tāratamya sthitāḥ yasmāt padārthāḥ sarve eva ca yasmāt sarve api padārthāḥ parimāṇa tāratamyena eva sthitāḥ sva parimāṇa apekṣayā utkṛṣṭa apakṛṣṭa parimāṇavantaḥ sarvāṇi api dravyāṇi kutaścid parimāṇāt utkṛṣṭena parimāṇena upetāni iti vā tasmāt paramāṇoḥ api mahat tvam yujyate iti sambandhaḥ ayam atra prayogaḥ paramāṇuḥ kutaścid utkṛṣṭena parimāṇena yuktaḥ sva parimāṇa apekṣayā apakṛṣṭa parimāṇavān iti vā dravya tvāt tantu vat iti na ca paramāṇoḥ apakṛṣṭa dravya abhāvāt bādhita viṣaya tvam tad bhāgānām vakṣyamāṇa tvāt na ca teṣu eva vyabhicāraḥ teṣām api bhāgavat tvāt 
NSu_2.2.64ab.3–2.2.64cd.1	 tat evam paramāṇu dvayaṇuka ādi parimāṇānām vaijātyasya abhāvādi uktam sautram anumānam iti siddham yadi api vaijātyam aṅgīkṛtya api kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ śakya upapādanaḥ anyathā saṅkhayāyāḥ api akāraṇa tva āpatteḥ parimāṇasya evam iti niyamasya nirmūla tvāt tathā api vastu sthitiḥ eva vaktavyā iti parimāṇa tva avāntara jāti apākaraṇena sajātīyatām upapādya anumānam samāhitam iti jñātavyam paramāṇoḥ api utkṛṣṭa parimāṇa āśraya tvam uktam tadā ākṣipati yathā iti yathā mahat tva viśrāntiḥ tathā aṇu tvasya ca iṣyate 
NSu_2.2.65a.1–2.2.65a.3	 parimāṇa tvataḥ ced yathā mahat tvasya viśrāntiḥ tathā parimāṇa tva hetoḥ aṇu tvasya ca viśrāntiḥ iṣyate ced iti yojanā atra mahattva aṇu tva śabdābhyām parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣau= ucyete tābhyām ca tat tāratamyam upalakṣyate parimāṇa tvataḥ iti parimāra tāratamya tvāt iti arthaḥ tatācāṇau siddhe aṇu tva siddhiḥ tad siddhau ca tad siddhiḥ iti paraspara āśraya doṣaḥ parāstaḥ tat ayam arthaḥ parimāṇa apakarṣa tāratamyam kvacid viśrāntam parimāṇa tāratamya tvāt parimāṇa utkarṣa tāratamya vat iti anumānena parimāṇa apakarṣa tāratamyasya kvacid viśrānti siddhau yatra idam viśrāntam yatas paramāṇuḥ na asti sa paramāṇuḥ iti parimāṇa apakarṣa kāṣṭha āśraya tayā siddhasya paramāṇoḥ katham utkṛṣṭa parimāṇa ākhyam api mahat tvam sādhayitum śakyam dharmi grāhaka pramāṇena sva vacanena vyāghātāt iti 
NSu_2.2.65a.4–2.2.65a.5	 atra vaktavyam kā iyam kvacid viśrāntiḥ nāma kim iyat tā paricchedaḥ tri aṇuka parimāṇāt ṣaṣṭha bhāgaḥ eva parimāṇam na tatas apakṛṣṭam asti iti kiṃvā kvacid dravye vṛttiḥ apakarṣa tāratamyam iyat tāvaccheda rahitam eva kintu ananta aṃśa upetam api tat sarvam kvacid āśritam eva iti tatra ādye sādhye dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ iti āha na iti 
NSu_2.2.65ab.1–2.2.65c.2	 na mahattvasya api viśramaḥ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtasya mahattvasya parimāṇa utkarṣa tāratamyasya api viśramaḥ ukta rūpaḥ na asti na kevalam pakṣasya iti aperarthaḥ kutas na asti iti atas āha dṛśyate iti dṛśyate anantaḥ iti eva parimāṇa utkarṣata ratam abhāvaḥ anantaḥ anavadhikaḥ iti eva dṛśyate na tu iyat tā pari= chedavān iti bādhaka pramāṇa sadbhāvāt sādhaka abhāvāt ca iti arthaḥ kāla atyaya apadiṣyam ca asmin pakṣe anumānam iti āha tathā iti 
NSu_2.2.65d.1–2.2.65d.3	 tathā ānanti amaṇau= api tathā śabdaḥ dūṣaṇa samuccaye na kevalam parimāṇa utkarṣataratam abhāvaḥ anantaḥ iti dṛśyate kintu a sāvaṇau parimāṇa apakarṣa tāratamye api ānantyam anavadhika tvam dṛśyate iti arthaḥ dṛśyate anantaḥ iti eva a iti īyatta apari= chedaḥ na dṛṣṭānte dṛśyate iti eva śabdena uktam tad viśadayati na iti 
NSu_2.2.66a–2.2.66c.2	 na mahat tatva guṇataḥ etāvān iti hi īśvaraḥ paricchinnaḥ mahat tvam iti dravya viśeṣasi a ivam saṃjñā tena ān mahataḥ iti eṣa vidhiḥ na bhavati dṛṣṭa anugatiḥ hi saṃjñā chandasoḥ a iṣyate yathā aha bahulam taṇi a iti guṇa śabdaḥ atra tantreṇa dvis upāttaḥ tatra ādyasya parimāṇa ākhyaḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ arthaḥ dvitīyasya guṇanam īśvaraḥ iti parama mahat tva āśraya dravya upalakṣaṇam parimāṇa utkarṣa tāratamyasya iyat ta aparicchedaḥ hi tathā sati dṛṣṭaḥ syāt yadi mahat tattva ādi parimāṇa gaṇanayā īśvara ādiḥ etāvān pañca guṇa parimāṇavān ṣaḍguṇa parimāṇavān vā iti paricchinnaḥ syāt naca evam tathā sati parama mahat tva anupapatteḥ iti hi śabda arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.66a–2.2.66c.4	 atra mahat tattva grahaṇena idam sūcayati yat uktam vaiśeṣika ādibhiḥ pṛthivī ādīni nava eva dravyāṇi iti tat asat mahat ahaṅkāra ādīnām api sattvāt na ca tatra pramāṇa abhāvaḥ śruti ādeḥ pramāṇasya vidyamāna tvāt na ca tri aṇuka ādikam eva tathā ucyate avyakta tva ādi śravaṇāt na ca bādhakam kiñcid vidyate yena upacāra kalpanā iti īśvara grahaṇena jīva ātmanām api yat para eṣaḥ parama mahat tvam uktam tat asat iti sūcayati upapādayiṣyate khalu aṇu tvam jīvasya iti dṛṣṭānte viśrama abhāva upapādanasya prayojanam āha tathā iti 
NSu_2.2.66cd.1–2.2.66cd.2	 tathā aṇoḥ ca na etāvat bhāga tā kvacid yatas dṛṣṭānte etāvat guṇam eva parimāṇam utkṛṣṭate na atas adhikam iti vākyam na asti atas tathā tad dṛṣṭāntena aṇoḥ aṇu tvasya parimāṇa apakarṣasya ca etāvat bhāga tā tri aṇuka parimāṇāt ṣaṣṭha bhāgaḥ eva parimāṇam apakṛṣṭate na atas adhikam iti īyattā kvacid dravye na siddhayati na hi mahāhradam sa pakṣīkṛtya parvate agnima tvam śakya sādhanam tad asiddhau ca na vivakṣita artha lābhaḥ asmāt etāvat bhāgam eva parimāṇam apākṛṣṭate na atas adhikam iti asya arthasya hi siddhau= apakarṣa kāṣṭha āśraya bhūtam kutaścid api anutkṛṣṭamāṇam dravyam siddhayati iti 
NSu_2.2.66cd.3–2.2.66cd.4	 yat vā anena vākyena pratipakṣam āha tathā hi samarthitam tāvat parimāṇa utkarṣa tāratamyam na kvacid viśrāntam asmāt etāvat guṇam eva parimāṇam utkṛṣṭataḥ iti īyat ta abhāvāt iti tathā tad dṛṣṭāntena aṇoḥ ca etāvat bhāga tā kvacid na asti iti sādhyate iti atra ayam prayogaḥ parimāṇa apakarṣa tāratamyam kvacid na viśrāntam parimāṇa tāratamya tvāt parimāṇa utkarṣa tāratamya vat iti dvitīyam śaṅkate viśrāntaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.67ab.1–2.2.67ab.2	 viśrāntaḥ yadi ananta aṃśaḥ kaścid asti iti gamyate viśrāntaḥ iti asya tri aṇuka ādi apekṣayā parimāṇataḥ ananta aṃśaḥ dravya viśeṣaḥ kaścid asti iti arthaḥ iti dvitīya pakṣaḥ gamyate abhyupagamyate yadi iti arthaḥ idam uktam bhavati parimāṇa apakarṣa tāratamyam iyat tān avacchinnam eva kintu ananta aṃśa rūpam api tat kvacid āśritam iti nirākaroti na iti 
NSu_2.2.67cd.1–2.2.67cd.2	 na avasāyayitum śakyaḥ virodhāt eva kevalam tarhi iti śeṣaḥ kaścid iti vartate evam sādhane kaścid api dravya viśeṣaḥ na avasāyayitum śakyaḥ ayam eva sarvatas apakṛṣṭa parimāṇa vān na atas apakṛṣṭa parimāṇaḥ asti iti sarva antimatayā na pratipattum kaścid śakyate kutas kevalam sākṣāt virodhāt parimāṇa apakarṣaḥ anantaḥ ca paryavasitaḥ ca iti hi vipratiṣiddham etat bhavitavyam ca avasānena anyathā sarvasya api utkṛṣṭa apakṛṣṭa parimāṇa sambhavena paramāṇoḥ mahat tva nirākaraṇa asambhavāt eva śabdena virodhasya aparihārya tvam sūcayati tad anena apasiddhāntaḥ abhihitaḥ bhavati 
NSu_2.2.67cd.3	 yadi ca ānantyam avadhīrya parimāṇa apakarṣa tāratamyam kvacid āśritam iti eva pratijñā arthaḥ syāt tathā api na sisādhayiṣitam avasānam labhyate iti artha antara tā syāt yathā akāśa ādeḥ utkṛṣṭa parimāṇam dravyam na asti tathā paramāṇoḥ apakṛṣṭa parimāṇam dravyam na asti iti tātparya artham iti ced satyam na ayam itas labhyate iti ucyate parimāṇa apakaṣartāratamyam kvacid niratiśayam parimāṇa tāratamya tvāt parimāṇa utkaṣartāratamya vat iti vivakṣitam iti ced kaḥ ayam atiśayaḥ nāma kim ādhikyam uta nyūna tā atha sādhāraṇam kiñcid ādye bādhaḥ dvitīye dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikalatā na tṛtīyaḥ tad abhāvāt śabda sāmya mātreṇa anumāna apravṛtteḥ yathā akāśa ādi parimāṇam ubhaya a= adhimat na bhavati tathā tri aṇuka avaya va avayava parimāṇam api sādhyam iti ced na
