NSu_2.2.67cd.4–2.2.67cd.5	 hetu abhāvāt parimāṇa tvasya ghaṭa ādi parimāṇe vyabhicārāt nitya parimāṇa tvasya āśraya aniti a tāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇa tvena asiddheḥ parimāṇa kāṣṭha tvasya ca sādhya tvāt evam tātparya antarāṇi api nirākāryāṇi iti parimāṇa utkarṣa tāratamyasya ananta tvam dṛśyate iti uktam tat kena pramāṇena iti āśaṅkaya kāla ākāśa īśvara ādīni hi dravyāṇi parama mahat tvayantīṣyante tatra kāla ākāśayoḥ tāvat parimāṇa utkarṣasya ānantyam sākṣi siddham iti āha kevalam iti 
NSu_2.2.68ab.1–2.2.68ab.3	 kevalam sākṣi mānena kālaḥ deśaḥ api na antavān kevala śabdena pramāṇa antara abhāvam pratijānīte deśaḥ iti ākāśaḥ ucyate na antavān iti anavadhika parimāṇa utkarṣavān dṛśyate iti vakṣyamāṇam atra api sambaddhayate kāla ākāśau hi kevalam sākṣi siddhau= iti upapāditam prathama adhyāye atas tad parimāṇa utkaṣarsyāna vadhika tvam api tena eva gamyate iti parimāṇa apakarṣa tāratamyasya api ānantyam dṛśyate iti uktam tat kena pramāṇena iti āśaṅkaya kāla ākāśayoḥ tāvat sākṣiṇā eva iti āha aparyavasitaḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.2.68cd.1–2.2.69a.2	 aparyavasitiḥ ca aṇoḥ dṛśyate sakṣiṇā dvayoḥ dvayoḥ kāle gagane ca aṇoḥ ca parimāṇa apakarṣa tāratamyasya ca iti arthaḥ aparyavasitiḥ ānantyam nanu etat anupayuktam paramāṇu parimāṇataḥ apakṛṣṭa parimāṇa sadbhāve pramāṇa upanyāsasya kāryatve kāla avakāśayoḥ parimāṇa utkarṣa ānantye pramāṇa upanyāsasya prayojana abhāvāt iti mā evam na hi pareṇa sākṣāt evam uktam kintu parimāṇa utkarṣa paramparā vat tadapakaṣarpa ramparā api paryavasānavatī iti tathā ca kāla ākāśayoḥ parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣa paramparāyāḥ paryavasāna abhāve sākṣi pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ katham asaṅgataḥ nanu astu kāla ākāśayoḥ parimāṇa prakarṣaḥ anavadhikaḥ tad apakarṣa ānantyam tu katham vyāhata tvāt mā evam sākṣi siddha tvāt pramite arthe virodhān avakāśāt kāla ādāvana vadhikaḥ parimāṇa apakarṣaḥ sākṣi siddhaḥ iti eva na iṣyate iti ced kim sākṣiṇā na avagamyate uta avagataḥ api na satyaḥ athavā sākṣī nāma pramāṇam na asti ādyam śaṅkate yadi iti yadi no sākṣi gamyam tat tat iti kāla ādeḥ parimāṇa apakarṣasya ānantyam sāmānyena parāmṛśati dūṣayati mahat tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.69b.1–2.2.69b.3	 mahat tvam kena gamyate kāla ākāśayoḥ iti vartate mahat tvam anavadhikaḥ parimāṇa utkaṣarḥ tarhi iti śeṣaḥ ayam abhisandhiḥ kāla ādau parimāṇa utkaṣarsya ānantyam upetya hi pareṇa tad apakarṣa ānantyam na iṣyate tatra vaktavyam prakarṣa ānantyam kena pramāṇena avagamyate iti sākṣiṇā iti ced apakarṣa ānantyam api tad balena kutas na aṅgīkṛtam tat tena na avagamyate iti sākṣiṇā iti ced apakarṣa ānantyam api tad balena kutas na aṅgīkāryam tat tena na avagamyate iti uktam iti ced idam api tena na avagamyate iti vadantam prati kim uttaram anubhava āpalāpaḥ na yuktaḥ iti ced samam prakṛte api yathā hi kāla ādeḥ utkarṣa anavadhika tvam anubhave cakāsti tathā apakarṣa ānantyam api iti kim ekatra pakṣapātena anyathā eka apalāpe dvitīyasya api apalāpaḥ duruttaraḥ syāt iti syāt etat na kāla ādeḥ parimāṇa utkarṣa ānantyam sākṣi siddham iti brūmaḥ kintu anumāna gamyam tathā ca na pratibandī grahaḥ iti atas āha viśrāntiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.69cd.1–2.2.69cd.3	 viśrāntiḥ tāratamyena dṛśyate hi anumānataḥ parimāṇa utkarṣa paramparayā iti śeṣaḥ anumānataḥ iti tṛtīya arthe tasiḥ na anumānena kāla ādā= ana vadhika parimāra utkaṣar siddhiḥ hi yasmāt tāratamyena anumānena tat viśrāntiḥ dṛśyate parimāṇa utkarṣa tāratamyam iyat tāvat parimāṇa tāratamya tvāt tad apakaṣartāratamya vat iti pratyanumāna pratiruddha tvāt iti yāvat na ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ asmākam sādhya vikalaḥ iti vācyam apakarṣa tāratamyasya antavat tvam upetya utkarṣa tāratamyasya ānantyam anumimānasya parasya evam pratipakṣa utprekṣā syāt iti ucyamāna tvāt tathā ca sākṣi viruddham pratyanumānam iti vaktavyam katham tarhi saḥ eva kāla ādā= ana vadhika prakṛṣṭa parimāṇam na sādhayet iti astu tarhi āgamāt kāla ādā= ana vadhika utkṛṣṭa parimāṇa siddhiḥ itayā āśaṅkayā āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.70.1–2.2.70.3	 yadi āgamāt anantam tat mahat tvam avagamyate anantam eva ca aṇu tvam kutas na eva avasīyate āgamāt saḥ eṣaḥ anantaḥ iti ādeḥ tat mahatvam kāla ādi parimāṇa utkarṣaḥ aṇu tvam parimāṇa apakarṣaḥ etat uktam bhavati na āgamaḥ kāla ādi anantānām svayam pratipādayati tad pravṛtteḥ prāk eva sākṣiṇā tad pratibhāsāt kintu anuvādaḥ eva ayam pratipādaka tve vā na asmad prayojana parikṣayaḥ yasmāt āgamāt kāla ādi utkarṣaḥ anavadhikaḥ pratīyate tasmāt eva aparṣa ānantya pratīteḥ ananta śabdaḥ hi anavaccheda mātram ācaṣṭe sa ca yathā parimāṇa utkarṣa viṣayaḥ vyākhyāyate tathā tad apakarṣa viṣayaḥ api śakyate vyākhyātum iti parimāṇa utkarṣa vat tad apakarṣasya api kāla ādau= ānantyam sākṣiṇā agamena vā pratīyate eva tathā api na tat satyam na hi pratīta tva mātreṇa satya tā niścayaḥ ati prasaṅgāt iti dvitīyam nirākaroti mahat tva iti 
NSu_2.2.71ab.1–2.2.71ab.3	 mahattva aṇu tvayoḥ na eva viśrāntiḥ upalabhyate kāla ādau parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ viśrāntiḥ iyat tāvat chedaḥ balavat pramāṇena na eva upalabhyate atra mahat tva grahaṇam dṛṣṭānta atharm idam uktam bhavati yathā kāla ādau parimāṇa utkarṣasya ānantyam sākṣī ādi avagatam viparīta grāhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt satyam eva tathā tad apakarṣasya api vinā bādhakena sākṣi ādi siddham parimāṇa apakarṣa ānantya kālādau= asatyam ced tat utkarṣa ānantyam api asatyam syāt aviśeṣāt tatas ca aparicchinna parimāṇa tā aṅgīkāraḥ naṅkṣayeta atiprasaṅgaḥ tu bādhaka abhāvena apāste iti nanu asti eva parimāṇa apakarṣasya ānantya abhyupagame bādhakam tathā hi apakarṣaḥ nāma alpa tā ānantyam ca analpa tā na ca viruddhayoḥ viśeṣya bhāvaḥ sambhavati na hi bhavati pītaḥ apītaḥ iti atas bādhaka sadbhāvāt pratītam api apakarṣa ānantyam tyajyate iti atas āha anyat eva iti 
NSu_2.2.71cd.1–2.2.71cd.3	 anyat eva hi ananta tvam mahattva aṇu tvayoḥ samam na ananta tvam nāma analpa tvam kintu anyadeva pariccheda abhāva rūpam tasmāt parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ samānaḥ dharmaḥ iti yujyate atra api mahat tva grahaṇam dṛṣṭāntam eva yathā mahattvasya viśeṣaṇam tathā aṇu tvasya api iti yadi ananta tvam nāma analpa tvam syāt tadā utkarṣasya api viśeṣaṇam na syāt na hi tat eva tasya viśeṣaṇam bhavati pītaḥ pītaḥ iti adarśanāt atas tatra ānantyam nāma pariccheda abhāvaḥ iti svīkṛtya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ samarthanīyaḥ tathā prakṛte api iti yathā hi parimāṇa utkarṣaḥ gagana ādau= anadhikaḥ tathā tad apakarṣaḥ a pyanavadhikaḥ eva iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva abhyupagame na kaḥ api doṣaḥ iti ānantyam nāma analpa tvāt anyat iti etat pratyayayitum dṛṣṭānta antaram āha bahutva iti 
NSu_2.2.72a–2.2.72c.3	 bahutva alpa tvayoḥ yadvat sāṅkhayāyām upalabhyate ānantyam yadvat yathā saṅkhayāyām bahutva alpa tvayoḥ viśeṣaṇatayā anantyam upalabhyate bahu tvam anantam alpa tvam ca anantam iti tathā prakṛte api iti yadi anantvam nāma analpa tvam syāt tadā na bahu tvasya viśeṣaṇam syāt tasya eva tad viśeṣaṇa tva ayogāt na api alpa tvasya virodhāt atas avaccheda abhāvaḥ eva ananta tvam iti aṅgīkṛtya bahu tvam alpa tvacā paryavasitam iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ boddhavyaḥ tathā parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ api iti nanu ca na asti eva saṅkhayāyām bahu tva alpa tvayoḥ ānantyam bahu tvasya parārdhaḥ eva paryavasita tvāt alpa tvasya ca ekatva avadhi tvam yathā uktam sā ca eka tva ādi parārdha paryantā a iti atas katham ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti atas āha ekā iti 
NSu_2.2.72cd.1–2.2.72cd.3	 eka bhāgānām tāvat tvam hi eva gaṇyate saṅkhayām adhikṛtya hi gaṇita śāstram pravṛttam tatra ca kalā savaṇarna prabhāga bhāga anubandha bhāga apavāha bhāga bhāga ādi prakaraṇeṣu eka bhāgānām tāvat tvam anavadhika tvam gamyate hi yasmāt tasmāt avagamyate asti eka tvāt api apakṛṣṭa anavadhikā saṅkhayā iti parārdhāt paratas api saṅkhayā asadbhāvaḥ sphuṭaḥ eva iti na upapāditaḥ sambhavati hi pareṣām api īśvara apekṣā buddhayā paramāṇu ādau parārdhāt paratas api saṅkhayā utpattiḥ tatas param saṃjñā karaṇam tu gaṇakānām prayojana abhāvāt etām eva vipratipattim apanetam saṅkhayā dṛṣṭānta upādānam kṛtam iti evam kāla ākāśayoḥ parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣa ānantyam sākṣiṇā prasādhya īśvare tad āgamena sādhayati aṇīyān= ca iti 
NSu_2.2.73ab.1–2.2.73ab.2	 aṇīyān= ca mahīyān= ca bhagavān āgama uditaḥ aṇoḥ aṇīyān mahataḥ mahīyā anātmā a iti āgamena bhagavān īśvaraḥ aṇoḥ api aṇīyāt mahataḥ api mahīya anuditaḥ na ca tatra aṇu mahat śabdābhyām kiñci d vayavasthitam ucyate viśeṣaṇa abhāvāt tatas yadi apakṛṣṭa parimāṇam tatas tatas api apakṛṣṭa parimāṇaḥ yat yat ca utkṛṣṭa parimāṇam tatas tatas api utkṛṣṭa parimāṇaḥ iti uktam syāt tathā ca īśvara gatayaḥ parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ anavadhika tvam eva labhyate 
NSu_2.2.73ab.3–2.2.73cd.1	 nanu aṇīyāt mahīyān iti uktaḥ eva bhagavati parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ paryavasānāt katham tayoḥ anavadhika tvam iti atas āha aṇīyān iti aṇīyāt mahīyān iti uktayoḥ api aṇoḥ mahataḥ ca iti śabda viṣaya tvāt iti nanu evam sati svasmāt api svayam apakṛṣṭaḥ utkṛṣṭaḥ ca iti āgatam kaḥ na iti āha yathā ca etat tathā vakṣyate śruti antaram ca īśvare parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ ānantyam pratipādayat asti iti āha ānantya iti ānantya vācakaḥ śabdaḥ dvidhā ānantye api mānatām 
NSu_2.2.74a.1–2.2.74a.2	 yāti satyam jñānam anantam brahma a iti brahmaṇaḥ ānantyasya vācakaḥ ananta śabdaḥ tāvat deśataḥ kālataḥ vastutas ca ānantyam āha tatra deśa ānantyam nāma anavadhika parimāṇa vat tvam kāla ānantyam nāma anavacchinna sattāka tvam vastu ānantyam nāma aparicchinna saṅkhayā guṇa karma vigrahavat tvam tatra yadā parimāṇa ānantyasya vācakaḥ tadā dvidhā ānantye api utkarṣa apakarṣābhyām anantye api mānatām yāti na tu utkarṣa ānantya mātre viśeṣa abhāvāt iti nanu aneka artha tvam anyāyaḥ kaḥ atra nyāya virodhaḥ nirarthaka śabda prayoga ayogāt tāvat ekaḥ arthaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ dvitīya aṅgīkāre tu na kiñcid bījam iti kalpanā gauravam ucyate yatra hi ekasmin= arthe vyavasthite sati vṛthā eva artha antara aṅgīkāraḥ tatra evam etat na ca evam prakṛte ananta śabdaḥ hi pariccheda abhāvam āha paricchedaḥ hi deśataḥ kālataḥ vastutas ca bhavanī upagapad eva prāpnoti na ca tatra kasyacid prāthamyam asti na api anyatama parityāge kāraṇam evam parimāṇa antye api utkarṣa parigrahaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.74a.3–2.2.74a.4	 nanu evam kālataḥ guṇataḥ ca ānantya vācakasya ananta śabdasya alpa kāla tvam alpa guṇa tvam ca arthaḥ syāt anyathā alpa parimāṇa vat tvam api na syāt aviśeṣāt iti ced kim idam kālataḥ guṇataḥ ca alpa tvam āpādyam kim alpāḥ eva guṇāḥ santi brahmaṇaḥ na bahutarāḥ tathā alpa kālīna eva sattā na pracurakālīna iti kiṃvā sarva kāla gatasya alpa kāle api avasthitiḥ syāt mahā guṇasya ca alpaḥ api guṇaḥ syāt iti ādyam dūṣayati na eva iti 
NSu_2.2.74ab.1–2.2.75c.2	 na eva guṇa alpa tvam kālāt patvam ca mānagam guṇa alpa tvam kāla alpa tvam ca mānagam anantam brahma iti śruti pratipādyam na eva bhavet iti gūḍha abhisandheḥ pratijñā hetum uttaratra vakṣyati dvitīyam āśaṅkayā aṅgīkaroti sarva iti sarva kāla gatasya alpa kāle api syāt avasthitiḥ mahā guṇasya ca alpaḥ api guṇaḥ syāt iti ced bhavet iti cet āpādyate tat bhaveda iti arthaḥ atra guṇa grahaṇam kriyā ādeḥ api upalakṣaṇam guṇa kālayoḥ yathā iṣyam upādānam prāthamya nirāsa atharm tena ukta kalpanā gaurava parihāram sūcayati nanu yadi kāla alpa tvam guṇa alpa tvam ca aṅgīkriyate katham tarhi na eva guṇa alpa tvam iti nirākaraṇam iti atas abhisandhim udghāṭayati tāvat tvam eva iti tāvat tvam eva na eva syāt alpa tvam eva iti arthaḥ iti uktam prāk iti śeṣaḥ kutas na syāt iti ced āpādaka abhāvāt iti āha deśe api iti 
NSu_2.2.75c.1–2.2.75c.3	 deśe api etat na naḥ matam parimāṇe api iti arthaḥ etat tāvat tvam eva naḥ asmākam etat uktam bhavati parimāṇa viṣaye asmadīyam śruti vyākhyānam upalabhya hi guṇa kālayoḥ api etat āpādyate āpādaka antara abhāvāt na ca parimāṇe asmābhiḥ evam vyākhyāyate apakṛṣṭam eva parimāṇam anavadhikam asti na utkṛṣṭam iti dvidhā ānantye api iti ukta tvāt atas nirmūlam etat āpādanam iti nanu etat īśvara ādeḥ anavadhika utkṛṣṭa apakṛṣṭa parimāṇa samarthanam ayuktam sūtrakāreṇa kvāpi anukta tvāt mahat dīrgha vat vā iti sūtrasya vijātīyayoḥ api kārya kāraṇa bhāva upapādanena vyadhikaraṇayoḥ api aparicchinna parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ upapādanena vā samarthayitum śakya tvāt iti atas āha mahataḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.76ab.1–2.2.76ab.3	 mahataḥ alpa tvam api hi vyoma vat prāha veda vid niravadhika parimāṇa utkarṣavataḥ brahmaṇaḥ alpa parimāravat tvam ca vyomam dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya vyoma vat ca iti sūtra khaṇḍena prāha sūtrakāraḥ atas brahmaṇaḥ gaganasya vānavadhika parimāṇara utkarṣa apakarṣa sadbhāvaḥ tad siddhāntaḥ bhavati eva iti kiñca yaḥ arthaḥ niravakāśa pramāṇa siddhaḥ yad viparyaye ca aniṣyam sa sarvaḥ api siddhānte eva tatra kāla ākāśayoḥ īśvare ca ana vadhika parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣa sadbhāvaḥ sākṣiṇā agamena ca siddhaḥ iti uktam tad viparyaye bādhakam āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.76cd.1–2.2.76cd.2	 yadi alpa deśa saṃsthānam na sarvatra api naḥ bhavet kāla ādeḥ iti vartate sarvatra api saṃsthānam iti ca kāla ādīnām sarva gata tvam pareṇa api aṅgīkṛtam sarva gata tvam ca sarva deśe saṃsthānam tathā ca yadi kāla ādeḥ alpa alpatara deśeṣu saṃsthānam na syāt tadā sarvatra avasthānam api naḥ bhavet kutas iti atas āha sthitasya hi iti 
NSu_2.2.77.1–2.2.77.3	 sthitasya hi alpa deśeṣu sarvaga tvam bhavet dhruvam ekatra api anavasthasya kutas eva akhila stha tā dhruvam iti avadhāraṇe alpa deśeṣu sthitasya eva iti yathā khalu ekaikam varṇam uccārayataḥ eva savardeva uccāraṇam na tu ekam api varṇam anuccārayataḥ tathā alpa alpatara deśeṣu sthitasya eva hi sarva deśa gata tvam bhavet ekaikatra api deśe anavasthitasya akhila deśa stha tā kutas eva bhavet anena yaḥ yat samudāyam vyāpnoti sa tad eka deśān api vyāpnoti yaḥ ca eka deśāt na vyāpnoti na asau tad samudāyam iti anvaya vyatirekau darśitau na kevalam alpa alpatara deśa stha tva abhāve sarva gatvā abhāva prasaṅgaḥ kintu śaśaviṣāṇa ādi vat sat tā api na syāt iti āha śūnya tvam eva iti 
NSu_2.2.78ab.1–2.2.78ab.2	 śūnya tvam eva tasya syāt yasya ekatra api na sthitiḥ evaṃca kāla ādīnām alpa alpatara deśa avasthāne alpa alpatara parimāṇa vat tvam api avarjanīyam iti anavadhika parimāṇa apakarṣa siddhiḥ anavadhika utkarṣaḥ tu pareṇa api aṅgīkṛtaḥ eva iti na tad viparyaye bādhakam uktam sarvatra api naḥ bhavet iti eva vā draṣṭavyam na hi parama mahat tva abhāve sarva gata tvam sambhavati tathā ca āha vibhu tvāt mahān ākāśaḥ a ityādi alpa alpatara deśa paryavasitasya alpa alpatara parimāṇa tvam na ca evam ākāśa ādi iti ced tat kim ākāśa ādi samudita rūpam yena paryavasāna aparyavasāna viṣaya tvam aśnuvīta kintu ekam eva tat ca yadi alpa alpatara deśeṣu tiṣṭhet tadā tad tad parimāṇam bhavati eva yadi tava tatra sthitasya tad tad parimāṇa tvam tadā ghaṭa ādau= api tad prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na tasya sa aṃśa tvena anyathā siddha tvāt 
NSu_2.2.78ab.3–2.2.78ab.4	 nanu ca sarva mūrta saṃyogi tvam eva sarva gata tvam na sarvatra saṃsthānam ākāśa āt eḥ anāśrita tvāt saṃyogaḥ ca tad tad parimāṇa abhāve api bhavet eva na hi ghaṭaḥ gaganena saṃyujyamānaḥ bhavati parama m ahān nā api paramāṇunā saṃyujyamānaḥ paramāṇuḥ tat kasya hetoḥ saṃyogasya pradeśa vṛtti tvāt iti mā evam sarva parimāṇānām api ākāśe sattvāt paramāṇunā ca ghaṭa aṃśasya eva saṃyogāt tathā hi viśeṣa śaktayā nirbhedam api ākāśam ananta aṃśa upetam tatra anavadhikau parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣau vyavasthayā vartete tatas ca ghaṭaḥ vitasti parimāṇena eva ākāśena saṃyujyate svayam ca tad parimāṇaḥ iti kaḥ doṣaḥ ghaṭa aṃśaḥ eva paramāṇu saṃyogaḥ vartate na ghaṭaḥ iti katham ghaṭasya parama aṇu tā tarhi ākāśa pradeśāḥ eva alpa alpatara pradeśa saṃyoginaḥ iti te eva tad tad parimāṇāḥ syuḥ nākāśam iti ced na teṣām api ākāśa ātmaka tvāt anyathā saṃyogasya pradeśa vṛtti tvam na syāt vaya āghātāt iti kāla ādau parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ ānantyam upapādya upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_2.2.78cd.1–2.2.78cd.3	 atas na aṇu tva viśrāntiḥ na mahattvasya ca kvacid kvacid kāla ādau traye yat vā anumāna dūṣaṇa upasaṃhāraḥ ayam tatas ca kāla atīta tva dṛṣṭānta doṣau= aparihāryau= iti kāla ākāśa īśvareṣu parimāṇa utkarṣa apakarṣayoḥ ānantyam asti iti uktam na kevalam teṣu eva kintu prakṛti ādau sarva gate parama mahati dravya antare api iti āha ubhaya iti 
NSu_2.2.79ab.1–2.2.79c.2	 ubhaya ānantya yuj tasmāt yadi mukhya mahat bhavet tasmāt iṣu ukta nyāyāt mukhyam mahat parama mahat yadi kāla ādeḥ api ānantyam syāt katham tarhi satyam jñānam anantam brahma iti ānantyam brahmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇa tvena ucyate na hi ati vyāptam lakṣaṇam bhavati iti atas āha tat ca iti tat ca brahma param sākṣāt sarva ānantya yutam sadā param iti kevala arthe yadi api kāla ādikam api anantam tathā api brahma eva tat anantam iti ucyate kutas sākṣāt para anapekṣayā ananta tvāt apara adhīnatva apekṣayā iti yāvat pakṣa antaram āha sarva iti 
NSu_2.2.79d.1–2.2.79d.2	 sarva ānantya yutam sadā na asyām śrutau= ānantya mātram lakṣaṇa tvena ucyate kintu deśataḥ kālataḥ guṇāditaḥ ca tādṛśam ca brahma eva iti na doṣaḥ yathā uktam deśataḥ kālataḥ ca eva guṇataḥ ca tridhā tatiḥ sā samastāḥ hareḥ eva na hi anye pūrṇa sat guṇāḥ a iti pakṣa antaram anvācinoti sadā iti pūrveṇa eva sambandhaḥ tathā ca kālakṣaṇeṣu deśataḥ ananteṣu api na ativyāptiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.79d.3	 paramāṇau= api parimāṇa apakarṣa tāratamya viśrāntiḥ na asti iti uktam tat asat parimāṇasya dravya āśraya tvāt paramāṇutaḥ api apakṛṣṭa parimāṇa āśrayasya dravyasya abhāvāt mā evam paramāṇu bhāgānām sattvāt na ca teṣu viśrāntiḥ teṣām api sa bhāga tvāt aviśrānta bhāga paramparā kutas siddha iti atas sākṣiṇā iti vaktum sākṣī nāma pramāṇam eva na asti iti vadataḥ bādhakam tāvat āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.80a–2.2.80c.3	 yadi sākṣī svayambhātaḥ na mānam kena gamyate akṣa ja ādeḥ ca māna tvam sākṣī nāma mānam yadi na iṣyate tadā akṣaja ādeḥ jñānasya māna tvam caśabdāt bahis kāla ākāśa ādikam antar sukha ādikam ca kena pramāṇena gamyate na kena api tad grāhakasya pramāṇa antarasya abhāvāt na ca tat mā bhūt iti vācyam tadvayava hāra vilaya prasaṅgāt iti 
NSu_2.2.80a–2.2.80c.5	 nanu astu sākṣiṇam anaṅgīkurvāṇasya idam bādhakam sādhakam kim iti atas āha svayambhātaḥ iti yaḥ tu svayam prakāśamāne api sākṣiṇi vipratipadyate saḥ akṣaja ādeḥ mānatvam sa pramāṇakam vastu tvāt ghaṭa vat iti prasaṅga sūcitena anumānena bodhanīyaḥ prasakta pratiṣedhaḥ ca vakṣyamāṇa nyāyena bhaviṣyati dhamiḥ grāhaka pramāṇena eva siddheḥ na tad prāmāṇye pṛthak pramāṇam vaktavyam atas eva mānam iti uktam na sākṣiṇaḥ anabhyupagame api akṣaja ādi jñāna prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇikam prasajyate pravṛtti sāmarthyena tad jātīya tvena vā anumānena tad siddheḥ iti atas āha anavasthā iti 
NSu_2.2.80d.1–2.2.81c.2	 anavasthā athavā bhavet anyathā sākṣītara pramāṇa vedya tva aṅgīkāre tarhi sākṣi prāmāṇyam api anyena grāhyam iti anavasthā eva iti ced na tasya sva prakāśa tvāt iti tat idam uktam svayambhātaḥ iti kim atas yadi evam sākṣī nāma pramāṇam asti iti atas āha atas iti atas sarva padārthānām bhāgāḥ santi eva sarvadā sarva dikṣu api sambandhāt sākṣitaḥ iti arthaḥ sarva padārthānām paramāṇoḥ tad bhāgānām ca iti arthaḥ santi eva iti siddham iti śeṣaḥ yat vā sarva padārthānām iti anena anumānam api sūcayati paramāṇuḥ sabhāgaḥ padārtha tvāt ghaṭa vat iti naca āśraya asiddhiḥ dharmi grāhaka virodhaḥ vā sākṣiṇā paramāṇu siddheḥ ukta tvāt tena ca sabhāga tayā eva siddheḥ na ca evam anumāna vaiyarthyam pramāṇa samplava aṅgīkārāt sabhāga tva mātre vipratipannam prati sārthakyāt ca anumāna antaram āha sarvadā iti 
NSu_2.2.81a–2.2.81c.3	 yugapad iti arthaḥ sarva dikṣu sthitaiḥ dravyaiḥ sambandhāt saṃyogāt api bhāgāḥ santi iti avagamyate yadi api sabhāga tva mātra sādhane saṃyogi tva mātram prayojakam gagana ādīnām api bhāgāṅgīkāreṇa vyabhicāra abhavāt tathā api bahu bhāga sādhanāya viśeṣaṇa upādānam tathā hi paramāṇuḥ daśa bhāgavān yugapad daśa mūrta saṃyogi tvāt ghaṭa vat iti 
NSu_2.2.81a–2.2.81c.4	 nanu dravya tvena eva alam kim saṃyogi tvena vipakṣe bādhaka sūcana artham iti brūmaḥ tathā hi asti tāvat paramāṇoḥ paramāṇu antara saṃyogaḥ anyathā dvayaṇuka ādi ārambha anupapatteḥ na ca ekena eva iti niyamaḥ kāraṇa akāraṇa saṃyoga ja saṃyoga prakriyāyām ekaikasya paramāṇoḥ sajātīya vijātīya paramāṇu dvayena yugapad saṃyogasya ūrarīkṛta tvāt pāṣāṇa ādi madhya vartinaḥ paramāṇoḥ paritas asthitaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ saṃyoga abhāva ādi anupapatteḥ ca na ca mūrtānām yugapad eka deśa avasthānam sambhavati pradeśa vartinaḥ ca saṃyogāḥ sākṣi siddha tvāt ghaṭa ādau tad darśanena ca paramāṇa autat anumānāt ca tathā ca yadi paramāṇuḥ aneka aṃśaḥ na syāt tadā yugapad anekaiḥ na saṃyujyata iti 
NSu_2.2.81a–2.2.81c.6	 nanu saṃyogasya pradeśa vṛtti tvam nāma svātyanta abhāva samāna deśa tvam eva na tu ghaṭa saṃyogaḥ ghaṭa avayave vartate iti tat katham bhāga abhāve saṃyoga anupapattiḥ iti mā evam pratyakṣa ādi siddhasya avaya vṛtti tvasya parityāgena aprāmāṇika vyāhata aṅgīkārasya anucita tvāt vakṣyate ca etat nanu paramāṇuḥ sa avayavaḥ iti sva vyāghātasya mukhyam udāharaṇam yaḥ hi sarvatas apakṛṣṭaḥ yatas paramāṇuḥ na asti tam paramāṇum ācate tasya sāvayava tve avayavinaḥ avayavānām apakṛṣṭa parimāṇa tva avaśyam bhāvāt katham na vyāhatiḥ iti atas āha avibhāgaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.81d.1–2.2.81d.2	 avibhāgaḥ parāṇu tā syāt ayam virodhaḥ yadi idam paramāṇupada pravṛtti nimittam syāt naca evam sa avayava tayā sākṣi siddhe tad asambhavāt kintu avibhāgaḥ parāṇu tā paramāṇu śabda pravṛtti nimittam tathā ca kutas vyāghātaḥ iti nanu avibhāgaḥ iti katham idam vijñāyate sarvathā vibhāga lakṣaṇa guṇa abhāvaḥ iti ced na guṇa ādeḥ api parama aṇu tva prasaṅgāt dravya tve satī iti viśeṣaṇāt adoṣaḥ iti ced na asambhavāt yat kiñcid vibhāga abhāva abhiprāye meru mandarayoḥ api aṇu tva prasaṅgāt avayava vibhāga abhāvaḥ abhimataḥ iti ced na mā evam yasya vibhinna avayaveṣu satsu api teṣām vibhāgaḥ na kadāpi bhavitum arhati sa paramāṇuḥ iti vyākhyānāt etena avayava paramparā viśrama abhāve anavasthā iti api parāḥ tam mūla kṣaya abhāvasya sūcita tvāt 
NSu_2.2.81d.3–2.2.81d.5	 yat vā vibhidyate vibhajyate iti vibhāgaḥ tad abhāvaḥ paramāṇu tā iti yatas sva avayavam vinā svatantram anavayava rūpam apakṛṣṭa parimāṇam na asti sa paramāṇuḥ iti yāvat nanu evam avayava paramparā viśrānti abhāve ananta avayava ārabdha tva aviśeṣāt sarṣapa mahīdharayoḥ parimāṇa aviśeṣaḥ syāt na ca kāraṇa saṅkhayā viśeṣe api tad parimāṇa pracaya viśeṣāt sarṣapa mahīdharayoḥ parimāṇa viśeṣaḥ iti vācyam avayava ānantya sāmye tayoḥ api anupapatteḥ iti ucyate kim ayam prasaṅgaḥ uta anumānam 
NSu_2.2.81d.6	 ādye hi ayam arthaḥ yadi sarṣapa mahīdharau= aviśrānta avayava parasparau syātām tadā ananta avayava ārabdhau prasajya iyātāt tathā ca sama parimāṇau bhavetām iti tatra ubhayatra api vyāpti abhāvaḥ yat aviśrānta avayava parasparam tad anantā avayava ārabdham yat ca evam tad tulya parimāṇam iti kinnāma bhavatā upalabdham kiñca avayava paramparā viśrānti abhāva te sarve api sambhūya anantāḥ syuḥ saṣarpa mahīdhara ārambhakāṇām ānantyam tu kutas atas eva dvitīya prasaṅgasya āpādaka asiddhiḥ etena avayava paramparā viśrānti abhāve sama saṅkhayā avayava ārabdha tvam tatas ca avayava parimāṇa ādi viśeṣa abhāve parimāṇa aviśeṣaḥ syāt iti iti api parāḥ tam vyāpti asiddheḥ sama saṅkhayā avayava ārabdha tva asiddheḥ ca 
NSu_2.2.81d.7	 dvitīye tu idam uktam syāt sarṣapa mahīdharau na ananta avayava ārabdhau visadṛśa parimāṇa tvāt vimatau na aviśrānta avayava paramparau ananta avayavān ārabdha tvāt iti ādye siddha sādhanam na hi sarṣapa ādeḥ avayava paramparā viśrānti abhāva ādinā ananta avayava ārabdha tvam aṅgīkṛtam kintu sambhūtānām ananta tvam tad abhāva sādhane mām prati dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ guṇa ādau sādhana abhāvāt dvitīyasya tu aprayojaka tā iti 
NSu_2.2.81d.8	 syāt etat sarṣapa avayava paramparāyāḥ niravadhika tve mūrtānām samāna deśa tva anupapattau sarṣapa avayavaiḥ jagati vyāpte viśva vyāpī sarṣapaḥ syāt iti mahīdharasya anavakāśaḥ eva iti āpādana artham iti ced na pārthiva parama aṇūnām ananta tve api sa mūrta antara avakāśa darśanāt sarṣapaḥ yāvantam deśam avaṣṭabhya vartamānaḥ dṛśyate tāvatī eva anavadhikāyāḥ api tad avayava paramparāyāḥ avasthānāt ca atas eva hi ākāśa ādīnām api anavadhikam aṃśa paramparām upetya tatra parimāṇa apakarṣa ānantyam upapāditam 
NSu_2.2.81d.9–2.2.81d.10	 nanu mā bhūt sākṣāt sarṣapa mahīdhara ārambhakāṇām sama saṅkhayatvam tathā api avayava paramparāyāḥ viśrānti abhāve sambhūta avayavānām sama saṅkhaya tvāt parimāṇa bhedaḥ na syāt iti ced na ānantye api tāratamya sambhavāt anantāḥ hi pārthiva paramāṇavaḥ anantāḥ ca antya viśeṣāḥ na ca te sama saṅkhayāḥ tathā satyā api aparamāṇuṣu tad abhāva āpātāt tathā sarva kalpeṣu saṃsāriṇaḥ anantāḥ tathā api apavarga vaśāt tāratamyam upeyam eva evam anekam udāharaṇam iti yat etat sūtra kṛtā parimāṇa asamavāyi kāraṇa viṣaye dūṣaṇam uktam tad upalakṣaṇa mātram anyatra api asamavāyi kāraṇe svayam dūṣaṇāni ūhanīyāni iti āśayavān dravya asam avāyi kāraṇa saṃyoga viṣaye anyathāpratipattim nirākaroti tad saṃyogāt iti 
NSu_2.2.82ab.1–2.2.82ab.3	 tad saṃyogāt aniyatāt padārthānām janiḥ bhavet avayava saṃyogaḥ dravya asamavāyi kāraṇam iti vadantaḥ api vaiśeṣika ādayaḥ paramāṇu kārya utpattau dvayoḥ eva sajātīyayoḥ eva paramāṇvoḥ eva saṃyogasya kāraṇa tvam iti ādya cakṣate tat aśraddheyam kinnāma teṣām kāraṇānām aniyatāt ukta niyama rahitāt saṃyogāt padārthānām dravyāṇām janiḥ bhavet kiñcid kāryam dvayoḥ paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogāt upajāyate tat dvayaṇukam ucyate kadācid trayāṇām tad tri aṇukam caturbhiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ ārabdham caturuṇukam evam anyat api tathā kiñcid sajātīyayoḥ paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogāt kiñcid vijātīyayoḥ evam kiñcid paramāṇvoḥ eva saṃyogāt kiñcid paramāṇu dvayaṇukayoḥ ityādi evam dvayaṇuka kārya utpatta śavapya niyamaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ kutas iti ced ukta niyame pramāṇa abhāvāt iti āha dvayoḥ eva iti 
NSu_2.2.82cd.1–2.2.82cd.2	 dvayoḥ eva tu saṃyogaḥ iti kena avasīyate tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa arthaḥ tena sajātīyayoḥ paramāṇvoḥ iti niyamaḥ labhyate saṃyogaḥ ādi kāryasya asamavāyi kāraṇam iti śeṣaḥ kena pramāṇena iti ākṣepe upalakṣaṇam etat trayāṇām eva dvayaṇukānām iti api draṣṭavyam nanu sāvayavasya aneka saṃyogaḥ sambhavati paramāṇuḥ tu niravayavaḥ iti dvayoḥ eva iti niyama siddhiḥ iti ukta uttaram niravayava tve dvayoḥ api saṃyogaḥ na sambhavati saṃyogasya aṃśa vṛtti tvāt 
NSu_2.2.82cd.3–2.2.82cd.4	 nanu sajātīya saṃyogaḥ eva ārambhakaḥ iti niyamaḥ na niṣpramāṇakaḥ paramāṇu kārye gandha ādi utpatteḥ eva tatra pramāṇa tvāt tathā hi pārthiva apya paramāṇubhyām yadi ekam kāryam utpadyate tadā tad agandham asneham āpadyeta pārthiva taijasābhyām utpannam agandha rūpam utpadyeta ekasya gandha ādeḥ anārambhaka tvāt atas gandha ādi utpattyā eva sajātīya saṃyogasya ārambhaka tva siddhiḥ iti atas āha kāraṇasya iti 
NSu_2.2.83ab.1–2.2.83ab.2	 kāraṇasya guṇāḥ tena bhaveyuḥ kārya gāḥ api tena iti dvayoḥ eva iti niyama abhāvena iti arthaḥ syāt etat vijātīya ārambhaka tve bādhakam yadi dvayoḥ eva paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogaḥ kārya ārambhakaḥ iti niyamaḥ pramāṇavān syāt na ca evam tathā ca bahūnām paramāṇūnām vijātīyānām saṃyoga āta kārya ārambhe kāraṇa gatā gandha ādayaḥ guṇāḥ sajātīyāḥ santaḥ kārya gata gandha ādi ārambhakāḥ api bhaveyuḥ kaḥ doṣaḥ 
NSu_2.2.83ab.3	 nanu aniyama vādinā dvaya saṃyogasya ārambhaka tvam tāvat iṣyate tatra vijātīyayoḥ ārambhaka tve kārye gandha ādi anutpattiḥ prasajyate iti ced na ekaikasya api gandha ādeḥ ārambhaka tve bādhaka abhāvāt apekṣaṇīya antara abhāvāt santa utpatti prasaṅgaḥ bādhakaḥ iti ced na kārya dravya utpatteḥ apekṣaṇīya tvāt samavāyi kāraṇa abhāve kārya anutpādāt anyathā aneka gandha ādi abhyupagame api samānaḥ doṣaḥ 
NSu_2.2.83ab.4	 etat ca paramatarī itya uktam vastutas tu yatas kāraṇāni eva kārya akāreṇa utpadyante tena kāraṇa guṇāḥ eva kārya gāḥ bhaveyuḥ tatas ca vijātīya ārambhaka tve kaḥ doṣaḥ evam tarhi pṛthivī tva ādi jāti saṅkaraḥ syāt iti ced tatas kim vyavahāra vilopaḥ syāt iti ced na vaiśeṣyāt tu tad vāde a iti parihariṣyamāṇa tvāt tathā api sampratipannasajātīya ārabdha dṛṣṭāntena vipratipannānām api sajātīya ārabdha tvam anumāsyate iti ced na vijātīya ārambhaka tvasya sākṣi ādi pramāṇa siddha tvena bādhāt 
NSu_2.2.83ab.5	 syāt etat yadi bahūnām paramāṇūnām saṃyogasya ārambhaka tvam syāt naca evam ārambhaka saṅkhayā apakarṣa tāratamyam kvacid viśrāntam tāratamya tvāt parimāṇa tāratamyāt iti anumānena ārambhaka saṅkhayā apakarṣasya kvacid viśrānti siddhau= ekasya ārambhaka tve santata utpatti ādi prasaṅgāt tri ādi kalpane gauravāt dvayoḥ eva paramāṇvoḥ saṃyogaḥ dravya ārambhakaḥ iti niyama siddheḥ iti atas āha tāratamya iti 
NSu_2.2.83cd.1–2.2.83cd.2	 tāratamyena sarve api mahāntaḥ ca aṇavaḥ yatas yatas kāraṇāt tāratamyena sarve api arthāḥ mahāntaḥ ca aṇavaḥ ca samathiḥ tāḥ tatas parimāṇa tāratamya vat iti dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvāt dvayoḥ eva tu saṃyogaḥ itrata kena avasīyate iti sambandhaḥ kiñca anena eva nyāyena dvayaṇuka dvaya saṃyogasya api ārambhaka tvam kim na iṣyate bahutva abhāve kārya mahat tva anupapatti prasaṅgāt iti ced na yatas tāratamyena sarve api mahāntaḥ ca aṇavaḥ ca samarthitāḥ tena dvayaṇuka mahat tvāt tad utpatti upapatteḥ paramāṇu dvaya ārabdha kārya dṛṣṭāntena sarvatra anumāne tu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.83cd.3–2.2.84ab.3	 astu evam ukta niyameṣu pramāṇa abhāvaḥ tathā api aniyama sṛṣṭau kim mānam iti ced sākṣī tāvat loṣṭha ādi kārya aṇām aniyata saṅkhayaiḥ vijātīya eviḥ sadṛśaiḥ ca ārambha darśanena anumānam ca āgamāḥ ca atra bahulam bhavanti tad darśanam bhrāntiḥ iti ced kim niyama grāhaka pramāṇa virodhāt evam ucyate uta kevalayā vaiśeṣika ādi kalpanayā virodhāt ādyam dūṣayati na ca iti na ca tad prokta sṛṣṭau tu mānam sajātīyābhyām eva dvābhyām eva paramāṇubhyām eva ityādi niyamavatyām tad prokta sṛṣṭau tu mānam na asti tat sākṣī ādi siddhasya asmad abhimata sṛṣṭi prakārasya bādhakam syāt tathā ca uktam dvitīyam dūṣayati kevala iti 
NSu_2.2.84b–2.2.84b–2.2.84d.3^1	 kevala kalpanā katham sākṣi mitasya asya śaknuyāt vāraṇe kvacid nirmūlā iti arthaḥ sākṣī iti upalakṣaṇam asya aniyama ārambhasya kalpanā mātrasya prāmāṇika nivāraka tve ati prasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ atra tad prokta sṛṣṭau= iti sāmānyatas vadatā anyat api tat kalpitam aprāmāṇikam iti sūcitam tathā ahi prakṛtem arhāt mahataḥ ahaṅkāraḥ ahaṅkārāt krameṇa ākāśa ādīni mahābhūtāni a iti etām śruti ādi prasiddhām prakriyām apahāya vāyu ādīnām caturṇām anyonya anapekṣā eva sṛṣṭiḥ vyutkrameṇa ca abhihitā vinā eva bādhakenaa ākāśāt vāyuḥ vāyoḥ agniḥa ityādi pañcamī bhāktī svīkṛtā atyantā asataḥ eva ca janiḥ aṅgīkṛtā sarvā api sṛṣṭiḥ sama vāyi ādi kāraṇa traya adhīna abhyupagatā tatra samavāyi kāraṇam samavāya aprāmāṇika tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt ayuktam atas eva asamavāyi kāraṇam api tad adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt ca tad lakṣaṇasya samavāyi nimittayoḥ ati vyāpteḥ ca tathā hi tantu paṭayoḥ utpannasya dvi tvasya paṭaḥ samavāyi kāraṇam 
NSu_2.2.84b–2.2.84d.3^2	 sa ca dvi tva samavāyi kāraṇe tantau samaveta tvāt samavāyi kāraṇa pratyāsannaḥ samavāyi kāraṇa tayā avadhṛta sāmarthyaḥ ca śarīra ātmanoḥ utpannasya dvi tvasya apekṣā buddhiḥ nimittam sā ca dvi tva samavāyi kāraṇāt samaveta tvāt nimitta tvāt ca ukta lakṣaṇa sampannāḥ samavāyi kāraṇa pratyāsanna tayā sāmarthya avadhāraṇam abhimatam na ca tathā prakṛtaḥ iti ced tathā api vyāpya buddheḥ vyāpaka buddhim prati viṣaya buddheḥ dharma adharmayoḥ ca sukha duḥkhe pratyasamavāyi kāraṇa tva āpatteḥ na hi anya gatam vyāpya buddhayā ādi anya gatasya vyāpaka buddhayā ādeḥ nimittam bhavati ātmani pradeśa bhedāt na iti ced na ādya ādi śabdānām dvitīya ādi śabda samavāyi kāraṇa tva abhāva āpatteḥ eka ākāśa gata tvena tad sambhave prakṛte api samānam 
NSu_2.2.84b–2.2.84d.6	 evam anyatra api ativyāptiḥ ūhanīyāḥ saṅketaḥ ayam ācāryasya atas na atīva atra nirbandhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ iti ced evam tarhi nimūlā eva iyam prakriyā iti siddham eva pākaja prakriyām ca aprāmāṇikam aṅgīkurvanti tat ca vakṣyate iti alam nanu paramāṇu dvayaṇuke eva tāvat na sākṣi siddhe kutas tadīya ārambha prakāraḥ tat katham uktam sākṣi mitasya iti tatra āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.85a.1–2.2.85a.2	 yadi sākṣi mitam na etat etat iti paramāṇu ādikam tarhi tat aprāmāṇikam eva āpadyate iti śeṣaḥ syāt etat yadi api mahat tva abhāvāt na paramāṇu ādikam cakṣuḥ ādeḥ gocaraḥ bahis svātantryāt manasaḥ api āgama ādi tu na anumānāt bhidyate bhede api atīndriye saṅketa anupapatteḥ na āgamasya viṣayaḥ tathā api anumānam tatra bhaviṣyati tat katham paramāṇu ādeḥ sa akṣi vedya tva abhāve aprāmāṇika tva āpattiḥ iti atas āha na iti 
NSu_2.2.85b.1–2.2.85cd.3	 na anumā tatra vartate katham iti ced kim paramāṇu ādikam eva pakṣīkṛtya tat sādhyate uta anyat ādye tad pramāṇa antarataḥ siddham na vā pakṣa dvaye doṣam āha pakṣīkartum iti pakṣīkartum aśakyatvāt kutas eva anumā bhavet siddha tve pakṣa lakṣaṇa abhāvāt asiddha tve nyāya aviṣaya tvāt paramāṇu ādeḥ pakṣīkaṛtum aśakyatvāt tad pakṣīkāreṇa anumā dūra nirastā iti nanu pakṣīkaraṇa asambhave katham anumāna anupapattiḥ iti atas āha yatra iti 
NSu_2.2.86ab.1–2.2.86ab.4	 yatra na asti padanyāsaḥ kaḥ tam viṣayam āpnuyāt yathā tathā iti adhyāhartavyam yatra yat viṣaye viṣayam deśam yathā hi viṣaya prāpteḥ pada nyāsaḥ kāraṇam sthāṇu asthāṇu saṃyogasya āstha aṇu kriyā hetu tvāt atas pada nyāsa abhāve viṣaya prāptiḥ api na asti tathā anumā utpattau pakṣīkaraṇam kāraṇam na hi parvata ādiḥ vā vahnaya ādiḥ vā anumānasya viṣayaḥ kintu tad sambandhaḥ na ca sambandhi jñānena vinā sambandha jñānam sambhavati atas pakṣīkaraṇa abhāve na anumāna utpattiḥ sambhavati iti dvitīyam api nirākaroti pakṣīkartum iti dvayaṇukam hi pakṣīkṛtya paramāṇuḥ anumātavyaḥ kāryam eva atra pramāṇam iti ukta tvāt tat ca idānīm api asiddham iti pakṣīkaṛtum aśakyatvāt kutas eva tad kāraṇa paramāṇu anumā bhavet anumitam dvayaṇukam pakṣīkṛtya paramāṇuḥ anumāsyate iti ced na 
NSu_2.2.86ab.5	 tat api hi paramāṇum pakṣīkṛtya yadi sādhyate tadā uktaḥ eva doṣaḥ iti āha pakṣīkartum iti adya api asiddhasya paramāṇoḥ pakṣīkaṛtum aśakyatvāt kutas eva tad kāyardvayaṇukā anumā bhavet nanu aṇu parimāṇa tāratamyam kvacid viśrāntam parimāṇa tāratamya tvāt mahat parimāṇa tāratamya vat iti anumānena paramāṇu siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced na vikalpa anupapatteḥ aṇu parimāṇa śabdena kim parimāṇa apakarṣaḥ abhidhīyate kiṃvā paramāṇu parimāṇam yat vā dvayaṇuka parimāṇam yadi vā ubhaya parimāṇam na ādyaḥ dūṣita tvāt uttara pakṣa trayam dūṣayati pakṣīkartum iti paramāṇu dvayaṇu kayoḥ asiddhau tad parimāṇasya api asiddheḥ eka ekatra tāratamyasya abhāvāt ca iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.2.86ab.6	 yat idam jāla sūrya marīci stham sarvatas sūkṣmatamam rajaḥ upalabhyate tat tri aṇukam iti ucyate tat idam mahat cākṣuṣa dravya tvāt ghaṭa vat kāryam ca mahat tve sati cākṣuṣa tvāt mahatve sati kriyāva tvāt vā sa avayavam ca kārya dravya tvāt tad avayavāḥ ca dvayaṇuka nāmānaḥ te api kāryāḥ sa avayavāḥ ca mahat dravya ārambhaka tvāt tantu vat yaḥ ca tad avayavaḥ saḥ eva paramāṇuḥ tad avayava kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt bādhaka sadbhāvāt ca atas anumānena eva paramāṇu dvayaṇuka siddhiḥ iti atas āha pakṣīkartum iti pratyakṣasya tri aṇukasya eva parama aṇu tva sambhavena tad kāryatva sāvayava tva sādhānāya pakṣīkartum aśakyatvāt kutas eva dvayaṇuka paramāṇu oḥ anumā bhavet 
NSu_2.2.86ab.7^1	 mahat tvāt katham asau paramāṇuḥ iti ced na mahat tva asiddheḥ cākṣuṣa dravya tvāt tad siddhiḥ iti ced na kasyacid amahataḥ api cākṣuṣa tve bādhaka abhāvāt mahat tvam ca dravya cākṣuṣa tāyām kāraṇam iti ced satyam kvacid anyat api kāraṇam kalpayiṣyate gauravam tathā sati syāt iti ced na dharmi kalpanātaḥ dharma mātra kalpanāyāḥ laghu tvāt astu vā mahat tvam tathā api aṇu tvena tasya samāveśe kaḥ virodhaḥ kāryatva sādhanam ca aprayojakam mahataḥ api ātmanaḥ pratyakṣa vat cākṣuṣa tva upapatteḥ parama mahat tva abhāvena kriyā sambhavāt ca mahat tvasya kāraṇa bahu tvam kāraṇam iti ced na nitya tva upapatteḥ cākṣuṣa mahat tvāt na iti ced na bādhaka abhāvāt atas eva kārya dravya tvam asiddham 
NSu_2.2.86ab.7^2–2.2.86ab.8	 santu vā tad avayavāḥ te eva paramāṇavaḥ iti teṣām punar avayava sādhanāya pakṣīkaṛtum aśakyatvāt kutas eva anumā bhavet nanu mahat dravya ārambhaka tvāt te api sā avayavāḥ eva iti ced na niravayavasya mahat dravya ārambhaka tve bādhaka abhāvāt bahu tvena eva mahat tva ārambha upapatteḥ dravya ārambhe sāvayavatsya anupayogāt santu vā dvayaṇuka avayavāḥ te api kutas paramāṇavaḥ mahat dravya ārambhaka tvena teṣām api sāvayavatva anumānāt anavasthā bādhikā iti ced na tad avayavānām tad avayava avayavānām vā niravayava tvena tad viśrānteḥ katham ca iyam anavasthā dūṣaṇam meru sarṣapa ādīnām sama parimāṇa tva āpattiḥ tu dūṣitāḥ ghaṭa ādi kārya anutpattiḥ iti ced na sāvayavasya eva nitya tva upapatteḥ yathā uktam avibhāgaḥ paramāṇu tā iti evam paramāṇu dvayaṇukayoḥ anumānataḥ siddhim apākṛtya prasaṅgāt ākāśa ādi parimāṇa utkarṣa ānantyasya anumānika tvam na yujyate iti yat uktam tat prapañcayati deśa antarā iti 
NSu_2.2.86cd.1–2.2.86cd.2	 deśa antara ādi śabdaḥ ca śaśaśṛṅga ādi śabda vat yaḥ ayam yojana ādi paricchinnaḥ deśaḥ sampratipannaḥ sa svatas sthūlena deśa antareṇa yuktaḥ deśa tvāt hasta ādi deśa vat iti ādi anumānaiḥ khalu ākāśa ādi parimāṇa utkarṣa ānantyam sādhanīyam te ete deśa antara ādi śabdāḥ deśa antara ādi sādhaka anumāna prayogāḥ śaśaśṛṅga ādi śabda vat śaśaśṛṅga ādi sādhaka anumāna prayogaiḥ tulyam vartante anena eva prakāreṇa śaśaśṛṅga ādikam api anumātum śakyate iti yāvat śabda mātram eva etat na tu anumānam iti sūcayitum śabdāḥ iti uktam na kevalam ākāśa ādīnām parimāṇa utkarṣa ānantya anumānam pratipakṣa parāhatam api tu sampratipannāni sarva śṛṅgviśṛṅga antaravanti śṛṅga tvāt go śṛṅga vat vimatāḥ sarve putrāḥ putra antara upetāḥ putra tvāt devadatta putra vat iti śaśaśṛṅga ādi sādhaka anumāna ābhāsa samāna yogakṣemam ca iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.86cd.3	 na vayam evam ākāśa ādi parimāṇa utkarṣa ānantyam anumimīmahe yena atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt kintu vipratipannaḥ deśaḥ svatas sthūlena sadṛśena sajātīyena vā dravya antareṇa yuktaḥ deśa tvāt hasta ādi deśa vat saḥ api evam saḥ api evam evam kāle api anumātavyam na ca evam śaśaśṛṅga anumānam śakyam tasya atyanta asataḥ anupalabhyamānasya gavā ādi śṛṅgeḥ sādṛśya sājātyayoḥ abhāvāt na caḥ ākāśa ādeḥ api eka eka tvāt sādṛśya ādi a bhāvaḥ aupādhika bhedena tat upapatteḥ iti atas āha sadṛśam ca iti 
NSu_2.2.87ab.1–2.2.87ab.3	 sadṛśam ca sajātīyam na asmad pakṣe kim eva hi sampratipanna deśa ādinā sadṛśam sajātīyam vā asmad pakṣe gagana ādi parimāṇa utkarṣa ānantyam anabhyupagacchatām pakṣe kim eva na bhavati kintu bhavati eva iti tathā ca sampratipanna deśasya tatas sthūlena ātmanā sadṛśena sajātīyena vā upeta tvasya siddha tvāt siddha sādhana tā syāt ākāśa ādi parimāṇa utkarṣa ānantyā siddheḥ artha antara tā ca iti sampratipanna deśasya īśvara ādimattvam bādhitam sambandha abhāvāt iti ced na deśa antareṇa api sambandha abhāvāt etena śaśa viṣāṇa ādi sādhaka anumāne api bādha abhidhānam parāḥ tam deśa antara anumāne api sāmyāt tat evam paramāṇu dvayaṇu kayoḥ ākāśa ādi parimāṇa utkarṣa antyasya ca sākṣi siddha tām anaṅgīkṛtya kevala anumāna vedya tva svīkaraṇam anupapannam iti uktam evam āgamam anādṛtya īśvara dharma ādi anumānam api ayuktam iti prasaṅgāt āha yena eva iti 
NSu_2.2.87c–2.2.87f.3	 yena eva ca prakāreṇa atya siddham anumīyate tena eva śaśa śṛṅga ādeḥ śakyam astitva kalpanam atyasiddham iti anena āgamānādaram darśayati śaśaśṛṅga ādeḥ iti a prāmāṇikasya upalakṣaṇam etat ca tatra tatra leśataḥ darśitam na śaśaśṛṅga ādi anumāna pratibandī grasta tva mātreṇa eteṣām anumānānām aprāmāṇyam yuktam tathā sati dhūma anumānasya api aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt tatra api hi śakyate vaktum yadi dhūmavat tvāt pavartaḥ agnimān= tadā paśu tvāt śaśaḥ api viṣāṇavān yasyāt iti atha ucyeta tulya yogakṣema tve hi pratibandī grahaḥ anyathā ati prasaṅgāt na ca atra tulya yogakṣema tā dhūma anumānasya vyāpti ādi sāmarthya sahita tvāt śaśaśṛṅga ādi anumānasya tad abhāvāt iti samam etat prakṛte api prastuta anumānānām api vyāpti ādimattvāt ityataḥ āha pratyakṣam iti 
NSu_2.2.88.1–2.2.88.3^1	 pratyakṣam āgamaḥ vā api bhavet yatra niyāmakaḥ sā eva vyāptiḥ bhavet mānam na anyā sandigdha mūlataḥ vā śabdaḥ samuccaye apiḥ anumānasya samuccaya arthaḥ niyāmakaḥ grāhakaḥ mānam anumāna mānatva upayoginī anyā pratyakṣa ādya gṛhītā sandigdha mūlataḥ sandigdha vyabhicāra tvataḥ avyabhicāraḥ hi sāhityasya vyāpti tve mūlam tatra pratyakṣa gṛhītā vyāptiḥ yathā dhūmasya agninā āgama gṛhītā yathā brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ iti anumāna gṛhītā yathā vyatireki prayoge etat uktam bhavati pratyakṣa ādi avadhṛtam hi vyāpti ādi anumāna māna aṅgam na svaya mātra siddham sandigdha vyabhicāri tvāt samayānām sandigdha mūla tvāt ca 
NSu_2.2.88.1–2.2.88.3^2	 vidyate ca dhūma ādi anumānānām pramāṇa avadhṛtam vyāpti ādi iti na pratibandī graha mātreṇa tad bhaṅgaḥ na paramāṇu ādi anumānānām iti pratibandī grasta tvāt aprāmāṇyam eva nanu vyāpti ādi abhāve kim pratibandī graheṇa tatas eva aprāmāṇya siddheḥ iti satyam pratyakṣa ādyanavadhṛta vyāpti ādeḥ api prāmāṇye ati prasaṅgaḥ vā tad aprāmāṇye dṛṣṭāntaḥ vā pratibandī graheṇa dyotyate iti adoṣaḥ iti satyam etat pratyakṣa ādi avadhṛtā eva vyāptiḥ anumāna prāmāṇya upayoginī iti sā ca dhūma anumāvat paramāṇu ādi anumāneṣu api asti eva dhūmasya agninā iva mahat ārambhaka tva ādīnām api sāvayava tva ādinā sāhitya darśanāt iti atas āha saha iti 
NSu_2.2.89ab.1–2.2.89ab.4	 saha darśana mātreṇa na vyāptiḥ avasīyate na dhūma ādīm ā api agni ādibhiḥ saha darśana mātreṇa vyāptiḥ avasīyate yena mahat ārambhaka tva ādīnām api sāvayava tva ādibhiḥ tatas avasīyeta tathā sati agni ādīnām dhūma ādibhiḥ api vyāpti adhyavasāya prasaṅgāt saha darśana mātrasya tatra api sattvāt vyabhicāra anupalambhe sati sāhitya darśanam vyāpti adhyavasāya hetuḥ iti ced kim sakala deśa kāla niṣṭhaḥ anupalambhaḥ kim vā tad viśeṣa niṣṭhaḥ na ādyaḥ asmad ādya śakya tvāt na dvitīyaḥ atiprasaṅgāt iti katham tarhi vyāpti adhyavasāyaḥ syāt iti atas āha yadā eva iti 
NSu_2.2.89c–2.2.89f.3	 yadā eva avyatirekasya hi akṣa jam vā āgamaḥ bhavet tad nirdhārita yuktiḥ vā vyāptiḥ sā eva aparāḥ nahi avyatireke sādhya abhimata vyatirekeṇa asattve asya sādhana abhimatasya dharmasya yukteḥ vyāpti niścaya hetu tve anavasthā nāt tad vayā āpteḥ api yukti antareṇa niścetavya tvāt iti atas uktam tat nirdhāritā iti vyāpti śabdaḥ adhyāhāryaḥ tena pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā nirdhārita vyāptikā iti arthaḥ aparā sāhitya darśana mātra nibandhanā na hi 
NSu_2.2.89c–2.2.89f.4	 ayam arthaḥ niyataḥ sambandhaḥ hi vyāptiḥ na sambandha mātram niyamaḥ ca vyabhicāra abhāvaḥ atas sāhityaḥ iva vyabhicāra abhāve api pramāṇa pravṛttau vyāpti siddhiḥ na ca etat aśakyam anum iti anudaye sarva vyavahāra vilopa prasaṅgena kārya darśanāt eva tad siddheḥ prakāraḥ tu cintyate tatra dhūmasya agninā sambandhaḥ tāvat pratyakṣeṇa avagamyate paricita deśa kālayoḥ vyabhicāraḥ ca na avagamyate deśa antara ādi gate tu vyabhicāre sandehaḥ avaśiṣyate sa ca na tā= at vayabhicāra cihna darśana janyaḥ kintu bhūyas sahacarita tayā dṛṣṭāḥ adṛṣṭa vyabhicārāḥ api dharmāḥ vyabhicāriṇaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ dharmaḥ ca ayam iti evam utpadyate tatra yadi ayam etat saha vṛtti svabhāvaḥ tadā anyatra api saha eva varteta svabhāvasya anapāyāt yadi ca asaha vṛtti svabhāvaḥ tadā atrā api na saha varteta asaha vṛtti svabhāvasya api saha vṛttiḥ nimitta antara āyattā ced atra upalabhyeta saha vṛtti svabhāvasya api nimitta antarā dvayabhicāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti tu nirbījā śaṅkām na udeti eva sarva vyavahāra abhāva prasaṅgāt 
NSu_2.2.89c–2.2.89f.6	 tat evam mīmāṃsā saha kṛtam pratyakṣam dhūmasya agni sambandham gṛhṇa dvaya bhicāra abhāvam api ākalayati iti vyāptim avadhārayati eva anumāna āgamābhyām tu vyāpti graha prakāraḥ su grahaḥ eva iti nanu anena eva nyāyena mahat ārambhaka tva ādīnām api vyāpti niścaya sambhavāt katham paramāṇu ādau= anumāna apravṛttiḥ iti ced na pakṣa itara tvasya upādhi tva sambhavena vyabhicāra abhāvā niścayāt atha tasya upādhi tvam na asti iti ucyeta dāta bādhakam āha anyathā iti 
NSu_2.2.90.1–2.2.90.2	 anyathā saptama rasa bhavaḥ api anumayā apatet aniṣṭāni ca sarvāṇi hi anumā kāma cāriṇī pakṣa itara tvasya upādhitām anādṛtya pramāṇa antara asaha kṛtena eva anumānena paramāṇu ādi siddhayabhyupagamaḥ iti arthaḥ madhuraḥ rasaḥ lavaṇa ādi rasa pañcaka vyatirikta rasa anyonya abhāvavān rasa tvāt lavaṇāt itya ādi anumayāḥ aniṣyāni ca sarvāṇi dahana śaitya ādīni āpateyuḥ kutas yasmāt evaṃvidhā anumā kāma cāriṇī nanu ca saptama rasa ādeḥ anupalambha ādi bādhita tvāt pakṣa itara tva upādhi duṣṭa tvam anumānānām iti ced samam prakṛte api paramāṇu ādeḥ api anupalambha bādhita tvāt ayogyam tat iti ced tulyam saptama rasa ādau= api anumāna prāmāṇye saptama rasa ādi siddhau= ayogya tvam kalpyam kalpite ca tasmin= anumāna prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti anyonya āśraya tvam iti ced etat api tādṛś eva anupabhogyasya saptama rasa ādeḥ kalpane gauravam iti ced samādhi sāmyam pramite na gauravam doṣaḥ iti etat api samānam tasmāt paramāṇu ādeḥ sākṣi vedya tvam aṅgīkṛtya pratibandī mocanīyā iti katham na tasya sa akṣi vedya tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.90.3–2.2.90.5	 samavāya abhyupagamāt ca sāmyāt anavasthiteḥ samavāya abhyupagamāt ca sāmyāt anavasthiteḥ ubhayathā api na karma atas tad abhāvaḥ iti sūtram tat nityam eva ca bhāvāt a iti āgāmi sūtra vyākhyānena eva vyākhyātam bhaviṣyati iti manvānaḥ tad apahāya hetu antareṇa vaiśeṣika ādi samayam apākurvan samavāya abhyupagamāt ca sāmyāt anavasthiteḥ a iti etat sūtram vyācaṣṭe kāryā iti 
NSu_2.2.91a.1–2.2.91a.3	 kārya kāraṇayoḥ ca eva samavāyaḥ īryate iti vakṣyamāṇam atra api sambaddhayate anena samavāya pratipādakam pareṣāniha iti yatas kārya kāraṇayoḥ sa samavāyaḥ a iti sūtram arthataḥ anuvadati atra kārya kāraṇa śabda avayava avayavi vācakau tau ca upalakṣaṇa parau= iti sūcanā arthaḥ ca śabdaḥ eva śabdaḥ samavāyasya iha pratyasiddhatvam sūcayati tat etat svayam eva vivṛṇoti guṇa ādeḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.91b–2.2.91d.3	 guṇa ādeḥ pañcakasya ca bhinnasya eva tu sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ anyaḥ īryate guṇa ādeḥ pañcakasya iti guṇa avayavi kriyā sāmānya viśeṣaṇām iti arthaḥ caśabdena guṇyādi pañcakasya ca iti samuccinoti nanu guṇa guṇyādikam abhinnam bhinna abhinnam vā tat kim samavāyena iti atas uktam bhinnasya eva iti tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa arthaḥ na yayoḥ kayoḥ cidguṇa guṇinoḥ samavāyaḥ kintu ayuta siddhayoḥ eva iti sa guṇa guṇyādi svabhāvaḥ eva ced na padārtha antara siddhiḥ iti atas uktam anyaḥ iti īryate vaiśeṣika ādibhiḥ atas api tad darśanam ayuktam iti śeṣaḥ ayam arthaḥ vaiśeṣika ādayaḥ avayava avayavinoḥ guṇa guṇinoḥ kriyā kriyā vatoḥ jāti vyaktayoḥ viśeṣa nitya dravyayoḥ atyanta bhedam abhyupagamya atyanta bhinnam eva samavāya ākhyam sambandham abhyupagacchanti tatas api anupapanna bhāṣiṇaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.91b–2.2.91d.4	 nanu ca guṇa guṇyādīnām atyanta bhedaḥ tāvat vaya padeśa bheda ādi pramāṇa siddhaḥ anyathā stambha kumbha ādīnām api atyanta bhedaḥ na syāt asti ca iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ iha paṭe rūpam iha mūrte karma iha gavi go tvam iha nitya dravye viśeṣaḥ iti abādhitaḥ pratyayaḥ na ca iha idam iti pratyayaḥ vinā atiriktena sambandhena upapadyate iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi iti pratyayasya saṃyoga pūrvakatva darśanāt sa ca ayam ayuta siddhayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti saṃyogāt bhidyate yuta siddhayoḥ hi sambandhaḥ saṃyogaḥ dravya mātra vṛttiḥ ca tat evam pramitasya samavāyasya abhyupagame katham ayukta vādi tvam vaiśeṣika ādīnām iti atas āha bhinna tvā iti 
NSu_2.2.92ab.1–2.2.92ab.3	 bhinna tva sāmyataḥ tasya tābhyām yogaḥ bhavet dhruvam bhinna tu a sāmyate iti upalakṣaṇam ihapratyaya sāmyataḥ ca iti api draṣṭavyam tasya samavāyasya tābhyām avayava avayavi ādi sambandhibhyām saha yogaḥ sambandhaḥ etat uktam bhavati iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ ityādi pratyayaḥ sambandha pūrvakaḥ abādhita iha pratyaya tvāt iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi iti pratyaya vat iti samavāyam anumimānena yaḥ abādhita iha pratyayaḥ sa sambandha pūrvakaḥ iti vyāptiḥ avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīyāḥ vidyate ca iha tantu paṭayoḥ samavāyaḥ iti abādhiteha pratyayaḥ tena samavāyasya api tantu paṭābhyām samavāyaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ eva syāt na ca abhyupagamyate atas tatra anaikāntikam anumānam iti 
NSu_2.2.92ab.4–2.2.92ab.5	 nanu tantu paṭayoḥ samavāyaḥ siddhaḥ na vā siddhaḥ ced kim uttara kāla bhāvinānaikāntyena nacet kvana aikāntyam mā evam āpātatas pratīte sambandhe vyabhicāram dṛṣṭvā parāvṛtteḥ āvaśyaka tvasya vivakṣita tvāt nanu atra bhinna tva sāmyam kim artham upanyastam na hi bhinna tvam hetūkṛtam iti satyam abādhita tvad yotana artham bhinna tva grahaṇam vibhinna vastu abhāve khalu iha pratyayaḥ bādhitaḥ syāt iha tantu paṭayoḥ samavāyaḥ iti pratyayaḥ api sambandha pūrvakaḥ eva tantu paṭa samavāyasya etat kāraṇa tvāt iti ced na ādhāra ādheya tayā pratīyamānayoḥ sambandhasya pareṇa sisā dhayiṣita tvāt anyathā sthāṇu śyenayoḥ saṃyogaḥ iti atra samavāya asiddhi prasaṅgāt indriya artha sannikarṣa ādinā siddha sādhana tā āpatteḥ ca 
NSu_2.2.92ab.6–2.2.92ab.8	 nanu anavasthiteḥ iti sūtram katham ittham yadi vyabhicāra parihārāya samavāyasya api samavāya antaram upeyate tadā anavasthitiḥ iti iha kecid samavāyam pratyakṣam ācakṣāṇāḥ yatas iti ca viṣaya saptamīm vyācakṣāṇāḥ tad sthemne anumānam ācakṣate teṣām ihapratyayasya sambandha pūrvaka tvam nāma tad pratīti pūrvaka tvam eva tad mate sphuṭā eva anavasthā ye tu pratyakṣatām na abhyupagacchanti sambandhasya sattā mātreṇa iha pratyaya kāraṇava tvam āhuḥ teṣām avasthitiḥ siddhāntaḥ tad virodhaḥ anavasthitiḥ iti anavasthiti śabdaḥ apasiddhānta vācī vyākhyāyate 
NSu_2.2.92ab.9	 yat va iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi iti vat sambandhasya pratītya eva iha pratyaya kāraṇa tvāt atra api pratītim āpādya anavasthā eva vaktavyā kuṇḍa badara saṃyogasya yogyatayā avarjanīya tayā pratītiḥ neha pratyaya kāraṇam iti kutas eṣā kalpanā sattā mātreṇa iha pratyaya kāraṇa tva upapattau pratīteḥ api kāraṇa tva kalpaka abhāvāt iti ced na sati api saṃyoge kutaścid vaya vadhānāt apratīyamāne na iha buddhiḥ bhavati bhavati ca asati api saṃyoge tad viparyayāt iti anvaya vyatirekayoḥ kalpaka abhāvāt sva svāmi bhāva ādayaḥ api hi jñātāḥ eva sambandha nimitta vyavahāra hetavaḥ dṛṣṭā na anyathā na te sambandhāḥ adviṣṭha tvāt iti ced na saṃyogasya api at viṣṭhatāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇa tvāt kiñca evam samavāyaḥ api na sambandhaḥ syāt tasya anāśrita tva abhyupagamāt 
NSu_2.2.92ab.10	 nanu evam tarhi na anaikāntyāt anavasthā eva bādhita tvena ābādhiteha pratyaya tvasya tatra āvṛtteḥ iti ced na anavasthāyāḥ sādhya bādhaka tvena sādhana ābādhaka tvāt sādhya bādhena eva sādhana bādhana abhyupagamasya vyāpti niścaya uttara kālīna tvāt tantu paṭayoḥ samavāyaḥ iti pratītiḥ api sambandha pūrvikā eva kintu aropitaḥ eva asau sambandhaḥ iti ced na anavasthā nistārāt āropita sambandha pūrvaka tvam hi sambandha āra upa pūrvaka tvam eva pratītau ca iyam anavasthā uktā iti katham nistāraḥ kiñca evam vadatā sat tayā eva sambandhasya kāraṇa tvam iti matam tyaktam syāt 
NSu_2.2.92ab.11–2.2.92ab.14	 api ca ābādhitaḥ api iha pratyayaḥ yadi sambandha āra upa mātreṇa bhavet tadā tantu paṭa ādau= api kinna bhavet iti samavāya asiddhiḥ kvacid siddhasya kvacid āropaḥ kutra api abhāve tad asiddhiḥ iti ced na sthāṇu śyenayoḥ sambandhasya sattvāt anyathā samavāye api samavāya antara ārope na syāt samavāya antarasya kvāpi asambhavāt samavāye bhedaḥ eva āropyate na samavāya antaram iti ced na tāvat mātreṇa iha pratyaya ayogāt sambandhi sambandha bhāvaḥ api āropyate iti ced na tarhi tantu paṭa ādau= api tad āropa mātreṇa iha pratyaya upapattau kim samavāyena iti nanu samavāye api iha idam iti pratyayaḥ samavāya adhīnaḥ eva na cāpa siddhāntaḥ anavasthā vā tasya eva samavāyasya sva nirvāhaka tvāt yaḥ eva hi samavāyaḥ avayava ādiṣu avayavi ādīnām sambandhaḥ saḥ eva avayavau= avyādiṣu ātmanā sambandhaḥ iti āśaṅkate saḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.92c.1–2.2.92d.4	 sa sva nirvāhakaḥ ced syāt saḥ avayava avayavi ādi samavāyaḥ evam tarhi kim samavāyena dravyasya eva sva nirvāhaka tva upapatteḥ iti pariharati dravyam eva iti  dravyam eva tathā na kim tarhi iti śeṣaḥ tathā sva nirvāhaka tvāt kim kasmāt ayam āśayaḥ yadi iha idam iti buddhiḥ na avaśyam sva atirikta sambandha sāpekṣā kvacid sva nirvāhaka tvāt tarhi dravya guṇa ādīnām iha idam iti pratyayaḥ api na atirikta sambandha adhīnaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ dravyasya eva sva nirvāhaka tayā api tat upapatteḥ iti samavāyaḥ sambandha ātmaka tvāt sva nirvāhakaḥ na dravyam iti ced na tad asiddhau sambandha tvasya api asiddheḥ saṃyogasya api sva nirvāha ka tā āpatteḥ ca tasya anitya tvāt na iti ced na samavāya nitya tvasya āsiddheḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.92d.5	 evam dravyāt guṇa ādīnām atyanta bhede api na tad sambandhaḥ samavāya lakṣaṇaḥ aparaḥ siddhayati samavāya vat dravyasya eva sva nirvāhaka tva upapatteḥ kalpanā lāghavāt ca iti uktam idānīm guṇa ādīnām dravyāt atyanta bheda abhāvāt ca na samavāya siddhiḥ iti āśayavān= tat atyanta bhede para upanyastān hetūn apākartum tāvat upodghātam āha viśeṣaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.93.1–2.2.93.3	 viśeṣaḥ tad gata tva ādiḥ yadya bhinne avasīyate guṇa kriyā ādi rūpasya niṣedhaḥ kena hetunā abhinne samavāyaḥ iti śeṣaḥ avasīyate aṅgīkriyate iti yāvat guṇa kriyā ādi rūpasya viśeṣasya iti śeṣaḥ kena hetunā na kena api idam uktam bhavati samavāye tāvat avayava avayavi ādi gata tvam aṅgīkṛtam āśrita tvam ca anyatra nitya dravyebhyaḥ a iti vacanāt naca anitya dravya gura karma sāmānya viśeṣaṇām iva samavāyasya tat gata tvam nāma samavāya lakṣaṇa vṛttiḥ sambhavati tasya abhinna tvāt atas tad gata tvam samavāya sva rūpam eva iti aṅgīkartavyam paratantra tayā upalabdhiḥ tad gata tvam iti ced na tasyāḥ samavāya dharma tva anupapatteḥ tad viṣaya tvāt tad dharma tvam iti ced na viṣaya tvasya api samavāya svarūpa anatiḥ ekāt 
NSu_2.2.93.4–2.2.93.5^1	 evam astitva abhidheya tva jñeya tva sambandha tva ādayaḥ api samavāye abhyupagatāḥ na samavāya sva rūpāt bhidyante bhedam hi teṣām samavāyena sambandhaḥ vaktavyaḥ anyathā katham ete tatra syuḥ na ca sambandhaḥ yuktaḥ saṃyogasya guṇa tvena dravya mātra vṛtteḥ samavāyasya ca abhinna tvāt tatra pṛcchāmaḥ samavāyasya tad gata tva ādi dharmāṇām ca abhede katham aparyāya śabda vācya tvam dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ ṣaṣṭhī prayogaḥ jñāta tva ajñāta tvam ekatva an eka tvam ityādi yujyate iti nahi atra upacāra ādi kalpanā yuktāḥ 
NSu_2.2.93.4–2.2.93.5^2	 mukhya prayoga ādeḥ adarśanāt na tad gata tva ādi samavāya tan mātram yena anupapāttaḥ syāt kintu samavāya abhinnam api tad viśeṣa ātmaka tmakam atas vyapadeśa bheda ādi yujyate viśeṣasya bheda pratinidhi tvāt iti eva āgatikataya tatra samādhiḥ abhidhānīyaḥ tathā ca yadi abhinne api samavāye tad gata tva ādi viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkriyate tadā guṇa kriyā ādikam api dravya svarūpam eva sat viśeṣa ātmakam bhavatu na tu tanmātram samavāya dharmāsta viśeṣāḥ guṇa ādayaḥ tu na dravya viśeṣāḥ iti atra viśeṣa hetu abhāvāt iti kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha dravyam eva iti 
NSu_2.2.94a–2.2.94c.2	 dravyam eva tatas ananta viśeṣa ātma tayā sadā nānā vyavahṛteḥ hetuḥ samavāya dharma vat guṇa ādīnām dravya viśeṣa tvāt iti arthaḥ ananta śabdaḥ yatra yāvantaḥ vyavahārāḥ tāvatām upalakṣakaḥ nānā vyavahṛteḥ vyapadeśa bheda ādiḥ iti arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati guṇa guṇyādeḥ atyanta bhede siddhe hi tad sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ siddhayati guṇa guṇyādi atyanta bhedaḥ tu na prāmāṇikaḥ tathā hi na tāvat tatra pratyakṣam pramāṇam gavāśvādi vat anupalambhāt atas guṇa guṇinā avatyanta bhinnau= aparyāya śabda vācya tvāt ghaṭa paṭa vat iti ādi anumānam eva vaktavyam tat ca anaikāntikam samavāyasya tad dharmāṇām bheda abhāve api aparyāya śabda vācya tvāt anyathā siddham ca yathā samavāye tad gata tva ādi dharmāṇām bheda bhāve api viśeṣa para nāmakāt svabhāva viśeṣāt eva aparyāya śabda vācya tva ādikam upapādanīyam gati antara abhāvāt tathā guṇa guṇyādīnām abhede api guṇa ādīnām dravya viśeṣa tvetat dravyam eva viśeṣa śaktayā eva aparyāya śabda vācya tva ādi vyavahāra hetuḥ bhaviṣyati tathā ca vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvāt aprayojaka tvam hetūnām iti 
NSu_2.2.94a–2.2.94c.3	 yat vā viśeṣaḥ tad gata tva ādiḥ iti anena eva guṇa guṇyādi atyanta bheda sādhakānām hetūnām anaikāntya aprayojaka tve varṇite yadi tad gata tva ādi dharma abhinne samavāye tad gata tva ādi viśeṣaḥ abhyupeyate viśeṣaṇā eva ca vyavahārāḥ nirvahiṣyante tadā vyapadeśa bheda ādi hetūnām vyabhicārān yatha asiddhibhyām ābhāsa tvāt kena hetunā dravyasya guṇa kriyā ādi rūpasya guṇa kriyā ādi svarūpa tvasya niṣedhaḥ kriyate guṇa guṇyādi atyanta bhedaḥ kena hetunā sādhayiṣyate iti yāvat anyathā siddhim eva prakaṭayan= upasaṃharati dravyam eva iti samavāya vat iti vakṣyamāṇam atra api sambaddhayate yathā samavāyasya tad gata tva ādi viśeṣa ātma tayā vyapadeśa bheda ādi vyavahāra hetu tvam tathā dravyam eva ghaṭa ādikam guṇa kriyā ādi ananta viśeṣa ātma tayā nānā vyavahṛteḥ hetuḥ bhavati iti 
NSu_2.2.94a–2.2.94c.4	 nanu aupacārika tvam vā bhrānti mūla tvam vā vyavahārāṇām aṅgīkṛtya hetūnām dūṣaṇam śakyam tat kim viśeṣa aṅgīkāreṇa na evam śakyam aupacārika tva ādau hi kadācid muktau vyavahāraḥ syāt na hi tīra ādau sadā gaṅgā ādi vyavahāraḥ asti na ca evam prakṛte sadā eva aparyāya śabda vācya tva ādeḥ sattvāt yadā api abheda bodhāya rūpam eva ghaṭaḥ iti vā vijñānam brahma iti vā vyavahriyate tadā api na paryāyatām upetya tathā ananubhavāt atas vaktavyam eva atra nimittam tat idam uktam sadā iti 
NSu_2.2.94a–2.2.94c.5	 nanu ananta viśeṣa ātmakam ekam eva dravyam iti vyāhatam iti ced kim mātā vandhyā iti vat sākṣāt virodhaḥ kiṃvā kṛtakam nityam itivat vaya āptyai na ādyaḥ yatas ananta tvam saṅkhayā viśeṣaḥ eka tvam ca abhedaḥ na dvitīyaḥ yatra aneka tvam tatra avaśyam bhedaḥ iti vyāptau hi sa syāt na ca evam bheda pratinidhinā viśeṣeṇa eva aneka tva saṅkhayā nirvāhāt iti a āha ananta tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.94d.1–2.2.94d.3	 ananta tvam viśeṣataḥ īśvara ākhya dravya viśeṣaṇām ananta tvam anyatra aneka tvam iti draṣṭavyam atra api samavāya vat iti sambaddhayate ekaḥ eva hi samavāyaḥ aneka dharma ātmakaḥ aṅgīkriyate nanu ayam nānā vyavahāra nirvāha hetuḥ viśeṣaḥ yadi dravya ātmā eva katham tarhi dravyasya viśeṣaḥ syāt tadīyatāyāḥ bheda vyāpta tvāt mā evam vinā api bhedena tad pratinidhinā viśeṣaṇā eva viśeṣasya tadīyata upapatteḥ evam tarhi tasya api viśeṣasya viśeṣa tva siddhaye viśeṣa antaram aṅgīkartavyam iti anavasthā iti atas āha viśeṣaḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.2.95ab.1–2.2.95ab.2	 viśeṣaḥ ca viśeṣī saḥ svena eva samavāya vat yathā samavāyaḥ svena eva samavāyī na sambandha antareṇa iti abhyupagamya anavasthā pareṇa parākriyate tathā sa dravye aneka vyavahāra nirvāhetuḥ viśeṣaḥ ca svena eva viśeṣī na punar viśeṣa antareṇa atas na kaścid doṣaḥ iti samavāya vat iti upalakṣaṇam sattā antya viśeṣa vat ca iti api draṣṭavyam yathā dravya guṇa karmasu sa dvaya vahāra hetuḥ sattā svena eva satī svīkṛtā yathā ca nitya dravyeṣu atyanta vyāvṛtti pratyaye hetuḥ antyaḥ viśeṣaḥ svena eva atyanta vyāvṛttaḥ tathā eva iti 
NSu_2.2.95ab.3^1	 atha api syāt guṇa guṇyādi bhedam abhyupagacchatā mayā iha idam iti vyavahāra nirvāhāya samavāyaḥ aṅgīkriyate tasya ca anavasthā parihārāya sva nirvāhaka tvam abhedaṃca abhyupagacchatā tvayā aparyāya śabda vācya tā ādi siddhaye viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkriyate tasya ca anavasthā nirāsāya sva nirvāhaka tvam iti pakṣa dvaye samāne kaḥ viśeṣaḥ abheda pakṣe yena sa parigṛhyate samavāyasya aprāmāṇika tvam iti ced samam viśeṣe api aparyāya vyavahāra ādinā sa siddhaḥ iti ced tarhi samavāyaḥ api iha it am ityādinā siddhaḥ iti tulyam tad anaikāntikam iti uktam iti ced 
NSu_2.2.95ab.3^2	 aparyāya vyavahāra ādikam api ghaṭa paṭau= anaikāntikam iti samānam astu tarhi guṇa guṇyādi bhede vyavahāra ādi sakam api ghaṭa paṭāt avanaikāntikam iti samānam astu tarhi guṇa guṇyādi bhede pramāṇa abhāvaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti ced na abhede api pramāṇa abhāvāt gavāḥ ca ādi vat vivekena anupalambhaḥ abhede pramāṇam iti ced tarhi vyapadeśa bheda ādi bhede pramāṇam asti iti samādhi sāmyam tadvayabhicārān yathā siddhibhyām nirastam iti ced abheda pramāṇam api tādṛś eva tasya api kṣīra nīrādau vyabhicārāt ayutasiddha tvena anyathā siddheḥ ca tasmāt nimittaḥ ayam abheda pakṣapātaḥ iti atas āha kalpanā iti 
NSu_2.2.95cd.1–2.2.95cd.3	 kalpanā guru tā doṣāt padārtha antara tā nahi padārtha antarā guṇa guṇyādīnām iti śeṣaḥ yadi api bheda abheda pakṣayoḥ sva nirvāhaka samavāya viśeṣa aṅgīkāreṇa sāmyam tathā api bheda pakṣe kalpanā guru tā doṣāt guṇa guṇyādīnām padārtha antara tā na aṅgīkriyate kalpanā lāgha vāt abhedaḥ eva upeyate iti katham bheda vāde kalpanā gauravam iti atas āha kalpayitvā iti 
NSu_2.2.96.1–2.2.96.3	 kalpayitvā ṣaṭ padārthān sābhāvān api kevalam ekasmin sa viśeṣaḥ ced kim pūrvam tasya vismṛtiḥ kevalam iti etat ṣaṣ iti anena ekasmin= iti anena ca sambaddhayate ekasmin samavāye saḥ vicitra vyavahāra hetuḥ ced aṅgīkriyate iti śeṣaḥ kim kasmāt pūrvam dravyaḥ iti arthaḥ tasya viśeṣasya ayam abhisandhiḥ vyapadeśa bheda ādi pramāṇa balam avambya vaiśeṣika ādibhiḥ dravya ādayaḥ bhāva padārthāḥ ṣaṭ eva abhāvaḥ api saptamaḥ iti kalpitam samavāye pratītam tad gata tva ādikam tu na samavāya atiriktam kintu svabhāva bheda apara nāmnā viśeṣeṇa eva tatra vyapadeśa bheda ādi utpattiḥ iti ca tatra antatas api aṅgīka tarvyena vyapadeśa bheda ādi nirvāhakeṇa viśeṣeṇa eva dravye api tad nirvāhaḥ vaktavyaḥ sapta padārthī nirūpaṇam na kartavyam yat vā dravya vat samavāye api tad gata tva ādīnām bhedaḥ eva svīkāryaḥ teṣām ca dravya ādiṣu antarbhāvā sambhave sapta padārtha niyamaḥ tyājyaḥ viśeṣa kāraṇena vinā 
NSu_2.2.96.4	 kvacid bhedasya kvacid viśeṣasya abhyupagame katham kalpanā gauravam na syāt tad abhāve vā abheda vāde katham kalpanā lāghavam na bhavet iti bheda pratītya pratītibhyām viśeṣaḥ ityādi tu nirākariṣyate atra dvidhā kalpana pradarśana arthena eva pūrva ardhena samavāye viśeṣasya aṅgīkartavyatā api samathiḥ tāḥ veditavyā atas eva kevala śabda sambandhaḥ sapta eva hi padārthāḥ na ca teṣu samavāya dharmāṇām antarbhāvaḥ sambhavati iti viśeṣāḥ eva tairaṅgīkartavyāḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.96.5–2.2.96.6	 na kevalam sarvathā aṅgī kāryeṇa viśeṣeṇa eva guṇa guṇyādi vyapadeśa bheda ādi upapattau dravya bhedam aṅgīkṛtya samavāyaḥ ekasmin viśeṣa abhyupagame kalpanā gauravam iti bheda matam apahāya abheda pakṣapātaḥ kriyate kintu samavāye pramāṇa abhāvāt api tathā hi na tāvat tatra pratyakṣam pramāṇam kuṇḍa dadhnoḥ saṃyogaḥ iti vat tantu paṭayoḥ samavāyaḥ iti apratīteḥ sambandha pratītiḥ eva tad pratītiḥ iti ced na tasyāḥ asammateḥ 
NSu_2.2.96.7	 etena ayam tantu paṭa sambandha pratyayaḥ cakṣuḥ janyaḥ ananyathā siddha tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt paṭa pratyaya vat ayam tantu paṭayoḥ sambandhaḥ yoga ja dharma ajanya janya sākṣātkāra viṣayaḥ tantu paṭa sambandha tvāt etat tantu paṭa antara saṃyoga vat iti samavāya pratyakṣa tā sādhanam api apāstam tantu paṭa sambandha tad pratyayayoḥ asiddhayā aśrayā siddheḥ sambandha apratītau śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇya pratītiḥ na syāt daṇḍī kuṇḍalī iti ādau tasya tad pūrvakatva darśanāt iti ced na samavāyaḥ asti iti ādau vyabhicārāt 
NSu_2.2.96.8	 na api anumānam iha idam iti pratyayasya dūṣita tvāt iha bhū tale ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti pratyaye vyabhicārāt ca bhāva mātra viṣaya tvena viśeṣaṇāt adoṣaḥ iti ced na abhāva vat bhāve api upapattau anyathā siddheḥ iha ghaṭe jñānam iti pratyaye vyabhicāra aparihārāt ca bādhitaḥ ayam iti ced na anyathā pratyaya anupalabdheḥ etena jāti ādi gocaraḥ viśiṣṭa vyavahāraḥ sambandhi niyataḥ bhāva mātra viṣaya ābādhita viśiṣṭa vyavahāra tvāt sa ghaṭam bhū talam iti vyavahāra vat iti apāstam jñātaḥ ghaṭaḥ asti samavāyaḥ ityādau vyabhicārāt 
NSu_2.2.96.9–2.2.96.10	 ete tantavaḥ etad paṭa sambaddhā etat āśraya tvāt bhū tala vat ayam paṭe etad tantu sambaddhaḥ etat āśrita tvāt etat āśrita tṛṇa ādi vat iti api asat tantu paṭayoḥ āśraya āśrayi bhāva asiddheḥ iha tantuṣu ayam paṭaḥ iti vyavahāra siddha tad pratyāttat siddhiḥ iti ced na iha samavāye astitvam iti ādau vyabhicārāt bhū tala rūpa ādayaḥ bhū tala sambaddhā bhū tala viśeṣaṇa tvāt ghaṭa vat iti api bhū tala viśeṣaṇe jñāne vyabhicārāt ayuktam 
NSu_2.2.96.11	 iha tantuṣa paṭaḥ ityādi pratyayaḥ etañjanaka saṃyoga tva rahita sambandha janyaḥ iha iti pratyaya tvāt iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi iti pratyaya vat naca iha bhū tale ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti pratyaye vyabhicāraḥ tatra api cakṣuḥ bhū tala saṃyoga ādi janya tvasya sattvāt iti api na yuktam ayam paṭe etat janaka tanturahita upādāna janyaḥ paṭa tvāt paṭa antara vat iti ābhāsa samāna yogakṣema tvāt 
NSu_2.2.96.12–2.2.96.13	 rūpa ādayaḥ sambandhavantaḥ prameya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti api anupapannam samavāya abhāvayoḥ vyabhicārāt tatra api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva abhyupagamāt na iti ced na tasya pareṇa sambandha tva anaṅgīkārāt aṅgīkāre vā tena eva artha antara tvāt matu barthasya abhāvāt bādhita viṣaya tvāt ca samavāyaḥ svena eva sambandhī syāt iti nirastam 
NSu_2.2.96.14	 idam cakṣuḥ etat janya saṃyoga jñāna tva rahita sambandha jñāna janakam cakṣuṣṭvāt anya cakṣuḥ vat aham mad niṣṭha saṃyoga jñāna tva rahita sambandha jñānavān ātma tvāt ātmā antara vat ayam kālaḥ idānīntana saṃyoga jñāna tva rahita sambandha jñānavān kāla tvāt anya kāla vat ityādīni ābhāsa samāna yogakṣema tvāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva ādinā artha antara tvāt cāpāḥ tāni 
NSu_2.2.96.15	 saṃyoga tvam sambandha vyāvṛttam jāti tvāt go tva vat iti siddha sādhanam jāteḥ prativyakti niyata tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvena ekasya saṃyoga tvasya saṃyoga antara advaya āvṛtteḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva āditas vyāvṛtteḥ ca vivāda adhyāsitā mṛd ghaṭa sambaddhā dravya tvāt ākāśa vat iti ca ghaṭa antara saṃyogena artha antaram etad ghaṭa sambaddhā iti nirdeśe api etat ghaṭa sambandham alabdhvā vinaṣṭa dravye anaikāntikam tatra api paramparā sambandhaḥ asti iti ced tarhi siddha sādhanam mṛd saṃyukta bhū talasya ghaṭa saṃyukta tvāt 
NSu_2.2.96.16–2.2.96.18	 tantu paṭau nitya sambaddhau dravya tvāt ākāśa vat iti dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvāt apāstam saṃyogaḥ sva vyatirikta sambandhāt bhinnaḥ prameya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti atra sva vyatirikta padena sva anyonya abhāva vivakṣāyām siddha sādhana tā ekasya saṃyogasya saṃyoga antarāt bhinna tvāt saṃyoga tva rahita tva vivakṣāyāma prasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva ādinā tad samādhāne tena eva siddha sādhanam ayam saṃyogaḥ etad anya saṃyoga tva rahita sambandhānyaḥ meya tvāt ghaṭa vat ityādyāḥ ca ābhāsa samāna yogakṣema tvāt upekṣaṇīyāḥ tat evam samavāye pramāṇa abhāvāt na bheda pakṣaḥ aṅgīkriyate nanu uktam atra abheda pakṣaḥ api tarhi na aṅgī kāryaḥ viśeṣe pramāṇa abhāvāt iti tatra āha yena iti 
NSu_2.2.97.1–2.2.97.2	 yena pratyakṣa siddhena vyavahāraḥ akhilaḥ bhavet bhāva abhāva vibhāgena yam vinā na kathañcana etat dṛśe viśeṣe asmin kaḥ dveṣaḥ vādinām bhavet pratyakṣa siddhena iti anena pratyakṣa siddhaḥ iti labhyate yena akhilaḥ vyavahāraḥ bhavet yam vinā na bhavet iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām viśeṣa kārya tvam vyavahārasya darśayatā vyavahārānyatha anupapattiḥ ca viśeṣe pramāṇam tad anaṅgīkāre vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgaḥ ca iti uktam bhavati akhilaḥ iti asya eva vivaraṇam bhāva abhāva vibhāgena vidhi niṣedha bhedena dvividhaḥ tāvat iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_2.2.97.3–2.2.97.5	 nanu bheda pakṣe api samavāyabhyupagamena akhilaḥ api vyavahāraḥ ghaṭiṣyate atyanta abhede api vyāvṛtti svīkāreṇa bheda abhedābhyām tu sutarām tat kim viśeṣeṇa iti atas uktam kathañcana iti etādṛśe sarva vyavahāra nirvāha hetau kaḥ dveṣaḥ kinnimitta anupāditā pramāṇa abhāvaḥ hi anupādāna nimittam sati pramāṇe na anupādāna nimittam asti iti arthaḥ mā bhūdvayavahāraḥ iti atas uktam vādinām iti upalakṣaṇam ca etat jñātṛṇām ca iti api draṣṭavyam viśiṣṭa viṣaya abhijñā abhivadana lakṣaṇaḥ hi atra vyavahāraḥ prakṛtaḥ kiñca avayava avayavi ādi bhede pramāṇa abhāvāt ca tam parityajya abheda pakṣaḥ aṅgīkriyate nanu uktam atra abhede api pramāṇam na asti iti tatra āha abhedena iti 
NSu_2.2.98.1–2.2.98.2	 abhedena pratītiḥ ca kārya kāraṇa pūrvake abhāva ante padārthe asmin sa viśeṣa avasīyate iha api kārya kāraṇa grahaṇena avayavi avayavau= ucyete pūrva śabdena guṇa guṇyādikam abhāva śabdena anyonya abhāvaḥ gṛhyate tasya eva dharmyabhinna tvāt yadvā abhāva tad dharma a= anena upalakṣyete avasīyate sākṣiṇā tathā hi tantu paṭa ādi viṣayā buddhiḥ atyanta bhinna ghaṭa paṭa ādi viṣaya buddhitaḥ vilakṣaṇa anuvyavasīyate uta avilakṣaṇāḥ na tāvat dvitīyaḥ pratītya palāpa anupapatteḥ ādye katham abheda pratītiḥ na asti iti śakyam vaktum sambandhena viśiṣyate iti ced na kuṇḍa badara pratītitaḥ api vailakṣaṇya anubhavāt sambandhinoḥ ayuta siddha tvāt tathā iti ced na ādhāra ādheya bhāvena avasthāna samaye tasya akiñcitkara tvāt atas tantu paṭayoḥ kuṇḍa badarayoḥ ca bhede sambandhe ca samāne kāla antara bhāvinaḥ sambandha vināśa ādeḥ sambandhi vibhāga ādeḥ vā pratyakṣa pratītim pratyupayoga abhāvāt vailakṣaṇyam na anubhūyeta anubhūyate ca tantu paṭa ādi buddhiḥ kuṇḍa badara ādi buddhevirlakṣaṇa iti abheda viṣayā eva sāvasīyate 
NSu_2.2.98.3–2.2.98.4	 kiñca paṭa utpatteḥ prāc yāvantam deśam avaṣṭabhya tantavaḥ tiṣṭhanti paṭaḥ api tāvantam eva na ca mūrtayoḥ samāna deśa tvam yujyate tena jñāyate tantu abhinnaḥ paṭaḥ iti naca avayava avayavinaḥ rūpa rasa ādi dvaitam anubhūyate iti ādya bheda pramāṇam svayam ūhanīyam nanu abhedaḥ ced pratyakṣeṇa eva īkṣyate tadā katham śuklaḥ paṭaḥ calati ityādi sāmāna adhikaraṇyā ādi vyavahāraḥ tasya daṇḍī kuṇḍalī iti vat bheda viṣaya tvāt na hi pratīti virodhī vyavahāraḥ bhavati iti atas uktam sa viśeṣa iti viśeṣeṇa viṣayeṇa upetāḥ 
NSu_2.2.98.5–2.2.98.6	 ayam arthaḥ yatra kevalam abhedaḥ pratīyate na tatra sāmānādhikaraṇya vyavahāraḥ bhavati yathā ghaṭaḥ kalaśaḥ iti atra tu abhedaḥ pratīyamānaḥ viśeṣeṇa sahitaḥ eva pratīyate viśeṣaḥ ca bheda pratinidhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya vyavahāram prasūtaḥ iti nanu abheda pratītim abhibhūya viśeṣa pratītiḥ sva kāryam katham kuryāt karoti ced abheda pratītiḥ api viśeṣa pratītim abhibhūya sva kāryam katham na syāt mā evam na hi pratītiḥ asti iti eva vyavahāraḥ kintu prayojane api sati prayojanam ca sāmānādhikaraṇya vyavahāreṇa eva bahulam loka vedayoḥ yadā tu abheda vyavahāraḥ prayojanavān= tadā saḥ api dṛśyate eva yathā vijñānam ānandam brahma ityādi 
NSu_2.2.98.7–2.2.98.8^1	 yat vā viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa arthāpatti siddhaḥ iti uktam tat katham iti atas pratyakṣa siddha tām tāvat upapādayati abhedena iti anukta samuccaya arthaḥ ca śabdaḥ padārthaḥ iti eka vacanam jāti viṣayam asti yatas tasmāt sā sa viśeṣāvasīyate iti yojanā tatas ca ayam arthaḥ asti tāvat avayava avayavi ādi padārtha sārthe abhedena pratītiḥ kuṇḍa badara ādi pratītitaḥ asyāḥ vyāvṛtta tayā adhyavasāyāt na ca abhedam antareṇa vyāvṛtti hetuḥ asti atas asati nimitta antare sammata bheda vastu antara pratītitaḥ vyāvṛttā iyam abhedaḥ eva viśrāmyati iti 
NSu_2.2.98.7–2.2.98.8^2	 asti ca tathā api sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi vyavahāraḥ tatra yadi iyam abheda mātra viṣayā syāt tadā na sāmānādhikaraṇya ādi vyavahāram kuryāt ghaṭaḥ kalaśaḥ iti vyavahāra adarśanāt tatas jñāyate adhikaḥ api viṣayaḥ asyāḥ vidyate iti na ca bhedaḥ asau= iti vācyam bheda abheda vāde api antaḥ viśeṣasya aṅgī kārya tvāt tathā ca iyam abheda pratītiḥ indriya jā sa viśeṣāvasīyate iti prāk uktam samavāye viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkriyate iti tat na tāvat eva kintu sarveṣu api padārtheṣu iti darśayan viśeṣasya vyavahāra ani atha anupapatti siddha tām ca upapādayati sāmānya ādi iti 
NSu_2.2.99.1–2.2.99.3	 sāmānya ādi padārtheṣu tad niṣṭha tva ādayaḥ akhilāḥ katham dharmāḥ nivāryante vastu aikye api hi vādibhiḥ tad niṣṭha tva ādayaḥ vyakti niṣṭha tva ādayaḥ katham iti ākṣepe vastu aikye api dharma aikye api kutas na nivāryate iti atas uktam vādibhiḥ iti avisaṃvādi vyavahāra siddha tvāt iti yāvat etat eva prapañcayati kāryasya iti 
NSu_2.2.100a–2.2.100c.3	 kāryasya tad tad niṣṭha tvam guṇa ādeḥ vyāpita ādikaḥ katham viśeṣaḥ na eva asti asti tāvat avayavinaḥ avayava niṣṭha tvam nāma dharmaḥ guṇānām keṣāñcit rūpa ādīnām āśraya vyāpi tvam keṣāñcid saṃyoga ādīnām pradeśa vṛtti tvam rūpa ādīnām udbhūta tvam sarveṣām caturviṃśati tvam karmaṇaḥ ca āśraya vyāpi tvam anitya tvam pañcatvam mūrta niṣṭha tvam sāmānyasya api dravya guṇa karma niṣṭha tvam nitya tvam anugata tvam dvividha tvam iti ati bahulaḥ ayam padārtha dharma samūhaḥ na ca ayam āśrayataḥ bhinnaḥ eva iti yuktam asti ca dharma dharmyādi vyavahāraḥ tantuṣu paṭaḥ paṭaḥ na bhavati ghaṭaḥ ityādiḥ sa ca ayam atyanta abhede anupapadyamānaḥ sva upapādakam viśeṣam avagamayati iti sarva padārtheṣu katham viśeṣaḥ na eva asti satyam santi eva dravya ādiṣu saptasu api padārtheṣu te te dharmāḥ kinnām a āśrayataḥ bhinnāḥ eva tathā ca tad sambandha nibandhana tayā eva upapadyamānaḥ vyavahāraḥ sarva padārtheṣu na viśeṣam ākṣeptum alam iti āśayena śaṅkate sa ca iti 
NSu_2.2.100d.1–2.2.101a.3^1	 sa ca dharmaḥ aparaḥ yadi na kevalam guṇa ādi dravya āditas bhinnam kintu saḥ tad tad niṣṭha tva ādi dharmaḥ ca aparaḥ sva āśrayāt bhinnaḥ yadi aṅgīkriyate iti arthaḥ nirākaroti ṣaṣ iti ṣaṣ padārtha atirekaḥ syāt tarhi dharmāṇām ṣaḍbhyaḥ padārthebhyaḥ atirekaḥ syāt tathā ca ṣaṣ eva padārthā sati niyamaḥ bhajyeta iti nanu sva āśrayataḥ vibhinnāḥ api dharmāḥ na ṣaṣ padārthebhyaḥ atiricyante kintu te eva anyonya viśeṣaṇībhūtāḥ dharmāḥ iti ucyante yathā ahayadi api dharmāḥ ṣaṭpadārthebhyaḥ na vyatiricyante kintu te eva anyonya apekṣayā dharma dharmiṇaḥ ca bhavanti a itrataḥ anyatra apiteṣām dharmāḥ te eva parasparam viśeṣaṇībhūtāḥ a iti tat katham niyama bhaṅgaḥ iti mā evam tad niṣṭhatva ādīnām ṣaṭsu padārtheṣu antar bhāvayitum aśakya tvāt tathā hi āśrita tvam ca anyatra nitya dravyebhyaḥ a iti abhyupagatam kārya dravya guṇa karma sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyānām avayava ādi niṣṭha tvam na tāvat dravya ādikam 
NSu_2.2.101a.3^2	 guṇa ādi vṛtti anupapatteḥ na api samavāyaḥ tasya sva vṛtti anupapatteḥ kiñca adhārya ādhāra bhūtayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyaḥ iṣyate tathā ca katham saḥ eva adhāri tvam ādhāra tvam ca syāt tathā rūpa ādīnām āśraya vyāpi tvam na dravya ādiṣu antar bhavati teṣām guṇa vṛttti vāsambhavāt samavāyaḥ tu ukta rītyā nirastaḥ api ca vṛtti tva mātram samavāyaḥ vyāpya vṛtti tvam tu atiriktam nirvaktavyarm kṛtsne sva āśraye samavāyaḥ tat iti ced na dravyasya asamudita tvena kṛtsna tva ādi anavakāśāt svabhāvena saha anavasthānam vyāpya vṛtti tvam iti ced na tasya api antar bhāvya tvāt abhāvaḥ asau= iti ced na nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt 
NSu_2.2.101a.4–2.2.101a.5	 evam saṃyoga ādīnām pradeśa vṛtti tvam nirastam udbhūta tvam ca na jāti viśeṣaḥ rūpa tva ādinā para apara bhāva anupapatteḥ yadi hi rūpa tvam param syāt tadā sparśasya udbhūta tvam na syāt yadi ca udbhūta tvam param bhavet tadā sarvam api rūpam udbhūtam iti cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api pratītiḥ syāt caturviṃśati tvam ca na saṅkhayā guṇānām nirguṇa tva aṅgīkārāt upacāraḥ ayam iti ced na nimitta abhāvāt na tāvat eka atharsamavāyaḥ nimittam dravye caturviṃśati tva niyama abhāvāt pratyekam rūpa ādiṣu tad prasaṅgāt ca aparyāya caturviṃśati śabda vācya tvam iti ced na śabde api caturviṃśati tva abhāvāt caturviṃśati puruṣa uccārita aparyāya śabda vācya tvam iti ced na badhira ādīnām rūpa ādiṣu saṅkhayā vyavahāra abhāva prasaṅgāt evam anyeṣām api dharmāṇām antarbhāvaḥ nirasanīyaḥ 
NSu_2.2.101a.6–2.2.101a.7	 kaścid āha dharma padārthaḥ abhāve antarbhavati iti tat asat niṣedha buddhi bodhya tva abhāvāt abhāve abhāva anaṅgīkāreṇa tad dharmāṇām abhāva tva ayogāt ca dravya ādi ṣaṣ lakṣaṇa śanyatam arāhityam abhāva tvam na tu niṣedha buddhi bodhya tvam iti ced na loka pratītim avadhūya sva kalpanā daraṇe dravyam eva bhāvāḥ tad lakṣaṇa rahitaḥ abhāvaḥ iti api kalpanā prasaṅgāt atas tad tad niṣṭha tva ādayaḥ dravya ādi dharmāḥ tad ātmānaḥ eva aṅgī kāryāḥ tathā cāhabhāvasya svarūpam eva avasthā bhedena astitvam jñeya tvam abhidheya tvam ca ucyate a iti na ca viśeṣam apahāya avasthā bhedaḥ śakya nirūpaṇaḥ nanu dharmāḥ dharmitaḥ bhinnāḥ eva naca ukta doṣaḥ naiyāyika ādibhiḥ paramāṇu ārambha vādibhiḥ ṣaṣ eva padārthāḥ iti niyamasya anaṅgīkṛta tvāt dharma padārthasya pṛthak aṅgīkṛta tvāt ca tathā ca bhinna dharma saṃsarga vaśāt sarva vyavahāra upapattau na tat anyathā anupapattyā viśeṣa siddhiḥ iti atas āha padārtha iti 
NSu_2.2.101b–2.2.101d.2	 padārtha aniyame api hi dharmasya dharma santānāt anavasthā karaḥ bhavet padārthānām ṣaṭ eva iti niyama abhāva pakṣe api hi yasmāt dharmasya dharma santānāt anavasthāyāḥ ākaraḥ bhavet ayam pakṣaḥ tasmāt dharma dharmāṇām āśrayā bhede avaśyam aṅgī kārye tatra dharma dharmyādi vyavahārāni atha anupapattyā viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ iti yojyam khaniḥ ākaraḥ 
NSu_2.2.101b–2.2.101d.3	 etat uktam bhavati dharma padārtham dravya ādibhyaḥ bhinnam abhyupagacchan praṣṭavyaḥ astitva ādi dharmeṣu api astitva ādikam asti na vā na iti pakṣe anubhava virodhaḥ astitvam na jñeyam na abhidheyam iti sva kriyā virodhaḥ ca anyathā dravya ādiṣu api tad abhāva āpattiḥ ādye tad āśrayataḥ bhinnam abhinnam vā ādye tatra api astitva ādi antaram iti anavasthā syāt dvitīye tu asti tāvat tatra api dharma dharmyādi vyavahāraḥ sa ca anupapadyamānaḥ viśeṣam gamayati iti kiñca dharma gatāḥ dharmāḥ yadi āśraya abhinnāḥ tadā kim dravya ādi gata astitva ādi dharmaiḥ aparāddham yena te dravya āditas bhidyeran yogakṣema sāmyāt tatas teṣām eva dravya ādi abhede sati punar vyavahārānyatha anupapattyā dravya ādiṣu eva viśeṣa siddhiḥ 
NSu_2.2.101b–2.2.101d.4	 nanu asti eva dravya ādi dharmeṣu astitva ādiṣu api astitva ādikam tat ca āśrayataḥ bhinnam eva na ca evam dharma sya ana vadhika dharma santānāt anavasthā doṣaḥ utpatti jñapti pratibandhaka tva abhāvena adoṣa tvāt yathā ahuḥ mūla kṣaya karīm prāhuḥ anavasthām hi dūṣaṇam a iti yad artham uttarottara anusaraṇam tat mūlam utpattiḥ jñaptiḥ vā tatas bhinna nimitta tayā upapadyamānaḥ vyavahāraḥ na viśeṣam ākṣeptum alam iti atas āha sāmānyasya api iti 
NSu_2.2.102ac.1–2.2.102ac.3^1	 sāmānyasya api sāmānyam guṇasya api guṇaḥ hi atas na aṅgīkṛtaḥ sāmānyasya go tva ādeḥ sāmānyam sattā lakṣaṇam guṇasya ca rūpa ādeḥ saṅkhayā pṛthaktava ādi guṇaḥ atas anavasthā bhayāt eva hi na aṅgīkṛtaḥ ayam āśayaḥ sāmānyasya api sāmānyam tāvat pareṇa na aṅgīkṛtam tathā guṇasya api guṇaḥ na aṅgīkṛtaḥ tat kasmāt iti vaktavyam na tāvat pratītyabhāvāt sat gotvam caturviṃśati guṇāḥ rūpāt rasaḥ pṛthak iti pratibhāsasya durapahnava tvāt na ca na sat gotvam ityādi bādhakam asti yena pratītasya api parityāgaḥ go tvam na sat tāvat apara sāmānya śūnya tvāt viśeṣa vat guṇāḥ na guṇavantaḥ adravya tvāt kriyā vat iti ādi bādhakam asti iti ced na vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvena aprayojaka tvāt dṛṣṭāntayoḥ sādhya vikala tvāt ca yadi go tva ādau sattā syāt tadā sattāyām api syāt tathā ca ātmā āśraya tvam iti ced na sattā antara tva upapatteḥ kiñca pratīteḥ kim ātma āśraya tā kariṣyati anyathā prameya tva ādīnām kevala anvayitvam na syāt ātma āśraya bhayāt yatas prameya tva ādi vyāvṛttiḥ tasya eva vipakṣa tvāt 
NSu_2.2.102ac.3^2–2.2.102ac.4	 uktam cakatham sva vṛttiḥ iṣyā ced yathā anyatra iti gṛhyatām pramāṇam śaraṇam vṛttau na bhinna abhinna teya tā a iti guṇānām api guṇavat tve dravya lakṣaṇa yogāt dravya tā āpattiḥ iti ced na pratītim anuruddhaya lakṣaṇa antarasya kartavya tvāt tasmāt sāmānye sāmānyam guṇe ca guṇaḥ anavasthā bhayāt eva na aṅgīkriyate iti eva vaktavyam yathā aha vyakteḥ abhedaḥ tulya tvam saṅkaraḥ atha anavasthitiḥ rūpa hāniḥ asambandhaḥ jāti bādhaka saṅgrahaḥ a iti naca an avacchinnā sāmānya paramparā guṇa paramparā ca utpatti jñapti pratibandhe hetuḥ tathā ca yathā sā dūṣaṇam tathā prakṛtā api dūṣaṇam eva na ced sā api na syāt iti sāmānya ādeḥ api sāmānya ādi aṅgīkāryam syāt yadi kathañcid jñapti pratibandhaka tvam tatra vyutpadyeta tarhi vayam api atra tat vyutpādayiṣyāmaḥ iti yadi kaścid vaiyātyāt brūyāt asti eva sāmānyasya api sāmānyam guṇasya api guṇaḥ nirbādha pratīti siddha tvāt utpatti jñapti apratibandha hetoḥ anavasthāyāḥ doṣa tva ayogāt atas na etat nyāyena dharma paramparā anavasthā bhayāt nivāraṇīyā iti tatra āha sa ca iti 
NSu_2.2.102cd.1–2.2.102cd.3	 sa ca yadi na anavasthā kvacid bhavet sa ca guṇasya api guṇaḥ caśabdāt sāmānyasya api sāmānyam yadi aṅgīkriyate tadā brūmaḥ na anavasthā kvacid bhavet iti ayam āśayaḥ evam vadan kvacid anavasthā dūṣaṇam aṅgīkaroti na vā iti vācyam naced dūṣaṇa antaram api na aṅgīkuryāt aviśeṣāt tathā ca kathāyām na adhikārī syāt na ādyaḥ dharma sāmānya guṇa an avasthāyāḥ adūṣaṇa tve vimatāyāḥ api dūṣaṇa tva ayogāt viśeṣa hetoḥ abhāvāt 
NSu_2.2.102cd.4^1	 nanu aparyavasita paramparā mātra sāmye api yatra utpatti ādi pratibandhaka tvam tatra dūṣaṇa tvam yatra yat abhāvaḥ tatra adūṣaṇa tvam iti ced kimartham utpatti ādi pratibandhaka tvam anusaraṇīyam anavasthā hi tarka viśeṣaḥ tarkaḥ ca aniṣya prasañjanam utpatti ādi pratibandhaḥ ca aniṣyaḥ prāmāṇika parityāga rūpa tvāt utpatti ādeḥ prāmāṇika tvāt atas tat apratibandhe tarka tva ayogāt katham dūṣaṇa antaram evam eva dūṣaṇa tve atiprasaṅgaḥ ita ced kim prāmāṇika parityāgaḥ eva āniṣyaḥ uta aprāmāṇika svīkāraḥ api na ādyaḥ niyāmaka abhāvāt dvitīye katham na prakṛta an avasthā dūṣaṇam atyanta bhinna dharma paramparāyāḥ api aprāmāṇika tvāt 
NSu_2.2.102cd.4^2	 atha aprāmāṇika svīkāraḥ na dūṣaṇam tarhi prāmāṇika parityāgaḥ api na syāt iti na anavasthā kvacid dūṣaṇam bhavet atha aniṣya āpatti hetuḥ anavasthā dūṣaṇam na punar aniṣya rūpā iti ced na aniṣya rūpā eva anavasthā dūṣaṇam na tu aniṣya āpatti hetuḥ iti api vaktum śakya tvena kvacid aṅgīkṛtā api anavasthā na dūṣaṇam bhavet tasmāt prāmāṇika parityāgā prāmāṇika parigraha rūpā vā tad hetuḥ vā anavacchinna paramparā anavasthā iti vācyam atas eva na ati prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca dharma paramparāyāḥ api anavasthātvena abhedaḥ eva aṅgī kāryaḥ evam ca ukta nyāyena vyavahārāni atha anupapattyā viśeṣa siddhiḥ iti
