NSu_2.2.102cd.5	 api ca yaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ bhedam samavāyam ca aṅgīkṛtya abhedam viśeṣam ca avajānāti tena anavasthātaḥ bibhyatā guṇa sāmānyayoḥ guṇa sāmānya pratītiḥ eva apalapanīyā vinā eva bādhakena bhrāntiḥ vā vācyāḥ pratītya pala āpāditaḥ vā bibhyataḥ anavasthā syāt iti ekam sandhitsataḥ anyat cyavate abhedam viśeṣam ca aṅgīkurvatām tu na idam dūṣaṇa dvayam atas api tad pakṣapātaḥ iti āśayavān āha asmad pakṣaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.103a–2.2.103c.3	 asmad pakṣe guṇa ādyāḥ ca tat vantaḥ hi viśeṣataḥ ananya tvāt na anavasthā dharma dharmiṇoḥ sa viśeṣa abheda vādinām pakṣaḥ iti arthaḥ guṇa ādyāḥ guṇāḥ sāmānyāni ca tadvantaḥ guṇavantaḥ sāmānyavanti ca tena caturviṃśati guṇāḥ sat gotvam ityādi pratīti virodhaḥ na asti iti śeṣaḥ ananya tvāt dharma dharmiṇoḥ iti śeṣaḥ aprāmāṇikā paryavasita paramparā rūpāḥ hi eṣā ananya tve katham tat vṛttam iti tad avasthaḥ pratīti virodhaḥ iti atas uktam viśeṣataḥ hi tadvantaḥ iti bheda sambandha kārya kārī hi viśeṣaḥ iti evam avayava avayavi ādīnām abhedaḥ atra nirūpitaḥ idānīm kvacid bhedā bhedau= api bhavataḥ iti tad apavādam āha bhedaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.103d.1–2.2.103d.3	 bhedaḥ nāśe bhavet tathā yat vā yadi avayavi ādayaḥ avayava ādya bhinnāḥ katham tarhi satsu eva avayava ādiṣu vinaśyanti iti atas āha bhedaḥ iti tathā śabdaḥ samuccaye avayava ādiṣu satsu eva avayavi a ādīnām nāśe bhedaḥ abhedaḥ ca bhavet iti arthaḥ atra nāśaḥ iti upalakṣaṇam yatra satsu eva avayaveṣu avayavinaḥ abhāvaḥ sati guṇini guṇasya abhāvaḥ tatra bheda abhedau= ityādi draṣṭavyam anyathā yatra avayava avayavi ādīnām yugapad vināśaḥ tatra bheda abhedau= uktau na syātām 
NSu_2.2.103d.4	 idam uktam bhavati sati api tasmin= asattvāt iti anena hetunā avayavi ādīnām avayava ādibhyaḥ bheda mātram vā sādhyate atyanta bhedaḥ vā ādye siddha sādhana tā bhāga asiddhiḥ ca tathā hi sati api upādāne kadācid upādeyam asat yathā paṭaḥ evam sati api dravye kecid guṇāḥ asantaḥ yathā pākaja ādayaḥ tathā sati api āśraye kāścid kriyā asatyaḥ yathā paṭa calana ādayaḥ jātiḥ ca kācid sati jātimati asatī yathā brāhmaṇam tatra bheda abhedayoḥ aṅgīkārāt bheda sādhanam siddha viṣayam gagana tad bhāgayoḥ īśvara ādi āśrita jñāna ādi guṇa kriyā jātiṣu abhāvāt bhāga asiddha tvam hetoḥ iti na dvitīyaḥ kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvāt abhedasya prāk upapādita tvāt upapādayiṣyamāṇa tvāt ca iti 
NSu_2.2.103d.5–2.2.103d.6^1	 syāt etat yathā bheda sādhakānām vyapadeśa bheda ādīnām viśeṣa āśrayeṇa eva anyathā siddhiḥ uktāḥ tathā sati api tasmin= asattvasya api viśeṣaṇā eva nirvāhaḥ kriyatām kim bheda abheda abhyupagamena mā evam viśeṣasya bheda kārya vyavahāra mātra nirvāhaka tvena vināśam pratyanirvāhaka tvāt sakala bhedakāyarkāri tve viśeṣaḥ bhedaḥ eva na tad pratinidhiḥ syāt kiñca aneka āśritasya avayavinaḥ dvi tva ādeḥ ca āśrayeṇa atyānta abhede satya āśrayaṇām api parasparam abhedaḥ prasajyate tad parihāra artham tāvat avaśyam tatra bhedaḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ naca avacchedakena vinā bheda abheda bhūmeḥ saṅgrahaḥ syāt iti ayāvat āśraya bhāvi tvam eva grāhyam 
NSu_2.2.103d.5–2.2.103d.6^2–2.2.104a.3	 tatra api viśeṣaḥ eva saṅkaram vārayiṣyati iti tu nirastam kiñca pramāṇa anusāriṇakṣa vyavasthā na tu sva icchā anusāriṇī pramāṇam tu bheda abhedau= avagāhataḥ iti vakṣyate nanu anitya dravya āśritāḥ eka tva ādayaḥ api guṇāḥ kim bhedavantaḥ teṣām api dravya kārya tayā tad utta rakṣaṇa bhāvi tvāt iti mā evam ukta uttara tvāt uktam hi etat upādāna dravyam guṇavat upādeya tayā pariṇamate iti nanu bheda abhedau= ekatra viruddhau tad katham ayāvat āśraya bhāvinām avayavi guṇa kamarsāmānyānām avayava ādibhiḥ bheda arbheda abhyupagamaḥ iti atas āha viśeṣam eva iti viśeṣam eva saṃśritya bheda abhedau= ekatra bhavataḥ iti sambandhaḥ avadhāraṇam kāla ādi bheda vyāvṛtti artham katham viśeṣa āśrayaṇe virodha śāntiḥ iti atas āha virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.104b.1–2.2.104b.3	 viśeṣaḥ balavān yatas balavān bheda kārya kāraṇaḥ iti śeṣaḥ tatas viśeṣam samāśritya ekatra bheda abhedau bhavataḥ iti anvayaḥ ayam arthaḥ bhedaḥ hi virodha śānti hetuḥ tathā hi kvacid āśraya bhedaḥ yathā madhurāyām devadatta sadbhāvaḥ srughne tad abhāvaḥ kvacid kālābhedaḥ yathā madhurāyām eva devadattasya bhāva abhāvau kvacid pratiyogi bhedaḥ yathā gavayaḥ go ghaṭābhyām sadṛśaḥ visadṛśaḥ ca iti bheda pratinidhiḥ ca viśeṣaḥ iti uktam atas katham asau bheda abhedau= ekadā eva ekatra eva na avasthāpayet iti evam tarhi ati prasaṅgaḥ sarvatra viśeṣam āśritya virodhasya utsādayitum śakya tvāt iti atas āha dṛṣṭī iti 
NSu_2.2.104c.1–2.2.104c.3	 dṛṣṭi pramāṇataḥ ca eva dṛṣṭiḥ ca tad pramāṇam ca pramāṇa bhūtāḥ dṛṣṭiḥ iti arthaḥ tatas bheda abhedau na viruddhau= iti sambandhaḥ caśabdaḥ viśeṣeṇa saha dṛṣṭeḥ samuccaye na sva icchā mātreṇa bheda abhedau= iti upetya viśeṣeṇa virodha abhāvaḥ abhidhīyate yena atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt iti eva śabdaḥ uktam tāvat avayava avayavi ādi abheda grāhiṇī dṛṣṭiḥ asti sambaddha vastu buddhitaḥ vilakṣaṇa tayā anuvyavasāyāt asti ca bheda grāhiṇī sati api tasmin= asattvāt iti hetu janitā dṛṣṭiḥ iti na ca ete bādhya bādhake anyatarān anuvṛtti prasaṅgāt na api pratipakṣa bhūte pratipattṛṇām ubhaya udāsīna tā āpatteḥ ca evam na atas dvayoḥ api prāmāṇyataḥ ca bheda abhedayoḥ avagata yonar virodhaḥ tat idam uktam pramāṇataḥ iti nanu bhavetām bheda abheda vekatra eva ekadeva pramitau tathā api katham virodha śāntiḥ iti atas āha virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.104d.1–2.2.105.1–2.2.105.3^1	 virodhaḥ darśane katham saha darśane sati katham virodhaḥ vaktum śakyate saha dṛṣṭau viruddhau ca iti vipratiṣiddham iti bhāvaḥ etat eva vivṛṇoti virodhaḥ hi iti virodhaḥ hi avirodhaḥ ca yatas darśanam ānagau tatas dṛṣṭe virodhaḥ tu sadbhiḥ āpādyate katham sarvatra paraspara parihāreṇa eva sattva darśanam mahānavasthāna lakṣaṇa virodhe pramāṇam kvacid saha darśanam ca avirodhe anyasya anirūpaṇāt atas saha dṛṣṭe bheda abheda lakṣaṇe vastu dvaye virodhaḥ katham ucyeta saha darśane hi avirodhaḥ syāt punar virodha kathane vyāghāta anivāraṇāt iti hi śabdena śīta uṣṇa ādau rūpa rasa ādau ca virodha avirodhayoḥ darśana eka pramāṇa tvam nidarśayati tuśabdasya dṛṣṭe tu iti sambandhaḥ sadbhiḥ vidvadbhiḥ iti upahāsaḥ 
NSu_2.2.105.1–2.2.105.3^2	 vaiśeṣika ādayaḥ hi saṃyoga vibhāga śabda ātma viśeṣa guṇānām tatra eva tadā eva bhāva abhāvau= upetya saha darśanāt virodhaḥ na asti iti vadantaḥ punar atra saha darśane api virodham udbhāvayantaḥ sva vyāhata bhāṣiṇaḥ sva ukta vismaraṇa śīlāḥ sva dṛṣṭi pakṣapātinaḥ katham santaḥ syuḥ sarvatra asaha dṛṣṭayoḥ yadi kaścid āgraha mātreṇa saha avasthānam manyate tam pratyeva virodha udbhāvanam kriyate na anyathā iti dharma dharmiṇoḥ bheda abhedau kvacid iti saṅkṣepeṇa uktam tat kim sarveṣu api dravyeṣu uta keṣucid eva iti apekṣāyām āha abhinnaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.106ab.1–2.2.106cd.3	 abhinnaḥ bhagavān svena tad anyena vibhedavān bhagavān iti cetana mātra upalakṣaṇam svena sva avayava guṇa kriyā ādibhiḥ tad anyena prakṛti jīva jaḍa ātmanā prapañcena iti evam vyavasthitau= eva bheda abhedau na tu eka viṣayau= iti arthaḥ ayāvat dravya bhāvi dharmaiḥ bheda abhedau kutas na syātām iti atas āha nityāḥ iti nityāḥ dharmāḥ tadīyāḥ tu sarve asmān na eva bhedinaḥ tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe asmāt kāraṇam asmāt bhagavataḥ dvi tva ādi saṅkhayā vyatiriktāḥ iti śeṣaḥ kva tarhi bheda abhedau= iti atas āha sāmastya iti 
NSu_2.2.107a–2.2.107c.2	 sāmastya ucchedinaḥ anyatra dharmāḥ ubhaya rūpakāḥ bhāve anyatra parameśvarāt jaḍe vastuni iti yāvat sati eva dhamirṇi sāmastyena ucchedavantaḥ ye dharmāḥ te ubhaya rūpiṇaḥ bhinna abhinnāḥ iti arthaḥ abhibhava vyāvṛtti artham sāmastya iti uktam yat vā sāmastye dravyasya avikala tve nāśa abhāve api ye ucchedinaḥ iti vyākhyeyam kim svasat bhāva velā āyām abhedinaḥ asadbhāva velāyām bhedinaḥ iti evam kāla bhedena bheda abhedau= iti atas uktam bhāvaḥ iti sva sadbhāva daśāyām eva ubhaya rūpakāḥ iti arthaḥ vinaṣṭasya asattvena bheda cintā ana vakāśāt prāk atyanta abhede vināśa asambhavāt ca kutas bhinna abhinnāḥ iti atas āha te eva iti 
NSu_2.2.107cd.1–2.2.107cd.3	 te eva ca ucchedāt tad anye ca samastaśas pratyakṣa balena te eva dharmi svarūpa bhūtāḥ eva ucchedāt sati eva dharmiṇī a sattvāt hetoḥ tad anye caśabdau mithas samuccaya arthau samastaśas iti ayāvat dravya bhāvi vivakṣayā uktam yat uktam yāvat avayava bhāvinaḥ avayavinaḥ avayavaiḥ atyanta abhedaḥ ayāvat avayava bhāvinaḥ tu bheda abhedau= iti tena anyat api ca udyam parihṛtam iti āha aṃśāṃśinoḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.108.1–2.2.108.2	 aṃśāṃśinā uḥ abhedena tu aṃśa saṃyogaḥ eva hi aṃśinaḥ na anavasthātaḥ yadi api aṃśeṣu aviśramaḥ tathā hi sarva dikṣu api sambandhāt iti yat aṃśataḥ saṃyogaḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam anavasthāpatteḥ ghaṭa saṃyogaḥ hi ghaṭa aṃśa saṃyoga pūrvakaḥ saḥ api tad aṃśa saṃyoga pūrvakaḥ naceyam niraṃśe paramparā viśrāmyati iti vācyam aṃśa paramparāyāḥ aviśramasya api aṅgīkṛta tvāt atas pūrva pūrva saṃyoga anutpattau= uttarottara anutpatti prasaṅgāt aṃśataḥ saṃyogaḥ iti niyamaḥ na upapadyate iti tat idam asaṅgatam yadi api aṃśataḥ eva saṃyogaḥ yadi api ca aṃśeṣu aṃśa paramparāyāḥ aviśramaḥ tathā api aṃśa aṃśinoḥ abhede na eva aṃśa saṃyogaḥ eva hi yasmāt aṃśinaḥ saṃyogaḥ atas na anavasthā iti 
NSu_2.2.108.3^1	 ayam abhisandhiḥ syāt iyam anavasthā yadi sarvatra aṃśataḥ eva saṃyogaḥ iti vadatām asmākam aṃśinaḥ saṃyogoṃ aśa saṃyogena eva jāyate iti abhiprāyaḥ syāt naca evam kintu yaḥ yasya aṃśinaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa tad aṃśe vartate niraṃśasya tu saṃyogaḥ kva nāma vartatām atas paramāṇvoḥ saṃyoge sati tad vṛtti artham aṃśaḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ iti na hi evam sati kācid anavasthā asti anavasthita kārya kāraṇa bhūta asiddha saṃyoga paramparā śrayaṇa abhāvāt etāvat tu bhavet ghaṭa saṃyogaḥ syāt pramāṇa virodhāt ca ghaṭa saṃyogaḥ ghaṭavṛttiḥ api ghaṭa saṃyogaḥ syāt pramāṇa virodhāt ca ghaṭa saṃyogaḥ ghaṭa vṛttiḥ tad guṇa tvāt tad rūpavat iti 
NSu_2.2.108.3^2–2.2.108.4	 ghaṭa aṃśa vṛttiḥ saṃyogaḥ na ghaṭa saṃyogaḥ tad anya vṛtti tvāt paṭa saṃyoga vat iti etat api anavakāśam aṃśāṃśinā uḥ abhedasya sādhita tvāt atiprasaṅgaḥ hi tadā syāt yadi paṭa vat ghaṭa aṃśaḥ api ghaṭāt atyanta bhinnaḥ syāt abhede tu kva atiprasaṅgaḥ anumānasya api ādyasya siddha sādhana tā aṃśa vṛtteḥ eva ghaṭa vṛtti tvāt aṃśāvṛtti tve sati ghaṭa vṛtti tva sādhane dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ syāt dvitīyaḥ tu hetuḥ svarūpa asiddhaḥ anyathā asiddhaḥ vā iti yadi ghaṭa saṃyogaḥ ghaṭa aṃśe vartate tarhi ghaṭa aṃśa saṃyogaḥ kva vartate iti ced anena nyāyena tad aṃśe saḥ api tad aṃśaḥ iti brūmaḥ na ca evam anavasthā sarve api aṃśi saṃyogāḥ tad tad aṃśa vṛttayaḥ iti atra itara apekṣāyāḥ abhāvāt evam tarhi paramāṇu vṛttiḥ api saṃyogaḥ ghaṭa saṃyogaḥ syāt iti ced kaḥ na iti āha iti aṃśa saṃyogaḥ eva hi aṃśinaḥ saṃyogaḥ atas na anavasthā iti uktam anavasthā parihāram vivṛṇoti ekasmin= iti 
NSu_2.2.109.1–2.2.109.2	 ekasmin jātaḥ eva anyaḥ saṃyogaḥ jāyate yadi anavasthā tadā eva syāt saṃyoga aikye bhavet kva sā avayava paramparāyāḥ aviśramam abhyupagamya ekaikasmin= avayava saṃyoge jāta eva anyaḥ avayava saṃyogaḥ jāyate iti yadi aṅgīkurmaḥ tadā eva anavasthā syāt saṃyoga aikye avayavi saṃyogaḥ kriyātaḥ jātaḥ tad avayave vartate avayava vṛtteḥ saṃyogāt aparaḥ avayavinaḥ saṃyogaḥ na asti iti vāde tu kva sa anavasthā iti 
NSu_2.2.109.3–2.2.109.5	 etena etat api nirastam yat āhuḥ saṃyogaḥ trividhaḥ anyatara karma ja ubhaya karma ja saṃyoga ja bhedāt tatra anyatara karma jaḥ yaḥ kriyāvatā niṣkriyasya yathā sthāṇoḥ śyenena ubhaya karma jaḥ tu viruddha dikkriyayoḥ sannipātaḥ yathā mallayoḥ saṃyoga jaḥ tu saṃyogaḥ kāraṇa akāraṇa saṃyogāt kārya akārya saṃyogaḥ yathā hasta taru saṃyogāt kāya taru saṃyogaḥ iti na hi hasta taru saṃyoga atiriktaḥ kāya taru saṃyogaḥ asti yena asau tat janyaḥ syāt pramāṇa abhāvāt kintu hasta karmaṇā janitaḥ hasta vṛttiḥ saṃyogaḥ eva hasta kāyayoḥ abhedāt kāya saṃyogaḥ bhavati atas eva hastasya aśuci saṃyoge kāya kṣālana ādi vidhayaḥ api upapadyate 
NSu_2.2.109.6	 atas eva vibhāga jaḥ api vibhāgaḥ nirastaḥ dvividham hi tam ācakṣate kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāgāt kāraṇa vibhāgāt ca iti tatra ādyaḥ yathā hasta taru vibhāgāt kāya taru vibhāgaḥ dvitīyaḥ yathā dvi tantuka avayave tantau karma utpannam tasya tantu antarāt vibhāgam karoti vibhāgāt tantvoḥ saṃyogaḥ naśyati tatas dvi tantuka vināśaḥ tatas idānīm tantvoḥ vartamānaḥ vibhāgaḥ sa kriyasya avayavasya dvi tantuka saṃyukta ākāśa ādi deśāt vibhāgam karoti iti 
NSu_2.2.109.7–2.2.109.8	 tatra ādyaḥ tāvat anupapannaḥ hasta taru vibhāga atiriktasya kāyataru vibhāgasya anupalambhāt hasta karmaṇā janitaḥ hi vibhāgaḥ hasta kāyayoḥ abhedāt hasta kāya guṇaḥ bhavati atas eva vivāda adhyāsitaḥ vibhāgaḥ na karma asamavāyi kāraṇakaḥ karma eka artha asamaveta tvāt śabda vat itaya siddha tayā nirastam dvitīyaḥ tu anupapannataraḥ tantu karmaṇā eva tantoḥ tantu antarāt ākāśa ādi deśāt ca vibhāga utpatti upapattau krama kalpanā anupapatteḥ anyathā aṅguli karmaṇā aṅguleḥ aṅguli antarāt eva vibhāgaḥ bhavati ākāśa ādi deśāt tu vibhāgāt eva iti syāt 
NSu_2.2.109.9	 nanu aṅguli karma aṅguli vibhāgam ākāśa ādi vibhāgam ca karoti tayoḥ vibhāgayoḥ aviruddha tvāt tantu karma tu tantu antara vibhāgam ākāśa ādi vibhāgam na kartum arhati tayoḥ vibhāgayoḥ dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga virodhi tva avirodhi tva rūpa virodhāt na hi aviruddhāt kāraṇāt viruddha kārya utpattiḥ sambhavati iti mā evam ekasmāt eva karmaṇaḥ saṃyoga vibhāga jana na abhyupagamāt tantu karmarāḥ dravya ārambhaka an ārambhaka tantu antara ākāśa saṃyoga janma aṅgīkārāt ca anyathā kāraṇa akāraṇa saṃyoga ja saṃyoga vat kāraṇa mātra saṃyoga jaḥ api saṃyogaḥ svīkāryaḥ syāt 
NSu_2.2.109.10	 nanu saṃyogasya na svarūpataḥ virodhaḥ asti yatas dravya anārambhaka dravya samavetaḥ eva saṃyogaḥ dravya anārambhakaḥ dravya anārambhakam ca dravyam saptavidham ārabdha dravyamantya avaya vi sparśa rahitam vinaśyat avastham vinaśyat avastha saṃyogam niṣphala ārambham vijātīyam ca iti tatas karmaṇā eva saṃyoga dvaya janma upapattiḥ iti eyam tarhi vibhāgayoḥ api kaḥ virodhaḥ dravya ārambhān ārambha prayukta tvāt virodha pratīteḥ tantu dvaya vibhāga janakam tantu karma na tantu ākāśa vibhāga janakam dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga virodhi vibhāga janaka karma tvāt dravyānrārambhaka saṃyoga virodhi vibhāga janaka karma vat iti ābhāsa samāna yogakṣema tvāt tantu karma na tantu antara vibhāga janakam karma tvāt sampratipanna karma vat iti api prayoga sambhavāt tatra pramāṇa bādhaḥ iti ced samam anyatra api vibhāga dvaya yaugapadya anubhavāt tantu karma ākāśa vibhāga janakam karma tvāt iti pratipakṣaḥ ca ākāśa vibhāge vibhāgena kartavye karmaṇaḥ nimitta tva abhyupagamāt siddha sādhanam iti ced na janaka śabdasya asamavāyi artha tvāt 
NSu_2.2.109.11	 etena vimatam karma dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga virodhi tadavirodhi vibhāga janakam na bhavati karma tvāt iti nirastam vimatam karma dravya ārambhaka an ārambhaka saṃyoga ārambhakam na bhavati karma tvāt śyena karma vat iti ābhāsa tulya tvāt sat pratipakṣa tvāt ca yat ākāśa vibhāga janakam karma na tad dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga virodhi vibhāga janakam yathā aṅguli karmā iti vyāpteḥ tantu karmaṇaḥ gagana vibhāga janaka tve tantu antara vibhāga janaka tvam na syāt iti ca id na naḥ yat yat pradeśa vibhāga janakam na bhavati na tad tad pradeśa stha dravya vibhāga janakam iti vyāpteḥ ākāśa deśa vibhāga ajanaka tve tantu antarāt api vibhāga janakam na syāt iti pratiprasaṅga sambhavāt 
NSu_2.2.109.12–2.2.109.14	 kiñca tantoḥ ākāśa vibhāgaḥ yadi vibhāga jaḥ na tu karma jaḥ tadā sa karmakasya iva akarmakasya api kutas na syāt vibhāgasya ubhayatra api sāmyāt uttara vibhāge karma nimitta kāraṇam iti atas na iti ced na ādya vibhāga jananena eva upakṣīṇasya kāraṇa tva anavadhāraṇāt avadhāraṇe vā asamavāyi tvasya anivāraṇāt anyathā tad lakṣaṇasya ati vyāpteḥ iti alam vistareṇa evam chalatvena anavasthā prasaṅgam nirākṛtya prakāra antareṇa nirākaroti aṃśaḥ iti aṃśi saṃyogasya aṃśa vṛtti tva dṛṣṭeḥ ca na anavasthā doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ dṛṣṭa tve katham adoṣa tvam iti atas āha dṛṣṭaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.110a.1–2.2.110a.2	 aṃśe saṃyoga dṛṣṭeḥ ca āpādake arthe dṛṣṭe sati sā anavasthitiḥ kā na dūṣaṇam iti yāvat etat uktam bhavati yadi aṃśataḥ saṃyogaḥ syāt tadā anavasthā syāt tatas ca saṃyoga abhāvaḥ eva āpadyeta na cāsau yuktaḥ tasmāt na aṃśataḥ saṃyogaḥ iti hi viparyaye paryavasānam kartavyam anavasthāyāḥ tarka tvāt viparyaya aparyavasāyinaḥ ca tarka ābhāsa tva niyamāt 
NSu_2.2.110b.1–2.2.110b.3	 dṛṣṭe kā sānavasthitiḥ atra aṃśataḥ saṃyoge na bhavati iti kaḥ arthaḥ yadi aṃśi saṃyogasya aṃśa saṃyoga pūrvaka tā niyamaḥ na asti iti tarhi evam iti vadāmaḥ yadi aṃśi saṃyogoṃ aśa vṛttiḥ na bhavati iti tat na ghaṭa ādi aṃśi saṃyogasya tad aṃśa vṛtti tāyāḥ pratyakṣa dṛṣṭa tvena viparyaya paryavasānasya bādhita tvāt ghaṭa saṃyogaḥ ghaṭaḥ eva vartate kintva vyāpya vṛtti tvāt tad aṃśa vṛttiḥ iva avabhāsate iti ced kā iyam avyāpya vṛtti tā nāma anyāḥ aṃśa vṛtti tvāt svābhāva samāna adhikaraṇa tvam iti ced na viruddha tvāt dṛṣṭa tvāt avirodhaḥ iti ced na kim aṃśa bhedena bhāva abhāvau dṛśyete uta ghaṭaḥ eva iti sandehāt na hi aviruddha viṣaya tve sati viruddha viṣaya tā aṅgīkartum ucitā upādhi bhedāt avirodhaḥ iti ced ke te upādhayaḥ aṃśāḥ eva iti ced te eva santu tarhi saṃyoga avābhāva āśrayāḥ kim aṃśa vṛtti tvena viruddhena aṅgīkṛtena aṃśāṃśinā uḥ abhedena atiprasaṅgasya apāsta tvāt iti pratitarka parāhata tvāt ca atiprasaṅgaḥ ayam iti āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.110cd.1–2.2.110cd.3	 yadi aṃśa gaḥ na saṃyogaḥ kāryeṣu prathimā katham yadi kāraṇānām saṃyogaḥ tad aṃśa vṛttiḥ na syāt tadā tad ārabdheṣu kāryeṣu kāraṇa apekṣayā parimāṇa utkarṣaḥ na syāt iti arthaḥ ayam abhisandhiḥ kāraṇa parimāṇa apekṣayā kārye parimāṇa utkarṣaḥ tāvat sarvatra pracaya janyaḥ dvi tūlake tathā darśanāt pracaya hīna tūla dvaya janya rajju dravye tad abhāva upalambhāt ca pracayaḥ ca kāraṇayoḥ praśithilaḥ saṃyogaḥ praśithila tā ca saṃyogasya keṣucid aṃśeṣu vṛttiḥ keṣucid avṛttiḥ eva na anyā anirūpaṇāt tatas saṃyogasya aṃśa vṛtti tva abhāve pracayaḥ asau na bhavati iti kāraṇa abhāvāt utkṛṣṭa parimāṇa utpādaḥ na syāt iti 
NSu_2.2.110cd.4	 astu anyasya saṃyogaḥ yathā tathā prastute paramāṇau saṃyogasya aṃśa vṛtti tva abhāve na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na anvaya vyatirekābhyām kāraṇa parimāṇa utkṛṣṭasya kārya parimāṇasya pracaya ākhya aṃśa vṛtti saṃyoga jatvā avadhāraṇāt kāraṇa abhāve ca kārya abhāva niyamāt paramāṇu saṃyogasya aṃśa vṛtti tva abhāve tad kārye dvayaṇuke paramāṇu parimāṇāt utkṛṣṭa parimāṇam na utpadyeta iti asya eva bādhakasya sattvāt nanu idam iṣya āpādanam paramāṇutaḥ dvayaṇuke parimāṇa utkarṣa abhāvāt iti atas āha paramāṇoḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.111ab.1–2.2.111ab.3	 paramāṇoḥ aṇoḥ na asti mahattā iti adbhutam vacaḥ paramāṇu parimāṇāt aṇa udvaryaṇukasya mahat tā parimāṇa utkarṣaḥ na asti iti vacaḥ adbhutam sva vyāhatam pramāṇa viruddham ca iti arthaḥ ayam āḍhyaḥ ayam parama āḍhyaḥ itivat aṇu paramāṇu śabdābhyām eva parimāṇa tāratamya avagateḥ tad abhāva vacanam sva vyāhatam bhavati dvi tantuka parimāṇa vat asamudita avayava janya dravya parimāṇa tvena dvayaṇuka parimāṇasya paramāṇu parimāṇāt utkarṣasya anumāna avaga tvāt ca iti nanu yat kāraṇa parimāṇa janyam utkṛṣṭa parimāṇam tat eva pracaya janmay tri aṇuka parimāṇa vat dvayaṇuka parimāṇam api kāraṇa parimāṇa janyam na bhavati kintu kāraṇa saṃkhyā janyam eva tat katham paramāṇoḥ pracaya abhāve dvayaṇuke parimāṇa utkarṣa anutpāda āpādanam iti atas āha aṇūnām iti 
NSu_2.2.111c–2.2.111f.3	 aṇūnām prathimā apekṣām vinā eva tṛyaṇuke api saḥ paramāṇoḥ mahat tvam ca vinā iti etat vacaḥ katham dvayaṇukānām parimāṇa utkarṣa apekṣām vinā eva saṃkhyā mātreṇa tri aṇuke sa parimāṇa utkarṣaḥ jāyate tathā paramāṇoḥ mahat tvam parimāṇa utkarṣam vinā kevala saṃkhyayā dvayaṇuke parimāṇa utkarṣaḥ jāyate iti etat vacaḥ katham ghaṭate mahat dīrgha vat vā iti nirasta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ ca api śabdau= itaretara samuccaye atra parimāṇa mātra grahaṇe kartavye prathimā iti mahat tvam iti ca uktiḥ visadṛśa parimāra tvasya anapekṣā hetoḥ nirākaraṇam smārayitum iti aṃśāṃśinoḥ atyantābhedaḥ bheda abhedau ca iti yat uktam tat viśadayati aṃśinaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.112ab.1–2.2.112ab.3	 aṃśinaḥ aṃśaiḥ abhedaḥ ayam aṃśena tu bhidā abhidā yathā gagana ādeḥ yāvat aṃśa bhāvinoṃ aśinaḥ sva aṃśaiḥ atyanta abhedaḥ tathā paṭa ādeḥ aṃśinaḥ api sarvaiḥ aṃśaiḥ atyanta abhedaḥ ekaika aṃśena tu bhidā abhidā ayam iti uttara vākyena sambaddhayate nanu etat ayuktam sarva tantu bhāve api kadācid paṭasya abhāvāt khaṇḍite bheda abheda svīkārāt atas ekena eva sarvaiḥ api paṭasya bheda abhedau= eva upacitau tathā ca uktam brahmatarke tantubhyaḥ anyaḥ paṭaḥ sākṣāt kasya dṛṣṭi patham gataḥ ananyaḥ ced tantu bhāve paṭa abhāvaḥ kutas bhavet a iti ucyate vyatiṣaṅga viśiṣṭāḥ hi tantavaḥ avagamyate na ca tad bhāve kadāpi paṭa abhāvaḥ tasmāt vayati ṣaṅga viśeṣa viśiṣṭaiḥ sarva tantubhiḥ paṭasya atyanta abhedaḥ eva avivakṣita vyatiṣaṅgaiḥ sarva tantubhiḥ tu bheda abhedau= eva iti na kaścid virodhaḥ 
NSu_2.2.112ab.4–2.2.112ab.5	 nanu evam tarhi vyatiṣakta tantu vyatirekeṇa paṭa abhāve paramāṇu puñja vāda āpattiḥ iti mā evam yathā hi guṇānām dravya abhede na dravyam nirguṇam yathā ca pareṣām sāmānya ādau= atirikta satta abhāve na asattvam tathā vyatiṣakta tantavaḥ eva paṭaḥ tathā api na paṭa abhāvaḥ kintu sati vyatiṣaktāḥ tantavaḥ paṭaḥ ca sa ca tebhyaḥ na bhidyate iti katham etat iti ced viśeṣa śaktayā eva iti brūmaḥ nanu vyatiṣakta sarva tantubhyaḥ api paṭasya bhedaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ tantu vyatiṣaṅga anantaram paṭasya jāyamāna tvāt katham ca ekaika tantunā abhedaḥ eka ekatra paṭa buddhaya bhāvāt iti ataḥ āha sarva iti 
NSu_2.2.112cd.1–2.2.112cd.2	 sarva pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ katham eva hi apohyate uktaḥ ayam arthaḥ sarva pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ yasmāt tasmāt katham eva apodyate etat uktam bhavati asti tāvat vayati ṣakta sarva tantūnām paṭasya ca abhede pratyakṣam tad pratīteḥ sambaddha vastu dvaya pratīti vailakṣaṇyasya sākṣi siddha tvāt na ca bhede pramāṇam asti yena saḥ api svīkariṣyate jāyatām nāma tantu vyatiṣaṅgam paṭam ācakṣmahe kintu vyatiṣaṅge sati yat tantūnām viśiṣṭam rūpam naca ekaika tantu parityāge sarva tantavaḥ nāma santi atas tatra api asti eva abheda pratītiḥ eka ekatra paṭa buddhaya bhāvaḥ tu bhedam ākṣipati na tu pratyakṣa siddham abhedam apavadati iti 
NSu_2.2.112cd.3	 atha api syāt avayavi ādīnām avayava ādibhiḥ abhedaḥ na upapadyate ekaḥ hi avayavi aneke ca avayavāḥ tad abhede avayavānām api abhedaḥ avayavinaḥ vā bhedaḥ prasajyeta tathā guṇāḥ ca kecid aneka āśritāḥ ekā eva hi saṃyogu ayaktiḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ vartate tathā vibhāga vyaktiḥ api saṅkhayā ca dvividhāḥ ekatva aneka tva bhedāt tatra ekatvasya eka dravya gata tve api dvi tva ādi ka m ena īka āśritam evam pṛthaktavam api dvividham eka pṛthaktavam aneka pṛthaktavam ca tatra eka pṛthaktavasya eka dravya vṛtti tve api dvi pṛthakta va ādikam aneka āśritam eva evaṃca guṇānām guṇinaikye saṃyoga ādi āśraya aneka dravyā bhedaḥ vā saṃyoga ādi bhedaḥ vā apadyeta sāmānyam ca ekam aneka āśritam tasya vyaktaya bhede vyaktīnām api abhedaḥ sāmānyasya vā bhedaḥ prasajyeta iti atas saṃyoga vibhāga pṛthaktavānām tāvat aneka āśrita tvam na asti iti āha saṃyogaḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.2.113ab.1–2.2.113ab.3	 saṃyogaḥ ca vibhāgaḥ ca bhedaḥ ca eva pṛthak pṛthak bhedaḥ iti pṛthaktavam ucyate caśabdāḥ itaretara yoge pṛthak pṛthak eva eka eka dravya āśritā eva iti arthaḥ tatas ca ekena guṇena abhinna tve dravyayoḥ api abhedaḥ syāt iti atiprasaṅgasya āpādaka asiddhiḥ aneka dravya abhinna tve guṇasya api bhedaḥ syāt iti asya iṣi āpattiḥ dūṣaṇam iti uktam bhavati nanu ghaṭa paṭa saṃyoga vibhāga bhedā ghaṭa paṭa sambandhitayā anubhūyate tat katham ekaika āśritāḥ tathā tve ca ekaikasmin= eva saṃyukta ādi pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha anyonya iti 
NSu_2.2.113cd.1–2.2.113cd.2	 anyonya pratiyogena hi ubhayoḥ api dṛśyate pratiyogaḥ pratiyogi tvam anyonyasya pratiyogaḥ anyonya pratiyogaḥ yad saṃyoga ādiḥ ubhayoḥ api dṛśyate tad anyonya pratiyogena hi nimittena atra ubhayoḥ api iti aneka upalakṣaṇam bhedasya bahu sambandhi tayā api pratīteḥ etat uktam bhavati ghaṭa pratiyogikaḥ saṃyoga ādiḥ paṭe asti tathā paṭa pratiyogikaḥ ghaṭe asti tasmāt ubhaya sambandhi tayā pratibhāsaḥ ati prasaṅga abhāvaḥ ca yujyate iti 
NSu_2.2.113cd.3–2.2.113cd.4	 syāt etat yadi saṃyoga ādīnām ekaika vṛtti tve pramāṇam syāt tat eva na asti iti atas āha anyonya iti pṛthak pṛthak eva iti anuvartate anyonya pratiyogena hetunā saṃyoga ādikam ubhayoḥ api pṛthak pṛthak eva hi dṛśyate ayam arthaḥ paṭaḥ ghaṭena saṃyuktaḥ ghaṭāt vibhaktaḥ ghaṭāt bhinnaḥ iti paṭa dharmaḥ saṃyoga ādi gharṭa pratiyogika tayā pratīyate yaḥ ca yat pratiyogikaḥ na asau tad dharmaḥ yathā sthavira pratiyogikam apara tvam na sthavira dharmaḥ tasmāt na ayam saṃyoga ādiḥ ghaṭa dharmaḥ evam ghaṭa dharmaḥ saṃyoga ādiḥ paṭa pratiyogitayā upalabhyamānaḥ na paṭa dharmaḥ bhavitum arhati tathā ca pṛthak pṛthak eva saṃyoga ādiḥ aneka dharmaḥ avagamyate iti 
NSu_2.2.113cd.5	 nanu astu saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ iyam gatiḥ na tu pṛthaktave yat hi ghaṭāt paṭaḥ pṛthak paṭāt ca ghaṭaḥ pṛthak iti anyonya pratiyogika tayā pratīyate tat eka pṛthaktavam pṛthak pṛthak eva abhyupagamyate yat tu bhinnau= imau bhinnāḥ ime iti pratīyate tad aneka pṛthaktavam aneka āśritam eva pratiyogya nirūpyasya eka āśrita tve māna abhāvāt iti atas āha bhinnāḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.114a–2.2.114c.5	 bhinnāḥ iti tu bhedānām samudāyaḥ hi dṛśyate yathā eva ca padārthānām ime bhinnāḥ ityādi pratītau bhedānām samudāyaḥ aneka tvam hi dṛśyate katham yathā eva ca padārthānām etat uktam bhavati yathā hi śuklāḥ ime paṭāḥ ityādi pratītau= aneke paṭāḥ anekāni ca tad viśeṣaṇāni śauklayāni avabhāsante tathā bhinnāḥ ime ityādi pratītau= api aneke padārthāḥ aneke ca bhedāḥ prakāśante iti abhyupagantavyam na ca viśeṣa pramāṇam asti yena atra anyaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati iti etena saṃyuktau= imau= iti ādi pratītiḥ api vyākhyātā veditavyā nanu anayoḥ bhedaḥ amīṣām bhedaḥ iti pratītau= aneka āśritam pṛthaktavam upalabhyate tat katham etat iti ced kim atra anekasya dharmi tayā avabhāsam pramāṇayasi uta dharmasya ekatva avabhāsam uta ubhaya avabhāsam pakṣa traye api uttaram āha anayoḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.114d.1–2.2.115ab.3	 anayoḥ bhedaḥ iti api itas amuṣya amutas api asya bhedaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ dvi dharmikaḥ asyām api pratītau= itas ghaṭāt amuṣya paṭasya amutaḥ paṭāt amuṣya ghaṭasya bhedaḥ iti evam dvi dharmikaḥ bhedaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tathā ca anekasya dharmi tve api dharmasya ekatva avabhāsā sammateḥ na anena abhimata artha siddhiḥ iti uktam bhavati anena eva anayoḥ saṃyogaḥ ityādi pratītiḥ api vyākhyātā draṣṭavyā nanu vacana liṅgāḥ hi vaktuḥ abhiprāyāḥ bhedaḥ iti ca eka vacanam prayujyate tena anumīyate asyām pratītau= ekaḥ eva bhedaḥ dvi dharmikaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti tasmāt anyonya pratiyogika aneka dharmikā aneka bheda viṣaya tvam pratīteḥ na vaktum śakyam iti atas āha tatra iti 
NSu_2.2.115cd.1–2.2.115cd.2	 tatra eka vacanam yat tat viprāṇām bhojanam yathā tatra anayoḥ bhedaḥ ityādi vākye bheda dvaye vā bhojanam iti eka vacanam yathā tathā iti arthaḥ etena eka vacanena pratīteḥ eka artha viṣaya tva anumāne anaikāntika tvam samudāya viṣaya tvena anyathā siddhiḥ ca iti uktam bhavati avayavinaḥ tu eka tve api na kaścid doṣaḥ ākāśasya sva avayavaiḥ abheda vat avayavānām api abhedasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt paṭasya ca yādṛśena tantu samudāyena atyanta abhedaḥ abhihitaḥ saḥ ekaḥ eva vyatiṣaktānām tantūnām viśiṣṭa ākāraḥ hi asau sa ca āgantuka tvāt tantubhyaḥ bhinna abhinnaḥ eva ekaikena tantunā sarvaiḥ ca bhede api bhedasya api vidyamāna tvāt na anyonya abheda prasaktiḥ iti svayam eva uhyatām iti na uktam 
NSu_2.2.115cd.3	 nanu evam tarhi saṃyoga ādeḥ api ekaika āśrita tvam na vaktavyam ayāvat dravya bhāvi tvena bheda abhedābhyām eva ukta ākṣepa samādhānāt iti satyam tathā api vastu sthitiḥ iya muktā ityadoṣaḥ api ca aja saṃyoge na ayam samādhiḥ sambhavati saḥ eva na asti pramāṇa abhāvāt iti ced na paramāṇoḥ ākāśa ādi saṃyoga aṅgīkārāt saḥ api paramāṇu karma jaḥ iti ced na prāc asa yoga prasaṅgāt aṃśa bhedāt na iti ced na svābhāvikasya anabhyupagamāt aupādhikasya ca nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt 
NSu_2.2.115cd.4–2.2.116a.2	 kiñca ākāśam īśvareṇa saṃyujyate dravya tvāt ghaṭa vat na ca mūrta tvam upādhiḥ viśeṣaṇa vaiyarthyāt paricchinna parimāṇavat tvena eva alam paricchinna tva viśeṣaṇam tu vyartham eva ākāśam īśvareṇa na saṃyujyate amūrta tvāt rūpa vat iti ced na adravya tvasya upādhi tvāt iti idānīm sāmānyasya ekaika āśrita tvam āha naḥ tu ādikam iti nara tva ādikam api evam evam saṃyoga ādi vat ekaika vṛtti iti arthaḥ sāmānyam api iti vaktavye brāhmaṇa tvādeḥ ayāvat dravya bhāvi tvena api tatra parihāraḥ sambhavati iti jñāpayitum nara tva ādikam iti uktam upapādanam ca na eka prakāram iti yoga vibhāgaḥ kutas nara tva ādikam prativyakti bhinnam iti atas āha tat tat iti 
NSu_2.2.116b.1–2.2.116b.3	 tat tad dharmatayeyate yathā hi nareṣu upalabhyamāneṣu tadīyam rūpa ādikam pratiniyatam upalabhyate tathā nara tva ādikam api tad tad niyata dharma tayā eva iyate dṛśyate iti pratyakṣa muktam yat vā yaḥ aneka āśritaḥ dharmaḥ na asau= ekaika pratītau pratīyate yathā dvi tva ādi pratīyate ca nara tva ādikam ekaika pratītau= atas na anugatam iti anumānam anena sūcayati kiñca nara tva ādikam na aneka anuvṛttam dharma tvāt rūpa ādi vat asya ābhāsa uddhāram karoti na iti 
NSu_2.2.116c.1–2.2.116c.3	 na sarva dharmaḥ ekaḥ asti sarva dharmaḥ aneka vṛtti dharmaḥ tena dharma tvam na bhagna vyāptikam iti śeṣaḥ pakṣa dharma tā tu sphuṭā eva iti nanu aneka tva saṅkhayā tāvat aneka āśritā ekaikasmin dvi tva ādeḥ śaṅkitum api aśakya tvāt na hi dvi tva ādikam ekaika pratītau pratīyate na ca pratiyogi nirūpyam dharmi tayā eva anekeṣām anubhavāt atas dharma tva hetoḥ tatra anaikāntyam iti atas āha samudāyaḥ tu iti 
NSu_2.2.116d.1–2.2.116d.3	 samudāyaḥ tu bhinna gaḥ samudāyaḥ aneka tvam bhinna gaḥ aneka āśritaḥ satyam aneka tva saṅkhayā aneka āśritā tathā api tad anya tvena hetu viśeṣaṇāt adoṣaḥ iti bhāvaḥ sā ca apekṣā buddhi janya tvāt ayāvat dravya bhāvinī bhinna abhinnā iti na āśrayayoḥ abheda āpattiḥ prābhākarāḥ tu āhuḥ sādṛśyam tāvat ekam aneka anugatam tatra dharma tva hetaḥ vyarbhi cāraḥ na ca vācyam sāmānyam eva sādṛśyam atas pakṣe vyabhicāra codanā iyam anupapannā iti jāti saṅkara prasaṅgāt asti hi kayoḥ cit aśvarāsa bhavaktayoḥ sādṛśyam tatra yadi sādṛśyam aśva tvāt param tadā sarveṣām api aśvānām rāsabha sādṛśyam syāt yadi ca aparam tadā rāsabha vyaktau= api aśva tvam syāt evam rāsabha tve api vācyam na sādṛśyam aśva rāsabha vṛtti brūmaḥ kintu tad avaya vṛtti dravya guṇa avayava karma vṛttīni sāmānyāt eva hi sādṛśya nāmanyabhyupagacchāmaḥ atas na jāti saṅkara doṣaḥ iti ced na gauḥ gavayena sadṛśī ityādi vyavahārāṇām amukhya tva prasaṅgāt na ca sāmānyam pratiyogi nirūpyam tad nirūpyam ca sādṛśyam iti sphuṭaḥ anayoḥ bhedaḥ iti atas āha etādṛśam ca iti 
NSu_2.2.117ab.1–2.2.117ab.3	 etādṛśam ca sādṛśyam padārtheṣu pṛthak pṛthak bhavatu sādṛśyam sāmānyatas bhinnam tathā api tad padārtheṣu pṛthak pṛthak eva iti na tena dharma tva hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ etādṛśam iti tatra ukta hetu atideśaḥ na hi sādṛśyasya aneka vṛtti tve pramāṇasya anena sādṛśyam asya anena śuklau= imau= ityādi vat upapatteḥ anayoḥ sādṛśyam iti ādeḥ ca āsya anena sādṛśyam asya anena sādṛśyam iti upapatteḥ eka vacanasyāḥ viprāṇām bhojanam ityādi vat upapanna tvat pratiyoginaḥ dharmi tva asambhavāt ca eka āśrita tve api pratiyogi nirūpya tvena ekaika pratītau= api apratīti sambhavāt ca iti nara tva ādi sāmānyasya prativyakti bhinna tve anumāna antaram āha ekasmin= iti 
NSu_2.2.117cd.1–2.2.117cd.3	 ekasmin sa vinaṣṭe api yatas anyatra eva dṛśyate ekasminnare naṣṭe tad āśritam nara tvam tāvat naṣṭam tathā api sa nara tva lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ anyatra nara antare dṛśyate eva yatas atas api nara tva ādikam iti uktena sambandhaḥ yat vā vinaṣṭam vināśaḥ saha vinaṣṭena vartate iti sa vinaṣṭam tasmin vināśavatī iti yāvat athavā aśrayeṇa saha vinaṣṭam sa vinaṣṭam tasmin= iti yojanā ayam atra prayogaḥ naṣṭān aṣṭa varti nara tvam bheda vat viruddha dharma āśraya tvāt chāyā atapavat naca asiddhaḥ hetuḥ naṣṭa āśrayasya nara tvasya naṣṭa tvāt anyasya tu dṛśyamāna tvena avinaṣṭa tvāt yat vedam nara tvam vinaṣṭāt nara tvāt bhidyate avinaṣṭa tvāt ghaṭa vat yadi vā tat nara tvam avinaṣṭāt nara tvāt bhidyate vinaṣṭa tvāt ghaṭa vat iti bhavet etat yadi vinaṣṭa nara āśritam api nara tvam vinaśyet na ca etat asti tasya nitya tvāt iti atas āha kutas iti 
NSu_2.2.118ab.1–2.2.118c.3	 kutas bhasma tvam āptasya nara tvam punar iṣyate naṣṭa nara āśritasya api nara tvasya punar sattvam na niṣpramāṇakam pratyakṣa siddha tvāt naṣṭān aṣṭa nara āśritam nara tvam tāvat ekam tat ca avinaṣṭe nare punar upalabhyate atas eva anumānam api bādhita viṣayam iti atas āha ekatvaḥ iti eka tve na asti mānam ca syātedadyadyetayoḥ ekatve mānam syāt na ca tat asti iti arthaḥ na ca pratyabhijñānam pramāṇam tasya svarūpataḥ pramāṇa tvena sandigdha tvāt caśabdena anyonya āśraya tvam samuccinoti eka tve hi punar sattva siddhiḥ tad siddhau ca eka tva siddhiḥ iti evam sāmānya ādīnām pratyāśrayam bhede pratyakṣa anumānāni uktavā śrutim api āha śrutiḥ api iti 
NSu_2.2.118d.1–2.2.121a.2	 śrutiḥ api āha sa ādaram anivṛtta vināśāḥ tu dharmāḥ ubhaya rūpakāḥ na kenacid abhinnaḥ atas bhagavān sva guṇaiḥ vinā anivṛtta vināśāḥ tu dharmāḥ ubhaya rūpakāḥ na kenacid abhinnaḥ atas bhagavān sva guṇaiḥ vinā iti āha sāmānya ādīnām pratyāśrayam bhedam iti śeṣaḥ bhinnāḥ para sparataḥ bhedavantaḥ anyonyam bhinnāḥ dharmāḥ yeṣām te bhinna dharmāḥ bhinna dharmāḥ iti anena āśrayataḥ api bhedaḥ abhihitaḥ iti śaṅkā nirāsa artham uktam svaiḥ iti svarūpaiḥ api yathā bhagavān matsya ādibhiḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ dharmaiḥ abhinnāḥ ca iti asya apavādaḥ anivṛttā iti anivṛtte api āśraye vināśaḥ yeṣām te tathā uktāḥ yathā amaghaṭa śyāma tā ādayaḥ ubhaya rūpakāḥ bhinna abhinnāḥ na kenacid iti śrutiḥ sva prakṛtam upasaṃharati atra sarvaśas ityādi vacanāt ukta vivaraṇāt ca ādaraḥ pratīyate 
NSu_2.2.121a.3–2.2.121a.4	 nanu ghaṭa ādeḥ āma dravyasya agninā sambaddhasya agni abhighātāt nodanāt vā tad ārambhakeṣu paramāṇuṣu karmāṇi utpadyante tebhyaḥ vibhāgāḥ vibhāgebhyassaṃyoga vināśāḥ saṃyoga vināśebhyaḥ kārya dravyam vinaśyati tasmin vicaṣṭe paramāṇuṣu agni saṃyogāt auṣṇya apekṣāt śyāmā ādīnām vināśaḥ punar anyasmāt agni saṃyogāt auṣṇya apekṣāt pāka jāḥ jāyante tad anantaram bhoginām adṛṣṭa apekṣāt ātma aṇu saṃyogāt utpanna pāka jeṣu aṇuṣu karma utpattau teṣām paraspara saṃyogāt dvayaṇuka ādi krameṇa kārya dravyam utpadyate tatra ca kāraṇa guṇa prakrameṇa rūpa ādi utpattiḥ bhavati tad katham āma ghaṭa śyāma tva ādīnām ayāvat dravya bhāvi tvam ucyate mā evam atra pramāṇa abhāvāt 
NSu_2.2.121a.5	 nodana ādi utpattau karma utpattiḥ pramāṇam karmasu vibhāgāḥ teṣu pūrva saṃyoga nivṛttiḥ tatra kārya dravya vināśaḥ tatra ca pūrvarūpa ādi parāvṛttiḥ tathā rūpa ādi antara utpattiḥ sthūla dravya utpattau pramāṇam sā tad avayava paramparāyām sā dvayaṇuke tad utpattiḥ paramāṇu saṃyoge sa ca tat kriyā ayam sā tad avayava paramparāyām sā tad avayava paramparāyām sā dvayaṇuke tad utpattiḥ paramāṇu saṃyoge sa ca tad kriyāyām sa adṛṣṭa vat ātma saṃyogaḥ iti ced na paramāṇuṣu iva kārya dravyeṣu pūrvarūpa ādi nivṛtteḥ apūrvarūpa ādi utpatteḥ upapatteḥ pārthiva avayavi rūpa ādayaḥ sva āśraya vināśāt eva vinaśyanti avayavi rūpa ādi tvāt dagdha paṭa rūpa ādi vat kāraṇa guṇebhyaḥ eva utpadyante tatas eva tadvat eva iti ced na kvacid satya āśraye api rūpa ādi vināśe agni saṃyoga ja tve ca virodha abhāvāt anyathā kārya dravyam saṃyoga vināśāt eva vinaśyati kārya dravya tvāt dvayaṇuka vat iti ādikam api syāt 
NSu_2.2.121a.6–2.2.121a.7	 nanu agni saṃyogaḥ sarva avayaveṣu asti na vā nacet tatra rūpa ādi vināśa utpāda asambhavaḥ tathā ca avayava avayavinoḥ vilakṣaṇa rūpa ādimattvam syāt ādye agni avayavānām sarvatra praveśena avayavi nāśasya āvarjanīya tvam iti ced avayavi dravyāṇām sa= chidra tvena praveśa upapatteḥ saṃsthāna apagama abhāvena avayavi vināśa ayogāt tathāvidhasya eva udāhṛta tvāt iti alam evam sāmānyasya aneka vṛtti tvam pramāṇaiḥ apākṛtam tat ayuktam tasya aneka vṛtti tva abhāve bādhaka sadbhāvāt 
NSu_2.2.121a.8	 tathā hi sarveṣu gopiṇḍeṣu yadi anugatam ekam go tva sāmānyam na syāt tadā tatra go śabda saṅgati grahaṇa lakṣaṇāḥ vyutpattiḥ na syāt vṛddha vyavahāra upadeśa ādinā hi vyutpattiḥ bhavati na ca pratipiṇḍam vyavahāra ādikam asti teṣām ānantyena vyutpattau= eva puruṣa āyuṣa paryavasāna prasaṅgāt atas yatra upadeśa ādikam tatra eva vyutpattiḥ vyavahāraḥ ca iti syāt atha vinā eva ekena nimittena upadeśa ādi abhāve api gopiṇḍa antare go śabda saṅketam gṛhṇīyāt tadā aśvapiṇḍe api kinna gṛhṇīyāt aviśeṣāt anugata go tve tu go śabda vṛtti nimitta tayā upadeśa ādinā avagate na ayam doṣaḥ prāduṣyāt tasmāt anekeṣu eka śabda saṅgati grahaṇāni atha anupapattyā anugatam ekam abhyupagantavyam eva 
NSu_2.2.121a.9–2.2.121a.10	 nanu katham tarhi sāmānya rahiteṣu pṛthivī ādiṣu bhūta mūrta ādi śabda saṅgati grahaṇam ucyate tatra api bāhya eka indriya grāhya guṇa āśraya tveyat tāvacchinna parimāṇa tva ādi upādhi nibandhanā eva vyutpattiḥ upādhīnām vyāvṛtta tve api anugata sāmānya āśraya tvena doṣa abhāvāt kiñca anugata tantu tva paṭa tva ādi sāmānya abhāve kārya kāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇam na syāt tatas ca kārya arthinaḥ kāraṇe pravṛttiḥ na syāt 
NSu_2.2.121a.11–2.2.121a.13	 kāyarkāraṇa bhāve hi anvaya vyatirekau vā upadeśaḥ vā pramāṇam na ca vyāvṛtteṣu vastuṣu anvaya vyatireka grahaṇam upapadyate niyama vyabhicārayodurjñāna tvāt upadeśaḥ ca ananteṣu na sambhavati eva iti uktam api ca vyāpti jñānam api anugata sāmānya abhāve anupapannam syāt vyāvṛtta vastūnām anvaya vyatireka avagama anupapatteḥ 
NSu_2.2.121a.14–2.2.121a.15	 sāmānya apavāda nyāyaḥ ca anugata sāmānya abhāve na bhavet dvayoḥ pramāṇayoḥ eka svarūpa viṣaya tve tu anyatarasya aprāmāṇyam eva syāt bhinna viṣaya tve na apavāda viṣayaḥ asti asti ca tāvat gaurayam iti anugata ākāra pratyayaḥ nacāsau vyāvṛtteṣu sambhavati bhrānta tva prasaṅgāt na ca etat savarmanyāpoha nibandhanam tasya api pratipiṇḍam vyāvṛtta tvāt anugata tve vā kim aparāddham sāmānyena tathā ca vidhi rūpaḥ pratyayaḥ api samāhitaḥ syāt evaṃcāṅgī kārye go tva ādeḥ anugame nitya tvam api anivāryam iti atas āha vyutpattiḥ api iti 
NSu_2.2.121ab.1–2.2.121ab.4	 vyutpattiḥ api hi sādṛśyena eva gamyate apipadam kārya kāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇa ādi samuccaya artham hi śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe gamyate abhyupagamyate avagamyate iti asti tāvat sādṛśyam nāma padārtha antaram go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ ityādi adhyakṣa siddha tvāt tena eva ca upapadyate vyutpatti ādikam tasmāt na tad artham go tva ādeḥ anugata tvam kalpanīyam sādṛśyena tāvat śabda vyutpatti prakāram darśayitum upakramate sarveṣu iti 
NSu_2.2.121cd.1–2.2.121cd.3	 sarveṣu yugapad śabdaḥ sadṛśeṣu pravartate bahavaḥ hi śabda saṅgati grahaṇa upāyāḥ tatra yadā upadeśataḥ vyutpadyate tadā ayam gauḥ iti upadeśa vākyam vyāpti grāhaka tayā upayujyate katham sādṛśya upadhānena sarveṣu gopiṇḍeṣu yugapad eka kāla mayam ityādi śabdaḥ pravartate ayam gauḥ iti asya ayam etat sadṛśāḥ sarve api go śabda vācyaḥ iti arthaḥ vaktrā abhipreyate śrotrā ca avadhāryate iti yāvat dvayoḥ api sārvatrika vyutpatti kāma tvena vākyasya eka piṇḍa viṣaya tva kalpanā anupapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ yadi ayam gauḥ iti ādi vākyam na eka piṇḍa mātra viṣayam kintu ayam ca etad sadṛśāḥ ca sarve go śabda vācyāḥ iti vyāpti param tadā saṅgati grahaṇa uttara kālam gāmānaya iti ukte go śabdāt sarva go pratipattiḥ syāt abhīṣya go pratipattiḥ tu jāyate sā katham iti taṭa sthasya ca udyam pariharati tathā api iti 
NSu_2.2.122a–2.2.122c.3	 tathā api prāptitaḥ tu eka vacanāt ca viśeṣataḥ abhīṣya avagatiḥ ca syāt yadi api upadeśaḥ na eka piṇḍa viśeṣa gocaraḥ tathā api gāmānaya iti ukte abhīṣya gopiṇḍa avagatiḥ syāt eva katham prāptitaḥ yogya tvāt atīta anāgatānām atyanta viprakṛṣṭa deśa sthānām gavām ānayana yogya tā bhāvam ālocya tad parityāgaḥ iti arthaḥ tarhi sannihita sarva go pratipattiḥ kutas na bhavati iti ced na gām iti eka vacanāt tathā api yasya kasyacid ekasya gopiṇḍasya pratipattiḥ syāt na abhīṣyasya eva iti ced na śabalam bahulām kāla akṣīm ityādi viśeṣaṇāt etat uktam bhavati go śabdāt bhavati eva sarva go pratipattiḥ kintu liṅga prakaraṇa ādi balāt piṇḍa viśeṣe kārya pratipattiḥ iti astu ayam gauḥ iti ādi vākyam vyāpti param tatas kim iti atas āha śaktiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.122d.1–2.2.123ab.3	 chaktiḥ sādṛśya gāḥ yatas tādṛśaḥ ayam ca tad śabdaḥ iti jñāpayati sphuṭam yatas vācaka tva śaktiḥ śabdasya sādṛśya gā sādṛśya sambandhinī sādṛśya vyāpikā iti yāvat asmāt vākyāt avadhāritā iti śeṣaḥ atas tām śaktim tad tad viṣaya tayā sādṛśyam sphuṭam jñāpayati katham iti atas prayoga prakāram darśayati tādṛśaḥ iti caḥ yasmāt iti arthe ayam paridṛśyamānaḥ yasmāt tādṛśaḥ upadeśa kāle sannihitena piṇḍena sadṛśaḥ tasmāt tad śabdaḥ sa śabdaḥ yasya vācakaḥ asau tathā uktaḥ iti śabdaḥ prakāra vācī 
NSu_2.2.123ab.4	 ayam atra samudāya arthaḥ vyutpatti artham tāvat na anugatam kim api aṅgīkaraṇīyam sādṛśyena eva tad upapatteḥ na ca vācyam sādṛśyam api anugatam ced kim sāmānyena aparāddham vyāvṛtta tve katham sārvatrika vyutpatti aṅgam iti nahi sādṛśyam śabda śakti viṣaya tayā pravṛtti nimitta tayā vai abhyupagamyate kinnāma liṅga tayā yathā hi gandhavat tvam na pṛthivī śabda vācyam na api tad pravṛtti nimittam kintu pṛthivī tvavatyā vyakteḥ pṛthivī śabda vācya tve liṅgam eva tathā tete vyāvṛttām api tad avabodhe liṅgatayā upayujyate tathā hi yadā ayam gauḥ iti upadeśa pūrvikā vyutpattiḥ tadā tat vākyam vyāpti grāhakam ayam caitanya sadṛśāḥ ca sarve go śabda vācyāḥ iti evamparatvāt vyavahāra ādi pūrvikāyām tu vyutpattau bhūyas vyavahāra ādi daśarne sādṛśya vyāpya ta a= agamaḥ bhavati tatas ca etat vākya ādinā avagata vyāptiḥ iti anumīyateayam go śabda vācyaḥ bhavitum arhati tad sadṛśa tvāt yaḥ tad sadṛśassa go śabda vācyaḥ tathā ca ayam tad sadṛśaḥ tasmāt go śabda vācyaḥ a iti 
NSu_2.2.123ab.5	 nanu atra kaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ upadeśa kāle sannihitaḥ gopiṇḍaḥ iti ced na tasya tad sadṛśa tva abhāvāt mā evam dṛṣṭānta niyamasya nirasta tvāt na ca sāsnādimattvam eva liṅgam astu kim sādṛśyena iti vācyam tasya gotva vat prativyakti vyāvṛtta tvāt sādṛśyasya tu vyāvṛtta tve api pratiyogi nirūpya tvena anugata phala sādhaka tva anubhavāt sāsnādimattvasya api sādṛśya upahitasya liṅga tvam abhyupagacchāmaḥ na ca vācyam go sādṛśyam aśve api asti iti tatra api go śabda vācya tā anumāna prasaṅgaḥ iti jāti nimitta tve api evam prasaṅgasya samāna tvāt jāti viśeṣaḥ nimitta tayā aṅgīkriyate yaḥ avyabhicāri iti ced tarhi sādṛśya viśeṣaḥ eva liṅgam yaḥ lakṣaṇa bhūtaḥ iti vadāmaḥ 
NSu_2.2.123ab.6–2.2.123ab.7	 etena kārya kāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇa ādikam api samāhitam veditavyam sādṛśyena eva tad upapatteḥ antya viśeṣe hi na kiñcid anugatam asti na api anugata āśrayaḥ upādhiḥ tad bhāve dravya guṇa karma vat atyanta vyāvartaka tva svarūpa hāni prasaṅgāt tathā api asti tatra viśeṣa śabda vyutpattiḥ atyanta vyāvṛtta buddhim prati kāraṇatva avadhāraṇam ityādi tatra pareṇa api lakṣaṇa rūpam sādṛśyam eva ādaraṇīyam iti evam anugata sāmānya anabhyupagamena eva vyutpatti ādikam samarthitam yaḥ tu manyate anugata sāmanyena eva vyutpatti ādikam na anyathā iti tasya bādhakam āha jātitaḥ ced iti 
NSu_2.2.123c.1–2.2.123c.3	 jātitaḥ ced katham tāsu yadi anugata jāti nimittā eva sarvatra vyutpattiḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇa ādikam ca syāt tadā tāsu jātiṣu katham jāti ādi śabda vyutpattiḥ anugata buddhi kāraṇa tva avadhāraṇam go tvam nityam jāti tvāt ityādi vyāpti jñānam iti ādikam syāt jātiṣu jātyabhāvena tatra vyutpatti ādikam na syāt iti arthaḥ yadi vaiyātyāt kaścid brūyātasti jātiṣu api jāti tvam nāma jātiḥ tad vaśāt tatra sa varmupapadyate a iti tam pratyāha tatra ced iti 
NSu_2.2.123d.1–2.2.123d.2	 tatra ced anavasthitiḥ yadi tatra jātiṣu api jātitvam nāma jātiḥ aṅgīkriyate tadā anavasthitiḥ syāt tathā hi go tva ādi jātiṣu jāti śabda pravṛtti nimittam yā jāti tvam nāma jātiḥ sā na tāvat svarūpe vartate sva vṛtteḥ aprāmāṇika tvāt atas sva vyatiriktāsu eva jātiṣu vartate iti vācyam tathā ca sva vyatirikta jātiṣu jāti śabda pravṛttau= iyam nimittam syāt na tu svarūpe api atas tasyām tadvayati riktāsu jātiṣu ekasya jāti śabdasya pravṛttau nimittam jāti antaram aṅgīkaraṇīyam tatra api evam eva iti anavasthā iti 
NSu_2.2.123d.3–2.2.123d.4	 nanu go tva ādi jātiṣu jāti tva prayuktaḥ jāti śabdaḥ jāti tve tu upadeśa adhīnaḥ bhavatu tasyāḥ eka tvāt iti mā evam na hi asmābhiḥ sādṛśyam iva bhavatā jātiḥ śabda pravṛttau jñāpakatayā upeyate yena kvacid upadeśaḥ niveśyate kintu nimitta tayā tatra upadeśa upanyāsasya kva upayogaḥ sthāna antare api bādhakam āha tathā eva iti 
NSu_2.2.124ab.1–2.2.124ab.3	 tathā eva vyakti vijñānam vyakti tva abhāva dūṣitam yathā jāti vijñānam jāti tva abhāvena dūṣitam tathā eva vyakti vijñānam vyaktīnām vyakti śabda vācya tva vijñānam tad nimitta vyakti tva jātya bhāvena dūṣitam dravya guṇa karmāṇi khalu vyaktayaḥ ucyante na ca tatra vyakti tvam nāma sāmānyam asti sat tayā para apara bhāva abhāvāt tasmāt tatra vyakti śabda vācya tva jñānam na syāt mā bhūdvayatiriktam vyakti tvam sattā eva vyakti śabda pravṛttau nimittam bhaviṣyati iti ced na sāmānyasya paryāya pravṛttau nimitta tvāt sa dvayakti śabdayoḥ aparyāya tvāt anyathā saṃyogi ādi śabdānām api dravya ādi śabda paryāya tvam syāt nanu śabda mātrasya jāti nimitta tvāt sattayā para apara bhāva śūnyam api dravya guṇa karmasu vyakti tvam asti eva iti atas na ukta doṣaḥ iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.124cd.1–2.2.124cd.3	 yadi tat ca asti tasya api viśeṣeṣu anavasthitiḥ tarhi tasya vyakti tvasya api viśeṣeṣu vyaktiṣu praveśaḥ syāt tathā ca anavasthitiḥ iti yojanā tathā hi yaḥ śabdaḥ aneka vācakaḥ sa sarvaḥ jāti nimittakaḥ iti svīkṛtya dravya guṇa karmasu vyakti tvam nāma jātiḥ yadi aṅgīkriyate tarhi tasyām anyāsu ca jātiṣu jāti śabda pravṛttaye jāti tvam jātiḥ aṅgīkartavyā syāt om iti ced tarhi sā vyakti tva jātiḥ api jāti tva jātim prati vyaktiḥ syāt na ca sā svarūpe vartate tatas dravya ādi traye tasyām ca vyakti śabda pravṛtti artham aparam vyakti tvam aṅgīkaraṇīyam tatra punar jāti śabda pravṛttaye jāti tvam abhyupagantavyam iti sā api tad āśraya tayā vyaktiḥ syāt tasyām punar vyakti tva antaram iti evam anavasthā iti sthala antare bādhakam āha katham iti 
NSu_2.2.125a–2.2.125d.2	 katham svarūpa tvam api jñāyate anugatam yadi eka vyutpatti paryantam anavasthā ādi dūṣitam atra svarūpam iti adhyāhartavyam tatas ca ayam arthaḥ yadi anugata sāmānya nibandhanā eva sarvatra vyutpattiḥ tadā sakala padārtha svarūpam svarūpa śabda vācya tayā katham jñāyate anugatasya svarūpa tva sāmānyasya abhāvāt svarūpeṣu svarūpa śabda vyutpattiḥ na syāt iti 
NSu_2.2.125a–2.2.125d.3	 nanu ca sarva svarūpeṣu anugatam svarūpa tvam aṅgīkriyate mayā atas na ukta doṣaḥ iti ata uktam svarūpa tvam api yadi anugatam aṅgīkriyate tadā anavasthā ādi dūṣitam bhavati a iti tathā hi sarveṣu svarūpeṣu yat svarūpa śabda pravṛtti nimittam svarūpa tvam nāma sāmānyam abhyupagamyate tat api tāvat svarūpeṇa na ca tatra svayam eva vartate ātma āśraya tvasya alaukika tvāt atas tasmin= anyeṣu ca svarūpeṣu sva rūpa śabda pravṛttaye anyat svarūpa tvam nāma sāmānyam aṅgī kāryam tat api svarūpam eva iti anavasthā ādipadena antya viśeṣa svarūpeṣu svarūpa tva sāmānyam aṅgī kāryam tat api svarūpam eva iti anavasthā ādipadena antya viśeṣa svarūpeṣu svarūpa tva sāmānya aṅgīkāre atyanta vyāvṛtti dhī hetu tvam na syāt samavāya abhāva svarūpe ca sambandha abhāvaḥ iti jñātavyam 
NSu_2.2.125a–2.2.125d.4	 anavasthā ādi aniṣya prasaṅgasya viparyaye paryavasānam sūcayati eka vyutpatti paryantam iti ekam kevalanugata sāmānya hīnam iti yāvat tasmin vyutpattiḥ eka vyutpattiḥ tad paryantam tāvat idam dūṣaṇam upaplavate eva yāvat anugata sāmānya nibandhanā eva sarvatra vyutpattiḥ iti pakṣam parityajya sāmānya hīne api vyutpattim aṅgīkuryāt iti arthaḥ anavasthā ādi parihārāya anugata sāmānyena vinā api vyutpattiḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyā iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.2.125a–2.2.125d.5	 nanu idam sakalam api asaṅgatam tathā hi yat uktaṃjātitaḥ ca iti uktam tāsu a iti tat tāvat asat jātiṣu jāti antara abhāve api nitya tve sati aneka anugata tvena upādhinā jāti śabda vyutpatti upapatteḥ astu vā jātiṣu jāti tvam nāma jātiḥ na ca anavasthā jāti tve jāti śabdasya svarūpa nibandhanatva upapatteḥ tathā eva vyakti vijñānam a iti etat api asat vyakti tva abhāve api jāti vyañjaka tva upādhinā dravya ādiṣu vyakti śabda pravṛtti upapatteḥ vyakti tva jāti aṅgīkāre api na anavasthā vyakti tve vyakti śabdasya svarūpa nimitta tva sambhavāt yat api katham a ityādi tat ayuktam pramāṇa gamya tva upādhinā eva svarūpa śabda vyutpatti upapatteḥ svarūpa tva abhyupagame api na anavasthā tatra svarūpa śabdasya sva rūpa mātra nibandhana tvāt antya viśeṣeṣu upādhi nibandhanaḥ eva iti na rūpa hāniḥ samavāya ādau svarūpam eva sambandhaḥ iti atas na kaścid doṣaḥ iti āśaṅkām pariharan= anugata samānya t ūṣaṇam upasaṃharati kalpanā iti 
NSu_2.2.125ef.1–2.2.125ef.2	 kalpanā gauravāt tena yuktā na anuga kalpanā sarvatra vyāvṛttam eva vācyam śabda pravṛttau nimittam ca vyutpattiḥ tu sādṛśya nibandhana iti eka rūpa kalpanena sarva sāmañjasye kvacid anugatam sāmānyam nimittam kvacid upādhiḥ kvacid svarūpam eva iti aneka kalpane kalpanā gauravam syāt iti arthaḥ tena bādhaka sadbhāvena sādhaka abhāvena ca 
NSu_2.2.125ef.3–2.2.125ef.4	 nanu anugata tva abhāve katham go tva ādikam sāmānyam ananugata tve api guṇa karma vat avāntara bhedasya kalpanīya tvāt iti evam samavāyam svarūpataḥ nirākṛtya idānīm yat samavāyasya sarvatra eka tvam nitya tvam catattvam bhāvena a iti sūtreṇa uktam tattvam samavāyasya sarvatra eka tvam nitya tvam ca bhāvena sat tayā vyākhyātam iti tat api nirāgikīṣuḥ ādau tāvat eka tvam nirākartum pīṭham āracayati aupādhika iti 
NSu_2.2.126a–2.2.126c.2	 aupādhika viśiṣṭa ādyam api tat vastu kim tatas anyat aupādhikaḥ pācaka yājaka ādiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ nīla agni mada ādiḥ ādya grahaṇāt upalakṣita grahaṇam api śabdaḥ dūṣaṇa antara samuccaya arthaḥ tat vastu upādhi ādi trayam kiṃśabdasya ubhayatas sambandhaḥ tatas upādhi ādi trayāt vastu iti etat aupādhika viśiṣṭa ādyam iti anena api sambaddhayate 
NSu_2.2.126a–2.2.126c.3	 ayam arthaḥ samavāyasya sarvatra eka tvam vadata idam tāvat vivicyatām ekaḥ eva puruṣaḥ pacana yajana ādibhiḥ upādhibhiḥ avat chedakaiḥ dharmaiḥ pācakaḥ yājakaḥ ca ityādi abhidhīyate sa pācaka yājaka ādiḥ aupādhikaḥ arthaḥ kim pacana ādi upādhi puruṣa tad sambandhebhyaḥ ananyaḥ uta anyaḥ iti tathā samāna adhikaraṇam vyāvartakam viśeṣaṇam yathā utpalasya nīlam rūpam parvatasya ca agniḥ vyadhikaraṇam tu vyāvartakam upalakṣaṇam yathā nīla rūpa gatam nīlatvam utpalasya 
NSu_2.2.126a–2.2.126c.4	 anye tu kāyarpraveśa apraveśābhyām viśeṣaṇa upalakṣaṇayoḥ bhedam ācakṣate yathā lambakarṇaḥ ānīyatām citragurā ānīyatām iti apare tu śābda sāmāna adhikaraṇyābhyām yathā daṇḍī devadattaḥ jaṭābhiḥ tāpasaḥ iti kecid punar vyavacchitti samaye sattva asattvābhyām tatra viśiṣṭam nīlam agnimān vā viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tad sambandhebhyaḥ ananyat anyat vā upalakṣitam ca upalakṣaṇa upalakṣya tad sambandhebhyaḥ ananyat anyat vā iti 
NSu_2.2.126a–2.2.126c.5	 tatra anya tva pakṣaḥ tāvat anubhava abhyupagama upapatti viruddha tvāt asambhāvitaḥ eva nahi pācaka ādiḥ pacana ādi traya atiriktaḥ anubhūyate na ca yogyasya ananubhave sattvam siddhayati na api agni mada ādiḥ parvata ādi atiriktaḥ anubhūyate atirikta tve ca aupādhika viśiṣṭa ādeḥ dravya ādi antarbhāvā sambhavāt ṣaṣ padārtha atireka prasaṅgena abhyupagama virodhaḥ syāt yadi ca aupādhika viśiṣṭa ādyam atiriktam syāt tadā pācakam ānayā iti ukte puruṣa ādi ānayanam na kriyeta ityādi upapatti virodhaḥ 
NSu_2.2.126a–2.2.126c.6	 nanu avacchittiḥ aupādhika tvam vyavacchittiḥ ca vaiśiṣyayam tritayāt bhinnam eva iti ced na avacchitteḥ anirūpaṇāt sā kim upādhi sambandhaḥ vā puruṣasya ekatvam vā svagataḥ bhedaḥ vā ādye na traya atirekaḥ dvitīye tu anaupādhikāt aviśeṣaḥ tṛtīye tu asattva prasaṅgaḥ vyavacchittiḥ vaiśiṣyam iti ca ayuktam tasyāḥ nīla ādi padārtha tva abhāvāt sā hi vaiśiṣyaya pratīti phala viṣaya tayā anubhūyate 
NSu_2.2.126a–2.2.126c.9	 viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya sambandha avagāhi ekam vā vijñānam aviralam anekam vā viśiṣṭam iti kaścid yathā aha viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyam ca tad sambandha phala arpakam jñāna rūpam sva sāmarthyāt viśiṣṭam iti kīrtitam a iti tat na viśiṣṭasya bāhya artha tayā anubhavāt anyathā sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ saḥ anumānena prajñāpanīyaḥ iti ādya yuktam syāt tasmāt atireka pakṣaḥ anupapannaḥ eva astu tarhyaipādhika viśiṣṭa ādyam tritayā anan yat iti ataḥ āha tat eva iti 
NSu_2.2.126cd.1–2.2.126cd.3	 tat eva ced agnimat tvam kim tatra bhaṇyate pratidatti saukaryāya udāharaṇa niṣṭhatayā matupā praśnaḥ kṛtaḥ agnimattvam iti dhūma ādi anumāna sādhyam viśiṣṭam iti arthaḥ aupādhika ādeḥ api upalakṣaṇam etat ayam arthaḥ agni mat ādi viśiṣṭam ca yadi viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tad sambandhebhyaḥ ananyat aṅgīkriyate tadā api vaktavyam kim tat tritayam api pratyekam viśiṣṭa muta anyatamam dvitīye api kim viśeṣaṇa bhūtaḥ agniḥ eva agnimat śabda arthaḥ uta viśeṣya rūpaḥ parvataḥ atha sambandhaḥ saṃyoga lakṣaṇaḥ saṃyoga pakṣe api kim nirviśeṣaṇa saṃyogaḥ kiṃvā agninā saṃyogaḥ uttaratra api kim agni saṃyoga mātram uta parvatasya agni saṃyogaḥ iti evam pācaka ādeḥ api pacana ādi traya an anya tve vikalpaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ antya pakṣa atiriktān sarva pakṣān apākaroti agni iti 
NSu_2.2.127ab.1–2.2.127ab.3	 agni saṃyoga mātram ced bhavet tat siddha sādhanam agni saṃyoga mātram iti sarva pakṣa upalakṣaṇam ced agnimat śabda arthaḥ iti śeṣaḥ tat dhūmavat tva ādi anumānam agni parvata saṃyogānām samastānām vyastānām agninā saṃyogasya ca agnimat śabda vācya viśiṣṭa tve dhūma anumānam siddha sādhanam syāt viśiṣṭasya anumāna sādhya tvāt agni ādeḥ viśiṣṭasya māna antarataḥ eva siddha tvāt iti astu tarhi parvatasya agninā saṃyogaḥ viśiṣṭa rūpaḥ agnimat śabda arthaḥ anumāna sādhyaḥ iti antimaḥ pakṣaḥ tatra ukta doṣa abhāvāt parvatam agni saṃyogānām samastānām vyastānām agni saṃyogasya ca siddha tve a pi parvatasya agninā yaḥ saṃyogaḥ tasya anumānataḥ prāc asiddheḥ iti śaṅkate bhūdharasya iti 
NSu_2.2.127cd.1–2.2.127cd.3	 bhūdharasya agni saṃyogaḥ yadi ṣaṣṭhayarthaḥ eva kaḥ agnimat śabda arthaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ anumāna sādhyaḥ iti śeṣaḥ dūṣayitum pṛcchati ṣaṣṭhayarthaḥ iti parvatasya agni saṃyogasya ca siddha tve api pavartasya yaḥ agni saṃyogaḥ sa na siddhaḥ iti atas saḥ eva viśiṣṭaḥ agnimat śabda arthaḥ a nu māna vedyaḥ iti vadatā parvatasya iti ṣaṣṭhayā nirdiṣyaḥ sambandhaḥ eva viśiṣṭaḥ agnimat śabda arthaḥ anumāna vedyaḥ iti uktam bhavati anyasya sarvasya siddha tvāt ṣaṣṭhayarthāḥ ca sambandhāḥ vaiyākaraṇaiḥ aneke gaṇitāḥ atas kaḥ atra sambandhaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti praśna arthaḥ eva śabdaḥ tasya eva prādhānyadyotana arthaḥ uttaram śaṅkate samavāyaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.128a.1–2.2.128ab.3	 samavāyaḥ yadi hi saṃyogaḥ hi guṇaḥ parvataḥ ca guṇī guṇa guṇinoḥ ca samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥ iti prasiddham iti hi śabda arthaḥ ṣaṣṭhayarthaḥ iti vartate nirākaroti asya ca iti  asya ca eka tvāt siddha sādhanam parvata ādeḥ iva asya samavāyasya ca siddha tvāt iti śeṣaḥ siddha sādhanam dhūma ādi anumānam iti śeṣaḥ katham samavāyasya siddha tvam iti atas uktam eka tvāt iti yaḥ tantu paṭayoḥ samavāyaḥ saḥ eva hi parvata agni saṃyogayoḥ samavāyaḥ pareṇa aṅgīkṛtaḥ tantu paṭayoḥ samavāyaḥ ca pratyakṣeṇa vā anumānena vā siddhaḥ eva iti ayam atra samudāya arthaḥ yadi ekaḥ eva sarvatra samavāyaḥ syāt tadā sarva anumānānām siddha sādhana tā syāt yadi api yāthārthyam eva prāmāṇyam tathā api śabda vat para artha anumānasya para apekṣayā pravṛtta tvāt siddha sādhana tā doṣaḥ eva 
NSu_2.2.128ab.4^1	 tathā hi sarvam api anumānam na vastu svarūpa mātra param tasya asiddhau= āśraya asiddheḥ siddhau ca siddha sādhana tvāt kintu kenacid upahitam vā viśiṣṭam vā upalakṣitam vā iti vaktavyam tat ca viśiṣṭa ādikam na viśeṣaṇa ādi trayāt anyat eva iti yuktam anupalambha ādi bādhāt traya an anya tve api na viśeṣaṇa mātram tasya anumānāt prāk siddha tvāt asiddhau ca aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tva āpatteḥ agneḥ eva agnimat śabda artha tve matupaḥ vaiyarthya āpatteḥ ca na api dharmi svarūpa mātram ukta doṣāt parvataḥ agnimān ityetayeḥ ekārtha tva āpatteḥ ca na ca sambandha mātram 
NSu_2.2.128ab.4^2–2.2.128ab.5	 saṃyogaḥ hi kvacid sambandhaḥ syāt yathā agni parvatayoḥ kvacid samavāyaḥ yathā rāsat rūpa anumāne dvau= api svarūpataḥ siddhau= iti siddha sādhanam eva saṃyoga mātrasya siddha tve api agni ādi saṃyogaḥ sādhyaḥ iti api na vācyam tasya api mahānasa ādau siddha tvāt atha parvata ādeḥ agni ādi saṃyogaḥ sādhyaḥ atra api vivektavyam kasya atra asiddhayā sādhya tvam iti anyasya asambhavāt ṣaṣṭhayarthasya samavāyasya iti vaktavyam sa ca sarvatra ekaḥ eva ced punar siddha sādhana tā eva syāt atas sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt sarvatra samavāya aikyam ayuktam iti nanu tantuṣu paṭa ādi samavāyaḥ parvata agni saṃyoga ādi samavāyaḥ ca yadi api svarūpeṇa ekaḥ eva tathā api tantu paṭa ādi parvata agni saṃyoga ādi upādhi nimittaḥ samavāyasya bhedaḥ api asti tatas siddha tve api sādhya tvam upapadyate iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.128cd.1–2.2.128cd.3	 yadi asi a aupādhikaḥ bhedaḥ kutas eka tvam iṣyate yadi asya samavāyasya sādhya tva siddhayartham aupādhikaḥ bhedaḥ iṣyate tadā ekatvam kutas iṣyate samavāyasya eka tvam hi na saṅkhayā viśeṣaḥ nirguṇa tvāt kintva bhedaḥ na ca bheda abhedau kvāpi pareṇa aṅgīkṛtau tasmāt samavāye bhedasya aṅgīkṛtau tad viruddhaḥ abhedaḥ na aṅgīkartum ucitaḥ iti nanu svābhāvikam eka tvam svābhāvikena eva bhedena viruddhayate na punar aupādhikena svabhāvataḥ abhinne api gagana ādau= aupādhika bheda darśanāt samavāye ca aupādhikaḥ eva bhedaḥ abhyupagataḥ tat katham svābhāvika eka tva aṅgīkāraḥ anucitaḥ iti atas āha na iti 
NSu_2.2.129a–2.2.129c.3^1	 na anirvācyam hi tena iṣyam atas aupādhika anyayoḥ satya tvāt kaḥ viśeṣaḥ syāt viruddha abhimatayoḥ avirodhaḥ hi kāla bhedena bhavati yathā tatra eva bhū tale tasya eva ghaṭasya bhāva abhāvayoḥ deśa bhedena vā yathā tadā eva tasya eva ghaṭasya astitva nāstitvayoḥ vyakti bhedena vā yathā tatra eva bhū tale yadā ekasya ghaṭasya bhāvaḥ tadā eva ghaṭa antarasya abhāvaḥ pāramārthika tva apāramārthika tvābhyām vā yathā gagane rūpa tad abhāvayoḥ tatra tāvat samavāye abheda bhedayoḥ nādyam vidhātrayam sambhavati iti parasya api sampratipannam na api caturthī vidhā sambhavati 
NSu_2.2.129a–2.2.129c.3^2	 samavāya bhedasya apāram ārthika tvam asattvam anirvācya tvam vā ādye siddha sādhana tvam tad avastham eva dvitīye tu idam upatiṣṭhate hi yasmāt tena vaiśeṣika ādinā nirvācyam vastu neṣyam atas a sattva anirvācya tva abhāvāt aupādhikasya svābhāvikasya ca satya tvāt kaḥ viśeṣaḥ syāt aupādhikasya api svābhāvika vat satya tvāt pāramārthika tva apāramārthika tva lakṣaṇasya virodha śānti hetoḥ abhāva vādaupādhika tva ādi uktayā na kiñcid kṛtam syāt iti bhāvaḥ iṣyate samavāya bhedasya anirvācya tvam mayā ced tadā kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced apasiddhāntaḥ iti āha māyā iti 
NSu_2.2.129d.1–2.2.130ab.2	 māyāvādi anyathā bhavet anirvācya vastu aṅgīkāre vaiśeṣika ādiḥ api māyā vādī bhavet iti arthaḥ nanu prakāra bhedena api virodha śaśantiḥ bhavati yathā tatra eva tadā eva nīla paṭa sadbhāve api pīta paṭa abhāvaḥ tathā samavāye api aupādhikaḥ bhedaḥ na svābhāvikam abhedam viruṇaddhi iti atas āha upādhi iti upādhi janyam tat gamyam iti vaupādhikam bhavet upādhi śabdāt tṛtīyā samarthāt janī a gamyayoḥ śeṣike ṭhaki kṛte sati aupādhikam iti bhavati tatas kim iti atas āha ubhayatra iti 
NSu_2.2.130cd.1–2.2.130cd.2	 ubhayatra api anantāḥ syuḥ samavāyāḥ itas tatas evam sati samavāya bhedasya aupādhika tvam nāma upādhi janya tvam vā upādhi gamya tvam vā vaktavyam tathā ca pakṣa dvaye api anantāḥ samavāyāḥ syuḥ tat katham iti atas āha itas tatas iti sarva deśa kāla gatānām avayava avayavi ādi upādhīnām ananta tvāt iti śeṣaḥ upādhīnām ananta tve api samavāya ānantyam kutas iti atas āha bhinna tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.130e.1–2.2.130e.2	 bhinna tvam ca eva teṣu asti caḥ yasmāt iti arthe na hi aupādhikaḥ bhedaḥ nāma upādhīnām eva bhedaḥ tathā sati samavāyasya iti na syāt ukta doṣa parihāraḥ ca na bhavet kintu teṣu samavāyeṣu eva upādhi janyam tat avagamyam vā bhinna tvam asti bheda hetavaḥ ca upādhayaḥ anantāḥ iti katham na samavāya ānantyam tathā api aupādhikam eva tat ānantyam iti uktasya kim āyātam iti atas āha kaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.130f.1–2.2.130f.4	 kaḥ viśeṣaḥ upādhi ge upādhi gastat sambandhī aupādhikaḥ iti yāvat aupādhika bhede kaḥ viśeṣaḥ yena asāvabhedam na viruṇaddhi iti arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati nīla paṭa sadbhāve api pīta paṭa abhāvaḥ iti atra hi yadi viśiṣṭa viṣayau vidhi niṣedhau tadā bhinna viṣaya tvena virodha abhāvaḥ nīla pīta paṭayoḥ bhinna tvāt na ca evam prakṛte bheda viśeṣa abhāve api bheda antara abhyupagama āpatteḥ tathā ca ekatva uktiḥ ayuktā eva na hi pārthiva paramāṇau rūpa ādayaḥ agni saṃyoga jāḥ na tvā api aparāmāṇu rūpa ādayaḥ iva svābhāvikāḥ iti etāvatā rūpa ādi rahitaḥ asau bhavati yadi ca viśeṣaṇa viṣayau tadā samavāye bhedaḥ asti eva sa tu sambandhibhiḥ upādhibhiḥ kṛtaḥ na tu akṛtrimaḥ iti uktam syāt tathā ca ghaṭa ādi bhedena tulyaḥ iti rikta eva abheda uktiḥ upādhīnām ca sarva dānapāyāt na bhedasya āgantuka tvam yuktam iti upādhi gamyam aupādhikam iti pakṣam aṅgīkṛtya ukta doṣa abhāvam śaṅkate avidyamānaḥ eva iti 
NSu_2.2.131a–2.2.131c.2	 avidyamānaḥ eva anyaḥ samavāyaḥ adhigamyate upādhinā satyam upādhi gamya tvāt aupādhikaḥ samavāya bhedaḥ adhigamaḥ ca na pramā yena asau bhedaḥ pāramāthirkaḥ syāt kintu vibhramaḥ eva na ca evam bhedasya asttu aprāptyā siddha sādhana tā tādavasthyam iti vācyam yatas avidyamānaḥ eva anyaḥ samavāyaḥ adhigamyate tad tad upādhinā iti brūmaḥ yathā aṅguli avaṣṭabdha nayana ādi upādhi vaśāt avidyamānaḥ eva dvitīyaḥ candraḥ adhigamyate tathā taiḥ taiḥ sambandhi lakṣaṇa upādhibhiḥ avidyamānāḥ eva aneke samavāyāḥ pratīyante te ete samavāyāḥ aupādhika bheda abhinnāḥ iti ucyante te eva ca agni mada ādi śabda vācyāḥ anumāna sādhyāḥ viśiṣṭa ākārāḥ tathā ca na samavāya ekatva hāniḥ candra vat āropitānām aneka tve api anāropitasya ekatva avirodhāt na api anumānānām siddha sādhana tā tathāvidha samavāyānām prāc asiddha tvāt iti pariharati tat gamakam iti 
NSu_2.2.131cd.1–2.2.132ab.2	 tad gamakam anumānam na mā bhavet yadi api asmin pakṣe na siddha sādhanam dhūma ādi anumānam tathā api tad gamakam avidyamāna samavāya sattām pratipādayat anumāna jātam dahana śaitya anumānam iva bādhita viṣaya tayā na pramāṇam bhavet upalakṣaṇam ca etat upādhīnvinā samavāya avabhāsasya kvāpi abhāvāt sarvatra api tasya avidyamāna tā eva syāt iti api draṣṭavyam tat evam sarva anumānānām siddha sādhana tva ādi prasaṅgāt na samavāya aikyam upapannam iti etat ca upalakṣaṇam āgamāpanhavaḥ ca samavāya aikye syāt padārthānām tad saṃsargāṇām ca sikatā vat viśa kalitānām siddha tvāt idānīm samavāyasya nitya tvam nirākaroti evam eva iti evam eva asataḥ satta samavāyaḥ janirmatā yathā samavāyasya sarvatra ekatva aṅgīkāre sarva anumānānām siddha sādhana tva ādi duṣṭa tvam uktam evam eva tad nitya tva abhyupagame prāc asataḥ sattā samavāyaḥ janiḥ duṣyā matā samavāya nitya tve na kasya api janiḥ syāt iti arthaḥ tat katham iti atas āha tatra api iti 
NSu_2.2.132cd.1–2.2.132cd.3^1	 tatra api hi ukta doṣāṇām na eva kiñcid nivārakam ukta doṣāṇām siddha sādhana tva ādīnām tathā hi prāc asataḥ sattā samavāyaḥ janiḥ iti pareṇa jani lakṣaṇam abhihitam tatra yadi samavāyaḥ nityaḥ syāt tadā tad lakṣaṇā ghaṭajaniḥ prāk kulāla ādi vyāpārāt asti iti tad arthasya tasya siddha sādhana tā syāt jñaptau hi siddhasya api sādhanam ghaṭate kintu kvacid anapekṣa tvam iti eva kṛtau tu prāc siddhasya sādhanam eva aśakyam iti kulāla ādi vyāpārasya niṣphala tvam syāt atha samavāyasya nitya tve api prāc asataḥ sattā samavāyaḥ sādhyaḥ astaḥ kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na samavāya aikya vyāghātāt aupādhikaḥ samavāyasya bhedaḥ iti ced yathāsambhavam sarvam uktam anusandheyam 
NSu_2.2.132cd.1–2.2.132cd.3^2	 na hi prāk asat viṣayaḥ vyāpāraḥ sambhavati tasya sat kāraṇa atirikta kartavya abhāvāt satkāraṇasya sattā samavāya an atirekāt sva rūpa lābhaḥ kulāla ādi vyāpāra sādhyaḥ iti ced evam tarhi kim apareṇa sattā samavāyena tat evam samavāyasya eka tva nitya tve sarva thā api ayukte iti yat vā samavāya nirākaraṇa prasaṅgāt para uktam viśiṣṭa ādeḥ janeḥ ca svarūpam tad matā sāma añjasya pradarśanāya aupādhika ityādinā nirākṛtam veditavyam nanu etat sarvam vyāhatam yuṣmābhiḥ api loka veda vyavahāram paripālayadbhiḥ viśiṣṭa ādeḥ aṅgīkaraṇīya tvāt tatra api ukta doṣa anuṣaṅgāt iti ataḥ viśiṣṭa ādi nirūpaṇe tāvat doṣa abhāvam sva mate darśayati asmat iti 
NSu_2.2.133a–2.2.133c.3	 asmad pakṣe viśeṣasya sarvatra aṅgīkṛta tvataḥ na asti doṣaḥ kvacid viśiṣṭa ākāraḥ na viśeṣaṇam na api sambandhaḥ kinnāma viśeṣyam na ca tanmātram dvividhaḥ hi viśiṣṭa ākāraḥ yāvat viśeṣya bhāvya yāvat viśeṣya bhāvī ca tatra ādyaḥ viśeṣyeṇa atyanta abhinnaḥ yathā īśvaraḥ sva rūpeṇa sarvajñaḥ evam yatra yatra viśeṣaṇa sambandhaḥ yāvat viśeṣya bhāvī tatra tatra viśiṣṭa prakāraḥ api tathābhūtaḥ viśeṣyeṇa atyanta abhinnaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ tathā api viśeṣasya bheda pratinidheḥ sarva padārtheṣu aṅgīkṛta tvena īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ iti aparyāya śabda pravṛtti ādi anupapatti doṣaḥ na asti īśvaraḥ eva sarvajñaḥ iti abhedaḥ tāvat pramitaḥ bhede tu na niravakāśam pramāṇam asti iti 
NSu_2.2.133a–2.2.133c.4	 dvitīyaḥ tu viśeṣyeṇa bhinna abhinnaḥ yathā pavartena agnimān yathā hi saṃyoga viśeṣa sacivāḥ tantavaḥ paṭa ākāreṇa pariṇamante tathā agantuka viśeṣaṇa sambandhāt viśeṣya svarūpam viśiṣṭa ākāreṇa pariṇamate tatra yadi api bheda abhedau vastunaḥ sva rūpa bhūtau tathā api asmad pakṣe viśeṣasya sarvatra aṅgīkṛta tvataḥ na saṅkara doṣaḥ tat idam uktam kvacid iti atyanta abheda sthale bheda abheda sthale ca iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.133a–2.2.133c.6	 yat vā kvacid iti aupādhika ādi trayaḥ iti arthaḥ tasya api ukta prakāra tvāt etena bheda hīne api ākāśa ādau= aupādhikaḥ bhedaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti apāstam viśeṣa nibandhanānām eva ākāśa ādi aṃśānām ghaṭa ādi upādhibhiḥ sphuṭīkaraṇāt iti janini rūpaṇe doṣa abhāvam sva mate darśayati asmat iti viśeṣasya pariṇāmasya jani tvena aṅgīkṛta tvataḥ na kaścid doṣaḥ asti iti yojanā mṛd ādīnām ghaṭa ādi ākāra āpattiḥ eva ghaṭa ādi janiḥ na tu samavāyaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.133a–2.2.133c.7	 syāt etat kvacid bhāvaḥ viśeṣyaḥ viśiṣṭa ākāraḥ ca abhāvaḥ dṛśyate yathā ghaṭaḥ na jānāti prakṛtiḥ na kartrī iti kvacid ca abhāvaḥ viśeṣyaḥ viśiṣṭa ākārāḥ ca bhāvaḥ pratīyate abhāvaḥ asti abhāvaḥ prameyaḥ iti na ca vidhi niṣedha ātmanoḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ abhedaḥ yujyate tat katham viśeṣya abhinnam viśiṣṭam ucyate iti atas āha bhāvaḥ hi iti 
NSu_2.2.133cd.1–2.2.134ab.2	 bhāvaḥ hi abhāvaḥ ca saḥ eva hi kvacid iti anuvartate yaḥ bhāvaḥ saḥ eva kvacid abhāvaḥ bhavati yaḥ ca abhāvaḥ saḥ eva kvacid bhāvaḥ bhavati iti etat ubhayam prasiddham eva iti arthaḥ vākya artha dvaya prasiddhi dyotana artham hi śabda dvayam tat katham iti atas āha abhāvasya ca iti abhāvasya ca dharmāḥ syuḥ bhāvāḥ teṣām ca te akhilāḥ asti tāvat idam yat abhāvasya api bhāvāḥ dharmāḥ syuḥ tathā teṣām ca bhāvānām ca te abhāvāḥ dharmāḥ syuḥ iti akhilāḥ iti bahu tva upalakṣaṇam etat api na aṅgīkaromi iti atas āha pratyakṣā iti 
NSu_2.2.134cd.1–2.2.134cd.3	 pratyakṣamānataḥ sarvam etat naḥ vāraṇa kṣamam pratyakṣa grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham yasmāt abhāvasya api bhāvāḥ dharmāḥ santi bhāvasya ca abhāvāḥ iti etat sarvam pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇataḥ siddham atas na vārayitum śakyam astu abhāva bhāvayoḥ bhāva abhāva dharmavat tvam tathā api bhāvasya abhāva tvam abhāvasya ca bhāva tvam kvacid asti iti atra kim āyātam iti atas āha sarve iti 
NSu_2.2.134ef.1–2.2.134ef.3	 sarve bhāvāḥ abhāvāḥ ca padārthāḥ tena sarvadā yatas abhāva abhāvayoḥ bhāva abhāva dharmavat tvam siddham siddhaḥ ca dharma dharmiṇoḥ abheda tvena kāraṇa tvena sarve bhāvāḥ padārthāḥ abhāvāḥ ca bhavanti abhāvaḥ ca sarve padārthāḥ bhāvāḥ bhavanti iti uktam upapannam iti arthaḥ yadi evam bhāvasya api abhāva tvam abhāvasya ca bhāva tvam tarhi dravya ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ eva prāc abhāva ādayaḥ tu abhāvāḥ eva iti sarvatra prasiddhaḥ bhāva abhāva vibhāgaḥ katham iti atas āha tathā api iti 
NSu_2.2.135.1–2.2.135.3	 tathā api prathamam buddheḥ yaḥ niṣedhasya gocara ḥ saḥ abhāvaḥ vidhi buddheḥ tu gocaraḥ prathamam paraḥ niṣedhasya buddheḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam paraḥ bhāvaḥ yadi api eṣaḥ arthaḥ prāk eva uktaḥ tathā api prasaṅgāt punar smāritaḥ iti adoṣaḥ abhāva bhāvayoḥ bhāva abhāva dharmavat tvam pratyakṣa ādi siddham iti uktam tat katham iti atas āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_2.2.136ab.1–2.2.136ab.3	 tasmāt pradhvasta bheda ādi sat iti eva avagamyate pradhvastam pradhvaṃsaḥ bhedaḥ pṛthaktvam ādipadena prameya tva ādi grahaṇam yasmāt abhāvasya bhāva dharma tvam asti tasmāt eva hi pradhvaṃsa abhāva ādeḥ pṛthaktva prameya tva ādi bhāva dharma jātam asti eva iti avagamyate pratyakṣa ādinā iti yojanā pradhvaṃsaḥ prāc abhāvāt vā ghaṭāt vā pṛthak prameyaḥ abhidheyaḥ ca iti avagamyate abhāvasya dharma anabhyupagame tad virodhaḥ syāt iti brūmaḥ ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ na bhavati iti bhāvasya anyonya abhāva dharma tvam sphuṭa tvāt na pradarśitam evam abhāvayoḥ bhāva abhāva ātmaka tvam sāmānyatas prasādhya prakṛte yojayati asti iti 
NSu_2.2.136cd.1–2.2.137a.3	 asti abhāvaḥ asti ca dhvaṃsaḥ deha abhāvaḥ ca bhasma tā ityādi yujyate sarvam tasmāt iti anuvartate yatas evam abhāvasya bhāva tvam bhāvasya ca abhāva tvam upapāditam tasmāt abhāvaḥ asti pradhvaṃsaḥ asti deha abhāvaḥ bhasmatā iti abhāvasya viśeṣya tvam bhāvasya ca viśiṣṭa tvam tayoḥ ca abhedaḥ tathā ghaṭo na jānāti iti bhāvaḥ viśeṣyaḥ abhāvaḥ ca viśiṣṭa ākāraḥ tayoḥ ca abhedaḥ iti uktam yujyate iti arthaḥ yadi bhāva abhāvayoḥ ekatvam na viruddham tadā ghaṭaḥ api svābhāva ātmā kinna syāt iti atas āha pratyakṣāt iti 
NSu_2.2.137b.1–2.2.137b.2	 pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇataḥ siddham iti śeṣaḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ viśeṣya viśiṣṭayoḥ aikyam pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddham na tu ghaṭa tada bhāvayoḥ atas na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ yat vā bhāva abhāvayoḥ dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ ca abhedaḥ prāmāṇika iti etat kim bhāva abhāvayoḥ viśeṣya viśiṣṭayoḥ aikyasya upapādakam kiṃvā sambhāvanā hetuḥ ādye tu uktaḥ ati prasaṅgaḥ dvitīye sādhakam vācyam iti atra idam uktam anena kvacid iti uktam vivṛtam bhavati 
NSu_2.2.137b.3	 athavā bhāvaḥ hi ityādinā pariṇāma vādaḥ prapañcyate tathā hi kecid pariṇāma vādinaḥ sataḥ eva abhivyaktim janim āhuḥ tad vyudāsā artham āha bhāvaḥ hi iti atra bhāva abhāva śabdau sat asat parau yaḥ kāraṇa tva abhimataḥ mṛd piṇḍaḥ sa kārya ghaṭa ātmanā bhāvaḥ saḥ eva tad ātmanā bhāvaḥ ca yat vā sa ghaṭaḥ prāk utpatteḥ bhāvaḥ san saḥ eva tad abhāvaḥ asan= ca athavā yaḥ kulāla ādi vyāpārāt prāgabhāvaḥ ghaṭa ātmanā āsat mṛd piṇḍaḥ saḥ eva tad anantaram bhāvaḥ ghaṭa ātmanā san bhavati iti etat uktam bhavati kāryam kāraṇena bhinna abhinnam tatas eva prāk utpatteḥ sat asat atas kāraṇam prākkāraka vyāpārāt akārya ātmakam satkārya rūpa tām āpadyate yat sā janiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.137b.4–2.2.137b.5	 nanu ekasya eva bhinna tvam abhinna tvam ca sattvam asattvam ca viruddham iti atas yathā ekasya eva bhāva tvam abhāva tvam ca na viruddham tathā etat api ityādau sambhāvanām tāvat upadarśayan= ekaikasya bhāva tvam abhāva tvam ca upapādayati abhāvasya iti sārdha śloka dvayena pūrvavat eva vyākhyānam astu iyam sambhāvanā niścāyakam kim iti atas bheda asattvayoḥ pareṇa api aṅgīkṛta tvāt abheda sattve pramāṇena sādhayati tasmāt iti pradhvastasya ghaṭa ādeḥ bhedaḥ pradhvasta bhedaḥ ādipadena anutpannasya kāraka tvam gṛhyate naṣṭānām api vastūnām bhedaḥ na eva vinaśyati a iti yat pradhvasta bhedasya sattvam avagamyate yat ca ghaṭaḥ jāyate ghaṭam janayati iti anutpannasya api kartṛ tvam karma tvam vā tat tasmāt kāryasya kāraṇa abhedāt prāk utpatteḥ vināśa uttaram ca sattvāt eva hi yujyate na hi atyanta asattvam āpannasya svarūpa bhedaḥ san= iti yujyate 
NSu_2.2.137b.6–2.2.137b.7	 na api atyanta asataḥ kāraka tvam na ca kāryasya pṛthak eva sattvam asti anupalambhāt atas sattvam kāraṇa abhedaḥ ca aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ na ca vinā eva bādhakena upacāra tva kalpanā yuktāḥ atiprasaṅgāt tat idam uktam avagamyate eva iti na kevalam vyavahriyate iti arthaḥ abhāvasya ca bhāvāḥ syuḥ dharmāḥ te ca pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddha tva ādyujyante eva na tu nirākaraṇa arhāḥ iti uktam tad viśadayati asti iti ādipadena ghaṭa ādeḥ bhāvasya paṭa anyonya abhāva dharma tvam gṛhyate 
NSu_2.2.137b.8–2.2.138ab.3	 syāt etat anyonya abhāvasya bhāva dharma tve api tasya bhāvāt pṛthaktvena katham bhāvasya api abhāva tvam ucyate anyonya abhāvasya bheda tvāt bhedasya ca svarūpa tva aṅgīkārāt iti ced na svarūpa bhedasya anyonya abhāva atirikta tvāt yat ca uktam abhāve api pṛthaktvam asti iti tat asat pramāṇa abhāvāt svarūpa bhedena eva asaṅkara upapatteḥ pṛthaktvasya ca svarūpa bheda atirikta tvāt iti atas āha anyonya iti anyonya abhāva bhedau ca pṛthaktavam ca pṛthak pṛthak yat kalpayanti tat ca eva kalpanā gauravāt gatam pṛthak pṛthak vibhinnāni iti arthaḥ caśabdaḥ dūṣaṇa antara succaya arthaḥ gatam prāk eva nirākṛtam anena punarukti doṣaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati katham kalpanā gaurava ādikam iti atas āha paryāya tvena iti 
NSu_2.2.138cd.1–2.2.138cd.4	 paryāya tvena te śabdāḥ jñāyante sarve eva hi krama prayojya tvena iti arthaḥ sarve eva laukikāḥ vaidikāḥ ca atra māyā vādinaḥ codayanti sva rūpa bheda anatiriktayoḥ anyonya abhāva pṛthaktvayoḥ bhāva abhāva dharma tva upalambhāt sarva padārthānām api bhāva abhāva ātma tā siddhiḥ iti yat uktam tat ayuktam bhedasya vastu svarūpatva anupapatteḥ tathā hi bhedaḥ tāvat vidāraṇa ātmā bhidiḥ vidāraṇaḥ iti vidāraṇa artha bhididhātu rūpa tvāt bheda śabdasya tasya ca vidāraṇa ātmanaḥ bhāva svabhāva tve tasya api vidāraṇam syāt tathā tad eka deśānām api bhedaḥ svabhāvaḥ iti tatra apa vidāraṇam bhavet iti anena krameṇa sarva śūnyatā syāt kiñca bhedasya vastu svarūpa tve na tatra ekatā samaveyāt abheda eka artha samavāyinyāḥ ekatāyāḥ bhedena virodhāt ekatva abhāve aneka tvam api na syāt tad samāhara rūpa tvāt tad kāryatvāt vā tasya ekatva aneka tva vikalam ca śūnyam eva āpadyate 
NSu_2.2.138cd.5–2.2.138cd.6	 api ca yadi bhedaḥ vastu svarūpam syāt tadā pratiyogi anapekṣaḥ prasajyeta svarūpasya anapekṣa tvāt na hi ghaṭāt paṭasya bhedaḥ iti vat ghaṭāt paṭaḥ iti pratītiḥ asti ghaṭaḥ bhinnaḥ ghaṭasya bhedaḥ iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva sambandha pratibhāsaḥ api bhedasya vastu svarūpa tve dugharṭaḥ syāt na hi svayam eva svasya viśeṣaṇam sambandhi vā bhavati saṃśaya viparyayau ca evam ucchidyeyātam bheda āgraha nimittarau hi tau bhavataḥ tatra yadi dharmiṇam avagāhya tau bhavataḥ tadā tad svabhāva bhūtaḥ bhedaḥ api gṛhītaḥ iti kva tayoḥ avakāśaḥ na ced nirviṣaya tvāt sutarām yadi ca asmat ayam bhinnaḥ iti pratiyogi ghaṭita tayā pratīyamānaḥ bhedaḥ vastunaḥ svarūpam syāt tadā tasya sa parikarasya bhedasya svarūpe antarbhāvāt pratiyoginaḥ api sva rūpa tayā nimajja nāda dvaita matam eva paryavasyet iti tān apākaroti bhedasya iti 
NSu_2.2.139.1–2.2.139.3	 bhedasya tu svarūpa tve ye vadanti ca śūnyatām adbhuta tāḥ te yatas anyasya pratiyogi tvam iṣyate tuśabdaḥ prakṛtāt vaiśeṣika ādeḥ vyavacchindanye tu iti sambaddhayate svarūpa tve bhedya vastu svarūpa tve śūnyatām sarvasya api iti śeṣaḥ caśabdaḥ pūrva ukta dūṣaṇa samuccaya arthaḥ adbhutāḥ āścaryāḥ na laukikeṣu evaṃvidhāḥ dṛśyante na api parīkṣakeṣu iti yāvat tat katham iti atas śūnyatā āpattim tāvat nirākaroti yatas iti yaḥ bhedaḥ yasya svarūpam iṣyate tam bhedam prati tatas anyasya eva vastunaḥ pratiyogi tvam iṣyate yatas tasmāt adbhutāḥ te iti sambandhaḥ anyasya pratiyogi tve api katham ukta doṣa parihāraḥ iti atas āha pratiyoginaḥ hi iti 
NSu_2.2.140ab.1–2.2.140ab.2	 pratiyoginaḥ hi bhedaḥ ayam na tu svasmāt kathañcana hi śabdaḥ pūrvavat hetau ayam iti evambhāvasya pratyakṣa ādi siddha tām sūcayati svasmāt dharmi svarūpāt idam uktam bhavati vidāraṇa ātmā hi bhedaḥ yasya yatas tam tatas vidārayet na tu yam kam api yatas kutaścid na ca ghaṭa svarūpasya bhedasya ghaṭaḥ eva pratiyogī yena svasmin vidāraṇam syāt kintu ghaṭa ādayaḥ eva tatas vidāraṇam tu na aniṣyam tasya śūnyatānāpādaka tvāt iti 
NSu_2.2.140ab.3–2.2.140ab.4	 kiñca bhidyate anena iti yadi bheda śabdaḥ karaṇa sādhanaḥ bhavet tadā bhedaḥ kam api vidārayet bhāva sādhanatva aṅgīkārāt atas abhyupagamya eva karaṇa sādhana tāmayam parihāraḥ abhihitaḥ iti āśayavān āha kathañcana iti idam uditam iti śeṣaḥ kiñca vidāraṇam api lavitra ādi yad sambandhi tat vidārayati na tu sva ātmānam atas dharma bheda vāde kathañcid idam vaktavyam svarūpa bheda vāde tu kva asya avakāśaḥ bhedasya vastu svarūpa tve na tatra ekatā samaveyāt iti api anena eva nirastam 
NSu_2.2.140ab.5	 na hi eka tānekate sva rūpeṇa viruddhe ekasya eva ghaṭasya anya apekṣayā aneka tva darśanāt kintu yad apekṣayā anekaḥ tad apekṣayā eva ekaḥ iti viruddham tatra ghaṭasya parasmāt pratiyoginaḥ eva bhedaḥ iti tad apekṣayā eva aneka tvam sva apekṣayā tu ekatvam iti kaḥ virodhaḥ api ca eka tva aneka tvayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam vā viruddham dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ vā ādye na ekatāyāḥ bhedena virodhaḥ bhedasya svarūpa tvena eka tāsā mānādhikaraṇyā bhāvāt na dvitīyaḥ ekam dvi tvam iti darśanāt ekatva anekatva abhāve api śūnya tvam kutas vaiśeṣika ādīnām guṇa ādi vat māyauvādinām brahma vada guṇasya api sattva upapatteḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.140ab.6	 nanu bhedaḥ vastu svarūpam ced pratiyogi nirūpyaḥ eva na syāt svarūpasya tad abhāvāt atas na ayam parihāraḥ yujyate tathā ca svasmin= eva vidāraṇe punar śūnyatā eva iti ced na svatas paratas api vyāpti asiddheḥ yathā para nirūpyam api brahmaṇaḥ jīva aikyam brahma svarūpa tvam māyā vādinā aṅgīkṛtam asmābhiḥ ca paratva ādikam dravya svarūpam tathā pratiyogi nirūpyasya api bhedasya vastu svarūpa tve kaḥ virodhaḥ 
NSu_2.2.140ab.7–2.2.140ab.8	 kiñca bhedaḥ vastu svarūpam iti bruvāṇaḥ vastu svarūpasya apara nirūpya tvam katham abhyupeyāt etāvat tu syāt ekasya eva vastunaḥ pratiyogi pratītim apekṣyā anapekṣya ca pratītiḥ katham tatra api na sā eva pratītiḥ ubhayīm gatim aśnute kintu pratīti dvayam etat tat ca ekasmin= api vastuni viśeṣa balam avalambya samañjasam bhaviṣyati iti bhedasya para pratiyogita upapatteḥ kutas svasmin vidāraṇa āpattiḥ astu vā sva rūpa vidāraṇam tathā api śūnyatā āpādanam ayuktam eva iti āśayavān āha vibhāgena iti 
NSu_2.2.140cd.1–2.2.140cd.3	 vibhāgena alpa tā eva syāt kutas eva ca śūnyatā loṣṭha ādeḥ khalu a vaya vibhāgena loṣṭha ādi vināśe satyalparimāṇa avayava avaśeṣaḥ avagataḥ na tu sarva śūnyatā tathā sarvatra api vibhāgena alpa tā alpa avayavau= aśeṣa tā eva syāt śūnyatā tu kutas eva syāt nanu ca pañcaṣeṣu sthaleṣu vidāraṇena alpa alpatara alpatama vastu avaśeṣe a pyantatas kasyacid avayava jātasya śūnyatāyām sarva śūnyatā syāt iti atas āha na iti 
NSu_2.2.141ab.1–2.2.141ab.3	 na śūnyānām hi saṃyogāt bhāvaḥ vastunaḥ iṣyate yad saṃyogena hi yat vastu utpannam tasmin vidāraṇe sati saṃyoga nāśāt vastu nāśa anantaram tad avaśeṣaḥ bhavati yathā tantu saṃyogena utpanne ghaṭe tantu vidāraṇa saṃyoga nāśa krameṇa vinaṣṭe tantu avaśeṣaḥ evaṃca yadi keṣāñcid parama alpānām vastūnām śūnya saṃyogāt utpattiḥ syāt tadā vidāraṇe sati saṃyoga nāśena kārya nāśe śūnya avaśeṣaḥ syāt na ca evam prāmāṇikaiḥ iṣyate atas asaṅgatam sarva śūnyatā āpādanam iti bhāvaḥ janma nanu śūnya tvam nāma na atyanta asattvam āpādya tvena vivakṣitam kintu sūkṣmatama tvam eva tat ca aniṣyam iti atas āha vidāraṇā iti 
NSu_2.2.141cd.1–2.2.141cd.5^1	 vidāraṇa arthaḥ dhātuḥ ca vibhāga guṇa vācakaḥ syāt etat yadi bhedaḥ vidāraṇa ātmā bhavet naca evam pramāṇa abhāvāt aṅgīkṛtya eva tu pūrvaḥ parihāraḥ abhihitaḥ nanu uktam atra bheda śabdāt eva bhedasya vidāraṇa ātmaka tvam avagamyate sa hi bhideḥ dhātoḥ rūpam sa ca vidāraṇa artha tayā vyākhyātaḥ iti atra utraram yadā bhididhātuḥ vidāraṇa arthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tadā bheda śabdaḥ vibhāga ākhya guṇa vācakaḥ na tu anyonya abhāva lakṣaṇa bheda vācakaḥ iti etat uktam bhavati kriyā vāci tvam ākhyātum ekaikaḥ arthaḥ pradarśitaḥ prayogataḥ anugantavyāḥ aneka arthāḥ hi dhātavaḥ a iti vacanāt bhidiḥ vibhāga vacanaḥ anya tva vacanaḥ ca 
NSu_2.2.141cd.1–2.2.141cd.5^2	 bhinnaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti ukte sphuṭitaḥ iti gamyate bhinnam gaganam ghaṭāt iti anyat iti vijñāyate tatra vibhāgaḥ vidāraṇa ātmā na anyatvam tat eva ca atra prakṛtam na vibhāgaḥ iti anyatā lakṣaṇasya bhedasya vastu svarūpa tve vidāraṇa prasaṅgena ati alpatā pādanam api asaṅgatam eva chala tvāt iti nanu vibhāgasya anyatvasya ca kaḥ viśeṣaḥ yena evam ucyate iti ced na guṇa grahaṇena eva parihṛta tvāt vibhāgaḥ hi guṇa tayā vaiśeṣika ādibhiḥ upāttaḥ anya tā ca anyonya abhāvaḥ iti sphuṭaḥ bhedaḥ yaḥ tu guṇa ādi prakriyām na māyā vādī manyate tam bodhayitum āha avidāraṇe api iti 
NSu_2.2.142ab.1–2.2.142ab.2	 avidāraṇe api hi āsyasya bhinnau= oṣṭhau tu tasya ca āsyasya iti āsya sambandhinā ūḥ oṣṭhayoḥ grahaṇam tasya ca māyā vādinaḥ eva yadā hi māyā vādī niruttara tayā tūṣṇīm āste tadā tadīyayoḥ oṣṭhayoḥ vidāraṇa lakṣaṇa vibhāga abhāve api oṣṭhau bhinnau= anyonya abhāva lakṣaṇa bhedavantau bhavataḥ eva yad abhāve ca yat asti tat tatas anyat iti ca prasiddham eva atas vibhāgāt bhedaḥ artha antaram eva iti jñāyate tasya ca iti anena na atas param svarūpa bhede kācid anupapattiḥ sambhāvitā asti iti sūcitam nanu katham na asti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva anupapatti ādeḥ aparihṛta tvāt iti ced na svarūpa tve api viśeṣa balena viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva sambandha avabhāsa upapatteḥ anyathā anandam brahma ānandam brahmaṇaḥ iti ādeḥ anupapatti prasaṅgāt saṃśaya viparyaya anupapattiḥ api na asti sa viśeṣa tvena jñāta ajñāta tva upapatteḥ anyathā atma svarūpe svayaṃprakāśamāne tad svarūpa mātrāṇām advitīya tva ānanda tva ādīnām api prakāśanīyamān na jātu kasyacid saṃśaya viparyayau syātām avidyā vaśāt tatra tathā iti ced atra api sādṛśya vaśāt tathā iti santoṣyavyam
