NSu_2.2.142ab.3–2.2.142ab.4	 yat ca advaita paryavasānam uktam tat kutas iti vaktavyam yadi manyeta yathā hi lambakarṇaḥ āgataḥ nīlam ānīyatām iti ādau parikaravataḥ yat bhavati tad parikarasya api tathā pratiyogi ghaṭitasya bhedasya dharmi svarūpa tve pratiyoginaḥ api tad nimajjanam syāt iti tatra kim sambhāvanayet amucyate uta vyāptyā na ādyaḥ praśithila mūla tvāt na dvitīyaḥ citragurā ānīyatām kāśī nivāsī samāgataḥ ityādau tad abhāvāt pāramārthikīm dṛṣṭim avalambamānasya tat api asiddham iti ced aho pakṣapātaḥ asya yat parasya aniṣyam prasañjayan vyāpti grahaṇāya laukikam dṛṣṭāntam bahu manyate vyabhicāre tu tatra udāste para siddhena parasya eva aniṣya āpādanam iti ced tarhi mūla śaithilyam api paraḥ sva siddhena pratipatsyate vaicitryam kinnimittam iti ced vyāvartaka tva mātreṇa pratiyoginām upayogāt iti brūmaḥ tat evam sva para ma ta avalokān apekṣayā eva doṣa udbhāvanāt upekṣaṇam eva unmatta vākya vat māyā vādasya ucitam kinnirākaraṇena iti āśayavān upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_2.2.142cd.1–2.2.142cd.3	 atas unmatta vākya tvāt māyā vādaḥ abhyupekṣitaḥ nanu evaṃvidham matam siddhānta viruddha tvāt sūtra kṛtā kutas atra na nirākṛtam iti etat anena parihriyate upekṣitaḥ sūtrakāreṇa iti śeṣaḥ evam samavāyam nirākṛtya idānīm sambandha prasaṅgena sambandhinām api guṇa ādīnām prasakta tvāt īśvara guṇa saṅkhayā vipratipattim nirākaroti na ca iti 
NSu_2.2.143.1–2.2.143.3	 na ca amandasat ānanda syandī ananta guṇa arṇavaḥ īśvaraḥ aṣṭaguṇa tvena prameyaḥ apramita tvataḥ īśvaraḥ aṣṭaguṇa tvena aṣṭau= eva guṇāḥ asya santi iti evaṃrūpeṇa na prameyaḥ na pratipattavyaḥ kutas apramita tvataḥ aṣṭaguṇa tve pramāṇa abhāvāt kintva manda sadānanda syandī ananta guṇa arṇavaḥ prameyaḥ arṇavaḥ iva arṇavaḥ kṣīrārṇavaḥ sudhā syandī bhavati ayañca analpa vidoṣa ānanda sudhā syandī saḥ anantāḥ guṇāḥ śubha padārthāḥ cintāmaṇi prabhṛtayaḥ asmin= iti ananta guṇaḥ ayam api ānanda ādayaḥ anantā guṇāḥ asmin= iti ananta guṇaḥ amanda sadānanda syandī ca asau= ananta guṇaḥ ca asau= arṇavaḥ ca iti vigrahaḥ aṣṭaguṇa tva vat ananta guṇa tve api īśvarasya pramāṇam na asti iti atas āha mayi iti 
NSu_2.2.144.1–2.2.146a.3	 mayi ananta guṇe anante guṇataḥ ananta vigrahe ananta guṇa māhātmya śakti jñāna mahā arṇavaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ aśeṣa cetanebhyaḥ param padam ityādi veda tad vākyaiḥ anantaiḥ ca avasīyate ananta guṇa tā viṣṇoḥ anantā asaṅkha yātā guṇāḥ yasya asau= ananta guṇaḥ guṇataḥ anantaḥ iti guṇānām pratyekam anavadhika tvam ananta avāntara viśeṣavat tvam ca abhipreyate ananta vigrahaḥ iti antam bhagavat vākyam uttaram veda vākyam guṇa māhātmyā iti sāmānya viśeṣābhyām uktam māhātmyam parimāṇa atiśayaḥ param padam iti uddiśya anyat ucyate iti na liṅga vyatyaya doṣaḥ nanu etāni vacanāni upacarita arthāni kinna syuḥ iti atas āha katham eva iti 
NSu_2.2.146b.1–2.2.146cd.1	 katham eva hi apodyate bādhaka vaśāt hi mukhya arthaḥ apodyate na ca atra tat asti iti atas ananta guṇa tā viṣṇoḥ katham eva apodyate yat ca vaiśeṣika ādibhiḥ īśvara jñāna icchā prayatnānām akhaṇḍa tvam uktam tat api asat anantam guṇataḥ a iti pratyekam guṇānām ananta viśeṣavat tvasya āgama siddha tvāt tad anaṅgīkāre bādhakam ca āha yadi iti yadi ananta viśeṣāḥ ca tad jñāna ādeḥ nivāritāḥ 
NSu_2.2.147.1–2.2.147.2	 katham tad tad viṣaya tā sārvajñya artham vidhīyate aupādhika viśeṣaḥ tu pūrvam eva nirākṛtaḥ tad tad viṣaya tā ghaṭa ādi viṣaya tā vidhīyate astitvena aṅgīkriyate mā bhūt tat tat viṣaya tvam iti atas uktam sārvajña artham iti upalakṣaṇam ca etat sarva kartṛ tva ādi artham ca iti api draṣṭavyam atra ananta viśeṣāḥ iti yathā āgama siddha uktiḥ vastutas tu yadi īśvara jñāna ādi nirviśeṣam syāt tadā tad tad viṣaya tvam na syāt tadā ca tasya sārvajña ādikam na syāt sarva viṣaya jñānavān hi sarvajñaḥ nāma tathā sarva kārya utpatti viṣaya icchā prayatnavān sarva kartā sarva kārya vināśa viṣaya icchādimān= ca sarva saṃhartā aṅgīkṛtam ca sārvajña ādi pareṇa parameśvarasya atas tad artham jñāna ādeḥ tad tad viṣaya tayā bhāvyam katham ca tathā sati nirviśeṣa tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.147.3–2.2.147.4	 etanait api nirastam yat āhuḥ anityam hi jñāna ādi karma kāraka tayā viṣaya sahita tvam apekṣeta nityasya tu kim viṣayeṇa a iti viṣayāṇām ca ānantyāt ananta viśeṣa tā siddhiḥ syāt etat nirviśeṣam eva īśvara jñānam jñapti rūpam tat tu taiḥ taiḥ ghaṭa ādi upādhibhiḥ tad tad viṣayam iti vyapadiśyate evam akhaṇḍā eva tasya icchā astu iti evam ākārāḥ tathā api taiḥ taiḥ sṛṣṭayā ādi upādhibhiḥ sisṛkṣā sajjihīrṣā ityādi ucyate tathā prayatnaḥ api atas svatas viśeṣa abhāve api aupādhika viśeṣa vaśāt tad tad viṣaya tā sārvajña ādikam ca yuktam iti atas āha aupādhika iti 
NSu_2.2.147.5–2.2.147.6	 aupādhikaḥ api viśeṣaḥ asti na vā asti ced katham nirviśeṣa tvam na ced punar sārvajña ādi a bhāvaḥ ityādi pūrva ukta nyāyena eva nirastam iti arthaḥ kiñca upādhiḥ jñāna ādi sambaddhaḥ viśeṣam āpādayet asambaddhaḥ vā ādye sambandhaḥ viṣaya viṣayi bhāva atiriktaḥ na asti iti pūrvam eva tad viṣaya taiṣyavyā dvitīye ati prasaṅgaḥ api ca astu iti evam ākāreṇa eva icchā ādinā sṛṣṭayā ādikam bhavati uta sṛṣṭayā ādikam bhavatu iti evam ākāreṇa na ādyaḥ atiprasaṅgāt dvitīye svatas sa viśeṣa tvam iti eṣā diś vaiśeṣika ādayaḥ kecid īśvara jñānam sva prakāśam na bhavati iti āhuḥ tān apākaroti sva prakāśa tvam api iti 
NSu_2.2.148a–2.2.148d.3	 sva prakāśa tvam api tu yaiḥ jñānasya nivāritam katham sarvajña tā tasya yaiḥ tu iti sambandhaḥ kecid vaiśeṣika ādayaḥ sva prakāśa tām aṅgīkurvanti iti etat sūcayitum tuśabdaḥ jñānasya īśvara jñānasya teṣām pakṣaḥ iti śeṣaḥ tasya īśvarasya katham sva prakāśa tva abhāve sarvajña tā bhāvaḥ iti atas āha sva iti  sva jñāna adhigamam vinā sva jñāna adhigama abhāvāt iti arthaḥ ekam eva hi īśvara jñānam tat ca sva vyatiriktam eva viṣayīkaroti na tu svarūpam iti katham īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ syāt iti sva prakāśa jñāna abhāve api īśvarasya sārvajña sambhavam śaṅkate jñānam iti 
NSu_2.2.149.1–2.2.150a.3	 jñānam viśva adhigam tu ekam tat jñāna viṣayam param iti jñāna dvayena eva sarva vid parameśvaraḥ iti ced viśva adhigam sva vyatirikta samasta viṣayam tat jñānam viṣayaḥ yasya tat tathā uktam syāt ayam doṣaḥ yadi īśvarasya ekam eva jñānam syāt na ca evam dve khalu īśvara jñāne tatra ekam sva vyatirikta dvitīya jñāna sahita sarva viṣayam dvitīyam tu tad jñāna viṣayī kāri evaṃca jñānasya sva viṣaya tva abhāve api īśvarasya evaṃvidha jñāna dvayena eva sarva vid tvam upapadyate iti tathā api īśvarasya asārvajñam tat jñānasya vā sva prakāśa tvam duṣpariharam iti āśayavān uttaram āha eṣaḥ eva iti 
NSu_2.2.150a–2.2.150c.3	 eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ tad jñāna avasitaḥ yadi sva prakāśa tvam eva syāt āstām tāvat sajātīya ātma viśeṣa guṇa yaugapadya anupapattiḥ jñāna dvayavān aham jñāna dvayena sarvajñaḥ asmi idam me jñānam etat jñāna viṣayam etat ca etat viṣayam iti ādiḥ eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ īśvareṇa jñāyate na vā na iti pakṣe tasya sārvajñam na syāt ādye kim etayoḥ anyatareṇa uta jñāna antareṇa prathamasya idam uttaram eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ tayoḥ anyatareṇa jñānena avasitaḥ viṣayīkṛtaḥ yadi tadā tasya jñānasya sva prakāśa tvam syāt eva iti tat katham iti atas āha jñānam hi iti 
NSu_2.2.150d.1–2.2.150d.3	 jñānam hi etat viśeṣaṇam yadi api etat jñānam na niṣkṛṣṭam svasya sva viṣaya tām āpadyate tathā api jñāna viṣayasya etasya jñāna dvayān aham iti ādeḥ arthasya viśeṣaṇam bhavati eva tathā ca viśiṣṭa artha viṣaya tve viśeṣaṇa bhūta sva viṣaya tvam avarjanīyam eva na hi daṇḍi sākṣātkāre daṇḍaḥ na sphurati iti yuktam iti dvitīye doṣam āha jñāna antareṇa iti 
NSu_2.2.151ab.1–2.2.151ab.4	 jñāna antareṇa ced atra bhavet eva anavasthitiḥ jñāna antareṇa tṛtīyena jñānena yadi eṣaḥ arthaḥ viṣayīkriyate atra asmin pakṣe anavasthitiḥ jñāna dvayavān īśvaraḥ iti niyama abhāvaḥ bhavet yaḥ tu jñāna trayavān iti niyamam manyate sa praṣṭavyaḥ kim jñāna trayavān aham asmi iti ādikam artham īśvaraḥ vetti na vā iti dvitīye tu punar asārvajñam ādye kim etat traya anyatamena uta caturthena na ādyaḥ sva prakāśa tā āpatteḥ dvitīye punar anavasthā eva evam jñāna antara paramparā abhyupagama vyasanam durvāram syāt nanu anantāni īśvara jñānāni abhyupagacchāmi kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na kalpanā gauravāt varam ekasya eva jñānasya sva prakāśa tva abhyupagamaḥ iti āśayavān upasaṃharati sva prakāśa tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.151cd.1–2.2.151cd.2	 sva prakāśa tvam etasmāt durnivāryam samāpatet nanu jñānam na sva prakāśam vastu tvāt ityādeḥ viruddham sva prakāśa tvam katham aṅgīkartum ucitam iti ced yat vastu na tad sva prakāśam iti vyāpti jñānam sva ātmānam na viṣayīkaroti ced na sarva upasaṃhāra va t vaya āpti siddhiḥ viṣayīkaraṇe tu sva prakāśa tvam durnivāram iti āśayavataḥ vā upasaṃhāraḥ 
NSu_2.2.151cd.3–2.2.152ab.2	 yat uktam īśvaraḥ ananta guṇaḥ iti tad anupapannam caturviṃśateḥ adhikānām guṇānām abhāvāt tatra api keṣāñcid īśvare anupapatteḥ tasmāt upapannaiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ eva guṇaiḥ upapannaḥ bhagavān iti mā evam śaurya audāyarprāgalbhya prabhṛtīnām guṇānām bhāvāt pareṇa svīkṛteṣu api keṣāñcid anupapatti abhāvāt ca tathā hi sukham tāvat īśvarasya kutas na aṅgīkartavyam īśvaraḥ sukha rahitaḥ duḥkha rahita tvāt ghaṭa vat sukhavān= ceda duḥkhavān prasajyate devadatta vat iti vipakṣe bādhaka upapannāt anumānāt iti ced tatra anugrāhakasya tarkasya tāvat dūṣaṇam āha sukhavān iti sukhavān duḥkhavān= ca syāt iti vyāptiḥ ca naḥ bhavet katham vyāpti abhāvaḥ iti atas āha nirduḥkha tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.152cd.1–2.2.152cd.3	 nirduḥkha tvam mahānandaḥ śrutyā eva īśasya bhaṇyate yadi api sukhi tvam duḥkhi tvena sahacaritam devadatta ādau= upalabdham tathā api īśvare nirduḥkhe api vācyam prāk prasañjāna advaya āpti grahaṇa velāyām eva idam vyāpti bhaṅga udbhāvanam iti sarvatra api evam vaktum śakya tvena ukta doṣā nistārāt iti mā evam sva abhyupagama mātreṇa āpādana sthale vyāpti bhaṅga abhidhāne sati evam etat na ca evam prakṛte śruti balena eva īśvare sukhitvasya duḥkhi tva vyabhicāra upapādanāt tat idam uktam śrutyā eva bhaṇyate iti pratyekam sambandhāt eka vacanam kāsau śrutiḥ iti atas arthataḥ tām udāharati yaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.153.1–2.2.153.3	 yaḥ aśanāyā pipāse ca śoka ādīn= ca ativartate ānandam brahmaṇaḥ vidvān vipāpmā iti ādikā ca sā anenayaḥ aśanāyā pipāse śokam moham jarām mṛtyumatyeti a iti śrutim upādatte vipāpmā iti anenayaḥ ātma apahata pāpmā a ityādi śrutim sā nirduḥkha tva ādi abhidhātrī nanu ānanda śruteḥ duḥkha abhāva viṣaya tva upapatteḥ na śruti avaṣṭambhena prasaṅga mūla bhūta vyāpti bhaṅgaḥ vaktum śakyate iti atas aṅgīkṛtya tāvat sa upādhika tvam āha īśvarasya iti 
NSu_2.2.154.1–2.2.154.3	 īśvarasya tathā iṣṭa tvam duḥkhitvā upādhiḥ iti api ukte kim uttaram brūyāt śruti anādara tatparaḥ tathā iṣṭa tvam duḥkhī bhavatu iti iṣṭa tvam duḥkhitvā upādhiḥ duḥkhi tva prayojakam apipadena adharma ādimattvam samuccinoti anādaraḥ vinā bādhakena pratīta artha parityāgaḥ mā bhūt tāvat śruti avaṣṭambhena vyāpti bhaṅgaḥ sa upādhika tayā tu bhaviṣyati sa upādhika sambandhasya vyabhicāra niyamāt iti yaḥ sukhī sa duḥkhī bhavatu iti īśvara icchā viṣayaḥ eva iti niyamān na ayam upādhiḥ iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.2.155ab.1–2.2.155ab.3^1	 na ca ātma duḥkhita icchā syāt atas etat nivāryate īśvarasya hiānandam brahmaṇaḥ vidvān a ityādi śruteḥ sukhi tve api na upādhimattvam kasya api ātma duḥkhita icchā bhāvāt atas etat upādheḥ vyāpya abhimata vyāpaka tvam nivāya ṛte yadi api ayam niyamaḥ na darśana mātreṇa siddhayati atiprasaṅgāt niyāmakam tu na asti iti vaktum śakyate tathā api śruti artha parityāgam vārayitum prasaṅga āpādanāya idam uditam iti draṣṭavyam bhavet etat yadi ānanda śrutiḥ sukha vādinī syāt na ca etat asti tasyāḥ duḥkha abhāva paratvāt iti ced kim bādhakāt iyam śrutiḥ sva arthāt pracyāvyate uta evam eva na tāvat dvitīyaḥ duḥkha abhāva śruteḥ api anyathayitum śakya tvena tarkasya iṣi āpattitāpatteḥ 
NSu_2.2.155ab.1–2.2.155ab.3^2–2.2.155cd.1	 ādye na tāvat pratyakṣam āgamaḥ vā bādhakaḥ asti tatas sukhi tve duḥkhi tva prasaṅgaḥ vā nirduḥkha tva anumānam vā bādhakam iti vācyam tat ubhayam api vyapti bala pravṛttam vā syāt saha darśana mātra bala pravṛttam vā na ādyaḥ itaretara āśraya tva prasaṅgāt siddhe hi śruteḥ sva artha pracyāvane tarka anumānayoḥ vyāpti siddhiḥ tad siddhau ca śruteḥ sva arthāt pracyāvana siddhiḥ iti nanu etat bhavatām api samānam śruteḥ sva artha paratve tarka anumānayoḥ vyāpti bhaṅgaḥ sati ca tasmin śruteḥ sva artha paratvam iti mā evam yatas pratīta artha parityāgaḥ eva bādhakam apekṣate na sva artha paratvam bādhaka abhāvam tasya pratītya eva siddha tvāt dvitīye tu ati prasaṅgaḥ syāt iti āha saha iti saha darśana mātreṇa śrutī nām apalāpakaḥ 
NSu_2.2.156a–2.2.156c.3	 yajña ādeḥ api pāpasya hetu tvam hiṃsayā yuteḥ na anumāti katham āpādyena sādhyena vā saha darśanam yasya āpādakasya sādhanasya vā tad saha darśanam śrutīnām īśvarasya ānanda vādinīnām apalāpakaḥ sva artha pracyāvakaḥ yajña ādeḥ iti ādi padena gobhyaḥ yavasa dānam gṛhyate yuteḥ yogāt yadi saha darśana mātreṇa ānanda śruti artha ālāpaḥ kriyeta tadā yā hiṃsā sā pāpa hetuḥ iti saha darśanena jyotiṣyomādi śruti artha apalāpaḥ api kriyatām aviśeṣāt iti bhāvaḥ nanu aviśeṣaḥ asiddhaḥ hiṃsā tva pāpa sādhana tvayoḥ sāhacarye niṣiddha tvasya upādheḥ vidyamāna tvāt na ca sukhi tva duḥkhi tva sambandhe kaścid upādhiḥ asti īśvarasya tathā iṣṭa tvam upādhiḥ tu idānīm api gahana niviṣyaḥ iti āśaṅkate tatra iti 
NSu_2.2.156cd.1–2.2.156cd.3	 tatra yadi upādhiḥ niṣiddha tā asti iti ucyate iti śeṣaḥ kā iyam niṣiddha tā nāma akartavyatayā śruti ukta tvam iti ced kā iyam akartavyatā api karaṇān arhatā vā kartuḥ aniṣya hetu tā vā na ādyaḥ brahma hiṃsāyāḥ api kriyamāṇa tvāt dvitīye api kim sākṣāt aniṣya sādhana tvam paramparayā vā na ādyaḥ hiṃsā anantaram eva duḥkha utpāda adarśanāt dvitīye tu pāpa sādhana tayā ukta tvam upādhiḥ iti uktam syāt evaṃcātra api upādhi sadbhāvāt aviśeṣaḥ eva iti pariharati aduḥkhi tvena iti 
NSu_2.2.157ab.1–2.2.158a.3	 aduḥkhi tvena ca anuktiḥ katham na upādhitām vrajet aduḥkhi tvena anuktiḥ iti a duḥkhi tvena uktiḥ iti arthaḥ kā asau devadatta ādīnām śrautī duḥkhitvā uktiḥ iti atas āha aduḥkham iti aduḥkham itarat sarvam jīvāḥ eva tu duḥkhinaḥ teṣām duḥkha prahāṇāya śrutiḥ eṣā pravartate iti śrutiḥ hi paramā pravartate duḥkha prahāṇa sādhanam paramātmānam pratipādayati iti arthaḥ evam anumāna anugrāhakam tarkam nirākṛtya idānīm īśvaraḥ na sukhī nirduḥkha tvāt ghaṭa vat iti anumānam api dūṣayati śruti uktiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.158b–2.2.158d.3	 śruti uktiḥ yadi kāraṇam kim kāryam anumānena gaa stana samena hi kāraṇam pramāyāḥ ānandam brahmaṇaḥ vidvān a ityādi śrutiḥ pramāṇam na vā na iti pakṣe apasiddhāntaḥ ādye tad bādhita tvena ajāgala stanaḥ iva vivakṣita artha āsādhakam anumānam upekṣaṇīyam iti bhāvaḥ nanu śrutiḥ pramāṇam eva kintu anumāna viruddha tvāt pratīta artham parityajya duḥkha abhāva para tayā vyākhyātavyā ityāśaṅkayaḥ na evam anumānasya śruti bādhaka tva adarśanāt kvacid upajīvya tva ādinā eva bādhaka tvāt evam eva bādhaka tva abhyupagame tu atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt iti āha anumānena iti 
NSu_2.2.159a–2.2.159e.2	 anumānena yadi arthaḥ śruti dṛṣṭaḥ vyapodyate pūrva uktena prakāreṇa na īśvaraḥ dharmaḥ eva ca syāt tad phalam ca pūrva uktena śāstra yoni sūtra uktena na īśvaraḥ syāt śruti dṛṣṭaḥ api īśvaraḥ anumāna virodhāt tyājyaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ dharmaḥ ca na eva syāt tat phalam ca na eva syāt iti atra api evam eva tātparyam yajña kriyā na adṛṣṭa phala hetuḥ kriyā tvāt niṣṭhīvana ādi kriyāvat dharmaḥ vā na sukha sādhanam adṛṣṭa tvāt adharma vat iti ādi anumāna sambhavāt atiprasaṅgasya viparyaye paryavasānam āha tena iti 
NSu_2.2.159ef.1–2.2.160.1	 tena atra śrutiḥ eva pramā bhavet yasmāt upajīvya tva ādi rahitena anumānena ānanda śruteḥ bādha abhyupagame aniṣya prasaṅgaḥ tena kāraṇena eṣā śrutiḥ atra īśvarasya ānandavat tvaḥ eva pramā pramāṇam bhavet na punar anyathā yojyā iti mā bhūt śrutiḥ apramāṇam mā ca bhūt anu māna bādhayār atha antara parā tathā api anumānasya bādhikā kutas pratirodhikā tu bhavet iti atas āha īśasya iti īśasya anumayā siddheḥ śrutiḥ dhamiḥ pramā bhavet tayā sarva guṇaiḥ pūrṇaḥ uktaḥ īśaḥ yatas tatas 
NSu_2.2.161a–2.2.161c.3	 anānanda anumā tasya dharmi grāhi virodhataḥ na pramāṇam bhavet anumaya iti śruti vyatirikta pramāṇa upalakṣaṇam dharmi pramā dharmi grāhakam pramāṇam anumānam hi pramāṇa antareṇa siddhe dharmiṇi pravartate na anyathā atra ca īśvaraḥ dharmī na ca asau= anumānena siddhayati iti samarthitam prāk pratyakṣa ādi aviṣaya tvam tu parasya api sammatam tatas pariśeṣāt śrutiḥ eva dharmiṇaḥ parameśvarasya grāhikā iti eṣi avyam tathā cānena anumānena śruti prāmāṇyam anumatam anyathā svasya anutthāna prasaṅgāt sā ca upajīvyā śrutiḥ īśvaram ānandavantam ācaṣṭe tatas tad virodhāt anumānam apramāṇam eva agni svarūpa grāhaka pratyakṣa viruddha tad śaitya anumāna vat iti na ca vācyam yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādi vākyam anumānasya upajīvyam na ānanda vādī iti sarvasya api vedasya eka vākya tvena ardhacaratīya ayogāt anyathā agni grāhakam eva upajīvyam na tu tat auṣṇya grāhakam iti api syāt anena eva nyāyena īśvarasya vigraharāhiti ādi anumānam api sarvam śruti viruddha tvāt apramāṇam eva iti āśayavān upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
NSu_2.2.161d.1–2.2.162.2^1	 tasmāt na anumātra upayoginī atra īśvara vākye atas eva sarva guṇaiḥ pūrṇaḥ iti uktam anyathā anandavān iti avakṣyat anupapatti antaram vaiśeṣika ādi darśane darśayat nityam eva ca bhāvāt a iti sūtram vyākhyāti nitya icchatvāt iti nitya icchatvāt para īśasya paramāṇu sadātvataḥ adṛṣṭa kālayoḥ ca eva bhāvāt kāryam sadā bhavet vaiśeṣika ādayaḥ hi kāla viśeṣe dvayaṇuka ādi prakrameṇa mahābhūta sṛṣṭim abhyupagacchanti tad tadīya prakriyā paryālocanāyām na upapadyate kintu tat pakṣe kāryam sadā bhavet yadā abhilaṣṭate tatas prāk api bhavet kutas kāraṇa sāmagrī sampatti nibandhanaḥ hi kārya utpatteḥ kāla niyamaḥ tatra ādi sṛṣṭau paramāṇavaḥ samavāyi kāraṇa bhūtāḥ tāvat sadā vidyante nimitta kāraṇam ca īśvara icchā nityā eva tathā kālaḥ diś yadi api adṛṣṭam dharma adharma samākhyātam na nityam tathā api pralaye asti iti aṅgīkriyate eva vṛtti lābhaḥ tadā na asti iti ced na tasya api īśvara icchā ādi kāraṇakasya tad bhāve abhāva anupapatteḥ atas eva paramāṇu saṃyogasya asamavāyi kāraṇasya abhāvāt na sadā sṛṣyiḥ iti nirastam 
NSu_2.2.162.2^2	 saṃyoga anutpādasya api anupapatteḥ tad asamavāyi kāraṇa karma abhāvāt iti ced na tad anutpādasya api ayogāt na cātas anya dvayaṇuka ādeḥ kāraṇam asti yat vaikalyāt abhilaṣita samayāt prāk kārya abhāvaḥ bhavet satyām ca abhimata sāmagṣām kārya anudaye paścāt api na utpadyeta niyāmaka abhāvāt iti sadātvam sadātatvanam bhāvāt pralaye api iti śeṣaḥ eva śabdasya sadā eva iti sambandhaḥ kāryam bhavet iti ca abhyupagamya uktam vastutas tu tad pakṣe kadāpi dvayaṇuka ādi utpattiḥ na sambhavati vināśa kāraṇasya īśvara icchā ādeḥ sadātana tvena sat pratipakṣa tvāt kārya utpatti saha kṛtam eva īśvara icchā ādikam vināśa kāraṇam iti aṅgīkāre api utpatti anantaram eva vināśaḥ prasajyeta iti atas eva sṛṣṭayā ādi iti vakṣyati 
NSu_2.2.162.3	 syāt evam yadi kāla mātram sṛṣṭeḥ vā saṃhārasya vā kāraṇam syāt naca evam kintu kāla viśeṣaḥ eva atas tad bhāva abhāvābhyām sṛṣṭi saṃhāra niyamaḥ ghaṭate tathā na īśvara icchā mātram sṛṣṭayā ādi hetuḥ kintu tad viśeṣaḥ eva tatas tad bhāva abhāva prayuktā sṛṣṭayā ādi vyavasthā syāt iti ced na kim kāla deśa ādeḥ aupādhikaḥ bhedaḥ kiṃvā svābhāvikaḥ na ādyaḥ nirasta tvāt dvitīye tu apasiddhāntaḥ iti āha na hi iti 
NSu_2.2.163ab.1–2.2.163ab.3	 na hi kāla vibhedaḥ asti tat pakṣe hi śabdenaa ākāśa kāla diśām eka eka tvāt a iti ādi tat vākyam smārayati kāla iti īśvara icchāyā api upalakṣaṇam nanu idam dūṣaṇam bhavatām api samānam tathā hi mahat ādi upādāna kāraṇam prakṛtiḥ nityā eva tathā nimitta kāraṇam īśvara icchā kāla ādikam api tat eva ca pralaya kāraṇam atas sṛṣṭi pralaya samaya niyamaḥ bhavatām api durghaṭaḥ iti atas āha asmat mataḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.163b–2.2.163d.2	 asmad mate hareḥ viśeṣa kāle eva etat sṛṣṭayā ādi icchā sadātanā yadi api asmad mate hareḥ icchā sadātanā prakṛti ādi upalakṣaṇam etat tathā api viśeṣa kāle eva etasya mahat ādeḥ sṛṣṭayā ādi bhavati iti yojanāḥ asmābhiḥ kāle svabhāvataḥ eva bhedaḥ abhyupagamyate tathā ca kāla viśeṣasya eva sṛṣṭim saṃhāram ca kāraṇa tvāt tad bhāva abhāvābhyām sat su api itara kāraṇeṣu sṛṣṭayā ādi samaya niyamaḥ yujyate iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.2.163b–2.2.163d.4	 nanu kāla viśeṣaḥ iti vācyam mā evam viśiṣṭate iti viśeṣaḥ sa ca asau kālaḥ ca iti vigraha grahaṇāt nanu sadātanī iti bhavitavyam mā evam na ayam ṭyuṭi uloḥ anya rataḥ pratyayaḥ kintu bhava arthe tana pratyayaḥ ayam athavā tana iti tanote rūpam etat nanu te kāla bhedāḥ yadi nityāḥ tadā sa prasaṅgaḥ tad avasthaḥ vyarthaḥ ca kāla bheda abhyupagamaḥ anitya tve tad kāraṇam vācyam iti ced satyam upādānam tu prakṛtiḥ eva nimittam āha viśeṣāḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.2.164ab.1–2.2.164ab.3	 viśeṣāḥ ca eva kālasya hareḥ icchā vaśāḥ sadā na kevalam mahat ādi kintu kālasya viśeṣāḥ ca kṣaṇa lava ādayaḥ eva śabdasya hareḥ eva iti sambandhaḥ sadā iti anena na yugapad sarva kṣaṇa sṛṣṭiḥ yena teṣām api kṣaṇika tvam syāt kintu nirantara pravāhatayā iti uktam bhavati nanu kāla viśeṣāṇām parameśvarāt janma kutas pramāṇāt siddham iti atas āha sarve iti 
NSu_2.2.164cd.1–2.2.164cd.3	 sarve nimeṣāḥ iti hi śrutiḥ eva āha sa ādaram sarve nimeṣāḥ jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣāt adhi a iti śrutiḥ eva kāla viśeṣāṇām īśvarāt janim āha hi iti arthaḥ viśeṣaṇa dyotate iti vidyut tasmāt parama puruṣāt sarve nimeṣāḥ kāla bhedāḥ adhijajñire yata asvam jāyante iti nanu eṣā śrutiḥ kāla upādhīnām īśvarāt jananam āha na tu kālasya tathā sati kāṣṭhā kalā muhartāḥ ca iti uttara vākyasya paunarukti aprasaṅgāt na hi sarva nimeṣa atiriktam kāṣṭhākalā ādikam asti upādhayaḥ tu nimeṣa ādi rūpāḥ pṛthak eva iti na tatra punarukti doṣaḥ iti atas uktam sa ādaram iti yat sarva nimeṣa janma abhidhāya punar kāṣṭha ādi janma abhidhatte tad ādara artham iti atas na punarukti doṣaḥ upādhi bhedaḥ tu na upapadyate iti uktam eva iti nanu nimeṣa ādi śabdāḥ akṣi pakṣma saṃyoga ādi vācinaḥ na sākṣāt kāla abhidhāyinaḥ atas na iyam śrutiḥ vyaktam kālasya eva īśvarāt janma pratipādayitum alam iti atas atra spaṣṭām śrutim ca āha udīrayati iti 
NSu_2.2.165ab.1–2.2.165ab.2	 udīrayati kāla ākhya śaktim iti asya vāc api saḥ antar śarīre arpita bhūta sūkṣmaḥ kāla ātmikām śaktim udīrayāṇaḥ a iti asya īśvarasya vāc api kālasya īśvarāt utpattim āhā iti arthaḥ kāla ātmikām kāla ākhyām sahakāri śaktim udīrayāṇaḥ janayan= iti arthaḥ atra kāla śabdāt īśvarasya jagat sṛṣṭau śaktitva abhidhānāt ca na artha antara kalpanā avakāśaḥ 
NSu_2.2.165ab.3–2.2.165cd.3	 syāt etat kālaḥ tāvat sarva utpattimatām nimittam na ca kālasya utpattau kāla antaram asti tat katham tasya upapattiḥ pūrva kālaḥ para kālasya nimittam iti ced na idānīm jātaḥ tadānīm jātaḥ iti adhikaraṇa tayā kālasya kāraṇa tā avadhāraṇāt adhikaraṇasya kārya utpatti samāna kālīnatāyāḥ gehe jātaḥ goṣṭhe jātaḥ ityādau niścita tvāt iti atas āha kālasya iti kālasya kāla ga tvena na virodhaḥ api kaścana kālasya utpatti aṅgīkāre na kevalam sādhaka sadbhāvaḥ kintu kaścana virodhaḥ api na asti iti yojanāḥ etat ca prapañcayiṣyate evam sva mate kāla viśeṣa bhāva abhāva prayuktaḥ sṛṣṭayā ādeḥ samaya niyamaḥ iti samarthitam prakāra antareṇa tam samarthayate asaṅkhayātā iti 
NSu_2.2.166ab.1–2.2.166ab.3	 asaṅkha yāta viśeṣa tvāt icchāyāḥ api sarvadā sarvadā vidyamānāyāḥ iti śeṣaḥ sarvadā vidyamānāyāḥ api īśvara icchayāḥ śakti vyakti rūpa avasthita sisṛkṣā tva ādi a saṅkha yāta viśeṣa tvāt tad vayakti avyakti prayuktaḥ sṛṣṭayā ādeḥ sama niyamaḥ yujyate iti arthaḥ yadi api kāla bheda mātreṇa kṛta samādhānam etat kāla viśeṣe srakṣyāmi iti evaṃrūpa tvāt bhagavat icchāyāḥ na mogha tvam āpadyate tathā api vastu sthitiḥ iyam darśitā veditavyā kālasya kāla ga tvena iti uktam tatra kim kālaḥ svagataḥ kim vā kāla antara gataḥ na ādyaḥ sva skandha ārohaṇa vat viruddha tvāt na dvitīyaḥ tad abhāvāt bhāve vā kāla antara sṛṣṭi vaiyarthyāt tasya api utpattau kāla antara aṅgīkāra prasaṅgāt iti ataḥ sa pramāṇakam uktam vivṛṇoti īśaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.166cd.1–2.2.168.2	 īśaḥ deśaḥ ca kālaḥ ca sva gatāḥ eva sarvadā deśaḥ iti avyākṛta ākāśa abhidhānam sva gatāḥ iti uktyā prāptām deśa kālayoḥ svātantrya śaṅkām vārayati īśa adhīnau= iti īśa adhīnau ca tau nityam tad ādhārau ca tad gatau iti śrutiḥ api prāha kāle sva uddiṣṭaḥ eva tu tad kāla sṛṣṭim eva atas vāñchati īśaḥ sadā eva hi syāt kālaḥ sa tadā eva iti kālasya sva gata tvataḥ viśeṣaṇa mātreṇa sattā pratīti pravṛttīnām parameśvara āyattatvam ucyate śrutiḥ api iti sākṣiṇam samuccinoti yatas kālasya sva gata tvam śrutiḥ prāha sākṣiṇā ca siddham atas kālasya sva gata tvataḥ sa kālaḥ tadā eva syāt iti īśaḥ sadā eva sva uddiṣyaḥ eva kāle tad tad kāla sṛṣṭim eva vāñchati iti anvayaḥ 
NSu_2.2.168.3	 etat uktam bhavati kāla atirikta kāryāṇām eva kālaḥ adhikaraṇa tayā kāraṇam na kālasya kevalam śvas ghaṭam sraṣṭā asmi iti vat kāla sṛṣṭim vāñchataḥ parameśvarasya adhikaraṇa tayā uddeśyaḥ kālaḥ kaḥ iti praśnaḥ avaśiṣyate tatra yaḥ sṛjyaḥ saḥ eva iti uttaram na hi sṛjyasya prāk sattvam asti yena uddeśya tvam sattvam apekṣeta adhikaraṇa adhikartavya tā ca ekasya eva śruti ādi siddhā viśeṣa balāt ca upapadyate atas na kālasya utpattau kācid anupapattiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.168.4	 yat uktam yadā īśvara icchā sisṛkṣā ākārā vyajyate tadā mahat ādi sṛṣṭi bharvati yadā tu sañjihīrṣā rūpā sampadyate tadā saṃhāraḥ bhavati iti tatra idam vaicitryam kinnimittam iti vācyam na ca kāla viśeṣaḥ nimittam iti yuktam tasya īśvara icchā āyatta tvāt na api puruṣa artha āyattam pāratantrya āpatteḥ iti atas āha svabhāvāt eva iti 
NSu_2.2.169a.1–2.2.169b.3	 svabhāvāt eva hi icchā eṣā eṣā vicitrāḥ tasmāt kāla viśeṣāṇām īśvara adhīna tve na itaretara āśraya doṣa āpattiḥ iti hi śabda arthaḥ kutas etat iti atas āha devasya iti  devasya eva iti śruteḥ etat avagamyate iti śeṣaḥ aparaḥ āha kim anayā kāla ādi vaicitrya kalpanayā yāvatā kāraṇānām kāryāṇām ca svabhāvāt eva samaya niyama upapatteḥ antatas api hi svabhāva vādaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ tatas varam ādau= eva svabhāva vāda abhyupagamaḥ iti atas āha svabhāvaḥ api iti 
NSu_2.2.169cd.1–2.2.169cd.3	 svabhāvaḥ api pareśa icchā vaśaḥ iti uditaḥ purā pura acetanānām viśeṣaḥ yaḥ a ityādau svabhāva vādam abhyupagacchatā api tad niyāma katayā īśvaraḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ tatas tatra ekatra eva svabhāva anusaraṇe pramāṇa āyatte aṅgīkārye kim anekatra tad abhyupagamena iti bhāvaḥ na kevalam pūrva uktam eva pramāṇam smartavyam kintu pramāṇa antaram api asti iti āha nityāḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.170ab.1–2.2.170cd.1	 nityāḥ anityāḥ ca tatas tad adhīnāḥ iti śrutiḥ tatas iti asya śrutau= eva parāmarśa viṣayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ śrutiḥ sarvasya īśvara adhīna tām āha iti śeṣaḥ anupapatti antaram vaiśeṣika ādimate darśayan  rūpa ādimat tvāt ca viparyayaḥ darśanāt ubhayathā ca doṣāt iti sūtra dvayam vyācaṣṭe rūpā iti rūpa ādimat tvāt ca viparyayaḥ darśanāt ubhayathā ca doṣāt rūpa sparśa ādi hetubhyaḥ paramāṇoḥ anitya tā 
NSu_2.2.171a.1–2.2.171a.6^1	 anumeyāḥ paramāṇoḥ iti jāti apekṣam eka vacanam pārthiva ādīnām caturvidhānām paramāṇūnām nitya tām upayānti vaiśeṣika ādayaḥ tad anupapannam pāthiḥ vāḥ pāthasīyāḥ taijasāḥ ca paramāṇavaḥ anityāḥ rūpavat tvāt paṭa vat yat vā caturvidhāḥ api anityāḥ sparśavat tvāt paṭa vat evam pārthitavāḥ āpyāḥ ca anityāḥ rasavat tvāt paṭa vat pārthivāḥ anityāḥ gandhavat tvāt tadvat eva ityādi anumāna viruddha tvāt na ca sāvayava tvam upādhiḥ guṇa ādau sādhya avyāpteḥ na ca dravya tva avacchinne sādhye asya upādhi tvam yat rūpa ādimat tat sāvayavam iti sādhana vyāpaka tvāt na ca dharmi grāhaka virodhaḥ sākṣiṇā eva paramāṇu siddheḥ ukta tvāt 
NSu_2.2.171a.1–2.2.171a.6^2	 anitya tve ca paramāṇūnām na mūla kāraṇa tva siddhiḥ yadi ca rūpa ādimantaḥ api paramāṇavaḥ na anityāḥ tadā ghaṭa ādayaḥ api anityāḥ na syuḥ aviśeṣāt tathā api na paramāṇūnām mūla kāraṇa tvam naceśvare hetūnām vyabhicāraḥ bhautika tvena viśeṣaṇāt tathā ca vakṣyati bhautikam tu eva rūpa ādi vyāptam nāśena naḥ mate a  iti nanu asmābhiḥ bhūta sūkṣmāṇām nityatā aṅgīkriyate tat katham evam anumīyate mā evam na hi paramāṇavaḥ bhūta sūkṣmāṇi kinnāma ahaṃmātra upacitāni vikṛta ākārāḥ ca anityāḥ eva iti aparigrahāt ca atyantam anapekṣā aparigrahāt ca atyantam anapekṣā iti sūtram vyācaṣṭe śrītīnām ca iti 
NSu_2.2.171.1–2.2.171.2	 śrutīnām ca viruddha tvāt na tat matam upādeyam atas ca ayam aviruddhaḥ samanvayaḥ sambandha mātre ṣaṣṭhī anyathā tṛtīyā syāt śrutayaḥ caa ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ a ityādyāḥ tatra tatra udāhṛtāḥ jñātavyāḥ vaiśeṣika ādi matasya anupādeya tve siddhe kim labdham iti atas āha atas ca iti ayam sakala guṇa pūrṇa para brahma viṣayaḥ aviruddhaḥ iti na vaiśeṣikā asi damata virodena asamañjasaḥ mantavyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.2.171.3–2.2.171.5	 samudāyaḥ ubhaya hetuke api tad aprāptiḥ samudāyaḥ ubhaya hetuke api tad aprāptiḥ atha idānīm saugata matam apākriyate te ca caturvidhāḥ vaibhāṣikāḥ sautra antikāḥ mādhyamikāḥ yoga ācārāḥ ca iti tatra jagat satyam eva paramāṇu m ayam ācakṣāṇānām vaiśeṣika ādīnām nirasana prasaṅgāt anatibhedam vaibhāṣika sautra antika matamādau tāvat nirākriyate vipratipattim darśayan= tat matam upanyasyati vaibhāṣikāḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.2.172ab.1–2.2.172ab.4	 vaibhāṣikāḥ ca sautra antāḥ svara sakṣaṇikam jagat āhuḥ iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ kṣaṇikam kṣaṇa mātra avasthāyi mudgara abhighāta ādīnām vināśa hetūnām pratikṣaṇam anupalambhāt katham kṣaṇa bhaṅgi tvam iti atas uktam svarasa iti svabhāvena eva kṣaṇikam svabhāvaḥ eva ayam vastunaḥ yat vināśi tvam tatra kā kāraṇa apekṣā mudgara ādayaḥ api na vastu vināśa hetavaḥ kinnāma ghaṭa āditaḥ kapāla ādeḥ visadṛśa kāryasya utpattau nimitta bhūtāḥ eva iti nanu ca kāraṇānām kriyayā saṃyoge sati tad samaveta tayā tad pariṇāma tayā vā kāryeṇa utpattavyam tad kāryeṇa api evam iti katham kṣaṇika tvam jagataḥ iti atas āha aṇūnām iti 
NSu_2.2.172c.1–2.2.172d.1	 aṇūnām samudāyam ca jagat āhuḥ aṇu samudāyāḥ eva go ghaṭa ādi bodha bodhyāḥ na tu tat atiriktaḥ avayavī nāma asti yena kṣaṇika tā virudhyeta aṇu mātram iti vaktavye samudāya grahaṇam ekaḥ mahān iti pratyakṣa pratyaya virodha parihāra artham pratyekam aṇūnām apratyakṣa tve aneka tve amahat tve api tad samudāyasya pratyakṣa tu a ādi yujyate iti bhāvaḥ samudāyaḥ hi melakena puṃsā bhavati naca asmad ādiḥ tathā iti īśvaraḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ syāt tathā avayavi anabhyupagame go ghaṭa ādi vilakṣaṇa ākāra tā na syāt iti atas āha kāla iti  ca kāla karma nimittataḥ 
NSu_2.2.173a.1–2.2.173a.3	 utpatti kāle yuktānām kāla karmaṇī ca te nimitte ca tatas utpatti kāle ādisṛṣṭau anyadā tu nimitta antaram asti iti bhāvaḥ yuktānām sannikṛṣṭa tayā utpannānām aṇūnām samudāyam iti sambandhaḥ karma ādi vaśāt eva tathā tathā sannikṛṣṭāḥ paramāṇavaḥ jāyante yatā yathā go ghaṭa ādi vicitra ākāra avabhāsaḥ syāt tatra kim īśvareṇa kim vā avayavinā siddhāntinā api hi karma ādikam nimittam aṅgīkartavyam saṃyogaḥ ca avaya vi utpāda anuguṇaḥ tāvatā eva sarvam upapadyate itrata kim anātma prapañcaḥ eva kṣaṇikaḥ na iti āha ātmānam iti 
NSu_2.2.173b.1–2.2.173d.2	 ātmānam ca kṣaṇa sthitim kṣaṇika tva hetoḥ sattvasya sarvatra sāmyāt iti bhāvaḥ kṣaṇika tve pratyabhijñā virodhaḥ iti atas āha nityam iti nityam santānam eteṣām eteṣām aṇūnām santā viṣayā pratyabhijñā iti bhāvaḥ na ca evam sattvasya anaikāntyāt santānasya sattva abhāvāt evam sāmānyatas nirūpya vibhāgam āha pañca iti  pañca skandha ātmanā sthitam jagat vṛkṣam pañca skandha ātmanā sthitam āhuḥ pañca skandhān āha saṃskāra iti 
NSu_2.2.174ab.1–2.2.174ab.3	 saṃskāra rūpa vijñāna sañjñā duḥkha ātmanā sthitiḥ sthitiḥ skandhānām iti śeṣaḥ samanantara pratyayaḥ saṃskāra skandhaḥ rūpa rasa gandha sparśa śabda ātmakāḥ paramāṇavaḥ rūpa skandhaḥ nirvikalpakam jñānam vijñāna skandhaḥ sa vikalpakam jñānam saṃjñā skandhaḥ vedanā para paryāyam duḥkham ca eka skandhaḥ atra rūpa skandhaḥ bāhyaḥ anye catvāraḥ ābhyantarāḥ iti āhuḥ iti sambandhaḥ sukha ādīnām padārtha antareṇa vidyamāna tvāt katham pañca eva skandhāḥ iti atas āha duḥkha abhāvāt iti 
NSu_2.2.174c.1–2.2.174d.1	 duḥkha abhāvam sukham ca āhuḥ caśabdena kecid sukham vedanā skandhe antar bhāvayanti iti sūcitam bhavati yat vā anukta samuccaya arthaḥ caśabdaḥ yathā mūrta abhāvaḥ eva ākāśam rūpa ādayaḥ eva pṛthivī ādyāḥ saṅkhayā ādayaḥ tu guṇāḥ pṛthak anupalambhāt na santi eva deśa antara utpādaḥ eva karma pratyaya ālambanam kṣaṇikasya vāstava karma ayogāt sannikṛṣṭa viprakṛṣṭa tayā utpādaḥ eva saṃyoga ādi vyavahāra gocaraḥ ata dvaya āvṛttiḥ eva go tva ādi sāmānya buddhi bodhyā ityādi  arūpa jñāna santatim 
NSu_2.2.175a.1–2.2.175a.3	 mokṣam arūpa iti santanyamānam jñānam eva ātmā tasya viṣaya upaplavaḥ saṃsāraḥ arūpā nirviṣayā yā jñāna santatiḥ tām eve mokṣam āhuḥ na anyam iti atas na pañca skandha prakriyā bhaṅgaḥ iti evam vaibhāṣika sautra antikayoḥ sādhāraṇam matam upanyasya avāntara bhedam tu nirākaraṇa prastāvaḥ eva vivakṣuḥ yat tāvat uktam paramāṇu samudāya eva go ghaṭa ādi prapañcaḥ na tu avayavī kaścid asti iti tat nirākartum samudāyaḥ ubhaya hetuke api tad aprāptiḥ iti sūtram vyācaṣṭe saḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.175ab.1–2.2.175ab.4	 sa samudāyaḥ hi na ekasmāt eva yujyate yaḥ ayam go ghaṭa ādi buddhi viṣaya tvena abhyupagataḥ samudāyaḥ sa kim eka paramāṇu hetukaḥ kiṃvā aneka paramāṇu hetukaḥ na ādyaḥ ekasmāt paramāṇoḥ samudāya utpāda anupapatteḥ na hi ekaikasmin= tarau taru samudāya buddhiḥ kasya api vidyate samudāya kalpanam vā anarthakam āpadyeta mahat tvā aindriyaka tvayoḥ asamarthita tvāt anena api śabda labdhaḥ arthaḥ darśitaḥ dvitīyam nirākaroti na iti 
NSu_2.2.175c.1–2.2.175c.3	 na ubhayoḥ caḥ  ubhaya grahaṇam aneka mātra upalakṣaṇam sakāśāt iti śeṣaḥ caśabdena samudāyaḥ yujyate iti anukṛṣṭate kutas na yujyate iti ced aneka hetuka tve api kim asamudita aneka hetukaḥ atha samudita aneka hetukaḥ iti vaktavyam ādye sarvatrago ghaṭa ādi buddhi prasaktiḥ asamudita paramāṇūnām sarvatra bhāvāt samudāyasya ca tanmātra hetuka tvāt samudāya aṅgīkāra vaiyathyarprasaṅgaḥ ca dvitīya anupapattau hetum āha ubhaya tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.175cd.1–2.2.175cd.3	 śca ubhaya tvam yat samudāya vyapekṣayā yadi asmāt ubhaya tvam samudita anekatvam samudāya sāpekṣam jāte hi samudāye anekeṣām samudita tvam bhavati tasmāt na iti sambandhaḥ samudita aneka tvasya samudāya sa apekṣa tve api kutas tatas samudāya utpādaḥ na yujyate iti āśaṅkām pariharat sūtra artham upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_2.2.176ab.1–2.2.176ab.2	 atas anyonya āśraya tvena samudāyaḥ na yujyate samudāyasya samuditān ekeṣām ca itara itara apekṣā utpattika tvena iti arthaḥ samudāya anu ca aṇūnām mahān ekaḥ iti pratyakṣa buddhi gocara tā yogāt avaśyam aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ avayavi iti kiñca ayam samudāyaḥ kim paramāṇūnām saṃyogaḥ kiṃvā aneka tva saṅkhayā uta dravya antaram nādya dvitīyau anaṅgīkārāt aṅgīkāre api atīndriya āśritayoḥ tayoḥ aindriyaka tva anupapattiḥ tṛtīye saḥ eva avayavī sāṃvṛtaḥ asau= iti ced tarhi punar mahān iti ādi pramā anupapattiḥ tad avasthā eva bhrāntiḥ iyam iti ced bhrānteḥ abhrānti pūrvaka tvena kvacid mahat tva ādeḥ vāstavat tva prasaṅgāt anādi vāsanā vaśā dāna ādiḥ evā iyam bhrāntiḥ iti ced na nīla ādi jñānasya api tathā tva prasaṅgāt 
NSu_2.2.176ab.3–2.2.176ab.4	 nanu viṣamam idam ucyate avayavini bādhaka sadbhāvāt tathā hi avayavī kim avayaveṣu pratyekam kārtsyena vartate kim vā eka deśena ādye aneka tva prasaṅgaḥ na dvitīyaḥ tasya avayavān vihāya eka deśa abhāvāt bhāve vā atra api vṛtti vikalpa prasaṅgāt kiñca keṣucid tantuṣu calatsu tad gataḥ avayavī calati na vā na iti pakṣe yuta siddhi prasaṅgaḥ ādye tu niścala avayava āśritaḥ na calati iti cala acala tva lakṣaṇaḥ viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ evam āvṛttān āvṛta tva raktā rakta tva lakṣaṇau= api viruddha dharma adhyāsau draṣṭavyau= iti 
NSu_2.2.176ab.5–2.2.176cd.1	 ucyate na asmābhiḥ avayavebhyaḥ atyanta bhinnaḥ avayavī gṛhyate kintu tad pariṇāma viśeṣaḥ eva tatra kutas vṛtti vikalpa avakāśaḥ cala acala tva ādi virodhaḥ tu bheda abheda virodha vat apākriyate iti na avayavini bādhaka sadbhāvaḥ na ca vācyam samudāyaḥ bhavadbhiḥ aṅgīkṛtaḥ eva tatra ākṣepa samādhāna sāmyam iti yatas anekeṣām eka kāla deśa kārya ādi avacchedena melanam samudāyaḥ abhyupagamyate sa ca āmilitebhyaḥ eva bhavati sthāyitānām ca tad sambhavaḥ na kṣaṇa bhaṅga vādaḥ iti vakṣyati uktam artham ākṣipya samādadhat sūtram itaretara pratyaya tvāt iti ced na utpatti mātra nimitta tvāt iti tatra ākṣepa aṃśam tā= advaya ācaṣṭe anyonya iti itaretara pratyaya tvāt iti ced na utpatti mātra nimitta tvāt anyonya apekṣayā puṃsaḥ samudāya tva vedanam 
NSu_2.2.177a–2.2.177c.2	 syāt tad sadātana tve api tat ca sāmīpya hetukam iti ced bhavet idam anyonya āśraya tvam yadi ayam samudāyaḥ kādācid kaḥ syāt naca evam sadātanam tu imam abhyupagacchāmaḥ evam tarhi sṛṣṭi pralaya vyavasthā na syāt iti ced na yatas tasya samudāyasya sadātana tve api puṃsaḥ samudāya tva vedanam syāt kadācid iti śeṣaḥ tatas tad apekṣayā sṛṣṭayā ādi vvaya stha upapadyate iti bhāvaḥ samudāyasya sadātana tve tad vedanam api kutas kādācid kam iti atas uktam tat ca iti tad samudāya tva vedanam paramāṇu sāmīpya hetukam na ca sāmīpyam sadā asti iti vedanasya kādācid ka tvam iti samudāya tva vedanasya sāmīpya hetuka tā kutas iti atas āha anyonya iti anyonya paramāṇu jñāna apekṣayā hi tat bhavati naca anyonya jñānam sāmīpyena vinā bhavati iti 
NSu_2.2.177a–2.2.177a–2.2.177c.4^1	 nanu vedanam eva pumān iti saugatāḥ manyante tat katham puṃsaḥ vedanam iti ucyate jñānam hi dvividham bhavati pravṛtti jñānam ālaya jñānam ca iti tatra ālaya jñānam pravṛtti jñāna duḥkha saṃskāra āspadam pumān iti ucyate pravṛtti jñānam tu samudāya tva vedanam iti na virodhaḥ etat uktam bhavati aneke paramāṇavaḥ eva samudāyaḥ tad anekatvam ca samudāya tvam tad militeṣu iva viraleṣu api vidyate kintu na sadā samudāya tva vedanam bhavati itara paramāṇu sahita itara paramāṇu sahita itara paramāṇu jñāne sati hi samudāya tva jñānam bhavati apekṣā buddheḥ aneka tva vyañjaka tvāt naca itaretara paramāṇu jñāne sati hi samudāya tva jñānam bhavati apekṣā buddheḥ aneka tva vyañjaka tvāt naca itaretara paramāṇu jñāne sati hi samudāya tva jñānam bhavati madhurā pāṭalī putra sthitayoḥ vṛkṣayoḥ itaretara pratyayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ 
NSu_2.2.177a–2.2.177c.4^2–2.2.177c.5	 kiñca adhipati saha kārya ālambana samanantara pratyayāḥ catvāraḥ hi jñāna hetavaḥ adhipatiḥ indriyam na ca viralānām parama aṇūnām indriya ālambana virala paramāṇubhyaḥ tad ālambana tayā tathā tathā sannikṛṣṭāḥ paramāṇavaḥ jāyante anadhipati indriyebhyaḥ ca adhipati indriyāṇi atha idānīm samanantara pratyaya balāt ekaḥ mahān iti jñānam utpadyate tena na anyonya āśraya tvam na api sṛṣṭayā ādi anupapattiḥ iti etena pakṣa antaram api sūcitam virala paramāṇubhyaḥ sannikṛṣṭāḥ paramāṇavaḥ jāyante tat eva teṣām samudāya tvam atas na kaścid doṣaḥ iti samādhāna aṃśam vyācaṣṭe kāryā iti 
NSu_2.2.177cd.1–2.2.178ab.4	 kārya sambhūti mātra vyāpṛti kāraṇam na tu kārya viśeṣeṣu vyāpṛtam kāraṇam bhavet kārya sambhūti mātre vyāpṛtiḥ yasya tat tathā uktam kāraṇam kārya sambhūti mātra vyāpṛtiḥ yatas tatas na iti śeṣaḥ yathā anutam etat na parihāra kṣamam atas abhiprāyam āha na tu iti viśiṣṭantaḥ iti viśeṣāḥ kāryāṇi eva viśeṣāḥ kārya viśeṣāḥ kāraṇam iti jātau= eka vacanam kāraṇāni khalu sva sadṛśa kārya janana vyāpārāṇi na tu visadṛśa kārya janane vyāpṛtāni iti arthaḥ kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_2.2.178c–2.2.178f.3	 atas artha indriya saṃyogi rūpa kāraṇa tā ātmanaḥ saṃyogi rūpa rāhityāt na eva tad jñāna tā api hi sadṛśa kārya janaka tva niyamāt iti arthaḥ saṃyogi rūpe grāhya grāhaka rūpe ye artha indriye tayoḥ kāryayoḥ kāraṇa tā saṃyogi rūpa kāraṇa tā artha indriyayoḥ saṃyogi rūpa kāraṇa tā sā na eva upapadyate kutas hi yasmāt kāraṇasya ātmanaḥ na eva tad jñāna tā asti iti yojanā idam uktam bhavati kāraṇam hi sadṛśa kārya janana svabhāvam syāt visadṛśa kārya janana svabhāvam vā ubhaya svabhāvam vā anubhaya svabhāvam vā 
NSu_2.2.178c–2.2.178f.5	 tatra yatra ādyaḥ kalpaḥ aṅgīkriyate tadā indriya anālambanebhyaḥ virala paramāṇubhyaḥ tathābhūtāḥ eva paramāṇavaḥ jāyeran na punar kadācid indriya ālambana bhūtāḥ militāḥ indriyebhyaḥ ca arthān adhipatibhyaḥ tathāvidhāni eva indriyāṇi utpadyeran na jātu artha adhipati indriyāṇi ātmānaḥ ca asamudāya jñānāt tādṛśaḥ eva ātmā jāyeta na kadācid tad jñānavān anyathā kāraṇa paramāṇu ādīnām api indriya ālambana tva ādikam abhyupagantavyam syāt itarathā sadṛśa kārya janana svabhāva bhaṅga āpatteḥ ubhayathā samudāya vedanasya kādācid ka tvam na upapadyate iti dvitīyam āśaṅkate viśeṣa iti 
NSu_2.2.179ab.1–2.2.179cd.3	 viśaṣaṣa kārya janakam yadi kāraṇam iṣyate tathā ca indriya anālamba navila paramāṇu ādibhyaḥ tad ālambana milita paramāṇu ādi janiḥ upapadyate iti bhāvaḥ nirākaroti kutas iti kutas samāna rūpa tvam kāryāṇām api sarvaśas tarhi iti śeṣaḥ sarvaśas api kāryāṇām iti sambandhaḥ atra kārya grahaṇam para ma ta anusāreṇa kāraṇasya visadṛśa kāyarjanana svabhāva tā āyāmā kapāla bhāvāt sarveṣu api ghaṭa kṣaṇeṣu ghaṭa ākāra tā na syāt kintu ghaṭa kṣaṇāt gajakṣaṇaḥ tatas gardabhakṣaṇaḥ utpadyate tathā nīla kṣaṇāt pītakṣaṇaḥ tatas kapotakṣaṇaḥ jāyeta nīla anuvṛttiḥ tu na syāt iti astu tarhi ubhaya svabhāvam kāraṇam iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ iti ced na virodhena ekasya api ajanana prasaṅgāt avirodhe tu āha atas iti 
NSu_2.2.180ab.1–2.2.180ab.4	 atas aniyatyā yat kiñcid yasya kasya api kāraṇam prakṛta pakṣa dvayam samāhṛtya atas iti parāmṛśati aniyatyā ghaṭaḥ ghaṭasya eva nīlaḥ nīlasya eva iti niyatim vinā yat kiñcit ghaṭa ādikam nīla ādikam vā yasya kasya api ghaṭa ādeḥ aghaṭa ādeḥ nīla ādeḥ anīla ādeḥ ca kāraṇam syāt ghaṭa kṣaṇasya ubhayavidha kārya janana svabhāva tve asau tat ubhayam janayet tathā ca upalabhyeta iti yāvat kecid idam vākyam pūrva vāki aśeṣa tayā vyācakṣate sarvaśas api kāryāṇām samāna rūpa tvam na syāt kintu visadṛśa kārya janana svabhāva tvāt ghaṭa ādikam gaja ādeḥ kāraṇam syāt iti na caturthaḥ artha kriyā rahitasya asattva prāpteḥ artha kriyā kāritvam sattvam iti saugatāḥ nanu ca kārya janana mātram vastunaḥ svabhāvaḥ iti aṅgīkurmaḥ na tu ukteṣu kam api pakṣam iti atas āha atas iti buddhi stham imam kalpam atas iti parāmṛśati atiprasaṅgaḥ tu na tirohitaḥ 
NSu_2.2.180ab.5	 syāt etat yathā bhavat mate pramājanana svabhāva tve api indriya ādeḥ deṣa sahakāri vaśāt apramājananam tathā kāraṇasya sadṛśa kārya janaka tve api adṛṣṭa ādi sahakāri sāmarthyāt kadācid visadṛśa kārya jananam bhaviṣyati yat vā yathā sāṅkhayānām indriya ādīni pramā pram ājanana svabhāvāni tatra apramā pratipakṣāṇām guṇānām upanipāte pramām eva upajanayanti pramā pratipakṣāṇām doṣāṇām upanipāte tu apramām tathā kāraṇasya ubhaya svabhāva tve api adṛṣṭa ādi vaśāt tad anyatara janma upapatsyate athavā yathā naiyāyika ādīnām indriya ādīni jñāna mātra janana svabhāvāni guṇa ādi saha kārī upanipātena pramādi upapattiḥ tathā kāraṇam kārya janana svabhāvam eva adṛṣṭa ādi sahakāri samavadhānāt tad sadṛśam visadṛśam vā janayiṣyati iti atas āha adṛṣṭam api iti 
NSu_2.2.180cd.1–2.2.180cd.3	 adṛṣṭam api tasya eva viśeṣa āpādakam kutas atra adṛṣṭa grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam adṛṣṭam api viśeṣasya ādye visadṛśa kārya janaka tvasya dvitīya anyatara pratibandhasya tṛtīye tu ubhaya janaka tvasya āpādam kutas iti ekam vākyam tathā hi pūrva pūrvatara ādya dṛṣṭa kṣaṇa aviśeṣān āpādakāḥ tad āpādakāḥ vā ādye tu asya adṛṣṭa kṣaṇasya viśeṣa āpādaka tvam na siddhayati kāraṇa abhāvāt viśeṣa an āpādaka adṛṣṭa kṣaṇā janyaḥ api adṛṣṭa kṣaṇaḥ sahakāri vaśāt viśeṣam āpādayiṣyati iti ced na tad sahakāriṇī api asya sāmyāt tatra api saha kāri anatra anusaraṇe gauravam iti 
NSu_2.2.180cd.4–2.2.180cd.5	 tasya eva kāraṇasya viśeṣa āpādakam kutas iti aparam vākyam tathā hi viśeṣa apavādakam api adṛṣṭam kim vivakṣitasya eva kāraṇasya viśeṣam āpādayati kāraṇa mātrasya vā na ādyaḥ niyāmakayoḥ kāraṇa jñāpakayoḥ abhāvāt iti yebhyaḥ indriya anālam abana virala paramāṇubhyaḥ tad ālambana milita paramāṇu utpattiḥ āśāsyate yatas ca arthān adhipateḥ indriyāt artha adhipati indriyasya yasmāt ca samudāya jñāna rahitāt ātmanaḥ tadvat ātmā utpādaḥ tat idam tasya eva iti ucyate ubhayatra dvitīyau kalpau dūṣayati yasya iti 
NSu_2.2.181ab.1–2.2.181ab.3	 yasya kasya api yat kiñcit viśeṣam upapādayet atra api yat kiñcid adṛṣṭam viśaṣam upapādayet iti ekam vākyam yadi pūvarpūrvatara ādyadṛṣṭasya api asti viśeṣa āpādaka tvam tarhi tat api pūvarpūrvatara ādi paramāṇu ādau viśeṣam āpādayet eva samarthasya kṣepa anabhyupagamāt tathā ca samudāya pratīteḥ samaya niyamaḥ na syāt iti yasya kasya api viśeṣam upapādayet iti dvitīyam yadi kāraṇa mātrasya viśeṣa āpādakam adṛṣṭam aṅgīkriyate tadā sarveṣām api kāraṇānām viśeṣam upapāditam tathā ca ghaṭa paramāṇu melane sarveṣām api melanam syāt na tu kutra api abhilaṣita paramāṇu avasthānam bhavet na ca yugapad sarva samudāyaḥ dṛśyate iti 
NSu_2.2.181ab.4	 atha matam sarvam idam sva vyāhatam tathā hi tantavaḥ yadi sadṛśa kārya janana svabhāvāḥ tadā tantu antaram eva janayeyuḥ na tu paṭam yadi ca visadṛśa kārya janana svabhāvāḥ tadā na tebhyaḥ pārthiva paṭasya utpattiḥ syāt kintu pāthasīyam kim api jāyeta ubhaya svabhāva tvam tu viruddham anubhaya svabhāva tve paṭasya api anutpattiḥ sahakāri vaśā dvayavasthā aṅgīkāre sahakāriṣu api idam samānam atha ucyeta astitā vat tantu paṭayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pramitasya apanhavān arha tvāt sa ca yathā yathā upapadyate tathā tathā kalpayiṣyate iti samam etat samāpi iti atas āha kāryam ca iti 
NSu_2.2.181cd.1–2.2.182ab.3	 kāryam ca kāraṇam ca eva yat kiñcid yasya kasyacid bhavet niyāmaka abhāvāt nitya vināśi tvaḥ itayetat vakṣyamāṇam atra api sambaddhayate yat kiñcit nīla ādikam yasya kasyacid eva pīta ādeḥ kāryam syāt yat kiñcit pīta ādikam yasya kasyacid eva nīla ādeḥ kāraṇam syāt kutas nīlāḥ nīlasya eva kāryam syāt na pītasya nīlam eva nīlasya kāraṇam na pīta miti niyāmaka abhāvāt iti yojanā caśabdau mithas samuccaye 
NSu_2.2.182ab.4–2.2.182ab.5	 etat uktam bhavati sambhavati sthira vāde parihāraḥ ayam yadi atra samavetam yat yena ākāreṇa pariṇatam vā tat tasya kāraṇam kāryam ca iti niyāmaka sadbhāvena kāyarkāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇe sati tad upapādaka kalpanā upapatteḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅgu naye tu pūrva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ niranvaya vināśa utpādayoḥ kāyarkāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇa upāyaḥ eva na asti samavāya pariṇāmayoḥ abhāvāt tathā ca kasya balāt upapādakam kalpayiṣyate iti samavāya pariṇāmayā ārabhāve api yat yad apekṣayā pūrva bhāvi tat eva tasya kāraṇam yat ca yad apekṣayā paścāt bhāvi tat eva tasya kāryam iti avadhāraṇa upapatteḥ niyāmaka abhāvaḥ asiddhaḥ iti atas kārya niyamam tāvat nirākaroti idam asya eva iti 
NSu_2.2.182b–2.2.182d.2	 idam asya eva kāraṇam iti nitya vināśi tve kena mānena gamyate idam nīlama sya eva kāraṇam na tu pītasya iti evam nīlasya nīla kārya tvam nitya vināśi tve niranvaya vināśa utpāda pakṣe kena mānena na kena api paścāt bhāva mātrasya nīla apekṣayā iva pīta apekṣayā api sattvāt iti bhāvaḥ sādeśyam sārūpyam vā niyāmakam iti ced na virala paramāṇubhyaḥ militānām militebhyaḥ ca viralānām utpatti aṅgīkārāt kāraṇa niyamam api apākaroti idam na iti 
NSu_2.2.183ab.1–2.2.183ab.3	 idam na jāyate amuṣmāt iti atra api na kāraṇam idam nīlam amuṣmāt pītān na jāyate kintu nīlāt eva iti atra nīlasya kāraṇatva avadhāraṇe api kāraṇam pramāṇam na asti nīlasya iva pītasi api nīla apekṣayā pūrva bhāvitāyāḥ sattvāt iti bhāvaḥ nanu yathā bhavatām samavāya pariṇāmayoḥ abhāve api kuvinda paṭayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇam tathā mama api bhaviṣyati iti atas āha idam asya iti nitya vināśi tve ātmanaḥ iti śeṣaḥ yujyate asmākam nimitta kāraṇa kāryayoḥ tad bhāva avadhāraṇam anyatra anupakṣīṇa anvaya vyatirekābhyām na tu parasya asmābhiḥ anvaya vyatireka anusandha ātura ātmanaḥ sthāyi tvā abhyupagamāt pareṇa kṣaṇika tā svīkārāt na hi tathāvidhaḥ anvaya vyatirekayoḥ anyatra anupakṣayasya ca avadhṛteḥ īṣyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ yojanā tu pūrvavat eva 
NSu_2.2.183ab.4	 evam samudāyam nirākṛtya sarvasya kṣaṇikatām adhunā pramāṇa abhāvena tad virodhena ca apākartum uttaraḥ granthaḥ tathā hi na kevalam samudāyaḥ na upapadyate kinnāma sarvasya kṣaṇika tā ca tatra pramāṇa abhāvāt nanu pratyakṣam kṣaṇika tām arthānām avagamayati tat hi vartamāna mātra gocaram arthasya vatarma anakṣaṇa mātra sambandhinīm sattām avagāhate na pūrva uttara kṣaṇa sambandhanīm api tat katham kṣaṇika tvam arthānām aprāmāṇikam iti ucyate kim idam kṣaṇika tvam nāma kim kṣaṇa sambandhi sattvam kiṃvā kṣaṇa mātraḥ eva utpatti nāśavat tvam yat vā kṣaṇa antara asambandhi tve satyeka kṣaṇa sambandhi tvam ādyaḥ tu iṣyaḥ eva sthāyinaḥ api arthasya ekakṣaṇa sattā svīkārāt dvitīya tṛtīyau dūṣayati vināśa iti 
NSu_2.2.183cd.1–2.2.183cd.2	 vināśa utpattayaḥ ca eva na dṛśyante sadātanāḥ aneka padārtha sambandhi tvena bahuvacanam caśabdaḥ tṛtīya pakṣa samuccaya arthaḥ eva śabdasya na eva iti sambandhaḥ sadātanāḥ pratikṣaṇa bhāvinyaḥ pratyakṣam khalu arthānām vatarmān akāla sattām avagāhate na punar kṣaṇa mātra bhāvinau= utpatti vināśau= api na api kṣaṇa antara sambandhi tvam tathā ca katham tena kṣaṇika tā siddhayet iti 
NSu_2.2.183cd.3	 nanu ca pratyakṣam pūrva uttarakṣaṇavatiḥ tvam api arthasya gṛhṇāti na vā na ādyaḥ vartamāna mātra grāhi tvāt dvitīye tu pratyakṣānupalambhena parva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ asattva siddheḥ kṣaṇikatā eva siddhā iti ced dvitīyam tāvat urarī kumarḥ na ca evam kṣaṇika tā siddhiḥ yogyā anupalambhasya eva asattva gamaka tvāt na ca pūrva uttara kāla vartinā pratyakṣa yogyā vatarmāna mātra grāhitāyāḥ pareṇa eva ukta tvāt astu vā adyaḥ pakṣaḥ kasyācid pratyakṣasya vartamāna mātra grāhi tve api tat eva idam iti pratyabhijñāna lakṣaṇasya tad abhāvāt iti āśayena āha dṛśyate iti 
NSu_2.2.184ab.1–2.2.184ab.3	 dṛśyate pratyabhijñātaḥ sthira tvam sarva vastuṣu viṣayīkriyate iti arthaḥ tṛtīya arthe tasiḥ ekasya eva aneka kṣaṇa sambandhi tvam sthira tvam etena na kevalam pratyakṣam kṣaṇika tām na gocarayati kintu sthāyi tvam api gocarayati iti api iti vadatā para pakṣe pramāṇa virodhaḥ sva pakṣe pramāṇa sadbhāvaḥ coditaḥ bhavati anena anusmṛteḥ ca a iti sūtram kṛta vyākhyānam veditavyam sarva vastuṣu iti anena saugatānām pratyabhijñā nirākaraṇam vaiśeṣika ādi matam eva spṛśati na tu asmat matam iti sūcayati 
NSu_2.2.184ab.4^1	 tathā hi kim anayā pratyabhijñayā nitya tvena abhyupagateṣu paramāṇu ādiṣu sthira tvam sādhyate kiṃvā ghaṭa ādiṣu na ādyaḥ teṣām atīndriya tvena pratyabhijñā pratyakṣa gocara tvasya abhyupagantum aśakyatvāt na dvitīyaḥ ghaṭa ādiṣu pareṇa api pratyabhijñāyāḥ bhrānti tvasya svīkārya tvāt yadā hi ghaṭa ādau sūcī agra ādinā ekaḥ api paramāṇuḥ apaiti tadā naṣṭavyam eva tadā ārabdhena dvayaṇukena vibhāgena asamavāyi kāraṇasya saṃyogasya naṣṭa tvāt dvayaṇuka nāśe samavāyi kāraṇa nāśāt tri aṇuka nāśaḥ iti anena krameṇa ghaṭa nāśaḥ api avaśyambhāvī na ca paramāṇuḥ pratyakṣaḥ yena tad apagamānapagamau pratyakṣeṇa śakya niścayau 
NSu_2.2.184ab.4^2	 na ca vācyam nibiḍa avayaveṣu sphaṭika ādiṣu pratyabhijñayā sthira tvam setsyati iti tatra api paramāṇu apagama abhāvasya pratyakṣeṇa niścetum aśakyatvāt nibiḍa avayava tvam ca na vibhāga ayogya a= ayava tvam vibhāgasya pratyakṣa siddha tvāt kintu ghaṭa āditaḥ api utkṛṣṭa kāraṇa apekṣa tvam na ca tad viśeṣa abhāvaḥ śakyaḥ asmābhiḥ avagantum dṛśyate hi kālataḥ sphaṭika ādau= api guru tva apakarṣaḥ naca avayavān apagame sa sambhavati iti na api guṇa ādau sthāyi tvam pratyabhijñayā siddhayati tasya api kasyacid atīndriya tvāt kasyacid ghaṭa ādi tulya tvāt sāmānya ādikam tu svarūpataḥ na asti eva sattve api rūpa ādi samānam eva iti śaṅkita prāmāṇyam pratyabhijñānam na kutra api sthairya siddhau pramāṇayitum yuktam iti 
NSu_2.2.184ab.5–2.2.184ab.8	 atra ucyate syāt ayam doṣaḥ paramāṇu ārambha vādinām na pariṇāma vādinām asmākam tat eva vastu avayava upacaya apacayābhyām anyathā vikriyate na punar anyat eva bhavati iti hi pariṇāma vādinaḥ manyante atas pratyakṣa yogyeṣu sarva vastuṣu pratyabhijñayā sthira tva grahaṇam yuktam eva iti nanu bhavat mate api pratyabhijñā bhrāntiḥ eva pariṇāma vāde pūrva uttara vastunoḥ bheda abheda aṅgīkārāt tat eva idam iti ca pratyabhijñayā atyanta abhedasya avagāhanāt ucyate yadā tu pūrva uttara kāla bhāvinā uḥ abhedaḥ pratyabhijñā viṣayaḥ aṅgīkriyate tadā sa avadhāraṇasya pratyabhijñānasya bhrama tve api tat idam iti tu na bhramaḥ tena eva ca sthāyi tva siddheḥ yadā tu kāla ādi dvaya sambandhaḥ viṣayaḥ tadā sa avadhāraṇam api na bhramaḥ iti nanu idam pratyabhijñānam parilūna punar jāta kuntalāpa ādau= iva bhrāntam kin na syāt iti ced bādhaka abhāvāt evam eva bhrānti tva abhyupagame nīla ādi pratyayānām api tathā tva āpatteḥ na ca pratyakṣam bādhakam iti uktam pratyakṣasya ābādhaka tve api anumānam bādhakam bhaviṣyati iti śaṅkate phala ādīnām iti 
NSu_2.2.184cd.1–2.2.186.1–2.2.186.2^1	 phala ādīnām viśeṣeṇa sarvatra api anumīyate sattvena kṣaṇika tvam ced ākāśasya aviśeṣatas aviśeṣaḥ akhilasya api sattvāt kim na anumīyate ādipadena deha dīpa ādi grahaṇam viśeṣeṇa parimāṇa bhedena kṣaṇika tvam anumīyate iti sambandhaḥ tatas tad dṛṣṭāntena sarvatra phala ādi vyatirikte api vastuni sattvena hetunā pañca skandhāḥ iti anumānam sthira tva viṣaya pratyabhijñāyāḥ bādhakam bhaviṣyati na ca phala ādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ yat viruddha parimāṇam tat nānā dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa paṭau viruddha parimāṇam ca phala ādikam pūrva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ iti anumānena phala ādīnām kṣaṇikatā siddheḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.186.1–2.2.186.2^2	 pariharati ākāśasya iti aviśeṣatas pūrva uttarayoḥ bheda rahita tvataḥ aviśeṣaḥ pūrva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ bhedarāhityam akhilasya api vipratipannasya idam uktam bhavati yat satta dakṣaṇikam yathā akāśam sat ca nīla ādi iti pratyanumāna pratiruddha tvena anumānasya ābhāsa tvāt na pratyabhijñā bādhaka tvam sambhavati iti naca ākāśa dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ ākāśaḥ dvau nirodhau ca nityam trayam asaṃskṛtam a itrata pareṇa eva aṅgīkṛta tvāt kṣaṇika tā sādhakasya parimāṇa bheda ādeḥ ākāśe abhāvāt ca tat idam uktam aviśeṣatas parimāṇa bheda ādi rahita tvataḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.186.3–2.2.186.4^1	 yat vā akāśasya aviśeṣatas parimāṇa bheda rahita tvataḥ tad dṛṣṭāntena akhilasya api phala ādeḥ aviśeṣaḥ pūrva uttara kālayoḥ parimāṇa bheda abhāvaḥ sattvāt kim na anumīyate iti yojanā etat uktam bhavati na anumānam pratyabhijñāyāḥ bādhakam bhavitum arhati anumānasya pratyakṣataḥ dubarla tvena tad bādhya tvāt anyathā phala ādikam parimāṇa bheda rahitam sattvāt ākāśa vat iti api anumāna prasaṅgāt na hi atra pratyakṣa ādi bādham vinā kaścid doṣaḥ asti tathā ca tat dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇika tva sādhakasya asiddha tvāt sādhya vikalatā syāt tatas pratyakṣa virodhena eva asya anumānasya aprāmāṇyam 
NSu_2.2.186.3–2.2.186.4^2	 anyathā anyonya āśraya prasaṅgaḥ iti eva vaktavyam tat ca samam prakṛte api iti etenaa ākāśe ca aviśeṣāt a iti sūtram vyākhyātam bhavati tat anena kṣaṇika tva sādhaka anumānasya sat pratipakṣa tvam bādhita viṣaya tvam ca vadatā akāśe anaikāntyam api sūcitam bhavat anumānasya api phala ādinā anaikāntyam iti ced na tatra api kṣaṇikatā bhāvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt bhavet idam yadi ākāśasya sattvam syāt na ca etat asti mūrta abhāva tvāt ākāśasya bhāva tvam hi sattvam atra vivakṣitam sa svarūpa tve api vā sattve abhāvaḥ niḥsvarūpaḥ iti aṅgīkṛtam iti āśaṅkayā āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.187ab.1–2.2.187ab.3	 yadi ākāśasya sattvam na kutas eva nara ādiṣu yadi ākāśasya sattvam na asti iti aṅgīkṛtya pratyanumāne ati prasaṅga anumāne ca dṛṣṭāntasya sādhana vaikalyam sva anumānasya anaikāntika tva abhāvaḥ ca ucyate tadā deha ādiṣu sattvam kutas eva siddham iti brūmaḥ tathā ca parakīyasya api dṛṣṭāntasya sādhana vaikalyam syāt yadi ca vidhi mukha pratyaya vedya tvāt deha ādīnām bhāva tvam pramāviṣaya tvāt sattvam ca ucyate tadā akāśe api samānam iti pramāṇa antareṇa ākāśasya abhāva tvam vārayitum upodghātam āha sa dharmī iti 
NSu_2.2.187cd.1–2.2.187cd.4	 sa dharmi pratiyogi tvam ākāśasya avagamyate yatra abhāvaḥ sa dharmī yasya abhāvaḥ sa pratiyogī tat ubhayavat tvam abhāvasya niyāmakam vyāpakam yaḥ abhāvaḥ sa sarvaḥ api dharmi pratiyogi sahitaḥ eva yathā ghaṭa ādi abhāvaḥ sa hi bhū tala ādi dharmiṇā ghaṭa ādi pratiyoginā ca upetaḥ eva iti nanu idam anupapannam abhāvasya hi dharmi pratiyogi sāhitya niyamaḥ kim deśataḥ syāt kiṃvā kālataḥ ādye dharmiṇā sādeśyam tāvat na asti bhū talasya sva āśraye abhāvasya tu bhū tale vṛtteḥ pratiyoginā tu viruddham eva dvitīyaḥ tu yadi api dharmiṇā kathañcid syāt tathā api pratiyoginā na asti eva prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāvayoḥ pratiyogi bhinna kāla tva niyamāt iti āśaṅkām pariharan= abhāvasya dharmi pratiyogi sāhiti avyāpta tvam upapādayati tau vinā iti 
NSu_2.2.187*ab.1–2.2.187*ab.3	 tau vinā na hi abhāvaḥ ca kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ kadācana atra dṛṣṭaḥ iti prakaraṇa āt tau vinā iti tat jñānam vinā iti atharḥ caśabdaḥ abhāvaḥ dṛśyamānaḥ dharmi pratiyogi pratītau= eva dṛśyate iti anvaya sam uccaya arthaḥ hi śabdena anvaya vyatirekayoḥ prasiddha tvam sūcayati tad anena anvaya vyatireka abhyām a bhāva pratīteḥ dharmi pratiyogi pratīti pūrvakatayā vyāptiḥ upapāditā bhavati yat vā tau= iti anena na jñānam upalakṣaṇīyam abhāvaḥ pratīyamānaḥ dharmi pratiyogi ghaṭitaḥ eva atra idam na asti ityādi rūpeṇa pratīyate na tu tau vinā kevalaḥ iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām eka jñāna sambandhena vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva upapādanam etat iti avagantavyam prātar gaja ādi abhāva jñānam tu anyathā upapādayiṣyāmaḥ kim atas yadi evam abhāvasya yadi evam abhāvasya dharmi pratiyogi sāhityam pratītau vyāpakam iti atas āha adharmi iti 
NSu_2.2.187*cd.1–2.2.187*cd.3	 adharmi pratiyogi tvam ākāśasya avagamyate pratītau= abhāvasya vyāpakam sa dharmi pratiyogi tvam ākāśāt tāva dvaya āvartaṛte yasmāt ākāśaḥ iti eva avagamyate na tu atra idam na asti iti iyam api vastutas mūrta abhāva gocarā eva pratītiḥ pralaya ādi vat nañu arjita abhilāpa sambandhāt atādṛśī iva prakāśate iti ced na nīla ādi pratiteḥ api tathā tva prasaṅgāt anānubhāvika tvasya ubhayatra api sāmyāt tathā ca parasya api asiddhayā ādyāpātaḥ vyāpaka nivṛttyā vyāpya nivṛttiḥ avaśyaṃbhāvinī iti ākāśasya na abhāva tvam iti tat ayam prayogaḥ ākāśaḥ na abhāvaḥ dharmi pratiyoginau vinā eva pratīyamāna tvāt rūpa vat iti kiñca mūrta abhāvam ākāśam vadatā yaḥ dharmī tasya ucyate saḥ eva asmākam ākāśaḥ iti nāmnayā iva vivādaḥ avaśiṣyate vakṣyate ca etat viyat adhikaraṇaḥ iti sūtra dvaya artham upasaṃharati svīkāra iti 
NSu_2.2.188.1–2.2.188.2	 svīkāra tyāgataḥ adṛṣṭa dṛṣṭayoḥ sarva vastuṣu guṇān unmattaḥ eva asau vidadhāti adhikam punar adṛṣṭasya kṣaṇika tva ādeḥ svīkṛtitaḥ dṛṣṭasya sthira tva ādeḥ tyāgataḥ asau saugataḥ adhikam svatas iti śeṣaḥ unmattam api svasmāt adhika vivekavantam khyāpayati iti arthaḥ na hi unmattaḥ sarvatra apramitam svīkaroti na api pramitam tyajati iti 
NSu_2.2.188.3	 nanu yadi nīla ādikam na syāt tadā sat na syāt artha kriyā kāritvam hi sattvam vyāptam ca krama yaugapadyābhyām tṛtīya prakāra abhāvāt na ca sthire tad sambhavaḥ prasaṅga tad viparyayābhyām tathā hi sthāyībhāvaḥ kim svakīyām artha kriyām krameṇa kuryāt yugapad vā ādye kāla antara bhāvinīm artha kriyām pratīdānīm samarthaḥ na vā prathame tām api idānīm kuryāt samarthasya kṣepā yogāt dvitīye tadā api na kuryāt idānīm asamarthaḥ api tadānīm samartha tvāt kariṣyati iti ced tadā sāmarthya asāmarthya lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ bhāvam bhindyāt dvitīye tvādyakṣaṇaḥ eva kartavyasya sarvasya kṛta tvāt dvitīya ādi kṣaṇe asattvam avarjanīyam eva tat evam anukūla tarka bala labdha pratibandhasya kṣaṇikatva anumānasya balavat tvāt pratyabhijñā pratyanumāne tad bādhite na sthairya sādhanāya alam iti mā evam eṣām tarkāṇām pratitarka parāhata tva ādinā abhāsa tvāt 
NSu_2.2.188.4	 tathā hi yadi ātmān ātma prapañcaḥ sarvaḥ api kṣaṇikaḥ syāt tadā pramā pramārūpaḥ sarvaḥ api anumāna āgama pratyabhijñā lakṣaṇaḥ vyavahāraḥ lupyeta tarkasya api asya na utthānam syāt tasya tad jātīyasya vā tena tad jātīyena vā saha bhūyas sambandha avagame te tādātmya tad utpatti avadhāraṇena ca upādhi abhāva avadhāraṇena vā vyabhicāra abhāva niścaye sati vyāpti avadhāraṇam avadhṛta vyāpteḥ ca pakṣa darśanam liṅga darśanam ca tatas anubhūta vyāpti smaraṇam atha yat mayā vyāpta tvena jñātam liṅgam tat atra pakṣe asti iti anusandhānam atha idānīm anumitiḥ iti anumāna prakriyā na hi etat sarvam kṣaṇikasya ātmanaḥ sambhavati yena hi sakṛt dhūmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ naṣṭaḥ eva asau kasya bhūyas darśanam kasya ca vyāpti avadhāraṇa ādi yasmin= ca parvate dhūmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ naṣṭaḥ eva asau kutra punar vyāpti liṅga anusandhānam kutra ca sādhya adhyavasāyaḥ 
NSu_2.2.188.5	 evam āgame api ekaika varṇa śravaṇāni pada anusandhānam samaya grahaḥ punar pada śravaṇam samaya smaraṇam vākya artha jñānam iti aneka saṃvindhānam na ātmanaḥ kṣaṇikatāyām upapadyate pratyabhijñānam api yena pūrva avasthaḥ arthaḥ jñātaḥ tena eva tasya vā tad sadṛśasya vā darśane bhavati tat katham kṣaṇikasya ātmanaḥ syāt 
NSu_2.2.188.6	 anumānena tarkaḥ api vyākhyātaḥ pratikṣaṇam ātmanaḥ anātmanaḥ ca bhede api anumādi aṅgīkāre atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt yasya kasyacid vaya āpti jñāne nārikela dvīpa vāsinaḥ api agni pramā syāt parvate liṅga darśanena hrade api agniḥ anumīyeta ityādi pūrva uttara kṣaṇa vartinām ātmanām parvata ādīnām ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt upapannaḥ anumāna ādi vyavahāraḥ iti ced anya tvasya anapāyāt anyathā upādhyāya śiṣya buddhayā ādau= api prasaṅgāt 
NSu_2.2.188.7–2.2.189.2	 atha matam kāraṇa kṣaṇāḥ kārya kṣaṇeṣu saṃskārān aparyanti atas pūrva pūrva ātma saṃskāra yoginām uttarottareṣām ātmanām anumāna ādi vyavahāraḥ yujyate parvata ādayaḥ api pūrva saṃskāra bhājaḥ pakṣa ādi tvam aśnuvate iti etat nirākaraṇāya sūtram uttara utpāde ca pūrva nirodhāt iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe uttarā iti uttara utpāde ca pūrva nirodhāt uttara utpatti mātreṇa vināśāt pūvarvaḥ tunaḥ na saṃskāra arpaka tvam ca yujyate kasyacid kvacid kasyacid kāraṇasya kacid kārye tatas kim iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_2.2.190ab.1–2.2.190ab.3	 atas jñātam mayā ityādi na jñeyam anumā kutas ātmanaḥ kṣaṇika tvāt saṃskāra āparṇasya ca asambhavāt iti arthaḥ yat mayā vyāpta tvena jñātam tat atra vidyate ityādi yathā bhavati tathā na jñeyam jñātum aśakyam tatas ca anumā kutas āgama ādeḥ api upalakṣaṇam etat nanu asti tāvat anumāna ādi vyavahāraḥ sarva loka siddhasya apahnavā yogāt tad balena alaukikam api asahabhāvinaḥ saṃskāra arpaka tvam kalpayiṣyate iti atas āha eka tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.190c–2.2.190e.3	 eka tvam anubhūti stham tyaktavā nirmānakāḥ bhidā kutas ātma ādikeṣu syāt kim anumāna ādi vyavahārāni atha anupapatti mātreṇa alaukikam kalpanīyam kiṃvā atma ādeḥ kṣaṇika tve api sati na ādyaḥ ātma ādeḥ sthāyi tvena eva tad upapatteḥ dvitīyaḥ tu syāt yadi ātma ādeḥ kṣaṇika tvam siddham syāt na ca tat asti pramāṇa bādhita tvāt niṣpramāṇaka tvāt ca iti bhāvaḥ eka tvam bhidā iti atra pūrva uttara kālayoḥ iti śeṣaḥ anubhūti stham pratyabhijñā siddham kutas aṅgīkāryā iti adhyāhārāt samāna kartṛtā siddhiḥ nanu ca pratyabhijñānam bhrāntam iti uktam tat katham ātma ādeḥ aikyam tatas siddhayet iti atas āha valyā iva iti 
NSu_2.2.190f.1–2.2.190f.3	 balyā iva anubhavaḥ yatas tarka balena anumāne niravakāśa tayā prabale sati hi tad virodhāt pratyabhijñānam bhrāntam syāt yadā tu tarkasya ukta vidhayā abhāsa tvam tadā kutas kṣaṇikatva anumāna prābalyam kutas ca pratyabhijñāyāḥ tad bādhaḥ abādhitaḥ ca pratyabhijñā anubhavaḥ yatas balyā iva atas ātma ādeḥ ekatvam tena siddham iti sambandhaḥ etena anumāna siddhasya bhedasya katham nirmānaka tvam iti api parāḥ tam tad upajīvyasya tarkasya adya api anavasthānāt nanvastu uttara utpādaḥ eva pūrvasya nirodhaḥ tathā api kutas pūrvasya uttarasmin saṃskāra an ādhāyaka tvam iti atas āha kārya kāraṇayoḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.2.191.1–2.2.191.3	 kārya kāraṇayoḥ ca eka kālīna tvam vinā katham pūrva saṃskāra yogī syāt uttaraḥ niyamena ca uttara utpādaḥ eva pūrvasya nirodhāt kāyarkāraṇayoḥ eka kālīna tvam tāvat na asti iti labhyate eka kālīna tvam ca vinā pūrva āhita saṃskāra yogi tvam uttarasya na yujyate niyamena ca iti anena kvacid api na yujyate kutas sarvatra iti sūcayati yat vā eka kālīnasya eva saṃskāra arpaka tvam dṛṣṭam na bhinna kāla tvaḥ iti vyāpteḥ iti arthaḥ nanu eka kālīna tva abhāve api kutas saṃskāra arpaka tvam na syāt iti atas āha sambaddhāḥ eva iti 
NSu_2.2.196a–2.2.196d.3	 abhedena viśeṣeṇa deha dīpa phala ādiṣu viśeṣa darśanam yuktam asmākam yasmāt akhilāḥ saṃskāra ādhāyakāḥ ca āmpaka kusuma ādayaḥ padārthāḥ taila ādibhiḥ sambaddhāḥ eva anyatra taila ādau saṃskāram ādadhate na asambaddhāḥ iti asti niyamaḥ na ca bhinnakālīnayoḥ sambandhaḥ yujyate tasmāt uttareṇa śasambaddhaḥ pūrvaḥ tasmin= uttare vāsanām na kuryāt iti uktam artham buddhayā āroha artham saṅkalayya āha eka kālatayā iti 
NSu_2.2.193ab.1–2.2.193ab.2	 eka kāla tayā yogam vinā saṃskārataḥ katham atra eka kāla tayā vinā kārya kāraṇayoḥ yogaḥ na yujyate yogam vinā kāraṇasya kārye saṃskāra arpaka tvam ca na ghaṭate saṃskārataḥ vinā katham anumāna ādi vyavahāraḥ iti adhyāhāreṇa yojanā saṃskāra āparka tvam ca na ghaṭate saṃskārataḥ vinā katham anumāna ādi vyavahāraḥ iti adhyāhāreṇa yojanā yadi idam saṅkalanam na kriyeta tadā pūrva uktānām pratyekam saṃskāra an ādhayaka tve hetu tvam jñāyeta sarvatra sādhya nirdeśāt tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ uktā kāṅkṣā kuṇṭhita tvam eva iti 
NSu_2.2.193ab.3	 atra ete prayogāḥ pūrvakṣaṇaḥ uttarakṣaṇe saṃskāra ādhāyakaḥ na bhavati tena asambaddha tvāt yaḥ yena asambaddhaḥ na asau tatra saṃskāra ādhāyakaḥ yathā sampratipannaḥ yat vā yaḥ yatra saṃskāra ādhāyakaḥ sa tad sambaddhaḥ eva dṛṣṭaḥ yathā sammataḥ asambaddhasya api saṃskāra ādhāyaka tve mṛgamadaḥ vasanam iva sarvam vāsayet aviśeṣāt asambaddhaḥ ca pūrvaḥ uttareṇa tatas bhinna kālīna tvāt sampratipanna vat bhinnaka ālīnayoḥ api sambandhe ati prasaṅgaḥ bhinnakālīnaḥ ca pūrvam uttareṇa 
NSu_2.2.193ab.4–2.2.193ab.5	 tad utpādaḥ eva vinaṣṭa tvāt saṃmata vat prāk eva naṣṭasya tena eka kālīna tva śaṅkā eva vyāhata iti nanu lākṣā rasa āhita bījapūra kusuma lauhitya vat kin na syāt iti ced tatra api niranvaya vināśa utpāda anabhyupagamāt atra ca para siddha nyāyena parasya bodhana anna āśraya asiddhayā ādi śaṅkanīyam iti bhavet etat yadi kāraṇasya kārya utpādaḥ eva vināśaḥ syāt saḥ eva kutas siddhaḥ iti atas āha kṣaṇa mātram iti 
NSu_2.2.193cd.1–2.2.193cd.3	 kṣaṇa mātram avasthānam svīkṛtam sarva vastuṣu kārya kāraṇayoḥ tāvat uttara pūrva tvam āvaśyakam yaugapadye kāyarkāraṇa bhāva vyāghātāt tatas pūrva kṣaṇa varti kāraṇam yadi kāya ṛkṣaṇe api syāt tadā sarva vastūnām aṅgīkṛtam kṣaṇa mātram avasthānam bhajyeta atas kṣaṇika tva abhyupagamaḥ eva uttara utpāde ca pūrva nirodham gamayati iti syāt etat kāraṇam kṣaṇasya pūrva vibhāge labdha sattākam madhya vibhāge kāryam utpādya apara vibhāge tatra saṃskāram ādhāya naśyati iti aṅgīkāre na kaḥ api doṣaḥ iti atas āha pūrva iti 
NSu_2.2.194ab.1–2.2.194ab.4	 pūrva madhya apara kalā ra hitaḥ kṣaṇaḥ iṣyate atra vibhāga mātram kalā ucyate pūrva aparayoḥ abhāve tad nirūpya madhya abhāvaḥ siddhaḥ iṣyate saugataiḥ evam tarkasya pratitarka parāhatim abhidhāya idānīm yathā sthāyinaḥ sattva anupapattiḥ evam kṣaṇikasya api tat anupapatteḥ anukūla tā nāma tarka doṣaḥ iti pratipādayitum sūtram asati pratijñā uparodhaḥ yaugapadyam anyathā iti tadvayā cakṣāṇaḥ tāvat vikalpena tat pṛcchati pūrva iti asati pratijñā uparodhaḥ yaugapadyam anyathā 
NSu_2.2.194cd.1–2.2.194cd.3	 pūrva bhāva bhavam kāryam uta tad nāśa sambhavam artha kriyā kāritvam hi sattvam parasya abhimatam tat ca vakṣyamāṇa kalpa dvaya vyāptam tṛtīya prakāra anirūpaṇāt na ca tad kṣaṇike sambhavati tathā hi kṣaṇikāt bhāvāt bhavat kāryam kim pūrvasya kāraṇasya bhāve bhavati kāraṇa sattā samāna kālīn asattam iti yāvat uta tasya kāraṇasya nāśe sati sambhavati iti ādye doṣam āha yaugapadyam iti 
NSu_2.2.195ab.1–2.2.195ab.3	 yaugapadyam sati bhavet utpādyānām aśeṣatas sati kāraṇe kāryam bhavati ced tarhi iti śeṣaḥ kṣaṇikam hi kāraṇam kāryam ca tad sattā samāna kālīn asattam ced kārya kāraṇayoḥ saha utpādaḥ iti uktam syāt kṣaṇe vibhāga abhāvasya ukta tvāt tad tad kāryāṇām api ayam eva nyāyaḥ iti tad santāna bhāvinām aśeṣa kāryāṇām yaugapadyam syāt tat ca pratyakṣa ādi viruddham iti atra yadi api yugapad bhavatoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva anupapattiḥ api dūṣaṇam tathā api tad śiṣyaiḥ eva jñātum śakyate iti ubhayathā ca doṣāt a iti sūtre kathitam iti vā atra na uktam dvitīyam nirākaroti vināśe ced iti 
NSu_2.2.195c.1–2.2.195c.3	 vināśe ced na tat kāryam kāraṇasya kāryam bhavet tarhi iti śeṣaḥ tat tasya kāryam na bhavati iti āpannam anyathā sarvasya sarvam kāryam syāt na hi ānantarya mātreṇa kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tathā tve vināśa kārya tva prasaṅgāt ānantaryasya anya apekṣayā api sattvāt sādeśya ādeḥ apākṛta tvāt evam anyasya api kāryam na bhavati iti na kāryam syāt akāraṇam vā ubhayathā api pūrvasya artha kriyā virahāt asattva prāptiḥ iti sūtra kṛtā saugata abhyupagatam pakṣam pradhānīkṛtya dūṣaṇam uktam bhāṣya kṛtā tu abhāvasya bhāva sāpekṣa tvāt tena krameṇa atas artha virodha abhāvaḥ nanu asti tāvat pratikṣaṇam kārya utpattiḥ na ca kāryam kāraṇena vinā utpattum alam tathā sati nityam sattvam asat tvam vā iti āpatteḥ atas kārya utpattiḥ eva anyatara pakṣa doṣam ābhāsayiṣyati pakṣa antaram vā grāhayiṣyati iti atas āha kārya utpattau ca iti 
NSu_2.2.195d.1–2.2.195d.3	 kārya utpattau ca kā pramā syāt etat yadi pratikṣaṇam kārya utpattiḥ pramāṇavatī syāt na ca etat asti na ca sva aṅgīkāra mātreṇa artha antara ākṣepa sāmarthyam atiprasaṅgāt iti nanu asti yat sat tad kṣaṇikam yathā deha ādi sat ca vivāda padam iti pratikṣaṇam kārya utpattau pramāṇam iti ced na asya eva nirākriyamāṇa tvāt deha ādīnām api kṣaṇika tva abhāvena dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvāt ca nanu deha ādeḥ pūrva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ parimāṇa bhedena bheda siddhau kṣaṇika tva siddhiḥ iti uktam iti asya āha abhede api iti 
NSu_2.2.196a–2.2.196d.3	 abhedena viśeṣeṇa deha dīpa phala ādiṣu viśeṣa darśanam yuktam asmākam pūrva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ iti śeṣaḥ viśeṣeṇa ārambha vādat vailakṣaṇyena ādipadena aṅkura ādi viśeṣa darśanam parimāṇa bheda darśanam asmākam pariṇāma vādinām mate ayam atharḥ ārambha vādinaḥ hi parimāṇam yāvat dravya bhāvi abhyupayanti avayava saṅkhayā atiśayān atiśaya āyattatvāt parimāṇa bhedasya avayava apacaye dravya vināśasya avayava upacaye ca tad utpādasya āvarjanīya tvāt atas teṣām parimāṇa bhedaḥ dravyam bhindyāt eva asmākam tu avasthitam eva dravyam avayava upacaya apacayābhyām tad parimāṇaka tayā vikriyate iti darśanam tatra parimāṇa bhedaḥ na bhedam ākṣipati iti kiñca phala ādīnām pūrva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ bhedaḥ sādhyate uta abheda abhāvaḥ ādye siddha sādhanam bhedasya asmābhiḥ api aṅgīkṛta tvāt tāvatā kṣaṇa bhaṅga asiddheḥ dvitīye doṣam āha anubhūtitaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.196d.1–2.2.197ab.2	 anubhūtitaḥ viśeṣa darśanam mānam yadi na sthairya dṛś kutas tat idam phalam iti pratyabhijñayā pūrva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ abheda siddheḥ bādhita viṣayam anumānam iti śeṣaḥ bhrāntā pratyabhijñā nābha idam sādhayitum alam iti ced tarhi bhrāntam parimāṇa bheda darśanam na bheda sādhanāya alam iti brūmaḥ parimāṇa bheda darśanam bādhaka abhāvāt pramāṇam eva iti ced tatra āha viśeṣa iti 
NSu_2.2.197ab.3	 tarhi sthairyat ṛk kutas na mānam tasyāḥ api bādhaka rahita tvāt viśeṣa darśanam bādhakam iti ced tarhi sthairya darśanam kutas na bādhakam atas anupalabhyamāna viśeṣa yaḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāva ayogāt anyonya pratipakṣatān anubhavāt ca anyatara pakṣapātam parityajya bheda abheda viṣaya tayā eva vyavasthāpanam yuktam anyathā dṛṣṭānte sādhya sandehena api para anumānam duṣyam syāt iti evam tarka aṅga antara vaikalyam svayam ūhanīyam 
NSu_2.2.197ab.4–2.2.197ab.5	 nanu etāni sūtrāṇi kutas vyutkrameṇa vyākhyātāni ucyate upodghāta prakriyayā sūtrakāreṇa eva ādau bādhakāni nirākṛtya ante niṣkaṇṭakā pratyabhijñā upanyastā bhāṣya kāreṇa tu su bodha tvāya śiṣyā kāṅkṣā krameṇa ādau pratyabhijñām abhidhāya anantaram tad bādhakāni parihṛtāni iti duḥkha abhāvam sukham ca āhuḥ iti yat anūditam tat nirākaroti diś iti 
NSu_2.2.197cd.1–2.2.197cd.2	 diś sukhe ca kha dṛṣṭāntāt bhāvau sat ced kvacid bhavet sva dṛṣṭāntāt iti ākāśasya bhāva tve yaḥ nyāyaḥ abhihitaḥ tasmāt iti hetu atideśaḥ dharmi pratiyogi nirapekṣam eva vidhi rūpeṇa pratīyamāna tvāt iti arthaḥ sadbhāvaḥ kvacid bhavet ced tat dṛṣṭāntena iti śeṣaḥ anena anyathā rūpa ādinām api bhāva tvam na syāt aviśeṣāt iti bādhakam sūcayati yadi api diśaḥ na ākāśāt bhidyante tathā api ākāśasya bhāga sadbhāvam jñāpayitum tāsām grahaṇam eka vacanam tu jāti abhiprāyam 
NSu_2.2.197cd.3–2.2.197cd.4	 etena ākāśe ca aviśeṣāt iti sūtram prakāra antareṇa vyākhyātam bhavati ākāśa ādīnām bhāva tva samarthanena pañca skandha ātmakam viśvam iti nirastam ātmanaḥ jñāna ātmaka tvam tu na asmākam aniṣyam kṣaṇa bhaṅgitāyāḥ nirasta tvāt jñānasya api grāhaka tāyāḥ pareṇa abhyupagata tvāt mokṣaḥ tu caturthe parīkṣiṣyate syāt etat vaibhāṣika sautra antikayoḥ yaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ sva mata viruddhaḥ siddhāntaḥ saḥ eva nirākṛtaḥ yaḥ tu sautra antikasya siddhānta viśeṣaḥ pramāṇam tāvat vividham prameya dvaividhyāt tatra jñāna atiriktaḥ sarve api rūpa ādi prapañcaḥ anumeyaḥ eva na tu pratyakṣaḥ jñānam nīla ādi ākāram pratyakṣa vedyam a iti sa kasmāt na nirākṛtaḥ iti atas āha viśvam iti 
NSu_2.2.198.1–2.2.198.3^1	 viśvam pratyakṣa gam tyaktavā tayoḥ yaḥ anumitam vadet māyā vādi vat eva asau= upekṣyaḥ bhūtim icchatā tayoḥ vaibhāṣika sautra antikayoḥ madhye yaḥ sautra antikaḥ viśvam rūpa ādikam pratyakṣa gam tyaktvā rūpa ādeḥ viśvasya pratyakṣa vedya tām vaibhāṣika ādibhiḥ abhyupagatām anabhyupagamya iti yāvat anumitam vadet rūpa ādeḥ viśvasya anumāna vedya tām aṅgīkuryāt māyā vādinā tulyam vartate iti māyauvādi vat etat uktam bhavati yathā sarvān duḥsamaya anapākurvatā sūtra kṛtā na māyā vādaḥ atra pāde nirākṛtaḥ tasya atyanta nirdalasya upekṣā eva kāryā 
NSu_2.2.198.1–2.2.198.3^2	 na tu īṣat sadalaiḥ sāṅkhayādi samayaiḥ saha nirāsaḥ iti jñāpana artham tathā bāhya anumeya tā vādaḥ api iti nanu māyāvādaḥ sūtra utpatti uttara kāla bhāvī tasya katham nirāsa prasaktiḥ mā evam anādi kālataḥ vṛttāḥ a iti akta tvāt anyathā sāṅkhayādi nirāsasya api aprasakteḥ iti nanu apratiṣiddham anumānam bhavati iti nyāyena nīla ādeḥ viśvasya apratyakṣa tvam sūtrakārasya abhimatam eva iti kutas na kalpyate na ca evam śakyam pramāṇa aviruddhaḥ pramāṇa anusārī ca sūtrakārasya abhiprāyaḥ kalpanīyaḥ naca ayam arthaḥ tathā iti āśavān āha sarva iti 
NSu_2.2.199a–2.2.199c.2	 sarva pramāṇa siddham yat buddheḥ bhedena sarvadā katham nu tasya buddhi tvam ayam atra uttara kramaḥ nīla ādeḥ arthasya apratyakṣa tvam na vaktum śakyate nīla ādi pratīteḥ aparokṣatāyāḥ sākṣi siddha tvāt indriya vyāpāra bhāva bhāvi tvena anumāna siddha tvāt ca atha matam yena arthena yat jñānam jāyate tat tad ākāram bhavati 
NSu_2.2.199a–2.2.199c.4^1	 tat ca jñānam sva prakāśa tayā sva gatam nīla ādi ākāram api sākṣāt kurute atas aparokṣatayā upalabhyamānasya nīla ādi ākāra nikarasya buddhi gata tvāt na kaścid doṣaḥ iti atra idam upatiṣṭhate yat aparokṣatayā avabhāsamānam nīla ādi ākāra cakram buddheḥ bhedena sarvadā sarva pramāṇa siddham tasya katham nu buddhi tvam aṅgīkriyate bahirmukhatayet antena hi ayam nīla ādi ākāraḥ aparokṣam avabhāsate na jātu antarmukha tayā aham nīlam iti tathā nīla aparokṣa jñāna samanantaram nīla arthī niyamena bahis pravartate tena anumīyate anena bahis arthaḥ eva sākṣātkṛtaḥ iti na hi anyatra jñānam anyatra pravṛttiḥ iti yujyate 
NSu_2.2.199a–2.2.199c.4^2	 atiprasaṅgāt madhye anumānam tu nirasiṣyate evam āptaḥ api kim aparokṣa tayā paśyasi iti pṛṣṭaḥ aṅgulim prasārya idam iti bāhyam eva bravīti atas tribhiḥ api pramāṇaiḥ aparokṣatayā avabhāsamānasya nīla ādi ākārasya buddhitaḥ bhedaḥ eva avasīyate na ca idam sarvam bhrāntam kadā api anyathā pratītyabhāvāt vinā eva bādhakena bhrānti tva abhyupagame ati prasaṅgāt atas aparokṣatayā avabhāsamānaḥ nīla ādi ākāraḥ bāhyaḥ eva na tu buddhi gataḥ iti kiñca bāhya arthasya apratyakṣa tve tad asiddhiḥ eva syāt pramāṇa abhāvāt tathā ca bāhya artha abhyupagamaḥ riktaḥ syāt iti āha viśvam iti 
NSu_2.2.199d.1–2.2.199d.2	 viśvam anyat ca kimpramam anyat jñānam iti śeṣaḥ kā pramā yasya tat kiṃpramam anumeyaḥ bāhya ākāraḥ iti ced sarvathā siddhasya pakṣīkaraṇa ayogāt liṅga abhāva advaya āpti asiddheḥ ca syāt etat buddhi gataḥ tāvat ākāraḥ aparokṣam avabhāsate sa kādācitka tvāt kim api kāraṇam epakṣamāṇaḥ bāhyam nīla ādi anumāpayiṣyati iti mā evam bāhya tayā eva nīla ādi ākārasya sphuraṇāt kutra ca idam ulabdham yat kādācitkam tad kāraṇa vat iti jñānaḥ eva iti ced bāhya apratyakṣa tva vāde tatra api kāraṇa tva anavadhāraṇāt jñānam pūrva jñāna kāraṇakam upalabdham iti ced tarhi ākāraḥ api pūrva ākāra janyaḥ kalpyatām kim bāhya artha vyasanena nīla jñāna anaṃntaram pīta jñāna utpāda darśanāt na iti ced sadṛśa janya tvasya pareṇa kvāpi anupalabdha tvāt 
NSu_2.2.199d.3	 kiñca vāsanā ādikam āntaram eva sahakārīkṛtya visadṛśam api jñānam janayati iti kalpanīyam na bāhyam dṛṣṭena eva kathañcid upapattau= adṛṣṭa kalpanā anupapatteḥ atas bāhyaḥ athaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ iti śaṅkānāspada tvāt idam matam atra na dūṣitam iti uktam yat vā sphuṭatarā analpa doṣa tvena śiṣyaiḥ eva heya tayā jñātum śakya tvāt iti āśayena āha sarva iti 
NSu_2.2.200.1–2.2.200.3	 sarva lokaḥ bibheti añjaḥ yasmāt anubhavāt sadā tasya apalāpinaḥ kim na niṣpramāṇaka vādinaḥ mādhyamika ādayaḥ api bāhya arthān apahnuvānāḥ api hi anubhavāt bibhyataḥ sāṃvṛvasattva ādi abhyupayanti tatas sarvaiḥ anusaraṇīyaḥ eva ayam anubhavaḥ tam api yaḥ sautra antikaḥ apalapati anubhava siddhāyāḥ aparokṣasya nīla ākārasya bāhya tāyāḥ apākaraṇāt tathā niṣpramāṇakam vadati nīla ādi ākārasya buddhi sthatāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt tasya anubhavasya apalāpinaḥ niṣpramāṇaka vādinaḥ tasya sautra antikasya kim dūṣaṇam na bhavet sarvam api bhavet iti eka tvam anubhūti stham akha dṛṣṭāntāt atasya apalāpinaḥ a iti para pakṣe tatra tatra anubhava virodhaḥ abhihitaḥ sa katham iti atas abhinayena tam darśayati saḥ aham iti 
NSu_2.2.201.1–2.2.201.3	 saḥ aham tat idam eva aham sukhī sat gaganam diśaḥ satyāḥ ityādi anubhavāḥ sadā tad pratipakṣa gāḥ atra saḥ eva aham iti ātmā eka tva agrāhī pratyabhijñā anubhavaḥ darśitaḥ tat idam iti anātmanaḥ aham sukhī iti sukhasya vidhi tvā anubhavaḥ sat bhāva rūpam gaganam diśaḥ satyāḥ bhāva rūpāḥ iti gaganasya diśām ca bhāva tva anubhavaḥ ādi padāt idam nīlam na aham nīlam iti ādeḥ grahaṇam tad pratipakṣa gāḥ tad abhyupagata atharvi ruddha viṣayāḥ vaibhāṣika sautra antika samaya nirākaraṇam upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_2.2.202.1–2.2.203.1	 atas nirmānam akhila pramāṇa pratipakṣa gam durmatam kaḥ nu gṛhṇīyāt vināsuḥ atatim kvacid akhila pramāṇa pratipakṣa gam sarva pramāṇa viruddha artha viṣayam atas eva durmatam diṅnāga prabhṛtibhiḥ bahubhiḥ gṛhīta tvāt katham kaḥ nu gṛhṇīyāt iti ākṣepaḥ iti atas uktam vinā iti sat puruṣa viṣayaḥ eva ayam ākṣepaḥ iti bhāvaḥ na ca evam nirākaraṇa vaiyarthyam ukta artha anusandhāne kaḥ nu gṛhṇīyāt iti vyākhyānāt iti na asataḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt mādhyamika matam atra apākriyate tasya ukta artha viruddha tām darśayitum tat tāvat upanyasyati aparaḥ iti na asataḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt aparaḥ śūnyam akhilam manaḥ vācām a gocaram nirviśeṣam svayambhātam nirlepam ajara amaram 
NSu_2.2.204a–2.2.204a–2.2.204c.2^1	 aśeṣa doṣa rahitam anantam deśa kālataḥ vastutas ca aparaḥ mādhyamikaḥ iti brūmaḥa iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ śūnyam eva tattvam na tatas anyat asti iti śeṣaḥ nanu pañca skandhāḥ tatas atiriktāḥ santi iti atas uktam akhilam iti pañca skandha ātmakam akhilam jagat śūnyam eva na tatas anyat iti atharḥ tat śūnyam kutas siddham iti atas uktam svayambhātam iti svayaṃbhāta tvam ca na sva karmaka prakāśa tvam kintu apara aprakāśya tvam eva iti āśayena uktam manaḥ iti pramāṇa mātra upalakṣaṇam etat kutas pramāṇa aviṣaya tvam śūnyasya nirdharmaka tvāt sadharmakaḥ eva pramāṇa pravṛttiḥ iti uktam nirviśeṣam iti 
NSu_2.2.204a–2.2.204c.2^2–2.2.204c.3	 nikhila jagat ātmakam ced śūnyam tarhi tad dharmā lepa jarā maraṇa duḥkha pariccheda ādayaḥ tasya eva syuḥ iti katham nirviśeṣa tva ādikam iti atas āha nirlepam iti lepaḥ dharma adharma sambandhaḥ doṣāḥ duḥkha ādayaḥ vastutas ca anantam vastu antara pratiyogika anyonya abhāva rahitam yat vā śuddham sarva gatam nityam sarva ātmakam śūnyam abhilapyate tat katham nirviśeṣam iti ucyate iti atas etat uktam lepa ādi doṣa abhāva mātreṇa śuddham ucyate deśa ādi pariccheda abhāvam ādāya sarva gata tva ādi va ādaḥ na tu kam api dharmam āśritya iti upāya upeya bhāva avasthita padārtha khyāpanam śāstra dharmaḥ atas tattva viṣayām vipratipattim darśayitvā vipratipanne upāya upeye darśayati tat asmi iti 
NSu_2.2.204c–2.2.204f.3	 tat asmi iti nitya upāsā para ukṣitam rāga ādi doṣa rahitam tad bhāvam yoginam nayet tat śūnyam aham asmi iti nitya upāsaya aparokṣīkṛtam tat śūnyam rāga ādi doṣa rahitam yoginam tad bhāvam śūnya tva lakṣaṇam mokṣam nayet iti sambandhaḥ yathā uktam pradīpasya iva nirvāṇam vimokṣaḥ tasya tāyinaḥ a iti yadi śūnya mukta rūpam katham tarhi akhilam śūnyam iti atas āha tasya eva iti 
NSu_2.2.205a–2.2.205c.3	 tasya eva anādi saṃvṛttyā nānābheda ātmakam jagat sat iva ābhāti śūnyasya eva saṃvriyate anayā iti saṃvṛtiḥ avidyā saṃvṛteḥ satya tve advaita hāniḥ āropita tve tu saṃvṛti antara apekṣā iti atas anādi iti uktam nānābheda ātmakam pañca skandha ātmakam śūnya avidyā kalpita tvāt akhilam śūnyam iti ucyate na punar tat eva tat iti tat kim asadeva idam tathā tve vā katham sat iti pratibhāsaḥ sattva āropāt pakṣa antaram āha satya tvam iti
