NSu_2.2.205cd.1–2.2.206ab.2	 satya tvam sāṃvṛtam tasya ca iṣyate tasya āropitasya api jagataḥ sāṃvṛtam satya tvam iṣyate atas na sat pratyaya virodhaḥ asti ced jagataḥ sattvam katham tarhi asat yena sat ivā bhāti iti uktam iti atas āha pāramārthikā iti pāramārthika sattvam tu śūnyāt anyasya na kvacid sarvathā bādhya tvam pāramāthirkattvam tad abhāvāt asat idam jagat udgīyate iti pāramārthika sattva abhāve katham jagati artha kriyā ādi vyavahāraḥ iti atas āha sāṃvṛtena eva iti 
NSu_2.2.206cd.1–2.2.206cd.3	 sāṃvṛtena eva satyena vyavahāraḥ akhilaḥ bhavet akhilaḥ hāna upādāna upekṣā abhijñā abhivādana artha kriyā lakṣaṇaḥ vyavahārasya api asattvāt svapnaḥ iva iti śeṣaḥ pāramārthika sattvam eva vyavahāra virodhi tasya sarva kriyā rahita tvāt na tu tad abhāvaḥ iti bhāvena uktam sāṃvṛtena eva sattvena iti sṛṣṭi pralaya viṣaye vigānam darśayati śūnyāt iti 
NSu_2.2.207a–2.2.207e.4	 śūnyāt saṃvṛti yogena viśvam etat pravartate sṛṣṭi kāle punar ca ante stimitam śūnyatām vrajet iti brūte sṛṣṭi kāle pravartata jāyate śūnyasya niṣkriya tvāt katham viśvakartṛ tvam iti atas uktam saṃvṛti yogena iti ante pralaya kāle stimitam niṣkriyam anena kriyā vibhāga ādi nyāyena yā viśvasya satya tva vādinām pralaya prakriyā sā nirākriyate svāpna gaja ādiḥ iva iti śeṣaḥ evam upanyasta mata nirāsātha ṛtu ena adhikaraṇam avatārayati tam uddiśya iti 
NSu_2.2.207ef.1–2.2.208a.2	 tam uddiśya jagāda jagatām guruḥ yat tāvat uktam śūnyāt eva idam jagat utpadyate iti tat yathāśrutam apākartum sūtram na asataḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe na asataḥ iti na asataḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt na asataḥ jagataḥ bhāvaḥ asataḥ sarva viśeṣa nirmukta tvena gagana kusuma samānāt śūnyāt jagataḥ bhāvaḥ janma na upapadyate kutas iti atas āha na hi iti 
NSu_2.2.208bc.1–2.2.208bc.4	 na hi dṛṣṭā asataḥ janiḥ sataḥ kvacid sataḥ bhavataḥ kāryasya iti yāvat kvacid asataḥ janiḥ na dṛṣṭā yatas atra sarvatra śūnyasya asattvam āpādya dūṣaṇa abhidhānam iti jñātavyam syāt etat pramāṇa abhāvaḥ prameya abhāvam sādhayati na punar pramāṇa viśeṣa abhāvaḥ mā hi bhūt asmad ādi pratyakṣa vyāvṛttyā dharma ādi abhāva siddhiḥ tat atra api pramāṇa abhāvāt iti hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt iti a pratyakṣa abhāva kathanam tu katham anaikāntika tvāt iti atas āha pramāṇam ca iti 
NSu_2.2.208cd.1–2.2.208cd.2	 pramāṇam ca dṛṣṭiḥ eva akhilāt varam dṛṣṭiḥ pratyakṣam eva akhilāt anumānāt agamāt ca varam pramāṇam ayam abhisandhiḥ na asataḥ jagataḥ bhāvaḥ iti pratijñāya kutas iti ākāṅkṣāyām tatra pramāṇa abhāvāt iti hetum manasi nidhāya katam tatra pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti jijñāsāyām anumāna āgamayoḥ pratyakṣa mūla tvena tatas pratyakṣam eva varam pramāṇam iti ādau= adṛṣṭa tvāt iti tad abhāvaḥ ayam darśitaḥ na tu pradhāna pratijñāyām hetu tvena yena ukta doṣaḥ syāt iti 
NSu_2.2.208cd.3	 tarhi anumāna ādya bhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti atas āha pramāṇam ca iti ayam āśayaḥ veda ādeḥ śūnya vādinā prāmāṇyam na aṅgīkriyate tadīya āgamasya tu asmābhiḥ iti ataḥ na asti atra āgamaḥ sampratipannaḥ iti śiṣyaiḥ eva śakyate jñātum pratyakṣa abhāvena anumānasya api abhāvaḥ siddhaḥ eva pratyakṣasya anumāna upajīvya tvāt pratyakṣeṇa kvacid upalabdham eva hi anumānena sādhanīyam atas anumāna abhāvasya anuktau= api lābhāt adṛṣṭa tvāt iti eva uktam sūtrakṛtā iti atas eva prāk uktam kvacid iti 
NSu_2.2.208cd.4–2.2.208cd.5	 mā bhūt śūnyāt jagat utpattau pratyakṣam pramāṇam mā ca bhūt āgamaḥ tathā api anumānam bhaviṣyati asataḥ sat utpattau pratyakṣa abhāvena dṛṣṭa anumāna anupapattau= api sāmānyatas dṛṣṭasya upapatteḥ kāraṇasya hi sattve niṣiddhe asataḥ eva janma setsyati iti āśaṅkayā anumānānām tarka pratighātam vaktum sūtram udāsīnānām api ca evam siddhiḥ iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe yadi evam iti udāsīnānām api ca evam siddhiḥ 
NSu_2.2.209.1–2.2.209.3	 yadi evam saptama rasān madhurāt iva pīnatā bhavet janasya mārjārṛṅgam goḥ iva ghātakam yadi asataḥ eva yat kiñcit kāryam jāyeta tadā madhurāt iva saptama rasāñjanasya pīnatā syāt goḥ śṛṅgam iva mārjārṛṅgam api janasya ghātakam bhavet aviśeṣāt iti anena evam sati udāsīnānām heya upekṣaṇīya buddhaya viṣayāṇām saptama rasa ādīnām api sakāśāt pīna tva ādi kāryasya siddhiḥ prasajyeta iti sūtram vyākhyātam bhavati prakāra antareṇa vyākhyāti kārya arthī iti 
NSu_2.2.210ab.1–2.2.210cd.3	 kārya arthī kāraṇam sat ca na upādadyāt kathañcana yadi asataḥ eva kāryam utpadyate tadā paṭa ādi kārya arthī kuvinda ādiḥ sat tantu ādi kāraṇam sarvathā na upādadīta asataḥ eva paṭa ādi utpatteḥ atiprasaṅga antaram āha na iti na pravarteta ceṣyāya śūnyādeva iṣya sambhavāt na kevalam asataḥ kārya utpattau sat kāraṇa upādāna anupapattiḥ kintviṣyāya paṭa ādi utpādāya na pravarteta na prayateta ca kutas śūnyādeveṣya sambhavāt etena tantu ādi upādānāt udāsīnānām cikīrṣā ādi rahitānām ca puṃsām paṭa ādi siddhiḥ syāt iti sūtram vyākhyātam bhavati prakāra antareṇa vyākhyāti deśa iti 
NSu_2.2.211ab.1–2.2.211ab.3	 deśa kāla ādi niyamaḥ niṃha śūnyāt sataḥ bhavet śūnyāt sataḥ śūnyāt eva bhavataḥ kāryasya deśa kāla avasthā niyamaḥ na bhavet tathā hi yadi jagat śūnyāt eva bhavet tadā godhūmāḥ kṛṣṇa bhūmau sampadyante na pāṇḍu bhūmau vasante kiṃśukāḥ puṣpitāḥ bhavanti na varṣāsu tri hāyiṇī eva gauḥ garbham dhatte na anyathā sa tuṣāḥ eva vrīhayaḥ aṅkurān utpādayanti na itaratha iti ādi deśa kāla ādi niyamaḥ kārya utpattau na syāt śūnyasya sarvatra aviśiṣṭa tvāt anena udāsīnānām deśa kāla ādi niyama anapekṣāṇām api kāryāṇām siddhiḥ utpattiḥ syāt iti sūtram vyākhyātam bhavati śūnyāt eva kārya utpattau kurtru pādāna nimitta apekṣā na syāt iti samudāya arthaḥ nanu ādi sṛṣṭau= eva śūnyāt kāryā utpādam brūmaḥ na sarvadā anyadā tu kartṛ ādi kāṇa gaṇāt eva atas na ati prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha puruṣa iti 
NSu_2.2.211cd.1–2.2.212c.2	 puruṣa icchā anusāreṇa yadi kiñcid prajāyate kim na anumīyate tadvat vastu tvāt puruṣāt bhavaḥ sarvasya api kiñcid iti adhunātanam kāryam vastu tvāt kāryatvāt sarvasya api iti ādikālīnasya api kāryasya iti arthaḥ anane nā puruṣaḥ sataḥ ādikālīnasya kāryasya kartā anumātavyaḥ kutas dṛṣṭa tvāt adhunātanānām kāryāṇām puruṣa kartṛ tvasya niścita tvāt iti prathama sūtram prakāra antareṇa vyākhyātam bhavati sūtra bhāṣyayoḥ puruṣa grahaṇam tu upādāna ādi upalakṣaṇam 
NSu_2.2.212a–2.2.212c.3	 nanu idam sarvam api sva vyāhatam tathā hi yat uktam na asataḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt iti tad sataḥ kāraṇa tve api samānam na hi sataḥ kāraṇa tvam api kvāpi āvayoḥ sammatam nanu ca madhurāt iva goḥ śṛṅgam iva ityādinā sataḥ sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kāri tvam nidarśitam mā evam sarvasya api jagataḥ asattvena tad antaḥpātinaḥ madhura ādeḥ api sattva abhāvāt 
NSu_2.2.212a–2.2.212c.4	 yaḥ ca ayam ati prasaṅgaḥa sataḥ kāraṇa tve saptama rasa ādeḥ api madhura ādi kārya kāri tva prasaṅgaḥa iti saḥ api sataḥ kāraṇa tve tantu ādīnām mṛdā ādi kārya kāri tva prasaṅgena tulyaḥ tathā api kāraṇa tva mātram sataḥ asti iti ced tad sattva asammateḥ ukta tvāt na hi sakala vikriyā atītasya kāraṇa tvam śakya sambhāvanam madhura ādīnām saptama rasa ādīnām ca asattva aviśeṣe api sat buddhi bhāva abhāvābhyām viśeṣāt 
NSu_2.2.212a–2.2.213a.2	 yat api kārya arthī ityādi tad īśvarasya sarva kāraṇa tve tatas eva paṭa ādi sambhavāt tantu ādi upādānam na syāt kuvinda ādeḥ icchā ādikam ca vyartham syāt iti samānam etena deśa kāla ādi iti prasaṅgaḥ api samīkṛtaḥ veditavyaḥ yat ca puruṣa icchā anusāreṇa iti uktam tat mahat ādi kāryasya kulāla ādi janya tā sā dhana samāna yogakṣemam iti atra yat viśvasya asattvam uktam tat tāvat nirākartum sūtram na abhāvaḥ upalabdheḥ iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe na ca iti na abhāvaḥ upalabdheḥ  naca abhāvaḥ viśvam sat iti gamyate yatas bhavati iti bhāvaḥ na bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ asat iti yāvat sat iti gamyate yatas iti anena viśvasatya tve pratyakṣam pramāṇam uktam veditavyam pratyakṣeṇa sat iti anubhūyamānam api viśvam asat ced kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha anubhava iti 
NSu_2.2.213ab.1–2.2.213cd.1	 anubhava rodhe tu vacanam vādinaḥ kutas anubhava rodhe tu kriyamāṇaḥ iti śeṣaḥ yadi sattvena upalabhyamānam api asatsyāt tadā uttaram vadati api śūnya vāt iti na uktam tvayā iti atas te a pratibhā iti bruvāṇam param prati śūnya vādinaḥ sva vacana sādha ka upāya abhāvāt parājayaḥ eva āpadyeta yadi ca prāśnika ādi avagatam katham mad vacanam na asti iti brūyāt tadā aṅgīkṛtam pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam iti sattvena tad avagatam viśvam katama satsyāt iti ukta doṣa parihāram śaṅkate svapna iti svapna bhrānti vat eva idam saṃvṛttyā eva upalabhyate 
NSu_2.2.214a.1–2.2.214a.4	 yadi sattvena svapnaḥ ca bhrāntiḥ ca tayoḥ iva svapna bhrānti vat yadi api parasya svapnaḥ api bhrantiḥ eva tathā api go balīvarda nyāyena loka vyavahāram apekṣya pṛthak uktiḥ yathā svapne bhrāntau ca asat eva gaja ādikam sa pādikam ca sat iti upalabhyate tathā āsat eva idam viśvam sattvena upalabhyate etat eva viśvasya śūnya kāraṇa tvam nāma na aparam tatra katham sat iti upalambhena viśvasya satva siddhiḥ naca evam adhiṣṭhānasya draṣṭuḥ karaṇānām tad doṣāṇām ca sattvam aṅgī kāryam anyathā bhrānti vaicitrya ādi anupapattiḥ iti vācyam asat prakāśana śaktyā saṃvṛtya eva sarvasya upapattau tad aṅgīkāra vaiyathryāt evaṃca na vacana asiddhiḥ sāṃvṛta sattvasya vacanasya pratyakṣeṇa eva siddheḥ tāvatā eva vyavahāra upapattau pāramārthika sattvasya upayoga abhāvāt iti etat parihārāya vaidharmyāt ca na svapna ādi vat iti sūtram tadvayā ācaṣṭe kiñca iti vaidharmyāt ca na svapna ādi vat 
NSu_2.2.214ab.1–2.2.214ab.3	 kiñca atra bhramaḥ na eva nivartate bhavet evam yadi prapañce rajju sarpa ādau= iva sattva pratyayaḥ bhramaḥ syāt naca evam tathā tve atra prapañce satva bhramaḥ kim iti na eva nivartate jñānānām bhramatvā avadhāraṇam hi bādha bodha adhīnam sampratipanna sthale tathā darśanāt pratyaya tva mātra adhīna tve prāk api bādha bodha udayāt rajju sarpa ādi jñāne laukika parīkṣakāṇām bhramatvā avadhāraṇam syāt na ca evam kvacid dṛṣṭam na ca prapañca satta avagamasya bādhakam paśyāmaḥ tatas na bhramatvā avadhāraṇam yuktam iti svapnasya bhrānti tva abhāvaḥ bhramasya ca adhiṣṭhāna ādi apekṣā niyamaḥ sāṃvṛta sattvasya vyavahāra nirvāhaka tvasya abhāvaḥ ca anyatra samarthitaḥ atra anusandheyaḥ syāt etat kim prapañca pratyayasya idānīm bādhaḥ na asti iti ucyate uta uttara kāle api ādye na tāvatā bhavataḥ api viśva satyatva avadhāraṇam śukti rajata ādau tad ayogāt dvitīyaḥ tu na asti prapañca pratyayaḥ bādhiṣyate pratyaya tvāt sampratipanna vat iti āgāmi bādha siddheḥ iti atas āha anādeḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.214c–2.2.214f.3	 anādeḥ asya viśvasya nivṛttiḥ yadi ca iṣyate nivṛttiḥ ca nivarteta tasyāḥ bhrānti tva sambhavāt anāditaḥ anuvṛttasya iti arthaḥ viśvasya tad pratyayasya nivṛttiḥ bādhaḥ nivarteta bādhyeta yadi pratyaya tvāt prapañca pratyayasya bādhaḥ anumīyate tadā avaśyam bādha pratyayasya api bādhena bhāvyam anyathā pratyaya tva hetoḥ tatra vyabhicāra āpatteḥ bādhaka pratyayasya bādhya tve prapañca pratyayasya yāthārthya siddhiḥ tiṣṭhatu tāvat parama artha cintā vyāvahārike tu tathā dṛṣṭam eva na kevalam idam āpādanam kintu sambhāvitam ca etat yad prapañca pratyayasya yāthārthyam tat na astita apratyayasya bādhya tvāt anāditaḥ anuvṛttasya aneka sajātīya vijātīya saṃvādataḥ yāthārthya sambhavāt kādācid kasya saṃvāda vidhura tvena bhrama tu a sambhavāt iti nanu ca prapañcanivṛttiḥ nāma śūnyam eva tat ca parama artha rūpam na kalpitam adṛṣṭa tvāt tat katham tad pratyayasya bādhya tā syāt kintu prapañcasya dṛṣṭa tvena kalpita tva sambhavāt tad pratyayaḥ eva bādhyaḥ hetuḥ ca prapañca pratyaya tvena vivektavyaḥ iti atas āha dṛṣṭasya iti 
NSu_2.2.215ab.1–2.2.215ab.3	 dṛṣṭasya bhrāntitā ced syāt adṛṣṭe na bhramaḥ kutas bhrāntitā bhrama śabdābhyām kalpita tvam ucyate idam uktam bhavati viparatīm etat uktam yat sarva pramāṇa dṛṣṭasya prapañcasya kalpita tvam ādāya tad sattā pratyayasya bādhya tva svīkaraṇam kena api pramāṇena adṛṣṭasya śūnyasya akalpita tvam gṛhītvā tad sattva pratyayasya abādhya tva upādānam prāmāṇikam akalpitam aprāmāṇikam ca aṅgīkriyamāṇam kalpitam iti sarva sammata tvāt iti etat eva dṛṣṭāntena darśayati gavām iti 
NSu_2.2.215cd.1–2.2.215cd.3	 gavāma śṛṅgi bhāvena nahi syāt śaśaśṛṅgitā aśṛṅgi bhāvena sahitā iti śeṣaḥ kaścid gavām śṛṅgitavam asti iti āha kaścid śaśasya iti tatra paroktarītyā gavām śṛṅgitā kalpitā dṛṣṭa tvāt śaśa śṛṅgitā tu akalpita adṛṣṭa tvāt iti syāt na hi evam loke pratītiḥ loka anusāreṇa eva ca parama arthaḥ boddhavyaḥ na anyathā loka nyāyasya eva tad bodha upāya tvāt iti tat evam pratyakṣa balena viśva satya tā sādhitā tad bādhaka śaṅkā ca parihṛtāḥ tatas kim siddham iti atas yat uktam pūrva pakṣiṇā sataḥ api kāraṇa tve pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti tat parihṛtam iti vadan samīkaraṇa antaram api pariharati asmākam tu iti 
NSu_2.2.216.1–2.2.216.2^1	 asmākam tu pramāṇena prasādāt īśvarasya ca ukta bhaṅgayā agamānām ca prāmāṇyāt yujyate akhilam sat kāraṇa tva vādinām akhilam pareṇa ākṣiptam yujyate katham bādha vidhureṇa pramāṇena jagataḥ satya tva siddhau madhura ādīnām puṣyayā ādi kāraṇānām sattva siddheḥ tantu ādīnām ca vicitra svabhāva tayā pramāṇena siddhānām na mṛd ādi kārya kāri tva prasaṅgaḥ na hi sataḥ iva asataḥ api svabhāva bhedaḥ asattva vyāghātāt pramāṇena eva sataḥ kāraṇa tva upalabdheḥ anupapattiḥ ābhāsa bhūtā eva pramāṇena sat tayā pramitānām madhura ādīnām sat buddhi mātra vailakṣaṇya kalpanā tyayuktā eva anyathā sat buddhayā avagatāt saptamarasāt api pīnatā satī syāt 
NSu_2.2.216.2^2–2.2.216.3	 īśvarasya sarva kāraṇa tve api tantu ādi apekṣā puruṣa prayatna ādi apekṣā deśa kāla ādi niyamaḥ ca yujyate eva tantu ādi apekṣayā eva kāryam utpadyatām iti īśvarasya prasādāt saṅkalpāt na ca evam nirviśeṣasya śūnyasya saṅkalpaḥ yujyate na ca etat aprāmāṇikam ārambhaṇa adhikaraṇa uktarītyātra āgama anumāna ādīnām pramāra tvāt na ca veda ādi āgama prāmāṇyam asiddham prathama sūtra ukta rītyā agama prāmāṇyasya siddha tvāt anumāne ati prasaṅgaḥ api āgama prāmāṇyena eva apāstaḥ iti brahma ādīn sṛṣṭayā ādau= īśvaraḥ teṣu kṛpayā apekṣate parameśvara niyoga anuṣṭhāne teṣām parama puruṣa artha lābhāt iti jñāpayitum prasādāt iti uktam prāk viśvasati atva sādhanāya upanyastasya pratyakṣasya anyathā siddhim āśaṅkaya tad parihāra tvena vaidharmyāt ca na svapna ādi vat iti sūtram vyākhyātam idānīm viśva mithyā tve para abhihitasya anumānasya dūṣaka tvena api vyākhyātum mithyātve anumānam tāvat śaṅkate dṛśya tvāt iti 
NSu_2.2.217ab.1–2.2.217ab.3	 dṛśya tvāt vimaṃta mithyā svapna vat ced sarvam mithyā iti ukte sampratipanna mithyā tve śukti rajata ādau siddha sādhana tā śūnye bādhaḥ syāt atas satya tva mithyā tvābhyām vimatam iti uktam vimatam gagana ādikam mithyā dṛśya tvāt svapna vat iti anumānena viśva mithyā tva siddheḥ katham satya tvam aṅgīkriyate iti arthaḥ dūṣayitum pṛcchati iyam ca iti 
NSu_2.2.217b.1–2.2.217c.2	 iyam ca mā tiṣṭhatu tāvat viśvam iyam ca mā idam eva dṛśya tva anumānam mithyā satyam vā iti śeṣaḥ ādyam dūṣayati mithyā iti mithyā ced sādhya siddhiḥ na na hi śabde avidyamānena cākṣuṣa tvena śabda anitya tvam siddhayati iti bhāvaḥ dvitīye dṛśya tvam dṛśyam adṛśyam vā prathamam dūṣayati vyabhicāraḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.217d.1–2.2.217d.3	 vyabhicāraḥ na ced bhavet dṛśya tvam mithyā na ced atha ca dṛśyam tadā dṛśya tvaḥ eva vyabhicāraḥ bhavet dvitīye tu ajñāna asiddha tā hetoḥ iti bhāvaḥ syāt etat mithyā eva dṛśya tvam iti brūmaḥ na ca evam sādhya asādhaka tvam varṇa dairghya ādīnām mithyābhūtānām api sādhaka tvasya ubhaya siddha tvāt cākṣuṣa tva ādīnām tu āropa abhāvāt ārope api asāṃvyāvahārika tvāt asādhaka tvam na tu mithyā tvāt iti ataḥ āha sādhaka tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.218ab.1–2.2.218ab.3	 sādhaka tvam asatyasya sādhyam vipratipattitaḥ yatra udāharaṇe mithyātvam sampratipannam tatra sādhaka tve yatra ca sādhaka tvam saṃmatam tatra mithyātve vipratipattitaḥ asati asya sādhaka tvam sādhyam eva na punar asmākam siddham iti vipratipattau sādhaka tvam mithyātvam vā sādhayiṣyāmi iti ced kim satyena pramāṇena uta mithyā bhūtena ādye tu uktam eva uttaram dvitīye doṣam āha tasya ca iti 
NSu_2.2.218c.1–2.2.218d.2	 tasya ca  na hi kvāpi asmākam mithyābhūtasya sādhaka tvam sammatam atas tasya api sādhaka tvam sādhyam eva tasya api sādhaka tvam sādhayiṣyāmi iti atas āha iti iti  iti anavasthā syāt pūrva ukta prakāreṇa iti arthaḥ na hi sarvam asatyam sādhakam iti ekam pramāṇam asti na api sat vādī kadāpi sattva asattva udāsīnena pramāṇena sādhya siddhim aṅgīkuryāt yena anavasthā śāntiḥ bhavet iti evam asiddhi vyabhicārābhyām anumānam nirākṛtya pramāṇa bādham ca āha sattvam ca iti  sattvam ca asya anubhūtitaḥ asya prapañcasya anubhūtitaḥ siddham atas bādhita viṣayam ca anumānam iti śeṣaḥ na kevalam dṛśya tva anumānasya anena doṣeṇa ābhāsattvam kintu yat anyat api prapañca mithyā tve anumānam jaḍa tvam vā paricchinna tvam vā paraiḥ ucyate tasya api iti āha anubhūti iti 
NSu_2.2.219ab.1–2.2.219ab.3	 anubhūti virodhena mithyātve mā na kācana upalakṣaṇam etat pūrva ukta vyabhicāra asiddhibhyām ca iti api draṣṭavyam tathā hi jaḍa tva ādikam satyam mithyā vā ādye jaḍa tvāt imat na vā prathame vyabhicāraḥ dvitīye apasiddhāntaḥ mithyā ced sādhya siddhiḥ na iti bhavet asattvam anumānānām yadi anubhava virodhaḥ bhavet na ca asau= asti mithyātva apara paryāyam bādhya tvam hi anumāna sādhyam na ca tad abhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa vedyaḥ tasya vartamāna mātra viṣaya tvena kathañcid vartamāna kālīnābādha abhāva viṣaya tve api kāla antara bhāvi bādha abhāva viṣaya tva ayogāt iti atas āha atīta iti 
NSu_2.2.219cd.1–2.2.219ef.2	 atīta anāgatau kālau= api naḥ sākṣi gocarau atra atīta grahaṇam prāsaṅgikam na kevalam vartamānaḥ iti apeḥ arthaḥ naḥ sarveṣām anyathā tad viśiṣṭa vyavahāra anupapattiḥ iti bhāvaḥ kim atas yadi evam avartamānaḥ api kālaḥ sākṣi gocaraḥ iti atas āha tat iti tad sambandhi tayā sattvam api kāla antara sambandhi tayā sattvam abādhya tvam na kevalam vartamāna kālīnabādha abhāvaḥ anubhava vedyaḥ kintu sarva kālagataḥ api iti arthaḥ tat katham iti atas uktam dṛṣṭasya iti 
NSu_2.2.219f.1–2.2.219f.3	 dṛṣṭasya sākṣi gam pratyakṣa ādi pratīti viṣayasya pratyakṣa ādi pratītīnām prāmāṇyasya sākṣiṇā grahaṇāt iti bhāvaḥ na hi viṣayasya traikālikā bādhya tvam anantarbhāvya tad pratīteḥ prāmāṇyam śakya grahaṇam yadi pratītim gṛhṇan sākṣī tad prāmāṇya grahaṇa svabhāva tvāt tat gṛhṇan= tad viṣayasya traikālikā bādhya tvam vyavasthāpayet tadā śukti rajata ādi pratīteḥ api saḥ eva grāhakaḥ iti tasyāḥ api prāmāṇyam gṛhṇīyāt tathā ca tad viṣayasya api rajata ādeḥ traikālikā bādhya tvam siddhayet iti atas dṛṣṭa śabdam vyākhyāti dṛḍha iti 
NSu_2.2.220ab.1–2.2.220ab.3	 dṛḍha dṛṣṭam tu yat dṛṣṭam dṛṣṭa ābhāsaḥ tatas aparam yat nirdeṣa tvena avadhṛtayā pratītyā viṣayīkṛtam tat eva dṛṣṭam iti uktam kutas itarasya sammugdha dṛṣṭasya dṛṣṭa ābhāsa tvāt mukhyā mukhyayoḥ ca mukhya grahaṇasya nyāyya tvāt kṛta vyutpādanam ca etat prāk sat pratipakṣāṇi ca dṛśya tva ādi anumānāni iti āśayavān āha bhrānteḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.220d–2.2.220f.3	 bhrānteḥ saṃvṛti satyasya viśeṣaḥ avyabhicāravān tena api aṅgīkṛtaḥ samyak sa naḥ satya tvam eva hi bhrānti viṣaya tvena sampratipannāt śukti rajata ādikāt iti arthaḥ saṃvṛti satyasya tathā tvena abhyupagatasya viśvasya viśeṣaḥ vailakṣaṇyam avyabhicāravān kadācid kvacid api sampratipanna mithyā abhāve avartamānaḥ tena śūnya vādinā api samyak iti asandehena saḥ eva viśeṣaḥ naḥ asmākam mate viśvasya satya tvam sādhayiṣyati iti śeṣaḥ tatas sat pratipakṣāṇi dṛśya tva ādi anumānāni iti atra tena api samyak aṅgīkṛtaḥ iti anena pakṣa dharmatā samarthitā avyabhicāravān iti anena tu vyāptiḥ ayam atra prayogaḥ viśvam kālatra abādhyam prātītika vilakṣaṇa tvāt vyatirekeṇa śukti rajata vat iti nanu ca śukti rajata ādīnām prāk śūnya tattva jñānāt śukti ādi jñānena eva nivṛttiḥ bhavati prapañcasya tu śūnya jñānena kadācid nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati iti evam mayā prātītika sāṃvṛtayoḥ vailakṣaṇyam aṅgīkṛtam naca idam viśvasatya tve bhavatā hetūkartum śakyam virodhāt ityataḥ āha vijñānāt iti 
NSu_2.2.221a–2.2.221c.2	 vijñānāt vyabhicāraḥ asya kadācid syāt iti pramā na eva dṛṣṭāḥ vyabhicāraḥ nivṛttiḥ na ayam viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkartum śakyate aprāmāṇika tvāt na hi aprāmāṇikena śṛṅgeṇa aśvaḥ anyatas viśeṣyamāṇaḥ dṛśyate iti nanu idam kadācid bādhiṣyate dṛśya tvāt śukti rajata ādi vat iti anumānasya sattvāt katham atra pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti atas sva uktam doṣam smārayati pramā iti 
NSu_2.2.221cd.1–2.2.221cd.2	 pramā sā ca na bhavet sva virodhataḥ yā ca śaṅkayate sā iti arthaḥ sva virodhate iti sva viṣayasya svasya ca bādhya tva āpādaka tvāt iti arthaḥ anyathā vyabhicāra āpatteḥ yasya viṣayaḥ asan svayam ca bādhyam katham tad pramāṇam bhavet atas asya viśeṣasya aprāmāṇika tvena aṅgīkartum aśakyatve yaḥ anyaḥ viśeṣaḥ prāmāṇikaḥ pramāṇa avirodhī ca aṅgīkartavyaḥ saḥ asmākam satya tve hetuḥ bhaviṣyati iti sa ca pramāṇa gamya tvam artha kriyā kāri tvam ca iti hṛdayam 
NSu_2.2.221cd.3–2.2.221cd.4	 nanu tarhi evam eva kutas na ucyate tathā ucyamāne pramāṇānām tattva āvedaka tvam atharkriyāyāḥ sattvam asati tad abhāvaḥ ityādi bahu saṃvidheyam syāt lāghava artham tu evam uktam tat api yathāvasaram upapāditam eva yat vā prapañcasya abādhya tve pariśeṣa pramāṇam anena uktam tathā hi jagataḥ bādhya tvam abādhya tvam ca prasaktam tṛtīya prakāra abhāvāt bādhya tvam ca prasiddha padārtha tattva jñānena anyena vā tatra ādyam vādi prativādibhyām anabhyupagamāt dvitīyam tu pramāṇa abhāva nirastam pariśeṣāt abādhya tvam eva siddhayati iti 
NSu_2.2.221cd.5–2.2.221cd.6	 athavā vyāpaka anupalabdhi liṅgakam anumānam etena śloka dvayena uktam bādhya tvam hi prasiddha padārtha tad itara tattva jñāna nivatya ṛtvena vyāptam tat ca vyāpakam anabhyupagama pramāṇa abhāvābhyām jagataḥ vyāvartamānam sva vyāpyam bādhya tvam iti vyāvartayati evam prapañca mithyātvā anumānāni nirākṛtya idānīm tad anugrāhaka tvena satya tva pratyakṣasya pratikūla tvena ca para utprekṣitam tarkam api nirākartum āśaṅkate bhedaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.222a–2.2.222a–2.2.222d.2^1	 bhedaḥ viśeṣya dharmyādi grahaṇa apekṣayā yadi anyonya āśraya tā hetoḥ durgāhyaḥ iti yat ādipadena viśeṣaṇa pratiyāginoḥ grahaṇam yadi gṛhyate iti śeṣaḥ tarhi iti ca ayam arthaḥ yadi prapañcaḥ sāṃvṛtaḥ na syāt tadā pratyakṣaḥ api asau na syāt tathā hi aneka meda bhinnaḥ hi prapañcaḥ iṣyate bhedasya ca apratyakṣatāyām saḥ api apratyakṣaḥ eva vinā bhedena tad pratītau= advitīya śūnya pratīti āpatteḥ na ca bheda pratītiḥ upapadyate bhedaḥ hi pratīyamānaḥ ghaṭa paṭau bhinnau= iti ghaṭa paṭayovirśeṣaṇa tayā ghaṭa paṭayoḥ bhedaḥ iti tābhyām viśeṣya tayā vā pratyetavyaḥ bhedaḥ iti eva pratīteḥ abhāvāt yat vā ghaṭāt paṭaḥ bhinnaḥ iti ghaṭāt paṭasya bhedaḥ iti vā ghaṭa pratiyogi tayā paṭa dharmika tayā ca bheda grahaṇam eṣi avyam 
NSu_2.2.222a–2.2.222d.2^2–2.2.222d.3	 tatra ubhayatra api anyonya āśraya tvam viśeṣyayoḥ ghaṭa paṭayoḥ jñāne sati hi tad viśeṣaṇa tayā bhedaḥ jñātavyaḥ na hi devadatta adarśane daṇḍasya tad viśeṣaṇa tayā darśanam yujyate viśeṣya jñānam ca bheda apekṣam na hi bheda apratītau ghaṭa paṭau= iti dvi tva viśiṣṭa artha pratītiḥ sambhavati evam viśeṣya tayā bheda pratītau= api draṣṭavyam tathā dharmi pratiyogi jñāne sati bheda jñānam tad nirūpya tvāt bheda jñāne sati ca dharmi pratiyoginoḥ jñānam na hi bheda agrahe dharmi pratiyogi bhāvaḥ avagantum śakyate tathā tve ghaṭāt ghaṭasya bheda pratītiḥ syāt na ca paraspara āśrayāṇi kāryāṇi sambhavanti atas vāstava tve bhedasya prati iti anupapattau prapañcasya api tad āpatteḥ avicārita ramaṇīyaḥ saṃvṛti bhayaḥ eva ayam aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ iti nirākaroti na iti 
NSu_2.2.222.1–2.2.223a.2	 na tat yat uktam bhedasya durgrāhya tvam tat na asti iti arthaḥ tat katham iti atas āha svarūpam iti svarūpam vastunaḥ bhedaḥ yat yasmāt bhedaḥ vastunaḥ svarūpam tasmāt tasya vastunaḥ grahaṇe sati paścāt bheda grahaḥ iti na asti kintu vastu grahaḥ eva bheda grahaḥ tathā ca kva anyoni a āśraya tvam yena bhedaḥ durgrahaḥ syāt iti 
NSu_2.2.223b.1–2.2.223b.3	 yat na tasya grahe grahaḥ yasmāt vastunaḥ grahe tasya bhedasya āgrahaḥ na asti tasmāt bhedaḥ vastunaḥ svarūpam iti sambandhaḥ ayam atra prayogaḥ vimataḥ bhedaḥ ghaṭa svarūpam bhavitum arhati ghaṭa grahe agṛhyamāṇa tva rahita tvāt ghaṭa svarūpa vat eva iti yadi atra tasya grahe gṛhyamāṇa tvāt iti eva ucyeta tadā ghaṭa paṭau= iti ghaṭa jñānena jñāyamānena paṭena anaikāntika tvam syāt tad arthaṃtasya grahe agrahaḥ na a iti uktam na hi ghaṭa grahe gṛhyamāṇaḥ api paṭaḥ ghaṭa grahe sarvathā gṛhyate eva iti niyamaḥ asti yat jñāne yat sarvathā upalabhyate tad tad svarūpam iti vyāptau= ucyamānāyām daṇḍi jñāne daṇḍaḥ api avaśyam sphurati eva nacāsau daṇḍinaḥ sva rūpam iti atas viśeṣa niṣṭhā eva vyāptiḥ abhidhātavyā 
NSu_2.2.223b.4–2.2.223b.5	 kiñca viśiṣṭam nāma viśeṣaṇa sambandha nimittaḥ viśeṣyasi a ākāra bhedaḥ iti pī na viśiṣṭa pratyaye viśeṣaṇa sphuraṇam asti kinnāma viśeṣaṇa jñānam viśiṣṭa jñāna kāraṇam āśu bhāvāt ca na kramaḥ lakṣyate yat vā ghaṭa bhedau pakṣīkṛtya niyamena anyatara pratītau= anyatarasya sphuraṇena anyonya abhinna tvam sādhyam na hi daṇḍi pratītau daṇḍa sphuraṇe api daṇḍa pratītau sarvathā daṇḍi sphuraṇam asti iti bhavet etat yadi bhedaḥ vastu grahaḥ eva gṛhyeta naca evam kinnāma vastu prati iti uttara kālam eva nirvikalpake ca pratyaye vastu mātram avabhāsate bhedaḥ ta vastu darśana uttara kālam pratiyogi smaraṇe satya vabhāsate yathā sādṛśyam abhāvaḥ ca iti atas āha anyathā iti 
NSu_2.2.223cd.1–2.2.223cd.3	 anyathā asya amunā bhedaḥ iti vaktum na yujyate yadi bhedaḥ vastu pratītau na pratīyeta tadā asya amunā bhedaḥ iti uttara kālam sa vikalpaka jñānam api na jāyeta tathā ca tathā vyavahāraḥ api na syāt asya amunā iti dharmi pratiyogi tayā vastu dvayam uddiśya bhedaḥ jñāyate na ca agṛhīta bhedam tathā uddeṣyum śakyate ekasmin= api tad prasaṅgāt bheda sattā mātreṇa tat upapattiḥ iti ced dūra stha vanaspatya uḥ abheda pratyaya abhāva prasaṅgāt doṣāt tatra tathā iti ced na bhedasya svarūpa sattayā eva upayoge doṣasya akiñcitkara tvāt iti na kevalam vastu darśane bheda sphuraṇam anabhyupagacchataḥ asya amunā bheda iti paścāt kālīnam sa vikalpaka jñānam tathā vyavahāraḥ ca na upapadyate kim tarhi iti atas āha agṛhītaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.224a–2.2.224c.2	 agṛhītaḥ yadā bhedaḥ tadā svasmāt iti grahaḥ syāt yadi ghaṭa darśane api tad bhedaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ tad anantaram smaryamāṇaraḥ gṛhyamāṇaḥ vā pratiyogī paṭaḥ api vinā bhedena upalabdhavyaḥ bheda adarśane ca avaśyam abheda jñānam syāt tathā ca uttara kālam svasmāt svayam bhinnaḥ iti sa vikalpakaḥ bheda grahaḥ syāt iti asu evam iti atas āha pratīti iti 
NSu_2.2.224c.1–2.2.224c.2	 pratīti virodhāt ca caśabdasya uttaratra sambandhaḥ paṭāt ghaṭaḥ bhinnaḥ iti eva hi savikalpikā pratītiḥ anubhūyate na jātu svasmāt svayam bhinnaḥ iti atas pratīti virodhāt evaṃvidhaḥ sa vikalpaka grahaḥ nāṅgīkartum ucitaḥ iti śeṣaḥ kiñca yadi sva svāt svayam bhinnaḥ iti sa vikalpakaḥ bheda grahaḥ syāt tadā kadācid tathāvidhaḥ vāc vyavahāraḥ api syāt na ca evam iti āha na hi iti 
NSu_2.2.224d.1–2.2.224d.3^1	 na hi kaścid tathā vadet etena kimika pratīti virodhaḥ uta sarva pratīti virodhaḥ na ādyaḥ vyabhicārāt na dvitīyaḥ asiddheḥ iti api parāḥ tam kadāpi kasyacid api tathā vyavahāra abhāvena viparīta vyavahāreṇa ca sarva pratīti siddheḥ iti atas vastu pratītau= eva bhedasya sphuraṇāt tad svarūpa tvam eva iti nanu evam bhedasya vastu svarūpa tvena tad pratīti bheda abhāvāt itaretara sā apekṣa tvasya suta rām abhāvāt na anyonya āśraya tvam iti uktam tatra kim bhedaḥ dharmiṇaḥ sva rūpam uta pratiyoginaḥ api na tāvat dvitīyaḥ ekasya eva bhedasya ubhaya svarūpa tve advaita prasaṅgāt ādye tu yadi api dharmi jñāna bheda jñānayoḥ na anyonya āśraya tvam tathā api pratiyogi jñāna apekṣayā anyonya āśraya tvam katham pariharaṇīyam mā evam bhedasya svarūpataḥ jñāne pratiyogi viśeṣa jñāna anapekṣaṇāt pratiyogi svarūpa jñāne ca etad bheda jñāna anapekṣaṇāt 
NSu_2.2.224d.3^2–2.2.224d.4	 astu tarhi viśeṣa jñāne anyonya āśraya tvam tat hi ghaṭāt paṭaḥ bhinnaḥ iti utpadyate tatra dhamirṇaḥ bhedena pratipannasya vā pratiyogitā anyathā vā natāvat dvitīyaḥ svatas api bheda pratīti āpatteḥ ādye pratiyogi svarūpa bheda pratītau dharmiṇaḥ pratiyogitāyām saḥ eva nyāyaḥ tathā ca paṭāt ghaṭasya bheda pratītau ghaṭāt paṭasya bheda pratītiḥ iti anyonya āśraya tvam iti mā evam vastutas anyonya pratiyogikayoḥ ghaṭa paṭa svarūpa bhedayoḥ pratītayoḥ satoḥ asati sādṛśya ādau pratibandhake anyonya pratiyogika tayā viśiṣṭa bheda pratītau bādhaka abhāvāt iti evam sva matena bheda pratītau= anyonya āśraya tvam parihṛtya bhinna bheda vādinām parihāram āha dharmitvā iti 
NSu_2.2.225.1–2.2.225.4	 dharmi tva pratiyogi tva tad bhedāḥ yugapad yadi viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyam ca tad bhāvaḥ ca eva gṛhyate upalakṣaṇam ca etat dharmi pratiyoginau ca iti draṣṭavyam tad bhāvaḥ viśeṣaṇa tvam viśeṣya tvam ca atra viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ anyatara tvāt bhedasya pṛthak grahaṇa abhāvaḥ ayam arthaḥ kim nirvikalpaka pratītau= anyonya āśraya tvam ucyate uta sa vikalpaka pratītau na ādyaḥ tatra dharmi pratiyogi svarūpayoḥ tad bhāvayoḥ tad bhedasya bhedayoḥ vā yugapad ava bhāsanāt tathā viśeṣaṇa bhūtayoḥ ghaṭa paṭayoḥ bhedasya ca tad bhāvayoḥ ca yugapad pratīteḥ yugapad eva sarvasya indriya sannikṛṣṭa tvāt 
NSu_2.2.225.5	 darśana yogya tvāt ca nanu dharmi pratiyoginoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ tad bhāvaḥ aparaḥ bhinna bheda vādibhiḥ na iṣyate tat katham etat mā evam bhūṣaṇa kāra ādibhiḥ tasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt teṣām eva ca ayam parihāraḥ iti nanu yatra pratiyogī paścāt pratīyate tatra yugapad ava bhāsaḥ na asti iti tad dṛṣṭāntena sarvatra api evam anumīyate iti ced na asat nihita vat sannihitasya api ajñāna sādhane pratiti virodhāt yatra pratiyogī na sannihitaḥ tatra api dharmi dharmi tva bhedānām tāvat yugapad pratītiḥ na anupapannāḥ tat idam uktam kaḥ virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.226a.1–2.2.226.2	 kaḥ virodhaḥ dvitīyam nirākaroti svarūpeṇa iti  sva rūpeṇa gṛhītaḥ bhedaḥ eva tu asya amuṣmāt iti punar viśeṣeṇa eva gṛhyate asya amuṣmāt iti upalakṣaṇam anayoḥ bhedaḥ bhinnau= imau= iti api grāhyam nivirkalpaka pratīta arthānām anyonya vaiśiṣyaya mātram sa vikalpaka jñāne avabhāsate na adhikam iti na tatra api itaretara āśraya tvam iti tathā āhuḥ bhinna bheda vādinaḥ ekasyām eva nirvikalpikāyām saṃvidi bhedasya bhedinoḥ ca yugapad ava bhāsane sati tatra ekam bhedinam avadhīkṛtya etasmāt ayam bhinnaḥ iti sa vikalpaka bodha udayāt na vyatirikta bheda pakṣe anyonya āśraya tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.226.3–2.2.227a.3	 nanu kimartha mayam parama topanyāsaḥ bheda pārthakyam antareṇa viśeṣa pratītau= asmākam api ayam eva parihāraḥ iti jñāpana artham tarhi idam eva vākyam tathā vyākhyāyatām na evam śakyam tad bhedaḥ ca iti pṛthak bheda grahaṇa virodhāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvena grahaṇam api na dharmi pratiyogi prakārāt bhidyate iti vaiśeṣika parīkṣāyām uktam atas na atra vyutpādanam api kṛtam iti evam āpādaka anabhyupagamena anyonya āśraya tva prasaṅgam nirākṛtya idānīm dūṣaṇa antaram pratijānīte kiñca iti kiñca anyat ca iti arthaḥ katham iti ced kim atra yadi dharmyādi prati iti apekṣayā bhedaḥ pratīyeta tadā anyonya āśraya tvam syāt iti eva āpādyate kiṃvā yadi bhedaḥ pratīyeta tadā anyonya āśraya tvam syāt iti ādye doṣam āha bhedaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.227.1–2.2.227.3	 bhedaḥ katham grāhyaḥ iti yaḥ paripṛcchati dharmya ādi bheda grahaṇāt tena uktaḥ anyonya saṃśrayaḥ katham iti ākṣepe paripṛcchati iti mṛdu uktiḥ ākṣipati iti yāvat dharmya ādi bheda grahaṇāt dharmya ādi grahaṇa sāpekṣa bheda grahaṇāt katham idam labhyate dharmya ādi padasya tad grahaṇa upalakṣaṇa tvāt ādipadasya ca kāraṇa arthasya aavṛtteḥ tat etat parasparam vyāhatam iti śeṣaḥ tathā hi bhedaḥ durgrahaḥ iti pratijñāya tad upapattaye hi idam ucyate anena ca yadi bhedaḥ dharmyādi pratītim apekṣya pratīyeta tadā anyonya āśraya tvam syāt tathā ca na pratīyeta iti āpādanena pratīyate ca atas na dharmya ādi grahaṇa apekṣā tad pratītiḥ iti labdham bhavet tathā cabhedaḥ durgrahaḥ apratīyate ca a iti etayoḥ katham na pūrva uttara virodhaḥ iti dvitīye pṛcchāmaḥ kim pareṇa kvāpi bhedaḥ na gṛhītaḥ kiṃvā kvacid gṛhītaḥ iti ādyam dūṣayati anyatva iti 
NSu_2.2.228ab.1–2.2.228ab.2	 anyatva agrahaṇe proktaḥ katham anyonya saṃśrayaḥ yadi anya tvam kvāpi na gṛhītam tadā anyonya āśraya tva āpādanam eva na śakyam nirāśraya tvāt tat hi pratītayoḥ dvayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva āśrayaṇe satya āpadyate antatas vādi prativādinoḥ dūṣya dūṣa kayoḥ āpādya āpādakayoḥ bheda agrahe anutthānam eva āpādanasya dvitīyam dūṣayati anya tvam iti 
NSu_2.2.228cd.1–2.2.228cd.3	 anya tvam yadi siddham syāt katham anyonya saṃśrayaḥ siddham pratītam anyonya āśraya tve hi bheda pratītiḥ eva na syāt na hi anyonya āśrayāṇi kāryāṇi kvāpi dṛṣṭāni prakalpyante tathā ca asti ced bheda pratītiḥ nūnam ābhāsa bhūtam eva idam anyonya āśraya tvam apratibandhaka tvāt iti asti bheda pratītiḥ sā na pramā iti tu tātparyam iti ced na kim anyonya āśraya tvam anyonya utpādam pratibadhanāti iti matam kiṃvā tad dharmam ādye katham apramā api bheda pratītiḥ utpadyate na dvitīyaḥ anyayoḥ anyonya āśraya tvam anyat tu lupyate iti asya anyāya tvāt sāṃvṛtī pratipattiḥ iti ced tat kim paṭaḥ sāṃvṛtaḥ iti yebhyaḥ tantubhyaḥ jātaḥ teṣām eva kāraṇam bhaviṣyati iti nanu anena asya tarkasya kim dūṣaṇam uktam syāt iti atas āha etādṛśasya iti 
NSu_2.2.229a–2.2.229c.2	 etādṛśasya vaktārau= ubhau jāti uttara ākarau māyī mādhyamikaḥ ca eva na kevalam etat jāti uttaram kintu yat anyat api tadīyam vacanam tathā hi bhedasya api bheda antara bhedya tve anavasthā iti tathā bhinne bheda niveśaḥ ced tena eva bhedena bhinna tāyām ātma āśraya tvam bheda antara aṅgīkāre tu anavasthā abhinne bheda niveśaḥ ced svataḥ api paṭasya bheda āpattiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.229a–2.2.229c.3	 tathā na tāvat pratyakṣeṇa bhedaḥ eva dṛśyate bhedaḥ iti eva pratīteḥ anubhavāt vastunaḥ api pratītau na tāvat bheda pūrvam vastu pratītiḥ ukta doṣāt na api vastu pratīti pūrvikā bheda pratītiḥ abhedena pratīte bheda pratītau= ati prasakteḥ na ca yugapad bheda pratītim prati vastu pratīteḥ kāraṇa tvena yaugapadya ayogāt na ca prakāra antaram asti iti 
NSu_2.2.229a–2.2.229c.8	 tathā sattāvat kāraṇam vā kāraṇe sattā vā ādye kāraṇasya asattvam dvitīye asataḥ eva kāraṇa tvam ityādi tat sarvam jāti uttaram iti jñāpayitum etādṛśasya iti uktam sarvasya api sva vyāghātaka tvāt bhedasya sattāyāḥ ca svarūpa atiriktayoḥ ayuktayoḥ eva aṅgīkaraṇāt ca katamā iyam jātiḥ iti ced na sāmānya lakṣaṇa sadbhāve asya nirbandhasya vyartha tvāt ahetu prasaṅga nitya samāsu antarbhāvāt ca māyā śabdasya vrīhi ādi tvāt māyi iti sādhuḥ śūnya vādi nirāsena māyā vādaḥ api nirastaḥ veditavyaḥ iti atideśa jñāpanāya māyī ca iti uktam eva śabdasya uttaratrata sambandhaḥ nanu etat anyonya āśraya tva ādikam sūtra kṛtā eva kutas na nirākṛtam iti atas āha tat iti 
NSu_2.2.229d.1–2.2.229d.3	 tad upekṣyau bubhūṣubhiḥ tasmāt jāti uttara ākara tvāt upekṣyau= eva na tu parihārāya prativādīkartavyau etat uktam bhavati sa dalam eva pūrva pakṣi vacanam nirākartavyam bhavati na nirdalam anyathā ati prasaṅgāt etat ca jāti uttara tvena nirdalam iti upekṣitam sūtra kṛtā asmābhiḥ tu śiṣya vyutpādanāya nirākṛtam iti syāt etat śūnyāvādī śūnyam jagat kāraṇam manyate māyā vādī tu brahma tat katham na asataḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt ityādi śūnyavāda nirāsāya māyā vāde ati deśaḥ mata vaiṣamye ati deśa asambhavāt iti ataḥ āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.230ab.1–2.2.230cd.3	 yat śūnya vādinaḥ śūnyam tat eva brahma māyinaḥ tasmāt atideśaḥ yuktaḥ iti śeṣaḥ tat katham iti atas āha na hi iti na hi lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ asti nirviśeṣa tvataḥ tayoḥ lakṣaṇa bhedena hi vipratipannaḥ bhedaḥ bodhanīyaḥ na asau śūnya brahmaṇoḥ sambhavati dvayoḥ api nirviśeṣa tva aṅgīkārāt nanu nirviśeṣa tvena bāhya lakṣaṇa bheda abhāve api satya jñāna ananta ānanda ātmaka tvam brahmaṇaḥ sva lakṣaṇam māyā vādinā aṅgīkṛtam na śūnyasya śūnya vādinā tena brahma śūnyayoḥ bhedaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha anṛta ādi iti 
NSu_2.2.231ab.1–2.2.231ab.2	 anṛta ādi virodhi tvam ubhayoḥ ca sva lakṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ satya jñāna ādi ātmaka tvam nāma anṛta jaḍa ādi virodhi tvam eva abhimatam māyā vādinaḥ anyasya asambhavāt anṛta jaḍa virodhi rūpam anta traya mala bandhana duḥkha tā aviruddham a iti tat vyākhyānāt ca anṛta ādi virodhi tvam ca śūnya vādī śūnyasya api manyate jāḍya saṃvṛti duḥkha antapūvardeṣa virodhi yat a iti vacanāt tatas na etat api bhedakam iti yuktaḥ eva ati deśaḥ 
NSu_2.2.231ab.3–2.2.231cd.1	 syāt etat prapañca mithyātvā anumāna nirāsa artham vaidharmyāt ca na svapna ādi vat iti sūtram tatra yad bhrānteḥ saṃvṛvisatyasya a iti dūṣaṇam uktam tat eva vaidharmyāt iti sūtre pratīyate yat punaruktam dṛśya tvasya satya tve tatra eva vyabhicāra prasaṅgāt tasya mithyātvam vācyam tathā ācāsādhaka tvam iti tad sūtre na dṛśyate tat katham eta t vaya ākhyānam iti atas āha sva vākya iti sva vākya abhāva saṃvādāt na kṛtyam prativādinaḥ 
NSu_2.2.232a–2.2.232c.3	 tad pakṣaḥ iti vaidharmyāt na svapna ādi vat ityajaḥ aprayatnāt nirācakre atra vākyam iti hetu vākya arthaḥ dṛśya tvam lakṣyate tad pakṣaḥ iti viṣaya saptamī tad mithyā tva sādhana viṣayaḥ iti yāvat iti śabdaḥ hetau aprayatnāt prayatnam avidhāya vaidharmyāt ca na svapna ādivat a iti anena nirācakraḥ iti sambandhaḥ etat uktam bhavati dṛśya tvasya mithyātvam śūnya vādinā eva abhyupagatam mithyābhūtasya asādhaka tvam su prasiddham eva atas etat viṣaye sat vādinaḥ kim api kṛtyam na asti eva sphuṭa dūṇa vyutpādane sūtra tva vyāghātāt tasmāt etad dūṣaṇa vyutpādane sūtra kṛtā prayatnaḥ na vihitaḥ asmābhiḥ tu tad abhiprāyaḥ sphuṭīkṛtaḥ iti tathā apisattvam ca asya anubhūṣitaḥ a iti yad prapañca mithyātvasya pratyakṣa viruddha tvam uktam yat ca mithyātve mā na kācana a iti niṣpramāṇa tvam tat ubhayam sūtre na dṛśyate iti atas āha ca iti 
NSu_2.2.232d–2.2.232f.4	 ca iti dṛṣṭi viruddha tām niṣpramāṇa tvam api asya sūcayāmāsa viśvakṛt asya mithyātvasya nanu anukta samuccaya arthena caśabdena idam dūṣaṇa dvayam sūcitam iti yathā vyākhyāyate tathā tat api ca aśabda artha tayā vyākhyāyatām kim anukta tva aṅgīkāreṇa mā evam na kṛtyam prativādinaḥ a iti uktvāt sūtre hetu viśeṣasya anupādānāt niṣpramāṇaka tvam jñāpitam iti aḥ tu kim ca aśabdasya ubhaya sūcaka tva grahaṇena na sati śabde sa avakāśa jñāpaka ādaraṇa anupapatteḥ svapna ādi vat iti sūtram svapna vat iti vyākhyātam kaḥ atra abhiprāyaḥ ucyate bahu sthaleṣu gṛhītā iyam vyāptiḥ iti atas na vyabhicāram arhati iti pūrva pakṣiṇaḥ abhimānam sūcayitum sūtrakāreṇa ādi padam prayuktam tathā api prayoga velāyām ekaḥ eva dṛṣṭānte upādeyaḥ anyathā adhikyam prasajyeta iti yathā aha hetu udāharaṇa ādikam adhikam iti etat jñāpanāya bhāṣya kāreṇa svapna vat iti eva uktam iti sarvam sustham na bhāvaḥ anupalabdheḥ atra yoga ācārāṇām matam apākriyate tad artham tat upanyasyati jñānam eva iti na bhāvaḥ anupalabdheḥ 
NSu_2.2.233ab.1–2.2.233ab.3	 jñānam eva ekam akhila jñeya ākāram prabhāsate vijñānam eva tattvam na rūpa ādayaḥ catvāraḥ skandhāḥ iti yoga ācārāḥ manyante iti atharḥ vijñāna aṅgīkāre api viśeṣam āha ekam iti advitīyam iti arthaḥ nanu jñeyam api rūpa ādikam pratyakṣa ādi siddham tat katham vijñānam eva tattvam iti atas āha akhila iti jñānam eva jñeya kāram na jñeyam nāma jñānāt bhinnam asti iti arthaḥ kutas jñeyasya jñāna ātmaka tvam iti atas āha prabhāsate iti jñānam hi prakāśate tena prakāśamāna tvasya jñāna tvena vyāptau siddhāyām nīla ādeḥ api prakāśamānasya jñāna tvam siddham iti arthaḥ yat vā prabhāsate nīla ādinā saha eva iti śeṣaḥ tena saha upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tat hiyoḥ a iti uktam bhavati nanu ayuktaḥ jñāna jñeyayoḥ abhedaḥ bhedasya pratibhāsanāt ekam iti ca ayuktam vijñāna santatīnām bhedasya ekaikasya api santatau vijñāna bhedasya ca vidyamāna tvāt kiñca āstām anyaḥ bhedaḥ bheda abhāvaḥ tāvat abhyupagamyate tena eva vijñānasya sa dvitīya tva aprāpteḥ na ekatvam upapadyate iti atas āha tatra iti 
NSu_2.2.233c–2.2.233f.3	 tatra santati bhedaḥ ca sva bhedaḥ bhedaḥ eva ca kalpitāḥ pratibhāsante nānā saṃvṛti bhūmiṣu tatra jñāna jñeyayoḥ bhedaḥ iti sambandhaḥ santati bhedaḥ santatīnām parasparam bhedaḥ sva bhedaḥ ekaikasyām api santatau pūrva uttara jñāna bhedaḥ kalpitāḥ eva iti sambandhaḥ nānā saṃvṛti bhūmiṣu aneka ajñāna sthāneṣu antaḥkaraṇeṣu yat vā nānā saṃvṛti kāraṇakāsu vāsanāsu iti nimitta saptamī tad uktambhedaḥ tu bhranti buddhayā eva dṛśyeta indau= iva advayaḥ a iti evam anūditam matam apākaroti iti etat api iti 
NSu_2.2.234a.1–2.2.234a.4	 iti etat api naḥ yuktam pūrva mata samuccaya arthaḥ api śabdaḥ anena na bhāve a iti sūtra aṃśaḥ vyākhyātaḥ jagat bhāvaḥ jñānam na bhavati iti arthaḥ bhavateḥ anubhava artha tvāt upasargāḥ hi dhātulīnā asya arthasya vyañjakāḥ eva kutas na yuktam iti ced kim jñeyam sva rūpeṇa asat eva vijñāne samāropitam vijñāna ātmakam ucyate kim vā paramārtha satas eva jñeyasya jagataḥ vijñāna ātmaka tvam bheda mātram tu asat iti ādyaḥ tu atīta adhikaraṇa rītyā nirastaḥ na dvitīyaḥ jagataḥ jñāna abhede pramāṇa abhāvāt na tāvat tatra pratyakṣam asti iti āha na hi iti 
NSu_2.2.234bc.1–2.2.235a.2	 na hi jñāna tayā jagat bhāsate anena anupalabdheḥ iti etat vaya ākhyātam bhavati mā bhūt pratyakṣeṇa jñāna arthayoḥ abheda siddhiḥ prakāśamāna tva ādi anumānena tu bhaviṣyati iti atas āha anubhavasya eva iti  anubhavasya eva viruddha tvāt apeśalam tat matam sambandha mātre ṣaṣṭhī eva śabdena anubhavasya anumānataḥ prābalyam sūcayati tat matam tat abhimatam anumānam iti śeṣaḥ jñāna jñeyayoḥ aikyam iti vā jñāna jñeyayoḥ sphuṭam bhedasya eva sākṣi siddha tvāt kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvam anumānasya iti arthaḥ anena anupalabdheḥ iti etat upalabdhi virodhāt iti ca vyākhyātam 
NSu_2.2.235a.3–2.2.235a.5	 nanu bheda grāhakam pratyakṣam bhrāntam iti ced na bādhaka abhāvāt anumānam bādhakam iti tu na vācyam pratyakṣasya anumānataḥ balavat tvāt anyathā kāla atīta tā uccheda prasaṅgāt pratyakṣasya bhrānta tve anumāna prāmāṇyam tasmin= ca pratyakṣasya bhrānta tvam iti anyonya āśraya tvāt ca iti anumāna virodham ca anumānasya pratipādayitum sūtram kṣaṇika tvāt ca iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe kṣaṇika tvāt ca iti kṣaṇika tvāt ca 
NSu_2.2.235a–2.2.235c.4	 kṣaṇika tvāt ca jñānasya sthira rūpataḥ jñeyasya ukta prakāreṇa āśutara vināśi tvāt iti arthaḥ na ca jñānasya kṣaṇika tvam bhrāntam abādhita pratyaya siddha tvāt sthira rūpataḥ āśutara vināśitā rahita tvataḥ anusmṛteḥ ca ityādi ukta prakāreṇa atra kṣaṇika tva akṣaṇika tva lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma adhyāsam bheda hetum vadatā a ntara bāhya tva ādiḥ anekaḥ viruddha dharma saṃsargaḥ upalakṣitaḥ boddhavyaḥ evam pratyekam nirākṛtāni bauddha matāni sādhāraṇa doṣeṇa dūṣayitum sūtram sa vartha anupapatteḥ ca iti tat vayā ākhyāti sarva iti sarvathā anupapatteḥ ca 
NSu_2.2.235d–2.2.235f.4	 sarva śruti virodhataḥ anubhūti viruddha tvāt api pakṣāḥ ime aśivāḥ śruti prāmāṇyasya samarthita tvāt avaidikam pratyapi śruti virodha kathanam yuktam eva abhyupagata śruti prāmāṇyam prati vā teṣām pakṣāṇām aśiva tvam anena jñāpyate iti nanu anubhūti virodhaḥ prāk uktaḥ eva punar kasmāt ucyate upasaṃhāra artham iti adoṣaḥ yat vā tadīya prameya antare api iti na ekasmin= asambhavāt jaina matam atra nirākriyate nirākārya aṃśa jñāpanāya tat upanyasyati āha iti na ekasmin asaṃbhavāt 
NSu_2.2.236.1–2.2.236.2	 āha kṣapaṇakaḥ viśvam sat asat dvayamadvayam dvayāt vayam atat sarvam sapta bhaṅgi sadātanam dvividham tāvat viśvam jīvā jīva ātmakam nirīśvaram tat punar ṣaṣ dravya ātmakam tāni ca dravyāṇi jīva dharma adhamar pudgala kāla ākāśa nāmāni tatra jīvāḥ trividhāḥ baddhāḥ yoga siddhāḥ muktāḥ ca iti dharmaḥ gati hetuḥ jagat vayāpī adharmaḥ sthiti hetuḥ vyāpakaḥ eva pudgalaḥ rūpa rasa gandha sparśa vat dravyam tat dvividham paramāṇu rūpam saṅghāta rūpam ca kālaḥ abhūt bhavati bhaviṣyati iti vyavahāra hetuḥ api aṇu rūpaḥ ākāśaḥ ekaḥ ananta pradeśaḥ ca sa dvividhaḥ loka ākāśaḥ aloka ākāśaḥ ca iti teṣu aṇu vyatiriktāni astikāya śabdāni aneka deśa vartini dravye astikāya śabda vṛtteḥ te ca jīva astikāyaḥ dharma astikāyaḥ adharma astikāyaḥ pudgala āstikāya ākāśa astikāyaḥ iti pañca 
NSu_2.2.236.3	 atra ca mokṣa upayoginaḥ sapta padārthāḥ jīvā jīva āsrava bandha nirjara saṃvara mokṣāḥ jīvaḥ jñāna darśana sukha vīrya guṇaḥ ajīvaḥ jīva upabhogyam vastu jātam asravaḥ tad bhoga upakaraṇam indriya ādikam bandhaḥ dvividhaḥ ghātikā ghātika catuṣyaya bhedāt ādyam jīva guṇānām jñāna ādīnām pratibandhakam dvitīyam śarīra saṃsthāna tad abhimāna tad sthiti tad prayukta sukha duḥkha hetu bhūtam nirjaraḥ mokṣa sādhanam tapaḥ saṃvaraḥ indriya nigrahaḥ mokṣaḥ svābhāvika ātma svarūpa āvirbhāvaḥ mokṣa grahaṇena eva mokṣa mārgaḥ api saṅgṛhītaḥ sa ca samyak jñāna samyak darśana samyak cāri tryākhya ratna traya ātmakaḥ 
NSu_2.2.236.4–2.2.236.5	 tat etat viśvam sapta bhaṅgi pratyekam sapta prakārakam āha kṣapaṇakaḥ katham sat iti eka prakāraḥ asat iti dvitīyaḥ dvayam sat asat ātmakam iti tṛtīyaḥ advayam avaktavyam iti caturthaḥ dvayāt vayam iti pañcama ṣaṣṭhau tatra sat avaktavyam ca iti pañcamaḥ asat avaktavyam ca iti ṣaṣṭhaḥ atat sarvam iti saptamaḥ sarvam iti sat asat ātmakam atat iti avaktavyam atra sapta bhaṅgi tva nirāsa artham na ekasmin= asambhavāt iti sūtram vyācaṣṭe na etat iti 
NSu_2.2.237ab.1–2.2.237ab.3	 na etat padārthaḥ ekasmin yuktam dṛṣṭi virodhataḥ etat sapta prakāra tvam kutas asambhavāt saḥ api katham dṛṣṭi virodhataḥ sarvam hi sva upādhau sat para upādhā= asat sva rūpeṇa bhāvaḥ anya ātma tva ādinā bhāvaḥ dravya rūpeṇa nityam avasthā bhedena anityam svarūpa ādinā bhinnam sva guṇa ādinā bhinna abhinnam iti eva pratīyate na atas anyena prakāreṇa atas vyavasthayā niyama grāhaka pratyakṣa ādi virodhena asambhavāt ayuktam eva anekāntam atam iti nanu ekānta darśanasya mithyā dṛṣṭi tvena na tad virodhaḥ asambhavam āhavati iti atas āha bhāva iti 
NSu_2.2.237c–2.2.237f.3	 bhāva abhāva tayā viśvam yena rūpeṇa mīyate tad rūpam eva tat iti niyamaḥ kena vāryate yena rūpeṇa iti asya eva vivaraṇam bhāva abhāvatayā iti tat ca vyavasthita sada sattva ādi upalakṣaṇam boddhavyam yat vā bhāva abhāvatayā anyena ca yena sattva ādi rūpeṇa iti yojanāḥ athavā yena bhāva abhāva tayā rūpeṇa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena yojyam yadi vā bhāva abhāvatayā iti asya viśeṣaṇam etat yena vyavasthitena rūpeṇa iti kena pramāṇena iti ākṣepaḥ bhavet etat niyama darśanasya mithyā dṛṣṭi tvam yadi dṛṣṭasya niyamasya nivārakam anekānta sādhakam prabala pramāṇam syāt na ca etat asti na ca bādhakena vinā pratyayānām mithyātvam kalpayitum yuktam atiprasaṅgāt iti niyamasya bādhakam āśaṅkate tat tat iti 
NSu_2.2.238a–2.2.238c.2	 tad tad doṣa nivṛtti artham svīkṛtā tad tad ātmanā yadi sat vādinaḥ hi sattvam viśvasya pramāṇaiḥ prātiṣṭhipaḥ tad anaṅgīkāre doṣān= ca nyarūpayan evam asat vādinaḥ api asattva sthāpanam tad anaṅgīkāre dūṣaṇam ca vyutpāditavantaḥ tathā anye api sva pakṣa sādhanam tad anabhyupagame bādhanam ca kṛtavantaḥ tathā ca yadi satvam na aṅgīkriyate tadā tu tad upanyastam pramāṇam uparudhyeta dūṣaṇam ca anuṣajyeta evam asattva ādi anaṅgīkāre api atas tad doṣa parihāra artham tad tad pramāṇa anusaraṇa artham ca tat tad ātmatā viśvasya mayā svīkṛtā tathā ca anekānte prabala pramāṇa sadbhāvāt katham niyame bādhaka abhāvaḥ iti pariharati taiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.238cd.1–2.2.238cd.3^1	 taiḥ akhilaiḥ deṣaiḥ lipyate cala darśanaḥ tarhi iti śeṣaḥ idam atra vaktavyam sat vādi mata anusaraṇa samaye asattva ādi bhaṅgī raṅgīkaroṣi na vā iti evam asadvādi caraṇa śaraṇa praveśa velāyām sattva ādi prakāra an ūrī karoṣi vā na vā iti evam anyeṣu api pakṣeṣu vikalpaḥ yadi ādyaḥ tadā asau acala darśanaḥ sadā sakala pakṣa aṅgīkāravān taiḥ deṣaiḥ akhilaiḥ lipyate tathā hi sat vādinaḥ hi na kevalam sattve pramāṇam tad anaṅgīkāre ca dūṣaṇam ca vyutpādya nivṛttāḥ kintva sattva ādi pakṣeṣu doṣān api vyutpāditavantaḥ evam asat vādinaḥ api na asattve pramāṇam tad anabhyupagame bādhakam ca abhidhāya eva uparatā kinnāma sattva ādi pakṣeṣu doṣān api upapāditavantaḥ evam anye api tathā ca sakala pakṣa kakṣīkāre tad tad vādī ukta pakṣa antara doṣa lepaḥ katham na syāt atha manyase na te doṣāḥ kintvā ābhāsāḥ te ca na anekānta vādam bādhantaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.238cd.3^2	 tadā katham tāni pramāṇāni anaṅgīkāre doṣāḥ ca na ābhāsāḥ yena anusaraṇīyāḥ tasamttad tad vādi vyutpādita pramāṇa ādi anusāreṇa sapta bhaṅgī raṅgīkurvāṇena tad ukta vipakṣa doṣa anusāreṇa tad parityāgaḥ api kāryaḥ syāt tathā ca aṅgīkāra parityāgābhyām ubhayatas ākṛṣṭaḥ ayam kaṣṭām daśām āviṣyaḥ syāt nanu ekāntaḥ dvedhā kramākrama bhedāt tatra kramān ekānte tāvat na aṅgīkāra parityāgau viruddhau akramān ekānte api yena rūpeṇa nitya tvam tena eva anitya tvam iti ādi anaṅgīkārāt na virodhaḥ tathā ca sapta bhaṅgayaṅgīkāriṇā mayā tāni pramāṇāni dūṣaṇāni ca vyavasthāpitāni bhavanti iti na ukta doṣaḥ mā evam tad tad pramāṇa ādīnām vyavasthānarha tvāt na khalu tad tad vādibhiḥ tāni tāni pramāṇa ādīni sa avakāśāni upanyastāni tasmāt sarveṣu api vādeṣu parama āstikasya kathitā eva gatiḥ 
NSu_2.2.238cd.4–2.2.238cd.7	 api ca evam api sapta bhaṅgayaṅgīkāraḥ nirmūlaḥ eva na hi evaṃvādinaḥ vādinaḥ prasiddhāḥ sambhāvanayā tad aṅgīkāre ca na sapta tva pariniṣṭhā sambhāvana avakāśasya niḥsīma tvāt kiñca sarva aṅgīkāra pakṣe syāt asti ca na asti ca iti pakṣāt syāt asti syāt na asti iti pakṣa dvayam na bhidyate dvitīya pakṣe tu cala darśanaḥ iti eva dūṣaṇam apasiddhāntī syāt iti tat evam sapta bhaṅgayaṅgīkāraḥ pramāṇa viruddhaḥ aprāmāṇikaḥ ca iti uktam akhilaiḥ deṣaiḥ lipyate iti anena paraspara vyāhatiḥ ca iti api sūcitam evambhūtasya api sapta bhaṅgi nayasya svīkāre ati prasaṅgam ca āha ati hāya iti 
NSu_2.2.239.1–2.2.240.2	 atihāya pramāṇa āptam niyamam sat asat tayā aśeṣam āviruddham ca nirmānam vyāhatam sadā sarva prakāram vadataḥ dṛṣṭa hāniḥ amagrahaḥ sva vyāhata tvam iti ādyāḥ doṣāḥ sarve bhavanti hi aśeṣam āviruddham vadate iti asya upapādanam vyavasthitayā sat asat tayā pramāṇa āpta niyamam ati hāya iti sarve prakārāḥ yasya viśvasya tat tathā uktam tatas ca asau prakāraḥ ca iti vā nanu kramān ekānte tāvat kāla bhedena na vyāghātaḥ akramān ekānte api rūpa bhedena iti atas uktam sadā sarva prakāram vadate iti sadā iti rūpa abhedasya api upalakṣaṇam 
NSu_2.2.240.3	 ayam āśayaḥ yadi krameṇa vā rūpa bhedena vāneprakāra tvam tadā na ayam anekānta vādaḥ samarthanīyaḥ sarvaiḥ api vādibhiḥ aṅgīkṛta tvāt na hi kaḥ api vādī padārthānām kālataḥ rūpataḥ ca avasthā vaicitryam anaṅgīkurvāṇaḥ asti yam pratyanekāntavāda avatāraḥ saṅgaccheta kevalam kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ vā atyanta sat kārya vādaḥ vā avasthau= atoḥ atyanta bhedaḥ vāpākaraṇīyaḥ atas anekānta vādam avatārayatā kṣapaṇakena sadā rūpa abhedena eva ca sarva prakāra tvam iti eva vaktavyam tathā ca na vyāghāta nistāraḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.240.4^1	 aśeṣam āviruddham sadā sarva prakāra tvam vadataḥ dṛṣṭa hāniḥ syāt nirmāna ca sadā sarva prakāram vadataḥ amagrahaḥ aprāmāṇika svīkāraḥ syāt vyāhatam sadā sarva prakāram vadataḥ sva vyāhata tvam syāt iti yojanāḥ dṛṣṭa hāna ādi anuṣaṅgi doṣa antara saṅgraha artham ityādyāḥ iti uktam hi śabdaḥ sarvatra prasaṅga hetu sūcana arthaḥ ayam arthaḥ yadi pramāṇa viruddham api sarva prakāra tvam viśvasya svīkriyate tadā dahana śaityam vā gavā ālambhana ādeḥ dharma sādhana tva ādikam vā aṅgīkāryam syāt pramāṇa virodhena pratipakṣa nirākaraṇam ca na syāt kintu pratyabhijñā ādi viruddham api kṣaṇika tva ādi kam aṅgīkartavyam syāt aviśeṣāt 
NSu_2.2.240.4^2–2.2.240.5	 yadi ca aprāmāṇikam api sarva prakāra tvam urarīkriyate tadā khara viṣāṇa ādikam vā go māṃsa ādi bhakṣaṇasya dharma sādhana tvam corarīkaraṇīyam syāt pramāṇa abhāvena para mata nirāsaḥ api na kāryaḥ syāt tat abhyupagamanīyam eva bhavet aviśeṣāt tathā ca dūṣya upādeya hīnasya śāstra nirmāṇam api na syāt yadi ca vyāhatam api sarva prakāra tvam aṅgīkuryāt tadā mātuḥ api vandhya tvam jina upadeśasya pramāṇa tayā abhyupagatasya api aprāmāṇyam baddhasya api mukta tvam muktasya api baddha tvam siddhasya api rāgi tvam śvapacasya api siddha tvam ityādi sarvam api aṅgīkāryam syāt anyathā anekānta bhaṅga prasaṅgāt evaṃca na śāstra praṇayana prayāsaḥ kāryaḥ matta unmatta ādibhiḥ eva asya kṛta tvāt iti evam viśvasya kṣapaṇaka uktam sarva prakāra tvam nirākṛtya tat uktam artha antaram api nirākartum anuvadati vakti iti 
NSu_2.2.241ab.1–2.2.241ab.5^1	 vakti sva prabham ātmānam deha mānam kṣapaṇakaḥ iti vartate sva prabham sva prakāśam dehasya mānam parimāṇam iva mānam yasya asau tathā uktaḥ atra deha māna tvam eva vipratipannaḥ arthaḥ sva prabha tvam tu sammatam eva asmākam yat vā sva prabham iti kriyā viśeṣaṇam vinā pramāṇena svīyayā prabhayā utprekṣya eva vakti iti athavā anena deha parimāṇa tve jaina uktam pramāṇa abhāva sam anuvadati tatra sva śabdena svīyaḥ dehaḥ ucyate tatra prabhā yasya asau tathā uktaḥ tathā ca prayogaḥ devadatta ātmā tad dehaḥ eva tatra sarvatra eva ca vidyate tatra eva tatra sarvatra eva ca svāsādhāraṇa guṇa ādhāra tayā upalambhāt 
NSu_2.2.241ab.1–2.2.241ab.5^2	 yaḥ yatra eva yatra savartrā eva svāsādhāraṇa guṇa ādhāratayā upalabhyate sa tatra eva tatra sarvatra ca vidyate yathā devadatta gṛhaḥ eva tatra sarvatra eva ca upalabhyamāna svāsādhāraṇa bhāsvara tva ādi guṇaḥ pradīpaḥ tathā āca ayam tasmāt tathā iti anyathā kamanīya tanaya āliṅganena sarvatra āhlāda karasya sukhasya ananubhava prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca sarva aṅgīṇa romāñca ādi kāryān udayaḥ syāt iti yat vā pradīpasya iva sva anapāyinī prabhā yasya asau sva prabhaḥ iti atra ātmanaḥ kāya parimāṇa tva nirāsa artham sūtram evañca ātmākāt snaryam iti tasya tātparyam āha tat api iti evam ca ātmā ākārtsnyam na ca paryāyāt api avirodhaḥ vikāra ādibhyaḥ 
NSu_2.2.241b–2.2.241d.2	 tat api alam duṣyam nānā śarīreṣu praveśāt anyathā abhavāt kutas akāt snarya ādi prasaṅgāt iti śeṣaḥ pipīlika ādi deha sthasya tad parimāṇasya ātmanaḥ karma vipāka vaśāt gaja gavaya ādi deha prāptau tatra akāt snaryam syāt gaja ādi deha gatasya ca tad parimāṇasya pipīlikā ādi dehe atirekaḥ syāt iti ubhayathā kāya parimāṇa tva anupapattiḥ eva iti etad artha tvena ca nānā śarīreṣu iti vākyam yojyam tatra anyathā abhāvāt iti kāya parimāṇa tva abhāva āpatteḥ iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.241b–2.2.242c.2	 syāt etat yam yam deham prāpnoti ātmā tad tad parimāṇaḥ bhavati atas na ukta doṣa iti āśaṅkā nirāsa artham sūtram na ca paryāyāt api avirodhaḥ vikāra ādibhyaḥ iti tasya tātparyam āha tat api alam iti citta stham parimāṇa paryāyam tat śabdena parāmṛśati nānā śarīreṣu praveśāt anyathā bhāvāt a iti sthūla sūkṣma śarīreṣu praveśāt sthūla sūkṣma parimāṇa upajane sati parimāṇa tadvatoḥ atyanta bheda anabhyupagamāt ātmanaḥ eva anyathā bhāva prasaṅgāt iti arthaḥ astu ātmanaḥ eva anyathā bhāvāḥ tatas kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha anyathā iti anyathā bhāvi yat vastu tat anityam iti sthitiḥ tad mate sthitiḥ vyāptiḥ tat mata jaina darśane aṅgīkṛtā iti śeṣaḥ tatas api kim iti atas āha tat iti  tad anitya tvam yatas evam vyāptiḥ yatas ca anyathā bhāvi tvam aṅgīkṛtam tat tasmāt ātmanaḥ anitya tvam āpatati iti śeṣaḥ atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ pudgala iti 
NSu_2.2.242d.1–2.2.242d.3	 pudgalasya anivāritam iva śabdaḥ adhyāhāryaḥ pudgalasya dehasya iva iti yat vā pudgala śabdaḥ jarat jā enaiḥ ātma vāci tvena svīkṛtaḥ iti atra ātma vācī yadi vā sva matena ayam ātmani prayuktaḥ yathā ahuḥ pudgalaḥ nirayayam giran a iti nanu avasthā paryāya rūpeṇa ātmanaḥ api anitya tvam aṅgīkriyate eva tat katham anitya tva āpādanam iti atas vā pudgalasya dehasya iva iti uktam yathā dehasya deha ākāra nāma parityāgena bhasmībhāva lakṣaṇa anitya tvam tathāvidha mātamnaḥ api āpādyate iti nanu anyathā bhāvasya evam vidha anitya tvena vyāptiḥ na asti paramāṇu ādau vyabhicārāt tat katham āpādanam mā evam parimāṇa vyatyaya lakṣaṇasya anyathā bhāvasya evaṃvidhā anitya tva vyāpta tvena deha ādau dṛṣṭa tayā tadvataḥ api ātmanaḥ tathāvidha anitya tvasya nivārayitum aśakyatvāt tat idam uktam anivāritam iti nanu asmad mata vat bhavat mate api ātmanaḥ anyathā abhāvaḥ asti eva sukha duḥkhābhyām ucca nīca tva abhyupagamāt anyathā bhāvinaḥ ca deha ādeḥ anityatā upalabdhā tasmāt bhavat mate api ātmanaḥ anitya tā durvāra iti atas āha na iti 
NSu_2.2.243.1–2.2.243.2	 na anitya tā asmad pakṣe tu caitanya ādeḥ viśeṣiṇaḥ lakṣaṇasya nivṛttau tu syāt na tad cetane kvacid anyathā abhāvavataḥ api ātmanaḥ prasajyate iti śeṣaḥ tat katham iti atas āha caitanya ādeḥ iti asmat mataḥ iti vartate anitya tā iti ca tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe asmad mate caitanya ādeḥ lakṣaṇasya nivṛttau= eva viśeṣiṇaḥ lakṣaṇavataḥ arthasya anitya tā syāt na tu jainānām iva anyathā bhāva mātreṇa etat uktam bhavati yasya vastunaḥ yat lakṣaṇam tat nivṛtti rūpaḥ anyathā bhāvaḥ eva tad anitya tā nibandhanam na anyathābhāva mātram iti evam tarhi śabda ādi lakṣaṇa abhāvāt gagana ādīnām mahāpralaye vināśaḥ syāt ceṣi āśraya tva abhāvāt śarīrasya supti ādau vilayaḥ bhavet iti atas uktam viśeṣiṇaḥ lakṣaṇasya iti viśeṣavataḥ lakṣaṇasya na tu lakṣaṇa mātrasya iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.243.3–2.2.243.4	 kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha na iti tat iti sāmānyena vākya artham parāmṛśati anitya tva kāraṇa tvena uktam viśeṣiṇaḥ lakṣaṇasya nivartanam cetane kvacid api na syāt atas tasya anityatā api na syāt yat vā tat iti lakṣaṇa parāma śarḥ cetane vartamānam kvacid na nivartate iti śeṣaḥ viśeṣiṇaḥ lakṣaṇasya nivṛttau lakṣasya anitya tā syāt iti uktam tad viśadayati otā iti 
NSu_2.2.244.1–2.2.244.3	 ota prota ātmaka tvam tu paṭe dehe aṅga saṃsthitiḥ ityādi lakṣaṇasya eva nivṛttau syāt anitya tā ota prota ātmaka tvam nāma tantūnām saṃyoga viśeṣaḥ paṭe lakṣaṇam iti śeṣaḥ aṅga saṃsthitiḥ kara caraṇa ādi aṅgānām sanniveśa viśeṣaḥ ādi śabdaḥ prakāra vacanaḥ anitya tā lakṣyasya iti śeṣaḥ yāvat lakṣya bhāvinām lakṣaṇānām nivṛttiḥ eva lakṣya anitya tva nimittam tādṛśam ca ātmanaḥ caitanyam tat ca kadāpi na nivartate iti katham tasya vināśa prasaṅgaḥ iti yat uktam ātmā sva prabhaḥ iti tat api asat sva prabhāvataḥ pradīpa ādeḥ iva rūpa sparśa āpatteḥ rūpa ādima tvāt ca vināśi tvā āpatteḥ yat rūpa ādimattada nitya tvam iti pareṇa eva vyāpteḥ aṅgīkṛta tvāt iti nanu siddhānte api ātmanaḥ rūpa ādimat tvam aṅgīkriyate eva rūpa ādimataḥ anitya tvam iti vyāptiḥ ca rūpa ādimat tvāt ca viparyayaḥ darśanāt a iti ukta tvāt tat katham anitya tva parihāraḥ iti atas āha bhautikam tu iti 
NSu_2.2.245ab.1–2.2.245ab.3	 bhautikam tu eva rūpa ādi vyāptam nāśena naḥ mate tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa arthaḥ saḥ eva bhautikam iti vivṛtaḥ na rūpa ādi mātram iti eva arthaḥ na ca bhautikam rūpa ādikam ātmani asti tasmāt na anitya tā prasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ yathā bhavadbhiḥ anyathā bhāvaḥ viśeṣyate yāvat lakṣya bhāvi lakṣaṇa vyāvṛtti rūpaḥ anyathā abhāvaḥ anitya tva vyāptaḥ iti rūpa ādimat tvam ca bhautika tvena tathā asmad mate api viśeṣaṇa prakṣepe na ukta doṣaḥ iti atas āha na evam iti 
NSu_2.2.245c.1–2.2.246ab.3	 na evam tasya tasya kṣapaṇakasya mate na evam anyathā bhāvaḥ rūpa ādimat tvam ca viśeṣyate kintu sāmānyam eva anitya tva vyāpta tayā aṅgīkriyate tatas na ukta doṣa parihāraḥ iti arthaḥ tat katham iti atas āha anyathā iti  anyathā bhāvaḥ yasya anitya tvam īritam rūpa ādi yuktasya tathā jagat nāśi tva siddhaye bhū bhūdharā dejargataḥ nāśi tva siddhaye yasya anyathā bhāvaḥ tasya anitya tvam īritam kṣapaṇakena tathā śabdaḥ samuccaye rūpa ādi yuktasya api anitya tvam īritam iti yat vā yat rūpa ādi yuj tat tathā anityam īritam ita yojanāḥ tasya iti atas yasya iti anena anvayaḥ anyathā tu yat śabda śravaṇāt tat śabda adhyāhāraḥ pūrvavākyāt tasya iti anuvartate vā etat ca upapādayiṣyate uktam upasaṃharati vyāptyā iti 
NSu_2.2.246cd.1–2.2.246cd.4	 vyāptyā tayā anyathā bhāvāt ātmanaḥ anitya tā bhavet yat anyathā bhāvi tat anityam yat ca rūpa ādimattada nityam iti vyāptyā anyathā abhāvāt iti upalakṣaṇam rūpa ādimat tvāt ca iti api draṣṭavyam syāt etat sampratipanna vyāptikavyā api āropaḥ aniṣya vyāpaka āropaṇam tarkaḥ atra ca na ced vaya āptiḥ sammatā katham tarhi tarka tvam mā evam vyāpya vadvaya āpteḥ api para abhyupagata tve api tarkatva avirodhāt evam eva kvacid āśrayasya ubhaya asammatau= api na doṣaḥ vakṣyati ca etat para nyāyaiḥ tu dūṣaṇam a iti kṣapaṇa uktam prameya antaram nirākartum sūtram antya avasthiteḥ ca ubhaya nitya tvāt aviśeṣāt iti tatra antya avasthiteḥ ca iti etāvat tāvadvaya ākhyāti nitya iti antya avasthiteḥ ca ubhaya nitya tvāt aviśeṣaḥ 
NSu_2.2.247.1–2.2.247.3	 nitya ūrdhva gatiḥ api eṣā yā muktiḥ iti kathyate aloka ākāśam āptasya katham na vikṛtiḥ ca sā api śabdaḥ prameya antara nirākaraṇa samuccaya arthaḥ caśabdaḥ parimāṇa paryāyeṇa saha samuccaye yā eṣā nitya ūrdhva gatiḥ muktiḥ iti jainaiḥ kathyate sā ca katham ātmanaḥ vikṛtiḥ naḥ bhavet bhevet eva tat katham aloka ākāśam āptasya prāk loka ākāśa sthaḥ hi ayam ātmā nirantara ūrdhva gati āloka ākāśam āpnoti tathā ca anyathā bhāvāt ātmanaḥ anitya tva āpattiḥ iti bhāvaḥ anena antyā avasthitiḥ santata ūrdhva gati lakṣaṇā tatas ca ātmanaḥ anitya tva āpattiḥ iti sūtra khaṇḍasya arthaḥ uktaḥ bhavati nanu anyathā bhāva mātram anitya tvasya prayojakam iti na tāvat bhavadīyaḥ pakṣaḥ iti uktam na api madīyaḥ pakṣaḥ tat katham pradeśa viśeṣa saṃyoga mātra rūpānyathātvena mukta ātmanaḥ a nitya tva prasañjanam iti atas jainapakṣaḥ ayam iti samarthayitum tāvat pṛcchati kīdṛśaḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.2.248ab.1–2.2.248ab.3	 kīdṛśaḥ ca anyathābhāvaḥ nāśa hetutayā iṣyate kṣapaṇakena hi kṣiti ādeḥ sarvasya nitya tva ādi anekāntam samarthayamānena dravya paryāyābhyām nitya tvam anitya tvam ca iti uktam dravya ākārasya kadā api anapāyāt nitya tvam paryāyaḥ anyathā bhāvaḥ tasmāt anitya tvam iti tatra vaktavyam kīdṛśaḥ atra anyathā bhāvaḥ nāśam prati hetutayā iṣyate kim saṃsthāna ādi lakṣaṇa apagama rūpaḥ vā sa dhāraṇaḥ vā iti bhāvaḥ ādyam śaṅkate saṃsthānā iti 
NSu_2.2.248c.1–2.2.249ab.2	 saṃsthāna apagamaḥ ced saṃsthāna grahaṇam lakṣaṇa upalakṣaṇam nāśa hetutayā iṣyatas iti sambandhaḥ pratiṣedhati sa na iti  sa na hi bhū sāgara ādiṣu vaktum śakyate iti śeṣaḥ kutas na iti atas āha sa na hi iti yāvat lakṣya bhāvi lakṣaṇa apagama lakṣaṇaḥ anyathā bhāvaḥ bhū sāgara ādiṣu pakṣa eka deśa bhūteṣu na hi idānīm pramitaḥ tatas hetoḥ sandigdha asiddha tvam syāt iti arthaḥ pramita tve tu tasya anitya tve api saṃśayaḥ na asti iti anumānam vyartham āpadyate tarhi dvitīyaḥ astu iti śaṅkate yaḥ kaścid iti yaḥ kaścid anyathā bhāvaḥ yadi pūrvavat eva sambandhaḥ avivakṣita viśeṣaḥ iti arthaḥ evam tarhi mukta ātmanaḥ api anitya tva āpādanam susthitam iti bhāvena āha muktiḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.2.249b.1–2.2.249b.4	 muktiḥ ca tādṛśī tādṛśī anyathā abhāva svarūpāḥ evam api ātmanaḥ nitya tve bhū bhūdhara ādīnām api nitya tvam syāt anyathā hetoḥ anaikāntyāt tat idam uktam sūtra kṛtā ubhaya nitya tvāt a iti avayava upacaya apacaya lakṣaṇaḥ anyathā abhāvaḥ anitya tve hetuḥ iti ced sphaṭika ādau pakṣa eka deśe sandigdha tvāt rūpa ādimat tvam sa viśeṣaṇam upādīyate ced kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na parasya vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt na hi paraḥ rūpa ādimat kiñcit nityam abhyupaiti ātmanaḥ tu prabhayā rūpa ādimat tvam āpāditam eva yat vā ātmanaḥ rūpa ādimat tvam sva siddhāntaḥ eva rūpa ādimataḥ anitya tvam iti vyāpti aṅgīkāre pūrva ukta anitya tva prasaṅgaḥ vyākhyātavyaḥ kṣapaṇaka uktam artha antaram dūṣayitum anuvadati deha iti 
NSu_2.2.249cd.1–2.2.250a.1–2.2.250a.3^1	 deha māne vikāraḥ syāt iti sthāsnūnana ātmanaḥ āha deha māne deha māna tve pramite ti śeṣaḥ vikāraḥ syāt sthāvarāṇām sa ātmaka tva aṅgīkṛtau= ātmanaḥ iti śeṣaḥ iti sa mā bhūt iti evam artham sthāsnūn vṛkṣa ādīn anātmanaḥ ātma an adhiṣṭhitān āha kṣapaṇakaḥ atra kṣapaṇakaḥ sthāvarānanātmanaḥ āha iti etāvati eva vaktavye yadā ātmanaḥ deha parimāṇa tvasya pramita tvāt vṛkṣa ādīnām api sa ātmaka tve tad parimāṇa tva āpattau= aṅkura avasthāyām aṇu mātrasya mahā vṛkṣa avasthāyām ca mahataḥ vikāri tvam vikāri tvāt anitya tvam ca prasajyeta tat mā prāsāṅkṣīt iti etat athati hetu kathanam tad pūrva ukta prameya dṛḍhīkaraṇa artham 
NSu_2.2.250a.1–2.2.250a.3^2	 yadi vikāri tva mātram anitya tve prayojakam jainaḥ na abhyupeyāt tadā vikāri tvena anitya tva prasaṅgāt bibhyatā sthāvarāṇām anātma tvam yat tena abhyupagatam tad anupapannam syāt na hi sthāvarāṇām sa ātmaka tāyām ātmanaḥ lakṣaṇa apagamaḥ bhavati kintu anyathā bhāva mātram iti yat vā dūṣaṇa saukarya artham hetu anuvādaḥ tat idam vikāritvā āpatti bhayāt sthāvarāṇām anātma tva aṅgīkaraṇam ayuktam tathā sati hasti ādi śarīrāṇām api anātma tvasya aṅgī kāya ṛtva prasaṅgāt tat katham iti atas āha hasti ādi iti 
NSu_2.2.250ab.1–2.2.250ab.4	 hasti ādi deheṣu hi api syāt anyathā bhāvaḥ pipīlika ādi deha sthasya tad parimāṇasya hasti ādi deheṣu prāpteṣu anyathā bhāvaḥ syāt hi tasmāt iti athavā śarīra mātrasya anātma tvam āpādya tad upapādanam idam kriyate hasti ādi sarva deheṣu api ātmanaḥ anyathā bhāvaḥ syāt utpatti samaye dehānām hasta vitasti mātra parimāṇa tvāt yauvane tu utkṛṣṭa parimāṇa tvāt iti anena aviśeṣāt iti sūtra khaṇḍasya arthaḥ uktaḥ bhavati nanu ca viṣamaḥ ayam upanyāsaḥ alpā eva hi hasti ādi deheṣu ātmanaḥ vikṛtiḥ vṛkṣa ādau tu mahatī tatas vṛkṣa ādīnām anātma tve hasti ādīnām api tad āpādanam anucitam iti atas āha aṇu dehasya iti 
NSu_2.2.250c–2.2.250f.2	 aṇu dehasya jīvasya gaja tve vikṛtiḥ hi yā deha vyāptyai viśeṣaḥ kaḥ tasyāḥ sthāsnu tanau ca nuḥ aṇu dehasya pipīlika ādi dehasya jīvasya gaja tve prāpte yat vā utpatti samaye aṇu dehasya hasta vitasti ādi parimita dehasya mahā gaja tve prāpte deha vyāptau yāvatī vikṛtiḥ sthāsnu tanau ca nuḥ puruṣasya yā vikṛtiḥ tasyāḥ tasyāḥ ca parasparam kaḥ viśeṣaḥ na kaḥ api ayam arthaḥ ātmanaḥ kim mahatī vikṛtiḥ anitya tva hetu tvāt anabhyupagantavyā kiṃvā vikṛti mātram na ādyaḥ mahat tvasya apariniṣṭhita tvāt pariniṣṭhā kalpane keṣucid vṛkṣa ādiṣu tad abhāvāt tad anurodhena api pariniṣṭhā aṅgīkāre hasti ādau= api tad bhāvāt dvitīye tu ubhayoḥ vikāri tvena aviśeṣāt vṛkṣa ādi vat hasti ādau= api anātma tvam aṅgī kāryam hasti ādi vat vṛkṣa ādīnām api sa ātmaka tvam na parityājyam iti etena aviśeṣa ādityasya artha antaram uktam veditavyam 
NSu_2.2.250c–2.2.250f.3	 syāt etat na vayam vikāritvā āpatti bhayāt vṛkṣa ādīnām anātmaka tvam ācakṣmahe kintu sa ātmaka tve pramāṇa abhāvāt bādhaka pramāṇa sadbhāvāt ca vṛkṣa ādīnām deha tve tat vayāpakam indriya vat tvam api syāt na ca tat asti tad kāryasya śravaṇa ādeḥ abhāvāt saḥ api tad jñāpakasya abhāvāt adeha tve ca na sa ātmaka tvam śilā ādi vat iti atas āha gītāt iti 
NSu_2.2.251a–2.2.251d.2	 gītāt puṣpa phala avāptiḥ sparśāt kārśyam rasāt sthitiḥ api vṛkṣasya dṛśyante iti nānā ātma tā bhavet gītāt tāvat vṛkṣasya api puṣpa phala avāptiḥ dṛśyate tayā śravaṇam anumīyate vimataḥ śravaṇavān gīta sānnidhye sati labdha vikāsa tvāt rāja ādi vat iti na ca ayam svabhāvaḥ eva rāja ādeḥ api tad prasaṅgāt śravaṇena ca śrotra sadbhāvaḥ anumīyate evam śīta uṣṇa sparśa viśeṣāt kārśyam dṛśyate tena sukumāra śarīra vat sparśa jñānam anumīyate tena ca tvac indriya sattvam tathā udaka ādi rasāt sthitiḥ aśuṣyataḥ avasthānam dṛśyate tena sammata deha vat rasa jñānam tatas rasanā indriya sadbhāvaḥ anumīyate evam kamanīya kānta avalokanena utkoraka tvam tilavṛkṣasya upalabhyate tena darśana kāmau tatas nayana manasī siddhayataḥ dhūpa upayāgena ca atiśaya darśanāt ghrāṇa siddhiḥ iti prasiddha śarīra aviśeṣāt sthāvarāṇām anātma tā na siddhayet 
NSu_2.2.251a–2.2.251d.5	 kecid mūle niṣiktānām apām upari sarpaṇāt ādhyātmika vāyu sambandham anumāya sa ātmaka tvam anumiyate tat asat bhasma gulikā ādau vyabhicārāt etena aviśeṣāt iti etad prakāra antareṇa vyākhyātam bhavati vakti sva prabham a iti ādikam utsūtritam kasmāt varṇitam iti manda āśaṅkām nivārayitum sūtra ārūḍham karoti evañca iti 
NSu_2.2.251ef.1–2.2.252.1	 evañca ātmākārtsnyam iti tatas eva āha veda vid iti tri sūtīm iti śeṣaḥ tatas eva tad artham eva uktasya arthasya pratipādana artham eva evam anyatra api sūtrān upanyāsena vyākhyāne api na evam āśaṅkanīyam iti jñāpayitum idam abhihitam iti pati urasām añjasyāt iha mahādevam puraskṛtya pravartamānānām matam apākriyate te caturvidhāḥ śaivāḥ pāśupatāḥ kālāmukhāḥ mahā vratāḥ ca iti teṣām sati api avāntara bhede sādhāraṇam eva prameyam veda vādasya ati viruddha tvāt apākartum anuvadati sarvajña tva ādikaiḥ iti patyuḥ asāmañjasyāt sarvajña tva ādikaiḥ sarvaiḥ guṇaiḥ yuktam sadāśivam jagat vicitra racanā kartāram doṣa varjitam 
NSu_2.2.253a.1–2.2.253a.3	 āhuḥ pāśupatāḥ paśupateḥ ime pāśupatāḥ iti caturvidhāḥ api gṛhyante te sadāśivam jagat vicitra racanā kartāram āhuḥ tatas janma ādyasya yatas iti uktam asat iti ajñāna ādi doṣa yuktam katham jagat kartāram āhuḥ iti atas uktam doṣa varjitam iti sārvajña ādi abhāve ajñāna ādi varjanam cetanasya na upapadyate iti atas sarvajña tva ādikaiḥ sarvaiḥ guṇaiḥ yuktam iti uktam yat vā sarvajña tva ādikaiḥ sarvaiḥ guṇaiḥ yuktam doṣa varjitam iti pradhāna lakṣaṇa viruddha artha upanyāsaḥ jagat vicitra racanā kartāram iti śrauta brahma lakṣaṇa viruddha artha uktiḥ iti avagantavyam tat etat dūṣayitum pati urasām añjasyāt iti sūtra tātparyam āha tat ca iti 
NSu_2.2.253a–2.2.253c.3	 tat ca bahu śruti virodhataḥ na upādeyam matam hi caśabdaḥ pūrvatanaiḥ saha samuccaya arthaḥ hi śabdaḥ hetau tat paśupateḥ sarva jagat kāṇa tva ādikam matam na upādeyam kutas patyuḥ paśupateḥ asām añjasyāt doṣi tvāt tad anaṅgīkāre ca bahu śruti virodhaḥ iti yojanā kāḥ tāḥ śrutayaḥ iti atas tāḥ udāharati asya iti 
NSu_2.2.253cd.1–2.2.256.1	 asya devasya stuhi garta gam utpipeṣa śiraḥ tasya gṛṇīṣe sat patim padam yat viṣṇoḥ upamam hantum rudram ākṛṣṭate mayā dhanuryam kāmaye tam tam ugram mā śiśna devatāḥ ghnan śiśna devān ekaḥ asau= āsīt nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ tasmāt rudraḥ samprasādaḥ ca abhūtām vaiṣṇavam makham yajñena yajña maya janta abadhnan puruṣam paśum 
NSu_2.2.257ab.1–2.2.257ab.3^1	 yaḥ bhūtānām adhipatiḥ rudraḥ tanti caraḥ vṛṣā anenaasya devasya mīhuṣaḥ vayāḥ viṣṇoḥ eṣasya prabhuthe havirbhiḥ vide hi rudraḥ rudriyam mahitvam yāsiṣyam vartiraḥ civā virāvat a iti śrutim upādatte stuhi garta gam a iti anenaḥ tuhi śrutam garta madam yuvānam mṛgam na bhīmam upahatnum ugram mṛā jaritre rudra stavānaḥ anyam te asmāt nivapantu senā a iti utpipeṣa a iti anena rudrasya tu eva dhanuḥ ārtniḥ ri utpipeṣa a iti gṛṇīṣaḥa iti anena kumāraḥ citpitaram vandamānam prati na anāma rudra upayantam bhūreḥ dātāram sat patim gṛṇīṣe stutaḥ tvam bheṣajāḥ rāsyasma a iti padam a iti anena tava śriye marutaḥ marjayanta rudra yat te janima cāru citram padam yat viṣṇoḥ upamam nidhāyi tena pāsi guhyam nāma gonām a iti 
NSu_2.2.257ab.3^2–2.2.257ab.4	 yam kāmaye a iti anenayam kāmaye tam tam ugram kṛṇomi tam brahmāṇam tam ṛṣim tam sumedhām a iti mā a iti anenamā śiśna devāḥ api gurṛtam na a iti ghnan a iti anena ghnan= śiśna devām abhivarpasā bhūda iti ekosaua iti anenaekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ āsīt na brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥa iti tasmāt a iti anena sa ruṣyaḥ sa prasannaḥ yadruṣyaḥ yat prasannaḥ tasmāt rudra samprasādau= abhūtāma iti vaiṣṇavam a iti anena teṣām makham vaiṣṇavam yaśaḥ ārchat a iti yajñena iti abadhnan= iti yaḥ bhūtānām iti prasiddham katham etābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ paśupateniḥ ḥ deṣa tvam viruddham iti atas tāsām tātparyam āha ityādi iti 
NSu_2.2.257cd.1–2.2.258c.3	 ityādi śruti sāmarthyāt pāratantryam janiḥ mṛtiḥ para adhīna para prāpti ḥ ajña tvam praaye abhavaḥ pratīyante abhavaḥ abhāvaḥ pratīyante paśupateḥ iti śeṣaḥ asya devasya a iti anena para adhīna pada prāptiḥ pratīyate mīhuṣaḥ secakasya eṣasya icchā rūpasya asya viṣṇoḥ devasya pramṛthe prabharaṇe pūjāyām iti yāvat havirbhiḥ kṛte sati vayāḥ bandhakaḥ rudraḥ rudriyam mahitvam raudram padam vide vivide lebhe hi yathā tathā he aśvinau yuvām api irāvat anna vat varti vartanam yāsiṣyam ayāsiṣya prāptavantau sthaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.258a–2.2.258c.4	 stuhi a iti anena stāvaka tayā pāratantryam he rudra tvam śrutam prasiddham garta sadam hṛdaya guhā nivāsam yuvānam mṛgam na bhīmam siṃham iva bhīṣaṇam ugram ugrāṇām daityānām upahantunam upahantāram nṛharim stuhi stauṣi saḥ evam stavāna stuvan= tvam jaritre stotre tvām stuvantam mām mṛa mṛḍaya sukhasya te senāḥ ca asmad anyam eva nivapantu ghnantu iti 
NSu_2.2.258a–2.2.258c.6	 rudrasya a iti anena ajña tvam pāratantryam mṛtiḥ ca āropitam dhanuḥ hanau= avaṣṭabhya avasthitasya rudrasya śiraḥ jyāyām kāmarūpeṇa indreṇa chinnāyām utkṣiptā dhanuḥ ārtniḥ utpipeṣa ciccheda iti kumāraḥ a iti anena api pāratantryam janiḥ ca he rudra kumāraḥ putraḥ bhavān jaga dvayā mohanāya kailāsam upayantam tvām vandamānam pitaram kṛṣṇam prati nanāma tena stutaḥ tvam bhūreḥ puruṣa arthasya dātāram sat patim gṛṇīṣe stauṣi stutavān asi evambhūtaḥ tvam asmābhiḥ stutaḥ asme asmabhyam bheṣajāḥ bheṣajāni saṃsāra vyādhi nirasanāni jñānāni rāsi dadāsi dehi iti 
NSu_2.2.258a–2.2.258c.7	 tava śriyaḥ a iti anena para adhīna pada prāptiḥ janiḥ pāratantryam ca he rudra yat yebhyaḥ te janima janma abhūt te marutaḥ brahmaṇaḥ atīta vartamānāḥ tava śriye sampade cāru sundaram citram āścaryam upamam upa samīpe mā lakṣmīḥ yasya saṃvahana kartrī tat tathā uktam yat viṣṇoḥ padam marjayantaḥ śodhitavantaḥ kṣālitavantaḥ tattvayā hṛdi nidhāyi nyadhāyi tena kāraṇena tvam gonām gavām madhye guhyam nāma nārāyaṇa ādikam pāsi japa upadeśa ādinā pālayasi iti aham a iti anena mṛtiḥ aham brahma dviṣe brahma dviṣām daityānām śarave hiṃsakam rudrāya rudram hantavai hantum eva pralaye dhanurātanomi vistārayāmi iti 
NSu_2.2.258a–2.2.258c.12	 yam a iti anena para adhīna pada prāptiḥ aham yam yam rudram kartum kāmaye tam tam ugram rudram kṛṇomi karomi evam tam brahmāṇam tam ṛṣim tam sumedhām sumedhasam karomi iti mā a iti anena ajña tvam atīta anāgata vartamānāḥ guhya abhimāninaḥ devāḥ rudrāḥ api naḥ asmākam upāsi amṛtam jñāna rūpam brahma māguḥ na jñātavantaḥ iti ghnan= iti anena mṛtiḥ guhya abhimānidevān ghnan= īśvaraḥ varpasā balena sarvam abhyabhūt abhibhūtavān iti ekaḥ a iti anena pralaye abhāvaḥ janiḥ ca tasmāt a iti anena janiḥ parameśvara roṣa jaḥ rudraḥ iti arthaḥ samprasādaḥ brahmā 
NSu_2.2.258a–2.2.258c.15	 teṣām a ityādi vākyaiḥ pāratantryam teṣām devānām yaśaḥ vaiṣṇavam makham viṣṇu makhe paśutvena niyuktam rudram ārchat prāpta vat iti devāḥ yajñena rudreṇa paśunā yajñam viṣṇum ayajanta iti devāḥ puruṣam rudram paśum abadhnan= iti yaḥ bhūtānām adhipatiḥ rudraḥ sa viṣṇoḥ ājñā rūpāyām tantyām carati vṛṣā prasiddhatantyām iva iti etāsām śrutīnām etad artha tva upapādanam tvacā āryeṇa eva anyatra udāhṛtebhyaḥ vākyebhyaṣṭīkātaḥ ca avagantavyam atas eva sāmarthyāt iti uktam sūtra artham upasaṃharati sa doṣa tvāt iti 
NSu_2.2.258cd.1–2.2.259c.2	 sa doṣa tvāt na īśaḥ paśupatiḥ tatas tatas śruti balena sa doṣa tvāt paśupatiḥ īśaḥ jagat kartā na bhavati doṣi yajñadattasya iva jagat kartṛ tva anupapatteḥ iti yukti antareṇa śivasya jagat kartṛ tvam apākartum sūtram sambandha anupapatteḥ ca iti tasya artham āha aśarīra tvate iti saṃbandha anupapatteḥ ca aśarīra tvataḥ tasya sambandhaḥ jagatā kvacid kartṛ tvena na yujyeta tasya śivasya aśarīrasya api gagana ādeḥ jagatā sambandha darśanāt katham etat iti ata sambandham eve vyākhyāti kvacid kārye kartṛ tvena iti kāyarkartṛ tva lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ na yujyate iti arthaḥ kvacid iti anena kutas sarva kartṛ tvam iti sūcayati ayam atra prayogaḥ śivaḥ na kartā śarīra tvāt supta pralīna vat iti 
NSu_2.2.259a–2.2.259c.6	 nanu śivaḥ siddhaḥ na vā na dvitīyaḥ āśraya asiddheḥ ādye tu kartṛ tvena eva siddhaḥ iti dharmi grāhaka māna virodhaḥ kiñca bhavat mate śivasya kartṛ tvam śarīri tvam ca aṅgīkriyate eva tathā cāpa siddhānta anyatara asiddhī syātām iti ucyate idam atra ākūtam paśupateḥ jagat kāraṇa tvam vadan praṣṭavyaḥ kim pāśupata ādi śāstrāṇi anumānāni vā aśritya idam ucyate uta śruti ādikam ādye tu ati prasaṅgaḥ ayam ucyate yadi pāśupata ādi āśritya idam ucyate tarhi tasya aśarīra tvam api tatas siddham iti tat api aṅgīkāryam syāt tathā ca kartṛ tva anupapattiḥ iti atas eva na yujyata iti liṅprayogaḥ dvitīye tu vakṣyate iti evañca na kaścid doṣaḥ śiva svarūpasya asmākam śruti āditaḥ siddheḥ āśraya asiddhaya bhāvāt para siddhena aśarīra tvena kartṛ tva abhāva āpādanāt dharmi grāhaka virodha ādi abhāvāt etena pāśupata ādi virodhāt śrutayaḥ anyathā yojyāḥ iti nirastam nanu aśarīrasya api kartṛ tve bādhaka abhāva advaya āpti vidhuraḥ ayam prasaṅgaḥ kāraka prayoktṛ tvam hi kartṛ tvam na śarīri tvam iti atas āha dehinaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.259d.1–2.2.259d.2	 dehinaḥ jñāna dṛṣṭitaḥ satyam kāraka prayoktṛ tvam eva kartṛ tvam na śarīri tvam iti tat ca na prayatnena vinā sambhavati na ca icchām antareṇa prayatnaḥ na ca jñānāt vinā icchā na ca śarīrāt ṛte jñānam dehinām eva jāgratām jñāna darśanāt adehinām supta pralīnānām ca adarśanāt tatas kartṛ tvasya vyāpakam śarīram śivā dvaya āvartamānam tat api vyāvartayati iti 
NSu_2.2.259d.3	 nanu jñāna janmani eva śarīrasya upayogaḥ jñānasya indriya janya tvāt indriyāṇām ca śarīra saṃyoga niyamāt nitya jñānaḥ ca bhagavān śivaḥ iti kim tasya śarīreṇa iti evam tarhi prayatna janmani eva icchā upayoginī iti nitya prayatnasya icchā api na syāt tathā iccha utpattau= eva jñānam upayujyate iti nitya icchasya jñānam api na syāt 
NSu_2.2.259d.4–2.2.259d.6	 atha na prayatna mātram kartṛ tvam api tarhi jñāna icche api paridṛṣṭa sāmarthya kāraka prayoktṛ tvam kartṛ tvam iti hi vṛddhāḥ iti ced tathā api icchā tyāge bādhaka abhāvāt kutas ca evam kalpanīyam kulāla ādau tathā darśanāt iti ced kim tatra śarīram na dṛṣṭam dṛṣṭam api anupayuktam iti ced kinniyama abhāvāt evam āśrīyate anyatra upakṣayāt vā na ādyaḥ vyabhicāra abhāvāt śarīra preraṇe aparam śarīram na asti iti ced na tena eva sa śarīra tvāt na dvitīyaḥ nirasta tvāt anyathā jñāna ādīnām api anupayoga prasaṅgaḥ kutas ca asya nitya jñāna tva siddhiḥ āgamāt iti ced na paraspara āśraya prasaṅgāt siddhe hi āgama prāmāṇye nitya jñāna īśvara siddhiḥ tad siddhau ca āgamasya tad praṇīta tvena prāmāṇya siddhiḥ iti ukta doṣa parihāram āśaṅkaya tad nirāsāya sūtram karaṇa vat ced na bhoga ādibhyaḥ iti tat na iti antam tā= advaya ācaṣṭe na ca iti karaṇa vat ced na bhoga ādibhyaḥ 
NSu_2.2.260ab.1–2.2.260ab.3	 na ca deha ādi vat viśvam asya syāt yat uktam aśarīra tvāt śivasya kartṛ tva anupapattiḥ iti tat asat kulāla ādayaḥ hi kartāraḥ daṇḍa ādikam sākṣāt prayatnena adhiṣṭhātum anīśānāḥ tad adhiṣṭhānāya sākṣāt prayatna adhiṣṭheyam syāt tatas kim apareṇa śarīreṇa atas eva bhagavān viśvamūrtiḥ iti gīyate na ca ādi sṛṣṭeḥ prāk kāraka abhāvaḥ māyā ādeḥ anādeḥ vidyamāna tvāt anyathā sṛṣṭayanupapatteḥ iti ādipadena indriyāṇām vakṣyamāṇasya adhiṣṭhānasya ca saṅgrahaḥ tat idam na upapadyate iti arthaḥ kutas na iti atas sautra hetum vyākhyāti bhoga iti 
NSu_2.2.260b.1–2.2.260b.4	 bhoga sambhavāt yadi śivasya kāraka grāmaḥ sākṣāt prayatna adhiṣṭheyaḥ syāt tadā sa tasya sukha duḥkha anubhava lakṣaṇa bhoga hetuḥ syāt sākṣāt prayatna adhiṣṭheye asmad ādi śarīre tathā darśanāt karma arjitasya eva tathātvam iti ced na sākṣāt prayatna adhiṣṭheya tvena tathā abhāvasya api āpatteḥ bhoga ādimataḥ ca na īśvara tvam atas śivasya bhoga ādi prasaṅgāt na iyam kalpanā yuktā iti hetu antareṇa śivasya viśvakartṛ tvam nirākurvat adhiṣṭhāna anupapatteḥ ca iti sūtram vyācaṣṭe adhiṣṭhānaḥ iti adhiṣṭhāna anupapatteḥ ca 
NSu_2.2.260cd.1–2.2.260ef.2	 adhiṣṭhāne sthitaḥ kartā kāryam kurvan pratīyate yaḥ kartā kulāla ādiḥ sa pṛthivī ādau= adhiṣṭhāne sthitaḥ eva ghaṭa ādi kāryam kurvan pratīyate na tu niradhiṣṭhānaḥ kaścid kiñcid kurvāṇaḥ anena vyatirekauvinā abhāvena niradhiṣṭhāna tvasya akartṛ tvena vyāptiḥ upapāditā bhavati tatas kim iti atas āha na asya iti na asya adhiṣṭhāna yogaḥ asti bhūtānām praaye tadā asya śivasya tadā ādi sṛṣṭi samaye kutas na asti prāk utpannānām pṛthivī ādīnām mahābhūtānām pralaye sati tasmāt kartṛ tvam api tasya na upapadyate iti śeṣaḥ nanu kārakāṇām eva adhiṣṭhāna tvam bhaviṣyati mā evam sa adhiṣṭhānasya cetanasya bhoga ādi prasakteḥ ukta tvāt nanu ayam niradhiṣṭhāna tva hetuḥ kartuḥ vipakṣāt kulāla ādiḥ vākartuḥ sa pakṣāt ghaṭa ādeḥ api vyāvṛtta tvāt asādhāraṇaḥ mā evam gagana ādau sa pakṣe vṛtteḥ 
NSu_2.2.260ef.3	 nanu idam sūtra dvayam vyutkrameṇa kutas vyākhyātam sambandha anupapatti adhiṣṭhānānānupapattyoḥ ubhayoḥ api parihāraḥ karaṇa vat ced iti anena nirasyate iti jñāpana artham yadi khalu yathākramam eva vyākhyāyeta tadā sannihita adhiṣṭhāna anupapatti parihāra nirāsakam eva idam jñāyeta vyutkrameṇa tu ubhaya madhye vyākhyāne sati ubhaya sambandhi vijñāyate iti atas eva bhāṣye adhiṣṭhāna ādi rūpam iti uktam atra tu deha ādi vat iti 
NSu_2.2.260ef.4	 nanu yuktam kulālasya adhiṣṭhāna sāpekṣa tvam śarīri tvam śarīram hi guru tvāt prasakta patanam tat pratibandhāya sparśavat adhiṣṭhānam apekṣate anavasthita śarīrasya kartṛ tva ayogāt īśvarasya tu śarīra vidhurasya kim adhiṣṭhānam eva iha idam jātam iti adivyavahāraḥ tu gagana ādikam āśritya upapatsyate iti atas āha adehaḥ ced iti 
NSu_2.2.261ab.1–2.2.261ab.2	 adehaḥ ced asārvajñaḥ śilā kāṣṭha ādi vat sadā sadā iti anena vyāptim upapādayati atas eva śilā kāṣṭha ādi vat iti aneka dṛṣṭānta upādānam tathā ca kutas sāvarjñam kutas ca sarva kartṛ tvam iti bhāvaḥ syāt etat na sarvathā sadāśivaḥ aśarīraḥ kintu līlayā śarīrāṇi api gṛhṇāti tatas na ayam doṣaḥ na ca bhoga ādi prāptiḥ līlayā gṛhītasya vigrahasya tat ahetu tvāt iti ataḥ āha dehī ced iti 
NSu_2.2.261cd.1–2.2.261cd.2	 dehī ced antavān eva yajñadatta nidarśanāt antavān maraṇavān syāt upalakṣaṇam ca etat duḥkhāt imān= ca syāt iti api draṣṭavyam nanu asau vigrahaḥ na tad hetuḥ iti uktam mā evam śarīram na bhoga āyatanam ca iti asya vyāhata tvāt śarīra tvena eva tad anumānāt ca tat idam āha eva iti etenaantavat tma sarvajña tā vā a iti sūtram vyākhyātam bhavati pāṭha kramāt artha kramaḥ garīyān iti atas vyutkrameṇa vyākhyānam 
NSu_2.2.261cd.3	 nanu evam śivasya jagat kāraṇa tvam apākurvatām kaḥ abhiprāyaḥ kim akartṛkam eva idam viśvam iti kiṃvā viṣṇu kartṛkam iti na ādyaḥ kāryasya akartṛka tve virodhāt apasiddhānta prasakteḥ ca na dvitīyaḥ viṣṇau= api kartari abhyupagamyamāne doṣāṇām eṣām samāna tvena vyāhata tvāt tathā hi yat uktam asām añjasyam śivasya tad tāvat viṣṇau= api samam janita uta viṣṇoḥ a ityādau janma ādi doṣa śravaṇāt sambandha anupapatti ādikam tu sphuṭam eva iti atas āha na ca iti
