NSu_2.2.262a.1–2.2.262a.3	 naca etat akhilam viṣṇau etat akhilam doṣa jātam viṣṇau= api viśvasya kartari abhyupagate samānam iti na vācyam kutas śrutyā eva sakala doṣa parihāreṇa viṣṇoḥ viśva kāraṇa tvasya pratipādita tvāt nanu paśupateḥ api evam āgamaiḥ anumānaiḥ ca jagat kāraṇa tā pratipāditā eva tatas kaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti atas āha śruti iti 
NSu_2.2.262b.1–2.2.262b.3	 śruti prāmāṇya gauravāt pāśupatāditaḥ api śrutīnām prāmāṇyasya guru tvāt etat uktam bhavati pāśupata ādikam hi śive jagat kartari sarvajñe siddhe tad praṇīta tvena pramāṇa tvena niścīyeta niścite ca tad prāmāṇye śivasya evaṃvidhasya siddhiḥ iti anyonya āśraya tā duravadhāraṇa prāmāṇyam anyatas śivasya evaṃvidha tā siddha āvalam anena na ca anyat tādṛśam pramāṇam asti anumānānām dūṣita tvāt na ca evam śruti prāmāṇyam apauruṣeya tvena karaṇa doṣāṇām bādhaka pratyayasya ca abhāve sati tasya niṣkampam eva svatas niścita tvāt atas niścita pramāṇa bhāvayā śrutyā vidhūta avadya gandham viṣṇoḥ jagat kāraṇa tvam siddhayati eva iti kāḥ tāḥ śrutayaḥ iti atas tāḥ udāharati manaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.262cd.1–2.2.267.1	 manaḥ buddhayaṅgitām viṣṇoḥ lakṣayāmaḥ yaḥ eva saḥ saḥ eva dehaḥ vijñānam aiśvaryam śaktiḥ ūrjitāḥ dehaḥ viṣṇoḥ na te viṣṇo vāsudevaḥ agratas abhavat ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ tu āsīt na brahmā na ca śaṅkaraḥ ajasya nābhau= adhi ekam arpitam mātrayā paraḥ sat dehaḥ sukha gandhaḥ ca jñāna bhās sat parākramaḥ jñāna jñānaḥ sukha sukhaḥ sa viṣṇuḥ parama akṣaraḥ ānandaḥ ekaḥ eva agre āsīt nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ priyam tasya śire moda pramodau ca bhujau hareḥ ānandaḥ madhyatas brahma puccham na anyat abhūt kvacid manasaḥ asya abhavat brahmā lalāṭāt api śaṅkaraḥ 
NSu_2.2.268.1–2.2.268.3	 pakṣayoḥ garuḍaḥ śeṣaḥ mukhāt āsa sarasvatī sahasra śīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapād anena buddhi manaḥ aṅga pratyaṅga vat tām bhagavataḥ lakṣayām āha buddhimān manaḥ vānaṅgavān pratyaṅgavān a iti śrutim upādatte yaḥ eva a iti anenayat ātmakaḥ bhagavān= tad ātmikā vyaktiḥ kimātmakaḥ bhagavān jñāna ātmakaḥ aiśvarya ātmakaḥ śakti ātmakaḥ a iti ūrjitā balavatī sarvatra apratibaddhā etat ātamakaḥ bhagavān= tatas tasya dehaḥ api etat ātmakaḥ iti śruti labdhaḥ arthaḥ na te viṣṇaua iti anena na te viṣṇo jāyamānaḥ na jātaḥ deva mahimnaḥ param antam āpa a iti vāsudevaḥ a iti anena vāsudevaḥ vā idam agre āsīt a iti mātrayāa iti anena paraḥ mātrayā tanvā vṛdhāna na te mahitvam anvaśnuvanti a iti katham etābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ abhipreta artha siddhiḥ iti atas tāsām tātparyam āha ityādi iti 
NSu_2.2.269.1–2.2.269.2^1	 iti ādi śruti sandarbha balāt nitya guṇa ātmanaḥ viṣṇoḥ dehāt jagat sarvam āvirāsīt itīyate nityaḥ ca asau guṇa ātmā ca iti tathā uktaḥ tasmāt tatra buddhiḥ a iti śrutyā viṣṇoḥ dehavat tvam avagamyate aṅgam dehaḥ pratyaṅgāni hasta ādīni lakṣayāmahe jñāpayāmaḥ katham buddhimān ityādi yad ātmakaḥ bhagavān a iti anayā bhagavataḥ dehasya jñāna ādi guṇa ātmaka tvāt vyaktiḥ dehaḥ na te viṣṇaua iti anā bhagavaḥ dehasya jñāna ādi guṇa ātmaka tvam anādi nitya tvam jāta ādibhiḥ aprāpyamahitvasya anyathā anupapatteḥ vāsudevaḥ a iti śruti dvayena anādi nitya deha tvam 
NSu_2.2.269.1–2.2.269.2^2	 ajasya a iti anayā dehavat tvam tasya api aja tvam paraḥ mātrayā a iti anayā deśa kāla guṇaiḥ aparicchinna tanu tvam sat dehaḥ a ityādi śruti dvayena janma ādi doṣa rahita guṇa ātma dehavat tvam sat dehaḥ janma ādi doṣa rahita dehaḥ sukha gandhaḥ sugandhaḥ jñāna bhāḥ na tu taijasabhāḥ jñāna jñānaḥ iti ādeḥ atiśayita jñānaḥ iti ādiḥ iti arthaḥ priya ādi śabdāḥ sukha viśeṣa vācinaḥ anyat prākṛta ādikam manasaḥ a ityādi śruti dvayena dehavat tvam tatas jagataḥ janma ca brāhmaṇaḥ asya a ityādi vākya śeṣāt pakṣayoḥ pārśvayoḥ 
NSu_2.2.269.3–2.2.269.4	 atra kāsucid śrutiṣu vivakṣita arthaḥ na sphuṭam pratīyate kintu upa patti sādhyaḥ iti āśayavata uktam balāt iti āvirāsīt iti anena satkārya vādam sūcayati īyate jñāyate atra sakala jagat kāraṇa tvasya eva śruti siddha tve sarva doṣa parihāraḥ sidhyati eva na hi doṣeṣu satsu tad sambhavati tathā api deha abhāva prayuktāni dūṣaṇāni prayuktāni tasya ca dehasya jñāna ānanda ādi guṇa ātmaka tvena janana ādi doṣa parihāraḥ api siddhaḥ janita uta ityādi vākyam tu bahvībhiḥ niravakāśa ādibhiḥ śrutibhiḥ viruddham anyathā vyākhyeyam tat idam uktam sandarbha balāt iti syāt etat dehaḥ jñāna ānanda ādi guṇa ātmāna ādi nityaḥ ca iti etat śaśaḥ viṣāṇavān iti vat viruddham yaḥ dehaḥ sa bhautikaḥ janma ādimān iti niyama darśanāt tatas viṣṇoḥ deham aṅgīkṛtya tasya abhautika tva ādi aṅgīkāre śaśasya api viṣāṇi tvam aṅgīkāryam iti atas dehasya abhautika tva ādinā virodham tāvat apākaroti māna sattvāt iti 
NSu_2.2.270a.1–2.2.270b.2	 mānavat tvāt virodhaḥ kaḥ kaḥ iti ākṣepe na asti virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ idānīm śaśa viṣāṇa pratibandīm mocayati na iti  nāmānam kvacid iṣyate aṅgīkurmaḥ śaśa viṣāṇam api yadi parameśvara vigrahasya ānanda ādi ātmaka tvam asti prāmāṇikam syāt naca evam na hi aprāmāṇikam kena api kadāpi kvacid api eṣyum śakyate iti nanu prāmāṇika tve api virodha abhāvaḥ katham iti atas āha avirodhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.270cd.1–2.2.270cd.3	 avirodhaḥ virodhaḥ ca mānena eva hi gamyate yayoḥ kvacid saha darśanam tayoḥ avirodhaḥ yayoḥ tu niyamena vyadhikaraṇa tayā eva daśarnam tayoḥ virodhaḥ iti evam saha darśana asaha darśana lakṣaṇena mānena vastūnām avirodha virodhau= avagantavyau tad niyamākasya anyasya abhāvāt atas pramāṇena saha dṛṣṭe arthe virodhaḥ katham syāt vaya āghātāt iti upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_2.2.271ab.1–2.2.271ab.3	 atas uktam samastam ca vāsudevasya yujyate pramāṇaiḥ saha dṛṣṭe arthe virodhasya anā śaṅkanīya tvāt uktam udāhṛtābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ samastam cit ānanda ādya ātmaka niravadya vigraheṇa jagat kāraṇa tvam etat ca arūpavat eva ityādinā vakṣyamāṇam śiṣya hita eṣiṇā acāryeṇa atra uktam iti jñātavyam nanu etat asmākam api samānam tathā hi yadi api pāśupata ādikam aśakya avadhāraṇa pramāṇa bhāvam tathā apijñātvā śivam śāntim atyantam eti aekaḥ rudraḥ na dvitīyāya tasthe asaḥ imān lokān i īśate īśanībhiḥ a ityādyāḥ śrutayaḥ tāvat śivasya jagat janma ādi hetu tām ācakṣate śiva ādi nāma upeta tvāt na ca tathāvidhasya asamañjasa tvam sambhavati iti udāhṛtāḥ śrutayaḥ anyathā yojyāḥ atas sambandha anupapatti ādikam śrutiḥ eva ābhāsayiṣyati tad ghaṭakam vā kim api kalpayiṣyati iti atas āha śivā ādi iti 
NSu_2.2.271cd.1–2.2.272.1	 śiva ādi nām a yuktāḥ ca śrutayaḥ viṣṇu vācakāḥ bhavet evam yadi etāḥ śrutayaḥ śiva parāḥ syuḥ naca evam kintu śiva ādi nām a yuktāḥ api viṣṇu viṣayāḥ eva nanu etat kutas evam satyasmābhiḥ api vaktum śakyataḥ eva ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ ityādyāḥ api śrutayaḥ śiva parāḥ iti mā evam śiva ādi nāmnām viṣṇau śaktimat tvāt nārāyaṇa ādi nāmnām śive śakti abhavāt atra api kim mānam iti atas āha nāmāni iti nāmāni sarvāṇi ca yam ekaḥ yaḥ deva nāmadhāḥ viṣṇu nāmāni na anyasya sarva nāmā hariḥ svayam 
NSu_2.2.273.1–2.2.273.3	 na nārāyaṇa nāmāni tad anyeṣu apare harau iti ādi śrutayaḥ tatra mānam ca uktaḥ samanvayaḥ anena nāmāni viśva abhi na santi loke a iti ādikām śrutim upādatte ekaḥ a iti anena yaḥ devānām nāmadhā ekaḥ eva iti nāmāni dhattaḥ iti nāmadhāḥ na anyasya vācakāni na tad anyeṣu vartante apare śiva ādi śabdāḥ uktaḥ samanvayaḥ ca tatra mānam iti sambandhaḥ samanvaya grahaṇena etat api parihṛtam etāḥ api śrutīraham śiva ādi viṣaya tayā vyākhyāsyāmi iti upakrama ādibhiḥ liṅga ādibhiḥ ca bhagavat para tayā niścita tvāt iti mā bhūt śatibhiḥ śivasya jagat kāraṇatva avadhāraṇam śaiva purāṇaiḥ tu bhaviṣyati na ca tāni api viṣṇu parāṇi upakrama ādi balena śiva viṣaya tayā niścita tvāt iti atas āha purāṇāni iti 
NSu_2.2.274ab.1–2.2.274ab.3	 purāṇāni purāṇa ādyaiḥ viruddha tvāt na tat pramā purāṇa ādyaiḥ vaiṣṇavaiḥ viruddha tvāt prāk prābalya cintāyāḥ sat pratipakṣa tvāt tad uttaram bādhita tvāt ca tat tatra śivasya jagat kāraṇa tve na kevalam vaiṣṇava ādi purāṇa ādi viruddha tvāt apramāṇam śaiva purāṇam kintu śaiva pramāṇa viruddha tvāt api iti āha tat iti 
NSu_2.2.274cd.1–2.2.274cd.2	 tad viruddheṣu naḥ mānam pūrva apara virodhataḥ tad viruddheṣu śaiva purāṇa ādi viruddheṣu śiva jagat kāraṇa ādiṣu naḥ mānam śaiva purāṇam iti śeṣaḥ katham śaiva purāṇasya śaiva purāṇa virodhaḥ iti atas āha pūrva iti etat ca anyatra darśitam kiñca śaiva vaiṣṇava pakṣapāta śūnya brāhma purāṇa viruddha tvāt ca śaiva purāṇam vimate arthe na mānam iti āha sameti 
NSu_2.2.275b.1–2.2.275b.2	 sama brāhma virodhāt ca idam api anyatra darśitam evam tarhi vaiṣṇavānām api purāṇa ādīnām aprāmāṇyam syāt teṣām api śaiva brāhma purāṇa viruddha tvāt pūrva apara virodhāt ca iti atas āha niyamāt iti  niyamāt vaiṣṇaveṣu api eka prakāra tvāt pūrva apara virodha abhāvāt śaiva ādi purāṇānām etat pratibandhaka tva ādyasāmarthyāt iti aperarthaḥ teṣām na aprāmāṇyam iti śeṣaḥ nanu vaiṣṇaveṣu api purāṇa ādiṣu śiva ādīnām jagat kāraṇa tva ādikam viṣṇunā tadīya stuti ādi kāraṇam ca pratīyate eva tat katham niyamaḥ ucyate iti atas āha moha artham iti 
NSu_2.2.275c.1–2.2.275c.3	 moha artha m uktitaḥ ca eva śiva ādīnām jagat kāraṇa tvādeḥ ayogya jana vyāmohana artham eva uktiḥ caśabdāt viṣṇunā śivastuti ādeḥ moha artham kṛtasya anuvādataḥ ca niyamaḥ na viruddhaḥ iti katham śaiva purāṇa ādīnām pratirodhaka tvāt yasām athyarmiti atas āha moha artham iti śaivapurāṇa ādīnām moha artham eva uktitaḥ kṛta tvāt caśabdena vaiṣṇavānām tattva jñāna atharmā iva kṛta tvāt atra ca arthe anyatra pramāṇāni uktāni adhikaraṇa artham upasaṃharati viṣṇuḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.275d.1–2.2.276c.2	 viṣṇuḥ ekaḥ guṇa arṇavaḥ tasmāt iti siddham iti śeṣaḥ nanu skanda ādi matāni api ukta artha virodhīni santi tāni kutas atra na nirākriyantaḥ iti atas āha skanda iti skanda sūrya gaṇa īśa ādi matāni nyāyataḥ amutas nirākṛtāni amutas nyāyataḥ pāśupatam ata nirākaraṇa nyāyataḥ atas na nirākriyante iti śeṣaḥ katham anena nyāyena tat nirākaraṇam iti atas āha aśeṣeṇa iti 
NSu_2.2.276cd.1–2.2.276cd.4	 aśeṣeṇa siddhāntasya aviśeṣataḥ kāt snaryena tadīya siddhāntānām pāśupata siddhāntasya ca aviśeṣatas kevala devatā antara parigraheṇa eva siddhānta bhedaḥ prakriyā tu sarvatra samānā eva atas pūrva nirākaraṇa nyāyena eva tad nirākaraṇam yuktam eva iti bhāvaḥ utpatti asambhavāt śāktam matam atra apākriyate na nirākartavyam eva etat skānda ādimata vat asya api pūrva nyāyena eva nirasta tvāt yathā hi patyuḥ iti asya sthāne skandasya ityādi paṭhitvā āsām añjasye tad anusāriṇyaḥ śrutaye udāhriyante sambandha anupapatti ādikam ca tad viṣayam yojyate tathā śaktau= api vaktum śakyam eva anyathā skanda ādi śarnam api pṛthak apākaraṇīyam syāt atha ucyeta śākta mate pāśupatāt ācāra bheda ādeḥ vidyamāna tvāt tad siddhānta aviśeṣaḥ na asti iti tat na saura ādi mateṣu api tasya vidyamāna tvāt atha kim tena devatā viśeṣa parigraham antareṇa ukta artha viruddhaḥ dūṣyaḥ atharḥ sarvatra samānaḥ eva iti brūṣe tad śākte api samānam iti atas na etat api pṛthak apākaraṇīyam iti atas āha nirākṛtau= iti utpatti asaṃbhavāt 
NSu_2.2.277a–2.2.277c.3	 nirākṛtau viśeṣasya bhāvāt śakti matam pṛthak dūṣyate satyam skanda ādi vacśāktasya api matasya na pāśupatāt viśeṣaḥ atas eva ukta doṣa grāma viṣaya tvam api tathā api tatra asādhāraṇasya dūṣaṇasya vidyamāna tvāt tat vivakṣayā śakti matam pṛthak bhaṅgayā dūṣyate sūtrakāreṇa utpatti asambhavaḥ hi śāktasya eva asādhāraṇa doṣaḥ na tu puruṣa daivatānām etat ca vakṣyāmaḥ iti evam adhikaraṇa ārambham upapādya idānīm śākta matam upanyasyati mahati iti 
NSu_2.2.277c–2.2.277f.3	 mahatī devī hrīṅkarī sarva kāraṇam tripurābhairavi iti ādi nāmabhiḥ sā abhidhīyate śaktimatam iti vartate sarvasya āgāminā iti śabdena sambandhaḥ devī mahatī sarva utkṛṣṭā iti śaktimatam iti katham mahatī iti atas uktam sarva kāraṇam iti sakala jagat sṛṣṭayā ādi kāraṇa tvāt sārvajña ādi sarva guṇavatī samasta doṣa dūrā bhavati iti atas sarva utkṛṣṭā iti nanu idam śāstram anyonya vyāhatam katham pramāṇam syāt bhuvaneśvarī tantre hi sā eva mahatī sarva kāraṇam iti ca ucyate tripurātantre tu tripurā eva tathā bhaivarī tantre bhairavī evam kubjikā ādi tantreṣu anyā ca anyā ca na ca bahvīnām sarva uttama tvam upapadyate iti atas uktam hrīṅkārī tripurā bhairavi iti ādi nāmabhiḥ sā bhagavati ekā eva abhidhīyate atas na vyāghātaḥ iti śāktāḥ ca trividhāḥ mahāvāmāḥ madhyavāmāḥ aṇu vāmāḥ ca iti ete eva kvacid śākta śāmbhavā aṇa śabdaiḥ ucyante tatra ādyānām mata viśeṣam darśayati tasyāḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.278a–2.2.279.1	 tasyāḥ sadāśiva ādyāḥ ca jāyante deva mānuṣāḥ bhūta bhautikam api etat iti tasyāḥ kevalāyāḥ eva śakteḥ sadāśiva grahaṇena mata antarāt bhedaḥ darśitaḥ tatra sadāśivasya śaktitas janma anabhyupagamāt evam upanyastam mahā vāma matam tāvat ayuktam iti āha tat iti  tat na upapadyate nirantara upanyastam mahā vāma matam tat iti parāmṛśati kutas iti ākāṅkṣāyām sūtram utpatti asambhavāt iti tat vayā ākhyātum tāvat vaya āptim upapādayati dṛṣṭā iti dṛṣṭā pumbhyaḥ sadā sṛṣṭiḥ strī pumbhyaḥ vā viśeṣataḥ kevalābhyaḥ na hi strībhyaḥ tatas utpatti asambhavāt 
NSu_2.2.280a.1–2.2.280a.4	 na arcyam mahā vāma matam atra sṛṣṭi śabdena apattyā utpattiḥ vivakṣitāḥ na sṛṣṭi mātram tasya kevalābhyaḥ api strībhyaḥ darśanāt sadā iti vyabhicāra abhāvam sūcayati vā śabdaḥ tuśabda arthaḥ viśeṣataḥ prācuryeṇa keṣāñcid eva hi droṇa ādīnām sṛṣṭiḥ kevalebhyaḥ puruṣebhyaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ nanu acatuḥ ādi sūtreṇa strīpuṃsebhyaḥ iti bhavitavyam strī puṃbhyaḥ iti katham samāsa antaḥ vidhiḥ anityaḥ a iti bhaviṣyati yat vā dvandvāt paraḥ samāsa antaḥ asau nipātitaḥ atra tu strībhiḥ sahitāḥ pumāṃsaḥ tebhyaḥ iti na dvandvaḥ iti na bhaviṣyati kevalābhyaḥ puruṣān anugṛhītābhyaḥ tatas kim iti atas sūtram vyākhyāti tatas iti yatas evam vyāptiḥ yatas ca prakṛtā kevalāḥ śiva ādīnām tatas janma aṅgīkārāt tatas kāraṇāt tatas śakteḥ apatya utpatti asambhavāt iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.280a.5–2.2.280a.6	 ayam atra prayogaḥ ādi kālīna apattya utpattiḥ na kevala strī kṛtāḥ apatya utpatti tvāt yāpattya utpattiḥ sā na kevala strī kartṛkā yathā sampratipannāḥ sā hi kadācid puruṣa mātrāt kvacid puruṣa anugṛhītābhyaḥ strībhyaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ na punar kvāpi kevalābhyaḥ strībhyaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yena ukta vyāpteḥ vyabhicāraḥ syāt iti yat vā śaktiḥ na apatti aprasavitrī kevala strī tvāt sampratipanna kevala strī vat atra kevalābhyaḥ na hi strībhyaḥ iti anvaya kathanam dṛṣṭā ityādi tadvayabhicāra parihāra artham iti jñātavyam yadi vā kevala strī tvāt na apatya prasavitrī ced śaktiḥ syāt tadā kevala puruṣa tvāt puruṣottamaḥ api tathā na syāt iti ākṣepam apākartum prāk eva dṛṣṭā ityādi uktam asiddham ca kevala tvam tasya lakṣmīpateḥ iti āśayena strī puṃbhyaḥ iti uktam kevalābhyaḥ iti tu vyāpti upapādakam athavā yatnirākṛtau viśeṣasya bhāvāt a iti anena asya doṣasya asādhāraṇa tvam uktam tad upapādanāya dṛṣṭa ityādi upanyāsaḥ idānīm adhika āśaṅkayā mata antaram utthāpayati vāmaiḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.280b.1–2.2.281ab.3	 vāmaiḥ anyat udīryate madhya vāmaiḥ iti arthaḥ anyat mahā vāma siddhāntāt kim tat iti atas āha śivā iti śiva upasarjanā śaktiḥ sasarja idam samantataḥ iti śivaḥ upasarjanam yasyāḥ sā śiva upasarjanā idam iti asya eva vyākhyānam samantataḥ deśe kāle ca vartamānam kāryam iti etat uktam bhavati na utpatti asambhavaḥ asmad mate asti asmābhiḥ śiva sahitāyāḥ śakteḥ viśva prasavasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt na ca evam dvayoḥ sarva utkṛṣṭa tvam viruddham āpadyate śivasya śaktim pati upasarjana tva aṅgīkārāt iti etat pratiṣedhati tat ca iti  tat ca upapannam na atra api utpatti asambhavasya aparihārāt iti bhāvaḥ na ca kartuḥ karaṇam 
NSu_2.2.281bc.1–2.2.281bc.3	 śivasya akaraṇa tvataḥ adeha tvāt akaraṇa tvataḥ iti asya eva sva padasya varṇa nama deha tvāt iti yat vā akaraṇa tvataḥ jñāna ādi kāraṇa abhāvāt iti arthaḥ tat eva katham iti atas akaraṇa tvataḥ nirindriya tvāt iti uktam tat api kutas iti atas uktam adeha tvāt iti etat uktam bhavati dehavatā hi śivena apatya utpattau śakteḥ sācivyam ācaraṇīyam na videhena tasya pralīna vat indriya ādi vijñāna ādi vikalasya tad anupapatteḥ na ca śiva deha utpattau kevalāyāḥ śakteḥ śaktiḥ asti prāc ukta doṣāt anyathā atrā api tathā upapattau śiva aṅgīkāra vaiyarthya āpatteḥ ca na ca śiva sahitāyāḥ videhasya sāhāyya karaṇa anupapatteḥ atas aṅgīkṛtasya api śivasya ajāgala stanāyita tvena atra api utpatti a sambhavaḥ eva iti mata antaram utthāpayati api hi iti 
NSu_2.2.281cd.1–2.2.282a.2	 api hi anye brūyuḥ sarvajñam īśvaram aṇuvāmā anye api iti anvayaḥ tān eva viśeṣa nāmnā aha aṇu vāmā iti asya matasya loke pracura tām sūcayitum hi śabdaḥ sarvajñam iti upalakṣaṇam jagat sṛṣṭayā ādi upayukta sakala kāraṇa upetam idam uktam bhavati śiva sahitā śaktiḥ jagat jananī iti abhyupacchataḥ mama na ukta doṣaḥ śivasya svābhāvika sārvajña ādimattvena deha indriya anapekṣaṇāt līlā vigraha grahaṇena śakti sāhāyya karaṇasya api upapatteḥ iti tat idam dūṣayati na tat iti 
NSu_2.2.282a.1–2.2.282a.3	 na tat yuktam kutas iti atra sūtram vijñāna ādi bhāve vā tat apratiṣedhaḥ iti tasya arthaḥ śivasya vijñāna ādi bhāve aṅgīkṛte tasya matasya pratiṣedhaḥ na kriyate iti nanu idam matam anumānam na vā na ādyaḥ ukta artha viruddha tvāt na tat yuktam iti asya ca ayogāt dvitīye katham tat apratiṣedhaḥ iti uktam katham ca na tat yuktam iti atra asya hetu tvam iti atas tat apratiṣedhaḥ iti niveśayitum utsūtram tāvat hetum āha īśa iti vijñāna ādi bhāve vā tat apratiṣedhaḥ 
NSu_2.2.282b.1–2.2.282cd.1	 īśa vāda praveśanāt śaiva mata praveśa āpatteḥ iti arthaḥ nanu śaivāḥ sārvajña ādi guṇa upetam śivam ekam eva abhyupayanti śāktāḥ tu śivam śaktim ca iti asti mahān siddhānta bhedaḥ tat katham śāktānām śaiva mata anupraveśaḥ iti atas āpādita doṣaḥ ayam iti āśayavān āha sārvajñādi iti sārvajñi ādi guṇaiḥ yuktam guru kalpanayā dvayam 
NSu_2.2.283a.1–2.2.283a.3	 na yujyate satyam śāktaiḥ sārvajña ādi guṇaiḥ yuktam śiva śakti ākhyam dvayam abhyupagatam iti tat tu na yujyate kalpanā gauravāt tathā hi na tāvat sārvajña ādi upetam pratyakṣeṇa siddham para citta vṛttīnām param pratyatīndriya tvāt na api āgamena śakta āgamasya prāmāṇya sandehāt apauruṣeya āgamasya pareṇa prāmāṇya anādaraṇāt ādaraṇe vā tatas eva sva mata hāneḥ tatas prapañca racanā anupapattyā eva tathāvidham vastu kalpanīyam ekena eva sārvajña ādimatā sarvam nirvahati eva tathā ca vṛthā tathābhūta dvaya kalpane kalpanā gauravam eva atas ekam eva tādṛśam vastu aṅgīkāryam iti tatas kim iti atas āha tatas iti 
NSu_2.2.283b.1–2.2.283.4	 tatas tu īśaḥ ekaḥ eva prayojakaḥ ukta hetoḥ ekasya eva sārvajñādimataḥ aṅgī kārya tve kevala śakteḥ aṅgīkṛtau= utpatti asambhava prasaṅgāt īśa eva sārvajña ādi upetaḥ prapañca racanāyāḥ prayojakaḥ śāktaiḥ aṅgīkartavyaḥ syāt evañca katham na śaiva mata praveśaḥ śākta matasya iti kim atas yadi evam śāktasya apasiddhāntena parājayaḥ syāt iti ced satyam tāvatā api bhagavat siddhāntān avakptiḥ eva śaiva matasya api bhavat siddhānta virodhi tvena nirāka tarvya tvāt iti ataḥ tat apratiṣedhaḥ iti sūtra aṃśam sa upapattikam niveśayati uktā iti ukta doṣaḥ ca tad pakṣaḥ iti na eva atra dūṣyate yatas śaiva pakṣaḥ nirantara atīta adhikaraṇaḥ eva ukta doṣaḥ atas atra na punar dūṣyate punarukti doṣa bhayāt iti evam pratyekam apākṛtāni trīṇi api matāni sādhāraṇa dūṣaṇena nirākartum sūtram vipratiṣedhāt ca iti tat vyācaṣṭe śruti iti vipratiṣedhāt ca 
NSu_2.2.284.1–2.2.284.3	 śruti smṛti itihāsānām sāmastyena virodhataḥ satām jugupsita tvāt ca na aṅgīkāryam hi tat matam satām madhye jugupsita tvāt goptum iṣṭa tvāt yat vā kartṛ karmaṇoḥ kṛtī iti kartari ṣaṣṭhī sadbhiḥ nindita tvāt iti arthaḥ hi śabdena śruti ādīnām prasiddha tām dyotayati kecid imām catur sūtrīm bhāgavata m atanirākaraṇa para tayā vyācakṣate tathā hi pāñcarātrikā vāsudevāt saṅkarṣaṇaḥ nāma jīvaḥ jāyate saṅkarṣaṇāt pradyumna saṃjñakam manaḥ jāyate pradyumnāt aniruddha saṃjñakaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ jāyate iti prakriyām āhuḥ tatra sūtram utpatti asambhavāt iti vāsudevāt saṅkarṣaṇaḥ nāma jīvaḥ jāyate iti tāvat ayuktam jīvabhya utpatti asambhavāt utpattimataḥ hi jīvasya anitya tva ādayaḥ doṣāḥ prasajyeran tatas ca na eva asya bhagavat prāptiḥ mokṣaḥ syāt na jāyatemriyate iti ādi śruti smṛti virodhāt ca 
NSu_2.2.284.4	 na ca kartuḥ karaṇam saṅkarṣaṇa saṃjñakāt jīvāt pradyumna saṃjñakasya manasaḥ janma api pañca rotra uktam na upapadyate na hi loke kartuḥ devadatta ādeḥ paraśvadha ādi utpadyamānam karaṇam dṛśyate yadā ca utpadyate tadā karma eva na karaṇam jīvasya kartā manaḥ ca karaṇam tatas tat na tatas janimat bhavitum arhati etasmāt jāyate prāṇaḥ manaḥ sarva indriyāṇi cetāṃśvarāt eva manaḥ janana śravaṇāt ca etena pradyumnāt aniruddha saṃjñakaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ jāyate iti api pratyuktam 
NSu_2.2.284.5	 atha api syāt na eva ete saṅkaṣarṇa ādayaḥ jīva ādi bhāvena abhipreyante kim tarhi īśvarāḥ eva ete sarve jñāna aiśvarya śakti bala vīrya tejobhiḥ aiśvaraiḥ dharmaiḥ anvitāḥ abhyupagamyante tasmāt na ayam doṣaḥ iti atra parihāram paṭhati vijñāna ādi bhāve vā tat apratiṣedhaḥ paramātmanaḥ vāsudevasya iva saṅkarṣaṇa ādīnām api vijñāna ādi ṣāḍguṇya sadbhāve tata eva ca īśvara tve abhyupagamyamāne api tasya utpatti asambhava doṣasya apratiṣedhaḥ prakāra antareṇa prāpnoti eva ayam utpatti asambhava doṣaḥ tathā hi na tāvat ete catvāraḥ parasparam bhinnāḥ aneka īśvara kalpanāyām gaurava ādi doṣa āpatteḥ abhede tu katham svatas eva svasya utpattiḥ sambhavet niratiśaya tvāt na ca ete bhagavat vyūhāḥ catur saṅkhayāyām eva avatiṣṭheran tad vyūhānām ananta tva abhyupagamāt 
NSu_2.2.284.6–2.2.284.7	 vipratiṣedhāt ca paraspara virodhaḥ ca pañca rātre bhavati jñāna aiśvarya bala vīrya śaktitejsām bhagavataḥ guṇāḥ iti kvacid ucyate ātmānaḥ eva ete bhagavantaḥ vāsudevasya iti kvacid bhagavat svarūpa tvam ityadi veda pratiṣedhaḥ ca atra bhavati bhagavān śāṇḍilyaḥ ṣaṣ aṅgam vedam adhītya tasmin mahati āmnāye niṣṭhām anadhigacchan yaḥ sarva paraḥ dharmaḥ yasmāt na bhūyas asti katham tam vidyām iti evam balavat vivekam ātiṣṭhamānaḥ babhūva tatra bhagavate śāṇḍilyāya bhagavatā saṅkarṣaṇena vyaktena śabdavat śāstram proktam iti veda nindā darśanāt tathā ca anyatra adhītāḥ bhagavan vedāḥ sa aṅga upāṅgāḥ sa vistarāḥ śrutāni ca mayā aṅgāni vākaḥ vākya yutāni ca na ca eteṣu samasteṣu saṃśayena vinā kvacid śreyaḥ mārgam prapaśyāmi yena siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati a iti tasmāt ayuktam pañca rātra śāstram iti tām imām apavyākhyām pratyākhyāti pañcarātra iti 
NSu_2.2.285a–2.2.287.1	 pañca rātra niṣedha artham etāni ācakṣate yadi sūtrāṇi ati viruddham tat ācakṣate vyācakṣate yat iti asya arthe yadi śabdaḥ tadvayā ākhyānam atiśayena viruddham sva vyāhatam pramāṇa antara pratihatam ca iti arthaḥ tat katham iti atas sva vyāhatim tāvat upapādayati yatas iti  yatas āha sa bhārate yasmāt sūtra kāraḥ eva bhārate pañca rātrasya prāmāṇyam āha tasmāt atra tad nirākaraṇe sūtrakārasya sva vacana vyāhatiḥ syāt iti arthaḥ tad bhārata vacanam udāharati pañca rātrasya iti pañca rātrasya kṛtsnasya vaktā nārāyaṇaḥ svayam jñāneṣu eteṣu rāja indra sarveṣu etat viśiṣṭate pañca rātra vidaḥ ye tu yathā krama parāḥ nṛpa ekānta bhāva upagatāḥ vāsudevam viśanti te 
NSu_2.2.288a.1–2.2.288a.3	 iti sāṅkhayam yogaḥ pāśupatam veda āraṇyakam eva ca jñānāni etāni bhinnāni utāho na iti ca ucyatām a iti jñāna kāraṇa tvad jñāna śabda vācyāni sāṅkhayā ādīni śāstrāṇi anyonya viruddhānyuta aviruddhāni iti praśnasyasā aṅkhayam yogaḥ pāśupatam veda āraṇyakam eva ca jñānāni etāni bhinnāni na atra kāryā vicāraṇāa iti parihāraḥ abhihitaḥ tatas punar vastu vikalpa anupapatteḥ paraspara viruddhānām sarveṣām prāmāṇya yogāt eteṣu kim pramāṇam iti jijñāsāyām sāṅkhayasya vaktā kapilaḥ a ityādinā sāṅkhayā ādīnām anāpta kartṛ tvam abhidhāya prāgveda āraṇyaka pada upalakṣitasya pañca rātrasya parama āpta tvena nārāyaṇena praṇītattvāt prāmāṇyam iti anena vākyena ucyate vedānām tu apauruṣeya tayā svatas eva prāmāṇyam siddham eva iti na uktam phalavat pravṛtti janaka tvāt api pañca rātrasya prāmāṇyam iti pañca rātra vidaḥ iti anena vākyena ucyate yathā krama parāḥ devatā tāratamya parāḥ ekānta bhāva upagatāḥ avyabhicāriṇīm bhaktim prāptāḥ prakāra antareṇa sva vyāhatim āha gītā ca iti 
NSu_2.2.288ab.1–2.2.288ab.4	 gītā ca tad śāstra saṅkṣepaḥ iti hīritam tad śāstra saṅkṣepaḥ pañca rātra saṅkṣepaḥ iti hīritam brahma rudra indra sūryāṇām yat dattam viṣṇunā purā pañcarātra ātmakam jñānam vyāsaḥ adāt pāṇḍaveṣu tat teṣām eva avatāreṣu senā madhye arjunāya ca prādāt gītā iti vinirdiṣyam saṅkṣepeṇa āyuyutsave a ityādinā purāṇa vākyena iti śeṣaḥ tatas pramāṇa tayā pañca rātra saṅkṣepa rūpām gītām praṇītavataḥ bādarāyaṇasya pañca rātra prāmāṇyam anumatam eva iti punar atra tad nirākaraṇe katham sva vyāhatiḥ na bhavet iti sva vyāhatim prakāra antareṇa darśayati vedena iti 
NSu_2.2.288cd.1–2.2.289c.3	 vedena pañca rātreṇa bhaktayā yajñena ca eva hi dṛśyaḥ aham na anyathā dṛśyaḥ varṣa koṭi śataiḥ api iti vārāha vacanam evam varāhapurāṇe bhagavat darśana sādhana tvena veda vat pañcarātrasya prāmāṇyam abhyupagamya iha punar tad nirākaraṇe vyāghātaḥ eva iti evam sva vyāhatim upapādya pramāṇa antara virodham darśayati ślokāḥ iti 
NSu_2.2.289d.1–2.2.289d.2	 ślokāḥ iti vacaḥ śrutau vacaḥ asti iti śeṣaḥ ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ atharva aṅgirasaḥ itihāsa purāṇam vidyāḥ upaniṣadaḥ ślokāḥ sūtrāṇi anuvyākhyānāni vyākhyānāni a iti asyām śrutau ṛgveda ādi pramāṇa uddeśa prasaṅge ślokāḥ iti pañca rātram upāttam pañca rātra vidaḥ mukhyāḥ a iti prakṛta pañcarātra viṣaya tvena ṛṣīn uvāca tān sarvān adṛśyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ kṛtam śata sahasram hi ślokānām hitam uttamam a iti śloka śabdasya bhārate prayogāt chandogaśrutau ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ iti ārabhya ekāyanam iti pañca rātram ucyate tad samākhyayā śloka śabdaḥ pañca rātra viṣayaḥ aśeṣojñāyate atas śrutyā pañca rātra prāmāṇyam siddham iti tad aprāmāṇyavādaḥ śruti viruddhaḥ spaṣṭa śruti virodham ca darśayati vedaiḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.2.290ab.1–2.2.290cd.1	 vedaiḥ ca pañca rātraiḥ ca dhyeyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ veda pañcarātra ukta prakāreṇaṇā iti arthaḥ saṃhitā bhedāt pañcarātraiḥ iti bahuvacanam paraspara viruddha śāstra dvaya anusāreṇa katham dhyānam iti atas uktam pañca rātram ca iti iti ādi veda vacanaiḥ ca pañca rātrā prāmāṇya kathanam viruddham iti śeṣaḥ tatas kim iti atas āha pañca rātram iti pañca rātram ca vedāḥ ca vidyā ekā eva dvi dheyate 
NSu_2.2.291a–2.2.291c.4	 iti ādi veda vacanaiḥ pañca rātram apodyate katham eva yatas evam pañca rātra nirākaraṇam sva vyāhatam pramāṇa antara vyāhatam ca atas atra sūtrakāreṇa pañca rātram apodyate dūṣyate iti katham eva vaktum śakyate na hi vyāhata bhāṣī bhagavān iti syāt matam na asti ayam vyāghātaḥ yaḥ asau nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ avaktāt prasiddhaḥ paramātmā saḥ ātmanā atmānam anekadhā vyūhya vyavasthitaḥ tam itthambhūtam ṣāḍguṇya vigraham bhagavantam abhigamana upādāna ijyā svādhyāya yogaiḥ pañca kāla abhidhānaiḥ aneka kālam iṣṭvā kṣīṇa kleśaḥ bhagavantam eva pratipādyate a ityādeḥ pañcarātra āditasya arthasya svīkṛta tvāt tad para tā eva bhārata ādi vākyānām upapatteḥ iti mā evam evam sati sāṅkhayādi śāstreṣu api upādeya aṃśasya vidyamāna tvena viśeṣataḥ pañca rātra prāmāṇya abhidhāna anupapatteḥ kṛtsnasya iti viśeṣaṇa anupapatteḥ ca ṛc a ādyāḥ bhāratam ca eva pañca rātram atha akhilam veda arthapūrakam jñeyam pañca rātram yatas akhilam a iti akhila śabda virodhāt ca iti itas ca na pañca rātra dūṣaṇam yuktam iti āha atra iti 
NSu_2.2.291c.1–2.2.292a.2	 atra doṣaḥ kaḥ atra pañca rātre kaḥ doṣaḥ yena tat nirākriyeta na kaḥ api iti arthaḥ nanu katham doṣaḥ na asti jīva utpatteḥ asambhāvitāyāḥ tatra ukta tvāt iti atas aṅgīkāra vādena āha utpattiḥ iti  utpattiḥ jñaḥ atas iti api iha eva uktā kim jīva utpati abhidhāna mātram pañca rātrā prāmāṇya hetutayā upādīyate uta ābhūta bhavana rūpa jīva utpatti abhidhānam ādye tu utpatti mātram iha eva pramāṇa tayā abhyupagate mīmāṃsā śāstre jñaḥ atas eva a iti sūtreṇa uktam apipadena sarve eva te ātmānaḥ vyuccaranti a iti śrutau= uktā iti samuccinoti tatas veda tad mī māṃsayoḥ api aprāmāṇyam syāt anyathā hetoḥ anaikānti āpatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ jñaḥ atas eva a iti sūtra arthe vipratipannam prati śrutiḥ eva udāha tarvyā syāt etat dvitīyaḥ eva hetuḥ upādīyate nacāsau śruti sūtrayoḥ vartate tatra hi prāk vidyamānasya eva jīvasya deha ādi upādhi apekṣayā eva utpattiḥ ucyate na tu abhūta bhāva lakṣaṇa iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.2.292ab.1–2.2.292ab.3	 nacābhūta bhāvaḥ tatra api kathyate tatra api pañca rātre api yathā hi śruti sūtrayoḥ pratītam api jīva jana namabhūta bhavanam vihāya upādhi viṣayam vyākhyāyate tathā pañca rātra uktam api tat tathā vyākhyāyatām tatas ca svarūpa asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti bhāvaḥ nu viṣamaḥ ayam upanyāsaḥ śruti sūtrayoḥ khaluana ādi māyayā suptaḥ a  nānādi tvā t a ityādināna ādi karma sambandhaḥ abhidhīyate na hi abhūtvā bhāvavataḥ jīvasya asau= upapadyate atas tad anurodhāt tatra pratītam api jīva jananam anyathā netavyam eva na ca tathāvidham bādhakam iha asti yena mukhya artham parityājyā mukhya artham pratipadyemahi tatas mukhya arthe grāhye na hetoḥ asiddhiḥ iti atas āha anādi iti 
NSu_2.2.292cd.1–2.2.293ab.3	 anādi karmaṇā baddhaḥ jīvaḥ saṃsāra maṇḍale vāsudeva icchayā nityam bhramati iti hi tad vacaḥ tat vacaḥ pañca rātra vākyam śruti sūtra vat pañcarātre api jīvasya anādi karma sambandha abhidhānāt tad anurodhena tatra uktam jīva jananam api anyathāvyākhyātavyam eva pakṣapāte kāraṇa abhāvāt tathā ca hetoḥ asiddhiḥ tad avasthā iti arthaḥ atha api syāt na kutra api veda ādau saṃsāra sādi tva ādikam jīvānām abhūtvā abhavana jñāpakam spaṣṭam uktam atas sa avakāśam idam anyathā yojyam eva iti ced etat api samānam atra iti bhāvena āha na hi iti 
NSu_2.2.293cd.1–2.2.293cd.3	 na hi saṃsāra sādi tvam pañca rātra uditam kvacid anena eva nyāyena naca kartuḥ karaṇam a iti etat api apākaraṇīyam iti tathā hi kim karaṇam kartuḥ na jāyate iti vyāptiḥ kim vā yasyām kriyāyām yat karaṇam tat tad kriyā kartuḥ na jāyate iti na ādyaḥ vyabhicārāt anyathā karaṇānām anutpatti prasaṅgāt na dvitīyaḥ prakṛte api tathā abhāva asiddheḥ etasmāt jāyate iti śruti virodhaḥ api kim jīvān manasaḥ janana mātra abhyupagame syāt uta janana viśeṣa abhyupagame na ādyaḥ annam aśitam tredhā vidhīyate a ityādi śruteḥ pratyaham manasaḥ jīvāt utpatteḥ na dvitīyaḥ tathā tvasya prakṛte api asammateḥ evam manasaḥ api ahaṅkāra janmani doṣaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ evam jīva ādi padānām yathā śruta artha abhyupagamena sūtra dvaya āropita doṣa parihāraḥ abhihitaḥ idānīm vāsudevāt saṅkaṣarṇaḥ nāma jīvaḥ jāyate ityādi vākyasya para kalpitāt arthāt artha antaram āha jīva iti 
NSu_2.2.294.1–2.2.295ab.2	 jīva abhimāni śeṣasya nāmnā saṅkarṣaṇasya tu vāsudevāt janiḥ proktā pradyumnasya tatas tathā manaḥ abhimāninaḥ kāmasya evam jīva śabdasya pravṛtti nimittam upapādayitum jīva abhimāni iti uktam saṅkarṣaṇasya bhagavataḥ janeḥ abhāvāt tat vyudāsāya nāmnā saṅkarṣaṇasya śeṣasya iti uktam proktā vāsudevāt ityādinā vākyena tatas saṅkarṣaṇāt tathā śabdaḥ samuccaye janiḥ proktā iti arthaḥ manobhimāninaḥ kāmasya iti asya pūrvavat eva prayojanam evaṃśabdena pradyumnāt aniruddha saṃjñakaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ jāyate iti atra api ukta vyākhyāna nyāyam atidiśati pradyumnāt ahaṅkāra abhimāninaḥ kāmaputrasya aniruddhasya janiḥ proktā iti 
NSu_2.2.295ab.3	 nanu evam api utpatti asambhava doṣaḥ tad avasthaḥ śeṣa ādīnām api jīva tvāt iti mā evam na hi atra saṅkarṣaṇa ādīnām utpattiḥ ucyate kintu jāyate itrata janiḥ ucyate janiḥ ca prādurbhāvaḥ janī prādurbhāvaḥ iti paṭhanti prādurbhāvaḥ ca śarīra utpattau jīvasya su prasiddhaḥ tat idam uktam janiḥ proktā iti atas eva pūrvaḥ abhyupagama vādaḥ artha antaram api āha sākṣāt iti 
NSu_2.2.295b–2.2.295e.2	 sākṣāt hareḥ kvacid saṅkarṣaṇa ādi nām nā eva nitya acintya uru śaktitaḥ vyūhaḥ uktaḥ śeṣa ādayaḥ api bhagavat aṃśa tvāt haritvena ucyate tat vyudāsāya sākṣāt iti uktam sākṣāt hareḥ eva saṅkarṣaṇa ādi nāmnā vyūhaḥ uktaḥ iti anvayaḥ nanu atra uktam tat apratiṣedhaḥ hareḥ utpatti abhāvāt iti atas uktam vyūhaḥ vibhāgaḥ eva uktaḥ na tu utpattiḥ iti yat api uktam kim ete anyonyam bhinnā uta na iti tasya uttaram hareḥ ekasya eva iti nanu evam tarhi niratiśaya tvāt katham svasmāt eva svasya vibhāgaḥ iti atas uktam nitya iti kinnāma durvibhāvyam bhagavati yat pramitam iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.2.295b–2.2.295e.4	 yat api uktam na evete bhagavat vyūhāḥ catur saṅkhayām eva pariniṣṭhitāḥ ananta tvāt iti tatra uttaram kvacid iti kāla viśeṣe prayojana viśeṣe ca iti arthaḥ anabhijñaḥ bhavān bhāgavata sampradāyasya ādi kāle hi bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ nija mukti pada pradāna ādi artham vāsudeva ādi catur vyūhaḥ babhūva tatas kāla antare prayojana antara artham daśa dvādaśa ādi vyūhaḥ jātaḥ sā iyam śuddha sṛṣṭiḥ iti pāñcarātrikaiḥ abhidhīyate tad apekṣayā catur vyūha varṇanam katham nāma anupapannam iti evam adhikāri viśeṣa ārādhana artham iyamuktiḥ yuktā eva yathā uktam eka mūrtiḥ catur mūtiḥ athavā pañcamūrtikaḥ dvādaśa ādi prabhedaḥ vā pūjyate sat janaiḥ hariḥ a iti artha antara kathanasya prayojanam āha anyathā iti 
NSu_2.2.295ef.1–2.2.295ef.3	 anyathā ānūdya katham duṣṭa tvam ucyate evam artha antara vivakṣayā prayuktasya vākyasya anyathā anuvādam vidhāya dūṣaṇa abhidhānam katham kriyate chala prasaṅgāt iti na ca jīva ādi śabdānām anupapattiḥ bhagavataḥ eva mukhyatas prāṇa dhāraṇa ādimataḥ tad atha ṛtvāt yat ca vipratiṣedhāt ca iti sūtra artha tayā kalpitam paraspara vyāghātaḥ asti pañca rātraḥ iti tat api nitya acintya uru śaktitaḥ iti anena eva parihṛtam bhagavat śaktyā eva guṇa guṇyādi vyavahāra upapattiḥ iti samarthitaḥ ca bheda pade abhiṣiktaḥ pramita sarva nirvāha hetuḥ viśeṣaḥ yat api uktam śāṇḍilya vṛttānta kathane pañca rātrasya veda vidveṣaḥ pratīyate iti tat nirākaroti yadi iti 
NSu_2.2.296.1–2.2.296.2	 yadi vidyāt catur vedān iti vat veda pūraṇam pañca rātrāt iti kutas dveṣaḥ śāṇḍilya vartane yadi vidyāt catur vedān sa aṅga upaniṣadān dvijaḥ nacet purāṇam saṃvidyāt na eva sa syāt vicakṣaṇaḥa iti atra vākye yathā itihāsa purāṇa āditaḥ veda pūraṇam abhipreyate tathā atra api pañca rātrāt veda pūraṇam eva abhipretam iti vyākhyāne sati śāṇḍilya vartane abhidhīyamāne pañca rātrasya veda vidveṣaḥ pratīyate iti kutas na pratīyate iti arthaḥ yat vā evam vākya dvaye samāne sati śāṇḍilya vartana abhidhāyinī ā iva vākye bhavataḥ dveṣaḥ kuto yena yadi vidyāt iti etat itihāsa purāṇayoḥ veda pūraka tva abhiprāyam ādāya bhagavān śāṇḍilyaḥ a iti ādikam pañca rātrasya veda virodhitvā abhiprāyam iti vyākhyāyate iti 
NSu_2.2.296.3–2.2.296.4	 ayam atra uttara kramaḥ yadi etat vākya balāt pañcarātrasya ced avirodhi tvam kalpyate tadā yadi vidyāt iti vākya balāt itihāsa purāṇayoḥ api tat kalpyatām viśeṣa abhāvāt atha tatra itihāsa ādeḥ vedapūraka tvam abhiprāyaḥ atra api saḥ eva kalpyatām viśeṣa abhāvāt itihāsa purāṇābhyām vedam samupabṛṃhayet a iti uttara vākya anurodhāt tathā kalpanam yuktam iti ced atra apiveda arthapūrakam jñeya pañca rātram a ityādi vākya anurodhāt tathā kalpanam iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ anyatra vidveṣāt iti parama saṃhitā vākyam api evam eva vyākhyātavyam apavyākhyāna nirākaraṇam upasaṃharati atas parama iti 
NSu_2.2.297.1–2.2.297.2	 atas parama śāstrorudveṣāt uditam āsuraiḥ dūṣaṇam pañca rātrasya vīkṣāyām api na kṣamam vīkṣāyām api na kṣamam vyadhikaraṇam iti arthaḥ tarhi kasmāt uditam iti atas uktam parama iti parama śāstram pañca rātram dveṣaḥ eva kim nibandhanaḥ iti atas uktam āsuraiḥ iti bhāgavata śāstre hi svābhāvikaḥ eva hi vidveṣaḥ asurāṇām na tu doṣa darśana nimittaḥ ete ca asura sambandhinaḥ tad svabhāvāḥ ca vṛtti kārāḥ āsuraiḥ eva uktam na tu sūtrakāreṇa iti anena tasmāt na ayam sūtra arthaḥ kintu śākta mata nirāsaḥ eva iti uktam bhavati 
NSu_2.2.297.3	 etena etat api pratyuktam yat kecid idam adhikaraṇam sāṅkhayā ādi vat pañcarātrasya api aprāmāṇyam āśaṅkaya tad nirāsa artham iti varṇayanti tathā hi uktarītyā autpatti asambhavāt anaca kartuḥ karaṇam a iti sūtra dvayena pañca rātrā prāmāṇyam pūrva pakṣayitvā vijñāna ādi bhāve vā tat apratiṣedhaḥ iti siddhāntitam vā śabdāt pakṣaḥ viparivartate vijñānam ca ādi ca iti paraṃbrahma vijñāna ādi saṅkarṣaṇa pradyumna aniruddhānām api para brahma bhāve sati tad pratipādanasya śāstrasya prāmāṇyam na pratiṣiddhayate vipratiṣedhāt ca pratiṣiddhāḥ hi jīva utpattiḥ asmin= api tantre yathā uktam parama saṃhitāyām acetanā para arthā ca nityā satata vikriyā triguṇā karmaṇām kṣetram prakṛte rūpam ucyate prāpti rūpeṇa sambandhaḥ tasyāḥ ca puruṣasya ca sa hi anādiḥ anantaḥ ca parama arthena niścitaḥ a iti 
NSu_2.2.297.4–2.2.297.5	 pañca rātrā prāmāṇya śaṅkāyām prāptāyām eva hi tad nirāsāya prayāsaḥ sātharkaḥ syāt na ca vyadhikaraṇāni dūṣaṇāni tad śaṅkām prāpayitum īśate na hi chala uttarāṇi etāvat adhikaraṇam prayojayanti atiprasaṅgāt prakaraṇānanuguram ca etat para mata nirāsaḥ hi atra prakṛtaḥ na tu sva mata samarthanam kṛtam ca tatna vilakṣaṇa tvāt a ityādinā sūtra akṣarān anurūpam ca eta t vaya ākhyānam na hi atra vijñāna ādi padam brahmaṇi kvacid prayuktam tat apratiṣedhaḥ iti ca vyartham na prājña tvāt iti eva vaktavyam laghu ca evam sūtram vyaktam ca syāt tasmāt uktaḥ eva sūtra arthaḥ iti sthitam pāda artham upasaṃharati atas aśeṣa iti 
NSu_2.2.298.1–2.2.298.3	 atas aśeṣa jagat dhātā nirdoṣa uru guṇa arṇavaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ śruti gaṇa tātparyāt avasīyate sāṅkhayādi virodhi samayānām nirasta tvāt prathama adhyāye yat sakala śruti samanvayena bhagavataḥ lakṣaṇa dvayam sādhitam tat nirṇītam eva iti arthaḥ syāt etat na nigṛhya kathām kuryāt a ityādi smṛti niṣiddham para nirākaraṇam idam na kāryam eva tat kutas sāṅkhayādi nirākaraṇam kṛtam iti ced na asya niṣedhasya sat viṣaya tvāt kutas saṅkocaḥ iti ced śruti smṛtyoḥ śruteḥ balavat tvāt śrutau ca para nirākaraṇasya kartavya tayā avagata tvāt iti āśayavān andhantamaḥ praviśanti ye avidyām upāsate tatas bhūyas iva te tamaḥ yaḥ u vidyāyām ratāḥ vidyām ca avidyām ca yaḥ tad veda ubhayam saha avidyayā mṛtyum tīrtvā vidyayā amṛtam aśnute a iti mantra dvayam arthataḥ anuvadati andham iti 
NSu_2.2.299.1–2.2.300.2	 andham tamaḥ praviśanti ye tu avidyām upāsate tatas bhūyas iva āpsyanti ye tasyāḥ na eva nindakāḥ tatas vidyām avidyām ca yaḥ jānāti ubhayam saha doṣa jñānāt atītya etān vidyayā amṛtam aśnute avidyām avidya kalpitam avidyamāna artham āyānti tamaḥ iva śabdaḥ kiñcid arthaḥ uśabdaḥ avadhāraṇa arthaḥ ye kevalam vidyāyām eva ratāḥ iti uktyā labdhasya arthasya kathanam tasyāḥ na eva nindakāḥ iti anyathā vidyayā amṛtam aśnutaḥ iti anena virodhaḥ syāt tatas avidyā nirākaraṇa abhāve doṣa sadbhāvāt saha iti samuccaya niyamam dyotayati doṣa jñānāt atītya etām iti anena avidyayā duṣṭa tvena jñātayā mṛtyum tām eva avidyām tat kāryam duḥkha ādikam ca atītya tīrtvā aiti arthaḥ jñāyate 
NSu_2.2.300.3–2.2.300.4	 yadi api tattva jñānam na sva pakṣa pramāṇa mātreṇa bhavati yāvat para pakṣa pramāṇam na nirākriyate sat pratipakṣasya pramāṇasya nirṇaya anaṅga tvāt atas tattva jñānam kāmayamānena avaśyam sva pakṣa sādhanam iva para pakṣa nirasaḥ api vidheyaḥ eva iti upapatti siddhaḥ ayam arthaḥ tathā api āgama avaṣṭambhena pratyavatiṣṭhamānaḥ tathā eva bodhanīyaḥ iti āśayavatā mantrau= udāhṛtau= iti sarvam anavadyam na viyat aśruteḥ a ityādi pāda pratipādyam sa saṅgatikam darśayati atha iti 
NSu_2.3.1.1–2.3.1.2	 atha aśeṣa samāmnāya virodha apākṛtim prabhuḥ kariṣyan= adhidaiva adhibhūta jīva para ātmanām prabhuḥ sūtrakāraḥ anena vyāci khyāsita tayā buddhi sannihitena tṛtīyena pādena vaidikānām vacanānām parasparam avirodham virodha abhāvam darśayati iti pratipādya kathanam asya antarbhāva lakṣaṇām saṅgatim darśayitum uktam aśeṣa iti aśeṣāḥ ca te samāmnāya virodhāḥ ca iti vigrahaḥ kariṣyan iti adhyāya upakrama samaya apekṣayā sūtra kṛtā khalu sarvān api veda virodhān parihartum dvitīyaḥ ayam adhyāyaḥ ārabdhaḥ vaidikānām vacanānām paraspara virodhaḥ api tad antarbhūtaḥ eva iti atas tat apākaraṇam iha saṅgatam eva iti ānantarya lakṣaṇām saṅgatim darśayitum atha iti uktam avasara prāptau prādhānyāt yukti virodha parihārasya prāthamye tad prapañca ātmaka tvena samaya virodha parihārasya tat ā ānantarye sati śrutīnām paraspara virodha parihārasya bhavati ayam avasaraḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.1.3–2.3.1.4	 nanu evam tarhi asya pādasya caturtha pādāt bhedaḥ na syāt tatra api veda vacasām paraspara virodhasya apākriyamāṇa tvāt iti atas uktam adhidaiva iti adhidaivāni avyakta ādi abhimāni devatāḥ adhibhūtāni kārya kāraṇa upetāni viyat ādi bhūtāni idam uktam bhavati yadi api pāda dvaye veda vākyānām paraspara virodhaḥ eva nirasyate tathā api viṣaya bhedāt bhedaḥ bhaviṣyati iha adhidaiva ādi viṣaya vākyānām caturthe tu adhyātma viṣayāṇām iti naca evam asya pādasya aneka viṣaya tvena aneka tva āpattiḥ adhyātma itara viṣaya tvena ekatva upapatteḥ iti atra api krama niyame hetum ācāryaḥ eva vakṣyati 
NSu_2.3.1.5	 nanu ca veda vākyānām paraspara virodha parihāraḥ kimarthaḥ mithas viruddhānām prāmāṇya aniścayāt tad prāmāṇya niścaya arthaḥ iti ced na evam satyasya tarka śāstra tva prasaṅgena mīmāṃsā tu avyāghātāt iti ucyate brahmaṇaḥ aśeṣa jagat kāraṇa tva niścayaḥ hi aśeṣa jagat svarūpa nirṇaye tasya kāryatva ādi nirṇaye ca sati syāt na anyathā na ca tad viṣayāṇām vākyānām mithas vyāghāte tad svarūpa nirṇayaḥ bhavati atas adhidaiva ādi vastu tattva avadhāraṇa arthaḥ eva ayam mithas virodha parihāraḥ tat idam api uktam svarūpa nirṇayāya eva iti 
NSu_2.3.2.1–2.3.2.3	 svarūpa nirṇayāya eva vacanānām parasparam pādena anena avirodham darśayati amita dyutiḥ nanu kim katipaya vacanānām anyonya virodhaḥ parihriyate uta sarveṣām na ādyaḥ vaiyarthyāt tatra eva vacana antara virodha sadbhāvena anirṇaya tā davasthyāt na dvitīyaḥ veda vākyānām ananta tvena jñātum aśakyatvāt iti atas uktam amita dyutiḥ iti sarvajñaḥ iti arthaḥ etad pāda adhikaraṇa pūrva pakṣa siddhānta yuktīḥ saṅgṛhya āha anubhūti iti 
NSu_2.3.3.1–2.3.7.1	 anubhūti yukti bahu vāc vailomyam ca tatas adhikam etat sarvam sataḥ sāmyam dvāra vaiyarthyam eva ca dṛṣṭa yuktayanu sāri tva muktā anyārtha avirodhataḥ prasiddha nāma svīkāre bahu vākya anuvatiḥ tā loka dṛṣṭa anusāri tvam jīva sāmyam anāditā tatra tatra parijñānam guṇa sāmya śrutī tathā utpattimat tvam sva guṇān anubhūti alpa kalpane nānā śrutiḥ ca vaicitṛyam yuktayaḥ pūrva pakṣa gāḥ vyavasthā anupapattiḥ ca svātantryam anusāritāḥ mukhya tā śaktimat tvam ca vairūpyam sarva saṅgrahaḥ 
NSu_2.3.8.1–2.3.8.3	 gati ādiḥ īśa śaktiḥ ca sarva māna virodhitāḥ abhīṣya asiddhi suvyaktī śāstra siddhi virparyayaḥ viśeṣa kāraṇam ca iti siddhāntasya eva sādhakāḥ na viyat aśruteḥ atra adhikaraṇe anādiḥ vā ayam ākāśaḥ ityādi śrutīnām gauṇa tvam ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ iti ādi śrutīnām mukhya tvam upādāya viyataḥ utpattiḥ samarthitā tatra viyat padam na ākāśa mātra param kinnāma atha ha vāva nityāni puruṣaḥ prakṛtiḥ ātmā kālaḥ ityādi śruti vigāna viṣayāṇām parama ātmā atiriktānām prakṛti ādīnām upalakṣaṇa artham jñātavyam iti āśayavān āha prakṛtiḥ iti na viyat aśruteḥ 
NSu_2.3.9a–2.3.9c.3	 prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ kālaḥ devāḥ tad abhimāninaḥ mahat ādyāḥ ca jāyante prakṛtiḥ acetanā puruṣaḥ jīvaḥ tad abhimāninaḥ prakṛti ādi abhimāninaḥ mahat ādyāḥ iti mahat ahaṅkāra manaḥ buddhi indriya bhūta sūkṣma tanmātrāṇi ucyante prakṛtasya utpatti asambhavasya na iti pratiṣedhe labdham artham āha jāyante iti ayam abhisandhiḥ na tāvat prakṛti ādayaḥ janma rahitāḥ eva abhyupagatāḥ iti yuktam pratijñā hāniḥ avyatirekāt śabdebhyaḥ ayāvat vikāraḥ tu vibhāgaḥ lokavat a iti uktānām pratijñāhāni ādīnām atra api sāmyāt anyathā teṣām anaikāntika tva āpātāt na api avigīta janmānaḥ śruti vigānasya darśita tvāt naca adhikaraṇa antaram tat param asti tasmāt atra eva viyat padena teṣām upalakṣaṇam yuktam mātariśva prabhṛtiṣu punar adhika āśaṅkā nirāsāyāyadhikaraṇa antara ārambhaḥ iti iha ākāśasya uktam janma ghaṭa ādeḥ iva abhūtvā bhavana lakṣaṇam iti kecid āsthitāḥ tat nirākariṣyan sva matam tāvat āha para adhīnā iti 
NSu_2.3.9d–2.3.9f.2	 para adhīna viśeṣitā idam sarvam sasarja iti janimat tvam iha uditam ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ asaḥ idam sarvam asṛjata a ityādi śrutim vibhakta tva ādi yuktim ca āśritya yat iha adhikaraṇe viyataḥ janimat tvam uditam tad para adhīna atiśaya lābha lakṣaṇam pratipattavyam apūrva viśeṣa upajanane hi viśiṣya ākāra upajanaḥ avaśyambhāvī viśiṣya ākāraḥ ca vastu svarūpa abhinnaḥ iti tasya eva asau= upajanaḥ bhavati devadattaḥ śarīrī jātaḥ vidvān jātaḥ iti ghaṭaḥ saṃyuktaḥ jātaḥ vibhaktaḥ jātaḥ iti ca avasthita svarūpaḥ eva vastuni viśeṣa avāpti mātreṇa janana vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate eva 
NSu_2.3.9d–2.3.9f.6	 nanu pariṇāma vāde ghaṭa ādeḥ api eṣā eva utpattiḥ yat avasthita svarūpasya eva mṛd ā ādeḥ api ākāra antara tā āpattiḥ paraiḥ api pariṇāma vādaḥ eva aṅgīkṛtaḥ na ārambha vādaḥ atas vivāda abhāvāt vayarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ yathā na vyarthaḥ tathā acāryaḥ eva vivāda viṣayam spaṣṭayiṣyati atra aidam sarvam sasarja a iti śruti udāharaṇam śruti ādau= api evam eva janma vyākhyeyam iti jñāpana artham yat ca viyat padam prakṛti ādi upalakṣaṇa param itya abhipretam tatra uktarītya upapatti sūcanā artham ca iti paroktarītyā ghaṭa ādi vat abhūtvā abhavana lakṣaṇā eva utpattiḥ viyataḥ śruti sūtra vivakṣitā kinna syāt iti ced atra pṛcchāmaḥ ākāśa śabdena kim vivakṣitam pareṣām vaiśeṣika ādi vat avakāśa mātram uta bāhyānām iva mūrta abhāvaḥ ādyam dūṣayati avakāśa mātram iti 
NSu_2.3.10ab.1–2.3.10ab.2^1	 avakāśa mātram ākāśaḥ katham utpadyate anyathā anyathā para adhīna viśeṣa āptiḥ janma iti anaṅgīkṛtya abhūtvā bhavanam janma iti aṅgīkāre avakāśa mātram ākāśaḥ iti ca aṅgīkāre katham asau= utpadyate tasya utpattiḥ na upapadyate iti yāvat sa upādānā hi sarva sṛṣṭiḥ dṛṣṭā na ca ākāśa utpattau= upādānam asti na ca brahmaṇaḥ upādāna tvam upapadyate iti prakṛti adhikaraṇe nirdiṣyam yasya ca utpattiḥ tasya prāc abhāvena bhāvyam na ca ākāśasya prāc abhāvaḥ sambhavati anupapanna pratītika tvāt abhāvaḥ hi pratīyamānaḥ asya atra iti pratīyate na tu nirāśrayaḥ naca ākāśa abhāvasya āśraya pratītiḥ upapadyate yat eva iha iti nirdiśyate tasya eva ākāśa tvāt upādāna āśrita abhāva vāde api tad abhāvāt na abhāva prati iti upapattiḥ 
NSu_2.3.10ab.2^2–2.3.10ab.3	 tathā ca śrutiḥ abhāvaḥ hi pradeśasya na hi atra abhāvaḥ iti api a iti anavakāśa rūpam brahma eva ākāśasya pūrva avasthā prāgabhāvaḥ ca ucyate iti api brahmaṇaḥ anupādāna tvena pratyuktam pratiyogi āśrayaḥ eva abhāva āśrayaḥ na ca ākāśasya āśrayaḥ asti iti tad abhāvaḥ api nirāśrayaḥ astu iti ced na nirāśraya tve kāryatva anupapatteḥ kiñca pratītau= ākāśaḥ sva āśrayaḥ iti atas tad abhāvaḥ api ākāśa āśrayaḥ pratīyeta iti viruddham āpadyate prakṛtiḥ ākāśasya kāraṇam iti kaścid tad mate prakṛteḥ ajanma prasaṅgaḥ atha tatra para adhīna viśeṣa avāptiḥ janmāṅgīkriyate tadā asambhāvita utpattike viyat ādau= api evam eva aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti dvitīye api kim pradeśa rūpam ākāśam aṅgīkṛtya idam ucyate uta anaṅgīkṛtya prathame yasya kasyacid mūrta dravya abhāvasya utpattiḥ vā sarvasya vā vivakṣitā na ādyaḥ tasyāḥ pratyakṣa ādi siddha tvena adhikaraṇa anārambhaka tvāt dvitīyam dūṣayati yadi iti 
NSu_2.3.10cd.1–2.3.10cd.2	 yadi anākāśa tā pūrvam kim mūrta nibiḍam jagat sarvasya api mūrta abhāvasya sṛṣṭau= utpatti aṅgīkāre pralaye avaśyam tad abhāvaḥ abhyupagamaḥ syāt atyanta asataḥ janma asambhavāt yadi ca sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvam pralaye anākāśa tā sarvasya mūrta dravya abhāvasya abhāvaḥ aṅgīkriyate tarhi kim tadā mūrta nibiḍam jagat aṅgīkriyate etat eva spaṣṭayati mūrtā iti 
NSu_2.3.11ab.1–2.3.11ab.2	 mūtarsampūrṇa tā ca eva yadi anākāśa tā bhavet yadi ukta lakṣaṇa ākāśa abhāvaḥ pralaye bhavet tadā mūrta sampūrṇa tā bhavet eva abhāva abhāvasya bhāvān atirekāt tad vayā āpta tvāt vā caśabdaḥ anukta samuccaya arthaḥ sṛṣṭayuttara kālam mūrta mātram ca na syāt evam ca sarga pralaya viparivartaḥ syāt adhikā ca pralaye mūrta sampūrteḥ āpattiḥ mūrta dravya abhāvaḥ eva ākāśaḥ na tatas atiriktaḥ asti iti dvitīyam nirākaroti mūrta dravyāṇi iti 
NSu_2.3.11cd.1–2.3.11cd.4^1	 mūrta dravyāṇi ca ākāśe sthitāni eva hi sarvadā tad abhāvaḥ ca iti ca arthaḥ yaḥ mūrta dravyāṇi tad abhāvān= ca aṅgīkaroti tena avaśyam tad atirikta ākāśaḥ aṅgīkartavyaḥ eva yasmāt tāni sarvadā akāśe sthitāni tena iti yojanāḥ idam uktam bhavati ekasmin patatriṇi patati dvitīyena patatriṇā kutra patitavyam iti vācyam yatra asau na asti tatra iti ced tarhi yena adhikaraṇena ekya patatriṇaḥ abhāvaḥ parasya ca bhāvaḥ viśiṣyate tad artha antaram aṅgīkaraṇīyam saḥ eva pradeśa rūpaḥ ākāśaḥ iti katham tad anabhyupagamaḥ kiñca iha pakṣī na iha pakṣī iti mūrta tadabhāva āśraya tayā pradeśaḥ sākṣi siddhaḥ katham apahnotum śakyate api ca kim mūrta dravyasya prāc abhāvaḥ ākāśaḥ kiṃvā pradhvaṃsaḥ yat vā atyanta abhāvaḥ athavā anyonya abhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.3.11cd.1–2.3.11cd.4^2	 na prathama dvitīyau sṛṣṭayuttara kāle nirākāśa tva prasaṅgāt prāc abhāva pradhvaṃsa abhāvayorupādāna niṣṭhatvena tatra ākāśa buddheḥ anyatra tad abhāvasya ca āpatteḥ na tṛtīyaḥ kvacid kadācid mūrta sadbhāve tad atyanta abhāva anupapatteḥ na caturthaḥ ghaṭa anyonya abhāvaḥ hi paṭaḥ tad niṣṭhaḥ vā iti tatra ākāśa buddhi prasaṅgāt mūrta dravya saṃsarga abhāva mātram ākāśaḥ iti ced tarhi utpatataḥ patatriṇaḥ kena saṃsargaḥ yena tad abhāvasya ākāśa tvam syāt iti avaśya āśrayaṇīyaḥ pradeśaḥ iti tat evam ākāśasya abhūtvā abhavana rūpa utpattiḥ uyaktā iti siddham astu evam para kṛtam apavyākhyānam kaḥ tarhi ākāśa śabda arthaḥ kā ca tasya para adhīna viśeṣa āptiḥ iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_2.3.12.1–2.3.12.2	 atas ākāśa śabda uktaḥ tat devaḥ atra vināyakaḥ deha utpattyā samutpannaḥ iti śrutyā abhidhīyate parakīya vyākhyānasya ayukta tvāt iti arthaḥ tat devaḥ bhūtākāśa abhimāni iti vināyakasya ākāśa śabda vācya tva upapādanam atra ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ ityādi śrutau deha utpattyā iti para adhīna viśeṣa āpteḥ vivaraṇam vākya dvayam etat iti atas atra iti śrutyā iti ca yujyate śruteḥ viṣaya antaram ca āha bhūtam api iti 
NSu_2.3.13a–2.3.13c.4	 bhūtam api asitam divya dṛṣṭi gocaram eva tu utpadyate bhūtam api ākāśa śabda uktam tat ca ghaṭa ādi vat utpadyate iti śrutyā abhidhīyate iti sambandhaḥ kutas bhūtākāśasya utpattimat tvam iti atas uktam asitam iti rūpi tvāt iti arthaḥ tathā ca śrutiḥ ākāśaḥ nīlimodeti a iti tathā sati cākṣuṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ iti atas uktam divyā iti tuśabdena anudbhūta tva viśeṣam sūcayati idam uktam bhavati kim cākṣuṣa tva mātram āpādyamuta asmad ādīn prati ādye tu iṣi ā pādanam divya dṛṣṭi gocara tva abhyupagamāt dvitīye tu bhūta ādi śarīreṣu vyāpti bhaṅgaḥ tatra anudbhūta ādi kalpane atra api tad samānam śruti prāmāṇyāt iti nanu ākāśasya abhūtvā bhavana lakṣaṇām utpatti madhunā eva nirākṛtya atra punar tad aṅgīkāre katham pūrva uttara vyāghātaḥ na bhavet iti atas āha avyākṛtam iti 
NSu_2.3.13cd.1–2.3.13cd.2	 avyākṛtam hi gaganam sākṣi gocaram yatas avyākṛtam eva gaganam na utpadyate iti uktam na tu bhūtam atas na virodhaḥ tasya anutpattau hetu antaram api āha nityam hi tat iti na ca etat asiddham vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt na hi kāraṇa antaram anapekṣyeḥ cara icchā vināśa hetuḥ dṛṣṭāḥ utpatti śruteḥ tat api kalpanīyam iti ced na tasyāḥ bhūta tad abhimāni viṣaya tvena sa avakāśa tvāt avaśyam ca etat evam ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ iti ādeḥ bhūta prakaraṇa tvāt nanu avyākṛta ākāśe pramāṇam eva na asti kasya anutpattiḥ ucyate iti atas uktam sākṣī iti tat katham iti atas āha pradeśaḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.13ef.1–2.3.13ef.2	 pradeśaḥ iti vijñeyam nityam na utpadyate hi tat nanu etat eva bhūtākāśam iti ced na rūpi tva ārūpitva vyākṛta tva avyākṛta tva paricchinna tva aparicchinna tva śrutīnām sattvāt kiñca utpatti anutpatti śrutyoḥ virodhaḥ api ākāśa dvaitam avagamayati vyavasthayā avirodha upapattau= anutpatti śruteḥ aupacārika tva kalpanā yogāt na ca pradeśasya utpattiḥ upapadyate iti uktam prāk 
NSu_2.3.13ef.3–2.3.13ef.4	 nanu sūtra kṛtā eva gauṇya sambhavāt iti uktam vyākhyātam tat bhāṣya kṛtāḥ vivṛtam ca asmābhiḥ nanu avyākṛta ākāśasya utpatti abhāve mā bhūt ākāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ iti virodhaḥ idam sarvam asṛjata ityādi śruti virodhaḥ tu bhaviṣyati iti ced na tasya abhūtvā bhavana lakṣaṇa utpatti asambhave api para adhīna viśeṣa āpti rūpa utpatti sadbhāvāt iti āha tathā api iti 
NSu_2.3.14.1–2.3.14.3	 tathā api pūrva sambandha paratantra viśeṣa yuj kham eva utpattimat nāma śruti śabda vivakṣitam mūrta sambandhaḥ ca asau paratantra viśeṣaḥ ca iti vigrahaḥ yat anādi tvena uktam tat eva svam iti arthaḥ idam sarvam asṛjata iti śruti vākyam śruti śabdaḥ evam śrauta ākāśa utpattim vyākhyāya upalakṣita prakṛti ādi utpattim vyākhyāti prakṛtiḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.15.1–2.3.16ab.3	 prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ kālaḥ iti ete ca samastaśas īśa adhīna viśeṣeṇa janyāḥ iti eva kīrtitāḥ iti ete ca etad ādayaḥ ca īśvara adhīna viśeṣeṇa eva na abhū tva abhāvi tvena iti arthaḥ kālasya tu abhūtvā bhavanam api asti iti āśayena āha kāla iti kāla pravāhaḥ eva ekaḥ nityaḥ na tu viśeṣavān viśeṣavān kṣaṇa lava ādi rūpaḥ upapāditam ca etat prāk eva prāk parigaṇitānām prakṛti ādīnām īśvara adhīna viśeṣa avāptiḥ eva janma iti uktam tatra kasya kīdṛśī viśeṣa avāptiḥ iti atas prakṛti ādi traya abhimāni devatāyāḥ para adhīna viśeṣa avāptim viśadayati puruṣa iti 
NSu_2.3.16cd.1–2.3.17d.4	 puruṣa avyakta kālānām rama eva eka abhimāninī sisṛkṣu tva viśeṣam tat sākṣāt bhagavat icchayā prāptā eva sṛṣṭa iti uditā yasmāt puruṣa ādīnām rama abhimāninī sā ca ekā eva deha dehya ādi bheda rahitāḥ tat tasmāt sākṣāt bhagavat icchayā sisṛkṣu tva viśeṣam prāptā eva sṛṣṭa iti uditā na tu vināyaka ādi abhimāni vat deha utpattimatī iti arthaḥ yadi api bhagavatyā icchāni nityā tathā api vyakti rūpasya īśvara adhīna tva abhiprāyeṇa idam uktam iti jñātavyam prakṛteḥ para adhīna viśeṣa avāptim vivṛṇoti pradhānam iti  pradhānam vikṛteḥ api pradhānam api vikṛteḥ īśvara adhīnāyāḥ kāraṇāt idam sarvam asṛjata ityādau sṛṣṭam iti uditam iti arthaḥ yathā uktam vikāraḥ avyakta janma hi a iti puruṣāṇām para adhīna viśeṣa avāptim spaṣṭayati pumāṃsaḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.18ab.1–2.3.18ab.5	 pumāṃsaḥ deha sambandhāt sṛṣṭimantaḥ iti īritāḥ kāla pravāhasya pravāhi janma mahat ādīnām ca upacaya avāptiḥ viśeṣa lābhaḥ iti spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam etena jñaḥ atas eva atathā prāṇāḥ a iti adikam api vyākhyātam veditavyam etena mātariśvā vyākhyātaḥ atīta adhikaraṇe viyat ādi viṣayāṇām utpatti anutpatti śrutīnām vyavasthayā virodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ idānīṃ tejaḥ bannāni ākāśaḥ iti tāni anityāni vāyuḥ vāva nityaḥ a iti śrutau vyavasthita nitya tva anitya tvavantam api ākāśam anitya pakṣe nikṣipya vāyonirtya tva abhidhānāt ākāśa devatāyāḥ vināyakasya iva vāyu devatāyāḥ sva rūpeṇa nitya tvam deha utpatti ādinā janma ādimattvam iti vyavasthā anupapatteḥ mukhyā eva anutpattiḥ iti adhika āśaṅkayā pūrva pakṣite vyavasthā ati deśena eva siddhāntitam tatra kīdṛśī vāyau śrutīnām vyavasthā yayā adhika āśaṅkā parihāraḥ syāt iti atas tām daśaryati evam iti etena mātariśvā vyākhyātaḥ 
NSu_2.3.18cd.1–2.3.19.3	 evam praaya kāle api pratibhāta parāvaraḥ mukhyau= āyuḥ nitya samaḥ śarīra utpatti kāraṇāt para adhīna viśeṣeṇa janimān eva śabditaḥ yathā viyadana ādi janma vat ca uktam evam iti atharḥ pratibhāta parāvaraḥ śarīra abhāve api pratibhena eva jñānena viṣayīkṛta atīta an āgataḥ yatas tasmāt nitya samaḥ iti śabditaḥ śarīra utpatti kāraṇāt para adhīna viśeṣeṇa iti etayoḥ hetu hetum at bhāvaḥ eva śabdasya para adhīna viśeṣeṇa eva iti anvayaḥ mukhya vāyuḥ iti anena bhūta prakaraṇe api na bhūta vāyu viṣayam idam sūtram tatra adhika āśaṅkā bhāvāt atas eva na avā antara abhimāni viṣayam kinnāma tad parama abhimāni viṣayam eva iti sūcayati sva rūpa atiriktasya pratibha jñānasya api anupaplavāt ākāśa devatātaḥ viśeṣaḥ yujyate iti bhāvaḥ yat uktam atra prakaraṇe para adhīna viśeṣa avāptiḥ eva janiḥ na abhūtvā abhavanam iti tad upapatti antareṇa upapādayan= adhikaraṇa artham upasaṃharati na eva iti 
NSu_2.3.20.1–2.3.22a.2	 na eva kiñcid tatas janma varjitam paramāt ṛte para adhīna viśeṣa tve janmanaḥ sthūla tā bhavaḥ pūrva śabda vilopaḥ ca yadi janma iti kīrtyate ramāyāḥ na eva janma asti caitanyasya api kevalam pradhanasya ca vedasya iti siddham iti śeṣaḥ etat ca janmanaḥ para adhīna viśeṣa lābha tvaḥ eva aṅgīkṛte siddhayati na tu abhūtvā abhavana rūpatvaḥ iti arthaḥ nanu avyākṛta ākāśasya abhūtvā abhavana anupapatteḥ astu tatra para adhīna viśeṣa avāpti jarnma śabda arthaḥ anyatra tu abhūtvā abhavanam eva aṅgīkriyate ced kaḥ doṣaḥ bādhaka bhāva abhāvābhyām aneka artha tva kalpanā virodhāt ityataḥ āha sthūlatā iti 
NSu_2.3.22a.3–2.3.22a.4^1	 upādāna dharmiṇaḥ dharmi antarātmanā parivartaḥ sthūla tā bhāvaḥ atas eva pūrva śabda vilopaḥ ca pūrva śabda nivṛttau śabda antara pravṛttiḥ ca iti arthaḥ udāhṛtam ca etad prakṛti adhikaraṇe abhūtvā abhavanam yadi janma iti kīrti atas iti ukte asat anuvādaḥ syāt pariṇāma vādibhiḥ kvāpi abhūtvā abhavana anabhyupagamāt atas vimati padam darśayitum sthūlatā ityādi uktam tarhi ramāyāḥ jīva caitanyasya api pradhānasya vedasya ca evaṃvidham janma na eva asti iti atas parameśvarāt ṛte sarvam janimat iti na siddhayet tathā caidam sarvam asṛjata a ityādi pratijñā hāniḥātmā vā a ityādi śabda virodhaḥ vibhakta tva hetoḥ anaikāntyam ca syāt iti vākya śeṣaḥ 
NSu_2.3.22a.3–2.3.22a.4^2	 eṣa cetanayā yuktaḥ jīvaḥ iti abhidhīyate a ityādi vacanāt jīva śabdaḥ bhūta ādi saṅghāte vartate tasya ca uktavidha utpattiḥ asti eva iti atas kevalam caitanyasya iti uktam nahi kṣīram dadhi jātam iti vat idam dravyam rama ādi tvena parivṛttam iti atra pramāṇam asti kintu dvau= etau nityam uktau nityau sarva gatau a ajaḥ nityaḥ a ajām ekām a yāvat brahma viṣṭhitam tāvatī vāk a ityādi śrutibhyaḥ anādi tvam eva avagatam nanu vedasya kīdṛśī para adhīna viśeṣa āptiḥ yena bhavat pakṣe pratijñā ahānya ādikam na syāt iti atas āha vedasya api iti 
NSu_2.3.22bc.1–2.3.22d.1	 vedasya api īśvara icchayā vyaktiḥ nāma viśeṣaḥ asti niyata viśiṣya anupūrvīka tvena artha bodhaka tva śakti āvirbhāvaḥ vyaktiḥ kāla pravāhasya na astitve doṣaḥ vakṣyate mahat ādi sūkṣma rūpa nitya tā ca śrutyā api prasiddhā atas api pratijñā ahāni ādya nistāraḥ iti āśayavān upasaṃharati tasmāt iti  tasmāt tad vaśatā eva hi 
NSu_2.3.23a.1–2.3.23a.4	 utpattiḥ atra kathitāḥ tad vaśatā parameśvara vaśa tva viśeṣa lābhaḥ atra śruti sūtrayoḥ asambhavaḥ tu sataḥ anupapatteḥ asambhāvyamāna janmanoḥ gagana pavanayoḥ utpattau= uktāyām idam āśaṅkayate sat ajāyata ityādi śruteḥ brahmaṇaḥ api janma asti na ca śruti ādi virodhaḥ svarūpa utpatti abhāve api parāyatta viśeṣa avāpti rūpa utpatti sambhavāt gagana pavana vat iti tad nivṛtti artham idam adhikaraṇam ārabdham etat ca ayuktam iva ābhāti asambhavaḥ iti anutpatti mātra pratijñānāt tasya ca pareṇa api aṅgīkṛta tvāt nanu avadhāraṇa arthasya tuśabdasya prayogāt na ayam doṣaḥ satyam tathā api tatra hetoḥ anabhidhānāt ayuktam eva nanu anupapatteḥ iti uktam satyam kim tasya arthaḥ na hi asataḥ sat utpatteḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt anupapatteḥ iti naca etat sarvathā api utpatti abhāvam upapādayitum alam kāraṇa viśeṣa pratiṣedhāt mā evam prasakta kāraṇa nirāsāt anyasya aprasaṅgāt kāraṇa abhāvasya eva siddheḥ iti sthite vibhavāt anupapatteḥ ita hetum prakāra antareṇa vyācakṣāṇāḥ sūtra artham āha svatantra tvāt iti asaṃbhavaḥ tu sataḥ anupapatteḥ 
NSu_2.3.23b–2.3.23d.2	 svatantra tvāt para ātmanaḥ na eva utpattiḥ katham api na svatantram tatas aparam katham api iti svarūpataḥ viśeṣataḥ ca iti arthaḥ kutas paramātmanaḥ svātantryam iti ced mā evam kim svatantram eva vastu na aṅgīkriyate kiṃvātaḥ anyat svatantram aṅgīkṛtya tasya svātantryam nirākriyate na ādyaḥ anavasthiteḥ asambhavāt ca dvitīyam pratyāha na iti pramāṇa abhāvāt bhāve vā tat eva asmābhiḥ paramātma tayā aṅgīkariṣyate iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_2.3.23b–2.3.23d.3	 kecid idam sūtram anyathā vyācakṣate prāk guṇinām viyat ādīnām utpattiḥ uktāḥ idānīm rūpa ādīnām guṇānām dikkālādeḥ ca utpattiḥ ucyate sataḥ guṇa ādeḥ a sambhavaḥ na upapadyate pratijñā ahānyādinā anupapatteḥ iti tat asat viyat padena eva sarvasya upalakṣaṇāt abhyadhika āśaṅkā bhāvāt ca viyat padasya sajātīya bhūta mātra upalakṣaka tvam nyāyyam vijātīya guṇa ādi upalakṣaka tvam ayuktam iti ced na saṅgatiḥ eṣā na abhyadhikā śaṅkā rūpa ādīnām utpatti a śravaṇāt iti ced na pratijña ādibhyaḥ tad avagateḥ saṅkocaḥ tatra kalpyate iti ced na bādhaka anupanyāsāt iti 
NSu_2.3.23b–2.3.23d.4	 anye tu evam vyākurvate brahmaṇaḥ eva asambhavaḥ na tu tadvayatiriktasya pratijñāhānya ādi prasaṅgena anupapatteḥ iti etat api asat pūrveṇa eva asya arthasya labdha tvāt viyat mātariśvanoḥ utpatti pratipādanam upalakṣaṇa artham iti jñāpayitum etat iti ced na pratijñāhānya ādi upanyāsena eva tad jñāpana siddheḥ samāna nyāya upalakṣaṇasya mīmāṃsāyām sarvatra prasiddha tvāt anyathā atideśe abhyadhikā śaṅkā abhyūha na vaiyarthyāt iti uktaḥ eva sūtra arthaḥ etat eva jñāpayitum bhagavatā acāryeṇa prāk evana eva kiñcid a iti upasaṃhṛtam 
NSu_2.3.23b–2.3.24.1	 vyatirekaḥ gandhavat tathā ca darśayati atra yoginām sva rūpeṇa eva aneka tvam upapadyate tasya ca avirodhaḥ candana vat iti ukta artha upapādaka tayā saṅgatau sthitāyām asambhavaḥ tu sataḥ anupapatteḥ iti yadi īśvarasya sarva svātantryam uktam tad upapādaka tvena api saṅgatim jñāpayan= tathā sūtram vyācaṣṭe acchedyasya api iti vyatirekaḥ gandha vat tathā ca darśayati acchedyasya api jīvasya vibhāgam bahudhā hariḥ kṛtvā bhogān pradāya eva ca aikyam āpādayet punar 
NSu_2.3.25ab.1–2.3.25ab.3	 atas īśa vaśam sarvam cetana acetanam jagat bhogān= ca iti sambandhaḥ aikyam eva iti eva śabda anvayaḥ aikyam eka rūpa tvam svarūpa aikyasya vibhāge api sattvāt sarvam īśa vaśam tathā ca saḥ eva svatantraḥ iti vākya śeṣaḥ nanu anyaiḥ chaittum aśakyam chitvā teṣām api bhāgānām bhoga śaktim pradāya yadi punar eka tām āpādayati hariḥ tarhi tatra tasya sāmarthyam jñāyatām kāryasya kāraṇa śaktim vinā anupapatteḥ sarvam jagadīśa vaśam iti tu katham iti atas āha avibhāgam iti 
NSu_2.3.25c–2.3.25f.2	 avibhāgam vibhāgāya yadā nayati keśavaḥ kim aśakyam para īśasya tadā iti hi abhidhīyate yathā loke kiñcid adbhatam kāryam kṛtavataḥ tathābhūte anyatra api kārya śaktiḥ sambhāvyate tathā atyanta āghaṭitam idam ghaṭayataḥ jagannāthasya sarvatra api śakti sambhāvanā yuktā eva iti bhāvaḥ nanu atra sūtre jīvasya aneka tva āpatti mātram ucyate na tu tasyāḥ parameśvara āyatta tvam tat katham anena tasya sarva aiśvarya avagatiḥ iti atas āha iti hi iti tam yathā yathā īśvaraḥ prakurute tathā tathā bhavati saḥ acintyaḥ pamaraḥ garīyān aacintyayeśa śaktyā eva hi ekaḥ avayava vivarjitaḥ ātmānam bahudhā kṛtvā krīḍate yoga sampadaḥ a iti sūtra upāttābhyām śrutibhyām yasmāt evam abhidhīyate tasmāt sūtreṇa api evam evam abhidhīyate pratijñā pramāṇayoḥ eka artha tāyāḥ āvaśyaka tvāt iti 
NSu_2.3.25c–2.3.25f.4	 pṛthak upadeśāt atra jīva ātmanaḥ paramātmanā atyantikaḥ bhedaḥ samarthyate syāt etat yathā hi pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇaira ṇā avadhṛta siṃha bhedasya puṃsaḥ siṃhaḥ devadattaḥ iti vākya śravaṇe api na siṃha deva datta svarūpa aikya pratipattiḥ bhavati kinnāma gauṇaḥ eva ayam prayogaḥ iti adhyavasyati tathā atha atas brahma jijñāsā ityādibhiḥ vyatirekaḥ gandhavat iti antaiḥ sūtraiḥ jīva ātma parama ātma bhedasya pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa balena upapādita tvāt tattvam asya ādi śruti śatena api na tad abheda pratipattiḥ utpattum alam kintu gauṇa arthaḥ eva śrutaye eva iti niścayaḥ bhavet atas prāpaka bhāvāt na idam adhikaraṇam ārambhaṇīyam iti atas adhika āśaṅkām daśaryan pūrvapakṣayati evam sthite api iti pṛthak upadeśāt 
NSu_2.3.26.1–2.3.26.2^1	 evam sthite api jīva aikyam kecid āhuḥ para ātmanā tat yaḥ aham iti pūrvābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ ca anumābalāt evam atīta grantha ukta nyāyena jīvātma parama ātmanoḥ bhede niścite api iti arthaḥ smṛti bhinnā iti ca arthaḥ anumāna balāt ca iti vā sambandhaḥ etat uktam bhavati yadi api bhedaḥ prāk samarthitaḥ tathā api jīvaḥ paramātmanā abhinnaḥ eva tat yaḥ aham saḥ asau yaḥ asau saḥ aham a  tat tvam asi aham brahma asmi a ityādi śruteḥ aham hariḥ sarvam idam janārdanaḥ na anyat tatas kāraṇa kārya jātam īdṛś manaḥ yasya na tasya bhūyas bhavodbhavāḥ dvandva gadāḥ bhavanti a ityādi smṛteḥ ca na ca etāḥ śrutayaḥ smṛtayaḥ ca gauṇa arthāḥ yojyāḥ upakrama ādi balena tātparya avadhāraṇāt balavat bādhaka abhāvāt ca upanyastāni tu pramāṇāni āvidyaka mithyā bheda viṣaya tayā api sambhavanti 
NSu_2.3.26.2^2–2.3.26.3	 tathā ca anumānam vimataḥ bhedaḥ mithyā bheda tvāt candrabheda vat iti nacaasmin= asya ca tad yogam śāsti a iti muktau= api bheda uktiḥ bādhikāḥ tasyāḥ avāntara viṣaya tva upapatteḥ na ca parama m uktau bhede pramāṇam asti yatra tu asya sarvam ātmā eva abhūt vibheda janake jñāne nāśam ātyantikam gate ātmanaḥ brahmaṇaḥ bhedam asantam kaḥ kariṣyati avimukteḥ tu bheda ssyāt jīvasya paramasya ca tatas param na bhedaḥ asti bheda hetoḥ abhāvataḥ a iti ādi śrutiḥ amṛtayaḥ apavadanti ca parama m uktau jīva para bhedam iti evam kecid vādinaḥ vadanti atas yuktaḥ tad nirākaraṇāya adhikaraṇa ārambhaḥ iti evam pūrva pakṣayitvā siddhāntayat sūtram vyācaṣṭe na tat iti 
NSu_2.3.27ab.1–2.3.27ab.3	 na tat yuktam yatas viṣṇuḥ pṛthak eva abhidhīyate tat jīvasya paramātma aikyam na yuktam kintu pṛthak eva jīva ātma parama ātmānau kutas yatas viṣṇuḥ jīvāt jīvaḥ ca viṣṇoḥ bhinnaḥ acintyaḥ paramaḥ jīva saṅghā t a ityādi śrutibhiḥ pṛthak eva abhidhīyate tasmāt iti arthaḥ nanu etāḥ śruti smṛtayaḥ avidyā kalpita bheda viṣaya tayā anyathā siddhāḥ na tātvika bheda siddhayai prabhavanti iti uktam iti ced mā tvariṣṭhāḥ nirākariṣyāmaḥ śruti ādeḥ atattva avedaka tvam iti āśa yavān akalpita bheda viṣayām śrutim udāharati prajñā iti 
NSu_2.3.27cd.1–2.3.27cd.3	 prajñā netraḥ alokaḥ iti muktau bhedaḥ abhidhīyate eṣa brahma eṣa prajāpatiḥ indraḥ a ityādinā viśva prapañcam anūdya sarvam tat prajñā netram iti tasya prajñā ākhya brahma netṛka tvam abhidhāya netṛ netavya bhāvasya kalpita tvāt iti āśaṅkā nivṛtti artham prajñā netraḥ alokaḥ iti śrutyā muktau= api jīva parayoḥ bhedaḥ abhidhīyate alokaḥ muktaḥ api prajñā netraḥ brahmanetṛkaḥ iti nīyate anena iti netram dāmni iti adi sūtrāt prajñā ca brahma prajñā pratiṣṭhā prajñānam brahma a iti vākya śeṣāt na ca atra lokaḥ iti padam chedyam jana bhuvana deha rūpasya lokasya prāk eva brahma netṛka tvasya ukta tvena punarukti prasaṅgāt na ca netṛ neta vyayoḥ abhedaḥ kvacid asti na ca ava antara mukti viṣayā iyam śrutiḥ tatra lokātīta tā yogāt deha indriya ādi vaikalyam khalva loka tvam parama muktau ca anuvartamānaḥ bhedaḥ na avidyā kalpitaḥ bhavitum arhati ati prasaṅgāt iti nanu muktāvabhede anekāḥ śrutayaḥ smṛtayaḥ ca santi tat katham ekākinīyam śratiḥ muktau bheda sādhanāya alam iti atas bahvīḥ śruti smṛtīḥ atra udāharati etam iti 
NSu_2.3.27ef.1–2.3.27ef.2	 etam ānandam iti anyā paramam sāmyam iti api etam ānanda maya ātmānam upasaṅkramya a iti anyā śrutiḥ muktasya parasmāt bhedam āha sāmīpya prāpteḥ abhidhānāt naceyam avāntara muktiḥ asmāt lokāt pretya a iti videha tva vacanāt tadā vidvān puṇya pāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramam sāmyam upaiti a iti api śrutiḥ muktau jīvasya brahmaṇaḥ bhedam ācaṣṭe sāmyasya bheda samāna āśraya tvāt puṇya pāpa añjana ākhya vidyā vidhūnana abhidhānāt asya api parama mukti viṣaya tvam jñāyate 
NSu_2.3.28.1–2.3.29.1	 idam jñānam apāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ sarge api na upajāyante praaye na vyathanti ca idam jñānam iti bhagavat vākye api mama sādharmyam āgamāḥ iti bhedaḥ jñāyate sarga pralayayoḥ api upajanana vyathā bhāva uktyā parama mukti tvam ca upasampadya tat jyotiḥ sva rūpeṇa abhipadyate tatra paryeti jakṣan= ca krīḍan= api sadā sukhī 
NSu_2.3.30.1–2.3.32.1	 ācakṣva me mokṣam dhīrāḥ yam pravadanti tam iti aktaḥ āha vāgdevī param mokṣam prajāpateḥ upasampadyate iti anena parañjyotiḥ upasampadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate sa tatra paryeti jakṣan krīḍa n ramamāṇaḥ a iti etām śrutim arthataḥ anuvadati atra api sāmīpya prāpti ādinā bhedaḥ avagamyate asmāt śarīrāt samutthāya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate a iti uktyā parama mokṣa tvam ca śākhām śākhām mahā nadyaḥ saṃyānti paritas sravāḥ dhānā pūpāḥ māṃsa kāmāḥ sadā pāyasa kardamāḥ yasmin= agni mukhāḥ devāḥ sa indrāḥ saha marut gaṇāḥ ījire kratubhiḥ śreṣṭhaiḥ tat akṣaram upāsate 
NSu_2.3.33.1–2.3.34.1	 praviśanti param devam muktāḥ tatra eva bhoginaḥ nirgacchanti yathākāmam pareśena eva coditāḥ śākhām śākhām iti mahābhārata vākye bheda avabhāsaḥ sphuṭaḥ eva tasya ca parama mokṣa viṣaya tā pradarśana artham ācakṣva ityādi pūrva vākya artha saṅgraha kathanam iti ukte prajāpatinā iti pṛṣṭe tasya madhye puṇya gandhaḥ sahasra śākhaḥ vimalaḥ vibhāti tasya vetasasya śākhām śākhām āśritya dhānā apūpavatyaḥ māṃsa kāmavatyaḥ arśaa ādibhyaḥ at pāyasam kardama sthānīyam yāsām tāḥ tathā uktāḥ yasmin loke ījire yajante ca tat akṣaram paramam brahma tatra eva parameśvara antaraḥ eva bheda dṛṣṭayā abhimānena niḥsaṅgena api kamarṇāḥ kartṛ tvāt sa guṇam brahma puruṣam puruṣa ṛṣabham 
NSu_2.3.35.1–2.3.35.2	 sa saṅgatya punar kāle kālena īśvara mūrtitā jāte aguṇa vyatikare yathāpūrvam prajāyate bheda dṛṣṭayā iti bhāgavata vākyasya ayam arthaḥ ādyaḥ sthira carāṇām yaḥ veda garbhaḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ yoga īśvaraiḥ kumāra ādyaiḥ siddhaiḥ yoga pravartakaiḥ sa jīva īśvara ādi bheda jñānena abhimānena īśvara bahu mānena nivṛtta karmaṇā ca jagatkartṛ tvāt sārvajña ādi guṇa upetam parama puruṣa ākhyam param brahma saṅgatya m uktaḥ san praviśya punar kāla ākhya parameśvara mūrtyā sṛṣṭi kāle jāte satya guṇa vyatireke sattva ādi guṇa vikriyā hīne viṣṇu loke pūrvavat sarva muktā adhipatiḥ jāyate iti atra tu bhedaḥ sphuṭaḥ eva hiraṇyagarbha mukti tvāt eva parama mukti tvam ca siddham 
NSu_2.3.36ab.1–2.3.36ab.3	 ṛcām tvaḥ poṣam āste ca pareṇa preritāḥ sadā ṛcām tvaḥ poṣam āste pupuṣvān gāyatram tvaḥ gāyati śakvarīṣu brahmā tvaḥ vadati jāta vidyām yajñasya mātrām vimimīta u tva a iti mantrasya ayam arthaḥ mukti sthāne tvaḥ kaścid brahmā ṛcām poṣam pupuṣpvānāḥ te ṛcaḥ puṣyāḥ kurvan= āste tvaḥ brahmā śakvarīṣu ṛkṣu ārūḍham gāyatram sāma gāyati tvaḥ brahmā jāta vidyām pauruṣeya vidyām vadati tvaḥ brahmā yajñasya viṣṇoḥ mātrām aṃśam eva vimimīte dhyāyati iti atra api bhedaḥ sphuṭaḥ eva avabhāsate brahma bāhulya śravaṇāt parama mokṣa tvam ca naca asya ṛtvij viṣaya tvam brahmaṇaḥ jāta vidyā vādi tvasya aprasiddha tvāt caturṇām api pādānām hotra ādi bhinna viṣaya tve tṛtīya pāde tvaḥ iti ca vyartham syāt caśabdaḥ vākya śeṣa samuccaye pareṇa preritāḥ sadā iti anena sa vai eṣa brahma niṣṭhaḥ idam śarīram martyam atimṛjya brahma abhisampadya brahmaṇā apaśyati a ityādi śrutīḥ yatheṣyam parivartante tasya eva anugraha īritā a ityādi smṛtīḥ ca upādatte 
NSu_2.3.36cd.1–2.3.36cd.3	 yat kāmaḥ tat sṛjati addhaiṣā ātmanā tat sṛjati api yad kāmaḥ iti anena na ha asya karma kṣīyate asmāt hayā iva ātmanaḥ yat yat kāmayate tat tat sṛjata a iti śrutiḥ upādīyate muktaḥ yat yat kāmayate tad tat vastu tat karma sṛjate katham yat sṛjate tat asmāt ātmanaḥ eva parameśvara anugraha dvārā eva iti arthaḥ addhā eva iti hi eva śabda arthaḥ atra īśvarāt jīvasya bhedaḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva karma akṣaya vacanāt parama mukti tvam ca 
NSu_2.3.37ab.1–2.3.37ab.2	 saha eva brahmaṇā kāmān bhuṅkate nistīrṇa tad guṇaḥ saha eva iti anenasaḥ aśnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipaścitaḥ a iti śrutim upādatte brahmaṇā brahma ātma kāma tayā sarvān kāmān saha yaugapadyena bhuṅkta iti vyākhyānam tu śrauta akṣarān anuguṇam tad siddhāntān anuguṇam ca nistīrṇa iti anena tīrṇaḥ hi tadā sarvān śokān hṛdayasya bhavati a iti śrutiḥ gṛhyate tadā sarvān śokān= tīrṇaḥ muktaḥ hṛdayasya brahmaṇaḥ śeṣa bhūtaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ hṛdayana tvāt hṛdayam brahma tad guṇāḥ hṛd guṇāḥ duḥkha ādyāḥ atra sarva śoka taraṇāt parama mukti tvam avagamyate 
NSu_2.3.37c.1–2.3.38a.2	 duḥkha ādīn= ca parityajya duḥkha ādīn= ca parityajya iti anena jyotiḥ mayeṣu deheṣu sva icchayā viśva mokṣiṇaḥ bhuñjate su sukhāni eva na duḥkha ādīn kadācana a ityādi brahmavaivarta vākyam gṛhyate atra bahuvacanena bhedaḥ duḥkha ādi a bhāvena parama mukti tvam ca avabhāsate  jagat vaya āpāra varjitaḥ bhuṅkte bhogān saha eva uccān jagat vayā pāra iti anena sva adhika ānanda samprāptau sṛṣṭayā ādi vyāpṛtiṣu api muktānām na eva kāmaḥ syāt anyān kāmān= tu bhuñjate a iti vārāha vacanam gṛhyate atra ca aiśvarya maryādayā bhedaḥ gamyate sva pakṣa sādhanam upasaṃharati ityādi iti 
NSu_2.3.38b–2.3.39ab.3	 iti ādya āgama mānataḥ muktasya bheda avagateḥ katham eva hi abhinnatā jīveśayoḥ muktasya para brahmaṇaḥ iti śeṣaḥ idānīm para pakṣam nirākariṣyan yat uktam śrutibhiḥ ca anumābala āt ita śruti sācivyena anumānam tat tāvat nirākartum upakramate na anumā ca iti  na anumā ca tad abhedam pramāpayet caśabdaḥ sva pakṣa sādhana para pakṣa nirāsa samuccaya ārtaḥ pramāpayet pramitam kuryāt yat vā jīveśvara abhede para upanyasta samasta pramāṇa nirasana pratijñā iyam tathā ca śruti smṛtī ca iti ca arthaḥ tat katham iti atas anumānam tāvat anuvadati mithyā eva iti 
NSu_2.3.39c–2.3.39e.3	 mithyā eva bhedaḥ vimataḥ bheda tvāt candrabheda vat iti ced bhedaḥ mithyā iti etau= atī ukte candra bheda ādinā siddha sādhanam syāt iti ota vimataḥ iti uktam jīva brahmaṇoḥ bhedaḥ iti yāvat stambha kumbha ādi bhedasya pakṣa tulya tvāt na tatra bheda tva hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ iti jñāpana artham vā yāvān kaścid vimataḥ bhedaḥ sa sarvaḥ api iti bheda grahaṇam spaṣṭa artham sādhya avadhāraṇena asiddhayā ādi a ābhāsa uddhāram sūcayati bheda mithyā tva siddhauvabhedaḥ eva vāstavaḥ siddhayati iti bhāvaḥ dūṣayitum pṛcchati sādhyeti 
NSu_2.3.39ef.1–2.3.39ef.5	 sādhya dharmaḥ ayam sannasan vā nava ubhayam ayam jīva brahma bhedasya mithyātva lakṣaṇaḥ san= iti sva mata anusāreṇa nanu mithyātvam sat ced tat yasya tat api satsyāt na hi sambhavati na asti dharmī dharmaḥ ca asti iti tathā ca vaiparītyam mā evam mithyātvam khalu atyanta abhāva pratiyogi tvam tat ca buddhi dvāreṇa eva atyanta asataḥ api pratītiḥ aṅgīkriyate tathā ca mithyātvam asti iti asya tat pratiyogikaḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ san= iti arthaḥ naca atra kaḥ api virodhaḥ asanvā iti mādhyamika mata anurodhena na hi prativādinī āśvāsaḥ asti yena asau sva matam atipatya na vadet iti niścinumaḥ ubhayam navā iti prativādi mata anusāreṇa sat ādi pakṣa dūṣaṇa sāmyāt iti brūmaḥ yat vā ubhayam ca iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ na iti caturthaḥ ubhayam na vā iti arthaḥ ādyam dūṣayati yadi iti 
NSu_2.3.40a.1–2.3.40b.2	 yadi san= apa siddhāntaḥ yadi ayam sādhya dharmaḥ san= iti ucyate tadā māyā vādinaḥ apasiddhāntaḥ syāt na hi jīva brahmaṇoḥ bhedasya mithyātvam brahma yena tasya sattve api sat advaita vādinaḥ na apasiddhāntaḥ syāt brahmaṇaḥ nirvikalpaka tvāt dvitīye doṣam āha saḥ eva iti  saḥ eva āsanniti īrite apasiddhāntaḥ eva mithyātvasya asattve sattvam eva jīva brahma bhedasya syāt na ca asat pramāṇa viṣayaḥ iti teṣām pakṣaḥ anena sat asattva pakṣaḥ api nirastaḥ veditavyaḥ antimam apākaroti na ubhayam ced iti 
NSu_2.3.40c.1–2.3.40c.4^1	 na ubhayam ced na siddham tat tad ubhaya vilakṣaṇa tvam ca jīva brahma bheda mithyā tve anyatra vā kvāpi na siddham nanu anena kim uktam syāt aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvam iti ced na sat asat vailakṣaṇyasya pakṣa viśeṣaṇa tva abhāvāt mithyātvam eva pakṣa viśeṣaṇam upanyastam tad dharmaḥ eva sat asat vailakṣaṇyam na ca vimatam buddhimat kartṛ pūrvakam itivat viśeṣaṇena api prasiddhena bhāvyam iti vācyam vaiṣamyāt yat hi vyāpaka koṭi niviṣyam vivāda padam ca tasya prasiddha tā vaśyam bhāvinī anyathā vyāpti grahaṇa pakṣayoḥ asambhavāt 
NSu_2.3.40c.1–2.3.40c.4^2	 asti ca buddhimat tvasya api vyāpakoṭi niveśa ādi na tu sat asat vailakṣaṇyasya iti ucyate yaḥ hi arthaḥ pramāṇa sādhyaḥ sa sambhāvita prakāreṣu anyatama prakāravān upalabdhaḥ idam ca jīva brahma bhedasya mithyātvam na sat ādi prakāra vat aṅgīkartum śakyam prakāra trayasya apasiddhānta para āhata tvāt catutharsyā prāmāṇika tvāt na hi aprāmāṇikena prakāreṇa prakāra vat kiñcid bhavati atas vyāpaka anupalabdhi bādhitam jīva brahmaṇoḥ bhedasya mithyātvam na sādhayitum śakyam iti samudāya arthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti na kācid anupapattiḥ anena eva abhiprāyeṇa ṭīkā api netavya iti dūṣaṇa antaram āha iti mānasya iti 
NSu_2.3.40d.1–2.3.40d.2	 iti mānasya dūṣaṇam mīyate iti mānam kṛtyat luṭaḥ bahulam iti vacanāt mithyā śabda artham vikalpya api evam dūṣaṇam abhidhānīyam iti arthaḥ tathā hi kim mithyā iti asattvam ucyate kiṃvānirvācya tvam ādye apasiddhāntaḥ dvitīye aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā pakṣasya iti sattva abhāvaḥ mithyā padārthaḥ iti ced na tasya eva asattva padārtha tvena apasiddhāntā nistārāt iti 
NSu_2.3.40d.3	 doṣa antaram āha iti iti mānasya liṅgasya bheda tva hetuḥ api sannasanvā sat asan vā anirvācyaḥ vā iti vikalpya ādye advaita vādinaḥ asiddhiḥ dṛṣṭāntasya sādhana vikalaḥ dvitīya tṛtīyayoḥ dvayoḥ api caturthe dvaita vādinaḥ iti dūṣaṇam abhidhātavyam iti arthaḥ na ca sat asat ādau bheda tva sāmānyam asti yena dhūmavat tva vat ayam hetuḥ syāt 
NSu_2.3.40d.4–2.3.40d.5	 jīvaḥ brahmaṇaḥ na bhidyate ātma tvāt brahma vat iti ādau= anumāna antare api evam eva vikalpya dūṣaṇa antaram abhidhātavyam iti āha iti mānasya iti yadvā dvaitava ādi prayukteṣu viruddha viṣayeṣu sarveṣu api anumāneṣu evam sādhyam hetum ca vikalpya doṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti atidiśati iti iti na siddham tat iti ayuktam pakṣīkṛte bhede vā prapañce vā avidyāyām vā śakti rajata ādau vā aniḥ vacanīya tvasya pramāṇena sādhayitum śakya tvāt iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.3.41ab.1–2.3.41ab.3	 na ca māna antareṇa etat śakyam sādhayitum kvacid yadā bheda mithyā tvasya sattva ādi vikalpena dūṣaṇa abhidhānam tadā antara śabdaḥ viśeṣa vacanaḥ yadā tu mithyā śabda artha vikalpena dūṣaṇa abhidhānam tadā anyat mānam māna antaram etat anirvācya tvam kvacid iti ukta sthaleṣu tat katham iti ced ittham kasyacid padārthasya anirvācya tve pratyakṣam vā pramāṇam ucyate anumānam vā agamaḥ vār atha āpattiḥ vā upamānam vā abhāvaḥ vā iti manasi vikalpān nidhāya para aṅgīkāra prācurya anurodhena anumānam tāvat apākaroti anumānena ced iti 
NSu_2.3.41cd.1–2.3.42a.2	 anumānena ced sā eva hi anavasthā bhaviṣyati vimatam anirvācyam bādhya tvāt itya ādi anumānena śukti rajata ādeḥ a nirvācya tvam sādhyate ced anavasthā bhaviṣyati katham sā eva hi aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā parihāra artha anumāna paramparāt vārikā prasiddhā eva iti arthaḥ yat atra vaktavyam tad prathama sūtraḥ eva asmābhiḥ abhihitam āgamam apākaroti na ca iti naca āgamaḥ tad arthaḥ asti tad arthaḥ anirvacanīya arthaḥ anupalambhāt iti bhāvaḥ nanu katham na asti na asat āsīt nosadāsīt tadānīm iti āgamasya vidyamāna tvāt iti atas āha na asat iti 
NSu_2.3.42b.1–2.3.42b.3	 na asat āsīt na tat vadet iti āgamaḥ iti śeṣaḥ tat anirvācyam vastu ayam bhāvaḥ pada samanvaya balena pratītaḥ padārtha saṃsargaḥ hi vākya arthaḥ na aparaḥ anyathār atha apatti ādeḥ api āgama antarbhāva prasaṅgāt atra ca pralaye sat ādi abhāva mātram vākyāt pratīyate na punar anirvācyam vastu tatas na ayam āgamaḥ anirvācya arthaḥ iti mā bhūt ayam āgamaḥ anirvacanīya arthaḥ tathā api etat vacana balena anirvacanīya arthaḥ setsyati tathā hi atra tāvat pralaye sat asat abhāva pratipādyate tad sāmarthyāt tadā vidyamānasya arthasya sattva asattva pratiṣedha avagatau pariśeṣāt anirvācya tva avagateḥ na ca tadā vastu mātra abhāvaḥ punar sṛṣṭayanupapatteḥ abhāvasya aṅgī kārya tvāt ca pariśeṣaḥ ca arthāpattiḥ anumānam vā iti āśaṅkate pariśeṣāt iti 
NSu_2.3.42cd.1–2.3.43a.2	 pariśeṣāt anirvācyam yadi siddhayet pariśeṣāt anirvācyam vastu siddhayet ita yadi ucyate iti sambandhaḥ atra brūmaḥ bhavet idam yat i atra sat asat śabdau pratīta arthau syātām naca evam pratyakṣa apratyakṣa pañca mahābhūta para tvāt na sat tat na asat ucyate a ityādau tatra prayogāt kutas etat iti ced pratīta artha tve aniṣya prasaṅga ādi tayāśayavān āha para ātmanaḥ iti  para ātmanaḥ anirvācya tvam eva syāt tarhi sattvena aṅgīkṛtasya paramātmanaḥ eva anirvācya tvam syāt iti arthaḥ kutas iti atas āha pariśiṣyaḥ hi iti 
NSu_2.3.43b.1–2.3.43b.4	 pariśiṣṭaḥ hi asau tadā sat asat pratiṣedha sāmarthyāt sarva kārya laye avaśiṣyasya khalva nirvācya tvam eva īṣi avyam asau paramātmā yasmāt tadā pralaya velāyāmalīnatayā avaśiṣyaḥ tasmāt tasya anirvācya tvam bhavet iti na ca vācyam yadi api pralaye paramātmā vidyate eva tathā api tamaḥ āsīt iti adisannihita vākyāt tamaḥ avidyā ākhyam buddhi sannihitam iti tad upaktāyām buddhau pariśeṣa pramāṇam api tamasaḥ eva anirvācya tām ādhāsyati iti ānīda vātam iti vākyena brahmaṇaḥ api buddhi sannidhānāt satyam jñānam iti tasya satya tva avagamāt apavādaḥ iti ced na āsīt iti tamasaḥ api sattva avagamāt apavādaḥ syāt sāṃvyāvahārikam sattvam tat iti ced brahmaṇaḥ api tathā kin na syāt kiñca asmin vyākhyāne tadānīm iti vyartham sadā tamasaḥ anirvācya tvāt anya param vākyam iti ced tathā api asanna āsīt iti vyartham eva prāpti abhāvāt na tam vidātha yaḥ imāḥ jajānān i at yuṣmākam antaram babhūva nīhāreṇa prāvṛtāḥ jalpyāḥ ca asutṛpaḥ uktha śāsaḥ caranti te ime satyāḥ kāmāḥ anṛtā pidhānā a iti ādya āgama starhi ajñānasya anirvācya tve pramāṇam iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.3.43c.1–2.3.44a.3	 naca anyaḥ āgamaḥ tatra tatra anirvācye arthe mānam iti śeṣaḥ anya anṛta śabda abhyām anirvacanīya ajñāna abhidhānāt katham na iti atas anirvācya tvam nirvakti sat asat iti  sat asat pratiyogini sat asatī pratiyoginī yasya tat tathā uktam yat na sannāpya sat tat dhaya nirvācyam na ca atra tad pratipādakaḥ śabdaḥ asti anṛta ādi śabdasya tu anyathā vyākhyānāt iti pratyakṣam pratikṣipati na ca iti na ca pratyakṣa mātrā asti na hi idam anirvācyam iti kaścid laukikaḥ parīkṣakaḥ vā cakṣuḥ ādinā īkṣate bādha uttara kālam mithyā eva rajatam pratyabhāt iti anuvādāt katham na īkṣate iti ced na mithyā śabdasya asad artha tvāt arthāpattim apākaroti na ca iti 
NSu_2.3.44b.1–2.3.44b.3	 naca artha āpattiḥ iṣyate anumānāt pṛthak prāmāṇikaiḥ iti śeṣaḥ anumānam ca aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tayā nirastam iti bhāvaḥ kiñca na asti asau= anupapadyamānaḥ arthaḥ yena kasyacid arthasya anirvācya tā āpattiḥ syāt atha matam yadi viyat ādi viśvam vā śukti rajata ādikam vā sat syāt tadā na bādhyeta sataḥ bādhā yogāt na hi san= a ātmā bādhyate yadi vā asat syāt tarhi na pratīyeta asataḥ pratītya yogāt na hi nari śṛṅgam bhāti gavi iva atas bādha pratītyoḥ anupapatti ā nirvācya tvam gamyate iti atas āha bādhā iti
