NSu_2.3.44c.1–2.3.44c.3	 bādhā yogāt sataḥ iti arthāpattiḥ na iṣyate iti vartate eka deśa utkīrtanena uktam sarvam upāttam veditavyam sataḥ bādhā yogāt ityāt yukta arthāpattiḥ na anirvācya tvam gamayitum alam iti atharḥ viyat ādeḥ sattve śukti rajata ādeḥ ca asattve anupapatti abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ nanu yadi viyadādikam sat syāt tadā bādhaḥ na syāt iti uktam iti atas āha bādhā abhāvataḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.44d–2.3.44e.3	 bādhā abhāvataḥ eva hi iṣṭāpattiḥ viyat ādeḥ viśvasya bādhā abhāvataḥ eva sattve bādhaḥ na syādi ti iṣya āpādanam etat na iha nānā asti iti śrauta niṣedha ātmā bādhaḥ asti iti ced na tasya prāk eva niṣiddha tvāt tat idam āha hi śabdena anena ākṣepakā siddhiḥ ca uktā bhavati vimatam bādhyam dṛśya tvāt bhrānti vat iti viyat ādau bādhaḥ pramitaḥ iti atas āha nahati 
NSu_2.3.44ef.1–2.3.45ab.2	 na hi bhrāntau= api bādhaḥ avagamyate tasmāt dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya vikalaḥ iti arthaḥ katham iti ced vaktavyam tarhi kasya bādha sati kim jñānasya uta viṣayasya na ādyaḥ adhiṣṭhāna jñāna nāśya tva lakṣaṇasya para abhimatasya bādhasya tatra svabhāva bhaṅgure abhāvāt anyathā pramiteḥ api tad prasaṅgāt para mate jñānasya sākṣi tvena vināśa ayogāt ca dvitīyam pratiṣedhati viṣayasya iti viṣayasya kutas bādhaḥ vidyamānam hi bādhyate na kutas api iti arthaḥ kutas na iti ced viṣayaḥ kaḥ abhimataḥ kim śukti ādiḥ kim vā rajata ādiḥ ādye hetum āha vidyamānam hi iti 
NSu_2.3.45cd.1–2.3.45cd.3	 na hi vandhyā sutaḥ vadhyaḥ yajñadattaḥ hi vadhyate na hi bhrāntau a iti atas maṇḍūka plutyā na iti anuvartate vidyamānam yathā artha jñāna udaya anantaram api anuvartamānam na hi bādhyate tathā satya ātmanaḥ api bādha prasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ dvitīye hetum āha vidyamānam hi iti yat pūrvam vidyamānam tat eva kenacid nāśyate na avidyamān śukti rajata ādikam ca avidyamānam iti tasya nāśya tva ayogāt tad viṣayaḥ bādhaḥ sutarām a yuktaḥ iti asataḥ nāśya tvam na asti kintu vidyamānasya eva iti atra dṛṣṭāntau= āha na hi iti ayam atra prayogaḥ śukti rajatam na nāśyam asattvāt yat asat tat na nāśyam yathā vandhyā sutaḥ yat vā yat nāśyam na tat asat yathā yajñadattaḥ iti syāt etat bādha anabhyupagame laukika vaidika vyavahāra virodhaḥ apasiddhāntaḥ ca syāt iti atas sarvathā aṅgīkartavye bādhe tad dṛṣṭāntena viyat ādeḥ api bādhā yogāt sattvānupapattiḥ iti atas āha bādhā iti 
NSu_2.3.46ab.1–2.3.46ab.2^1	 bādhā yogaḥ sataḥ iti vyāptiḥ eṣā kva dṛśyate kva iti ākṣepe idam uktam bhavati satyam aṅgīkriyate eva bādhaḥ asmābhiḥ kintu anyathā vijñātasya samyak vijñāna gocara tva lakṣaṇaḥ sa tu bhrāntau= iva viyat ādau= api asti eva kṣaṇika tva brahma pariṇāma tva ādi rūpeṇa vijñātasya sthāyi tvā ādi rūpeṇa avagamāt adhiṣṭhāna yāthātmya jñāna nāśya tvasya eva prāk nirasta tvāt tad sādhane siddha sādhana tā syāt na ca tena viyat ādau sattva pratikṣepaḥ sambhavati yat sat tat na bādhyate iti vyāpteḥ anavagata tvāt sa tyasya api ātmanaḥ anya ākāreṇa viditasya samyak vijñāna gocara tvasya ubhaya siddha tvāt naca arthāpatteḥ pṛthak pramāṇa tve kim vyāptyā iti vācyam na hi vayam anupapadyamāna rsthasya upapādakena arthena vyāpteḥ abhāvam codayāmaḥ 
NSu_2.3.46ab.2^2–2.3.46ab.3	 kintu sattvasya bādhā bhāvena bādhasya vā sattva abhāvena na hi bādhaḥ eva anupapadyaramānaḥ arthaḥ kintu pratīta tve sati bādhaḥ tasya ca anyathā anupapattim vyutpādayatā sarvathā sattve bādhaḥ na syāt iti prasaṅgaḥ vā bādhāt sat na bhavati iti anumānam vā vācyam tat ubhayam ca vyāpti apekṣam eva yadā tu pramāṇa dvaya virodhaḥ artha āpattiḥ tadā spaṣṭaḥ eva vyāpti abhāvaḥ doṣaḥ iti nanu bādhā yogāt iti pañcamī kimarthāḥ ucyate sataḥ bādhā yogāt bādhyamānam idam na sat iti anumāne vyāptiḥ eṣā kva dṛśyate iti vyākhyāyate yat vā asmad abhimata bādha abhyupagame bādhā yogāt sataḥ iti ādikam na upapadyate iti nañaḥ anuvṛttyā vyākhyā kutas iti āśaṅkāyām vyāptiḥ iti ādikam vyākhyeyam evam vināśa lakṣaṇam bādham siddhavat kṛtya śakti rajata ādau viyat ādau ca bādhasya asiddhiḥ abhihitā idānīm tām eva vivaritum bādha svarūpam param pṛcchati kaḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.3.46c.1–2.3.46c.3	 kaḥ ca ayam bādhaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ yaḥ ayam viyat ādeḥ śukti rajata ādeḥ ca sattva abhāva siddhayartham bādhaḥ uddiṣyaḥ ayam kaḥ kim jñānena vināśaḥ kiṃvā nivṛttiḥ yat vā na āsīt na asti na bhaviṣyati iti kāla traya sattā niṣedhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ nanu vināśa nivṛttyoḥ kaḥ bhedaḥ ucyate kecid khalu māyā vādinaḥ vadanti adhiṣṭhāna yāthātmya jñānena sa vilāsa avidyā vinaśyati yāvanti jñānāni tāvatyaḥ hi avidyā iti tad mata rītyā vināśaḥ iti uktam apare tu ekaika avidyā tad avasthā viśeṣāḥ eva rajata ādi upādānāni bhavanti iti manvānāḥ adhiṣṭhāna tattva jñānena saha kāryaiḥ avidyā tirodhattaḥ iti tad samaya anusāreṇa nivṛttiḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.46c.4–2.3.46c.5	 yat vā avidyāyāḥ vidyayā vināśaḥ bhavati kāryam tu rajata ādikam upādāna vināśe svayam eva vilīyate iti pareṣām matam tad ubhaya anusāreṇa idam kalpa dvayam athavā alaukika rajata utpāda vādinām matam anusṛtya vināśaḥ iti māyā vādinām tu matam anuruddhaya nivṛttiḥ iti yadi vā vināśaḥ iti māyā vādinām matam viveka agrahāt pravṛttasya viveka grahe sati nivṛttiḥ iti prābhākara matam iti ādyam dūṣayati na hi iti 
NSu_2.3.46d.1–2.3.46d.3	 na hi nāśaḥ asataḥ bhavet asataḥ iti upalakṣaṇam asat eva rajatam pratyabhāt iti uttara anubhava balāt asat eva tāvat śukti rajatam nacāsataḥ śaśa viṣāṇa vat vināśaḥ sambhavati svarūpa nivṛttiḥ hi vināśaḥ nacāsataḥ svarūpam asti vyāghātāt na api viyat ādeḥ vināśaḥ sambhavati nitya tvāt ghaṭa ādeḥ api mudgara abhighāta ādinā eva vināśaḥ na adhiṣṭhāna tattva jñānena iti pūrva uktam smārayitum etat uktam iti hi śabdaḥ dvitīyam nirākaroti nivṛttiḥ ca iti 
NSu_2.3.46ef.1–2.3.46ef.3	 nivṛttiḥ ca apravṛttasya katham eva upapadyate tirobhāva ādi rūpā nivṛttiḥ khalu āvirbhāva ādi rūpa pravṛttimataḥ bhavet saddharmaḥ ca āvirbhāvaḥ śukti rajata ādikam ca asat iti uktam atas apravṛttasya tasya nivṛttiḥ ca katham eva upapadyate yat vā avidyāyā pravṛttasya tad upādānakasya hi vidyayā nivṛttiḥ ukta rūpa upapadyate na ca śakti rajata ādikam avidyā upādānakam asattvāt atas apravṛttasya nivṛttiḥ ca katham eva upapadyate etena viyat ādau= api bādhā siddhiḥ uktā veditavyā prābhākaram prati rajata arthita abhāva ādinā apravṛttasya puruṣasya nivṛttiḥ na upapadyate iti tatra avyāpteḥ na idam bādha lakṣaṇam iti vyākhyeyam tṛtīyam dūṣayitum anuvadati na āsīt iti 
NSu_2.3.47a–2.3.47c.2	 na āsīt asti bhaviṣyat ca tat iti jñānam eya tā yadi bādhaḥ yat etāvantam kālam pratyabhāt tannā āsīt na asti na bhaviṣyati iti traikālika sattva niṣedha rūpa jñāna viṣaya tā bādhaḥ iti arthaḥ yadi api evaṃvidham jñānam bādhaḥ iti vaktavyam tathā api tasya rajata ādi sambandhitā jñāpana artham jñānam eya tā iti uktam dūṣayati tadā iti 
NSu_2.3.47cd.1–2.3.47cd.2	 tadā asattvam tena eva aṅgīkṛtam punar yadi evam traikālika sattva niṣedha lakṣaṇaḥ bādhaḥ viyat ādeḥ śukti rajata ādeḥ ca aṅgīkriyate tadā asat vailakṣaṇyamurarīkurvatā tena eva punar asattvam aṅgīkṛtam syāt sattā viraha vyatirekeṇa śaśaviṣāṇa ādīnām api asattvasya anirūpaṇāt apasiddhānta prasaṅgāt na ayam bādhaḥ pareṇa aṅgīkartum śakyate iti āśayaḥ asiddhaḥ ca ayam bādhaḥ viyat ā ādau= iti prāk eva uktam 
NSu_2.3.47cd.3	 yat uktam śukti rajata ādeḥ asattvāt na vināśa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ bādhaḥ sambhavati iti tat asiddham vimatam na asat pratīyamāna tvāt yat pratīyate tat na asat yathā paṭaḥ yat ca āsat na tat pratīyate yathā śaśa viṣāṇam iti pramāṇena asattva virahasya niścita tvāt atas eva asattve anupapatti abhāvāt arthāpatteḥ anyathā eva upapattiḥ iti api pratyuktam pratīteḥ eva anupapatteḥ yat ca uktam traikālika sattva niṣedhe asattva aṅgīkāra prasaṅgaḥ iti tat api asat pratīta tvena asattva anupapattau niṣedhasya sattva utsāraṇa mātraḥ eva paryavasāna upapatteḥ yat api atra uktam sattāviraha vyatirekeṇa asattvam nāma durnirūpam iti tat ca ayuktam nirupākhya tvam asattvam iti nirūpaṇāt iti ced na asataḥ prati iti abhāve khalu idam sarvam syāt naca evam asataḥ pratītim nirākurvatā tvayā eva tasyāḥ aṅgī kārya tvāt ityāśayavān āha pratītiḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.48ab.1–2.3.48cd.3	 pratītiḥ na asataḥ iti vadan= aṅgīkaroti tām vadan= iti upalakṣaṇam jānan= iti api draṣṭavyam asataḥ pratītiḥ na asti iti niṣedham kurvatā kutas asataḥ pratītiḥ aṅgīkāryā iti atas āha niṣedhaḥ hi iti niṣedhaḥ hi apratītasya kathañcid na upapadyate pratītiḥ na asataḥ iti kim asataḥ pratītiḥ niṣidhyate kiṃvā pratīteḥ asat viṣaya tvam ādye pratiṣedha viṣaya tayā dvitīye pratiṣedhya niviṣya tayā avaśyam asataḥ pratītiḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyā tasmāt kathañcid ukta prakāra dvayena apratītasya sambandhī niṣedhaḥ na upapadyate na hi apratīte bhū tale ghaṭe vā bhū tale ghaṭaḥ na asti iti pratiṣedhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tat anena vimataḥ asat pratītimān= tad sambandhi niṣedha kartṛ tva āt ta dvayavahartṛ tvāt vā sammata vat iti pramāṇam sūcitam bhavati avaśyam ca prāmāṇikam parīkṣakeṇa abhyupagantavyam manasi abhyupagamaḥ vāci niṣedhaḥ iti sva kriyā virodhaḥ vā anena sūcitaḥ iti evam arthāpattim nirasya upamānam ca nirasyati na ca iti 
NSu_2.3.49a.1–2.3.49b.2	 na ca upamā bhavet atra atra anirvacanīya artha sadbhāve pramāṇam iti śeṣaḥ tasyāḥ sādṛśya ādi niyata viṣaya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ abhāvam apākaroti pratyakṣat iti pratyakṣāt sattvam eva ca viyat ādau śukti rajata ādau vā pratyakṣeṇa anupalambhena vā sattva asattvayoḥ abhāva siddha avaniḥ vacanīya artha siddhiḥ iti vaktavyam na ca tat yuktam yatas viyat ādau pratyakṣāt sattvam eva niścīyate caśabdāt śukti raja tā dau= asattvam ca niścīyate iti gṛhyate pratyakṣam viparītam anupalambhaḥ ca asiddhaḥ iti arthaḥ 
NSu_2.3.49b.3	 evam anumāna ādīnām pratyekam dūṣaṇam abhidhāya sādhāraṇam dūṣaṇam āha pratyakṣāt iti pratyakṣeṇa gagana ādau sattvam eva śukti rajata ādau tu asattvam eva niścīyate sat gaganam asti me ajñānam asat eva rajatam pratyabhāt iti sarva loka sākṣiṇaḥ sākṣātkāri pratyakṣasya durapahnava tvāt atas tat anirvācya tāyām āśaṅkayamānāni anumāna ādīni pratyakṣa apahṛta viṣayāṇi itinā ubhayam ced na siddham tat a iti yuktam 
NSu_2.3.49b.4–2.3.49b.5	 yat vā jīveśvarayoḥ bhedaḥ mithyā bheda tvāt ityādi anumānasya dūṣaṇa antaram āha pratyakṣāt iti jīveśvara bhedasya avadhāryate iti śeṣaḥ tatas pratyakṣa viruddha tvena kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvam jīva īśvara bheda mithyā tva ādi sādhaka anumānasya iti bhāvaḥ syāt etat īśvaraḥ tāvat na pratyakṣa siddhaḥ śāstra yoni tvasya abhyupagata tvāt na api sarve jīvāḥ para ātmanām para ātmānam prati pratyakṣa tvasya anabhyupagamāt naca apratyakṣa vastu bhedaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ dūre tat satya tvam iti atas āha śāstra iti 
NSu_2.3.49cd.1–2.3.49cd.4	 śāstra gamya para īśānāt bhedaḥ sva ātmanaḥ īyate īyate pratyakṣeṇa iti śeṣaḥ uktam tāvat na ekaḥ eva bhedaḥ anekatra vyāsajya vartate kintu eka pratiyogikaḥ apara dharmikaḥ iti tad pratyakṣa tāyām ca dharmiṇaḥ eva pratyakṣatā upayujyate pratiyoginaḥ tu avagama mātram tathā loke darśanāt tatra īśvarasya ātma antarāṇām ca apratyakṣa tvena tad dharmikasya bhedasya pratyakṣeṇa jñātum aśakyatve api parameśvara pratiyogikaḥ sva ātma dharmikaḥ bhedaḥ pratyakṣeṇa jñātum śakyataḥ eva sva ātmanaḥ pratyakṣa tvāt para īśānasya ca śāstreṇa avagata tvāt yaḥ tu śāstreṇa īśvaram na jānāti tena mā vimāyi tad pratiyogikaḥ sva ātmanaḥ bhedaḥ śāstrāt vidita īśvarasya eva pratyakṣam tatas sva ātmanaḥ bhede pramāṇam uktam iti tathā api katham anumānasya kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvam bheda grāhakasya pratyakṣasya prābalyā nirūpaṇāt iti atas āha anubhūti iti tata api katham anumānasya kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvam bheda grāhakasya pratyakṣasya prābalyā nirūpaṇāt iti atas āha anubhūti iti 
NSu_2.3.50ab.1–2.3.50ab.3	 anubhūti virodhena katham ekatvam ucyate atra anubhūti śabdena sākṣī gṛhyate ucyate anumīyate para artha anumāna prayogasya vacana ātmaka tvāt ucyate iti uktam anumānena iti adhyāhāraḥ vā etat uktam bhavati sākṣi pratyakṣam khalu sva ātmanaḥ paramātma bheda grāha kamiṣyam tat ca anumānataḥ prabalam eva tad svarūpa prāmāṇyayoḥ dharmi koṭi niviṣyasya jīvasya ca grāhaka tvena upajīvya tvāt atas tad virodhena kāraṇena jīva brahmaṇoḥ eka tvam na anumātum śakyate iti astu sākṣi pratyakṣam anumānāt prabalam tasya īśvarāt svātmanaḥ bheda grāhaka tvam tu kutas niścitam yena anumānam bādhita viṣayam syāt iti atas āha kiñcid iti 
NSu_2.3.50cd.1–2.3.51ab.1–2.3.51ab.3^1	 kiñcid kartā ca duḥkhī iti sarvaiḥ eva anubhūyate sarvajñaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarva śaktiḥ iti śrutaḥ upalakṣaṇam etat alpa jñaḥ alpa śaktiḥ ca iti api pūrva ardhe grāhyam tathā sarva kartā nirduḥkhaḥ iti aparārdhe anubhūyate sva ātmā iti śeṣaḥ śrutaḥyaḥ sarvajñaḥ a parā asya śaktiḥ a sa hi sarvasya kartā a niraniṣyaḥa iti ādau= iti śeṣaḥ ayam abhisandhiḥ yaḥ hi yam artham avagamya tat viruddha dharmāṇam yam adhyakṣīkaroti sa tasmāt tasya bhedam pratyakṣatas paśyati eva iti sarva sākṣikam yadi api bhedaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ tathā api pratiyoginaḥ vaidharmya daśarnam pratyakṣa sācivyam ācarati iti na doṣaḥ 
NSu_2.3.51ab.1–2.3.51ab.3^2	 dṛṣṭam hi ratna tattva sākṣātkāre śāstrīya lakṣaṇa jñānasya sācivyam tat iha api śāstra avagata sārvajña ādi mat īśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ sva ātmanam tad viruddha alpa jña tva ādi dharmavantam sākṣiṇā anubhavan= tatas sva ātmanaḥ bhedam katham na adhyakṣīkuryāt iti astu ekasya jīvasya īśvarāt bhedaḥ sākṣi siddhaḥ tathā api tam vihāya anyatra īśvara abheda anumāne na pratyakṣa bādhaḥ iti atas uktam sarvaiḥ eva iti eka pratyakṣa bādha abhāve api tad tad pratyakṣa bādhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ iti bhāvaḥ nanu jīvam pakṣīkṛtya īśvara abheda sādhane bhavet eyam pratyakṣa virodhaḥ na ca evam anumīyate kintvīśvaram pakṣīkṛtya jīvābhedaḥ iti atas āha anubhūtāt hi iti 
NSu_2.3.51cd.1–2.3.51cd.3	 anubhūtāt hi bhedena śrutiḥ eṣā vadati amum īśvaram pakṣīkurvatā hi tad siddhiḥ avaśyam vaktavyā na ca pratyakṣa ādinā sa siddhayati iti śrutiḥ eva tad grāhikāḥ grāhyā eṣā ca dharmi pramāṇa bhūtāyaḥ sarvajñaḥ a satya ādikā śrutiḥ anumīśvaram alpa jña tva ādinā anubhūtāt jīvāt bhedenavadati tasmāt pratyakṣa bādha abhāve api upajīvya śruti virodhena kāla atyaya apadiṣya tā duṣparihara eva sadā avagata alpa jña tva ādi mañjīra svarūpam prati sārvajña ādi mat īśvara svarūpam pratipādayantī śrutiḥ tatas tam bhinnam eva pratipādayati anubhavasyāpala pitum aśakyatvāt anena eva ubhaya pakṣīkāraḥ api parāstaḥ upajīvya pratyakṣa śruti bādhita tvāt iti evam anumānam nirākṛtya idānīm tat yaḥ aham ityādi śrutim nirākaroti upajīvya iti 
NSu_2.3.52ab.1–2.3.52ab.2	 upajīvya viruddham tu katham aikyam śrutiḥ vadet tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa arthaḥ duṣyam hi anumānam aprāṇam bhavati śruteḥ tu pratīta artha pracyāvana mātram iti aikyam jīveśvarayoḥ śrutyā hi yadi jīvam anūdya tasya īśvara aikyam bodhyate tadā jīva grāhakam sākṣi pratyakṣam upajīvyam syāt tat ca bheda grāhakam iti uktam iti upajīvyavirodhaḥ yadi ca īśvara anuvādena tasya jīvābhedaḥ vidhīyate tadā yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti ādikam śruti antaram eva upajīvyam bhavet tat ca bheda grāhakam iti ukta tvāt upajīvi avirodhaḥ eva yadi ca ubhaya anuvādena abheda mātra bodhyam tadā ubhayam upajīvyam iti upajīvya pramāṇa virodhaḥ sphuṭaḥ eva yadi api etat sarvam prathama sūtraḥ eva uktam tathā api prapañcana artham punar ārabhyate iti adoṣaḥ 
NSu_2.3.52ab.3	 nanūpa jīvya virodhena upajīvakam bādhyate iti atra kim niyāmakam yena pratyakṣa āgama virodhāt anumāna āgamayoḥ aprāmāṇyam uktam ucyate iha hi bheda abheda viṣayoḥ upajīvya upajīvakayoḥ ubhayoḥ api prāmāṇyam eva vā aprāmāṇyam eva vā ekasya prāmāṇyam aparasya aprāmāṇyam vā tatra api upajīvakasya prāmāṇyam upajīvyasya aprāmāṇyam vā upajīvyasya prāmāṇyam upajīvakasya aprāmāṇyam iti pakṣāḥ sambhavati tatra na tāvat prathamaḥ viruddhayoḥ prāmāṇya anupapatteḥ upapattau vā vastunaḥ dvarūpya āpatteḥ bhrānti bādha vyavasthā bhāva prasaṅgāt ca na ca bheda abhedābhyām upapattiḥ nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt asārvatrika tvāt ca nacāna ekānta vādena nistāraḥ dvayoḥ api sa avadhāraṇatva asambhavāt na api dvitīyaḥ vastunaḥ nissvabhāva tva āpatteḥ naca anirvācya tā svīkāreṇa nirvāhaḥ brahmaṇi api sambhavāt iti pakṣa dvaya mati sphuṭa doṣa tvāt anirākṛtya tṛtīyam dūṣayati aprāmāṇyam iti 
NSu_2.3.52cd.1–2.3.53ab.2	 aprāmāṇyam yadā bheda vācakasya bhaviṣyati saḥ eva dharmiṇaḥ grāhī tad abhedaḥ katham bhavet bheda vācakasya āgamasya iti upalakṣaṇam bheda grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya iti api draṣṭavyam evam tadā saḥ eva iti atra api vyākhyāta tvāt dharmiṇaḥ jīvasya īśvarasya ca iti śabdaḥ adhyāhāryaḥ katham bodhyaḥ iti śeṣaḥ idam uktam bhavati yadi ajñāna ādi viśiṣyasya jīvasya sārvajña ādi viśiṣyasya paramātmanaḥ grāhakam pratyakṣam āgama vākyam vā prāmāṇyam syāt tadā jīva īśvarayoḥ asiddhau tat tvam asya ādi a āgamaiḥ anumānaiḥ ca tad abheda bodhanam na syāt nirviṣaya tvāt tathā ca kasya virodhāt pratyakṣa ādeḥ aprāmāṇyam syāt jñāpakaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ na kārakaḥ akhaṇḍa artha bodhanam api laukika vākya nyāyam anusṛtya paścāt lakṣaṇayā pareṇa abhyupagatam na punar evam eva alaukika prakārasya bodha anaṅga tvāt tasmāt upajīvaka virodhena upajīvyasya aprāmāṇya ayogāt pariśeṣataḥ caturtha prakāraḥ eva ca siddhayati iti 
NSu_2.3.53ab.3^1	 bhavet eva upajīvakāt upajīvyam balavat tad virodhe ca upajīvakasya aprāmāṇyam kinnāma asti tatra viśeṣaḥ aneka prakāraḥ hi upajīvya upajīvaka bhāvaḥ kvacid dharmi grāhaka tvena kvacid sādhya grāhaka tayā kvacid tad grahaṇa upayukta tayā kvāpi svarūpa grahaṇena kutracid prāmāṇya upapādanena kvacid vayāpti ādi aṅga pratipādaka tvena iti tatra sarvatra upajīvya viruddham upajīvakam bādhyataḥ eva āśraya ādi hīnasya utthāna viraha āpatteḥ yatra punar pratiṣedhakasya upajīvakasya pratiṣedhya samarpakam upajīvyam bhavati tadā na ayam nyāyaḥ 
NSu_2.3.53ab.3^2	 ca upajīvakena eva upajīvyasya bādhaḥ niṣedha artham eva tena tad upajīvanāt dṛṣṭam hi idam rajatam iti jñānasya na idam rajatam iti jñānena bādhya tvāt tat iha api yad uktam abheda pramāṇayoḥ anumānāgamayoḥ upajīvyābhyām pratyakṣa āgamābhyām virodhāt aprāmāṇyam iti tat ayuktam pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ anumāna āgamau prati niṣedhya samarpakatayā upajīvya tvāt bheda niṣedhaḥ hi na tad prāptim sambhavati tena atra upajīvaka virodhinoḥ upajīvyayoḥ pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ eva aprāmāṇyam ucitam iti atas yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti ādeḥ āgamasya tāvat aprāmāṇyam apākaroti aprāmāṇyam iti 
NSu_2.3.53ab.4	 bheda vācakasya bhedaka sārvajña ādi viśiṣya paramātma pratipādakasya āgamasya etat uktam bhavati samutthānavatā khalu anumānena āgamena vā virodhinā yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti ādi a āgamasya aprāmāṇyasyeṣi avyam asya aprāmāṇye tu anumāna ādeḥ utthānam eva durlabham dūre tad bādhanam parama ātma lakṣaṇasya dharmiṇaḥ tad eka gamya tvāt nirāśrayasya anumāna ādeḥ pravṛtti anupapattiḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.53ab.5–2.3.53ab.6	 nanu evam tarhi na idam rajatam iti jñāna virodhena idam rajatam ita jñānasya aprāmāṇyam na syāt na na syāt na hi na idam rajatam iti jñānam rajata aviśiṣyam vastu dharmīkṛtya utpadyate kintu sva rūpa mātram sarvam api hi jñānam dharmiṇi pramāṇam prakāre tu viparyayaḥ tat atra api idam rajatam iti jñānam idam aṃśe pramāṇam iti tat siddham idam ākāram āśritya pravṛttena bādhaka pratyayena virodhāt rajata aṃśe pūrva jñānasya aprāmāṇyam yujyate eva 
NSu_2.3.53ab.7	 nanu anena eva nyāyena abheda anumāna āgama virodhena yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti ādi śruteḥ aprāmāṇyam śakya upapādanam iyam api śrutiḥ brahma svarūpa mātre pramāṇam iti tanmātram upajīvya anumāna āgamābhyām sārvajña ādi bhedaka dharma vaiśiṣyayā aṃśe apramāṇīkariṣyate tathā ca yat dharmi grāhakam na tad virodhaḥ anumāna ādeḥ yat ca virodhi na tad dharmi pramāram iti atas āha yat iti 
NSu_2.3.53cd.1–2.3.53cd.3	 yat sva rūpa grahe mānam tad dharme na katham bhavet yat śati vākyam brahma svarūpa grahaṇa artham mānam aṅgīkriyate tad dharme sārvajña ādi dharma vaiśiṣyayā ākāre katham na mānam bhavet ayam abhisandhiḥ śukti rajata ādi jñānam hi idam aṃśe pramāṇam rajata vaiśiṣyayā aṃśe tu apramāṇam iti yuktam vaiśiṣyayā aṃśasya bādhaka pramāṇa viruddha tvāt idam ākārasya uttaratra api anuvṛtteḥ idam na rajatam iti bādhaka jñānam utpadyate na punar na idam rajatam ca iti naca ayam atra nyāyaḥ svarūpa vat viśiṣya aṃśe api bādhaka abhāvāt naca abheda anumāna āgamau bādhakau anyonya āśraya tvāt bādhita tvena śruteḥ aprāmāṇye sati upajīvya virodha rahitasya anumāna ādeḥ bādhaka tvam sati ca tasmin= tad virodhinyāḥ śruteḥ aprāmāṇyam iti 
NSu_2.3.53cd.4–2.3.53cd.5	 katham ca anumāna ādeḥ śruti bādhaka tvam natāvat virodhi tva mātreṇa vaiparītyasya api su vaca tvāt na api virodhi uttara jñāna tvena śukti rūpyam iti jñāna anantaram rajatam idam iti jñānasya darśanāt anuttara virodhi jñānam bādhakam idam tu sa uttaram iti api na kadācid anuttarasya api rajata jñānasya sambhavāt kintu yāvat śakti parīkṣitam uttaram virodhi a parīkṣitasya pūrvasya bādhakam bhavati naca evam atra asti iti na kevalam bādhaka abhāva sāmyāt ayam vibhāgaḥ na yuktaḥ kim tarhi iti atas āha ekā iti 
NSu_2.3.54.1–2.3.54.2	 eka vijñāna vijñaptyā dvayam mānam bhaviṣyati na ced ekam amānam tat dvayam api atra naḥ bhavet ekavidhamā iva idam yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti ādi śruti janitam vijñānam na punar śukti rajata ādi jñānam iva sva rūpa mātre pramāṇam viśiṣya ākāre tu apramāṇam iti anekavidham iti evam parīkṣā sahakṛta sākṣi rūpavijñaptyā api idam jñāna dvayam dharma dharmi dvaya garbham viśiṣya ākāram pratyapi mānam bhavati eva vakṣyate ca ayam arthaḥ prapañcena yat vā dvayam pratīti dvayam sva rūpa vat dharme api iti yojyam 
NSu_2.3.54.3–2.3.54.4	 athavā yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādi śruteḥ brahma svarūpa mātre prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam tu sārvajña ādi viśiṣya ākāraḥ iti vadataḥ kaḥ abhiprāyaḥ kim śukti rajata ādi jñānam iva ekam eva idam jñānam viṣaya bhedena pramāṇam apramāṇam ca iti kiṃvā jñāna dvayam etat tatra ekam pramāṇam aparam ca apramāṇam iti ādyam dūṣayati yat iti pūrvaḥ eva abhiprāyaḥ dvitīyam nirākaroti ekā iti ekam eva idam vijñānam iti sākṣi vijñaptyā na anekatvam kalpyam iti śeṣaḥ anyathā stambhaḥ ayam iti ādau= api jñāna dvaya kalpanā pattiḥ tathā ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam na kena api jñāyeta astu vedam jñāna dvayam tathā api na ekasya aprāmāṇyam vaktum śakyate sva rūpa jñānasya iva dharma jñānasya api abādhita tvāt iti āha dvayam iti jñāna dvayam api iti arthaḥ dharma jñānam api iti vaktavye dvayam iti vacanam nyāya sāmya sūcana artham 
NSu_2.3.54.5	 evam bādhā bhāva parīkṣita tva sāmye api śrautam ekam jñāna dvayam vāṅgīkṛtya aṃśataḥ prāmāṇya prāmāṇye vadataḥ atiprasaṅgam āha naced iti tat śrautam jñānam dvayam viśiṣya ākāram prati pramāṇam na ced tadā atra viṣaye ekam svarūpa aṃśam pratyapi pramāṇam na bhavet aviśeṣāt tathā ca punar anāśrayayoḥ anumāna āgāmayoḥ anutthānam eva yat vā tat vijñānam atra viṣaye ekam viśiṣya ākāram prati pramāṇam ced tadā dvayam pratyapi naḥ bhavet viśiṣya ākāra vat svarūpe api pramāṇam na bhavet aviśeṣāt iti yāvat jñāna dvaya aṅgīkāra vāde tu atra jñāna dvaye tad viśiṣya viṣayam jñānam pramāṇam na ced tarhi jñāna dvayam api pramāṇam na bhavet viśiṣya jñānam iva svarūpa jñānam api apramāṇam syāt aviśeṣāt iti 
NSu_2.3.54.6	 evam abheda anumāna āgamau prati yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti śruteḥ niṣedhya samarpaka tvena upajīvya tvam pratyuktam tathā api na anumānāgamayoḥ upajīvya pramāṇa virodhaḥ asti yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādi śruti siddha brahma svarūpa mātra āśrayaṇena pravṛtta tvāt na hi sārvajña ādi viśiṣya ākāram avalambya anumāna ādinā pravartitavyam iti atra niyāmakam asti tatas viruddha ākārasya anupayogi taya anupajīvanāt upajīvyasya ca sva rūpa mātrasya avirodhi tvāt na upajīvya pramāṇa virodhaḥ anumāna ādeḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ tu kathañcid syāt iti āśaṅkām pariharan= upasaṃharati dharmī iti 
NSu_2.3.55ab.1–2.3.55ab.3^1	 dharmi grāhi virodhaḥ tu tasmāt mānasya dūṣaṇam tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa arthaḥ pramāṇa mātra virodhādvayavat chinatti dharmi grāhiṇyā śrutyā virodhaḥ mānasya abheda pramāṇasya anumāna āgama rūpasya ayam āśayaḥ paramāṇavaḥ sa avayavāḥ iti ādeḥ anumānasya vākyasya ca katham upajīvya virodhaḥ iti vaktavyam parama aṇu tvasya anupayoginaḥ anupajīvya tvam kintu sva rūpa mātrasya iti vaktum śakya tvāt na evam yuktam niravaya tva ādinā vinā paramāṇoḥ dharmīkaraṇa asambhavāt sva rūpa mātra dharmīkaraṇe siddhārtha tā āpattiḥ iti ced samam prakṛte api na hi brahmā api sārvajña ādinā vinā śakyam dharmīkartum 
NSu_2.3.55ab.1–2.3.55ab.3^2	 sva rūpa mātra dharmīkaraṇe siddha sādhanāt āropitena sārvajña ādinā vyāvṛttasya dharmīkaraṇe kaḥ doṣaḥ yaḥ ayam sthāṇuḥ sa puruṣaḥ iti vat iti ced na āropitena niravayava tva ādinā vyāvṛttasya tatra api dharmīkaraṇa sambhavāt niravayava tva ādi grāhakam pramāṇa tayā avadhṛtam na āropitam iti ced tulyam atra api śruteḥ api prāmāṇya niścayāt tat evam pramāṇa siddhena niravayava tva ādinā viśiṣyasya eva yathā dharmīkaraṇam tathā atra api sāvarjñādinā pāramārthikena eva viśiṣyasya eva dharmīkaraṇam iti atas dharmi grāhaka virodhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.55ab.4	 syāt etat yathā khalva bheda pramāṇayoḥ anumānāgamayoḥ upajīvya virodha anna abheda sādhaka tvam tathā udāhṛtāyāḥ bhinnaḥ acintyaḥ ityādi bheda śruteḥ api upajīvya virodhāt na bheda sādhaka tvam sambhavati tādātmya pratiyogikaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ hi bhedaḥ nāma naca aprāpte tādātmye tad pratiṣedha bodhanam yuktam iti abheda prāpakam pramāṇam upajīvya pravṛttā bheda śrutiḥ katham na upajīvi aviruddhāḥ kiñca nirbhedam svarūpam āśritya tasya bhedaḥ bodhanīyaḥ tathā ca katham na upajīvyavirodhaḥ yathoktam abhedam na ullikhantī dhīḥ na bheda ullekhana kṣamā tathā āca ādye pramā sā syāt na antye sva apekṣya vaiśasāt a iti atas āha na iti 
NSu_2.3.55cd.1–2.3.55cd.2	 na upajīvyaḥ hi abhedaḥ atra kvacid bheda śruteḥ balāt hi śabdaḥ yukti sūcakaḥ abhedaḥ iti tad grāhakam atra kvacid iti dharmi tva ādau= iti arthaḥ tat ayam arthaḥ bheda śruteḥ hi na dharmi samarpaka tvena abheda jñāna upajīvaka tvam tāvat jīveśvara svarūpasya eva dharmi tvāt na api svarūpa prāmāṇya grāhaka tvena pratyakṣeṇa eva tad siddheḥ atas niṣedhya prāpaka tayā eva iti vaktavyam na ca tad virodhaḥ aprāmāṇyam āvahati niṣedha śāstra apalāpa prasaṅgāt na ca pramāṇa prāptasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ kintu tattvam asya ādi śruti tātparya aparijñāna prāptasya eva yat api nirbhedam svarūpam ādāya bhedaḥ boddhavyaḥ iti tatra api na yayoḥ bhedaḥ bodhanīyaḥ tayoḥ abhedaḥ āśrayaṇīyaḥ kintu sva gata bhedam vastu dharmitaya upādāya tasya antatas bhedaḥ bodhyate atas jīva īśa bheda śruteḥ tad abheda upajīvana abhāvāt anapekṣa tva lakṣaṇāt bala ādi uktam bheda sādhaka tvam iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_2.3.55cd.3–2.3.55cd.5	 kiñca tiṣṭhatu tāvat yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādi śruteḥ upajīvya tvam tathā api abheda anumāna āgama bādhaka tvam bhavet eva iyam khalu śrutiḥ sārvajña ādi viśiṣyam īśvaram pratipādayantī na kiñcid apekṣate anumāna āgamau tu sa apekṣau sa apekṣa nirapekṣayoḥ ca nirapekṣasya prābalyāditya āśayavān āha na upajīvyaḥ hi iti atra bheda abheda pramāṇayoḥ madhye bheda śruteḥ bhedaka dharma viśiṣya dharmi śruteḥ abhedaḥ iti abheda pramāṇam anapekṣatva upalakṣaṇam etat atas balāt abheda pramāṇa bādhaka tvam iti śeṣaḥ syāt etat yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādi śrutiḥ na jīva bhedaka dharma viśiṣyam brahma pratipādayati kintu anuvadati eva atas na anumāna ādeḥ tad bādhaḥ iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.3.56ab.1–2.3.56ab.2	 na ca māna antara upeyam brahma tat bhavati kvacid upeyam jñeyam tat iti sārvajña ādi upetam kvacid iti bhrānti pratipannam api na bhavati iti sūcayati na tāvat sārvajña ādi viśiṣyam brahma śrīti vyatirikta pramāṇa gamyam śāstra eka yoni tvasya samarthita tvāt na api bhrānti pratipannam kvacid pramitasya eva anyatra āropāt na ca pramāṇena bhrāntyā vā aprāptasya anuvādaḥ sambhavati atas na iyam śrutiḥ anuvādinī kinnāma pratipādayati eva ukta rūpam brahma iti 
NSu_2.3.56ab.3–2.3.56cd.2	 nanu tathā api na upajīvya pramāṇa virodhaḥ anumāna ādeḥ śruti upajīvane hi saḥ syāt na ca evam tadvayati rikta pramāṇa upajīvanāt iti atas āha na ca iti vastu vyavahitaḥ vahniḥ adhūma sthale pratyakṣādya vedyaḥ api kvacid deśe pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vā avagamyate prāk patana utpatteḥ agamyam api guru tvam kvacid kāle anumānena gamyate na ca evam brahma kvacid māna antara upeyam yena tad upajīvya anumāna ādi pravṛttiḥ syāt astu vā brahma pramāṇa antara vedyam tathā api abheda anumāna ādeḥ upajīvya pramāṇa virodhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ śruti vat tasya api pramāṇasya bheda pratyāyaka tvāt iti abhiprāyavān āha yena iti yena mānena ca apeyam bhedaḥ tena avagamyate upeyam brahma iti śeṣaḥ tat katham iti atas āha savajñā iti 
NSu_2.3.57.1–2.3.57.2	 sarva jñāna maya eva īśaḥ yadi upeyaḥ kathañcana sarvajñathva guṇena eva tayā bhedaḥ avagamyate dharma ādikam kasyacid pratyakṣam prameya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ādikayā sa avajña sādhaka tayā anumayā sarva kartṛ tva ādi anumāna upalakṣaṇam ca etat eva iti pratyakṣam vyāvartayati kathañcana iti abhyupagama vādaḥ ayam iti sūcayati sarvajña tvā iti upalakṣaṇam tayā eva iti anvayaḥ īśvare tāvat pratyakṣam śaṅkā arham eva na bhavati atas anumānam eva vaktavyam pratipakṣa ādinā parāhatasya api tasya kathañcid śaṅkā arha tvāt anumānam ca kiñcid kenacid viśiṣyam eva pratipādayati na tu niṣkṛṣṭam vastu na ca jīva ādi sādhāraṇa dharma viśiṣya atharsiddhau= īśvaraḥ sidhyati tasmāt bhedaka dharma vaiśiṣyayena eva tad siddhi varktavyā tathā ca anumāna ādeḥ upajīvya virodhaḥ vajra lepāyitaḥ yadi api anumānam svatas śrutitaḥ durbalam tathā api upajīvyatayā bādhakam bhavati eva iti 
NSu_2.3.57.3	 tad anena īśvara grāhikāyāḥ śruteḥ bhedaka dharma viśṭi tasmin prāmāṇyam upapāditam idānīm jīva grāhakasya pratyakṣasya īśvara bhedaka dharmiṇi jīve prāmāṇyam samarthyate tathā hi bhavatu śrutiḥ aduḥkhi tva sārvajña ādi mat īśvare pramāṇam tathā api nābheda anumāna āgamayoḥ upajīvya pramāṇa virodhena aprāmāṇyam duḥkhi tvā ādi rūpe hi jīvasya tāttvike sati tathā syāt na ca evam aham duḥkhī iti ādeḥ anubhavasya mithyā anubhava tvāt antaḥkaraṇa gataḥ hi duḥkha ādiḥ anarthaḥ svarūpataḥ mithyā bhūtaḥ japā kusuma aruṇim eva sphaṭike caitanye cakāsti na ca bhrānti pratipannena bhedakena vastu bhidyate iti atas āha na iti 
NSu_2.3.58ab.1–2.3.58ab.3	 na duḥkha anubhavaḥ kvāpi mithyā anubhava tām vrajet kvāpi iti sarvathā iti arthaḥ bhavet etat yadi aham duḥkhī iti ādi anubhavaḥ mithyā anubhavaḥ syāt na ca tathā api tu pramāṇam eva yadi api duḥkha ādikam antaḥkaraṇa gatam tathā api svarūpeṇa sat eva jīvātmanaḥ ca tad bhoktṛ tvena tadvat tvam tāttvikam eva alpa śakti tva pāratantrī a ādikam tu svarūpa gatam eva iti āśayaḥ kutas iti atas āha na hi iti 
NSu_2.3.58cd.1–2.3.58cd.2	 na hi bādhaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ duḥkha ādi anubhavasya tu tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe na eva iti sambandhaḥ asañjāta bādha bhrameṣu vyabhicāra parihārāya kvacid iti uktam na hi kadācid kutracid kaścid nā aham duḥkhī kintu antaḥkaraṇa gatena eva mithyā duḥkhena duḥkhitayā atmānam amaniṣam iti bādhaka pratyayavān dṛśyate iti arthaḥ nanu vimuktaḥ ca vimucyate atattvam asi a ityādi śrutiḥ eva asya anubhavasya bādhikā asti iti katham na duḥkha anubhūtiḥ bhrāntiḥ atra hi duḥkha ādi upaplava rahitam eva asya ātmanaḥ tāttvikam rūpam iti pratipādyate iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_2.3.59.1–2.3.59.2	 yadi duḥkha anubhūtiḥ ca bhrāntiḥ iti avasīyate aduḥkhita aśrutiḥ kena na bhrāntiḥ iti gamyate avasīyate śrutim āśritya iti śeṣaḥ kena kāraṇena bhrāntiḥ svarūpataḥ arthataḥ ca gamyate abhyupagamyate anubhavam āśritya iti śeṣaḥ idam uktam bhavati bhavet eṣā śrutiḥ asya anubhavasya bādhikā yadi niścita pramāṇa bhāvā bhavet na ca tathā dharmi grāhaka anubhava virodhena asmābhiḥ tad aprāmāṇyasya pratipādyamāna tvāt parasya ca tad parihārāya adya api samudyata tvāt tathā ca sati śruti prāmāṇya niścaye anubhavasya bhrānti tvam tasmin= ca sati śruti prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti paraspara āśraya tva prasaṅgaḥ nanu anubhava virodhena śruti aprāmāṇya abhidhāne api samānam etat na samānam anubhavasya anapekṣa tvāt śruteḥ tad apekṣa tvāt anyathā sarvatra dharmi grāhaka virodha uccheda āpattiḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.59.3–2.3.60ab.2	 nanu tarhi na idam rajatam iti asya api rajatam idam iti jñānam prati bādhaka tvam ayuktam syāt na syāt na idam rajatam iti jñāna prāmāṇyasya sākṣiṇā parīkṣayā niścita tvāt idam rajatam iti jñānasya tad abhāvāt parīkṣita prāmāṇyena upajīvakena upajīvyasya atathā bhūtasya bādha upagamāt upajīvya upajīvaka nyāyasya tad anya viṣaya tvāt prāmāṇya sandehe khalu nyāya anusaraṇam niścite tu prāmāṇye kim anena vakṣyati ca etat ācāryaḥ evam tarhi śruteḥ api prāmāṇyam parīkṣā sahakṛtena sākṣiṇā niścitam iti anubhava bādhaka tvam upapatsyate iti āśa yavān āśaṅkate śruti iti evam tarhi śruteḥ api prāmāṇyam parīkṣā sahakṛtena sākṣiṇā niścitam iti anubhava bādhaka tvam upapatsyate iti āśa yavān āśaṅkate śruti iti śruti svarūpam arthaḥ ca mānena eva avasīyate svarūpam arthaḥ ca iti vivakṣā bhedena prāmāṇyam eva uktam jīvasya nirduḥkha brahma ātma tā pratipādaka śruti svarūpam asyāḥ śruteḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti ubhayatra phalataḥ artha bheda abhāvāt etat eva hi prāmāṇyam api mānena sākṣiṇā pariharati tat ced iti 
NSu_2.3.60cd.1–2.3.60cd.3	 tat ced mānam gṛhītam te kim duḥkha anubhave bhramaḥ te iti avyayam tṛtīya arthe te mataḥ iti adhyāhāraḥ vā kim kinnimittam duḥkha anubhave bhramaḥ iti duḥkha anubhavasya bhrama tvam iti yāvat aṅgīkriyate iti śeṣaḥ tat sākṣi lakṣaṇam mānam duḥkha anubhava viṣaye bhramaḥ kutas aṅgīkriyate iti vā etat uktam bhavati sākṣiṇā śruti prāmāṇyam niścitam iti na pareṇa aṅgīkartum śakyate tathā sati tad prāmāṇyasya aṅgīkartavya tva prasaṅgāt iṣyate tat iti ced na tathā sati aham duḥkhī iti duḥkha ādi viṣayaḥ api saḥ eva iti tatra api tasya prāmāṇyam eva grāhyam syāt na bhrama tvam na ced śruti prāmāṇya grahaṇe api bhramaḥ syāt iti nanu ekatra prāmāṇye viṣaya antare api prāmāṇyena bhāvyam tatra aprāmāṇye ca anyatra api aprāmāṇyena bhavitavyam iti kutas etat mā hi bhūt ekasya cakṣuḥ ādeḥ ayam niyamaḥ iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_2.3.61ab.1–2.3.61ab.2	 na ca bādha viśeṣaḥ asti yat abādhitam eva tat bhedet eva ekasya api kvacid prāmāṇye paratra aprāmāṇyam kāraṇa viśeṣāt sa ca utpattau doṣaḥ jñaptau bādhaḥ doṣaḥ api bādhonneyaḥ eva yathā uktam balavat pramāṇataḥ ca eva jñeyāḥ doṣāḥ na ca anyathā a iti tatas bādhaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ na ca duḥkha ādi viṣayasya sākṣi anubhavasya bādha rūpaḥ viśeṣaḥ asti yena asau śruti prāmāṇye pramāṇa bhūtaḥ api duḥkha ādau bhramaḥ syāt yat yasmāt evam tat tasmāt śruti prāmāṇyam iva tat ātmanaḥ duḥkhi tvā ādikam api abādhitam eva satyam eva aṅgīkāyarmiti yat vā yadi asmāt evam tasmāt kim duḥkha anubhave bhramaḥ iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ 
NSu_2.3.61ab.3	 nanu etat śruti prāmāṇyam duḥkha ādikam ca sākṣi gṛhītam eva na cobhayatra prāmāṇyam sākṣiṇaḥ yuktam paraspara virodhāt tatas ekatra aprāmāṇya avaśyambhāve duḥkha ādau= eva tat iti grāhyam śruti prāmāṇyasya apauruṣeya tva ādi parīkṣā saha kṛtena gṛhīta tvāt atas mithyā eva duḥkhi tvā ādikam ita ced na duḥkha ādau= api sajātīya vijātīya saṃvāda rūpa parīkṣā asadbhāvāt evam tarhi sandehāt na duḥkha ādi satya tā niścayaḥ bhavatām yuktaḥ iti na śruteḥ anubhava bādhaḥ vaktum śakyate iti atas āha abādhitam eva iti 
NSu_2.3.61ab.4	 tat duḥkham satyam eva iti avadhārayataḥ ayam abhisandhiḥ satyam śruti prāmāṇyam duḥkha ādikam ca sākṣi gṛhītam eva naca ekatra api bādhakam asti iti ubhayam api pramāṇam sākṣī na ca virodhaḥ advaita sat tām antareṇa api śruti prāmāṇya sattāyāḥ sambhavāt na hi apauruṣeya tva ādi yuktayaḥ viṣaya viśeṣa niyata prāmāṇya niścaye sācivyam ācaranti kintu prāmāṇya mātra niścaye upakrama ādyāḥ tu tatra tatra ābhāsīkṛtāḥ eva na ca duḥkha sattām antareṇa tatra prāmāṇyasya sambhavaḥ asti na ca duḥkha sattayā śruti prāmāṇya mātrasya virodhaḥ asti viṣaya antare api tasya sambhavāt atas satyam eva duḥkha ādikam iti 
NSu_2.3.61ab.5	 śrutiḥ anubhavasya bādhikā na bhavati kintu dharmi grāhaka tayā prabalena anubhavena eva bādhyate iti uktam na kevalam dhamiḥ grāhaka tayā anubhava prābalyam kinnāma śruti svarūpa prāmāṇya grāhaka tvena api iti āśayavān āha śruti iti arthaḥ iti arthavat tvam prāmāṇyam iti yāvat svarūpataḥ prāmāṇyataḥ ca avasitāḥ hi śrutiḥ abhipreta siddhaye prayoktavyā na anyathā śrati svarūpam tad prāmāṇyam ca mānena eva sākṣi lakṣaṇena avasīyate na anyena yadi api śrati svarūpam śrotra vedyam tathā api śrotra janita tad vṛtti prāmāṇyam yāvat na sākṣiṇā gṛhyate tāvat na tat siddhayati iti atas śruti svarūpa avasāyaḥ api sākṣiṇyā iva āyatate 
NSu_2.3.61ab.6	 yat vā śruti śabdena tat janitam jñānam ucyate tatra pṛcchāmaḥ tasya sākṣiṇaḥ prāmāṇyam bhavatā api abhyupagatam na vā iti na iti pakṣe śruti svarūpa ādya siddheḥ na tad virodhena duḥkha ādi anubhavasya bhrama tvam vaktum yuktam ādyam dūṣayati tat ced iti tat sākṣi rūpam pramāṇam tvayā gṛhītam ced tadā duḥkha anubhavasya bhrama tvam kim na kathañcid śruti virodhena khalu tat ucyate sā tu svarūpa prāmāṇya grāhaka tayā upajīvyena anubhavena bādhitā katham tat bādhanāya prabhavati iti 
NSu_2.3.61ab.7–2.3.61ab.8	 syāt etat śruti svarūpa prāmāṇyayoḥ sākṣiṇaḥ prāmāṇyam aṅgīkriyate duḥkha ādau tu viṣaya antare śruti virodhena aprāmāṇyam āśrīyate tad katham ukta doṣaḥ iti atas āha na ca iti bādhasya bādhaka tvena abhimatāyāḥ śruteḥ viśeṣaḥ bādhya tayā abhimatāt sākṣiṇaḥ atiśayaḥ na asti asti ca ukta vakṣyamāṇa rītyā sākṣiṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ iti śiṣyam spaṣṭam kiñca aham duḥkhī ityādi sākṣiṇaḥ bhrama tvam vadan praṣṭavyaḥ kim sarvatra api sākṣiṇaḥ bhrama tvam aṅgīkriyate uta kvacid prāmāṇyam api ādye doṣam āha śruti svarūpam iti 
NSu_2.3.61ab.9	 mānena sākṣiṇā eva tathā ca tasya bhrānti tve tat na siddhayet iti bhāvaḥ paramārthataḥ mā saitsīt iti ca na vācyam tattva āvedaka tvasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt atha śruti svarūpa ādi viṣaye tad māna tvam svīkriyate iti dvitīya m anūdya uttaram āha tat ced iti ekatra prāmāṇye paratra api prāmāṇyam aṅgīkartavyam iti etat kutas iti atas aviśeṣāt iti āha na ca iti pūrvavat vaya ākhyānam 
NSu_2.3.61ab.10–2.3.61ab.12	 evam sākṣiṇaḥ pramāṇa antara sādhāraṇa rūpa tām upetya bādhaka abhāvena aham duḥkhī iti ādebhraṃma tvam na upapadyate iti uktam idānīm sākṣiṇaḥ yathārtha tva niyamāt ca na duḥkha ādi viṣaye bhramatu a śaṅkā upapadyate kim bādhaka gaveṣaṇa ādinā iti āśayavān sākṣiṇaḥ yathārtha tva niyamam vipakṣe bādhakena samarthayate bādhaḥ iti anubhūte sākṣi pratīte arthe yadi bādhaḥ pravarteta sākṣī yadi kutracid ayathārthaḥ syāt iti yāvat ayathātvarthasya bādha unneya tvāt evam uktam tadā katham stambhaḥ ayam kumbhaḥ ayam iti padārthānām nirṇayaḥ īyate upeyate etat eva prapañcayati kaḥ api iti 
NSu_2.3.62ab.1–2.3.62ab.3^1	 kaḥ api hi arthaḥ na niścetum śakyate bhrama vādinā bhrama vādinā sākṣiṇaḥ kvacid bhrama tvam vadatā sākṣī kvacid ayathārthaḥ syāt tadā padārtha nirṇayaḥ na syāt iti arthaḥ yathā ahuḥ anye api jñānasya vyabhicāri tve viśvāsaḥ kinnibandhanaḥ a iti nanu ca nirṇayaḥ niścayaḥ iti ca avadhāraṇa ātmakam jñānam ucyate tat ca stambha kumbha ādiṣu artheṣu tad tad kāraṇa sāmagrī vaśādeva utpadyate nirṇāyaka abhāva saha kṛta samāna dharma darśana ādinā hi anavadhāraṇa ātmakam jñānam saṃśaya pada vedanīyam janyate tad vilakṣaṇayā ca sāmagṣāḥ avadhāraṇa jñānam 
NSu_2.3.62ab.1–2.3.62ab.3^2	 tatra kaḥ sākṣiṇaḥ yāthārthya niyamasya upayogaḥ kiñca tad abhāvena apaneṣyate ucyate na stambhaḥ ayam iti eka ākāra pratiniyatam jñānam iha nirṇaya ādi śabdaiḥ abhidhīyate api tarhi tad anantara bhāvī vastu tathā tva āśvāsaḥ tathā hi vaktāraḥ bhavanti stambhaḥ iti pratīyate bhavati ca ayam stambhaḥ iti vā vastu tattvam tu na vidmaḥ iti vā iti tat kasya hetoḥ eka ākāra pratiniyateṣu api jñān eṣa keṣāñcit bhrama tvasya keṣāñcid abhramatvasya bahulam upalabdha tvena idānīm jāyamānā ipi eka ākāra niyate jñāne vastu tathā tva viśvāsa ayogāt 
NSu_2.3.62ab.4	 bhavatu vastu tathā tu a āśvāsaḥ vastu darśana pṛṣṭha bhāvī nirṇayaḥ saḥ api tasya daśarnasya bhramatvā abhrama tva nirṇayam eva apekṣate yadi jñānam bhramaḥ syāt tadā vastu atathābhūtam iti avasīyate yadi tu abhramaḥ tadā tathābhūtam iti evaṃca kim sākṣiṇaḥ yāthārthya niyamena upanīyate kiṃca tasya bhrama tvena apanīyate iti atas āha bhrama tvam iti 
NSu_2.3.62c–2.3.62f.3	 bhrama tvam abhramatvam ca yadā eva anubhava upagam ekasya bhramatā tatra parasya abhramatā kutas satyam pratyayānām bhramatvā abhrama tva nirṇaya āyattaḥ vastu nirṇayaḥ iti sā eva tatra pratyayeṣu ekasya stambha ādau puruṣa ādi pratyayasya bhramatā parasya stambha ādi pratyayasya abhramatā ca kutas nirṇetavyāḥ na kutas api kutas yadā yatas pratyayānām bhrama tvam abhram atva ca anubhava upagam sākṣiṇā eva adhyavaseyam iti syāt etat karaṇa doṣa bādhaka pratyaya adhīnam pratyayānām bhrama tvam abhramatvam ca saṃvāda āyattam bhaviṣyati tat katham tat anavadhāraṇam iti āśaṅkām pariharan= uktam artham spaṣṭam ācaṣṭe bhrama tvam iti 
NSu_2.3.63.1–2.3.63.3^1	 bhrama tvam abhramatvam ca sarvam vedyam hi sākṣiṇā sa ced sākṣī kvacid duṣyaḥ katham nirṇayaḥ īyate pratyayānām bhrama tvam abhrama tvam tad avadhāraṇa upayuktam ca sarvam karaṇa doṣa ādikam sākṣiṇā niśceyam aniścitasya bhrama tvādi avadhāraṇa aprasaṅgāt sa ced sākṣī kvacid duṣyaḥ ayathārthaḥ syāt tadā katham kāraṇa doṣa ādeḥ bhrama tva ādeḥ vastu tathā tva ādeḥ vā niṇarya īyate etat uktam bhavati pratyayānām bhramatvā avadhāraṇam kāraṇa doṣa ādi āyattam tathā api sākṣiṇaḥ yāthārthya niyama abhāve na siddhayet na hi tad svarūpeṇa upayuktam atiprasaṅgāt kintu niścitam eva tat niścayaḥ ca sākṣātkāra paramparayā vā sākṣiṇyāyatate sa hi kāraṇa doṣa ādikam svayam eva tad grāhaka prāmāṇya grahaṇena vā niścitya bhrama tvam niścinoti 
NSu_2.3.63.1–2.3.63.3^2	 tatas ca tasya kvacid ayathārtha tve aviśvasanīya tva āpattyā na nirṇayaḥ syāt abhrama tva niścayaḥ tu na saṃvāda adhīnaḥ tathā sati anava stha ādi doṣāḥ prāduṣyuḥ iti uktam kintu kevala sākṣiṇi āyattaḥ viparyaya śaṅkā nirāse tu saṃvādasya anupraveśaḥ na ca saṃvādaḥ api aniścitaḥ aṅgam tad niścayaḥ ca sākṣī adhīnaḥ eva tasya ca kvacid ayathārtha tve tat ubhaya nirṇayaḥ api na bhavet iti nanu sākṣiṇaḥ yathārtha tva niyame api pratyayānām bhramatvā abhrama tva nirṇayaḥ na upapadyate na hi yāthārthyam sva rūpeṇa eva upayuktam atiprasaṅgāt kintu niścitam eva na ca tad niścaya upāyaḥ asti atas tat aniścayāt kāraṇa doṣa ādeḥ bhrama tva ādeḥ stambha tvādeḥ aniścayaḥ eva iti atas āha viśeṣāḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.64ab.1–2.3.64ab.3	 viśeṣā sarve eva ete sākṣi pratyaya gocarāḥ viśiṣyante etaiḥ iti viśeṣāḥ kāraṇa doṣa upādayaḥ sākṣi pratyakṣa gocarāḥ eva iti sambandhaḥ sa akṣi yātha arthyasya sākṣiṇā eva upapatteḥ asya arthasya ca vakṣyamāṇa vyavahārānyatha anupapatti siddha tvāt iti bhāvaḥ yadi sākṣī kvacid vayabhicaret tadā tena aviśvasanīyena kāraṇa doṣa ādi niścayaḥ na syāt tad abhāve ca pratyayānām bhramatvādi na niścīyeta tathā ca vastu nirṇayaḥ na syāt kāraṇa abhāve kārya ayogāt iti uktam tatra mā bhūt etat sarvam iti ced na tathā sati hāna upādāna ādi sarva vyavaha avila upaprasaṅgāt katham sarva vyavahārāṇām atad kārya tvāt iti āha ūrīkṛtya ca iti 
NSu_2.3.64cd.1–2.3.64cd.3	 ūrīkṛtya ca tān sarvān vyavahāraḥ pravartate niścitya iti arthaḥ caḥ avadhāraṇe tān sarvān kāraṇa doṣān ūrīkṛtya vyavahāra pravartate iti gauṇam samāna kartṛka tvam yat vorīkṛtya kāraṇa tayā upādāya kāraṇīkṛtvā iti vyākhyeyam tathā hi idam rajatam iti bhrāntyā pravṛttaḥ kāraṇa doṣam bādhaka pratyayam vā avadhārya tasya jñānasya bhrama tvam niścitya na idam rajatam kintu śuktiḥ eva iti vastu vyavasthāpya jahāti tathā jalam edat iti pratītya tasya pratyayasya apātataḥ eva anyathā tva śaṅkāyām saṃvādam niveśya tad svarūpa prāmāṇye gṛhītvā abhrama tvam niścitya jalam etat bhavati eva iti avadhārya tat upādattaḥ iti nanu na ayam asti niyamaḥ yat ukta rītyār atha tathā tva adhyavasāya pūrvakaḥ eva vyavahāraḥ iti tad sandeha ādinā api vyavahāra darśanāt iti ataḥ āha sākṣiṇaḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.64ef.1–2.3.64ef.2	 sākṣiṇaḥ vyavasāyī tu vyavahāraḥ abhidhīyate vyavasāyī niraśaṅkaḥ avisaṃvādī ca vyavahāraḥ asmābhiḥ ukta rītyā sākṣiṇaḥ kāryaḥ abhidhīyate na tu vyavahāra mātram na ca viśiṣyaḥ vyavahāraḥ artha tathā tva adhyavasāya pūrvaka tām vyabhicarati iti astu vyavahāra vilopaḥ kinnaḥ chinnam iti āśaṅkām pariharan= uktā prasaṅgānām viparyaya paryavasānam āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_2.3.65.1–2.3.65.3^1	 tasmāt sarva prasiddhasya vyavahārasya siddhaye sākṣī nirdoṣaḥ eva ekaḥ sadā aṅgī kāryaḥ eva naḥ yasmāt sākṣiṇaḥ kvacid ayathārtha tve aviśvasanīya tva āpattyā kāraṇa doṣa ādi aniścaya prasaṅgena jñānānām bhramatvā bhrama tva nirdhāraṇa abhāva saktyār atha tathā tva nirṇaya abhāva anuṣaṅgeṇa niśśaṅkaḥ avisaṃvādī vyavahāraḥ lupyeta na ca tat lopaḥ aṅgīkartum śakyaḥ sa varloka prasiddha tvāt tathāvidhasya laukikaiḥ parīkṣakaiśla ullaṅghana ayogāt pramita arthān anumatau= unmatta tva prasaṅgāt tasmāt sarva loka prasiddhasya niśśaṅkasya avisaṃvādinaḥ vyavahārasya kāyarbhūtasya siddhaye vastu tathā tvā tathātva niścayaḥ kāraṇa bhūtaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ 
NSu_2.3.65.1–2.3.65.3^2	 tad siddhaye kāraṇa doṣa ādi niścaya dvārā sākṣiṇā jñānānām bhramatvā abhrama tva nirṇayaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ tad siddhaye sākṣiṇaḥ viśvasanīya tvam tad siddhaye ca sākṣī sadā nirdeṣaḥ yathārthaḥ eva na parīkṣakāṇām aṅgī kāryaḥ iti nanu evam tarhi prābhākara ādi diśā sarveṣām api pratyayānām yathārtha tva niyamaḥ astu iti atas āha ekaḥ eva iti ekasya eva yāthārthya niyamena sarvasya upapattau kim aprāmāṇikena pramāṇa viruddhena sarva pratyaya yāthārthya niyamena iti bhāvaḥ kim atas yadi evam sākṣī niyamena artha avi abhicāri iti atas āha śuddhaḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.66ab.1–2.3.66cd.2	 śuddhaḥ sākṣī yadā siddhaḥ duḥkhi tvam vāryate katham duḥkhi tvam tena pratītam jīvasya iti śeṣaḥ tatas ca kim iti atas āha upajīvya iti upajīvya pramāṇam tat bheda grāhakam eva hi śruti anumānayoḥ upajīvya pramāṇam tat tasmāt bheda grāhakam bheda pramāpakam tathā ca upajīvya virodhāt abheda śruti ādeḥ aprāmāṇyam iti bhāvaḥ tatas api kim iti atas sūtra artham upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_2.3.66ef.1–2.3.67.1	 atas jīva īśayoḥ bhedaḥ śruti sāmarthya su sthiraḥ śrutiḥ bhinnaḥ acintyaḥ a iti ādikāḥ sāmarthyam apratipakṣa tvam tad guṇa sāra tvāt tu tad vayapadeśaḥ prājña vat yadi evam jīva īśvarayoḥ bhedaḥ eva pāramārthikaḥ vyavasthitaḥ tadā tat tvam asi iti ādya dvaita śrutīnām aham hariḥ iti ādi smṛtīnām ca kā gatiḥ na hi tāsām anumāna vat sarvathā prāmāṇyam yuktam apauruṣeya tvena āpta ukta tvena ca tad kāraṇa abhāvāt iti āśaṅkā parihārāya sūtram tad guṇa sāra tvāt tu tad vayapadeśaḥ prājña vat iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe tathā api iti tad guṇa sāra tvāt tu tad vyapadeśaḥ prājña vat tathā api tu cit ānanda pūrvāḥ tad sadṛśāḥ guṇāḥ sāra sva rūpam asya api muktau= api avaśiṣyate 
NSu_2.3.68.1–2.3.68.2	 atas abheda vat eva etāḥ śrutayaḥ pravadanti hi paurāṇāni ca vākyāni sādṛśya abheda saṃśrayāt yadi api jīva brahmaṇoḥ bhedaḥ eva tathā api abheda vat iti sambandhaḥ tuśabdaḥ viśeṣa arthaḥ tam ca vakṣyāmaḥ tad sadṛśaḥ paramātma guṇa sadṛśāḥ sāraḥ iti anuvādena svarūpam iti vyākhyānam asya jīvasya kutas muktau= api kaivalye api avaśiṣyate yatas abheda vat abhedam ivatatra tasya iva a iti atra upasaṅkhayā iyam etat śiṣya prayogāt yat vā bhedaḥ iti tad pratipādakam upalakṣyate atas eva iti sambandhaḥ etāḥ para udāhṛtāḥ hi iti mukhye bādhakam sūcayati 
NSu_2.3.68.3–2.3.68.4	 atas eva iti asya eva vivaraṇam sādṛśya iti sādṛśyam eva abhedaḥ sādṛśya abhedaḥ siṃhaḥ devadattaḥ iti ādi vat gauṇaḥ ayam vyapadeśaḥ iti vākya arthaḥ advaitavādibhiḥ khalu tattvaṃpadayoḥ viruddha sva artha eka deśa tyāgena eka deśa lakṣaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇya mātram mukhyam aṅgīkṛtam tatas varam pada dvayasya mukhya artha tvam abhyupagamya sāmānādhikaraṇya mātrasya gauṇa tvam abhyupagantum tātparyaliṅgāni ca tatra tatra anyathā nītāni upalakṣaṇam ca etat sautram abheda āgama vyākhyānam iti āśayavān ukta anuvādena artha antaram api āha sādṛśyāt ca iti 
NSu_2.3.69a–2.3.69c.3	 sādṛśyāt ca pradhāna tvāt svātantryāt apicā abhidām āhuḥ īśena jīvasya pradhāna tvāt api iti anvayaḥ āhuḥ śrutayaḥ paurāṇāni vākyāni iti vartate ukta anuvādaḥ pratipatti saukarya arthaḥ pradhāna tvam vaiśiṣyayam tat tvam asi ityādi vyapadeśaḥ sādṛśyāt gauṇaḥ iti uktam na anyaḥ atas asti draṣṭā ityādi nirdeśaḥ tu svātantrya prādhānyābhyām lākṣaṇikaḥ draṣṭṛ padena tatra āropita vaiśiṣyayam svātantryam ca upalakṣyate tathā ca draṣṭā viśiṣyaḥ svātantryaḥ ca anyaḥ na asti iti arthaḥ sampadyate yat vā tat tvam asi ityādi nirdeśaḥ api prādhānya svātantryābhyām lākṣaṇikaḥ vyākhyāyate tathā hi tad śabdena tadīye svātantrya prādhānye lakṣyete punar tābhyām tad viṣaya tā lakṣyate tatas ca tad pradhānakaḥ tad tantraḥ ca iti vākya arthaḥ bhavati etat api upalakṣaṇam atattvam asi iti ādi vyākhyāna antaram api atra draṣṭavyam syāt etat tuśabdaḥ hi sautraḥ avadhāraṇa arthaḥ tena ca sādṛśya atiriktaḥ arthaḥ nivartyate tat katham artha antara varṇanam iti ataḥ anyathā vyācaṣṭe na iti 
NSu_2.3.69d.1–2.3.70ab.3	 na svarūpa abhidām kvacid kvacid pradeśe sva rūpa abhidām na āhuḥ iti tuśabda arthaḥ na tu prādhānya ādi nivṛttiḥ iti astu evam jīvasya brahma aikyam muktasya tat katham vyākhyeyam na ca tat api ukta nyāyena iti yuktam tathā sati yatra tu asya ityādi viśeṣa ukti anupapatteḥ iti atas āha sthāna aikyam iti sthāna aikyam aikamatyam ca muktasya tu viśiṣṭate īśena iti vartate na kevala mukta nimitta trayam kinnāma etat nimitta dvayam viśiṣyate atas viśeṣaṇā bheda uktiḥ upapadyate tatra sthāna aikyena aikya vyapadeśaḥ lākṣaṇikaḥ sthāna gatasya ekasya sthāniṣu prayogāt aikamatya nimitte tu prayoge lakṣita lakṣaṇā viṣaya aikyāt mati ā aikyam tatas ca matimatām iti kiñca yat sādṛśyam sajjīva mātra sādhāraṇa tayā uktam tad saṃsāriṇī anabhivyaktam mukte tu vyaktam iti tad abhiprāyeṇa api viśeṣataḥ abheda uktiḥ yuktā ityāśayavān āha sādṛśyam ca iti 
NSu_2.3.70c.1–2.3.70d.2	 sādṛśyam ca viśeṣeṇa muktasya īśena iti vartate nanu sādṛya ādikam jaḍeṣu api vidyate tat katham teṣāṃsarvam khalu idam brahma a  bhūtāni viṣṇuḥ bhuvanāni viṣṇuḥ vanāni viṣṇuḥ girayaḥ diśaḥ ca a ityādau kvacid eva paramātma aikya vyapadeśaḥ na punar jīvat prācuryeṇa iti atas āha jaḍānām iti  jaḍānām dvayam eva tu tad pradhānakam tat tantra tvam eva jaḍānām tu iti sambandhaḥ sādṛśyasya api tṛtīyasya vidyamāna tvāt katham dvayam eva iti atas āha bhavet iti 
NSu_2.3.70ef.1–2.3.70ef.3	 bhavet sādṛśyam ati alpam tṛtīyam paramātmanā jaḍānām iti vartate satyam asti sādṛśyam kintu tad satva ādinā eva na tu jīva vat ānanda ādinā atas dvayasya eva sattvāt upapanna apracura uktiḥ nanu ānanda ādinā sādṛśyam jīveṣu api na asti keṣāñcid jīvānām atad rūpa tā abhyupagamāt iti ced mā bhūt na hi jīva mātram prati tat tvam asi iti ucyate tasya vedān adhikāri tvāt kintu bhokṣa yogyam patīti adoṣaḥ atra sthāna aikyam ca kṣīra abdhi ādi sthita bhagavat rūpa apekṣayā uktam iti na jīva jaḍa sādhāraṇam jaḍa abheda vyākhyānena prājña vat iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ api vyākhyātaḥ bhavati sūtre prājña vat iti uktam tasya athaḥ prājñe yathābheda vyapadeśaḥ amukhyaḥ tathā iti tatra pratiyogi viśeṣa anukteḥ vijñānam ānandam brahma ityādiḥ akhilaḥ api abheda vyapadeśaḥ nitya tva ādi sādṛśyena amukhyaḥ iti jñāyeta tat mā vijñāyi iti āśa yavān āha īśa iti 
NSu_2.3.71.1–2.3.71.2	 īśa rūpa kriyāṇām ca guṇānām api sarvaśas tathā eva avayavānām tad svarūpa aikyam tu mukhyatas rūpāṇi matsya ādīni kriyāḥ sṛṣṭayā ādyāḥ guṇāḥ jñāna ādayaḥ sa varśaḥ iti pratyekam sambandhaḥ tathā śabdaḥ samuccaye eva śabdasya mukhyatas iti ena anvayaḥ avayavāḥ hasta ādyāḥ tad svarūpa aikyam īśvara svarūpeṇa aikyam tat pratipādakam vākyam iti yāvat mukhyatas eva vyākhyeyam iti śeṣaḥ tuśabdaḥ jaḍa vyāvṛtti arthaḥ tathā ca jaḍa viśeṣaḥ eva ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti bhāvaḥ na ca evam sādhya sama tva doṣaḥ jīva mātra abheda vādinam pratyakṣasya adhikaraṇasya ārabdha tvāt iti kutas etat iti ced tatra bheda darśane pratyavāyasya ukta tvāt iti āha yathā iti 
NSu_2.3.72a–2.3.72e.3	 yathā udakam durge vṛṣṭam parvateṣu vidhāvati evam dharmān pṛthak paśyan= tān eva anuvidhāvati iti śruteḥ parvateṣu durge śikhare vṛṣṭam udakam yathā adhas dhāvati evam pārameśvarān dharmāḥ tatas pṛthak paśyan= tān eva tad darśanam anu eva avilambena narakam vidhāvatī iti arthaḥ nanu īśvara dharmāṇām bheda abhedau bhavatām tathā ca atyanta abheda uktiḥ amukhyā iti sautraḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ asaṅkucita vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati iyam ca śrutiḥ atyanta bheda darśana nindā parā bhavatu iti atas āha na ubhayam ca iti 
NSu_2.3.72ef.1–2.3.73.1	 na ubhayam ca bheda abheda ākhyam iṣyate iṣyate sūtrakṛtā iti śeṣaḥ bheda abhedau na iṣyate iti vaktavye bheda abheda ākhyam ubhayam iti vacanam vakṣyamāṇa śruti vyākhyāna anusāreṇa iti jñātavyam kutas na iṣyate iti atas āha ekam eva iti ekam eva advitīyam na iha nānā asti kiñcana mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha nānā iva paśyati 
NSu_2.3.74ab.1–2.3.74ab.2	 iti śrutau= iva iti asmāt bheda abheda nirākṛtiḥ ekam abhinnam ekam api ghaṭa ādikam avayava bheda vat upalabdham atas eva iti uktam advitīyam samādhika rahitam iha brahmaṇi kiñcana guṇa ādikam iti nānā bhūtam na asti yaḥ tu iha brahmaṇi vidyamānam guṇa ādikam nānā bhinnam iva śabda āt abhinnam ca paśyati sa mṛtyoḥ anantaram mṛtyum narakam āpnoti iti śrutau= iva iti asmāt śabdāt upalakṣaṇam ca etat eva śabdāt ca bheda abheda nirākṛtiḥ kṛtā jñāyate atas neṣyate iti yojanā iva śabda prayogāt katham etat labhyate iti atas āha iva iti 
NSu_2.3.74cd.1–2.3.74cd.5^1	 iva ubhaye ca sādṛśyaḥ iti vāc śabda nirṇaye ubhaye yat uktam pūrva padena tad pratiyogini dvitīye vartate iti arthaḥ atra ca nānā uktyā prayuktaḥ iva śabdaḥ anānā gṛhṇāti iti bheda abheda ākhya mukhyam nirākṛtam bhavati vāc asti iti śeṣaḥ śabdanirṇayaḥ nāma grantha viśeṣaḥ aṃśaḥ nānā vyapadeśāt anyathā ca api tāśakitava ādi tvam adhīyate eke kecid idam evam vyācakṣate jīvaḥ paramātmanoṃ aśaḥ aṃśa tvam ca na ārambhaka tvam paramātmanaḥ anārabdha tvāt na api khaṇḍa tvam acchedya tvāt na ca pradeśa tvam paṭa ādi vat anitya tva prasaṅgāt kinnāma bhinna abhinna tvam 
NSu_2.3.74cd.1–2.3.74cd.5^2	 atra bhedaḥ aupādhikaḥ abhedaḥ tu svābhāvikaḥ upādhiḥ ca anādya nirvācya avidyā iti eke anye tu satyam eva antaḥkaraṇa ādikam iti kutas etat dvā suparṇā anityaḥ nityānām a ityādi nānā vyapadeśāt anyathā ca api tattvam asi aaham brahma asmi a ityādya bheda vyapadeśāt naca ekasya eva jīvasya brahmaṇā bheda abhedau kintu sarveṣām yatas brahma dāśāḥ brahmakitavāḥ iti eke brahmararaḥ dāśakita va ādi tvam adhīyate ityādi tat idam ayuktam tathā hi kaḥ ayam abhedaḥ kim mukhyaḥ eva utāmukhyaḥ sādṛśya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ ādyam nirākaroti bhedasya iti aṃśaḥ nānā vyapadeśāt anyathā ca api dāśakitavādi tvam adhīyate eke 
NSu_2.3.75ab.1–2.3.75ab.3	 bhedasya muktau vacanāt api tad pakṣa nigrahaḥ muktau= api iti sambandhaḥ tad pakṣaḥ mukhya abheda pakṣaḥ jīvasya aupādhikaḥ eva paramātmanaḥ bhedaḥ abhedaḥ tu svābhāvikaḥ iti vadatā muktau bheda abhāvaḥ tatra avidyāyāḥ antaḥkaraṇa ādeḥ ca abhāvāt na ca tat yujyate muktau= api jīva brahma bhedasya prāk udāhṛtābhiḥ śruti smṛtibhiḥ abhihita tvāt atas pramāṇa viruddha tvāt asya pakṣasya heya tvam eva dvitīyam nirācaṣṭe cetana tva ādi iti 
NSu_2.3.75c–2.3.76.1	 cetana tva ādi sādṛśyam yadi abheda iti iṣyate aṅgīkṛtam tat asmābhiḥ na sva rūpa eka tā kvacid sādṛśyam iti upalakṣaṇam tad pradhāna tvāt yapi iti draṣṭavyam abhedaḥ aṅgīkṛtaḥ ced katham tad pakṣa nigrahaḥ iti uktam iti atas āha na iti kvacid iti saṃsāre muktau vā iti arthaḥ na kevalam yukti viruddhaḥ jīva brahmaṇoḥ bheda abhedāṅgīkāraḥ kim tarhi śruti viruddhaḥ api iti āha na kenacid iti na kenacid abhedaḥ asti bheda abhedaḥ api vā kvacid samudāya m ṛte viṣṇoḥ sva guṇa ādīn vinā api vā 
NSu_2.3.77ab.1–2.3.77ab.4	 iti śruteḥ na tasya asti bheda abhedaḥ api kenacid bhedena sahitaḥ abhedaḥ bheda abhedaḥ kvacid api iti sambandhaḥ vā śabdaḥ samuccaye ṛteyoge dvitīyā api upasaṅkha yātavyā śrauta prayogāt api śabdaḥ samuccaye vā śabdaḥ vikalpa arthaḥ sa ca vyavasthitaḥ vikalpaḥ samudāyam ṛte kenacid bheda abhedaḥ na asti sva guṇa ādīn vinā bhedaḥ na asti iti kenacid api iti anvayaḥ etena jīva brahmaṇoḥ bheda abhedau dvau= api svābhāvikau na tu bhedaḥ avidyā ādi upādhi nibandhanaḥ atas muktau= api bheda sadbhāvāt na asmākam mukta bheda vacana virodhaḥ iti vadan yādava prakāśaḥ api nirastaḥ kvacid kenacid iti viśeṣa śruti virodhāt iti yadi evam jīva brahmaṇoḥ na bheda abhedau katham tarhi sautram bheda abheda śruti udāharaṇam iti atas sva matena sūtra tātparyam āha abheda iti 
NSu_2.3.77c.1–2.3.77c.3^1	 abheda śrutayaḥ aṃśa tvāt upalakṣaṇam etat bheda śrutayaḥ ca iti api draṣṭavyam aṃśa tvāt eva hi upapadyante iti śeṣaḥ dinānāvidha sambandha vyapadeśa hetum abhidhāya anyathā ca api ityādinār atha āpattiḥ api ucyate tathā hi jīva brahmaṇoḥ bhedam abhedam ca vadantyaḥ śrutayaḥ tāvat vidyante tāḥ ca jīvasya brahma aṃśa tvāt eva hi upapadyante na anyathā yadi jīvaḥ brahmaṇaḥ ghaṭaḥ iva paṭāt atyanta bhinnaḥ syāt tadā abheda śrutayaḥ uparudhyeran yadi vā brahma abhinnaḥ syāt tarhi bheda śrutayaḥ bādhyeran na ca bheda abheda āśrayaṇena śruti dvaya sāmañjasyam vācyam 
NSu_2.3.77c.1–2.3.77c.3^2	 na kenacid iti udāhṛta śruti virodhāt atas bheda abheda śruti anyathā anupapattyā jīvaḥ brahma aṃśaḥ aṅgīkāryaḥ iti eva sūtra arthaḥ iti etad artham ca na kenacid ityādi eka vākya tayā vā yojyam yathā uktam yatas bhedena tasya ayam a bhedena ca gīyate atas ca aṃśa tvam uddiṣyam bheda abhedau na mukhyataḥ a iti paramātma aṃśa tvam ced upagatam katham tarhi na bheda abheda aṅgīkāraḥ prakāra antareṇa aṃśa tvasya nirvaktum aśakya tvāt matsya ādiṣu parameśvara aṃśeṣu abhedasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt ca iti atas āha sādṛśyam ca iti 
NSu_2.3.77d.1–2.3.78.1	 sādṛśyam ca aṃśatā asya tu asya jīvasya parameśvara aṃśa tā tu tad sādṛśyam caśabdāt tad adhīna sattā ādimat tvam ca iti arthaḥ etena puṃstva ādi vat iti anena eva idam gata artham adhikaraṇam iti api nirastam yat vā caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇa arthaḥ satyam matsya ādiṣu abheda nimittakoṃ aśa śabdaḥ tathā api mukhya aṃśa sādṛśyam tat sattayā eva sat tāvat tva lakṣaṇam eva jīvasya aṃśa tvam gauṇaḥ ayam aṃśa śabdaḥ iti iti yāvat aṃśa śabdasya aneka artha tvam tatra matsya ādyāḥ svarūpa aṃśāḥ eva jīvāḥ bhinna aṃśāḥ eva iti atra asambhāvanā nirāsāya āgama vākayam paṭhati aṃśastu iti aṃśaḥ tu dvividhaḥ jñeyaḥ svarūpa aṃśaḥ anyaḥ eva ca vibhinna aṃśaḥ alpa śaktiḥ syāt kiñcid sādṛśya mātra yuj 
NSu_2.3.79.1–2.3.79.2	 aṃśinaḥ yat tu sāmarthyam yat svarūpam yathā sthitiḥ saḥ eva ced svarūpa aṃśaḥ prādurbhāvāḥ hareḥ yathā dvividhaḥ eva na tu ekavidhaḥ eva iti anvayaḥ kiñcid sādṛśya mātra yuj iti purovat ubhayathā vyākhyeyam sāmarthyam sṛṣṭayā ādi kartṛ tva ādi lakṣaṇam svarūpam pūrṇa ānanda ādikam sthitiḥ sarva gata tva ādi parimāṇam saḥ eva ced tad sāmarthya ādi yuktaḥ ced aṃśaḥ tadā asau tad svarūpa aṃśaḥ jñātavyaḥ prādurbhāvāḥ iti tasya eva udāharaṇam evam jīvāḥ yathā iti ādyasya api udāharaṇam draṣṭavyam anena prakāśa ādi vat na evam paraḥ iti asya tātparyam uktam bhavati 
NSu_2.3.79.3–2.3.80.1	 matsya ādīnām jīvānām ca parameśvara aṃśa tva asāmye api na eka prakāra tā kintu matsya ādyāḥ svarūpa aṃśā eva jīvāḥ vibhinna aṃśāḥ eva iti atra asambhāvanā nirāsāya prakāśa vat iti sūtra kṛtāḥ dṛṣṭāntāḥ dattāḥ te ca ayuktāḥ iva pratīyante ubhayatra bheda abheda sāmyāt iti āśaṅkā nirāsātham bhāṣyam abhimāni devatā apekṣayā etat a iti tat avispaṣṭam iti atas sautrān dṛṣṭāntān spaṣṭayati sūrya iti sūrya maṇḍala mānī ekaḥ tad prakāśa abhimānavān sūryaḥ atha saptama abdheḥ ca bāhya udasya ca vāripaḥ 
NSu_2.3.81a–2.3.81c.2	 kaṭhina tvena meru ādeḥ pṛthivyāḥ api devatāḥ dharā devī sūrya maṇḍala mānī aṃśī sūryaḥ tad prakāśa abhimānavān= tad aṃśaḥ ca ekaḥ eva yathā iti sarvatra anvīyate athaśabdaḥ samuccaye bāhya udasya abhimānyaṃśī vāripaḥ saptama abdheḥ abhimānī tad aṃśaḥ ca ekaḥ eva pṛthivyāḥ pañcāśat koṭi vistīrṇāyāḥ abhimāninī aṃśi bhūtā dharā devī meru ādi abhimāninī devatā api aṃśa rūpa ekā eva meru hima vat ādeḥ puruṣāḥ abhimāninaḥ purāṇeṣu siddhāḥ iti atas uktam kaṭhiṇa tvena iti yat kaṭhinam sā pṛthivī iti śruteḥ dharādevi eva sarvasyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ abhimāninī avāntara abhimāninaḥ tu anye iti anena svarūpa aṃśaḥ nidarśitaḥ dārṣya antikam darśayati evam eva iti 
NSu_2.3.81c–2.3.82.3	 evam eva ekaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ nānā avatāra rūpeṇa sthitaḥ pūrṇa guṇaḥ sadā bhagavān viṣṇuḥ aṃśī nānā avatāra rūpeṇa sthitoṃ aśaḥ ca ekaḥ eva iti yojanāḥ avyayaḥ sadā pūrṇa guṇaḥ iti āgāmi sūtra anusāreṇa abheda upapādanam vibhinna aṃśa dṛṣṭānta vivaraṇa pūrvakam dārṣya antikam vivṛṇoti viṣ mūtra iti viṣ mūtra akṣi ādi māninyaḥ yathā apabhraṣṭa devatāḥ sūrya ādibhyaḥ tathā eva ayam saṃsārī paramāt pṛthak apabhraṣṭa nāmakāḥ devatāḥ aṃśa rūpāḥ sūrya ādibhyaḥ sūrya varuṇa pṛthivībhyoṃ aśibhyaḥ vyutkrameṇa yathā pṛthak jīva aṃśānām aṃśinaḥ parameśvarāt pṛthaktvam yuktitaḥ samarthayitum sūtram anujñā parihārau deha sambandhāt jyotiḥ ādi vat iti atra api dṛṣṭāntānām asaṅga timāśaṅkayā abhimāni viṣaya tayā vyākhyāti deha iti anujñā parihārau deha sambandhāt jyotiḥ ādi vat 
NSu_2.3.83.1–2.3.85ab.6	 deha doṣaiḥ ca duṣṭa tvāt apabhraṣṭa ākhya devatāḥ anyāḥ sūrya ādi devebhyaḥ hi anugrāhyāḥ ca taiḥ sadā evam eva parāt viṣṇoḥ pṛthak saṃsāriṇaḥ matāḥ anugrāhyāḥ ca tena eva tad prasādāt ca mokṣiṇaḥ na tu matsya ādi rūpāṇām anugrāhya tvam iṣyate para deha gata doṣaiḥ devatā tvam tu antardhāna ādi śakti yogaḥ caśabdaḥ hetvoḥ samuccaye hi yasmāt anugrāhyāḥ ca taiḥ sūrya ādibhiḥ tad prasāda āyatta pratibandha nivṛtti tvāt ca iti api draṣṭavyam anugrāhyaḥ ca ityādau yatas iti śeṣaḥ deha doṣa lipta tvāt iti api grāhyam nanu anujñā ādi hetu trayam svarūpa aṃśeṣu matsya ādiṣu asti iti anaikāntikam na jīva aṃśānām parameśvarāt bhedam sādhayitum alam iti atas āha natu iti anugrāhya tvam iti upalakṣaṇam na iṣyatena eva te jāyante a iti ādi śruti balena iti śeṣaḥ atra eva sūtram asantateḥ ca avyatikaraḥ a iti tad jīva aṃśānām parameśvarāt bhedam eva sādhayat pratīyate na tu matsya ādīnām abhedam api atas upalakṣaṇa tvena vyācaṣṭe guṇaiḥ iti asantateḥ ca avyatikaraḥ 
NSu_2.3.85cd.1–2.3.85cd.4	 guṇaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ pūrṇa tvāt mukhyā bhedaḥ aparaiḥ naca matsya ādi rūpāṇām iti vartate mukhyā bhedāeṃ aśināḥ aparaiḥ jīvaiḥ īśvarasya abhedaḥ na ca teṣām aparipūrṇa guṇa tvāt ca iti anujñā parihārau= iti etat api evam upalakṣaṇa tayā vyākhyeyam tad artham vā na tu matsya ādi rūpāṇām iti vākyam yojyam ābhāsaḥ eva ca evam aṃśasya api jīvasya īśvarāt bhedaḥ pramāṇaiḥ samarthitaḥ yaḥ tu aṃśa tvāt abhedam sādhayet tasya aṃśa śabda vācya tva mātra tvam ced hetuḥ tadā anaikāntika tvam uktam eva mukhya aṃśa tvam ced hetuḥ tadā asiddhiḥ iti pratipādayat ābhāsaḥ eva ca iti sūtram vyācaṣṭe aṃśa iti ābhāsaḥ eva ca 
NSu_2.3.86ab.1–2.3.86cd.2	 aṃśa ābhāsāḥ ca sarve api parasya aṃśāḥ na mukhyatas sarve api jīvāḥ jīvānām aṃśa ābhāsa tvam śruti antareṇa draḍhayati yathā iti yathā eṣā puruṣe cchāyā etasmin= etat ātatam tathā etasmin puruṣottame etat jīva jātam ātatam etat eva asya tad aṃśa tvam iti bhāvaḥ nanu etat śruti viruddhaṃpādaḥ asya viśvā bhūtāni tripādasya amṛtam divi a iti asmin mantre ananta āsana śvetadvīpa vaikuṇṭheṣu dyu śabda vācyeṣu avasthita rūpa traya vat bhūta śabda vācyānām jīvānām api parama puruṣa pāda tva abhidhānāt iti āśaṅkaya viśeṣa śruti balena pāda śabdasya aneka artha tva kalpanam nyāyyam iti āśayavān āha natu iti 
NSu_2.3.87.1–2.3.87.3	 na tu pumpāda vat pādāḥ jīvāḥ ete para ātmanaḥ pūrṇāḥ tasya guṇāḥ eva prādurbhāva tayā sthitāḥ evam jagāda parama śrutiḥ nārāyaṇam param puṃpāda vat puruṣasya amṛta pāda trayam iva kutas pūrṇāḥ nārāyaṇam prādurbhāva rūpam jīva aṃśebhyaḥ param vilakṣaṇam jagāda adhidaiva ādi svarūpa nirṇayāya pādaḥ ayam ārabdhaḥ iti uktam tatra kīdṛśaḥ atra nirṇayaḥ jātaḥ iti atas tam buddhayā ārohāya piṇḍīkṛtya āha akṣayaḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.88ab.1–2.3.88ab.2	 akṣayaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ lakṣmyāvāsaḥ laye sthitaḥ deha ādi kṣaya rahitaḥ eva pralaye sthitaḥ anena a sambhavaḥ tu sataḥ anupapatteḥ a na ātmā śruteḥ nitya tvāt ca tābhyaḥ a iti adhikaraṇa tātparyam uktam bhavati lakṣmī āvāsaḥ iti devyāḥ api pralaye avasthāna uktyāḥ viyat pada upalakṣitāyāḥ tasyāḥ na jīva vat jananam iti viyat ādi pada upādānena tad abhimāni tvadaśāyām eva brahma ādīnām deha ādi utpattiḥ na muktau= iti sūcitam tat sūcayati muktaiḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.88cd.1–2.3.90.1	 muktaiḥ sadā cintyamānaḥ brahma ādyaiḥ tāratamya gaiḥ tathā api sṛṣṭi laya krama samarthanena sūcitam tāratamyam tu tatra api na apaiti iti āśayena uktam tāratamya gauḥ iti viparyayeṇa tu kramaḥ atra iti sṛṣṭi krama viparyayeṇa laye kramaḥ abhihitaḥ tatra kaḥ sṛṣṭau kramaḥ iti atas tam darśayan viyat adhikaraṇa tātparyam āha prakṛtiḥ iti prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ kālaḥ vedāḥ ca iti catuṣyayam nityam svarūpataḥ viṣṇoḥ viśeṣa avāpti mātrataḥ utpattimāt iti proktam lakṣmīḥ tad abhimāninī tatas jātaḥ pumān nāma brahmā asyām vāsudevataḥ sūtra ātmā prāṇa nāmā ca devyau prakṛti māninī 
NSu_2.3.91.1–2.3.91.3	 tatas rūpam mahān nāma brahmaṇaḥ ahaṅkṛtiḥ śivaḥ brahmaṇaḥ buddhi nāmnā umā tatas indraḥ manaḥ abhidhas skandaḥ ca tatas eva anye sarve devāḥ prajajñire tad abhimāninī lakṣmīḥ ca evam iti arthaḥ tatas kaḥ sṛṣṭau kramaḥ iti atas tam darśayan viyat adhikaraṇa tātparyam āha prakṛtiḥ iti tad abhimāninī lakṣmīḥ ca evam iti arthaḥ tatas tad anantaram prāṇa nāmā saṅkarṣaṇāt devyau sarasvatī bhāratyau prakṛti māninī mahat tattva rūpāt tatas ahaṅkārāt tatas eva indra skandābhyām anye tattva abhimāninaḥ atra upalakṣitānām api adhika āśaṅkā nirāsāya tathā prāṇaḥ aityādinā nirṇayaḥ kariṣyate iti adoṣaḥ sṛṣṭi pralayayoḥ krama vipayarya samarthanāya tātparyam āha tatra iti 
NSu_2.3.92ab.1–2.3.92c.2	 tatra pūrvatanaḥ śreyān guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samastaśas samastaśas samasteṣu tejaḥ atas a tad abhidhyānāt a iti ādeḥ tātparyam āha tebhyaḥ ca iti tebhyaḥ ca bhagavān viṣṇuḥ śreyān iti vartate samastaśas iti pañcamī antam atra vā sambaddhayate sarvasya janma layau parameśvara āyattau= iti uktam parāt tu tad śateḥ a ityādinā pravṛttiḥ ca tat tātparyam āha tad adhīnāḥ iti 
NSu_2.3.92d.1–2.3.93c.2	 tad adhīnāḥ ime sadā janma sthiti laya ajñāna niyati jñāna saṃsṛtiḥ mokṣaḥ ca ime janma ādyāḥ mokṣa antāḥ bhāvāḥ eteṣām iti vakṣyamāṇam atra api sambaddhayate dvandva eka vat bhāve api napuṃsaka tva abhāvaḥ chāndasaḥ yuvora nākau= iti yathā muktau janma abhāve api sthiti ādau bhagavat adhīna tvam asti eva iti āha tad adhīna tvam iti 
NSu_2.3.93cd.1–2.3.94cd.2	 tad adhīna tvam eteṣām na eva hīyate muktau= api eteṣām brahma ādīnām parama prameyam āha saḥ eva iti  saḥ eva ekaḥ svatantraḥ pūrṇa sat guṇaḥ upasaṃharati iti iti iti śruti upapattibhyām pāde asmin prabhuṇā uditam yadi api caturtha pāde api śruti vacanānām paraspara virodhaḥ eva parihriyate tathā api adhyātma viṣaya tvena bheda siddhiḥ iti prāk eva sūcitam prakāra antareṇa pāda bhedam darśayitum āha śruti arthaḥ iti 
NSu_2.4.1a–2.4.1e.3	 śruti arthaḥ śruti yuktibhyām viruddhaḥ iva dṛśyate yatra tat nirṇayam devaḥ su viśiṣṭa upapattibhiḥ karoti anena pādena yadi api śrutiḥ iti eva ukte api siddhayati arthaḥ iti vākyānām artha dvārā eva virodha sthiteḥ tathā api artha nirṇayāya eva pāda ārambhaḥ na prāmāṇya nirṇaya āyātaḥ na mīmāṃsā tu ahaniḥ iti darśayitum arthaḥ iti uktam yadi api yuktayaḥ pūrva pāde api santi tathā api āgama gṛhīta vyāpti ādimattvena atra prabalāḥ iti viśeṣaḥ pāramārthike virodhe niṇaryaḥ duṣkaraḥ iti atas iva iti uktam yatra prāṇa ādi viṣaye śruti arthaḥ janma ādiḥ yukti upasarjanābhiḥ śrutibhiḥ viruddhaḥ iva dṛśyate tat nirṇayam iti yojanā yukti sahita śrutibhiḥ pūrva pakṣite katham śruti mātreṇa tad viparīta artha nirṇayaḥ iti atas uktam su viśiṣya iti anena buddhi sannihitena tathā prāṇāḥ ityādīnām sūtrāṇām bhāṣyaḥ eva arthaḥ vispaṣṭaḥ iti atas pūrva uttara pakṣa yuktīḥ saṅgṛhya āha tatra iti 
NSu_2.4.1f.1–2.4.3.2	 tatra spaṣṭa artha vat śrutiḥ viśeṣa śruti vairūpyam māhātmyam vyakta sat guṇāḥ dṛṣṭa āyuktiḥ samāna tvam kartṛ śaktiḥ vimiśratā yuktayaḥ pūrva pakṣeṣu sunirṇīta asatu tādṛśāḥ yuktayaḥ nirṇayasya eva svayam bhagavatā uditāḥ tatra caturtha pāde tādṛśāḥ tad śabda vācyāḥ nirṇayasya siddhāntasya tādṛśāḥ ced katham nirṇayam kuryuḥ iti atas uktam su nirṇītāḥ tu iti tādṛśa arthāḥ iti śeṣaḥ kutas etat iti atas uktam svayam iti svayam eva iti sambandhaḥ 
NSu_2.4.3.3–3.1.2.1	 kṛpita ahi phaṇa= chāyā samīkṛtya aparam sukham sevante yat padam dhīrāḥ tam bhajevallabham śriyaḥ sādhana vicāraḥ ayam adhyāyaḥ vairāgya arthe gati ādi nirūpaṇā prathama pādaḥ iti adhyāya pāda pratipādyam bhāṣyaḥ eva sphuṭam saṅgatim tu lāghavāya ekīkṛtya upari vakṣyāmaḥ iti āśayavān= tṛtīya ādya pāda adhikaraṇa pūvarpakṣa siddhānta yuktīḥ saṅgraheṇa āha svābhāvika iti svābhāvikānyathānāma sahābhāvāni athoktayaḥ aviśeṣaḥ viśeṣau ca sahabhāvaḥ vimiśratā viruddha uktiḥ saha sthānam vaiyarthyam ca anyathāgatiḥ yuktayaḥ pūrva pakṣasya guṇa ādhikya arthatā ubhavau 
NSu_3.1.3.1–3.1.3.2	 upapattiḥ dvi rūpa tvam ādhikyam anurūpa tā yogya tā prabala tvam ca vibhāgaḥ kāraṇa abhavaḥ kptiḥ anyā gatiḥ ca eva siddhāntasya eva sādhakāḥ sādhakāḥ iti vakṣyamāṇam pūrva pakṣasya iti atra api sambaddhayate pūrva pakṣasya siddhāntasya iti jātau= eka vacanam sādhakāḥ iti chāndasaḥ nirdeśaḥ yat vā yuktayaḥ pūrva pakṣasya iti atra sādhakāḥ iti nyakṛṣṭate pūrva pakṣa sambandhinaḥ yuktayaḥ iti eva arthaḥ siddhāntasya eva sādhakāḥ iti atra tu nyāyāḥ iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_3.1.3.3^1	 atra sūtram yoneḥ śarīram iti tat vayā ākhyātam bhāṣye svargāt avāk gataḥ jīvaḥ vṛṣṭi dvārā vrīhi ādi bījeṣu saṅkrāntaḥ retasmik puruṣam praviśya saha retasā mātryoni dvāreṇa jaṭharam praviṣyaḥ kalala bṛt buda ādi krameṇa utpannam śarīram āpnoti iti prasiddham tat kim tathyam utātathyam iti sandehaḥ na tathyam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ kutas deham garbha sthitam kvāpi praviśet svargataḥ gataḥ a ityādi vacanāt māndhātṛ droṇa drupada kṛpākā ādīnām itihāsa purāṇeṣu vinā eva bīja ādi sambandhena janana darśanāt ca anyathā siddhe ca arthe na bahu kalpanā yuktāḥ 
NSu_3.1.3.3^2–3.1.3.5	 atas te vairāgya jana kātham eva adhyātma vidām vādāḥ a iti tathyam iti siddhāntaḥ kasmāt memeghaḥ bhūtvā varṣati te iha vrīhi yavāḥ oṣadhayaḥ tila āmāṣāḥ iti jāyante yaḥ yaḥ hi annam atti yaḥ vā retaḥ siñcati tad rūpāt bhūyas eva bhavati tat yaḥ iha ramaṇīya caraṇāḥ abhyāśaḥ ha yat te ramaṇīyām yonim āpadyante a ityādi śruteḥ na ca adṛṣṭe arthenyathā siddhiḥ avakāśavatī na ca vacana antara liṅgadaśarna virodhaḥ kvacid bīja ādi sambandha abhāvasya api vidyā māna tvena tad viṣaya tvāt yathā uktam divaḥ sthāsnūn gacchati a  sthāvarāṇi divaḥ prāptaḥ a iti śruti smṛtibhyām iti tat idam ayuktam vyākhyānam utsūtra tvāt yadi api atra yoni śabdaḥ bīja ādi upalakṣaṇaḥ śakyaḥ vyākhyātum tathā api tad sambandha niyamaḥ eva sūtre pratīyate na tu kvācid kaḥ tad abhāvaḥ api yadi ca kvacid bīja ādi sambandha abhāvaḥ syāt tadā akasmika tvam syāt iti atas āha bīja iti yoneḥ śarīram 
NSu_3.1.4a–3.1.4c.3	 bījā pūruṣa yonīnām saṅga ati niyama ujkhitim athaśabdena bhagavān āha bīja śabdena vrīhi ādikam retaḥ ca ucyate saṅgati niyama ujkhitim sambandha ati niyama abhāvam ayam arthaḥ retaḥ siṇyogaḥ atha iti pūrva sūtrāt atha śabdaḥ atra api anuvartate sa ca prakṛtāt arthāt artha antare vartate tathā ca yoneḥ śarīram āpadyate kvacid tad abhāvena api iti atha śabdena bhagavān sūtra kāraḥ bīja ādi sambandha niyama abhāvam sūtritavān iti atas na utsūtra tva paryanuyogaḥ yuktaḥ iti yat uktam evam satyākasmika tva prasaṅgaḥ iti tat pariharati kāraṇataḥ ca iti 
NSu_3.1.4d.1–3.1.4d.3	 kāraṇataḥ ca tām tām ca bīja ādi sambandha niyama ujkhitim kāraṇāt āha etat uktam bhavati janma kāraṇa adṛṣṭa ākṛṣṭaḥ jantuḥ bīja ādi sambandhena śarīram āpadyate iti utsargaḥ sa ca kvacid jñāna tapaḥ yoga ādi atiśaya lakṣaṇena kāraṇa viśeṣaṇā apodyate yathā kṣudra jantu yātanā śarīra utpattau= apavādaḥ iti tathā ca uktam viśeṣa kāraṇāt eva viśeṣāt janiḥ iṣyate sāmānya jananam ca eva nṛṇām sāmānya hetutaḥ a iti atas yuktam eta t vaya ākhyānam iti bhaktiḥ asmin pādaḥ ucyate bhakti artham hi bhagavat mahima uktiḥ a iti pāda apratipādyam bhāṣyaḥ eva sphuṭam saṅgatim tu uttaratra vakṣyāmaḥ iti āśayavān etad pāda adhikaraṇe pūrva pakṣa siddhānta yuktīḥ saṅgraheṇa āha paścāt iti 
NSu_3.2.1.1–3.2.4.1–3.2.4.6^1^1	 paścāt adṛṣṭayavijñāna kāla duḥkha pṛthak bhavāḥ sthāna bhedaḥ viruddha tvam nyāya sāmyam svatobhavaḥ guṇa sāmyam ayogaḥ ca tarka bādhaḥ viloma tā nānābhāvaḥ pralobhaḥ ca pūrva pakṣa gāḥ aśakya kartṛ tā śaktiḥ svatas abodhaḥ tat eva ca amāna kpti sanmāna vyavasthā ati alpatā bhavāḥ viśeṣa dṛṣṭi vākye ca puṃśaktiḥ su nidarśanam alaukika tvam ādhikyam svātantryam nirṇaya pramāḥ pūrva pakṣa gāḥ pūrva pakṣa sambandhinyaḥ nirṇaya pramāḥ siddhānta nirṇaya arthāni pramāṇāni saṃdhye sṛṣṭiḥ āha hi sandhye sṛṣṭiḥ āha hi yoneḥ śarīram iti etat avasānaiḥ sūtraiḥ jīvasya janma avagatam jātasya ca svapana ādi avasthā sambandhaḥ prasiddhaḥ tatra svapna avasthā pravartaka tva lakṣaṇaḥ mahimā bhagavataḥ atra adhikaraṇe nirṇīyate tathā hi svapnaḥ nāma artha jñāna ātmakaḥ tatra tāvat svāpna arthānām kari turaga ādīnām parameśvara āyattatā na upapadyate 
NSu_3.2.4.1–3.2.4.6^1^2	 asatya tvāt na tāvat ime anādi nityāḥ svapna avasthātaḥ prāk ūrdhvam ca upalabdhi prasaṅgāt na hi vidyamānāḥ api upalabdhi sādhaneṣu cakṣuḥ ādiṣu anuparateṣu na upalabhyante upalabhyante ca upapatteḥ iti sambhavati naca anyatra gatāḥ anyaiḥ api anupalambhāt madyam aparimāṇaḥ ca ete dṛśyante na ca tathāvidham anādi nityam kim api dṛṣṭam na api utpatti nāśavantaḥ tathā tve api prāk ūrdhvam upalambha prasakteḥ na ca vācyam vidyut ādi vat tadaiva utpattiḥ vināśaḥ ca iti ittham bhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt 
NSu_3.2.4.6^2–3.2.4.9	 prāj mṛdā ādīnām ūrdhvam kapāla ādīnām ca upalambha āpatteḥ ca na ca eteṣām tad kālīna janmani upādānam nimittam ca paśyāmaḥ kartā ca na tāvat jīva ātmā draṣṭuḥ nirvyāpāra tvāt aparasya ca adarśanāt na api īśvaraḥ pramāṇa abhāvāt bhrānti tvam ca eteṣām svāpnam āyāsa rūpaḥ a iti svāpna manorathaḥ yathā a ityādi śruti smṛtibhyām ā vedyate śiṣyam apavyākhyāna anuvāde vakṣyāmaḥ tat evam na svāpnānām arthānām īśvara adhīna tvam na api tat jñānasya tasya api nimitta abhāvena aparamārtha tvāt natā vat cakṣuḥ ādīnām tad nimitta tvam teṣām uparata tvāt na api manasaḥ rūpa ādim ati arthe sāmarthya abhāvāt atas eva na sākṣiṇaḥ saḥ indriya apravṛttau liṅga śabdayoḥ api na avakāśaḥ aparokṣa ākāram ca idam avabhāsate atas artha jñāna rūpā svāpna avasthā na īśvara adhīnā iti prāpte tad pratividhānāya upodghātam āha vāsanāḥ iti saṃdhye sṛṣṭiḥ āha hi nirmātāram ca eke putra ādayaḥ ca māyā mātram tu kārtsnyena anabhivyakta svarūpa tvāt 
NSu_3.2.5.1–3.2.5.3	 vāsanāḥ sarva vastūnām anādi anubhava āgatāḥ santi eva aśeṣa jīvānām anādi manasi sthitāḥ bhāvanā para nāmakāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarva grahaṇa prayojanam uttaratra bhaviṣyati nanu bhāvanā ākhya saṃskāraḥ anubhava janyaḥ na ca sarva jīvānām sarva vastu anubhavaḥ asti tad katham aśeṣa jīvānām sarva vastu vāsanāḥ santi eva iti atas uktam anādi iti anādi anubhava pravāha utpannāḥ vāsanānām ātma samaveta tvam vaiśeṣika ādibhiḥ abhyupagatam tad nirāsa artham uktam manasi sthitāḥ iti jātau= eka vacanam sāditaḥ manasaḥ katham anādi vāsanā sambandhaḥ iti atas uktam anādi iti etat eva prapañcayati triguṇa ātmakam iti 
NSu_3.2.6.1–3.2.6.3^1	 triguṇa ātmakam manaḥ asti eva yāvat muktiḥ sadātanam tatra eva aśeṣa saṃskārāḥ sañcīyante sadā eva ca manasaḥ eva saṃskāra āśraya tvam na ātmanaḥ itayatra upapatti sūcanāya triguṇa ātmakam iti uktam guṇa ātmakam iti eva ukte parimāṇa ādi guṇa ātmakam iti api pratītiḥ syāt tad ā ātmanaḥ api samānam iti atas tri grahaṇam tathā ca jīvātmā na bhāvanā āśrayaḥ sattva ādi guṇān ātmaka tvāt īśvara vat bhāvanā vā sattva ādi guṇa ātmaka dravya āśrayā saṃskāra tvāt vega ādi vat tat ca pariśeṣāt manaḥ eva iti uktam bhavati sattva ādi guṇa an abhyupagantāram prati tu tad sthāne acetana padam prayoktavyam triguṇa ātmaka grahaṇam sva rūpa kathanam 
NSu_3.2.6.1–3.2.6.3^2	 asti eva sarvadā iti śeṣaḥ tathā sati mokṣe api sattvāt svapna ādi avasthāpattiḥ iti atas uktam vivṛṇoti yāvat iti yadi api manaḥ sva rūpeṇa nityam eva tathā api jīva sambandhaḥ tasya mokṣa avadhiḥ iti atas idam uktam tat vai jaivam manaḥ yena ānandyeta bhavati iti sūktau= api ātmanaḥ manaḥ sambandha śravaṇāt katham yāvat muktiḥ iti uktam iti atas vā triguṇa ātmakam iti uktam ātma svarūpa manasaḥ muktau sattve api jaḍa manaḥ abhipretya ayam avadhiḥ uktaḥ iti caḥ tasmāt iti arthe tatra eva na tu ātmani etasmāt jāyate prāṇaḥ manaḥ sarva indriyāṇi ca a iti manasaḥ janma śravaṇāt katham anādi tvam ucyate iti atas āha sūkṣma tvena iti 
NSu_3.2.7.1–3.2.7.3	 sūkṣma tvena laye sat ca prākṛtaiḥ upacīyate sṛṣṭi kāle yadā tat na kutas saṃsāra saṃsthitiḥ caśabdaḥ eva arthe prākṛtaiḥ ahaṅkāra ādyaiḥ manaḥ iti vartate pralaye sataḥ api upacaya apekṣayā janma śrutiḥ iti bhāvaḥ kutas eṣā kalpanā mukhya arthe bādhaka sadbhāvāt iti āha yadā iti yadi manaḥ mukhyatas eva janimat syāt tadā pralaye tat na syāt yadi ca pralaye tat na syāt tadā atmanaḥ saṃsāra avasthānam na syāt na ca mā bhūt pralaye saṃsāra avasthānam iti yuktam muktānām punar saṃsāra anupapattyā sṛṣṭayanupapatti prasaṅgāt avidyā kāma karma ādi adhīnaḥ saṃsāraḥ iti ced na avidyā ādeḥ eva saṃsāra tvāt manaḥ param kāraṇam āmananti a ityādi smṛti virodhāt ca tathā ca śrutiḥ nityam manaḥ anādi tvāt na hi amanāḥ pumān= tiṣṭhati a iti pumān saṃsārī iti arthaḥ kim atas yadi evam sarva vastu anubhava āhita saṃskāra sadbhāvaḥ iti atas āha saṃskāraiḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.8a–3.2.8c.2	 saṃskāraiḥ bhagavān eva sṛṣṭvā nānāvidham jagat svapna kāle darśayati atra sṛṣṭvā iti anena anādi nitya tva pakṣa doṣāḥ anabhyupagamena eva nirastāḥ svapna kāle eva sṛṣṭvā iti anena prāk ūrdhvam ca upalambha prasaṅgaḥ nirākṛtaḥ sṛṣṭeḥ saṃhāra upalakṣaṇa tvāt saṃskāraiḥ iti upādāna kīrtanam na ca teṣām guṇa tvena upādāna tva anupapattiḥ manaḥ vṛtti tvena dravya tvāt saṃskārāṇām ca atīndriya tvena tri aṇuka janma vināśayoḥ iva prāk ūrdhvam ca anupalambhaḥ na doṣāya bhagavān iti kartṛ nirdeśaḥ tadā eva sṛṣṭi saṃhāra karaṇam asambhāvitam iti atas aśakya kartṛ tā śakti sūcanāya bhagavān iti uktam evam ca satya dṛṣṭa ādi nimittam prasiddham eva na kevalam arthānām satya tva sambhavena bhagavat adhīna tvam api tu tad jñānasya api iti uktam darśayati iti jīvāya iti śeṣaḥ darśana sādhanam ca manaḥ eva iti vakṣyati darśanam ca anubhavaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tena smaraṇam eva etat iti matam nirastam bhavati 
NSu_3.2.8a–3.2.8c.3	 smaraṇa tvam khalu asya tat cihnasya tat iti ullekhasya sadbhāvāt vā kalpyate asat nihita gocara tvāt vā saṃskāra prabhava tvāt vā na ādyaḥ idam iti ullekhena tad abhāvāt atas eva smṛti viparyāsaḥ ayam iti ced na smṛti tvasya eva asiddheḥ na dvitīyaḥ viṣaya sānnidhyasya upapādita tvāt na tṛtīyaḥ padārtha janmani saṃskārasya upakṣīṇa tvena asiddheḥ tasmāt yathā manorathe dhyāne vā saṃskāra yonīn arthān manasā anubhavati evam svapne api iti kim anupapannam iyān= tu viśeṣaḥ manoratha ādau prayatna pūrvikā padārtha sṛṣṭiḥ svapne punar īśvara adhīnā eva iti 
NSu_3.2.8a–3.2.8c.4	 apare tu bhavati eva ayam anubhavaḥ kintu jāgara anubhūta smartavya arthaḥ eva iti manyante tat api asat tathā hi kim ayam anubhavaḥ yathārthaḥ uta ayatha arthaḥ na ādyaḥ bāhya arthānām deśa kāla viprakṛṣṭa tvena tad anupapatteḥ dvitīye vaktavyam kim ayam agaje gaja tvā ullekhī iti ayam ayathārthaḥ kiṃvā gajaḥ eva āsannikṛṣṭe sannikṛṣṭa tva ullekhī iti ayathārthaḥ ādye na ayam gajaḥ kintu gavaye eva iti bāda udayaḥ syāt dvitīye na ayam sannikṛṣṭaḥ kinnāma viprakṛṣṭaḥ iti bādhaḥ bhavet na ca etat asti tasmāt saṃskāra prabhava sannikṛṣṭa satya artha pramitiḥ eva iyam iti yuktam katham tarhi śruti smṛtiṣu svapna pratīteḥ bhrānti tvam ucyate iti atas āha bhrāntiḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.8d.1–3.2.8d.2	 bhrāntiḥ jāgrat tvam eva hi jāgrat tvam iti tat pratītim upalakṣayati eva iti padārtha svarūpam vyāvartayati jāgrat tvam jāgara anubhūta padārthaiḥ eka tvam svapne hi tātkālika tayā adṛṣṭa carān eva tanaya ādīn dṛṣṭa cara tayā anusandhatte yat vā jāgrat tvam nāma gagana ādīnām nitya tva ādikam ghaṭa ādīnām mṛdā ādi upādānaka tvam bāhya artha kriyā akṣama tvam ityādi grāhyam jāgrat tva pratīteḥ bhrānti tvāt tat viṣayam śruti ādikam iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_3.2.8d.3	 syāt etat jāgrat tvasya api saṃskāraḥ asti eva iti sa upādāna tva sambhavāt katham tad pratītiḥ bhrāntiḥ iti ucyate anyathār atha pratītiḥ api bhrāntiḥ syāt aviśeṣāt iti mā evam na hi vayam kāraṇa sāmagrī sambhava mātreṇa arthānām satya tām ātiṣṭhāmahe kintu bādhā bhāvena iti vakṣyāmaḥ sāmagṣa bhāvena asatya tvam bruvāṇam prati tu tad asiddhiḥ eva āveditā asti ca jāgrattā pratīteḥ bādhaḥ svāpnaḥ eva ayam na jāgara anubhūtaḥ ityādi udayāt tat idam uktam hi śabdena 
NSu_3.2.8d.4–3.2.9.1	 jāgrat tvrapratītiḥ eva bhrāntiḥ iti ayuktam arthānām api keṣāñcid asattvena tad pratīteḥ api bhrānti tvāt svapne api sva śira= cheda ādayaḥ api pratīyante na ca tad utpattau= upādānam asti ananubhūta tvena saṃskāra udaya ayogāt ananubhūte api saṃskāra udaya abhyupagamea dṛṣṭe ca aśruteḥ a ityādi śruti smṛti virodhaḥ syāt kadācid ananubhūta artha smṛtiḥ api āpadyeta tatas yadi api sākṣāt sva śira= cheda ādeḥ bādhaḥ na asti tathā api kāraṇa anupapattyāsattvam aṅgīkāryam eva iti atas āha adṛṣṭe ca iti adṛṣṭe ca aśrute bhāve na bhāvaḥ upajāyate adṛṣṭāt aśrutāt bhāvāt na bhāvaḥ upajāyate 
NSu_3.2.10ab.1–3.2.10ab.2	 iti śruti purāṇa uktiḥ anādi tvāt tu yujyate bhāve padārthe bhāvaḥ vāsanā pañcamī saptamī arthe uktiḥ iti atas paraḥ tu śabdaḥ boddhavyaḥ anādi tvāt saṃsārasya iti śeṣaḥ saṃsārasya anādi tvāt kvacid janmani sva śiraḥ ccheda ādeḥ api anubhava sambhavena saṃskāra upapatteḥ satya tve api śruti purāṇa uktiḥ yujyate eva na tu viruddhayate vinā api anubhavena saṃskāra udaya abhyupagame hi sā viruddhayeta iti atra aśruta grahaṇena atra api janmani śravaṇa janita saṃskāraḥ sambhavati iti sūcyate yatra tu śravaṇa ādi api na asti tatra anādi tvam niveśitam anena yat pūrvam sarva grahaṇam kṛtam tad upapattaye vānādi anubhava parampara uktā tasya sarvasya upayogaḥ kathitaḥ bhavati
