NSu_3.2.10ab.3–3.2.10ab.4	 nanu śaśa viṣāṇa ādi pratītau katham na hi bhava antare api tad anubhavaḥ sambhavati yathāpūrvam iti sarva kalpānām ekavidha tva śravaṇāt mā evam śaśa viṣāṇa ādi pramā bhāve api śabda ādinā bhrānti sambhavena saṃskāra upapatteḥ yena tu śaśa viṣāṇa ādikam bhrāntyā api na pratipannam tasya katham na hi sarvatra bhrāmyati iti niyamaḥ asti na api svapne na tat paśyati iti niyantum śakyate ucyate kim atra śaśa ādīnām viṣāṇa ādīnām ca upādāna āsambhavena asattvam ucyate uta śaśa tva ādi viṣāṇi tva ādi sāmāna adhikaraṇyādeḥ ādyam nirākaroti kadācid iti 
NSu_3.2.10cd.1–3.2.11a.3	 kadācid darśana ayogyam yat tatra api vibhāgataḥ dṛṣṭam yad svapne dṛśyate iti śeṣaḥ vibhāgataḥ sāmānā adhiraṇyena vinā dṛṣṭam jāgare yadi api śaśa tva viṣāṇi tva ādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam śaśa viṣāṇa ādi sambandha viśeṣaḥ vā jāgare na anubhūtaḥ tathā api viviktam śaśa tva ādikam anubhūtam eva iti tad saṃskāra sambhave na śaśa ādīnām asattvam vācyam iti dvitīye sampratipattim uttaram āha sameti 
NSu_3.2.11ab.1–3.2.11ab.4	 samāna adhikaraṇam dṛśyate ca sa ca bhramaḥ bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etat dṛśyate iti atra prakṛti artham saḥ iti parāmṛśati yat iti anuvartate atra svapne na kevalam jāgrat tvam iti ca arthaḥ yasya upādānam sambhavati bādhaḥ ca na asti tat eva hi prāk eva śabdena vyavacchinnam iti bhāvaḥ bhavet etat sarvam yadi svāpna arthānām jāgara upalabdhānām iva spaṣṭa tayā bāhya artha kriyā sāmarthya lakṣaṇā na asti anyathā sā syāt iti arthaḥ dṛṣṭam samāna adhikaraṇam dṛśyate ca sa ca bhramaḥ 
NSu_3.2.11ab.5	 ayam abhisandhiḥ svāpnāḥ tāvat ghaṭa ādayaḥ nāsantaḥ bādhā bhāvāt na api anādi nityāḥ pūrva uttaram anupalambhāt na nirupādāna utpattiḥ upapannāḥ tatas avaśyam upādāne anusaraṇīye na tāvat bāhya mṛdā ādi upādānāḥ bāhya artha kriyā sāmarthya rahita tvāt vimataḥ ghaṭaḥ na bāhya mṛdā ādi upādānakaḥ bāhya mṛdā ādi upādānakaḥ bāhya mṛdā ādi upādāna kārya kriyā rahita tvāt iti prayogāt anyathā tad prasaṅgāt na ca upādāna antaram asti tatas pariśeṣāt vāsanā upādānakāḥ eva iti caśabdena bhagavat kartṛka tve tātkālikā utpatti vināśi tve ca pariśeṣamya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti aetasmāt hayā iva putraḥ jāyate ana tatra rathāḥ a ityādi śrutim ca pramāṇam samuccinoti 
NSu_3.2.11ab.6–3.2.11ab.8	 tat anena prabandhena sandhye sṛṣṭiḥ āha hi nirmātāram ca eke putra ādayaḥ ca māyā mātram tu kāt snaryena anabhivyakta svarūpa tvāt iti tri sūtrī vyākhyātā bhavati anye punar anyathā etāni sūtrāṇi vyācakṣate tathā hi na tatra rathāḥ na ratha yogāḥ na panthānaḥ bhavanti atha rathān ratha yogān pathaḥ sṛjate a ityādi śrūyate tatra saṃśayaḥ kim prabodhaḥ iva svapne api pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiḥ āhosvit māyāmayī iti tatra tāvat pratipadyante sandhye sṛṣṭiḥ āha hi prabodha samprasāda sthānayoḥ sandhau bhavati iti sandhyam svāpna sthānam tatra tathārūpā eva sṛṣṭiḥ kutas yatas pramāṇa bhūtā śrutiḥ evam āha atha rathān ratha yogān pathaḥ sṛjate a ityādi 
NSu_3.2.11ab.9	 nirmātāram ca eke putra ādayaḥ ca api ca eke śākhinaḥ sandhye kāmānām nirmātāram ātmānam āmananti yaḥ eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmam kāmam puruṣaḥ nirmimāṇaḥ a iti putra ādayaḥ ca tatra kāmāḥ abhipreyante kāmyante iti na punar icchā viśeṣāḥ śata āyuṣaḥ putra pautrān vṛṇīṣva a iti prakṛteṣu putra āt iṣu kāmānām tvā kāma bhājam karomi a iti kāma śabdasya prayukta tvāt 
NSu_3.2.11ab.10–3.2.11ab.12	 prājñam ca enam nirmātāram prakaraṇa vākya śeṣābhyām pratīmaḥ anyatra dharmāt anyatra adharmāt a ityādeḥ prājñasya hi idam prakaraṇam vākya śeṣaḥ apitat eva śukram tat brahma a ityādiḥ prājña kartṛkā ca sṛṣṭi yathā rūpā sandhye sṛṣṭiḥ iti evam prāpte pratyāha māyā mātram tu kāt snaryena anabhivyakta svarūpa tvāt tuśabdaḥ pakṣam vyāvartayati māyā iti anādiḥ anirvācyā avidyā ucyate māyā eva sandhye sṛṣṭiḥ na paramārtha gandhaḥ api asti kutas māyā iti anādiḥ anirvācya avidyā ucyate māyā eva sandhye sṛṣṭiḥ na paramārtha gandhaḥ api asti kutas kāt snaryena anabhivyakta svarūpa tvāt deśa kāla nimitta sampattiḥ abādhaḥ ca kātsnaryam tena abhivyakta svarūpa tva abhāvāt 
NSu_3.2.11ab.13	 tathā hi na tāvat svapne ratha ādīnām ucitaḥ deśaḥ sambhavati na hi saṃvṛte deha deśe ratha ādayaḥ avakāśam labheran na ca vāci aṃbahis kulāyāt amṛtaḥ caritvā a iti śruteḥ sthiti gati pratyaya bhedāt ca bahis dehāt svapnam paśyati iti suptasya jantoḥ yojana śata antaritam deśam kṣaṇa mātreṇa paryetum viparyetu ca tatas sāmarthya asambhavāt kvacid ca pratyāgamana varjitaḥ svapnaḥ bhavati kuruṣu aham adya śayānaḥ svapne pāñcālān adhigataḥ ca pratibuddhaḥ ca iti dehāt ced apeyāt pāñcāleṣu pratibudhyeta kuruṣu a iva tu pratibudhyate yena ca ayam dehena deśa antarāṇi svapne paśyati na tāni tathābhūtāni eva bhavanti paridhāvan= ced paśyet jā agra dvat bhūtam artham ākalayet darśayati ca śrutiḥ antar eva svapnaṃsve śarīre yathākāmam parivartate a iti atas ca śruti upapatti viredhāt bahis śrutiḥ anupakāri tva sāmyāt gauṇī vyākhyeyāḥ sthiti gati pratyaya bhedaḥ ca bhrāntaḥ abhyupeyaḥ 
NSu_3.2.11ab.14	 kāla visaṃvādaḥ api svapne bhavati rajanyām suptaḥ hi vāsaram bhārate varṣe manyante tathā muhūrta mātram api varṣam nimittāni api svapne na buddhaye karmaṇe vā ucitāni vidyante bādhyante ca ete ratha ādayaḥ svapne dṛṣṭāḥ prabodhe svapne eva ca ete sulabha bādhāḥ bhavanti ādi antayoḥ vyabhicāra darśanāt rathaḥ ayam iti hi kadācid svapne nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena manuṣyaḥ sampadyate manuṣyaḥ ayam iti nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena vṛkṣaḥ 
NSu_3.2.11ab.15–3.2.11ab.16	 spaṣṭam ca abhāvam ratha ādīnām svapne śrāvayati śāstram na tatra rathāḥ na ratha yogāḥ na panthānaḥ bhavanti a ityādi tasmāt māyā mātram svapana darśanam aparaḥ āha kāt snaryena anabhivyakta svara pū tvāt draṣṭubhiḥ nna tu a ādinā nirvaktum aśakya tvāt tathā hi svāpnānām ratha ādīnām draṣṭuḥ bhedaḥ abhedaḥ bheda abhedaḥ vā na tāvat bhedaḥ pāśvarsthānām api tad upalambha prasaṅgāt āntara tvasya ca anucita tvāt na api abhedaḥ ekasya avicitrasya vicitra an eka ātmaka tāyā vinā bhrāntim anupapatteḥ bheda pratyaya virodhāt ca na ca bheda abhedau vyāghātāt atas anirvācya avidyā lāsaḥ eva ayam iti 
NSu_3.2.11ab.17–3.2.11ab.18	 sūcakaḥ ca hi śruteḥ ācakṣate ca tad vidaḥ sūcakaḥ ca hi śruteḥ ācakṣate ca tad vidaḥ māyā mātra tvāt tarhi na kaścid svapne paramārtha gandhaḥ iti na iti ucyate sūcakaḥ ca hi svapnaḥ bhavati bhaviṣyatoḥ sādhu asādhunoḥ kutas yadā karmasu iti ādi śruteḥ ācakṣate ca svapna adhyāya vidaḥ tatra bhavatu sūcyamānasya satya tvam sūcakasya tu vaitathyam eva iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_3.2.11ab.19–3.2.11ab.20	 yat uktam āha hi a iti tat evam sati bhāktam vyākhyeyam suptau hi svapna darśana nimitta sukṛta duṣkṛta kartṛ tvāt ratha ādīnām kartā iti ucyate nirmāṇa śrutiḥ api evam bhāktā vyākhyeyāḥ yat api uktam prājñam enam nirmātāram āmananti iti tat api asat śruti antaresu ayam vihṛtya svayam nirmāya a iti jīva vyāpāra śravaṇāt 
NSu_3.2.11ab.21	 aparaḥ tu etad artham eva sūcakaḥ ca iti sūtram vyākhyātavān śubha aśubha sūcakaḥ hi svapnaḥ na hi prājñasya śubha aśubha yogaḥ avakalpate iti jīvasya eva tat eva śuklam iti vākya śeṣe jīva bhāvam vyāvartya brahma bhāva upadiśyate tat tvam asi ityādi vat iti na brahma prakaraṇam viruddhayate astu vā svapne api prājña vyavahāraḥ na tāvatā viyat ādi vat svapnasya satya tvam vaiṣamyasya ukta tvāt viyat ādi prapañcaḥ api asatyaḥ eva iti upapāditam ca ārambhaṇa adhikaraṇe brahma ātma tva darśanāt viyat ādi prapañcaḥ bādhyate sandhyāśrayaḥ tu pratidinam iti atas vaiśeṣikam idam sandhyasya māyā mātra tvam uditam 
NSu_3.2.11ab.22	 para abhidhyānāt tu tirohitam tatas hi asya bandha viparyayau nanyagneḥ aṃśasya viṣphuliṅgasya yathā dahana prakāśana śaktī bhavataḥ tathā īśvara aṃśasya jīvasya api jñāna aiśvarya śaktibhyām bhāvyam tatas ca sāṅkalpikī sṛṣṭiḥ syāt iti asya idam uttaram satyam asti eva īśvara sādharmyam jīvasya kintu tirohitam tat tu parameśvara abhidhyānāt eva āvirbhavati kutas tatas hi īśvarāt hetoḥ asya jīvasya bandha mokṣau bhavataḥ deha yogāt vā saḥ api kasmāt jīvasya jñāna aiśvarya tiraskāraḥ bhavati viṣphuliṅga vat atiraskāraḥ hi yuktaḥ iti atra idam uttaram saḥ api tiraskāraḥ jīvasya deha yogāt 
NSu_3.2.11ab.23–3.2.11ab.24	 avidyā pratyupasthāpita nāma rūpa kṛta deha indriya manaḥ buddhi viṣaya vedanā ādi upādhi yogāt tat aviveka bhrama kṛtaḥ bhavati yathā araṇi yogāt agneḥ kim anayā kalpanayā anyaḥ eva astu jīvaḥ parameśvarāt iti etat vā aśabdena vyavacchinatti mā evam tat tvam asya ādi śruti virodhāt iti tat idam anupapannam vyākhyānam tathā hi yattāt svapna sṛṣṭeḥ pāramārthika tva pratipādakam sūtra dvayam pūrva pīnuvāda param iti tat tadā pratīmaḥ yadi māyā mātram iti anirvācya tva pratijñā syāt naca evam tad pratipādaka pramāṇa abhāvāt 
NSu_3.2.11ab.25–3.2.12c.3	 nanu uktam kāt snaryena anabhivyakta svarūpa tvāt iti deśa kāla nimitta sampatti abādharāhityam tathā bhinna tva ādinā nirūpayitum aśakyatvam ca mā evam tasya anupapanna tvāt tatra yat deśa ādirāhityam upapāditam tad sūtra artha spaṣṭī karaṇena eva ābhāsī bhaviṣyati iti āśayavān bheda ādi vikalpa praśnena yat dūṣaṇam uktam tatra praśnaḥ eva asau= anupapannaḥ dūre dūṣaṇa abhidhānam iti āha bhedaḥ iti bhedaḥ abhedaḥ athavā dvandvam iti praśnaḥ na yujyate draṣṭuḥ svapnasya draṣṭuḥ devadattāt svapnasya svapna upalabhyasya ratha ādeḥ kim bhedaḥ atha abhedaḥ dvandvam bheda abhedau vā iti vikalpa praśnaḥ na yujyate kutas iti atas āha dṛṣṭa tvāt iti 
NSu_3.2.12cd.1–3.2.12cd.3	 dṛṣṭa tvāt bhedasya eva akhilaiḥ janaiḥ draṣṭuḥ svapnasya iti anuvartate sandeha mūlaḥ hi vikalpa praśnaḥ na ca prakṛte sandehaḥ sambhavati svapna tad draṣṣoḥ bhedasya eva akhilaiḥ janaiḥ dṛṣṭa tvena vipratipatteḥ abhāvāt syāt etat mā bhūt vipratipatti mūlaḥ ayam saṃśayaḥ samāna dharma jaḥ tu bhaviṣyati kiñcid vastu draṣṭuḥ bhinnam bhavati kiñcid abhinnam kiñcid bhinna abhinnam vastu ca idam atas bhinnam abhinnam vā ityādi saṃśayaḥ bhavet iti mā evam saṃśayaḥ hi kim samāna dharma darśana mātrāt bhavati uta nirṇāyaka abhāva saha kṛtāt na ādyaḥ sarvatra sandeha utpāda prasaṅgāt asti hi sarvatra kiñcid sādharmyam tad anivṛtti prasaṅgāt ca na hi samānaḥ dharmaḥ kadāpi nivartate dvitīye tu katham atra sandehaḥ bhedasya eva akhilaiḥ janaiḥ dṛṣṭa tvena nirṇāyaka abhāvasya eva asiddheḥ 
NSu_3.2.12cd.4	 atha matam bhedaḥ hi kaścid parama arthaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā stambha kumbhayoḥ kaścid aparama arthaḥ yathā candramasoḥ dṛśyate ca ayam bhedaḥ tatas bhavet eva sandehaḥ iti etat api na tathā sati yathāsaṃśayam vikalpa praśnasya kāryatvāt saḥ eva anayā vācā ubhaṅgayā kriyate iti ced na pratītiḥ api hi na kevalā saṃśaya hetuḥ bhavati sarvatra prasaṅgāt tad anivṛtti prasaṅgāt ca viśeṣa pratītyā hi tad nivṛttiḥ eṣyavyā tatra api ca sandehaḥ avaskandate eva kintu vipratipatti ādi kaluṣitā na ca atra tat asti iti uktam autsargikam hi pratītīnām yāthāthi arm anyathātvam tu apavādam tat evam siddha viṣaya tvāt praśnaḥ eva ayam anupapannaḥ 
NSu_3.2.12cd.5	 nanu ca bheda pakṣam eva aṅgīkṛtya tatra uktaḥ doṣaḥ śakyate eva parihartum manaḥ yoni tvena sukha ādi vat pārśva stha anupalambha sambhavāt tad kim anena praśna khaṇḍena satyam tathā api prativādissu akhilam na upekṣām arhati iti śiṣyān= śikṣayitum etat tathā ca vakṣyati yukti pāda vyutpādita nyāya śeṣam prasaṅgena vyutpādayitum ca iha ca tad vyutpādanasya upayogam leśataḥ darśayiṣyāmaḥ 
NSu_3.2.12cd.6	 siddhe arthe saṃśayaḥ na yujyate tatas vikalpa praśnaḥ api iti uktam tatra na yujyate iti kaḥ arthaḥ na tāvat na utpadyate iti saṃśaya vikalpa praśna utpatteḥ pramita tvāt na ca utpannaḥ api niṣkāraṇaḥ iti akāraṇa kārya utpatteḥ pramāṇa viruddha tvāt na api atad kāraṇāt utpannaḥ iti yatas utpannaḥ tasya eva kāraṇa tvena vyāhata tvāt na ca anyat anupapanna tvam asti iti atas āha praśnā iti 
NSu_3.2.12cd.7–3.2.12cd.9	 vikalpa praśna doṣāḥḍha pramāṇa vyāhatiḥ siddhārtha tā eva iti na pṛthak uktaḥ sva vyāhatiḥ yathā vandhyā kim putravatī na vā iti asaṅgatiḥ yathā īśvaraḥ sukhī iti ukte prapañcasya kṣaṇika tve kim pratyakṣam pramāṇa muta anumitiḥ iti siddhārthasya tu prakṛtā eva vaiphalatyam yathā kākasya āṣyau daśa vā dantāḥ iti vaiphalyam iti atas param iti śabdaḥ adhyāhāryaḥ ayam abhisandhiḥ sva vyāhati ādikam tāvat trayam praśna dūṣaṇam bhavati eva pratijñā viroda artha antara ādeḥ nigraha sthāna tvena prāmāṇikaiḥ parigaṇita tvāt tasya anupapanna tā kīdṛśī yena dūṣaṇa tvam iti vaktavyam 
NSu_3.2.12cd.10	 atha manyeta avyāhati ādikam artha pratyayana aṅgam vyāhata ādikam ca bruvāṇaḥ tat na pratyeti viparītam ca pratyeti iti anumīyate atas apratipatti vipratipatti liṅga tvāt anupapannam iti evam tarhi siddhārtha tā api evam eva iti katham na doṣaḥ vikalpa praśnaḥ hi sandeha mūlaḥ sandehaḥ ca samāna dharma darśana ādinā nirṇāyaka abhāva saha kṛtena bhavati samāna dharma ādi abhāve vā nirṇāyaka sadbhāve api vā yaḥ sandigdhe vikalpān= ca pṛcchati sa nūnam avidyā mānam eva samāna dharma ādikam pratipannaḥ na pratipannaḥ ca nirṇāyaka sadbhāvam iti anumīyate na ca kāryam akāraṇam bhavitum arhati dṛśyate hi sarpa bhrama ādinā api bhaya kampa ādi kārya utpādaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.12cd.11	 nanu granthāḥ tāvat ime vāda kathā prakriyayā pravṛttāḥ na ca vāde nigraha sthānam asti tasya tattva nirṇaya avasāna tvāt na hi vādi prativādinoḥ anyarasmin pratijñā ahāni ādinā nigṛhīte sati antara pakṣa nirṇayaḥ siddhayati punar samyak pratipādya pratyavasthāna sambhavāt yat tu vāda sūtresiddhānta aviruddhaḥ pañca avayava upapannaḥ a iti apasiddhānta ādeḥ nigraha sthāna tvam sūcitam tat api vādasya anyatara pakṣa niṇarya avasāna tva virodhāt anupapannam yadi ca vāde apasiddhānta ādīni kānicid nigraha sthānāni syuḥ tadā aparaṇī api kasmāt na syuḥ tattva nirṇaya avasāna tva virodhasya ubhayatra sāmyāt pratijñā ahāni a ādinā nigrahe vīta rāga tva hāniḥ syāt iti ced samam apasiddhānta dau= api iti atas vāde nigraha sthāna abhāvāt katham praśna doṣa udbhavanam iti atas āha na taiḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.13d.1–3.2.14ab.3	 na taiḥ syāt tattva nirṇayaḥ taiḥ sva vyāhata ādi praśnaiḥ sva vyāhata ādi praśnāḥ tattva nirṇaya virodhinaḥ iti arthaḥ na hi siddhe api arthe sandihānaḥ śatena api pramāṇānām tattvam pratipādayitum śakyate tatra api sandeha anivāraṇāt tatas kim iti atas āha tat tva iti tattva nirṇaya vailomyam syāt vāde api hi nigrahaḥ na kevalam jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ eva nigraha sthāna sadbhāvaḥ kintu vāde api nigṛhyate anena iti nigrahaḥ nigraha sthānam syāt eva ayam tu viśeṣaḥ na jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ iva samastam api tu yāvat tattva nirṇaya virodhi tāvat eva siddha praśna ādikam ca tattva nirṇaya virodhi iti uktam tad kutas vāde na nigraha sthānam iti yaḥ hi yad artham pravartate sa tat viruddham ācaran katham na aparādhī syāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ nigraha nimitta niṣkarṣa artham vailomyam iti bhāva pratyayaḥ nanu evam tarhi vādasya tattva nirṇaya artha tvam vyāhanyate tathā ca vijaya artha tvena jalpāditaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ ca na syāt tadvat eva sa varnigraha sthāna sadbhāvaḥ api syāt iti atas āha udbhāvanīyam eva iti 
NSu_3.2.14cd.1–3.2.15ab.1–3.2.15ab.4^1	 udbhāvanīyam eva syāt na kathā avasitiḥ bhavet vijigīṣu kathāyām tu kathā avasiti kāraṇam tattva nirṇaya vailomyam vādaḥ iti anuvartate avasītayate anena iti avasitiḥ vijigīṣu kathāyām jalpa vitaṇḍā lakṣaṇāyām kathā avasiti kāraṇam sarvam api nigraha sthānam iti śeṣaḥ etat uktam bhavati vāde kiñcid asambhāvitam eva yathā vikṣepa ādi tasya ajñāna saṃgūhanādi artha tvāt tattva nirṇinīṣoḥ ca tatra anarthi tvāt kiñcid sambhāvitam api anudbhāvyam yathā ananubhāṣaṇa ādi tasya ubhaya abhilaṣi tattva nirṇaya avirodhi tvena tad udbhāvanasya vyartha tvāt kiñcid udbhāvya mātram yathā pratijñā virodha ādikam prakṛtam 
NSu_3.2.15ab.1–3.2.15ab.4^2	 tasya tattva nirṇaya virodhi tvena tad udbhāvanasya tyājanena tattva nirṇaya aṅga tvāt vāda avasānam tu anyatarasya sādhana dūṣaṇayoḥ sthitayoḥ anyasmin= ca nissādha dūṣaṇe sati bhavati saḥ eva hi tattva nirṇayaḥ iti jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tu sarvam api nigraha sthānam sambhāvitam ca udbhāvyam ca udbhāvitam ca kathām ca avasāyayati tayoḥ vijaya artha tvāt sarvasya vijaya sādhana tvāt atas na kaścid doṣaḥ iti evam siddhārtha viṣaya tvam praśnasya dūṣaṇam udbhāvyam ca iti upapādya tad dūṣaṇa tva anabhyupagame ati prasaṅgam sūcayitum āha parihāre api iti 
NSu_3.2.15c–3.2.15e.2	 parihāre api siddha tvam dūṣaṇam prativādinaḥ pratijñāyām na kevalam siddha viṣaya tvam praśna dūṣaṇam kinnāma parihare api uttare api arthasya siddhatvam dūṣaṇam iyān= tu viśeṣaḥ praśne tu pṛcchyamāna arthasya praṣṭuḥ siddha tvam dūṣaṇam pratiyoginaḥ tu siddha tvam nyāyyam eva anyathā pratipādaka tva anupapatteḥ iti tat kim uttara vākya arthasya sarvasya api prativādi siddha tvam dūṣaṇam na iti brūmaḥ kintu pratijñā arthasya eva parihāre api pratijñāyām arthasya prativādinaḥ siddha tvam dūṣaṇam iti sambandhaḥ idam uktam bhavati yadi sva siddhārtha praśna karaṇam na dūṣaṇam syāt tadā prativādi siddhārtha pratijñā api na dūṣaṇam syāt aviśeṣāt 
NSu_3.2.15c–3.2.15e.3	 nanu param prati sādhanāya pakṣa vacanam pratijñā na ca siddham sādhanam arhati atas pratijñātu a vyāghātāt prativādi siddhārtha tvam dūṣaṇam eva iti evam tarhi jñīpsā pūrvakam vākyam praśnaḥ na ca jñāte jñīpsā sambhavati atas praśna tva vyāghātāt sva siddhārtha viṣaya tvam katham na dūṣaṇam iti atha kim artham pratijñāyām iti ucyate iti atas āha tad anyasya iti 
NSu_3.2.15ef.1–3.2.15ef.3	 tad anyasya siddha tā eva hi sādhakāḥ vyāpaka dharmasya sādhya dharmiṇā sambandhaḥ tad aparyavasāna labhyaḥ ca arthaḥ pratijñā arthaḥ tad anyasya hetu ādi arthasya siddha tā eva hi sādhya sādhikā bhavati asiddhasya liṅga ādeḥ sādhya sādhaka tve ati prasaṅgāt atas pratijñāyāmi ti aktam pratijñāta artha vyatiriktasya uttara vākya arthasya siddha tā eva sādhika iti anena tad asiddheḥ dūṣaṇvam labdham sā ca aneka prakārāḥ tathā hi sādhya dharmiṇaḥ asiddhiḥ āśraya asiddhiḥ yathā nṛśṛṅgam asti śṛṅga tvāt go śṛṅga vat iti sādhya dharma asiddhiḥ aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā para saṃjñā yathā śukti rajata ādikam sat asat vilakṣaṇam bādhya tvāt iti liṅga asiddhiḥ yathā vimatam acetanam sat asat vilakṣaṇa tvāt iti liṅgasya pakṣa dharmatā siddhiḥ yathā śabdaḥ nityaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt iti vyadhikaraṇa asiddhiḥ yathā śabdaḥ anityaḥ ghaṭasya kṛtaka tvāt iti vyāptyasiddhiḥ yathā yat sat tad kṣaṇikam yathā pradīpaḥ san= ca prapañcaḥ iti evam viśeṣaṇā siddhayā ādayaḥ api draṣṭavyāḥ tatra sarvāsām api asiddhīnām dūṣaṇa tve prāpte apavādam āha āśraya iti 
NSu_3.2.16a–3.2.16c.2	 āśraya vyāśraya asiddhī sādhya siddhiḥ ca dūṣaṇam keṣāñcin āśraya asiddhiḥ vyadhikaraṇā siddhiḥ sādhya asiddhiḥ ca yadi api keṣāñcit naiyyāyika ādīnām mate dūṣaṇam tathā api tattvataḥ na ca te doṣāḥ āśraya asiddhiḥ aneka prakārāḥ asat āśraya tvam abhāva āśraya tvam apratīta āśraya tvam pakṣīkṛta ākāreṇa asattvam siddha sādhana tvam ca iti tatra ādyayoḥ dvayoḥ adoṣa tvam pratijānīte na ca iti 
NSu_3.2.16.1–3.2.16.2	 na ca te doṣāḥ vyāptau satyām kathañcana apratīta āśraya tva ādeḥ deṣa tvasya siddha tvāt atas eva uktam anyatraa sadāśrayasya a ityādi na ca atyanta abhāvaḥ api a iti evam uttaratra api jñātavyam āśraya asiddhi śabdena dṛṣṭāntasya āśraya hīna tā api saṅgrāhyā kutas te na doṣāḥ iti ced kim vyāpti ādi bhaṅga hetu tvena doṣa tvam uta sati eva vyāpti ādau prakāra antareṇa na ādyaḥ āśraya asiddhayā ādau= api vyāpti ādeḥ sattvāt dvitīye tu idam upatiṣṭhate vyāptau satyām kathañcana kena api prakāreṇa na doṣāḥ iti vyāpti grahaṇam abādhita viṣaya tva ādi upalakṣaṇam vastutas vyāptau= eva tasya upayogāt na pṛthak uktam asya eva arthasya prapañca artham uttaraḥ prabandhaḥ 
NSu_3.2.16.3	 tatra bhagavat abhāvasya api prāmāṇika tvam sadharmaka tvam ca prāk eva sādhitam asat āśrayasya tu kutas duṣṭa tvam iti vācyam kinnara viṣāṇam asti viṣāṇa tvāt ityādeḥ api sādhana tva prasaṅgāt uta asataḥ nirdharmaka tvena sādhya dharma āśraya tva anupapattyā bādhita viṣaya tvena atha sādhana dharma āśraya tva anupapattyā svarūpa asiddha tvena yat vāsataḥ sakala vyavahāra abhājana tvena yadi vā aprāmāṇikasya pramāṇa aṅga tā sambhavena athavā asat āśrayasya vyāpti anupapattyā iti ādyam nirākaroti doṣaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.17ab.1–3.2.17ab.3	 doṣaḥ vyāhatiḥ eva asti nṛśṛṅga astitva sādhane vyāhatiḥ pramāṇa virodhaḥ śṛṅga śabdaḥ hi mahataḥ śissaṃyuktasya rūpavataḥ avayava viśeṣasya vācakaḥ abhipretaḥ syāt atīndriyasya vā kasyacid ādye pratyakṣeṇa tasya nāstita avadhāraṇāt pramāṇa bādhita tvena eva viṣāṇa tvasya asādhana tvāt na atiprasaṅgaḥ dvitīye tviṣi āpādanam iti syāt etat śṛṅga tvam tāvat asādhanam iti avivādam asti ca tatra bādhita viṣaya tvam asat āśraya tvam ca tatra bādhita viṣaya tvam eva tadīyāsa adhana tve prayojakam na asat āśraya tvam iti kutas niyamyate iti atas āha yatra iti 
NSu_3.2.17cd.1–3.2.17cd.3	 yatra vyāhata tā na asti kaḥ ati saṅgaḥ asya sādhane yasmin sādhye vyāhata tā pramāṇa bādhaḥ na asti asya sādhane asat āśrayeṇa api hetunā kriyamāṇe kaḥ ati prasaṅgaḥ na kaḥ api doṣaḥ vyāhata tā iti upalakṣaṇam vyabhicāra ādikam ca iti api draṣṭavyam etat uktam bhavati asti tāvat bādhita viṣaya tvasya dūṣaṇa tve kṛśa anuśaitya ādi sādhanam kṛtaka tva ādikam doṣa antara asaṅkīrṇam udāharaṇam tena tasya dūṣaṇa tvam niśninumaḥ na ca āsāt āśraya tvasya doṣa tve abādhita viṣaya tva ādi asaṅkīrṇam udāharaṇam asti yena tasya doṣa tvam pratīmaḥ bādhita viṣaya tva ādi doṣa antara abhāve kevala asat āśrayasya hetu tve bādhaka abhāvāt dṛśyate ca tathāvidhasya hetu tvam yathā vandhyā sutaḥ na vaktā acetana tvāt pāṣāṇa vat iti atas bādhita viṣaya tvena eva śṛṅga tvam asādhanam na asat āśraya tvena iti niścīyate 
NSu_3.2.17cd.4	 atha matam vandhyā sutaḥ vaktā suta tvāt sammata vat iti sat pratipakṣam etat kin na syāt asat āśrayatā abhayasya bhavatā eva tyājita tvāt iti mā evam tadīyavaktṛtā kāryasya kadāpi kena api anupalabdha tvena bādhita viṣaya tayā durbalasya apratipakṣa tvāt na hi bhavati tarakṣoḥ pratipakṣaḥ hariṇa śāvaḥ avaktṛ tvam api vacana itara kriyā kartṛ tvam iti atas acetana tvam api bādhita viṣayam iti ced na vaktṛ tva abhāva mātrasya sādhya tvāt 
NSu_3.2.17cd.5	 nanu abhāvaḥ api asati katham tasya dharma abhāvāt iti ced na dharmāṇām anekavidha tvāt kecid hi dharmi samavetāḥ bhavanti yathā rūpa ādayaḥ kecid anya samavetāḥ api anyam uparañjanīyam yathā jñāna ādayaḥ ghaṭa ādīnām kecid āśraya samavāyam api na apekṣante kevalam kenacid nirūpyante yathābhāvaḥ na ca vācyam abhāvaḥ api sat bhayām nirūpaṇīyaḥ iti prāgabhāva ādya nirūpaṇa prasaṅgāt ghaṭa ādeḥ kadācid sattvāt na evam iti ced na tasya nirūpaṇa samaye anupayogāt pratītyā nirūpaka tvam iti ced samam prakṛte api śabda ābhāsa ādinā vandhyā sutasya api pratīti sambhavāt 
NSu_3.2.17cd.6	 asiddham ca suta tvam vandhyā sutasya na ca evam sva vacana vyāghātaḥ kālpanikā anuvādena vāstava nirākaraṇāt kālpanikasya katham pakṣatvam iti ced na niṣedham prati pakṣa tve bādhaka abhāvāt anyathā para pakṣa pratikṣepa ayogāt atha acetana tvam api asiddham tasya cetanā ati rikta svabhāva tvāt iti ced na caitanya vyāvṛtti mātrasya hetu tvāt abhāvasya ca asataḥ api nirūpaṇam upapadyate iti uktam 
NSu_3.2.17cd.7–3.2.17cd.8	 mūke anaikāntikaḥ ca satatva hetuḥ amūka tvena viśeṣaṇe tasya vaktṛ tva anatirikta tvena sādhya viśiṣya tā syāt etena vikalpitāḥ pakṣāḥ samastāḥ api nirastāḥ bhavanti iti āḥ tām vistaraḥ pramāṇa virodhena śṛṅga tva hetuḥ ābhāsaḥ iti uktam atha pramāṇa virodhasya api kutas dūṣaṇa tvam vyāpti ādi aṅga sākalye sādhya siddheḥ āvaśyaka tvāt tad abhāve tatas eva ābhāsa tvam kim pramāṇa bādhena iti atas āha pratyakṣā iti 
NSu_3.2.18a–3.2.18c.2	 pratyakṣa āgama mūlāḥ tu nyāyāḥ sarve bhavanti hi nyāya ābhāsāḥ amūlāḥ syuḥ tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe hi śabdaḥ prasiddhau yasmāt iti arthe ca yadi api niṣedhaka hetoḥ niṣedha ātmanaḥ aprāmāṇikam api āśrayaḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmī ca kvacid bhavati iti uktam tathā api vidhāyakānām vidhi rūpāṇām ca āśrayeṇa avaśyam pratyakṣa āgama gṛhītena bhāvyam kvacid niṣedhakasya niṣedha ātmanaḥ ca niṣedhe sādhye kvacid pratiyoginā pratyakṣa ādi gṛhītena bhavitavyam liṅgam ca na sva rūpeṇa sādhya pramitim upajanayitum alam kintu pratyakṣa āgamābhyām niścita svarūpa vyāptikam iti evam anekadhā sarve api nyāyāḥ pratyakṣa āgama mūlāḥ eva bhavanti iti tāvat prasiddham 
NSu_3.2.18a–3.2.18c.4	 yatas evam tasmāt amūlāḥ sva mūla bhūta pratyakṣa āgama viruddhā nyāya ābhāsāḥ eva syuḥ yathā naiśati ādi sampannaḥ api paraśura viṣaye gagana ādau na chidām janayati evam anumānāni api upajīvya tva ādinā prabalābhyām pratyakṣa āgamābhyām bādhita tvena aviṣaye na pramām upajanayitum alam iti ābhāsa bhūtāni eva iti nanu anumāna mūlaḥ api nyāyaḥ asti yathā cakṣuḥ ādi pakṣīkāreṇa pravṛttaḥ tat katham pratyakṣa āgama mūlāḥ syuḥ iti uktam iti atas āha nyāyasya iti 
NSu_3.2.18d.1–3.2.18d.3	 nyāyasya anyasya tau punar pratyakṣa āgama mūlāt nyāyāt anyasya api nyāyasya tau pratyakṣa āgamau= eve mūlam katham yatas mūla bhūtasya api anyasya nyāyasya tau punar mūlam iti antataḥ sarvathā pratyakṣa āgamān atikramāt tathā uktam iti yadi api āgamaḥ api pratyakṣa mūlaḥ tathā api kvacid pratyakṣasya api mūlam bhavati iti atas dvayoḥ grahaṇam anumānasya api kvacid tad mūla tve api na svatantrasya iti atas tad parityāgaḥ evam vyāpti bhaṅga ādi anapekṣam eva aviṣaya vṛtti tvena bādhitasya duṣṭa tvam upapāditam prakāra antaram api āha adṛṣṭaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.19a–3.2.19d.1	 adṛṣṭe vyabhicāre tu sādhakam tat iti sphuṭam jñāyate sākṣiṇā eva at vā tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe tat liṅgam dhūma ādikam dahana ādi sādhya vyabhicāre addhā sarvathā api adṛṣṭaḥ eva sati tasya sādhakam na tu vyabhicāra darśanaḥ iti tāvat sākṣiṇā eva sphuṭam jñāyate kim ate yadi adṛṣṭa vyabhicārasya eva liṅgasya sādhya sādhaka tvam sākṣi siddham iti atas āha māna iti  māna bādhe na tat bhavet 
NSu_3.2.20ab.1–3.2.20ab.2	 yat sākṣiṇā eva māna tvam mānānām avasīyate pramāṇa bādhe sati tat dṛṣṭānta vyabhicāri tvam na bhavet pramāṇa bādhena agni ādeḥ śaitya ādi apahāre sati tatra eva liṅgasya kṛtaka tva ādeḥ sādhya vyabhicāra darśanāt tat anena vyāpti bhaṅga hetu tayā bādhasya dūṣaṇa tvam iti uktam bhavati tatra ayam vivekaḥ para artha prayoga uttara kālam aviṣaya vṛtti tvam eva udbhāvyam na vyāpti bhaṅgaḥ vyāpti bhaṅga upapādanāya upajīvyena aviṣaya vṛtti tvena eva anumānasya duṣṭa tve jaghanya pratipattikasya vyāpti bhaṅgasya anusaraṇasya anyāyya tvāt vyāpti grahaṇa samaye tu tad bhaṅga hetu tvena eva tadānīm viṣayasya buddhau= anārūḍha tvāt vyāpti bhaṅgasya eva purasphūtirka tvāt ca iti sākṣiṇā eva iti uktam tad prasaṅgāt upapādayati yat iti 
NSu_3.2.20ab.3–3.2.20ab.4	 yasmāt sarveṣām mānānām jñānānām māna tvam sākṣiṇā eva avasīyate anyatā anavasthā ādi prasaṅgāt tasmāt anumānasya api prāmāṇyam tena eva jñāyate iti uktam eva yadi tarhi prāmāṇyam sākṣi vedyam sākṣiṇaḥ prāk upapāditaḥ yāthārthya niyamaḥ bhajyeta kadācid amānasya api hi māna tvam gṛhyate anyathā viparyaya ādi śaṅkā pravṛttiḥ na syāt tasya ca ayathārtha tvam bādhena avedyate iti atas āha amānasya iti 
NSu_3.2.20cd.1–3.2.20cd.3	 amānasya tu māna tvam mānasa tvāt calam bhavet māna tvam māna tva grahaṇam calam bādhitam amānasya tu yat māna tvam gṛhyate tad manasā eva na sākṣiṇā atas tasya bādhya tvam na doṣam āvahati iti atra eṣā prakriyā sarvam api jñānam sākṣī gṛhṇāti yadi asya bādhaḥ bhaviṣyati tadā pramāṇam na ced pramāṇam eva iti tad prāmāṇyam api gṛhṇāti sati prayojane prāmāṇya ādi jijñāsāyām parīkṣām anusṛtya prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam vā vyavasthāpayati alābhe tu parīkṣāyāḥ viśeṣa avadhāraṇāt udāste 
NSu_3.2.20cd.4–3.2.20cd.5	 asyām avasthāyām rāga ādi kaluṣitam manaḥ parīkṣā abhāsa sahāyam prāmāṇya ādikam avadhārayati tat ca kadācid bādhyate kadācid na iti kutas eṣā kalpanā iti ced sākṣiṇaḥ yāthārthya niyamasya eva upāpadita tvāt vakṣyate ca etat iti adṛṣṭe vyabhicāraḥ iti sādhya vyabhicāri liṅgam apramāṇam iti uktam tatra dṛṣṭa vyabhicāri liṅgam apramāṇam iti uktam tatra viśeṣam āha utsargataḥ api iti 
NSu_3.2.21.1–3.2.21.3	 utsargataḥ api yat prāptam apavāda vivarjitam vyabhicārya pavādena mānam eva bhaviṣyati yat liṅgam utsargataḥ svabhāvena apavāda vivarjitam sādhya vyabhicāra varjitam prāptam niścitam api apavādena kāraṇa viśeṣeṇa eva vyabhicāri tat mānam eva bhaviṣyati etat uktam bhavati yathā sādhanasya sādhya sāhitya mātram na prāmāṇyayā upayogi kintu nirupādhikam eva anyathā sa upādhika sādhya sambandhasya maitrī tanaya tva ādeḥ api śyama tā sādhana tva prasaṅgāt tathā vyabhicāraḥ api nirupādhikaḥ eva asādhana tve hetuḥ yathā prameya tvasya nitya tvena na hi prameya tvam svabhāvena nitya tva avi abhicāri vyabhicāri tu nimitta antareṇa iti atra niyāmakam paśyāmaḥ yaḥ tu svabhāvena nitya tva avi abhicāri vyabhicāri tu nimitta antareṇa iti atra paśyāmaḥ yaḥ tu svabhāvena sādhya vyabhicāriṇaḥ api sādhanasya aupādhikaḥ vyabhicāraḥ nāsā a= aprāmāṇyakāraṇam iti kutas etat iti atas āha atas hi iti 
NSu_3.2.22a–3.2.22c.3	 atas hi bhojana ādīnām iṣṭa sādhana tā anumā mānam vyavahṛtau nityam eva śabdaḥ atra adhyāhāryaḥ sa upādhika vyabhicārasya aprāmāṇya kāraṇa tva abhāvāt eva hi āgāmi bhojana ādīnām iṣya sādhana tā anumānam yadi sa upādhikaḥ api vyabhicāraḥ aprāmāṇya hetuḥ syāt tadā vimatam bhojanam iṣya sādhanam bhojana tvāt hi astana bhojana vat iti anumānam amānam prasajyeta iti aprāmāṇyam eva tat astu iti atas āha vyavahṛtau= iti kāraṇam iti śeṣaḥ yadi vyabhicāreṇa īdam amānam syāt tadā prameya tvam iva vyavahartṛbhiḥ amāna tayā niścīyeta api tathā ca tatas bhojane prekṣāvatām pravṛttiḥ na syāt nanu vyabhicāri sādhanam sandeham āvahati sandehaḥ api bhavati pravṛtti hetuḥ iti satyam sandehaḥ sa āśaṅkām pravṛttim upajanayati na niraṅkuśām iyam tu niraṅkuśā sarva anubhava siddhā iti tat idam uktam nityam iti pūrveṇa eva sambandhaḥ bhavati idam anumānam pramāṇam kintu vyabhicāra abhāvāt eva iti atas āha vyabhicāraḥ hi iti 
NSu_3.2.22.1–3.2.22.2	 vyabhicāraḥ hi tatra ca tatra bhojana tva ādau sādhane sādhyeṣya sādhana tva vyabhicāraḥ sphuṭaḥ eva kvacid aniṣya sādhana tvasya api upalambhāt kintu a pathya tva ādi upādhi nibandhanaḥ eva na ca pathya tva ādi viśiṣyam eva bhojana tva ādikam sādhanam iti vācyam tasya pravṛtti uttara kāle phala anumeyasya prāc asiddheḥ na khalu phala mūla ādīnām viṣapatrikā ādi anupahata tvam asmad ādibhiḥ avadhārayitum śakyate tasmāt nirupādhikaḥ eva vyabhicāraḥ asādhana tva hetuḥ iti tat evam pramāṇa bādhasya dūṣaṇa tve prakāra sambhavān nāsat āśraya tvasya adūṣaṇa tve tad pratibandī yuktā iti 
NSu_3.2.22.3	 evam asat āśraya tvasya hetu dūṣaṇa tvam nirākṛtya vyadhikaraṇa tvasya api tad nirākurvāṇaḥ yadi vyadhikaraṇaḥ api hetuḥ syāt tadā atma anityaḥ kākasya kārṣyāt iti ayam api hetuḥ syāt iti atiprasaṅgāt vā vyadhikaraṇa tvasya hetu dūṣaṇa tvam aṅgīka tarvyam vyāpti abhāvāt vā pakṣa dharmatā bhāvāt vā iti vikalpam manasi nidhāya ādyam nirācaṣṭe vyāpta tvaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.23ab.1–3.2.23ab.3	 vyāpta tve vyāśraya tvam tu katham eva hi dūṣaṇam sādhanasya sādhyena vyāpta tve sati tena vibhinna āśraya tvam katham eva hi dūṣaṇam na kathañcid idam uktam bhavati kākasya kārṣṇyam vyāpti abhāvāt eva hi nitya tva asādhakam na punar vyadhikaraṇa tvam atas na ati prasaṅgaḥ kutas etat vyāpti ādi aṅga sākalye vyadhikaraṇa tva mātreṇa asādhaka tvasya kvāpi anupalambhāt ghaṭasya kṛtaka tvāt śabdaḥ anityate iti ādau dṛṣṭam iti ced ghaṭasya iti etat hetu viśeṣaṇam na vā ādye vaiyarthyam dvitīye katham asādhaka tvam anitya tva vyāptam api kṛtaka tvam ghaṭa vṛtti na śabde anitya tvam sādhayati iti ced na vyāpti abhāvāt tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ na kevalam vyāpti ādi aṅga sākalye vyadhikaraṇa tva mātreṇa duṣṭa tvam na dṛṣṭam kintu dṛṣṭam ca vyadhikaraṇasya api vyāpti ādi sampattimataḥ sādhaka tvam iti āha rohiṇī iti 
NSu_3.2.23c–3.2.23e.2	 rohiṇī udayaḥ āsannaḥ kṛttikā abhyuditāḥ yatas iti ukte sādhanam no kim nadī pūra darśanena uttara deśe vṛṣṭayanumānam pratyagra śarāva cakra bhrama darśanena kulāla asatti anumānam ca aśaṅkaya kenacid uktam na uttara deśaḥ atra pakṣaḥ kinnāma nadī tad dharmeṇa eva pūreṇa tad dharmasya vṛṣṭimat uttara deśa sambandhasya sādhya tvam evam śarāva cakra dharmābhyām pratyagra tva bhramābhyām tad dharmasya eva kulāla āsatteḥ anumānam iti atas idam udāharaṇa antara muditam na hi tatra iva iha rohiṇyāḥ kṛttikāyāḥ vā dvau dharmau sampādayitum śakyau 
NSu_3.2.23c–3.2.23e.4	 nanu iha api kālam pakṣīkṛtya prayoktavyam vimataḥ kālaḥ rohiṇī udaya asattimān kṛttika udaya vat kāla tvāt atīta kāla vat iti evam sati deśam kālam vā adāya sāmānādhikaraṇyasya sarvatra sattva advayadhi karaṇa asiddhaḥ eva na syāt iti vyartham tad parisaṅkhayānam evam aprayoge vyadhikaraṇa tvam sa avakāśam iti ced na tathā satya siddheḥ ukti doṣa tva abhāva prasaṅgāt naca ukti doṣa tvam api vyadhikaraṇa tayā ukteḥ api sādhya siddhayaṅga tva anubhavāt evam eva hi laukikānām uktayaḥ parīkṣakāḥ api hi tat prāmāṇyam apāta prāmāṇyāt a ityādi prayujyate tat idam uktam iti vyadhikaraṇa tayā ukte api etat vākyam sādhanam sādhya sidhi aṅgam no kim bhavati eva iti kiñca kāla ādikam ādāya prayoga vipariṇāmaḥ kāryaḥ iti atra naiyāyika ādi samayaḥ niyāmakaḥ kiṃvā pramāṇam asti ādyam dūṣayati na hi iti 
NSu_3.2.23.1–3.2.23.2	 na hi ājñā eva atra sādhakāḥ atra upapatti sādhye arthe ājñā eva samaya mātram tathā sati sarvam vāc mātreṇa eva upadeṣī avyam na punar kvāpi pramāṇam vācyam viparīta ājñayā sat pratipakṣatā ca syāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ ājñā khalu pramāṇāt para viṣaye dharma ādau bhavati sā ca avagata āpta bhāvānām na api dvitīyaḥ tad anupalambhāt 
NSu_3.2.23.3^1	 syāt etat vyāptiḥ tāvat anumāna aṅgam sambandha viśeṣaḥ ca vyāptiḥ na ca vyāśrayayoḥ sambandhaḥ yujyate atas vyāśraya tvasya doṣa tvāt sambhate viṣaye vipariṇāmaḥ iti mā evam avinā abhāva mātrasya vyāpti tvāt avinābhāvaḥ ca kvacid eka āśrayatām antar bhāvya bhavati yathā kṛtaka tvasya anitya tvena atas eva anya gatena tena na anyatra anitya tā siddhiḥ kvacid vibhinna āśrayayoḥ eva yathā dhūmasya agninā dhūma agnī khalu na samavāya vṛttyā samāna āśrayau na api saṃyoga vṛttyā ūrdhva adhas deśa saṃyogi tvāt tathā api eka parvata saṃyogitā dvayoḥ asti iti ced na 
NSu_3.2.23.3^2	 tathā sati agni arthinaḥ niyamena pradeśa viśeṣe pravṛtti anupapatteḥ dhūmaḥ eva dhūma tvena mūle agnimān sādhyate iti ced kim eṣā laukikī pratītiḥ āhosvit samaya siddhaye vipariṇāmaḥ kriyate na prathamaḥ laukikāḥ hi ūrdhva deśam dhūmavantam avalokya adhas deśam vahnim antam avagacchanti na dvitīyaḥ nirmūla tvāt api ca deha ādīnām tāvat pareṇa kṣaṇika tā svīkriyate tatra patana kam arṇā gurutva anumānam durghaṭam syāt na hi tayoḥ kālataḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt na api deśataḥ vibhinna dravya āśraya tvāt atas kasyacid vibhinna āśrayeṇa eva avinābhāvaḥ 
NSu_3.2.23.4	 nanu vyadhikaraṇasya pakṣa dharma tā na asti iti ced mā bhūt tat niyamasya nirnibandhana tvāt tathā sati sādhya niyata deśa tā katham siddhayet iti ced vaya āpti svabhāvāt iti brūmaḥ yathā hi yat kṛtakam tat anityam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam antar bhāvya vyāpteḥ kṛtaka tvam sva āśrayaḥ eva anitya tvam gamayati tathā kṛttikā udayaḥ vyadhikaraṇayā eva rohiṇī udaya asattyā vyāptaḥ iti tau tathā eva gamayati yathā ca sāmānādhikaraṇye api asti pradeśa ādi niyamaḥ tathā vaiyadhi karaṇye api iti kaḥ doṣaḥ tasmāt yatra idam tatra idam itivat yadā idam tat ā idam iti vat yat evam tat evam iti vat ca yadi idam tarhi idam iti vyāpti sambhavāt vyāpti anurodhena eva hetu siddheḥ āvaśyaka tayā pakṣa dharma tānā vaśyaka tvāt yuktam vyadhikaraṇasya api hetu tvam iti 
NSu_3.2.23.5	 tathā sādhya viśeṣaṇasya aprasiddhau= api tathā hi sādhya viśeṣaṇa śapra siddheḥ kutas dūṣaṇa tvāt kim viśvam sat asat vilakṣaṇam bādhya tvāt ityādeḥ api prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt uta sādhya viśeṣaṇa aprasiddhau tad sandeha anupapattau pakṣatvā anupapatteḥ hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tva anupapatti prasakteḥ athavā sādhya viśeṣaṇa aprasiddhau tena sādhanasya vyāpti prati iti anupapatti prasaṅgāt yat vā pratijñā vākyasya apratīta padārthaka tvena ābodhaka tva āpatteḥ ādyam dūṣayati anyat iti 
NSu_3.2.24ab.1–3.2.24ab.2^1	 anyat sat asatoḥ viśvam iti ca vyāhateramā sat na bhavati iti ukte asattvam uktam bhavet sattva pratikṣepa rūpa tvāt asattvasya punar asat na bhavati iti ukte sva vacana vyāhatiḥ evam asat na bhavati iti uktyā dvau nañau prakṛtam artham sa atiśayam gamayate iti sattvam labhyate punar sat na bhavati iti ukte sva vyāhatiḥ eva tat evam viśvam sat asatoḥ sakāśāt anyat sat asat ca na bhavati iti eṣā pratijñā sva vyāhateḥ eva amā sādhana aṅgam na bhavati na tu viśeṣaṇasya sat asat vailakṣaṇya lakṣaṇasya aprasiddha tvena kutas sva vyāhatiḥ hi me mātā vandhyā ityādau dūṣaṇa tvena sampratipannāḥ 
NSu_3.2.24ab.2^2–3.2.24ab.3	 sva vacana sva nyāya sva kriyā su asiddhānta pramāṇa antara apratihatāyāḥ eva ukteḥ sādhana dūṣaṇa aṅga tvāt na hi sva viṣa vimūrchitā bhujaṅgī param daśati na ca doṣa antara asaṅkīrṇam sādhya viśeṣaṇā siddheḥ udāharaṇam paśyāmaḥ yena doṣa tvam pratīmaḥ kasyacid asādhāraṇa dharmeṇa śaśa viṣāṇa ādimattva sādhanam api pramāṇam kin na syāt iti ced na tatra api dṛśya anupalambha bādhasya vidyamāna tvāt atīndriya saṃsagarsādhane na kaḥ api doṣaḥ iti ced na īśvara ādi saṃsargeṇa siddha sādhana tvāt evam anyatra api sampratipanna aprāmāṇye doṣa antaram anveṣaṇīyam tat idam uktam caśabdena atas eva vyāhateḥ iti upalakṣaṇam dvitīyam parācaṣṭe asiddhā iti 
NSu_3.2.24cd.1–3.2.24cd.2^1	 asiddha sādhane doṣaḥ kaḥ vyāptiḥ yadi vidyate sādhya aprasiddhayā yatra pakṣa dharma tva asiddhiḥ ucyate tatra vyāpti ādi itara aṅga sākalyam asti na vā na ced tatas eva anumānam duṣyam kim sādhya viśeṣaṇa aprasiddhayā yadi vyāpti ādikam vidyate tadā asiddha sādhane kaḥ doṣaḥ na kaḥ api ayam abhisandhiḥ hetoḥ hi pakṣa dharma tva asiddhiḥ tadā syāt yadi dharmī vā hetoḥ tad dharma tvam vā na syāt sandeha abhāvena pakṣa dharma tva asiddhiḥ tadā syāt yadi dharmī vā hetoḥ tad dharma tvam vā na syāt sandeha abhāvena pakṣatvā anupapattyā pakṣa dharmatā bhāve tu sva artha anumāna viśeṣa vilopaḥ syāt 
NSu_3.2.24cd.2^2	 yadā hi yaḥ dhūmavān asau= agni mān iti gṛhīta vyāptikaḥ giri śekhare dhūmam paśyan vyāptim smarati tadā utpadyate eva asya anumitiḥ na ca tasya agni sandehaḥ asti yadā ca āpta vacanāt viniścita parvata agni sambandhaḥ parvatam pratyāsīdandhūmam avalokayati tadā api tasya vinā sandehena agni anumitiḥ bhavati eva nahi sāmagrī buddhimatī yena yat mayā kartavyam tad anyena kṛtam iti paryālocya udāsīta na api chinne chidāyāḥ iva paricchinne pariccheda antara utpādaḥ ayuktaḥ na api para artha anumāne sandeha niyamaḥ viparyastasya api prativāditvā upapatteḥ atas eva siddha sādhakaḥ asaṅgataḥ eva na āśraya asiddhaḥ iti uktam 
NSu_3.2.24cd.3–3.2.24cd.4	 kiñca vidita tattvaḥ api yadā para parīkṣā artham tatra pramāṇam pṛcchati tadā prayuktam anumānam amānam syāt sandeha abhāvāt tasmāt sandigdha sādhyaḥ pakṣaḥ ityādyāḥ prācām vācaḥ sambhāvana abhiprāyāḥ paramārthataḥ tu anumiti viṣayaḥ eva pakṣaḥ atas sandeha abhāve pakṣatvā anupapatti abhāva at na aprasiddha sādhane pakṣa dharma tva asiddhi rūpaḥ doṣaḥ iti tṛtīyam nirākaroti vyāptiḥ ca iti 
NSu_3.2.25ab.1–3.2.25ab.2	 vyāptiḥ ca vyatirekeṇa tatra taiḥ ca eva gamyate tatra jīvāt śarīra jātam sa ātmakam prāṇa ādimattvāt bhūritarebhyaḥ bhidyate gandhavat tvāt īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ sa varkartṛ tvāt ityādau kevala vyatirekiṇi sādhana samūhe taiḥ aprasiddhaiḥ api sa ātmaka tva ādibhiḥ sādhyaiḥ vyāptiḥ ca asti na kevalam pakṣa dharma tā vyatirekeṇa sādhya abhāvasya sādhana abhāva vyāpta tvena liṅgena avagamyate ca sā 
NSu_3.2.25ab.3	 idam uktam bhavati sādhya viśeṣaṇa aprasiddhayā vyāpti pratītyabhāvam prasajjayataḥ vyāpti abhāvaḥ tathā hi kevala vyatireki anumānam pramāṇam na vā na iti pakṣe vakṣyāmaḥ ādye tasya vyāpti sadbhāvaḥ vyāpti avagamaḥ ca aṅgī kāryaḥ anyathā anumāna tva vyāghātāt na ca kevala vyatirekiṇi sādhyam prasiddham pakṣe prasiddhau siddha sādhana tvāt anyatra prasiddhau kevala vyatirekiṇi sādhyam prasiddham pakṣe prasiddhau siddha sādhana tvāt anyatra prasiddhau kevala vyatirekiṇi sādhyam prasiddham pakṣe prasiddhau siddha sādhana tvāt anyatra prasiddhau tatra hetoḥ vṛttau kevala vyatirekitva anupapatteḥ avṛttau= asādha araṇya prasaṅgāt atas śithila mūlaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vyatirekiṇaḥ kva vyāptiḥ kena ca avagamyate iti ced pakṣaḥ eva vyatirekeṇa avagamyate iti brūmaḥ pakṣa ādi pravibhāgāt prāc avagatā tatra eva vipratipattyā upadarśayitum aśakyā vyatirekeṇa upapādyate iti taiḥ iti bahuvacanena atiprasiddha tām prasaṅga vyāpti bhaṅgasya sūcayati 
NSu_3.2.25ab.4	 na kevalam kevala vyatireki sādhanasya sādhyena vyāptiḥ vyatirekeṇa tad avagamaḥ ca asmābhiḥ eva aṅgīkriyate kintva prasiddha viśeṣaṇa tva dūṣaṇa tva vādibhiḥ api kaiścid iti āha taiḥ ca iti avagamyate abhyupagamyate yathā ahuḥ yadi sādhyena asya kvacid api anvayaḥ na asti tadā viruddhaḥ eva ayam iti āśaṅkaya na upeya tvam anvayasya vyāsedhāmaḥ api tu upāya tvam ityādi tathā yathā ca vyatireka balāt anvaya siddhiḥ tathā vaiśeṣikaiḥ api upapādanīyam anyathā sādhya sādhanayoḥ avyāptau vyatirekiṇaḥ gamaka tva bhaṅgāt ityādi tathā ca aprasiddha viśeṣaṇasya api kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ vyāpti upapādanam aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tve vyāptyapratīti prasañjanam ca katham na vyāhatam iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_3.2.25ab.5	 yat uktam kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ vyāpti avagamāt paraiḥ abhyupagamāt ca na aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tve a pi vyāpti avagamāt paraiḥ abhyupagamāt ca na aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tve api vyāpti anavagatiḥ iti tat ayuktam yatas kevala vyatirekiṇī anyā eva gatiḥ ye hi sampratipanna pramāṇa bhāvāḥ kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ teṣu sāmānyatas anvaya vyāptiḥ eva abhidhātavyā tathā hi prāṇa ādimattvena jīvat śarīrasya sa ātmaka tve sādhye yat yat kāryavat tad tad kāraṇa vat yathā ahaṅkuravatī bhūmiḥ bījagarbhā iti tathā gandhavat tvena bhuvaḥ anya bheda sādhane yat yat asādhāraṇa dharma vat tat tatas bhidyate yathā abādi iti evam īśvarasya sarva kartṛ tvena sārvajña sādhane yaḥ yasya kartā sa tasya kāraṇam prayojanam ca jānāti yathā kulālaḥ iti evam śabdaḥ pṛthivī ādi aṣṭa dravya atirikta dravya āśritaḥ pṛthivī ādi vṛttau bādhaka upapanna tve sati guṇa tvāt ityādau yaḥ yat vṛttau bādhaka upapanna tve sati guṇaḥ sa tatas anya dravya vṛttiḥ yathā gandhaḥ ityādi rūpeṇa sāmānyatas vyāptiḥ abhidhātavyā 
NSu_3.2.25ab.6	 yat vā sāmānyatas viśeṣaṇa prasiddhim vidhāya kevala vyatirekī prayoktavyaḥ yathā jñāna tāratamyam kvacid viśrāntam tāratamya tvāt iti anena sāmānyatas sārvajña siddhau tasya īśvara sambandhaḥ kevala vyatirekiṇā sādhyate tathā iccha ādayaḥ kvacid āśritā guṇa tvāt rūpa vat yaḥ ca icchā ādīnām āśrayaḥ saḥ eva ātmā iti sāmānyena ātma siddhau tad sambandhaḥ jīvat śarīrasya kevala vyatirekiṇā sādhyate evam anyatra api yathāsambhava m ūhyam 
NSu_3.2.25ab.7	 kvacid pakṣa eka deśaḥ eva viśeṣaṇa prasiddhim āśritya kevala vyatirekī pravartate yathā pṛthivī itarebhyaḥ bhidyate pṛthivī tvāt na yat evam na tat evam yathā jala ādi iti atra ghaṭa ādau= eva viśeṣaṇa prasiddheḥ na aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā na ca evam sa pakṣa sambhavena kevala vyatireki tva bhaṅgaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ pakṣa eka deśa tvāt naca aṃśe siddha sādhana tā ekaikatra prasiddhau= api āparamāṇaroḥ ā ca bhū golakāt asiddheḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.25ab.8–3.2.25ab.9	 abhāvaḥ vā kevala vyatirekiṇā sādhyaḥ bhāve hi pratipādye vyatireka vyāptau tad abhāvasya pratiyogi pratīti sāpekṣa tayā viśeṣaṇa prasiddha yapekṣā abhāve tu sādhye na ayam doṣaḥ abhāva abhāvasya bhāva tvena pratiyogi nirapekṣa tvāt evam anye api ukti viśeṣa prakārāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ teṣu anyatamasya api abhāve aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā dūṣaṇam eva atas na kevala vyatireki prāmāṇyam avalambya aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tā dūṣaṇa tvam nirasanīyam iti atas āha aprasiddhasya iti 
NSu_3.2.25c–3.2.25f.2	 aprasiddhasya sādhyasya sādhaka tvam yat eṣyate liṅgasya uktau viśeṣaḥ ayam kena mānena gamyate sādhyasya iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī liṅgasya iti kartari ayam iti buddhi stha parāmarśaḥ bhavet etat yadi ayam kevala vyatirekiṇī ukti viśeṣaḥ kāryaḥ iti atra niyāmakam syāt na ca etat asti tathā hi kim anena ukti viśeṣeṇa kevala vyatireki sādhyam anvayitām nīyate uta na iti vaktavyam na ādyaḥ ukteḥ artha tathātva parivartaka tva asambhavāt na hi sahasreṇa api uktīnām naraḥ vānarīkartum śakyate śakya tve vā kevala vyatireki prāmāṇyam tyaktam syāt dvitīyasya idam uktam yadā liṅgasya aprasiddhasya sādhyasya sādhaka tvam iṣyate yat yukti viśeṣaṇā api liṅgam kevala vyatireki sādhya sādhakam eva na anvayitām āpadyate iti iṣyate iti yāvat tadā ayam uktau viśeṣaḥ kena mānena kartavya tayā jñāyate na kena api atas aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ eva kevala vyatirekī sādhakaḥ ca iti na aprasiddha viśeṣaṇa tvasya doṣa tvam iti 
NSu_3.2.25c–3.2.25f.3	 asti eva ukti viśeṣasya kartavyatāyām niyāmakam tathā hi yadi api ukti viśeṣaḥ na vyatirekiṇam anvayinam karoti tathā api liṅgasya sādhyena vyāptiḥ tāvat aśyambhāvinī na ca sā kevala vyatirekiṇi sākṣāt uparśayitum śakyāḥ anvaya grahaṇa sthalasya vipratipattyā pratiruddha tvāt atas sādhya vyatirekasya sādhana vyatirekeṇa vipakṣe vyāptim pradarśya upapādanīyāḥ 
NSu_3.2.25c–3.2.25f.5	 yadi vā vyatireka vyāptiḥ eva sādhya siddheḥ aṅgam tathā api tad grahaḥ avaśyambhāvī vyatirekaḥ ca pratiyogi pratīti adhīna pratītikaḥ eva pratiyoginau ca liṅga sādhya dharmau tatra liṅgam pakṣe pratītam eva sādhya dharmaḥ ca na pakṣe pratītaḥ na api anyatra tat katham vyatirekayoḥ api vyāptiḥ gṛhyatām etaiḥ tu ukti viśeṣaiḥ kathañcid pratiyoginaḥ sādhya dharmasya buddhi sthatāyām sukaraḥ vyāpti grahaḥ syāt pratijñā vākyam ca evam avidita padārthakam na prasajyate iti atas āha sādhanam iti 
NSu_3.2.26.1–3.2.26.2	 sādhanam paramāṇu ādeḥ yadā siddhasya ca iṣyate yathā anubhavam eva etat na aṅgīkāryam kutas tadā paramāṇu kāraka tām kāryāṇām abhyupagacchatā vaiśeṣika ādinā paramāṇu sadbhāvaḥ sādhyate tathā pradhāna upādāna tām vadatā sāṅkhayena pradhāna sadbhāvaḥ evam anyat api samavāya ādikam tad aṅgī kāribhiḥ samarthyate tatra pṛcchāmaḥ yaḥ paramāṇu ādikam abhyupaiti tam prati tad sadbhāvaḥ sādhyate uta na santi paramāṇavaḥ iti tad abhāvam abhyupagacchantam prati na ādyaḥ siddhasya sādhana ayogāt dvitīye tu abuddhayā ārūḍhasya paramāṇu ādeḥ sādhanāya katham vādinaḥ prayatnaḥ katham ca tad abhāvam paraḥ manyeta pratiyoginaḥ avidita tvāt 
NSu_3.2.26.3	 atha manyase kaṇāda ādi upadeśena sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa sva artha anumānena vā svayam avagatam paramāṇu ādikam vādinā śakyataḥ eva sādhayitum vādi vākyena ca pratiyoginaḥ paramāṇu ādeḥ avagame tad abhāva abhimatiḥ prativādinaḥ yuktā eva na hi pramāṇena eva pratiyogī jñātavyaḥ iti niyamaḥ asti śaśa viṣāṇa ādi a bhāva pratītya anupapatti prasaṅgāt iti 
NSu_3.2.26.4–3.2.26.5	 yadi evam atyanta aprasiddhasya api paramāṇu ādeḥ anubhava mārgam anatikramya sādhanam iṣyate tadā etat vayatiḥ eki sādhya sādhanam api anubhava anusāreṇa eva kutas na aṅgīkāryam tathā hi pratyakṣeṇa upadeśena vāsā dhāraṇau dharmau= ekatra upalabdhavataḥ tatas anyatra savartrā api tad abhāva upalambha sambhave vyatireka vyāpti grahaḥ tāvat vādinaḥ sukaraḥ eva prativādinaḥ api vādi vākya avagata pratiyoginaḥ tad abhāva avagama sambhavāt vyatireka vyāpti grahaḥ sambhavati eva tathā ca prāk ukta rītyā anvaya samarthanena aprasiddha sādhya sādhane sambhavati kim etābhiḥ kliṣya kalpa nābhiḥ evaṃca na pratijñā vākyasya avidita padārthaka tva prasaṅgaḥ vādinā tad arthasya vyutpādita tvāt iti upasaṃharati yatra iti 
NSu_3.2.27.1–3.2.27.2	 yatra na ati prasaṅgaḥ asti mānam na ca viparyate kliṣṭa kalpanayā eva atra sādhyam iti ati durvacaḥ viṣaye kevala vyatirekiṇi evam sāmānya anvaya abhidhāna ādinā sādhanam kāryam iti niyāmakam na asti vyāpti pratīti ādeḥ anyathā siddha tvāt ṛjunā anubhava anusāriṇā mārgeṇa siddhayataḥ arthasya vakreṇa anā anubhāvikena sādhana ayogāt viparyaye tathā sādhana akaraṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ ca na asti sva vyāhati ādinā eva aparasya ābhāsa tvāt atra kliṣya kalpa nayā eva sādhya sādhanam kāryam iti atiduṣyam vākyam iti anena viśiṣya vyatirekam āśritya yā mahāvidyā ādi vakrarītiḥ sā api apāstā veditavyā 
NSu_3.2.27.3–3.2.27.4	 bhavet etat yadi kevala vyatireki anumānam bhavet naca evam pakṣa dharma tvam sa pakṣe sattvam vipakṣā dvayā vṛttiḥ abādhita viṣaya tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam ca iti pañca rūpa upapannam khalu anumānam bhavati na ca kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ tat asti sa pakṣa abhāvena sa pakṣe sattva abhāvāt na ca evam kevala anvayinaḥ api vipakṣa abhāvena vipakṣā dvaya āvṛtteḥ abhāvāt ananumāna tva prasaṅgaḥ iti vācyam anvaya vyatirekavataḥ eva anumāna tvena aniṣya abhāvāt iti dvitīyam āśaṅkayā āha pariśeṣaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.28a–3.2.28e.2	 pariśeṣaḥ mithas siddhiḥ cakraka sva āśraya ādayaḥ asiddha sādhaka tvena pañca avayava tām vinā aṅgīkāryāḥ samastaiḥ prasakta pratiṣedhe pariśiṣyamāṇe buddhiḥ pariśeṣaḥ dvayoḥ paraspara apekṣayā utpattiḥ jñaptiḥ vā mithas siddhiḥ bahūnām cakra vat itara itara apekṣayā utpatti ādikam cakrakam svāpekṣam sva utpatti ādi sva āśrayaḥ ādipadena anavasthā sā ca anavasthita asiddha utpādaka ādi parampara apekṣā asiddha sādhaka tvena hetunā pañca avayava tām pañca rūpa upapanna tām aṅgīkāryāḥ anumāna tvena samastaiḥ vādibhiḥ na khalu kaḥ api vādī pariśeṣa ādīn anādṛtya parīkṣāyām pravṛttaḥ asti 
NSu_3.2.28a–3.2.28e.3^1	 etat uktam bhavati pariśeṣa ādīni tāvat anumānāni vyāpya jñānāt vayāpaka jñānam iti tad lakṣaṇa ākrānta tvāt pramāṇa prapañca rucibhiḥ api anumānāt bahis bhāvena tad prāmāṇyasya anabhyupagata tvāt ca tāni ca asiddhasya eva sādhyasya sādhakāni śabdasya hi pṛthivī ādi aṣṭa saṃsarge pratiṣiddhe pariśeṣāt tad atirikta dravya āśrita tvam siddhayati na ca prāc ākāśa siddheḥ pṛthivī ādi atiriktam dravyam siddham yena tad āśrita tva kvacid prasiddham syāt yat yasya kāryam pramitam pareṇa aṅgīkṛtam vā tasya tad kāryatām aṅgīkurvāṇam prati mithas siddhiḥ ucyate na ca sā kvacid prasiddhā 
NSu_3.2.28a–3.2.28e.3^2–3.2.28e.4	 dvayoḥ api paraspara apekṣayā pūrva bhāvi tvam sā iti pakṣe api tathā etena cakrakam vyākhyātam asya eva ghaṭasya etat kārya tvami upagacchantam prati sva āśraya tvam abhidhīyate svasya eva sva apekṣayā pūrva bhāvi tvam paścāt bhāvi tvam ca aprasiddham eva asiddhasya eva kāraṇa tām bruvāṇam pratyanavasthā ucyate na ca kvacid kārye anavasthita asiddha kāraṇa paramparā siddhāḥ sāmānyatas prasiddhiḥ tu kevala vyatirekiṇī api samānāḥ asiddha sādhaka tvena ca eṣām pañca rūpa upapanna tā na asti tathā ca anumānānām api eṣām pañca rūpa upapanna tva abhāvāt vyatireki na anumānam pañca rūpa tā vaidhuryāt iti anaikāntikam iti dūṣaṇa antaram āha tat niyamaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.28f.1–3.2.28f.3	 tat niyamaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ anumāne pañca rūpa upapanna tā niyamasya nirnibandhana tvāt atādṛśasya api anumāna tve bādhaka abhāvāt ca aprayojakaḥ ayam hetvābhāsaḥ nanu epām rūpāṇām vyāpti pakṣa dharma taupāyika tvāt asiddhayā ādi hetvābhāsa pañcaka vyudāsa artha tvāt ca katham nirnibandhana tā katham ca vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvaḥ ukta prayojanā siddheḥ eva bādhaka tvāt sa pakṣe sattvam vinā api anumāna tve bhūḥ nityā gandhavat tvāt itya ādeḥ asādhāraṇasya api anumāna tvam syāt iti ced na sa pakṣa sadbhāva asadbhāvābhyām bheda siddheḥ iti evam āśraya asiddhayā ādeḥ adūṣaṇa tvam upapādya yat uktaṃparihare api siddha tvam dūṣaṇam a iti tat ayuktam vāde nigraha sthāna abhāvasya ukta tvāt iti āśaṅkām pariharati siddhā iti 
NSu_3.2.29ab.1–3.2.29ab.3	 sidda sa adhana tāyām ca na kathā avasitiḥ bhavet yathā siddha praśna ādau na vāda kathā avasitiḥ bhavet kintu tattva nirṇaya virodhi tvāt udbhāvya tyājanīyam eva evam siddha sādhana tāyām ca iti arthaḥ tad anyasya siddha tā eva hi sādhikāa iti anena hetoḥ vyāpti asiddhiḥ sva rūpa asiddhiḥ ca dūṣaṇam iti sūcitam tatra kecid ācakṣate dvividham vyāpti abhāva ādikam vādi prativādinoḥ anyatara matena ubhaya matena ca iti anye tu manyante anyatarāvyāpti ādikam nāma na asti eva vastu vikalpā sambhavāt iti tatra kintattvam iti ākāṅkṣāyām āha vyabhicāraḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.29cd.1–3.2.29cd.3	 vyabhicāraḥ hetu asiddhiḥ eka pakṣe api dūṣaṇam atra vyabhicāraḥ iti avyāpti mātra upalakṣaṇam na kevalam ubhaya pakṣe kintu vādi prativādinoḥ ekasya pakṣe api vyabhicāraḥ hetu asiddhiḥ ca hetoḥ dūṣaṇam eva yadi api vastutas anyatara vyabhicāra ādikam na sambhavati tathā api prāk vastu tattva avadhāraṇa āda abhimānikam sambhavati eva tathā ca hetu sāmarthya sandehe api ahetu tvam āvaśyakam eva vyāpti ādi nimittayā niścitasya eva hetu tvāt iti tad anyasya iti anena dṛṣṭāntasya api sādhya ādimattvena asiddhiḥ dūṣaṇam iti sūcitam kecid ācakṣate dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ nāma na santi teṣām yathāyogam hetu doṣeṣu eva antarbhūta tvāt iti tān pratyāha sādhyeti 
NSu_3.2.30ab.1–3.2.30ab.3	 sādhya sādhana vaikalyam dṛṣṭāntasya dūṣaṇam iti vartate sādhya vaikalya ādeḥ hetvābhāsa antarbhāve api dṛṣṭānta āśraya tayā spaṣṭa pratibhāsa tvāt pratibhāsa anusāreṇa eva udbhāvya tvāt udbhāvanā artha tvāt ca vyutpādanasya dṛṣṭānta doṣa tvam yuktam iti bhāvaḥ dṛṣṭānta doṣān= ca kecid aṣṭau= ācakṣate sādhya vaikalyam sādhana vaikalyam ubhaya vaikalyam āśraya hīna tvam iti catvāraḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ sādhya avyāvṛttiḥ sādhana avyāvṛttiḥ ubhayā vi āvṛttiḥ āśraya hīna tvam iti catvāraḥ vaidhamyardṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ iti tat na iti āha sādhyeti siddhe satya ārambhaḥ niyama arthaḥ sādhya sādhana vaikalyam eva dṛṣṭāntasya dūṣaṇam na aparam iti arthaḥ tathā hi ubhaya vaikalyam tāvat pṛthak na vācyam ekaika vaikalyena eva dṛṣṭāntasya duṣṭa tve samudita kalpanā vaiyarthyāt anyathā ekaika vaikalyasya dūṣaṇa tva aṅgīkāra bhaṅgāt sambhava mātreṇa pṛthak vacane anaikāntika kālatīta tvam nāma hetvābhāsa antaram vācyam syāt āśraya hīna tvam ca āśraya siddhi samānam vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ nāma na asti eva iti prāk eva prapañcitam iti 
NSu_3.2.30ab.4–3.2.30ab.6	 yat vā dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya sādhana vaikalyam api vyabhicāra asi vat ubhaya anyatara rītyā dvividham pratipattavya na punar ekavidham eva abhimānataḥ dvaividhyasya api sambhavāt iti āha sādhyeti eka pakṣe api dūṣaṇam iti anuvartate hetoḥ vyartha viśeṣaṇa tvam vyartha viśeṣya tvam ca na dūṣaṇam vyāpti pakṣa dharma tayoḥ apratihateḥ iti kecid tān pratyāha viśeṣaṇaḥ iti viśeṣaṇe datte sati yat vaiyarthyam viśeṣyasya viśeṣaṇasya vā tat api hetoḥ dūṣaṇam eva vyāpti upayogi tayā hi hetau viśeṣaṇam upadīyate vaiyarthye tu viśiṣyasya vyāpya tva abhāva ādi uktam hetu doṣa tvam iti yat vā siddha praśna ādikam iti vakṣyamāṇa tvāt ādhikya antargatam etat sarvathā hetu doṣa tvam siddham vyartha viśeṣaṇa tva ādikam api ubhayā anyatara rītyā dvividham pratipattavyam na punar ekavidham eva iti āha viśeṣaṇaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.30bc.1–3.2.30cd.2	 viśeṣaṇe vaiyathī arm eka pakṣe api dūṣaṇam iti vartate viśeṣaṇā siddhiḥ viśeṣya asiddhiḥ ca hetu doṣaḥ na bhavati na hi viśeṣaṇa mātram viśeṣya mātram vā hetuḥ yena tad asiddhiḥ hetoḥ dūṣaṇam syāt iti eke tān pratyāha eka siddhau ca iti  ekā siddhau ca viśiṣṭa asiddhiḥ eva hi viśiṣyaḥ hetuḥ na viśeṣaṇa ādi mātram viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ ekasya asiddhau= api viśiṣyasya asiddhiḥ eva prasiddhā daṇḍa mātra abhāve puruṣa mātra abhāve vā daṇḍinaḥ abhāva darśanāt atas viśeṣaṇā siddhayā ādau= api viśiṣya hetu asiddheḥ avarjanīya tvādi uktam tasya hetu doṣa tvam tat ca ubhayā anyatara rītyā dvividham iti pūrvavat siddham eva iti eka abhāve ca ityādi anuktvā eka asiddhau ca iti vacanam asiddhiḥ ca dvividhā svarūpa tā jñānataḥ ca iti sūcanā artham tat evam vyartha viśeṣaṇā siddhayā ādeḥ hetu doṣa tvadyuktam para parigaṇitā siddhi bhedeṣu āśraya asiddhayā ādi trayasya eva adoṣa tva kathanam iti 
NSu_3.2.30cd.3	 yat uktam praśna doṣāḥ catvāraḥ iti tatra vaiphalyasya asaṅgateḥ ca doṣa tvam ayuktam aśakya udbhāvana tvāt tathā hi śabdaḥ anityaḥ asmad ādi bāhya indriya grāhya tvāt iti prayukte paraḥ pṛcchati sāmānyam nityam anityam vā iti tatra vaiphalya udbhāvane niranuyojya anuyogena paraḥ nigṛhṇīyāt sāmānya nitya tvam ubhaya sammatam kṛtvā tatra anaikāntika tva udbhāvanasya prayojanasya pareṇa abhisandhātum api ucita tvāt tatra eva prayoge paraḥ pṛcchati sāmānyam anugata dam na vā iti tatra āsaṅga ti udbhāvane niranuyoga jya anuyogaḥ syāt anugata tvena nitya tvam prasādhya tatra anaikāntika tvam vakṣyāmi iti evam upodghāta lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṅgateḥ api pareṇa abhipretam ucita tvāt naca aśakyā udbhāvanam dūṣaṇam nāma iti atas āha aprayojana tā iti 
NSu_3.2.31ab.1–3.2.31cd.2	 aprayojaka tā tatra prathama praśna dūṣaṇam tatra praśna doṣeṣu aprayojana tā yadi api uttara praśneṣu avadhārayitum aśakyā tathā api prathama praśne sambhāvitāḥ dūṣaṇa tvena udbhāvayitum śakyataḥ eva na hi kathā upakrame pradhāna prameya praśnam apahāya evaṃvidhaḥ praśnaḥ sambhavati iti anena eva nyāyena asaṅgatiḥ api sarvathā saṅgati anupalambhaḥ eva udbhāvyā iti draṣṭavyam nanu evam sati ṣaṣ eva nigraha sthānāni iti bhajyeta sva vyāhati asaṅgatyoḥ virodha asaṅgatyantarbhāve api siddhārtha tā vaiphalyayoḥ atirikta tvāt iti atas āha siddhā iti siddha praśna ādikam yat tad ādhikya anta gartam bhavet dūṣaṇa antar bhāva kathana prasaṅgena prāc ukta pramāṇa tritva niyama siddhaye paraiḥ pṛthak pramāṇa tvena aṅgīkṛtānām artha apatti ādīnām uktā antarbhāvam āha arthāpatti iti 
NSu_3.2.32ab.1–3.2.32ab.2^1	 arthāpatti upama abhāvāḥ anumā antargatāḥ anupapadyamāna darśanāt upapādake buddhiḥ arthāpattiḥ yathā jīvataḥ gṛha abhāva darśanāt bahis bhāva buddhiḥ tatra jīvataḥ gṛha abhāvasya anupapadyamāna tā nāma kim sarvathā sambhavaḥ kim bahis bhāvena vinā anavasthānam ādye dahana śaityam api anumāna ābhāsāt pratītam kim kam api artham na bodhayet tad pratītiḥ bhrāntiḥ iti ced sarvathā sambhavataḥ gṛha abhāvasya api pratītiḥ katham na bhrāntiḥ dahana śaityasya upapādakam na asti iti ced na sarvathā api asambhavataḥ gṛha abhāvasya api tad anupapatteḥ dvitīye vyāptiḥ eva sā iti vyāpya darśanāt vayāpaka buddhiḥ arthāpattiḥ anumānam eva 
NSu_3.2.32ab.2^2	 pramāṇa dvaya virodhaḥ anupapattiḥ iti ced na prakṛta udāharaṇe tad abhāvāt virodhaḥ hi tadā syāt yadi jīvati iti asya gṛhe asti iti arthaḥ syāt yadi vā gṛhe na asti iti asya na jīvati iti arthaḥ syāt na ca tat asti svasmin= eva anyathā bhāva adarśanāt yaḥ hi mātā pitṛbhyām su śikṣitaḥ na jātu gṛhāt nirgacchati saḥ anyān api tathā manyamānaḥ jīvana pramāṇasya gṛhe sattvam eva artham pratipādyate iti evam tarhi sandihānaḥ avatiṣṭheta na tu bahirbhāvam niścinuyāt anyathā prakaraṇa samena api kiñcid avadhārayet 
NSu_3.2.32ab.3–3.2.32ab.4	 etena etat api nirastam yat āhuḥ anumāna tva pakṣe kim bahirbhāve jīvana mātram liṅgam uta gṛha abhāva mātram athavā viśiṣyam na prathama dvitīyau vyabhicārāt na tṛtīyaḥ viruddhayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva anupapatteḥ avirodha pratīteḥ ca bahis bhāva kalpanā uttara kālīna tvena itaretara āśraya āpatteḥ iti jīvana graha abhāvayoḥ virodhasya abhāvāt bhāve vār atha āpatteḥ api anupapatteḥ atas avinā abhāva balena artha pratīti hetu tvāt arthāpattiḥ anumānam eva etena kevala vyatirekī pariśeṣaḥ ca artha āpattiḥ eva na anumānam iti api nirastam 
NSu_3.2.32ab.5–3.2.32ab.6	 gṛhyamāṇe vastuni smaryamāṇa pratiyogika sādṛśya darśanāt smaryamāṇe gṛhyamāṇa pratiyogika sādṛśya pratītiḥ upamānam yathā gām anubhūya vanam gataḥ gavaye go sādṛśyam upalabhya gavi gavaya sādṛśyam pratyeti yadi api na etat smaraṇam pratiyoginaḥ gavayasya prāk ananubhūta tvena go gata sādṛśyasya ananubhūta tvāt na hi sāma gṣa bhāve yogya indriya sannikarṣa sadbhāva mātreṇa anubhavaḥ śakyaḥ aṅgīkartum pratiyogi jñānasya anvaya vyatirekābhyām sādṛśya pratītau hetu tvam avadhṛtam eva nirvikalpaka pratīti abhyupagamaḥ tu aprāmāṇikaḥ eva tathā api yaḥ yat sadṛśaḥ sa tad sadṛśaḥ iti vyāpti balena gamaka tvāt anumānam eva vyadhikaraṇa tvāt na iti ced tasyāt oṣa tāyāḥ nirūpita tvāt eka adhikaraṇa tāyāḥ śakya sampādana tvāt ca tasmāt vaisādṛśya darśana vat sādṛśya darśanam api na pṛthak pramāṇam 
NSu_3.2.32ab.7^1	 anye tu saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pramiti phalam anadhigata saṅgati saṃjñā smaraṇa sahāyam tad samabhivyāhṛta atideśa vākya artha pratyabhijñānam upamānam atideśa vākya arthaḥ ca kvacid sādharmyam kvacid vaidharmyam kvacid dharma mātram iti trividhaḥ bhavati yathā vyutpannaga vaya padārthaḥ go sadṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti atideśa vākya anubhūtam artham pratyakṣe gavaye pratyabhijñānam gavaya padam smaran gavaya padasya gavaye saṅgatim avagacchati tat idam sādharmya upamānam vaidharmya upamānam tu gavā ādi vat dviśaphaḥ na bhavati aśvaḥ iti vākya artha pratyabhijñānāt aśve aśva pada saṅgati grahaṇam 
NSu_3.2.32ab.7^2–3.2.32ab.8	 dharma mātra upamānam api dīrgha grīva tva ādi dharmavān paśuḥ uṣṣaḥ iti vākya artha pratyabhijñānāt uṣṣa pada vyutpattiḥ iti manyante tatra yadi api saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratipattiḥ prāk gavaya ādi darśanāt ati deśa vākyena prayoga ādinā liṅgena vā bhavitum na arhati sambandhinaḥ anavagame sambandhasya avagantum aśakyatvāt tathā api gavaya ādi darśana uttara kālam sādharmya ādinā liṅgena eva bhaviṣyati etasyām daśāyām atideśa vākyam vyāpti grāhaka tvena upayujyate yathā hi pṛthivī tva abhisambandhāt pṛthivī iti vyavahartavyā iti śrutavataḥ pṛthivī tva abhisambandham kvacid dravye paśyataḥ anumānena eva saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratipattiḥ abhyupagatā tathā prakṛte api iti katham idam pṛthak pramāṇam syāt iti ghaṭa ādi pratyakṣa yogya artha pratiyogika abhāva pratīti sādhanam pramāṇam abhāvaḥ tat ca anupalabdhi lakṣaṇam liṅgam eva iti abhāvaḥ api na anumānāt bhidyate atas yuktam trīṇi eva pramāṇāni iti tat kim abhāvaḥ niyamena anumāna antargataḥ iti atas āha kvacid iti 
NSu_3.2.32bc.1–3.2.32d.3	 kvacid pratyakṣa antargataḥ abhāvaḥ kadācid haṭa ādya bhāva grāhakam pratyakṣam api bhavati iti arthaḥ kim tarhi pratyakṣa yogya arthānām sarveṣām api abhāvaḥ pramāṇa dvaya vedyaḥ iti atas āha sukha ādeḥ iti  sukha ādeḥ niyamena ca caḥ tu arthaḥ sukha ādeḥ āntarasya sākṣi vedyasya abhāvaḥ tu niyamena sākṣi pratyakṣeṇa eva grāhyaḥ iti arthaḥ yat vā abhāvaḥ iti pramāṇam eva ucyate tasya sukha ādeḥ iti paramparayā sambandhaḥ niyamena pratyakṣa antargataḥ iti sambandhaḥ anena bāhyānām pratyakṣa yogyānām ghaṭa ādīnām abhāvaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna vedyaḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam ekasya eva jñānasya svatantra kāraṇa dvaya janya tva anupapatteḥ paraspara viruddha parokṣa aparokṣa tva lakṣaṇa ākāra dvaya prāpteḥ ca iti atas uktam kvacid iti tathā api anupapattiḥ eva pratyakṣa grāhye arthe anumānān avakāśāt iti ataḥ āha anyatra iti 
NSu_3.2.33a.1–3.2.33a.2	 anyatra khaḍiti prāptaḥ sukha ādeḥ anyatra ghaṭa ādau pratiyogini sati yaḥ abhāvaḥ abhāva pramāṇam khaḍiti prāpnoti tad pratyakṣam yat tu vilambena jāyate tad anumānam iti etat uktam bhavati ghaṭa ādi abhāva grāhakam yogyā anupalabdhi rūpam pramāṇam pṛthak eva iti mīmāṃsakāḥ anupalabdhi liṅgakam anumānam eve tat iti saugatāḥ tat ubhayam api anupapannam pratiyogi smaraṇavataḥ purovartini bhū tale ghaṭa ādi abhāvasya pratyakṣeṇa evagamyamāna tvāt indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinaḥ abhāva pratyayasya apratyakṣa phala tva anupapatteḥ aparokṣa kāra tvasya anubhava siddha tvāt bādhaka abhāvāt ca anyatra upakṣaya kalpanā anupapatteḥ anyathā rūpa ādi jñāne api pramāṇa antara kalpanā prasaṅgāt liṅga darśana vyāpti smaraṇa ādi vilambena vinā khaḍiti jāyamānasya anumāna phala tva anupapatteḥ liṅgasya jñātasya eva karaṇa tvāt anupalabdheḥ api abhāva tvena anupalabdhi antara apekṣāyām anavasthā prasaṅgāt ca 
NSu_3.2.33a.3–3.2.33a.4	 nanu ca prātar catvara ādau pratiyogi smaraṇa abhāvena gaja ādi abhāvaṃmananubhūya deśa antaram gataḥ gaja smṛtimān prātar catvare gajaḥ na āsīt iti pratipadyate na tatra pratyakṣasya avakāśaḥ iti anupalabdhi lakṣaṇam pṛthak pramāṇam tatra aṅgīkāryam iti mā evam tatra abhāvasya apratyakṣa tve api anupalabdhi liṅgaka anumāna vedya tā abhyupagamāt anupalabdheḥ ca smaraṇa abhāva liṅga anumeya tvāt atas eva tatra kṣaṇam dhyātvā na āsīt catvare gajaḥ iti pratipadyate smaraṇa abhāvaḥ api anupalabdhi antara anumeyaḥ iti anavasthā iti api na asti sākṣi grāhyāṇām buddhi sukha ādīnām avabhāvasya niyamena sākṣi vedya tvāt iti tathā api upakrama upasaṃhārau= abhyāsa apūvartāphala artha vādāḥ pramāṇāni santi iti katham tat tritva niyamaḥ iti atas āha prārambha ādyāḥ ca iti 
NSu_3.2.33b.1–3.2.33cd.3	 prārambha ādyāḥ ca yuktayaḥ yuktayaḥ anumānāni kutas iti atas āha āgama iti āgama artha a= asiti arthāḥ niyata vyāptayaḥ akhilāḥ yatas akhilāḥ prārambha ādyāḥ niyata vyāptayaḥ yaḥ yatra prārabhyate sa tatra pratipādya ityādi rūpām vyāptim apekṣamāṇāḥ eva āgama arthau= asiti arthāḥ bhavanti atas yuktayaḥ eva iti arthaḥ etena āgama antarbhāvaḥ api nirastaḥ upakrama ādyāḥ āgama viṣayāḥ eva na ca arthāpatti upama abhāvāḥ iti yoga vibhāgaḥ vākya ādīnām api pramāṇānam anumāna antarbhāvam āha vākyam iti 
NSu_3.2.34ab.1–3.2.34ab.3	 vākyam prakaraṇam sthānam samākhyā ca tathāvidhāḥ yatas vākya ādayaḥ api tathāvidhāḥ vyāptim apekṣya eva āgama artha a= asiti arthāḥ tatas tathāvidhā yuktayaḥ eva iti arthaḥ upakrama ādīnām uttarottaram prābalyam vākya ādīnām tu pūrva pūrvam iti jñāpanāya yoga vibhāgaḥ yadi upakramāt ayaḥ vākya ādayaḥ ca anumāne antarbhavanti tarhi katham upakrama upasaṃhārau= abhyāsaḥ apūrvatā phalam arthavāda upapattī ca liṅgam tātparyanirṇaye a iti upakrama ādīnām anumāna apara paryāya upapatteḥ pṛthaktvena uktiḥ te tathā aśrutiḥ liṅgam samākhyā ca vākyam prakaraṇam tathā a iti vākya ādīnām liṅgāt ityataḥ āha kuru pāṇḍava vat iti 
NSu_3.2.34cd.1–3.2.34cd.3	 kuru pāṇḍava vat teṣām upapatteḥ pṛthak vacaḥ yathā pāṇḍavānām kurutve api sāmānya viśeṣa apekṣayā santāna bījam kuru pāṇḍavānām a ityādau kurubhyaḥ pṛthak vacanam tathā teṣām upakrama ādīnām vākya ādīnām ca anumāna tve api upapatteḥ liṅgāt ca pṛthak vacanam yuktam iti arthaḥ nanu tathā api śākuna lipi akṣara ceṣya asamba vaitihya pariśeṣāḥ pṛthak pramāṇāni santi iti ced śākuna lipi akṣara ceṣyānām antarbhāvasya na vilakṣaṇa adhikaraṇe sūcita tvāt sambhava eti hyayoḥ anumāna āgama antarbhāvasya sarva vādi sampratipanna tvāt pariśeṣasya ca pariśeṣaḥ mithas siddhiḥ a iti anena eva anumāna tvasya sthita tvāt 
NSu_3.2.34cd.4–3.2.34cd.5	 nanu tathā api jaināḥ tarkam pṛthak pramāṇam āhuḥ satyam mithassisiddhirī iti ādinā saḥ api anumāna antargataḥ iti sūcitam eva atra āha tarkaḥ pramāṇam eva na bhavati kutas anumānam tathā hi aniṣya prasañjanam tarkaḥ aniṣyam ca dvividham prāmāṇika parityāgaḥ aprāmāṇika svīkāraḥ ca iti sa pañcavidhaḥ ātma āśraya anyoni āśraya cakrakānavasthā pramāṇa bādhita artha prasaṅga bhedāt tatra prasaṅgaḥ nāma vyāpya aṅgīkāre aniṣya vyāpaka prasañjanam 
NSu_3.2.34cd.6	 saḥ ayam tarkaḥ pramāṇānām anugrāhakaḥ anugrahaḥ ca pramāṇa viṣaya sambhāvana ādi rūpaḥ tathā hi bhū tale ghaṭaḥ kinna syāt iti viparīta śaṅkayā kuṇṭhita śaktikam pratyakṣam na tāvat ghaṭā bhāvam niśninuyāt yāvat yat yatra ghaṭaḥ abhaviṣyat tadā bhū talam iva adrakṣyata tad tulya darśana sāmagrīka tvāt iti tarkeṇa viparīta śaṅkā na apanīyate tarkaḥ hi durjanaḥ iva para abhilaṣitam vicchidya ghaṭa abhāvam sambhāvayati atha idānīm pratyakṣam su janaḥ iva sva prameyam niścinoti 
NSu_3.2.34cd.7	 evam kvacid vayabhicāra śaṅkayā upādhi śaṅkayā vā dhūmavān api parvataḥ agnimān mā bhūt iti pakṣe vipakṣa śaṅkayā anumāne kuṇṭhite yadi niragnikaḥ syāt parvataḥ tadā nirdhūmaḥ api syāt ityādi rūpaḥ tarkaḥ pravartate sa hi upādhi koṭau tad āyatta vyabhicāra koṭau vāniṣyam upajanayan viparīta icchām vicchinatti tatas ca niścitā vina abhāvam anumānam niṣkammapā iva agnimat tvam niścāyayati 
NSu_3.2.34cd.8–3.2.34cd.9	 tathā svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti atra liṅgā pratīyamānāyāḥ bhāvanāyāḥ bhāvi apekṣāyām kim bhāvyaḥ dhātvarthaḥ bhavatu bhavatu vā svarga iti sandehe samāna pada upātta tvāt dhātu arthaḥ eva bhāvyaḥ iti śaṅkayā kuṇṭhita śaktiḥ śabdaḥ joṣam eva āste yadi dhātu arthaḥ bhāvyaḥ syāt tadā vidheḥ iṣya abhyupāya tvam śāstrasya ca tat bodhaka tvam tad praṇetuḥ ca āpta tvam prekṣāvatām pravṛttiḥ ca iti etat sarvam na syāt iti tarkeṇa apanītāyām śaṅkāyām śabdaḥ svargam eva bhāvyatayā avadhārayati evam nānāvidhaḥ tarka sādhyaḥ anugrahaḥ svayam eva boddhavyaḥ 
NSu_3.2.34cd.10	 saḥ ayam pramā rūpam vā pramāṇam syāt liṅgadaśarnavat apramā rūpam vā indriya ādi vat na tāvat anyaḥ tarsya āhārya rūpa tvāt na tat karaṇam api pramāṇam pramā phala tva abhāvāt na dvitīyaḥ āropita viṣaya tvāt viparyaya prāmāṇya upagatau tu tena asya niyāmakaḥ sambandhaḥ na asti asambaddhasya gamaka tve ca atiprasaṅgaḥ anumāna tve ca asya āpādakam liṅgam āpādyam sādhyam iti vaktavyam na ca tat yuktam āpādakasya āhārya tvena anyatara asiddha tvāt āpādyasya ca aniṣṭa tvena bādhita tvāt na hi asiddham liṅgam bhavati na api bādhitam sādhyam sati ca āśraye anumānam bhavati na ca bhū tale ghaṭaḥ asti yaḥ sādhya sādhanayoḥ āśrayaḥ syāt vyadhikaraṇa tā ca apādya āpādakayoḥ bahulam upalabhyate āpādyasya sādhya tve apasiddhāntaḥ ca syāt dhūma sadbhāvasya svayam abhyupagantavya tvāt tasmāt viparyaya paratantra tvāt apramāṇam eva pramāṇānām anugrāhakaḥ tarkaḥ iti kutas asya anumāne antarbhāvaḥ iti atas āha sva nyāyaiḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.35.1–3.2.35.2	 sva nyāyaiḥ sādhanam kāryam para nyāyaiḥ tu dūṣaṇam sva nyāyaiḥ dūṣaṇam ca syāt sādhitaiḥ prativādinaḥ nyāya śabdena dhamiḥ liṅga vyāpti dṛṣṭāntāḥ ucyante na kevalam parasya kintu svasya api ye siddhāḥ nyāyāḥ te su anyāyāḥ sādhanam iti dūṣaṇasya api upalakṣaṇam parasya eva siddhāḥ nyāyāḥ para nyāyāḥ svasya eva siddhāḥ nyāyāḥ su anyāyāḥ caśabdena sādhanam ca prativādinaḥ prati 
NSu_3.2.35.3^1	 etat uktam bhavati dvividham hi kāryam kathakasya sva pakṣa sādhanam para pakṣa dūṣaṇam ca iti tatra sādhanam sva para sammataiḥ eva nyāyaiḥ kāryam na anyatara mātra siddhaiḥ yathā parvataḥ agnimāndhūmavat tva ādyaḥ yaḥ dhūmavān asau= agnimān yathā mahānasaḥ iti kvacid punar sādhanam sva mātra siddhaiḥ eva nyāyaiḥ kriyate tatra ca pareṇa anyatara asiddhayā ādau= udāhṛte tam prati tad sādhanam kriyate yathā śabdaḥ anityaḥ kāryatvāt kāryaḥ ca asau= avyañjaka prayatna anantara upalabdheḥ ityādi sarvathā sādhanam ubhaya siddha nyāyasādhyam dūṣaṇam tu dvividham idam ittham na bhavati iti vā aniṣya upadarśanena vā tatra ādyam ubhaya siddha nyāyaiḥ eva kāryam 
NSu_3.2.35.3^2	 yathā śabdaḥ na dravyam śrotra grāhya tvāt sāmānya vat iti kvacid punar sva mātra siddhaiḥ nyāyaiḥ sādhanam iva dūṣaṇam api kṛtvā param prati tad sādhanam kriyate yathā tatra eva prayoge kālena anaikānti audbhāvane tasya atīndriya tva sādhanam ityādi sarvathā adyam dūṣaṇam ubhaya siddha nyāya sampādyam eva dvitīyam tu para siddhaiḥ eva nyāyaiḥ kāryam yathā yadi parvataḥ niragnikaḥ tadā nirdhūmaḥ syāt iti atra hi āpādakasya para siddha tvam eva bhāvyam na sva siddha tvam tad atirikta aṅgānām tu sva siddhaḥ satī asatī vā na vivakṣitā para siddhiḥ eva upayujyate tat eva ca tarkaḥ iti vyavahriyate tena tatra āśraya asiddhayanyatara asiddhī bhūṣaṇe eva na dūṣaṇe 
NSu_3.2.35.4	 vyadhikaraṇa tvam tu na kvāpi dūṣaṇam iti uktam śakya sampādanam ca tarke api sāmāna adhikaraṇa tvam avaśyam ca etat evam anyathā kevala anvayi dharmasya kevala vyatirekiṇya bhāvāt tasya ananumāna tva āpatteḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇa sadbhāvāt viśeṣa lakṣaṇa abhāve api na doṣaḥ iti ced samam prakṛte api vyāpti apekṣayā gamaka tvasya tarke api vidyamāna tvāt vidyamānaḥ eva āśraye vidyamānasya eva iti api sāmānya lakṣaṇe niveśyate iti ced tarhi vipakṣa abhāvaḥ vā sapa pakṣa sadbhāvaḥ api vā niveśyatām prayojana abhāvāt na iti ced na prakṛte api samatvāt tarka nirāsaḥ prayojanam iti ced tatra api kevala vyatikinirāsaḥ prayojanam bhaviṣyati nirnibandhanaḥ asau= iti ced samam prakṛte api sādhane api asiddhasya anumāna tvam syāt iti ced tarhi vipakṣavataḥ sa pakṣe asataḥ api kevala anvayitvam syāt tad viśeṣa lakṣaṇaḥ eva nikṣepyam iti ced samānam atra api atas eva sva nyāyaiḥ sādhanam ityādinā vyavasthā darśitā iti 
NSu_3.2.35.5	 mabhūt āśraya asiddhayan yatara asiddhayoḥ atra dūṣaṇa tvam tathā api bādhāpa siddhānta sadbhāvāt na tarkasya anumāna tvam iti ced na tayoḥ api asiddhi vat sādhana dūṣaṇa viśeṣayoḥ eva dūṣaṇa tvena prasaṅga anumāne tad abhāvāt iti pūrvavat parihāraḥ siddhaḥ eva tathā api sādhane api avāntara bheda kalpanayā tarhi bādhā ādeḥ adūṣaṇa tvam kalpyatām iti ati prasaṅga nirāsāya parihāra antaram āha prasaṅga iti 
NSu_3.2.36ab.1–3.2.36ab.3	 prasaṅga artha tayā proktāḥ na siddhāntasya dūṣakāḥ prasaṅgaḥ āpādanam tad artha tayā tad viṣaya tayā prasañjanīyatayā iti yāvat proktāḥ nirdhūma tva ādayaḥ arthāḥ na siddhāntasya dūṣakāḥ iti upalakṣaṇam na bādhitāḥ iti api draṣṭavyam etat uktam bhavati kim āpādyata upetasya nirdhūma tva ādeḥ bādhya tvam tad proktau ca apa siddhāntaḥ ucyate uta kevalasya na ādyaḥ yatas āpādanam nāma aṅgīka tarvyata ajñāpanam na punar sadbhāva pratipādanam na ca tad pramāṇa ādi viruddham yadi viṣam bhakṣayiṣyasi tarhi mariṣyasi iti yathā dvitīye tu syāt eva bādhā ādi na ca tat atra ucyate tathā sati syāt iti na syāt iti 
NSu_3.2.36ab.4–3.2.36ab.5	 asiddhiḥ api evam eva parihatarvyā tathā hi kim yadi alaṃkṛtasya niragnika tva ādeḥ asiddha tvam ucyate kiṃvā kevalasya na prathamaḥ asiddheḥ yadi niragnikaḥ syāt iti api yadi niragnika tvena aṅgīkriyeta iti arthaḥ naca ayam asiddhaḥ tathā asati tarkasya api anutthāna āpatteḥ atas eva bhagavān ācāryaḥ yadi vidyeta a iti etat vidyate iti aṅgīkāraḥ bhavet yadi a iti vyākhyātavān na dvitīyaḥ tasya atra anupādānāt tathā tve yadi iti na syāt iti asmin parihāre sati pūrva ukta vyavasthā āśrayaṇe api na kaścitati prasaṅgaḥ 
NSu_3.2.36ab.6	 syāt etat dvividham eva anumānam sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca tatra tarkaḥ na sādhanam iti tāvat bhavatām api sammatam na api dūṣaṇam duṣyi pramājanakam hi dūṣaṇam nāma na ca tarkasya tad sambhavati para siddhena hi nyāyena parasya tatra duṣyiḥ jñāpanīyā na ca asau sādhuḥ tathā tve hi para siddhaḥ iti eva na syāt asādhunā ca jñāpyamānā duṣyira ābhāsa bhūtā eva iti katham tarkaḥ anumānam iti atas chala jātyoḥ duṣṭa tva mūla vyutpādanena eva etad samāna yoga kṣemam iti āśayavān= tad svarūpam nirūpayati chalam iti 
NSu_3.2.36cd.1–3.2.36e.2	 chalam jātiḥ iti dvedhā vyāhati antaram iṣyate vyāhati antaram vyāhati prabhedaḥ iṣyate prāmāṇikaiḥ yat vā vyāhati virodhaḥ anyat asaṅgatam ca iti vyāhati antaram chalam asaṅgatam jāti virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ tatra jāteḥ lakṣaṇam āha jātiḥ iti jātiḥ sva vyāhatiḥ jñeyā jñeyati anena uttara tva viśeṣaṇam na kāryam sādhane api sva vyāhateḥ sambhavāt vṛthā prabheda kalpa nasya aprāmāṇika tvāt sva vyāhatiḥ ca sva vacana virodha sva kriyā virodha sva nyāya virodha bhedena trividhā iti chala lakṣaṇam āha chalam iti 
NSu_3.2.36f.1–3.2.36f.3	 chalam artha antara uttaram para uktasya artha antaram parikalpya tasya artha antarasya uttaram iti arthaḥ ayam bhāvaḥ asti tāvat sva vyāhati lakṣaṇā jātiḥ artha antara uttara lakṣaṇam chalam ca iti dvividham nigraha sthānam na ca tad aṅgīkāre ṣaṣ eva nigraha sthānāni iti niyama bhaṅgaḥ jāteḥ virodha bheda tvāt chalasya asaṅgati prabheda tvāt dvayoḥ api vā virodhaḥ eva antar bhāvayitum śakya tvāt tatra jātim vā chalam vā prayuñjānaḥ duṣyam etat iti katham pratipādanīyaḥ iti vācyam jātau tāvat yukta aṅga hīna tvāt ayukta aṅga adhika tvāt aviṣaya vṛtti tvāt duṣyam etat iti chale ca mada vivakṣita dūṣaṇena asaṅgata tvāt iti evam iti ced tatra jāti vādī na idam ayukta aṅgam iti vā na idam ayuktam iti vā na ayam aviṣayaḥ iti vā na idam ayuktam iti vā brūyāt eva chala vādī ca kim tvad vivakṣayā tvad vacanena pratītaḥ arthaḥ mayā dūṣaṇīyaḥ iti tau katham pratibodhanīyau 
NSu_3.2.36f.4^1	 atha manyase dvividham duṣṭa tva mūlam sādhāraṇam asādhāraṇam ca tatra asādhāraṇam yukta aṅga tyāga ādikam sādhāraṇam tu sva vyāhatiḥ tatra asādhāraṇa dūṣaṇa upanyāse api punar śaṅkamānaḥ sva vyāhatyāḥ bodhanīyaḥ yadi vyāpti ādi aṅgam anapekṣya prasaṅgaḥ tadā jāti vākya arthaḥ api tathā dūṣayitum śakyate ityādi yadi vaktuḥ vivakṣām anapekṣya eva śabda pratīta tva mātreṇa dūṣaṇam tadā chala vākye api tathā śakyam iti evam tarhi para siddhena eva nyāyena paraḥ chala jātyoḥ duṣyim bodhanīyaḥ tatas param tu na śaṅkayate eva vyāghātau= adhi tvāt āśaṅkāyāḥ iti uktam bhavati tathā ca para nyāyaḥ tāvat asādhuḥ 
NSu_3.2.36f.4^2–3.2.36f.5	 tena bodhyamānā duṣyira ābhāsa bhūtā eva iti chala ādeḥ vāstavam aduṣṭa tvam syāt na syāt na hi atra para nyāyaḥ pramāṇa tvena upanyasyate kintu asādhurayam tvadīyaḥ nyāyaḥ yatas sva ātmānam api vyāhanti iti abhiprāyaḥ iti ced tulyam etat prakṛte api na hi atra api niragnika tvam pramāṇa tayā upanyasyate api tu asādhurayam tvadīyaḥ niragnika tva aṅgīkāraḥ yatas pramāṇa viruddham nirdhūma tvam api aṅgīkārayati iti abhiprāya eti jāti ādau sva viruddha āpattiḥ tarke tu pramāṇa viruddha āpattiḥ iti vailakṣaṇya mātram asti ca sva viruddha āpattiḥ antatas tarke api yathā uktam vyāghāta avadhiḥ āśaṅkā tarkaḥ śaṅkā avadhiḥ mataḥ a iti tat evam tarkasya dūṣaṇa anumāne antarbhāvādyuktam uktam iti tat anena prabandhena ukta arthasya prakṛta upayogam darśayan= apavyākhyānasya dūṣaṇa antaram āha evam iti 
NSu_3.2.37.1–3.2.37.3	 evam saṃśodhita nyāya sat āgama virodhataḥ na anirvācyam iha proktam māyā mātra padena hi saṃśodhitaḥ ābhāsāt samyak vivecitaḥ nyāyaḥ anumānam nirdeṣa tvasya āgama padena eva labdha tvāt sat śabdena niravakāśa tvam ucyate iha sūtre proktam sandhyam iti śeṣaḥ tatra nyāya virodhaḥ anupadam eva pradarśayiṣyate svapnasya satya tām pratipādayan sat āgamaḥ tu bhāṣya ādau= udāhṛtaḥ prasiddhaḥ eva iti hi śabdena āha na kevalam pramāṇa abhāvāt māyā mātram iti iyam na svapnasya anirvācya tā pratijñā kinnāma pramāṇa virodhāt api iti arthaḥ na kevalam pramāṇa vyāhatā iyam pratijñā api tarhi sva vyāhatā api iti āha vilakṣaṇam iti 
NSu_3.2.38ab.1–3.2.38ab.3^1	 vilakṣaṇam sat asatoḥ iti hi vyāhatam svatas anirvācyam iti na vācya tā virahaḥ parasya abhimataḥ sva kriyā virodha āpatteḥ kintu sat asatoḥ sakāśāt vilakṣaṇam iti pratijñānam ca sva vyāhatam sat na bhavati iti ukte asattvam eva labdham punar asat na bhavati iti abhidhāne katham na sva vyāhatiḥ evam asat na bhavati iti abhihite sati sattvam eva abhihitam punar sat na bhavati iti uktau kutas na sva vyāhatiḥ iti hi śabda arthaḥ tṛtīya prakāra aṅgīkāriṇām na sva vyāhatiḥ iti ced na asyām pratijñāyām siddhāyām tṛtīya prakāra siddhiḥ tad siddhau ca pratijñā siddhiḥ iti paraspara āśraya doṣāt 
NSu_3.2.38ab.1–3.2.38ab.3^2	 sat ādi prakāraiḥ durnirūpa tā mātram pratijñāyate na punar asat ādi prakāraḥ vidhīyate atas na sva vyāhatiḥ iti ced na sat ādi prakāra pratiṣedhaḥ asat ādi prakāra vidhiḥ iti etayoḥ anartha antara bhāvasya ukta tvāt anyathā evam mama mātā vandhyā ityādau= api sva vyāhatiḥ samāhitā syāt kiñca sat asat vilakṣaṇam iti atra sat śabdena kim abādhyam abhidhīyate uta brahma svarūpam vailakṣaṇyam api tat dhamarvi parīta dharmat tvam vā tad pratiyogika anyonya abhāvaḥ vā tattva anadhikaraṇa tvam vā sarveṣu api dūṣaṇāni āha pratiyogi tvam api iti 
NSu_3.2.38cd.1–3.2.38cd.3	 pratiyogi tvam api asya brahmaṇaḥ aṅgīkṛtam bhavet asya svāpna prapañcasya svāpna prapañcam prati iti yāvat apipadam doṣa antara samuccaya artham asya nirākāra tayā aṅgīkṛtasya api brahmaṇaḥ iti vā sat asat vilakṣaṇam sandhyam iti pratijānata iti vākya śeṣaḥ tatas ca ayam arthaḥ sat śabdena abādhyam aṅgīkṛtya vailakṣaṇyam api tad dharma viparīta dharma tvam aṅgīkriyate ced tadābādhyasya api dharmavat tvam aṅgīkṛtam syāt abādhyam ca na brahmaṇaḥ anyat asti iti brahma eva sadharmakam uktam syāt tathā cāpa siddhāntaḥ etena sat śabdasya brahma arthaḥ vailakṣaṇyam ca tad dharma viparyayaḥ iti pakṣaḥ api apāstaḥ 
NSu_3.2.38cd.4–3.2.38cd.5	 atha abādhyam sat vailakṣaṇyam ca tad pratiyogikaḥ anyonya abhāvaḥ iti matam tadā brahma atiriktasya abādhyasya abhāvāt brahmaṇaḥ prapañcam prati pratiyogi tva lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ svīkṛtaḥ bhavet anena sat śabdaḥ brahma arthaḥ iti pratyuktam atha sat śabdaḥ abādhya arthaḥ vailakṣaṇyam ca tattva anadhikaraṇa tvam tarhi bādhyam iti pratijñā arthaḥ syāt kāt snaryena anabhivyakta tvam ca tat eva iti sādhya hetvoḥ bhedaḥ na bhavet abādhyasya dharmi tvam ca abhyupetam syāt anyathā tu apratyaya vaiyarthyāt etena brahma pakṣaraḥ api apoḍhaḥ 
NSu_3.2.38cd.6–3.2.38cd.7	 na ca vācyam sakalam api etat ayuktam yatas atra māyā mātra tvam eva pratijñātam na tu sat asat vailakṣaṇyam iti māyā mātra padasya sat asat vailakṣaṇya artha tayā eva parasya abhimata tvāt tat cakim svapne pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiḥ āhosvit mayā mayi a iti saṃśaya upapādanena sandhye tathārūpā eva sṛṣṭiḥ a iti pūrva pakṣa utthāpanenana paramārtha gandhaḥ api asti a iti siddhānta upakrameṇa ca avagamyate na hi asattvam svīkriyate iti syāt etat brahmaṇaḥ pratiyogi tva ādi aṅgīkāre api na apasiddhāntaḥ paramārthataḥ hi brahma nirdharmakam brūmaḥ pratiyogi tva ādikam ca aṅgīkriyamāṇam mithyā eva na hi āropitena nīlimnā nabhasaḥ nīrūpa tvam vyāhanyate iti āśaṅkayā āha mithyā ced iti 
NSu_3.2.39ab.1–3.2.39d.1	 mithyā ced pratiyogi tvam vailakṣaṇyam tatas na hi pratiyogi tvam iti upalakṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ pratiyogi tva ādi yadi mithyā syāt tarhi tatas brahmaṇaḥ svāpna prapañcasya vailakṣaṇyam uktavidham na syāt yasya yad apekṣayā na pratiyogi tvam na tatas tasya vailakṣaṇyam api yathā tatas eva ghaṭāt tasya eva ghaṭasya iti vyāpti sūcana arthaḥ hi śabdaḥ mithyā śabdaḥ anirvacanīya vacanaḥ na asat vacanaḥ iti tu prāc anirvacanīya siddheḥ durvacanam nanu ca vailakṣaṇyam na syāt iti idam iṣya āpādanam mayā tasya api mithyātva aṅgīkārāt ityatas āha avilakṣaṇa tvam iti avilakṣaṇa tvam satyam syāt yadi svāpna prapañcasya brahma vailakṣaṇyam mṛṣā tad avilakṣaṇa tvam satyam syāt ghaṭa ādau tathā darśanāt yadi api atra na pareṇa tathā astu iti vaktum śakyam apasiddhānta āpatteḥ sphuṭa tvāt tathā api adhikam vivakṣuḥ āha mithyātvam iti  mithyātvam brahmaṇaḥ tatas
