NSu_3.2.40a.1–3.2.40a.2	 anirvācyasya sattvam vā tatas brahma svapnayoḥ availakṣaṇyasya satya tvāt anirvācyasya anirvācya tayā aṅgīkṛtasya svapnasya sattvam bhavet iti anuvartate prasaṅgasya aniṣyata adarśanāya svapnasya iti vaktavye anirvācyasya iti uktam evam brahmaṇaḥ satyasya iti api grāhyam brahma svapnayoḥ availakṣaṇyasya satya tve api kutas mithyātva ādi prasaṅgaḥ iti atas vedam uditam upalabdham hi ghaṭasya ghaṭa antareṇa sā lakṣaṇya sadbhāve pārthiva tva ādi sāmyam atra sāmānyena viśeṣa āpādanāt na apādya āpādakayoḥ abhedaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ bhāva tve dravya ādi anyatamatva āpattiḥ iti yathā brahma pratiyogikam svapnasya sālakṣaṇyam ced brahmaṇaḥ api mithyātvam syāt iti asaṅgatam vyadhikaraṇa tvāt iti na vācyam yat pratiyogikam yatra sālakṣaṇyam sa tad dharma iti vyāpteḥ su graha tvāt yaḥ tu manda matiḥ tam prati samāna adhikaraṇam api aniṣyam suvacanam iti prasaṅga antaram abhihitam 
NSu_3.2.40a.3	 syāt etat brahmaṇaḥ pratiyogitva abhāve anuyogi tvam syāt tathā ca svapnasya tatas vailakṣaṇyam na syāt tad abhāve ca sa alakṣaṇya āpattyā brahma svapnayoḥ mithyātva ādi prasajyeta iti uktam ayuktam sa dharmake hi vastuni ekasya dharmasya abhāvena tad viruddhasya dharmasya bhāvaḥ bhāvena ca abhāvaḥ vaktum śakyate yathā parimāṇavat tvāt dravyasya mahat tva abhāve aṇu tvasya aṇu tva bhāve vā mahat tva abhāvasya āpādanam yathā vaktuḥ manda vacana abhāve tīvra vacanam tad bhāve vā tad abhāvaḥ śakya āpādanaḥ brahma tu sakala dharma vikalam iti katham tatra āpādanam pratiyogi tva ādeḥ iva ayogi tva ādeḥ api abhāvāt na hi parimāṇa rahite guṇa ādau vaktṛ tva śūnye kāṣṭhe ca ukta prasaṅga avakāśaḥ asti tathā svapane api na ukta prasaṅga avakāśaḥ svayam asatyasya vailakṣaṇya vada vailakṣaṇyasya api abhāvāt na hi bhrānta sarpa visarpaṇa ādayaḥ satyā bhaveyuḥ iti āśaṅkaya brahmaṇaḥ nirdharmaka tvam dūṣayati yadi ityādinā īśa tajjñāna iti atas prāktanena prakaraṇena 
NSu_3.2.40b–3.2.40d.4	 yadi dharmāḥ na kecana brahmaṇaḥ na eva jijñāsyam yadi brahmaṇaḥ ke api dharmāḥ na syuḥ tarhi tad jijñāsyam na eva syāt bhavati hi jijñāsyam atha atas brahma jijñāsā iti vacanāt atas na tat nirdhakam iti nirdharmaka tve api brahmaṇaḥ kutas na jijñāsyata iti atas āha jijñāsā iti  jijñāsā dharma nirṇayaḥ vicāraḥ hi jijñāsā nāma sa ca dharmasya nirṇayaḥ dharma nirṇayaḥ vyāpya dharma darśanam iti yāvat śaśa viṣāṇa vat nirdharmake katham asau syāt aṅgīkāre ca vyāghātaḥ katham na syāt itas api na nirdharmakasya jijñāsyata iti āha idam ittham iti 
NSu_3.2.41ab.1–3.2.41ab.3	 idam ittham iti jñānam jijñāsāyāḥ prayojanam na khalu anumāna vicāra apara paryāyāyāḥ jijñāsāyāḥ vastu svarūpa mātra jñānam prayojanam tasya prāk eva siddha tvāt asiddhau vā aaśraya asiddhasya anumānasya anutthānāt kinnāma idam iti svarūpa anuvādena ittham iti vyāpaka dharma viśiṣya dharmi jñānam dhūma anumāna ādau tathā darśanāt tathā ca katham nirdharmakasya jijñāsyata iti etena svapne api prasaṅga an avakāśaḥ nirastaḥ tathā sati māyā mātram iti anumāna asambhavāt āropitābhyām vyāpya vyāpakābhyām tad sambhavam iti ced na svarūpa asiddhi bādha prasaṅgāt iti yadi api na brahma niṣṭhena kenacid dharmeṇa tatra dharma antaram vidhitsitam tathā api kasyacid dharmasya nivṛttyā dharma antarasya bhrānti prasaktasya anyatra sataḥ nivṛttiḥ jñāpyate yathā uktam siddham tu nivartaka tvāt iti evañca nirdharmakasya katham jijñāsyata anupapattiḥ iti atas āha ittham bhāvaḥ hi iti 
NSu_3.2.41cd.1–3.2.41cd.3	 ittham bhāvaḥ hi dharmaḥ asya na ced na pratiyogitā asya brahmaṇaḥ pratiyogitā virodhitā prapañca dharma vyāvṛttimat tā iti yāvat na khalu nirādhārayā kasyacid dharmasya nivṛttyā nirādhāra eva dharma antara vyāvṛttiḥ anumātum śakyāḥ evaṃvidha anumāna pravṛtteḥ alaukika tvāt atas brahma niṣṭhayā eva brahma niṣṭha iti vācyam yadi ca asya dharmaḥ na syāt na tarhi vyāvṛttimat tā api syāt iti ittham iti jñānam jijñāsā phalam ced brahmaṇi itthambhāvaḥ eva svīkāryaḥ syāt tat kim dharmeṇa iti manda āśaṅkā nirāsāya aittham bhāvaḥ hi dharmaḥ asya a iti anuvādena parihāraḥ abhihitaḥ yat vā astu vyāvṛtti mat tā brahmaṇaḥ kim dharmeṇa iti atas idam uktam na vidhi rūpaḥ eva dharmaḥ kinnāmetthambhāva mātram prakṛtam iti tat anena brahma na nirdharmakam jijñāsya tvāt parvata vat iti anumānam sūcitam bhavati itas api na nirdharmakam brahma iti āha itthambhāva ātmakān iti 
NSu_3.2.42ab.1–3.2.42ab.2	 ittham bhāva ātmakān dharmān āhuḥ ca śrutayaḥ akhilāḥ śrutayaḥ ca iti sambandhaḥ bhavanti satyakāmaḥ ityādyāḥ śrutayaḥ dharma vādinyaḥ na tu apahata pāpma ityādyāḥ tat katham akhilā iti ucyate iti atas uktam itthambhā= a ātmakān iti akhaṇḍa niṣṭhatā tu prāk eva nirākṛtā nirākariṣyate ca iti na kevalam śruti anumāna viruddham brahmaṇaḥ nirdharmaka tvam kintu sūtra viruddham ca iti āha adṛśya tva ādayaḥ api iti 
NSu_3.2.42cd.1–3.2.42cd.3	 adṛśya tva ādayaḥ api asya guṇāḥ hi prabhuṇā uditāḥ prabhuṇā api iti sambandhaḥ adṛśya tva ādi guṇakaḥ dharma ukteḥ a ityādinā iti śeṣaḥ yat vā na vidhi rūpaḥ eva dharmaḥ kinnāmetthambhāva mātram iti ata prayogam anena pramāṇayati atra cāpi śabdaḥ na bhinnakramaḥ guṇa śabdaḥ ca dhamarvacanaḥ na pāribhāṣika vacanaḥ adṛśya tva ādīnām tad abhāvāt nanu asmābhiḥ bhāva rūpāḥ eva dharmāḥ brahmaṇaḥ na aṅgīkriyante abhāva ātmakāḥ tu svīkriyante eva atas na sūtra virodhaḥ iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.2.43ab.1–3.2.43ab.3	 yadi syuḥ tādṛśāḥ dharmāḥ sarvajña tva ādayaḥ na kim tādṛśāḥ abhāva ātmakāḥ yata adṛśya tva ādyāḥ pramāṇa avagatāḥ tathā sarvajña tva ādayaḥ bhāva rūpāḥ api yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti ādi śruti siddhāḥ iti te api aṅgīkāryāḥ atha tad aṅgīkāre na iha nānā asti iti ādi śruti virodhaḥ iti ucyate saḥ adṛśya tva ādi aṅgīkāre api samānaḥ atas ardhacaratīyasya aprāmāṇika tvāt sarvajña tva ādayaḥ api svīkāryāḥ adṛśya tva ādayaḥ api vā tyājyāḥ iti syāt etat sarvajña tva ādayaḥ sarva nirūpya tvāt sarva apekṣāḥ viyadādikam ca sarvam bhrānti siddham asatyam eva asatya sāpekṣāḥ tu katham paramātha ṛtaḥ brahma dharma tayā svīkartum śakyante iti atas āha anyā iti 
NSu_3.2.43c.1–3.2.43d.2	 anya apekṣā yadi syuṣṭe te sarvajña tva ādayaḥ anya apekṣāḥ iti yadi na aṅgīkriyante tarhi te adṛśya tvāt ayaḥ api na dṛśyam adṛśyam iti evam anya apekṣāssyuḥ iti na aṅgīkāryāḥ eva tathā ca sūtra virodhaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva viṣaya tayā anya apekṣa tvam pratiyogitayā anya apekṣa tvam iti vaiṣamya mātram syuṣyaḥ iti suṣāma ādiṣu draṣṭavyam kiñca para apekṣa tayā sarvajña tva ādikam brahmaṇaḥ anaṅgīkurvāṇena sattā api na aṅgīkaraṇīyā yatas sat tā api evam para apekṣā iti āha sattā evam iti  sattā evam na asti eva svarūpa atiriktā sattā iti ced svarūpa sattā api na syāt na hi mithyā bhūta para apekṣam satya svarūpam bhavitum arhati iti tvadīya nyāya prāpta tvāt tathā ca sat eva somya ityādi śruti virodhaḥ katham sattā para apekṣā iti atas āha deśa iti 
NSu_3.2.43d.1–3.2.43d.3	 deśa kāla gā yatas tasmāt satta evam iti sambandhaḥ nanu deśa kāla gā iti kaḥ arthaḥ deśa kāla sambaddhā iti vā deśa kāla janyā iti vā na ādyaḥ tāvatā para apekṣā siddheḥ na hi gaganam ghaṭena saṃyuktam iti etāvatā tad apekṣam na dvitīyaḥ anādi nitya tvāt iti ced evam tarhi sāvarjña ādeḥ api na anya apekṣatā na hi sarveṇa saha viṣaya viṣayi bhāva mātreṇa sarva apekṣa tvam saura prakāśasya api ghaṭa apekṣatā prasaṅgāt na ca sarveṇa janya tvam nitya siddha tvāt nanu utpattau sārvajña ādeḥ sarvāsa apekṣata abhāve api jñaptau sā asti eva viditaḥ eva sarvasmin sārvajña ādi vijñāyate na aviditaḥ iti evam tarhi sattā api mā bhūt utpattau para apekṣā jñaptau tu bhavati eva iti āha deśa iti 
NSu_3.2.44ab.1–3.2.44ab.3	 deśa kāla anapekṣā hi na sattā kvāpi dṛśyate deśa kāla anapekṣā deśa kāla pratīti anapekṣā deśa kāla prati iti apekṣā eva dṛśyate iti anvayaḥ api draṣṭavyaḥ yadi kaścid vaiyātyāt kvacid deśa kāla pratīti anapekṣā api sattā dṛśyate iti brūyāt tadā vyāghātaḥ syāt deśa kāla vyatirekeṇa kiṃśabda artha anirvacanāt sattā pratīta avavarjanīya tayā deśa kālau dṛśyete na tu tat apekṣā iti ced na abhūt bhavati bhaviṣyati ityādi pratītim avadhūya sattāyāḥ apratibhāsāt niyata viśiṣya pratītike anapekṣāyām na kutra api apekṣā syāt tat idam uktam kvāpi iti na kevalam brāhmaṇaḥ nirdhamarka tve mīmāṃsā viṣaya tva anupapattiḥ kinnāma śāstra yoni tvāt iti uktam śāstra viṣaya tvam api anupapannam syāt iti āha sarva iti 
NSu_3.2.44cd.1–3.2.44cd.3	 sarva dharma ujjñitasya asya kim śāstreṇa adhigamyate kim ākṣepe svarūpam tāvat sva prakāśa tvāt na śāstra pratipādyam saṃsarga bhedayoḥ eva vākya artha tvāt ca dharmāḥ tu na santi yena saṃsarga bhedau śāstra viṣayau syātām tasmāt asya brahmaṇaḥ kim śāstreṇa adhigamyate na svarūpam na api dharma saṃsarga ādi iti ittham bhāva ātmakāni iti brahmaṇaḥ nirdharmaka tve śruti virodhaḥ abhihitaḥ sāmpratam tu śrutīnām nirviṣayatu a āpatti ādikam iti mahān bhedaḥ brahmaṇi paramārthataḥ dharma abhāve api mithyā bhūtāḥ dharmāḥ śāstrasya viṣayāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti atas āha mithyā iti 
NSu_3.2.45ab.1–3.2.45ab.4	 mithyā dharma vidhātuḥ ca vedasya eva apramāṇa tā caḥ tu arthaḥ apramāṇa tā eva iti sambandhaḥ vedāntānām viṣaya abhāvena prasaktam abodhaka tva lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam parihartum aṅgīkṛtam mithyā dharma pratipādaka tvam viparīta bodhaka tva lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam eva āpādayati iyān= tu viśeṣaḥ abodhakānām upekṣaṇīyatā eva kevalam viparīta bodhakānām tu heya tā syāt iti bhavet apramāṇam vedaḥ yadi mithyā dharmān pratipādya eva uparamet na ca evam kinnāma na iha nānā asti ityādinā pratiṣedhati ca iti atas āha āprāptam iti 
NSu_3.2.45cd.1–3.2.45cd.3	 aprāptām bhrāntim āpādya kim vedaḥ mānatām vrajet āpādya iti atas param niṣedham kurvan= iti śeṣaḥ yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva vit a  yaḥ ātma apahata pāpmā a ityādinā vedaḥ yadi bhrāntim brahmaṇi mithyā bhūta sārvajñi ādi pratītim utpādya svayam eva na iha nānā asti ityādinā tat pratiṣedham kuryāt tadā māna tām vrajet kim paraspara viruddha tvena unmatta vacana vat aprāmāṇyam eva syāt nanu etat anākalita para abhisandheḥ asat anuvādena uktam na hi vayam vedaḥ dharmān vidhāya svayam eva niṣedhati iti brūmaḥ kintu anūdya niṣedhati iti tathā ca katham aprāmāṇi āpattiḥ iti atas uktam āprāptam iti anuvādaḥ hi anyatas prāptasya bhavati na ca brahmaṇi mithyābhūta dharma pratītiḥ kenacid prāptā tatas anuvāda asambhavāt vidhāya eva pratiṣedhati iti vaktavye pūrva uktaḥ doṣaḥ iti katham aprāptiḥ brahma dharmaṇām iti atas āha na hi iti 
NSu_3.2.46ab.1–3.2.46ab.3	 na hi vedam vinā brahma vedyam dharmāḥ ca tad gatāḥ vedena vinā brahma na vedyam iti tāvat samarthitam prathama adhyāye tathā ca katham tad gata tvena sārvajña ādayaḥ anyatas vedyāḥ bhaveyuḥ veda vidite api brahmaṇi anumānena sārvajña ādi pratītiḥ iti ced na tasyāḥ vinā api vaidikena pratiṣedhena pratyanumānena eva apāsta tvāt anyathā ati prasaṅgāt atha matam mithyā dharma vidhātuḥ ca vedasya eva apramāṇa tā iti yat uktam tat na aniṣyam dvividhaḥ veda bhāgaḥ tattva avedakaḥ atattva āvedakaḥ ca tatra jīveśvarayoḥ aikyam pratipādayan= tattva avedakaḥ aparaḥ atattva āvedakaḥ iti asmābhiḥ aṅgīkṛta tvāt iti atas āha veda iti 
NSu_3.2.46cd.1–3.2.46cd.3	 veda vedyasya mithyātvam yadi na aikyasya tat katham tat tarhi tat mithyātvam iti vā satyam eva tvayā aṅgīkṛtam iti na ca tat upapadyate sarvaḥ api hi vedaḥ apauruṣeyaḥ svatas pramāṇa bhūtaḥ ca tatra ca ekasya bhāgasya aprāmāṇye parasya api tat syāt tasya prāmāṇye asya api katham tat na syāt tātparyaliṅga bhāva abhāvābhyām vyavasthā iti ca asaṅgatam tathā tve hi asya bhāgasya anyatra tātparyam vācyam syāt na ca niṣedhāya anuvādaḥ iti upapāditam ahiṃsā ādiśyena ādi vidhivat vidvada vidvat viṣaya tayā vyavasthā astu iti ced na vaiṣamyāt dhana tvasya ca anabhidhānāt atha aikyam pratipādayitum buddhi śuddhaye sārvajña ādi avidyā mānam api pratipādyate sarvatra prasṛtā hi buddhiḥ saguṇe brahmaṇi datta padā krameṇa aikye praviśati iti ced na pratikūla tvāt sārvajña ādi pratipādanena hi bheda vāsanā eva dṛḍha nirūḍhā syāt iti eṣā diś 
NSu_3.2.46cd.4–3.2.47ab.3	 yat uktam brahmaṇi dharmāṇām aprāptiḥ iti tat na pramāṇataḥ aprāptau= api āropaḥ tad sambhavāt ātmā eva hi brahma sa ca sva prakāśa tayā avabhāsataḥ eva iti tasmin dharma āropaḥ na anupapannaḥ tatas ca āropita dharma anuvādena pratiṣedhaḥ yujyate iti ced syāt api evam yadi brahmaṇi dharma āropaḥ yujyeta naca evam tasya sarva dharma rahita tvāt pradhāna abhāvāt ca atha dharma rahita tva ādau= api kutas na āropaḥ iti atas vyatireka vyāptim darśayati dharma iti dharma āropaḥ api sāmānya dharma ādīnām hi daśarne na kevalam pramāṇataḥ prāpti abhāvaḥ kintu dharma āropaḥ api na upapadyate iti apiśabdaḥ sāmānyam ca asau dharmaḥ ca sāmānya dharmaḥ ādipadena pradhāna darśanam dṛṣṭaḥ iti śeṣaḥ etat eva prapañcayati idam iti 
NSu_3.2.47cd.1–3.2.47cd.3	 idantat ādi dharmi tve dharmaḥ anyaḥ kalpyate atra hi idam tat iti bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ ādipadena sādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇam dharmi tve dṛṣṭaḥ iti śeṣaḥ pradhāna jñānam api atra saṅgrāhyam atra loke śuktikāyām rajata tva dharma āropaḥ hi na śuktikā avabhāsa mātreṇa bhavati kinnāma vastutas rajatatva dharmavataḥ pradhānasya adhiṣṭhāne śuktikā śakale puras varti tva ādeḥ pradhāna sādhāraṇasya ca śukla bhāsvara tva ādeḥ dharmasya darśanaḥ eva tathā sphaṭike lauhitya āropaḥ api vastutas lauhityavataḥ japā kusumasya sphaṭike cadanta ādeḥ pradhāna sannidhānasya ca darśanaḥ eva dṛṣṭaḥ iti saha darśana mātreṇa na vyāpti niścayaḥ iti atas āha sarva iti 
NSu_3.2.48ab.1–3.2.48ab.2	 sarva dharma vihīnasya dharma āropaḥ kva dṛśyate atra api pradhāna darśanam upalakṣaṇīyam kva dṛśyate yena ukta vyāpteḥ vyabhicāraḥ syāt iti śeṣaḥ upādhi vyabhicārayoḥ adarśane sāhacarya darśanam vyāpti niścāyakam eva iti bhāvaḥ ayam samudāya arthaḥ dharma āropasya pradhāna darśana ādikam vyāpakam upalabdham na ca prakṛte tat asti sarva ājña ādīnām apahata pāpma tva ādīnām anyatra anabhyupagamāt brahmaṇi ca pradhāna sādhāraṇa dharma ādeḥ anaṅgīkārāt atas vyāpyasya dharma āropasya abhāvaḥ iti nanu atra pradhāna adarśanena dharma āropasambhavaḥ śakya anumānaḥ sārvajña ādikam na brahmaṇi āropitam prāc anyatra anupalabdha tvāt iti prayoga sambhavāt dharma abhāva liṅgakam anumānam tu katham bhavatām asiddha tvāt iti mā evam dharmarāhiti a vādinā evam anumāya upagantavyam iti abhiprāyat 
NSu_3.2.48ab.3	 nanu dharma āropaḥ adhiṣṭhāna dharmāṇām pradhānasya ca pratītau= eva āyatate na tu sattāyām idantu ādi pratītau hi idam rajatam iti ādi rūpā pratītiḥ syāt sādhāraṇa dharma pratītiḥ eva ca pradhānam buddhi sthīkaroti pradhāna pratītiḥ eva ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām āropa upayoginī sattāyāḥ upayoga aṅgīkāre ati prasaṅgaḥ ubhaya upayoge tu gauravam asti ca api atra adhiṣṭhāna dharma ādi pratītiḥ āra uparūpāḥ nahī daṃpūrvaḥ ayam brahmaṇi dharma āropaḥ tathā ca pūrva āropita dharma prati iti adhīnaḥ ayam uttarottara āropaḥ bhaviṣyati pūrvam eva ca uttarasya pradhānam iti kim anupapannam iti atas āha tad artham iti 
NSu_3.2.48ab.4	 yadi brahmaṇi dharma āropa siddhayartham anyāḥ dharmāṇām āropaḥ kalpyate tadā saḥ api dharma āropa antara āyatte iti evam prasaktā anavasthitiḥ syāt siddha viṣaya tvāt na iyam anavasthā dūṣaṇam iti ced na dharma sadbhāva tad pratītyoḥ pūrva siddha tve api āropatva kalpanāyām anavasthā nivāraṇāt asyāḥ dharma pratīteḥ āropatvam pūrva pratīteḥ āropatva kalpanā adhīnam tasyāḥ api tathā iti tat evam brahmaṇi dharma āropāsambha vātsu ataḥ nirdharmaka tve veda aprāmāṇya ādi prasaṅgāt na nirdharmakam brahma iti siddham 
NSu_3.2.48ab.5–3.2.49.1	 yat uktam sārvajña ādeḥ mithyātva siddhaye viśvasya bhrānti kalpita tvam tad dūṣayitum īśa tad jñāna iti ādikaḥ granthaḥ tathā hi viśvasya bhrānti siddha tvam vadatā tatra pramāṇam vaktavyam tat kim pratyakṣam syāt anumānam vā agamaḥ vā na tāvat pratyakṣam tasya satya tva grāhi tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt na api anumānam śūnya samaya nirāsenirasta tvāt adhikam ca dūṣaṇam vaktum āha īśa iti īśa tad jñāna veda akṣa ja anumā mātṛ pūrviṇaḥ bhrāntiḥ viśvasya yena eva māna ābhāsena kalpyate atra hi 
NSu_3.2.50ab.1–3.2.50ab.2^1	 tanmātrasya anyathā bhāvāt kim na syāt viśva satya tā yadi api atra bhrāntiḥ viśvasya ityādinā eva alam tathā api ye viśvam pramāṇa prameya pramātṛ pramiti bhedena caturvidham ācakṣate tad nirākaraṇa prastāvanāya pramāṇa prameya pramātṛ bhedena trividham eva viśvam iti pratijñātum īśa ityādi uktam tatra īśa mātra padābhyām parāpara pramātroḥ grahaṇam yadi api mātṛ padena eva īśvaraḥ api labhyate tathā api tasya niyatam pramātṛ tvam anyeṣām tu viparyaya ādi sambhavāt aniyatam ityādi viśeṣa dyotanāya pṛthak grahaṇam veda akṣa jānum āpadaiḥ karaṇa phala rūpa pramāṇa svīkāraḥ veda padam āgama upalakṣaṇam akṣa ja tvam jñāna sannikarṣayoḥ asti eva īśvara ādi jñānam na veda ādi padaiḥ saṅgṛhyate akaraṇa tvāt aphala tvāt ca bhavati ca pramāṇam iti atas tad jñāna iti pṛthak uktam nitya jñāna mātra upalakṣaṇam ca etat pūrva śabdena karmadhārayam vidhāya tatas inipratyayaḥ 
NSu_3.2.50ab.2^2–3.2.50ab.3	 pratyaya arthaḥ tu veda śabdaḥ ca apaupuruṣeya vākya vacanaḥ eva pūrva śabdaḥ kāraṇa arthaḥ pramādhya āhāreṇa tad sambandhaḥ tatas ca īśavākyeśa ādi jñāna veda akṣa jā anumānān īśvara pramātṛ vākya rūpa pramāṇavataḥ sarva pramāṇa siddhasya iti uktam bhavati bhrāntiḥ bhrānti kalpita tvam yena iti atas labdham eka tvam eva iti avadhāryate māna ābhāsena iti svabhāvataḥ durbalena anumānena iti arthaḥ anyathā abhāve aprāmāṇye kim ākṣepe etat uktam bhavati viśvam tāvat svabhāvataḥ bahu tvena ca prabalaiḥ īśa vākya ādibhiḥ sarvaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ satya tayā avagatam teṣānasatyam apratiṣṭham te a ityādīnām anyatra darśita tvāt vivāda padam mithyā dṛśya tvāt jaḍa vat iti ādikam viśva mithyātva anumānam tu svabhāva eka tvābhyām durbalam tathā ca prabala pramāṇa viruddhasya anumānasya aprāmāṇya upapatteḥ viśvasya satya tvam eva yuktam iti na api abhāvaḥ sa hi gauḍa pāda ādi puruṣa praṇītaḥ vā veda ādiḥ vā ādyam dūṣayati yena iti 
NSu_3.2.50cd.1–3.2.50cd.2	 yena idam kalpyate bhrāntam bhrāntiḥ tasya eva kim na sā yena gauḍa pāda ādinā idam prāk uktam īśa ādikam viśvam bhrāntam bhrānti siddham kalpyate kalpayitvā ca tathā vākyam praṇīyate tasya eva sā kalpanā bhrāntiḥ ayathārthāḥ kinna bhavet etat uktam bhavati īśa vākya ādi pramāṇaiḥ tāvat īśa ādi viśvam satya tayā avagatam tad viruddhā ca gauḍa pāda ādīnām viśva mithyā tva pratītiḥ bhrāntiḥ eva iti tatas kim iti atas āha bhrānta tvaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.51ab.1–3.2.51ab.2	 bhrānta tve tasya viśva ādeḥ īśādya bhrāntam eva hi viśvāreḥ viśva mithyā tvam pratipādayataḥ tasya gauḍa pāda ādeḥ bhrānta tve siddhe tad mūlasya tad vākyasya aprāmāṇyāt tena viśva mithyā tva asiddhau= īśa vākya ādibhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ īśa ādi viśvam abhra antam satyam eva siddham iti nanu īśvara vākya virodhāt gauḍa pāda ādīnām bhrānta tvam kutas kalpanīyam gauḍa pāda ādi vākya virodhāt īśvara ādīnām viśvasatyatva pratītiḥ eva bhrāntiḥ kutas na kalpanīyā iti atas āha bhaveyuḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.51cd.1–3.2.51cd.3	 bhaveyuḥ bhrāntayaḥ nṛṇām naiva īśa ādeḥ kathañcana bāhya antara kāraṇa sāmagrī sattvāt iti śeṣaḥ kathañcana indriya doṣa ādeḥ bāhya kāraṇasya adharma ādeḥ ajñāna ādeḥ āntara kāraṇasya api atyantam asambhavāt iti arthaḥ īśa ādayaḥ vipralambhakāḥ iti ced na kalpaka abhāvāt iti astu tarhi na iha nānā asti iti ādiḥ advaita paraḥ veda ādiḥ āgamaḥ sarvasya api mithyātve pramāṇam iti ced na tasya viśva satyatva grāhaka pratyakṣa bādhita tvena ātad artha tvāt atha matam pratyakṣam khalu tātkālikam pramāṇam na punar ātyantikam vedaḥ tu na tathā svatas pramāṇam ca atas balavatā vedena bādhita tvāt pratyakṣa prāptam api viśva satya tvam bhrānti siddham iti eva aṅgīkartum ucitam iti atas āha satya tvam iti 
NSu_3.2.52ab.1–3.2.53ab.2	 satya tvam akṣaja prāptam yadi bhrāntam iti iṣyate satyatyam viśvasya iti śeṣaḥ āgama balam āśritya tat na iti vākya śeṣaḥ kutas na iti atas āha prāmāṇyam iti prāmāṇyam āgamasya api pratyakṣāt anyatas kutas kutas siddham na kutas api na kevalam pratyakṣasya kintva āgamasya api prāmāṇyam pratyakṣeṇa eva siddham na tu anyena iti arthaḥ tat katham iti atas āha sākṣī iti sākṣi pratyakṣataḥ hi eva mānānām mānateyate ādya ādibhyaḥ upasaṅkha yānāt tṛtīya arthe tasiḥ mānānām sarveṣām īyate pratīyate hi śabdaḥ sarva pramāṇa prāmāṇyasya sākṣi siddha tva upapādaka pramāṇa sūcana arthaḥ tat vivṛṇoti sākṣiṇā iti 
NSu_3.2.53cd.1–3.2.53cd.3	 sākṣiṇaḥ sva prakāśa tvam anavasthā tatas na hi pramāṇānām prāmāṇyam hi na sattā mātreṇa niśśaṅka vyavahāra hetuḥ api tu pramitam eva na ca bāhya pratyakṣa ādikam eva prāmāṇya pramiti sādhanam tad prāmāṇya pramiteḥ api ukta nyāyena āvaśyaka tvāt na ca tat prāmāṇyam sva grāhyam acaitanya jñānasya sva prakāśa tva abhāvāt pratyakṣa ādi antara anveṣaṇe ca anavasthā syāt sa akṣi vedya tve tu sarva pramāṇa prāmāṇyasya na kaścid doṣaḥ sākṣī hi caitanya rūpa tayā sva prakāśaḥ prāmāṇyam ca jñāna grāhaka grāhyam iti sva prāmāṇyam svayam eva gṛhṇāti iti na anavasthā apadyate atas sākṣi vedyam eva sarva pramāṇa prāmāṇyam aṅgī kāryam iti 
NSu_3.2.53cd.4	 astu evam sākṣi pratyakṣa vedyam pratyakṣa āgama prāmāṇyam tathā api ukta rītyā prabalena āgamena virodhe durbalasya pratyakṣasya kutas na bādhaḥ iti ced ittham syāt ayam pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ yadi vyutpādite daurbalya prābalye yukte syātām na ca ubhaya prāmāṇyasya sākṣi vedya tve te yujyete iti āśayavān pratyakṣasya tātkālikam prāmāṇyam āgamasya ātyantikam iti vibhāgam tāvat apākaroti tad kālikam iti 
NSu_3.2.54a–3.2.54c.3	 tātkālikam pramāṇa tvam akṣajasya yadā bhavet aikya āgamasya kim na syāt yadi sākṣi gṛhītam api viśvasatya tva grāhiṇaḥ akṣajasya prāmāṇyam tātkālikam eva bhavet tarhi aikyāgamasya api prāmāṇyam sākṣi gṛhīta tva aviśeṣāt tātkālikam syāt eva iti na vibhāgaḥ siddhayati nanu aikya gāma prāmāṇyam api tātkālikam eva kintu pratyakṣam ābhāsīkṛtya nivartate yathā uktam veṇu saṅgharṣa jaḥ vahniḥ dagdhvā śāmyati tat vanam evam guṇa vyatyaya jaḥ vedaḥ śāmyati tat yathā a iti iti atas āha tasya api iti 
NSu_3.2.54d–3.2.54f.3	 tasya api etādṛśam yadi aikya prāmāṇya mithyā tvam yadā viśvasya satya tā aikya āgamasya api prāmāṇyam yadi tātkālikam svīkriyeta tadā viśvasya satyatā eva syāt nanu uktam atra pratyakṣam ābhāsīkṛtya paścāt aikya āgama prāmāṇyam nivartate iti bhavati tātkālikam na ca viśva satya tva āpattiḥ iti atas tasya api etādṛśam yadi a iti etat aikya pramāṇa mithyā tvam yadā a iti vyākhyātam aikya āgama prāmāṇyasya bādhya tvam yadā iti arthaḥ na kevalam prāmāṇya mātrasya bādhya tvam kintu dharmiṇaḥ vākyasya api iti jñāpanāya evam uktam 
NSu_3.2.54d–3.2.54f.5	 etat uktam bhavati syāt idam yadi prāmāṇyasya tātkālika tvam nāma anitya tvam iha vivakṣitam syāt na ca evam kṣaṇa mātra vartinaḥ api prāmāṇyasya viṣaya satya tva avyabhicāri tvena anitya tāyāḥ daurbalya hetutva asambhavāt kintu bādhya tvam eva tat ced aikya āgama prāmāṇyasya abhyupagatam tadā katham viśvasya satya tā na syāt iti nanu sākṣiṇaḥ viṣaya vyabhicāri tvāt tat gṛhītam aikya āgama prāmāṇyam abādhatayam eva iti āśaṅkayā āha aikya vākyasya iti 
NSu_3.2.55.1–3.2.55.3	 aikya āgamasya māna tvam yadi abādhyam iti iṣyate akṣajasya api māna tvam na abādhyam kim iti iṣyate sākṣi gṛhīta tva aviśeṣāt iti bhāvaḥ sākṣi gṛhīta tva aviśeṣāt viśva satya tā grāhaka pratyakṣa prāmāṇyasya bādhya tāyām aikya āgama prāmāṇyam api bādhyam syāt tad abādhya tve vā pratyakṣa prāmāṇyam api abādhyam eva eṣyavyam iti samudāya arthaḥ nanu advaita brahma avasthānam mokṣaḥ sa ca pratyakṣa prāmāṇyasya abādhya tve vyāhanyeta prapañca satya tvena sat dvaita tā āpatteḥ atas sākṣi vedya tva aviśeṣe api anena viśeṣeṇa pratyakṣa prāmāṇyam sākṣiṇā tātkālikam eva gṛhyate iti kalpyate iti atas āha advaita iti 
NSu_3.2.56a.1–3.2.56b.2	 advaita hāni sāmānyān evam tarhi aikya vākya prāmāṇyam api tathāvidham eva tad abādhya tve api advaitahānisāmānyena ukta lakṣaṇa mokṣa asiddheḥ na hi vākyam vā tad prāmāṇyam vā tad arthaḥ bheda abhāvaḥ vā brahma iti pratyakṣa prāmāṇyasya abādhya tve bahu prapañca āpattiḥ āgama prāmāṇya abādhyatāyām tu na evam iti ced na asya viśeṣasya vyartha tvāt iti āśayavān āha na iti  na viśeṣaḥ ca kaścana yat api advaita āgamasya prābalya upapādanāya svatas prāmāṇyam uktam tatra āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.2.56cd.1–3.2.56cd.2	 yadi svatas tvam prāmāṇye viśva sattā katham na te svatas tu adharmasya prāmāṇyam dharmi adhikaraṇa tayā vivakṣitam iti saptamī upapattiḥ yadi āgama prāmāṇyasya svatas tvam ucyate tadā pratyakṣa prāmāṇyam api svatas eva iti brūmaḥ samyak mithyā jñāna sādhāraṇa kāraṇa mātra janya tvam vā samyak mithyā jñāna sādhāraṇa jñāpaka mātra jñeya tvam vā prāmāṇyasya svatas tvam tad āgama janya jñāna vat pratyakṣa janyasya api aviśiṣyam eva tathā ca āgama prāmāṇyasya svatas tvam aṅgīkurvataḥ yatā tad viṣaya satyatā sammatā tathā svatas pramāṇa pratyakṣa viṣaya viśva sattā api katham na te sammata iti 
NSu_3.2.56cd.3–3.2.57ab.2	 syāt etat pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ svatas prāmāṇye api asti viśeṣaḥ yat pratyakṣam tātkālikam eva jñānasya prāmāṇyam janayati vākyantu ātyantikam tathā jñāna grāhakaḥ sākṣī pratyakṣa jñānasya tātkālikam eva prāmāṇyam gṛhṇāti vākya janya jñānasya tu ātyantikam iti mā evam asyām vyavasthāyām niyāmaka abhā= asya ukta tvāt doṣa antaram ca āha prāmāṇyasya ca iti prāmāṇyasya ca maryādā kālataḥ vyāhatā bhavet kālataḥ maryādā vyavacchedaḥ tātkālika tvam iti yāvat katham vyāhatiḥ iti atas āha kāla antare api iti 
NSu_3.2.57cd.1–3.2.57cd.3	 kāla antare apyamānam ced idānīm mānatā kutas amānam bādhita māna tvam ced pratyakṣam tātkālika śabdena hi idānīm asti kāla antare tu bādhyam iti parasya abhimatam tatra yadi ca pratyakṣam kāla antare api bādhita prāmāṇyam syāt tarhi idānīm tasya mānatā asti iti kutas syāt kāla traya sattā niṣedha rūpa tvāt bādhasya yadi ca pratyakṣa prāmāṇyam idānīm sat syāt katham kāla antare api tarhi bādhyeta iti vyāhatam eva tātkālika tva vacanam apramāṇam eva bhavatu tarhi pratyakṣam iti ced satyam bhavati bhavataḥ ayam manorathaḥ tad siddhiḥ eva idānīm api kaphoṇi guḍāyate advitīya brahma avasthāna lakṣaṇam mokṣam abhyupetya pratyakṣa prāmāṇya abādhya tāvat āgama prāmāṇya abādhya tāyām api tad hāniḥ samāna iti uktam idānīntu saḥ eva anupapannaḥ iti āśayavān pṛcchati mithyā tva mānam iti 
NSu_3.2.58ab.1–3.2.58ab.2	 mithyā tva mānam mokṣe api mānam kim na iti bhaṇya tām viśva mithyā tva pratipādaka mānam āgamaḥ anumānam vā mokṣe api mānam iti mokṣa samaye api abādhita svarūpa prāmāṇyam iti arthaḥ na iti bādhita svarūpa prāmāṇyam iti arthaḥ kiṃśabdaḥ pūrveṇa pareṇa ca sambaddhayate yat vā kākvā eva mānam iti ayam praśnaḥ jñātavyaḥ iti pṛṣṭasya uttaram bhaṇya tām ādye doṣam āha mānatvaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.58c.1–3.2.58d.2	 māna tve advaita hāniḥ syāt abādhita svarūpa prāmāṇya pakṣe tena eva sat dvitīya tvāt advaita hāniḥ syāt iti ukta lakṣaṇaḥ mokṣaḥ na siddhayet dvitīye dūṣaṇam āha amāna tve api iti  amāna tve api amokṣa tā amokṣa tā vivakṣita avasthāyāḥ iti śeṣaḥ viśvamithyā tva mānasya tad prāmāṇyasya ca bādhya tva pakṣe api mokṣaḥ na siddhayati katham iti atas āha viśvasya iti 
NSu_3.2.59ab.1–3.2.59ab.3	 viśvasya punar āpattiḥ mithyāmānam yadā na mā viśvamithyā tva mānam yadā na mā bādhita svarūpa prāmāṇyam syāt tadā viśvasya punar āpattiḥ syāt nāstitva pramāṇa bādhasya astitva avyabhicārāt viśva sadbhāve ca katham ukta lakṣaṇaḥ mokṣaḥ syāt iti ādau tāvat pratyakṣeṇa viśvam prāptam tad āgama ādinā apātataḥ apanīyam āgama ādeḥ ca bādhe punar tadāpatitam iti prati iti apekṣayā punar śabdaḥ viśvam tat bādhakam ca ubhayam api bādhitam iti ced na uttaratra dūṣaṇāt kiñca muktiḥ satī vāsatī vā pakṣa dvaye api na ukta lakṣaṇā muktiḥ siddhayati katham iti ādyam pratyāha asti ced iti 
NSu_3.2.59cd.1–3.2.59d.1	 asti ced mukta yavasthā ca dvaitāpattiḥ ātma svarūpam eva muktiḥ yathā uktam ātmā eva ajñānahāniḥ a iti avidyā astamayaḥ mokṣaḥ a iti ca tat katham dvaita āpattiḥ iti atas mukti avasthā iti uktam avasthā eva eṣā atmanaḥ na tu ātmā eva tathā tve hi prāk eva siddha tvāt prayatna vaiyarthyam na ca ātmā jñānasya sādhyaḥ anādi tvāt avidyādhvaṃsa viśiṣyaḥ na prāc siddhaḥ jñāna sādhyaḥ ca iti ced tat kim saḥ eva muktiḥ addhā iti ced tarhi viśiṣyasya sattva abhāvena satī muktiḥ iti ayuktam syāt kiñca muktiḥ nāma dharmaḥ sa katham ātmā eva syāt iti dvitīyam parācaṣṭe atas anyaḥ ca iti  atas anyathā 
NSu_3.2.60a.1–3.2.60a.3	 amukta tvam sattva pakṣāt pakṣa antare yadi mukti rasatī syāt tadā atmanaḥ amukta tvam syāt viṣāṇa asattve śaśaḥ hi aviṣāṇī dṛṣṭaḥ tathā ca kutas ukta lakṣaṇa tvam atha matam na muktiḥ satī na api asatī kintva nirvacanīyā iti tadā api amukta tā eva saṃsāre api anirvacanīyena eva hi dvitīyena sat dvitīya tvam tad uttaram api tat ced syāt katham amukta tvam na bhavet etena pañcama prakāra tā api nirastāḥ anirvacanīya tā parihārāt na hi caturtha prakāra tā avasthitiḥ anirvacanīya tvam tathā sati nirvacanīyatā āpatteḥ anirvacanīya avidyā nivṛttiḥ katham anirvacanīyā syāt iti ced ghaṭa pradhvaṃsaḥ yathā tathā iti jānīthāḥ tat etat saṅgraha āyātaḥ anyathā iti uktam anyathā asatī ced iti avakṣyat evam eva mukteḥ advitīya brahma avasthāna rūpa tā nirāsāya kāle api vikalpya doṣaḥ abhidhātavyaḥ iti āha tathā kālaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.60a.1–3.2.60b.3	 tathā kāle nanu ca mokṣa daśāyām kālaḥ asti na vā iti vikalpī aasti ced dvaitāpattiḥ a iti dūṣaṇam ca astu atas anyathāmukta tvam a iti katham atideśaḥ iti atas āha kāla adhīnā hi iti  kāla adhīnā hi mukta tā kāla adhīnā niyamena kāla adhikaraṇāḥ yat vastu tad kāla sambandhyā iva iti vyāpteḥ iti hi śabda arthaḥ na kevalam anumāna siddhaḥ mukteḥ kāla adhikaraṇa tā niyamaḥ kintu tadā vidvān adṛṣṭvā eva tam mucyate a iti āgama siddhaḥ api iti āha kālaḥ eva iti 
NSu_3.2.60cd.1–3.2.60de.3	 kālaḥ eva āgamaḥ api āha muktim kintataḥ yadi evam adhikaraṇena kālena vyāptā muktiḥ iti atas āha kāla iti  kāla nivartane mukteḥ api nivṛttiḥ syāt kāla asattve mukteḥ api asattvam syāt vyāpaka nivṛttau vyāpya nivṛtteḥ āvaśyaka tvāt tathā ca atideśaḥ yuktaḥ iti etat uktam bhavati yadi mokṣaḥ kāla sambandhī na syāt tadā śaśṛṅga ādi vat asattva āpattiḥ iti nanu cana mumukṣuḥ na vai muktaḥ iti eṣā paramārtha tā a iti mukteḥ asattvasya iṣṭa tvāt na iyam aniṣya āpattiḥ iti atas āha saṃsāri tvam iti 
NSu_3.2.60f.1–3.2.60f.3	 saṃsāri tvam atas bhavet caitanyasya sataḥ bandha abhāva lakṣaṇe mokṣe asati deva datta vat mukta abhimatasya api saṃsāri tvam bhavet bandha mithyā tvāt saṃsāraḥ muktiḥ ca na staḥ eva iti ced na anaṅgīkṛta tvam eva aniṣṭa tvam kintva prāmāṇika tva ādikam na ca bandha mithyā tvam prāmāṇikam iti uktam prāk tat evam āgama āditaḥ pratyakṣasya daurbalyam nirākurvatā tad miṣeṇa prābalyam ca vyutpāditam sākṣi pratyakṣasya āgama ādi prāmāṇya grāhaka tvena upajīvyatāyāḥ tat itarasya sākṣi niścita pramāṇa tāyāḥ ca sūcita tvāt tatas tad viruddhasya āgama ādeḥ eva aprāmāṇyam yuktam iti na kevalam upajīvya tva ādi guṇena anyatas prabalam pratyakṣam kintu svabhāvataḥ api iti āśayavān āha kva ca iti 
NSu_3.2.61ab.1–3.2.61ab.2	 kva ca pratyakṣatas prāptam anumāgama bādhitam pratyakṣataḥ prāptam iti sākṣātkāra siddham anumāna āgama śabdau liṅga vacana vacanau prāmāṇya nirṇayasya idānīm kriyamāṇa tvāt dṛṣṭam iti śeṣaḥ yadi hi pratyakṣa prāptam kvacid anumāna āgamābhyām bādhitam upalabdhavantaḥ tadā pratīmaḥ anumāditaḥ pratyakṣasya daurbalyam na ca tathā īśvare doṣa grāhi pratyakṣam āgama ādi bādhitam dṛṣṭam iti ced satyam tatra āgama ādeḥ upajīvyatayā bādhaka tvam iti vakṣyāmaḥ prābalyam āgamasya eva jātyā teṣu triṣu smṛtam a iti asya vaidika ārta viṣaya tvāt atra ca pṛthivī ādi prapañcasya prastuta tvāt na virodhaḥ 
NSu_3.2.61ab.3–3.2.61ab.4	 dṛṣṭam ca dahana śaitya anumānasya mama karṇe praviśya gajaḥ garjati ityādi vākyasya ca pratyakṣa bādhita tvāt tatra api pratyakṣam upajīvya tvāt bādhakam na tu svabhāvena iti ced na dharmi vyāpaka vyāpya vyāpti grāhaka tva abhāvāt dahana auṣṇya ādi grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya anauṣṇyam uṣṇa tā bhāvaḥ sa ca pratiyogi jñāna adhīna jñānaḥ pratiyogi bhūtam ca auṣṇyam tejasi eva pratyakṣeṇa pratyetavyam iti tasya upajīvya tvam iti ced na ukta uttara tvāt anuṣṇa tā sā dhane hi idam upapādanam kenacid hetunā śaitya sādhane tu asya anavakāśaḥ yadā ca samastasya api tejasaḥ anauṣṇyam sādhyate tadā bhavatu idam vyutpādanam agni mātra pakṣīkāre tu na idam upayujyate saura ādau tejasi uṣṇa tām sparśanena upalabhya cakṣuṣā upalabdhe a gnāvana auṣṇya sādhanasya tu svabhāva prabalena eva pratyakṣeṇa bādhaḥ iti eṣā diś dehasya ātma tvam pratyakṣa prāptam api dehaḥ na ātmā bhūta tvāt kārya tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ādi anumānenatam svāt śarīrāt pravṛhet a iti āgamena ca bādhitam dṛṣṭam anyathā bādhaka antara abhāvāt deha ātma tvasya vāstavatā āpātāt tat katham etat iti atas āha deha ātma tvam iti 
NSu_3.2.61c.1–3.2.61cd.3	 deha ātma tvam yadi deha ātma tvam pratyakṣatas prāptam anumāna āgama bādhitam dṛṣṭam iti yadi brūyāt tadā tat na iti brūmaḥ iti arthaḥ na tat iti pūrveṇa uttareṇa ca sambaddhayate kutas na iti atas āha na tat iti  na tat prāptam pratyakṣatas kvacid deha ātma tvam pratyakṣa prāptam eva na bhavati atas pratyakṣa prāptasya anumāna ādinā bādhaḥ iti atra na idam udāharaṇam ayam abhisandhiḥ na asti eva deha ātma tva pratītiḥ yā anumāna ādinā bādhyate yeṣām ca asti nāstika ādīnām teṣām api na indriya jāḥ kintu anumāna āgama ābhāsa janyā eva iti mā bhūt paṇḍita rūpāṇām deha ātma tva pratītiḥ pāmārāṇām tu asti eva sā eva asmākam udāharaṇam bhaviṣyati iti atas kvacid iti uktam tat upapādayati mama iti 
NSu_3.2.61ef.1–3.2.61ef.2	 mama dehaḥ iti hi eva na dehaḥ aham iti pramā sarvasya api jantoḥ mama dehaḥ iti eva hi pramā pratītiḥ na tu kasya api dehaḥ aham iti yat vā yasmāt sarveṣām mama dehaḥ iti eva pramā samyak pratītiḥ sarda anuvartate tasmāt dehaḥ aham iti pratītiḥ na avakāśam āsādayati iti deha ātma tva prati iti abhāve api deha dharmāṇām kārṣṇya ādīnām ātma niṣṭhatva pratītiḥ tāvat asti eva kṛṣṇaḥ aham ityādi vyavahāra sandarśanāt sā ca liṅga ādi anapekṣā eva jāyamānā pratyakṣa janyā eva bādhyate ca anumāna ādinā iti sā eva udāharaṇam bhaviṣyati iti atas āha upacāraḥ ca iti 
NSu_3.2.62ab.1–3.2.62c.2	 upacāraḥ ca kṛṣṇaḥ aham iti kṛṣṇaḥ aham iti ca pratītiḥ na asti iti anuvartate katham tarhi vyavahāraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ aham iti vyavahāraḥ tu upacāraḥ eva iti yojanāḥ asya yaḥ vyavahāra balena tathāvidhām pratītim api anuminoti tasya anaikāntika tvam syāt iti āśayavān ukta arthe dṛṣṭāntam āha kardama iti  kardama lepane vastrasya yadvat evam syāt yathā vastrasya kardama lepane sati kṛṣṇam vastram iti upacāra vyavahāraḥ bhavati evam prakṛte api syāt ayam abhisandhiḥ yaḥ hi vastrasya śauklayam kardama lepanam ca samyak avagacchati na tasya vastre kāṣṇi ar pratītiḥ asti vyavaharati ca kṛṣṇam vastram iti atas kṛṣṇaḥ aham iti vyavahārāt tathāvidha jñāna anumānam tatra vyabhicarati upacāra vyavahāraḥ asau= iti ced prakṛte api tathā kin na syāt iti 
NSu_3.2.62c.3–3.2.62c.4	 nanu kṛṣṇam vastram iti na upacāraḥ svatas śukle api vastre kardama upādhika kārṣṇi a sadbhāvena pratīti sambhavāt iti ced na kim idam aupādhikam nāma sādhana abhimate vyāptiḥ iva kardama sannidhānāt āropyamāṇam iti ced na āropāsambhasya ukta tvāt japā kusuma sannidhānāt sphaṭike lauhityam iva pratiphalati iti ced na vastrasya āsvacchatvāt ghṛta ādinā kuṅkuma gandhādiḥ iva kardama nābhi vyaktam iti ced na prāk vastre kārṣṇya sadbhāve māna abhāvāt 
NSu_3.2.62c.5	 atha agni saṃyogāt pārthiva dravye rūpa ādikam iva kardama upādhinā kṛtam iti matam tatra pṛcchāmaḥ kim kardamaḥ śauklayam nivartya kārṣṇyam vastre karoti uta anivartya eva na ādyaḥ kardama apagame śauklayā anupalabdhi prasaṅgāt na ca punar śauklayam utpannam kāraṇa abhāvāt na dvitīyaḥ yugapad rūpa dvaya adhiṣṭhāna virodhāt aupādhikasya api satya tvena svābhāvikā viśeṣāt 
NSu_3.2.62c.6–3.2.62b.2	 bhavatu vā vastre kathañcid kārṣṇyam aupādhikam kintat upanyāsena abhyarthate naca ukta vyabhicāra parihāraḥ eka udāharaṇa nirākaraṇe api mañcāḥ krośanti iti ādeḥ anekasya vyabhicāra udāharaṇasya sambhavāt atha vastre kardamena iva ātmani deha upādhinā kṛtam kārṣṇyam asti iti pratīti sambhāvanā vivakṣitā tatra āha yadi iti  yadi upādhi kṛtam tadā yadi vastraḥ iva ātmani deha upādhi kṛtam kārṣṇyam asti iti tad pratītiḥ sambhāvyate tadā pratyakṣa pratītasya anumāna ādinā bādhaḥ iti atra na idam udāharaṇam iti śeṣaḥ katham iti atas āha svatas iti 
NSu_3.2.62cd.1–3.2.62cd.2	 svatas śukla tva vat kārṣṇyam na mama iti pratīyate atra dṛṣṭānte dārṣya antike ca eka deśa utkīrtanena anyat api upalakṣyate tathā ca ayam arthaḥ vastre khalu kārṣṇyam kardama upādhi kṛtam pratīyamānam evam pratyetavyam svatiḥ śuklam eva idam vastram na kṛṣṇam kārṣṇyantu upa adhi kṛtam iti tathā atra api svatas nīrūpaḥ eva aham kārṣṇyam tu na mama svabhāvataḥ kintu deha upādhi kṛtam iti pratīyate iti aṅgīkartavyam tathā ca asyāḥ pratīteḥ yathārtha tvāt na anumāna ādinā bādhaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.62cd.3^1	 yat uktam deha ātma tā pratītiḥ na asti dehaḥ aham iti prati iti ananubhavāt iti tat asat aham iti pratīteḥ eva tad pratīti tvāt idam anidaṃ rūpa vastu garbhaḥ hi ahaṅkāraḥ yat ca uktam mama dehaḥ iti bheda pratīti anuvṛtteḥ deha ātma tva pratibhāsaḥ anupapannaḥ iti tat ayuktam bheda pratītya sampratipatteḥ mama dehaḥ iti vyavahārasya mama svarūpam iti vat aupacārika tva upapatteḥ na khalu kevale dehe ātma tva pratītiḥ kintarhi deha indriya antaḥkaraṇa ādi saṅghāte tatra saṅghāta apekṣayā deha mātre sambandha pratītiḥ api na bādhikā prasādasya stambhaḥ vṛkṣasya śākhā iti yathā 
NSu_3.2.62cd.3^2–3.2.62cd.4	 na ca deha indriya ādeḥ ātmanaḥ ca bheda avabhāse sphuṭam pramāṇam asti yena deha ādi ātma pratītiḥ virudhyeta yat api uktam kṛṣṇaḥ aham ityādi rūpa deha ādi dharmāṇām ātma niṣṭha pratītiḥ na asti pramāṇa abhāvāt iti tat na kṛṣṇaḥ aham iti vyavahāra darśanāt jñāna mūla tā khalu vyavahārasya utsargataḥ siddhāḥ tad anupapattau tu upacāra tva kalpanā na ca na aham kṛṣṇaḥ iti ādi rūpā pratītiḥ asti yad bhayāt upacāra tvam kalpayāmaḥ atas bheda ādi pratīti abhāvāt asti eva ubhayī pratītiḥ yathā aha anyonyasmin= anyonya ātmaka tām anyonya dharmān= ca adhyasya a iti pratyakṣa jā ca iyam pratītiḥ iti katham pratyakṣa siddhasya na anumāna ādinā bādhaḥ iti atas āha katham ca iti 
NSu_3.2.63ab.1–3.2.63ab.2	 katham ca bhedaḥ deha ādeḥ ātmanaḥ na pramīyate bheda śabdena asaṃsargaḥ api gṛhyate deha ādi śabdena saṅghātaḥ tad dharmāḥ ca yadā deha ādeḥ iti pañcamī tadā atmanaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī yadā ca ātmanaḥ iti pañcamī tadā deha ādeḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī anyonya āropasya pareṇa ukta tvāt deha ādi saṅghātasya ātmanaḥ ca anyonyam bhedaḥ tad dharmāṇām ca parasparam asaṃsargaḥ pratīyate eva iti arthaḥ tat katham iti atas āha jāta mātrāḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.63c–3.2.64ab.2	 jāta mātrāḥ mṛgāḥ gāvaḥ hastinaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ khaṣāḥ bhaya abhaya sva bhoga ādau kāraṇāni vijānate jātāḥ eva na tu vyāpāra antaram kṛtavantaḥ bhujyate iti bhogaḥ sukham ādipadena duḥkham siṃha vyāghra ādīni bhaya kāraṇāni mātrādīni abhaya kāraṇāni stana pāna ādīni sukha kāraṇāni śaṅkva ādinā nayana antar kaṇḍūyana ādīni duḥkha kāraṇāni iti vijānate atas eva siṃha ādi dhvani mātreṇa palāyante mātrā ādīni ca upasarpanti stana pāna ādi artham pravartante varjayanti śaṅku kaṇḍūyana ādīni tatas kim iti atas āha asmṛtau= iti asmṛtau pūrva dehasya vijñānam tat katham bhavet tat vijñānam bhaya ādi kāraṇam etat iti vijñānam pūrva deha asmaraṇe tat vijñānam katham na bhavet iti atas āha anvaya iti 
NSu_3.2.64cd.1–3.2.64cd.3^1	 anvaya vyatireka ādeḥ anusandhāna vismṛtau ādipadena dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇoḥ grahaṇam yat vā adi grahaṇena upadeśaḥ gṛhyate anvaya vyatireka ādeḥ vismṛtau= iti sambandhaḥ na kevalam etāvat kintu tathā ca ayam iti anusandhanasya ca vismṛtau satyām vijñānam tat katham bhavet iti sambandhaḥ etat uktam bhavati asti tāvat mṛga ādīnām stana pāna ādau pravṛttiḥ śaṅku kaṇḍūyanāditaḥ nivṛttiḥ ca tatas anumīyate vidyete tatra teṣām rāga dveṣau= iti rāga dveṣayoḥ eva pravṛtti kāraṇa tvena asmad ādau nirṇīta tvāt rāga dveṣābhyām ceṣi ā niṣya sādhana tva jñānam tasya eva rāga ādi kāraṇa tayā niścita tvāt 
NSu_3.2.64cd.1–3.2.64cd.3^2	 na ca tat jñānam pratyakṣa sādhyam kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya atīndriya tvāt kintu anumāna upadeśa sādhyam eva na ca mṛga ādīnām upadeśaḥ sambhavati anadhikārāt tasmāt prāc bhavīya upadeśaḥ iti vācyam naca asmṛtaḥ asau tad kāraṇam iti tad smṛti sadbhāvaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ yat vā anumānam na ca tat yat yat stana pānam tat iṣya sādhanam yat iṣya sādhanam na bhavati tad stana pānam na bhavati yathā amukam stana pānam ca idam iti anvaya ādi smaraṇena vinā bhavati nacān anubhūte smṛtiḥ utpadyate naca asmin janmani anvaya ādi anubhavaḥ asti jāta mātrāṇām udāhṛta tvāt atas janma antara anubhūta anvaya ādi smaraṇam eṣṭavyam 
NSu_3.2.64cd.4	 prāc bhavīyasya upadeśasya anvaya ādeḥ ca smaraṇe pūvardeha smaraṇam api aṅgīkartavyam samāna yogakṣema tvāt naced deha antara smaraṇam mṛga ādīnām tadā tad aviśiṣya an vayaya ādi smaraṇam api na syāt tad abhāve ca anumāna ādya bhāveneṣyā niṣya kāraṇa tā jñānam na utpadyeta tad anutpāde ca rāga ādi anutpādāt pravṛtti ādi anutpadyate kāraṇa abhāve kārya abhāvasya sulabha tvāt adṛṣṭa vaśāt pravṛtti ādi iti ced na dṛṣṭa atikrama doṣāt 
NSu_3.2.64cd.5–3.2.64cd.7	 etāvān= tu adṛṣṭasya upayogaḥ yan janma antara anubhūtam sarvam asmaran= etāvat smarati yādṛcchikam pravṛtti ādi bhavatu iti ced na anantānām tad anupapatteḥ atas eva mṛgāḥ ityādi bahuvacanam astu jāti svabhāvaḥ ayam na bhinna jātīyānām api upalambhāt atas eva mṛgāḥ gāvaḥ ityādi uktam dṛṣṭa atikrama doṣaḥ ca aparihāryaḥ tasmāt asti mṛga ādīnām pūrva deha smaraṇam tathā eva mānuṣa ādīnām api iti siddham iti tathā api kim prakṛtaḥ iti atas āha yadā iti 
NSu_3.2.65ab.1–3.2.65ab.2	 yadā deha antara jñānam deha aikyau= asitiḥ kutas yadā evam etat deha vartinaḥ mama na kevala mayam eva dehaḥ kintu tad prāc anyaḥ api abhūt iti deha antara smaraṇam pramitam tadā etat dehena svasya aikya avasāyaḥ kutas syāt kintu aneka maṇiṣu anusyūtam sūtram iva aneka deha anusyūtam ātmānam paśyataḥ svasya tatas atyanta bheda avasitiḥ eva yuktāḥ tathā ca kārṣṇya ādīnām asaṃsarga jñānam api sustham eve pareṇa deha ādi āropa nibandhana tva abhyupagamāt tat āropasya ahaṃpratyayaḥ tu na āropaḥ iti prāk eva uktam atas mama dehaḥ iti pratyayaḥ na anyathayitavyaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ aham iti ādiḥ ca upacāraḥ aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.65ab.3–3.2.65cd.1	 syāt etat na mukhya artha anupapatti mātrāt upacāraḥ labhyate kintu sādṛśye sambandhe vā prayojane ca sati na ca atra sādṛśya ādikam asti tat katham ayam upacāraḥ kiñca mṛga ādīnām pāmārāṇām manuṣyāṇām ca yadi deha ātma bheda jñānam syāt tarhinā eṣām mama aham iti dhīḥ śva sṛgāla bhakṣya a ityādayaḥ purāṇa ādi vyavahārāḥ katham saṅgacchante katham ca deha ātma viveka arthānām upadeśānām ānarthakyam na syāt deha anukūla pratikūla arthayaḥ rāga dveṣau ca deha ātma bheda jñāne sati na syātām tatas ca saṃsāra anupapattiḥ iti atas āha vyāpta tvāt iti vyāpta tvāt ātmanaḥ dehe vyavahāreṣu apāṭavāt 
NSu_3.2.66a–3.2.66a–3.2.66c.2^1	 bheda jñāne api ca aṅgāra vahni vat svāvivikta vat bhavanti vyavahārāḥ ca bheda ajñāne api ca iti caśabdaḥ vyavahāreṣu apāṭavāt ca iti sambaddhayate aṅgāra vahni vat iti aṅgāra vyāpta vanhau= iva iti arthaḥ svāvivikta vat sva abhinne sva saṃsṛṣṭe ca yathā tathā iti arthaḥ vyavahārāḥ ca iti caśabdaḥ anukta samuccaya arthaḥ ātmanaḥ vyāpta tvāt svāviviktava dvaya vahārāḥ bhavanti iti anena eka deśa tva lakṣaṇam sādṛśyam sambandhaḥ api abhihitaḥ bheda jñāne api abhinnava dvaya vahāre kim prayojanam iti asya uttaram bheda jñāne api lokānām vyavahāreṣu apāṭavāt svāviviktavadvayavahāre kim prayojanam iti asya uttaram bheda jñāne api lokānām vyavahāreṣu apāṭava vāt svāviviktava dvaya vahārāḥ bhavanti iti 
NSu_3.2.66a–3.2.66c.2^2–3.2.66c.3	 na prayojanam uddiśya lokāḥ tathā vyavaharanti kintu vivikta vyavahāreṣu pāṭava abhāvāt eva iti apāṭave hetuḥ vyāpta tvāt ātmanaḥ dehaḥ iti rūḍha tvāt ca eteṣām vyavahārāṇām na prayojana apekṣā iti āśayena uktam aṅgāra vahni vat iti bheda jñāne api ātmanaḥ deha vyāpta tvāt aṅgāra vahni vat lokānām vyavahāreṣu apāṭavāt atyanta vivikta vedaneṣu asāmarthyāt purāṇa ādi vyavahārāḥ ca svāvivikta vat bhavanti viśada viveka abhāva vivakṣayā eva te vyavahārāḥ iti āśayaḥ atas eva viveka arthānām upadeśānām ca sārthakyam upapadyate viśadaḥ hi vivekaḥ puruṣa arthāya kalpate na tu autpattikaḥ ātmanaḥ dehe vyāpta tvāt atyantam prema āspada tvāt rāga ādayaḥ yujyante eva iti nanu jñānam eva vyavahāra kāraṇam tat ced asti katham tarhi vyavahāreṣu apāṭavam iti atas āha na hi iti 
NSu_3.2.66d.1–3.2.67c.2	 na hi pratyakṣa gān api arthān yathā anubhavataḥ pratipādayitum kṣamāḥ lokāḥ yathā anubhavataḥ anubhava anusāreṇa pratipādayitum vyavahartum yamalayoḥ atyanta vivekam paśyantaḥ api mātṛ ā ādayaḥ katham etau viviktau= avagantavyau= iti pṛṣṭā evam iti sva pratyakṣa anubhava anusāreṇa na parān pratipādayitum kṣamantaḥ ityādi anubhava siddham kā nāma atra kathantā atha tatra atyanta sādṛśyam pratibandhakam tarhi atra api aṅgāra vahni vat ātmanaḥ dehe vyāpta tvam pratibandhakam uktam eva śukti rajata ādi pratyakṣāṇām anumāna ādinā bādhaḥ na asti iti anyatra upapāditam iti āśayavān kva ca pratyakṣatas prāptam a ityādinā uktam upasaṃharati tatas hi iti 
NSu_3.2.67cd.1–3.2.68a.2	 tatas hi pratyakṣa siddham na anyena kenacid śakyam vārayitum kvāpi kvacid pratīteḥ eva abhāvāt kvacid pratīti sadbhāve api pratyakṣa janya tva abhāvāt kvacid pratyakṣa pratīti bhāve api yathārtha tvāt kvacid ayathārtha tve api prabala pratyakṣeṇa eva bādhāt iti arthaḥ atas eva kvāpi iti uktam anyena iti anupajīvyena āgama ādinā iti arthaḥ tat evam svabhāvataḥ prabalena pratyakṣeṇa viruddhau= anumāna āgama avabhāsau= eva iti 
NSu_3.2.68a.3	 bhavatu āgamāditaḥ pratyakṣam prabalam mā vā bhūt tad virodhaḥ tu āgama ādeḥ na asti bhinna viṣaya tvāt tathā hi āgama ādikam khalu āgāminam viśvasya bādham pratipādayati na tu adhunātanam saḥ eva ca mithyā ādi padena vedanīyaḥ tasya ca pratyakṣa virodhaḥ tadā syāt yadi āgāminam api viśvasya bādham pratyakṣam pratikṣipet naca evam tasya vartamāna mātra grāhi tvena āgāminam api viśvasya bādham pratyakṣam pratikṣipet naca evam tasya vartamāna mātra grāhi tvena āgāmi bādhā bhāva grahaṇe sāmarthya abhāvāt yathā uktam sambaddham vartamānam ca gṛhyate cakṣuḥ ādināa iti idānīntana bādha abhāva grahaṇe api na virodhaḥ na ca bhinna viṣayayoḥ virodhaḥ asti tathā sati idānīntana ghaṭa abhāva grāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa bhaviṣyati ghaṭaḥ iti āgama ādeḥ virodhaḥ syāt iti 
NSu_3.2.68a.4	 ucyate asti tāvat pratyakṣam vartamāna kālīnam bādhā bhāvam āvedayati iti parasya api sampratipattiḥ āgamaḥ ca na iha nānā asti ityādi rūpaḥ vartamānam eva viśvasya bādham pratipādayati iti katham na pratyakṣa viruddhaḥ astu vā āgāmi bodhaka tvam āgama ādeḥ tathā api bādhaḥ nāma traikālika satta niṣedhaḥ sa ca vartamāna kālīna sattā grāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa viruddhayate eva iti tad pratipādakasya āgama ādeḥ katham na pratyakṣa virodhaḥ 
NSu_3.2.68a.5–3.2.68a.6	 etena asmad pratyakṣam asmad niṣṭham eva bādham pratikṣeptum kṣamate na puruṣa antara gatam iti nirastam ghaṭa ādi sattā niṣedha rūpasya bādhasya tad sattā grāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa virodha avaśyambhāvāt tat evam pratyakṣasya vartamāna mātra grāhi tve api āgama ādeḥ tad virodhaḥ duṣparihāraḥ eva tathā api prasaktau vastu sthitiḥ vaktavyā iti āśayavān pratyakṣasya vartamāna mātra grāhitā niyamam apākartum uttaram prakaraṇam ārabhamāṇaḥ sākṣi pratyakṣasya tāvat tat niyamam apākaroti tat ced iti 
NSu_3.2.68b–3.2.68d.3^1	 tat ced na uttara gocaram katham eva uttaraḥ kālaḥ tad gaḥ mokṣaḥ ca gamyate gamyate iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ tat iti pratyakṣa viśeṣa sākṣiṇam eva adhikurute bhagavān bhāṣya kāraḥ ced śabda śravaṇāt tarhi iti adhyāhāryam na uttara gocaram iti vartamāna mātra gocaram iti arthaḥ pramāṇa antarāṇām prāk eva dūṣita tvāt iti eva arthaḥ uttaraḥ iti atītasya api upalakṣaṇam yeṣām ca akhaṇḍaḥ eva kālaḥ taiḥ api upādhi bhedaḥ aṅgīkartavyaḥ eva anyathā sarva ākhyāta pratyayānām aikāthyarprasaṅgāt atas svābhāvikaḥ vaupādhikaḥ vā asti uttaraḥ kālaḥ mā avagāmi uttaraḥ kālaḥ idānīm kinnaḥ chinnam iti atas āha tat gaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.68b–3.2.68d.3^2	 katham eva iti anuvartate uttara kāla anavagatau= iti ca arthaḥ gamyate avagamyate atra atītasya kaṇṭhataḥ asaṅkīrtanam kaiścid atīta mokṣasya anaṅgīkṛta tvāt uttara kāla anavagatau tad sambandhi tayā mokṣaḥ api na avagamyate eva viśeṣaṇa anavagame viśiṣyān avagamasya prasiddha tvāt bhaviṣyati mokṣaḥ iti avagama abhāve ca tad arthaḥ prayatnaḥ na syāt mokṣe sarvasya bādhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti etat api na syāt iti śuka vāmadeva ādayaḥ jñānena muktāḥ abhūvat = aham api muktaḥ bhaviṣyāmi ityādi avagatiḥ āgamāt eva bhaviṣyati kim atra sākṣiṇaḥ atīta anāgata artha gocara tvena iti atas āha āgamaḥ api iti 
NSu_3.2.69a–3.2.69c.2	 āgamaḥ api hi sāmānye siddhe pratyakṣatas punar viśeṣam gamayet eva eṣā khalu āgamasya sthitiḥ yat sāmānye anvaya sāmānyavati padārtha samūhe pratyakṣataḥ pramāṇa antareṇa siddhe sati punar paścāt viśeṣam anvaya viśeṣavantam tam eva padārtha samūham gamayet iti eva na punar padārthān api gamayet iti nadyāḥ tīre pañca phalāni santi iti ādau tathā darśanāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ kim prāk padātharsiddhayā iti atas āha katham iti 
NSu_3.2.69d.1–3.2.69d.3	 katham śakti grahaḥ anyathā yadi padārthāḥ prāk na siddhāḥ tarhi padānām teṣu vācaka tva śakti grahaṇam na syāt avidita viṣayāyāḥ śakteḥ gṛhītum aśakyatvāt na hi kāṣṭham ajānan kuṭhārasya tad chedana śaktim jñātu śaknoti astu padānām śakti grahāya padārtha jñānam āvaśyakam atha śaktigrahaḥ eva kimarthaḥ iti atas āha atīta iti 
NSu_3.2.70.1–3.2.70.3	 atīta anāgata artheṣu jāte śakti grahe akhilam viśeṣam jñāpayet vākyam na tad ajñāta śaktike atra atīta anāgata grahaṇam prakṛta apekṣam akhilam api vākyam padānām padārtheṣu vācaka tva śakti grahe jātaḥ eva anvaya viśeṣam gamayet na tu tat vākyam padārtheṣu pada samūhe ajñāta śaktike sati viśeṣam gamayet iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām vākyasya vākya artha avagatau kartavyāyām śakti grahaḥ aṅgam iti jñāyate atas asau= arthanīyaḥ prakṛta vākyānām ca atīta anāgata artha saṃsarga bodhaka tvāt atīta anāgata artheṣu luṅḍa ādi anta padānām śaktiḥ jñātavyā iti arthaḥ astu śakti graha avaśyambhāvaḥ kintu vartamāneṣu eva artheṣu na atīta anāgateṣu anupayogāt iti atas āha śaktiḥ ced iti 
NSu_3.2.71ab.1–3.2.71ab.3	 śaktiḥ ced vartamāne syāt na atīta anāgatam vadet yadi vartamānaḥ eva arthe padānām śaktiḥ gṛhītā syāt tadā vākyam atīta anāgatam atīta anāgata artha saṃsargam na vadet na pratipādayet sahakāri virahāt sarvaḥ dvandvaḥ vibhāṣaya eka vat bhavati iti ekavat bhāvaḥ atīta anāgata artheṣu iti uktasya abhiprāya kathanam etat astu atīta anāgata artheṣu api padānām śakti grahaḥ tatas kim iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.2.71cd.1–3.2.71cd.4^1	 yadi śakti grahaḥ anyatra katham sa syāt tad agrahe vartamānāt anyatra atīta anāgatayoḥ api pada śakti grahaḥ yadi aṅgīkṛtaḥ tadā saḥ atīta anāgata artheṣu pada śakti grahaḥ tad agrahe atīta anāgata artha agrahe katham syāt na kathañcid nirviṣayāyāḥ śakteḥ jñātum aśakyatvāt atas atīta anāgata artha jñānam api aṅgīkāryam ayam atra samudāya arthaḥ vākyam tāvat padārtha saṃsarga viśeṣa lakṣaṇam vākya artham eva bodhayati na padārtha mātram tat ca apekṣate padānām padārtheṣu vācaka tva śakti graham śakti grahaḥ ca padārtha graham 
NSu_3.2.71cd.1–3.2.71cd.4^2	 padārtha grahaḥ ca pramāṇa antara āyattaḥ na pada vākya janyaḥ itaretara āśraya ādi doṣa prasaṅgāt yatra ca atīta anāgata artha saṃsargaḥ vākya arthaḥ tatra atīta anāgata artha grahaṇam āvaśyakam śuka vāmadevedayaḥ muktāḥ abhūvan= aham ca muktaḥ bhaviṣyāmi iti ādikam ca tathā tasmāt luṅḍa ādi anta pada vācyānām atītānagata kāla tad sambandhi padārthānām ca grahaṇam āgamena ukta artha pratipattim abhilaṣa tā api pareṇa eṣyavyam na ca tad sākṣiṇā vinā bhavati iti katham atīta anāgata artha grāhiṇaḥ tasya vartamāna mātra viṣaya tvam iti mīmāṃsaka mata anusāreṇa śaṅkate sāmānyam iti 
NSu_3.2.72ab.1–3.2.72ab.3	 sāmānyam dṛṣṭam eva asau= anyatra gamayet yadi asau= iti prakṛvākya eka deśasya śabdasya parāmarśaḥ sakalam api vastu sāmānya viśeṣa ātmakam tatra sāmānya ākāraḥ eva śabda vācyaḥ viśeṣaḥ tu lakṣyaḥ eva iti tāvat niṣyaṅkitam sāmānyam ca atīta anāgata viśeṣeṣu ekam eva tat ca vartamānam cakṣuḥ ādinā dṛṣṭam śabda śakti viṣaya tayā avagatam eva anyatra kāla antare api śabdaḥ bodhayati tatra kim atīta anāgata artha jñānena viśeṣāṇām hi śabda vācya tve teṣām atīta ādi rūpa tvāt śakti grahaṇāya atīta ādi jñānam apekṣitam syāt na ca luṅḍa ādi śakti grahaṇāya atīta anāgata ādi kāla grahaṇam aparihāryam iti vācyam tatra api kāla tva jāteḥ eva vācya tvāt na hi vaiśeṣika ādi vat mī māṃsakānām nissāmānyam kim api asti atas na śakti grahāya atīta ādi graha apekṣā iti uttaram āha sāmānyā iti 
NSu_3.2.72cd.1–3.2.72cd.3	 sāmānya varjitam vastu svarūpam gamayet katham astu tāvat sarva viśeṣa anugatam nityam go tva ādi sāmānyam eva gavā ādi śabda vācva tvam sāsnādi mantaḥ viśeṣāḥ tu lakṣyāḥ eva tathā api idam vaktavyam svarūpa śabdaḥ vastu svarūpāṇi avagamayati na vā iti na iti pakṣe anubhava virodhaḥ ādye katham kayā vṛttyā iti vācyam na tāvat lakṣaṇayā vācya artha dvārā eva sakṣaṇa asambhavāt sāmānyasya eva vācya tvāt svarūpāṇām ca sāmānya varjita tvāt atas svarūpa śabdaḥ vastu svarūpāṇām vācakaḥ iti eva aṅgīkāryam iti nanu sarva sāmānyānām vastu svarūpa ābahirbhāvāt sāmānya varjitam svarūpam iti katham iti atas āha na iti 
NSu_3.2.73ab.1–3.2.73cd.2	 na svarūpa tva sāmānyam kena api aṅgīkṛtam kvacid satyam santi svarūpe sāmānyāni na ca tāni svarūpa śabda vācyāni na hi sāsnādimati piṇḍe vatarmānam paśu tvam go śabda vācyam kintu go tvam eva tat atra api svarūpa śabdasya vācyam sāmānyam abhyupagacchatā svarūpa tvam eva aṅgīkāryam tat ca na asti kena api parīkṣakeṇa kvacid api anaṅgīkṛta tvāt māṅgīkāri kena api svarūpa tva sāmānyam mayā tu aṅgīkariṣyate na hi sarvaiḥ aṅgīkṛtam eva aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti asti niyamaḥ tathā tve darśana bheda asambhavāt iti vaiyātyāt vadantam pratyāha svarūpam ced iti svarūpam ced anugatam vyāvṛttam tatra kim bhavet svarūpam iti bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ tatra vastuni kiṃśabdaḥ praśne evam satya tva praśnaḥ niruttaraḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ tat katham iti atas āha sarva iti 
NSu_3.2.74a–3.2.74e.3	 sarva anugata dharmāṇām ante hi sva tvam iṣyate kim vyāvṛttam iti praśne svarūpam iti kevalam syāt uttaram yasmāt sarveṣām anugata dharmāṇām ante avasāne svat tvam svarūpa tvam iṣyate mīmāṃsakena tasmāt kim tatra vyāvṛttam iti praśne kṛte svarūpa tvam iti eva uttaram vaktavyam syāt etat uktam bhavati dravyeṣu atyantam vyāvṛttāḥ dharmāḥ antyāḥ viśeṣāḥ iti vaiśeṣikaiḥ aṅgīkṛtam viśeṣeṣu api viśeṣa antara aṅgīkāre anavasthānāt tatra yathā svarūpa tvam eva vyāvṛttam tathā dravyeṣu api tat eva astu kim viśeṣaiḥ iti viśeṣān avajñāya tad sthāne svarūpa tvam abhiṣiñcatā mīmāṃsakena kim vyāvṛttam iti praśne antyāḥ viśeṣāḥ iti vaktum na śakyataḥ eva apasiddhānta āpātāt guṇa ādayaḥ tu vyāvṛtta tve api anugata ādhāra tayā aṅgīkṛtāḥ anugata kalpāḥ eva atas svarūpa tvam eva vaktavyam tasya ca idānīm anugata tva aṅgīkāre katham ayam praśnaḥ niruttaraḥ na bhavet iti nanu bhedaḥ eva vyāvṛttaḥ bhaviṣyati tasya anugateḥ anugata ādhāra tāyāḥ ca abhāvāt iti ataḥ āha tatas iti 
NSu_3.2.74ef.1–3.2.74ef.3	 tatas anyat ced tat eva svayam eva naḥ ekasya eva śabdasya tarhi iti arthaḥ tatas svarūpa tvāt anyat bheda lakṣaṇam vyāvṛttam yadi aṅgīkriyate tarhi tat eva asmākam svayam svarūpam padārtha svarūpam udāhṛtam tatra bhedaḥ eva udāharaṇam bhaviṣyati iti arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati udāharaṇasya anāt araṇīya tvāt bhedaḥ tāvat nissāmānyaḥ api śabda bodhyaḥ vacana vṛttyā eva iti aṅgīkaraṇīyam na ca vācakaḥ śabdaḥ śakti grahaṇe vinār atham bodhayati iti tatra tasya śakti grahaḥ api eṣyavyaḥ iti tatas kim prakṛtaḥ iti atas āha evam iti 
NSu_3.2.75a–3.2.75cd.2	 evam vyāvṛtta rūpe api yadā śakti grahaḥ bhavet tasya evam ukta prakāreṇa vyāvṛtta rūpe nissāmānye api svarūpe vā bhede vā svarūpa bheda ādi śabdānām vācaka tva śakti grahaḥ yadā aṅgīkṛtaḥ bhavet tadā sa ca śakti grahaḥ tasya sva rūpa ādeḥ jñānam vinā kutas bhavet sambandha jñānasya sambandhi jñāna pūrvakatva niyamāt na bhavet eva iti tat jñānam aṅgīkaraṇīyam sarveṣām svarūpāṇām bhedānām ca jñāne sārvajñam āpatitam iti atas āha sāmānyatas iti  sāmānyatas jñānam vinā sa ca bhavet kutas sāmānyatas jñānena eva vyutpatti upapattiḥ viśeṣataḥ jñāna abhāvāt ca sārvajñān āpattiḥ iti arthaḥ nanu sāmānya varjitasya svarūpa ādeḥ katham sāmānyatas jñānam iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_3.2.76ab.1–3.2.76cd.1	 atas viśeṣa sāmānya rūpam sarvam api iṣyate sarvam api vastu asmābhiḥ viśeṣa sāmānya rūpam vyāvṛtta rūpam sāmānya rūpam ca iṣyate atas na kācid anupapattiḥ kutas evam iṣyate atas pūrva nyāyāt yadi vyāvṛttam eva syāt tadā ukta prakāreṇa sārvajñam āpadyeta śakti graha abhāvaḥ vā syāt yadi ca sāmānya rūpam eva bhavet tadā vyāvṛtta buddhayanupapattiḥ eva iti nanu idam pūrva ukta viruddham ucyate yāvatā prāk svarūpa ādikam nissāmānyam eva iti prasādhya idānīm sarvam api viśeṣa sāmānya rūpam iṣyate iti ucyate iti atas āha vyāvṛttam iti vyāvṛttam yat ca sāmānyam tat eva syāt viśeṣataḥ 
NSu_3.2.77ab.1–3.2.77ab.3	 naca eka dharmatā tena padārthānām parasparam yat eva vyāvṛttam svarūpam tat eva viśeṣa balena sāmānyam ca syāt yatas tena kāraṇena padārthānām parasparam eka dharma tā na asti iti etat uktam bhavati yad prāk svarūpa bheda ādau sāmānyam na asti iti uktam tad padārtha svarūpāṇām parasparam anugata eka dharma tā na asti iti abhiprāyeṇa tad abhāve api vyāvṛtta svarūpa abhinnasya pratiniyatasya sāmānya ākārasya abhyupagame viśeṣa sāmānya rūpam sarvam apīṣyate iti uktam iti na pūrva uttara virodhaḥ na ca etat ayuktam ekasya eva vastunaḥ viśeṣa balena vyāvṛtta anuvṛtta buddhi janaka tvena viśeṣa sāmānya rūpa tā upapatteḥ iti evam go tva ādi sāmānyasya anugata tvam aṅgīkṛtya svarūpa tva ādi sāmānya abhāvāt tatra śabda śakti graha artham tad svarūpa jñānam apekṣitam iti uktam idānīm go tva ādikam api na anugatam iti āha dharmāṇām iti 
NSu_3.2.77c.1–3.2.77c.3	 dharmāṇām bheda dṛṣṭayā eva padārthānām paramparam eka dharma tā na iti etāvat anuvata ṛte samudāya vyatiriktānām śauklaya ādi dharmāṇām bheda dṛṣṭayā pratidharmi vyāvṛtta tva darśanāt tat dṛṣṭāntena gavā ādi padārthānām api parasparam eka dharma tā anugata go tvā ādi dharma vattā na iti anumātavyam ayam atra prayogaḥ go tva ādikam prativyakti vyāvṛttam samudāya atirikta dharma tvāt śauklaya ādi vat iti eva śabdaḥ pratijñayā sambaddhayate tena anugata buddhi bādhaḥ iti nirākaroti anugata buddheḥ anyathā eva upapādita tvāt athavā yathā anyāsām eva astu sambandhaḥ prābhākarāḥ manyante rūpa ādayaḥ api dharmāḥ anuvṛttāḥ eva na tu prativyakti bhidyate atas sādhya vikalatā iti tad nirāsāya bheda dṛṣṭayā eva iti uktam anyathā bhedāt iti eva avakṣyat śauklaya ādeḥ vyāvṛtta tve anuvṛtta pratyayaḥ viruddhayeta iti atas āha tat iti 
NSu_3.2.77d.1–3.2.78ab.2	 tad sādṛśyasya darśanāt śauklayam idam śauklayam idam iti pratītau hima śauklayasādṛśyam eva himāṃśu śauklaye pratīyate na tu tena aikyam iti atas na virodhaḥ mā bhūt anugatam sāmānyam tatas kim prakṛtaḥ iti atas āha atas iti atas sarva padārthāḥ ca sāmānyāt sākṣi gocarāḥ anugata sāmānya abhāvena atīta anāgata vartamāna vyaktīnām eva vācya tvāt agṛhīta śaktīnām ca padānām abodhaka tvāt śakti grahaṇasya ca padārtha jñānena vinā asambhavāt viśeṣataḥ jñāne sārvajñāpatteḥ iti arthaḥ sarve iti vartamāna atīta anāgatāḥ astu atīta ādi jñāna apekṣā śakti grahasya tat ca sākṣiṇā iti kutas iti atas āha sarvam iti 
NSu_3.2.78cd.1–3.2.78cd.3	 sarvam iti eva vijñānam sarveṣām katham anyathā eva śabdaḥ viśeṣa ākāra vyavaccheda arthaḥ pramāṇa antara abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ anumānena atīta ādi sarva sāmānya jñānam bhaviṣyati iti asya ca idam uttaram atīta anāgata vartamānam sarvam api liṅgam anena sādhyena vyāptam iti jñāna apekṣam khalu anumānam na ca etat jñānam sākṣiṇā vinā sambhavati iti yat vā sākṣiṇaḥ atīta ādi sarva sāmāni a ākāra gocara tve pramāṇa antaram eva anena ucyate atīta ādikam sarvam dhūma ādi tathāvidhena agni ādinā vyāptam iti jñāna pūrvakam khalu anumānam tathā ca sākṣiṇaḥ atīta ādi gocara tva abhāve anyasya tathāvidhasya abhāvāt anumāna mātra ucchedaḥ syāt iti kiñca asti tāvat sarveṣām sarva śabda śakti grahaḥ anyathā sarvam khalu idam brahma a iti vyavahāra vilopa prasaṅgāt śakti grahaḥ ca artha graha apekṣaḥ iti sarveṣām sāmānyatas sarvam iti jñānam aṅgī kāryam sākṣiṇaḥ ca atīta ādi sarva gocara tva abhāve tat na syāt iti nanu anugata sāmānya abhāve vyaktīnām ānantyā dvayabhicārāt ca śabda śakti grahaḥ eva na saṅgacchate kutas tat anyathā anupapattyā sākṣiṇaḥ atīta ādi gocara tva siddhiḥ iti atas āha kiñcid iti 
NSu_3.2.79a–3.2.79d.3	 kiñcid sādṛśya vijñānāt akhilasya api vastunaḥ śabda śakti grahaḥ ca syāt tat etat vaiśeṣika parīkṣāyām vyākhyāta prāyam nanu evam sati go śabdasya gavaye api śaktim gṛhṇīyāt sādṛśya sadbhāvāt iti atas āha tat tat iti  tad tad sādṛśya mānataḥ pūrveṇa anvayaḥ na yat kiñcit sādṛśya jñānam śabda śakti grahaṇa kāraṇam kintu ati vyāpti vidhuram yathā go śabde sāsnādimattvam evam anyatra anyat iti bhāvaḥ etena pūrvaḥkiñcit a śabdaḥ vyākhyātaḥ bhavati evam sākṣi pratyakṣasya vartamāna mātra grāhi tvam apākṛtya mānasa pratyakṣasya api tat apākaroti pratyakṣam iti 
NSu_3.2.80ab.1–3.2.80cd.2	 pratyakṣam mānasam ca eva yadā atīta artha gocaram mānasam pratyakṣam ca atīta artha gocaram eva yat smṛti kāraṇam iti yadā iti uttara vākye sambaddhayate pūrva anubhavān adhika viṣayāyāḥ smṛteḥ prāmāṇyam eva durlabham kutas mānasa pratyakṣa ja tvam iti atas āha tadā iti tadā smṛti pramāṇa tvam atīta tva viśeṣitam yadā yasmāt atīta tva viśeṣitam artham smṛtiḥ viṣayīkaroti iti śeṣaḥ tadā tasmāt smṛti pramāṇa tvam siddham atīta tva viśeṣita artha viṣaya tve api katham smṛteḥ pramāṇa tvam iti atas āha ādhikyam iti 
NSu_3.2.81a–3.2.82ab.2	 ādhikyam anubhūtāt tu yadā atīta tvam iṣyate mānatā ca katham na syāt smṛteḥ yasmāt smṛti viṣayīkṛtam atīta tvam vartamāna tayā anubhūta arthāt adhikyam iṣyate sarvaiḥ tasmāt smṛteḥ mānatā katham na syāt māna tve ca mānasa pratyakṣa ja tvam katham na syāt iti ca arthaḥ api ca anadhigata artha gantṛ tvam pramāṇa lakṣaṇam aṅgīkṛtya idam smṛteḥ anubhava adhika viṣaya tvam vyutpāditam vastutas tu na idam lakṣaṇam kintu yathārtha tvam eva tat ca asti smṛteḥ anubhava siddham bādhaka pratyaye hi sati tat na bhavet na ca asau= atra asti iti āha bādhaḥ ca iti  bādhaḥ ca na atra hi cākṣuṣa ādi pratyakṣe api na vartamāna mātra grāhi tva niyamaḥ iti bhāvena āha māna tvam iti māna tvam pratyabhijñāyāḥ api sarva anubhūti gam sarve api hi parīkṣakāḥ tad balena ātma ādeḥ sthāyi tvam sādhayanti tatas kim prakṛtaḥ iti atas āha atīta iti 
NSu_3.2.82cd.1–3.2.83a.2	 atīta vartamāna tva dharmiṇī sā ca dṛśyate atīta tva vartamāna tva dharma viśiṣya artha viṣaya iti arthaḥ dṛśyate sākṣiṇā saḥ ayam iti hi pratyabhijñā ākāraḥ anubhūyate sā ca cakṣuḥ ādinā eva jāyate iti bhāvaḥ atha matam pratyabhijñāyām catvāraḥ pakṣāḥ sambhavanti anubhavaḥ eva iti vā smṛtiḥ eva iti vā smṛti anubhava rūpam jñāna dvayam iti ca ekam eva jñānam aṃśe smṛtiḥ aṃśe anubhavaḥ iti vā iti tatra na tāvat ādyaḥ tathā tve hi aham iti eva syāt na tu saḥ iti na api dvitīyaḥ tathā sati saḥ iti eva syāt na tu ayam iti vakṣyamāṇaḥ doṣaḥ ca syāt atha uttaram pakṣa dvayam eva aṅgīkaraṇīyam tathā ca saḥ iti aṃśasya smṛti tvāt na cākṣuṣa ādi pratyakṣasya atīta viṣaya tvam iti atas āha na ca iti na ca sā smṛti mātra ardhāḥ smṛtiḥ eva smṛti mātrā smṛti mātra ardham yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā smṛti anubhava rūpa eka deśa samudāya rūpā tathā smṛti anubhava ātmaka eka jñāna rūpā ca na iti arthaḥ kutas na iti atas prathama pratijñāyām hetum āha tat idaṃtvā iti 
NSu_3.2.83b.1–3.2.83b.3	 tat idantu agraha ekatas tattva idantu agrahayoḥ ekatva anubhavāt graha grahaṇena anubhava tvam sūcayati dvitīya pratijñāyām hetum āha tat idantvā iti tattvedantu agrahasya eka tvāt niraṃśa tvāt etat uktam bhavati pratyabhijñā na smṛtiḥ eva iti pareṇa api uktam na api jñāna dvaya rūpā tat tāvataḥ eva īdantāyām māna abhāva prasaṅgena kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅgā siddheḥ na ca smṛti anubhava rūpam ekam eva jñānam eka tve dvi rūpa tā virodhāt tasmāt anubhava rūpam ekam eva vijñānam saṃskāra sacivena cakṣuḥ ādinā jāta tvāt soyam iti ākāram bhavati yathā khalu śukla harita pīta ādi rūpāṇām citra rūpa ārambhaka tvam yathā vā doṣa saha kṛtānām indriyāṇām viparyaya hetu tvam tathā saṃskāra sacivānām indriyāṇām pratyabhijñā hetu tvam bhaviṣyati iti kaḥ doṣaḥ na ca saṃskārasya svatantrasya jñāna hetu tvam smṛteḥ mānasa pratyakṣa jatvā aṅgīkārāt iti tat ced na uttara gocaram ityādinā uktam artham upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_3.2.83cd.1–3.2.83cd.3	 atas na vatarmāna eka niyamaḥ syāt grahe akṣa je vartamāna eka niyamaḥ vartamānam ekam eva viṣayīkaroti iti evaṃrūpaḥ niyamaḥ pramāṇa prameya pramātṛ bhedam viśvam abādhyam iti yat uktam tad upasaṃhariṣyan= artha gatāyāḥ jñā tattā prākaṭya samākhyāyāḥ pramiteḥ caturthyā vidyamāna tvāt katham trividham viśvam iti āśaṅkām tāvat pariharati na ca iti 
NSu_3.2.84.1–3.2.84.2	 na ca pramāṇataḥ anyā syāt pramitiḥ nāma kutracid māna abhāvāt gauravāt ca kalpanāyāḥ kim etayā pramitiḥ nāma vastu na asti eva tatra māna abhāvāt nanu katham māna abhāvaḥ pramātā ca prameyam ca pramāṇam pramitiḥ tathā a iti ādeḥ āgamasya vidyamāna tvāt iti atas uktam pramāṇataḥ anyā iti dvividham pramāṇam karaṇam phalam ca tatra pramāṇa śabdena karaṇam abhidhāya pramiti śabdena phala rūpa pramāṇam eva ucyate na tu tatas anyā pramitiḥ iti asti tāvat artha jñāna yovirṣaya viṣayi bhāva niyamaḥ nacāsau sat tayā kāraṇa tvena vā ati vyāpteḥ na api tādātmya sārūpyābhyām asambhavāt yatra jñāne yaḥ arthaḥ avabhāsate tasya asau viṣayaḥ iti atra saptamī artha anupapattiḥ tasmāt yena yasya atiśayaḥ utpadyate tasya asau viṣayaḥ iti aṅgīkāryam tathā ca arthasya viṣaya tva siddhaye jñāna janyaḥ artha gataḥ atiśayaḥ sarvathā aṅgīkāryaḥ iti katham māna abhāvaḥ mā evam tathā sati a tīta anāgatayoḥ jñāna viṣaya tā bhāva prasaṅgāt na hi asati dharmiṇi tatra dharma utpattiḥ sambhavati 
NSu_3.2.84.3–3.2.84.4	 atha karaṇa sambhavāt tatra viṣaya tvam iti ucyate tarhi vartamāne api tathā sambhavāt na jñāta tā kalpanīyā iti tat idam uktam kutracid iti atīta ādi vat vartamāne api na asti iti arthaḥ kiñca jñānam sva viṣaye jñāta tām upajanayati yatra kvacid vā dvitīye ati prasaṅgaḥ ādye jñāta upajananāt prāk eva arthasya viṣaya tva siddheḥ vyartham tat kalpanam iti āha kim etayā iti 
NSu_3.2.84.5–3.2.84.8	 api ca jñāta tāyām api jñāta tā utpādaḥ aṅgīkriyate na vā na iti pakṣe jñāna viṣaya tvam na syāt ādye anubhavān ārūḍham jñāta tā pravāham aṅgīkurvāṇasya kalpanā gauravam syāt iti āha kalpanāyāḥ gauravāt ca iti atha jñāta tā jñāta tā antaram antareṇa eva viṣayaḥ iti kalpyate tadā api kalpanā gauravam eva etena jñānam sva viṣaye kiñcid karoti kriyā tvāt gamana vat iti anumānam api nirastam jñāna mātra pakṣīkāre atīta anāgata jñāta tā jñāneṣu bādhāt anyathā tatra eva vyabhicārāt iti nanu jñātaḥ ghaṭaḥ prakaṭaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti artha viśeṣaṇa tayā jñāta tā pratyakṣam īkṣyate iti atas āha mayā iti 
NSu_3.2.85a–3.2.85c.3	 mayā etat jñātam iti tu sākṣi gam jñāna gocaram jñānam eva jñānam eva mayā etat jñātam iti jñāna gocaram kriyā hi kartṛ sthā eva yadā kartṛ prādhānyena vyavahriyate tadā kartṛ dharma tayā pratīyate yathā devadattaḥ ghaṭam icchati dveṣyi iti yadā tu karma prādhānyena tadā tad dharma tayā yathā iṣyaḥ dviṣyaḥ iti yadā punar sva prādhānyena tadā svatantrā eva yathā icchā dveṣaḥ iti eva ām ātma gatam eva jñānam viṣaya dharma tayā avabhāsate iti kim anupapannam 
NSu_3.2.85a–3.2.85c.4	 nanu ca jñānam tāvat na pratyakṣam tathā hi na tāvat pūrva bhāvinaḥ jñānasya jñānam viṣayaḥ tathā sati jñāsyāmi iti eva syāt na tu jānāmi iti na api āgāminaḥ tathā tve hi ajñāsiṣam iti eva syāt na ca saha bhāvijñāna antaram asti tatas jñāta tā lakṣaṇa kāryeṇa eva anumātavyam iti katham sā na abhyupagamyate iti atas uktam sākṣiṇam iti sākṣiṇaḥ nitya tvāt na ukta doṣaḥ sa ca sva prakāśaḥ iti anupalambha bādhitā ca jñāta tā iti āha tatas anyā iti 
NSu_3.2.85cd.1–3.2.85cd.3	 tatas anyā na pramitiḥ nāma dṛśyate prathama jñāne hi śuddhaḥ eva arthaḥ jñāyate na jñāta tā viśiṣyaḥ tadānīm tasyāḥ ajāta tvāt tām utpādya punar tat viśiṣyam artham viṣayīkaroti iti pakṣe viramya vyāpāra prasaṅgāt na ca prathama jñāna viṣayīkṛtāt adhikaḥ arthaḥ uttara jñāneṣu cakāsti jñātaḥ iti atra tu jñānam viṣayaḥ iti uktam eva iti idānīm īśa tat jñāna ityādinā uktam artham upasaṃharati māna iti 
NSu_3.2.86ab.1–3.2.86cd.2	 māna amātṛ prameyāṇām tad ucchittiḥ na hi kvacid tat tasmāt māna ādi bhedena trividham eva viśvam tasya kvacid api ucchittiḥ bādhaḥ na asti eva iti arthaḥ prakṛtam upasaṃharan svapnasya mithyātvam hetu antareṇa dūṣayati svāpnānām api iti svapnānām api ca eteṣām na bādhaḥ dṛśyate kvacid caḥ hetau yasmāt svapnānām api eṣām māna mātṛ prameyāṇām kvacid kāle na bādhaḥ dṛśyate atas svapnaḥ mithyā na eva iti sambandhaḥ na kevalam bāhya prapañcaḥ iti apeḥ arthaḥ svapnāt utthitasya na atra gajaḥ abhūt ityādinā bādha darśanāt katham etat iti atas āha jāgrat tva mātram iti 
NSu_3.2.87a–3.2.87c.3	 jāgrat tva mātram atra ekam anyathā dṛśyate sphuṭam atas mithyā na ca svapnaḥ anyathā avidyamāna tvena vyākhyāta prāyam etat yat tu uktam rathaḥ ayam ityādi tad pariṇāmi tām āvedayati na bādham iti vakṣyate na tatra rathāḥ a ityādi śrutiḥ tu tad prāgabhāvam nanu svāpna padārthānām jāgrat tvam yadi bhrama siddham bādhitam ca tadā teṣām mithyātvam avarjanīyam svāpna gaja ādayaḥ mithyā bhrama viṣaya tvāt bādha viṣaya tvāt ca śakti rajata vat iti anumānāt iti ced kim idam bhrama viṣaya tvam āropya tayā vā ara upa adhiṣṭhāna tayā vā sādhāraṇam vā tathā bādha viṣaya tvam api kinniṣedhyatayā uta niṣedha adhikaraṇa tayā atha sādhāraṇam ubhayatra api dvitīya tṛtīyayoḥ deṣam āha jāgrat vat iti 
NSu_3.2.87d.1–3.2.88a.3	 jāgrat vat jāgratā dṛṣṭam śukti ādikam yathā tathā iti arthaḥ yathā śuktikā ādeḥ āra upabādha adhiṣṭhāna tve api na mithyātvam tathā svāpnānām api iti anaikāntyam iti arthaḥ nanu jāgara upalabdhasya śukti ādeḥ api anena eva hetunā mithyātvam asmākam siṣā dhayiṣitam eva iti katham tatra anaikāntika tvam iti atas āha jāgrat iti  jāgrat eva ca ātma vat evam tarhi jāgrat svapnaḥ ca ātma vat na eva mithyā iti arthaḥ tat vivṛṇoti kvacid iti 
NSu_3.2.88a–3.2.88d.3	 kvacid ātmā ca syāt eva bhrama gocaraḥ etāvatā na mithyā asau svapne jāgarite tathā kṣaṇikaḥ aham ityādi bhrama gocaraḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etat na kṣaṇikaḥ aham sthiraḥ eva iti bādha gocaraḥ ca iti api draṣṭavyam svapne jāgarite tathā iti tatra upalabdhāḥ padārthāḥ api na mithyā iti arthaḥ ubhaya pakṣīkāreṇa anumānasya ātmani vyabhicāraḥ aparihāyar iti nanu kṣaṇika tva ādinā pratipannaḥ ātmā api mithyā iti katham tatra vyabhicāraḥ iti ced kim kṣaṇika tva ādeḥ āropitasya mithyātvāt evam ucyate uta ātma svarūpasya eva dvitīye tu apasiddhāntaḥ sphuṭaḥ eva ādyam āśaṅkaya dūṣayati yadi iti 
NSu_3.2.89ab.1–3.2.89ab.2	 yadi ātmani anyathā dṛśyam bhrāntam atra api tat bhavet evam tarhi āropita ākārasya mithyātvam sādhyam iti uktam syāt tathā ca siddha sādhana tvam jāgrat svapna avagata artheṣu āropita ākārāṇām mithyātvasya asmābhiḥ api aṅgīkṛta tvāt āropyatayā niṣedhya tayā vā bhrānti bādha viṣaya tvam hetuḥ iti ādya pakṣe doṣam āha abādhitā iti 
NSu_3.2.89cd.1–3.2.89cd.3	 abādhita anuvṛtteḥ tu svapna ādeḥ bhrānta tā kutas jāgrat tvādeḥ rajata tva ādeḥ ca bādhāt uttaram api abādhita tvena gaja ādeḥ śukti ādeḥ ca anuvṛtteḥ svapna ādeḥ uktavidhā bhrānta tā bādhya tā ca kutas tathā ca svarūpa asiddhiḥ yathā khalu bādha uttara kālam api anuvartamānaḥ ātmā na āropyaḥ na api bādhyaḥ tathā svapna jāgarau= api tayoḥ api adrākṣam eva aham gajam iti ādi anuvṛtteḥ iti anukūla pramāṇa abhāvāt pratikūla pramāṇa bhāvāt ca bhrānti viṣaya tva ādi hetunā jāgrat svapnayoḥ mithyātva anumānam anupapannam iti āha na ca iti 
NSu_3.2.90.1–3.2.90.3	 na ca kācid pramā viśva bhrānta tve sarvam eva ca abhrānta tve pramāṇam tu katham tat bhrāntitā bhavet viśvam iti ubhayavidham vivakṣitam bhrānta tve mithyātve yat vā bhrānti viṣaya tva ādi hetu dvayasya asiddhim prakāra antareṇa sādhayitum idam vākyam bhrāntasya iti bādhya tvasya api upalakṣaṇam yatas tasmāt iti upaskartavyam tat bhrānta tā tasya dvividhasya api viśvasya bhrānti viṣaya tā dṛśya tva ādi hetunā svapna jāgarayaḥ bhrānta tva ādi sādhanāt katham asiddhiḥ iti āśaṅkām parihartum bhrānta tvam prakāra antareṇa dūṣayati kiñca iti 
NSu_3.2.91a–3.2.91c.3	 kiñca bhrānta tva vādī sa bhrānta tvam sva matasya ca aṅgīkaroti niyatam bhrānta tva vādī dṛśya tva ādinā dvividhasya api viśvasya bhrānta tva ādikam sādhayan sva matasya iti sva pratijñātharm niyatam iti anyathā tatra anaikānti āpatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ na kevalam pareṇa sva vyāpti siddhaye sva pratijñāta arthasya bhrānta tva ādi kam aṅgīkaraṇīyam kintu vayam api tad aṅgīkurmaḥ iti āha tatra iti 
NSu_3.2.91d–3.2.91ef.2	 tatra sampratipanna tā vādinoḥ para pratijñāta arthasya bhrānta tva ādau vādinoḥ vādi prativādinoḥ etat ca vakṣyamāṇa anumānasya anyatara asiddhi nirāsa artham iti boddhavyam tatas kim iti atas āha tena ca iti  tena ca abhrāntam viśvam eva bhaviṣyati na kevala mukta pramāṇaiḥ kintu viśva bhrānta tva ādeḥ bhrānta tva ādi hetunā ca viśvam abhra antam eva tathā abādhyam eva bhaviṣyati tatra vyāptim sūcayati bhrānta tva iti 
NSu_3.2.92ab.1–3.2.92cd.3	 bhrānti tva bhrānta tā ced syāt katham na abhrānti satya tā tat etau prayogau bhavataḥ viśvam abhra antam bhrānta bhrānta tvāt tathā viśvam abādhyam bādhya bādhya tvāt ātma vat iti apavyākhyāna dūṣaṇasya prayārejanam āha aśeṣa iti aśeṣa doṣa duṣyam tat matam heyam bubhūṣibhiḥ tat matam iti svāpna jāgara prapañcasya mithyātvam pratipādayat matam syāt etat viśvasya bhrānta tva ādikam iva abhra anta tva ādikam api mithyā kinna syāt na ca etat aghaṭitam durghaṭa tvasya bhūṣaṇa tvāt iti āśaṅkām pariharan mandam etat asmadīyam tad mata heya tā vyutpādāna prasakteḥ abhāvāt iti sa ulluṇṭham āha yena iti 
NSu_3.2.93.1–3.2.94ab.2	 yena sva mata heya tvam svayam aṅgīkṛtam sadā bhrānti tvāt durghaṭa tvasya bhūṣaṇa tvāt ca kevalam unmattaḥ api katham tasya matam svīkartum icchati bhrānti tvāt bhrānti viṣaya tvena aṅgīkṛta tvāt durghaṭa tvasya bhūṣaṇa tvāt bhūṣaṇa tvena aṅgīkṛta tvāt ca kevalam unmattaḥ api sākṣāt unmattaḥ api na punar unmattaka bījāt yadanena unmattaḥ na hi unmattaḥ sva matam bhrāntam durghaṭam ca iti svayam eva manyate tarhi katham loke pravṛttam iti atas āha īśa iti 
NSu_3.2.94cd.1–3.2.95ab.2	 īśa śakteḥ acintya tvāt mahā unmattaiḥ pravartitam mahā unmattaiḥ iti hetu antaram sūtra vyākhyānam upakramya apavya ākhyānasya heya tā vyutpādanam asaṅgatam iti atas sva vyākhyāna dārḍhya artham iti āśayavān uktam sūtra artham vivṛṇvan māyā śabda artham tāvat āha atas iti atas prajñā atra māyā uktāḥ jaivyu atas iti anyathā vyākhyānasya duṣṭa tva ātmāyāḥ vayunam abhikhya a iti prajñā nāmasu pāṭhāt iti bhāvaḥ māyāyāḥ sandhya kāraṇa tvam vakṣyate tatra jaivī prajñā kīdṛśam kāraṇam iti atas āha upādānam eva iti 
NSu_3.2.95b.1–3.2.95c.3	 upādānam eva sā sandhyasya iti śeṣaḥ na kevalam jaivī prajñā atra māyā kintvaiśvarī ca sā ca sandhyasya nimittam eva iti āha nimittam iti nimittam aiśvarī mukhyam prajñā śabdaḥ ca atra lākṣaṇikaḥ vāsanā arthaḥ iti vakṣyati tat ca vyākhyānam na ubhaya sādhāraṇam iti āśayena uktam mukhya iti īśvara prajñā mukhyā eva jīva prajñā tu lākṣaṇikī māyā mātra padam vyākhyāti nirmitam iti 
NSu_3.2.95d.1–3.2.96.2	 nirmitam trātam eva ca tābhyām saha pṛthak ca eva māyā mātram iti īryate ubhābhyām mātam aiśvaryā trātam saha pṛthak tatas tābhyām eva iti sambandhaḥ tena tuśabdaḥ vyākhyātaḥ bhavati yathā saṅkhayena anvaya parihāra artham uktam saha pṛthak eva iti caśabdaḥ tasmāt iti arthe īryate sandhyam iti śeṣaḥ saha pṛthak iti uktam vivṛṇoti ubhābhyām iti 
NSu_3.2.96.3–3.2.97ab.2	 jīveśvara prajñābhyām mātam nirmitam aiśvaryā prajñayā trātam yasmāt tatas saha pṛthak iti uktam dhātu samudāya ādātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti kaḥ adibhūmyām hutajiti yathā yadi api ekasmāt eva dhātostra pratyayaḥ śakyaḥ kartum tathā api adhika artha lābhāya evam kṛtam sautra tvāt nirdeśasya karmaṇi pratyayaḥ ghañarthe kavidhānam iti vā nanu idam pūrva apara viruddham pūrvam hi jīva vāsanā upādānakam sandhyam iti uktam idānīm tu prajñā upādanakam iti mā evam prajñā śabdasya vāsanā upalakṣaṇa tvāt atha prajñāyāḥ vāsanāyāḥ ca kaḥ sambandhaḥ yena lakṣaṇā syāt iti atas āha prajñā ātmakam iti prajñā ātmakam manaḥ yena manaḥ rūpāḥ ca vāsanāḥ yena kāraṇena manaḥ prajñā ātmakam prajñā upādānam vāsanāḥ ca manaḥ rūpāḥ manaupādānakāḥ tena etayoḥ eka kāraṇa tva lakṣaṇa sambandhena lakṣaṇa upapadyate iti śeṣaḥ prajñā vāsanayomarnaḥ upādānam iti etat kutas iti atas āha dhīḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.97cd.1–3.2.97cd.3	 dhīḥ bhīḥ iti manaḥ tu ā iva iti āha ca śrutirañjasā śrutau= iti śabdaḥ ādi arthaḥ tena vāsanāyāḥ api manaḥ vikāra tvam labhyate iti tu iti sambandhaḥ iti śrutiḥ caśabdāt anyā ca āha prajñā ādeḥ manaḥ vikāra tvam añjasā spaṣṭam etena ātma kārya tvam vadantaḥ nirastāḥ bhavanti bāhya artha jñānasya tadānīm abhāvāt asataḥ ca upādāna tva anupapatteḥ mukhya artha tyāgaḥ yadi ca vāsanā mātram iti mukhyaḥ eva prayogaḥ kriyeta tadā īśvara prajñā na saṅgṛhītā syāt pṛthak ubhaya grahaṇe ca gauravam syāt atas mukhyā mukhya vivakṣayā ubhayasya lāghavena grahaṇāya māyā mātram iti uktam atas eva māyā eva māyā mātram iti na vyākhyātam sandhyasya nimitta kāraṇa bhūtayā īśvara prajñayā tādātmya abhāvāt nanu prajñā vāsanayoḥ asti kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ saḥ eva lakṣaṇābījam astu kim dvayoḥ manaḥ kāryatva varṇanena iti atas āha cit iti 
NSu_3.2.98.1–3.2.98.2	 cit acit miśram eva etat manaḥ yāvat ca saṃsṛtiḥ tena avasthāḥ imāḥ sarvāḥ jīvaḥ paśyati sarvadā na kevalam svapnam kintu imāḥ sāṃsārikīḥ sarvāḥ api avasthāḥ tena manasā eva sarvadā jīvaḥ paśyati atas pradhāna tvāt tad dvārakaḥ eva sambandhaḥ ādaraṇīyaḥ na aparaḥ manaḥ ca kecana jaḍam eva manyante apare tu acetanam eva āropita caitanyam tad nirāsena svarūpam kathayati cit acit miśram eva iti 
NSu_3.2.98.3	 yat iti adhyāhāryam kevalam acetanasya ghaṭa ādi vat evambhāva asambhavāt caitanya āropasya nirākṛta tvāt cit acit miśram eva aṅgī kāryam bhavanti ca atra āgamāḥ yadi manasā sarva avasthā prāptiḥ tadā mokṣe api tasya bhāvāt eva avasthāssyuḥ iti ata uktam yāvat saṃsṛtiḥ tāvat eva jīvasya upakāra apakārau karoti iti kāt snaryena anabhivyakta svarūpa tvāt iti vyākhyāti manaḥ vikārāḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.99.1–3.2.100a.2	 manaḥ vikārāḥ viṣayāḥ svāpnāḥ yat bahya vat na te sthūlāḥ bhavanti atas teṣām spaṣṭa tā na tathā kvacid yadi asmāt svāpnāḥ viṣayāḥ manaḥ janya vāsanā vikārāḥ atas eva hi te bāhya vat sthūlāḥ na bhavanti saṃvṛte deśe avakāśān arhāḥ na bhavanti teṣām tathā bāhya vat kvacid spaṣṭa tā bāhya artha kriyā kāritā na asti yat vā yasmāt te bāhya vat sthūlāḥ na bhavanti tathā teṣām kvacid spaṣṭa tāḥ na asti atas svāpanāḥ viṣayāḥ manaḥ vikārāḥ iti yojanā yathā ca etat tathā uktam purastāt nanu svāpna kāminī sambhoga ādeḥ carama dhātu visarga ādi bāhya atharkriyā kāritā darśanāt bhāga asiddhiḥ iti atas āha kvacid iti kvacid spaṣṭāḥ api syuṣye te svāpnāḥ viṣayāḥ kvacid spaṣṭāḥ api syuḥ eva tathā api tad atirikta pakṣīkaraṇena adoṣaḥ iti bhāvaḥ evam tarhi tasya aṃśasya vāsanāmaya tvam na syāt iti atas āha vāsanā iti 
NSu_3.2.100b.1–3.2.100b.5	 vāsanā mānasī ca sā sā ca mānasī vāsanā siddhāḥ aspaṣṭa ta abhāve api asthūla tvasya sattvāt iti bhāvaḥ atas eva sautraḥ hetuḥ dvedhā vyākhyātaḥ tat anena deśa kāla nimitta sampattiḥ svapne na asti iti yat uktam tat vāsanā āmayā uktyā nirastam atas eva sṛṣṭi śruteḥ bhākta tva varṇanam apāstam prājñasya nirmātṛ tvam ca na vṛthā tu ājyam svayam vihatya ityādya api īśvara viṣayam anyatra vyākhyātam svapna nirmāṇe śubha aśubha yoga āpattiḥ iti ca asaṅgatam vyāpti abhāvāt jīvasya brahma bhāva upadeśaḥ iti ca sārvajña ādeḥ pāramārthika tva samartha nāda yuktam viyat ādi prapañcasya mithyā tva kathanam ca tad satyatva upapādanāt nirastam para abhidhyānāt tu tirohitam tatas hi asya bandha viparyayau para abhidhyānāt tu tirohitam tatas hi asya bandha viparyayau para kṛtasya apavyākhyāna tām pratipādayitum para abhidhyānāt iti sūtra tātparyam āha īśa iti 
NSu_3.2.100c.1–3.2.100c.2	 īśa icchayā antardadhāti sandhyam iti śeṣaḥ na kevalam svapnaḥ kintu tat tirodhānam api īśvara icchā adhīnam iti eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ anena sūtreṇa ucyate na anyaḥ jīvasya īśvara aṃśa tāyāḥ aprāmāṇika tvasya dvitīye abhihita tvāt na ca jñāna aiśvarya śaktī brahmaṇaḥ tāttvika tayā pareṇa aṅgīkṛte kiñca deha yogāt tirohitam iti etāvatālam anyat asaṅgatam eva kiñca deha yogaḥ ced ti rodhāna hetuḥ tadā supti pralayayoḥ āvirbhāvaḥ syāt avidyā ādi upalakṣaṇam etat iti ced atha tathā eva kinna uktam iti āstām vistaraḥ yadi svapnaḥ antardhatte katham tarhi punar tad pratītiḥ iṣyate āha vyajyate ca iti 
NSu_3.2.100d.1–3.2.101.2	 vyajyate ca punar tayā etena parakīyam bādha kathanam nirastam vyaktiḥ tirodhānam ca na jñāyate iti atas adhikaraṇa dvaya artham upasaṃharati sṛṣṭvā eva iti sṛṣṭvā eva vāsānabhiḥ ca prapañcam svāpnam īśvaraḥ vāsanā mātra tām tasya nītvā antardhāpayati ajaḥ eva śabdena āropam vārayati darśayitvā iti api draṣṭavyam tasya ca vāsanā mātra tām nītvā kṛtvā anyathā dvitīyā syāt antardhāpayati adarśanam gamayati tasya jīvasya vāsanābhiḥ iti vā tasya antardhāpayati iti vā
