NSu_3.2.101.3–3.2.101.8	 tad abhāvaḥ nāḍīṣu tad śruteḥ ātmani ca atas prabodhaḥ asmāt mugdhe ardha saṃpattiḥ pariśeṣāt tad abhāvaḥ nāḍīṣu tad śateḥ ātmani ha atas prabodhaḥ asmāt mugdhe ardha sampatti pariśeṣāt atra yat jīva brahmaṇoḥ eka tvam pareṇa varṇitam tad sūtra akṣarā pratītam tat viruddham ca apekṣaṇīyam eva iti jñāpayitum adhikaraṇa trayasya tātparyam āha suṣupti iti 
NSu_3.2.102a–3.2.102c.3	 suṣupti moha bodhān= ca svavaśaḥ tad vaśam sadā jīvam nayati jīva īśaḥ suṣupti bodha ādeḥ kāraṇa antara darśanāt katham etat iti atas uktam svavaśaḥ tad vaśam iti svatantraḥ api īśvaraḥ līlayā tāni kāraṇāni upādāya jīvam tad vaśatām nītvā suṣupti ādikam prāpayati iti arthaḥ etat ca bhāṣya ādau spaṣṭam saḥ eva ca karma anusmṛti śabda vidhibhyaḥ 
NSu_3.2.102a–3.2.102c.5	 kecid evam vyācakṣate suṣuptau brahma sampannaḥ yaḥ eva jīvaṣaḥ saḥ eva uttiṣṭhati uta anyaḥ api iti saṃśaye mahā jalanidhau kṣiptasya udabindoḥ iva brahmaṇā ekībhūtasya uddharaṇa asambhavāt aniyamaḥ iti prāpte samādhīyate saḥ eva uttiṣṭhati yaḥ suptaḥ kutas karma śeṣa samāpanāt pratyabhijñānāt śabdebhyaḥ vidhibhyaḥ ca suptasya mukta tva āpattyā vidhi anupapatteḥ iti tat etat apavyākhyānam iti sūcanāya adhikaraṇa tātpayarmā āha na anyaḥ iti saḥ eva ca karma anusmṛti śabda vidhibhyaḥ 
NSu_3.2.102d.1–3.2.102d.3	 na anyaḥ kartā asya kaścana svapna ādīnām parameśvara kṛta tve abhihite kim deśa kāla antare anyaḥ api kartāḥ tyuta īśvaraḥ eva iti saṃśaye laukikeśvarāṇām deśa kāla vyavasthayā aiśvarya darśanāt ayam api tathāvidhaḥ iti prāpte saḥ eva īśvaraḥ asya svapna ādeḥ kartā na tu deśa kāla antare anyaḥ kaścana iti eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ atra pratipādyate iti na hi yaḥ suptaḥ saḥ eva uttiṣṭhati anyaḥ vā iti kasyacid saṃśayaḥ asti na ca suptasya brahmaṇā aikyam pramāṇa dṛṣṭam iṣyam vā parasya iti yat kiñcid etat lāghava artham krama ullaṅghanena vyākhyānam iti bodhyam sūtra kṛtā ca svapna ādi vat na mohaḥ svatantra avasthā iti jñāpanāya vyavadhānam kṛtam iti na sthānataḥ api parasya ubhaya liṅgam sarvatra hi 
NSu_3.2.102d.4	 kecid idam ittham vyācakṣate dvi rūpam brahma śrūyate sarva karmā sarva kāmaḥ ityādau sa viśeṣam asthūlam anaṇu iti ādau nirviśeṣam tatra kim ubhaya rūpam brahma pratipattavyamuta anyatara rūpam yadā api anyatara rūpam tadā kim sa viśeṣam uta nirviśeṣam iti saṃśaye dvividha śruti anurodhāt ubhaya rūpam eva brahma iti prāpte idam ucyate na tāvat svatas eva parasya brahmaṇaḥ ubhaya rūpa tvam sambhavati virodhāt astu tarhi sthānataḥ pṛthivī ādi upādhi yogāt mā evam na hi upādhiḥ anyat anyathākaroti kintu a vidyā upasthāpitāḥ pṛthivī ādi upādhayaḥ bhramam upajanayanti atas ca anyatara parigrahe api nirasta samasta viśeṣam eva brahma pratipattavyam sarvatra aśabdam asparśam iti ādi vākyeṣu tathābhūtam eva hi brahma upadiśyate na bhedāt iti ced na pratyekam atad vacanāt na nirviśeṣam eva brahma catuṣpād brahma ṣoḍaśa kalam brahma ityādau bhedena upadeśāt iti ced na yaḥ ca ayam asyām pṛthivyām ityādinā pratyupādhi bheda abhāva vacanāt api ca evam eke na iha nānā asti kiñcana ityādau bheda darśana nindā pūrva kam abhedam eke śākhinaḥ samāmananti iti 
NSu_3.2.102d.5–3.2.102d.7	 tat idam vyākhyānam samyak vyākhyānena eva apahastitam bhaviṣyati kim punar prayatnena iti āśayavān vyākhyānam eva ārabhate sarva śarīreṣu pratiśarīram ca dakṣiṇa akṣi ādi sthāneṣu sthitaḥ parama puruṣaḥ svapana ādi avasthāḥ pravartayati iti uktam tatra sarvatra sthitaḥ kim ekaḥ eva uta parasparam bhinnaḥ iti saṃśaye yat yugapad bhinna sthānam tat bhinnam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādi bhinna sthānaḥ ca ayam iti atas bhinnaḥ eva bhavet bhinnānām ca tāratamyam anugrāhya anugrāhaka bhāvaḥ ca upalabdhaḥ iti tad prasaṅgaḥ api iti katham saḥ eva ca iti uktam iti prāpte prativihitam sūtra kṛtā na sthānataḥ api iti tadvayā ācaṣṭe na iti na sthānataḥ api parasya ubhaya liṅgam sarvatra hi 
NSu_3.2.103ab.1–3.2.103ab.3	 na sthāna bhedataḥ api asya bhedaḥ kaścid pareśituḥ atra sthāna śabdaḥ tad bhedasya upalakṣaṇaḥ iti uktam bhavati saptamī arthe tasiḥ ādya ādibhyaḥ upasaṅkha yānāt bhedaḥ iti vadatauu bhaya liṅgam a iti etat bhinna svarūpa tvam iti vyākhyātam sthānānām sura nara ādi śarīrāṇām tatra api dakṣiṇa akṣi ādīnām bhede sati api asya tatra tatra sthitasya pareśituḥ kaścid anyonya abhāva lakṣaṇaḥ hīna adhika tva rūpaḥ anugrāhya anugrāhaka tva rūpaḥ vā bhedaḥ na asti kutas iti atas sarvatra hi iti uktam vyācaṣṭe sarvatra iti 
NSu_3.2.103cd.1–3.2.103cd.2	 sarvatra aśeṣa doṣa ujkha pūrṇa kalyāṇa cit guṇaḥ sarvatra sthāneṣu nirbhedaḥ ca iti api draṣṭavyam aśeṣa doṣa ujkhaḥ ca asau pūrṇa kalyāṇa cidguṇaḥ ca iti vigrahaḥ kalyāṇāḥ vināśa ādi rahitāḥ yat vā guṇa śabdaḥ duḥkha ādiṣu api iti atas kalyāṇa iti uktam cit śabdāt paratas ādi padam adhyāhāryam athavā cit rūpā na tu acetanāḥ iti arthaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu etam eva brahma iti ācakṣate a ityādau paramātmā śrūyate yatas iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_3.2.103cd.3–3.2.103cd.4	 na bhedāt iti ced na pratyekam atad vacanāt uktam artham ākṣipya samādhātum sūtram na bhedāt iti nirbhedam sarvatra sarva doṣa dūram sakala guṇa paripūrṇam brahma iti na upapadyate kārya kāraṇa baddhau tau a ityādi śruti purāṇa ādi vākyaiḥ bhinna tvad oṣitva alpa guṇa tva ādeḥ bheda śabda upalakṣitasya ukta tvāt iti ākṣepa arthaḥ na iti parihāra aṃśam vyācaṣṭe tad viruddham tu iti na bhedāt iti ced na pratyekam atadvacanāt 
NSu_3.2.104ab.1–3.2.104ab.2	 tad viruddham tu yat tatra mānam na eva bhavet kvacid yat tu vākyam tasya ukta arthasya viruddham pratīyate tat tatra ukta viruddhe kvacid arthe mānam na eva bhavet kintu anyaḥ eva tasya arthaḥ pratipattavyaḥ kutas iti atas pratyekam atad vacanāt iti uktam tad anupapannam iva ābhāti sarvatra hi iti uktasya pratipakṣa codanāyām punar tanmātra upanyāsasya vyartha tvāt atas tāt paryam āha mahātātparya iti 
NSu_3.2.104cd.1–3.2.104cd.3	 mahātātparya rodhena katham tat mānam atra tu sakala smṛti itihāsa purāṇānām parameśvarasya aśeṣa doṣa dūra tve samasta guṇa paripūrṇa tve ca yat mahātātparyam tad virodhena tat vākyam atra bhagavataḥ doṣi tva ādau katham mānam bhavet tuśabdaḥ mahā vākya tvauvāntara vākya tva lakṣaṇa viśeṣa arthaḥ dṛṣṭam hi nirṇīta mahā vākya artha viruddhasya tat avāntara vākyasya tatra aprāmāṇyam yathā svarga prayojana agni hotra para mahā vākya artha viruddhasya yadi amuṣmin = loke asti vā na vā ityādeḥ tat avāntara vākyam tad athar pratipatti hetu tvāt syāt etat yadi parameśvarasya sakala guṇa paripūrṇa tve nirasta samasta doṣa tve ca veda ādīnām mahātātparyam iti arthaḥ pramāṇavān syāt tat eva tu na paśyāmaḥ iti atas āha duḥkha iti 
NSu_3.2.105a–3.2.105c.2	 duḥkha apyaya sukhau= āpti hetu tvena eva veda vāc bhavet mānam mokṣa hetu tvena iti vaktavye duḥkha apyaya ityādi vacanam vādi vipratipatteḥ mokṣa svarūpa nirūpaṇa artham ātyantika duḥkha nivṛttiḥ niratiśaya sukha abhivyaktiḥ ca muktiḥ iti yat vā apradhāna prayojana svarga ādi saṅgraha artham idam ittham bhūta lakṣaṇe tṛtīyā duḥkha apyaya sukhau= āpti hetu tvena eva tad hetu tvam yathā nirvahet tathā eva mānam kasyacid arthasya pratipādikā bhavet veda vāc iti smṛti ādeḥ upalakṣaṇam 
NSu_3.2.105a–3.2.105c.4	 etat uktam bhavati śāstreṇa hi viṣaya prayojanavatā bhāvyam pramāṇa tvāt para artha tvāt ca tatra yadā viṣayaḥ sandigdhaḥ prayojanam ca niścitam tadā niścitena prayojanena aniścitaḥ viṣayaḥ niścetavyaḥ na hi śāstram sākṣāt prayojanasya kārakam kintu viṣaya pratipādana dvārā eva tathā ca tad prayojanam yasmin jñāpite sampadyate saḥ eva viṣayaḥ avadhāryate anyathā viṣaya prayojanayoḥ asambaddha tvena śāstrasya anupādeya tā apatteḥ veda ādeḥ ca mokṣaḥ eva pradhānam prayojanam teṣām duḥkha prahāṇāya śrutiḥ eṣā pravartate a ityādeḥ svarga ādikam ca apradhānam atas saḥ eva viṣayaḥ kalpanīyaḥ yasmin jñāte mokṣa ādikam sampadyeta iti tatas kim iti atas āha tat iti 
NSu_3.2.105cd.1–3.2.106.3	 tad īśānāt prasannāt eva na anyathā tat duḥkha apyaya ādi rūpam kaivalyam īśānāt viṣṇoḥ eva bhavet na anyasmāt sa hi tasya iṣye na anyaḥ astu tarhi saḥ eva viṣayaḥ kim guṇa pūrṇa tva ādinā iti atas uktam prasannāt eva na anyathā na jñāta mātrāt iti tatas api kim iti atas āha prasanna tā iti prasanna tā guṇa utkarṣa jñānāt eva hi kevalam nirdoṣa tā parijñānāt api na anyena kenacid viṣṇoḥ prasanna tā ca tadīya guṇa utkarṣa jñānāt eva kevalam nirdeṣa tā parijñānāt ca bhavati hi śabdaḥ pramāṇa prasiddhim dyotayati tat ca vakṣyate kevala śabdaḥ avadāraṇa arthaḥ na anyena kenacid iti etat pratirūpeṇa alpa guṇa tva ādi jñānena karma ādinā vā na iti arthaḥ tathā ca mokṣa ādi prayojanena śāstreṇa tad sādhana bhūtam bhagavat guṇa utkarṣa nirdeṣa tā jñānam eva jīvānām utpādanīyam iti atas sakala guṇa paripūrṇe nirasta samasta doṣe nārāyaṇaḥ eva aśeṣa śāstrasya mahātātparyam iti avasīyate syāt etat yadi tad īśānāt ityādinā uktam prāmāṇikam syāt iti atas tatra āgama vākyāni udāharati yaḥ mām iti 
NSu_3.2.107.1–3.2.109ab.2^1	 yaḥ mām aśeṣa doṣa ujkham guṇa sarva sva bṛṃhitam jānāti asmai prasannaḥ aham dadyām muktim naca anyathā yaḥ mām aśeṣa abhyadhikam vijānāti saḥ eva mām vijānāti akhilān= tasya dadyām kāmān param padam yaḥ mām evam asammūḍhaḥ kim mā nindanti śatravaḥ bṛṃhita śabdena pratyekam api guṇānām anavadhika tvam ācaṣṭe aśeṣa abhyadhikam guṇaiḥ deṣa bhāvaiḥ ca sarva uttamam saḥ eva mām vijānāti anya jñānasya mad prasāda ahetu tvāt yaḥ mām evam a iti anena kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca bhārata a iti antam bhagavat vākyam saṅgṛhṇāti evam samastaiḥ guṇaiḥ deṣa abhāvaiḥ ca kṣara akṣara uttamaḥ hi puruṣottamaḥ sa sarva vid iti ādi stutyā prasanna tā dyotyate sarva bhāvena sarveṇa prakāreṇa anyathā vyāghātāt kṛtakṛtyaḥ muktaḥ kim mām a iti anenaabhī a idam ekam eka asmi niṣṣāabhī dvā kimau trayaḥ karanti 
NSu_3.2.109ab.2^2–3.2.109cd.2	 khale na parṣān prati hanmi bhūri kim māḥ nindanti śatravaḥ anindrā a iti śrutim upādatte idam ekam viśvam abhi prati aham ekaḥ niṣpaasmi nitarām sahate iti niṣpāj dvau prapañcau= abhi prati aham ekaḥ niṣṣā asmi trayaḥ api prapañcāḥ mama kim eva kurvanti na kim api mama aniṣyam kartum īśate kintu aham eva khalaḥ iva khala sthitāni dhānyāni iva bhūri bhūrīn bahūn bahu varam vā tān niṣṭhurān nindakān pratihanmi tasmāt anīśvarāḥ te śatravaḥ mām kim nindanti iti arthaḥ etat bhagavataḥ vākyam atra nindakeṣu bhagavataḥ aprasādaḥ aniṣya avāptiḥ ca śrūyate nindā ca doṣa jñāna ādikā iti prasiddham eva vākya udāharaṇa phalam āha ityādi iti ityādi veda smṛti gavākyaiḥ eva avasīyate avadhāraṇena prābalyam sūcayati prasādena muktiḥ sa guṇa vedanā t a iti vakṣyamāṇam atra api sambaddhayate atra anumānam api āha lokataḥ ca iti 
NSu_3.2.110ab.1–3.2.110ab.3	 lokataḥ ca prasādena muktiḥ sa guṇa vedanāt iti śabdaḥ adhyāhāryaḥ avasīyate iti vartate bhagavat prasādena saṃsārāt muktiḥ bhavati sa bhagavat prasādaḥ tad guṇa utkarṣa vedanāt doṣa abhāva vedanāt ca bhavati iti ayam arthaḥ lokataḥ loka dṛṣṭānta upeta anumānataḥ ca avasīyate tathā ca prayogaḥ saṃsārāt muktiḥ samartha puruṣa prasāda sādhyāḥ mukti tvāt nigaḍa mukti vat na hi bhagavataḥ anyaḥ tatra samarthaḥ asti vimataḥ bhagavat prasādaḥ guṇa utkarṣa jñāna sādhyaḥ mahā prasāda tvāt rājasa prasāda vat pakṣa tulya tvāt na vyabhicāraḥ codanīyaḥ mahātātparya rodhena ityādinā uktam upasaṃharan para kṛta apavyākhyāna nirāse api uktām yuktim atidiśati mahātātparya iti 
NSu_3.2.110cd.1–3.2.111c.2	 mahātātparya mukhyasya virodhāt atas eva hi doṣi tva nirguṇa tva alpa guṇa tva ādi kathañcana na arthaḥ śruti purāṇa ādeḥ parama mahātātparyasya nirguṇa tva grahaṇam apavyākhyāna nirāsa artham kathañcana iti upādhi sambandha ādinā iti arthaḥ na kevala mānumānikam sakala veda antānām bhagavat guṇa utkarṣa ādau mahātāt payarm kintu vācanikam ca iti āha tad viruddhaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.111d–3.2.113c.3	 tad viruddhaḥ akhilasya ca arthaḥ svayam vinirṇītaḥ vāsudevena sa ādaram doṣi tva ādeḥ viruddhaḥ akhilasya śāstrasya tat vākyam paṭhati iti guhyatamam iti iti guhyatamam śāstram idam uktam mayā anagha etat buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca bhārata iti iti yat mayā mama puruṣottama tva ādikam uktam idam guhyatamam śāstram tātparyeṇa sarva śāstraiḥ pratipādyaḥ arthaḥ etat buddhvā iti praśaṃsayā adaraḥ pratīyate yat uktam sthāna bheda anumānam tat anyathā siddham iti pareśituḥ iti anena sūcitam yathā uktam aiśvaryāt rūpam ekam ca sūrya vat bahudheyata a iti kāla atītam ca iti āha atas iti  atas akhila sat śāstra viruddha tvena na anumā vartate tatra tatra parameśvara bheda ādau adhikaraṇa artham upasaṃharati tena iti 
NSu_3.2.113cd.1–3.2.113cd.5	 tena īśaḥ nirṇītaḥ akhila sat guṇaḥ sat śabdaḥ nirdeṣa arthaḥ nirbhedaḥ iti upasaṃhartavye tad phala upasaṃhāraḥ ayam apavyākhyāna nirāsam api upasaṃhartum atas eva ca upamā sūryaka ādi vat iha parameśvare jīvasya ātyantika bhakti siddhaye bheda abheda matam nirākriyate tathā hi jīva brahmaṇoḥ bhedaḥ tāvat siddhāntinā aṅgīkriyate eva abhedaḥ tu anumānataḥ siddhaḥ jīvaḥ brahma abhinnaḥ cetana tvāt brahmavataḥ brahma aṃśa tvāt yaḥ yat aṃśaḥ sa tat abhinnaḥ yathā īśvara aṃśāḥ matsya ādiḥ tat abhinnaḥ iti atas bhinna abhinnāḥ brahmaṇā jīvaḥ iti evam prāpte prativihitam sūtra kṛtā sūryaka ādi vat iti sūtra khaṇḍena tat etat dṛṣṭānta vacana mātram na kasyacid arthasya sādhakam bādhakam vā iti atas pūvarpakṣa niṣedha pūrvakam pratijñā hetū darśayati na ca iti atas eva ca upamā sūryaka ādi vat 
NSu_3.2.114.1–3.2.114.3	 na ca cit tvāt abhinna tvam jīvasya īśa vat āpyate yatas ābhāsatām eva śrutiḥ asya vadati alam cittvāditi aṃśa tvasya api upalakṣaṇam abhinna tvam brahmaṇā iti śeṣaḥ īśa vat brahma vat īśvara avatāra vat ca āpyate yujyate asya jīvasya asya brahmaṇaḥ ābhāsatām eva iti avigānena alam vispaṣṭam etat uktam bhavati na cetana tu a ādi anumānena jīvasya brahma abheda sādhanam yuktam jīvaḥ brahma abhinnaḥ na bhavati tad ābhāsa tva āt yaḥ yad ābhāsaḥ na asau tat abhinnaḥ yathāsūryaka ādiḥ sūrya ādinā iti anumāna virodhāt na ca asiddhaḥ hetuḥ vispaṣṭa śruti siddha tvāt iti kāsau śrutiḥ iti atas tām udāharati yathā iti 
NSu_3.2.115ab.1–3.2.118.1	 yathā eṣā puruṣe cchāyā etasmin= etat ātatam chāyā atatā tathā etasmin paramātmani etat jīva jātam ātatam āyattam iti yāvat etat eva viśada śrutibhyām darśayati chāyā iti chāyā yathā puṃsadṛśā pumā adhīnā ca dṛśyate evam eva ātmakāḥ sarve brahma ādyāḥ paramātmanaḥ sattā pratīti kāryeṣu pum a dhīnaḥ yatheyate ābhāsaḥ eva puruṣāḥ muktāḥ ca paramātmanaḥ ātmakāḥ alpa cetanāḥ puruṣāḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ tad adhīna tva ādikam eva ābhāsa tvam iti vakṣyati parameśvara ābhāsa tvam ca sākṣāt kintu pāramparyeṇa iti svarūpa kathanāya śruti dvayam paṭhati chāyā viṣṇoḥ iti chāyā viṣṇo ramā tasyāḥ chāyā dhātā viśeṣakau tasya indra kāmau ca tayoḥ tayoḥ anye akhilāḥ api hareḥ brahma asya gīḥ tasyāḥ viśeṣau= indraḥ etayoḥ māraḥ ca ābhāsakāḥ sarve etayoḥ tad adhīnataḥ 
NSu_3.2.119a–3.2.119d.2	 sarve alpa śaktayaḥ ca eva pūrṇa śaktiḥ paraḥ hariḥ cetana tve api bhinnāḥ te tasmāt etena sarvadā chāyā iva chāyā viśeṣakau garuḍa śeṣau tasya dhātuḥ chāye tayoḥ garuḍa śeṣayoḥ punar tayoḥ indra kāmayoḥ hareḥ brahmā abhāsaḥ iti sarvatra sambandhaḥ ābhāsa tva vyākhyānam tat adhīnate iti sarve iti anena sarveṣām parameśvara ābhāsa tvam upapādayati caśabdaḥ hariḥ tu iti tuśabda arthaḥ ābhāsā tve kim iti atas uktam cetana tve api iti atra api tad aṃśa tva upalakṣaṇam tasmāt ābhāsa tvāt sarvadā iti anena bhinnā eva iti avadhāraṇam sūcayati udāhṛta śrutīnām phalam āha ityādi iti 
NSu_3.2.119ef.1–3.2.119ef.3	 ityādi śruti vākyebhyaḥ jñāyate bhedaḥ eva hi jīvasya parameśvara ābhāsa tvam jñāyate tena atyanta bhedaḥ ca jñāyate iti arthaḥ na para anumānayoḥ sat pratipakṣa tvam ucyate kintu asmadīya anumānasya śrauta tvena prabala tvāt bādhita tvam iti bhāvaḥ idānīṃataḥ eva ca upamā a iti sūtra avayavam vyākhyātum tat nivartanīyām āśaṅkām āha ābhāsa tvam hi iti 
NSu_3.2.120a–3.2.120c.3	 ābhāsa tvam hi nirṇītam jīvasya paramātmanaḥ tat na yuktam yat jīvasya paramātmanaḥ ābhāsa tvam śruti balena nirṇītam tat yukti viruddham na hi niravakāśa yukti viruddhaḥ arthaḥ śrutyā api pratipādayitum śakyate tathā satyabhimāni adhikaraṇa anārambha prasaṅgāt atas sā kathañcid yojanīyā iti katham na yuktam iti atas āha yat iti 
NSu_3.2.120cd.1–3.2.121a.2	 yad ābhāse upādhyāyattaḥ īyate yasmāt ābhāsaḥ sūryaka ādiḥ jala ādi upādhi āyattaḥ jñāyate ābhāsa tvasya upādhyāyattatvam vyāpaka tvena sarvatra niścitam iti arthaḥ tathā api kutas na yuktam iti atas āha upādhi iti upādhi āyattata abhāvāt jīvānām iti śeṣaḥ vyāpakasya upādhi āyattatvasya jīveṣu abhāvāt vayāpyam api ābhāsa tvam na yuktam tatas hetoḥ asiddheḥ duṣyam anumānam itas ca duṣyam iti āha ābhāsatva iti 
NSu_3.2.121b.1–3.2.121b.3	 ābhāsa tva virodhataḥ ābhāsa tvasya bhinna tvena virodhataḥ ca anumānam duṣyam tathā hi darpaṇa ādinā sannikṛṣṭāḥ pratihatāḥ parāvṛttāḥ na ayana raśmayaḥ mukhena sannikṛṣṭāḥ tat eva viṣayīkurvanti na tu tatas anyaḥ ābhāsaḥ nāma asti tatra vyavacchedaḥ parāktvam savyetara vyatyāsaḥ ca iti ādikam bhrāntyā eva pratīyate sa upādhikaḥ ca ayam bhramaḥ iti yāvat upādhi bhāvam na nivartate evañca ābhāsa tvasya abhedena vyāpta tvāt bheda sādhane viruddha tvam iti upalakṣaṇam ca etat tat tvam asya ādi śruti viruddha tvena kāla atīta tvam api draṣṭavyam evam ābhāsa tva anumāne duṣye kim iti ced nirābādhena prāk ukta anumāna dvayena aikyam siddham iti āha cetana tvena iti 
NSu_3.2.121cd.1–3.2.121cd.3	 cetana tvena ca aṃśa tvāt samudāya aikyam āpatet aṃśa tvāt ca iti anvayaḥ aikyam ca sādhyamānam na māyā vādinām iva iti uktam samudāya iti māyā vādinaḥ hi jīvānām pratyekam brahmaṇā atyanta abhedam aṅgīkurvate na ca evam asmat matam samudāya aikye bhedasya api sattvāt iti atyanta abhedam parityajya samudāya aikyam kutas aṅgīkriyate iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_3.2.122ab.1–3.2.122ab.4	 atas pṛthaktavam uditam samudāya aṃśayoḥ bhavet samudāya aikya aṅgīkārataḥ yacchati ādi uktam pṛthaktvam tat samudāyasya tad aṃśasya ca jīvasya bhavet samudāyasya yau= aṃśau jīva īśvarau tayoḥ bhavet iti vā etat uktam bhavati yadi jīvasya brahmaṇā atyanta abhedaḥ sādhyate tadā bheda śrutayaḥ uparudhyeran māyika paratva abhidhāne ca apramāṇam āpadyeran naca ayam asmākam asti doṣaḥ jīva brahmaṇoḥ jīva īśvarayoḥ ca bheda sadbhāvena tad viṣaya tva upapatteḥ iti etena cetana tva ādi anumānasya ābhāsa uddhāraḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati samudāya aikyam iti uktam tat kiñcit prapañcayati īśa ākhyā iti 
NSu_3.2.122c.1–3.2.122c.2	 īśā ākhyā samudāye syāt īśa śabdaḥ brahma paraḥ samudāye cetanānām etat uktam bhavati brahma aikyam eva svabhāva siddham tattvam tat parama artha bhūtam māyā sambandhāt īśvara tām āpadyate sa ca sarvajñaḥ sarva īśvaraḥ jagat janana ādi kartā jīvāḥ tu brahmaṇaḥ ṃ aśāḥ cid svabhāvāḥ vahneḥ iva viṣphuliṅgāḥ atas eva brahmaṇaḥ bhinna abhinnāḥ parasparam īśvarāt ca bhinnāḥ eva brahma tu sakala cetana samudāya ātmakam atiriktam ca iti atra dṛṣṭāntam āha īśa iti 
NSu_3.2.122d.1–3.2.122d.3	 īśa rūpeṣu iva uditā yathā bhagavat rūpāṇām matsya ādīnām samudāye bhagavat saṃjñā na sthānataḥ api ityādau siddhāntinā uditā tathā etena atyanta abhedam parityajya bheda abheda aṅgīkāre śruti dvayam iva aṃśatva anumānam ca uktam bhavati yadi matsya ādayaḥ parameśvarasya iva jīvāḥ brahmaṇaḥ ṃ aśāḥ syuḥ tadā matsya ādīnām aiśvarya ādi vat jīvānām nirduḥkha tva ādikam syāt aṃśeṣu aṃśi sādharmyasya avyabhicārāt kiñca yadi jīvasya brahmaṇā bhedaḥ api parama arthaḥ syāt tadā brahmā eva bhavati iti uktā muktiḥ ayuktā syāt iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_3.2.123a–3.2.123c.3	 atas deha ādi upādhīnām apāye sama tā bhavet īśa rūpaiḥ buddhi sannihitam tadīya siddhāntam atas iti parāmṛśati na jīvānām brahmaṇā bheda abhedau svābhāvikau kintva bhedaḥ svābhāvikaḥ bhedaḥ tu aupādhikaḥ yathā īśvara aṃśānām matsya ādīnām īśvareṇa iyān= tu viśeṣaḥ matsya ādyāḥ jagat anugraha artham līlā vigraha upādhi bhinnāḥ atiraskṛta aiśvaryādimantaḥ jīvāḥ tu anādya vidyā kāma karma ādi nibandhana deha indriya ādi upādhi bhinnāḥ tiraskṛta brahma svabhāvāḥ upādhi nibandhana duḥkha ādi bhājaḥ ca iti yatas evam aupādhikaḥ eva bhedaḥ atas jñāna karmābhyām deha ādi upādhīnām ātyantike apāye sati jīvānām īśa rūpaiḥ sama tā bhavet yathā īśvara rūpāṇi kārya avasāne sva icchayā eva līlā vigraha tyāgena īśvara tām āpadyante tathā jīvāḥ api anuṣyita jñāna karma samuccayāḥ prārabdha karma avasāne deha ādi upādhibhiḥ atyanta vimuktāḥ svābhāvikam brahma tvam āpadyante iti na kaścid doṣaḥ yat uktam upādhi āyat tata abhāvāt iti tat asiddham jīvānām api sūryaka ādi vat ābhā satva aṅgīkāre bādhaka abhāvāt iti bhāvena aśaṅkate atha iti 
NSu_3.2.123cd.1–3.2.124ab.3	 atha ābhāsāḥ mukhyatas sūryaka ādi vat yadā athaśabdaḥ śaṅkā upakrame pakṣa antare vā ābhāsāḥ jīvāḥ mukhyatas iti upādhi āyattatvena sūryaka ādinā tulyam vartate iti sūryaka ādi vat uttara vākye vā asya sambandhaḥ pariharati tadā iti  tadā upādhi āyatta rūpāṇām nāśitā bhavet yadi jīvānām upādhyāyat tatā syāt tarhi upādhi nāśe sūryaka ādīnām iva teṣām nāśitā bhavet atha upādhayaḥ avināśinaḥ tadā pratyakṣa ādi virodhaḥ sarvadā saṃsāri tvam ca syāt iti ubhayathā mokṣa śāstra vaiyarthyam tasmāt upādhi adhīna tve aṅgīkartum aśakye susthā eva ābhāsa tvasya asiddhiḥ iti etad āśaṅkā nivartaka tvena sūtra avayavam avatārayati iti āśaṅkā iti 
NSu_3.2.124c–3.2.124e.3	 iti āśaṅkā nivṛtti artham āha veda adhipaḥ prabhuḥ atas eva upamā iti eva ca caśabdaḥ atas eva ca upamā iti bhinnakramaḥ etāvat eva vākyam etat āśaṅkā nirāsa artham na punar idam sūtrasya pratīka grahaṇam iti eva śabdaḥ anyathā hi sūryaka ādi vaditi asya āvṛttiḥ āśaṅkayeta yat vā eka vākyatā nirāsena para kṛtasya apavyākhyāna tām āha yatas eva ayam ātmā caitanya svarūpaḥ nirviśeṣaḥ vāc manasā atītaḥ para pratiṣedha upadeśyaḥ atas eva ca asya upādhi nimittam apāramārthikīm viśeṣa vat tām abhipretya jala sūryaka ādi vat iti upama upādīyate mokṣa śāstreṣu iti yadi api evam eka vākyatā lābhaḥ tathā api artha doṣaḥ tatra tatra vyutpāditaḥ eva vateḥ vaiyarthyam ca sūryakādiḥ iti etāvatā pūrṇa tvāt iti śabda adhyāhāraḥ ca evam na kartavyaḥ iti sūtrakhaṇḍasya tātparyam āha anyā iti 
NSu_3.2.124f.1–3.2.125.3	 anya ābhāsa viśeṣitām anyasmāt sūrya ka ādeḥ ābhāsāt jīvānām viśeṣitām vilakṣaṇa tām anena sūtra khaṇḍena āha sūtrakāraḥ tat etat tāt paryam sūtra akṣaraiḥ katam labhyate iti atas idaṃśabda parāmṛṣṭam artham tāvat darśayati yat uktam iti yat uktam tat adhīna tvam sarva avasthāsu aśeṣataḥ jīvasya sadṛśa tvam ca cittva mātram na ca aparam tad adhīna tvam paramātma adhīna tvam aśeṣatas aśeṣeṣu vyāpāreṣu sandhye sṛṣṭiḥ āha hi ityādau sadṛśa tvam ca paramātmanā yat uktam puṃstva ādi vat iti ādau kim tad sadṛśa tvam cittva mātram na ca aparam svātantrya ādikam yena hetoḥ viruddha tā syāt iti bhāvaḥ idānīm atas eva ca upamā iti vākyam yojayati tāvat mātreṇa ca iti 
NSu_3.2.126ab.1–3.2.126ab.3	 tāvat mātreṇa ca ābhāsaḥ rūpam eṣām cit ātmanām tad adhīna tva tad sadṛśa tva mātreṇa eṣām cit ātmanām rūpam svarūpam asmābhiḥ ābhāsaḥ iti uktam sūryaka ādi upamā ca tāvat mātreṇa ca upapatteḥ iti ca arthaḥ jīvaḥ iti vaktavye eṣām cit ātmanām rūpam iti vacanam mukteṣu idam dvayam asti iti darśayitum anena atas eva prakṛtābhyām tad adhīna tva tad sadṛśa tvābhyām eva ābhāsa tvam sūryaka ādi upamā ca uktā iti sva abhiprāya prakaṭanam sūtrāthar iti uktam bhavati eva śabda vyāvartyam darśayati na iti 
NSu_3.2.126c.1–3.2.126c.3	 na upādhi adhīnata ādyaiḥ ca upādhi adhīna tva tad nāśa na śyatvaḍa tva ādyaiḥ api na iti arthaḥ bahuvacana prayogāt nāśitā bhavet iti āpādanam api upalakṣaṇam boddhavyam nanu evam sati dṛṣṭānta dārṣya antika bhāvaḥ na syāt atyanta sāmye hi sa bhavati anyathā prameya tva ādi mātra sāmyasya sarvatra sambhavena maśakaḥ api mātaṅgasya dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt iti atas āha na ati sāmyam iti 
NSu_3.2.126d.1–3.2.126d.3	 na ati sāmyam nidarśane nidarśyate sādhyena sādhanasya vyāptiḥ atra iti hi nidarśanam atas sādhya sādhana dharma sāmyam eva dārṣya antikena tatra anveṣyavyam na tu ati sāmyam tathā sati sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt maśaka ādeḥ api vivakṣita dharma sāmye dṛṣṭānta tvam na aniṣyam iti nanu cittva mātram iti asat muktau sukha ādi aṅgīkāra virodhāt ityataḥ āha kiñcid iti 
NSu_3.2.127ab.1–3.2.127ab.3	 kiñcid sukha ādi sādṛśyam api īśenesura anṛte asurān vihāyāni eṣām jīvānām īśena kiñcid sukha ādi sādṛśyam api asti eva sukha ādi sādṛśyam vidyamānam api asarva gāmi tva at na uktam cit tva sādṛśyam tu sarva gāmi tvāt uktām iti bhāvaḥ niravadhika sukha ādi vyavacchedāya kiñcid iti uktam anyathā hi hetoḥ viruddha tā syāt ayam samudāya arthaḥ brahma ābhāsa tvāt iti hetoḥ brahma adhīna tvāt tad sadṛśa tvāt ca iti arthaḥ na tu sūryaka ādi vat pratibimba tvāt iti na ca ayam arthaḥ asiddhaḥ nipuṇataram prāk upapādita tvāt na ca upādhi adhīna tvena vyāptaḥ yena tad vaya āvṛttyā vyāvarteta upādhi adhīna tā ra hiteṣu api bhāvāt na ca bhāga asiddhiḥ cit ātma svarūpa tayā upapādita tvāt na api viruddhaḥ bhinneṣu eva bhāvāt 
NSu_3.2.127ab.4	 tathā api bimba pratibimbayoḥ aikyāt sūryaka ādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya sādhana vikalaḥ iti ced na pramāṇa abhāvāt na tāvat pratyakṣam tasya pratyaktu aparaktvādinā bheda grāhi tvāt pratyabhijñānam tu asiddham eva na api anumānam liṅga abhāvāt atyanta sādṛśyasya savya itara kara ādinā vyabhicārāt vaidharmya abhāvasya ca asiddha tvāt kriyā sāmyasya chāyā dā= anaikāntyāt pṛthak kāraṇa abhāvasya nityeṣu vyabhicārāt bimba kāraṇa mātra janya tvasya sandigdha tvāt pṛthak dṛṣṭa kārya anurodhena hi adṛṣṭam api pṛthak kāraṇam kalpyate 
NSu_3.2.127ab.5–3.2.127cd.1	 na tu kāraṇa adarśanena dṛṣṭa kārya apalāpaḥ tathā sati bahu viplava āpatteḥ tatas kāraṇam upādhiḥ eva kalpyate āgamāḥ tu pratyakṣa ādi virodhāt upacarita arthāḥ eva yadi ca jala ādinā pratihatāḥ nayana raśmayaḥ mukham īkṣante tadā śilā ādi pratihatāḥ api īkṣeran na ca asyām prakriyāyām svaccha tāyāḥ kaḥ api upayogaḥ asti iti alam tat tvam asya ādi śruti virodhaḥ tu parihariṣyate atas nirdeṣam eva ābhāsatva anumānam iti nanu brahma ābhāsa śabdaḥ jīvasya brahma adhīna tām brahma sadṛśa tām ca kayā vṛttyā vakti gauṇya iti ced evam tarhi asmad āyatte śabda prayoge avācakam kim iti prayokṣyāmahe iti prayojanam vācyam mā evam yoga āśrayaṇāt iti āha tatas iti tatas ābhāsate nityam tadvat ābhāsate api ca 
NSu_3.2.128.1–3.2.128.2	 bhānam asti tvam apica eva asamantāt yatas tatas jīvaḥ ābhāsaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ sadā eva paramātmanaḥ tena parama ātmanā nimittena ābhāsate pratītaḥ bhavati iti pratītau tad adhīna tvam ucyate tadvat brahma vada ābhāsate iti anena tad sadṛśa tvam api ca iti vyākhyāna samuccaye bhānam jñānam astitvam sattvam asti śabdaḥ avyayam asti svati iti pāṭhāt api śabdaḥ bhāna astitvayoḥ samuccaye caśabdaḥ vyākhyāna samuccaye eva śabdasya tatas eva iti sambandhaḥ ā iti anuvādena samantāt iti vyākhyānam yatas kāraṇāt tatas paramātmanaḥ eva jīvasya bhavataḥ tatas kāraṇāt iti āvṛttyā yojyam bhā ca āmā ca bhā ase ā sarva kāla vartinyau bhā ase ābhāse paramātma adhīne ābhāse yasya asau paramātma ābhāsaḥ pūrva anta vat svaraḥ sandhau kvacid eva para ādi vat draṣṭavyaḥ yati cintāyām yaṇa ādeśaḥ para ādivat a iti vacanāt na yati bhaṅgaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ 
NSu_3.2.129ab.1–3.2.129ab.2	 na jala āyatta sūrya ādi pratibimba upama tvataḥ na jala āyatta sūrya ādi pratibimba upama tvataḥ iti sūrya ādi pratibimbāḥ yathā jala ādi upādhi āyattāḥ tathā upādhyāyattatvena ābhāsaḥ na iti arthaḥ nanu ayam arthaḥ na upādhi adhīnata ādyaiḥ iti anena eva uktaḥ satyam yat uktam ityādinā uktaḥ eva arthaḥ tatas ābhāsate ityādinā prapañcitaḥ iti adoṣaḥ tathā hi rūpam eṣām cit ātmanām a iti uktasya tātparyam sadā eva iti uktam syāt etat sūtrakāreṇa dṛṣṭānta mātram uktam tad balāt kaścid hetuḥ adhyāhartavyaḥ na ca ābhāsa tvam eva iti asti niyamaḥ na api ābhāsa pada upādāne niyāmakam asti tasmāt asaṅgatam etat mā evam ābhāsaḥ eva ca iti sūtrakāra uktasya brahma ābhāsa tvasya atra hetu tvena vivakṣita tvāt brahma aṃśa tvena ākṣepe tad adhikaraṇa gata arthasya eva buddhi sannidhānāt tatra kartavyaḥ eva ayam caṛcaḥ atra kṛtaḥ iti na kaścid doṣaḥ 
NSu_3.2.129ab.3–3.2.129ab.4	 nanu upādhimat tvena eva jīvasya bhagavat pratibimba tvam iti siddhānte upādheḥ api nitya cetana tvena doṣa parihāraḥ yathā uktam upādheḥ ca eva nitya tvāt na eva jīvaḥ vinaśyati sva rūpa tvāt upādheḥ ca na bhinna upādhi kalpanā a iti tat katham etat ittham dvividhaḥ hi jīva upādhiḥ abhyantaraḥ bāhyaḥ ca tatra svarūpa pratibhāsa hetuḥ ābhyantaraḥ svabhāva viparīta avabhāsa hetuḥ antaḥkaraṇa ādiḥ bāhyaḥ tad āyatta tva ādikam caitanyasya na asti iti abhipretya idam uditam tat uktam jīva upādhiḥ dvidhā proktaḥ svarūpam bāhyaḥ eva ca bāhya upādhiḥ layam yāti muktau= anyasya tu sthitiḥ a iti nirupādhi pratibimba vācaḥ yuktar api bāhya upādhi adhīna tva abhāva abhiprāyeṇa netavya iti sautraḥ caśabdaḥ ābhāsa tva samuccaya arthasya vyākhyātaḥ avadhāraṇa arthaḥ vā pratipattavyaḥ evam tarhi punarukti doṣaḥ eva śabdasya api avadhāraṇa artha tvāt iti atas āha tad adhīna tvam iti 
NSu_3.2.129c–3.2.129c–3.2.129f.2^1	 tad adhīna tvam eva iti kiñcid sādṛśyam eva ca samprakāśayataḥ sūtra gatau eva iti śabdaḥ tad adhīna tvam eva iti artham caśabdaḥ kiñcid sādṛśyam eva iti artham iti ubhā= artha dvayam samprakāśayate iti āvṛttyā yojyam yat vā eva iti śabdaḥ tad adhīna tvam caḥ kiñcid sādṛśyam iti ubhau= artha dvayam samprakāśayataḥ avadhārayate iti vyākhyeyam etat uktam bhavati atas iti artha dvayam hetu tvena uktam pratyekam ca upādhi adhīna tva ādikam vyāvartanīyam tad adhīna tvāt eva tad sadṛśa tvāt eva iti tasmāt ubhau= api sārthakau= iti eva śabdena ekena eva śabdena ubhaya avadhāraṇam pratiṣedhati nanu ekaikena eva śabdena artha dvayasya ukta tvāt ekena eva ādhāraṇena alam 
NSu_3.2.129c–3.2.129f.2^2–3.2.129f.1	 mā evam buddhayā viviktena artha dvayena sambandhāt atha artha dvayam ekīkṛtya kasmāt na avadhāryate asti atra sūcanīyaḥ arthaḥ yat yatas eva iti etāvat eva ucyeta tat ekasya eva arthasya ayam parāmarśaḥ na dvitayasya parāmarśaḥ dvitīya parāmarśe api militasya hetu tvam iti jñāyeta avadhāraṇa dvaya prayoge tu tat anyathā anupapattyā pratyekam hetu bhūta artha dvaya parāmarśaḥ vijñāyate tathā ca bādhakasya aneka tvena prābalyam viśeṣaṇa kṛtya gaveṣaṇa prayāsa nirasaranam ca labdham syāt tat idam uktam sūtra gatau= iti evam cetana tva ādi anumānasya bādhaka tayā uktam ābhāsatva anumānam samarthitam tat idam pramāṇa antara upalakṣaṇam iti āśayavān āha akhila iti  akhila mānataḥ 
NSu_3.2.130ab.1–3.2.130ab.3	 jīveśa bheda dṛṣṭayā eva samudāya eka tā kutas na kevalam ābhā satva anumānena kintu akhilaiḥ api mānaiḥ bheda dṛṣṭayā iti ukte siddha sādhana tā syāt pareṇa api bhedasya aṅgīkṛta tvāt ataeva aśabdaḥ sa ca samāse guṇa bhūtena api buddhayā viviktena bheda śabdena sambaddhayate abheda nirāsena bhedasya darśanāt iti kutas pramāṇāt siddhayet tatra aikya bādhakam pratyakṣam tāvat siddham eva na aham sarvajñaḥ nirdeṣaḥ ityādi anubhavāt yathā hi stambhe kumbha tādātmya abhāvaḥ pratyakṣaḥ tathā atmani sārvajña ādi lakṣaṇa brahma tādātmya abhāvaḥ sākṣiṇā siddhaḥ eva tad abhra anta tā ca prāk eva upapāditā āgamāḥ tu tatra tatra udāhṛtāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ anumāna antaram ca āha aśeṣa iti 
NSu_3.2.130cd.1–3.2.131ab.3	 aśeṣa doṣa rāhityam sarva śakti tvataḥ hareḥ sarva upeta iti kathitam atas aikyam kva doṣiṇā etat uktam bhavati jīva brahmaṇī na abhedavatī viruddha dharma adhikaraṇāt chāyā atapavat na ca asiddhaḥ hetuḥ sarva upetā ca tad darśanāt iti sarva śakti tvena hetunā brahmaṇaḥ aśeṣa doṣa rāhiti asya samarthita tvāt jīve duḥkha ādi doṣāṇām anubhava siddha tvāt viruddha dharma adhikaraṇayoḥ api aikye stambha kumbhayoḥ api aikyam syāt iti nanu astu paramātmā sarva śaktiḥ aśeṣa doṣa rahitaḥ ca tathā api upādhibhinnaḥ tad aṃśaḥ jīvāḥ tad nimitta doṣavān= ca bhaviṣyati kaḥ virodhaḥ prakāra bhedasya virodha śānti hetu tvāt ityatas āha aśeṣa iti 
NSu_3.2.131cd.1–3.2.131cd.4^1	 aśeṣa śakti yuktaḥ ced svātantryāt doṣavān katham yadi aśeṣa śakti yuktaḥ paramātma aṅgīkṛtaḥ tadā tasya upādhau tad nimitte ca svātantryāt katham tad nimitta doṣavān syāt ayam abhisandhiḥ bhavatu vā anena prakāra bhedena virodha śāntiḥ mā vā bhūt prakāra bhedaḥ eva ayam anupapannaḥ tathā hi antaḥkaraṇādayupādhayaḥ avidyā nimittam ittāni ca sva śaktyā paramātmānam vicchidya tad aṃśasya jīvasya duḥkha ādi doṣān kurvanti iti tāvat na yujyate paramātmanaḥ sarva śakti svātantrya hāni prasaṅgāt atas paramātmā eva sarva śaktiḥ svādhīnaiḥ eva taiḥ sva ātmānam vicchidya sva aṃśam jīvam duḥkha ādi doṣa yoginam karoti iti mantavyam tat ca ayuktataram aprekṣāvat tva prasakteḥ 
NSu_3.2.131cd.1–3.2.131cd.4^2	 na hi kaścid prekṣāvān ātmānam ātma adhīnaiḥ ahikaṇṭaka ādibhiḥ apuruṣa artha bhājam kurvāṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na ca tāpasasya iva ātmanaḥ duḥkha utpādanena paramātmanaḥ kiñcid prayojanam asti paripūrṇa tvāt naca avidyā ādinaḥ anāditā atra samādhānam anādinaḥ api tat pravāhasya tad adhīna tvāt na ca līlā mātram etat iti sāmpratam svā puruṣa artha hetoḥ līlāyāḥ prekṣā pūrva kāribhiḥ anupādānāt atas parama puruṣasya na kena api prakāreṇa doṣa saṃsargaḥ yujyate iti na doṣiṇā jīvena tasya aikyam yuktam iti jīva brahmaṇoḥ aikye api brahmaṇaḥ jīva gata duḥkha ādi anusandhāna abhāvāt na ukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca uktena prakāra bhedena virodha śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati iti bhāvena śaṅkate anusandhānā iti 
NSu_3.2.132ab.1–3.2.132b.2	 anusandhāna rahitam aikyam ced anusandhānam nāma bhoga samākhyātaḥ svīyatayā duḥkha ādi sākṣātkāraḥ abhimataḥ pariharati ekatā iti  ekatā na tat tat tarhi jīvaḥ tāvat brahma svarūpam nirduḥkha tva ādikam na anusandhattaḥ iti avivādam brahmā api ced jīva gatam duḥkha ādikam na anusanda dhyāt tadā tayoḥ ekatā na asti iti eva ukta prāyam syāt katham iti atas āha cetanā iti 
NSu_3.2.132cd.1–3.2.132cd.2	 cetanā aikye anusandhānam pramāṇam na eva ca aparam caḥ hetu arthaḥ astu aikyaḥ anusandhānam pramāṇam tatas kim eka pramāṇa vyāvṛttau prameya vyāvṛtti abhāvāt mā hi bhūt dhūma abhāvaḥ agni abhāvaḥ iti atas uktam na eva aparam iti nanu asti ghaṭasya ghaṭena aikyam na tu anusandhānam tat katham etat iti atas uktam cetanā iti 
NSu_3.2.132cd.3	 etat uktam bhavati caitanya avacchinnam aikyam anusandhāna eka pramāṇakam āgama ādikam tu anusandhāne sati saṃvāditayā pravartate atas eva hi mama ātmā bhadrasenaḥ iti vākyam anusandhāna abhāvena bādhyate tathā na ayam saḥ ityādi vākyam anusandhānena na ca prāc bhavīya duḥkha ādi anusandhānam idānīm na asti asti ca aikyam iti vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ na hi vayam sadā anusandhānam brūmaḥ kintu yaḥ cetanaḥ yat svarūpam kadācid anusandhatte sa tena abhinnaḥ yaḥ na anusandhatte sa tena na abhinnaḥ iti tad eka pramāṇakasya tad nivṛttau nivṛttiḥ eva yathā rūpa grahaṇa nivṛttau cakṣuḥ nivṛttiḥ na ca cetana tvam śakya nivartanam ubhaya vādi siddha tvāt tasmāt ekatā eva nivartate iti 
NSu_3.2.132cd.4–3.2.132cd.5	 etena cetana tva ādi anumānasya sa upādhika tvam ca uktam bhavati anusandhānam khalu cetanatva avacchinnasya aikyasya vyāpakam upalabdham deva datta ādau avyāpakam ca cetana tva ādeḥ pakṣaḥ eva tad abhāvāt tathā ca sulabhaḥ prayogaḥ jīva brahmaṇī cetana tve sati paraspara aikyavatī na bhavataḥ paraspara anusandhāna rahita tvāt sampratipanna vat iti na ca pratijñāyām viśeṣaṇam vyartham śabdaḥ na sparśavat viśeṣa guṇaḥ iti ādau= iva hetu vyabhicāra parihāra artha tvāt śaṅkate anusandhānā iti 
NSu_3.2.133a–3.2.133c.2	 anusandhāna rahita samudāya aikyam eva ced cetaneṣu yatas samudāya aikyam eva mayā ucyate na ati anta aikyam atas cetaneṣu api anusandhāna rahitam tat yuktam ayam abhisandhiḥ samudāya aikya vādinā hi jīva brahmaṇoḥ bheda abhedau svīkriyete tatra anusandhāna abhāvaḥ bheda nimittaḥ tad jñāpanena eva caritārthaḥ nābha idam nivartayati tantu paṭa ādiṣu hi samudāya aikya sthaleṣu viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ bheda jñāpana mātreṇa kṛtārthaḥ nābha idam bādhate anyathā tatra api abheda aṅgīkāraḥ durghaṭaḥ syāt tasmāt aikyam na anupapannam iti gūḍha abhisandhiḥ sampratipattim uttaram āha astu tat iti 
NSu_3.2.133c.1–3.2.133cd.2	 astu tat sarvathā api paraspara svarūpa anusandhāna rahitam jīva brahmaṇoḥ aikyam bhavantu iti arthaḥ vipratipanna artha aṅgīkāre pratijñāhāniḥ nigraha sthānam syāt iti atas āha nāma mātram eva iti  nāma mātram eva yatas tatas yatas tat aikyam nāma mātram na vāstavam tatas tad abhyupagamaḥ na dūṣaṇam ayam abhisandhiḥ tantu paṭa ādi a bhedaḥ na viruddha dharma adhyāsa abhāva eka pramāṇakaḥ pratyakṣa ādinā tad abhedasya siddha tvāt tathā ca viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tva bhayāt abheda bādhanāt nivṛttaḥ bheda sādhanena eva kṛtī bhavati tathā yadi cetana aikyam niravakāśa pramāṇa antara gamyam syāt tadā anusandhāna abhāvaḥ abhedam abādhamānaḥ bheda mātra pratipādanena caritārthaḥ syāt 
NSu_3.2.133cd.3–3.2.133cd.4	 naca evam cetana ekyasya anusandhāna vyāpya tayā ukta tvāt vyāpaka abhāve ca vyāpya nivṛtteḥ āvaśyaka tvena aikya abhāve punar tat vacanam nirarthakam eva iti bhavatu anusandhāna eka pramāṇakam cetana aikyam anusandhānam ca kādācitkam api aikyam sādhayati vidyate ca muktau= anusandhānam iti aikya siddhiḥ mukta svarūpasya duḥkha ādi doṣa dūra tvena prāc ukta doṣa abhāvaḥ ca iti atas āha muktau= iti 
NSu_3.2.134ab.1–3.2.134ab.2	 muktau syāt anusandhānam iti api syāt su duṣkaram iti api vacanam su duṣkaram syāt pramāṇa abhāvena sandigdha tvāt iti bhāvaḥ kiñca muktau= anusandhānam bhaviṣyati iti vadatā vaktavyam idānīm kutas anusandhānam na asti iti atha brūyāt avidyā kāma karma ādi pratibandhaka sadbhāvāt iti tatra vaktavyam pratibandhaka sadbhāva nibandhanaḥ eva idānīm anusandhāna abhāvaḥ na punar aikya abhāva nibandhanaḥ iti kutas te niścayaḥ iti vayam tu vadāmaḥ aikya abhāva nibandhanaḥ eva ayam idānīm anusandhāna abhāvaḥ na ajñāna ādi nimittaḥ iti kutas ayam niścayaḥ iti tatra āha sarvajñaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.134cd.1–3.2.134cd.2	 sarvajñaḥ eka tām na anusandhatte na eva sā yatas yatas sarvajñaḥ eka tām na anusandhatte atas sā eka tā na eva iti sambandhaḥ etat uktam bhavati yadi ajñāna ādi nibandhanaḥ ayam anusandhāna abhāvaḥ bhavet bhavet tadā jīvānām eva teṣām eva ajñāna ādi sambandhi tvāt paramātmā tu anusandadhyāt eva tasya sarvajña tvena ajñāna ādi abhāvāt naca asau= anusandhatte yasmāt kṣaram atītaḥ aham ityādi vat vākyaiḥ bheda anubhavasya eva avagamāt tena niścinumaḥ anusandhāna abhāvaḥ na ajñāna ādi pratibandhaka nibandhanaḥ kintvā aikya abhāva nimittaḥ eva iti 
NSu_3.2.134cd.3–3.2.134cd.4	 īśvaraḥ eva asau= iti ced kaḥ tatas anyaḥ paramātmā pramāṇa abhāvāt kiñca īśvaraḥ api sarvajñaḥ eva iti kim anena iti api ca aikye pramāṇa siddhe anusandhāna abhāvaḥ pratibandhaka nibandhanaḥ iti kalpanā upapadyate na ca tat asti iti uktam nanu ca duḥkha ādikam jīvasya na caitanya svarūpa anubandhi kinnāma viśiṣya ākāra gatam eva tat katham īśvaraḥ anusandhīta iti duḥkha ādi ananusandhāne api aikyam tāvat anusandadhyāt eva iti uktam ekatām iti atas eva vibheda janake ajñāne nāśam ātyantikam gate ātmanaḥ brahmaṇā bhedam asantam kaḥ kariṣyati a ityādi vākyānyathā yojyāni vibheda śabdaḥ hi virodha vācī mitra bhedaḥ iti yathā tathā ca jīvasya paramātmanā viparītam ati tvam ajñāna nibandhanam tad apāye na bhavati iti arthaḥ paramātmanaḥ aikya anusandhāna abhāvaḥ asiddhaḥ yatas idānīm ananusanda dhadapīdam āgāmini kāle anusandhasyati na hi sārvakālikam anusandhānam aikyasya vyāpakam iti āśaṅkate paścāt iti 
NSu_3.2.135ab.1–3.2.135b.3	 paścāt syāt anusandhānam ced paramātmanaḥ jīva aikyasya iti śeṣaḥ atra pramāṇam na asti iti sphuṭaḥ parihāraḥ gūḍha abhisandhiḥ parihāra antaram āha mithyā iti  mithyājñānitā bhavet paramātmanaḥ iti śeṣaḥ sarvajñaḥ hi yadi idānīm jīva aikyam na anusandhatte tadā tat asat eva syāt saptamarasa ādi vat tathā ca āgāmini kāle tat anusandhāsyati ced mithyājñānī prasajyeta iti abhisandhiḥ nanu avidyamānam vidyamāna tayā anusandadhānaḥ mithyājñānī bhavati na ca aikyam avidyamānam tat katham paramātmanaḥ mithyājñāni tvam iti avidita abhisandheḥ āśaṅkām abhisandhim uddhāṭayan pariharati vidyamānā iti 
NSu_3.2.135cd.1–3.2.135cd.2	 vidyamāna anusandhānam na ced ajña tvam āpatet yadi aikyam vidyamānam tarhi tat idānīm ananu sanda dhada sarvajñaḥ syāt na ca tat yuktam atas na asti eva tat iti vācyam tathā ca tad anusandhāsyān katham mithyājñānī na bhavet etena īśvarasya idānīm śarīra sadbhāvāt ananusandhānam iti api nirastam sārvajña hāni prasaṅgā nistārāt īśvarasya sa ākāra tāyāḥ nitya tvena na bhāvini api anusandhāne pratyāśā 
NSu_3.2.135cd.3	 yadā aikyam avidyamānam eva yadi vā vidyamānam eva tadā ukta doṣa dvayam syāt naca evam kintu idānīm asat eva paścāt jñāna uttara kāle bhavet tatra idānīm asattvāt na paramātmanaḥ tad ananu sandhāne sāvarjña hāniḥ paścāt bhāvāt ca na tad anusandhāne mithyājñānitvam iti pariśiṣyam pakṣam kasyacid matam vā śaṅkate asat iti 
NSu_3.2.136ab.1–3.2.136ab.4	 asat aikyam bhavet paścāt yadi syāt saptamaḥ rasaḥ pariharati syāt iti tarhi iti śeṣaḥ na hi anādau saṃsāre yasya yena na aikyam tat tena ekībhūtam upalabdham na ca tathā bhaviṣyati iti atra pramāṇam asti pare avyaye sarve ekībhavanti ayāvat mokṣam tu bhedaḥ syāt jīvasya paramasya ca tatas param na bhedaḥ asti bheda hetoḥ abhāvataḥ a ityādi śruti smṛtīnām sthāna aikya ādi viṣaya tvena sa avakāśa tvāt atas saptamaḥ rasaḥ bhaviṣyati iti vat iyam pratyāśātyanta asambhāvita viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ jīva brahmaṇoḥ saṃsāre bheda abhedau mokṣe tu abhedaḥ eva iti saṃsāre kevala bhedaḥ muktau= atyantā bheda iti bheda abheda mata dvaya doṣa atideśena avasthā dvaye api bheda abhedau= iti tṛtīya m atam apākaroti samudāya iti 
NSu_3.2.136cd.1–3.2.136cd.3	 samudāya aikyam etasmāt dūratas apākṛtam sadā sadā samudāya aikyam iti sambandhaḥ etasmāt pramāṇa śūnya tvāt ābhāsa tva ādi pramāṇa viruddha tvāt ca iyān= tu viśeṣaḥ abheda kāryasya anusandhānasya bhedaḥ pratibandhakaḥ tasmin= apagate muktau= anusandhānam bhaviṣyati iti asti pūrvayoḥ matayoḥ pratyāśā atra tu sā api na asti bhedasya sadātana tvāt anusandhānam ca cetanā aikyasya vyāpakam iti uktam tat idam uktam dūratas iti deha ādi eva anusandhānasya pratibandhakam iti ced na kāyavhavatām yūyoginām anusandhān asadbhāvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt yadi evam na sakala cetana samudāyaḥ paramātmā tarhi kiyatī sīmā paramātma tvasya iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_3.2.137a–3.2.137d.2	 atas aśeṣa guṇa unnaddham nirdoṣam yāvat eva hi tāvat eva īśvaraḥ nāma sādhakasya anusandhānasya sarvatra abhāvāt bādhakasya ābhāsa tva ādeḥ bhāvāt iha tu tad bhāva abhāvābhyām iti arthaḥ aśeṣa guṇa unnaddha tvam nirdeṣa tvam ca pratyekam nirdhāraṇa hetu tvena uktam sva mate brahmaṇaḥ īśvara atiriktasya abhāvam sūcayitum sarvatra īśvaraḥ iti ādi uktiḥ idam hi brahmaṇaḥ lakṣaṇam śruti ādi siddham iti hi śabdaḥ tāvat vastu īśvaraḥ nāma iti ukte samudāya aikyam pratīyate tat nirākaroti tatra iti  tatra bhedaḥ api na kvacid kvacid iti parasparam paramātmanā ca iti arthaḥ etena etat api nirastam īśa rūpeṣu iva uditaḥ a iti yat uktam pūrva pakṣiṇā tad kutas iti atas āha na iha iti 
NSu_3.2.138a–3.2.138c.3	 na iha nānā asti kim api harayaḥ ayam ayam hi saḥ ityādi śruti mānena anenana iha nānā asti kiñcana a iti śrutim upādatte harayaḥ iti ayam vai harayaḥ iti ādikām ayam hi saḥ itiayam eva sa yaḥ ayam ātmā a iti ādikām pūrveṇa eva anvayaḥ etāsām śrutīnām abheda paratvāt na vivakṣita arthe māna tvam iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya mānena iti uktam ādya śrutau= īśvara rūpeṣu bheda nirākaraṇasya spaṣṭatavāt tṛtīyāyām eva śabda śravaṇāt tad anusāreṇa dvitīyāyām api vaiśabdasya eva artha tva upapatteḥ etāḥ śrutayaḥ vivakṣita arthe mānatām āpadyante iti bhāvaḥ cetanā aikyasya anusandhānam vyāpakam iti uktam kva tad upalabdham iti ced na devadatta sambandhinaḥ sukha ādeḥ devadattena anusandhīyamāna tvāt upādhi bhinne na upalabdham iti ced na hasta pāda ādi upādhi bhinne api darśanāt viśliṣya upādhi bhinne na dṛṣṭam iti ced tatra āha jīva aṃśāḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.138.1–3.2.139a.2	 jīva aṃśāḥ sarve eva ca niyamena anusandhānavantaḥ jīvānām indra ādīnām aṃśāḥ arjuna ādayaḥ etat caekaḥ ātmanaḥ śarīre bhāvāt a ityādina samarthayiṣyate caśabdena īśvara aṃśāḥ samuccīyante nacaa ātmā vai putra nāmā āsīt a ityādi vacanāt pitā putrayoḥ sati api aikye anusandhānam na asti iti katham tat vayāpakam iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.2.139b.1–3.2.139b.3	 yadi ekatā svatas tarhi anusandha ānavantaḥ iti sambandhaḥ ayam bhāvaḥ vāstavasya aikyasya anusandhānam vyāpakam abhimatam na tu upacaritasya naca abhimatasya vyabhicāraḥ asti pitāputra aikyam tu upacaritam eva iti na tatra vyabhicāraḥ doṣāya iti svatas vastutas yat vā parameśvara aṃśa tva hetuḥ asiddhaḥ ca iti āha jīva aṃśāḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.139b.4–3.2.139b.5^1	 etat uktam bhavati caitanya avacchinna aṃśa tvasya anusandhānam vyāpakam arjuna ādiṣu dṛṣṭam tat ca parameśvara jīvayoḥ na asti iti upapāditam vyāpaka abhāve ca vyāpya abhāvaḥ avaśyambhāvī na ca caitanya vyāvṛttiḥ yuktā iti aṃśa tvam eva vyāvartate tathā ca prayogaḥ jīveśvarau na cetanatve sati aṃśa aṃśinau paraspara anusandhāna śūnya tvāt yathā ghaṭa paṭau yathā ca indra arjunau= iti nanu pitāputrayoḥ aṃśa aṃśi bhāve sati api anusandhānam na asti iti katham tat tasya vyāpakam iti atas āha yadi iti ekatā eka deśa tā rūpa aṃśa tā pitāputrayoḥ aṃśa aśi bhāvaḥ na eka deśa tā ādi rūpaḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_3.2.139b.4–3.2.139b.5^2–3.2.139cd.1	 nanu anusandhāna abhāvena aṃśa tva vyāvṛttau= aṃśa adhikaraṇa virodhaḥ syāt na syāt aṃśa śabdaḥ hi tad eka deśa arthaḥ tad sadṛśa ādi arthaḥ ca tatra dvitīyam aṃśa tvam aṃśa adhikaraṇa pratipādyam na nirākriyate tasya anaikāntya prasaṅgena pareṇa hetūkaṛtum aśakyatvāt ādyasya asiddhi vyutpādane na kaḥ api doṣaḥ nanu indri dīnām anusandhān a sadbhāve katham indrān abhimatam khāṇḍava vana dāha ādikam arjunaḥ kṛta tvāt katham ca indraḥ arjuna an abhimatam dahana śamana ādikam na hi hasta ādau= anusandhāne sati idam dṛṣṭam iti atas āha aṃśinaḥ iti aṃśinaḥ aśeṣa sandhānam ati alpasya api vidyate 
NSu_3.2.140.1–3.2.140.3	 bhuvi jātena ca aṃśena sukha duḥkha ādi tad gatam anubhūyate viśeṣaḥ tu kaścid īśa kṛtaḥ bhavet ati alpasya api aṃśi noṃśa gata aśeṣa anusandhānam vidyate eva tathā api kaścid viśeṣaḥ ṃ aśānabhimata karaṇa ādiḥ śakṛtaḥ bhavat aṃśa kīrti āt i atharmī īśvara preritena aṃśinā kriyate iti arthaḥ alpasya api iti svarūpa saṅkīrtanam bhuvi jātena aṃśena ca aṃśi gatam sukha duḥkha ādi eva anubhūyate na tu sarvam sati api aikye kaścid sarva ananusandhāna rūpaḥ viśeṣaḥ tu īśa kṛtaḥ bhavet bhūmi ādi apakṛṣṭa deśam garbha vāsa ādi avasthām mānuṣāt na upabhoga ādikam ca nimittīkṛtya īśvareṇa kriyate atoṃ aśasya aṃśanabhimata karaṇa ādikam yujyate na hi aśeṣa anusandhānam asmābhiḥ cetana aikya ādeḥ vyāpakam uktam kintu anusandhāna mātram iti bhāvaḥ nanu īśvaraḥ api katham sva anabhitam kārayati katham ca abhinne anusandhānam pratibadhnāti iti atas āha īśasya iti 
NSu_3.2.141ab.1–3.2.141ab.2	 īśasya acintya śakti tvāt na aśakyam kvāpi vidyate dṛśyante khalva ghaṭitam ghaṭayantyā īśvara śaktyā preritāḥ kāma krodha ādi paravaśā aihikā muṣmika duḥkha hetum sva śiraḥ chedam pātakam ca kurvāṇāḥ iti āśayaḥ nanu evam tarhi mayā api śakyate vaktum yathā ajunasya aikye sati a pi indra gata aśeṣa anusandhānam acintyayā īśa śaktyā pratibaddhayate tathā jīva paramātmanā uḥ abhede api tayā eva anusandhāna pratibandhaḥ bhaviṣyati apakṛṣṭa deśa ādikam iva deha ādi upādhayaḥ nimitta tām āpatsyante tathā ca anusandhāna abhāvāt aikya abhāvaḥ iti anupapannam anusandhānasya aikya vyāpaka tvam ca asati pratibandhaḥ iti kalpyate iti atas āha sā iti 
NSu_3.2.141cd.1–3.2.141cd.2	 sa īśata anupapannā eva yadi jīva eka tā asya hi sā aghaṭita ghaṭanā rūpāḥ asya paramātmanaḥ bhavet etat yadi bhavat mate paramātmanaḥ acintya śaktimat tāru upeśa tā bhavet jīvena abhinnasya sa īśatā eva anupapannāḥ kutas tayā anusandhāna pratibandha kalpanādikam iti hi śabdena yaḥ jīvena abhinnaḥ na asau= acintya śakti rūpeśata upetaḥ yathā devadattaḥ iti vyāptim sūcayati jīvena ekībhūtaḥ api paramātmā astu īśata upetaḥ kim vipakṣe bādhakam iti atas āha anīśasya iti 
NSu_3.2.141ef.1–3.2.141ef.2	 anīśasya īśata iti eva viruddham sarva mānataḥ jīvaḥ tāvat anīśaḥ iti anubhava siddham tad abhede paramātmā api anīśaḥ iti uktam eva tathā ca anīśasya īśatā aḥ tu iti śaṅkitam syāt etat ca sarva pramāṇaiḥ viruddham sva vyāhatam ca na ca evaṃvidham anunmattaḥ śaṅkate śaṅkāyāḥ eva anudaye kutas bādhaka upanyāsa avasaraḥ iti eva śabdaḥ 
NSu_3.2.141ef.3–3.2.142.1	 syāt etat sa īśata anupapannā eva iti tarkaḥ anumānam vā na ādyaḥ aikyasya śruti siddha tvena viparyaya paryavasāna anupapatteḥ na dvitīyaḥ jīva eka tāyāḥ bhavatām asiddha tvāt yadi pada vaiyarthyāt ca iti mā evam yasya jīva aikyam siddham tasya anīśatā viṣaya sva artha anumāna āpādanasya abhimata tvāt tarka pakṣe api na doṣaḥ śrutīnām aikya paratva abhāva ādityāśayavān āha īśa tvena eva iti īśa tvena eva vijñātam anīśa tvena ced śrutiḥ anīśa tvena vijñātam īśa tvena athavā diśet 
NSu_3.2.143ab.1–3.2.143ab.3	 upajīvya virodhena na eva māna tvam eṣyati traividhyam khalu atra sambhavati kācid śrutiḥ pramāṇa antareṇa īśa tvena eva vijñātam paramātmānam uddiśya anīśa tvena pramitā nīśa tva jīva bhāvena ādiśet kācid anīśa tvena pramitam jīvam uddiśya īśa tvena pramita īśa bhāva paramātma tvena upadiśet kācid ubhau= api tathā pramitau= uddiśya aikyam upadiśet iti sarvathā api ujīvya virodha prasaṅgena na aikye prāmāṇyam aśnutaḥ iti yat atra vaktavyam tat katham brahma iti tat jñeyam a ityādinā vakṣyate ca icchatiḥ iti dvitīya ardhe api grāhyam ādiśet iti prathāma ardhe api tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ api adhyāhāryaḥ tarhi iti padam upajīvya iti atas pūrvam nanu paramātmanaḥ aghaṭitha ghaṭana svarūpayā śaktyaiva īśatānīśatayoḥ ekatra samāveśaḥ bhaviṣyati tat katham upajīvya virodhaḥ iti atas āha atas eva iti 
NSu_3.2.143cd.1–3.2.144.1	 atas eva īśata asiddheḥ na kiñcid śakyam asya ca jīva aikyāt eva iti arthaḥ īśatā ukta rūpā śaktiḥ kiñcid īśatānīśa tayoḥ ekatra avasthānam asya ca paramātmanaḥ api jīva aikyena īśatā abhāva anumānam aśakyam īśatāyāḥ para asya śaktiḥ a ityādi śruti siddha tvāt kiñca jīva aikye api bhedasya vidyamāna tvāt ī śata upapadyate iti āśaṅkām pariharan tarhi kiyatī sīmā paramātma śaktyā ghaṭita ghaṭana kalpanasya iti mandena jijñāsite satyāha īśatvaḥ iti īśa tve anīśa bhedena śrutyā samyak prakāśite ayuktam api ca anyatra yuktam bhavati tad balāt 
NSu_3.2.145.1–3.2.145.2	 atas anyatra api yat dṛṣṭam tat īśena eva kalpyate śruti ābhāsa āptam api na hi īśa tva paripanthi yat atra anīśa bhedena aṅgīkṛtena eva īśa tvam śrutyā samyak prakāśitam bhavati iti vadatā śruti virodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ tathā hi yadi jīva paramātma aikyam tāttvikam tadā niravakāśa anumāna viruddhā śrutiḥ upacarita arthā bhavantī na īśa tvam vyavasthāpayet iti susthaḥ sva artha anumāna prasaṅgaḥ iti samyak anīśa bhedena na tu bheda mātreṇa iti vā tathā ca bhedena īśatā upapatsyate iti 
NSu_3.2.145.3–3.2.145.4	 nirastam anīśatā hetoḥ abhedasya vidyamāna tvāt kim abhedena ānīśatāḥ tu uta bhedena mā bhūt iti sandeha anivāraṇāt anyatra īśvarāt ayuktam paraspara parihāreṇa vartamānam api yuktam bhavati īśvaraḥ iti śeṣaḥ tad balāt īśa tva balāt dṛṣṭam iti atra api sambaddhayate atas parameśvarāt īśena iti bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ kalpyate yukta tayā iti śeṣaḥ uktasya apavādaḥ śruti iti ābhāsa tvam ca vastu vṛtta śapa īkṣayā hi iti tatra upapattiḥ 
NSu_3.2.145.5–3.2.145.6	 ayam arthaḥ yat kvacid viruddham iva pratīyamānam api īśvare tat itaratra vā pramāṇa siddham īśvara aiśvarya virodhi ca na bhavati yathā aṇu tva mahat tva yaugapadi a ādi yathā vār ajuna ādīnām aśeṣa anusandhāna abhāvaḥ tat sarvam īśvara aiśvarya balena ghaṭataḥ iti aṅgīkāryam na tu nirākāryam yat punar apramitam tad īśvara aiśvaryā viruddham api na kalpanīyam śaśa viṣāṇa ādi kalpanā patteḥ yat ca pramitam api īśvara aiśvarya virodhi tat na kalpanīyam eva kalpaka vighātaka tvam kintu tasya pramāṇasya yathāyogam ābhāsa tvam vaṇarnīyam yathā prakṛtam iti anīśasya īśata iti eva viruddham sarva mānataḥ a iti uktam tat upapādayitum smṛtim eva paṭhati īśaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.146.1–3.2.147a.3	 īśaḥ anīśaḥ jagat mithyā duḥkhī muktaḥ bhidā na hi iti pratijñā vyāghātaḥ sarva doṣa adhika adhikaḥ iti hi brahma tarkoktiḥ dvividhaḥ hi pratijñā virodhaḥ pramāṇa sva vākya virodha bhedāt tatra īśaḥ anīśaḥ duḥkhī muktaḥ iti sva vākya virodhasya udāharaṇa dvayam jagat mithyā bhidā na hi iti pramāṇa virodhasya yat veśaḥ anīśaḥ duḥkhī muktaḥ iti sva vākya virodha udāharaṇe jagat mithyā iti sva nyāya virodhasya jagataḥ mithyātve tat nyāyena mithyātvasya api mithyātva āpattyā satya tva prasaṅgāt bhidā na hi iti sva kriyā virodhasya anayā hi pratijñā kriyayā sādhya dharma dharmiṇoḥ bhedaḥ tāvat prāpyate iti sarva doṣeṣu adhika adhikaḥ atyanta adhikaḥ smṛti udāharaṇasya sādhyam āha atiheyam iti 
NSu_3.2.147b–3.2.149.1	 atiheyam atas akhilaiḥ bubhūṣubhiḥ matam idam jīva īśā bheda vādinaḥ idam īśasya anīśa tvam īśa tvena īśa bhedena ityādinā ukte arthe smṛtim api āha na ayuktam iti na ayuktam īśituḥ kiñcid īśa tvasya avirodhi yat yadi īśitva virodhi syāt tat eva ayuktam añjasā īśitvasya avirodhena yojayitvā akhilāḥ pramāḥ siddha īśi tvena ca ayuktam api hi īśe na yojayet 
NSu_3.2.150a–3.2.150c.2	 mānataḥ prāptam akhilam nāmānam yojayet kvacid iti hi brahma tarkoktiḥ yasmāt na ayuktam īśatuḥ kiñcid ityādi tasmādī tvasya avirodhena ityādi siddham īśa tvam yasya asau tathā uktaḥ tena īśena saṃyojjayet īśvare asti iti jānīyāt apipadāt anyena api siddhena īśa tvena nimittena iti vā smṛti udāharaṇasya prayojanam āha atas iti 
NSu_3.2.150d.1–3.2.150d.5	 atas yuktam iha uditam tasmāt atyanta bhinnaḥ eva brahmaṇā jīvaḥ iti sthitam arūpa vat eva hi tad pradhāna tvāt atra adhikaraṇe prathama sūtreṇa brahmaṇaḥ rūpa rāhityam upapādya prakāśa vat ca avaiyarthyam iti sūtreṇa rūpavat tva viṣayāṇām śrutīnām vaiyarthyam āśaṅkaya vilakṣaṇa rūpavat tva aṅgīkāreṇa parihṛtam vilakṣaṇa rūpavat tvam ca āha ca tanmātram adarśayati ca atho api smaryate a iti sūtra dvayena samarthitam iti bhāṣyeṇa pratīyate tad anupapannam antataḥ rūpavat tva aṅgīkāre arūpa vat eva hi tat iti asya avaktavya tva āpātāt prayojana abhāvāt ca asya vicārasya iti atas catur sūtryāḥ tātparyam āha sa ca iti arūpa vat eva hi tad pradhāna tvāt 
NSu_3.2.151.1–3.2.151.2	 sa ca aprākṛta rūpa tvāt arūpaḥ sva guṇa śatmakam rūpam asya śiraḥ pāṇi pāda ādi ātmakam iṣyate sa paramātmā prakṛti śabdaḥ anyeṣām api tattvānām upalakṣakaḥ aprākṛta rūpa tvāt prākṛta rūpa rahita tvāt guṇa ātmakam iti ukte sattva ādīnām pratītiḥ syāt tad nirāsa artham sva śabdaḥ ye paramātmanaḥ sva rūpa bhūtāḥ guṇāḥ ānanda ādyāḥ tad ātmakam iti rūpa śabdena ca śukla ādi guṇa pratītiḥ syāt atas śiraḥ pāṇi iti vivaraṇam kṛtam atas rūpavān= ca iti śeṣaḥ vicāra prayojanam darśayati atas iti 
NSu_3.2.152ab.1–3.2.152ab.3	 atas na anitya tā na eva śruti dvaya virodhitā anitya tā janma maraṇa vattā na api saundarya ādi abhāvaḥ iti ca draṣṭavyam tathā ca tasmin bhaktiḥ upapannā iti śeṣaḥ yadi api paramātmanaḥ rūpam katham tarhi tasya prasiddha vailakṣaṇya mātreṇa arūpa tva vyavahāra iti āśaṅkā parihāra artha tvena prakāśa vat iti sūtra avayavaḥ bhāṣye vyākhyātaḥ idānīm yadi īśvara rūpam loka vilakṣaṇam tadā tatra rūpa śabda vṛttiḥ durghaṭā syāt sambandha grahaṇa anupapatteḥ tathā ca rūpavat tva śrutīnām vaiyarthyam duṣpariharam iti āśaṅkā parihāra artha tvena api vyācaṣṭe yathā hi iti 
NSu_3.2.152c–3.2.152f.2	 yathā hi taijasasya eva prakāśasya ujkhitau= api ātmā eva jyotiḥ iti āha jīvasya īśam śrutiḥ tathā taijasasya eva prakāśasya iti etat taijasaḥ eva hi saurādiḥ ālokaḥ prakāśa śabda vācyaḥ prasiddhaḥ tasya iti vyākhyeyam ujkhitau= api parameśvarasya tattva abhāve api iti yāvat ātmā eva asya jyotiḥ bhavati iti śrutiḥ jīvasya īśam prakāśam āha iti arthaḥ tathā loka vilakṣaṇe api bhagavat rūpe rūpa śabda pravṛttiḥ yuktā iti śeṣaḥ upapattiḥ tupara mate a iti atra vakṣamāṇa atra anusandeya iti 
NSu_3.2.152c–3.2.152f.3	 nanu etat adhikaraṇaṃataḥ eva ca a iti sūtrāt pūrvam tat katham paścādvaya ākhyānam ucyate atas eva iti sūtraṃna sthānataḥ api a iti adhikaraṇena saṅgatam iti jñāpanāya krama bhedaḥ tad siddhā atham upajīvya pūrva pakṣa utthānāt tathā ca bhāṣyamyasmāt evam a ityādi atra apiīśa rūpa iṣu a ityādi atha tad anantaram eva kin na kṛtam arūpavat tva adhikaraṇa arthasya atas eva ca iti sūtra artham prati hetu tvena upodghāta lakṣaṇayā saṅgatyā varṇitasya avyavadhāyaka tvāt hetu tvam api prapañcayitum ācāryeṇasa ca aprakṛta rūpa tvāt iti caśabdaḥ nibaddhaḥ kāla traye api aśarīrāt param ātmanaḥ jīvasya atyanta abhedaḥ eva hi upapannaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.152c–3.2.152f.6	 vṛddhi hrāsa bhāj tvam antar bhāvāt ubhaya sāmañjasyāt evam yad artham bhagavat mahimā atra ucyate sā bhaktiḥ puruṣeṣu tāratamyena tiṣṭhati iti etat iha upapādyate tathā hi asti bhakteḥ vṛddhi hrāsa bhāj tvam kutas brahma ādīnām asmad ādīnām ca bhakta tve antarbhāvāt evam bhakti tāratamye aṅgīkṛte eva īśvarasya ubhayān prati sāmañjasya sambhavāt iti tat etat asaṅgatam yukteḥ pratijñāta arthena saha smbandhā pratīteḥ iti tatra āha tat bhakti iti vṛddhi hrāsa bhāj tvam antarbhāvāt ubhayasāmañjasyāt evam 
NSu_3.2.153.1–3.2.153.2	 tad bhakti tāratamyena tāratamyam vimukti gam brahma ādīnām ca sarveṣām ānanda ādeḥ yathākramam brahma ādīnām caśabdāt asmad ādīnām iti evam sarveṣām yathākramam śrauta kramān atirekeṇa yad vimukti gama ānanda ādeḥ tāratamyam tad bhagavat bhakti tāratamyena eva bhavati iti arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati sādhitam tāvat mauktasya ānanda ādeḥ phalasya bhakti sādhya tvam ambu vat a grahaṇāt tu na tathātvam iti sūtreṇa tat ca athātas ānandasya mīmāṃsa ityādi śrutyā tāratamya vat avagamyate sādhya tāratamye ca sādhana tāratamyam āvaśyakam anyathā tasya ākasmika tva prasaṅgāt phala dātuḥ īśvarasya āsām añjasya prasakteḥ ca na ca evam atas asti bhakteḥ vṛddhi hrāsa bhāj tvam iti 
NSu_3.2.153.3–3.2.153.5	 sthāna niśeṣāt prakāśa ādi vat yadi api etat adhikaraṇam paramatas iti atas anantaram tathā api tena iva anena api saṅgatiḥ asya anena viṣaya upakṣepāt tena pūrva pakṣa upapatti darśanāt yat vā anena pūrva pakṣa yukti utthānāt tena viṣaya upakṣepāt tathā hi na brahma ādīnām ānandasya tāratamyam upapadyate bhagavat ānanda pratibimba tva abhyupagamāt bimbe ca tāratamya abhāvasya na sthānataḥ api iti ukta tvāt anyathā akasmika tva prasaṅgāt iti yat vā na brahma ādīnām ānandaḥ bhagavat ānanda pratibimbaḥ parasparam vibhinna tvāt bimba abhimate ca vaicitrya abhāvāt iti atas atra idam viśadayati pratibimba vat iti sthāna viśeṣāt prakāśa ādi vat 
NSu_3.2.154ab.1–3.2.154ab.4	 pratibimba vat api eṣām ānandaḥ anya guṇāḥ yathā yadyepi eṣām brahma ādīnām ānandaḥ pratibimba vat prasiddha pratibimbaiḥ tulyam vartate bhagavat ānanda pratibimbaḥ bhavati iti yāvat tathā api parasparam vicitraḥ bhavati iti śeṣaḥ katham anyeṣām sādhana bhūtānām upādhi guṇānām bhakti ādīnām vaicitrya an atikrameṇa tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratibimba vat iti yathā sūrya ādi pratibimbānām sūryakānta jala ādi gatāyām sūrya ādi bimba vaicitrya abhāve api sūrya kānta ādi sthāna guṇa vaicitryāt vaicitryam tathā iti arthaḥ vaicitrye hetu antaram āha nārāyaṇa iti upapatteḥ ca 
NSu_3.2.154c.1–3.2.155cd.1	 nārāyaṇa guṇa adhīnaḥ ca bimba śaktyā ca vicitraḥ iti arthaḥ sthāna guṇasya bimba sāmarthyasya ca prayojaka tvam nyāya vivaraṇe vyutpāditam anena upapatteḥ ca iti sūtram vyākhyātam bhavati bimba pratibimbayoḥ aikyam kecid icchanti atas pratibimba tvam vyākhyāti nārāyaṇa iti guṇaḥ ānandaḥ caśabdena tad sadṛśaḥ ca iti grāhyam bimba abhinnaḥ eva kinna bhavati iti atas āha ati alpaḥ iti  ati alpaḥ tad apekṣayā tasmāt bhinnaḥ ca satatam anyat jñānam parasya ca caḥ hetau yasmāt tat apekṣayā ati alpaḥ tasmāt satatam bhinnaḥ iti tad apekṣayā ati alpa tvam kutas iti ākāṅkṣām pariharan= atra śrutim āha anyat iti anyat jñānam tu jīvānām anyaḥ ānanda īśatā 
NSu_3.2.156a–3.2.156c.3	 mukhyeśatā para īśasya gauṇī jīvasya sā yatas iti śruteḥ anyaḥ ānandaḥ parasya jīvānām ca iti sambandhaḥ evam īśata iti api yojyam mukhyeśata iti upalakṣaṇayā hetum āha iti śruteḥ iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ prakṛtā etāvat tvam hi pratiṣedhati tatas bravīti ca bhūyas atra pūvarpakṣa pradarśana param bhāṣyaṃsṛṣṭi saṃhāra kartṛ tvam eva asya na pālaka tvam svatas siddheḥ iti tat ayuktam sṛṣṭi saṃhāra kartṛ tva abhyupagamasya vyartha tvāt svatas siddheḥ iti atra asya iti apratīteḥ ca sthiteḥ iti adhyāhāre api svabhāva vāda āśrayaṇasya sṛṣṭi saṃhārayoḥ api sāmyena tad kartṛ tva abhyupagama anupapatteḥ iti atas pūrva pakṣam viśadayati sṛṣṭī iti 
NSu_3.2.156d–3.2.156f.3	 sṛṣṭi nāśau tad adhīna aviti īrite svabhāva tvāt sthiteḥ na etad apekṣāḥ iti īrite siddhāntinā abhyupagate sati tatas ca ayam arthaḥ īśvarasya pālaka tvam na upapadyate sthiteḥ tad prayojana tvāt tasyāḥ ca svabhāva siddha tvena īśvara anapekṣa tvāt īśvaraḥ eva hi viśvasya sṛṣṭi saṃhārayoḥ kartā na anyaḥ iti abhyupagatam tathā ca sṛṣṭvā yāvat na saṃharet tāvat sthitiḥ svabhāva siddhā eva na para vyāpāram apekṣate yadi khalu sṛṣṭi saṃhārayoḥ kartā anyaḥ syāt tadā udāsīnasya tasya sṛṣṭau preraṇa ādi artham saṃhāre pravṛttasya nivāraṇa artham ca sthitau= īśvara apekṣā sambhavet na ca tat asti atas saṃhāra udāsīnatva atiriktam pālaka tvam na upapadyate iti evam atra pūrva pakṣaḥ iti evam tarhi siddhāntaḥ na yuktaḥ svabhāvat tva yukteḥ aparihṛta tvāt iti atas sūtra abhiprāyam āha iti na iti 
NSu_3.2.156.1–3.2.157ab.4	 iti na yujyate yatas svabhāvaḥ akhilaḥ īśa āyattaḥ akhilasya ca para anapekṣa tayā pratīyamānam svarūpam dharmaḥ vā svabhāvaḥ iti ucyate sa sarveṣām padārthānām sarvaḥ api īśa āyattaḥ eva anyathā teṣām svātantrya prasaṅgena āsya īśatva anupapatteḥ sarvam khalu iti ādi śruti virodha āpatteḥ ca anna dāna ādau vyāpāraḥ ca sphuṭaḥ eva iti tat avyaktam āha hi atra paramātmanaḥ avyakta tvam ādau vistareṇa samarthitam tatas tarhi bhakti ādi sādhana vaiyarthyam iti āśaṅkaya prakāśaḥ ca karmaṇi abhāsā t a iti dṛśya tvam ca uktam tat etat ubhayam viruddham iti āśaṅkaya atas anantena tathā hi liṅgam iti sūtritam atra virodha śāntiḥ na sphuṭā pratīyate iti atas tasya tātparyam āha avyaktaḥ api iti tat avyaktam āha hi 
NSu_3.2.157cd.1–3.2.157cd.3	 avyaktaḥ api svaktayā eva bhaktānām dṛśyate hariḥ ubhaya vyapadeśāt tu ahi kuṇḍala vat yadi īśvarasya guṇa kriyā ādayaḥ dharmāḥ tatas bhinnāḥ tadā samavāyasya nirākṛta tvāt tadvat tvam anupapannam yadi ca abhinnāḥ tadā jñāna ādimat tvam ānanda ādi bhoktṛ tvam iti ādya yuktam iti ubhayathā tatra bhakti anupapattiḥ iti pūrva pakṣa prāptau= idam ārabhyate tatra hetu dṛṣṭāntau= eva sūcitau na tu pakṣa parigraha rūpā pratijñā adhyāhāraḥ api hetu dṛṣṭānta balena bheda abheda pakṣa parigrahasya iti pratibhāti atas pratijñām darśayati tad abhinnāḥ iti ubhaya vyapadeśāt tu ahi kuṇḍala vat 
NSu_3.2.158.1–3.2.158.3	 tad abhinnāḥ guṇāḥ nityam api sarve viśeṣataḥ guṇa tvena guṇi tvena bhoktṛ bhogya tayā sthitāḥ nitya śabdaḥ niyama arthaḥ pārameśvarāḥ sarve guṇāḥ dharmāḥ nityam tat abhinnāḥ tena atyanta abhinnaḥ tathā api viśeṣa śaktyā guṇa guṇyādi bhāvena sthitāḥ syāt etat parimāṇa ādīnām yāvat dravya bhāvinām bhavatu nāma bhagavatā atyantā bhedaḥ kriyāṇām guṇānām ca asrākṣīt sṛjati srakṣyati vyajñāsīt jānāti jñāsyati ityādi śrauta vyavahāraiḥ anitya tayā avagatānām tu na yujyate iti atas āha viśeṣa ātmatayā iti 
NSu_3.2.159.1–3.2.159.2	 viśeṣa ātma tayā teṣām nitya śaktayā ātmanā tathā nitya sthiteḥ na dharmāṇām kriyā ādīnām anitya tā teṣām parameśvara sambandhinyām kriyā ādīnām dharmāṇām nitya śakti ātmanā nityam sthiteḥ tathā viśeṣa ātma tayā vyakti rūpeṇa vyavahāra viṣaya tā upapatteḥ na anitya tā iti yojanāḥ prapañcaḥ tu prāk eva kṛtaḥ nanu ca kriyā ādīnām yā vyakta tā sā tāvat anitya eva anyathā ukta vyavahārāṇām nirālambanatva āpātāt tatas tasyāḥ bhagavat dharma bhūtāyāḥ api na atyanta abheda upapattiḥ iti atas āha na viśeṣa iti 
NSu_3.2.160ab.1–3.2.160bc.2	 na viśeṣa ātma tā ca iyam anityāḥ iyam vyavahāra ālambana tvena uktā kutas iti atas āha śakti iti  śakti rūpa tā sā eva yat yadi asmāt sā viśeṣatma tā śakti rūpa tā eva śaktiḥ ca nitya iti uktam tasmāt iti arthaḥ nanu evam tarhi śaktiḥ vyaktiḥ ita vyavahāra viśeṣaḥ na syāt ukta vyavahārāṇām nirālambana tvam ca na parihṛtam syāt iti atas āha sa viśeṣa iti 
NSu_3.2.160.1–3.2.160d.1	 sa viśeṣā syāt na iyam vyaktiḥ śaktyā nirviśeṣa abhinnā yena ukta doṣaḥ syāt kintusa viśeṣa abhinnā eva yadi ayam sarva nirvāha hetuḥ viśeṣaḥ bhagavataḥ bhinnaḥ tadā sarveṣām tad dharmāṇām tena atyanta abhedaḥ iti pratijñā bhajyeta abhinnaḥ ced viśeṣa tā tasya na syāt svar upa mātra paryavasānena saḥ api na syāt iti atas āha viśeṣaḥ iti  viśeṣaḥ anyaḥ na ca api ayam 
NSu_3.2.161ab.1–3.2.161ab.4	 sva nirvāha ka tā hetoḥ tathā api syāt viśeṣataḥ caḥ avadhāraṇe ayam viśeṣaḥ api bhagavatā na eva bhinnaḥ tena na pratijñā hāniḥ tathā api tasya viśeṣa tā syāt katham na hi ayam abhinnaḥ bhavat nirviśeṣaḥ evam tarhi viśeṣa paramparayā anavasthā syāt na syāt kutas viśeṣasya sva nirvāha ka tā hetoḥ iti evam pratijñā darśitāḥ tatra bādhakāni parihṛtāni atra ca uktvā syāt evam yadi eteṣu artheṣu pramāṇam syāt na ca tad paśyāmaḥ iti atas sautram ubhaya vyapadeśāt iti hetum vyācaṣṭe viśeṣa tvena iti 
NSu_3.2.161cd.1–3.2.161cd.2	 viśeṣa tvena vijñāteḥ pramāṇaiḥ akhilaiḥ api akhilaiḥ ubhayavidhaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ veda vākyaiḥ jñāna ādi dharmāṇām bhagavat viśeṣa tvena api śabdāt tad abhinna tvena ca vijñāteḥ vijñānāt iti arthaḥ nanu vijñāteḥ iti katham ātaḥ ca upasarge a iti aṅaḥ ktinbādhaka tvāt ktinnāba ādibhyaḥ ca a iti vacanāt bhaviṣyati etat eva vivṛṇoti sasarja iti 
NSu_3.2.162.1–3.2.162.3^1	 sasarja sañjahāra iti viśeṣaḥ hi avagamyate śrutyā eva sa saḥ eva iti tad abhedaḥ ca gamyate saḥ idam sarvam asṛjate a ityādi śrutim sasarja iti anena upādatte tat tat attum adhriyate a iti ādikām sañjahāra iti anena saḥ ānanda ādiḥ saḥ paramātmā eva iti anenaā ānandaḥ brahma a ityādi śrutim tat ayam arthaḥ saḥ idam sarvam asṛjata ukṣā sa dyāvāpṛthivī bibharti tat tat attum adhriyata sa aikṣata saḥ akāmayata ānandam brahmaṇaḥ vidvān a ityādi śrutyā sarjana ādikam brahmaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ atiśayaḥ na brahma mātram iti avagamyate tanmātra tve kriyā kartṛ bhāva ādeḥ anupapatteḥ 
NSu_3.2.162.1–3.2.162.3^2	 ānandaḥ brahma iti vyajānāt satyam jñānam anantam brahma ekadhā eva anudraṣṭavyam a iti ādi śrutyā eva tasya tena abhedaḥ ca avagamyate tat evam ubhaya vyapadeśānyatha anupapattyā sakalam idam kalpyate sarveṣām brahma dharmāṇām brahmaṇā sa viśeṣaḥ atyanta abhedaḥ kriyā ādīnām nityatā śakti vyakti rūpa tā vyakti rūpasya api nitya tā śakti rūpa pābhinna tā sa viśeṣa tā viśeṣasya api abhedaḥ sva nirvāhaka tā ca iti na hi eteṣu artheṣu anyatamasya api akalpanāyām udāhṛta ubhaya vyapadeśa virodha śāntiḥ bhavati iti etat eva prapañcayituṃ nidarśana mātreṇa a iti atas prāktanaḥ grantha sandarbhaḥ 
NSu_3.2.162.4–3.2.162.5	 atha matam bhedaḥ eva brahma dharmāṇām brahmaṇāḥ tu samavāyena viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati samavāya dūṣaṇāni ca śruti virodhena ābhāsa tām yāsyanti samavāya abhāve api vā dharma dharmiṇoḥ eva sa kaḥ api mahimā kalpyate naca abheda śruti virodhaḥ anāgantaka tvena upacāra upapatteḥ atas kim abhedam ādāya viśeṣa ādi aṅgīkāreṇa iti aparaḥ āha akhaṇḍam eva brahma na tu tatra kaścid viśeṣaḥ na ca apara śruti virodhaḥ kriyā ādi viṣayāṇām sa guṇa viṣaya tvāt tasya ca māyā maya tvena avicārita ramaṇīya tvāt ānandam ityādīnām ca rāhoḥ śiraḥ iti ādi vat upacarita tva upapatteḥ iti anyaḥ tu āha bheda abhedābhyām eva ubhaya vyapadeśa sāmañjasya upapatteḥ kim anayā sa viśeṣa abheda kalpanayā iti mā evam tribhiḥ api etaiḥ antataḥ abhinne viśeṣasya aṅgīka tarvya tvāt tatas varam āditas eva tad aṅgīkaraṇam iti āśayavān bheda vādinam tāvat viśeṣam aṅgīkārayitum āha bhedaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.163ab.1–3.2.163c.4	 bhedaḥ yadi viśeṣasya sa bhedaḥ bhedinā katham viśeṣasya jñāna ādeḥ brahma dharmasya yadi brahmaṇaḥ bhedaḥ aṅgīkriyate tadā pṛcchāmaḥ sa bhedaḥ bhedinā brahmaṇā jñāna ādinā ca saha katham kim prakāraḥ pratipattavyaḥ kim bhinnaḥ kiṃvābhinnaḥ iti ādye doṣam āha bhinnaḥ ced iti bhinnaḥ ced anavasthā syāt yadi bhedaḥ bhedibhyām bhinnaḥ tadā saḥ api bhedaḥ tathā iti anavasthā syāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva ādi pratipattaye khalu dharma dharmiṇoḥ bhedaḥ abhyupagamyate sa ca pratīyamānaḥ eva tad hetuḥ tad pratītiḥ ca viśeṣaṇa ādi bhāvena eva iti uttara uttara bheda pratītiḥ avaśyam apekṣitā eva iti susthānavasthā abhinna tve api vaktavyam sa viśeṣa abhinnaḥ uta nirviśeṣa abhinnaḥ iti prathame doṣam āha abhinnaḥ ced iti 
NSu_3.2.163d.1–3.2.164ab.3	 abhinnaḥ ced purā na kim purā na kim iti dharmāṇām dharmiṇā sa viśeṣa abhedaḥ kinna aṅgīkriyate aṅgī kāryaḥ eva iti arthaḥ bhedaḥ iva vinā api bhedena viśeṣeṇa eva upapattau= api vṛthā paramparā kalpanāyām gauravam syāt tatas dharmāṇām eva sa viśeṣa abheda aṅgīkāraḥ śreyān iti bhāvaḥ astu evam iti atas āha viśeṣaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ abhinnaḥ eva iti tena na abhyupagamyate viśeṣaḥ dharma ubhinnaḥ iti eva tāvat tena bheda vādinā na abhyupagamyate dūre sa viśeṣa tvam iti atas apasiddhāntaḥ syāt samīhitam ca naḥ siddhayet iti āśayaḥ dvitīyam dūṣayati abhinnaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.164cd.1–3.2.164cd.3	 abhinnaḥ nivirśeṣaḥ ced bhedaḥ tad bheda tā kutas bhedaḥ yadi bhedibhyām abhinnaḥ nirviśeṣaḥ ca syāt tadā tasya tad bheda tā tayoḥ ayam bhedaḥ iti evambhāvaḥ kutas na kutas api tadīyatāyāḥ bhedena viśeṣaṇa vā vinā anupapatteḥ tanmātra tve ca dharma dharmiṇau= eva staḥ na bhedaḥ iti syāt tathā ca dharma dharmiṇau= iti api na syāt bhedaḥ eva asti na dharma dharmiṇau= iti vā bhavet tatas ca bhedaḥ api na syāt iti bhedasya bhedi svarūpa tvam aṅgīkṛtya viśeṣam anaṅgīkurvāṇam prati dūṣaṇa antaram āha anena iti 
NSu_3.2.165.1–3.2.165.3^1	 anena anena bhinnaḥ ayam iti yat sa viśeṣataḥ bhedaḥ eva eṣa bahudhā dṛśyate tat kim uttaram bhinnaḥ ayam ghaṭaḥ iti sa bhedaḥ eva viśeṣataḥ viśeṣaṇa tvena dṛśyate na tu ghaṭaḥ kintu viśeṣya tvena tathā anena anena vyatyayaḥ bahulam iti pañcamī arthe tṛtīyā saha yoge vā paṭāt bhinna stambhāt bhinnaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti eṣa bhedaḥ eva sa viśeṣaḥ pratiyogi viśeṣa sāhityena dṛśyate tathā ayam padārthaḥ anena vakra tvena anena koṭaravat tvena puruṣāt bhinnaḥ iti saḥ eṣa bhedaḥ eva viśeṣataḥ vyāvartaka dharmeṇa dṛśyate padārthaḥ tu akṣa sannikarṣa mātreṇa 
NSu_3.2.165.1–3.2.165.3^2	 tathā asmāt paṭāt asmāt stambhāt asmāt kuḍyāt bhinnaḥ ayam ghaṭaḥ iti eṣa bheda eva sa viśeṣatas pratiyogi viśeṣa sāhityena nimittena bahudhā dṛśyate ghaṭaḥ tu ekadhā eva atas na bhedaḥ ghaṭasya svarūpam iti yat svarūpa bhedasya dūṣaṇam paraiḥ ucyate tat tasya kim uttaram tvayā abhidhāsyate yadi viśeṣaḥ na aṅgīkriyate iti arthaḥ yadi viśeṣaḥ na aṅgīkriyate tadā bhedaḥ bhedinā abhinnaḥ iti api na aṅgīkartum śakyate bheda bhedinoḥ bheda sādhakānām anekeṣām bhāvāt viśeṣaṇā eva hi teṣām anyathā siddhim vyutpādya pratīti balena bhedasya bhedinā bhedaḥ vaktavyaḥ na anyathā iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_3.2.165.4–3.2.165.5	 tadīya tvena viśeṣaṇa tvena sa pratiyogi tvena liṅgi tvena bahu tvena ca pratīyamānaḥ anyonya abhāva ādi rūpaḥ bhedaḥ na bhedi svarūpa tayā aṅgīkriyate yaḥ tu sva rūpa tayā aṅgīkriyate na asau tadīyatva ādinā pratīyate iti tasya uttaram brūmaḥ iti ced na asya eva prasiddha tvāt anyasya tad abhāvāt anyathā svarūpasya eva bhedaḥ iti pāribhāṣikam nāma antaram uktam syāt na ca advaita vādinaḥ svarūpam na aṅgīkurvate tat kim anena bhedena tat idam uktam saḥ eṣaḥ iti prasiddhi dyotakābhyām tadīyatva ādiḥ upacāraḥ iti ced na pratīteḥ sphuṭa tvāt bādhaka abhāvena abhrānti tvāt ca tat idam api uktam dṛśyate iti dūṣaṇa antaram āha abheda iti 
NSu_3.2.166ab.1–3.2.166cd.2	 abheda bhedayoḥ ca eva svarūpa tvam hi bhedinā na kevalam bhedasya kintvabhedasya ca bhedinaḥ svarūpa tvam eva iti yojanāḥ yaḥ bhedasya bhedinā ghaṭena abhedam aṅgīkaroti tena tasya abhedasya api ghaṭa svarūpa tvam eva aṅgīkaraṇīyam bheda samāna nyāya tvāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ tatas kim iti atas āha tayoḥ api iti tayoḥ api abhedaḥ aṅgīkāryaḥ iti śeṣaḥ astu ekena ghaṭena atyanta abhinnayoḥ abheda bhedayoḥ abhedaḥ tatas api kim iti atas āha aviśeṣa tva iti  aviśeṣa tve paryāya tvam hi śabdayoḥ abheda bhedayoḥ atyanta abhede viśeṣe ca asati abheda abheda śabdayoḥ paryāya tvam syāt eka atharvāci tvāt ghaṭa kalaśa śabdāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ astu iti atas āha abheda iti 
NSu_3.2.167ab.1–3.2.167ab.5	 abheda bheda śabdau ca paryāyau= iti kaḥ vadet kaḥ vadet na kaḥ api pratyuta aparyāyau= iti eva vadati sarve iti aprāmāṇikam pramāṇa viruddham ca etat iti etat uktam bhavati bhedaḥ bhedinā bhinnaḥ tad nyāyena saḥ abhedaḥ api tatas tau= anyonyam api abhinnau= iti tāvat tvam tathā ca bheda abheda śabdayoḥ paryāyatva prāptau viśeṣa balena eva hi tat pariharaṇīyam tasya ca anaṅgīkāre duṣpariharam tadāpadyeta iti nanu bheda bhedi śabdayoḥ api paryāya tvam āpādayitum ucitam satyam śiṣyaiḥ ūhyatām iti na uktam śaṅkate bhedaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.167cd.1–3.2.167d.2	 bhedaḥ anyonyam abhedaḥ ca bhedinā ced yadi api bheda abhedayoḥ bhedinā ghaṭena saha abhedaḥ tathā api tayoḥ anyonyam bhedaḥ asti iti na tad śabdayoḥ paryāya tvam prasajyate tat kim viśeṣaṇa iti pariharati viśeṣitā iti  viśeṣa tā evam aṅgī kurvāṇena api abhinne vastuni viśeṣita aṅgīkaraṇīyā eva iti arthaḥ tat katham iti atas āha aviśeṣaḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.168.1–3.2.168.3	 nirviśeṣe katham bhedaḥ bhedinā ekaḥ tathā abhidā punar tayoḥ vibhedaḥ ca bhedi mātra tvataḥ bhavet viśeṣa abhāve bhedaḥ bhedinā ekaḥ abhinnaḥ tathā abhidā bhedinā ghaṭena abhinnāḥ punar tayoḥ bheda abhedayoḥ parasparam katham upapannam bhavet kutas na bhavet bheda abhedayoḥ bhedi mātra tvataḥ anyathā ghaṭasya api svatas bhedaḥ syāt ghaṭena abhinnayoḥ bheda abhedayoḥ parasparam bheda nirvāha artham ghaṭena sa viśeṣaḥ eva abhedaḥ aṅgīkāryaḥ iti bhāvaḥ śaṅkate bhedinaḥ ca iti 
NSu_3.2.169a–3.2.169c.3	 bhedinaḥ ca eva bhedasya viśeṣaḥ yadi gamyate abheda abhedinoḥ ca eva caśabdau= anyonya samuccaya arthau eva śabdau parasparam sa viśeṣa abheda vyāvṛtti arthau gamyate abhyupagamyate bhedasya bhedinaḥ ca ghaṭasya abhedaḥ viśeṣaḥ ca mayā abhyupagamyate tathā abhedasya abhedinaḥ ca tasya sa viśeṣaḥ abhedaḥ abhyupagamyate tathā ca bheda abhedayoḥ ghaṭa tanmātra tva abhāvena parasparam bheda upapatteḥ na śabdayoḥ paryāya tvam tatas ca bheda abhedayoḥ parasparam abhedaḥ viśeṣaḥ ca aṅgīkāyar iti asat iti bhāvaḥ evam api dharma dharmiṇoḥ bhedam abhyupagacchata antataḥ abhinne vastuni viśeṣaḥ aṅgīrktavyaḥ iti abhimatam yadi api siddham eva tathā api uktam tattvam na parityājyam iti āśayavān pariharati kim iti 
NSu_3.2.169d.1–3.2.170.2	 kim bhedaḥ abheda bhedayoḥ evañcedabheda bhedayoḥ bhedaḥ kasmāt kalpyate tayoḥ api sa viśeṣa abhedaḥ eva aṅgīkartavyaḥ tatra upapattim āha viśeṣaṇā eva iti viśeṣeṇa eva sarvatra yadi vyavahṛtiḥ bhavet kalpanā gauravāya eva kim bhedaḥ kalpyate tadā sarvatra bheda bhedina uḥ abheda abhedinoḥ ca abhede api viśeṣeṇa eva tanmātra tā bhāva nibandhanā vyāvahṛtiḥ bhavet iti aṅgīkṛtam ced bheda abhedayoḥ tarhi bhedaḥ kim kalpanā gauravāya eva kalpyate iti sa ulluṇṭha vacanam bheda abhedayoḥ ghaṭena iva parasparam api sa viśeṣa tvena eva sarvasya upapattau bheda kalpane kalpanā gauravam syāt aneka padārtha kalpanāt dvidhā kalpanāt ca iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_3.2.170.3–3.2.170.4	 astu evam tatas kim āyātam prakṛtaḥ iti atas āha viśeṣeṇa eva iti bhedasya bhedinā bhede api tadīya tva ādi vyavahṛtiḥ bheda abheda yaḥ ghaṭena abhede api aparyāya śabda vyavahṛtiḥ yadi viśeṣeṇa eva bhavet tadā dharma dhamirṇoḥ api bhedaḥ kim kalpanā gauravāya eva kalpyate dharma dhamirṇoḥ bhedam aṅgīkṛtya api antatas viśeṣaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ tatas varam āditas eva tad aṅgīkaraṇam anyathā kalpanā gaurava prasaṅgāt iti etena purā na kim iti vivṛtam bhavati yadi kalpanā gaurava bhayāt dharma dharmiṇoḥ abhedam aṅgīkṛtya vyavahāra viśeṣa artham viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkriyate tarhi gavāśvayoḥ api tathā kalpyatām aviśeṣāt tathā ca bhedaḥ eva jagati na syāt iti atas āha aikya iti 
NSu_3.2.171ab.1–3.2.171cd.3	 aikya pratītyabhāvena bhedaḥ eva gavaśvayoḥ bhedaḥ eva svīkriyate na viśeṣaḥ gavaśvayoḥ iti pramāda pāṭhaḥ mūlakośeṣu adarśanāt aikya prati iti abhāve api kutas viśeṣaḥ na aṅgīkriyate iti atas āha saḥ eva iti saḥ eva iti pratītau hi viśeṣaḥ nāma bhaṇyate dharma dharmi pratibandyāḥ hi gavā āśvayovirśeṣaḥ pareṇa āpādanīyaḥ na ca tatra aviśeṣaḥ abheda pratītyā tatra tad aṅgīkārāt iha ca tad abhāvāt bhedasya pratīti siddha tvena kalpanā bhāvāt iti adhunā bheda vādinā api viśeṣam aṅgīkārayati saccit ādeḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.172a–3.2.172c.3	 saccit ādera paryāya siddhayartham māyinā api hi aṅgīkāryaḥ viśeṣaḥ ayam māyinā api iti kriyā ādi viṣayāṇām vākyānām māyika viṣaya tām aṅgīkurvatā api iti yāvat tatra hetuḥ saccidādeḥ pada samūhasya aparyāya tva siddhayartham iti ayam iti aparyāya śabda pravṛtti hetuḥ viśeṣasya tathā abhāvaḥ pramitaḥ iti hi śabdaḥ etat uktam bhavati santu tāvat kriyā ādi viṣayāṇi vākyāni asatya viṣayāṇi tathā apisatyam jñānam anantam brahma a ityādīni tāvat satya viṣayāṇi pareṇa aṅgīkṛtāni eva teṣām ca akhaṇḍa artha niṣṭhatve satya jñāna ādi padānām ekārtha tvena paryāya tvam syāt na ca tat yuktam saha prayoga darśanāt na ca bhedaḥ aṅgīkartum śakyaḥ ekam eva advitīyam iti ādi śruti virodhāt atas satye api viśeṣaḥ aṅgī kāryaḥ tasya aparyāya śabda pravṛtti hetu tā ca ānayā eva arthāpattyā siddhāḥ tathā tvena eva tad kalpanāt iti apohavāt āśrayeṇa śaṅkate yadi iti 
NSu_3.2.172d–3.2.172d–3.2.172f.2^1	 yadi asati aviśeṣaṇam pṛthak pṛthak vārayitum śabda antaram iti iṣyate satya ādi padānām vidhi vāci tve vidhīyamānānām satya tva ādi viśeṣaṇānām brahmaṇi abhāvāt sva rūpa mātrasya ca eka tvāt paryāya tvam syāt na ca evam asatya tva ādi apoha vāci tvāt na ca evam sati vaiyarthyam brahmaṇi asatya tva ādīnām viśeṣaṇānām bhrānti kalpita tvena tad nivāraṇa artha tvāt santi hi na asti brahma sat api na jñānam paricchinnam vā ityādi pratītayaḥ prāṇinām na ca satya padam ajñānasya api apoham vakti yena ekena eva alam iti syāt tasmāt na paryāya tvam vaiyarthyam ca iti yat vā satya ādi padāni satya tva ādi pṛthak artha vācīni eva iti na paryāyatām āpadyante 
NSu_3.2.172d–3.2.172f.2^2–3.2.172f.3	 brahmaṇi tu lakṣaṇayā pravartante iti na tatra viśeṣaṇāni samarpayanti na hi gaṅgā padam tīre gaṅgā tvam arpayati naca evam ekena eva lakṣita tvāt itareṣām vaiyarthyam iti vācyam āropitānām asatya tva ādi viśeṣaṇānām pratyektam nivāraṇena sārthakyāt na ca saṅgati grahaṇa viṣaya abhāvāt lakṣaṇa anupapattiḥ śabale gṛhīta saṅgatikānām satya brahma lakṣaka tva upapatteḥ atas na paryāya tvam na api vaiyarthyam iti śaṅkā arthaḥ asatya viśeṣaṇam asatya tva viśeṣaṇam āropitam viśeṣaṇam iti vā iti yadi iṣyate iti anvayaḥ pariharati māyā iti 
NSu_3.2.173a–3.2.173cd.2	 māyā viśeṣa rāhitya viśeṣeṇa viśeṣitā satyasya api bhavet māyā śabdena āropita tvam ācaṣṭe evam kusṛṣṭau kalpitāyām api na satyasya akhaṇḍa tā siddhiḥ kalpita asatya tva ādi viśeṣa rāhitya lakṣaṇa viśeṣa viśeṣitāyāḥ avarjanīya tvāt iti arthaḥ śaṅkate sā ca iti  sā ca tathā ced bhavet akhaṇḍa tva khaṇḍanam yadi āropita viśeṣa parāhitya rūpa viśeṣaṇa viśeṣitā satyā syāt na ca evam api tarhi sā api asatya tva ādi vat āropitā eva na hi āropitena rūpeṇa gaganasya nīrūpa tā vihanyate iti arthaḥ pariharati anavasthitiḥ iti 
NSu_3.2.173d.1–3.2.173d.3	 anavasthitiḥ vākya arthasya iti śeṣaḥ evam tarhi na kaḥ api vākya arthaḥ vyavasthitaḥ syāt satya tva ādi viśeṣa vattayā satya tva ādi vyāvṛttimat tayā ca apratipādita tvāt na hi saṃsarga bhedau vihāya vākya arthaḥ asti brahma eva vākya arthaḥ iti ced na tasya sva prakāśa tvāt vyāvṛtteḥ ca asatya tvāt iti yat vā pratītā sā ca svābhāva vyāvartaka tvena eva vyavatiṣṭhate na brahma viṣaya tvena yena akhaṇḍa tā vyāhanyate iti śaṅkā arthaḥ evam api tad abhāva vyāvṛtti rūpa viśeṣaṇa viśiṣya tāyāḥ aparihārāt akhaṇḍa tva hāniḥ eva sā api tathā ced anavasthitiḥ brahma jñānasya avyavasthā eva iti parihāra arthaḥ na kevalam brahmaṇaḥ nirviśeṣa tve padānām paunarukti ādi kinnāma ekasya api padasya tatra pravṛttiḥ na bhavet iti āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.2.174ab.1–3.2.174c.2	 yadi satye viśeṣaḥ na na tad uktiḥ bhavet tadā guṇa karma ādi nimittam anālambya kasya api śabdasya pravṛtti abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ śaṅkate lakṣyate cetena iti lakṣyate ced tena syāt ayam doṣaḥ yadi brahma śabda abhidheyam syāt naca evam kintu tena śabdena lakṣyate eva na hi lakṣaṇā guṇa kriyā ādi apekṣā tathā tve khalu abhidhā eva syāt iti pariharati lakṣyam iti 
NSu_3.2.174cd.1–3.2.175ab.3	 lakṣyam iti api syāt viśeṣitā evam aṅgīkāre api brahmaṇaḥ lakṣyam iti viśeṣitā syāt lakṣya tvam tāvat aparihāyarmiti arthaḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etat mukhya artha yoga ādinā api viśeṣitā syāt eva nanu lakṣya tvam api brahmaṇaḥ na asti eva lakṣyam iti api lakṣaṇayā eva ucyate na abhidhāna vṛttyā iti ced na atra api vākye pareṇa lakṣya padasya prayogāt lakṣya tva viśeṣa prāpteḥ tena api lakṣyam eva iti ced tatra āha punar iti punar punar lakṣaṇāyām api syāt anavasthitiḥ lakṣaṇāyām āśritāyām satyām iti śeṣaḥ śaṅkate yadi iti 
NSu_3.2.175cd.1–3.2.175cd.2	 yadi abhāva viśeṣi tvam syāt aṅgīkṛtam eva te te mate iti śeṣaḥ tṛtīya arthe avyayam vā yat uktam māyā viśeṣa rāhitya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣitā satyasya api bhavet iti tat na aniṣyam abhāva rūpa viśeṣavat tvasya mayā aṅgīkṛta tvāt na iha nānā asti a iti śrutiḥ iha bhū tale ghaṭaḥ na asti a iti vat abhāvam brahmaṇi aṅgīkaroti eva yat ca uktam na tat uktiḥ bhavet tadā iti tat api asat bhāva nimitta abhāve api abhāva nimittena pada pravṛtti upapatteḥ abhāva dharmavat tvasya ca aṅgīkṛta tvāt etena lakṣyam iti etat api nirastam lakṣya padasya api apoha vāci tva upapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
