NSu_3.3.76.1–3.3.76.2	 abhāve nirṇaya jñasya sat śāstrāṇi eva sarvadā śṛṇuyāt nirṇaya jñasya guroḥ abhāve api yādṛśa tādṛśāt sarvadā śṛṇuyāt manvīta ca na hi guṇa alābhe mukhya parityāgaḥ yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ veda ādi śravaṇe sarvajñaḥ guruḥ apekṣitaḥ tad itara śravaṇe tu nirṇaya jñaḥ sarvajña kalpaḥ dvayoḥ abhāve api śravaṇa ādikam ced anuṣṭheyam tadā asat śāstrāṇām iti pratītiḥ syāt atas sat śāstrāṇi eva iti uktam yādṛśa tādṛśāt śṛṇuyāt iti anena atiprasaktau satyām āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.3.76cd.1–3.3.76cd.3	 yadi sat jñāna prācuryam upalabhyate yadi tasmin puruṣe sva apekṣayā samyak jñāna ādi prācuryam upalabhyate tarhi tatas śṛṇuyāt na tu adhamāt vaiyarthyāt na hi adṛṣṭa mātra artham śravaṇa ādikam iti bhāvaḥ svatas adhikasya puruṣasya prabandhena vyākhyānāsa ambhave kim śravaṇa ādi a bhāvaḥ eva iti ākāṅkṣāyām āha mahat bhayaḥ iti 
NSu_3.3.77a–3.3.77e.2	 mahat bhayaḥ viṣṇu bhaktebhyaḥ yathāśakti ca saṃśayān chindyāt svatas mahat bhayaḥ mahat tvam ca na sat jñāna mātreṇa kintu viṣṇu bhakti ādi guṇaiḥ ca iti uktam viṣṇu bhaktebhyaḥ iti tādṛśaḥ eva hi ādaram utpādayan vyākhyāti sa ādaram eva ca śravaṇa ādikam phalāya alam saṃśayān ajñāna viparyayān= ca iti śravaṇa ādi phalam uktam ekasmāt prabandhena śravaṇa ādya sambhave api bahubhyaḥ mahat bhayaḥ yathāśakti yathāsambhavam ekaika deśa śravaṇa ādikam api kuryāt eva tena api saṃśayāt icchedasya śravaṇa ādi phalasya lābhāt iti bhāvaḥ svatas adhika abhāve katham śravaṇa ādi iti atas āha svatas iti  svatas adhika abhāve svayam eva samabhyaset brūyāt api ca śiṣyebhyaḥ apicau= ita retara yoge śrutā avṛtti pravacanābhyām abhinava utprekṣā udayāt te api śravaṇa ādi phalam prasuvāte samyak śravaṇa ādi rahitaḥ vyācakṣāṇaḥ skhalanena pratyaveyāt tat katham ucyate śiṣyebhyaḥ brūyāt iti tatra āha sat iti 
NSu_3.3.77.1–3.3.77.3	 sat siddhāntam ahāpayan brūyāt iti sambandhaḥ prāmāṇika tayā abhimānaḥ arthaḥ siddhāntaḥ na tu prāmāṇikaḥ eva iti niyamaḥ  tathā tve śabda nitya tvam keṣāñcid siddhāntaḥ keṣāñcittada nitya tvam iti na syāt dvayoḥ prāmāṇika tva ayogāt ayam tu na tathā api tu prāmāṇikaḥ eva iti atas sat iti uktam svārthikaḥ ṇit ajahat iti arthaḥ yat vā śiṣyaiḥ ahāpayan sat siddhānta hāniḥ eva mahataḥ pratyavāyasya hetuḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ kṣudra sskhalitam tu alpīyasaḥ eva na ca tāvatā mahā prayojana vyākhyāna tyāgaḥ tathā sati mṛga bhayāt bīja an āvāpa prasaṅgāt iti bhāvaḥ kaḥ asau sat siddhāntaḥ yaḥ na hātavyaḥ dvividhaḥ sat siddhāntaḥ para apara bhedāt pratyekam dvividhaḥ vācanikaḥ ānuṣaṅgikaḥ ca tatra vācanikam param sat siddhāntam tāvat āha aśeṣa iti 
NSu_3.3.78.1–3.3.78.2	 aśeṣa guṇa pūrṇa tvam sarva doṣa samujkhitiḥ viṣṇoḥ anyat ca tat tantram iti samyak vinirṇayaḥ anyat tat tantram iti sakala jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvam ucyate nirṇīyate iti nirṇayaḥ samyak vinirṇayaḥ vācanikaḥ para siddhāntaḥ sākṣāt brahma svarūpa avadhāraṇa pare janma ādi sūtre khalu abhihitaḥ ayam arthaḥ ānuṣaṅgikam para siddhāntam āha svatantra tvam iti 
NSu_3.3.79ab.1–3.3.79ab.3	 svatantra tvam sadā tasya tasya bhedaḥ ca sarvatas svatantra tvam svādhīna sattva ādimattvam tasya viṣṇoḥ dvitīyaḥ tasya iti śabdaḥ uttaratra sambaddhayate sarvatas bhedaḥ ca iti prakṛti jīva jaḍebhyaḥ atyanta bhinna tvam nanu etat api asambhavaḥ tu sataḥ na ātma aśruteḥ pṛthak upadeśāt ityādinā abhihitam eva tad katham ānuṣaṅkikaḥ siddhāntaḥ satyam tathā api pradhāna prameya upayogi tayā ukta tvāt adoṣaḥ sva gata bheda varjita tva ādeḥ upalakṣaṇam etat iti samyak sthitiḥ iti vakṣyamāṇena anvayaḥ katham asya atharsya ānuṣaṅgika tvam iti atas āha adoṣa tvasya iti 
NSu_3.3.79c.1–3.3.79d.2	 adoṣa tvasya siddhayartham viṣṇoḥ adoṣa tvasya siddhayartham aṅgī kāryaḥ ayam arthaḥ iti śeṣaḥ upalakṣaṇam etat aśeṣa guṇa pūrṇa tvasya sakala jagat janma ādi kāraṇa tvasya ca iti api draṣṭavyam anena katham tat siddhiḥ iti atas āha yadi iti  yat abhede tad anvayaḥ yasmāt jagata abhede viṣṇoḥ deṣa sambandhaḥ prasajyate tasmāt iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ atra api abhedaḥ iti asvātantryasya api upalakṣaṇam tad anvayaḥ iti ca guṇa pūrti ādi abhāvasya api anyat tat tantram iti anya śabdaḥ amukta viṣayaḥ iti pratītiḥ syāt tad artham āha tat tantra tvam ca iti 
NSu_3.3.80ab.1–3.3.80b.2	 tat tantra tvam ca muktānām api caśabdaḥ vakṣyamāṇena bhedena saha samuccaya arthaḥ aṅgīkāyarmiti śeṣaḥ kimartham idam aṅgī kāryam janma ādi sūtrasya amukta viṣaya tayā api upapatteḥ iti atas āha tat iti  tad guṇa pūrtaye na hi muktānām tat tantra tvena vinā tasya nirargalam aiśvaryam siddhayati na ca tad antareṇa guṇa pūrtiḥ bhavati iti syāt etat yadi muktāḥ paramātmanaḥ bhinnāḥ syuḥ na ca tathā tat kim tat tantra tvena iti atas āha muktānām api iti 
NSu_3.3.80c.1–3.3.80de.2	 muktānām api bhedaḥ ca paramātmanaḥ atyanta bhedaḥ ca aṅgī kāryaḥ anenatasya bhedaḥ ca sarvataḥ a iti etat api vivṛtam bhavati kimartham iti atas prayojanam vaktum pīṭham āracayati na hi iti  na hi bhinnam abhinnatām gacchat dṛṣṭam kvacid muktānām paramātmanā bhedaḥ bhavat na tāvat prāk bhinnānām bhinnasya abheda avāpteḥ kvāpi adarśanāt na kevalam adarśanam kim tarhi iti atas āha tasya iti 
NSu_3.3.80ef.1–3.3.81.3	 tasya api abhāvaḥ anubhava upagaḥ bhinnam abhinnatām gacchati iti asya arthasya abhāvaḥ anubhava siddhaḥ api tatas saṃsāre api abhinnānām eva muktā avabhedaḥ vyajyate iti eva vaktavyam tathā eva astu iti atas āha pūrva iti pūrva abhede doṣavat tvam īśasya iti ati bhinna tā nārāyaṇena muktānām api samyak iti sthitiḥ samarthitam tāvat duḥkha ādi rūpaḥ ayam saṃsāraḥ satyaḥ iti tatas saṃsāre api jīvānām paramātmanā bhede tasya doṣavat tvam syāt iti śabdaḥ hetau samyak sthitiḥ sat siddhāntaḥ ānuṣaṅgikaḥ paraḥ iti śeṣaḥ nanu ati bhinna tā kimarthāḥ bheda abheda upapatteḥ iti atas āha bheda iti 
NSu_3.3.82ab.1–3.3.82ab.2	 bheda abhede api abhedena doṣāṇām api sambhavaḥ bhedena sahitaḥ abhedaḥ bheda abhedaḥ vipratiṣiddham ca anadhikaraṇa vācī a iti dvandva eka vat bhāvaḥ vā atra api pūrva nyāyena saṃsāre api bheda abhedauvaṅgī kāryau tatas ca abhedena doṣāṇām api sambhavaḥ bhedena tad parihāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced tarhi kim ajāgala stanāyitena abhedena iti idānīm aparam siddhāntam āha nirdeṣa tvam iti 
NSu_3.3.82c.1–3.3.82d.2	 nirdoṣa tvam ramāyāḥ ca tathā parameśvara vat ramāyāḥ ca nirdeṣa tvam yathā uktamkāmādiḥ atatra tatra ca āyatana ādibhyaḥ asamanā ca asṛti upakramāt amṛta tvam ca anupoṣya a iti nirdeṣa tvam iti uktyā pāratantryam api na asti iti pratīti nirāsa artham āha tat iti  tad anantara tā tathā parameśvara anantara tā tad adhīna tā iti yāvat yat vā anena apara siddhānta antaram āha ekasmāt bhagavataḥ eva avara tvam iti tat api uktam asya eva ca upapatteḥ ūṣmā a iti siddhānta antaram āha brahma iti 
NSu_3.3.83.1–3.3.84a.2	 brahmā sarasvatī vi indra śeṣa rudrāḥ ca tad sriyaḥ śakra kāmau tad anye ca kramāt muktau= api iti ca sat siddhāntaḥ iti jñeyaḥ muktau saṃsāre api proktāt kramāt tiṣṭhanti iti arthaḥ atra dvandva nirdiṣyānām sāmyam anyeṣām tāratamyam iti jñeyam etat ca uktam iyat āma nanāt iti upalakṣaṇam ca etat prapañca satya tva ādikam api grāhyam kutas ayam aśeṣa guṇa ityādi sat siddhāntaḥ iti atas āha nirṇītaḥ iti 
NSu_3.3.84b.1–3.3.84cd.2	 nirṇītaḥ hariṇā svayam hariṇā sūtrakāreṇa svayam sākṣāt nirṇītaḥ na tu balāt sūtra artha tayā kalpitaḥ etat ca tatra tatra darśitam eva sat siddhāntam ahāpayan= iti uktam tad hānau kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha etat iti etat virodhi yat sarvam tamase andhāya kevalam jñātam sat iti arthaḥ virodhi jñānam eva hi asya tyāgaḥ andhāya bhavati iti śeṣaḥ kevalam iti na kadāpi na sukhāya iti arthaḥ kutas etat iti atas āha andham iti 
NSu_3.3.85ab.1–3.3.87.1	 andham tamaḥ viśanti iti prāha śruti ḥ ati sphuṭam anena andhantamaḥ praviśanti ye avidyām upāsate iti śrutim upādatte ukta arthasya prāmāṇika tvam vakṣyate atas tat viruddha pratītiḥ avidyā bhavati eva ati sphuṭam iti anena pareṣām vyākhyānam parācaṣṭe tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ nanu ca vastutas prāmāṇikaḥ sat siddhāntaḥ prakṛtasya katham prāmāṇika tvam iti atas āha iti eva ityādinā sa ādaram iti antena iti eva śrutayaḥ aśeṣāḥ pañca rātram atha akhilam mūla rāmāyaṇam ca eva bhāratam smṛtayaḥ akhilāḥ vaiṣṇavāni purāṇāni sāṅkhaya yogau parau= api brahmatarkaḥ ca mīmāṃsā iti anantaḥ śabda sāgaraḥ anantara yuktayaḥ ca eva pratyakṣa āgama mūlakāḥ 
NSu_3.3.88.1–3.3.88.3	 pratyakṣam aiśvaram ca eva rama ādīnām aśeṣatas muktānām api amuktānām etam eva artham uttamam iti eva iti ukta prakāra avadhāraṇam etam eva artham iti prakṛta dharmī avadhāraṇam tena vyatyāsam api vārayati aśeṣāḥ iti śruti bhāgasya karma ādi paryavasāyi tva nirāsa artham athaśabdaḥ samuccaye akhilam iti jīva janana ādi vākyānām api upādana artham mūla rāmāyaṇam eva iti avāntara rāmāyaṇānām vyudāsaḥ akhilāḥ iti bahuvacana viṣaya vivaraṇa artham itara purāṇānām pāśupata ādi mūla tvena aprāmāṇyāt vaiṣṇavāni iti uktam parau= iti arvācīnasa aṅkhaya yoga vyāvṛttaye tayoḥ apramāṇa tvāt mīmāṃsā trividhā śabda sāgaraḥ prakāśayati iti sambandhaḥ yuktayaḥ ca prakāśayanti pratyakṣa āgama mūlakāḥ eva na tu ābhāsāḥ pratyakṣam ca prakāśayati eva śabdena īśvara pratyakṣasya prābalyam sūcayati karma kāṇḍa ādīnām etat artha prakāśaka tvam katham iti atas uktam uttamam iti karma ādeḥ uttāna artha tve api uttamaḥ arthaḥ ayam iti bhāvaḥ veda ādīnām anyathāvyākhyānam vārayati anya avakāśa rahitam iti 
NSu_3.3.89ab.1–3.3.89cd.1	 anya avakāśa rahitam prakāśayati sādaram kriyā viśeṣaṇam etat sa ādaram iti tatra tātparya sadbhāvam ācaṣṭe etad artharm ca śruti ādikam anyatra paṭhitam eva draṣṭavyam sat siddhānta mahāpayan sat śāstrāṇi eva sarvadā śṛṇuyāt iti uktam tatra sat siddhānta svarūpam nirūpya sat śāstrāṇi eva sarvadā śruṇuyāt iti etat vivṛṇoti etat eva ca iti etat eva ca sat śāstram duḥśāstram tu tatas param 
NSu_3.3.90ab.1–3.3.90ab.3	 sat śāstram abhyaset nityam duḥśāstram ca parityajet etat veda ādikam tatas param tat viruddham tat udāsīnam ca ṛc a ādyāḥ bhāratam ca eva ityādya āgamaḥ atra sphuṭaḥ eva duśśāstram na abhyaset iti vaktavye parityajet iti vacanam na kevalam tatra udāsīna tvam kintu hetu tayā jñānam api bhāvyam iti jñāpayitum atra ca asat śāstra adhigamanam iti pātakeṣu parigaṇanam pramāṇam sphuṭāni ca ācāryeṇa anyatra atra arthe vākyāni udāhṛtāni sat śāstram abhyaset iti śravaṇa mananayoḥ kartavya tvam uktam tat ayuktam nididhi a āsanena eva brahma darśana upapatteḥ anyathā tad vaiyarthyāt ityataḥ āha asaṃśayena iti 
NSu_3.3.90cd.1–3.3.90cd.2	 asaṃśayena tattvasya nirṇaye brahma darśanam saṃśaya śabdena viparyayaḥ api lakṣyate nirṇaye sati nididhi āsanena brahma darśanam bhavati iti yojyam etat uktam bhavati satyam nididhi āsanam brahma darśana sādhanam iti kintu tad siddhaye śravaṇa manane api kartavye avitatham brahma anucintanam hi nididhi āsanam vitatha anucintanasya caturthe nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt naca aviditasya anucintanam sambhavati iti tad vedanā artham śravaṇam abhyarthanīyam śrute ca arthe liṅga ābhāsa pratibhāsena saṃśaya viparyaya udayena vitatham tat bhavati iti tad vyudāsa hetuḥ mananam api eṣyavyam iti 
NSu_3.3.90cd.3^1	 anye punar manyante śravaṇam eva brahma aparokṣa jñāna sādhanam manana nididhi āsane śravaṇam prati phala upakārī aṅga bhūte asambhāvanā viparīta bhāvanā ākhya citta vikṣepa pratibaddham hi brahma aparokṣa jñānam na avidyā nirmūla nasyeṣyam manana ādikam ca pratibandham nivartayati iti tat asat śabdasya sākṣātkāra kāraṇa tāyāḥ kvāpi adarśanāt brahma viṣaya śabda vat dharma ādi viṣayasya api tathā tva āpatteḥ ca na ca viśeṣa hetuḥ asti yena brahma viṣayasya eva tad bhāvaḥ na dharma ādi viṣayasya iti pratīmaḥ pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa ākrānta tayā śabdasya tatra antarbhāvaḥ ca āpadyeta atha matam dṛśyate tāvat daśamaḥ tvam asi iti ādi vākyasya sākṣātkāra karaṇa tvam na ca tatra api indriyam eva karaṇam na śabdaḥ iti sāmpratam śabdasya api anvaya vyatireka siddha tvāt astu tarhi indriyam eva karaṇam śabdaḥ tu sahakārī iti ced na vaiparītyasya api su vaca tvāt 
NSu_3.3.90cd.3^2	 tathā api kutā vinigamanam iti ced kvacid bahalatame tamasi kvacid ca locana virahiṇaḥ api vākyāt daśamaḥ asmi iti aparokṣa pratīti darśanāt iti vadāmaḥ dharma ādi viṣayasya api śabdasya aparokṣa jñāna sādhana tva āpādanam ca asat vaiṣamyāt prakṛtaḥ hi śabdaḥ aparokṣa brahma ātma viṣayaḥ na tathā anyaḥ asti ca asya aparokṣa jñāna sādhana tve pramāṇam na anyasya tathā hi vimatam śabda jñānam aparokṣam aparokṣa viṣaya tvāt sukha ādi jñāna vat aparokṣa tvam vedānta vākya janya jñāna vṛtti aparokṣa jñāna niṣṭhāti anta abhāva apratiyogi tvāt jñāna tva vat iti na ca vivāda adhyāsitaḥ śabdaḥ aparokṣa jñāna janakaḥ na bhavati śabda tvāt jyotiṣyoma ādi vākya vat iti yuktam daśamaḥ tvam asi iti ādau vyabhicārāt śrūyate cataddhā asya vijijñau tamasaḥ pāram darśayati a iti upadeśa mātra deva aparokṣa pramiti janma atas eva brahma ātma viṣaya vākya anya tvena pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam viśeṣaṇīyam iti 
NSu_3.3.90cd.4^1	 atra ucyate yat tāvat uktam daśamaḥ tvam asi ityādi vākyāt aparokṣa jñāna janma upabdham iti tad asaṅgatam daśa tu asaṅkhayā khalu apekṣā buddhi janyā tad vayaṅgayā vā iti atas na apātataḥ rūpa ādikam iva pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyate tatas daśānām pūraṇaḥ daśamaḥ api tathā atas prathamam śabdena parokṣa jñāne jāte anantaram labdha sahāyena pratyakṣeṇa aparokṣa jñānam jāyate ābhāvāt ekam eva aparokṣam jñānam iti abhimānaḥ andhakāra ādau tu vākyāt utpannasya jñānasya aparokṣa tvam na asti eva pratīti kalahaḥ ayam niravadhikaḥ iti ced atra idam vaktavyam śabdasya aparokṣa jñāna sādhana tvam kim svabhāvaḥ kim vā aparokṣa jñāna sādhana tvam asya api agantukam ādye sarveṣām api śabdānām tathā abhāvaḥ syāt dvitīye nimittam vaktavyam brahma ātma viṣaya tvam iti ced tarhi daśamaḥ tvam asi iti ādeḥ atathābhūtasya na aparokṣa jñāna sādhana tvam syāt aparokṣa viṣaya tvam iti ced na 
NSu_3.3.90cd.4^2	 aparokṣa jñāna viṣaya tva atiriktasya arthe aparokṣa tvasya abhāvāt tatra etat jñāna viṣaya tvena tad uktau= itaretara āśraya tvam jñāna antara abhiprāye tu svarga ādayaḥ api keṣāñcit aparokṣa jñāna viṣayāḥ iti asmākam tad viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ aparokṣa jñānam janayet eka puruṣa abhiprāye api keṣāñcit aparokṣa jñāna viṣayāḥ iti asmākam tad viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ aparokṣa jñānam janayet eka puruṣa abhiprāye api pratyakṣa avagate agnau dhūma darśanena aparokṣa jñāna janma prasaṅgaḥ śabdasya evaṃbhāvaḥ iti ced tathā api agnau śabdena aparokṣa jñāna utpattiḥ syāt aparokṣatayā jñāyamāne tathā iti ced na dharmi mātra abhiprāye pratyakṣeṇa avagamyamāne ghaṭe śata pala parimitaḥ ayam iti śabdasya aparokṣa jñāna kāraṇa tā āpatteḥ prakāra abhiprāye tu prakṛte abhāvāt na hi tattvam asi ityādi vākya pratipādyam brahma ātma aikyam aparokṣatayā avabhāsate tathā sati śabda vaiyarthya āpatteḥ iti 
NSu_3.3.90cd.5–3.3.90cd.6	 etena aparokṣa viṣaya tva anumānam api parāḥ tam yat ca aparokṣa tvam ityādi tad jyotiṣyoma ādi vākye api tathā prayoga sambhavāt ābhāsa samāna yogakṣemam jyotiṣyoma ādi vākyasya aparokṣa jñāna sādhana tva abhāve na kiñcid bādhakam iti ced samam etat vedānta vākyeṣu api saṃsārasya avidyā maya tvāt avidyāyāḥ ca aparokṣa jñānena vinā nibarhaṇa ayogāt vedānta vākyasya aparokṣa jñāna sādhana tva abhāve mokṣa abhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced na jñāna nivartyatāyāḥ nirasta tvāt citta ekāgṣa rūpa nididhi āsanasya aparokṣa jñāna sādhanatva upapatteḥ ca manasaḥ aparokṣa jñāna sādhana tvam kvāpi na upalabdham iti ced tat kim śabdasya upalabdham yat manasā na manutaḥ iti śruti viruddham tat iti ced na śruteḥ manasā eva idam āptavyam iti śrutyā sat pratipakṣa tvāt citta aikāgṣasya antaraṅga tā pareyam śrutiḥ iti ced sā api apakva manaḥ viṣaya iti syāt 
NSu_3.3.90cd.7	 kiñca śabdasya api brahma jñāna sādhana tvam yatas vācaḥ nivartante iti śruti viruddham katham aṅgī kāryam tat ha asya vijijñau= iti ādi śrutayaḥ tu parokṣa jñānena api sārthakāḥ paramparayā aparokṣa jñāna sādhana tva vādinyaḥ vā spaṣṭam hi smṛtayaḥ vadantiśrutvā matvā tathā dhyātvā tad ajñāna viparyayau saṃśayam ca parāṇudya labhate brahma darśanam a iti śṛṇuyāt yāvat ajñānam matiḥ yāvat ayukta tā dhyānam ca yāvadīkṣā syāt na īkṣarā kva ca na bādhyate a iti ca 
NSu_3.3.90cd.8–3.3.90cd.9	 etena dharma ādi vākye ati prasaṅgaḥ śabda tva anumānam ca samāhitam veditavyam atas eva pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe viśeṣa prakṣeṇe api nirastaḥ nirnibandhana tvāt ye tu śabdaḥ eva aparokṣa jñāna jananāya pravṛttaḥ asambhāvana ādi pratibaddhaḥ manana nididhi a āsanābhyām pratibandha apagame sajjanayati iti manyante te praṣṭavyāḥ prāk manana nididhi a āsanābhyām kim asau kim api akṛtvā parastāt aparokṣa jñānam janayati uta parokṣa jñānam kṛtvā na ādyaḥ gṛhīta saṅgateḥ śabdāt bodha udaya abhāvasya pramāṇa viruddha tvāt dvitīye api viramya vyāpāra āpattiḥ tatas varam śabdasya tāvatā eva caritārtha tva kalpanam iti eṣā diś 
NSu_3.3.90cd.10	 yat uktam yathāśakti śravaṇa manane kartavye iti tat ayuktam puruṣa śaktīnām tāratamyavat tvena śravaṇa ādeḥ api tāratamya āpatteḥ na ca tathā astu iti vācyam tad sādhyasya jñānasya ekavidha tvena vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt na ca vācyam jñātavyasya brahmaṇaḥ aparimita tvāt tad tad jñānāni api tāratamyavanti iti tad phalasya mokṣasya tāratamya rahita tvena vaiyarthya aparihārāt na khalu bandha vidhvaṃsasya tāratamyam upapadyate iti atas āha samyak iti 
NSu_3.3.91.1–3.3.91.2	 samyak viṣama vijñāna tāratamya anusārataḥ phalam bhavet tāratamyāt sukha duḥkha ātmakam nṛṇām viṣamam viparītam jñānam eva vijñānam tatas na punaruktiḥ virodhaḥ ca tāratamyāt iti tāratamyena upetam iti arthaḥ samyak viparīta jñānayoḥ tāratamyam iti ukte parasparam iti pratītiḥ syāt tad nirāsa artham uktam vivṛṇoti samyak ca iti 
NSu_3.3.92ab.1–3.3.92ab.3	 samyak ca adhika vijñānāt sukha ādhikyam bhavet nṛṇām samyak iti avyayam samīcīnāt iti arthaḥ caśabdaḥ anukta samuccaya arthaḥ madhyamāt samyak jñānāt tathāvidham sukham bhavet alpāt ca samyak jñānāt alpam evam adhikāt mithyā jñānāt adhikam duḥkham ityādi atra mithyājñāna tāratamyena duḥkha tāratamyasya abhidhānam dṛṣṭānta tvena upayujyate yat vā duśśāstram tu parityajet iti uktam tatra atyanta parityāga arthaḥ arthavādaḥ ayam na bandha pradhvaṃsa mātram mokṣaḥ kintu sukham api tasya ca tāratamyam upapadyate iti bhāvaḥ adhikaraṇa artham upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_3.3.92cd.1–3.3.92cd.2^1	 atas yathā ātma śaktayā eva śravaṇam mananam tathā nanu atra ātma śaktim anatikramya yathā ātma śakti iti avyayībhāve sati tasya avyayībhāvaḥ ca iti avyaya tvāt avyayāt āpsupaḥ iti tṛtīyāyāḥ lukā bhavitavyam yathā atma śaktyā eva iti katham ucyate yathā iti bhinnam padam samyak vāci nivṛtti mārgaḥ kathitaḥ ādau bhagavatā yathā iti yathā śravaṇam ityādinā ca sambaddhayate sādṛśya artham vā ātma śaktyā eva śravaṇam mananam ca ācaret na tu sarva śākhā viṣayam na api sva sva śākhā mātra viṣayam yathā ca śravaṇam manana ca ātma śaktyā eva nididhi āsanam api tathā acaret tat ca śravaṇam mananam ca kṛtvā kuvarnvā iti yat vā yathā atma śakti iti avyayībhāvāt paraḥ āśabdaḥ samyak vācī 
NSu_3.3.92cd.2^2	 śravaṇam ityādinā sambaddhayate athavā yathāśabdasya ātma śabdena avyayībhāvaḥ tatas śakti śabdena karmadhā arayaḥ yogyatā anusāriṇyā śaktyā iti arthaḥ atra yathā atma śaktyā eva śravaṇam mananam tathā acataret iti etāvatā eva upasaṃhāre kartavye adhikam ucyate yat tat śravaṇam ananayoḥ uktasya nididhi āsana aṅga tvasya api upasaṃhāra atharm kṛtvā athavā kurvan= api iti viśeṣa jñāpana artham ca ayam ca vikalpaḥ guru upadeśa anurodhena vyavatiṣṭhate athavā pūrva ardhaḥ eva adhikaraṇa artha upasaṃhāraḥ tatra ācaret iti vakṣyamāṇam siṃha avalokanena sambaddhayate iti siddham iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_3.3.92cd.3–3.3.92cd.6	 upasaṃhāraḥ artha abhedāt vidhi śeṣa vat samāne ca atra sarva veda uktān guṇān doṣa abhāvān= ca upasaṃhṛtya eva paramātma upāsyaḥ iti uktam iha api sarva śabdaḥ na asaṅkucita vṛttiḥ ukta nyāyāt ityāśayavān= tāt paryam āha kṛtvā iti upasaṃhāraḥ artha abhedāt vidhi śeṣa vat samāne ca kṛtvā atha kurvan= api vā nididhi āsanam ācaret śravaṇam mananam tathā iti vartate yathā atma śaktyā eva iti ca anena prāpteḥ ca samañjasam a ityādīnām sūtrāṇām api tātparyam uktam veditavyam tathā tad nirdhāraṇa artha niyamaḥ a ityādīnām prathama adhikaraṇa vyākhyānena iti 
NSu_3.3.92cd.7^1	 anubandha ādibhyaḥ ca yoga śāstre yama ādikam upāsana aṅga tayā upadiśyate tatra pūrva pakṣa vādī manyate yama anuṣṭhānam tāvat asat viṣṇu bhakti ādi guṇa sampattiḥ viṣaya saṃsarga ādi doṣa varjanam ca yama śabda abhidheyam deśa kāla avasta avyavasthayā vinā anuṣṭheyasya tathātvāt ahiṃsā ādi parigaṇanam tu tad pradarśana artham iti hi yoga anuśāsanāni tatra yamānām kim upāsana utpattau= upayogaḥ kiṃvā tad phala jñāna utpattau na ādyaḥ vidveṣiṇām api satata anucintana darśanāt tanmātra tvāt ca upāsanāyāḥ na dvitīyaḥ 
NSu_3.3.92cd.7^2–3.3.93.1	 bhakti ādi sahitam eva upāsanam brahma sākṣātkāram janayati na anyathā iti atra pramāṇa abhāvāt kiñca dveṣāt caidya ādayaḥ nṛpāḥ a  vaireṇa yat nṛpatayaḥ a ityādau dveṣasya tāvat mokṣa sādhana tvam pratīyate dṛṣṭvā eva tam mucyate na apareṇa iti mokṣasya darśana eka sādhya tvam ca tad ubhaya paryālocanayā dveṣasya darśana sādhana tvam avagamyate evam niyama āsana prāṇāyāma pratyāhārāṇām api aṅga tā nirasanīya iti tatra samādhānam anubandha ādibhyaḥ iti tasya arthaḥ bhakti ādibhyaḥ iti tatra na jñāyate kaḥ pakṣaḥ aṅgīkṛtaḥ katham ca tatra ukta doṣaḥ parihṛtaḥ iti atas vyācaṣṭe viṣayeṣu ityādinā anubandha ādibhyaḥ ca viṣayeṣu ca saṃsargāt śāśvatasya ca saṃśayāt manasā ca anyat ākāṅkṣāt param na pratipādyate 
NSu_3.3.94.1–3.3.94.3	 iti bhārata vākyam hi tena etad doṣa varjitaḥ sadā upāsanayā yuktaḥ vāsudevam prapaśyati viṣaya sevanāt śāśvatasya brahmaṇaḥ mokṣāt anyat viṣaya jātam prati ākāṅkṣāt iti ghañantaḥ param brahma na pratipadyate na paśyati mithas samuccaye caśabdaḥ hi śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe viṣaya saṃsarga ādi doṣāṇām jñāna virodhi tvam āha iti śeṣaḥ etad doṣa varjitaḥ eva sadā upāsanayā yuktaḥ bhavati tathāvidhaḥ eva sadā upāsanayā yuktaḥ vāsudevam prapaśyati iti yojyam etat uktam bhavati upāsana utpattau tāvat yamānām aṅga tvam brūmaḥ viṣaya saṃsarga ādimataḥ bhakti rahitasya sadā upāsana anupapatteḥ na hi anyatra āsakta manāḥ tatra sneha vidhuraḥ ca tad santatam cintayati iti yujyate 
NSu_3.3.94.4–3.3.94.5	 yat atra uktam snigdha vat kruddhānām api santata anucintanam dṛṣṭam iti tat satyam tathā api tad itara saṃsarga varjana ādi kam aṅgīkāryam eva na ca bhagavati vidveṣasya kāraṇam asti keṣāñcid āśaya doṣa vaśāt dveṣa sambhave api na tathāvidham anucintanam jñāna sādhanam bhavati kintu uktayamādi sahitam eva iti dvitīya pakṣam api svīkurmaḥ na ca tatra pramāṇa abhāvaḥ bhārata vākyasya vidyamāna tvāt tatra viṣaya saṃsarga ādi padānām yama mātra abhāva upalakṣaṇa tvāt iti bhakti ādi abhāvasya api doṣa tvena etad doṣa varjitaḥ iti uktam yamānām avaśya anuṣṭheya tve yuktim api āha doṣāḥ iti 
NSu_3.3.95.1–3.3.95.3	 doṣāḥ anādi sambaddhāḥ te mukti paripanthinaḥ santi eva prāyaśas puṃsu tena mokṣaḥ na jāyate te viṣṇu bhakti abhāva ādyāḥ viṣaya saṃsarga ādyāḥ ca doṣāḥ mukti paripanthinaḥ prācuryeṇa puruṣeṣu anādi sambandhāḥ santi eva tena kāraṇena teṣām mokṣaḥ na jāyate etat uktam bhavati mokṣa yogyānām mumukṣūṇām api idānīm tāvat mokṣaḥ na jāyate tat kutas iti cintyam bhagavat prasāda abhāvāt iti ced saḥ api kutas jñāna abhāvāt iti ced asau= api kutas dhyāna abhyāsa asattvāt iti ced na vidveṣiṇām tad sattve api asattvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt api ca dhyāna abhyāsaḥ api kutas na iti vācyam śravaṇa ādi abhāvāt iti ced tad bhāvaḥ api na kutas atas doṣāḥ eva tad tad utpattim pratibadhnantaḥ mokṣa paripanthinaḥ iti jñāyate na ca doṣāṇām āgantukānām anādi mokṣa abhāva hetu tvam na sambhavati iti sāmpratam pravāhataḥ anādi tvāt iti tathā ca uktam doṣa gṛhīta guṇām iti syāt etat santi kecid saṃsāriṇaḥ api rāga ādi doṣa rahitāḥ jīvāḥ bāla mugdha ādayaḥ tat katham doṣāṇām mokṣa abhāva hetu tvam iti atas āha sarve iti 
NSu_3.3.96ab.1–3.3.96ab.3	 sarve te ete jīveṣu dṛśyante tāratamyataḥ udāhṛteṣu api bāla mugdha ādi jīveṣu te ete magavat bhakti abhāva ādyāḥ doṣāḥ tāvat pratyakṣa anumānābhyām dṛśyante eva rāga dveṣa ādayaḥ api puruṣeṣu tāratamyataḥ santi caturvidhāḥ hi te prasupta tanu vicchinna udāra bhedena atas bāla ādiṣu udārāṇām teṣām abhāvāt abhāva abhimānaḥ stanya ādi kāma ādeḥ teṣu api darśanāt tathā ca āgamaḥ garbhe bālye api apauṣkalyāt ityādiḥ tat evam sarve api doṣāḥ sarveṣu api pramitāḥ iti yuktam uktam atha api syāt ṛjavaḥ nāma hiraṇyagarbha pada prāpti yogyāḥ santi saṃsāriṇaḥ puruṣāḥ na ca te doṣiṇaḥ iti yuktam ṛju tva virodhāt ṛjavaḥ samīcīnā nirdeṣāḥ iti anartha antaram tat katham iti atas āha ṛjūnām iti 
NSu_3.3.96cd.1–3.3.96cd.3	 ṛjūnām ekaḥ eva asti parama utsāha varjanam ṛjūnām api mokṣa artham mahodyogavarjanam nāma doṣaḥ asti iti atas na uktam ayuktam anyathā mokṣa vilambā sambhavāt na ca evam ṛju tu a virodhaḥ yatas asau= ekaḥ eva doṣa bāhulya abhāva abhiprāyam ṛju tva vacanam alpa sve niḥsva prayoga darśanāt iti bhāvaḥ prakāra antareṇa virodham pariharati saḥ iti 
NSu_3.3.96ef.1–3.3.96ef.3	 sa guṇa alpa tva mātra tvāt narja tvena viruddhayate sa parama utsāha varjanam nāma doṣaḥ yadi api mahā udyama abhāvaḥ doṣaḥ eva heya tvāt tathā api na rāga ādiḥ iva bhāva rūpaḥ na api guṇa abhāva rūpaḥ kinnāma utsāha lakṣaṇa guṇa alpa tā mātram iti adoṣaḥ api ucyate iti naṛju tvena viruddhayate kim atas yadi evam doṣāḥ saṃsāra hetavaḥ mukti paripanthinaḥ iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_3.3.97.1–3.3.98.1	 atas viṣṇau parā bhaktiḥ tad bhakteṣu rama ādiṣu tāratamyena kartavyā puruṣa artham abhīpsitā idam ca sarva yama upalakṣaṇam puruṣa artham mokṣam ayam atra saṅkṣepaḥ viṣṇu bhakti abhāva ādyāḥ viṣaya saṃsarga ādyāḥ ca doṣāḥ mumukṣa ādimatā tyājyāḥ mokṣa ādi virodhi tvāt yat yat virodhi tad tad arthinā tyājyam dṛṣṭam yathā arogya virodhya pathyam tad arthinā tathā ca viṣṇu bhakti ādikam kāryam iti siddhayati bhāva anuṣṭhānena vinā abhāva parityāga ayogāt iti viṣṇau parāni atra tāratamyena iti uktam vivṛṇoti svādaraḥ iti svādaraḥ sarva jantūnām saṃsiddhaḥ hi svabhāvataḥ tatas adhikaḥ sva uttameṣu tad ādhikya anusārataḥ 
NSu_3.3.99ab.1–3.3.99cd.2	 kartavyaḥ vāsudeva antam sarvathā śubham icchatā ādaraḥ snehaḥ svabhāvataḥ saṃsiddhaḥ iti upakāra ādi karaṇam anapekṣya anādi siddhaḥ iti arthaḥ anyathā sukhinā eva mayā bhāvyam na jātu duḥkhinā iti āśīḥ na syāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ tatas sva viṣayāt ādarāt adhikaḥ ādaraḥ sākṣāt sva uttameṣu kartavyaḥ evam teṣām teṣām ādhikya anusārataḥ adhikaḥ kartavyaḥ vāsudeva antam vāsudeve tu niratiśayaḥ śubham dhyāna ādikam etat ca upapādadiṣyate sakṛt anuṣṭheya asakṛt anuṣṭheya sadā anuṣṭheya bhedāt aṅgam anekavidham ayam tu katham iti apekṣāyām āha na iti na kadācid tyajet tam ca krameṇa enam vivardhayet tam viṣṇu ādi ādaram na kevalam na tyajet kintu kāla krameṇa enam vivardhayet ca sva sameṣu svatas adhameṣu ca katham iti apekṣāyām āha sameṣu iti 
NSu_3.3.100.1–3.3.100.3	 sameṣu sva ātma vat snehaḥ satsu anyatra tatas dayā kāryā evam āparokṣyeṇa dṛśyate kṣipram īśvaraḥ kartavyaḥ iti vartate tatas uttama samebhyaḥ anyatra adhameṣu satsu dayā kāryā yadi satsu iti eva ucyeta tadā uttama sameṣu api prasaṅgaḥ tatas anyatra iti eva uktau= asatsu api prasaktiḥ tatas varga trayāt anyatra ājñeṣu odāsīnyam viparīteṣu vaiparītyam ca iti api yojyam evam kriyamāṇe yamānām upāsana utpattau jñāna utpāde mokṣa tiśaye ca aṅga tvam iti sūcanāya puruṣa artham abhīpsatā śubham icchatā dṛśyate kṣipram īśvaraḥ iti vicitra uktiḥ atas eva upasaṃhāre trayasya api saṅkīrtanam doṣa parityāge api asti viśeṣaḥ rāga ādayaḥ hi saṃsāram ātanvate viparīta jñāna ādayaḥ tu nityam narakam prāpayanti iti atas rāga āditaḥ atiśayena tyājyāḥ iti āśayavān= tatra śrutim āha tat iti 
NSu_3.3.101.1–3.3.103a.3	 tat tamaḥ andham vrajet viṣṇu sama tvam yaḥ anupaśyati ramā brahma śiva ādīnām api muktau kathañcana kim uta ādhikya dṛṣṭeḥ tat guṇa abhāva mateḥ api doṣa vettuḥ abhedasya draṣṭuḥ draṣṭuḥ tathā ubhayoḥ iti āha sat śrutiḥ tat prasiddham na kevalam saṃsāre kintu muktau= api kathañcana kena api dharmeṇa samatvam ramā brahma śiva ādīnām viṣṇoḥ ādhikya dṛṣṭeḥ puruṣasya andhatamasā avāptiḥ bhavati iti kim uta iti yojyam viṣṇoḥ guṇa abhāva mateḥ viṣṇoḥ jīvaiḥ jaḍaiḥ ca abhedasya draṣṭuḥ ubhayoḥ bheda abhedayoḥ sva pakṣa sādhanam upasaṃharati tena iti 
NSu_3.3.103a–3.3.103d.3	 tena samprokta guṇa saṃyutam upāsīta harim dṛṣṭvā muktiḥ tena eva jāyate prāk samproktaiḥ viṣaya saṃsarga varjana ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ saṃyutaḥ yat vā yoga śāstre samproktaiḥ yama ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ aṅgaiḥ saṃyutaḥ tena eva tathāvidhena eva upāsena harim dṛṣṭvā karmāṇi kṣapayataḥ muktiḥ jāyate idānīm yat pūrva pakṣiṇa uktam bhagavat dveṣiṇām api purāṇe muktiḥ kathyate iti tat nirākaroti dveṣāt iti 
NSu_3.3.104ab.1–3.3.104f.1	 dveṣāt yat mukti kathanam śruti vākya virodhi yat tasmāt anyathā vyākhyātavyam iti bhāvaḥ tad prakāram ca vakṣyati kim tad śati vākyam iti atomāḥ naḥ tenebhyaḥ ye abhidruha spade nirāmiṇaḥ ripavaḥ anneṣu jāgṛdhuḥ a iti etat arthataḥ paṭhati ripavaḥ iti ripavaḥ ye tu rāmasya vimukha tvāt nirāmiṇaḥ abhidroha pade nityam andhe tamasi te sthitāḥ 
NSu_3.3.105.1–3.3.105.3	 haridviṣaḥ tamaḥ yānti ye ca eva tad abhedinaḥ tat nirguṇa tva vettāraḥ tasya doṣa vidaḥ api ca rāmaḥ ramaṇam tat asya asti iti rāmī bhagavat nāmaḥ tasmāt niṣkrāntāḥ tasya vimukhāḥ nirāmiṇaḥ iti arthaḥ atas eva tasya ripavaḥ abhidroha padaḥ iti asya eva vyākhyānam andhetam asi iti nityam sthitāḥ bhavanti iti śeṣoktiḥ anena ye nirāmiṇaḥ ripavaḥ anneṣu bhogeṣu jāgṛdhuḥ abhikāṅkṣā= antaḥ te abhidruhaḥ a bhitas drohasya pade sthāne sthātum yogyā yatas atas tebhyaḥ stenebhyaḥ asmān māvocaḥ na hi asmad śravaṇavān duḥkham arhati iti yojanā sūcitā bhavati idam ca vāyum prati vidyā devatāyāḥ vacanam tad abhedinaḥ tasya hareḥ jīva ādi a bheda vādinaḥ katham etat śati virodhaḥ iti atas āha ityādi iti 
NSu_3.3.106ab.1–3.3.107.1	 ityādi śruti sandarbhāt dveṣiṇaḥ tamaḥ īyate smṛti viruddham ca dveṣiṇām mokṣa kathanam iti āśayavān= tāḥ paṭhati hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ca iti hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ca api bhagavat nindayā tamaḥ vidhi kṣuḥ ati agāt sūno prahlādasya anubhāvataḥ yat anindat pitā mahyam tvad bhakte mayi ca āghavān tasmāt pitā me pūyeta durantāt dustarāt aghāt 
NSu_3.3.108.1–3.3.113.1	 nindām bhagavataḥ śṛṇvan= tatparasya janasya vā tatas na apaiti yaḥ saḥ api yāti aghaḥ sukṛtāt cyutaḥ avajānanti mām mūḍhāḥ mānuṣīm tanum āśritam param bhāvam ajānantaḥ mama bhūta maheśvaram mogha āśāḥ mogha karmāṇaḥ mogha jñānāḥ vicetasaḥ rākṣasīm āsurīm ca eva prakṛtim mohanīm śritāḥ mām ātma para deheṣu pradviṣantaḥ abhyasūyakāḥ tān aham dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu nara adhamān kṣipāmi ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣu eva yoniṣu āsurīm yonim āpannāḥ mūḍhāḥ janmani janmani mām aprāpya eva kaunteya tatas yānti adhamām gatim yaḥ dviṣṭāt vibudha śreṣṭham devam nārāyaṇam prabhum katham sa na bhavet dveṣyaḥ āloka antasya kasyacid 
NSu_3.3.114.1–3.3.114.3	 yaḥ dviṣṭāt vibudha śreṣṭham devam nārāyaṇam prabhum majjanti pitaraḥ tasya narake śāśvatīḥ samāḥ ityādi vākya sandohāt dveṣiṇaḥ tamaḥ eva tu vivikṣuḥ veśana sambhāvanā viṣayaḥ āśaṅkāyām acetaneṣu upasaṅkha yānam iti vacanāt śvā mumūrṣati iti yathā atyāgāt tamaḥ mama pitā mahyam mad nimittam tvam anindat mayi mad viṣaye ca āghavān aparādhavān tasmāt viṣṇu vaiṣṇava nindā parādha jādaghāt nitya nirayāt nindā ādikam ca dveṣa mūlam iti prasiddham eva nara harim prati prahlādasya vākyam idam tatas sthānāt nindām śṛṇvataḥ yadā adhaḥpātaḥ tadā nindakasya kimu mānuṣīm manuṣya sadṛśīm ye mām avajānanti te mogha āśādimantaḥ bhavanti teṣām sukha leśaḥ api na bhavati ātma para deheṣu preraka tvena sthitam saṃsaranti atra iti saṃsārāḥ dehāḥ tasya vivaraṇam āsurīṣu eva ityādi lokaḥ janaḥ tasya antar caṇḍāla ādiḥ tad paryantasya katham etat smṛti virodhaḥ iti atas āha ityādi iti 
NSu_3.3.114cd.1–3.3.114cd.6	 ityādi vākya sandohāt dveṣiṇaḥ tamaḥ eva tu jñāyate iti śeṣaḥ tamaḥ api nirutthānam iti tuśabdaḥ atas yama ādi aṅgam avaśya anuṣṭheyam iti siddham vidyā eva tu nirdhāraṇāt yadi api idam adhikaraṇam anubandha ādibhyaḥ iti atas pūrvam tathā api upāsana svarūpa avagame sati eva tad sāthaṛkya samarthanasya avasaraḥ na anyathā iti vyutkrameṇa vyākhyātam tathā hi na bhagavat upāsanam kartavyam vaiyarthyāt na ca sākṣātkāra artham tasya api vyartha tvāt na ca mokṣa prayojanaḥ asau= iti vācyam cārvāka diśā mokṣasya eva abhāvāt bhāve vā jaina ādi mata anusāreṇa sādhana antara sādhya tvāt iti prāpte mokṣa sadbhāvam tasya api bhagavat darśana sādhya tvam ca sādhayitum idam ārabhyate yadi api samaya pāde cārvāka ādi matāni nirākṛtāni tathā api mokṣa tad sādhana viyat ūṣaṇa viśeṣa vyutpādana arthaḥ ayam prayatnaḥ tatra cārvāka matam tāvat anuvadati na eva iti vidyā eva tu nirdhāraṇāt 
NSu_3.3.115ab.1–3.3.115c.2	 na eva mokṣaḥ iti prāhuḥ lokāyata mate sthitāḥ eva śabdaḥ svarūpa niṣedha dyotana arthaḥ anyathā puruṣa viśeṣa ādi sambandhena niṣedhaḥ api jñāyeta tasmāt upāsanam vyartham iti śeṣaḥ tarhi kaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ asti iti atas āha bhogaḥ iti bhogaḥ sraj candana ādi viṣaya sukha anubhavaḥ bhogaḥ sa puruṣa arthaḥ asti iti prāhuḥ iti sambandhaḥ bhogaḥ ca aihikaḥ eva na tu svarga ādi gataḥ iti āha śarīra iti 
NSu_3.3.115c.1–3.3.116a.3	 śarīra paryantam śarīra pāta paryantam iti arthaḥ kutas svarga apavargayoḥ asattvam iti atas āha bhasmībhāvaḥ iti  bhasmībhāvaḥ tatas bhavet iti tatas pāta anantaram śarīrasya bhasmībhāvaḥ bhavet idam uktam bhavati śarīra pāta uttara kālam ātmanaḥ svarga apavargau vaktavyau ātmā ca na śarīra atiriktaḥ asti śarīram ca pāta uttara kālam naśyati eva tatas kasya tau syātām iti iti prāhuḥ iti sambandhaḥ śaṅkā samāptau vā iti śabdaḥ tat etad pramāṇa abhāvena dūṣayan= tāvat pṛcchati tat iti 
NSu_3.3.116ab.1–3.3.116b.2	 tat kena mānena dṛṣṭam mokṣaḥ na eva asti iti vākya artham tat iti parāmṛśati kena mānena iti pratyakṣeṇa vā tad itareṇa vā iti arthaḥ dṛṣṭam avagatam dvitīyaḥ tāvat cārvākeṇa na aṅgīkartum śakyate iti āśayavān āha pratyakṣā iti  pratyakṣa vādinā pratyakṣam ekam eva pramāṇam na anyat iti abhyupagacchatā pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ ādyam nirākaroti na hi iti 
NSu_3.3.116cd.1–3.3.116cd.2	 na hi pratyakṣa mānena mokṣa abhāvaḥ avasīyate anumāna ādikam tāvat parasya mānam na bhavati yat ca māna tvena aṅgīkṛtam pratyakṣam tena iti yāvat mokṣaḥ hi nāma parama ānanda avāpti viśiṣya ātyantikī duḥkha nivṛttiḥ tad abhāvaḥ ca evam avagantavyaḥ na asti kaḥ api puruṣaḥ parama ānanda anubhavī sarvaḥ api duḥkhī ca iti na ca puruṣa antara vartinī sukha duḥkhe tad abhāvau vā puruṣa antara pratyakṣa viṣayau= iti katham mokṣa abhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa avasīyeta iti hi śabda arthaḥ 
NSu_3.3.116cd.3–3.3.116cd.4	 mā bhūt pramāṇa abhāvena mokṣa abhāva niścayaḥ tad sadbhāva niścayaḥ atrapa durghaṭaḥ eva pramāṇa abhāvāt tāvat tatra pratyakṣam pramāṇam para puruṣa vartinoḥ parama ānanda duḥkha abhāvayoḥ para pratyakṣasya sāmarthya abhāvāt sva niṣṭhaḥ tu tad abhāvaḥ eva pratyakṣeṇa ukṣyate na api pratyakṣāt anyat tad prāmāṇya siddheḥ tatas ca sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt apratipattiḥ nitya saṃśayaḥ vā mokṣe syāt iti na upāsana anuṣṭhānam sambhavati iti mā evam pratyakṣeṇa tāvat mokṣa niścaya upapatteḥ nanu uktam atra pratyakṣasya tatra sāmarthyam na asti iti tatra āha ghaṭataḥ iti 
NSu_3.3.117ab.1–3.3.117ab.3	 ghaṭate mukti dṛṣṭiḥ tu puruṣeṇa mahīyasā yadi api prākṛtānām pratyakṣam na mokṣam gocarayitum kṣamate tathā api mahattama puruṣa pratyakṣeṇa mokṣa niścayaḥ yujyate eva tadīya pratyakṣa avagamaḥ ca pareṣām tad vākyena bhaviṣyati iti bhāvaḥ nanu kartṛ karmaṇoḥ kṛtī iti atra ṣaṣṭhayā bhavitavyam katham tṛtīyā śeṣa vivakṣāyām ṣaṣṭhī vihitā na ca atra śeṣa vivakṣā iti ced na asmin yoge śeṣa grahaṇasya nivṛtta tvāt ucyate hetau= eṣā tṛtīyā na kartari karaṇe vā mahīyasā puruṣeṇa hetunā karaṇena vā tadīya pratyakṣeṇa iti yāvat itareṣām mukti dṛṣṭiḥ mukti sadbhāva niścayaḥ ghaṭataḥ iti yat vā mukti viṣayā pratyakṣa dṛṣṭiḥ ghaṭate katham yatas mahīyasā puruṣeṇa ṣakṣyate mokṣaḥ iti vadāmaḥ iti yojanā athavā kriyamāṇā iti pada adhyāhāre na doṣaḥ evam tarhi mayā api vaktum śakyataḥ eva yadi api para puruṣa vartī mokṣa abhāvaḥ asmad ādīnām na pratyakṣaḥ tathā api mahīyasaḥ puruṣasya lokāyata ācāryasya pratyakṣaḥ eva tad avagamaḥ ca asmākam tad vākyena bhaviṣyati iti tathā ca sat pratipakṣa tayā punar aniścayaḥ eva iti atas āha na iti iti 
NSu_3.3.117cd.1–3.3.117cd.3	 na iti vaktuḥ mahat tvam tu kathañcana na vidyate kasmin= api puruṣe vartamānaḥ anāgataḥ vā mokṣaḥ na asti eva iti aham pratyakṣeṇa īkṣaḥ iti vaktuḥ tu iti sambandhaḥ mahat tvam eva na vidyate kutas mahīyaḥ tvam iti eva śabda arthaḥ vā tuśabdaḥ mahat tvam iha bahu prakāram apekṣitam itara puruṣa apratyakṣa artha sākṣātkāri tvam tad upayukta asādhāraṇa dharmavat tvam yathārtha vādi tvam ca iti tatra eka prakāram api na lokāyata ācāryasya vidyate kutas tena sat pratipakṣatā āśaṅkā mokṣa vādinām mahāpuruṣāṇām kutas iti atas āha sādhayan= iti 
NSu_3.3.118ab.1–3.3.118ab.3^1	 sādhayan sarva sāmānyam katham eva viśeṣavān dharma ādi abhāva pratipādanena sarveṣām puṃsām samāna tvam sādhayan= lokāyata ācāryaḥ katham eva itarebhyaḥ atiśayavān bhavati na kathañcid etat uktam bhavati puruṣa antara apratyakṣasya para puruṣa gatasya mokṣa abhāvasya sākṣātkaraṇe lokāyata ācāryasya itarebhyaḥ viśeṣeṇa bhāvyam anyathā itareṣām api tad prasaṅgāt na ca asau= asti tapasā yogena vā janitaḥ dharma viśeṣaḥ tathā sa ca itareṣām iva sva ātmanaḥ api na asti iti tena eva sādhitam atas kāraṇa abhāvāt itaravat tasya api para puruṣa varti mokṣa abhāva sākṣāt karaṇam na asti eva iti niścīyate 
NSu_3.3.118ab.1–3.3.118ab.3^2–3.3.119.1	 tatas eva aham mokṣa abhāvam sākṣāt karomi iti tadīya vacanam ayathārtham eva bhūta pariṇāma viśeṣaḥ eva atiśayaḥ astu iti ced sa kim pratyakṣaḥ apratyakṣaḥ vā na ādyaḥ anupalambhāt yādṛśa tādṛśasya prakṛta phala hetu tve māna abhāvāt anyathā ati prasakteḥ na dvitīyaḥ atīndriya artham nirākurvatā tena eva itara vat ātmani api tad abhāvasya sādhita tvāt iti yathā yuṣmābhiḥ abhidhīyate na asti eva mokṣa abhāva sākṣāt kārī mahāpuruṣaḥ iti tathā aham api vadāmi na asti eva asau mahīyān puruṣaḥ yaḥ pratyakṣeṇa mokṣam īkṣeta pramāṇa abhāvāt iti tathā ca punar aniścayaḥ eva iti atas āha dṛśyante iti dṛśyante puruṣāḥ loke parāvara vidaḥ api ca aparokṣa dṛśaḥ yoga niṣṭhāḥ ca amala cakṣuṣaḥ pratyakṣam devatām dṛṣṭvā tad prasāda āpta bhūtayaḥ 
NSu_3.3.120a.1–3.3.120a.3	 jñāna vijñāna pārajñāḥ na kevalam ekaḥ iti bhāvaḥ loke asmin= eva bhū maṇḍale te ca vasiṣṭha ādayaḥ teṣām mahīyaḥ tvam āha jñāna vijñāna pāra jñāḥ iti atra viṣayibhyām viṣayau= upalakṣyete sāmānya viśeṣa ākāra pāra jñāḥ na kevalam vartamāna aśeṣa vidaḥ kinnāma parāvara vidaḥ api tat kim anumāna ādinā na iti āha aparokṣa dṛśaḥ ca iti asmad ādibhyaḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ teṣām iti atas uktam yoga niṣṭhāḥ ca amala cakṣuṣaḥ iti yoga niṣṭhā janita viśiṣya adṛṣṭena divya dṛṣṭayaḥ kintena eva na iti āha pratyakṣam iti yoga sāmarthyena para devatām sākṣāt upalabhya tat prasāda āsādita prakāśa ādi aiśvaryavantaḥ vasiṣṭha ādayaḥ yogardhi sampannayā divyayā dṛṣṭayā parama puruṣa vartinam mokṣam sākṣāt kurvāṇāḥ pratyakṣeṇa eva dṛśyante atas na mokṣā niścayaḥ iti asmad ādibhiḥ anupalabdha tvāt te na santi iti atas āha niṣiddhayantaḥ iti 
NSu_3.3.120b.1–3.3.120b.3	 niṣiddhayante katham nṛbhiḥ nṛbhiḥ iti anena mandabhāgyaiḥ parimitā vivikta deśa paricayavadbhiḥ iti sūcayati na hi te vaṇij vīthyām vartante yena yuṣmābhiḥ upalabhyeran atas viprakarṣāt anupalabhyamānāḥ na niṣeddhum śakyante iti bhāvaḥ nanu puruṣa svarūpa mātre na vipratipattiḥ teṣām mahīyaḥ tvam tu kutas iti atas āha dṛśyate ca iti 
NSu_3.3.120b.4–3.3.120b.5	 na kevalam puruṣāḥ kintu teṣām atimāhātmyam mahīyaḥ tvam ca dṛśyate katham ati mahā ojasām etat uktam bhavati dṛśyante tāvat vindhya sthagana samudra pāna ādīni teṣām ati mahāntyojāṃsi tāni ca mahā aiśvarya kāryāṇi na ca kāryāṇi vinā kāraṇaiḥ bhavitum arhanti mahā aiśvaryeṣu ca sārvajñāpara nāmakam prākāśyam iti teṣām mahīyaḥ tu asiddhiḥ iti nanu tadīyam mokṣa viṣayam pratyakṣam pareṣām kutas siddham tad vākyāt iti ced na teṣām vipralambhaka tva upapatteḥ iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.3.121ab.1–3.3.121ab.2	 yadi te api niṣiddhayante kim na uktiḥ te niṣiddhayate vipralambhaḥ hi prayojana mūlaḥ bhavati na ca teṣām prayojana anusandhānam sambhavati āpta samasta eśvaya ṛtvāt prayojana antarasya ca apramita tvāt evaṃbhūtāḥ api te yoginaḥ yadi vipralambhakāḥ iti niṣiddhayante tadīyam vākyam vipralambha mūla tvena nirākriyate iti yāvat tadā te tvad abhyupagatā lokāyata ācārya uktiḥ kim tathā eva na niṣidhyate sā api vipralambha mūlā iti kalpayitvā anādaraṇīyā syāt aviśeṣāt iti yāvat 
NSu_3.3.121ab.3–3.3.121ab.4	 etena etat api nirastam vipra kaṣarvaśāt asmābhiḥ anupalabhyamānāḥ api yoginaḥ tad māhātmyam tadīyam sva pratyakṣa viṣayam vākyam ca asmābhiḥ kutas avagantavyam itihāsa purāṇebhyaḥ iti ced na teṣām apramāṇa tvāt iti doṣa darśanena hi teṣām aprāmāṇyam kalpyam na ca tatra pramāṇam asti vākya tvena eva prāmāṇya pratiṣedhe lokāyata ācārya ukteḥ api tad pratiṣedha prasaṅgāt iti na lokāyata ācārya uktiḥ vipralambha śaṅkayā nirākriyate pratyakṣa saṃvādena prāmāṇya niścayāt iti ced samam prakṛte api iti āha yat uktā iti 
NSu_3.3.121cd.1–3.3.122ab.2	 yat ukta vākya prāmāṇyam pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyate yaiḥ yogibhiḥ uktānām vākyānām prāmāṇyam pratyakṣeṇa pratyakṣa saṃvādena upalabhyante te api iti pūrveṇa anvayaḥ katham iti atas āha vara ādayaḥ api iti vara ādayaḥ api tad dattāḥ sadā satyāḥ bhavanti hi taiḥ yogibhiḥ dattāḥ varāḥ śāpāḥ ca sadā avyabhicāreṇa satyāḥ bhavanti hi yasmāt tasmāt iti pūrveṇa eva sambandhaḥ te prasannāḥ santaḥ tava idam bhadram bhaviṣyati iti vā kupitāḥ santaḥ tava idam abhadram bhaviṣyati iti vā yat āhuḥ tat tathā eva bhavat pratyakṣeṇa upalabhyate iti 
NSu_3.3.122ab.3–3.3.122ab.5	 syāt etat pratyakṣa yogya arthe bhavatu tad saṃvādena tadīyam vākyam pramāṇam atīndriye tu mokṣa ādau katham iti evam tarhi lokāyata ācārya vacanam api pratyakṣa yogya arthe tad saṃvādena pramāṇam astu atīndriye tu mokṣa abhāva ādau katham iti samānam atha manyase pratyakṣa yogya arthe tāvat tadīyam vacanam pratyakṣa saṃvādya iva upalabdham tena atīndriya artha viṣaye api tatra viśvasimaḥ loke tathā upalambhāt iti tat idam prakṛte api samānam tat idam uktam anukta samuccaya arthena apipadena evam sat pratipakṣatā nirāsāya yoginām mokṣa pratyakṣa vādasya prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam ca lokāyata ācāryasya mokṣa abhāva pratyakṣa ukteḥ upapāditam hetu antareṇa api tat aprāmāṇyam upapādayati aprāmāṇyam iti 
NSu_3.3.122cd.1–3.3.123ab.2	 aprāmāṇyam tat ukteḥ ca vṛthā vācā vasīyate hetu samuccaye caśabdaḥ vṛthā āvācā iti bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ vṛthātvāt iti eva ukte tṛṇa ādi darśane vyabhicāraḥ syāt tad artham vāc grahaṇam katham lokāyata ācārya ukteḥ vṛthātvam iti atas āha na hi iti na hi prayojanam kiñcid para loka nivāraṇāt para lokasya mokṣa ādeḥ nivāraṇāt nāstitva pratipādanāt labhyam kiñcid prayojanam na asti iti etat prasiddham eva tathā hi tad ukteḥ adṛṣṭam vā prayojanam syāt dṛṣṭam vā na tāvat adṛṣṭam para loka nivāraṇāt adṛṣṭam hi svarga ādau= upabhogyam vā syāt deha antareṇa iha eva vā na ādyaḥ svarga ādeḥ para lokasya pareṇa pratiṣiddha tvāt na dvitīyaḥ deha ātma vādinā asya ātmanaḥ para lokasya deha antarasya nivāraṇāt na api dṛṣṭam pratipādaka pratipādyayoḥ artha kāma lābha anupalambhāt iti 
NSu_3.3.123ab.3–3.3.123ab.4	 vaidikānām dharma adharma vyavasthāpakaiḥ vavacanaiḥ uparuddha kāma bhogānām prāṇinām dharma ādi abhāva apratipādanena kāma upabhoga uparodha nivṛtti rūpa para upakāraḥ tāvat ācāryasya prāṇinām dharma ādi abhāva pratipādanena kāma upabhoga uparodha nivṛtti rūpa para upakāraḥ tāvat ācāryasya prayojanam asti yadi api upakāraḥ na sva rūpeṇa prayojanam na api adṛṣṭa hetu tvena tathā api upakartāram pratyupakurvanti eva vineyānām ca kāma upabhoga uparodha nivṛttiḥ eva asti prayojanam tat katham vṛthātvam iti atas āha vṛthā vācam iti 
NSu_3.3.123cd.1–3.3.123cd.4	 vṛthā vācam vṛthā hanyāt yadi tasya kim uttaram atra vṛthā avācam iti sādhya nirdeśaḥ evam api vṛthā vāc tvam na parihāryam iti adṛṣṭa prayojana rahita vācam iti vā yadi kaścid tam ācāryam vineyam vā vṛthā eva hanyāt tadā tam prati tasya kim uttaram na kiñcid etat uktam bhavati na staḥ eva dharma adharmau atas tvayā niraṅkuśena kāma upabhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ iti ācāryeṇa bodhitaḥ antevāsī tadīya kamanīya kānta ādi apahāra artham tam hanyāt eva tadā asya kā pratikriyā upakartuḥ apakāraḥ mahā pratyavāya hetuḥ iti chāndasa ukteḥ tena eva tyājita tvāt upakartāram pratyupakurvanti iti etat api dharma ādi va āsanāyām satyām eva sā tu tena eva niśśeṣitā atas na asti eva ācāryasya prayojanam pratyuta sva jīvana hāni lakṣaṇaḥ anarthaḥ eva evam vineyānām api anyonya dhana vanitā ādi apahārāya paraspara vadha ādau= eva pravṛttiḥ na tu kāma upabhoga avasaraḥ mahatā anarthena ākrāntaḥ alpīyān kāma upabhogaḥ anarthaḥ eva iti astu evam lokāyata ācārya ukteḥ vṛthātvam anartha hetu tvam ca tathā api aprāmāṇyam kutas iti atas āha sva iti 
NSu_3.3.123ef.1–3.3.124.1	 sva jīvana virodhāya vadan kim nāma buddhimān sva śabdaḥ pareṣām api upalakṣakaḥ vyartham ca iti śeṣaḥ vyartha anartha hetu vāc tvena lokāyata ācāryasya aprekṣāvat tvam anumīyate tatas tad vacanasya aprāmāṇyam iti śeṣaḥ uktaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ prayojana adhikaraṇe uktam artham buddhayā ārohāya saṅkṣipya āha prāmāṇyam iti prāmāṇye saṃśayaḥ kim syāt tayoḥ puruṣayoḥ api sva jīvana viruddha ukti rajñaḥ dṛṣṭasya ca api saḥ 
NSu_3.3.125a–3.3.125c.3	 yaḥ ca atīndriya deva ukti śrotāḥ dṛṣṭa parāvaraḥ atīta anāgatam sarvam lokānubhavam āpayan prāmāṇya śabdena āpta tvam ucyate kim iti ākṣepe api śabdaḥ garhāyām sva iti upalakṣaṇam dṛṣṭasya darśana yogyasya api bahoḥ arthasya caśabdaḥ viśeṣaṇa samuccaye deva ukti iti atīndriya antarasya api upalakṣaṇam sva uktam sarvam pratyakṣa saṃvādena loka anubhavam loka āśvāsam prāpayan yaḥ sva jīvana viruddha ukti tva ādi viśeṣaṇaḥ lokāyata ācāryaḥ yaḥ ca atīndriya deva ukti śrotṛ tva ādi viśeṣaṇaḥ yogī tayoḥ api puruṣayoḥ prāmāṇye saṃśayaḥ syāt kim na syāt eva kintvāt yasya aprāmāṇyam eva dvitīyasya prāmāṇyam eva niścīyate iti yojanā 
NSu_3.3.125a–3.3.125c.4	 evam nimitta abhāvena asambhāvita atīndriya jñānasya kāmuka tva ādinā sambhāvita vipralambhasya lokāyata ācāryasya yogardhi sampadā sambhāvita sārvajña avāpta samasta aiśvarya vat tva ādinā atyanta asambhāvita vañcaka tvāt pratyakṣa saṃvādi vacasaḥ yoginaḥ prati pratipakṣatvā sambhave tad vacana avagatena tad pratyakṣeṇa mokṣaḥ siddhayati iti uktam idānīm vedena api tam siṣādhayiṣuḥ tad prāmāṇye vipratipannam prati kim saṃvāda rahita tvāt vedasya aprāmāṇyam ucyate uta vākya tvāt unmatta vākya vat athavā unmatta vākyāt aniścita viśeṣa tvāt atha bādhita tvad iti vikalpya ādye a pi kim sarvasya saṃvādaḥ na asti uta eka deśasya iti vikalpya ādyam nirācaṣṭe atas iti 
NSu_3.3.125ef.1–3.3.125ef.3	 atas pratyakṣa gamya tvāt vedamātvasya ca sphuṭam vaidika anuṣṭhānavatām tad phala siddheḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt iti arthaḥ pratyakṣa gamya tvāt pratyakṣa saṃvādena siddha tvāt pramāṇa samuccaye caśabdaḥ vedena ca mokṣa siddhiḥ iti anena sarvasya api vedasya pramāṇa antara saṃvādaḥ na asti iti etat asiddham aiśvarya ādi sādhana tayā yoga ādikam upadiśataḥ veda bhāgasya saṃvāda darśanāt iti uktam bhavati mokṣa pratipādakāni ca veda vākyāni tatra tatra udāhṛtāni eva draṣṭavyāni phala visaṃvādaḥ api vedasya dṛśyate iti ced na tasya kartṛ karma ādi vaiguṇya hetutāyāḥ prāk ukta tvāt tat idam uktam sphuṭam iti ādye dvitīyam dūṣayati yadi iti 
NSu_3.3.126ab.1–3.3.126ab.2	 yadi āgamasya naḥ mātvam akṣajasya tathā bhavet yadi bhāga viśeṣasya saṃvāda abhāvena kṛtsnasya api āgamasya naḥ māna tvam apramāṇa tvam iti ucyate tarhi akṣajasya pratyakṣa mātrasya tathā apramāṇa tvam bhavet asthāt sukha ādi viṣayasya pratyakṣasya saṃvāda abhāvāt yadi ca saṃvāda rahitasya eva veda bhāgasya naḥ māna tvam iti ucyate tadā asmad sukha ādi viṣayasya pratyakṣasya aprāmāṇyam bhavet eva iti yadi api yogi pratyakṣa saṃvādaḥ prāguktaḥ tathā api tad itara pramāṇa apekṣayā it am uditam veditavyam syāt etat pratyakṣam svatas eva pramāṇam tatra kim saṃvādena iti atas āha yadi akṣa jasya iti 
NSu_3.3.126cd.1–3.3.126cd.4	 yadi akṣa jasya mātvam syāt āgamasya katham na tat yadi saṃvādena vinākṣajasya svatas eva pramāṇa tvam syāt tarhi āgamasya tat svatas eva prāmāṇyam katham na bhavet aviśeṣāt bhavet eva dvitīyam nirākaroti yadi āgamasya iti yadi vākya tva mātreṇa unmatta vākya vat āgamasya na māna tvam iti ucyate tarhi akṣa ja tvena śukti rajata ādi viṣaya akṣa ja vatḥ tad stambhāt yakṣa jasya api aprāmāṇyam syāt aviśeṣāt nirdeṣa tvāt stambha ādi viṣayam akṣa jam pramāṇam iti atas āha yadi akṣa jasya iti yadi nirdeṣa tvāt stambha ādi viṣayasya akṣajasya pramāṇa tvam syāt tarhi āgamasya api tatas eva katham na bhavet na hi apauruṣeyasya sa doṣa tā sambhavati vedaḥ iti upakramāt tathā eva vaktavye yat āgamasya iti vadati tat anena eva nyāyena pauruṣeya āgamasya api prāmāṇyam sādhanīyam iti sūcayitum tṛtīyam nirākaroti loka iti 
NSu_3.3.126ef.1–3.3.126ef.4	 loka vākyāt viśeṣaḥ ca avyabhicāreṇa siddhayati unmatta ādi vākyāt viśeṣaḥ vedasya avyabhicāreṇa bādhara ahityena na hi vaidikaḥ arthaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ yena tat tatra bādhaka tayā avakāśam labheta etena caturthaḥ api nirastaḥ tat evam pratyakṣa āgamābhyām mokṣam sādhayata iha amutra phala bhoga vairāgyavatām yoginām pravṛttiḥ saphalā prekṣā vat pravṛtti tvāt sammata vat iti anumānam api sūcitam anumāna prāmāṇyam ca prāk eva samarthitam 
NSu_3.3.126ef.5–3.3.126ef.6	 apare purananumimate duḥkha santatiḥ atyantam ucchidyate santati tvāt dīpa jvālā santati vat iti tat asat sakala jīva gata duḥkha santati pakṣīkāreṃ aśe bādhita tvāt nitya saṃsāriṇām keṣāñcid sattvasya taiḥ api aṅgīkṛta tvāt samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt ca tadvayati rikta jīva gata duḥkha santati pakṣīkāre tu tatra eva vyabhicārāt pārthiva paramāṇu rūpa ādi santāne vyabhicārāt ca sarva mukti pakṣe phala mūlayoḥ abhāvena saḥ api atyantam ucchid yate eva iti ced na sarva mukti pakṣasya eva nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt kālakṣaṇa santāne vyabhicārāt ca 
NSu_3.3.126ef.7	 kiñca duḥkha santati śabdena duḥkhāni eva ucyante uta tad dharmaḥ kaścid ādye siddha sādhana tā mokṣam anaṅgīkurvatā api duḥkhānām vināśita abhyupagamāt atas eva atyantam iti uktam iti ced kaḥ asya arthaḥ kim sarvāṇi api duḥkhāni ucchidyante iti uta niḥśeṣa tayā ucchidyante iti athavā tatra duḥkha antara anutpādena iti na prathamaḥ siddha sādhana tā nistārāt sarveṣām api duḥkhānām pareṇa anitya tāyāḥ svīkṛta tvāt atas eva na dvitīyaḥ na hi duḥkham sa avayava dravyam yena sa śeṣam ucchidyate iti śaṅkayeta na tṛtīyaḥ dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvāt na hi dīpa jvālā santatiḥ evam ucchidyate tatra eva punar jvālā antara udaya sambhavāt na dvitīyaḥ duḥkha dharmaḥ hi jātiḥ vā tad anyaḥ vā ādye apasiddhāntaḥ jāteḥ nitya tva aṅgīkārāt na dvitīyaḥ āśraya asiddheḥ guṇeṣu jāti vyatirikta dharma anaṅgīkārāt aṅgīkāre api artha antara tā syāt na hi duḥkha dharmasya kasyacid vināśa siddhau mokṣa siddhiḥ iti 
NSu_3.3.126ef.8	 ātmā kadācid dhvasta aśeṣa viśeṣa guṇaḥ vibhu tve sati kārya viśeṣa guṇavat tvāt mahāpralaya avasthāyām ākāśa vat iti ca asat sarva ātma pakṣīkāre parameśvara ātmani bādhāt asiddheḥ ca jīvātma pakṣīkāre api saṃsāri eka svabhāvānām jīvānām svayam eva urarīkṛta tvena tatra bādhāt tad atirikta jīva pakṣīkāre tatra eva anaikāntyāt jīva ātmanām vibhu tva abhāvena asiddheḥ ca 
NSu_3.3.126ef.9–3.3.126ef.12	 ātma tvam kadācid dhvasta aśeṣa viśeṣa guṇa dravya niṣṭham iti pratijñā arthaḥ iti ced na tathā sati hetoḥ asiddhi prasaṅgāt jāti tvam hetuḥ iti ced na pūrva anumāna doṣa aparihārāt ghaṭa tva ādau= anaikāntika tvāt ca aśeṣa viśeṣa guṇa śūnya dravya niṣṭham iti pratijñā arthaḥ iti ced na sa guṇānām eva dravyāṇām utpādasya samarthita tvāt vibhu kārya viśeṣa guṇavat vṛtti jāti tvasya hetu tvāt na kaḥ api doṣaḥ iti ced na kārya viśeṣa guṇavat padasya vaiyarthyāt tad tyāge api artha antara tvāt aśeṣa viśeṣa guṇa dhvaṃsaḥ na mokṣaḥ iti vakṣyamāṇa tvāt etena devadattaḥ devadatta adharma samāna kālīna devadatta gata tvān adhikaraṇa duḥkha dhvaṃsā adhikaraṇam duḥkhi tvāt yajña datta vat iti viśiṣya vyatireki anumānam api nirastam artha antara tā parihārāt iti āḥ tām prapañcaḥ idānīm jaina ukta mokṣa sādhanam dūṣayitum anuvadati asti iti 
NSu_3.3.127ab.1–3.3.127ab.3	 asti mokṣaḥ api dharmeṇa yathā artha jñānataḥ api ca yat idam mokṣa astitvam samarthitam tat sādhu iti jā enāḥ prāhuḥ iti sambandhaḥ aṅgīkṛtaḥ ced mokṣa sadbhāvaḥ tadā tad sādhanam api kiñci d aṅgī kāyarmā iva tathā ca kā vipratipattiḥ iti āśayavān pṛcchati api iti kim tarhi iti arthaḥ uttaram āha dharmeṇa iti labhyate iti āhuḥ apicau= ita reta rasam uccaye yadi api mokṣam tat sādhanam ca abhyupayanti jaināḥ tathā api tad viśeṣe vipratipadyante yatas samyak jñāna samyak cāritrya samuccaya sādhyam mokṣam āhuḥ iti āśayaḥ samyak darśanam yadi aparokṣa jñānam tadā yathārtha grahaṇena eva gṛhītam yadi ca sva samaya paripālanam tadā dharma grahaṇena iti pṛthak grahaṇam vyartham iti sūcayitum dvayoḥ eva grahaṇam dharma jñāna samuccaya sādhya tvam mokṣasya kathañcid asmābhiḥ api aṅgīkriyate atas vipratipatti anantaram darśayati prāmāṇyam iti 
NSu_3.3.127cd.1–3.3.128ab.3	 prāmāṇyam anumāyāḥ ca jinasya āptatva sādhane tad vākyāt dharma sat jñāna vijñaptiḥ bhavati iti ca jinaḥ āptaḥ assu alita vākya tvāt ityādi anumāyāḥ caśabdāt jina darśinām vākyasya ca tad vākyāt jina vākyāt iti ca jaināḥ prāhuḥ anumādyavagata āpta bhāva jina vākyāt mokṣa sādhana siddhim āhuḥ na tu svatas pramāṇāt vedāt iti āśayaḥ mokṣa sādhana viṣayām vipratipattim darśayitum upakramya pramāṇa vipratipatti pradarśanam asaṅgatam iti ced na sādhana jñāpakasya api sādhana tvāt dharma jñāna svarūpe api vipratipattim darśayati dharmaḥ iti 
NSu_3.3.128cd.1–3.3.129a.3	 dharmaḥ ahiṃsā paraḥ na anyaḥ jñānam pudgala darśanam iti jaināḥ ahiṃsā parā pradhāna bhūtāḥ yasmin sa tathā uktaḥ etat asmākam api sammatam iti atas uktam anyaḥ hiṃsā sahitaḥ yajña ādiḥ na dharmaḥ iti ātma vivikta tva ādi rūpeṇa pudgalasya dehasya darśanam yat vā pudgalasya ātmanaḥ deha ādi vivikta tayā darśanam atra api na anyat yat siddhāntinā vivakṣitam iti anuvartate dūṣayati katham iti 
NSu_3.3.129ab.1–3.3.129f.1	 katham tat syāt pramāṇam anumānataḥ tad jina vākyam anumānena pramāṇam iti pratipattavyam katham syāt anumānena vākyena ca jinasya āptatvam avadhāri a āpta vākya tva anumānena mokṣa sādhanam dharmam jñānam ca pratipādayataḥ jina vākyasya prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam yat uktam tat na upapadyate iti arthaḥ kutas na upapadyate iti atas hetum vaktum upodghāta tvena pratyakṣa anumāna āgama svarūpam krameṇa tāvat āha viṣayān iti viṣayān prati sthitam hi akṣam pratyakṣam iti gīyate pratyakṣa śabda anusārāt anumā iti prakītiḥ tāḥ 
NSu_3.3.130.1–3.3.130.2	 ā samantāt gamayati dharma adharmau param padam yat ca api atīndriyam tu anyat tena asau= āgamaḥ smṛtaḥ viṣayān nirdeṣān prati sthitam taiḥ sannikṛṣṭam akṣa maduṣyam indriyam jātau= eka vacanam yasya indriyasya yaḥ viṣayaḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagataḥ tena adoṣeṇa sannikṛṣṭa maduṣyam tat pratyakṣam iti arthaḥ anena prādi samāsaḥ ayam na avyayībhāvaḥ iti sūcitam tathā sati pratyakṣasya iti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeta yadi api pratisthitam akṣam pratyakṣam tathā api yogya tayā viṣayāṇām sambandhaḥ iti hi śabdena ācaṣṭe 
NSu_3.3.130.3	 pratyakṣa śabda anusārāt pratyakṣa āgama anusāreṇa eva māna tvam anusaraṇam ca tad gṛhīta dharmyādimat tvam tad abādhita apratibaddha viṣaya tvam ca prakīrtitānumā iti śeṣaḥ yā an umā prasiddhā sā asmāt nimittāt anumā iti prakītiḥ tāḥ yadi api anusṛtā mā anumā tathā api sāmarthyāt pratyakṣa ādi sambandhaḥ anumāna mūla anumā api antataḥ pratyakṣa ādi mūlā eva iti uktam prāk 
NSu_3.3.130.4–3.3.130.5	 ā iti anuvādena samantāt iti vyākhyānam samyak ca iti api grāhyam gamayati jñāpayati karaṇe kartṛ tva upacāraḥ graha vṛdṛniścigamaḥ ca iti akartari kārake bhāve vai apaḥ vidhānāt anupramāṇa viṣayam ca idam vyākhyānam jñātavyam yat ca dharma ādibhyaḥ anyat ati indriyam api śabdāt ananumitam ca tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe tena eva iti sambaddhayate yadi apyā samyak samantāt sarvam gamyate anena iti āgamaḥ tathā api pratyakṣa anumāna āgate arthe tasya vaiyarthyāt atīndriyam api iti uktam tasya vivaraṇam dharma ityādi yaḥ āgamaḥ prasiddhaḥ asau nirvacana mātram eva etat pratyakṣa ādi śabdānām na ca nirvacana labhyaḥ arthaḥ ati vyāpti parihāreṇa avaśyambhāvī iti asti niyamaḥ vyāghraparṇī ādiṣu abhāvāt iti na mantavyam iti āśa yavān āha etena iti 
NSu_3.3.131ab.1–3.3.131d.3	 etena kāreṇena eva tat tad māna tvam iṣyate tat tad māna tvam pratyakṣa ādīnām pratyakṣa ādi tvam pratyakṣa ādi śabda vācya tvam iṣyate prāmāṇikaiḥ pratyakṣa ādiṣu pratyakṣa ādi śabda pravṛttau nimittam eva etat na tu nirvacana mātra labhyaḥ arthaḥ iti arthaḥ kutas iti atas āha svarūpam hi iti svarūpam hi tat eteṣām tat nirdeṣa viṣaya sannikṛṣṭa nirdeṣa indriya tva ādikam eteṣām pratyakṣa ādīnām svarūpam lakṣaṇam hi iti arthaḥ lakṣaṇam hi śabda pravṛtti nimittam bhavati etat api kutas iti atas āha anyathā iti  anyathā siddhi mānataḥ anyathā siddhiḥ ca tad mānam ca prakāra antareṇa pratyakṣa ādi lakṣaṇānām nirūpayitum aśakyatvāt iti arthaḥ tathā ca uktam tatas kim yadi evam pratyakṣa ādi svarūpam iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_3.3.132ab.1–3.3.132ab.2	 atas anumā katham dharmam pudgalam ca api darśayet anumā iti anumāna avagata prāmāṇyam jina vākyam ucyate ca api śabdau= itaretara samuccaye darśayet pratipādayet idam uktam bhavati jina vākyāt dharma ādi siddhiḥ iti vadatā kim pramāṇam uktam bhavati āgamaḥ iti ced na samyak pratyakṣa ādi anadhigata artha pratipādakasya eva āgama tvāt jina vākyasya ca tad asiddheḥ jinaḥ hi pramāṇena artham upalabhya vākyam praṇītavān anyathā vā dvitīye pauruṣeyasya nirmūlasya unmatta vākya vat samyak tvam durlabham ādye pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vā avagatau tad anadhigata arthār asambhavaḥ vākya antareṇa ced andha paramparā āpattyā punar asamyak tvam eva 
NSu_3.3.132ab.3–3.3.132ab.4	 etena vimatam pramāṇam āpta vākya tvāt jinaḥ āptaḥ asskhalita vākya tvāt iti anumānam jina darśinām vākyam ca pratyuktam tathā hi āpta tva viṣayam vākyam tāvat nirmūlam ced asamyak eva vākya antara mūla tve api tathā na ca pratyakṣam mūlam viṣayān prati sthitasya akṣasya pratyakṣa tvāt na ca āpta tva rūpa apara citta vṛttiḥ aparokṣa viṣaya tām aśnute atas asskhalita vāc tvā ādi anumāna mūlam iti eva vaktavyam naca etat anumānam pratyakṣa ādi anusaraṇena artha gamakasya anumāna tvāt naca etat prakṛte asti āpta vākya tva āditi asya hi yathāśruta artha tve kvacid āptasya vipralambhakasya ājñasya vākye vyabhicāraḥ āpti mūla vākya tvāt iti abhiprāye viśeṣaṇā siddhiḥ tattva jñāna ādi lakṣaṇā khalu āptiḥ tatra dharma ādi viṣayam tattva jñānam tāvat na jinasya pratyakṣa janyam viṣayān prati sthitasya akṣasya pratyakṣa tvāt 
NSu_3.3.132ab.5–3.3.132ab.7	 dharma ādeḥ ca akṣā viṣaya tvāt tathā tve vā anyeṣām api tad adhigati prāpteḥ atas eva na anumāna janyam vākya antara abhyupagame tu andha paramparā eva evam avipralipsā api duradhigamāḥ atas eva āpta tva sādhakam anumānam kāla atyaya apadiṣyam āpteḥ ukta vidhayā bādhita tvāt anyeṣām apratyakṣe arthe asya pratyakṣam pravartate iti atas na virodhaḥ iti ced na puruṣa tva ādinā sat pratipakṣa tvāt asskhalita vākyam ca kvacid vā prakṛte vā sarvatra vā na ādyaḥ yaḥ kvacid asskhalita vāc asau viṣaya viśeṣaḥ āptaḥ iti vyāpti abhāvāt na dvitīyaḥ nirdhāraṇa upāya abhāvāt phala prāpti anumeyam khalu etat atas eva na tṛtīyaḥ api 
NSu_3.3.132ab.8–3.3.132ab.9	 yat tu niḥsveda tva ādikam liṅgam ucyate tad tāvat sandigdha asiddham auṣadha ādinā sambhavat anyathā siddham ca naca ayam manu ādi vākyeṣu api prasaṅgaḥ apauruṣeya tayā mūla anapekṣa veda mūla tvāt yat vai kiñcana manuḥ avadat tat bheṣajam a iti ādi vedena eva āpta tva ādi niścayāt ca atas pratyakṣa ādīnām ukta lakṣaṇa tvāt jina tad darśita pratyakṣe para upanyasta anumāne jina ādi vākye ca tad abhāvāt anumāna ādi siddha āpta bhāva jina vākyāt dharma ādi siddhiḥ iti asat iti na kevalam jinasya asskhalita vāc tvam niścāyaka abhāva ādi siddham kintu sskhala nada śarnāt api iti āśayena āha svarūpaḥ iti 
NSu_3.3.132cd.1–3.3.132cd.3	 svarūpam pudgalasya uktā doṣāḥ viṣaya saptamīyam apudgala śabdena tañiva yukta nyāyena pudgalāt dehāt anyaḥ tad sadṛśaḥ ca ātmā ucyate pudgala śabdena eva vā uktāḥ evam ca ātmā kātsnaryam a ityādinā ayam arthaḥ jinena ātma svarūpam śarīra parimāṇam rūpavat ca uktam tad prāc dūṣitam iti skhalita vāc asau= iti yadi api sapta bhaṅgi nayaḥ api tad uktaḥ dūṣitaḥ tathā api mokṣa sādhanam yat pudgala daśarnam uktam tatra eva skhalana pradarśanāyeya muktiḥ nanu etat api pūrva vākyena siddham satyam prapañca arthaḥ uttarabandhaḥ iti adoṣaḥ prakāra antareṇa ātma svarūpe jina vacana skhalanam darśayati ānandam eva iti 
NSu_3.3.132de.1–3.3.132de.3	 ānandam eva ca na manyate pudgalam sa atra api apudgala pudgala śabdābhyām ātmā ucyate tattva vidaḥ ātmāna mānān dam eva ānandena atyanta abhinnam manyante sa jinaḥ tam ānandam eva na manyante bhinna tva ādinā sapta prakāram bravīti tad sapta bhaṅgī naya nirāsena puṃstva ādi vat iti ātmanaḥ sukha ādi atyanta abheda sādhanena ca nirastam atas ca skhalita vāc asau= iti bhāvaḥ itas ca tathā iti āha duḥkha iti 
NSu_3.3.132f.1–3.3.132f.2	 duḥkha abhāvaḥ sukham tu iti tuśabdaḥ ātma vyāvṛtti arthaḥ iti śabdaḥ hetau pūrveṇa eva sambandhaḥ yasmāt ātmā bhāvaḥ sukham tu duḥkha abhāvaḥ na ca viruddha svabhāvayoḥ atyanta abhedaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt ātmā na sukha atyanta abhinnaḥ iti jinaḥ brūte tat ca ayuktam iti atas skhalita vāc asau kutas tat ayuktam iti atas āha mātrā iti 
NSu_3.3.133ab.1–3.3.133ab.2	 mātrā bhoga atirekeṇa sukha ādhikyasya darśanāt mīyante iti mātrāḥ śabda ādyāḥ viṣayāḥ bhogaḥ anubhavaḥ upalakṣaṇam ca etat viṣaya bhoga alpa tvena sukha alpa tva darśana tvāt iti api grāhyam sukham bhāvaḥ tāratamya upeta tvāt duḥkha ādi vat iti pramāṇa viruddha tvāt sukhasya duḥkha abhāva tva vacanam ayuktam iti arthaḥ sukhasya tāratamya upeta tva samarthanāya darśanāt iti sākṣī tatra pramāṇa tvena darśitaḥ yaḥ tu tatra api vipratipannaḥ tam pratyaniṣya prasaṅgam sūcayitum mātrābhoga atirekeṇa iti uktam yadi sukham niratiśayam syāt tadā prekṣāvatām viṣaya bhoga atireka upādanam vyartham syāt dṛśyate ca tat iti 
NSu_3.3.133ab.3–3.3.133c.2	 nanu na sukham tāratamya upetam kintu duḥkham bhāva bhūtam tāratamya upetam tad abhāvaḥ ca sukham tat yāvat yāvat nivartate tāvat tāvat sukham iti pratīyate na ca pratiyoga rūpa upādhi nimittā tāratamya upalabdhiḥ tāttvikam tad upapādayitum īṣye viṣaya bhoga atireka upādānam ca duḥkha atireka vyāvṛtti artham viṣaya bhoga sādhya tvāt duḥkha abhāvasya iti atas āha sukhasya iti sukhasya abhāva tā kena bhavet etat pratīti ādeḥ aupādhika tva varṇanam yadi sukhasya abhāva tā pramāṇena siddhā syāt sukhasya abhāva tā kena na kena api pramāṇena siddhā iti arthaḥ evam eva pratīti ādeḥ aupādhika tva varṇane bādhakam āha na ca iti 
NSu_3.3.133d.1–3.3.133d.3	 na ca syāt kim viparyayaḥ yadi nirnibandhanam eva sukha tāratamyat aśarnādeḥ aupādhika tvam kalpyate tadā sukham bhāva rūpam duḥkham tad abhāvaḥ tatra tāratamya darśanam pratiyogi sukha upādhi nimittam sukha nivṛtti arthāni ca ahikaṇṭaka ādīni iti parokta vipayaryaḥ ca kinna syāt syāt eva atas dvayoḥ api anupalabhyamāna viśeṣa tvāt svābhāvika tāratamyoḥ bhāva tvam aṅgīkartavyam iti sukham abhāvaḥ vastu tvāt sammata abhāva vat iti pramāṇa sadbhāvāt katham sukhasya abhāva tā kena iti uktam iti ced kim evaṃvādinaḥ mate kaścid bhāvaḥ vidyate uta sarve api abhāvāḥ ādye doṣam āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.3.134ab.1–3.3.134d.1	 yadi bhāvaḥ api kaścid syāt tasya eva abhāva tā kutas vastu tvena sukhasya abhāvatām anumimānasya mate yadi kaścid padārthaḥ bhāvaḥ api syāt tarhi tasya sukhasya eva abhāva tā kutas api tu bhāva tvena aṅgīkṛtasya api padārthasya abhāvatā syāt anyathā vastu tvasya tatra vyabhicāra āpatteḥ nanu sarve api padārthāḥ abhāvāḥ bhavanti evati na uktaḥ doṣaḥ yadi api ghaṭa ādīnām anādi tva ādi āpattyā prāk pradhvaṃsa atyanta abhāva tvam anupapannam tathā api anyonya abhāva tvam yujyate eva ghaṭe hi paṭa ādi anyonya abhāvaḥ pramāṇa siddhaḥ naca anyonya abhāvaḥ dharmiṇaḥ anyaḥ asti atas ghaṭaḥ eva paṭa ādi anyonya abhāvaḥ evam paṭa ādayaḥ api iti dvitīyam śaṅkate yadi sarve api iti yadi sarve api abhāvāḥ syuḥ anyonyam iti sarve api padārthāḥ anyonya abhāvāḥ syuḥ iti yadi manyasaḥ iti arthaḥ uttaram āha bhāvatā iti  bhāvatā 
NSu_3.3.135ab.1–3.3.135ab.3	 abhāva abhāva tā yat syāt kim naḥ chinnam tadā bhavet tadā evam sarva padārthānām anyonya abhāva tva vyutpādanena naḥ asmākam kim chinnam bhavet na kim api katham yatas abhāva abhāva tā bhāva tā eva syāt idam uktam bhavati sukhasya vastu tvena sādhyamānam abhāva tvam kim prāc abhāva ādi traya anyatama tvam athavā anyonya abhāva tvam uta sāmānyam ādye prāc ukta doṣa parihāraḥ dvitīya tṛtīyayoḥ siddha sādhanam asmābhiḥ api sukha ādīnām sarva padārthānām anyonya abhāvatā su īkārāt na ca bhāva tva aṅgīkāra virodhaḥ sukham hi sva anyonya abhāva duḥkha anyonya abhāvaḥ abhāva abhāvaḥ ca bhāvaḥ eva evambhūtam ca abhāva tvam sukhasya na ātma svarūpa tām viruṇaddhi ātmanaḥ api tathā tvāt iti abhāva abhāva tā bhāva tā eva syāt iti uktam tad upapādayitum bhāva abhāva svarūpam tāvat āha bhāva tvam iti 
NSu_3.3.135cd.1–3.3.136ab.3	 bhāva tvam vidhi rūpa tvam niṣedha tvam abhāvatā bhāva tvam nāma vidhi rūpa tvam abhāva tvam nāma niṣedha tvam iti yojanā śabda pravṛtti nimitta niṣkarṣa artham bhāva pratyayaḥ anyathā indraḥ purandaraḥ itivat syāt tatas kim iti atas āha niṣedhasya iti niṣedhasya niṣedhaḥ api bhāvaḥ eva balāt bhavet yasmāt abhāvaḥ nāma niṣedhaḥ tasmāt abhāvasya abhāvaḥ iti niṣedhasya api niṣedhaḥ iti uktam syāt sa ca vidhiḥ eva syāt darśana balāt dṛṣṭaḥ hineyaṅuvaṅsthānau a iti niṣedhasya astrī iti niṣedhaḥ vidhiḥ vakṣyate ca etat vidhiḥ ca bhāvaḥ eva iti uktam tasmāt abhāva abhāva tā bhāvatā eva iti yuktam evam tarhi dravya ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ prāc abhāva ādayaḥ abhāvāḥ iti anyatra ukta niyamaḥ na syāt ghaṭasya api na paṭaḥ iti niṣedha rūpa tāyāḥ prāgabhāvasya api prameyaḥ iti vidhi rūpa tāyāḥ darśanāt iti ataḥ prāk uktam smārayati prathamā iti 
NSu_3.3.136cd.1–3.3.137ab.3	 prathama pratipattiḥ tu bhāva bhāva niyāmikā kṛta vyākhyānam etat evam jinasya skhalita vāc tva pradarśanena tat uktasya mokṣa sādhanasya aprāmāṇika tvam uktam yukti viruddha tvam ca darśayan= ātma jñānasya yat mokṣa sādhana tvam uktam tat kim sākṣāt uta ātma prasāda dvāra iti vikalpya ādyam tāvat nirākaroti na ca iti na ca pudgala vijñānam mokṣa dam bhavati kvacid ātma vijñānam mokṣa dam na bhavati acetana tvāt paṭa vat iti śeṣaḥ asya vyāptimucapa pādayati kvacid iti na iti vartate mokṣa dam iti ca tat ca bhāva pradhānam na hi kvacid api acetane mokṣa da tvam dṛṣṭam yena vyāptiḥ na syāt karmaṇaḥ tathā tvam nirākariṣyate jñānam tu caitanyam eva na cetanam iti prasiddham eva ātmā jñātaḥ prasannaḥ mokṣam dadāti iti dvitīyam dūṣayati asvātantryāt iti 
NSu_3.3.137cd.1–3.3.137cd.3	 asvātantryāt pudgalasya jñātaḥ api sukha daḥ na hi jñātaḥ ātmā api sukha daḥ mokṣa daḥ na bhavati kutas pudgalasya ātmanaḥ asvātantryāt hi śabdena paṭa ādau vyāptiḥ sphuṭā iti sūcayati asvātantryam ca anupadam eva jñāsyate ātmanaḥ sukha mātra dānam na upapadyate kim uta ananta sukha mokṣa dānam iti sūcayitum sukha daḥ iti uktam pakṣa dvayam hetu antareṇa nirākaroti na hi iti 
NSu_3.3.138ab.1–3.3.138ab.3	 na hi duḥkhi parijñānāt duḥkhi tvam vinivartate ātma jñānam ātyantika duḥkha nivṛtti hetuḥ na bhavati duḥkhi jñāna tvāt devadatta jñāna vat jainena api sva ātma jñānam eva mokṣa sādhanam ucyate na ātma jñāna mātram īśvara jñāne vyabhicāra nirāsāya duḥkhī iti uktam tasya api sākṣāt mokṣa sādhana tva abhāva vivakṣāyām jñāna tvāt iti eva vaktavyam yat vā atmā duḥkham nivartayitum aśaktaḥ duḥkhi tvā ādyaḥ yat anarthavān na asau tat nivartate śaktaḥ yathā daridraḥ dāridraya nivartane iti tātparyātharḥ duḥkhitvā uktyā svātantryam samarthitam svātantrye hi jātu na duḥkhī bhavet iti syāt etat na ātma jñānam devadattaḥ gām iva mokṣam dadāti kintu prakāśaḥ andhakāram iva virodhāt duḥkham nivartayati tatra kim acaitanyam kariṣyati sva ātma jñānam eva ca sva duḥkha virodhi na ātma jñāna mātram iti dvitīya hetuḥ api aprayojakaḥ iti āśaṅkayā āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.3.138c–3.3.138f.3^1	 yadi pudgala vijñānāt aduḥkhī syāt kathañcana dehavān api na aduḥkhī kim jñānāt uttaram sadā kathañcana duḥkha ātma jñānayoḥ viruddha tvena tarhi jñānāt uttara kālam dehavān api sadā nirantaram aduḥkhī kinna syāt syāt eva etat uktam bhavati prakāśaḥ khalu andhakāra virodhi tvāt tat nivartayan utpatti anantaram eva nivartayati na tu vilambena vilambe virodhasya eva anirvāhāt tathā ātma tattva jñānam yadi duḥkha ādi anartha virodhi tvāt tad nivarti ātmānam muktam kuryāt tarhi jina ādayaḥ tattva jñāna sampannāḥ jñāna utpatti anantaram eva muktāḥ syuḥ na ca evam 
NSu_3.3.138c–3.3.138f.3^2	 deha ādimattvena upalambhāt tathāvidhānām ca duḥkha ādeḥ avarjanāt iti iṣyāpatti nirāsāya sadā itya āt i uktam ayam atra prayogaḥ duḥkha ādikam ātma tattva jñāna virodhi na bhavati bahulam kālam tena saha sthita tvāt sammata vat iti kiñca ātma tattva jñānam na tāvat āmokṣāt ekam jñānānām kṣaṇika tva darśanāt tathā ca yad anantaram mokṣaḥ abhilaṣṭate tad jinasya caram a jñānam na mokṣa sādhanam ātma jñāna tvāt prathama ādi jñāna vat anyathā prathamam eva mokṣam sādhayet aviśeṣāt iti nanu bhavadbhiḥ īśvara jñānam mokṣa sādhanam abhyupeyate tatra api samānam idam dūṣaṇam iti atas āha īśa iti 
NSu_3.3.139ab.1–3.3.139ab.3	 īśa kpti anusāreṇa syāt kālādi īśa vādinaḥ īśa vādinaḥ mama mate tad icchā viśeṣa anusāreṇa kālāt kañcana kālam ativāhya muktiḥ syāt ayam abhisandhiḥ na vayam īśvara jñānam mokṣa sādhanam ācakṣmahe kinnāma prasannaḥ parameśvaraḥ eva jñānam tu prasāda sādhana tvāt mokṣa sādhanam iti gīyate sa ca cetanaḥ kām api kāla kalpanām karoti asmin samaye amum muktam kariṣyāmi iti tad kalpanā anusāreṇa bhavati eva asau muktaḥ iti na kaścid doṣaḥ yathā brāhmaṇasya vidyā caraṇa ādinā prasannaḥ api prabhuḥ cetasā kalpayati āgāmini sūrya uparāge asmai gām dāsyāmi iti sa brāhmaṇasya vidyā caraṇa ādinā prasannaḥ api prabhuḥ cetasā kalpayati āgāmini sūrya uparāge asmai gām dāsyāmi iti sa tad anusāreṇa tasmāt gām labhate tathā eva iti evam ātma jñānasya mokṣa sādhana tvam nirākṛtya dharmasya api tam nirācaṣṭe karma iti 
NSu_3.3.139cd.1–3.3.139cd.2	 karma hetu tvam api tu niścaitanyāt na hi kvacid karmaṇā hetu tvam karma hetu tvam mokṣam prati yat vā karma hetu tvam iti bahuvrīhiḥ mokṣasya iti śeṣaḥ tuśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe na eva iti sambandhaḥ niścaitanyāt karmaṇaḥ vimatam karma na mokṣa sādhanam bhavati acetana tvāt paṭa vat iti arthaḥ vyāptim upapādayati na hi iti na iti ubhayatra sambaddhayate na hi kvacid acetane mokṣa sādhana tvam āvayoḥ sammatam yena atra vyāptiḥ na syāt iti arthaḥ 
NSu_3.3.139cd.3	 nanu acetana tve api viśiṣyam karma idam mokṣa sādhanam kin na syāt iti ced kim āmokṣa prāpteḥ kriyamāṇam ekam eva karma utān ekāni na ādyaḥ kriyāṇām aneka tva darśanāt pratikriyam karma utpatteḥ eka tve ca jātasya eva janma vā kriyāṇām vaiyarthyam vā viramya vyāpāraḥ vā apadyeta abhyupagamya eka tvam bādhakam āha aśeṣa iti 
NSu_3.3.140a–3.3.140c.2	 aśeṣa duḥkha vilaye na idānīm kāraṇam yathā tathā uttaram ca na eva syāt yathā idānīm prathama kriyā uttara kālam jātam karma aśeṣa duḥkha vilaye mokṣasya kāraṇam na bhavati tathā uttara kālam vivakṣita kāle api mokṣa kāraṇam na syāt karma tvāt iti śeṣaḥ ekasya api karmaṇaḥ kāla bhedena bhedāt pakṣa sa pakṣa tvam yujyate vipakṣe tu utpatti anantaram eva mokṣam sādhayet aviśeṣāt iti 
NSu_3.3.140a–3.3.140c.4	 dvitīye api bādhakam pramāṇam āha aśeṣa iti atra idānīm iti idāni intanī karma vyaktiḥ ucyate uttaram iti antimā anyat samānam na cāntimakarma vyatiriktānām karmaṇām mokṣa sādhana tvam asti tathā sati tad anantaram eva mokṣa prasaṅgāt na ca pūrva saha kṛsya antimasya karmaṇaḥ mokṣa sādhana tvam vācyam iyattā abhāvena aniyata kāraṇaka tva āpatteḥ na hi jñāna udaya anantaram iyatā eva kālena iyanti eva karmāṇi kṛtvā apavrajyate iti niyamaḥ pramāṇavān na ca jainaiḥ iṣyate jinānām viṣama kāla tva abhyupagamāt ābhāsa uddhāram karoti dṛṣṭī iti 
NSu_3.3.140d.1–3.3.140d.4	 dṛṣṭi pūrva anumā yatas yasmāt iyam dṛṣṭi pūrvā pramāṇa gṛhīta vyāpti ādimatī tatas anumā na tu ābhāsaḥ iti arthaḥ yat uktam īśakpti anusāreṇa iti tat asat jñānāt īśvara prasādaḥ tatas muktiḥ iti atra pramāṇa abhāvāt iti ced na śruteḥ sadbhāvāt tad prāmāṇyasya sādhita tvāt ābhāsāt anuddharan= eva ca anumānam api āha dṛṣṭī iti 
NSu_3.3.141.1–3.3.141.2	 śaktasya anyasya vijñānam tat prīti janakam yadi tayā eva bandha hāniḥ syāt iti kim nāma dūṣaṇam śaktasya anyasya vijñānam viśiṣya jñānam guṇa utkarṣa ādi jñānam iti yāvat tat prīti janakam iti yadi anumīyate yadi ca tayā tat prītyā eva bandha hāniḥ syāt iti anumīyate tadā kinnāma dūṣaṇam na kim api kutas yatas dṛṣṭi pūrvā pramāṇa gṛhīta vyāpti ādimatīyam anumā iti arthaḥ artha mātram idam uktam 
NSu_3.3.141.3–3.3.141.4	 eṣā tu prayoga prakriyā saṃsāra bandha hāniḥ samartha puruṣa antara prīti nibandhanāḥ bandha hāni tvāt rāja prasāda adhīna bhṛtya nigaḍa bandha hāni vat yaḥ ca asau puruṣaḥ saḥ eva īśvaraḥ vipratipannā prītiḥ guṇa utkarṣa ādi jñāna jāḥ anija prīti tvāt rāja prīti vat karma ādinā bhavan= i īśvara prasādaḥ api guṇa utkarṣa ādi jñāne sati eva iti na doṣaḥ yat veśvara viṣayam guṇa utkarṣa ādi jñāna tvāt saṃmata vat naceśvara siddhayā doṣaḥ prathama anumānena tasya siddha tvāt tat idam uktam śaktasya anyasya iti nanu etat viparītam api mayā anumīyate tatas sat pratipakṣata iti ced kim vimatā bandha hāniḥ sva jñāna nibandhanā iti anumīyate uta para prasāda nibandhanā na bhavati iti ādye doṣam āha sva jñānāt iti 
NSu_3.3.142ab.1–3.3.142ab.2	 sva jñānāt bandha hāniḥ tu dṛśyate kasya kutracid dṛśyate iti etat kākvā na dṛśyate iti vyākhyeyam tathā ca vyāpti abhāvaḥ iti bhāvaḥ dvitīye tu bandha hāni tvāde rāja prasāda adhīna nigaḍa bandha hāni ādau vyabhicāraḥ para prasāda nirapekṣā eva kācid bandha hāniḥ dṛśyate tatra bhavatām api vyabhicāraḥ iti ced na pakṣa tulya tvāt sarva api aniṣya nivṛttiḥ īśvara prasāda adhīnā iti hi tattva vidām panthāḥ 
NSu_3.3.142ab.3–3.3.142cd.3	 yat uktam dharma jñānayoḥ mokṣa sādhana tve tadā eva mokṣaḥ syāt iti tat asat karmaṇaḥ pratibandhakasya sadbhāvāt na hi pratibandhaka vaśāt kāryam akurvāṇaḥ hetuḥ ahetuḥ bhavati atiprasaṅgāt anekavidham khalu kamar tatra yadi api jñāna āvaraṇa ādikam jñānāt eva nivṛttam tathā api āyuḥ ādi kāraṇam asti eva iti ced syāt idam pratibandhaka sadbhāva kalpanam yadiahiṃsā ādi rūpaḥ dharmaḥ śarīra parimāṇa tva ādinā atma jñānam ca tattva jñānam ete ca dharma jñāne mokṣa sādhane a iti eṣaḥ arthaḥ pramitaḥ bhavet naca evam evam eva kalyane atiprasaṅgaḥ iti āśayavān dharma ādi svarūpe tāvat pramāṇam na asti iti āha ahiṃsāyāḥ ca iti ahiṃsāyāḥ ca dharma tvam kena mānena gamyate caśabdaḥ jñāna saṅgraha arthaḥ yat vā sapta ghaṭikā bhojana ādi samuccaya arthaḥ jñāna viśeṣasya ca upalakṣaṇam jina vākyena avagamyate iti ced na tad prāmāṇya sādhaka abhāvasya ukta tvāt sat pratipakṣam ca jina vākyam iti āha hiṃsāyāḥ eva iti 
NSu_3.3.142ef.1–3.3.142ef.3	 hiṃsāyāḥ eva dharma tvam iti ukte syāt kim uttaram atra api pūrvavat upalakṣaṇam jñātavyam jina vākyāt ahiṃsāyāḥ dharma tvam pratipannasya bhinnaka ācāryeṇa hiṃsāyāḥ eva dharma tvam iti akte kim uttaram syāt na kim api tathā ca na dharma niścayaḥ syāt bhinnaka ācāryaḥ na āptaḥ iti ced jinaḥ api katham āptaḥ sarva guṇa upeta tvāt iti ced bhinnaka ācārye api tulyam etat aprāmāṇikāḥ tatra te guṇāḥ iti ced jine api kim pramāṇa siddhāḥ jina darśinām vacanena teṣām tatra siddhiḥ iti ced na samānam anyatra api bhinnaka ācārya darśinaḥ bhrāntāḥ pratārakāḥ vā iti ced jina darśinaḥ api kutas na tathā iti idānīm dharma ādeḥ mokṣa sādhana tvam api aprāmāṇikam iti āha dharmasya iti 
NSu_3.3.143ab.1–3.3.143cd.3	 dharmasya sukha hetu tvam api kena avagamyate sukham mokṣaḥ jina vākyena avasīyate iti vadataḥ pūrvavat sat pratipakṣata iti āha hatyāyāḥ iti hatyayā mokṣa hetu tvam kutas mānāt nivāryate mokṣa hetu tvam kenacid ācāryeṇa uktam iti śeṣaḥ hanaḥ ta ca iti atra supīti na anuvartate brahmahatyā ādayaḥ tu ṣaṣṭhī samāsāḥ atas hatyā iti sādhuḥ santi khalu a kṣayam ha vai cāturmāsya yājinaḥ sukṛtam bhavati a ityādi śrutim anusṛtya hiṃsā ātmakasya yāgasya mokṣa hetu tvam vadantaḥ iti ayuktam eva jā enānām mokṣa sādhanam iti adhunā bauddha abhimatam mokṣa sādhanam nirākurvāṇaḥ śūnya vādī uktam tāvat apākaroti na ca iti 
NSu_3.3.144a–3.3.144c.2	 na ca śūnya parijñānāt śūnya bhāvanayā api ca mokṣaḥ kathañcana bhavet śūnyam eva tattvam samastam tatra adhyastam iti parijñānam tathā eva śūnya bhāvanayā śūnya dhyānena apicau= anyonya samuccaye mokṣaḥ na bhavet iti sambandhaḥ katham ca na iti anena idam ācaṣṭe śūnya parijñāna ādikam mokṣa sādhanam iti atra pramāṇa abhāvāt tatra eva bandha hāniḥ syāt iti ukta pramāṇa virodhāt ca iti yat vā śūnya parijñāna ādikam kim svayam eva mokṣam sādhayati kiṃvā śūnya prasāda jananena na ādyaḥ acetana tvāt paṭa vat na dvitīyaḥ śūnyasya prasāda guṇa anaṅgīkārāt anyathā śūnya tva vyāghātāt iti 
NSu_3.3.144a–3.3.144c.4	 syāt etat bandhaḥ tāvat saṃvṛvina āmaka ajñāna nimittaḥ adhyāsaḥ saṃvṛtiḥ ca virodhinā śūnya jñānena nivartyate tatas tad mūlaḥ bandha adhyāsaḥ api iti kim acetana tva ādikam kariṣyati na caḥ evambhāvanā vaiyarthyam asambhāvanā viparīta bhāvanā nivṛtti artha tvāt iti mā evam bandhasya adhyasta tāyāḥ nirasta tvāt aṅgīkṛtya doṣam āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.3.144d.1–3.3.144d.3	 yadi idānīm katham na saḥ śūnya parijñānāt itya ādikam sarvam anuvartate śūnya jñānena kathañcanā iti śaṅkita rītyā mokṣaḥ bhavet iti yadi ucyate tarhi sa mokṣaḥ katham idānīm jñāna udaya ananta rakṣaṇe na bhavet tadā eva bhavitavyam iti āśayaḥ na hi pradīpasya virodhi andhakāra nivartane vilambaḥ asti aṅgīkriyante ca śūnya jñāna samanantaram api saṃsarantaḥ puruṣāḥ pareṇa asambhāvanā viparīta bhāvanā sadbhāvāt vilambaḥ iti ced te kim saṃvṛti kārye na vā dvitīye śūnya vat anivṛttiḥ eva ādye saṃvṛtau nivṛttāyām katham tat anivṛttiḥ anyathā saṃvṛtyanivṛttiḥ vā tat akārya tvam etayoḥ vā syāt saṃvṛteḥ anivṛttau ca katham jñāna virodhi tvam paścāt api katham nivṛttiḥ nanu yathā bhavat mate jñāna udaya anantaram api saṃsāra avasthānam tathā asmad mate api kim na syāt iti atas vaiṣamyam āha parā iti 
NSu_3.3.145.1–3.3.146ab.2	 para prasādana icchoḥ tu viambaḥ nāma yujyate pum icchā adhīna tā no ced viambaḥ kiṅkṛtaḥ bhavet anuṣṭhita sva kṛtyasya api tena para prasādana icchoḥ tu phala avāptau vilambaḥ nāma yujyate loke tathā darśanāt mokṣasya puruṣa antara prasāda adhīna tā no ced āsthīyate kevalam śūnya jñānam bandha virodhi tvāt bandham nivartayati iti aṅgīkriyate tadā jñāna udaya anantaram mokṣasya vilambaḥ kim nibandhanaḥ bhavet pratibandhaka tvena kalpyamānasya saṃvṛti kāya ṛtvena jñāna virodhi tvāt na hi prabodha anantaram svāpna bandha nivṛtteḥ vilambaḥ asti para prasāda anapekṣeṣu api kāryeṣu vilambaḥ asti trivṛt mūla abhyavaharaṇa ādau kṛte api virecanāt eviḥ lamba darśanāt tat katham ucyate pum icchā adhīna tā bhāve vilambaḥ na bhavet iti tatra āha anyatra api iti anyatra api viambāḥ tu syuḥ īśa icchā nimittataḥ mokṣāt anyatra etāvatā kālena idam bhavatu iti īśa icchā eva nimittam tatas kutas atra īśvara icchā nimittam kalpyate iti atas āha anyathā iti 
NSu_3.3.146cd.1–3.3.146cd.3	 anyathā kāraṇam ced syāt kim kāryam na upajāyate īśvara icchāyāḥ akalpane kāraṇam syāt ced trivṛt mūlāt anādi mātram vireka ādeḥ kāraṇam yadi bhavet tadā tasya sadbhāvāt kāryam vireka ādikam kasmāt na upajāyate upajāyeta eva kāryānudayena eva sāmagrī vaikalyam kalpyate na ca dṛṣṭasya vaikalyam atra asti iti parameśvara icchā eva kalpyāḥ na ca dharma vaikalyam kalpayitum yuktam uttara kālam api kāryān udaya prasaṅgāt na hi tad madhye kaścid dharmaḥ anuṣṭhīyate vidyamānaḥ eva prāc alabdha vṛttiḥ dharmaḥ iti ced kā iyam vṛttiḥ nāma kim kārya kāraṇam uta sahakāri sāhityam na ādyaḥ karaṇam eva kutas na asti iti vicāryamāṇa tvāt dvitīye tat eva sahakārīśvara icchā eva ucyate auṣadhasya śarīra āśaya vyāpti abhāvāt kāryā anudayaḥ iti ced na tasya api īśvara icchām antareṇa anupapatteḥ iti kiñca prāpta sādhana abhimatānām api mokṣa vilambe sāmagrī vaikalyam vā pratibandhaka sadbhāvaḥ vā anyaiḥ vādibhiḥ kathañcid śakyate vaktum na tu bauddhena iti āśayavān āha kāraṇe sati iti 
NSu_3.3.146ef.1–3.3.146ef.3	 kāraṇe sati kāryasya bhāvaḥ su niyataḥ asya hi asya bauddhasya mate kāraṇe sati kāryasya utpādaḥ su niyataḥ na tu anyeṣām iva apratibaddha kāraṇa sāmagṣām satyām samarthasya kṣepā yogāt iti tad vacanāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ atas śūnya vijñāna ādikam na mokṣa sādhanam iti siddham vijñāna vādi uktam mokṣa sādhanam dūṣayati vijñāna iti
