NSu_3.4.24.1–3.4.24.3	 tad kāraṇa tvāt pāpam vā vṛjinam nāma kathyate iti uktaḥ svayam īśena nāma arthaḥ śabda nirṇaye duḥkham apriyam ityādi śabdaiḥ īryate iti sambandhaḥ tad kāraṇa tvāt duḥkha kāraṇa tvāt dadhi trapusam pratyakṣaḥ jvaraḥ iti yathā etena vṛjina śabdaḥ duḥkhe mukhyaḥ pāpe tādarthyāt tāt śabdyam iti uktam bhavati atas eva vā śabdaḥ nāma arthaḥ vṛjina nāma arthaḥ vṛjina śabdasya duḥkha ādi artha tve avṛjina śabdasya aduḥkha ādi artha tvam siddham eva iti bhāvaḥ tatas kim yadi apāpa tva ādi kama vṛjina śabda arthaḥ iti atas āha apāpa tvam ca iti 
NSu_3.4.25.1–3.4.25.2	 apāpa tvam ca na eva asti yāvat saṃsāram asya hi ārabdha pāpam asti eva duḥkham ca jñāninaḥ api hi caśabdaḥ vakṣyamāṇa samuccaya arthaḥ asya jīvasya hi śabdaḥ saṃsāri tvāt iti hetu sūcanā arthaḥ tat yathā iṣīkātūlam iti ādi śrauteḥ jñāninaḥ pāpa abhāvāt katham etat iti atas uktam ārabdha iti anārabdha viṣayā śrutiḥ iti bhāvaḥ jñāninaḥ api ārabdha pāpam asti eva iti sambandhaḥ duḥkham ca asti eva pāpa sadbhāvāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ tasmāt avṛjina tvam api muktebhyaḥ anyatra asambhavī iti siddham 
NSu_3.4.25.3^1	 kecid etām śrutim anyathā vyācakṣate yaḥ ca śrotriyaḥ avṛjinaḥ akāma hataḥ iti śrotriyasya ca akāma hatasya iti ca vākyam na mukta saṅgraha artham kinnāma prakṛta manuṣya gandharva ādi viṣayam eva na ca tatra asambhavaḥ śrotriyan chandaḥ dhītaḥ iti smaraṇāt śrotriya śabdasya chandaḥ adhigati nimitta tvāt manuṣya gandharva ādīnām ca sarvajña kalpa tvāt prārabdha pāpa sadbhāve api na te tadā pāpam ācaranti iti avṛjināḥ eva ucyante viṣaya vairāgya upeta tvāt akāmahatāḥ ca bhavanti iti na ca vyāvartya abhāvena vaiyarthyam iti yuktam 
NSu_3.4.25.3^2–3.4.26ab.3	 na hi vayam śrotriya tva ādikam viśeṣaṇa tvena brūmaḥ kintu manuṣyebhyaḥ manuṣya gandharvāṇām śataguṇa ānanda tve abhihite tatra hetu ākāṅkṣāyām idam ucyate evam manuṣya gandharvebhyaḥ deva gandharvāṇām śataguṇa ānanda abhidhāne kutas iti ākāṅkṣāyām śrotriya tva ādi hetuḥ ucyate evam uttaratra api na ca vācyam sarveṣu api vidyamānam śrotriya tva ādikam ānanda atiśaye katham hetuḥ syāt iti manuṣyāt api atiśayena manuṣya gandharvaḥ śrotriyaḥ avṛjinaḥ akāma hataḥ ca yatas evam pūrva pūrva nirdiṣyāt api atiśayena uttarottaraḥ śrotriya tva āt imān yasmāt iti vyākhyānāt iti tat etat nnirācaṣṭe tasmāt iti tasmāt tasmāt akāma tvam iti ca aśruta kalpanā caḥ tu arthaḥ tasmāt tasmāt pūrva pūrva nirdiṣyāt atiśayena uttarottarasya akāma tvam upalakṣaṇam etat śrotriya ādikam ca iti vyākhyāne tu aśruta kalpanam syāt tasmāt iti atiśayena iti ca aśrutasya kalpanīya tvāt anyathā vivakṣita arthasya alābhāt doṣa antaram āha akāma iti 
NSu_3.4.26cd.1–3.4.26cd.3	 akāma hataḥ iti ukteḥ śruta hāniḥ api sphuṭāḥ śrutāvakāma hataḥ iti ukteḥ pareṇa ca akāmaḥ iti vyākhyāta tvāt śatasya hata śabdasya hāniḥ api sphuṭā apadyate na hi hata śabdasya kiñcid prayojanam asti atas śruta aśruta tyāga upādāna prasaṅgāt ayuktam idam vyākhyānam iti apare tu vyācakṣate yaḥ caḥ śrotriyaḥ iti śrotriyasya ca iti ca na mukta viṣayam na api prakṛta manuṣya gandharva ādi viṣayam kintu puruṣa antara viṣayam tathā hi manuṣyebhyaḥ manuṣya gandharvāṇām śataguṇaḥ tāvat ānandaḥ yaḥ ca aparaḥ śrotriyaḥ avṛjinaḥ manuṣya gandharva pade kāma rahitaḥ ca tasya api manuṣyebhyaḥ śataguṇaḥ manuṣya gandharva samānaḥ eva ānandaḥ bhavati iti evam teṣu teṣu padeṣu akāmasya tat tad samāna ānanda tvam atra ucyate na ca vācyam viraktānām sarvatra kāma abhāvāt katham iyam tāratamya uktiḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.26cd.4–3.4.26cd.6	 tad atirikta padeṣu kāma sadbhāvasya vivakṣita tvāt yaḥ yaḥ yāvat āyāsāt muktaḥ asau= asau tāvat ānandavān iti arthaḥ hi atra pratipipādayiṣitaḥ iti etat api śruta hāna aśruta kalpanā prasaṅgāt eva nirastam atra api hata śabdasya prayojana abhāvena hi ātavya tvāt tasmin padaḥ iti asya anyatra sa kāmaḥ iti asya ca kalpanīya tvāt adhikam doṣam āha kutracid iti 
NSu_3.4.27.1–3.4.27.3	 kutracid kāminaḥ puṃsaḥ kāma abhāvāt kvacid kvacid indra ādi sukha bhogaḥ asti iti anubhūtiḥ hi kupyati kutracid indra ādi pada vyatirikte kāminaḥ puṃsaḥ kvacid kvacid indra ādi pade kāma abhāvāt indra ādi samāna sukha anubhavaḥ asti iti vyākhyāne anubhava virodhaḥ syāt rājyam akāmayamānasya rāja samāna sukha anubhūteḥ anubhava bādhita tvasya spaṣṭa tvāt vairāgya praśaṃsātaḥ na tattvam mārgaṇīyam iti ced na niravadhika ānanda svarūpaḥ ayam ātmā kāma ādi upadrava āvaraṇāt tu tathā na bhāsate atas yāvat yāvat kāma kṣayaḥ tāvat tāvat ānanda utkarṣaḥ dṛśyate iti asya arthasya pradarśana artham asya prakaraṇasya avatārita tvāt ānanda utkarṣetu tātparyam śataguṇa tve tu na nirbharaḥ kāryaḥ iti ced na deva pada akāmāt indra pada akāmasya ānanda viśeṣa adarśanāt iti tarhi kaḥ śruti arthaḥ iti atas āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_3.4.28a–3.4.28e.3	 tasmāt amukta sukha gam tāratamyam pṛthak pṛthak uktvā yaḥ ca iti muktānām tāratamyam sukhe śrutiḥ āha iti peśalam artha antara pratīteḥ nirasta tvāt amukta manuṣya ādi sukha sambandhi tāratamyam te ye śatam iti ādi vākyaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak uktvā yaḥ ca iti śrotriyasya ca iti ca vākyena muktānām manuṣya gandharva ādīnām sukhe tāratamyam śrutiḥ ati deśena aha iti vyākhyānam eva peśalam nanu evam sati vākya bhedaḥ doṣaḥ syāt mā evam jñāpaka sadbhāvāt iti āha tat ca iti 
NSu_3.4.28ef.1–3.4.28ef.2	 tat ca caśabdāt eva gamyate yaḥ ca iti vākyasya prakṛtāt anyaḥ viṣayaḥ iti etat ca caśabdena eva gamyate kim uta eka vākya gatāya amuktā an upapattyā iti eva arthaḥ caśabdaḥ hi ayam samuccayasya dyotakaḥ pratīyate devadattaḥ dhanikaḥ yajñadattaḥ ca iti tathā naca eka viṣaya tāyām evam yujyate na hi bhavati vasiṣṭhaḥ brahmiṣṭhaḥ arundhatī patiḥ ca tathā iti prayogaḥ viśeṣaṇa samuccaye caśabdaḥ kinna syāt iti ced na mukhya arthe bādhaka abhāvena tyāga ayogāt vacana vyatyayaḥ ca eka vākyatāyām sphuṭaḥ eva tathā tve khalu te ye śatam karma devānām ānandāḥ saḥ ekaḥ ājāna devānām ānandaḥ ye śrotriyāḥ avṛjināḥ akāma hatāḥ ca iti syāt tathā teta ye śatam mānuṣāḥ ānandāḥ saḥ ekaḥ manuṣya gandharvāṇām ānandaḥ śrotriyāṇām akāma hatānām iti bhavet 
NSu_3.4.28ef.3	 nanu evam tarhi katham bṛhadāraṇyaka vākyam bhāṣye mukta mātra viṣayam vyākhyātam yaḥ ca iti viśeṣaṇa samuccaya param uktam ayam abhiprāyaḥ bhāṣya kārasya sarvathā vākya dvayam eva idam bhinna viṣayam eka vākyata aśraddhāyām api mukta mātra viṣayam astu tatra anupapattīnām alpa tvāt na amukta mātra viṣayam anupapatti bāhulyāt iti 
NSu_3.4.28ef.4–3.4.28ef.5	 mānuṣa ādi hiraṇyagarma antānām amuktānām muktānām ca uttarottaram śataguṇa ānanda tvam śruti dvayam āheti ayuktam mānuṣa ānanda nirdeśaḥ mukta jñāpaka abhāvāt na hi tatra akāma hata tva ādikam anyat vā kim api śrūyate iti āśaṅkām nirākurvan śruti artham vivṛṇoti rāddhaḥ itayā ādinā abhivīkṣate iti antena tatra tāvat bṛhadāraṇyake manuṣya muktasya jñāpakam darśayati rāddhaḥ iti rāddhaḥ saṃsiddhaḥ iti eva muktaḥ eva avagamyate sādhunā viṣṇunā yuktaḥ muktaḥ sādhu yuvā mataḥ 
NSu_3.4.28ef.6–3.4.28ef.7	 sa yaḥ manuṣyāṇām rāddhaḥ samṛddhaḥ bhavati iti upakrama vākye rāddhaḥ iti padena muktaḥ eva gṛhyate na amuktaḥ kayā vṛttyā abhidhayā eva na tu upacaryate yena mukhya artha anupapatti ādikam vyutpādanīyam syāt katham saṃsiddhaḥ iti etat uktam bhavati rādha sādha saṃsiddhau= iti paṭhyate rādhadhātoḥ cagati artha akarmaka śliṣa śīṅsthā asavasa janaruha jīryatibhyaḥ ca a iti akarmaka tvāt kartari ktaḥ tatas rāddhaḥ saṃsiddhaḥ iti uktam bhavati saṃsiddhiḥ ca muktiḥ eva nitya tvena duḥkha asambhinna tvena ca samīcīna siddhi tvāt na itarā anitya tvena duḥkha sambhinna tvena ca asamī cīna tvāt na ca mukhye sambhavati amukhya arthaḥ aṅgīkartum śakyate iti evam samṛddha śabdaḥ api muktasya eva vācakaḥ muktim vinā samyak ṛddheḥ abhāvāt anyeṣām adhipatiḥ iti ādikam tu muktā mukta sādhāraṇam yathā ca mukte sambhavati tathā uktam bhāṣye idānīm taittirīya śrutau mukta manuṣya jñāpakam darśayan yuvā syāt ityādīni padāni vyācaṣṭe sādhunā iti 
NSu_3.4.29cd.1–3.4.32ab.2^1	 sādhunā viṣṇunā yuktaḥ muktaḥ sādhu yuvā mataḥ yauvanam nityam etasya muktasya iti yuvā sa ca phalam adhyayanasya āptam tena adhyāyakaḥ īritaḥ nirhrāsa ānanda samprāptyā ca āśiṣṭaḥ iti gīyate sthitasya ananyathā prāpteḥ dṛḍhiṣṭhaḥ iti coditaḥ baliṣṭhaḥ ca svabhāvena muktaḥ bhavati kevalam nirdeṣaḥ hi sādhuḥ iti ucyate na ca viṣṇoḥ itaraḥ nirdeṣaḥ asti atas sādhunā viṣṇunā iti uktam tṛtīya ante sādhu śabdaḥ upapade yu miśraṇaḥ iti asamātanyebhyaḥ api dṛśyante a iti kvanippratyaye kṛte sādhuyuvā iti bhavati yat vā yujiḥ yogaḥ iti asya idam rūpam dṛśi grahaṇa sāmarthyāt dhātoḥ anta lopaḥ tathā ca bhagavat sāmīpya lakṣaṇam okṣavān iti uktam bhavati yuva śabdāt api atiśayena sādhu yuva śabdaḥ muktasya jñāpakaḥ iti kramamati laṅghayā ādau vyākhyātaḥ yadi api yuva śabdaḥ yauvana nimittaḥ tathā api mukhyā mukhyayoḥ mukhye sampratyayaḥ iti nitya yauvanam aṅgī kāryam tat ca etasya manuṣyasya muktasya eva yujyate na saṃsāriṇaḥ iti hetoḥ yuvā ca sa muktaḥ eva adhyāyaka śabdaḥ yadi api āṅadhi pūrva ādiṅadhyayane iti asmāt ṇvuli pratyaye sati niṣpannaḥ samyak adhyayanasya kartāram āha 
NSu_3.4.32ab.2^2–3.4.32ab.3	 tathā api atra puruṣa artha prasaṅgāt adhyayanasya apuruṣa artha tvāt adhyayana phala prāpteḥ lakṣakaḥ varṇanīyaḥ adhyayanasya phalam ca tena muktena eva āptam mukteḥ eva tad phala tvāt tena kāraṇena muktaḥ eva adhyāpakaḥ īritaḥ ā samyak samantāt ca śamasya iti āśaḥ atiśayena āśaḥ āśiṣṭhaḥ samyaktva ādi ca hrāsa abhāva ādikam eva tatas nirhrāsasya yogyatā anusāreṇa pūrṇasya ānandasya samprāptyā kāraṇena muktaḥ eva aśiṣṭhaḥ iti ca gīyate avikāraḥ hi dṛḍhaḥ nāma atiśayena dṛḍhaḥ dṛḍhiṣṭhaḥ chānda satva atra ṛtaḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ a iti etat na bhavati muktaḥ eva sthitasya ananyathā prāpteḥ atiśayena nirvikāra tvāt dṛḍhiṣṭhaḥ iti coditaḥ balam asya asti iti balī atiśayena balī baliṣṭhaḥ atiśayaḥ ca svābhāvika tvam svabhāvena baliṣṭhaḥ ca kevalam muktaḥ bhavati na amuktaḥ atas baliṣṭhaḥ iti saḥ eva ucyate iti nanu muktasyatasya iyam pṛthivī sarvāḥ vittasya pūrṇā syāt a iti vitta paripūrṇa pṛthivīpati tvam ucyamānam katham yujyate iti atas āha tasya iti 
NSu_3.4.32cd.1–3.4.32cd.2	 tasya iyam pṛthivī ityādi pūrva bhāva vyapekṣayā pūrva bhāvaḥ amukta tvam muktā mukta manuṣyayoḥ vivakṣayā hi yuvā syāt iti ādikam ārabdham tatra yuvā syāt iti ādikā muktam pratipādya amukta vivakṣayā tasya ityādi vākyam pravṛttam iti arthaḥ anena eva nyāyena anyeṣām adhipatiḥ iti ādikam amukta viṣayam pratipattavyam nanu evam yuvā syāt iti ādeḥ muktā mukta viṣaya tā aṅgīkṛtau= eka viṣaya tā pratīti virodha iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya amuktā iti vaktavye pūrva bhāva iti uktam ekaḥ eva cetanaḥ yuvādi śabdaiḥ pratipādyate tasya ca avasthā bhedena viśeṣaṇāni vyavasthāpyate ekaḥ eva cetanaḥ yuvādi śabdaiḥ pratipādyate tasya ca avasthā bhedena viśeṣaṇāni vyavasthāpyante tasmāt eka viṣaya tā pratibhāsaḥ na anupapannaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.32cd.3	 evam vājasaneya śrutausa yaḥ ha vai manuṣyāṇām ityādeḥ sampannatamaḥ iti antasya taittirīya śrutau ca yuvā syāt iti ādeḥ pūrṇā syāt iti antasya a muktā mukta paratva varṇanena sa manuṣyāṇām paramaḥ ānandaḥ athaye śatam manuṣyāṇām ānandāḥ iti etat saḥ ekaḥ mānuṣaḥ ānandaḥ te ye śatam mānuṣāḥ ānandā iti etat ca muktā mukta viṣayam iti siddhe taittirīya śruti gatam saḥ ekaḥ manuṣya gandharvāṇām ānandaḥ śrotriyasya ca akāma hatasya iti etā= at vaya ācaṣṭe saḥ ekaḥ iti iti 
NSu_3.4.33.1–3.4.33.3	 saḥ ekaḥ iti saṃsāra gata muktavā sukham punar śrotriyasya iti vadati muktāt śataguṇa ātma tām saṃsāra gatam sukham uktvā iti saṃsāri manuṣya sukhāt śataguṇam saṃsāriṇaḥ manuṣya gandharvasya sukham uktvā iti arthaḥ muktāt śataguṇa ātma tām iti mukta manuṣyasya sukhāt mukta manuṣya gandharvasya śataguṇa sukha ātma tām vadati iti arthaḥ śrutiḥ iti śeṣaḥ saḥ ekaḥ iti vākyena śrotriyasya iti vākyena anena eva nyāyena te ye śatam manuṣya gandharvāṇām ānandā iti ādikam vyākhyeyam iti āśayavān āha saṃsāra gāt iti 
NSu_3.4.34a–3.4.34c.2	 saṃsāra gāt ca saṃsāra gatasya eva śata adhikam muktān muktasya saṃsāri manuṣya gandharva ādi sukhāt iti arthaḥ saṃsāra gatasya deva gandharva ādeḥ śata adhikam śataguṇa adhikam sukham uktvā iti vartate muktān muktasya iti mukta manuṣya gandharva ādi sukhāt śataguṇam mukta deva gandharva ādeḥ sukham vadati iti arthaḥ anena te ye śatam iti ubhayam eka uktyā parāmṛśya saḥ ekaḥ iti śrotriyasya iti ca yathāyogyam pṛthak śataguṇa ānanda tvam ucyate iti uktam bhavati 
NSu_3.4.34a–3.4.34cd.3	 anayā eva rītyā saḥ ekaḥ pitṝṇām ityādi vājasaneya śruti vākyam api vyākhyeyam upakrame mukta śravaṇāt ājāna deva ādau yaḥ ca śrotriyaḥ ityādinā tad śravaṇāt madhye api yaḥ ca śrotriyaḥ iti anuvartanīyam śruti dvaya visaṃvādaḥ tu bhagavat pādaiḥ anyatra parihṛtaḥ iti śruti dvaya vyākhyānam upasaṃharati yuktam syāt iti  yuktam syāt śruti uktam abhivīkṣitaḥ śruti uktam abhivīkṣataḥ abhivīkṣamāṇasya samyak vicārayataḥ matena etat eva vyākhyānam yuktam syāt athavā abhivīkṣaḥ abhivīkṣaṇam samyak vicāraḥ tasmāt idam eva śruti uktam yuktam syāt iti evam śrutyā muktau tāratamyam upapādya yuktyā api upapādayati yuktam ca iti 
NSu_3.4.35ab.1–3.4.35ab.3	 yuktam ca sādhana ādhikyāt sādhya ādhikyam sura ādiṣu sura ādiṣu mānuṣa ādibhyaḥ sādhya ādhikyam mukti gata phala ādhikyam sādhana ādhikyāt hetoḥ yuktam anumitam ca iti arthaḥ deva ādayaḥ mānuṣa ādibhyaḥ adhika maukta phala bhājaḥ tad apekṣayā adhika tad sādhanavat tvāt iti uktam bhavati vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvaṃda prayojakaḥ ayam hetuḥ iti atas āha na ādhikyam iti 
NSu_3.4.35cd.1–3.4.36ab.3	 na ādhikyam yadi sādhye syāt prayatnaḥ sādhane kutas sura ādiṣu iti vartate mānuṣa ādibhyaḥ iti ca sādhane sādhana ādhikye yadi deva ādayaḥ mānuṣa ādibhyaḥ adhika maukta phala bhājaḥ na syuḥ tadā tad adhika tad sādhana artha prayatnavantaḥ na syuḥ anadhika phalāya ca adhikam prayatnam ātiṣṭhamānāḥ na prekṣāvantaḥ bhaveyuḥ iti vipakṣe bādhakān na aprayojakaḥ hetuḥ pramāṇa abhāvāt sva rūpa asiddhaḥ astu iti atas āha yatnaḥ ca iti yatnaḥ ca dṛśyate teṣām mahān eva mahātmanām mahātmanām mahā phala bhāj tvena anumeyānām teṣām deva ādīnām mānuṣa ādibhyaḥ mahān yatnaḥ adhikam mokṣa sādhana anuṣṭhānam ca dṛśyate eva pramāṇaiḥ tāni api vakṣyāmaḥ iti bhāvaḥ vyāptim upapādayati yatra iti 
NSu_3.4.36c–3.4.36e.3	 yatra sādhana bāhulyam sādhya bāhulyam atra ca dṛṣṭam niyamataḥ yatra puruṣe yad apekṣayā sādhana ādhikyam asti atra tad apekṣayā sādhya ādhikyam ca niyamena dṛṣṭam karṣaka vāṇigrāja puruṣa ādiṣu loke vede ca agni āhita ādiṣu yaḥ yat adhika sādhanavān asau tad adhika sādhyavān iti niyamena tad tad pramāṇaiḥ upalabdham eva iti arthaḥ yaḥ tu agni ādhāna ādi phalānām tāratamyam ajānānaḥ kṛṣṭa ādi sthale ca dhānya ādau tāratamyam kāraṇa antara āyattam na kṛṣṭa ādi sādhana tāratamya adhīnam iti manyamānaḥ dṛṣṭānteṣu api vipratipadyate tam pratyāha no ced iti 
NSu_3.4.36ef.1–3.4.36ef.2	 no ced na yatnam kurya rañjasā yadi loke vede ca sādhana ādhikyāt sādhya ādhikyam naḥ bhavet tadā ke api añjasā yatnam sādhana atiśaya anuṣṭhānam na kuryuḥ kintu samam eva kuryuḥ itarathā prekṣāvantaḥ na bhaveyuḥ na hi agni ādhānena yāvān svargaḥ aśvamedhena api tāvataḥ eva lābhe aśvamedhe kaścid pravarteta pravartamānaḥ vā abuddhimān bhavet droṇa vāpa mātra karṣaṇena yāvān dhānya lābhaḥ tāvataḥ eva svārrī iva apakarṣaṇena bhāve na kaścid tatra pravarteta tathā tve ca mandaḥ syāt dṛṣṭam vṛṣṭayā ādikam adṛṣṭam dharma ādikam ca sādhana antarbhūtam eva iti na vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ 
NSu_3.4.36ef.3	 evam mānuṣa ādayaḥ deva ādibhyaḥ alpa mukti phala bhājaḥ tad apekṣayā alpa sādhana vat tva āt yaḥ yad apekṣayā alpa sādhanavān sa tatas alpa phalavān dṛṣṭaḥ yathā sammataḥ deva ādayaḥ mānuṣa antāḥ muktau phala tāratam yavantaḥ sādhana tāratamya upeta tva ādye yat sādhana tāratamyavantaḥ te tat sādhya tāratamyavantaḥ yathā sammatāḥ brahma ādīnām mānuṣa antānām mokṣa phalāni tāratamyavanti tāratamya vat sādhana sādhya tvāt sammata vat iti anumānāni api atra draṣṭavyāni anukūla tarka ādikam ca pūrvavat ūhanīyam iti 
NSu_3.4.36ef.4	 syāt etat muktāḥ api upāsanam karma ca anutiṣṭhanti iti guṇa upasaṃhāra pāde samarthitam na ca eka prakāram eva teṣām anuṣṭhānam iti niyāmakam asti tathā ca teṣām upāsana ādi tāratamye sati api tad prayukta phala tāratamya abhāvāt ayuktāni eva sa tarkāṇi anumānāni muktaiḥ anuṣṭhitam sādhanam eva na bhavati sādhya abhāvāt iti ced amuktaiḥ anuṣṭhitasya api adhikasya tathā tva upapatteḥ anuṣṭhānam ca mukta vat līlā ātmakam bhaviṣyati iti atas āha kṛcchreṇa iti 
NSu_3.4.37ab.1–3.4.39.1	 kṛcchreṇa sādhanāt eva na mukta vat udīryate mumukṣubhiḥ kṛcchreṇa eva sādhanānām sādhanāt anuṣṭhānāt kāraṇāt mukta vat muktānām iva līlayā anuṣṭhānam na bhavati anena viśeṣaṇa prakṣepāt anaikāntyādi parihṛtam muktānām kṛcchra abhāvāt līlā vailakṣaṇya darśanāt anyathā siddhiḥ api apāstā nahi kṛcchravatī līlā bhavati iti uktam bhavati kṛcchreṇa mumukṣūṇām sādhana anuṣṭhāne kim pramāṇam iti atas āha udīryate iti etat āgamena udīryate iti arthaḥ tad āgamam paṭhati daśa kalpam iti daśa kalpam tapaḥ cīrṇam rudreṇa lavaṇa arṇave tyaktavā sukhāni sarvāṇi kliṣṭena lavaṇa ambhasā śakreṇa varṣakoṭiḥ ca dhūmaḥ pītaḥ ati duḥkhataḥ varṣa ayutam ca sūryeṇa tapaḥ avākchirasā kṛtam su duḥkhena sukham tyaktavā dharmeṇa ākāśa śāyinā pītā mayīcayaḥ varṣa sāhasram ati sādaram 
NSu_3.4.40a–3.4.40c.4	 atikṛcchreṇa kurvanti yatnam brahma vidaḥ api hi iti kalpaḥ brahmaṇaḥ divasaḥ pātra ādi tvāt napuṃsakam kāla adhvanoḥ atyanta saṃyogaḥ iti dvitīyā yat vā daśa kalpam iti bahuvrīhiḥ tapasaḥ viśeṣaṇam sahasram parimāṇam asya iti sāhasraḥ saṅghaḥ tat asya parimāṇam iti arthe śata māna viṃśatika sahasra vasana ādaṇityaṇaḥ vidhānāt anye api atikṛcchreṇa yatnam kuvarnti kim aihika phala artham na iti ucyate brahma vidaḥ api iti viṣaya vairāgyam anena upalakṣyate brahma jñāna uttaram sādhana anuṣṭhānena mokṣa tāratamyasya upari sādhayiṣyamāṇa tvāt atra sāmānya mātram vivakṣitam iti śabdaḥ vākya samāptau anumānam upasaṃharati etat iti 
NSu_3.4.40cd.1–3.4.40cd.3	 etat akhilam mokṣa viśeṣa abhāvataḥ katham etat akhilam kṛcchreṇa sādhana anuṣṭhānam viśeṣaḥ vaicitryam saptamī arthe tasiḥ katham yujyate tatas anena mokṣa viśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ iti śeṣaḥ syāt etat muktau tāratamya anumānam kāla atyaya apadiṣyam paramam sāmyam upaiti iti ādi śruti viruddha tvāt iti mā evam śruteḥ śruti smṛti bādhita tvena bādhaka tva asambhava ādityāśayavān mokṣa tāratamya vādinīḥ śruti smṛtīḥ tāvat paṭhati daivī iti 
NSu_3.4.41.1–3.4.43.1	 daivī sampad vimokṣāya nibandhāya āsurī matā iti mokṣa viśeṣaḥ ca svayam bhagavatā uditaḥ tam eva yūyam bhajata ātma vṛttibhiḥ manaḥ vacaḥ kāya guṇaiḥ sva karmabhiḥ amāyinaḥ kāmadughā aṅghri paṅkajam yathā adhikāra avasita artha siddhaye akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyaḥ manojaveṣu asamāḥ babhūvuḥ ādaghnāsaḥ upakakṣāsaḥ u tve hradāḥ iva snātvā u tve dadṛśre 
NSu_3.4.44.1–3.4.44.3	 ityādīni ca vākyāni tāratamyam vimukti gam vyaktam vadanti sampad yogya tā vimokṣaḥ viśiṣya mokṣaḥ nibandhaḥ nīca sthāne andhe tamasi bandhaḥ tādarthye caturthī caśabdaḥ eva arthe bhagavatā svayam eva uktaḥ iti sampadyate anyathā vīti upasargasya vaiyarthya āpatteḥ tam eva iti munīn prati pṛthoḥ vākyam tam viṣṇum eva ātma vṛttibhiḥ iti asya eva vivaraṇam manaḥ vacaḥ kāya kāryaiḥ sva karmabhiḥ iti amāyinaḥ chadma rahitāḥ niṣkāmāḥ yathā adhikāram yogyatā anusāreṇa avasitasya niścita arthasya mokṣasya siddhayaḥ iti mokṣa tāratamya uktiḥ amāyinaḥ iti ukta tvāt artha śabdena mokṣasya eva ukteḥ 
NSu_3.4.44.4–3.4.44.5	 akṣaṇvantaḥ akṣimantaḥ anaḥ nuḍiti nuṣ karṇavantaḥ prāpta samaḥ ta indriya phalāḥ parasparam sakhāyaḥ muktāḥ manojaveṣu manojavaḥ prajñā atiśayaḥ bahuvacanam ādi arthe jñāna ādi guṇeṣu asamāḥ tāratamya upetāḥ babhūvuḥ bhagavat sāmīpye ca tāratamyam ucyate teṣu kecid ādadhnāsaḥ āsya śabdasya aabhāvaḥ āsyam parimāṇasya iti āt adhnam amṛtam tat eteṣām asti sthānam iti arśaa ādibhyaḥ at āsya parimāṇe sudhā nidhau viharantaḥ iti dūra tvam ucyate yat vā taratama śabdaḥ iva dadhna śabdaḥ apratyayaḥ api asti tatas ca samyak dadhnāḥ magnāḥ iti arthaḥ tve kecid upagatāḥ kakṣam vanam upakakṣāḥ uśabdaḥ eva arthaḥ śvetadvīpa gata vana krīḍā ratā eva iti madhya tvam ucyate āñjaseḥ a sugitya suc tu eeke snātvāḥ snātavyāḥ kṛti arthetava eket kenyatvana a iti tvan 
NSu_3.4.44.6–3.4.44.8	 hṛdā iva gambhīrāḥ parameśvaram dadṛśre dadṛśuḥ harayore anena atisāmīpyam ucyate śrutvā viṣṇum karṇa phalam a ityādi smṛtya asya mantrasya eva vyākhyāta tvāt na artha antaram kalpanīyam ityādīni ca iti caśabdena prāk udāhṛta kāṇvataittirīya śrutī samuccinoti vyaktam niravakāśam tatas kim iti atas āha tat kena iti 
NSu_3.4.44cd.1–3.4.45ab.3	 tat kena sāmyam mukteṣu gamyate tat tasmāt niravakāśa śruti smṛti bādhita tvāt kena na kena api yat udāhṛtam vākyam tat na tat param iti bhāvaḥ tarhi kaḥ tasya arthaḥ iti atas āha duḥkha ādi iti duḥkha ādi a bhāva sāmyam ca sāmya vākya arthaḥ īyate caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe parama ānanda sāmya samuccaye vā yathā uktam duḥkha abhāvaḥ parānandaḥ liṅga bhedaḥ samāḥ matā a iti kiñcana idam anumānam utprekṣitam kintvā āgama siddham tatra katham kāla atīta āśaṅkā iti āśayena āha bhaktyādi iti 
NSu_3.4.45c–3.4.45e.2	 bhaktayā ādi guṇa sadbhāve hi atulya tvam ca bhārate uktam tāratamyena bhakti ādi guṇa sadbhāve sati bhakti ādi sādhana guṇānām tāratamyena hetunā iti yāvat atulya tvam mokṣa phalasya na kevalam asmābhiḥ kintu bhārate ca uktam hi iti tad vākyasya prasiddhānām sūcayati yathā sati hi guṇe pravadanti atulya tām iti sati sādhau guṇaṣa bhaktyā dau= atulye sati phalasya api atulya tām vadanti hi iti arthaḥ sādhana tāratamyam pramāṇaiḥ dṛśyate iti uktam kāni tāni iti atas kṛcchreṇa anuṣṭhānam pradarśayitum udāhṛtam tāvat ekam vākyam anyāni api santi iti āha sādhana iti 
NSu_3.4.45ef.1–3.4.48.1	 sādhana vaiśeṣyam api sarvatra kathyate sādhakānām sādhana vaicitryam sarvatra api grantheṣu tāni vākyāni paṭhati durjñeyam iti durjñeyam ghora rūpasya trailokya dhvaṃsinaḥ prabhoḥ daivataiḥ munibhiḥ siddhaiḥ mahā yogibhiḥ eva ca prabhoḥ nṛsiṃhasya dhyāna cakram devatā ādibhiḥ durjñeyam kutas ghoram bhayaṅkaram rūpam asya iti tathā uktaḥ trailokyam dhvaṃsitum śīlam asya iti eva śabdena na saṃjñā mātreṇa mahā yoginaḥ kintu arthataḥ eva iti āha tat eva uktam nitya muktaiḥ ityādinā nitya yuktaiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ vimukta kleśa sādhvasaiḥ mahā utsāhaiḥ mahā dhairyaiḥ sattva sthaiḥ vyavasāyibhiḥ atīta anāgata jñāna prabhava apyaya vedibhiḥ śauca svādhyāya santoṣa tapassatya dayā anvitaiḥ 
NSu_3.4.49.1–3.4.49.2	 kimu martyaiḥ bhaya bhrānti dhvaṃsa moha rujā anvitaiḥ alpa āyuḥ vīrya dhī sattva vyavasāya śruti vrataiḥ sarvadā dhyāna ādi udyogavadbhiḥ bhāgaḥ bhāgyam indriya jaya ādi mohaḥ mithyājñānam kleśāḥ avidyāyāḥ sādhvasam vighna ādi bhayam na kevalam sadā udyuktāḥ kintu sa ca udyogaḥ mahān iti ucyate mahā utsāhaiḥ iti sattvasyaiḥ sadā sattva guṇa pracuraiḥ vyavasāyaḥ niścayaḥ jñāna śabdena jñeyam upalakṣyate atīta anāgatāni jñānāni prabhāva apyayau sṛṣṭi saṃhārau ca vettum śīlam eṣām iti tathā uktāḥ prabhāva apyayajñānasya mahā phala tvāt pṛthak uktiḥ martyaiḥ durjñeyam iti kimu vaktavyam dhvaṃsaḥ manaḥ viśaraṇam mohaḥ ajñānam śrutiḥ śravaṇam atra vaihāyasa saṃhitā vākye deva ādibhyaḥ manuṣyāṇām alpam sādhanam iti sphuṭam pratīyate mānuṣa tva apagama anantaram a adhikam bhaviṣyati iti ced na mānuṣa tva ādeḥ anapagamasya anantaram eva vakṣyamāṇa tvāt 
NSu_3.4.50.1–3.4.51.2	 kaḥ tam madāmadam devam mad anyaḥ jñātum arhati brahma eva kiñcid jānāti na tad anyaḥ hi kaścana kaḥ tām iti śrutiḥ yama vākyam sura asurāṇām sukha duḥkha hetu tvāt madāmadaḥ anena yamasya anyebhyaḥ jñāna ādhikyam ucyate brahma eva iti anena brahmaṇaḥ atas eva mad anyaḥ iti brahma ādīn vinā iti vyākhyeyam muktānām api siddhānām nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ su durlabhaḥ praśānta ātmā koṭiṣu api mahāmate muktānām iti bhāgavata vākye muktānām śarīra ādi abhimāna rahitānām siddhānām jñāninām koṭiṣu api nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ praśānta ātmā su durlabhaḥ kaścid eva nārāyaṇāyanāḥ śānta ātmānaḥ tu sarve api iti a sphuṭam sādhana tāratamyam pratīyate atra viśeṣaṇa dvayena vairāgya bhaktī kathyete 
NSu_3.4.52.1–3.4.52.2	 iyam visṛṣṭiḥ yatas ā babhūva yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na yaḥ asya adhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman tsaḥ aṅga veda yadi vā na veda iyam visṛṣṭiḥ iti mantrasya ayam arthaḥ iyam pratyakṣa ādi siddhā vividhā sṛṣṭiḥ yatas hiraṇyagarbhādā samantāt babhūva yaḥ ca asya prapañcasya adhyakṣaḥ adhipatiḥ saḥ api paramātmānam parame vyoman vyāmni hṛdaya ākāśe yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na tathā veda yadi vā na aṅga iti kasyacid sambuddhiḥ itara apekṣayā adhikyena dhyāyati jānāti ca kārtsyena tu na dhyāyati na jānāti ca iti vyoman= iti saptamyāḥ luc yaḥ asya saḥ aṅgā iti prakṛtyā antar pādam avyaparaḥ iti prakṛti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_3.4.53.1–3.4.53.2	 yaḥ sva ātma māyā vibhavam svayam gataḥ na aham nabhasvān= tam atha apare kutas brahmā api yam vetti na eva iha samyak anye kutas deva muni indra martyāḥ yaḥ sva ātma māyā ityādiṣu bhāgavata vacaneṣu kaimutya uktyā jñāna tāratamyam avagamyate yaḥ bhagavān sva ātma māyāyāḥ vibhavam sva rūpa mahimnaḥ vistaram svayam eva gataḥ jñānavān brahma vākyam idam yam harim iha jīveṣu 
NSu_3.4.54.1–3.4.55.2	 namaḥ te amita tattvāya dharma ādīnām ca sūtaye nirguṇāya ca sat kāṣṭhām na aham veda apare kutas tattvam sva rūpam sūtiḥ kāraṇam yasya sat kāṣṭhām samyak diś mātram brahma vākyam idam na aham parāyuḥ ṛṣayaḥ na marīci mukhyāḥ jānanti yat viracitam khalu sattva saṅgāḥ yat māyayā muṣita cetasaḥ īśa daitya martya ādayaḥ kim uta śaśvat abhadra vṛttāḥ na aham para āyuḥ iti śiva vacanam yat viracitam yasya caritram īśa iti bhagavat sambuddhiḥ 
NSu_3.4.56.1–3.4.58.2	 aham mahā indraḥ nirṛtiḥ pracetāḥ somaḥ agniḥ īśaḥ pavanaḥ arkaḥ viriñcaḥ āditya viśve vasavaḥ atha sādhyāḥ marut gaṇāḥ rudra gaṇāḥ sa siddhāḥ anye ca ye viśvasṛjaḥ amara īśāḥ bhṛgu ādayaḥ aspṛṣṭa rajaḥ tamaskāḥ yasya īhitam na viduḥ spṛṣṭṛ māyāḥ sattva pradhānāḥ api kim tatas anye sa varsya ādau smṛtaḥ brahmā tasmāt devāt anantaraḥ jānāti deva pravaram bhūyas ca atas adhikam nṛpa aham iti yama vacanam īhitam ca iṣyitam sarvasya prapañcasya ādau smṛtaḥ ādyatayā pramitaḥ atas jñāni vargāt bhūyas adhikam atiśayena adhikam 
NSu_3.4.59.1–3.4.62.2	 na tvām atiśayiṣyanti muktau= api kathañcana mad bhakti yogāt jñānāt ca sarvān atiśayiṣyasi yathā bhakti viśeṣaḥ atra dṛśyate puruṣottame tathā mukti viśeṣaḥ api jñāninām liṅga bhedane sāyujyam samanuprāptāḥ api deva ādayaḥ akhilāḥ tāratamyāt hi tiṣṭhanti tāratamyam hi sādhane manuṣyāṇām sahasreṣu kaścid yatati siddhaye yatatām api siddhānām kaścid mām vetti tattvataḥ na tvām iti brahmāṇam prati bhagavat vākyam atra saṃsāre liṅga bhedane liṅga śarīra bhaṅge jāte sati siddhaye jñānasya yatatām api madhye kecid siddhāḥ bhavanti siddhānām madhye iti yojyam tattvataḥ prācuryeṇa ekam ca tattvataḥ jñātum iti yathā 
NSu_3.4.63.1–3.4.66.2	 yaḥ imam paramam guhyam mad bhakteṣu abhidhāsyati bhaktim mayi parām kṛtvā mām eva eṣyati asaṃśayaḥ na ca tasmāt manuṣyeṣu kaścid me priya kṛttamaḥ bhavitā na ca me tasmāt anyaḥ priyataraḥ bhuvi adhyeṣyate ca yaḥ imam dharmyam saṃvādam āvayoḥ jñāna yajñena tena aham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ śraddhāvānana sūyuḥ ca śṛṇuyāt api yaḥ naraḥ saḥ api muktaḥ śubhān lokān prāpnuyāt puṇya karmaṇām imam iti vyākhyātuḥ adhyetuḥ śrotuḥ ca tāratamyam ucyate vyākhyāna ādi prācuryam ca pratyekam mokṣa sādhanam iti anyatra uktam 
NSu_3.4.67.1–3.4.69.1	 dhyānena ātmani paśyanti kecid ātmānam ātmanā anye sāṅkhayena yogena karma yogena ca apare anye tu evam ajānantaḥ śrutvā anyebhyaḥ upāsate te api ca atitaranti eva mṛtyum śruti parāyaṇāḥ dhyānena iti asya bhagavat pāda kṛtam gītātātparya gatam vyākhyānam draṣṭavyam su sūkṣmaiḥ api aśeṣaiḥ ca viśeṣaiḥ saha paśyati sva ātmānam bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarva rūpaḥ api sarvadā 
NSu_3.4.70.1–3.4.73.1	 savartra ca anyat api evam tena adṛṣṭam na hi kvacid sarvatra sarva daiveśam paśyati eva ramā api tu na tu sarvaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ tam paśyanti api anyatas adhikam sva ātmānam anyat ca aśeṣam paśyati eva hi sarvadā brahmā tu sarvagam paśyet guṇān api atas adhikam na tu sarveṣu kāleṣu tathā paśyati amukti gaḥ muktaḥ tu sarvadā paśyet sarva ga tvena ca api tu na ramā vat viśeṣāṇām darśanam śaknuyāt kvacid 
NSu_3.4.74.1–3.4.74.2	 sva ātmānam anyat ca sadā viśeṣaiḥ akhilaiḥ api paśyanti añjaḥ tathā vāṇī viśoṣān= tāvataḥ na tu traiguṇyāt paratas paśyet vyāptam śataguṇam harim su sūkṣmaiḥ ityādinā sarveṣām jñāna tāratamyam ucyate svatas anyat viśvam api evam paśyati api tu kintu tarhi bhagavat samānā kim iti praśna arthaḥ anyatas jñāna vargāt adhikam paśyanti api sarvaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ yuktam tam na eva paśyati viṣṇoḥ svasmāt ca anyat aśeṣam anyatas sarasvatī ādeḥ adhikam paśyet brahmaṇaḥ api avasthā bhedena viśeṣaḥ ucyate na tu sarveṣu iti tathā sarva gata tvena sarasvatī ādi dṛṣṭa adhika guṇa tvena savargata tvena ca iti caśabdena ukta guṇavat tvam samuccinoti tarhi muktasya brahmaṇaḥ rama asāmyam kim iti praśnaḥ api tu iti darśanam kartum anyat bhagavataḥ yatha brahma rama adṛṣṭāt na paśyati tathā yāvantaḥ brahma dṛṣṭāḥ tāvataḥ 
NSu_3.4.75.1–3.4.79.1	 giriśaḥ garuḍaḥ ca eva tamaḥ mātra gatam harim paśyet viśeṣān api hi vāṇī dṛṣṭān na paśyati umā suparṇī ca mahat tattvam yāvat prapaśyati rudra dṛṣṭān viśeṣān= ca na eva paśyet kadācana svarūpam anya rūpam ca muktāḥ devāḥ samastaśas jānanti indraḥ ca kāmaḥ ca brahma yāvat ahaṅkṛtiḥ paśyantaḥ manu dakṣa ādyāḥ buddhi tattva sthitam harim paśyanti soma sūryau tu mana stham parameśvaram anye bhūta sthitam viṣṇum devāḥ paśyanti sarvadā bahu sāhasra varṣeṇa mahat tattve kvacid kvacid 
NSu_3.4.80.1–3.4.80.3	 anye ca eva yathāyogya maṇḍa antar vartinam harim śvetadvīpa patim ca eva hṛdi eva anye tu kecana kadācid eva tatra api kecid paśyanti keśavam tamaḥ guṇa mātra gatam eva iti sambandhaḥ paśyet iti ādeḥ pratyekam sambandhaḥ anya rūpam sva adhama rūpam bahu sāhasra varṣeṇa iti bahu sahasra varṣa anuṣṭhita sādhanena kvacid kvacid iti mahat tattva pravibhāgān abhipraiti yathāyogam eva kecana śvetadvīpa patim eva tatra āpa hṛdi api parimāṇa darśana vat viśeṣa darśane tāratamyam na vispaṣṭam uktam atas āha umā iti 
NSu_3.4.81.1–3.4.82.3	 umā yāvat ananta aṃśān pūrva dṛṣṭebhyaḥ eva tu viśeṣān vāsudevasya paścāt uktāḥ vicakṣate śakra kāma ādayaḥ ca eva viśeṣān brahmaṇi sthitān umā ādibhiḥ prabuddhebhyaḥ śata aṃśān eva cakṣate umā paryantam tu paścāt paścāt uktāḥ pūrva pūrvaiḥ dṛṣṭebhyaḥ dṛṣṭānām ananta aṃśān eva vāsudevasya viśeṣa śanvicakṣate śakra kāma ādayaḥ ca iti caḥ tu arthaḥ eva śabdasya uma ādibhiḥ eva iti anvayaḥ prabuddhebhyaḥ iti pūrvavat ṣaṣṭhayarthe cakṣate paśyanti udāhṛtānām vacanānām prayojanam āha ityādi iti 
NSu_3.4.83.1–3.4.83.3	 ityādi veda smṛti gavacanebhyaḥ yathārthataḥ tāratamyam vimuktānām sādhanānām ca dṛśyate yathārthataḥ iti na para matā anuvāda rūpeṇa iti arthaḥ muktānām ca sādhanānām ca iti yojanā sādhana tāratamya pratipādanāya udāhṛteṣu eve keṣucid vākyeṣu muktānām tāratamyam pratīyate tat api prakṛta tvāt grāhyam iti arthaḥ astu mumukṣūṇām sādhaneṣu tāratamyam mā ca bhūmnokṣe tāratamyam iti āśaṅkāyām prāc bādhakam uktam idānīm śaṅkā eva eṣā na upapadyate dūre dūṣaṇa abhidhānam iti āha sādhyeti 
NSu_3.4.84a.1–3.4.84a.2	 sādhya sādhana vairūpyam sādhyam avicitram sādhanam vicitram iti sādhya sādhanayoḥ vairūpyam kena bījena kalpyate śaṅkayate na kena api ayam abhisandhiḥ pakṣe vipakṣa tva śaṅkā khalu kenacid bījena syāt nirbījam śaṅkamānaḥ na laukikaḥ na api parīkṣakaḥ iti unmattaḥ iva upekṣaṇīyaḥ bījam ca vyabhicāra darśanam vā upādhi daśarnam vā tayoḥ anyatara śaṅkā vā tatra ādyam tāvat iha na asti tat idam āha adṛṣṭam iti 
NSu_3.4.84b.1–3.4.84b.3	 adṛṣṭam kena kalpyate na api dvitīyam pakṣe sādhya sadbhāvasya śruti ādi siddha tvena yasya kasyacid āśaṅkayamānasya avaśyam sādhya vyāpaka tva abhāvena upādhi tva asambhavāt pakṣe api tad vṛttau sādhana vyāpaka tvāt atas eva upādhi śaṅkā api nirastāḥ tatas vyabhicāra śaṅkā api udāhṛta vākyaiḥ vyāpteḥ ukta tvāt atas bīja abhāvāt śaṅkā eva eṣā anupapannā iti īśvaraḥ mumukṣubhyaḥ vicitram phalam dadāti vicitra sādhanaiḥ ārādhita tvāt vicitra sādhanāni apekṣya phala dātṛ tvāt iti anumāna antaram hṛdi nidhāya anyathā asi siddhi nirāsa artham vipakṣe bādhakam āha vaiṣamyam iti 
NSu_3.4.84cd.1–3.4.84cd.3	 vaiṣamyam nirghṛṇa tvam ca tena syātām parasya ca tena sādhya sādhana vairūpyeṇa dvitīyaḥ caśabdaḥ pramāṇa antara sūcana arthaḥ yadi īśvaraḥ anuṣṭhita alpa sādhanāya anuṣṭhita mahā sādhana samāna phalam dadyāt tadā asau viṣamaḥ prasajyeta yadi vā anuṣṭhita mahā sādhanāya anuṣṭhita alpa sādhana samāna phalam dadyāt tadā nirghṛṇaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ īśvarasya vaiṣamya ādi āpattiḥ na aniṣyā duḥkha ādi ahetu tvāt iti ataḥ āha sa apekṣa tvāt iti 
NSu_3.4.84ef.1–3.4.84ef.3	 sa apekṣa tvāt iti ca tau vidyā adhīśena vāritau anena vaiṣamya nairghaṇye vā sa apekṣa tvāt a iti sūtram upādatte tau ca iti sambandhaḥ tau vaiṣamya nairghaṇya lakṣaṇau doṣau yat hi pramāṇa viruddham aprāmāṇikam vā tat ucyate aniṣyam iti vaiṣamyaṃceśvarasya sūtrakāreṇa vārita tvāt pramāṇa viruddham iti katham na aniṣyam aṅgīkṛta sūtra prāmāṇyān pratyayam yatnaḥ iti na asaṅgatiḥ ye tu sūtra prāmāṇyam anaṅgīkṛtya īśvarasya vaiṣamya ādi āpatteḥ iṣṭa tvam manyante tān prati vedā prāmāṇya hetutvena vaiṣamya ādeḥ deṣa tvam sūcayitum pulliṅga nirdeśaḥ anyathā prakaraṇāt te vārite iti avakṣyat napuṃsaka prayoge api dūṣaṇe iti śakyate jñātum iti ced na te vaiṣamyanaiḥ ghṛṇye iti nirākāṅkṣa tvāt prasaṅgasya viparyaye payarvasānam upapādayati tāratamyāt iti 
NSu_3.4.85.1–3.4.85.3	 tāratamyāt sādhanānām sādhya tāt ṛktavam īśataḥ avaiṣamyādi hetuḥ syāt sadā eva parameśvare sādhanānām tāratamyāt sadā eva niyamena īśataḥ bhavataḥ sādhyasya tāratamyam parameśvare avaiṣamya ādi hetuḥ syāt āpādaka viparyayasya khalu āpādi avipayaryam prati nirvāhaka tve bhavet prasaṅgasya viparyaya paryavasānam niragnika tva viparyayaḥ hi nirdhūma tva viparyayam ghaṭayati asti ca etat prakṛtaḥ iti yat vā katham vaiṣamya ādi sūtrakāreṇa vāritam iti atas sa apekṣa tvasya vaiṣamya ādi a bhāvena saha hetu hetum at bhāvam vyutpādayati tāratamyāt iti pūrvā eva yojanā 
NSu_3.4.85.4	 vyartham idam sūtrakārasya sādhana saṃskāra pūrva karma apekṣā aṅgīkāreṇa vaiṣamya ādi nivāraṇam phale tad parihāre api sādhana ādau parihartum aśakyatvāt tathā hi sādhana ādau parameśvarasya prayojaka tvam asti na vā na iti pakṣe parameśvara tva hāniḥ ādye nirnimittam vicitrāṇi sādhanāni prayojayataḥ katham na vaiṣamya ādi iti atas anupapannasya sūtrasya katham bādhaka tvam iti mā evam asya ākṣepasya sūtra kṛtā eva nirasta tvāt iti āha svātantryaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.86a–3.4.86d.3	 svātantrye vidyamāne api sādhana ādau pareśituḥ apekṣya anādi vaicitṛyam na doṣaḥ iti tad vacaḥ svātantryam prayojaka kartṛ tvāt vaicitryam sādhana ādeḥ apekṣya preraṇāt iti śeṣaḥ doṣaḥ vaiṣamya ādiḥ tat vacaḥ sūtra kṛtaḥ vacaḥ asti nanu evam savartra sa apekṣasya hareḥ svātantrya hāniḥ deṣaḥ syāt iti atas āha svatantryaḥ iti ayam api doṣaḥ na asti katham pareśituḥ sādhana ādau svātantrye vidyamāne api sva icchayā anādi vaicitryam apekṣya preraka tvam iti etad artha pratipādakam tat vacaḥ asti yatas iti kim tat vacaḥ iti atas krameṇa sūtra dvayam paṭhati nānā ādi tvāt iti 
NSu_3.4.86ef.1–3.4.87d.2	 nānā ādi tvāt iti hi uktam upapadyate iti api tatra ādya doṣa parihārāyana karma avibhāgāt iti ced nānādi tvāt a itrata sūtraṃ upādatte dvitīya parihārāya aupapadyate ca a iti evam anumānasya anyathā siddhim nirasya bādhaka pratirodhau nirākaroti apekṣya iti apekṣya upāya vaiṣamyam upeyasya tathā sthitiḥ mayā kayā viruddhā syāt tathā sthitiḥ viṣamateśvareṇa kriyate iti sādhyamānā iti śeṣaḥ mayā pramāṇena kayā na kayā api paramam sāmyam iti ādeḥ anyathā vyākhyāta tvat iti bhāvaḥ anumāna ādeḥ vyāpti pratipattaye dṛṣṭāntam āha rājā ādau= iti  rāja ādau= api dṛśyate prekṣāvati rāja ādau sevā anurūpa phala dānam vaiparītya kartari aprekṣāvati vaiṣamya ādikam ca dṛśyate iti arthaḥ sādhya sādhana vairūpya kalpane bādhaka antaram āha tyāgaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.88a–3.4.88d.1	 tyāgaḥ dṛṣṭasya ca adṛṣṭa kalpanā iti su duṣkarau māyibhyaḥ anyena kena api sarvatra sādhya sādhana eka rūpyasya dṛṣṭa tvāt tat vairūpyasya kvāpi adṛṣṭa tvāt prakṛta vairūpyam śaṅkamānasya dṛṣṭa tyāgaḥ adṛṣṭa kalpanā ca iti doṣau prasajyete na ca syātām tau= iti śakyate vaktum prekṣāvatā kena api anaṅgīkṛta tvāt iti āha su duṣkaram iti māyā vādinaḥ dṛṣṭam prapañcasya satya tva ādikam tyajanti adṛṣṭam anirvācya ādikam kalpayanti atas māyibhyaḥ anyena iti uktam asya ca uttaratra upayogaḥ anyaiḥ akṛtam api dṛṣṭa tyāga ādikam kurvatām kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha tat kim iti  tat kim anyaiḥ ca vādibhiḥ 
NSu_3.4.89a.1–3.4.89a.4	 māyinaḥ atra anugamyante tat tarhi kim iti gūḍha abhiprāyaḥ praśnaḥ atra dṛṣṭa tyāga ādi anuṣṭhāna viṣaye anugamyante anusriyante etat uktam bhavati dṛṣṭa tyāga ādi prasaṅgena māyā vādinaḥ dūṣayatām punar atra dṛṣṭa tyāga ādikam svayam kurvatām vyāhatiḥ syāt iti sādhya sādhanayoḥ vairūpyam śaṅkamānasya aniṣya antaram āha śrutā iti ukta vidhayā sādhya sādhana sārūpyasya śruta tvāt anyathā ca aśruta tvāt atra vairūpya aṅgīkāre śruta hānya śruta grahau= api syātām māyinām liṅge iti tayoḥ viśeṣaṇam prayuñjānasya uktaḥ eva abhisandhiḥ māyā vādinaḥ hi śrutam sārvajña ādi upetam brahma parityajya aśrutam nirguṇam upayanti dṛṣṭa tyāga ādi catuṣyayam kurvatām bādhaka antaram āha tat iti 
NSu_3.4.89b–3.4.89d.3	 śruta hānya śruta grahau api atra māyinām liṅge tat ke doṣāḥ tatas adhikāḥ tat tatra prakṛta doṣeṣu tatas dṛṣṭa tyāgāt eṣaḥ adhikāḥ bahis bhūtāḥ dṛṣṭa tyāga ādikam kurvāṇena anyat api pramitam tyājyam syāt adṛṣṭa kalpanādikam ca kurvata aprāmāṇikam anyat api kalpanīyam bhavet iti bhāvaḥ syāt etat yadi muktāḥ tāratamya upetāḥ syuḥ tadā parasparam dveṣavantaḥ syuḥ iti pratikūla tarka parāhatam mukta tāratamya anumānam iti atas āha niśśeṣa iti 
NSu_3.4.90.1–3.4.90.2	 niśśeṣa gata doṣāṇām bahubhiḥ janmabhiḥ punar syāt āparokṣyam hi hareḥ dveṣa īrṣyādiḥ tatas kutas niśśeṣeṇa gatāḥ apagatāḥ doṣāḥ yebhyāḥ te tathā uktāḥ punar śravaṇa ādimatām iti śeṣaḥ teṣām hareḥ āparokṣyam iti tān prati hareḥ āparokṣyam iti arthaḥ anubandha ādibhyaḥ iti atra pratipāditaḥ ayam arthaḥ iti hi śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe vā dveṣa īrṣyā ādi doṣaḥ tatas tasmāt kutas muktānām na apādayitum śakyate iti arthaḥ 
NSu_3.4.90.3	 etat uktam bhavati ye tāratamya upetāḥ te dveṣa adimantaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yathā laukikāḥ puruṣāḥ iti khalu atra vyāptiḥ abhidhātavyā naca evam laukikānām dveṣa ādimattve doṣi tvasya eva prayojaka tvāt yatra dveṣa ādimattvam tatra doṣi tvam ita vyāpteḥ darśanam na ca doṣi tvam mukteṣu sambhavati aupādhikāḥ hi teṣu doṣāḥ vaktavyāḥ svābhāvikānām śaṅkitum aśakyatvāt te ca bhagavat sākṣāt kāra udayāt prāk eva prācuryeṇa gatāḥ sākṣātkāreṇa ca sa mūla ghātam hatāḥ muktau ca upādheḥ eva apagata tvāt na īṣat api sthātum arhati atas vyāpaka abhāvāḥ dvayāpi asya api abhāvaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.90.4–3.4.90.5	 nanu pareṇa api na mukteṣu dveṣa ādimattvam sādhyate kintvā āpādyate iti tatas stebhyaḥ ta dvayā vṛtti sādha nam asaṅgatam mā evam tarka mūla bhūta vyāptau= upādhiḥ khalu atra kathitaḥ tasya ca pakṣā dvaya āvṛttiḥ sva vyāvṛttyā vivakṣita dharma vyāvartana śaktiḥ ca āvaśyaka iti tad vyutpādanasya kriyamāṇa tvāt atra dveṣa īrṣyā santāpa pareṣya pratighāta prayatna icchāḥ vyāpyāḥ avidyā ahaṅkāra ādyāḥ vyāpakāḥ iti vivekaḥ doṣāṇām eva dveṣa ādau prayojaka tvam iti etam artham pareṇa api svīkārayitum pratibandī gṛhṇāti bhaveyuḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.91ab.1–3.4.91ab.3	 bhaveyuḥ yadi ca īrṣi ā ādyāḥ sameṣu api kutas na te tāratamye aṅgīkṛte muktānām īrṣi ādayaḥ yadi bhaveyuḥ yadi āpādi ante tadā mukteṣu sameṣu aṅgīkṛteṣu api kutas na bhaveyuḥ yadi muktāḥ tāratamya upetāḥ tadā dveṣa ādimantaḥ syuḥ iti vadatā na dveṣa ādimantaḥ tasmāt samā eva iti vācyam na ca sāmyam api aṅgīkartum śakyate yadi muktāḥ samāḥ syuḥ tadā dveṣa ādimantaḥ syuḥ iti tatra api aniṣya prasaṅgāt iti arthaḥ sāmye katham dveṣa ādi prasaṅgaḥ iti ata para prasaṅga vat sāmyasya api dveṣa ādi sāhacaryam dṛṣṭam iti āha tapyamānāḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.91c–3.4.91f.4	 tapyamānāḥ samān dṛṣṭvā dveṣa īrṣyā ādi yutāḥ api dṛśyante bahavaḥ loke doṣāḥ eva atra kāraṇam sama sattā mātram na āpādaka tvena vivakṣitam atiprasaṅgāt kintu sama darśanam eva iti āśayena uktam samān dṛṣṭvā iti pratibandī grahaṇasya prayojanam āha doṣāḥ iti doṣāṇām samuditānām eva kāraṇa tvam iti eka vacanam evam asmābhiḥ sāmya vādinam pratyatiprasaṅge abhihite tena etat eva vaktavyam atra loke doṣāḥ eva dveṣa ādeḥ kāraṇam anvaya vyatirekābhyām tad niścayāt na tu sāmyam sati api sāmye sakhiṣu abhāvāt asati api kvacid bhāvāt na ca mukteṣu doṣāḥ santi atas sāmye api na doṣa ādi prasaṅgaḥ iti atas kim iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.4.92ab.1–3.4.92ab.3	 yadi nirdoṣa tā tatra kimādhikyena dūṣyate yadi evam doṣāṇām eva dveṣa ādi kāraṇa tvam tatra mukteṣu nirdeṣa tā ca aṅgīkṛtā tadā ādhikyena hīna adhika bhāvena aṅgīkṛtena kim dūṣyate na kim api sāmyam aṅgīkurvāṇena api nirdeṣa tayā eva dveṣa ādi prasaṅgaḥ vāraṇīyaḥ tāratamyam aṅgī kurvāṇaiḥ asmābhiḥ api tathā eva nirākariṣyate iyān= tu viśeṣaḥ yat tāratamyam pramitam na sāmyam iti samudāya arthaḥ śaṅkate yadi iti 
NSu_3.4.92cd.1–3.4.92cd.2	 yadi anya darśana abhāvādīrṣi ādiḥ vinivāryate bhavet etat yadi sāmyena prasaktam dveṣa ādikam nirdeṣa tayā nivārayāmaḥ naca evam kinnāma sama sattā mātram hi na dveṣa ādi kāraṇam ati prasaṅgāt api tarhi sama darśanam na ca muktaḥ samam muktā antaram paśyati atas na dveṣa ādi iti evam tarhi na tāratamya sattā mātram dveṣa ādi kāraṇam kintu svatas adhika darśanam eva na ca muktaḥ svatas adhikam mukta antaram paśyati tasmāt sati api tāratamye na dveṣa ādi prasaṅgaḥ iti kutas na santoṣyavyam iti parihāraḥ atra śakyate vaktum tathā api na asau tāttvikaḥ iti anya darśana abhāvam eva dūṣayati adarśanāt iti 
NSu_3.4.92ef.1–3.4.92ef.3	 adarśanāt arati ādiḥ katham tena nivāryate evam anya darśana abhāvena dveṣa ādikam nivārayatā tena adarśanāt prasaktam arati ādikam katham nivāryate aratiḥ sukha abhāvaḥ ādipadena tandrī bhayam ca gṛhyate etat uktam bhavati syāt ayam parihāraḥ yadi muktasya anya darśana abhāvaḥ sambhavet naca evam muktaḥ hi na tāvat acetanaḥ apasiddhānta prasaṅgāt tatas cetanasya sataḥ anya darśana abhāve arati ādikam prasajyate iti nanu bahirmukhāḥ eva anya darśana abhāve arati ādikam prāpnuvanti na ca muktāḥ tathā atas nārati ādi prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha brahmaṇaḥ api iti 
NSu_3.4.93ab.1–3.4.93f.3	 brahmaṇaḥ api aratiḥ dṛṣṭvā pūrvam ekākinaḥ śrutau jñānam apratigham yasya vairāgyam ca jagatpateḥ aiśvaryam ca eva dharmaḥ ca saha siddham catuṣyayam a iti evam pramitasya api iti arthaḥ pūrvam ādi kāle śrutau= iti jātau= eka vacanam tāḥ śrutīḥ arthataḥ paṭhati na eva iti na eva reme sa ca ekākī tasamān na ramate kvacid dvitīyam aicchat tena asau= iti śrutayaḥ ūdire anena sa vai na eva reme tasmāt ekākī na ramate sa dvitīyam aicchat iti vākyam upādatte syāt etat yadi anya darśana abhāva mātram arati ādeḥ kāraṇam syāt naca evam kintu anya darśana icchāyām tad abhāvaḥ muktasya tu icchā eva na asti atas anya darśana abhāve api nārati ādikam prasajyate iti āśaṅkayā āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.4.94.1–3.4.94.2	 yadi icchā tatra na eva asti iti eva tat kalpyate mṛṣā śruti ukta nirdoṣa tā eva kim na aṅgīkriyate svayam tat tatra muktau tatra anya darśana viṣaye icchā na eva asti iti mṛṣā eva kalpya teyadi iti yojanā bhidyate hṛdaya granthiḥ iti ādi śruti uktā svayam sākṣācchati uktā iti sambandhaḥ tarhi iti śeṣaḥ tad śabdaḥ vā tarhi arthaḥ idam uktam bhavati muktānām sāmyam aṅgīkṛtya anya darśana abhāvena dveṣa ādi parihṛtya anya darśana icchā bhāvena cārati ādikam pariharataḥ aprāmāṇika aneka kalpanam prāmāṇika parityāgaḥ ca syātām 
NSu_3.4.94.3–3.4.94.4	 sāmānya darśana abhāvena abhāvavata dicchā bhāvā nām aprāmāṇika tvāt tāratamya ādeḥ prāmāṇika tvāt tatas varam tāratamyam aṅgīkṛtya dveṣa ādi nirāsāya śrauta nirdeṣa tā svīkāraḥ iti etena tāratamyam sāmyam vā aṅgīkṛtya nirdeṣa tvena dveṣa ādi samādhānam vidhātavyam iti sandehaḥ api nirastaḥ veditavyaḥ uktam eva spaṣṭam āha tāratamyam ca iti 
NSu_3.4.95.1–3.4.95.3	 tāratamyam ca kāmam ca śrutam eva atihāya tu aśrutā sama tā kena kalpyate yukti māninā anya darśanam ca iti api grāhyam sa yaḥ manuṣyāṇām rāddhaḥ kāmasya yatra āptāḥ kāmāḥ akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyaḥ a ityādyau śrutam na hi anya darśana abhāve sakhyam sambhavati samatā iti anya darśana abhāva icchā bhāvayoḥ api upalakṣaṇam yuktim manyate iti yukta mānī yuktau bahu mānavatā kena api evam na kalpyate iti arthaḥ prāmāṇika parityāgā prāmāṇika svīkāra prasaṅgaḥ hi tarkāpara nāmikā yuktiḥ nanu samatāyāḥ aśruta tve api na aprāmāṇika tvam na hi śrutiḥ eva pramāṇam iti atas āha kim tat iti 
NSu_3.4.96ab.1–3.4.96cd.2	 kim tat mānam sama tve te muktānām upalabhyate na kiñcid ta= chateḥ anyat atas pramāṇa antara abhāve aśruta tvena aprāmāṇika tvam eva siddhayati yadi anya darśana abhāvāt ityādinā uktam upasaṃharati vṛthā iti vṛthā ayam āgrahaḥ kena śruta hānya śruta grahe kena na kena api kāraṇena śruta hāni aśruta grahaḥ iti dvandva eka vat bhāvaḥ śruta hāni sahitaḥ aśruta grahaḥ iti vā viṣaya saptamīyam tatas na kāryaḥ iti bhāvaḥ muktānām tāratamye anumāna antaram āha mokṣe api iti 
NSu_3.4.97ab.1–3.4.97ab.3	 mokṣe api tāratami a itas cetana tvāt purā yathā tāratamyena itas prāptaḥ tāratamyavān iti yāvat purā saṃsāre nanu atra saṃsāre vartamānam kam api pakṣīkṛtya ayam tāratamyeta iti sādhyate tatra ca mokṣe api iti siddha sādhana tā parihārāya viśeṣaṇam upādīyate iti vā mokṣe api iti anena muktam pakṣīkṛtya tāratamyeta iti vā muktam pakṣīkṛtya tāratamyeta iti sādhyate tatra prācīnena tāratamyena siddha sādhana tā parihārāya mokṣe api iti viśeṣaṇam upādīyate iti vā na ādyaḥ tasya nitya saṃsāri tvasya api sambhavena bādhāpatteḥ niścita mokṣa puruṣa viśeṣa pakṣīkāre api dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tvāt na hi saṃsārī mukti gata tāratamya upetaḥ dvitīye apipada vaiyarthyam prāktana tāratamya upeta tvena siddha sādhana tā ca tṛtīye api dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vikala tā eva tāratamya upeta tvam ca hīna adhika sadbhāvaḥ vā anyatara sadbhāvaḥ vā 
NSu_3.4.97ab.4–3.4.97ab.6	 ādye parameśvare anaikāntyam dvitīye siddha sādhana tā muktānām api amuktebhyaḥ adhika tvasya pareṇa aṅgīkṛta tvāt mukta adhika tva sādhane devadatte vyabhicāraḥ tat katham etat ucyate muktāḥ tadānīntanena parasparam tāratamyena upetāḥ cetana tvāt saṃsāriṇaḥ yathā iti ayam arthaḥ atra vivakṣitaḥ tāratamyam ca kutaścid hīna tvam kutaścid adhika tvam iti etayoḥ anyatarat iti na ukta doṣaḥ sāmānyasya ca viśeṣa nirāsena apākaraṇe ca atiprasaṅgaḥ yat vā makti uttara kṣaṇa vartī muktaḥ prāk yatas adhika tva hīna tvābhyām upeta svarūpaḥ abhūt idānīm api tābhyām upete iti pratijñā arthaḥ vaṇarnīyaḥ sāmānyatas eva vyāptiḥ abhidhātavyā iti ābhāsā an uddharati iti uktaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.97c.1–3.4.97d.3	 iti uktaḥ uttaram kim te ukte pratyukte vyāpti pakṣa dharma tvayoḥ pramita tvāt na kim api uttaram asti iti bhāvaḥ bādhita viṣayam anumānam iti atas āha kalpanā iti  kalpanā mātra vādinaḥ kalpanā mātreṇa vadati iti tathā uktaḥ pūrveṇa eva sambandhaḥ śrutī nām anya artha tvāt pramāṇa antarasya ca abhāvāt sva utprekṣayā eva muktānām tāratamya abhāvam vadataḥ tava uttaram kim iti yadi evam anumīyeta tadā muktāḥ duḥkha ādi upetāḥ cetana tvāt saṃsāri vat iti api anumīyeta iti ati prasaṅga parāhatam anumānam iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_3.4.98a.1–3.4.98b.3	 na ca duḥkha ādikam kalpyam kalpyam anumeyam muktasya ādipadena aparipūrṇa ānanda tva ādeḥ saṅgrahaḥ kutas iti atas āha nirduḥkha tvā iti  nirduḥkha tva śruteḥ balāt atra api ādi padam grāhyam ayam abhisandhiḥ samāna yogakṣema tva abhiprāyeṇa khalu ayam ati prasaṅgaḥ vācyaḥ na anyathā vyāpti abhāvāt na ca prakṛte tat asti duḥkha ādi sādhakasya nirduḥkha tva ādikam pratipādayantyā śrutyā bādhita tvāt śruteḥ apauruṣeya tvena dharmi grāhaka tvena ca anumānataḥ balavat tvāt tāratamya anumānasya ca ābādhita tvāt iti etat eva vivṛṇvan muktasya nirduḥkha tva ādi pratipādayantīḥ śrutīḥ tāvat paṭhitvā tāsām tātparyam āha śokam iti 
NSu_3.4.98cd.1–3.4.100.2	 śokam tarati ātma vettā tīrṇaḥ sarvān aduḥkha bhāj yena ānandyā iva bhavati na śocati kadācana kilbiṣa spṛt pituṣaṇiḥ aram hitaḥ iha īśvaraḥ yam yamantam abhiprepsuḥ sa saṅkalpāt bhavet iha iti ādi śrutayaḥ mānam nirduḥkha tva ādi sampadi anena tarati śokam ātma vid iti śrutim upādatte vettā veditā vicāraṇa arthasya vindateḥ vā rūpam etat tīrṇaḥ sarvān iti anena tīrṇaḥ hi tadā sarvān śokān iti aduḥkha bhāj iti anena nānā ānandam kañcid upaspṛśati iti yena iti anena tat vai jaivam manaḥ yena ānandyā iva bhavati iti atho na śocati iti eva śabdena śoka abhāve labdhe api yat punar na śocati a iti uktam tasya abhiprāyaḥ kadācana iti 
NSu_3.4.100.3–3.4.100.4	 kilpiṣa spṛt iti anena sarve nandanti yaśasā agatena sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ kilbiṣa aspṛt pitu aṣaṇiḥ hi eṣa amaram hitaḥ bhavati vā ajināya iti mantram parasparam sakhāyaḥ sarve muktāḥ āgatena svāgatena yaśasā yaśovatā sabhām sahate iti sabhāsahaḥ karmaṇi aṣ tena sakhyā parameśvareṇa nimittena nandanti katham hi yasmāt īśvaraḥ eṣām muktānām kilbiṣa spṛt duḥkham na sahate spardhateḥ arthe spardhā iti dhātu antaram tatas kvip pituṣaṇiḥ annasya dātā annam vai pituḥ iti śruteḥ ṣaṇu dāne asmādikāra pratyayaḥ ara mati artham vājināya indriyāya hitaḥ bhavati indriyam vai vājinam iti śruteḥ iha mukta viṣaye yam yam iti anena yam yamantam abhikāmaḥ bhavati saḥ asya saṅkalpāt eva bhavati iti antam sthānam iha muktau nirduḥkha tva ādi sampadi muktānām tatas kim iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_3.4.101ab.1–3.4.101cd.3	 atas duḥkha ādi anumayā na avakāśaḥ atra labhyate śruti bādhita tvāt iti arthaḥ atra mukteṣu muktāḥ duḥkha ādi upetāḥ iti pratijñāyāḥ sva vyāhata tvāt ca iti api draṣṭavyam tatas api kim iti atas āha tāratamya iti tāratamya anumā tena bhavet na ati prasaṅginī tasmāt bādhā bhāvena samāna yogakṣema tva abhāvāt mukta tāratamya sādhanam upasaṃharati śruti iti 
NSu_3.4.102.1–3.4.102.6	 śruti yukti balāt evam tāratamyam vibhāvyate muktau= api tatas ke atra virodham kartum īśate vibhāvyate samyak anubhūyate ke vādinaḥ na ke api atra mukta tāratamya viṣaye sarvathā api tu te eva ubhaya liṅgāt na ca adhikārikam api patana anumānāt tad ayogāt atra prathama adhikaraṇe anādi jñāna yogya tāvatām eva jñāna prāptiḥ na anyeṣām iti uktam dvitīye ca devatā ādi pada prāptiḥ anādi tad yogyatā upetānām eva na itareṣām iti abhihitam sā iyam jīvānām nānā vidhāna ādi yogya tā prasiddhaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ kāraṇaiḥ utkarṣāparka prāptiḥ bhavati iti vadadbhiḥ vādibhiḥ na abhyupagamyate atas tām sādhayitum āha anādi iti sarvathā api te eva ubhaya liṅgāt na ca ādhikārikam api patana anumānāt tad ayogāt 
NSu_3.4.103.1–3.4.103.2	 anādi yogyatām ca eva kali vāṇi īśvara avadhim kaḥ nivārayitum śaktaḥ yuktayā āgama bala uddhatām na kevalam muktānām tāratamyam iti ca arthaḥ anena mukta tāratamyasya api idam sādhakam iti uktam bhavati anādeḥ nitya tvāt eva śabdasya kaḥ eva iti sambandhaḥ kali vāṇi īśvara avadhī yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā yogya tāpakarṣa paramparāyāḥ kaliḥ avadhiḥ tad utkarṣa paramparāyāḥ vāṇīśvaraḥ uddhatām apratihatām katham yukti āgama siddha iti atas āgamānām sāvakāśa tva abhimānena yuktau= eva bahu mānavantam pratyādau tām āha brahmaṇaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.104.1–3.4.104.3^1	 brahmaṇaḥ anyatra ādhikya yuktaḥ kālaḥ vivādavān kālaḥ hi ayam yathā ityādi mā anumāmāninaḥ bhavet vartamāna kāle brahmā sarva adhikaḥ iti sampratipannam atas vivādavān vivāda viṣayaḥ kālaḥ iti uktam vartamāna mahā kalpa vyatiriktaḥ atītaḥ anāgataḥ ca kālaḥ etasya brahmaṇaḥ yat anyatas ādhikyam tena yuktaḥ kālaḥ hi iti kāla tvāt iti arthaḥ ayam vartamānaḥ kālaḥ yathā ādipadena ayam brahma atīta ādi kāle api anyatas adhikaḥ brahma tvāt tad kāla varti brahma vat iti ādeḥ saṅgrahaḥ anumāmāninaḥ anumāyām bahu mānavataḥ bodhāya prayoktavyā bhavet anumā māninaḥ pratītim vā brahma gatena ādhikyena kālasya sambandha abhāvāt katham anumānam iti ced na 
NSu_3.4.104.1–3.4.104.3^2	 paramparā sambandhena anumāna prāmāṇya vādibhiḥ ayam kālaḥ veda vyatiriktā idānīntana tva rahita pauruṣeyavān iti ādi anumāna apravṛtteḥ aṅgīkṛta tvāt tat idam uktam anumā māninaḥ iti brahmaṇa pada ādi abhāva kāle api sarva utkarṣa siddhau yogya tā eva sarva utkṛṣṭa an ādi nityā siddhā bhavati syāt etat pramāṇa bādhitā iyam pratijñā dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca sādhya vikalaḥ anya śabdaḥ hi ayam prakaraṇāt brahma vyatiriktam sarvam āha tatra hareḥ mahālakṣmyā ṛjubhyaḥ ca ādhikyam brahmaṇaḥ kāla traye api na asti hareḥ śriyaḥ ca adhika tvena ṛjūnām samatvena pramita tvāt iti atas āha anya śabdaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.105.1–3.4.105.3	 anya śabdaḥ hari śrī svasamebhyaḥ anya vivakṣayā prayuktaḥ na eva doṣāya sva śabdena brahmā ucyate sa ca āvartanīyaḥ svar ca sva samāḥ ca iti yadā vaktā sva vivakṣām svayam eva vyākhyāti kā atra prakaraṇa ādi apekṣā tad abhāve tasya upayogāt kathāyām tu vyaktam eva vaktavyam anyathā pratijñā antara ādīnām api evam parihāra prasaṅgāt na eva doṣāya bādha ādi hetuḥ na eva bhavati ukta nyāyam anyatra api atidiśati rudra ādiṣu ca iti 
NSu_3.4.105.1–3.4.106ab.2	 rudra ādiṣu ca yuktitaḥ anayā eva rītyā rudra ādiṣu api sā anādi yogya tā yuktyā sādhanīya iti arthaḥ vimataḥ kālaḥ asya rudrasya īśvara ādi vyatiriktāt yadādhikyam tena yuktaḥ kāla tvāt etat kāla vat ityādi muktāḥ tāvat sarve api brahmaṇaḥ adhikāḥ teṣām mukta tvāt asya saṃsāri tvāt atas anya śabda vyākhyāne te api kutas na gṛhyante iti atas āha uttama tvam tu iti uttama tvam tu muktānām api na brahmaṇaḥ bhavet atas tat agrahe na doṣaḥ iti śeṣaḥ tat katham iti atas āha vyaktiḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.106cd.1–3.4.106cd.3	 vyaktiḥ sukhasya tu bhavet natu ādhikyam sukhasya ca ādyaḥ tu śabdaḥ avadhāraṇa atharḥ vyaktiḥ eva iti sambaddhayate caśabdaḥ guṇa antara samuccayāthar ubhayatra anveti prāk vidyamānasya eva svarūpa sukha ādeḥ muktau= avidyā ādi āvaraṇa apāyena vyaktiḥ anubhava lakṣaṇā bhavet na tu kim api adhikam utpadyate tathā satya nitya tva prasaṅgāt na ca brahmaṇaḥ svarūpa āditareṣām svarūpam adhikam na ca nirṇiktam kāṃsyam anirṇiktāt suvarṇāt adhikam bhavati etena mukta tva hetuḥ api pratyuktaḥ na kevalam muktānām brahmaṇaḥ adhika tvam na asti kim tarhi iti atas āha bala iti 
NSu_3.4.107ab.1–3.4.107cd.3	 bala jñāna adhika tvam ca tebhyaḥ hi brahmaṇaḥ sadā guṇa antara upalakṣaṇam etat sadā saṃsāre muktau ca etena sama śabdena api tad parigrahaḥ nirastaḥ nanu evam anumāne vimataḥ kālaḥ asya rājñaḥ sampratipanna ādhikyena yuktaḥ kāla tvāt sampratipanna kāla vat iti api anumāna prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha ādhikyasya iti ādhikyasya tu anitya tve na kiñcid mānam īyate brahmaṇaḥ iti śeṣaḥ anitya tvaḥ iti sādi tvasya api upalakṣaṇam tuśabdaḥ rāja ādi ādhikyasya vyāvartakaḥ bādhaka bhāva abhāvābhyām viśeṣāt na atiprasaṅgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ evam brahma ādi jīveṣu anādi nityam nānāvidhām yogya tām prasādhya idānīm āgamena api sādhayan= ādau tāvat śrutīḥ paṭhati śṛṇve vīraḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.108.1–3.4.108.2	 śṛṇve vīraḥ ugram ugram damāyan= anyam anyam atinenīyamānaḥ edhamāna dviu bhayasya rājā coṣkūyate viśaḥ indraḥ manuṣyān vīraḥ adhyavasita anta gāmī indraḥ parameśvaraḥ ugram ugram sarvān duṣya prakṛti in damayat nitya narakam prāpayan= anyam anyam sarvān sat svabhāva ānatinenīyamānaḥ saṃsāram bhṛśam atikrāmayan sva yogya tā atirekeṇa edhamānam dveṣyi iti edha māna dviṣ śṛṇve śrūyate kutas ubhayasya devatā asura vargasya rājā yatas kiñca manuṣyān viśaḥ prajāḥ ca uṣkūyate nityam parivartayati 
NSu_3.4.109.1–3.4.109.2	 parā pūrveṣām sakhyā vṛṇakti vitarturāṇaḥ aparebhiḥ eti anānubhūtīḥ ava dhūnvānaḥ pūrvītindraḥ śaradaḥ tartarī iti parā pūrveṣām atīta mantre pūrveṣām pūrva nirdiṣyānām ugrāṇām sakhyā sakhyāni parāvṛṇakti parityajati aparebhiḥ aparaiḥ sādhubhiḥ saha sakhyāni vitarturāṇaḥ atiśayena tvaramāṇaḥ etyān ānubhūtīḥ samyak anubhava rahita anavadhūn vānaḥ avame saṃsāre vartayan= indraḥ pūrvīḥ śaradaḥ atītān saṃvatsarān= tīrṇaḥ vartamānān= ca tartarī iti āgāminaḥ ca tariṣyati iti atra mantra dvaye asurāṇām anāditaḥ bhagavat bhajana abhāvaḥ nitya naraka avāptiḥ ca śrūyate devānām sadā bhagavat bhajanam mokṣa avāptiḥ ca manuṣyāṇām sarvadā saṃsāraḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.110.1–3.4.111.1	 divedive sadṛśīḥ anyam ardham kṛṣṇāḥ asedhat apa sadmanaḥ jāḥ ahan dāsāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vasnayanta udavra je varcinam śambaram ca dive dive varṣaṇāt vṛṣabhaḥ parameśvaraḥ dive dive sarvadā sadṛśīḥ cetana tva mātreṇa kṛṣṇāḥ tamaḥ mayīrjāḥ prajāḥ kāstā devebhyaḥ anyam ardham svīyāt sadmana upāsedhat nivartayati kiñca dāsau dasyū vasnayantāḥ jagat chāya dantau varcinam śambaram ca udavraje jala rāśau samudra tīre ahan hiṃsitavān iti atra daityānām kadāpi na mokṣaḥ iti pratīyate tam bhūtiḥ iti devāḥ upāsāñcakrire te babhūvuḥ tasmāt ha api etarhi suptaḥ bhūbhrūḥ iti eva praśvasiti abhūtiḥ iti asurāḥ te ha parābabhūvuḥ 
NSu_3.4.112.1–3.4.112.3	 tat yathā peśaskarī peśasaḥ mātrām apādāya anyat navataram kalyāṇataram rūpam tanutaḥ evam eva ayam ātmā idam śarīram nihatya avidyām gamayitavān yat navataram kalyāṇataram rūpam kurute pitṛyam pitṛyam vā gāndharvam vā daivam vā prājāpatyam vā brāhmam vā anyeṣām vā bhūtānām tam bhūtiḥ iti tam parameśvaram bhūtiḥ aiśvarya rūpaḥ babhūvuḥ muktāḥ iti śeṣaḥ etarhi idānīm suptaḥ supta sthaḥ vāyuḥ parābabhūvuḥ nitya nirayam prāptāḥ atra deva asurāṇām samyak viparīta upāsanābhyām mokṣa tamasoḥ prāptiḥ śrūyate tena deva tvam asura tvam ca sahajam iti jñāyate tat yathā tat vakṣyamāṇam nidarśanam yathā peśaskārī suvarṇakāraḥ peśasaḥ suvarṇasya mātrām aṃśam anyat iva navataram prāk ananubhavāt kalyāṇataram mala apakarṣāt rūpam rucaka ādikam ātmā paramātmā anyeṣām bhūtānām manuṣya uttamānām atra suvarṇasya eva yathā rucikā ādi bhāvaḥ suvarṇakāreṇa kriyate na yasya kasyacid dravyasya tathā mukti yogyānām eva īśvareṇa mukta tvam kriyate na anyeṣām iti pratīyate adhunā atra eva smṛtīḥ paṭhati prayānti iti 
NSu_3.4.113.1–3.4.113.2	 prayānti paramām siddhimaihikā muṣmikīm drutam yā na prāpya asuraiḥ sarvaiḥ akṣayā kleśa varjitāḥ na tām gatim prapadyante vinā bhāgavatāt narān purā satye yugaḥ iti prakṛtānām devatā svabhāvānām prayānti iti anena mokṣa ādi phala prāptimuktvā yā na prāpya iti asurāṇām na tām gatim iti manuṣyāṇām ca kadācid tad prāptiḥ na asti iti ucyate 
NSu_3.4.114.1–3.4.115.3	 avajānanti mām mūḍhāḥ mānuṣīm tanum āśritam param bhāvam ajānantaḥ mama bhūta maheśvaram mogha āśāḥ mogha karmāṇaḥ mogha jñānāḥ vicetasaḥ rākṣasīm āsurīm ca eva prakṛtim mohanīm śritāḥ avajānanti iti anena bhagavat avajña ādi lakṣaṇa rākṣasa ādi svabhāvavatām kadāpi puruṣa artha avāptiḥ na astīvati kathyate prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥ 
NSu_3.4.116.1–3.4.118.1	 mahātmānaḥ tu mām pārtha daivīm prakṛtim āśritāḥ bhajanti ananya manasaḥ jñātvā bhūtādim avyayam mahātmanaḥ iti atra bhagavat bhajana ādi lakṣaṇa deva tvam svabhāvaḥ iti pratīyate abhayam sattva saṃśuddhiḥ jñāna yoga vyavasthitiḥ dānam damaḥ ca yajñaḥ ca svādhyāyaḥ tapaḥ ārjavam ahiṃsā satyam akrodhaḥ tyāgaḥ śāntiḥ apaiśunam dayā bhūteṣu alolu tvam mārdavam hrīḥ acāpalam 
NSu_3.4.119.1–3.4.121.1	 tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adrohaḥ na ati mānitā bhavanti sampadam daivīm abhijātasya bhārata ḍambhaḥ darpaḥ atimāḥ ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca ajñānam ca abhijātasya pārtha sampadam āsurīm abhayam iti anena abhaya ādi lakṣaṇam deva tvam dambha ādi lakṣaṇam ca asura tvam svabhāvaḥ eva iti jñāyate mām ātma para deheṣu pradviṣantaḥ abhyasūyakāḥ tān aham dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu nara adhamān kṣipāmi ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣu eva yoniṣu 
NSu_3.4.122.1–3.4.127.1	 āsurīm yonim āpannāḥ mūḍhāḥ janmani janmani mām aprāpya eva kaunteya tatas yānti adhamām gatim mām ātmā iti anena asura svabhāvānām andhatamasā avāpti paryavasānam abhidhīyate dvividhaḥ bhūta sargaḥ atra daive āsuraḥ eva ca viṣṇu bhakti paraḥ daivaḥ viparītaḥ tathā asuraḥ devānām paramaḥ dharmaḥ sadā yajña ādikāḥ kriyāḥ svādhyāyaḥ tattva vedi tvam viṣṇu pūjā ratiḥ smṛtiḥ daityānām bāhuṣāi tvam mātsaryam yuddha satkriyā nīti śāstra praveditvam śiva pūjā ratiḥ smṛtiḥ varṇa āśrama ācāravat tvam svādhyāyaḥ bhaktiḥ acyute śive sūrye tathā devyām svabhāvaḥ mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ anādi vaiṣṇavāḥ eva devatāḥ tu svabhāvataḥ viparītāḥ tatas daityāḥ sadā eva anādi kālataḥ 
NSu_3.4.128ab.1–3.4.128ab.2	 mānuṣāḥ miśra matayaḥ vimiśra gatayaḥ api ca dvividhaḥ iti spaṣṭam deva asura tvayoḥ svabhāva tvam ākhyāyate sarga śabdasya svabhāva vāci tvāt dvividhaḥ eva iti sambandhaḥ sargāṇām su bahu tve api śubha aśubha phala adhikau deva asura ākhyau dvau= eva gandhavadyāḥ tad antarā iti vacanāt avadhāraṇa upapattiḥ svabhāvaḥ iti etat devānām daityānām iti atra api sambaddhayate paramaḥ dharmaḥ iti yajña ādikānām kriyāṇām viśeṣaṇam bhagavat arpaṇa ādinā parama dharma rūpa yajña ādikāḥ kriyāḥ iti ratiḥ smṛtiḥ ca viṣṇoḥ śivasya ca iti śeṣaḥ bahu śāli tvam iti asthāne bāhu bala prayogaḥ abhipreyate yuddha satkriyā yuddha kauśalam varṇa āśrama iti tad anuṣṭhāna mātra paryavasāyi tvam ācaṣṭe acyuta ādau sāmyena bhaktiḥ iti arthaḥ anādi iti spaṣṭam anādi tvāt eva svabhāvataḥ anādi kālataḥ iti etat mānuṣāḥ iti anena sambaddhayate miśra matayaḥ samyak asamyak jñānāḥ vimiśra gatayaḥ sukha duḥkha ātmaka saṃsāra phalāḥ deva ādīnām api evam phalam jñātavyam śruti smṛti udāharaṇa phalam darśayati ityādi iti 
NSu_3.4.128cd.1–3.4.129ab.2	 ityādi vākya sandarbhe jñāyate anādi yogya tā sandarbhaiḥ iti ati bahūni vākyāni atra arthe anyatra udāhṛtāni draṣṭavyāni iti sūcayati uktānām anumānānām vyāpti avadhāraṇa ādi artham āgamānām ca anya artha vyākhyāna nirāsa artham anugrāhakam tarkam āha yadi iti yadi anādiḥ viśeṣaḥ na sāmpratam katham eva saḥ viśeṣaḥ svarūpa gataḥ yogya tā lakṣaṇaḥ atiśayaḥ sa viśeṣaḥ paridṛśyamānaḥ atiśayaḥ etat uktam bhavati yadi hiraṇyagarbhasya anādiḥ sarva utkṛṣṭaḥ yogya tā lakṣaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ na syāt tadā sāmpratam dṛśyamānam sarva utkṛṣṭa tvam na syāt tasya etat bīja tvāt kāraṇa abhāve ca kārya abhāvasya niyama tvāt anyathā sarveṣām api sarva utkṛṣṭa tva āpatteḥ evam anyatra api vaktavyam iti 
NSu_3.4.129ab.3	 nanu brahma ādīnām yogya tā lakṣaṇa anādi viśeṣa abhāve api sādinaḥ viśiṣya adṛṣṭāt eva sarva utkṛṣṭa tva ādikam bhaviṣyati tathā ca smṛtiḥ svadharma niṣṭhaḥ śata janmabhiḥ pumān viriñca tām eti a iti ādikā iti ced atra vaktavyam kim tad viriñcasya sarva utkarṣa bījam viśiṣyam adṛṣṭam tatas prāktana tathāvidham adṛṣṭam anapekṣya eva jāyate uta apekṣya iti ādyam dūṣayati adṛṣṭāt eva ca iti 
NSu_3.4.129cd.1–3.4.129cd.3	 adṛṣṭāt eva ca adṛṣṭam svīkṛtam sa varva ādibhiḥ tāni tāni dravya ādīni khalvadṛṣṭa utpattau nimittāni śruti smṛtibhyām upalabhyante tad sampattiḥ ca adṛṣṭa nimittā eva tasmāt na kevalam phalam kinnāma uttara uttaram adṛṣṭam ca pūrva pūrva adṛṣṭāt bhavati iti cārvāka vyatirikta sarva vādibhiḥ svīkṛtam atas sarva utkarṣa hetoḥ viśiṣya adṛṣṭasya tathāvidha prāktana adṛṣṭa anapekṣā utpattika tva abhyupagame apasiddhāntaḥ syāt bhavatu anyeṣām vādinām ittham siddhāntaḥ mama tu sarva utkarṣa ādi phala utpattau= eva viśiṣya adṛṣṭa apekṣā na tu tat utpattau= api iti yat vā yat viriñcasya sarva utkarṣa nimittam viśiṣyam adṛṣṭam tasya tathāvidha adṛṣṭa kārya tve api tasya na adṛṣṭa kāryatvam iti sarvasya api pravāhasya tathā tve hi bhavatām iṣya siddhiḥ iti vadantam pratyatiprasaṅgam āha ākasmikaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.130a–3.4.130d.2	 ākasmikaḥ viśeṣaḥ ced adṛṣṭe kvacid iṣyate sarvatra ākasmika tvam syāt na adṛṣṭa apekṣatā bhavet kvacid viriñca utkarṣa hetau tad hetau vā adṛṣṭe viśeṣaḥ atiśayaḥ yadi ākasmikaḥ adṛṣṭa nirapekṣaḥ eva iṣyate yadi kim api viśiṣyam adṛṣṭam tathāvidha adṛṣṭa nirapekṣam eva utpadyate iti aṅgīkriyate iti yāvat tarhi sarvatra phala ādau= api āka smika tvam aṅgī kāryam syāt aviśeṣāt āpādyam vivṛṇoti na iti 
NSu_3.4.130a–3.4.130d.5	 sarvatra iti anuvartate yadi evam na vivrīyeta tarhi pareṇa adṛṣṭasya niṣkāraṇa tāyāḥ anaṅgīkṛta tvāt asaṅgataḥ ayam prasaṅgaḥ syāt evam eva apadākam api vyākhyeyam iti bhāvaḥ astu viriñca utkarṣasya api adṛṣṭān apekṣa tā iti ced na prāk bhavīyasya dṛṣṭa kāraṇa kalāpasya naṣṭa tvena niṣkāraṇa tā āpātāt kiñca viśiṣyaḥ dṛṣṭa kāraṇa kalāpaḥ api tasya kutas iti vācyam nirnimittaḥ ced atiprasaṅgaḥ svabhāva nimittaḥ ced siddham naḥ samīhitam etena dṛṣṭa vyāpāra parituṣyāt īśvarāt viriñcasya sarva utkarṣa sampattiḥ iti api nirastam anādi yogya tā parihārāt iti astu tarhi dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ iti tatra āha adṛṣṭāt ced iti 
NSu_3.4.130ef.1–3.4.130ef.3	 adṛṣṭāḥ ced viśeṣaḥ ayam anādi tvam kutas na tat bhavati iti śeṣaḥ viśiṣyate iti viśeṣaḥ viśiṣyam adṛṣṭam iti arthaḥ ayam iti viriñcasya sarva utkaṣarhetuḥ anādi tvam tathāvidha adṛṣṭa paramparāyāḥ anādi yogya tāvat tvam iti ca tat tarhi idam uktam bhavati yathā viriñcasya sarva utkarṣe kāraṇam viśiṣyam adṛṣṭam tathāvidha pūrva adṛṣṭa hetukam tathā tat api tat api iti svīkāryam samāna nyāya tvāt tathā ca anādi viśiṣya adṛṣṭa pravāha āśraya tvam tasya eva kutas iti anuyogasya na anyat uttaram anādeḥ viśiṣya svabhāvāt tad tad phala prāpti upāyayoḥ prayatna adṛṣṭayoḥ āgantukayoḥ bīja bhūtaḥ anāgantuka svabhāva viśeṣaḥ eva anādi yogya tā ucyate yathā uktam svabhāva ākhyā yogyatā yā haṭha ākhyāa ityādi atas siddhāḥ brahma ādi kali paryanteṣu jīveṣu anāt iyogyatā iti 
NSu_3.4.130ef.4	 bhagavān nirdeṣaḥ iti yat prāk uktam tad samarthana artham uttaraḥ granthaḥ nanuna sthānataḥ api a ityādinā eva samarthitam etat satyam yukti ādinā prāptam sa doṣa tvam tatra apākṛtam atra tu pratyakṣa prāptam iti bhedāt etat api tatra eva kutas na dūṣitam iti ced viśva ādiṣu pratyakṣasya apravṛtteḥ prāsaṅgikam tu nirākaraṇam tatra vā atra vā na kaścid viśeṣaḥ prāc ukta artha prapañcaḥ ca atra anubhāṣya kṛtā kriyate mukta tāratamya ādeḥ prapañcana ādeḥ atas atra eva nirdeṣa tā prapañcanam yuktam kiñca atra jñāna svarūpa nirūpaṇam bhaviṣyati tad prasaṅgaḥ ca jñāna pāde samucitaḥ api ca na bhagavat sākṣātkāra mātreṇa aśeṣa puruṣa artha prāptiḥ kintu nirdeṣāt bhagavat darśanāt iti uktam tat ca anena nirdeṣa bhagavat darśanam upadarśitam bhavati tarhi tatra eva ayam grantha sandarbhaḥ kutas na niveśitaḥ iti ced deva dānava mānava svabhāva prapañcanasya atra upayukta tvena tad ānantarya upapatteḥ tathā ca vakṣyāmaḥ 
NSu_3.4.130ef.5–3.4.130ef.6	 idam atra śaṅkayate rāma kṛṣṇa ādayaḥ bhagavat avatārāḥ bhagavatā atyanta abhinnāḥ iti tāvat samarthitam teṣām ca parasparam bheda stakāla vartinām puruṣāṇām pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyate na ca te dehavantaḥ iti ca uktam tatas deha gataḥ eva bhedaḥ iti anavakāśāt tatas ca sarveṣām svātantrya anupapatteḥ keṣāñcid pāratantryam evam anye api bheda anuṣaṅgiṇaḥ doṣāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ samāna nyāya tvāt veda adhidoṣāḥ ca pratyakṣeṇa īkṣyante iti na bhagavataḥ nirdeṣa tvam iti tatra tāvat bhedasya pratyakṣa siddha tām nirākartum āgama vākyam paṭhati na ca iti 
NSu_3.4.130a–3.4.130c.3	 naca anya bheda vat viṣṇau bhedaḥ tad darśinām api dṛśyate caḥ avadhāraṇe anya bheda vat iti vyatireka dṛṣṭāntaḥ anyeṣām ghaṭa ādīnām yathā anekatva atiriktaḥ anyonya abhāva lakṣaṇaḥ bhedaḥ dṛśyate na tathā iti viṣṇau bhedaḥ na dṛśyate iti eva ukte aneka tvasya api adarśanam pratīyeta tad artham idam vacanam yat vā yathā viṣṇau= anya pratiyogikaḥ bhedaḥ dṛśyate na tathā sva pratiyogikaḥ iti yojanā anyathā ghaṭa ādi pratiyogikaḥ api bhedaḥ na dṛśyate iti api pratīyeta athavā anya pratiyāgika bhedavati viṣṇau= itya eka padyena vyākhyeyam prayojanam tu uktam eva viṣṇau rāma kṛṣṇa ādi rūpe adhunātanaiḥ bhedaḥ na dṛśyate iti parasya api sammatam atas tad darśinām api iti uktam tṛtīya arthe ṣaṣṭhī avatāra darśibhiḥ api iti arthaḥ tad darśinām pratyakṣeṇa api iti vā svabhāvataḥ eva jīvāḥ trividhāḥ deva dānava mānavabhedāt tatra daivam pratyakṣam tāvat avatārāṇām parasparam na bhedam gocarayati iti bhāvaḥ na kevalam etāvat kim tarhi iti atas āha pratyabhijñā eva iti 
NSu_3.4.130cd.1–3.4.132ab.2	 pratyabhijñā eva bahu rūpeṣu dṛśyate uttamānām puruṣāṇām bhagavataḥ bahu rūpeṣu tat eva idam iti abheda viṣayā pratyabhijñā eva purāṇa ādau dṛśyate yathā jāmbavataḥ sa rāmaḥ eva ayam kṛṣṇaḥ iti pratyabhijñā tathā ca kutas bheda jñānasya avakāśaḥ iti bhāvaḥ nanu bahu tvam bhedena vinā anupapadyamānam tam ākṣipati tathā ca bahu rūpeṣu pratyabhijñā na sambhavati eva sambhavantī vā bhrāntiḥ syāt iti atas āha bahu tvam ca iti bahu tvam ca viśeṣeṇa bhagavat rūpāṇām iti śeṣaḥ anyathā upapatti kuṇṭhita arthāpattiḥ na bhedam pramāpayati iti arthaḥ anyathā api upapatti pakṣe bheda sandehaḥ syāt saḥ api aniṣyaḥ iti anyathā eva upapattim sūcayati na bhedena iti 
NSu_3.4.132b.1–3.4.132b.3	 na bhedena kathañcana upapadyate iti ubhayatra śeṣaḥ kutas bhagavat rūpāṇām bhede niravakāśa pramāṇa abhāvāt tad virodhāt ca tat idam āha kathañcana iti evam uttamānām puṃsām bhagavat eka rūpa darśana samaye rūpa antara pratītau= asatyām tatas bheda jñānam asambhāvitam pratiyogi jñāna abhāve bheda jñāna abhāvasya niyata tvāt satyām api tathā virodhinyāḥ pratyabhijñāyāḥ bhāvāt iti uktam tathā api madhyama ādi janānām pratyakṣam bhagavat rūpa bhede pramāṇam bhaviṣyati eka rūpa darśana samaye rūpa antara pratīti abhāve bheda darśana anupapattau= api tad bhāve sambhavati eva na ca teṣām api pratyabhijñā bhavadbhiḥ abhyupetum śakyate uttama tva prasaṅgāt iti ataḥ madhyamā anapekṣya tāvat āha pratyabhijñā ca iti 
NSu_3.4.132cd.1–3.4.133.3	 pratyabhijñā ca yeṣām na te api tad muṣya dṛṣṭayaḥ caḥ tu arthaḥ yeṣām tu madhyamānām janānām pratyabhijñā bhagavat rūpeṣu na asti te api tatra bhedam na eva paśyanti iti yojanāḥ pratyabhijñā abhāve kāraṇam tena bhagavatā muṣya apahatā dṛṣṭiḥ eṣām iti tena bahu tvena iti vā bhagavat icchāyā teṣām yogya tayā ca upodbalitam bahu tvam upalabhyamānam pratīyamāne vastuni vidyamānasya api abhedasya jñānam pratibadhnāti atra tad muṣya dṛṣṭayaḥ te api iti anuvādāt tad muṣya dṛṣṭi tvāt pratyabhijñā eṣām na asti iti labhyate bhagavat rūpe bhedam na eva paśyanti iti ukte ghaṭa ādibhyaḥ api bhedam na paśyanti iti mandasya pratītiḥ syāt tām nivārayitum āha bhedam iti bhedam na eva prapaśyanti bhedam anyebhyaḥ eva ca paśyanti evam hariḥ teṣām sandarśayati na anyathā anyebhyaḥ bhedam paśyanti eva ca iti yojanā nanu pratīyamānam vastu dvayam bhedena vā pratīyate abhedena vā bheda abheda udāsīna tayā tu pratītiḥ katham iti atas āha evam iti 
NSu_3.4.134ab.1–3.4.134ab.3	 evam bṛhatsaṃhitāyām vacanam teṣām yogyatā iti śeṣaḥ anyathā gati buddhi ityādinā karma saṃjñāyām dvitīyā syāt vibhakti vyatyayaḥ vā chāndasaḥ anyathā bhedena abhedena ca darśayati yathā khalu a khyāta vādinām sahakāri sāmarthyāt bheda abhedaudāsīnyena vastu pratītiḥ yathā vā anyeṣām śuktikā śakala darśana anantaram vyāsaktau tathā parameśvara śaktyā atrā api tathā pratītau kaḥ virodhaḥ adhama jīva pratyakṣasya tu anyā gatiḥ bhaviṣyati evam īśvara rūpa bhede pratyakṣam nirākurvata anumānam api nirākṛtam bahutvasya anyathā siddheḥ ukta tvāt tat nyāyena ca ākāra viśeṣa ādīnām anyathā siddha tvāt iti vacanam asti iti śeṣaḥ mā bhūt bhagavat rūpa bhedaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna siddhaḥ āgama siddhaḥ tu bhaviṣyati purāṇeṣu tatra tatra anya ādi śabda śravaṇāt iti ced na na iha nānā asti kiñcana ityādi veda vākya virodhāt purāṇam eva vedasya kin na bādhakam bhavati iti atas āha na iti 
NSu_3.4.134b–3.4.134d.3	 na purāṇa gam loka darśana vādyā iva veda rodhāya śaknuyāt vacanam iti vartate purāṇa vacanam khalu lokānām yat bhagavat rūpeṣu bheda darśanam tad anuvāda param eva na vastu niṣṭham upakrama ādinā tathā avagamāt vedaḥ tu vastu tathā tve tātparyavān liṅgaiḥ tathā adhyavasāyāt atas na tat tad bādhanāya śaknoti nanu eta dvaya āhatam yad prāc bhagavat rūpa bheda viṣayam pratyakṣam na asti iti uktam idānīntu tat asti iti tasya eva abhāve purāṇa vacanasya tad anuvāditva anupapatteḥ mā evam bahu tva ādi anumāna ābhāsa janita bheda t aśarna anuvādi tva upapatteḥ 
NSu_3.4.134b–3.4.134d.5	 kiñca uttama madhyamānām bheda viṣayam pratyakṣam na asti iti abhihitam adhamānām tu tad asti iti adhunā aṅgīkriyate tarhi tat eva bhagavat rūpa bhede pramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti api na vācyam uttamānām abheda viṣayeṇa pratyakṣeṇa bādhita tvāt na ca tat eva na asti pratyabhijñā eva bahu rūpeṣu dṛśyate iti āgama ukta tvāt tathā ca bhīṣma vākyam tam imam aham ajam śarīra bhājām hṛdi hṛdi viṣṭhitam ātma kalpitānām pratidṛśam iva na ekadhā arkam ekam samadhigataḥ asmi vidhūta bheda mohaḥ a iti atha bheda darśanam eva abheda darśanasya bādhakam kutas na bhavati iti atas āha aparīkṣitā iti 
NSu_3.4.135a–3.4.135c.3	 aparīkṣita dṛṣṭiḥ ca parīkṣā pūrva darśanam niṣeddhum śaknuvāt kvāpi aparīkṣitā parīkṣayā pramāṇa tvena aniścitā na iti asya anukarṣaṇa arthaḥ caśabdaḥ parīkṣā pūrvaḥ prāmāṇya niścayaḥ yasya darśanasya tad parīkṣā pūrva darśanam parīkṣā pūrvam darśanam prāmāṇya niścayaḥ yasya pratyakṣasya iti vā kvāpi iti anena niyamam āha tat anena yat parīkṣayā na niścita prāmāṇyam jñānam na tad nimitta prāmāṇyam jñāna antaram bādhataḥ iti vyāptiḥ uktāḥ parīkṣā grahaṇam prāmāṇya niścaya upalakṣaṇam eva na tu niyama artham iti uttaratra sphuṭībhaviṣyati atra dṛṣṭāntam āha devadattā iti 
NSu_3.4.135cd.1–3.4.135cd.3	 veda datta ādi dṛṣṭi vat yathā yajñadatta ādā= aniściprāmāṇyā deva datta ādi dṛṣṭiḥ na niścita prāmāṇyām yajñadatta ādi dṛṣṭim bādhate tathā iti arthaḥ tatas kim yadi evam vyāptiḥ iti ced bheda darśanam aniścita prāmāṇyam abhedat aśarnam tu niścita prāmāṇyam atas na tat tasya bādhakam kintu vaiparītyam eva iti vadāmaḥ kutas bheda darśanam aniścita prāmāṇyam iti atas āha na ca iti 
NSu_3.4.136a–3.4.136c.2	 na ca niścita bhedasya darśane asti purāṇa gam vākyam kvacid hi caḥ avadhāraṇe kvacid pradeśe hi śabdaḥ hetau parameśvara rūpa bheda viṣayam pratyakṣam tāvat asmākam purāṇa vākyāt eva siddham purāṇa vākyam ca kecid bhedam paśyanti iti vā pratipādayatu anuvādaka tayā liṅga tvena vā atas tad prāmāṇya niścayaḥ tatas eva anveṣyavyaḥ na ca bheda darśanasya prāmāṇyam niścāyayat purāṇa vākyam asti atas pramāṇa abhāvāt na bheda daśarnasya prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_3.4.136a–3.4.136c.4	 prāmāṇya niścayaḥ dvābhyām prakārābhyām bhavati artha tathā tva niścayena vā jñāna parīkṣayā vā ādya abhiprāyeṇa uktam satya tayā niścita bhedasya iti dvitīya abhiprāyeṇa tu bhedasya darśanaḥ iti samāsaḥ ṣaṣṭhayā ākrośaḥ iti aluj niścitam parīkṣitam ca tad bhedasya darśanam ca iti tathā uktam tatra sva abhiprāyeṇa ākrośaḥ para abhiprāyeṇa niścita tvam iti avirodhaḥ yadi purāṇa vākyāt niścita prāmāṇyam bheda darśanam na pratīyeta tarhi kīdṛśam tat pratīyate iti atas āha sammugdham iti 
NSu_3.4.136cd.1–3.4.136cd.3	 sammugdha darśanam tatra gamyate pramāṇa tva apramāṇa tvābhyām sandigdham daśarnam bhedasya tatra purāṇa vākye etat uktam bhavati purāṇa vākyam bheda darśana mātram gamayati na tu tasya prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam vā tatas prāc abheda darśana avagamāt tatra prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya sandehaḥ eva yuktaḥ avagate tu abheda darśane tasya aprāmāṇyam eva niścīyate purāṇa vākyāt eva tad prāmāṇyasya niścita tvāt samadhigata usmi iti saṃśabda śravaṇāt hṛdi hṛdi na ekadhā sthitam api iti anumānānām ābhāsa tvasya ukta tvāt vidhūta bheda mohaḥ iti bheda jñānasya moha tva abhidhānāt ca iti evam bhagavat rūpeṣu bheda abhāvaḥ siddhaḥ tathā vedha ādi doṣa abhāvaḥ ca pramāṇa abhāvāt nanu asti tad darśitā pratyakṣam atra pramāṇam mā evam mahatām pratyakṣeṇa vedha ādi a bhāva grāhiṇā bādhita tvāt idam eva tasya bādhakam kin na syāt iti atas āha aparīkṣitam eva iti 
NSu_3.4.137.1–3.4.137.3	 aparīkṣitam eva atra vedha ādikam adhīśituḥ parīkṣā darśane na eva dṛśyate kenacid kvacid atra vedha ādi tad abhāvayoḥ madhye adhīśituḥ atra avatāreṣu iti vā dṛśyate iti sambandhaḥ yat vā vedha ādikam iti tad darśanam upalakṣyate parīkṣayā yuktam darśanam parīkṣā darśanam yat vā parīkṣyate iti parīkṣā guroḥ ca halaḥ iti akāra pratyayaḥ parīkṣā ca tat daśarnam ca tasmin dṛśyate vedha ādikam kvacid doṣa darśanam aparīkṣitam nirdeṣa tva darśanam tu parīkṣitam iti bhāvaḥ nanu doṣa abhāva viṣayam mahatām pratyakṣam tāvat kutas siddham iti atas āha nirdeṣam eva iti 
NSu_3.4.138.1–3.4.139.3	 nirdoṣam eva tam brahmā dadarśa aśeṣa rūpiṇam nirdoṣam eva rudraḥ adrāk nirdoṣam tam purandaraḥ nirdoṣāṇi asya rūpāṇi dṛṣṭāni evam sura uttamaiḥ anye sa doṣāḥ sarve api nirdoṣaḥ harirekalaḥ iti barku śruteḥ ca eva sa doṣam na asya darśanam adrāk adrākṣīt anityam āgama śāsanam iti vacanāt purandaraḥ adrākṣīt anyaiḥ api sura uttamaiḥ sa doṣāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ tasmāt nirdeṣaḥ hariḥ ekaḥ eva caśabdaḥ śruti antara samuccaya arthaḥ asya parameśvarasya viṣaye mahatām darśanam sa doṣam doṣa grāhi na eva kintu nirdeṣam eva gṛhṇāti iti doṣa daśarnam aparīkṣitam tad abhāva darśanam tu parīkṣitam etat kutas iti atas āha aviddhaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.140.1–3.4.140.2	 aviddhaḥ viddha vat viṣṇuḥ ajātaḥ jāta vat mṛṣā abaddhaḥ baddha vat ca eva darśayati amita dyutiḥ iti paiṅgiśrutiḥ ca eva prāha nirdoṣa tām hareḥ aviddham iva viddha vat chāndasaḥ dvitīya antādvatiḥ eva śabdasya āviddhaḥ ityādinā sambandhaḥ darśayati ātmānam pūrvaśrutyā api ayam arthaḥ arthāt siddhayati iti paiṅgiśrutiḥ ca iti uktam nirdeṣa tām iti phala uktyā vivakṣitam artham upalakṣayati atra eva spaṣṭām śrutim udāharati aparīkṣitā iti 
NSu_3.4.141a–3.4.141d.2	 aparīkṣita dṛṣṭayā eva sa doṣaḥ dṛśyate hariḥ parīkṣā darśane na eva dṛśyaḥ doṣaḥ hareḥ kvacid iti paiṅgiśrutiḥ ca āha āha doṣa darśanasya aparīkṣita tvam nirdeṣa tā darśanasya parīkṣita tvam ca tatas kim iti atas āha pramāṇam hi iti  pramāṇam hi parīkṣitam yat parīkṣitam parīkṣayā pramāṇa tvena avadhṛtam tat eva pramāṇam aparīkṣitam tvāpātataḥ sandigdham niścita virodhi upanipāte tu apramāṇam eva atas parīkṣitena nirdeṣa tā darśanena aparīkṣitam doṣa darśanam eva bādhyate na tu viparyayaḥ prāmāṇya niścaye parīkṣā upayogaḥ pramāṇa siddhaḥ iti hi śabdaḥ tathā ca vakṣyate 
NSu_3.4.141d.3	 atra kecid āhuḥ svatas eva jñānānām prāmāṇyam na tu parīkṣā adhīnam sakalam api jñānam sva prakāśam yathārtham ca atas svena eva svayam sva prāmāṇyam ca siddhayati kā tatra parīkṣā apekṣā iti anye tu bruvate jñānam tad prāmāṇyam ca anumānena eva gṛhyate iti apare tu vadanti jñānam tad prāmāṇyam ca sākṣiṇā eva jñāyate iti yadi ca svatas prāmāṇya grahaḥ na syāt tarhi na syāt eva tasya parīkṣā adhīna tve anavasthā prasaṅgāt anumāna viśeṣaḥ khalu parīkṣā nāma tad prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam ca parīkṣā antareṇa iti katham na anavasthā syāt iti tatra pāmāṇi agrahasya parīkṣā adhīna tve anavasthā prasaṅgam tāvat pariharati na iti 
NSu_3.4.142a.1–3.4.142a.3	 na parīkṣā anavasthā syāt prāmāṇya grahaṇasya parīkṣā adhīna tva aṅgīkāre api iti śeṣaḥ tatra hetum āha sākṣī iti  sākṣi siddhe tu asaṃśayāt dvividham khalu jñānam antaḥkaraṇa pariṇāma rūpam sākṣi rūpam ca iti tatra ādyāt viśeṣyum tuśabdaḥ etat uktam bhavati syāt iyam anavasthā yadi savartra parīkṣā apekṣā syāt na ca evam sandigdhe khalu arthe parīkṣā apekṣyate na tu asandigdhe saṃśayaḥ ca manaḥ vṛtti viṣaye pānīya ādau bhavati na punar sākṣi siddhe sukha ādau atas tāvat eva parīkṣā yāvat sākṣi gṛhīteṣu sukha ādiṣu avatāraḥ iti kutas anavasthā iti prapañcitaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ asmābhiḥ prakṛti adhikaraṇe manaḥ vṛtti viṣayaḥ eva saṃśayaḥ na sākṣi siddhaḥ iti atra kim kāraṇam iti atas āha mānasaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.142cd.1–3.4.142cd.3	 mānase darśane doṣāḥ syuḥ navai sākṣi darśane manaḥ pariṇati rūpe doṣāḥ kāraṇa tayā sambhāvitāḥ syuḥ vaiśabdaḥ tuśabda arthe ayam arthaḥ dvividhaḥ hi saṃśayaḥ bhavati ekaḥ tāvat āditas eva yathā sthāṇuḥ vā ayam puruṣaḥ vā iti aparaḥ tu niścaya pṛṣṭha bhāvī yathā sthāṇu tayā pratīyate sthāṇuḥ bhavati na vā iti tatra ādyaḥ viśeṣa adarśana ādi doṣa mūlaḥ dvitīyaḥ api prathama jñānasya doṣa janya tva śaṅkā mūlaḥ doṣāḥ ca mānasaḥ eva darśane sambhavanti atas tad saṃśaya ātmakam vā jāyate niścaya tayā jātasya viṣaye vai āhāyarḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati na tu sākṣi darśane doṣa sambhavaḥ atas na tad saṃśaya ātmakam na api tad siddhe arthe saṃśayaḥ iti mānase darśane doṣāḥ sambhavanti iti sphuṭam sākṣi darśane na sambhavanti iti etat kutas iti atas āha su dṛḍhaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.142ef.1–3.4.142ef.3	 su dṛḍhaḥ nirṇayaḥ yatra jñeyam tat sākṣi darśanam su dṛḍhaḥ kadāpi bādha rahitaḥ nirṇayaḥ avadhāraṇa ātmakaḥ pratyayaḥ yatra iti nipātaḥ yaḥ iti arthe idam uktam bhavati doṣāḥ tāvat jñānasya ḍolāyamāna tā darśanena balavat bādhakopa nipātena vā kalpyāḥ yathā uktam balavat pramāṇataḥ ca a iti sākṣi darśanam ca nirṇaya ātmakam eva bhavati na ca bādhyate iti upapāditam pṛthak adhikaraṇe atas pramāṇa abhāvāt na tatra doṣaḥ sambhavati sākṣi siddhe arthe saṃśayaḥ na asti iti uktam tad anubhava ārūḍham kartum sākṣi siddham artham tāvat āha icchā iti 
NSu_3.4.143a–3.4.143cd.3	 icchā jñānam sukham duḥkha bhaya abhaya kṛpa ādayaḥ sākṣi siddhā ādi padena prayatna dveṣau= etad abhāvāḥ ca gṛhyante tatas kim iti atas āha na iti  na kaścid hi tatra saṃśayavān kvacid tatra kvacid iti sambandhaḥ na jātu mama sukham asti na vā iti saṃśayaḥ na api pratīyamānam idam sukham sat asat vā iti saṃśayaḥ iti hi śabdena āha sākṣi darśanam abādhitam eva iti na yujyate śukti rajata ādau bādha darśanāt na hi pratīti samaya mātra vartini tatra anya jñānam sambhavati iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.4.143ef.1–3.4.143ef.3	 yat kvacid vyabhicārī syāt darśanam mānasam hi tat yad darśanam kvacid śukti rajata ādau viṣaye vyabhicāri bādhitam syāt tad cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇakam manaḥ pariṇati rūpam eva na sākṣi rūpam kutas etat mānasa darśanasya bādhya tva aṅgīkāre aniṣya abhāvāt sākṣiṇaḥ tu tathā tve sarva vyavahāra vilopa prasaṅgasya ukta tvāt tat idam uktam hi śabdena sambhavati ca asya mānasatvam anyathā ākhyāti samarthanāt iti mānasasya darśanasya doṣa bādha sambhavaḥ abhihitaḥ kīdṛśasya tarhi prāmāṇyam iti atas āha manaḥ iti
