NSu_3.4.144.1–3.4.144.3^1	 manaḥ cakṣuḥ darśana ādeḥ api yatra eva sākṣiṇā prāmāṇyam su gṛhītam syāt tat parīkṣita darśanam manaḥ cakṣuḥ śabdau śrotra ādeḥ upalakṣakau darśanam sākṣātkāraḥ ādi padena laiṅgika śabda jñāna saṅgrahaḥ indriya liṅga śabda karaṇakasya manaḥ vṛtteḥ jñānasya iti atharḥ nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī sambhāvita doṣa bādhasya api iti apeḥ arthaḥ yatra jñāne su gṛhītam parīkṣayā niścitam tad parīkṣita darśanam pramāṇam iti śeṣaḥ pratyakṣa āgama jñāna prāmāṇya grahaṇaḥ eva parīkṣā upayogaḥ dharmi jñāna anumāna upamāna anuvyavasāyānām tu prāmāṇya grahaṇam na parīkṣā apekṣam iti kecid manyante 
NSu_3.4.144.1–3.4.144.3^2	 tad nirāsāya sarva mānasa saṅgraha artham manaḥ cakṣuḥ darśana ādeḥ madhye iti uktam anyathā yatra jñānaḥ iti ādikam eva avakṣyat tat eve pramāṇam iti etāvatā pūrṇe parīkṣita darśanam iti anuvādena su gṛhītam iti etat vivṛṇoti evam mānasa pratyakṣa ādi jñāna prāmāṇya grahasya parīkṣā adhīna tve api sākṣi prāmāṇya grahasya tad anapekṣa tvāt na parīkṣā anavasthā iti uktam tatra kim anayā dvividha kalpanayā sākṣi vat pratyakṣa ādi jñānasya api prāmāṇya grahaḥ parīkṣā anapekṣaḥ eva ukta vidhayā svatas kin na syāt iti āśaṅkām pariharati na iti 
NSu_3.4.145ab.1–3.4.145ab.3	 na jñāna dṛṣṭi mātreṇa prāmāṇyam tasya dṛśyate jñānasya dṛṣṭiḥ jñāna dṛṣṭiḥ tasya jñānasya etat uktam bhavati vṛtti jñānānām sva prakāśa tvam eva tāvat asat pramāṇa abhāvāt jñāna vyavahārasya sākṣi vedya tvena eva upapatteḥ idam aham jānāmi iti anubhavasya sākṣi rūpa tvāt vimatam jñānam na sva prakāśam anātma tvāt kārya tvāt anitya tvāt manaḥ rūpa tvāt sukha ādi vat iti ādi pramāṇa virodhāt ca 
NSu_3.4.145ab.4	 bhavatu vā jñānam sva prakāśam tathā api sva rūpa mātre eva na tu svadharme prāmāṇye api tathā hi veda vākya śravaṇe sati bāhyasya vākya artha jñānam utpadyate na vā na dvitīyaḥ satyām sāmagṣām kāryān udaya anupapatteḥ anyathā mīmāṃsakasya api tad anudaya prasaṅgāt ādye api tat prakāśate na vā na iti pakṣe apasiddhāntaḥ prathame tat prāmāṇyam prakāśate na vā na ādyaḥ tad nirāsa anupapatteḥ tatas jñāna dṛṣṭi mātreṇa na jñāna prāmāṇyam dṛśyate iti dvitīyaḥ eva aṅgī kāryaḥ tathā ca sva prakāśa jñānena eva prāmāṇya grahaḥ iti katham syāt apauruṣeya tva ādi yuktibhiḥ prabodhitaḥ bāhyaḥ pratipadyate ca tad prāmāṇyam iti katham na parīkṣā pekṣa tvam anyathā vaidika jñāna prāmāṇye vipratipattiḥ eva na syāt jñāna svarūpa vat kiñca evaṃvādinaḥ mate śukti rajata ādi vibhramaḥ na syāt idam anubhavasya rajata smaraṇasya ca bheda āgrahaḥ hi vibhramaḥ tatra prāmāṇya vat bhedasya anubhava tu a smaraṇa tvayoḥ ca prakāśaḥ avaśyambhāvī iti katham vibhrama avakāśaḥ na hi prāmāṇyasya bheda ādeḥ ca kaścid viśeṣaḥ asti iti 
NSu_3.4.145ab.5	 jñāna prāmāṇye saha eva anumeye iti api asat jñānasya anumeya tve pramāṇa abhāvāt tadvayava hārasya anyathā eva upapatteḥ āśutara vināśinaḥ jñānasya jānāmi iti vartamāna tayā pratibhā anupapatteḥ ca aparokṣa avabhāsa virodhāt ca anumeya tve api jñānasya na jñāna anumiti mātreṇa prāmāṇyam tasya dṛśyate tat hi jñāta tayā vyavahāreṇa kāryeṇa vā anumātavyam na ca tāvatā prāmāṇyam anumātum śakyate vyabhicārāt tatas jñāta tā ādi mātreṇa pratīte jñāne bādhā bhāva ādinā prāmāṇyam anumeyam anyathā bāhyānām api vaidika jñāna prāmāṇya anumāna prasakteḥ prasaktam api apodyate iti ced tarhi apavāda nirāsāya parīkṣā apekṣā vaśyam bhāvinī iti āgatam idam eva ca asmābhiḥ abhidhāsyate sarvathā parīkṣān apekṣā iti tu na kṣamyate 
NSu_3.4.145ab.6–3.4.145ab.8	 etena sākṣi vedya tā pakṣaḥ api pratikṣiptaḥ aupaniṣada jñāna dṛṣṭi mātreṇa bāhyaiḥ tad prāmāṇyasya adarśanāt caturtha pakṣaḥ tu ati mandaḥ anumāna ādi jñāna dṛṣṭi mātreṇa tad prāmāṇyasya cārvāka ādibhiḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt vibhāge māna abhāvāt ca dharmi jñāna ādi prāmāṇye vigāna abhāvāt iti ced na nirālambana ādi mata darśanāt upapatti bādhitam tat iti ced tarhi svīkṛtā api uṣmatā eva parīkṣā apekṣā iti alam pallavena iti evam tarhi pratyakṣa ādi vat sākṣiṇaḥ api prāmāṇyam parīkṣā apekṣa grahaṇam eva aṅgīkriyatām dvidhā kalpanasya anyāyya tvāt iti atas āha niyamena iti 
NSu_3.4.145cd.1–3.4.145cd.3	 niyamena sukha ādyeṣu prāmāṇyam sākṣi gocaram dṛśyate iti vartate sākṣī gocaraḥ yasya tat tathā uktam gocara tvam ca āśraya tayā vivakṣitam sukha ādi viṣaye yat sākṣi gatam prāmāṇyam tat niyamena dṛśyate etat uktam bhavati yadi vṛtti jñānānām iva sākṣi jñānasya api prāmāṇyam tad darśana mātreṇa na dṛśyate tadā adhikam api kāraṇam kalpayāmaḥ naca evam sukha jñāne dṛṣṭe tad prāmāṇya ajñāna saṃśaya viparyayāṇām kadāpi adarśanāt kalpaka sadbhāve dvidhā kalpanasya adūṣaṇa tvāt iti kiñca sākṣi prāmāṇyasya api parīkṣā apekṣa grahaṇa tve anavasthā ca syāt nanu prāmāṇya grahaṇam abhilaṣatā na anavasthātaḥ bhettum yuktam parīkṣā anavasthā bhāve api grāhaka an avasthāyāḥ duṣparihara tvāt iti atas āha sva prāmāṇyam iti 
NSu_3.4.146ab.1–3.4.146ab.3	 sva prāmāṇyam sadā sākṣī paśyati eva su niścayāt sākṣyeva iti sambandhaḥ sadā su niścayāt iti parīkṣā anapekṣam eva iti yāvat etat ca anubhavānyatha anupapattibhyām kalpyate nanu evam sati vṛtti jñānānām paratas prāmāṇyam uktam syāt jñāna svarūpasya sākṣi vedya tvāt prāmāṇyasya parīkṣā gamya tvāt tathā ca na vilakṣaṇa tvāt iti yat svataḥ prāmāṇyam iṣyam tat tyaktam syāt iti atas āha jñānasya iti 
NSu_3.4.146cd.1–3.4.147a.2	 jñānasya grāhakeṇa eva sākṣiṇā mānatā amiteḥ jñānasya grāhakeṇa sākṣiṇā eva jñānasya mānatāyāḥ miteḥ kāraṇāt svatas prāmāṇyam iṣyate eva iti sambandhaḥ bhavet svatas prāmāṇya tyāgaḥ yadi jñānam eva sākṣi vedyam na prāmāṇyam iti brūmaḥ na ca evam jñāna vat tat prāmāṇyasya api sa akṣi vedya tva abhyupagamāt iti kimartham tarhi parīkṣā vaśyambhāvaḥ abhyupagamyate iti atas āha doṣā iti doṣa abhāve pramāṇa tvam sākṣiṇā niścita tvam iti vakṣyamāṇam iha api yojyam iti prāmāṇyasya iti pada dvayam adhyāhāryam jñānam gṛhṇan sākṣī karaṇa doṣa abhāve asya prāmāṇyam iti eva prāmāṇyam niścinoti na tu pramāṇam eva idam iti tatas kim iti atas āha doṣa abhāvasya iti 
NSu_3.4.147b–3.4.147d.3	 doṣa abhāvasya sākṣiṇā niścita tvam kvacid ca eva svatas prāmāṇyam iṣyate parīkṣaya iti śeṣaḥ caḥ avadhāraṇe kvacid eva prayojana vaśāt jijñāsāyām jātāyām parīkṣā lābhe ca iti arthaḥ doṣa abhāva niścaya arthā parīkṣā na tu prāmāṇya grahaṇa arthāḥ tat punar jñānam iva sākṣi vedyam eva atas na svatas prāmāṇya parityāgaḥ iti bhāvaḥ syāt etat yadīyam prakriyā pramāṇavatī syāt na ca tat asti iti atas āha atas iti 
NSu_3.4.148.1–3.4.148.3	 atas na sarva mānānām prāmāṇyam niścitam bhavet sākṣiṇā niścitam yatra tat prāmāṇya sva lakṣaṇam atas eva hi sarveṣām jñānānām prāmāṇyam prathamatas na niścitam bhavet kinnāma yatra yadā parīkṣā sahakṛtena sākṣiṇā prāmāṇyam niścitam bhavati tat tadā eva prāmāṇyam sva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇya sva rūpam aprāmāṇyaviviktam prāmāṇyam siddhayati idam uktam bhavati yadi sākṣī doṣa abhāve pramāṇam etat iti prathamam sammugdham prāmāṇyam gṛhītvā paścāt jijñāsāyām satyām parīkṣayā pramāṇam eva iti avadhārayati iti eṣā prakriyā na aṅgīkriyeta tadā anabhyasta viṣayāṇām śabda ādinā jātānām sarveṣām api jñānānām prathamam eva prāmāṇyam avadhāryeta na ca etat asti tena jānīmaḥ asti iyam prakriyā iti uktam artham buddhayā ārohāya saṅkṣipya āha na hi iti 
NSu_3.4.149.1–3.4.150ab.3	 na hi kaścid sukha ādyeṣu saṃśayam kurute janaḥ na ca eva akhila mānāni niścinoti akhilaḥ janaḥ tasmāt anubhava ārūḍham kim artham upalapyate yasmāt sukha ādyeṣu kaścid saṃśayam na karoti yasmāt ca akhilāni vṛtti jñānāni darśanaḥ eva pramāṇa tayā akhilaḥ janaḥ na niścinoti tasmāt sākṣi prāmāṇyam parīkṣā anapekṣeṇa sākṣiṇā eva gṛhyate vṛtti jñānānām tu tad sāpekṣeṇa iti anubhava ārūḍham prameyam kim artham apalapyate nirnimittam apala pitum na śakyate iti na parīkṣā anavasthā syāt a iti uktam upasaṃharati doṣa abhāva ādikam ca iti 
NSu_3.4.150cd.1–3.4.151ab.3	 doṣa abhāva ādikam ca eva sākṣī samyak prapaśyati sākṣyeva iti sambandhaḥ svasya parīkṣāyāḥ ca doṣa abhāvam prāmāṇyam ca parīkṣā nirapekṣaḥ sākṣyā iva samyak prapaśyati tasmāt na kā api anavasthā iti aparīkṣitam eva a ityādinā uktam upasaṃharati tat iti tat parīkṣita mānena na doṣaḥ viṣṇavi kvacid tat tasmāt parīkṣitam eva mānam tena ca bhagavati kvacid api doṣaḥ na asti iti siddham tad virodhāt aparīkṣitam doṣa darśanam apramāṇam eva iti arthaḥ evam aparīkṣitam doṣa darśanam parīkṣitena nirdeṣa tā darśanena bādhitam na bhagavataḥ doṣi tvam sādhayitum śaktam iti uktam idānīm tādṛśasya api sādhaka tve ati prasaṅgam sūcayati aparīkṣitā iti 
NSu_3.4.151cd.1–3.4.151cd.3	 aparīkṣita dṛṣṭiḥ tu kasmin= arthe na vidyate śukti ādīnām rajata tva ādau= api vidyate eva tatas ca tathā tat api siddhayet aviśeṣāt iti bhāvaḥ tat evam doṣa darśanam parīkṣita pratyakṣa virodhāt apramāṇam iti abhihitam niraniṣyaḥ niravadya iti ādi āgama virodhāt ca syāt etat prāk tattvam asya adya āgamasya pratyakṣa viruddha tvāt pratīta arthe na prāmāṇyam iti uktam tat katham tad viparītam pratyakṣasya āgama virodhena aprāmāṇyam idānīm ucyate iti āśaṅkām parihartum āha tat iti 
NSu_3.4.152.1–3.4.152.3	 tat pratyakṣa viruddha arthe na āgamasya api mānatā upajīvyam akṣa jam yatra tad anyatra viparyayaḥ yatra yadā akṣajam āgamasya upajīvyam tat tadā pratyakṣa viruddha arthe jātyā prabalasya api āgamasya mānatā na asti tasmāt upajīvya upajīvaka bhāvāt anyatra viparīta upajīvya upajīvaka bhāve bādhya bādhaka bhāvasya api viparyayaḥ yadā agamaḥ pratyakṣasya upajīvyaḥ tadā agama viruddha arthe pratyakṣasya na mānatā iti arthaḥ tatas kim iti atas āha laukikaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.153.1–3.4.153.3	 laukike vyavahāre atra pratyakṣasya upajīvyatā avatāra ādi daṣṭau syāt āgamasya upajīvyatā laukike pratyakṣa siddha jīva ādi viṣaye brahma ātmaka tva ādi bodhana rūpe vyavahāre tat tvam asya ādi a āgamena kriyamāṇe atra āgame āgamam prati pratyakṣasya upajīvyatā avatārāṇām viśva ādīnām ca doṣa dṛṣṭau pratyakṣa ādikam pratyāgamasya upajīvyatā syāt etat uktam bhavati prāk pratyakṣa virodhena āgamasya aprāmāṇyam abhidhāya idānīm āgama virodhena pratyakṣasya aprāmāṇya abhidhānam na viruddham na hi nirviśeṣaṇayoḥ pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ parasparam bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ abhihitaḥ kintu upa jīvaka tvena bādhya tvam upajīvya tvena bādhaka tvam tat ca tatra anyathā atrāni athā iti katham virodhaḥ iti anena doṣa viṣaya pratyakṣa virodhāt āgamasya eva aprāmāṇyam kin na syāt iti ca udyam garbhasrāveṇa eva gatam āgamasya ūjīvyatayā pratyakṣataḥ prābalyasya ukta tvāt katham pratyakṣam pratyāgamasya upajīvya tvam iti atas āha āgamena iti 
NSu_3.4.154ab.1–3.4.154c.2	 āgamena hi viṣṇu tvam jñātvā doṣaḥ atra kalpyate atra viṣṇau vastutas kalpanā eva eṣā na pramitiḥ iti bhāvena kalpyate iti uktam bhavet āgamasya upajīvya tvam yadi viṣṇu tvam jñātavyam bhavet tat eva na jñātavyam iti atas āha na ced iti na ced syāt doṣavān anyaḥ yadi viṣṇu tvam rāma kṛṣṇa ādau na jñātam tadā doṣa grāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ anyaḥ doṣavān iti gṛhītam syāt na tu viṣṇuḥ deṣavān iti na hi devadatte devadatta tva ajñāne devadattaḥ ayam āgataḥ iti ākāram jñānam utpattum arhati iti tathā api na āgamasya upajīvya tvam yatas śrīvatsa kaustubha ādi lakṣaṇena viṣṇu tvam anumāya viṣṇuḥ deṣavān iti pratyakṣeṇa jñāsyate iti atas āha śāstra iti 
NSu_3.4.154d.1–3.4.154d.2	 śāstra siddham hi lakṣaṇam śrīvatsa ādikam lakṣaṇam viṣṇu tvena vyāptam iti etat śāstreṇa eva siddham yadi api asmin pakṣe sākṣāt āgamaḥ na upajīvyaḥ tathā api anumāna mūla vyāpti grahaṇāya tat upajīvanam aparihāryam eva iti bhāvaḥ nanu viṣṇu tva ajñāne viṣṇoḥ anyaḥ doṣavān iti jñānena kutas bhāvyam viṣṇu tva vat tad anya tvasya api ajñāta tvāt iti ced evam tarhi ajñātam prasajyate iti āha kasyacid iti 
NSu_3.4.155ab.1–3.4.155ab.2	 kasyacid doṣavat tvam syāt iti mātre akṣa jam bhavet iti mātre etāvatī eva viṣaye viṣṇuḥ deṣavān iti jñāna anutpādana prasaṅgaḥ eva tātparyam iti bhāvaḥ nanu yathā paṭaḥ ayam chinnaḥ dagdhaḥ malinaḥ iti parānupajīvinā pratyakṣeṇa eva gṛhyate tathā agama ādikam anupajīvya pratyakṣeṇa eva viṣṇuḥ deṣavān iti jñāsyate iti atas āha na iti 
NSu_3.4.155cd.1–3.4.155cd.2	 na viṣṇoḥ deṣavat tve hi pratyakṣam vartate svatas svatas parānupajīvanena ayam abhisandhiḥ paṭa tvam avayava sanniveśa vyaṅghayam pratyakṣam eva iti yujyate tathā jñānam viṣṇu tvam tu samasta guṇa paripūrṇa tva nirdeṣa tva jagat janma ādi kāraṇatva lakṣaṇam na pratyakṣam atas na tathāvidham jñānam upapadyate yathā pañca pala parimitaḥ ayam paṭaḥ malinaḥ iti jñānam iti 
NSu_3.4.155cd.3–3.4.155cd.4	 ayam samudāya arthaḥ rāma kṛṣṇa ādi doṣa grāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa tredhā utpattavyam viṣṇuḥ ayam doṣavān iti vā viṣṇoḥ anyaḥ ayam doṣavān iti vā kaścid ayam doṣavān iti vā prakāra antara abhāvāt tatra dvitīya tṛtīyayoḥ na viṣṇoḥ deṣavat tve tat udbhāvayitum śakyam viṣṇuḥ deṣavān iti tena anavagāhanāt vastu vṛttyā asau viṣṇuḥ eva iti ced kim tatas na hi vastu vṛtti sahitam yat kiñcit jñānam vivakṣita viśeṣam sādhayati atiprasaṅgāt ādye viṣṇu tvam sarvathā jñātavyam naca etat pratyakṣa vedyam na api anumeyam iti uktam śāstra yoni sūtre tasmāt devakyām deva rūpiṇyām viṣṇuḥ sarva guhā āśayaḥ āvirāsīda iti āgamena vā agama avagata vyāptikā anumānena vā avagantavyam tatas sarvathā pratyakṣasya āgama upajīvya tvam aṅgī kāryam sarvaḥ api āgamaḥ tāvat ekam eva vākyam sa ca sarva rūpa upetasya viṣṇoḥ nirdeṣa tvam pratipādayati iti tad virodhāt apramāṇam eva doṣa viṣayam pratyakṣam iti itas ca tat apramāṇam iti darśayitum āha kecid iti 
NSu_3.4.156ab.1–3.4.156ab.3	 kecid paśyanti doṣān iti atra api syāt na cākṣa jam na kevalam doṣeṣu iti api śabdaḥ caśabdaḥ anumāna ādi samuccaya arthaḥ pratyakṣam bhagavat rūpāṇām doṣi tve pramāṇam iti vadan praṣṭavyaḥ kecid tad kāla vartinaḥ puruṣāḥ bhagavat rūpeṣu doṣān paśyanti iti atra arthe asmākam kim pramāṇam pratyakṣam anumānam āgamaḥ vā iti na tāvat pratyakṣam para puruṣa vartini pratyakṣe pareṣām pratyakṣa ayogāt dūre kāla bhede na api anumānam liṅga abhāvāt āgamaḥ api vedaḥ purāṇa ādiḥ vā na ādyaḥ tasya adarśanāt tasmāt dvitīyaḥ eva aṅgī kāryaḥ iti āha paurāṇam iti 
NSu_3.4.156c.1–3.4.156d.3	 paurāṇam vākyam eva atra atra bhagavat rūpa doṣa grāhi pratyakṣa sadbhāve vaktavyam iti śeṣaḥ tatas kim iti ced tad purāṇa vākyam tad doṣa darśanam kim pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam pramāṇa tayā manyate uta aparīkṣita pramāṇa apramāṇa abhāva pratīti mātra tayā atha apramāṇa tayā ādye doṣam āha tat iti  tat śrutyā eva viruddhayate bhagavat rūpeṣu doṣa grāhiṇīm pratītim pramāṇa tayā pratipādayat purāṇa vākyam doṣa sadbhāvam manyate eva na hi sambhavati tad grāhiṇaḥ prāmāṇyam aṅgīkaroti na aṅgīkaroti ca tat iti doṣa sadbhāvam manyamānam ca tad prāk udāhṛtayā śrutyā eva viruddhayate iti purāṇa vākyasya śruti viruddha tve kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha purāṇasya iti 
NSu_3.4.157ab.1–3.4.157b.4	 purāṇasya upajīvyaḥ ca veda pauruṣeyeṇa khalu vākyena sa mūlena bhāvyam yatas kenacid kāraṇena kañcid artham buddhi sthīkṛtya vākyam prayuñjmahe anyathā utpatteḥ eva asambhavaḥ purāṇa vākyasya ca vedaḥ eva mūlam kutas iti atas āha na ca iti  eva naca aparaḥ aparaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ granthaḥ caśabdaḥ pratyakṣa ādi samuccaya arthaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ tāvat āgamaḥ na purāṇasya mūlam tasya api mūlāpekṣāyām andha paramparā āpātāt na pratyakṣa anumāne tad arthasya tad agocara tvāt na api utprekṣā pratāraka vākya vat aprāmāṇya prasaṅgāt atas pariśeṣāt vedaḥ eva purāṇasya upajīvyaḥ iti siddham tatas kim iti atas āha tad virodhaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.157cd.1–3.4.157cd.4	 tad virodhe katham mānam tat tatra ca bhaviṣyati upajīvya veda virodhe tat purāṇa vākyam tatra bhagavataḥ sa doṣa tve upajīvya viruddhasya upajīvakasya aprāmāṇya avaśyambhāvāt iti ca arthaḥ nanu īśvara praṇītānām purāṇānām tadīyam nijam jñānam eva mūlam na vedaḥ anīśvara praṇītānām api yogi pratyakṣam eva atas veda virodhe api kaḥ doṣaḥ ucyate vedaḥ tāvat pramāṇam eva iti niṣyaṅkitam na ca pramāṇayoḥ virodhaḥ asti vastu vikalpa prasaṅgāt tatas veda virodhe nija jñāna ādi mūla tvam eva apanīyate tathā api vedaḥ eva purāṇasya upajīvyaḥ iti katham am īśvara praṇīta purāṇa abhiprāyeṇa iti na doṣaḥ anīśvarāḥ hi svayaṃpratibhāte api arthe āśvāsa artham vedam upajīvanti yathā uktamyat svayaṃpratibhātasya saṃśaya ārtam guroḥ vacaḥ a iti yadveśvara praṇīta purāṇānām api prāmāṇya avadhāraṇāya veda saṃvādaḥ apekṣitaḥ anyathā utprekṣā mūla tva śaṅkanāt tad abhiprāyeṇa purāṇasya upajīvyaḥ ca vedaḥ eva a iti uktam dvitīyam nirākaroti aparīkṣitā iti 
NSu_3.4.158ab.1–3.4.158cd.2	 aparīkṣita dṛṣṭiḥ ca katham eva akṣa jam bhavet akṣa jam katham eva bhavet iti pratyakṣam pramāṇa tayā abhilaṣita arthe na udbhāvayitum śakyate na hi pramāṇa tvena anavadhāritam pramāṇa tvena udbhāvayan parīkṣakaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ vipakṣe bādhakam āha yadi evam iti yadi evam devadatta ādi bhramaḥ kim na akṣa jam bhavet pramāṇa tvena aparīkṣitam api yadi pratyakṣa tayā udbhāvyate iti arthaḥ deva datta ādi bhramaḥ iti yajñadatta śukti ādau devadatta rajata ādi bhramaḥ iti arthaḥ bādhita tvāt tat nākṣa jam pramāṇam iti ced tat kim bādhā bhāva mātram vastu vyavasthā hetuḥ tathā tve niścāyaka pramāṇa vaiyarthya āpatteḥ asti ca prakṛte veda bādhaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.158cd.3	 upajīvya veda virodhāt upajīvakayoḥ pratyakṣa purāṇa vākyayoḥ aprāmāṇyam iti uktam tat asat upajīvakam upajīvya virodhena bādhyate iti niyama abhāvāt dṛśyate hi upajīvyasya api idam rajatam iti jñānasya upajīvakena na idam rajatam iti jñānena bādhaḥ iti ced katham atra upajīvya upajīvaka bhāvaḥ iti vaktavyam aprāptasya pratiṣedha ayogāt prāpti rūpam idam rajatam iti jñānam ādyam upajīvyam pratiṣedha ātmakam tu na idam rajatam iti jñānam upajīvakam iti vā asiddhe dharmiṇi pratiṣedha asambhavāt dharmi jñānam ādyam upajīvyam dvitīyam tu upajīvakam iti vā ādye samādhim āha yāvat śakti iti 
NSu_3.4.159.1–3.4.159.2	 yāvat śakti parīkṣāyām upajīvyasya bādhane doṣaḥ na aśodhite doṣaḥ upajīvya tvam asvalam parīkṣāyām satyām pramāṇa tayā pratītasya iti śeṣaḥ bādhane upajīvakena kutas iti śeṣaḥ doṣaḥ asmad abhimata niyama bhaṅgaḥ syāt upajīvye aśodhite parīkṣayā pramāṇāt avivikte upajīvakena bādhite na doṣaḥ upajīvya tvam astu alam iti prakṛta udāharaṇe prathama pupajīvya upajīvaka bhāvam abhyupaiti upajīvya tvam iti upalakṣaṇam upajīvaka tvam ca iti api draṣṭavyam pūrva uttara jñānayoḥ iti śeṣaḥ alaṃśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe 
NSu_3.4.159.3^1	 idam uktam bhavati asti eva idam rajatam na idam rajatam iti jñānayoḥ upajīvya upajīvaka bhāvaḥ upajīvyasya upajīvakena bādhaḥ ca tathā api upajīvyavirodhena upajīvakam bādhyate iti niyama bhaṅgaḥ na asti ayam khalu asya niyamasya arthaḥ parīkṣayā śodhitam upajīvyam virodhi upajīvakam bādhate svayam tena na bādhyate iti na tu yathāśrutaḥ asya tu tadā bhaṅgaḥ syāt yadi parīkṣitam upajīvyam virodhinā upajīvakena bādhyam kvacid upalabhemahi naca evam idam rajatam iti jñānam tu na śodhitam tatas tasmin= upajīvakena bādhite na niyama bhaṅgaḥ na hi nirviśeṣaṇasya vyabhicāre viśiṣyam vyabhicarati ati prasaṅgāt na ca vācyam viśiṣyasya prayojaka tā kalpanam nirmūlam iti 
NSu_3.4.159.3^2–3.4.159.4	 ubhayathā bādhya bādhaka bhāva darśanāt viśeṣaṇān apekṣāyām avyavasthāpātāt nanu parīkṣāyām aṅgīkṛtāyām tayā eva alam parīkṣitena aparīkṣitam bādhyate iti etāvataḥ kvacid vayabhicāra abhāvāt kim upajīvya upajīvaka bhāvena ucyate bhavet evam yadi ātyantikīm parīkṣāmatra aṅgīkurmaḥ naca evam kintu yāvat śakti parīkṣām eva na ca tāvat mātrasya bādhaka tva niyamaḥ asti yāvat śakti parīkṣitasya api bādha darśanāt atas yuktam viśiṣyasya upādānam ātyantika parīkṣā eva bādhaka tva upayoginī bhavatu kim upajīvya tvena iti api na vācyam tasya api sāṃvyāvahārika tvāt yathā uktam sannipāta lakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tat vighātasya a iti prakṛte tu vedaḥ parīkṣitaḥ upajīvyaḥ ca iti dvitīye parihāram āha bhrame api iti 
NSu_3.4.160a.1–3.4.160a.2	 bhrame api abhrama bhāgaḥ asti hi iti vakṣyamāṇam atra api sambaddhayate yadi api ekam eva idam rajatam iti jñānam tathā api viṣaya upādhi vaśāt vibhāgam tatra prakāre bhrama tve api svarūpe abhrama tvam eva tatra kadāpi bādhā bhāvāt tathā anyepi āhuḥ sarvam jñānam dharmiṇi pramāṇam prakāre tu viparyayaḥ iti bhāga abhyupagamāt eva na virodha codanā vakāśaḥ tatas kim iti atas āha tanmātram iti 
NSu_3.4.160bc.1–3.4.160bc.2	 tanmātram upajīvya hi bādhaka jñāna vṛttiḥ syāt abhrama bhāga mātram tena eva dharmiṇaḥ siddheḥ rajata ākārasya niṣedhya tvena dharmitva abhāvāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati asmin pakṣe yat upajīvyam na tad upajīvakena bādhyate yat ca bādhyate na tat upajīvyam iti atas na idam asmadīya niyama bhaṅgasya udāharaṇam iti 
NSu_3.4.160bc.3–3.4.160bc.4	 atra antare māyā vādinaḥ codayanti yat uktam upajīvya virodhāt advaita śrutīnām aprāmāṇyam iti tat asat tatra api asya samādhānasya su vaca tvāt tathā hi yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādīnām tattvam asya ādīnām ca katham upajīvya upajīvaka bhāvaḥ iti vaktavyam siddham na nivartaka tvāt ityādi vacanāt tat tvam asya ādi vākayam aikya virodhinām sāvarjña ādīnām duḥkha ādīnām ca pratiṣedha kam aṅgīkṛtam na ca prāptim vinā pratiṣedhaḥ asti iti prāpti rūpam yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti ādikam upajīvyam tat tvam asya ādikam tu upajīvakam iti vā asiddhe dhamirṇi pratiṣedha anupapatteḥ dharmi pratipādakam ādyam upajīvyam upajīvakam ca uttaram iti vā ādye rajata jñānasya iva aparīkṣita tvāt upajīvyasya api prathamasya uttareṇa bādhe na kā api anupapattiḥ dvitīye śukti sva rūpa mātram iva brahma svarūpa mātram upajīvyam na sārvajña ādi viśiṣyam tathā ca yat upajīvyam na tad uttareṇa bādhyate yat bādhyate sārvajña ādikam na tat upajīvyam iti na kaścid virodhaḥ iti atra parihāra dvayam api pratiṣedhati na ca evam iti 
NSu_3.4.160d.1–3.4.160d.3	 na ca evam prasiddhayoḥ bhrānti bādhayoḥ iva atra samādhānam na vaktum śakyate vaiṣamyāt iti bhāvaḥ tat katham iti atas prathama pakṣe tāvat vaiṣamyam darśayati su parīkṣitaḥ iti  su parīkṣite prathama pramāṇe su parīkṣite sati na ca evam iti sambandhaḥ etat uktam bhavati idam rajatam iti jñānam upajīvyam api aparīkṣita tvāt upajīvakena na idam rajatam ati jñānena bādhyate upajīvya upajīvaka nyāyasya yāvat śakti parīkṣā viṣaya tvāti hi asmābhiḥ abhihitam asmad nyāyena ca pareṇa pratyavasthāyate na ca tat yuktam yaḥ sarvajñaḥ ityādīnām aham duḥkhī iti ādīnām ca su parīkṣita tvāt upapāditam khalu yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti ādi śrutīnām tattva āvedaka tvam sākṣiṇaḥ ca niyamena avyabhicāritvam iti dvitīya pakṣe vaiṣamyam darśayati sarvam iti 
NSu_3.4.160ef.1–3.4.161.1	 sarvam tat upajīvya eva pramāṇam vartate yatas yatas kāraṇāt tat sarvam sārvajña ādikam upajīvya eva tattvam asi iti ādikam pramāṇam pravartate atas na ca evam iti sambandhaḥ idam uktam bhavati yathā na idam rajatam iti jñānam purovartinaḥ sva rūpa mātram dharmīkṛtya pravartate na tu rajata tva viśiṣyam na tathā tattvam asya ādi vākyam pravartitum arhati kintu sarvajña tva ādi viśiṣyam brahma svarūpam duḥkha ādi viśiṣyam jīva svarūpam ca dharmīkṛtya eva tathā ca dharmi grāhaka virodhaḥ aparihārya iti atra sarvam iti sarvajña tva ādi anyatamasya upalakṣaṇam nanu tattvam asya ādi vākyam api yadi sva rūpa mātram upajīvya pravarteta tadā kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha katham iti katham brahma iti tat jñeyam sarvajña tva ādi lakṣaṇam vihāya yasmāt kasmāccid svarūpasya eva ced yadi 
NSu_3.4.162a.1–3.4.162a.2	 upajīvya tvam vākya dvayam etat tatra ekasya arthaḥ dharmān vihāya svarūpasya eva upajīvya tvam ced tarhi tat katham jñeyam yat tat tvam asi iti bodhyate etat uktam bhavati śabdena ānūdya hi svarūpam tat tvam asi iti vaktavyam na ca nirdharmasya pratipādakaḥ śabdaḥ asti atas sva rūpa mātrasya buddhau= anārohāt bodhanam eva anupapannam iti na brūmaḥ sva rūpa mātrasya upajīvya tvam kintu bhedakān sarvajña tva ādi dharmān vihāya tattva ādinā viśiṣyasya tathā ca na kaścid doṣaḥ iti atas śiṣyam vākyam yadi tattva ādi dharma upetasya upajīvya tvam tarhi sarvajña tva ādikam vihāya yasmāt kasmāccid tattva ādeḥ tat brahma iti katham jñeyam yadi api asmin pakṣe na ukta doṣaḥ tathā api bodhyasya brahma asmi iti jñānam anupapannam eva sarvajña tva ādeḥ brahma lakṣaṇa tvena tad anupādāne brahmaṇaḥ buddhau= anārohāt tattva ādeḥ ghaṭa ādi sādhāraṇa tvāt iti bhāvaḥ sarvajña tva ādi parityāgena upajīvane bādhakam abhidhāya viparyaye paryavasānam āha etasmāt iti 
NSu_3.4.162a–3.4.162d.3	 etasmāt vyāvṛttam yāvatā bhavet tāvatā eva upajīvya tvam aparathāḥ jñāna asambhavāt yāvatā dharmeṇa tāvatā upetasya eva nanu na idam rajatam iti jñānam yathā sva rūpa mātram upajīvya pravṛttam tathā idam api pravartsyati kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha svarūpasya eva iti  svarapasya eva na kvacid upajīvya tvam iti vartate ukta anupapatteḥ eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ api na samastaḥ iti arthaḥ nanu yat sarvajñam tat tvam asi iti na bodhanīyam kintu tat tvam asi iti eva na ca ukta doṣaḥ tad śabdaḥ brahma vadati yogyā anvita abhidhāyinaḥ ca śabdāḥ lakṣaṇam ca brahmaṇā anvetum yogyam tatas ca tat śabdena eva vyāvṛttasya pratīteḥ iti āśa yavān āśaṅkate sarva iti 
NSu_3.4.163ab.1–3.4.163c.3	 sarva lakṣaṇa yuktam tu svarūpam yadi bhaṇyate caśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe bhaṇyate tad śabdena iti yadi bhaṇyate iti āvṛttyā yojyam sampratipattim uttaram āha astu iti astu yat pareṇa uktam tat astu iti arthaḥ prativādi ukta artha aṅgīkāre pratijñāhāniḥ katham na bhavet iti atas āha na iti  naḥ na eva hāniḥ syāt anabhimata prameya aṅgīkāre hi pratijñā hāniḥ syāt anena ca aṅgīkṛtena naḥ asmākam na eva hāniḥ syāt parasya dharmi grāhi virodhaḥ hi asmābhiḥ ucyate tad parihārāya pareṇa ca idam uditam naca anena tat parihāram pratyuta dṛḍhīkṛtam iti bhāvaḥ kim prakṛta prameya avirodhi tva mātreṇa idam aṅgīkriyate uta tathābhūta tvena iti jijñāsāyām āha sva pakṣaḥ ca iti 
NSu_3.4.163d.1–3.4.164ab.3	 sva pakṣaḥ ca ayam añjasā añjasā iti nābhyupagama mātreṇa iti arthaḥ tat upapādayati yasmāt iti yasmāt anvitaḥ eva arthaḥ śabdānām api sarvaśas sarvaśas api iti sambandhaḥ iti etat sūtra sāmarthyena prāk upapāditam iti śeṣaḥ kiñca asmin= api pakṣe brahmaṇaḥ buddhau= anārohaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva yatas tad ādi śabdāḥ sāmānyatas eva yogyā anvitam bruvate sarva jña ādi śabdāḥ eva viśeṣataḥ tathā anubhavāt na ca sāmānyatas anvita abhidhāyinā vyāvṛtta pratītiḥ iti āśayavān āha viśeṣa iti 
NSu_3.4.164cd.1–3.4.164cd.4	 viśeṣa sāmanyatayā svarūpam akhilam bhavet akhilam yogyā anvitam svarūpam viśeṣa sāmānyatayā śabda bodhyam bhavet anvita abhidhāna mātram aṅgīkriyate eva tat ca ekasya padasya sāmānyatas eva na viśeṣate iti na buddhau brahma ārohaḥ yadi ca viśeṣaḥ tadā dharmi grāhi virodhaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva iti samudāya arthaḥ kecid māyā vādinaḥ anvita abhidhānam aṅgīkurvate vijñāna ghanādaya sati na aprāpta śaṅkā iyam 
NSu_3.4.164cd.5	 vyāvartaka dharmaiḥ vyāvṛttasya eva upajīvya tvam iti yat uktam tat na asti bādhaka jñāneṣu tad abhāvāt na ca tatra api vyāvṛttasya eva upajīvya tvam na sva rūpa mātrasya iti uktam iti vācyam pūrvasmin bhrama jñāne vyāvṛtta tvasya eva asiddha tvāt siddhau ca bhramatvā anupapatteḥ tanmātram upajīvya hi a iti ukta virodhāt ca iti atas āha puras varti tva iti 
NSu_3.4.165.1–3.4.165.4	 puras varti tva pūrvāṇi devadatta ādika bhrame vyāvartayanti tad rūpam caitra mātrat vinā eva hi deva datta ādau yaḥ caitra ādi bhramaḥ tatra puras varti tva pūrvāṇi viśeṣaṇāni devadatta ādi svarūpam devadatta ādeḥ avidita tvāt caitra mātrāt vinā evāpuraḥ varti ādibhyaḥ vyāvartayanti yasmāt tasmāt bādhaka jñānam vyāvṛttam eva upajīvati iti niyamaḥ na anupapannaḥ na api bhrama anupapattiḥ āropya vyāvṛtteḥ anaṅgīkaraṇāt tanmātra śabdena ca āropya mātra vyāvartanāt na ukta virodhaḥ api iti bhāvaḥ nanu anena na atyanta vyāvṛttiḥ upayoginī kintu vyāvṛtti mātram iti uktam bhavati tad prakṛte api asti tattva ādinā brahmaṇaḥ api vyāvṛtta tvena upajīvya tva sambhavāt iti ced na tāvat mātreṇa bodhyasya api brahma asmi iti jñāna anupapatteḥ ukta tvāt doṣa antaram ca āha brahmaṇaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.166ab.1–3.4.166cd.3	 brahmaṇaḥ nirviśeṣa tvāt vyāvartayati kim punar brahmaṇaḥ punar iti sambandhaḥ kim kartṛ brahma vyāvartayati na kim api tattva ādīnām aṅgīkāre api doṣam āha yasmāt iti yasmāt kasmāt cid api arthāt tāvat ced siddha sādhanam tattva ādi viśeṣaṇena yasmāt kasmāt api arthāt tattva ādi rahitam tāvadvaya avṛttam ced upajīvya tvam asti iti bodhyate tadā idam vākyam siddha sādhanam jñātasya eva jñāpakam syāt bodhyena asya arthasya prāk eva vidita tvāt tathā ca aśāstram syāt mā bhūt tattva ādinā vyāvṛttam brahma upajīvyam vijñānam ānandam brahma ityādi śrutyāḥ brahma lakṣaṇa tvena uktena cit mātra tva ādinā tu bhaviṣyati iti atas āha cit mātra tvam ca iti 
NSu_3.4.167ab.1–3.4.167cd.3	 cit mātra tvam ca naiveṣyam aviśeṣa tva vādinaḥ mātra śabdena citaḥ sarva viṣaya tva ādikam vyāvartayati ānanda tva ādeḥ api upalakṣaṇam etat brahmaṇaḥ iti śeṣaḥ cit mātra tva ādikam na brahmaṇaḥ bhinnam atas nirviśeṣa tva avirodhāt tad aṅgīkriyate iti atas āha tāvat mātram iti tāvat mātram yat īṣyam syāt sarvajña tvam kutas na tat tat tarhi tasya api śruta tvāt abhinna tvāt ca iti bhāvaḥ abhede katham lakṣaṇa tvam iti ced samam vijñāna ādau= api uktaḥ ca lakṣya lakṣaṇa prakāraḥ lakṣaṇa sūtraḥ iti śruta tva sāmye api cit mātra tva ādikam eva dharmiṇi niveśyate aviruddha tvāt na sarvajña tva ādikam viruddha tvāt yathā na idam rajatam iti jñāne aviruddha puras varti tva ādi upetasya dharmi tvam na viruddha rajata tva ādi upetasya iti atas āha cit mātra iti 
NSu_3.4.168a.1–3.4.168c.2	 cit mātra abheda sādhye api cit mātreṇa abhedaḥ cit mātrā bhedaḥ saḥ sādhyaḥ pratipādyaḥ yasya tat tathā uktam tat tvam asya ādi vākye cit mātrā bheda sādhye aṅgīkṛte api tat vākyam siddha sādhanam bhavet iti anvayaḥ tat katham iti atas āha siddham iti  siddham tat prativādinaḥ tat cit aikyam prativādinaḥ bodhyasya yatas iti śeṣaḥ katham siddham iti atas āha sva iti sva abheda aṅgīkṛteḥ eva svasya svena abheda aṅgīkṛteḥ eva śabdasya siddham iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ sva abheda aṅgīkṛtau cit abhedaḥ katham siddhaḥ iti atas āha cittvam iti 
NSu_3.4.168d.1–3.4.168d.3	 cit tvam svasya api yat matam svasya bodhyasya yadi asmāt matam sammatam etat uktam bhavati virodha bhayāt sarvajña tva ādi viśiṣyam na dharmīkriyate iti vadatā cit ānanda rūpam api na dharmīkartavyam jñāta jñāpana prasaṅgāt virodhaḥ iva jñāta jñāpanasya api aśāstra tā hetu tve viśeṣa abhāvāt cit mātram tvad atiriktam na asti iti vākya arthaḥ iti ced na apratibhāsanāt gati antara abhāvāt ittham kalpyate iti ced sūtra kṛtā eva artha antarasya ukta tvāt 
NSu_3.4.168d.4	 na virodha bhayā dvayam sārvajña ādikam dharmiṇi na niveśayāmaḥ kintu sarvajña tva ādikam na brahmaṇaḥ bhinnam na iha nānā ityādi śruti virodhāt na api svarūpam tasya viyat ādi sarva sāpekṣa tvāt sarvasya ca mithyātvāt na hi tathābhūtasya satya svarūpa tā sambhavati cit ānanda ādeḥ tu brahma svarūpa tve na kvāpi anupapattiḥ iti āśa yavān āśaṅkate sarva iti 
NSu_3.4.169a–3.4.169c.2	 sarva apekṣa tayā sarvajña tvam iti eva tat na hi iti ced sarvajña tvam vartate iti śeṣaḥ iti śabdaḥ hetau eva śabdasya tat eva iti anena sambandhaḥ na hi mithyā iti arthaḥ pariharati cetana tvam ca iti  cetana tvam ca yat para sa apekṣam tat na sat iti aṅgīkāre brahmaṇaḥ cetana tvam ca na syāt iti arthaḥ kutas iti atas yupratyayasya aneka artha tvāt kartṛ vācitām tāvat upādāya vyācaṣṭe jña tvam iti 
NSu_3.4.169d.1–3.4.169d.3	 jña tvam cetana tvam nāma tāvat jña tvam iti arthaḥ tatas kim iti atas āha na iti  na jñeya varjitam jña tvam iti vartate kintu jñeya sā apekṣam eva jñāna kriyām prati kartṛ tvam khalu jña tvam sa karmaka kriyā vacanaḥ ca jānātiḥ atas karma apekṣa kriyā kartṛ tvam api sa apekṣam eva tathā api kutas cetana tvam na syāt iti ced jñasya brahmaṇaḥ jñeyam svayam eva vā syāt param vā na adyaḥ iti āha sva iti 
NSu_3.4.170ab.1–3.4.170ab.3	 sva jñeya tvam ca na eva asau manyate sa viśeṣatas caḥ tu arthaḥ asau māyā vādī kutas na manyate iti atas āha sa viśeṣatas iti sa viśeṣa tva prasaṅgāt pratyak parāgbhāva lakṣaṇaḥ hi kartṛ karma bhāvaḥ na ekatra ekasya yujyate yadi ca syāt tadā bheda pratinidhinā viśeṣeṇa ghaṭanīyaḥ atas brahmaṇaḥ jña tva jñeya tvayoḥ aṅgīkāre viśeṣaḥ aṅgīkartavyaḥ syāt nivirśeṣam ca brahma aṅgīkṛtam iti sva jñeya tvam na manyate tatas ca param eva jñeyam vaktavyam tat ca mithyābhūtam iti katham tad apekṣam cetana tvam satsyāt iti evam jña tvasya jñāna sāpekṣa tvam api vaktavyam kiñca evam vadatā svarūpa mātram upajīvyam iti api vaktum na śakyate tasya api sva śabdena para apekṣatā pratīteḥ iti āha sva śabdaḥ api iti 
NSu_3.4.170c.1–3.4.170.1	 sva śabdaḥ api para apekṣaḥ parepekṣaḥ para apekṣasya arthasya pratipādakaḥ katham iti atas āha tasmāt iti  tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ eva hi sva śabda arthaḥ iti proktaḥ parasmāt hi śabdaḥ hetau arthaḥ pravṛtti nimittam iti proktaḥ śabda śakti jñaiḥ svam ca tad rūpam ca iti hi svarūpam rūpa śabdaḥ ca su aparasādhāraṇaḥ tena svasmin prāpte api ucyamānaḥ sva śabdaḥ parisaṅkhayā anyāyena para vyāvṛttim eva pratipādayati iti jñāyate satyam etat evam vyākhyāne na ca evam iti atas āha svarūpam iti  svarūpam nāma kim na ced 
NSu_3.4.171.1–3.4.171.2^1	 na svarūpa abhidhāyi syāt vaiyarthyam svaravasya yat rūpa śabdena pūrṇa tvāt tat ca sāmānyatā vacaḥ asmad abhipretam vyākhyānam na ced aṅgīkriyate tadā svarūpam nāma kim na kim api svarūpa śabdaḥ nirarthakaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ rūpa śabda samāna arthaḥ svarūpa śabdaḥ iti atas katham etat iti ced atra vaktavyam svam ca tad rūpam ca iti vyutpattim aṅgīkṛtya evam ucyate uta akhaṇḍaḥ eva ayam śabdaḥ iti upetya ādye doṣam āha vaiyathyarmiti yasmāt asmin pakṣe sva śabdasya vaiyarthyam tasmāt svarūpam nāma kim ita sambandhaḥ kutas vaiyarthyam iti atas āha rūpā iti 
NSu_3.4.171.1–3.4.171.2^2	 sva rūpa śabde yaḥ rūpa śabdaḥ tena eva rūpa śabda artha abhidhānasya pūrṇa tvāt na hi rūpa śabdaḥ rūpa śabda artham na abhidhavaḥ iti sambhavati anyathā utpala nīlotpala śabdau= api eka arthau syātām dvitīyam nirākaroti tat ca iti tat rūpa padam caḥ yasmāt iti arthe sāmānya tā vacaḥ sāmānya ākārasya vācakam cāturvarṇya ādi tvāt svārthe ṣyan pratyayaḥ etat uktam bhavati pratīti pramāṇakaḥ eva śabda artha niścayaḥ iti hi śābdāḥ tatra rūpa śabdaḥ sāmānya ākārasya abhidhāyakaḥ sarveṣām tatas tad pratyayāt sva rūpa śabdaḥ ca asādhāraṇa ākārasya tasmāt tad pratīteḥ tasmāt na tayoḥ eka artha tvam iti 
NSu_3.4.171.3	 yat uktam cetana tvam brahmaṇaḥ na syāt iti tat iṣi āpādanam na hi vayam brahmaṇaḥ cetana tvam aṅgīkurmaḥ kriyā veśa lakṣaṇasya kartṛ tvasya nirvikalpake abhāvāt kintu caitanyam eva brahma tad arthāḥ eva cetana tva vādāḥ vyākhyātavyāḥ iti atas caitanyam api na pareṇa śakya aṅgīkāram iti bhāvena tat vaya ākhyāti cetanasya iti 
NSu_3.4.172ab.1–3.4.172ab.3	 cetanasya svabhāvaḥ hi caitanyam iti gīyate bhāvaḥ śabda pravṛtti nimittam tasya atra anāgantuka tvam jñāpayitum sva śabdaḥ iti hi gīyate iti anena guṇa vacana brāhmaṇa ādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ca iti smṛtim sūcayati cetana śabda pravṛtti nimittam ca jñānam citī saṃjñānaḥ iti pāṭhāt tatas ca jñānam brahma iti uktam bhavati tatas kim iti atas āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_3.4.172cd.1–3.4.172cd.2	 tasmāt viśeṣa bāhulyam caitanyasya viśeṣataḥ yasmāt caitanyam nāma jñānam tasmāt caitanyasya brahmaṇaḥ viśeṣataḥ atiśayena viśeṣa bāhulyam prasajyate jñānam hi jñeya jñātṛ karaṇa sāpekṣam bhavati jñāna tva ādi dharmāḥ ca anivāryāḥ na ca sa viśeṣam brahma pareṇa aṅgīkriyate jñeya ādikam ca na svayam virodhāt parantu mithyā iti tad sāpekṣam jñānam katham sat syāt brahmaṇaḥ jñāna tve jñeya ādi upeta tā kutas iti ced jñāna tvāt prasiddha jñāna vat na ca jñāna tvam asiddham iti yuktam aṅgīkāra virodhāt vyāptim upapādayati na iti 
NSu_3.4.173ab.1–3.4.173cd.3	 na jñeya jñātṛ hīnam hi jñānam nāma kvacid bhavet yat uktam prāk brahmaṇaḥ cetana tve jñeya jñāna upeta tvena bhāvyam iti tatra api jña tvāt sammata vat iti niyāmakam abhipretam prasaṅgāt tasya api vyāptim upapādayati jñeyā iti jñeya jñāna vihīnaḥ ca jñaḥ iti atra ca na pramā ādyaḥ ca śabdaḥ jñeyādi rāhityajña tvayoḥ samuccaye dvitīyaḥ tu vyabhicāra dvaya samuccaye nanu prasiddhasya jñānasya jñeya ādi upeta tve api idam brahma svarūpam jñānam tat rahitam bhavatu kim bādhakam iti atas āha jñātṛ jñeya iti 
NSu_3.4.174.1–3.4.174.3	 jñātṛ jñeya vihīnam ca jñānam ced bhoktṛ bhojyataḥ hīnam bhojanam eva syāt tāḍanam kartṛ tāḍyataḥ hīnam eva iti sambandhaḥ kartṛ tāḍyate iti tāḍayitṛ tāḍyābhyām hīnam syāt iti arthaḥ dhātvarthaḥ api jñānam yadi kartṛ rahitam syāt ākāṅkṣā vaśāt sa karmaka tayā pratīyamānam api ca yadi niṣkarmakam syāt tadā uktaḥ bahutaraḥ ati prasaṅgaḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt iti jña viṣaye api evam bhojya bhojana vihīnaḥ bhoktā api syāt ityādi rati prasaṅgaḥ vācyaḥ na hi sa karmaka kriyāyāḥ kartā kriyā ādi rahitaḥ yuktaḥ iti jñātā jñeyam iti ca kāraka abhidhānam etat kārakam utpādakam iti ca paryāyau= etau kāryam eva ca utpādakam apekṣate akāryam ca brahma ākhyam jñānam iti na tasya kartṛ ādi apekṣā iti āśayavān śaṅkate nitya tvāt iti 
NSu_3.4.175ab.1–3.4.175ab.3	 nitya tvāt tādṛśam ca syāt iti ced nitya tvam akārya tvasya upalakṣaṇam anityasya bhojana ādeḥ bhoktra ādi apekṣāyām api idam nitya tvāt tādṛśam jñātra ādi rahitam ca syāt iti anena vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhyā vyāpya viparyayaḥ śaṅkitaḥ na utpādakam eva kārakam tathā sati asti gaganam ityādau gagana ādīnām akāraka tva prasaṅgāt kintu dhātu artha āśrayaḥ kartā tad viṣayaḥ karma ityādi ākāṅkṣānākāṅkṣe eva ca tad anvita tvān anvita tvayoḥ prayojake na tu kāryatva akārya tve atas eva kaścid dhātvarthaḥ karma ādi anvitaḥ kaścid na iti yujyata iti āśa yavān ākāṅkṣām a prayojakīkṛtya kārya tva ādi eva prayojakī kurvāṇasya atiprasaṅgam āha nitya iti 
NSu_3.4.175bc.1–3.4.175d.2	 nitya vāc api vācya vaktṛ vihīnā syāt akāryasya kārakān anvita tve akāryā veda vāc vācya vaktṛ vihīnā syāt kāryasya ca kāraka anvita tve karma ādi anvita tā niyamaḥ api syāt iti apeḥ arthaḥ viparyaye paryavasānam āha na hi iti  nahi sā ca eva tādṛśī sā tādṛśī na eva hi iti sambandhaḥ dvitīya prasaṅgasya viparyaya paryavasānam caśabdena āha katham na sā tādṛśī iti atas āha draṣṭāraḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.176ab.1–3.4.176cd.1	 draṣṭāraḥ veda vācaḥ hi santi vācyāni ca añjasā vaktāraḥ iti vaktavye draṣṭāraḥ iti uktam apauruṣeya tva avighāta artham añjasā iti vācya sadbhāve na kācid anupapattiḥ iti uktam nanu santi sthiti samaye veda vācaḥ vasiṣṭha ādayaḥ draṣṭāraḥ indra ādayaḥ ca vācyāḥ na tu mahāpralayaḥ iti atas āha nityaḥ iti nityaḥ draṣṭā ca vācyaḥ ca bhagavān eva ca svayam 
NSu_3.4.177ab.1–3.4.177ab.3	 na hi vaktṛ vihīnā ca vācya hīnā api vāc kvacid dvau caśabdau= anyonya samuccaye tṛtīyaḥ yasmāt iti arthe veda vācaḥ iti vartate hi śabdaḥ tasmāt iti arthe vāc veda vāc kvacid pralaye api yathā veda vāc vācya ādi upetā api kvacid tat rahitā tathā brahma rūpam jñānam vyavahāre jñeya ādi anvitam api paramārthataḥ tat rahitam bhaviṣyati iti pratyāśām vārayitum idam vacanam yasmāt evam kārya tva ādi kamaprayojakam kintvākāṅkṣā nimittaḥ niyata sambandhaḥ eva tasmāt nitya vāc iva nityam api jñānam jñeya ādi upetam eva aṅgīkāryam iti upasaṃharati jñātṛ jñeya iti 
NSu_3.4.177cd.1–3.4.177cd.4	 jñātṛ jñeya vihīnam ca jñānam evam na tat bhavet nanu vāc na dhātvarthaḥ api tu dhātu artham prati karma tat katham atra udāharaṇam ucyate ākāṅkṣā nimittam pratisambandhi anvita tvam nitya tvena na hīyate iti etāvat mātre vāc udāharaṇasya gṛhīta tvāt na doṣaḥ vāc iti ukte hi kiṃvaktṛkā kiṃvācyā iti ākāṅkṣā bhavati eva varṇānām api atharvat tvasya sthita tvāt na nitya tva vācyavat tvayoḥ vyadhikaraṇa tvam jñasya api nitya tvena jñeya ādi rahita tva śaṅkā evam eva parihārya iti āha na hi iti 
NSu_3.4.178.1–3.4.178.3	 na hi nityaḥ api vaktā asti vākya vācya vivarjitaḥ jñāna jñeya vihīnaḥ ca jñaḥ api evam na eva vidyate nityaḥ api vaktā parameśvaraḥ vākya vācya vivajirtaḥ na asti yasmāt tasmāt evam nityaḥ api jñaḥ jñāna jñeya vihīnaḥ na eva vidyate śaktiḥ kārakam iti pakṣasya sthitvād nityaḥ vaktā iti yujyate anena ubhayatra vyāpti abhāvena vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ asiddhā iti uktam bhavati mithyā bhūta parasa apekṣasya sārvajñasya api mithyātvam aṅgīkurvāṇasya cetana tu a ādi abhāva prasaṅgaḥ abhihitaḥ idānīm prapañca mithyā tvam ca aprāmāṇikam iti āha kiñca iti 
NSu_3.4.179ab.1–3.4.179f.2	 kiñca sarva vilopaḥ ca kena mānena gamyate sarva vilopaḥ sarvasya mithyātvam na tāvat pratyakṣeṇa tasya satya tā grāhi tvāt na api anumānena pratyakṣa bādhitasya tasya prāmāṇya abhāvāt naca āgamena prapañca mithyātvam pratipādayataḥ tasya abhāvāt iti ākṣepa arthaḥ nanu na iha nānā asti kiñcana ityāgamasya sadbhāvāt katham viśva mithyā tve māna abhāvaḥ iti ced atra pṛcchāmaḥ atra sarvasya mithyātvam pratipādayati vākye sarva antargata tvena idam vākyam etat vākya arthaḥ ca gṛhyate na vā iti ādyam anūdya dūṣayati sarveṇa iti sarveṇa saha tat vākyām arthaḥ ca yadi gṛhyate tad abhāvena sarvasya na apalāpaḥ bhavet tadā tad abhāvena vākya vākya arthayoḥ mithyā tvena kāraṇena vākya abhāve pratipādaka abhāvāt vākya arthasya sarva mithyā tvasya abhāve ca vyāghātāt dvitīyam anūdya dūṣayati na gṛhyate ced iti 
NSu_3.4.180ab.1–3.4.180ab.3	 na gṛhyate ced tad nyāyāt apalāpaḥ na hi kvacid kvacid viyat ādi viṣaye api apalāpaḥ niṣedhaḥ na yujyate tad nyāyāt vākya ādi nyāyāt ayam arthaḥ vākya vākya arthau kutas sarvasmāt bahiṣkriyete iti vācyam anupapatteḥ iti ced kim anupapannam na pratipādanīyam addhā iti ceta evam tarhi viyat ādi mithyātvam api anupapanna tvāt na pratipādanīyam iti nanu vākya udāharaṇe kṛte na evaṃvidham vākyam asti iti vā na eṣām padānām atra śaktiḥ arsti iti vā na asya vākyasya atra tātparyam asti iti vā vaktavyam anena vikalpa nirākaraṇena tu kim kṛtam syāt iti atas āha upapatti iti 
NSu_3.4.180cd.1–3.4.180cd.3	 upapatti vihīnasya vākyasya arthaḥ na gamyate vihīnasya viruddhasya arthaḥ tātparyam etat uktam bhavati na brūmaḥ vayam na asti idam vākyam iti na api eṣām padānām atra śaktiḥ na asti iti kintvasya vākyasya prapañca mithyā tve tātparyam na asti iti upapatti virodha abhāvaḥ hi pratīta arthe tātparyasya jñāpakaḥ atra ca asti upapatti virodhaḥ iti jñāpanāya vikalpya dūṣaṇa abhidhānam kṛtam iti syāt etat upakrama upasaṃhāra abhyāsa āpūrvatā phala arthavāda upapattayaḥ śruti liṅga vākya prakaraṇa sthāna samākhyāḥ ca tātparyaliṅgāni tatra upapatti virodhe api anyaiḥ liṅgaiḥ asya vākyasya prapañca mithyā tve tātparyam avagamya tām iti atas āha upakrama ādi iti 
NSu_3.4.181a–3.4.181c.2	 upakrama ādi liṅgānām balīyaḥ hi uttarottaram śruti ādau pūrva pūrvam ca upakrama ādi liṅgānām madhye yat yat uttaram tad tad balīyaḥ iti upapattiḥ eva balīyasī śruti ādau liṅga samūhe ca yat yat pūrvam tad tad balīyaḥ iti tatra api liṅga śabda udita upapattiḥ eva balavatī tatas balavat virodhe satām anyeṣām liṅgānām na tātparya niścāyaka tvam yuktam kutas etat iti atas āha brahmatarka iti 
NSu_3.4.181d.1–3.4.182.1	 brahma tarka vinirṇayāt brahma tarka ākhye tarkaśāstre tathā nirṇīta tvāt etena upakramasya upasaṃhārāt prābalyam vadantaḥ nirastāḥ yathā ca etat tathā uktam nyāya vivaraṇe itas ca na api asya vākyasya prapañca mithyā tve tātparyam āha pratyakṣam iti pratyakṣam upapattiḥ ca bahavaḥ ca āgamā yadā viruddhayante naca arthaḥ asti yatra liṅga virodhitā 
NSu_3.4.183a.1–3.4.183a.3	 saḥ eva arthaḥ katham grāhyaḥ sat gaganam ityādi pratyakṣam tat ca sākṣi rūpa tvāt balavat upapattiḥ ca artha kriyā kāri tva ādikāḥ sā ca vyāpti ādimattvāt balavatī āgamāḥ ca viśvam satyam ityādyāḥ teṣā prābalya vyutpādanāya bahavaḥ iti uktam niravakāśa tva ādi upalakṣaṇam etat yadā yasmin= arthe aṅgīkṛte yatra yad artha pratipādane arthaḥ prayojanam ca na asti brahmaṇaḥ advitīya tā siddhiḥ prayojanam iti ced na tasyāḥ eva aprāmāṇika tvāt ātmanaḥ mukti siddhiḥ iti ced na vināśena api tad siddheḥ bahu jīva vādinām iva adarśanena api upapatteḥ vairāgya artham iti ced na duḥkha sādhana tā ājñāpanena tad siddheḥ artha grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam upakrama ādīnām api ānukūlyam na asti iti ca draṣṭavyam na kevalam liṅga ānukūlya abhāvaḥ kinnāma yatra liṅga virodhitā ca etat dvayam grantha antare tatra tatra uktam jñātavyam tarhi niravakāśam vākyam apramāṇam prasajyate iti atas āha upapannaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.183b.1–3.4.183cd.3	 upapanne avirodhinī pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa upakrama ādi liṅga avirodhini tadā anukūlya upapanne ca bhagavati sva gata bheda abhāve arthe vākyasya sati saḥ eva arthaḥ katham grāhyaḥ na iha nānā iti vākyasya apavyākhyāne nirākṛte labdham āha mukhya arthaḥ iti mukhya arthe vidyamāne tu kva sāvarjñyam niṣiddhayate pratiṣedhasya saṅkoce kāraṇa abhāvena prapañca mithyātvam mukhyaḥ arthaḥ tasmin= avidyamāne tu sāvarjñam na pratiṣeddhum śakyate mithyā artha sāpekṣa tayā hi tat niṣedhyam yat vā upapannaḥ iti ādikam ekam vākyam upapanne avirodhini ca atas eva mukhya arthe vākyasya vidyamāne sati anena prapañca mithyātvā siddheḥ kva sārvajñam niṣidhyate iti yojanā saṅgatiḥ tu ukta saṅgati samāhāreṇa draṣṭavyā sarvam tat upajīvya eva ityādinā uktam artham upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_3.4.184ab.1–3.4.184ab.3	 atas sarva guṇaiḥ yuktam brahma aṅgīkāyarmā iva hi aṅgīkāryam dharmi tayā iti śeṣaḥ tathā ca upajīvya virodhaḥ tattvam asya ādi vākyasya durvāraḥ iti herarthaḥ syāt etat sārvajña ādi guṇa upetam eva brahma dharmīkurmaḥ kintu teṣām mithyātvāt na upajīvya virodhaḥ advaita āgamasya yathā yaḥ puruṣaḥ sa sthāṇuḥ iti atra āropitena puruṣa tvena vyāvṛttam vastu dharmīkṛtya pravṛttau= api na upajīvyavirodhaḥ iti atas āha apalāpaḥ api iti 
NSu_3.4.184cd.1–3.4.184cd.3	 apalāpaḥ api sarvasya na kathañcana yujyate mithyātva abhidhānam api śabdaḥ pūrva vākya artha samuccaye sarva śabdena prakṛtam guṇa jātam ucyate kathañcanā iti pramāṇa abhāvāt śruti ādi pramāṇa viruddha tvāt ca aprāpta tvena anuvāda tva abhāvasya ca ukta tvāt iti arthaḥ nanu ca tattvam asya ādi vākyam eva jīva brahmaṇoḥ eka tām pratipādayat sārvajña ādi guṇa jātasya mithyātvam gamayati na hi tasya satya tve jīva brahma eka tvam upapadyate tat katham guṇānām mithyātve pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti ced na siddhe tattvam asya ādi vākyasya jīva brahma ekatva niṣṭha tve guṇānām mithyātva siddhiḥ tad siddhau ca tad siddhiḥ iti paraspara āśraya tā doṣāt doṣa antaram ca āha anādi iti 
NSu_3.4.185ab.1–3.4.185ab.3	 anādi yogya tā ca uktā tena grāhyā eva sarvathā yasmāt jīvānām anādi yogya tā uktā pramāṇaiḥ upapāditā tena kāraṇena sā grāhyā eva sarvathā etat uktam bhavati yadā deva mānava dānava rūpā tat avāntara bheda rūpā ca jīvānām yogyatāna ādi nityā pramitā tadā kā vārtā jīva brahmaṇoḥ eka tvasya tathā ca katham tad siddhaye guṇānām mithyātva kalpanam iti atra eva hetu antaram āha muktānām iti 
NSu_3.4.185cd.1–3.4.185cd.3	 muktānām tāratamyam ca mānaiḥ uktaiḥ na cālyate mānaiḥ uktaiḥ iti mānānām ukta tvāt iti arthaḥ na cālyate na anyathayitum śakyate yadā muktau= api tāratamyam pramitam tadā kā jīva brahma aikya pratyāśā katham ca tattvam asya ādi vākyasya tat paratvam yatas guṇānām mithyātva kalpanam yuktam syāt iti muktānām tāratamye pramāṇa antaram āha jñāninaḥ api iti 
NSu_3.4.186.1–3.4.186.2	 jñāninaḥ api yatas nityam kurvanti śubham eva hi tāratamyam tu muktau ca tena eva adhyavasīyate eva śabdena pāpam pariharanti ca iti sūcayati tuśabdena śubha aśubha karaṇa parityāgayoḥ tāratamyam dyotayati hi śabdena tatra pramāṇa prasiddhim pramāṇāni tu daśa kalpam ityādīni prāk udāhṛtāni eva tena eva iti asya pramāṇasya niravakāśa tām āha prāk mokṣa sādhanānām tāratamyāt mokṣa tāratamyam uktam idānīm tu jñānena niścita mokṣāṇām api śubha aśubha karaṇa parityāgatāratamyāt ucyate iti bhedaḥ vipakṣe bādhakam āha tāratamyam iti 
NSu_3.4.187ab.1–3.4.187cd.1	 tāratamyam na ced muktau kutas kuryuḥ śubham punar punar iti jñāna uttaram yadi brahma ādyāḥ muktau tāratamyavantaḥ na syuḥ tadā jñāna mātreṇa mokṣasya prāpta prāya tvāt jñāna uttara kālam śubham na kuryuḥ aśubham ca na parityajeyuḥ iti atharḥ viparyaya paryavasānam āha kṛcchreṇa iti kṛcchreṇa api tapaḥ jñānam karma api ete caranti hi 
NSu_3.4.188ab.1–3.4.188ab.2	 bibhyati sma aśubhān nityam sa kāmāḥ ca śubhe sadā tapaḥ jñānam karma api iti anena śubham iti uktam bhavati jñānam iti śravaṇa ādikam ucyate karma iti yajña ādi ete jñāninaḥ kṛcchreṇa api ityādi viśeṣaṇānām phalam anupadam eva jñāsyate sa kāmāḥ ca śubhe sadā iti ekasya tapaa ādeḥ caraṇa kāle tapaā ādi antaram kāmayantaḥ iti arthaḥ tasmāt jñāna uttara kāla anuṣṭhitena vicitreṇa śubhena vicitrām ānanda buddhim prāpnuvanti iti śeṣaḥ 
NSu_3.4.188ab.3–3.4.188cd.2	 bhavet etat yadi jñāna uttara kāla kṛtānām śubhānām phalavat tvam syāt na ca evam teṣām karmasu anadhikārāt anadhikāriṇā ca kṛtam viphalam iti prasiddham eva anuṣṭhānam tu anyathā api upapadyate te hi prāk jñāna udayāt ādara nairantaryābhyām śubhāni anuṣṭhitavantaḥ tad svābhāvyam āpannā jñāna udaya anantaram api anutiṣṭhanti iti āṅkaya pariharati na ca iti na ca svabhāvaḥ eva ayam bhaya pūrva pravṛttitaḥ ayam jñāninām śubha ācaraṇa rūpaḥ akaraṇe pratyavāyaḥ bhaviṣyati iti evam bhaya pūrva pravṛttitaḥ kṛcchreṇa eva ācaraṇāt ca śubhasya eva iti prekṣā pūrvam aśubha parityāgena iti arthaḥ 
NSu_3.4.188ef.1–3.4.188ef.3	 kṛcchreṇa ācaraṇāt ca eva śubhasya eva punar punar etena kṛcchreṇa api ityādi viśeṣaṇa phalam uktam bhavati na hi svabhāva kṛtā pravṛttiḥ evam bhavitum arhati nanu ete prāc anuṣṭhāna kāle bhaya pūrvam kṛcchreṇa aśubha parityāgena eva anuṣṭhitavantaḥ atas tad svabhāvāḥ eva saṃvṛttāraḥ idānīm api tat svābhāvyena tathā eva kurvanti iti aṅgīkāre kaḥ doṣaḥ iti āśaṅkayā āha tādṛśaḥ api iti 
NSu_3.4.189ab.1–3.4.189ab.3	 tādṛśaḥ api svabhāvaḥ ced ajñasya api bhavet tathā bhaya pūrva pravṛtti ādi rūpaḥ api jñāninaḥ tāvat anuṣṭhāne ajñebhyaḥ na viśiṣyante tatra jñāninām śubha pravṛttiḥ pūrvatara pūrvatama svabhāva bala āyātā eva na tu phalavatī iti aṅgīkurvāṇam prati yadi kaścid brūyāt ajñāninām api śubhā pravṛttiḥ pūrvatara pūrvam asvabhāva gatā eva na tu phalavatī viśeṣa abhāvāt iti tadā kim vācyam iti pratibandīm mocayitum āśaṅkate phalavat tvaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.189cd.1–3.4.189cd.4	 phalavat tve pramāṇam ced tatra jñasya samam hi tat ajñāninām karmaṇaḥ asti iti śeṣaḥ sāmye hi pratibandī grahaḥ na ca tat atra asti yatas ajñāni kṛta karmaṇām saphala tvekarma jam buddhi yuktā hi a iti ādikam pramāṇam asti upalakṣaṇam ca etat adhikāriṇaḥ ca ete vidhi gocarāḥ ca iti api draṣṭavyam na hi evam sati svabhāva kalpanā avakāśaḥ asti iti evam tarhi jñāniṣu api na svabhāva kalpanā yuktā iti āśayavān āha tatra iti tatra karmaṇaḥ phalavat tve tat pramāṇam atra api adhikāra ādikam upalakṣaṇīyam kim tad pramāṇam iti atas tat darśayati niṣkāmam iti 
NSu_3.4.190.1–3.4.191.2	 niṣkāmam jñāna pūrvam ca nivṛttam iha ca ucyate nivṛttam sevamānaḥ tu brahma abhyeti sanātanam iha pravṛtta nivṛttayoḥ madhye abhyeti atiśayena eti ānanda udreka sāhityena muktaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ etad smṛti vākya artha vivaraṇāya vākya antaram paṭhati śubhena iti śubhena ānanda vṛddhi syāt ghrāsaḥ ca eva aśubhena hi jñāninaḥ api yatas tena kartavyam śubham eva taiḥ hi āsaḥ ca ānandasya śubham eva kartavyam aśubham tyājyam ca anena vidhi sadbhāvaḥ api siddhaḥ tatas adhikāraḥ ca atra śrutim api āha upāste iti 
NSu_3.4.192.1–3.4.193ab.2	 upāste sa yaḥ ātmānam kṣīyate na asya karma ha asmāt hayā iva ātmanaḥ yat yat kāmayet sṛjate ca tat anenasa yaḥ ātmānam eva lokam upāste na hi asya karma kṣīyate asmāt hayā iva ātmanaḥ yat yat kāmayate tat tat sṛjate a iti śrutim upādatte ātmānam paramātmānam lokam sarva āśrayam upāste kāraṇena kārya upalakṣaṇam paśyati iti arthaḥ sa vidvān muktaḥ bhūtvā yat yat kāmayate tad tad karma asmāt hayā iva ātmanaḥ asya ātmanaḥ prasādena sṛjate avidvān bahu karmā api hi anta vat phalam āpnuyāt avidvān iti anenayadi api anevaṃvid mahat puṇyam karma karoti tad ha asya antataḥ kṣīyate eva a iti śrutim upādatte anayā ca arthāt jñāni karmaṇaḥ sāphalyam siddhayati upari ca upayogaḥ bhaviṣyati 
NSu_3.4.193c–3.4.193f.3	 yat eva vidyayā kuryāt tat eva hi ati vīrya vat ityādi vākya sāmarthyāt tāratamyam vimukti gam yat eva iti anenayat eva vidyayā karoti śraddhayā upaniṣadā tat eva vīryavattaram bhavati a iti śrutim upādatte vidyayā brahma sākṣātkāra pūrvakam upaniṣadā sva yogyayā vīryavattaram adhika phalam ityādi vākya sāmarthyāt jñāni kṛta karmaṇām phalavat tvam tāvat pratīyate tatas teṣām vaicitryāt vimukti gam tāratamyam ca siddham iti arthaḥ syāt etat na etāni vākyāni jñāni karmaṇām sāphalyam pratipādayanti sa yaḥ ātmānam iti atra tāvat upāsaka karmaṇām akṣaya phala tva śravaṇāt itaratra ca jñāna vidyā śabdayoḥ parokṣa jñāna artha tvasya api upapatteḥ iti āśaṅkām pariharati na ca iti 
NSu_3.4.194ab.1–3.4.194cd.1–3.4.194cd.4^1	 na cātra upāsakasya eva phalam akṣayam ucyate atra vākyeṣu phalam karmaṇām tathā jñāna ādi padam parokṣa jñāna artha tayā na vyākhyeyam iti api grāhyam kutas na iti atas āha na hi iti na hi jñānam vinā kvāpi phalasya akṣayatā bhavet jñānam brahma sākṣātkāram kvāpi mokṣe anyatra ca phalasya karmaṇām idam uktam bhavati brahma sākṣātkāra rahitena upāsakena kṛtāni karmāṇi akṣaya phalāni kena prakāreṇa iti cintyam kim akṣayam mokṣam kurvanti iti uta svarga ādikam na ādyaḥ na anyaḥ panthāḥ iti śruti virodhāt na dvitīyaḥ puṇya citaḥ lokaḥ kṣīyate iti svarga ādi phalānām kṣayitva śravaṇāt anevaṃvid mahat puṇyam karma karoti atat eva vīryavattaram bhavati a iti udāhṛta śruti virodhaḥ ca pakṣa dvaye api 
NSu_3.4.194cd.1–3.4.194cd.4^2	 tat evam ajña pakṣe vākya artha anupapatteḥ upāsaka padasya jñāni upalakṣaka tvam eva yuktam tathā brahma abhyeti iti śravaṇāt jñāna padasya sākṣātkāra vāci tvam eva yuktam iti atas eva vākya sāmarthyāt iti uktam yadi api paśyan= api imam ātmānam ityādyāḥ spaṣṭa arthāḥ śrutayaḥ atra santi tathā api mīmāṃsā artham etāsām udāharaṇam nanu ajña pakṣe api na anupapattiḥ upāsakena kṛtāni khalva saṅkalpita phalāni karmāṇi jñānam upajanayanti karmaṇā jñānam ātanoti iti śruteḥ jñānena mokṣaḥ bhavati iti ajña kṛta karmaṇām api jñāna dvāreṇa akṣaya phala tva upapatteḥ iti āśaṅkayā āha jñāna iti 
NSu_3.4.194ef.1–3.4.194ef.3	 jñāna dvāreṇa ced tasya na asmad pakṣa pratīpa tā karma phalasya akṣayatā iti vartate tasya para kṛta vyākhyānasya asmad pakṣa pratīpa tā mukta tāratamya virodhitā pratyuta tad anukūla tā eva muktau tāratamyam asahamānena khalu evam anyathā vyākhyānam kriyate tad mukta tāratamyam eva sādhayati karmāṇi hi jijñāsavaḥ vicitrāṇi kurvanti taiḥ ca jāyamānena jñānena vicitreṇa eva bhāvyam anyathā kṛta viprāṇa akṛta abhyāgam āpatte vicitreṇa jñānena vicitraḥ eva mokṣaḥ bhāvanīyaḥ pūrva uktāt eva hetoḥ iti tat evam sva mata virodhi para anukūlam anyathāvyākhyānam na kāryam eva tathā ca asmadvaya ākhyāne sthite prakṛtam yuktam iti astu vā anyathāvyākhyānam yuktam tatas ca eteṣām vākyānām prakṛta asādhaka tvam evam api jñāna uttara karmaṇaḥ mokṣa antargata phala hetu tāyāḥ pramāṇa antareṇa siddheḥ mukta tāratamyam na hātum śakyam iti abhyupagama vādena āha jñāna uttarasya iti 
NSu_3.4.195ab.1–3.4.195cd.1	 jñāna uttarasya evam api hi akṣaya tvam karmaṇaḥ akṣaya tvam akṣaya mokṣa anupraveśi phala tvam siddhayati katham iti atas āha na ca iti  naca anyathā prakāra antara abhāvāt pariśeṣa pramāṇāt iti yāvat etena jñāna uttarasya karmaṇaḥ sāphalye api tasya phalasya mokṣa anupraveśitāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt na mokṣa tāratamya siddhiḥ iti api pratyuktam pariśeṣam eva darśayati pūrva iti pūrva bhāvi śubhānām hi jñānena eva kṛtārtha tā 
NSu_3.4.196.1–3.4.196.3^1	 prārabdhānām tu bhogena tad jñāna uttara karmaṇām muktau= anupraveśaḥ syāt anyathā tad kṛtiḥ nahi jñāni kṛteṣu karmasu etāḥ vidhāḥ tāvat sambhavanti jñāna artha tvam vā bhoga artha tvam vā vyartha tvam vā iti tatra jñāni karmaṇām jñāna artha tvam tāvat na upapadyate pūrva bhāvi śabhaiḥ eva jñānasya kṛta tvāt tatra hetuḥ pūrva bhāvi iti jñānāt pūrva bhāvinām śubhānām yasamāt jñānena eva kāryeṇa kṛtārtha tā na anyena teṣām kārya antara abhāvāt jñāna artha tva abhāve vaiyarthyam syāt iti arthaḥ pūrva jātam prati paścāt bhāvinaḥ kāraṇa tva ayogāt ca na api bhoga artha tvam prācīnaprārabdha karmabhiḥ eva bhogasya jāyamāna tvāt 
NSu_3.4.196.1–3.4.196.3^2	 tatra hetuḥ prārabdhānām ca karmaṇām bhogena eva kṛtārtha tā iti pūrvavat tātparyam vaiyarthya nirāsa hetuḥ anyathā iti jñāni karmaṇām vyartha tve tad anuṣṭhānam na syāt na hi prekṣāvantaḥ vyartham kurvanti karaṇa svābhāvyāt iti ced abuddhi pūrva tā prasaṅgāt loka saṅgraha artham iti ced na tad prayojanasya api vācya tvāt īśvara vat iti ced na muktau= api prasaṅgāt pariśeṣa phala kathanam tat tasmāt jñāna uttara karmaṇām muktau= anupraveśaḥ mukti gata ānanda vṛddhayartha tvam syāt iti pūrva bhāvi śubhāni jñāna arthāni iti uktam tatra sarveṣām jñāna artha tāyām prasaktāyām viśeṣam āha jñāna ādi iti 
NSu_3.4.197a–3.4.197cd.3	 jñānāt pūrvāṇi sarvāṇi śubhāni jñāna siddhaye akāmyāni jñānāt pūrvāṇi akāmyāni eva śubhāni karmāṇi puṇya karmāṇi jñāna siddhaye bhavanti na tu kāmyāni śubhāni iti viśeṣaṇasya kṛtyam āha niṣiddhāni iti  niṣiddhāni jñāna rodhāya bhuktaye jñāna anutpādaḥ utpannasya api abhibhavaḥ vā jñāna rodhaḥ bhuktaye duḥkhasya evam kāmyasya api viniyogaḥ jñātavyaḥ etat caturthe vyutpādanīyam nanu yathākāmyāni śubhāni iti ca viśeṣaṇam upādīyate tathā nitya naimittika vyatiriktāni iti api viśeṣaṇam upādeyam nitya ādeḥ api pratyavāya parihāra atha rtvena jñāna kāraṇa tva abhāvāt iti atas āha yogyatāyāḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.198a–3.4.198d.3	 yogyatāyāḥ balāt yat ca śubha bāhulyam āditas jñāna bāhulyam eva etat kuryāt na anyasya yogyāta brāhmaṇa tva ādi rūpā pitṛ maraṇa ādi rūpā ca āditas jñānāt pūrvam kṛtam anyasya pratyavāya mātra parihārasya ādhyānāya prayojana abhāvāt a iti atra asya arthasya samarthita tvāt na iha hetuḥ uktaḥ atra yogyatāyāḥ balāt śubham āditas kṛtam etat ca jñānam eva kuryāt iti ca vaktavye yat ubhayatra bāhulya grahaṇam kṛtam tat tasya na asmad pakṣa pratīpatā iti ukta prapañcana artham iti atra puruṣa arthaḥ atas śabdāda ityādinā jñānasya mokṣa sādhana tvam uktam atra ca karma tāratamyāt jñāna tāratamyam jñāna tāratamyāt mokṣa tāratamyam iti vadatā ca sūcitam jñāna padam ca avabodha mātrasya pratipādakam iti pratīti nirāsa artham āha jñānasya iti 
NSu_3.4.199ab.1–3.4.199ab.3	 jñānasya bhakti bhāga tvāt bhaktiḥ jñānam iti īryate asmin śāstre yatra yatra jñānasya mokṣa sādhana tvam ucyate tatra tatra jñānam iti padena bhaktiḥ īryate lakṣyate kutas sambandhāt jñānasya bhakti bhāga tvāt māhātmya jñāna sneha samudāyaḥ hi bhaktiḥ iti uktam tatas jñānam bhakteḥ bhāgaḥ eka deśaḥ tathā ca eka deśa eka deśi tva lakṣaṇāt sambandhāt iti uktam bhavati eka deśena eka deśi lakṣaṇā ca daśā mātram dattam iti ādau prasiddhā eva prakāra antaram āha jñānasya eva iti 
NSu_3.4.199cd.1–3.4.199cd.2	 jñānasya eva viśeṣaḥ yat bhaktiḥ iti abhidhīyate yat yadā jñānasya eva viśeṣaḥ sneha ādi sāhitya lakṣaṇaḥ dharmaḥ bhavati tadā sa piṇḍaḥ bhaktiḥ iti abhidhīyate etat uktam bhavati jñānam snehaḥ ca bhakteḥ aṃśau tatra ekena aṃśena aṃśa antarasya upalakṣaṇam tathā cāha jat lakṣaṇayā bhaktiḥ eva sidhyati iti eka deśa antareṇa eka deśa antarasya upalakṣaṇe dṛṣṭāntam āha parokṣa tvā iti 
NSu_3.4.200ab.1–3.4.200cd.3	 parokṣa tva aparokṣa tve viśeṣau jñāna gau yathā yathā jñānasya parokṣa tva aparokṣa tva lakṣaṇau dvau dharmau tatra tam evam vidvān iti parokṣa jñānasya mokṣa sādhana tve abhihite parokṣa tvena aparokṣa tvam lakṣyate iti arthaḥ dārṣya antikam daśaryati sneha yogaḥ api iti sneha yogaḥ api tadvat syāt viśeṣaḥ jñāna gocaraḥ snehaḥ ca asau yogaḥ upāyaḥ ca iti sneha yogaḥ snehena yogaḥ sambandhaḥ iti vā tatas eka deśena eka deśa antara lakṣaṇā ca syāt iti śeṣaḥ lākṣaṇika prayoge sūtrakārasya kim prayojanam iti atas āha iti abhiprāyate iti 
NSu_3.4.201a–3.4.201c.2	 iti ābhiprāyataḥ prāyas jñānam eva vimuktaye vadanti śrutayaḥ dvividha lakṣaṇa abhki mayeṇa śrutayaḥ tarati śokam ātma vid iti ādyāḥ idam uktam bhavati dvividhā lakṣaṇā bhavati rūḍha ārūḍha bhedāt tatra dvitīyāyām prayoktuḥ prayojana anusandhānena bhāvyam na tu ādyāyām abhidhā tulyāyām iyam ca rūḍha lakṣaṇā śrutiṣu prāyika vyavahāra adarśanāt atas kim prayojana anveṣaṇena iti 
NSu_3.4.201a–3.4.201cd.1	 bhakti śabdaḥ māhātmya jñāna pūrvakasya snehasya vācakaḥ iti uktam tathā jñāna śabdaḥ bhakti arthaḥ iti tat ubhayam api anupapannam bhakti jñānābhyām mokṣaḥ bhavati iti api darśanāt tatra bhakti śabdasya ukta artha tve jñāna grahaṇa vaiyarthyāt jñāna padasya ca ubhaya artha tve bhakti grahaṇa vaiyarthyāt ityataḥ āha saḥ ayam iti  saḥ ayam viśeṣaḥ api hi udīryate 
NSu_3.4.202a.1–3.4.202a.2	 bhaktiḥ jñānam iti kvāpi kvāpi bhaktiḥ jñānam iti padābhyām saḥ ayam sneha lakṣaṇaḥ bodha lakṣaṇaḥ ca viśeṣaḥ api udīryate na tu uktaḥ eva arthaḥ iti niyamaḥ tasmāt na anupapattiḥ yatra bhakti jñāne saha ucyate tadā punarukti prasaṅgāt bhakti padam sva artha eka deśa tyāgena sneha aṃśasya lakṣakam na tu mukhya artha niṣṭham jñāna padam ca anupapatti abhāvāt mukhya artham eva na tu lakṣakam iti bhāvaḥ 
NSu_3.4.202a.3	 nanu vinā snehāt jñāna mātreṇa yadi muktiḥ anupapannā syāt tadā jñāna padasya lakṣaka tvam āśrayaṇīyam naca evam puruṣa arthasya bhakti eka sādhya tve pramāṇa abhāvāt dveṣiṇām api śiśupāla ādīnām mokṣa darśanāt ca dveṣiṇaḥ snigdhāḥ iti asya ca vipratiṣiddha tvāt atas anupapannam lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇam iti atas dveṣasya mokṣa sādhana tvam tāvat nirākaroti na hi iti 
NSu_3.4.202b–3.4.202d.3	 na hi dveṣa yutā dṛśiḥ puruṣa arthāya bhavati sarva śruti virodhataḥ atra dveṣasya puruṣa artha sādhana tva niṣiddhayate dṛśiḥ iti tu prasaṅgāt uktam jñānasya āvaśyaka tām upādāya sneha nirāsāya hi paraḥ pratyavasthitaḥ kaim utya artham vā māhātmya jñānam api na dveṣa yuktam mokṣa hetuḥ kim uta kevalaḥ dveṣaḥ iti yathā uktam naiṣkarmyam api acyuta bhāva varjitam na śobhate jñāna malam virañjanam a iti dveṣasya mukti sādha śratva aṅgīkāre katham sarva śruti virodhaḥ iti atas tāvat ekām śrutim paṭhati cetanasya iti 
NSu_3.4.203.1–3.4.205.3	 cetanasya dvayam bhogyam saṃsāraḥ muktiḥ eva ca saṃsāraḥ trividhaḥ tatra svargaḥ madhyam adhas tathā muktiḥ ca dvividhā tatra sukham nityam tathā aparam nitya duḥkham iti jñeyam sādhanam saṃsṛtau= api kāmyam karma niṣiddham ca sa ajñānam iti niścayaḥ dveṣaḥ bhaktiḥ ca muktau tu mukti dvaya vidhāyakam iti paiṅgi śruteḥ dveṣaḥ na eva sat mukti kāraṇam jīva jātasya dvayam eva tatra mukti saṃsārayoḥ madhye madhyam mānuṣa tvam adhas naraka ādi nityam sukham ekam mukti tvena jñeyam tathā nitya duḥkham aparam iti jñeyam saṃsṛtau saṃsṛti viṣaye sādhanam api dveṣaḥ bhaktiḥ ca iti yogyatayā sambandhaḥ vidhāyakam kārakam nitya sukha rūpā sat muktiḥ iti jñāyate iti śeṣaḥ sat mukti kāraṇa tvasya apratiṣedhāt katham evam ucyate iti atas āha asat iti 
NSu_3.4.206a.1–3.4.206bc.2	 asat mukteḥ kāraṇam ca nitya duḥkha svarūpāṇām mukteḥ kāraṇa tvena tāvat dveṣaḥ uktaḥ tena sat mukti kāraṇam na bhavati iti jñāyate virodhāt iti nanu asyām śrutau mukti viṣayau bhakti dveṣau sat asat mukti kāraṇa tvena ucyeta viṣṇu viṣayau tu prakṛtau atas kim kena saṅgatam iti atas āha muktau= iti  muktau= iti atra keśavaḥ mukti śabda uditaḥ muktau= iti atra saptamī ante pade mukti iti prātipadikena uditaḥ kevalam mukti śabda uditaḥ iti ukte mukti dvaya iti atra api prāptiḥ atas muktau= iti atra iti uktam kena nimittena iti atas āha mokṣam iti 
NSu_3.4.206cd.1–3.4.207ab.2	 mokṣam sva bhaktānām karoti yat muc mokṣaṇaḥ iti asmāt strayām ktiniti ktin pratyayaḥ sa ca bahula grahaṇāt kartari api bhavati yat vā karoti iti karaṇe kartṛ tva upacāraḥ mucyate anena iti muktiḥ ita karaṇe ktin pratyayaḥ dveṣasya mokṣa sādhanatva aṅgīkāre yukti virodham ca āha dveṣataḥ api iti dveṣataḥ api vimuktiḥ ced mahātātparya rodhanam na kevalam bhaktyā kintu dveṣataḥ api viśiṣyā muktiḥ ced aṅgīkriyate tadā yat sarva śruti ādīnām bhagavat guṇa utkarṣaḥ eva mahātātparyam tat viruddham āpadyeta katham iti atas āha bhaktyā iti 
NSu_3.4.207c–3.4.207f.3	 bhaktayā prasannataḥ devān muktiḥ iti eva tad guṇān vadanti śrutayaḥ sarvāḥ purāṇāni āgamāḥ api anye api āgamāḥ śruti ādayaḥ mukti prayojanāḥ parameśvara guṇa viṣayāḥ ca iti tāvat prasiddham tatra sambandhaḥ ayam eva yat bhagavataḥ eva jīvānām muktiḥ sā ca prasannāt eva prasādaḥ ca bhaktyā eva bhaktiḥ ca guṇa jñānaḥ eva iti evam śruti ādyāḥ tad guṇān vadanti iti tathā ca katham dveṣataḥ mukti aṅgīkāre na mahātātparya virodhaḥ bhakteḥ mokṣa sādhana tvam anena gamyate na ca tat asmābhiḥ apākriyate kintu bhakti vat dveṣasya api iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_3.4.208ab.1–3.4.208ab.3	 yadi dveṣeṇa muktiḥ syāt vaktavyaḥ doṣa sañcayaḥ tadā dveṣa utpādana artham iti śeṣaḥ naca evam guṇa mātra pratipādanasya pratipādita tvāt tatas mokṣa artham pravṛttaḥ veda ādiḥ guṇān eva pratipādayat mokṣasya bhakti mātra sādhya tvam abhipraiti iti gamyate iti bhāvaḥ nanu dveṣāt caidya ādayaḥ nṛpāḥ ityādīni dveṣasya api mokṣa sādhana tām pratipādayanti vākyāni santi tat katham dveṣasya mukti sādhana tva abhāvaḥ iti atas āha smartavyaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.208c–3.4.208f.5^1	 smartavyaḥ bhagavān nityam iti arthena eva hi kvacid dveṣāt iva guṇān āha purāṇe kruddha vākya vat purāṇe kvacid pradeśe bhagavān nityam smartavyaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa eva dveṣāt muktim āhā iva purāṇa kṛt iti sambandhaḥ tasmāt na ukta virodhaḥ iti herarthaḥ idam uktam bhavati purāṇa vākyam dveṣasya mukti sādhana tvam pratipādayat ivāpātatas yadi api pratīyateta tathā api tat na tad abhiprāyam kintu mumukṣuṇā bhagavan sarvadā smartavyaḥ iti tasya abhiprāyaḥ yathā vṛddhau ca mātā pitarau sādhvī bhāryā sutaḥ śiśuḥ api akārya śatam kṛtvā bhartavyā manuḥ abravīt a iti atra na akārya karaṇe tātparyam kintu sarvathā bhartavya tve tathā iha api iti 
NSu_3.4.208c–3.4.208f.5^2–3.4.209.1	 guṇa ān āha iti tātparya antaram caidya ādīnām dveṣataḥ muktim pratipādayat vākyam bhagavataḥ kṛpālu tva ādīn guṇa ānāha iti śāpa ādinā dveṣiṇaḥ api caidya ādyāḥ tāt kālika dveṣam anirūpya pūrvatanīm bhaktim eva apekṣya bhagavatā sūcitāḥ aho kṛpālu tvam nirvikāra tvam satya saṅkalpa tvam ca tasya iti atra tātparyam teṣām vākyānām iti arthaḥ dvividhāni vākyāni vaireṇa yat nṛpatayaḥ ityādīni smaraṇa pradhānāni teṣām prathamā gatiḥ dveṣāt caidya ādayaḥ ityādīni dveṣa pradhānāni teṣām dvitīyā iti hṛdayam prathama vyākhyāne laukika dṛṣṭāntam āha kruddha vākya vat iti kruddha vākyasya yathā na pratītaḥ eva artha pramāṇyam kintu anyatra tathā eva iti arthaḥ etat vivṛṇoti yathā iti yathā kruddhaḥ pitā putram mara iti ākṣepa pūrvakam proktasya anyasya kṛti artham vadati evam purāṇa gam 
NSu_3.4.210a.1–3.4.210a.3	 vākyam mara iti prakṛti antarasya etat rūpam jīva vā mara vā sādho vyādha mā jīva mā mara a iti prayoga darśanāt ākṣepaḥ nindā svena proktasya anyasya kāryasya pitā kiñcid putram prati vidhatte idam kurvī iti sa tu śrama ādi bhīruḥ akurvāṇaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate tadā kruddhaḥ pitā bravīti are jālma vaidhaveya mriayasva iti tasya vākyasya yathā na putra maraṇa vidhāne tātparyam kintu sva vihita karaṇe tathā ca dveṣeṇa smaraṇe muktiḥ bhavati iti purāṇa vākyasya api na dveṣasya mukti sādhana tve tātpayarm kintu smaraṇasya kartavyatāyām iti iyam ca vyañjana āvṛttiḥ iti kecid tātparya vṛttiḥ iti apare vākya lakṣaṇa anumānam ca iti ācāryāḥ pratītaḥ eva arthaḥ kinna syāt iti atas āha śruti iti 
NSu_3.4.210a–3.4.210d.3	 śruti virodhena sva virodhena ca añjasā bahu āgama virodhāt ca na dveṣāt mukti vācakam purāṇa gam vākyam iti vartate śrutayaḥ atīta pāde atra ca udāhṛtāḥ yatra dveṣasya mukti sādhana tvam ucyate tatra eva tat viruddham ucyate iti sva virodhaḥ saḥ api hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ca ityādi bhāgāvata vākyānām paṭhita tvāt pradarśitaḥ eva añjasā mukhyayā vṛttyā dveṣāt muktim pratipādayan na bhavati āgama virodham darśayati tamaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.211.1–3.4.211.3	 tamaḥ dveṣeṇa saṃyānti bhaktayā muktim tathā eva ca viṣṇau viṣṇu prasādena viloma tvena ca añjasā iti ṣāḍguṇya vacanam api ukta artha niyāmakam viṣṇau bhaktyā jātena viṣṇu prasādena eva muktim saṃyānti tathā viṣṇau dveṣeṇa jātena viloma tvena viṣṇu kopena añjasā tamaḥ saṃyānti iti yojanā caśabdau samuccaya arthau ukta artha niyāmakam viṣṇu bhaktiḥ eva mukti sādhanam na dveṣaḥ iti asya arthasya niyāmakam etad vākya samākhyayā cetanasya iti śrutau muktāviti śabdaḥ viṣṇoḥ vācakaḥ iti siddhayati tathā ca dveṣaḥ bhaktiḥ ca iti etat dvayam sat mukteḥ kevalaḥ dveṣaḥ tu asat mukteḥ kāraṇam iti anyathā pratītiḥ apāstā bhavati itas ca na etat vākyam patīta artha param iti āha mahātātparya iti 
NSu_3.4.212a–3.4.212c.3	 mahātātparya rodhe ca katham vākyam pramāṇa tām yāti mokṣa prayojanānām sarva āgamānām bhagavat guṇeṣu eva yat mahātātparyam tat anyathā anupapattyā bhaktiḥ eva mukti sādhanam na dveṣaḥ iti avagamyate atas mahātātparya virodhena ca dveṣa vākyam pratīta arthe katham pramāṇa tām yāti nanu śruti ādīnām katham prābalyam yena tad virodhāt idam vacanam sva arthāt pracyāvyate ucyate śruteḥ śruti tvāt eva prābalyam sva vākyasya niravakāśa tvāt atas eva tatra uktam añjasā iti itara āgamānām ca bahu tvena atas eva bahu āgama iti abhihitam mahātātparya yukteḥ vākyataḥ prābalyam upapādayitum āha sarva iti 
NSu_3.4.212cd.1–3.4.213a.2	 sarva artha rūpam hi mahātāt paryam iṣyate sarveṣām śāstrāṇām ananyā artha tayā yat eka artha pratipādaka tvam tat rūpam iti arthaḥ katham idam labhyate artha śabdaḥ mukhyam pratipādyam āha sataḥ eva padātharsya a iti yathā sa ca eka vacana antaḥ tena ca tad pratipādaka tvam lakṣyate iti katham ayam mahātātparya śabda arthaḥ iti atas āha vācaka tvam hi iti vācaka tvam hi tātparyam tat param pratipādyam yasya tat tad param tasya bhāvaḥ tātparyam iti evam vācaka tvam pratipādaka tvam hi tātparyam ucyate tasya ca mahat śabdena viśeṣaṇe yogyatayā eṣaḥ arthaḥ mahātātparya śabdasya bhavati iti bhāvaḥ tatas kim iti atas āha yad arthāḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.213b–3.4.213d.4	 yad arthāḥ akhilāḥ ravāḥ saḥ arthaḥ katham parityājyaḥ eka śabdasya saṃśaye yaḥ arthaḥ yeṣām te yad arthāḥ ravāḥ āgamāḥ eka śabdasya saṃśaye eka vākya sambandhini saṃśaye sati ekam sandigdham viruddha artham vākyam ādāya iti arthaḥ etat uktam bhavati sarvāṇi vākyāni sambhūyānanyā artha tayā yam ekam artham pratipādayanti tad viruddha artham pratipādayat tat ava antara vākyam yaduṇlabhyate sa avakāśam ca tat mahā vākya artha virodhāt anyathā kriyate na tu tad viruddhaḥ mahā vākya arthaḥ tyajyate iti tāvat prasiddham mahā vākyasya pradhāna tvāt upakrama ādibhiḥ niścita artha tvāt ca avāntara vākyasya apradhāna tvāt sandigdha artha tvāt ca prakṛte tu bhaktiḥ eva mukti sādhanam na dveṣaḥ iti sarvaiḥ vākyaiḥ sambhūya pratipāditaḥ arthaḥ artha ākṣiptasya api pratipādyasya iva tad artha tvāt dveṣāt muktim pratipādayat ekam tat avāntara vākyam sa avakāśam ca ukta prakāreṇa tasmāt idam eva bādhyate iti dveṣasya mukti sādhana tva nirākaraṇam upasaṃharati atas iti 
NSu_3.4.213ef.1–3.4.213ef.3	 atas vijñāna bhaktibhyām puruṣa arthaḥ paraḥ bhavet māhātmya jñāna snehābhyām eva na tu dveṣeṇa iti arthaḥ mokṣaḥ iti vaktavye paraḥ puruṣa arthaḥ iti vadatā jñāna ādikam api dveṣiṇām na bhavati iti sūcitam jñāna ādeḥ api dharma ādi apekṣayā para puruṣa artha tvāt evam dveṣasya mukti sādhana tvam nirākṛtya idānīm bhakteḥ parama puruṣa artha sādhaka tve pramāṇam na asti iti yat uktam tat nirāsāya pramāṇa antaram āha yasya iti 
NSu_3.4.214.1–3.4.218.1	 yasya deve parā bhaktiḥ yathā deve tathā gurau tasya ete kathitāḥ hi arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ bhaktyā jñānam tatas bhaktiḥ tatas dṛṣṭiḥ tatas ca sā tatas muktiḥ tatas bhaktiḥ sā eva syāt sukha rūpiṇī bhaktayā prasannaḥ bhagavān dadyāt jñānam anākulam tayā eva darśanam yātaḥ pradadyāt muktim etayā na aham vedaiḥ na tapasā na dānena naca ijyayā śakyaḥ evaṃvidhaḥ draṣṭum pradadyāt muktim etayā bhaktayā tu ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidhaḥ arjunaḥ jñātum draṣṭum ca tattvena praveṣyum ca parantapaḥ 
NSu_3.4.219ab.1–3.4.219ab.3	 ityādi vākyataḥ ca eva saḥ ayam ukta arthaḥ īyate yathā deve deva yogyā tathā gurau guru yogyā iti arthaḥ anena jñānasya bhakti sādhya tvam ucyate bhaktyā jñānam iti anena jñāna ādeḥ jñānam parokṣa niścayaḥ jāyate tatas jñānāt pakvā bhaktiḥ bhavati tatas dṛṣṭiḥ tatas ca sā paripakvā bhaktiḥ tatas mokṣa anantaram bhaktiḥ avatiṣṭhate sā sukha rūpiṇī eva syāt na phalavatī bhaktyā prasannaḥ iti anena api idam eva ucyate jñāna abhāve bhaktyā bhāvāt anākulam iti uktam tayā eva pakvayā etayā paripakvayā vedaiḥ iti bhakti rahita śravaṇa ādibhiḥ iti arthaḥ na vidyate anyaḥ viṣayaḥ yasyāḥ sānanyā yādṛśī tatra bhaktiḥ syāt tādṛśi anyatra na eva cetaḥ ananya bhakti sā jñeyā viṣṇau= eva ca sā bhavet a iti ca smṛtiḥ vivakṣitaḥ tu sandhi bharvati iti vacanāt śakya aham iti yujyate tattvena yāthārthyena jñātum ityādi vākyataḥ ca iti caśabdena cetanasya dvayam ityādīni pūrva udāhṛta vākyāni samuccinoti vākyate eva na tu arthāt anumānena api uktam artham sādhayati na ca iti 
NSu_3.4.219c–3.4.219c–3.4.219f.3^1	 na ca prasādam āpnoti dveṣāt bhaktyā tam āpnuyāt iti dṛṣṭa anusāri tvam api asmin= arthaḥ īyate bhagavat dveṣāt bhagavat prasādam na evam āpnoti bhagavat bhaktyā tam bhagavat prasādam prāpnuyāt iti asmin= arthe dṛṣṭa anusāri tvam pati akṣa dṛṣṭa vyāptikā anumāna anusāri tvam apīyate jñāyate etat uktam bhavati bhagavat prasādāt eva mokṣaḥ iti tāvat niṣyaṅkitam bhagavat prasādaḥ bhagavat dveṣa sādhyaḥ na bhavati bhagavat prasāda tvāt yaḥ yad prasādaḥ na asau tad dveṣa sādhyaḥ yagāḥ guru prasādaḥ yat vā bhagavat dveṣaḥ bhagavat prasāda sādhanam na bhavati bhagavat dveṣa tvāt yaḥ yat dveṣaḥ sa tad prasāda sādhanam na bhavati yathā guru dveṣaḥ athavā bhagavān svadveṣiṇi na prasīdati prekṣāvat puruṣa tvāt devadatta vat yat vā bhagavat dveṣī bhagavat prīti viṣayaḥ na bhavati bhagavat dveṣi tvāt yaḥ yad dveṣī na asau tad prīti viṣayaḥ 
NSu_3.4.219c–3.4.219f.3^2–3.4.219f.4	 yathā sampratipannaḥ iti dveṣasya prasāda sādhana tve apāste mukti sādhana tvam eva apāstam bhavati tathā bhagavat prasādaḥ bhagavat bhakti sādhyaḥ bhagavat prasāda tvāt yaḥ yad prasādaḥ sa tad bhakti sādhyaḥ yathā guru prasādaḥ yat vā bhagavat bhaktiḥ bhagavat prasāda sādhanam bhagavat bhakti tvāt yā yat bhaktiḥ sā tad prasāda sādhanam yathā guru bhaktiḥ athavā bhagavān sva bhakte prasīdati prekṣāvat puruṣa artha tvāt sammata vat yat vā bhagavat bhaktaḥ bhagavat prīti viṣayaḥ bhagavat bhakta tvāt yaḥ yad bhaktaḥ asau tad prīti viṣayaḥ yathā guru bhaktaḥ iti bhakteḥ prasāda sādhana tve siddhe mukti sādhana tvam eva siddham bhavati iti nanu alaukike bhagavati loka dṛṣṭāntena evam anumānam na yujyate anyathā aṇu tva ādi niyamasya api anumāna āpatteḥ atas loka vilakṣaṇaḥ dviṣyaḥ api prasīdati iti āṅgīkāre na bādhakam iti śaṅkām āgama vākyena pariharati yaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.220.1–3.4.221ef.1	 ye pṛthak vihitāḥ viṣṇoḥ guṇāḥ vedena sa ādaram te eva dṛṣṭa vailomyāt aṅgīkāryāḥ na ca aparam anyat dṛṣṭa anusāreṇa vāsudeve api gṛhyate pṛthak loka vailakṣaṇyena sa ādaram tātparyeṇa dṛṣṭa vailomyāt dṛṣṭa vailomyam anādṛtya aparam veda an uktam loka vilakṣaṇam guṇa jātam na eva aṅgīkāryam kintu veda uktāt aṇu tva mahat tva yaugapadya ādeḥ anyat guṇa jātam guṇāḥ iti asya prayojanam ucyate doṣa abhāvaḥ iti doṣa abhāvāḥ ca ye vedaiḥ uditāḥ avihāya tān doṣa abhāvāḥ ca ye vedaiḥ uditāḥ avihāya tān 
NSu_3.4.222.1–3.4.222.4	 anuktāḥ apica grāhyā mahātātparya śaktitaḥ evam bṛhat saṃhitā vāc siddhāntaḥ hi tat īritaḥ caḥ tu arthaḥ loka vilakṣaṇāḥ avilakṣaṇāḥ ca iti śeṣaḥ mahātātparya śaktita sati sarvathā api doṣaḥ bhagavati na asti iti atra sāmānyatas sarva śāstrāṇām tātparyasya nirṇīta tvāt iti arthaḥ veda an uktasya aprāmāṇika arthasya grahaṇam ayuktam iti āśaṅkām anena nirācaṣṭe viśeṣataḥ anuktau= api sāmānyatas siddheḥ iti bhāvaḥ tat tasmāt īritaḥ arthaḥ siddhāntaḥ prāmāṇikaḥ yat vā bṛhat saṃhita īritaḥ arthaḥ hi siddhāntaḥ iti tatra bahu mānam utpādayati evam bhakteḥ eva mokṣa sādhana tvam upapāditam bhaktiḥ ca kevalam bhagavat viṣayā eva iti pratītim apākartum āha tāratamyena iti 
NSu_3.4.223a–3.4.223d.3	 tāratamyena tad bhakteṣu api bhaktiḥ viniścayāt kartavyā na kevalam viṣṇau kintu tad bhakteṣu rama ādiṣu api viniścayāt sarvathā sā ca kriyamāṇā tāratamyena eva kutas iti atas āha eṣāpi iti  eṣā api tad bhaktiḥ yatas tad bhakteṣu kriyamāṇā eṣā api bhagavat bhaktiḥ eva atas tad viṣaye api bhaktiḥ kartavyā etat uktam bhavati viṣṇu bhaktiḥ tāvat kartavyā iti upapāditam sā ca tad bhakta bhaktyā eva sa aṅgāḥ na anyathā iti etat api kutas iti atas āha loka iti  loka veda anusārataḥ loka śabdena leka siddha vyāptimat anumānam ucyate veda śabdena āgama mātram loka anusāritām darśayati yaḥ hi iti 
NSu_3.4.224.1–3.4.224.3	 yaḥ hi bhaktaḥ pradhāne syāt tadīyeṣu api bhaktimān dṛśyate asau niyamataḥ viparītaḥ viparyaye pradhāne rāja ādau viparyaye tadīya bhaktirāhitye viparītaḥ pradhāna bhakti rahitaḥ niyamena dṛśyate anena anvaya vyatirekau= uktau tathā ca ayam prayogaḥ vimataḥ bhagavat bhakta bhaktimān bhavet bhagavat bhaktyā puruṣa artha bhāj tvāt yaḥ yat bhaktyā puruṣa atharbhāj yathā sammataḥ iti nanu daitya ādayaḥ brahma ādiṣu bhaktimantaḥ api tad bhakteṣu indra ādiṣu bhakti rahitāḥ dṛśyante tatas vyabhicāraḥ iti atas āha vyabhicāraḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.225ab.1–3.4.225cd.3	 vyabhicāraḥ yadi kvāpi bhakti hrāsaḥ atra kalpyate yadi kvāpi pareṇa vyabhicāraḥ codyate tadā asmābhiḥ atra puruṣe bhakti hrāsaḥ kalpyate viphala bhakti tvam ucyate tathā ca vipakṣe viśiṣyasya hetoḥ abhāvāt na vyabhicāraḥ iti arthaḥ kutas evam kalpyate iti atas āha bhaktī iti bhakti doṣaḥ hi asau yat na tad bhakteṣu api bhaktimān tad bhakteṣu api bhaktimān na iti yat asau pradhāna bhakteḥ eva doṣaḥ hi tena pradhāna bhaktiḥ eva duṣyā na phalāya alam iti prasiddham hiraṇyagarbha ādibhiḥ daitya ādibhyaḥ amara tva ādikam sat chalam eva dīyate mṛṣā na bhavati iti purāṇeṣu su prasiddham eva iti veda anusāri tvam tu uttaratra pradarśayiṣyate tad bhakta bhaktiḥ kartavyā iti etat anumānena upapādya sā ca tāratamyena kāryā iti etat anumānena sādhayati tāratamyena iti 
NSu_3.4.226.1–3.4.226.3	 tāratamyena teṣu addhā bhaktiḥ dṛṣṭa anusārataḥ viṣṇu prasāda anusārāt kāryā doṣaḥ tat anyathā teṣu tad bhakteṣu kriyamāṇā bhakti raddhā sarvathā tāratamyena kāryā kutas dṛṣṭa anusarataḥ tāratamyena iti asya eva vivaraṇam viṣṇu prasāda anusārāt iti yasmin= adhikaḥ viṣṇu prasādaḥ tasmin= adhika ityādi tat anyathā sāmyena vaiparītyena ca karaṇe anarthaḥ bhavati dṛṣṭa anusārataḥ iti uktam darśayati sva iti 
NSu_3.4.227ab.1–3.4.227ab.2	 sva prīti anusṛtau prītiḥ loke api addhā eva dṛśyate atra sva śabdena rāja ādiḥ kathyate tad prīti anusāreṇa tasya yasmin yathā prītiḥ tad anusāreṇa bhakti karaṇe sati tasmin bhakte tasya rāja ādeḥ prīti raddhā niyamena eva dṛśyate ayam atra prayogaḥ īśvaraḥ sva prīti anusāreṇa sva bhakteṣu bhakteḥ prasīdati prekṣā vat puruṣa tvāt rāja vat iti anena prameya antaram api siddham iti āha tāratamya iti 
NSu_3.4.227cd.1–3.4.227cd.3	 tāratamya parijñānam api etena eva sādhanam etena eva bhagavat bhakteṣu ramā brahma ādiṣu tāratamyena eva muktiḥ karaṇīyā iti samarthitena eva devatā tāratamya parijñānam yat prāk uktam tat api mokṣasya sādhanam iti siddham na hi avidite tāratamye tāratamya anurodhena mukti karaṇam sambhavati anena eva prakāreṇa anumāna sambhavāt iti vā atideśa arthaḥ bhagavat prasāda tāratamya anusāreṇa tadīyeṣu muktiḥ kāryā iti atra āgamam api āha lakṣmī iti 
NSu_3.4.228.1–3.4.232.1	 lakṣmī viriñca vāṇi īśa girija indra aṅgirassutāḥ sūrya ādayaḥ ca kramaśas bhagavat prīti gocarāḥ teṣu bhaktiḥ krameṇa eva kāryā nityam mumukṣubhiḥ tena bhagavat prīti krameṇa eva tiṣṭhatu kramaḥ teṣu bhakti karaṇam eva kutas bhagavat prīti gocara tvāt eva kāraṇa antaram ca ucyate sarve api iti sarve api guravaḥ ca ete puruṣasya sadā eva hi tasmāt pūjyāḥ ca namyāḥ ca dhyeyāḥ ca paritas harim iti ṣāḍguṇya vacanāt api eṣaḥ arthaḥ avasīyate haribhaktiḥ krameṇa eva tadīyeṣu harismṛtiḥ hari stutiḥ tad smṛtiḥ ca tad stutiḥ hari pūjanam tad pūjā vihita tyāgaḥ iti mukteḥ krameṇa hi niyamāt sādhanāni eva nitya sādhyāni ca akhilaiḥ 
NSu_3.4.233ab.1–3.4.233cd.3	 iti pravṛtta vacanam sādhanasya vinirṇaye guru tvam vidyā pravartaka tvena prasiddham eva pūjyāḥ ca ityādinā bhakteḥ eva prapañcanam harim paritas na tu pṛthak veda anusārataḥ iti yat uktam tat api anena daśirtam bhavati krameṇa eva tayīyeṣu bhaktiḥ tad smṛtiḥ iti ādau tad śabdena tadīyāḥ ucyante krameṇa eva iti sarvatra sambaddhayate krameṇa iti hari viṣayāṇi bhakti ādīni mukhya sādhanāni tadīya viṣayāṇi tu amukhya sādhanāni iti arthaḥ mukti sādhana tvāt akhilaiḥ mumukṣubhiḥ niti asādhyāni sādhanasya vinirṇayaḥ iti sādhana vinirṇaya ākhye avāntara prakaraṇe asti iti arthaḥ etat eva vivṛṇoti pravṛttaḥ iti pravṛtte pañca rātre hi sādhanasya vinirṇayaḥ pañca rātre pravṛttam nāma avāntaraḥ granthaḥ tatra api sādhanasya vinirṇayaḥ nāma prakaraṇam asti iti arthaḥ ukta artheṣu anumāna antarāṇi āha hari iti 
NSu_3.4.234.1–3.4.234.2^1	 haridveṣaḥ na śubha da sat dveṣa tvāt yathā guroḥ kramāt bhaktiḥ hari prīti kāraṇam tad priya aupagā bhaktiḥ yatas yathā svasmin= itya ādyāḥ yuktiḥ atra ca sat dveṣa tvāt uttama puruṣa dveṣa tvāt vaiṣṇavaiḥ daitya ādiṣu kriyamāṇe dveṣe vyabhicāram vārayitum sat iti uktam guroḥ dveṣaḥ prāk dveṣasya bhagavat prasāda sādhana tva abhāve sāmānya vyāptim āśritya bhagavat dveṣa tvam hetuḥ uktaḥ atra tu śubha mātra sādhana tva abhāve viśeṣa vyāptim eva āśritya sat dveṣa tvam iti mahān bhedaḥ kramāt bhaktiḥ iti kramam anusṛtya rama ādiṣu bhaktiḥ dharmiṇī iti arthaḥ tad priya upagā bhaktiḥ yatas iti hari priya viṣaya bhakti tvāt iti arthaḥ tad priya anugacchati viṣayīkaroti iti tad priya upagāḥ
