NSu_3.4.234.2^2–3.4.235.1	 yā yat priya viṣayā bhaktiḥ sā tad prīti kāraṇāt yathā svasmin bhaktiḥ atra sva śabdena devadattaḥ ucyate yathā rāja priye devadatte bhaktiḥ rāja prīti kāraṇam iti arthaḥ iha kramāt iti pratijñāyām viśeṣaṇa prakṣepeṇa bhagavat bhakta bhakteḥ kartavya tvam tat tāratamyasya ca āvaśyaka tvam siddhayati yat vā anena prayoga dvayam sūcayati bhāgavata bhaktiḥ bhagavat prīti kāraṇam bhagavat priya bhakti tvāt iti bhagavān rāma ādiṣu tāratamya upeta bhaktyā eva prasīdati tāratamyena eva tad viṣaya prītimat tvāt iti ca yuktiḥ ca iti sambandhaḥ atra prāk ukte arthe kim sāmānya vyāptyā viśeṣa vyāptiḥ api asti iti āśayena prayoga antaram ucyate prādhānya iti prādhānya tāratamya anusāriṇī bhaktiḥ uttamā prīti daiva hareḥ yasmāt bhaktiḥ sā sva upagāḥ yathā 
NSu_3.4.236a.1–3.4.236a.4	 iti vā uttama tva tāratamya anusāriṇī rama ādiṣu bhaktiḥ hareḥ prīti daiva yasmāt sa uttamā bhaktiḥ śāstra vihita bhakti tvāt iti arthaḥ sva upagā sā viṣṇu viṣayā bhaktiḥ yathā iti arthaḥ iti vā anumātavyam iti śeṣaḥ atra api pūrvavat viśiṣya sādhāt pṛthak prayoga dvayena vā sādhya dvaya siddhiḥ svāminaḥ phala śruteḥ iti ātreyaḥ jñānam mahā phala kāraṇam iti puruṣa artha adhikaraṇe pratipāditam jñāna uttaram anuṣṭhitam varṇa āśrama karma śama dama ādikam ca ānanda atiśaya kāraṇam iti stuti adhikaraṇe tat etat jñāna karma ādi phalam kim preraka tvāt devānām bhavati uta kartṛ tvāt devadattasya iti saṃśaye prathama sūtreṇa devānām eva iti pūrva pakṣayitvā ārtvijyam iti auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikriyate a iti eka deśi matena siddhāntam abhidhāya sahakārī antara vidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyam tadvataḥ vidhi ādivat a iti parama siddhāntaḥ abhihitaḥ tatra devānām jñāna ādi phalam iti pūrva pakṣa aṃśaḥ grāhyaḥ eva avadhāraṇa mātram eva tyājyam atas pūrva pakṣa sūtra artham vivṛṇoti jñāna iti svāminaḥ phala śruteḥ iti ātreyaḥ 
NSu_3.4.236ab.1–3.4.236ab.3	 jñāna karma ādi phalam ca eṣu krama upagam phalam ca devānām bhavati iti śeṣaḥ bhavat ca eṣu deveṣu krama upagam krameṇa eva upagacchati devadattena anuṣṭhitasya jñāna ādeḥ phalam devānām bhavati iti ekā pratijñā bhavat ca tad krameṇa eva na tu sāmyena vaiparītyena vā iti dvitīyā tatra ādyāyām hetum sūcayan dvitīyam upapādayati svātantrya iti 
NSu_3.4.236cd.1–3.4.236cd.3	 svātantrya tāratamyena phalam hi phalinām bhavet phalinām phala bhājām svātantrya tāratamyena svāmya tāratamya anusāreṇa eva hi phalena bhāvyam na tu sāmyena vaiparītyena vā iti arthaḥ brahma ādayaḥ tāratamyena eva phalavantaḥ tatra tāratamyena eva svātantryāt iti uktam bhavataḥ anena prathama pratijñāyām svātantrya hetuḥ sūcitaḥ bhavati yaḥ sūtre svāmi padena uktaḥ yadi api phala prāptau tāratamyam na sūtritam tathā api phala prāptau= uktasya svāmi tva hetoḥ sāmarthyena prāptam iti tat api upapāditam yadi svātantryāt devadatta anuṣṭhita jñāna ādi phalam devānām syāt tarhi tad anuṣṭhita mithyā jñāna ādi phalam api prasajyeta aviśeṣāt iti atas āha aśubham tu iti 
NSu_3.4.237.1–3.4.237.3	 aśubham tu aśubhe api eṣām svātantryāt prītitaḥ hareḥ ājñayā ca anya gam na eva bhogāya bhavati kvacid anya gama śubham tu eṣām devānām kvacid api bhogāya na bhavati kutas hareḥ prītitaḥ aśubhe api eṣām svātantryāt bhagavat prasādena mā etat asmān prāpat iti nivāraṇe teṣām sāmarthya sadbhāvāt mā etat etān prāpat iti hareḥ eva ājñayā ca anya gam iti vadatā sva gatam tu bhavati iti sūcitam anena asati nivāraṇa kāraṇaḥ iti svāmi tva hetuḥ viśeṣitaḥ bhavati yat uktam aviśeṣāt iti tat asiddham vyavasthāpaka śruti sadbhāvāt iti āha puṇyam eva iti 
NSu_3.4.238a–3.4.238d.3	 puṇyam eva amum āpānoti na devān pāpam āpnuyāt iti ādi śrutayaḥ mānam ukte arthe anena puṇyam eva amum gacchati na ha vai devān pāpam gacchati a iti śrutim upādatte amum sapta anna vidyā upāsanena preraka tayā para pura praveśinam para kṛtam puṇyam eva āpnoti na pāpam kutas devaḥ hi asau jātaḥ na hi devān prāpnoti iti arthaḥ ukte arthe śubham eva bhavati na aśubham iti arthe vyavasthāpaka antaram āha yuktayaḥ iti 
NSu_3.4.238d.1–3.4.240.1	 yuktayaḥ aparāḥ aparāḥ pūrva uktābhyām ukte arthe mānam iti sambandhaḥ kāstā yuktayaḥ iti atas tāḥ darśayitum āgama vākyam paṭhati upasana iti upāsana adharma phalam yatas deha antare sthitiḥ vāsudeva ājñayā ca eva pūrva karma anusārataḥ prerayanti hi te jīvān puṇya pāpeṣu nityaśas arāga dveṣataḥ ca eva katham doṣān avāpnuyuḥ 
NSu_3.4.241.1–3.4.241.2	 haryājñā karaṇāt eva puṇyam ebhiḥ avāpyate hari pūjā iti ca uddeśāt katham na śubham āpnuyuḥ yatas kāraṇāt deha antare sthitiḥ para puram praviśya tatra puṇya pāpa preraṇam devānām bhagavat upāsanā janita dharma phalam atas katham pāpa ādikam prerayantaḥ api doṣān avāpnuyuḥ nahi sāttvikaḥ dharmaḥ duḥkha paryavasāyī tattva vyāghātāt iti arthaḥ parapure devānām pāpa ādi preraṇam na duḥkha hetuḥ sāttvika dharma phala tvāt tattva jñāna vat iti uktam bhavati kiñca te devāḥ vāsudeva ājñayā eva na tu sva icchayā tad tad kṛta pūrva karma anusārataḥ eva atas eva arāga dveṣataḥ rāga dveṣau vinā eva nityaśas jīvān puṇya pāpeṣu prerayanti hi yasmāt tasmāt katham doṣān avāpnuyuḥ prabhoḥ ājñayā aparādha anusāreṇa cora śāsaka rāja puruṣa vat iti bhāvaḥ pāpa ādi preraṇena devānām aśubham na bhavati iti eva kevalam na kintu haryājñā anuṣṭhānāt jyotiṣyoma ādi anuṣṭhātṛbhiḥ iva ebhiḥ devaiḥ puṇyam eva āpyate kiñca sva vihita para preraṇe hari pūjeyam iti ca uddeśāt katham devāḥ na śubham āpanuyuḥ atas iti upasaṃhāraḥ 
NSu_3.4.242.1–3.4.243ab.2	 atas yathākramam dharma jñānayoḥ phalam añjasā sarva prāṇi gatam devāḥ prāpnuvantyā viriñcataḥ dharma jñānayoḥ eva iti yojyam prāpnuvantaḥ api āviriñcataḥ yathākramam prāpnuvanti iti apūrva uktiḥ na upasaṃhāraḥ anya gatam jñāna ādi phalam devāḥ prāpnuvanti deva gatam tu katham iti apekṣāya am uktam devāḥ iti devāḥ eva hi devānām viśiṣṭāḥ viniyāmakāḥ devānām apakṛṣṭānām atas tadīya jñāna ādi phalam teṣām bhavati iti śeṣaḥ brahmā tu iti āviriñcate iti uktasya vivaraṇam 
NSu_3.4.243c–3.4.244.1	 brahmā tu akhila devānām narāṇām ca niyāmakaḥ atas sarva guṇān eṣa prāpanoti adhikam anyatas deva ādi grahaṇam upalakṣaṇam adhikam iti kriyā viśeṣaṇam bhavatu anya gata jñāna ādi phala prāptiḥ devānām tatra api tāratamye kaḥ hetuḥ iti atas uktam dravya iti dravya svātantrya vijñāna prayatnaiḥ adhikam phalam devānām anya gam ca api teṣu yat brahmaṇaḥ adhikam 
NSu_3.4.245ab.1–3.4.245ab.3	 bṛhat tantra uditam vākyam hariṇā phala nirṇaye dravyāṇi indriya ādīni teṣu svātantryam dravya svātantryam vijñāna prayatnau dharma ādi utpāna nimitte adhikaiḥ iti śeṣaḥ caśabdaḥ anukta samuccaya arthaḥ madhyamaiḥ dravya svātantrya ādibhiḥ madhyamam alpaiḥ alpam iti teṣu api deveṣu niravadhika dravya svātantrya mattvāt iti hi śabda arthaḥ phala nirṇayaḥ iti tatra api prakaraṇa viśeṣa uktiḥ dravya svātantrya ādi atiśayāt phala atiśayaḥ iti uktasya vyāptim darśayati loke api iti 
NSu_3.4.245cd.1–3.4.245cd.3	 loke api etādṛśa guṇaiḥ phala ādhikyam hi dṛśyate etādṛśa guṇaiḥ iti adhikaiḥ dravya svātantrya ādibhiḥ samuditāyām kṛṣau yasya adhikam kṣetra ādi dravya svātantryam yasya cā avāpa ādau jñāna prayatna ādhikyam tasya phala ādhikyam dṛśyate iti arthaḥ evam madhyalpayoḥ api udāha tarvyam anena svātantrya tāratamyena iti uktam upapāditam bhavati prasaṅgāt pāpa ādi phalam prerakāṇām asurāṇām tāratamyena bhavati iti āha evañca iti 
NSu_3.4.246.1–3.4.247.1	 evañca kali pūrvāṇām asurāṇām mahat phalam aśubheṣu sadā eva syāt mithyā jñāna ādikeṣu hi mahā prerakāṇām mahat ityādi iti arthaḥ aśubheṣu aśubha nimittam hi śabdena svātantryam hetum āha evam iti deva dṛṣṭāntam asurāṇām ca iti sambandhaḥ prāk ukte arthe atra ca pramāṇa antaram āha śubhā iti śubha aśubha phalam devāḥ asurāḥ ca samāpnuyuḥ krameṇa eva yathāśakti yathā ye ye prayojakāḥ 
NSu_3.4.248.1–3.4.248.6	 prerakāḥ api pāpānām na devāḥ pāpam āpnuyuḥ iti prakāśikāyām hi provāca hariḥ añjasā yathā saṅkhayena śubha aśubha phalam yathāśakti iti krameṇa eva iti atra yuktiḥ tasya vivaraṇam ye ye yathā prayojakāḥ tathā tathā iti prerakāḥ iti asya pūrvavat śaṅkā parihāraḥ ca ārtvijyam iti auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikriyate sahakārī antara vidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyam tadvataḥ vidhi ādi vat evam prapañcena pūrva pakṣam uktvā siddhānta sūtra tātparyam āgama vākyena āha yadi api iti ārtvijyam iti auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate sahakārī antara vidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyam tadvataḥ vidhi ādi vat 
NSu_3.4.249.1–3.4.249.4	 yadi api evam surāṇām ca daityānām ca mahat phalam śubha aśubhebhyaḥ evañca kartuḥ ca syāt yathā uditam evam ukta prakāreṇa yadi api śubha aśubhebhyaḥ jñāna ādibhyaḥ bhavat phalam surāṇām ca daityānām ca bhavati iti upapāditam evaṃca tathā api kartuḥ devadatta ādeḥ api phalam syāt eva āgame api asya arthasya prakṛta tvāt yadi api ityādi yujyate etat uktam bhavati deva asurāṇām śubha aśubha phalam iti etāvat abhyupagamyate pramita tvāt teṣām eva iti tu na kṣamyate kintu kartuḥ api bhavati iti kartuḥ phala aṅgīkāre yadu kiñca imāḥ prajāḥ iti sa avadhāraṇa śruti virodhaḥ ātreya vacana virodhaḥ ca syāt iti atas uktam mahat iti deva ādīnām mahat phalam kartuḥ tu alpam alpasya casattva vivakṣā bahulam upalabdha iti bhāvaḥ kutas kartuḥ phala aṅgīkāraḥ iti atas āha yathā uditam ita śruti smṛti sadbhāvāt iti arthaḥ tāḥ ca bhāṣya ādau= udāhṛtāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ yuktam api āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_3.4.250a–3.4.251.1–3.4.251.6^1	 tasmāt niraya mānuṣya svarga mukti upabhoginaḥ mānuṣa uttamam ārabhya kartuḥ śubha aśubha phala sadbhāvāt eva mānuṣa uttamam ārabhya deva paryantā daitya paryantāḥ ca niraya ādi upabhoginaḥ iti yujyate na anyathā iti arthaḥ uktasya apavādam āha devāḥ tu iti  devāḥ tu nirayam vinā asurāḥ tu vinā muktim tamaḥ andham api ca āpnuyuḥ iti tattva viveka uktam svayam bhagavatā vacaḥ anya phala upabhoginaḥ na kevalam asurāṇām mukti abhāvaḥ kintu andhantamaḥ api ca āpnuyuḥ etat uktam bhavati manuṣya uttamāḥ tāvat niraya mānuṣya svarga muktīḥ prāpnuvanti devāḥ ca mānuṣya svarga muktīḥ asurāḥ ca svarga mānuṣya niraya andhatamasāni na ca niraya ādīni nirnimittāni na ca sva kṛta pāpa ādīni vinā nimittam asti tasmāt kartuḥ api asti śubha aśubha phala prāptiḥ isita jñāyate anyathā niraya ādya bhāva prasaṅgāt 
NSu_3.4.251.1–3.4.251.6^2	 na ca vācyam sura asurāṇām kartṛ tva prayukta phala abhāve api preraṇa nimitta phala sadbhāvāt mukti ādi upapattiḥ iti devānām mānuṣya prāpteḥ ayogāt daityānām svarga ādi pāpteḥ anupapatteḥ sarvathā manuṣyāṇām niraya ādi prāpteḥ asambhavāt iti tat idam uktam mānuṣa uttamam ārabhya iti manuṣya uttamānām ādi tva uktyā niraya ādi aneka phala uktyā ca vacaḥ asti iti śeṣaḥ anāviṣkurvan= anvayāt jñāna dānam kim āviṣkāreṇa kāryam utānāviṣkāreṇa iti saṃśaye pūrvavat atra api pūrva pakṣam atyanta heya tva abhāvāt prapañcena aṃha jñāna dā api iti anāviṣkurvan anvayāt 
NSu_3.4.252ab.1–3.4.253.1	 jñāna dā apica ācāryāḥ viśeṣāt phalam āpnuyuḥ na kevalam śiṣyāḥ kintu jñāna dāḥ ācāryāḥ api jñāna phalam āpnuyuḥ tat ca viśeṣāt śiṣyāt api atiśayena ācāryāḥ iti enena eva siddhe jñāna dā iti vacanam jñāna dānena iti jñāpana artham caśabdaḥ parama ācārya ādi saṅgrahaḥ kutas etat iti atas āha muktau= iti muktau= aṣṭaguṇam śiṣyāt guruḥ āpanoti śobhanam tad guruḥ dviguṇam tasmāt sārdham tāvat tatas apare devāḥ sahasra guṇitam kramāt tasmāt yathottaram 
NSu_3.4.254a–3.4.254d.3	 brahmā mahā ogha guṇitam evam phala vinirṇayaḥ iti āha bhagavān śāstre guru vṛtta abhidhe svayam śiṣyāt śiṣyasya yat śravaṇa phalam tatas aṣya guṇam guruḥ jñāna dānena āpnoti tad guruḥ guroḥ guru smāt guru phalāt dviguṇa ṭha phalam āpnoti santāna kāraṇa tvāt tatas parama guroḥ apare guravaḥ sva śiṣya phala apekṣayā sārdham tāvat adhyardham phalam āpanuvanti yathottaram tasmāt kramāt iti adhyardha prāpti kramāt deva ajñāna pravartaka tvāt sahasra guṇitam yathottaram tasmāt kramāt iti brahmā mahā ogha guṇitam iti anena api sambaddhayate sahasra mahā ogha śabdau= upalakṣaṇa arthau paramparāyāḥ aniyata tvāt āgama siddhe atra arthe yuktiḥ api asti iti āha yuktam ca tat iti 
NSu_3.4.254c.1–3.4.254cd.3	 yuktam ca tat pratigrahītuḥ śiṣyasya jñāna phalāt api ācāryasya jñāna dāna phalam adhikam iti etat yukti siddham ca tām yuktim sūcayati na iti  na godātā go mātra phalam āpnuyāt pratigrahītuḥ hi go mātra phalam godātā na go mātra phalavān bhavati kintu mahā phalam svarga ādikam ca prāpnoti yathā etat tathā prakṛte api iti arthaḥ ayam atra prayogaḥ jñāna dātā datta vastu phalāt api adhika dāna phalavān puruṣa artha hetu vastu dātṛ tvāt go dātṛ vat iti jñāna phalāt api ācāryasya jñāna dāna phalam adhikām iti atra bhagavat gītā saṃvādam āha yaḥ imam iti 
NSu_3.4.255.1–3.4.256ef.2	 yaḥ imam paramam guhyam mad bhakteṣu abhidhāsyati bhaktim mayi parām kṛtvā mām eva eṣyati asaṃśayaḥ na ca tasmāt manuṣyeṣu kaścid me priya kṛttamaḥ bhavitā na ca me tasmāt anyaḥ priyataraḥ bhuvi iti āha bhagavān adhyeṣyate iti uttara vākyam atra paṭhanīyam yatas evam jñāna dānam tad sampradāya pravartanam ca mahā phalam atas bahūnām grahaṇāya āviṣkāreṇa jñāna dānam kāryam iti prāpte siddhāntam āha evam api iti  evam api satyam jñāna dāna mukta prakāreṇa mahā phalam tathā api na āviṣkāreṇa kāryam kutas iti atas āha pātram iti 
NSu_3.4.256f.1–3.4.256f.5	 pātram apekṣyate dāna phalena iti śeṣaḥ pātre kriyamāṇam khalu dānam phalāya alam na apātre pratyuta pratyavāyasya eva hetuḥ āviṣkāreṇa jñāna dāne ca ayogyānām api tad prāptiḥ bhavati sā ca pratiṣiddhā iti bhāvaḥ aihikam aprastuta pratibandhe tad darśanāt evam mukti phala aniyamaḥ tad avasthā avadhṛteḥ tad avasthā avadhṛteḥ adhikaraṇa dvayasya tātparyam saṅkṣepeṇa āha evam eva iti aihikam api aprastuta pratibandhe tad darśanāt evam mukti phala aniyamaḥ tad avasthā avadhṛteḥ tad avasthā avadhṛteḥ 
NSu_3.4.257.1–3.4.257.4	 evam eva avirodhena prārabdhasya eva karmaṇaḥ jñānam dṛṣṭa phalam proktam muktiḥ ca iha eva labhyate prārabdhasya karmaṇaḥ avirodhena eva jñānam dṛṣṭa phalam proktam iti prathama adhikaraṇa tātparyam dṛṣṭam ca tad phalam ca iti dṛṣṭa phalam śravaṇa ādi sampūrti anantaram eva jñānam utpadyate yadi prārabdhakamarpratibandhakam na asti tasmin= tu sati tad avasānaḥ iti evam eva muktiḥ ca eva iha labhyate iti dvitīyasya yasmin dehe jñānam utpannam tad pāta anantaram eva muktiḥ labhyate prārabdha karma pratibandhaka abhāve tad bhāve tu tad avasānaḥ iti yadīya caraṇa ambhoja= chāyām āśritya nirvṛtāḥ nandanti satatam muktāḥ saṃśraye tam śriyaḥ patim phalam nigadyate asmin= adhyāyaḥ iti bhāṣyam phala nirūpaṇasya idānīm kā saṅgatiḥ iti atas āha samanvaya iti 
NSu_4.1.1.1–4.1.2c.2	 samanvaya avirodhābhyām siddhe vastuni sādhane vicāriteṣu aśeṣeṣu sādhaneṣu viśeṣataḥ nityaśas kāryam atyantam avaśyam bhāvi sādhanam cintyate prathamam tatra samanvaya avirodhābhyām prathama dvitīya adhyāya pratipāditābhyām para brahma ādi rūpe vastuni siddhe sati sādhane sādhana viṣaye tṛtīya adhyāye aśeṣeṣu mokṣa sādhaneṣu vicāriteṣu satsu phala pratipādanasya avasara prāptiḥ jijñāsiteṣu artheṣu anyeṣām vicārita tvāt asya eva avaśiṣṭa tvāt atas mokṣa lakṣaṇam phala mātra adhyāye nigadyate iti vākya śeṣaḥ 
NSu_4.1.2a–4.1.2c.3	 pāda catuṣyaya pratipādyam saṅgatim ca lāghavāya ekatra eva vakṣyati tatas ca phala viṣaye asmin= adhyāye karma nāśa ākhyam phalam prathama pāde nigadyate iti uktam bhavati tasya apavādam āha viśeṣate iti tatra caturthasya prathama pāde prathamam kaiścid sūtraiḥ sādhanam eva cintyate katham viśeṣataḥ parama ādareṇa nityaśas nairantaryeṇa ca kāryam iti kutas yatas mokṣa siddhau= atyantam avaśyaṃbhāvi 
NSu_4.1.2a–4.1.2c.6	 idam uktam bhavati tṛtīye adhyāye yāni sādhanāni vicāritāni teṣu eva keṣāñcid parama ādara nairantaryābhyām anuṣṭheya tvam atra ādau pratipādyate tathā anuṣṭhānaḥ eva mokṣasya bhāvāt anyathā bhāvāt etat jñāpanāya tṛtīye idam anukta vātra idam ucyate tatra anuktayā hi tatas vailakṣaṇyam jñāyate phala lakṣaṇe ca uktyā phala antaraṅga tvam adhyāya ādi vyavasthā ca prāyika tvāt upapadyate iti āvṛttiḥ asakṛt upadeśāt adhikaraṇa utthāna kāraṇam darśayati śravaṇa ādi iti āvṛttiḥ asakṛt upadeśāt 
NSu_4.1.2d.1–4.1.3a.2	 śravaṇa ādi sakṛt kriyā āvṛttiḥ vā iti sandehe prathamam tatra iti vartate śrotavyaḥ mantavyaḥ nididhyāsitavyaḥ iti darśana atha śravaṇa ādikam vidhīyate tasya śravaṇa ādeḥ jyotiṣyoma ādi vat sakṛt kriyā vā vrīhyā avaghāta ādi vat āvṛttiḥ vā iti sandehe sati upalakṣaṇam etat sakṛt kriyā iti pūrva pakṣe ca satī iti api grāhyam idam adhikaraṇam ārabhyate iti śeṣaḥ pūrva pakṣa bījam ca nyāya vivaraṇe spaṣṭam avagantavyam sūtram vyākhyāti kartavyā iti 
NSu_4.1.3b–4.1.4.1	 kartavyā avṛttiḥ eva hi upadeśaḥ atat tvam asi iti ādiḥ hi asakṛt eva yat śravaṇa ādīnām iti vartate hi śabdaḥ tattvam asi iti upadeśasya prasiddha tvam dyotayati yadi hi śiṣyeṇa āvṛttiḥ na kartavyā tadā guroḥ asakṛt upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt tena jñāyate kartavyā śravaṇa āvṛttiḥ iti anena śravaṇa āvṛtteḥ kartavyatā siddhāḥ trayāṇām api āvṛttim sādhayat liṅgāt ca iti sūtram paṭhitvā tad abhipretāni liṅgāni āgama vākyena eva darśayati liṅgāt ityādinā liṅgāt ca liṅgāt lātavyataḥ pūrva mṛjobarrahma tvataḥ śatāt śuśrāva ugratapāḥ nāma yogyaḥ rudra padasya yaḥ 
NSu_4.1.5.1–4.1.5.2	 sārddham parārddham viṣṇoḥ tu guṇān bhaktayā sadā udyataḥ tad tri bhāgam upāsām ca cakre sambhṛta mānasaḥ lātavyaḥ ādātavyaḥ śiṣyaiḥ upāsitavyaḥ tasmāt brahmatvataḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī bahuvacana antāt tasiḥ brahma tvānām śatāt pūrvam iti ṛjoḥ viśeṣaṇam yasya etasmāt brahma kalpāt ārabhya brahma kalpānām śate gate brahma tvam bhaviṣyati tasmāt iti yāvat sārdham parārdham iti atyanta saṃyoge dvitīyā tad tri bhāgam tasya śravaṇa kālasya tṛtīya bhāgam kālam upāsām manana nididhi āsana rūpām sambhṛta mānasaḥ iti upāsitavyaḥ eva arthe dhṛta cittaḥ 
NSu_4.1.6.1–4.1.8.2	 daśa manvantaram śakra pada yogyaḥ garutmataḥ pada yogyāt sumanasaḥ sunandaḥ nāma ca aśṛṇot upāsām cakraḥ udyuktaḥ manvantara catuṣī ayam sūryācandramasoḥ ca eva pada yogyau su tejasau surūpaḥ śānta rūpaḥ ca manvantara catuṣī ayam aśṛṇvatām sumanasaḥ manvantaram upāsatām tatas proktāḥ tu te sarve bhaktayaḥ gratapaa ādayaḥ apaśyan paramam viṣṇum tad prasādedhitāḥ sadā iti uktam viṣṇunā sākṣāt granthe sattatva sañjñite daśa manvantarāṇi yasmin kāle sa tathā uktaḥ garutmataḥ pada yogyāditas garutmataḥ yat padam tatra yogyāt iti arthaḥ su tejasau= eva su prajñau= eva na tu mandau aśṛṇvatām aśṛṇu tām vyatyayaḥ bahulam iti dvi vikaraṇa tā sumanasaḥ eva manvantaram manvantara avacchinnam kālam upāsatām upāsātām chāndasaḥ vaṇarvikāraḥ 
NSu_4.1.8.3–4.1.8.6	 nanu atra śravaṇa ādi kāla bāhulyam eva pratīyate na punarāvṛttiḥ śrutasya eva vākyasya punar śravaṇam ityādi rūpā hi sā iti mā evam ekena vākyena avagatasya tattvasya punar punar tena anyena avagatiḥ śravaṇa āvṛttiḥ evam ekayā yukta yā anusaṃhitasya bhūyas bhūyas tayā anyathā vā anusandhānam manana āvṛttiḥ iti abhipreta tvāt nanu evam ced sarva vedānta pratyayam iti anena eva gatam etat satyam tasya eva atyanta āvaśyaka tva pradarśanāya punar ārambhaḥ iti uktam eva evam uttaratra api draṣṭavyam ātmā iti tu upagacchanti grāhayanti ca etat sūtram vyākhyātum ātma śabda artham tāvat āha ātmā iti ātmā iti tu upagacchanti grāhayanti ca 
NSu_4.1.9ab.1–4.1.9cd.1	 ātmā iti nāma kathitam sākṣāt nārāyaṇasya hi yasmāt ātmā iti nāma sākṣāt mukhyayā vṛttyā nārāyaṇasya kathitam mukhye ca sambhavati amukhyam na yujyate tasmāt atra sūtre api ātmā janārdanaḥ ātma śabda uditaḥ janārdanaḥ iti vakṣyamāṇena anvayaḥ kim tad ātma śabdasya bhagavat nāma tva kathanam iti atas āha ātmā iti ātmā brahma mahān= tāraḥ parameśaḥ śuciśravāḥ 
NSu_4.1.10.1–4.1.12.1	 viṣṇuḥ nārāyaṇaḥ anantaḥ iti śrīpatiḥ īryate iti piṅgaśrutiḥ ca eva tathā eva parama śrutiḥ iti nāmabhiḥ paiṅgiśrutiḥ ātma śabdam bhagavat nāma tvena āha caśabdaḥ śruti antara samuccaya arthaḥ śrutiḥ eva na tu mānuṣa praṇītam abhidhānam iti eva śabdaḥ tena kṣetrajñaḥ ātmā puruṣaḥ a ityādi virodhaḥ na aśaṅkanīyaḥ oma ātmā iti parama śrutiḥ oma ātmā bhagavān viṣṇuḥ ātma ānandaḥ akṣaraḥ svarāj viśva trātā nṛsiṃhaḥ ajaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ urukramaḥ anasūyā tathā eva atreḥ jajñe putrān akalmaṣān dattam durvāsasam somam ātma īśa brahma sambhavān 
NSu_4.1.13ab.1–4.1.13ab.3	 iti bhāgavate ca eva tasmāt ātmā janārdanaḥ ātma ānanda iti samastam ekam nāma anasūyā iti bhāgavate ca ātma śabdasya bhagavati eva prayogaḥ asti tathā eva iti tatra prakṛtena samuccaya arthaḥ jajñe janayāmāsa antarṇī taṇī arthaḥ vā atra janiḥ ātma īśa brahma sambhavān viṣṇu śiva brahma sambhavān saha bhavanti iti sambhavāḥ atra datta dūrvāsasau viṣṇu śivau= eva somaḥ brahmaṇā saha bhūtaḥ tad dharmaḥ anyayoḥ api upacārāt ucyate chatriṇaḥ iti yathā astu ātma śabdaḥ viṣṇu paraḥ tathā api kaḥ sūtra arthaḥ iti atas ātmā iti iti pratijña aṃśam vyākhyāti tasmāt iti 
NSu_4.1.13cd.1–4.1.14ab.3	 tasmāt upāsyaḥ viṣṇuḥ iti jñātavyaḥ sat janaiḥ sadā yasmāt ātma śabdaḥ viṣṇu paraḥ tasmāt ayam pratijñā arthaḥ ātmā viṣṇuḥ ātmā iti sat janaiḥ sadā jñātavyaḥ upāsyaḥ dhyeyaḥ ca hetu aṃśam vyācaṣṭe tathā eva iti tathā eva upāsate santaḥ tathā eva upadiśanti ca anena ātma śabdasyā avṛttiḥ tu śabdaḥ ca avadhāraṇa arthaḥ iti uktam bhavati satām eva upāsana upadeśau bhāṣya udāhṛtābhyām śrutibhyām siddhau upagacchanti iti etat jñāna artham upāsana artham ca tatra jñāna artha tvam spaṣṭam iti ekaḥ eva arthaḥ vyākhyātaḥ atas eva prāk jñātavyaḥ upāsyaḥ ca iti uktam nanu anena viṣṇuḥ viṣṇuḥ iti upāsyaḥ iti uktam bhavati tatas ca kim anena kṛtam syāt na hi aviṣṇu tvena upāstiḥ atra prasaktā iti atas āha ādāna iti 
NSu_4.1.14cd.1–4.1.14cd.3	 ādāna artha tvataḥ ca ayam ātma śabdaḥ patim vadet ayam sūtra gataḥ ātma śabdaḥ patim ca vadet katham ādāna atha rtvatas ādāna kartṛ tva artha tvāt āṅpūrvāt dāñaḥ ātaḥ manin= iti manin pratyayaḥ ākāra lopaḥ dasya taḥ ca nirvacana tvāt tathā ca uktaṃyat ca āpnoti yat ādattaḥ a ityādi patiḥ hi svīyatayā bhṛtyān ādatte tatas kim iti atas sūtra artham vivṛṇoti svāmī iti 
NSu_4.1.14ef.1–4.1.15.1	 svāmī me viṣṇuḥ iti eva nityadā upāsyam añjasā atra sūtre dvau= ātma śabdau ekonuvāda arthaḥ dvitīyaḥ vidhi atharḥ ātma ātmā iti upāsyaḥ iti dvau= api viṣṇu viṣayau tatra ādyaḥ avivakṣita avayava arthaḥ saṃjñā tvena vartate dvitīyaḥ vivakṣita avayava arthaḥ svāminam vadati tathā ca ātmā viṣṇuḥ ātmā iti svāmi iti upāsyaḥ iti sūtra arthaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ añjasā parama ādareṇa nanu etat ānanda ādayaḥ pradhānasya iti anena eva gatam satyam sarvathā upāsya tvasya jñāpanāya punarvacanam tat idam uktam nityadā eva añjasā iti asya sarvathā upāsya tve kim pramāṇam iti atas āha svāmī iti svāmī viṣṇuḥ iti dhyānam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyataḥ kartavyam sarvathā eva etat na kathañcana vismaret 
NSu_4.1.16.1–4.1.16.4	 iti sat tattva vacanam ṣāḍguṇya vacanam param mama svāmī hariḥ nityam sarvasya patiḥ eva ca iti dhyeyaḥ sarvadā eva bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyate iti svāmi tvam viśeṣaṇam viṣṇuḥ viśeṣyaḥ iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvena eva na tu taṭa stham svāmi tvam nirguṇasya viṣṇoḥ upalakṣaṇam iti evam iti arthaḥ kathañcane ādhi vyādhi satve api param uparitanam mama svāmī iti anena prasaktam alpa tvam nivārayati sarvasya iti na pratīke na hi saḥ manaḥ brahma iti upāsīta ityādi śruti prāptam manaḥ prabhṛti pratīkānām brahmatvena upāsanam atra pratiṣidhyate tatra pratīkaḥ iti adhikaraṇa saptamī iti pratītiḥ syāt pratīka adhikaraṇasya ca upāsanam brahmaṇaḥ yuktam eva atas anyathā pratijñām vyākhyāti pratīkā iti na pratīke na hi saḥ 
NSu_4.1.17ab.1–4.1.17c.2	 pratīka viṣaya tvena na kāryā viṣṇu bhāvanā ittham bhūta lakṣaṇe tṛtīyā idam manaā ādikam viṣṇuḥ iti evaṃrūpa upāsanā na kāryā iti arthaḥ na hi saḥ iti hetum vyācaṣṭe pratīkam iti pratīkam na eva viṣṇuḥ yat yadi asmāt pratīkam brahmaṇaḥ pratimā ātmakam manaḥ prabhṛti sa viṣṇuḥ na eva tasmāt iti pūrveṇa anvayaḥ nanu asaṅgataḥ ayam hetuḥ pratīkasya viṣṇoḥ ca abheda abhāvaḥ hi abhedasya tad pramiteḥ ca nivārakaḥ na tu abheda bhāvanā mātrasya iti atas āha mithyā iti 
NSu_4.1.17d.1–4.1.19.1	 mithyā upāsā hi anathardā na hi sa viṣṇuḥ pratīkam atas tayoḥ abheda bhāvanā mithyā upāsanā sā ca anarthasya eva hetuḥ atas na kartavyā iti evam hetu hetum at bhāvaḥ sūtra kṛtaḥ abhipretaḥ na punar sākṣāt atas na asaṅgatiḥ mithyā upāsanasya anartha hetu tvam kutas iti atas tad upapādana pūrvakam imam eva sūtra abhiprāyam spaṣṭam ācaṣṭe yaḥ anyathā ityādinā bhagavan prabhuḥ iti antena yaḥ anyathā santam ātma īśam anyathā pratipadyate kim tena na kṛtam pāpam coreṇa ātma apahāriṇā yaḥ anyathā santam ātmānam anyathā pratipadyate kim tena na kṛtam pāpam coreṇa īśa apa hāriṇā 
NSu_4.1.20.1–4.1.20.3	 yaḥ anyathā eva sthitam viṣṇum anyathā pratipadyate kim tena na kṛtam pāpam coreṇa brahmacāriṇā anyathā asantam pratīka bhinna tva ādi prakāram santam ātmanām jīvānām īśam anyathā pratīka tva ādinā pratipadyate jānāti dhyāyati ca cora tvasya eva vivaraṇam ātma apahāriṇā iti abhede khalu eka avaśeṣaḥ syāt tatra pratīka avaśeṣe dhyāte sphuṭam paramātma apahāri tvam pratīka pravilaye api aiśvarya apalāpāt paramātma apahāri tvam eva ātmānam paramātmānam etāni trīṇi vākyāni viṣṇoḥ pratīkatā dhyāne bādhakāni pratīkasya viṣṇu tva dhyāne tu na bādhakam iti atas sva ātmanam iti vākyam paṭhitam 
NSu_4.1.21.1–4.1.23.1	 sva ātmānam pratimām vā api devatā antaram eva vā cetana acetanam vā anyat dhyāyet yaḥ keśavaḥ tu iti kim tena na kṛtam pāpam cāreṇa īśa apa hāriṇā yaḥ anyat iti trīṇi ubhaya arthe yaḥ anyat viṣṇuḥ iti dhyāyet jānīyāt vā harim tathā andhe tamasi majjet sa yatra na eva utthitiḥ kvacid yaḥ anyat viṣṇuḥ iti dhyāyet viṣṇuḥ anyat iti sma vā anyathā dhyāna doṣeṇa mahātamasi majjati 
NSu_4.1.24.1–4.1.25.1	 yaḥ anyat viṣṇuḥ iti dhyāyet viṣṇuḥ anyat iti sma vā mahātamasi magnasya tasya na eva utthitiḥ kvacid yatra patitasya anyathādhyānam eva doṣaḥ anyathā dhyāna doṣaḥ yat kiñcid ityādīni prathama arthaḥ eva kaimutya arthāni yat kiñcid anyathā saṃstham anyathā dhyātam añjasā dhyātuḥ mahā doṣa karam kimu sarva īśvaraḥ hariḥ 
NSu_4.1.26.1–4.1.29.2	 yat kiñcid anyathā saṃstham anyathā jñātam añjasā mahā doṣa karam viṣṇuḥ kimu sarva īśvara īśvaraḥ yat kiñcid anyathā saṃstham anyathā jñātam añjasā anartha kāraṇam loke kimu sarva īśvara īśvaraḥ na kiñcid anyathā jñeyam dhyeyam vā tena kutracid kimu sarva uttamaḥ viṣṇuḥ jñeyaḥ nīca tayā kvacid tasmāt vastu yathārūpam jñeyam dhyeyam ca sarvadā kāraṇam puruṣa arthasya na anyathā bhavati kvacid yat kiñcid gaṅgā udaka ādikam anyathā saṃstham pavitram sat anyathā pavitram dhyātam dhyātuḥ añjasā mahā doṣa karam kimu sarva īśvaraḥ hariḥ aprakṛṣṭa tayā dhyātaḥ tena anartha prasaṅgena 
NSu_4.1.30.1–4.1.31ab.3	 iti śruti purāṇa ukti balataḥ na pratīkatā dhyeyāḥ viṣṇoḥ kvacid yasmāt mithyājñānam anartha dam iti abhipretya na hi saḥ iti āha bhagavān prabhuḥ iti śruti purāṇa ukti balataḥ mithyājñānam anartha padam pratīyate yasmāt tasmāt viṣṇoḥ pratīkatā na dhyeyā iti paramparayā hetu hetumat bhāvam abhipretya bhagavān sūtra kāraḥ na hi saḥ iti hetum āha atas na asaṅgatiḥ iti arthaḥ vakṣyamāṇa prakāreṇa dvi rūpasya api dhyānasya sāmyāt balataḥ iti uktam dhyānasya api jñāna viśeṣa tvāt saṅkīrṇa uktiḥ evam tarhi manaḥ brahma ityādi śrutīnām kaḥ arthaḥ iti atas āha pratīkā iti 
NSu_4.1.31cd.1–4.1.31cd.4	 pratīka saṃsthita tvena dhyeyaḥ viṣṇuḥ naca anyathā vyatyayaḥ bahulam saptasu prathamā ṣaṭsu dvitīyā ityādi smaraṇāt vibhakti vyatyayena adhikaraṇa artha tayā śrutayaḥ vyākhyeyāḥ iti bhāvaḥ brahma dṛṣṭiḥ utkarṣāt atra brahma dṛṣṭiḥ kartavyā iti ucyate kutra iti ākāṅkṣāyām sannidhānāt pratīkaḥ iti prāpnoti tat ca yogyatā virahāt nirākṛtam atas sākāṅkṣam pratijñā vākyam vyākhyāti brahma iti ca iti brahma dṛṣṭiḥ utkarṣāt 
NSu_4.1.32ab.1–4.1.32ab.2	 brahma iti ca sadā dhyeyaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ añjasā atra caśabdam prayuñjānena ātmā iti anena vyavahitena api asya yogyatayā anvayaḥ ātma śabdaḥ ca prathama antaḥ prakṛtaḥ saptamī antena ca iha arthaḥ artha vaśāt vibhakti vipariṇāmaḥ atas saptamyantaḥ atra anuvartate iti sūcitam bhagavān viṣṇuḥ brahma iti dhyeyaḥ iti tātparya kathanam na akṣara arthaḥ nanu etat bhūmnaḥ kratu vat jyāyaḥ tvam iti anena eva gatam iti atas sadā añjasā iti uktam utkarṣāt iti hetuḥ tatra na jñāyate kasya utkarṣaḥ iti atas vyācaṣṭe utkṛṣṭaḥ iti 
NSu_4.1.32c.1–4.1.32c.2	 utkṛṣṭaḥ brahma śabda arthaḥ yatas iti vakṣyamāṇam iha api sambaddhayate utkarṣāt utkarṣasya brahma śabda pravṛtti nimitta tvāt iti sūtra kṛta utkarṣasya brahma śabda pravṛtti nimitta tvam uktam anuvyākhyāna kṛtā tu utkarṣavān brahma śabda abhidheyaḥ iti abhihitam phalataḥ tu ekaḥ eva arthaḥ katham utkarṣaḥ brahma śabda pravṛtti nimittam iti atas āha pūrṇa tvam iti 
NSu_4.1.32d.1–4.1.32d.3	 pūrṇa tvam brahma tā yatas vṛddhayarthāt bṛhateḥ anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyante iti maninpratyayaḥ dṛśi grahaṇa sāmarthyāt dhātoram āgamaḥ ca vṛddhiḥ pūrṇa tvam iti ekaḥ eva arthaḥ brahma tā brahma śabda pravṛtti nimittam pūrṇa tvam eva ca utkarṣaḥ hetu hetum at bhāvaḥ ca bhāṣyaḥ eva samarthitaḥ brahma tvasya sarvathā āra dhyeya tve kim pramāṇam iti atas āha ādhivyādhi iti 
NSu_4.1.33.1–4.1.33.3	 ādhi vyādhi nimittena vikṣipta manasaḥ api tu dhyeyā eva brahma tā nityam viṣṇoḥ bhaktayā nirantaram iti prakāśikāyām ca vacanam viṣṇunā īritam ādhivyādhi iti dvandva eka vat bhāvaḥ tat ca tad nimittam ca tena kṛtyānām kartari vā iti ṣaṣṭhī caśabdena bhāṣya udāhṛtāni vacanāni samuccinoti ātmā iti tu upagacchanti grāhayanti ca a na pratīke na hi saḥ abrahma dṛṣṭiḥ utkarṣāt a iti trisūtrīm eke anyathā vyācakṣate 
NSu_4.1.33.4^1	 tathā hi paramātmā kim aham iti grahītavyaḥ kim vā mad anyaḥ iti saṃśaye na aham iti grāhyaḥ iti prāptam kutas apahata pāpma tva ādi guṇaḥ hi paramātmā tad viparīta guṇaḥ ca śārīraḥ atas katham tayoḥ abhedaḥ bhavet īśvarasya ca saṃsārya ātma tve īśvara abhāvaḥ tatas śāstra ānarthakyam saṃsāriṇaḥ api īśvara tve adhikārya bhāvāt śāstra ānarthakyam eva pratyakṣa ādi virodhaḥ ca evam prāpte brūmaḥ ātmā iti eva parameśvaraḥ pratipattavyaḥ tathā hi parameśvara prakriyāyām jābālāḥ ātma tvena eva enam upagacchanti tvam vā aham asmi bhagavaḥ devate aham vai tvam asi devate a iti tathā anye api aham brahmā asmi a iti evamādayaḥ ātma tva upagamāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ 
NSu_4.1.33.4^2	 grāhayanti ca ātma tvena eva īśvaram veda vākyāni eṣa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ a tat tvam asi a ityādīni atha yaḥ anyām devatām upāste a iti ādikā śrutiḥ apavat ati ca bheda darśanam yat tu uktam viruddha guṇayoḥ anyonya ātma tvam na sambhavati iti tat asat viruddha guṇa tayā mithyātvāt na ca īśvara abhāva prasaṅgaḥ na hi īśvarasya saṃsāri tvam pratipādyate kim tarhi saṃsāritva apohena īśvara tvam naca adhikārya bhāvaḥ pratyakṣa ādi virodhaḥ ca prāk prabodhāt saṃsāri tva abhyupagamāt tad viṣaya tvāt ca pratyakṣa ādi vyavahārasya prabodhe tu pratyakṣa ādi abhāvaḥ eva tathā satya dvaita śruteḥ api abhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced iṣyam eva etat tasmāt ātmā iti eva īśvare manaḥ dadhīta iti prathama sūtra arthaḥ 
NSu_4.1.33.5	 manaḥ brahma iti upāsīta iti evamādiṣu pratīka upāsaneṣu saṃśayaḥ kim teṣu api ātma grahaḥ kartavyaḥ na vā iti kim tāvat prāptam teṣu api ātma grahaḥ eva yuktaḥ kasmāt brahmaṇaḥ ātma tvāt pratīkānām api brahma vikāra tvāt brahma tve satya ātma tva upapatteḥ iti brūmaḥ na pratīkeṣu ātma matim badhnīyāt na hi saḥ upāsakaḥ pratīkāni yattāni ātma tvena akalayet yat punar brahma vikāra tvāt pratīkānām brahma tvam tatas ca ātma tvam iti tat asat pratīka abhāva prasaṅgāt vikāra svarūpa upamardena hi nāma ādi jātasya brahma tvam eva āśritam bhavati svarūpa upamarde ca nāma ādīnām kutas pratīka svarūpa tvam ātma grahaḥ vā kiñca yathā rucaka svastikayoḥ na itara ātma tvam dvayoḥ api vikāra tvāt tathā pratīka ātmanoḥ api suvarṇa ātmanā iva brahma ātmanā eka tve pratīka abhāva prasaṅgam avocāma atas na pratīkeṣu ātma dṛṣṭiḥ kartavyā iti dvitīya sūtra arthaḥ 
NSu_4.1.33.6–4.1.33.7	 teṣu eva udāharaṇeṣu anyaḥ saṃśayaḥ kim ādityādi dṛṣṭayaḥ brahmaṇi kāryāḥ kiṃvā brahma dṛṣṭiḥ āt itya ādiṣu iti sāmānādhikaraṇyasya ubha yatha upapatteḥ tatra aniyamaḥ niyama kāriṇaḥ śāstrasya abhāvāt athavā ādityādi dṛṣṭaye eva brahmaṇi kartavyāḥ evam hi brahma upāsitam bhavati brahma upāsanam ca phala vat iti prāpte brūmaḥ brahma dṛṣṭiḥ eva ādityādiṣu syāt kasmāt utkarṣāt evam utkarṣeṇa āt itya ādayaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ bhavanti tathā ca laukikaḥ nyāyaḥ anugataḥ bhavati kṣattari khalu rāja dṛṣṭiḥ kriyate na tu rājñi kṣattṛṣṭiḥ viparyaye pratyavāya prasaṅgāt yat tu phalavat tvayā braha upāsanam yuktam iti tat ayuktam āditya ādi upāsanasya api phalavat tva upapatteḥ brahma eva ca sarva adhyakṣa tvāt phalam dāsyati idam eva ca brahma upāsanam yat āditya ādiṣu tat dṛṣṭiḥ pratimā ādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādīnām iti tṛtīya sūtra arthaḥ iti tatra tāvat prathama sūtrasya apavyākhyānam dūṣayati na iti 
NSu_4.1.34ab.1–4.1.34ab.3	 na ātmā iti sūtram īśasya jīva tvapratipādakam atra pratipattiḥ nāma pramiteḥ eva parasya abhimatā pratīkadaśarnam iti āśaṅkaya nirākaraṇāt atas jīvatvena pratipattavya tvasya pratipādakam iti jīvatvasya pratipādakam iti ca ekaḥ eva arthaḥ kutas na iti atas padārtha jñāna pūrvaka tvāt vākya artha jñānasya prathamam padārtham nirākaroti ātma śabdam iti 
NSu_4.1.34c–4.1.34f.4^1	 ātma śabdam yatas hetum kṛtvā jīvam nyavārayat sva śabdāt prāṇabhṛt ca eva na uktaḥ iti eva veda rāj sva śabdāt eva prāṇabhṛt ca na uktaḥ iti veda rāj ā iva ātma śabdam hetum kṛtvā jīvam nyavārayat yatas tasmāt ātma śabda uditaḥ viṣṇuḥ eva na ca aparaḥ jīvaḥ iti yojanā etat uktam bhavati bhavet ayam sūtra arthaḥ yadi ātma śabdaḥ jīva vācī bhavet na ca evam sūtra kāra vacana sāmarthyāt eva tasya tad vāci tva abhāva avagamāt tathā hi yasmin dyauḥ iti vākyam udāhṛtya kim atra dyubhva ādi āyatana tvena pradhānam ucyate uta jīvaḥ kiṃvā paramātmā iti saṃśaye pradhāna ādau prāpte siddhāntitam 
NSu_4.1.34c–4.1.34f.4^2	 dyubhva ādi āyatanam sva śabdāt a iti sva śabdāt tam eva ekam jānathe ātmānam a iti dyubhva ādi āyatane ātma śabda śravaṇāt dyubhva ādi āyatanam paramātmā eva iti tatona anumāna m atad śabdāt a iti pradhānam nirākṛtya jīva nirākaraṇa artham sūtritam prāṇabhṛt ca iti tatra caśabdaḥ na iti asya sva śabdāt iti hetoḥ ca anukarṣaṇa arthaḥ tatas ca ātma śabdāt jīvaḥ api na iti arthaḥ yat evam ātma śabdam hetum kṛtvā jīvam nivāritavān sūtra kāraḥ tat anyathā anupapattyā jānīmaḥ sūtrakārasya ātma śabdaḥ na jīva vācī iti abhipretam iti tathā ca katham su ācarita viruddham idānīm ācaret iti etat eva viśadayati yadi iti 
NSu_4.1.35.1–4.1.35.3	 yadi ātma śabdaḥ jīve api katham sa vinivārayet ātma śabda uditaḥ tasmāt viṣṇuḥ eva naca aparaḥ jīve api vartate iti sūtra kṛtaḥ abhipretam iti śeṣaḥ tarhi katham sūtrakāraḥ jīvam ātma śabdena vinivārayet na hi gandhavat tvena ghaṭaḥ nivārayitum śakyate athavā yadi ātma śabdaḥ jīve api varteta tadā saḥ ātma śabdaḥ katham jīvam nivārayet pratyuta pratipādayet iti yojanāḥ āgama vākyam api atra paṭhati ātmā iti 
NSu_4.1.36.1–4.1.36.3	 ātma brahma ādayaḥ śabda astam ṛte viṣṇum avyayam na vadanti yatas na āptā kvāpi taiḥ guṇa pūrṇa tā nārāyaṇa adhyātma gatam iti yat vaiṣṇavam vacaḥ anyān na vadanti kutas yatas ātma ādi śabdāḥ pūrti vācinaḥ taiḥ anyaiḥ guṇa pūrṇa tā kvāpi avasthāyām na prāptā yat kiñcid pūrṇa tā artha tve ca amukhya artha tāpātaḥ iti ātma śabdaḥ api āṅpūrvāt tanoteḥ manin pratyaye ṭilope ca sati niṣpannaḥ pūrṇa tā vacanaḥ yadi asmāt evam vacaḥ asti tasmāt api iti pūrveṇa eva anvayaḥ idānīm vākya artham dūṣayati yadi iti 
NSu_4.1.37.1–4.1.37.6^1	 yadi jīveśayoḥ veda patiḥ aikyam ca manyate ātma śabdam katham tasmāt nivārayati yuktitaḥ manyate tatra sūtre tadā tasmāt jīvāt ātma śabdam katham nivārayati kutra nivāritavān iti atas uktam yuktitaḥ iti jīva nirākaraṇa yukti tvena ukta tvāt iti yāvat idam uktam bhavati ātma śabda śravaṇāt dyubhva ādi āyatanam na jīvaḥ iti ātma śabdam jīva nivāraṇe hetum vadatā sūtrakāreṇa ātma śabdaḥ jīvān nivāritaḥ iti gamyate na ayam puruṣaḥ viṣāṇi tvāt iti yathā na hi tatrasthena tad nirāsaḥ yujyate na ayam gauḥ viṣāṇi tvāt iti api prasaṅgāt 
NSu_4.1.37.1–4.1.37.6^2	 prathama sūtre ca dyubhva ādi āyatanam parameśvaraḥ na jīvaḥ ātma śabdāt iti ātma śabdasya parameśvare pravṛttiḥ abhyupagatā anyathā tena tad sādhana anupapatteḥ tatra yadi jīveśvarau= ekam eva tattvam iti sūtrakārasya matam syāt tadā tena ātma śabdaḥ tatra eva vartate na vartate ca iti uktam bhavati na ca vyāhatam sūtra kāraḥ bhāṣate iti yuktam tasmāt na jīveśvara aikyam tasya matam iti gamyate iti upalakṣaṇam ca etat dyubhva ādi āyatanam parameśvaraḥ na jīvaḥ iti pratijñā dvayam ca vyāhatam iti api draṣṭavyam sūtra antara virodham ca āha bhedasya iti 
NSu_4.1.38.1–4.1.39a.2	 bhedasya vyapadeśam ca sthitim ca adanam eva ca bheda dārḍhye hetum āha satātparyam jagatpatiḥ yadi jagatpatiḥ sūtrakāraḥ jīveśvarayoḥ aikyam manyate tarhi katham saḥ eva bheda vyapadeśāt a iti bhedasya vyapadeśam casthiti adanābhyām ca a iti sthitim ca adanam ca satātparyam jīveśa bhedam dṛḍhayitum hetum āha bhedasya prāk api pratipādita tvāt darḍhyaḥ iti uktam atra api aneka pramāṇa upanyāsāt satāt paryam iti na kaḥ api ayam virodhaḥ asti paramārthataḥ jīveśayoḥ eka tve api hi vyāvahārika bhedaḥ asti tad apekṣayā tāni sūtrāṇi idam tu paramārtha apekṣayā iti vyavasthā upapatteḥ iti āśayena śaṅkate vyāvahārikā iti vyāvahārika bhedaḥ ced atra vyāvahārika śabdena bhrānti siddhaḥ abhipreyate prāk prabodhāt iti ukta anuvāda tvāt jīveśvara bhedaḥ bhrānti siddhaḥ iti vadan praṣṭavyaḥ kim ayam eva bhedaḥ bhrānti siddhaḥ kim vā bheda mātram iti na ādyaḥ apasiddhāntāt dvitīye doṣam āha kva iti 
NSu_4.1.39b.1–4.1.39b.3	 kva asau= avyāvahārikaḥ bhrānteḥ abhrānti pūrvaka tvāt jīveśvara bhedasya bhrānti kalpita tve kvacid satyaḥ bhedaḥ aṅgīkartavyaḥ kva asau na kvāpi kutra api bhedasya satya tva aṅgīkāre jīva īśa bhet a āropaḥ api na sambhavati iti bhāvaḥ syāt etat na asti eva kaḥ api bhedaḥ satyaḥ tathā api jīva īśa bheda bhrāntiḥ upapadyate bhrāntiḥ hi saṃskāram apekṣyate saṃskāraḥ ca jñāna mātram atas pūrva pūrvam asaṃskārāt uttarottara bhrānti utpādaḥ anādiḥ ca ayam saṃsāraḥ iti mā evam bheda mātrasya mithyātve pramite khalu tad balāt eṣā kalpanā upapadyate na ca evam sarvaḥ api bhedaḥ bhrāntaḥ iti hi pratijñā eva tā= advaya hatā dūre pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ iti āśayavān sa upapattikam tāvat pṛcchati vyāvahārikam iti 
NSu_4.1.39cd.1–4.1.40a.3	 vyāvahārikam iti eva vacanam vyāvahārikam uta na iti vikalpe tu bheda mātram iti śeṣaḥ tiṣṭhatu tāvat anyat iti eva arthaḥ iti vikalpe tu pakṣa dvaite sambhavati kam pakṣam avalambyaḥ iti śeṣaḥ atra sarvatra vacana śabdena tad arthaḥ lakṣyate sarvaḥ api bhedaḥ bhrānti kalpitaḥ iti vākya arthaḥ bhrānti kalpitaḥ atha parama arthaḥ iti praśna arthaḥ ādyam śaṅkate yadi iti 
NSu_4.1.40b.1–4.1.41a.2	 yadi syāt vyāvahārikam etat vacanam iti vartate atra api pṛcchāmaḥ vākya arthaḥ ayam bādhyaḥ na vā iti na iti pakṣe bhrānti kalpitaḥ api na bhavet kutra api kadāpi kena api abādhyasya bhrānti kalpita tve brahmaṇaḥ api tathā tva āpatteḥ prathamam śaṅkate tasya iti tasya api bādhya tā ced syāt tasya vacanasya na kevalam bhrānti kalpita tvam kintu bādhyatā api syāt ced iti arthaḥ dūṣayati bhedaḥ iti  bhedaḥ syāt pāramārthikaḥ sarvaḥ api bhedaḥ bhrāntaḥ iti vākya arthasya bhrānta tve bādhya tve ca sakala bhedaḥ pāramārthikaḥ syāt dvitīyam āśaṅkate avyāvahārika tvam iti avyāvahārika tvam ced tasya vacanasya iti vartate nirākaroti bhedaḥ iti 
NSu_4.1.41b.1–4.1.41b.3	 bhedaḥ ayam satya tām gataḥ tiṣṭhatu tāvat anyaḥ vākya arthasya satya tve tasya brahmaṇaḥ ca yaḥ bhedaḥ yaḥ ca padārthānām asatya tve vākya arthasya satya tva anupapatteḥ padārthānām parasparam vākya arthāt brahmaṇaḥ ca bhedaḥ sa tāvat satya tām gataḥ ubhayathā api vākya arthaḥ vyāhate iti arthaḥ sarvaḥ api bhedaḥ bhrāntaḥ iti vākya arthasya bhrānta tve bādhya tve ca sarvasya api bhedasya satyatā syāt iti uktam tat kutas iti atas tad upapādanāya vyāptim tāvat āha ekasya iti 
NSu_4.1.41c–4.1.41f.3	 ekasya asatya tāyām hi dvayoḥ eva viruddhayoḥ anyasya satyatā eva syāt iti kena nivāryate yau dvau= eva viruddhau tayoḥ madhye ekasya asatya tāyām satyām anyasya satyatā syāt eva iti vyāptiḥ kena nivāryate upādhi vyabhicārayoḥ abhāvāt na kena api puras vartinaḥ puruṣa tve asati sthāṇu tvam eva bhavati iti niyamaḥ na asti valmīka tvasya api sambhavāt atas dvayoḥ eva viruddhayoḥ iti uktam dvayoḥ iti viśeṣaṇasya asamartha tā parihārāya viruddha grahaṇam yaḥ padārthaḥ dvayoḥ eva viruddhayoḥ ekasya asatya tvavān asau= anyasya satya tvavān iti uktam bhavati nidarśanam āha anityam iti 
NSu_4.1.42.1–4.1.42.4	 asatyam na uktam iti ukte satyam uktam iti prajāḥ jānanti uktam tu no satyam iti ukte asatya tām api āptena uktam asatyam na iti ukte sati uktam satyam iti prajāḥ jānanti tathā vipralambhakena uktam satyam naḥ iti ukte tu tasya asatyatām api jānanti satya tva asatya tvayoḥ dvayoḥ eva viruddha tā tatra āpta ukte arthe asati a tāyām asatyām satyatāyāḥ satvam anāpta ukte ca satya tā āyām asatyām asatyatāyāḥ satvam ca prasiddham iti arthaḥ iti uktaḥ iti pramita tva upalakṣaṇam prajāḥ jānanti iti anena āvipāla aṅganam eṣā vyāptiḥ siddhāḥ na kevalam parīkṣakāṇām iti sūcayati nanu svapne atra ghaṭaḥ iti dṛṣṭvā na atra ghaṭaḥ iti api paśyati tatra ghaṭaḥ tad abhāvaḥ ca dvayam api mithyā atas vyāpti bhaṅgaḥ iti atas āha na iti 
NSu_4.1.43a.1–4.1.43cd.2	 na svapne api dvayam mithyā tat kim dvayam api satyam iti atas āha tatra iti  tatra ekam satyam eva hi tatra ghaṭa tada bhāvayoḥ madhye yadā abhāvasya asatya tā tadā ghaṭaḥ satyaḥ eva yadā ca ghaṭasya asatya tā tadā abhāvaḥ satyaḥ eva iti atharḥ tasmāt na vyāpti bhaṅgaḥ iti hi śabda arthaḥ kutas na dvayam api mithyā iti atas āha bhāva iti bhāva abhāvau= ubhau tatra katham mithyā bhaviṣyataḥ yaḥ yasya abhāvaḥ yaḥ ca yasya abhāvasya pratiyogī tau= ubhau= api ekatra ekadaiva na mithyā iti vyāpteḥ svapne api ghaṭa tada bhāvau katham tathā bhaviṣyate iti bhāvaḥ vyāhatam ca bhāva abhāvayoḥ ubhayoḥ asattva varṇanam iti āśayena āha bhāvasya hi iti 
NSu_4.1.44ab.1–4.1.44ab.2	 bhāvasya hi niṣedhe tu na abhāvasya niṣedhanam hi śabdaḥ hetau bhāvasya niṣedhe kṛte tu abhāvasya eva vihita tvāt punar na abhā= asya niṣedhanam kartum śakyate vyāghātāt evam abhāvasya niṣedhe kṛte abhāva abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ eva tat vayaptaḥ vā iti bhāvasya vihita tvāt punar na bhāvasya niṣedhanam yuktam vyāhata tvāt iti astu evam vyāptiḥ tatas kim iti atas āha sva vacaḥ iti 
NSu_4.1.44cd.1–4.1.44cd.3	 sva vācaḥ asatya tā ced syāt tasmāt bhedasya satya tā sva śabdena prativādi ucyate tad vāc arthasya sakala bheda mithyā tvasya tasmāt vyāpti sadbhāvāt mithyātvam satya tvam ca dvau viruddha dharmau bhede tayoḥ mithyātve asati satya tvam satsyāt eva ukta vyāpti balāt iti arthaḥ prakṛtam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti 
NSu_4.1.45ab.1–4.1.45cd.2	 tasmāt jīveśayoḥ bhedaḥ ukta nyāyena gamyate bheda mithyā tvāsambhavāt jīva īśayoḥ pāramārthika bhedaḥ eva ukta nyāyena dyubhva ādi sūtraiḥ gamyate tathā ca tad virodhāt na idam abhedam pratipādayati sūtram iti siddham śrutayaḥ tu prāk eva samyak vyākhyātāḥ viruddha guṇa satyatā ca upapāditā pratyakṣa ādīnām atattva āvedaka tvam api nirākṛtam śruti mithyātvasya aniṣṭa tvam ca samarthitam iti uktaḥ eva sūtra arthaḥ evam prathama sūtrasya apavyākhyām pratyākhyāya dvitīyasya api pratyākhyāti etasmāt iti etasmāt ātma śabdaḥ ayam paramātmā abhidhā bhavet etasmāt ukta nyāyāt ātmā iti sūtra gataḥ ayam ātma śabdaḥ paramātmā abhidhā paramātmanaḥ eva abhidhāyakaḥ tāvat bhavet tatas kim iti atas āha pratīkā iti 
NSu_4.1.46ab.1–4.1.46ab.2	 pratīka viṣaya tvena viṣṇu dṛṣṭiḥ na tat bhavet tat tasmāt pūrva sūtra gatasya ātma śabdasya paramātma vāci tvāt na pratīkaḥ iti pratijñā vākyasya pratīka viṣaya tvena viṣṇu dṛṣṭiḥ kartavyā na bhavet iti eva arthaḥ idam uktam bhavati na pratīkaḥ iti atra tāvat ātmā iti iti anuvartanīyam pūrva sūtrāt anyathā pratijñā vākyasya aparipūrṇa tvāt pūrva sūtre ca ātma śabdaḥ viṣṇu viṣayaḥ iti samarthitam tathā ca pratīka viṣayāyāḥ viṣṇu dṛṣṭeḥ eva ayam pratiṣedhaḥ vyākhyeyaḥ na pratīkeṣu jīvamatim badhnīyāt iti tu pratijñā vyākhyāne prakṛta parityāgaḥ aprakṛta svīkāraḥ ca prasajyeyātām iti 
NSu_4.1.46ab.3–4.1.46cd.3	 manaḥ brahma ityādi śruti artha tvena yat pratīka saṃsthita tvena iti uktam tat api na utsūtram kintu pratīkaḥ iti saptamī antam padam āvartate tatra ādyam viṣaya saptamī antam na iti anena sambaddhayate dvitīyam adhikaraṇa saptamī antam śruti vyākhyānam ubhayatra ātmā iti iti pada dvayam pūvarsūtrāt anuvartate iti āśayavān prasaṅgāt dvitīyam vyākhyāti pratīkaḥ iti pratīke viṣṇuḥ iti eva tasmāt kāryā hi upāsanāḥ yasmāt pratīka viṣaya tvena viṣṇu dṛṣṭiḥ kartavyā na bhavet tasmāt iti śruti arthaḥ iti śeṣaḥ hi śabdena prathama ādi vibhakteḥ saptamī artha vāci tvam śābdikānām prasiddham iti dyotayati itas ca na ayam pratijñā arthaḥ iti āha na ca iti 
NSu_4.1.47ab.1–4.1.47ab.2	 na ca viṣṇuḥ pratīkam yat tasmāt yasmāt viṣṇuḥ pratīkam caśabdāt jīvasya na bhavati tasmāt pratīkeṣu ātmā iti jīvaḥ iti upāsanāḥ na prasaktā iti śeṣaḥ ayam arthaḥ prāptau satyām hi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ na ca pratīkeṣu upāsakasya ātma dṛṣṭiḥ prasaktā prasañjaka abhāvāt yat tu prasañjakam uktam brahmaṇaḥ ātma tvam pratīkānām ca brahma vikāra tvam tat ubhayam aprāmāṇikam pramāṇa viruddham ca na hi atyanta ābhāsena prasaktiḥ bhavati atiprasaṅgāt tatas prasaktaya bhāvāt pratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ iti 
NSu_4.1.47ab.3–4.1.47ab.4	 na hi saḥ iti hetu vyākhyānam dūṣayati na ca viṣṇuḥ pratīkam yat tasmāt iti tad śabdaḥ hi prakṛta parāmarśe vartate prakṛtaḥ ca ātmā ātma śabdaḥ ca viṣṇu vāci eva iti samarthitam tathā ca hi yasmāt sa viṣṇuḥ pratīkam na eva tasmāt iti eva arthaḥ sampadyate na hi saḥ upāsakaḥ pratīkāni iti vyākhyāne tu prakṛta parityāgena aprakṛta parāmarśaḥ prasajyate iti idanīm brahmadṛṣṭiḥ iti sūtrasya apavyākhyāmaṇa karoti na ātmā iti 
NSu_4.1.47b–4.1.47d.3	 na ātmā iti upāsanāḥ iti pakṣaḥ yadā brahma dṛṣṭiḥ ca atra viruddhayate na ātmā iti upāsana iti eka deśa utkīrtanenana pratīke na hi saḥ a iti samagra sūtra artham anuvadati pratīkeṣu ātmā iti jīvaḥ iti upāsanāḥ na kāryā na hi saḥ upāsakaḥ pratīkāni iti pakṣaḥ yadā iti evam pūrva sūtra vyākhyānam yadā tadā atra pratīkeṣu brahma dṛṣṭiḥ ca viruddhayate caśabdaḥ apavyākhyāna nirāsa samuccaye etat vivṛṇoti saḥ iti 
NSu_4.1.47ef.1–4.1.47ef.3^1	 sa na iti yuktiḥ tatra api sameti ukta viruddha tā pratīkānām ātma tvena upāsanasya akartavya tve tvayā yā tādātmya abhāva lakṣaṇā sa na iti yuktiḥ abhihitā sā tatra api brahma pratīkayoḥ api sameti hetoḥ pratīkeṣu brahma dṛṣṭiḥ kartavyā iti sūtre vyākhyāyamāne sati ukta yukti viruddha tā bhavati iti etat uktam bhavati pratīkeṣu brahma dṛṣṭiḥ kartavyā iti sūtra vyākhyānam asat pratīkam brahmatayā na upāsyam abrahma tvāt yat yat na bhavati na tad tatvena upāsyam iti yukti viruddha tvāt na ca iyam yuktiḥ apramā pratīkānām ātma tvena upāsanasya akartavya tāyām pūrva sūtre pareṇa eva upanyasta tvāt 
NSu_4.1.47ef.1–4.1.47ef.3^2	 anyathā naikāntyena sādhikā na syāt na ca brahma pratīkayoḥ abhedaḥ brahmaṇaḥ satya tvāt pratīkānām kalpita tvāt pāramārthika bheda abhāvaḥ tāvat asti iti ced tarhi jīva pratīkayoḥ api sa na asti iti asiddhiḥ syāt iti syāt etat na hi saḥ a iti na nirviśeṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ sūtrakārasya abhimataḥ yena brahma dṛṣṭiḥ pratīkeṣu ukta yukti viruddhā syāt kim tu upāsyasya utkarṣa prāpti abhāve sati iti anena viśiṣyaḥ pratīkānām brahmatvena upāsane tu utkarṣa prāptiḥ asti atas atadbhāve api upāsanā yujyate iti atas āha yadi iti 
NSu_4.1.48ab.1–4.1.48cd.3	 yadi api utkarṣa mātreṇa hi atad bhave api upāsanāḥ ādye api śabdaḥ ati prasaṅga samuccaya arthaḥ hi śabdasya uttara ardhena anvayaḥ yadi viśiṣya hetum vyākhyāya pratīkānām atad bhāve abrahma tve api utkarṣa prāpti mātreṇa brahmatvena upāsana aṅgīkriyate tadā ātma tvena api tad upāsanam aṅgī kāryam na tu nirākāryam kutas iti atas āha utkarṣaḥ iti utkarṣaḥ ātmanaḥ api syāt cetana tvāt acetanāt yasmāt brahma vat a ātmanaḥ api pratīkāt utkarṣaḥ asti katham ātmanaḥ cetana tvāt acetanam khalu pratīkam tasya ātma tvena upāsanāyām utkarṣa praptiḥ syāt iti atiprasaṅgasya viparyaya payarvasānam āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_4.1.48ef.1–4.1.48ef.3	 tasamāda tattvam na upāsyam iti veda vidaḥ matam yasmāt viśiṣya hetau vyākhyāyamāne pūrva sūtre asiddhiḥ syāt tatas eva pratīkeṣu brahma upāsana vat ātma upāsanam ca prasajyeta tasmāt atattvam yat yat na bhavati tad tatvena na upāsyam iti sāmānyam eva sūtrakārasya abhimatam na tu viśeṣaṇa prakṣepaḥ tathā ca brahmadṛṣṭiḥ iti pratijñā sva ukta yukti viruddhā eva iti atra vyāpteḥ nirviśeṣaṇatva abhidhānasya hetoḥ nirviśeṣaṇa tvaḥ eva tātparyam spaṣṭa tva artham tu vyāpti abhidhānam iti vācyam pratijñāvyākhyānam apākṛtya utkarṣāt iti hetu vyākhyānam apākaroti utkarṣāt iti 
NSu_4.1.49.1–4.1.49.3	 utkarṣāt brahma tā dhyāne yadi syāt phalam añjasā brahmaṇaḥ nīca tā dhyānāt anarthaḥ kim na jāyate brahma tā dhyāne pratīkānām utkarṣāt utkarṣasya dṛṣṭa tvāt añjasā phalam puruṣa artha rūpam phalam yadi syāt tadā tat eva brahmaṇaḥ nīcata adhyānam iti tasmāt anarthaḥ kim na jāyate jāyate eva iti samavyaya phala tvāt akāryam eva idam iti abhyupagamya idam samavyaya phala tvam uktam vastutas tu na puruṣa arthaḥ kim tu anarthaḥ eva iti āha acetanasya iti 
NSu_4.1.50.1–4.1.50.3	 acetanasya brahma tva dhyāne tuṣyiḥ nahi kvacid nīcasya sva ātma tā dhyāne kupyati brahma loka vat tuṣṭi aya bhāvāt ca na puruṣa artha lābhaḥ tatas kvacid iti anena yat acetanam tad upacikīrṣā lakṣaṇa tuṣyi rahitam iti vyāptim sūcayati nīcasya pratīkasya sva ātma tā dhyānāt brahma kupyati tatas ca anartham prayacchati tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ loka vat iti yathā loke śilā ādikam rāja tva ādinā cintitam na prasīdati na api puruṣa artham prayacchati yathā ca rājā caṇḍāla tvena dhyātaḥ kupyati anartham ca dadāti tathā iti arthaḥ anena pratīkānām acetana tve api brahma eva sarva adhyakṣa tvāt phalam dāsyati iti ca pratyuktam tasya anena upāsanena kupita tvāt na vayam brahmaṇi pratīka tva upāsanam brūmaḥ yena brahma kupitam anartham prayacchet kintu pratīke brahmatva upāsanam tatas puruṣa artha prāptiḥ iti atas āha caṇḍālaḥ iti 
NSu_4.1.51.1–4.1.51.4	 caṇḍālaḥ nṛpaḥ iti ukte nṛpaḥ caṇḍāle iti api kaḥ viśeṣaḥ parijñāte nṛpeṇa syāt kathañcana caṇḍālam uddiśya caṇḍālaḥ nṛpaḥ iti ukte tathā nṛpam uddiśya nṛpaḥ caṇḍāle iti ukte nṛpeṇa parijñāte sati anartha prāptau kathañcana kaḥ viśeṣaḥ syāt na kathañcid kaḥ api atra ukta śabdena dhyānam upalakṣyate ajñāta upāsanaḥ rājā na anartham karoti iti nṛpeṇa parijñātaḥ iti uktam tathā ca pratīkam brahma iti upāsane brahma pratīkam iti upāsane ca samaḥ eva anarthaḥ iti vākya śeṣaḥ nanu kṣattari rāja dṛṣṭiḥ phalavatī rājñi kṣattṛ dṛṣṭiḥ anartha hetuḥ dṛṣṭā tat katham ubhayasya sāmyam ucyate iti ced na tatra dṛṣṭeḥ abhāvāt ukti mātram tu upacāreṇa siṃhaḥ devadattaḥ iti yathā dṛṣṭau tu tatra api anartha sāmyam eva iti āśayena āha puratas iti 
NSu_4.1.52.1–4.1.52.2	 puratas naradevasya caṇḍālaḥ yadi pūjyate rāja vat kim na kopaḥ syāt rājñaḥ loke hi paśyati rājā yathā pūjyate tathā tadā rājñaḥ kopaḥ na syāt kim loke abhipaśyati sati iti kopa atiśaya pradarśana artham pūjayā darśanam unnīyate iti atas pūjyate iti uktam na kevalam dṛṣṭeḥ unnāyikāyām pūjāyām eva rāja kopaḥ kintu tādṛśya amuktau= api iti āha rājñaḥ tu iti 
NSu_4.1.53.1–4.1.53.3	 rājñaḥ tu puratas prokte caṇḍālam nṛpaḥ iti api ātmānam saḥ iti proktam itivat dhayā iva kupyati na ajñātā proktiḥ kopa jananīti atas rājñaḥ tu puratas iti uktam caṇḍāle nṛpaḥ iti prokte api prakarṣeṇa na mayā upacāreṇa ucyate api tu vastutas eva iti ukte api rājā kupyati eva hi ātmānam prati hi sa caṇḍālaḥ iti proktam prakarṣeṇa uktam itivat iti atra yathā tathā eva iti arthaḥ pūjā eva kopa kāraṇam na daśarnam iti aśaṅkā nirāsāya viveka artha mayam ślokaḥ evam uddeśa vidhāna uktayā dvairūpyam aṅgīkṛtya phalatas sāmyam uktam idanīm tat api na asti iti āha abhedena iti 
NSu_4.1.54ab.1–4.1.54f.2	 abhede na etayoḥ dhyāne kaḥ viśeṣaḥ vacasi api etayoḥ brahma pratīkayoḥ abhedena dhyāne aṅgīkṛte na kevalam anatharsāmyam kintu vacasya api kaḥ viśeṣaḥ vacana dvaya arthaḥ api aviśiṣyaḥ eva iti arthaḥ atra eva dṛṣṭāntam āha ayam iti ayam rājā tvam iti ukte caṇḍāle atha nṛpe api ca caṇḍālaḥ iti tu prokte samam eva hi dūṣaṇam vyakti bhedena dūṣaṇa parihāraḥ syāt iti atas ayam iti uktam dūṣaṇam nīca tva lakṣaṇam dvayoḥ abhedena dhyāne dūṣaṇam sambhavati eva naca evam pratīkasya hi brahma tvam bhāvyate na tu brahmaṇaḥ pratīka tvam iti atas āha dhyātaḥ iti 
NSu_4.1.55ab.1–4.1.55ab.4	 dhyāte tu ekasya tad bhāve tad bhāvaḥ anyasya kim na tat tad tayoḥ brahma pratīkayoḥ ekasya pratīkasya tad bhāve brahma bhāve dhyāte sati anyasya brahmaṇaḥ tad bhāvaḥ pratīka bhāvaḥ dhyātaḥ na kim etat uktam bhavati bhavet ayam parihāraḥ yadi pratīka svarūpa upamardena tasya brahma tvam upāsyam iti pakṣaḥ syāt na ca evam pratīka abhāva prasaṅgasya pareṇa eva ukta tvāt bheda abheda abhiprāyeṇa ayam parihāraḥ iti api na asti na hi ghaṭaḥ mṛda bhinnaḥ mṛd ghaṭāt bhinnā iti bheda abhedau kinnāma parasparam tasmāt anupamardita svarūpasya pratīkasya brahma tve dhyāte brahmaṇaḥ api pratīka tvam dhyātam eva iti yuktam uktam iti nanu asmin= upāsane brahmaṇā jñāte anarthaḥ syāt na tu ajñāte atas tathā upāsanam kariṣyate iti atas āha na ca eva iti 
NSu_4.1.55cd.1–4.1.56ab.2	 naca eva tat avijñātam sarvajña brahmaṇā kvacid tat upāsanam brahmaṇaḥ ajñāne sarva adhyakṣam brahmā eva phalam dāsyati iti riktam vacaḥ syāt nanu śruti vihitam ācaratā katham brahma kopena anartha prāptiḥ iti āśaṅkām pariharan= apavyākhyāna nirākaraṇam upasaṃharati tasmāt iti tasmāt apeśalam sarvam anyasya brahma tā vacaḥ sarvam iti śruti sūtra vyākhyāna rūpam etena sālagrāma ādau viṣṇu ādi pratipattiḥ api parāḥ tā veditavyā sūtra vyākhyānam upakramya apavya ākhyāna dūṣaṇam asaṅgatam iti atas sva ukta dārḍhya artham iti bhāvena āha tasmāt iti 
NSu_4.1.56cd.1–4.1.56cd.5	 tasmāt yathā ukta mārgeṇa brahma upāsyam mumukṣubhiḥ parakīya vyākhyānasya dūṣita tvāt yathā ukta mārgeṇa asmat uktam sūtra artham anatikramya vartamānena mārgeṇa tad adhigamaḥ uttara pūrva aghayoḥ aśleṣa vināśau tadvayapadeśāt nivṛttā sādhana cintā pratibandhānām pūrva uttarāṇām ananta karmaṇām bhāvāt na jñāninaḥ mokṣaḥ sambhavati iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya karma nāśa ākhyam jñāna phalam idānīm nirūpyate tatra jñāna sāmarthyena eva karma kṣayaḥ bhavati iti pratītim nirākartum sūtra tātparyam āha tathā iti tad adhigamaḥ uttara pūrva aghayoḥ aśleṣa vināśau tad vyapadeśāt 
NSu_4.1.57a–4.1.57e.3	 tathā upāsya añjasā dṛṣṭam brahma pāpam ca bhasmasāt karoti nikhilam pūrvam pāścāttyasya api asaṅga tām karoti tathā ukta prakāreṇa añjasā ādara nairantaryābhyām upāsya dṛṣṭam jñānāt pūrvam nikhilam pāpam caśabdāt aniṣyam puṇyam ca pāścātyasya pāpasya aniṣya puṇyasya ca anenaataḥ anyat api iti ekeṣām ubhayoḥ a iti sūtra tātparyam uktam bhavati itarasya api evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu 
NSu_4.1.57a–4.1.57e.5	 idam sūtram kecid brahma vidaḥ eva aghasya iva puṇyasya aśeṣaḥ vināśaḥ bhavati śarīra pāte pratyāsanne sati iti vyācakṣate tat asat atas anyat api iti asya punar ukta tā prasaṅgāt vyākhyāna vyākhyeya bhāvasya ca ananya gati tvāt pūrva sūtraḥ eva agha pada sthāne karma pada prakṣepeṇa upapattau sūtra antara ārambha vaiyarthyāt asmākam tu agnihotra ādi ityādi sūtrāṇi puṇye api vibhāga sūcana arthāni jñāna uttaram puṇya arjanasya abhāvāt aśleṣa śabdaḥ vināśa arthaḥ vyākhyātavyaḥ tathā ca prakṛta parityāgaḥ aprakṛta svīkāraḥ ca iti āśayavān anyathā sūtra tātparyam āha tad dviṣaḥ ca iti itarasya api evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu 
NSu_4.1.57ef.1–4.1.58e.2	 tat dviṣaḥ ca evam puṇya nāśaḥ api asaṅga tā brahma dviṣaḥ ca evam jñāni vat dveṣa paripūrteḥ pūrvasya puṇyasya nāśaḥ bhavati uttarasya asaṅga tā api atra sūtram yat eva vidyayā iti hi iti tat punaruktam etad arthasya tat śruteḥ iti sūtreṇa prāk ukta tvāt iti atas āha yat eva iti yat eva vidyayā iti atra pūrva uktāt hi viśiṣṭate atra uktam prameyam iti śeṣaḥ atas na punarukti doṣaḥ iti heratharḥ vakṣyamāṇaḥ artha vibhāgaḥ prakaraṇa vaśāt prasiddhaḥ iti vā katham viśiṣyate iti atas pūrva sūtra tātparyam tāvat āha pūrvam iti pūrvam svarga ādi labdhi artham vīryavat tvena coditam karma vidyā yutam svarga ādi iti mokṣa itara puruṣa artha grahaṇam uttara sūtra tātparyam āha paścāt iti 
NSu_4.1.58ef.1–4.1.58ef.3	 paścāt mokṣe vīrya pradam tu iti paścāttu iti sambandhaḥ vidyā yutam karma iti vartate vīrya padam ānanda atiśaya pradam iti coditam iti sambandhaḥ sakalakamarkṣaye tadā eva muktiḥ syāt na ca evam jīvanmuktānām upalambhāt itya āśaṅkā parihārāya uktam sūtrakāreṇa anārabdha kārye eva tu pūrve tad avadheḥ iti tarhi prārabdha karma bhāvāt katham mokṣaḥ iti āśaṅkaya punar sūtritam bhogena tu itare kṣaparitvā atha sampatsyate iti etat api na brahma vid mātra viṣayam iti āśayavān vyācaṣṭe tatas iti bhogena tu itare kṣapayitvā atha saṃpadyate 
NSu_4.1.59.1–4.1.60.1	 tatas bhogena puṇyam ca kṣapayitvā itarat tathā brahma dviṣ brahmadarśī ca tamaḥ mokṣau= avāpnutaḥ anārabdha kṣaya anantaram itarat pāpam prārabdha karmaṇām ananta tve bhogena kṣayaḥ na śakyā eti āśaṅkām āgama vākyena pariharati brahmaṇām iti brahmāṇam śata kālāt tu pūrvam ārabdha saṅkṣayaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tu eva tāvat tvam pañcāśat brahmaṇaḥ tathā rudrasya viṃśat eva syāt indrasya arka ādike daśa 
NSu_4.1.61.1–4.1.61.2	 anyeṣām brahma mātrasya tu antaḥ ārabdha saṅkṣayaḥ brahmaṇā eva sahātas ca param nārāyaṇam vrajet iti sat tattva vacanam svayam bhagavatā uditam brahmaṇām śatam iti ṣaṣṭhayā aluc tasya kālaḥ brahmaṇām śata kālaḥ tasmāt tad samāpteḥ pūrvam eva sarveṣām jñāninām ārabdha saṃkṣayaḥ bhavati asya eva vivaraṇam brahmaṇaḥ tu tāvat tvam eva brahma kalpānām śatena eva karma kṣayavat tvam brahmaṇaḥ iti jātau= eka vacanam pañcāśatām brahmaṇām kālāt pūrvam rudrasya ārabdha saṅkṣayaḥ tathā śabdaḥ samuccaye viṃśati paryāyaḥ viṃśat śabdaḥ brahmaṇām viṃśatiḥ eva tad avacchinnaḥ eva indrasya prārabdha karma saṃkṣaya kālaḥ arka ādike arka ādīnām daśa brahmaṇaḥ tad avacchinnaḥ karma kṣaya kālaḥ brahma mātrasya ekasya eva brahmaṇaḥ atas param prārabdha karma saṅkṣayā anantaram api brahmaṇā saha eva nārāyaṇam vrajet 
NSu_4.1.61.3	 dvitīya pāda pratipādya pradarśana param bhāṣyaṃdevānām mokṣaḥ utkrāntiḥ ca asmin pādaḥ ucyate a iti tatra devānām iti etat yadi mokṣa utkrāntibhyām sambaddhayate tadā devebhyaḥ anyeṣām sa śarīrāṇām eva avasthānam iti prāpnoti anyatra vā tad śarīra parityāga prakāraḥ cintanīyaḥ acintane vā kāraṇam vācyam yadi ca mokṣeṇa eva sambaddhayate tadā devānām mokṣaḥ itareṣām utkrāntiḥ ca iti uktam bhavati mokṣaḥ ca prakaraṇa vaśāt dehāt iti gamyate tathā ca prathama pāde karma nāśa ākhyam phalam asmin pāde ucyate iti yathā sāmānyena uktam tathā atra api utkrāntiḥ asmin pādaḥ ucyate iti vaktavyam kim anena vibhāgena kṛtam syāt iti atas āha devānām ca iti 
NSu_4.2.1.1–4.2.1.3	 devānām ca manuṣyāṇām etāvat samam eva hi utkrānti mārgau devānām na prāyeṇa bhaviṣyataḥ yat atīta pāde cintitam karma nāśa ākhyam phalam etāvat devānām manuṣyāṇām ca samam eva karma nāśa abhāve tad phala anuvṛtteḥ āvaśyaka tvāt manuṣya śabdaḥ deva vyatiriktān lakṣayati tasmāt sāmānyena pūrva pāda pratipādyam uktam etad pāda pratimā ādyāḥ dehāt utkrāntiḥ tṛtīya pāda pratipādyaḥ arciḥ ādi mārgaḥ ca devānām na prāyeṇa bhaviṣyataḥ atas vibhāgena uktiḥ yuktā iti anena mārgaḥ gamyam ca asmin pādaḥ ucyate a iti etat bhāṣyam api deva vyatiriktānām mārgaḥ sarveṣām gamyam ca iti vyākhyeyam iti sūcitam bhavati sphuṭam ca etat vakṣyati utkrānti mārgaḥ ca vimukta gamyam a iti bhavatu idam pratipādyam etad pratipādane kā saṅgatiḥ iti atas prasaṅgāt pāda catuṣyayasya api saṅgatim āha karma iti 
NSu_4.2.2.1–4.2.2.2	 karma kṣaya sa tatha utkrāntiḥ mārgaḥ bhogaḥ catuṣyayam phalam mokṣaḥ iti proktaḥ kramāt pādeṣu coditaḥ tathā śabdaḥ samuccaye utkrānti śabdena deva tadita rasa ādhāraṇaḥ carama deha nāśaḥ lakṣyate mārga śabdena brahma prāptiḥ ca iti śabdaḥ bhogaḥ iti atas paraḥ yojyaḥ kvacid pāṭhaḥ proktam iti uditam iti ca tatra yathāsthānaḥ eva iti śabdaḥ ādye mokṣa anuvādena phala catuṣyaya ātmaka tvam vidheyam dvitīye tu viparyayeṇa kramāt iti etat āvartanīyam 
NSu_4.2.2.3–4.2.2.4	 tatas ca ayam arthaḥ phalam khalu atra adhyāye nirūpaṇīyam phalam ca mokṣaḥ saca karma kṣaya ādi catuṣyayā ātmakaḥ ātyantikā niṣya nivṛttīṣya prāptyoḥ atra eva antarbhāvāt karma kṣaya ādayaḥ ca kramāt bhavanti jñāna udaya anantaram eva hi karma kṣayaḥ kṣīṇa karmaṇaḥ ca utkrāntiḥ utkrāntasya ca sva yogya mārgeṇa gatasya brahma prāptiḥ tatas bhogaḥ iti tasmāt eteṣu pādeṣu kramāt eva uditā iti antar bhāva lakṣaṇā ca anantarya lakṣaṇā ca saṅgatiḥ iti devānām mārgaḥ na asti iti uktam tat kim yatra sthitāḥ tatra eva muktāḥ bhavanti iti atas āha sraṣṭṛṣu eva iti 
NSu_4.2.3a–4.2.3d.2	 sraṣṭṛṣu eva tu sṛjyānām praveśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ laye devānām mārgaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ kvacid asraṣṭṛṣu api iti caśabdaḥ tathā ca nyāya vivaraṇe brahmaṇaḥ laye pratyāsanne sati praveśa artham tad abhisarpaṇam eva mārga gamanam iti arthaḥ tarhi devānām mārgaḥ na asti iti uktasya kaḥ viṣayaḥ iti atas āha na iti  na arciḥ ādiḥ devānām dehāt utkramaḥ na asti iti uktam tat kutas sa dehānām eva avasthāna prasakteḥ iti atas āha na ca iti  na ca utkramaḥ atas eva iti upaskartavyam caśabdena sa dehānām avasthānam samuccinoti etat eva vivṛṇoti sraṣṭuḥ iti 
NSu_4.2.4.1–4.2.4.3	 sraṣṭuḥ tu grāsa bhūtasya dehaḥ tatra layam vrajet yatas sṛjyasya devasya na eva utkrāntiḥ tatas bhavet dehaḥ cetanā adhiṣṭhitaḥ eva tatas sraṣṭari utkrāntiḥ śarīram cetana niṣkramaṇāt prāk eva sṛjyānām dehaḥ sraṣṭṛṣu vilīyata yatas iti arthaḥ sraṣṭṛṣu laye nimittam sraṣṭuḥ grāsa bhūtasya iti dehaḥ tu iti sambandhaḥ devānām arciḥ ādi mārgaḥ na asti iti uktam tat kutas iti atas yat purā mārga antara m uktam tatas eva etat siddham iti āśayavān statanuvādena yuktayantaram āha layāt ca iti 
NSu_4.2.5.1–4.2.5.2	 layāt ca eva arcira ādīnām lokānām api sarvaśas katham mārgaḥ bhavet teṣām viśatām uttamam svatas devatā mukteḥ prāk eva iti arthaḥ arciḥ ādīnām lokānām iti vyadhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhayau sarveṣām api bhavet arciḥ ādiḥ iti śeṣaḥ svatas uttaram viśatām iti ukta anuvādaḥ nanu prāyeṇa iti ukta tvāt kadācid devānām utkrānti mārgau= aṅgī kāryau tatra ukta yukti virodhaḥ iti atas āha jātānām iti 
NSu_4.2.6.1–4.2.6.3	 jātānām mānuṣe loke devānām ca kadācana utkrānti mārgau bhavataḥ na tadā muktiḥ iṣyate yadi api bhavataḥ tathā api na tadā muktiḥ iṣyate kintu brahmaṇā saha eva atas na ukta yukti virodhaḥ etat uktam bhavati utkrānti mārga sāmānyam apekṣya eva prāyeṇa iti uktam na tu mukti kālīnau= utkrānti mārgau tasya ca vyāvartya avamokṣa kālīnau yuktiḥ tu mukti viṣaya iti na virodhaḥ iti kim devānām eva brahmaṇā saha muktiḥ anyeṣām api iti brūmaḥ tarhi bheje khaga indra dhvaja pāda mūlam a ityādi virodhaḥ iti atas āha anyeṣām api iti 
NSu_4.2.7.1–4.2.7.3	 anyeṣām api sākṣāt tu muktiḥ prāpya api tam harim saha eva brahmaṇā bhūyāt iti śāstrasya nirṇayaḥ sākṣāt muktiḥ liṅga śarīra bhaṅga lakṣaṇāḥ prāpya avasthitānām api iti yojyam tam iti vaikuṇṭha ādi stham chandasi ubhayathā iti anāśīḥ viṣayasya api liṅaḥ ārdhadhātuka tvāt bhūyāt iti sādhu iti īśvara āśīḥ iti asmin pakṣe sādhyam ādau pṛthak vācyam tasya nimittam jñāpakam ca anena ucyate iti iti śāstrasya nirṇayaḥ iti uktam eva vivṛṇoti kṣmā iti 
NSu_4.2.8.1–4.2.11.1	 kṣmā ambhaḥ nala anila viyat ma nā aindriya artha bhūta ādibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ pratisañjighṛkṣuḥ avyākṛtam viśati yarhi guṇatraya ātmā kālam param svam anubhūya paraḥ svayambhūḥ evam paretya bhagavantam anupraviṣṭāḥ ye yoginaḥ jita marut manasaḥ virāgāḥ tena eva sākam amṛtam puruṣam purāṇam brahma pradhānam upayānti agata abhimānāḥ bhagavantam anuprāptāḥ api tu brahmaṇā saha paramam mokṣam āyānti liṅga bhaṅgena yoginaḥ prāptāḥ api param devam saha eva brahmaṇā punar ānanda vyaktiyāyānti pūrṇām liṅgasya bhaṅgataḥ 
NSu_4.2.12ab.1–4.2.12ab.3	 iti śruti purāṇa ukti balāt vijñāyate ca tat bhūtānām ādiḥ bhūta ādiḥ kṣmā adipadaiḥ pañcānām mahābhūtānām manasaḥ daśānām indriyāṇām pañcānām viṣayāṇām bhūta ādi pada upalakṣitasya trividhasya api ahaṅkārasya abhimāninaḥ devāḥ ucyante avyākṛtam parameśvaram yarhi yadā guṇatrayasya ātmā abhimānī param para saṅkhayā upetam paraḥ kṣmā ādibhyaḥ evam tadā bhagavantam iti tadīyam lokam agata abhimānāḥ agata jīva bhāvāḥ paramam mokṣam iti asya eva vivaraṇam liṅga bhaṅgena iti ittham bhūta lakṣaṇe tṛtīyā yat vā liṅga bhaṅgena nimittena paramam mokṣam ānanda āvirbhāvam āyānti iti vyākhyeyam tat ca iti caśabdena sraṣṭṛṣu eva iti uktam samuccinoti śruti ādikam bhāṣya udāhṛtam grāhyam nanu yathā dvitīya tṛtīya pāda pratipādyam utkrama ādi kamasādhāraṇam tathā caturtha pāda uditaḥ bhogaḥ kim asādhāraṇaḥ kiṃvā prathama pāda udita karma kṣayaḥ iva sādhāraṇaḥ iti apekṣāyām āha bhogaḥ tu iti 
NSu_4.2.12cd.1–4.2.13c.3	 bhogaḥ tu sarva devānām nara ādīnām ca vidyate asādha araṇye pramāṇa abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ asmin prathama bhāṣye devānām mokṣaḥ iti prathama nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ tasya tātparyam āha tatra iti tatra praveśaḥ devānām uttarottarataḥ kramāt ucyate tatra dvitīya pāde prathamam iti śeṣaḥ uttarottarataḥ uttarottareṣu atas prathamam asau nirdiṣyaḥ iti nanu ayuktam etat vāc manasi ityādi sūtreṣu devānām aśravaṇāt atha vāc ādi śabdāḥ tad abhimāninām upalakṣakāḥ iti matam tadā sati vācake lākṣaṇika prayogasya prayojanam vācyam yat vā vācakāḥ eva iti pakṣaḥ tathā api prasiddha śabda parityāgena aprasiddha pada prayoge prayojanam vaktavyam eva iti atas āha deha iti 
NSu_4.2.13.1–4.2.13.2	 deha gānām ca vṛttīnām evam eva tu bāhya tattva vyāvṛtti artham deha gānām iti uktam vartate dehaḥ etābhiḥ iti vṛttayaḥ jaḍāḥ vāc ādyāḥ yathā mucyamānānām devānām evam eva deha gānām tad abhimatānām vāc ādīnām uttarottareṣu maraṇa kāle layaḥ bhavati iti etat api prasaṅgāt jñāpayitum vāc ādi pada prayogaḥ iti bhāvaḥ vāc ādi śabdāḥ devānām vācakāḥ eva iti tuśabdena sūcayati 
NSu_4.2.13.3	 bhavet evam padārthaḥ saṅgatiḥ ca yadi bhagavat jñāna bhogābhyām nivṛtta samasta aniṣya karmāṇaḥ sva uttama praveśena brahma nāḍya utkrameṇa vā parityakta dehāḥ sva ucitena acirra ādinā vā pathā vaikuṇṭha loka vāsinam bhagavantam hiraṇyagarbheṇa saha prāptāḥ bhinna liṅga śarīrāḥ vidhvasta prakṛtayaḥ atyanta nivṛtta aniṣyāḥ samyak āvirbhūta ānanda ādi guṇāḥ bhagavat samīpaḥ eva tad upāsīnāḥ sva rūpeṇa vā līlā nivṛtta aniṣyāḥ samyak āvirbhūta ānanda ādi guṇāḥ bhagavat samīpaḥ eva tam upāsīnāḥ sva rūpeṇa vā līlā gṛhīta vigrahaiḥ vā saṅkalpa mātra sādhyān divya bhogān= tāratamyena bhuñjānāḥ na kadācid punar āvartanta iti etat mokṣa svarūpaṃkarma kṣayaḥ tathā utkrāntiḥ a ityādinā uktam niścitam syāt na ca evam taiḥ taiḥ vādibhiḥ anyathāmokṣa svarūpasya varṇita tvāt vipratipattau ca saṃśayasya dhruva tvāt iti atas āha tatra iti 
NSu_4.2.14a–4.2.14c.2	 tatra mokṣa svarūpam tu vādinaḥ pratibhā āśrayāt nānā vadanti tatra tathā sati sūtra kāreṇa ukta lakṣaṇe mokṣe śruti ādi pramāṇaiḥ upapādite sati vādinaḥ tu pratibhā āśrayāt sva utprekṣā mātreṇa nānā vadanti atas pramāṇa mūla tvāt asya apramāṇa mūlānām utprekṣā mātra yonīnām vādānām ca sāmya abhāvāt na saṃśaya avakāśaḥ 
NSu_4.2.14a–4.2.14f.1	 nanu yadi tathā tathā pramāṇāni santi tarhi tad tad vādinām tādṛśāni jñānāni kutas na jāyante pramāṇa ābhāsaiḥ vimohitāḥ te iti ced tattva jña abhimatāḥ api kutas ta enar vimūḍhāḥ doṣa darśanāt iti ced itare api kutas na doṣān paśyanti pramāṇaiḥ tattva jñāna udayaḥ api samānaḥ iti atas mūla kāraṇam āha puṃsām hi iti  puṃsām hi matayaḥ guṇa bhedataḥ pṛthak pṛthak prajāyante guṇa bhedaḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ hi śabdena jñānam karma ca kartā a ityādi pramāṇa prasiddhim dyotayati etat viśadayati tamasā eva iti  tamasā eva anyathāmatiḥ 
NSu_4.2.15ab.1–4.2.15cd.1	 rajasā miśra buddhi tvam sattvena eva yathā matiḥ miśra jñāne anyathātvam samyaktavam ca asti iti atas anyathā eva iti uktam yathā iti bhinnam padam samyak vācī tamaḥ guṇaḥ pramāṇeṣu cetaḥ pravṛttim pratibadhya ābhāsānām doṣān ācchādya viparīta jñānam api utpādayati ityādi draṣṭavyam samyak jñānam sattva guṇena bhavati iti uktam tasya mukteṣu tāvat apavādam āha guṇa iti guṇa atītā vimuktānām matiḥ śuddha citiḥ yatas 
NSu_4.2.16a.1–4.2.16a.3	 sāmyak evā atha nityā ca yadi api vimuktānām matiḥ samyak eva atha api guṇa atītā sattva janyā na bhavati kutas śuddhacitiḥ nityā ca yatas jaḍam hi kutaścid jāyate na cetanam tathā anityam eva na nityam daityānām svarūpa jñāneṣu avidyamānam samyaktavam tarhi katham iti atas śuddhā iti uktam svābhāvika doṣa rahitā iti arthaḥ svarūpa upādhi gata dāṣa nibandhanam hi daityānām jñānānām asamyak tvam karaṇa nimittaḥ jñānānām viṣaya niyamaḥ vaiśadya bhedaḥ ca tatra yadi muktānām jñānam nityam tarhi nirviṣayam vā syāt sarva viṣayam vā evam vaiśadye api iti tatra āha tat tat iti 
NSu_4.2.16bc.1–4.2.17f.1	 tad tad māhātmya yogataḥ bahalā ca ati viśadāḥ teṣām teṣām māhātmyam yogyatā rūpam tat eva yogaḥ nimittam tatas tad anusāreṇa bahula artha viṣayiṇī ati viśadā ca śrī devyām api uktasya apavādam āha spaṣṭā ca iti  spaṣṭā ca eva śriyaḥ matiḥ mahā śuddha citi tvena śriyaḥ matiḥ ca samyaktave api guṇa atīta iti sambandhaḥ mahā śuddha citi tvena iti pūrvavat eva tatra hetuḥ mahat śabdena kadāpi doṣa sambandhaḥ na asti iti ucyate spaṣṭā eva iti bhukta mateḥ api atiśayena viśadā iti arthaḥ etat api pūrvavat vaya ākhyeyam bhagavat jñāne api apavādam āha tatas api iti  tatas api ati mahā citiḥ aśeṣa uru viśeṣāṇām ati spaṣṭa tayā dṛśiḥ nityam eka prakārā ca nārāyaṇa matiḥ parā 
NSu_4.2.18.1–4.2.18.2^1	 sūrya prabhāvat akhilam bhāsayanti nirantarā nirlepā vīta doṣā ca nityam eva avikāriṇī nārāyaṇa matiḥ ca samyaktave api parā guṇebhyaḥ iti śeṣaḥ tatra pūrvavat eva hetuḥ tatas śriyaḥ api atiśayena mahā śuddha citiḥ viśiṣyante iti viśeṣāḥ padārthāḥ aśeṣāṇāmurūṇām anantānām viśeṣāṇām dṛśiḥ viṣayī kāriṇī ati spaṣṭa tayā aśeṣa padārtha viṣaya iti etat api bahulā ca ati viśada itiva dvaya ākhyeyam dṛśiḥ sākṣātkāraḥ iti vā nityam eka prakāra iti utpatti vināśa rahitā iti ayam api guṇa atīta tve hetuḥ kecid ekam eva īśvara jñānam iti āsthitāḥ apare tu anekāni iti tad viveka artham uktam nirantarā nirbheda iti 
NSu_4.2.18.2^2–4.2.18.3	 tarhi kim teṣu teṣu padārtheṣu jñāteṣu vikriyate na iti āha nityam avikāriṇī eva iti katham tarhi tad tad viṣayīkaraṇam iti atas uktam sūrya iti yathā sūrya prabhā svayam nirvikāra api tān= tān prāptān viṣayān prakāśayati tathā iyam api iti arthaḥ atra ca viśeṣaḥ eva nirvāhakaḥ atas eva eka iti anuktavā nirantara iti uktam nirlepā vīta doṣā ca iti śuddha tva vyākhyānam lepaḥ karma sambandhaḥ mahat śabda vyākhyānam pūrvavat yat vā nityam eva iti tad artham atra api yojyam parā svatantrā iti ati śabdasya vyākhyāta tvena api vyākhyeyam atas eva tat tantra tvāt ca iti vakṣyati etāni viśeṣaṇāni lakṣmī māne api atidiśati viśeṣāni iti 
NSu_4.2.19ab.1–4.2.19e.3	 viśeṣa aṃsa tad gatān= tyaktavā prāyas tad lakṣaṇā śriyaḥ tad gatān bhagavat gatān= tāni lakṣaṇāni yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā śriyaḥ matiḥ pratipattavyā iti śeṣaḥ bhagavat gata aśeṣa viśeṣa viṣayīkāri tvam vihāya ani adharmavatī jñātavyā iti arthaḥ prāyas iti uktasya tātparyam āha tathā eva iti tathā eva spaṣṭa tā bhāvāt tad tantra tvāt ca kevalam na tādṛśī yathā bhagavat mateḥ niratiśaya spaṣṭa tvam tathā eva kevalam tat tantra tvāt bhagavat mātra adhīna tvāt atra kevalam iti sva rūpa kathanam para adhīna tvāt iti eva hetuḥ tādṛśī bhagavat mati sadṛśī atas prāyas iti uktam iti bhāvaḥ lakṣmīm ati viśeṣaṇāni mukta brahma matau= ati diśati brahmaṇaḥ tu iti 
NSu_4.2.19ef.1–4.2.20ab.2	 brahmaṇaḥ tu prāyas eva śriyaḥ yathā brahmaṇaḥ tu matiḥ śriyaḥ yathā evam prāyas tathā vaiśadya ādi abhāvāt prāyas iti uktam kevalam iti uktaya bhāvāt ca atas eva tatra tat uktam brahmaṇaḥ iti viśiṣya abhidhāne kaḥ hetuḥ iti atas āha muktānām tu iti muktānām tu tad anyeṣām samudrataraā upamā viśeṣa balena vṛddhihrāsavatī iti arthaḥ yathā uktam avṛddhi hrāsa rūpa tvam ityādi mukta grahaṇasya tātparyam āha agni iti 
NSu_4.2.20cd.1–4.2.21ab.2	 agni jvālā vat eva syāt smṛti gānām dṛśaḥ bhavaḥ agni jvālāyāḥ agneḥ iva saṃsāriṇām dṛśaḥ antaḥkaraṇāt bhavaḥ utpattiḥ eva syāt na tu vyakti mātram bhavatu evam jñānānām guṇa nimittam nānāvidha tvam prakṛte tu kim iti atas āha evaṃvidheṣu iti evaṃvidheṣu jñāneṣu tamasā muṣya dṛṣṭayaḥ jñāneṣu evaṃvidheṣu satsu muṣya dṛṣṭayaḥ apahṛta samyak jñānāḥ samyak jñāna abhāve anyathādṛktavam api na upapadyate adhiṣṭhāna sāmānya jñānasya bhrānti upayogi tvāt iti atas uktam khadyotā iti 
NSu_4.2.21c–4.2.21f.2	 khadyota sadṛśa ati alpa jñāna tvāt anyathā dṛśaḥ vadanti vādinaḥ mokṣam nānā mata samāśrayāt yathā andhatamase khadyotāḥ api bhaya hetavaḥ tathā viparyaya bahulam alpam samyak jñānam api tāmasam eva yathā uktam atattva arthavat alpam ca iti nānā mata samāśraya at nānāḥ vadanti iti yojanā jñānānām guṇa vaśāt anekavidha tva upapatteḥ tamasā avṛttāḥ vādinaḥ 
NSu_4.2.21c–4.2.21f.4	 pramāṇa avadhīraṇāt samyak jñāna vikalāḥ ābhāsa ādaraṇāt adhiṣṭhāna sāmānya jñāna vat tvāt ca viparīta jñāninaḥ mokṣam nānāvidham ācakṣate iti arthaḥ kāraṇa eka tvāt mithyājñānena api ekavidhena bhāvyam iti ced na saha kāri vaicitryāt vaicitrya upapatteḥ tat idam uktam nānā matam āśrayāt iti matānām ca pravāheṇa anādi tvam uktam mūla kāraṇe tamaḥ guṇe api vaicitryāt ca atas eva uktam guṇa bhedataḥ iti samadhigatam etat nānāvidheṣu mokṣa vādeṣu ekaḥ pramāṇa mūlaḥ anye mithyājñāna mūlāḥ iti na tu viśeṣaḥ atas punar saṃśayaḥ eva ityata para matānām sarveṣām heya tvam didarśayiṣuḥ ādau tāvat jina uditam mokṣa svarūpam anuvadati āśritya iti 
NSu_4.2.22ab.1–4.2.22cd.2	 āśritya pratibhām āha jinaḥ tatra atitāmasīm tatra teṣu vādiṣu veda prāmāṇya anaṅgīkārāt ati tāmasīm iti uktam kim āha iti atas aha jñānāt iti jñānāt karma kṣayāt mokṣaḥ bhavet deha ākhya pañjarāt jñānāt keṣāñcid karmaṇām kṣayaḥ bhavati keṣāñcid bhogāt tatas karma kṣayāt pakṣiṇaḥ pañjarāt ivaḥ ātmanaḥ dehāt mokṣaḥ bhavet deha avasthānasya karma nimitta tvāt tatas katham vartate iti atas āha pañjara iti 
NSu_4.2.23.1–4.2.24a.2	 pañjara unmukta khaga vat alākā kāśa gocaraḥ nityam ūrdhvam vrajati eva pudgalaḥ hasta pādavān iti yathā pañjara unmuktaḥ khagaḥ ūrdhvam vrajati evam eva ūrdhvam vrajati ayam tu viśeṣaḥ aloka ākāśaḥ gocaraḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ nityam eva iti ca deha parimāṇasya ātmanaḥ deha abhāve parimāṇa abhāva prāptau uktam hasta pādavān iti carama dehasya yaḥ sanniveśaḥ tathābhūtaḥ iti arthaḥ iti āha iti sambandhaḥ anūditam dūṣayati tat iti 
NSu_4.2.24ab.1–4.2.24ab.3	 tat kena mānena mokṣa rūpam pradṛśyate pradarśyate param prati jinena yat api ananta catuṣyayā avāptiḥ muktasya ucyate jinena tathā api sā sampratipanna tvāt na anūditā na api dūṣitāḥ katham ukta mokṣa svarūpam aprāmāṇikam iti ced na tāvat atra pratyakṣam asti na api āgamaḥ tadīya āgamasya asmābhiḥ anaṅgīkārāt veda ādeḥ ca pareṇa anaṅgīkṛta tvāt atas kevalam kiñcid anumānam vaktavyam tatra āha gatiḥ iti 
NSu_4.2.24c–4.2.24f.3^1	 gatiḥ ūrdhvā ca duḥkhetā gati tvāt laukikī yathā iti ukte ca anumāna eka śaraṇasya kim uttaram caśabdaḥ anukta samuccaya arthaḥ tena vipratipannā iti pratijñāyām siddhayati hetau ca cetanā āśritā iti tena acetana gatau bādhaḥ devadatta gatau siddhārtha tvam acetana gatau vyabhicāraḥ ca na sambhavati duḥkhenetā prāptā duḥkhetāḥ prāptiḥ ca na sādhya sādhana bhāva lakṣaṇāḥ tathā sati devadattasya sukha arthāyām manda gatau vyabhicāra āpātāt dūra tvasya ca aniyata tvāt tīvra tvasya api apariniṣṭhita tvāt kim tarhi samāna kālīnena duḥkhena saha eka adhikaraṇa tva lakṣaṇā 
NSu_4.2.24c–4.2.24f.3^2	 kadācid devadattaḥ duḥkhena vinā api gacchati tatra vyabhicāraḥ iti ced na devadattasya kadāpi nirduḥkha tāyāḥ anaṅgīkārāt ādhyātmika ādiṣu anyatamena mahatā alpena vā ayam khalu sadā saṃvalitaḥ cetana śabdena jāgrataḥ abhidhānāt na supta gatau vyabhicāraḥ sukha arthā api gatiḥ alpam duḥkham utpādayati iti abhyupagamya duḥkha sādhana tvam vā sādhyam laukikī devadatta ādi gatiḥ iti ca pratyanumāne kenacid ukte ekam ca tat śaraṇam ca eka śaraṇam anumānam eka śaraṇam yasya asau tathā uktaḥ anyathā pūrva kāla eka iti eka śabdasya pūrva nipātaḥ syāt pratyanumānasya uttaram śaṅkate anūrdhva iti 
NSu_4.2.25ab.1–4.2.25b–4.2.25d.3^1	 anūrdhva gati tā tatra yadi upādhiḥ tatra devadatta gateḥ duḥkha ta tve anūrdhva tā viśiṣyam gati tvam prayojakam na gati tva mātram iti yadi brūyāt iti arthaḥ pakṣetaraḥ ayam kasmāt śaṅkitaḥ iti ced na lakṣaṇa sampattau tad upādhi tvasya ukta tvāt nirākaroti khagasya iti  khagasya ca dūra ūrdhva gamane duḥkham iti sādhya anugaḥ na saḥ tadā vadāmaḥ iti ādau= upaskartavyam khagasya pārāvata ādeḥ dūra udhvargamane ca duḥkham asti iti hetoḥ saḥ upādhiḥ sādhya anugaḥ sādhya vyāpakaḥ na bhavati iti atas anupādhiḥ idam uktam bhavati kim ayam kevala sādhya vyāpakaḥ abhimataḥ kim vā sādhana avacchinna sādhya vyāpakaḥ na prathamaḥ adharme sādhya sadbhāve api anūrdhva tā viśiṣya gati tvasya abhāvena sādhya avyāpaka tvāt na dvitīyaḥ khagasya dūra ūrdhva gatau gati tva avacchinne duḥkhetatve sati api anūdhvargati tvasya abhāvāt 
NSu_4.2.25b–4.2.25d.3^2	 anena ūrdhva gati tva abhāvaḥ anūrdhva gati tvam kevala sādhye upādhiḥ iti api prayuktam iti dūra grahaṇam khagasya duḥkham vyañjayitum tadā hi tasmin duḥkha kāryāṇi dṛśyante pratyāgamana samaya varti duḥkha kāryāṇi tāni iti ced na ūrdhvam gacchati eva tad darśanāt mā bhūt ayam upādhiḥ śarīra vṛtti tvam tu bhaviṣyati devadatta gatau yat duḥkhe tattvam tatra na gati tvam prayojakam kim nāma śarīra vṛtti tvam na ca idam sādhya avyāpakam yat duḥkhetam tat śarīri vṛtti iti asya vyabhicāra adarśanāt iti ataḥ sarva upādhi sādhāraṇam dūṣaṇam āha pratisādhana iti 
NSu_4.2.26a–4.2.26c.2	 pratisādhana rūpasya na anumānasya dūṣaṇam upādhiḥ jina ukta anumānānām pratisādhanam khalu asmābhiḥ upanyastam pratisādhana rūpasya anumānasya ca upādhiḥ na dūṣaṇam atas atra upādhi udbhāvanam eva asaṅgatam kim tad dūṣaṇa gaveṣaṇena pūrva upādheḥ tu aṅgīkāreṇa dūṣaṇam abhihitam iti kutas na iti atas āha pratirūpam hi iti 
NSu_4.2.26cd.1–4.2.26cd.4	 pratirūpam hi sādhanam tat na ca aparam yadupādhiḥ nāma dūṣaṇam tad pratirūpam sādhanam na tvanaikānti ādikam hi śabdaḥ yasmāt iti arthe etat uktam bhavati upādhiḥ tāvat pratipakṣa unnāyakaḥ na itara sthā dūṣaṇam tatas pratipakṣasya upādhim udbhāvayatā pratipakṣaḥ eva udbhāvitaḥ bhavati pratipakṣaḥ ca sādhanāya pravṛttam pratibadhnāti na punar kiñcid sādhayati prathamena eva pratibaddha tvāt atas pratipakṣasya pratipakṣaḥ akiñcitkara tvāt na dūṣaṇam atas eva upādhiḥ api iti nanu pakṣa ādi pravibhāga uttara kālam upādhiḥ pratipakṣasya unnāyakaḥ bhavati eva prāk tu tatas avyāpteḥ unnāyakaḥ atas tad apekṣayā śarīra vṛtti tvam upādhiḥ bhavatu iti atas abhyupagamya dūṣayati atha api iti 
NSu_4.2.27ab.1–4.2.27ab.2	 atha api sa śarīra tvam ca atra upādhiḥ na vai bhavet yadi kayācid vivakṣayā pratipakṣasya api upādhiḥ ucyate tathā api sa śarīra tvam śarīreṇa saha vartamāna tvam śarīra samāna āśraya tvam śarīra vṛtti tvam iti yāvat na kevala m anūrdhva gati tvam iti caśabdaḥ atra asmad ukta anumāne vaiśabdaḥ avadhāraṇe kutas na bhavet iti atas āha gati tvam iti 
NSu_4.2.27cd.1–4.2.27cd.3	 gati tvam yatra dehi tvam iti yat sādhana anugam yatra gati tvam viśiṣyam tatra dehi tvam dehena sambandhaḥ pūrva uktaḥ dehi vṛtti tvam iti yāvat iti prakāreṇa śarīra vṛtti tvam sādhana anugam sādhanasya viśiṣya gati tvasya vyāpakam yadi asmāt iti arthaḥ syāt etat yat kiñcit gati pakṣīkāre bādha ādi prasaṅgāt muktānām gatiḥ pakṣīkaraṇīyā tasyāḥ duḥkheta tva sādhane bhavatām apasiddhāntaḥ syāt bhavadbhiḥ api muktānām nirduḥkha tvasya abhyupagata tvāt tathā yā gatiḥ sā duḥkheta iti vyāptim vadatā īśvarasya api duḥkham aṅgīkaraṇīyam anyathā tatra vyabhicāra āpatteḥ tatas api apasiddhāntaḥ eva śarīra vṛtti tvasya sādhana vyāpaka tā aṅgīkāre gatimat tvāt īśvarasya api śarīri tvam aṅgī kāryam tatas ca apasiddhāntaḥ eva iti atas āha āgama iti 
NSu_4.2.28a–4.2.28c.2	 āgamān anusāri tve prasaṅgaḥ ayam yatas tatas na apasiddhānta tā doṣaḥ yatas veda ādikam āgamam anusṛtya mokṣa svarūpa anumāne ati prasaṅgaḥ ayam asmābhiḥ uktaḥ yadi veda ādi nirapekṣaḥ tvam evam anumimīṣe tadā evam api kasmāt na anuminuyā iti tatas kāraṇāt apasiddha anta tā doṣaḥ na bhavati prasaṅge api apasiddhāntam udbhāvayantam bodhayitum āha prasaṅgaḥ iti 
NSu_4.2.28de.1–4.2.28f.3	 prasaṅge yadi sā bhavet tadā eva atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt sā apasiddhānta tā bhavet doṣaḥ iti śeṣaḥ katham atiprasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha na iti  na pasaṅgaḥ kvacid bhavet iti śabdaḥ atra ante adhyāhāryaḥ sarveṣu api prasaṅgeṣu apasiddhāntasya kathañcid udbhāvayitum śakya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ etena muktānām satata ūrdhva gatiḥ siddhā ced bādhaḥ anyathā aśraya asiddhiḥ iti api parāḥ tam para siddha āśraye pratipakṣasya prasañjanāt upādhi antaram āśaṅkate loka iti 
NSu_4.2.29ab.1–4.2.30cd.1	 loka ākāśa gati tvam ced upādhiḥ atra loka ākāśa sambandhi tvam eva upādhiḥ sādhya vyāpaka tvāt gati tvam tu svarūpa kathanam dūṣayati sādhana iti  sādhana anugaḥ saḥ api iti ukte vadet kim sa yā gatiḥ sā loka ākāśa sambandhinī iti saḥ api upādhiḥ sādhanam anugacchati vyāpnoti mukta gatau= upādheḥ abhāvāt na iti ced na tatra api gati tvena tad sādhanam etena śarīri vṛtti tvasya api sādhana vyāpaka tvam samarthitam veditavyam tat idam uktam iti ukte vadet kim saḥ iti sva abhimate mokṣe pramāṇam upadaśaryan= upasaṃharati tasmāt iti  tasmāt veda uditaḥ bhavet mokṣa jina ukte mokṣa svarūpe pramāṇa abhāvāt ukta doṣa atideśena bauddhektam api mokṣam dūṣayati evam iti  evam svayam viṣṇuḥ yadi api īśaḥ hi aśeṣa vid cakāra saugata matam mohāya eva cakāra yat
